leviticus 3:14	wehiqriw mimenu qarebano, ’isheh yhoh; ’et haHeilew hamkhasseh ’et haqerew, we’eit kal haHeilew, ’asher ‘al haqerew. 
leviticus 3:15	we’eit shetei hakelayot, we’et haHeilew ’asher ‘aleihen, ’asher ‘al hakesalim; we’et hayoteret ‘al hakaweid, ‘al hakelayot yesirenah. 
leviticus 3:16	wehiqTiram hakohein hamicbeiHah; leHem ’isheh lereiaH niHoaH, kal Heilew yhoh. 
leviticus 3:17	Huqat ‘olam ledoroteikhem, bekhol moshewoteikhem; kal Heilew wekhal dam lo tokheilu.
leviticus 4:1	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 4:2	dabeir ’el benei yisra’eil leimor nefesh, ki teHeTa wishgagah mikol mizwot yhoh, ’asher lo tei‘asenah; we‘asah mei’aHat meiheinah. 
leviticus 4:3	’im hakohein hamashiaH yeHeTa le’ashmat ha‘am; wehiqriw ‘al HaTato ’asher HaTa par ben baqar tamim yhoh leHaTat. 
leviticus 4:4	weheiwi ’et hapar, ’el petaH ’ohel mo‘eid lifnei yhoh; wesamakh ’et yado ‘al rosh hapar, weshaHaT ’et hapar lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 4:5	welaqaH hakohein hamashiaH midam hapar; weheiwi ’oto ’el ’ohel mo‘eid. 
leviticus 4:6	weTawal hakohein ’et ’ezba‘o badam; wehiccah min hadam shewa‘ pe‘amim lifnei yhoh, ’et penei parokhet haqodesh. 
leviticus 4:7	wenatan hakohein min hadam ‘al qarnot micbaH qeToret hassamim lifnei yhoh, ’asher be’ohel mo‘eid; we’eit kal dam hapar, yishpokh ’el yesod micbaH ha‘olah, ’asher petaH ’ohel mo‘eid. 
leviticus 4:8	we’et kal Heilew par haHaTat yarim mimenu; ’et haHeilew hamkhasseh ‘al haqerew, we’eit kal haHeilew, ’asher ‘al haqerew. 
leviticus 4:9	we’eit shetei hakelayot, we’et haHeilew ’asher ‘aleihen, ’asher ‘al hakesalim; we’et hayoteret ‘al hakaweid, ‘al hakelayot yesirenah. 
leviticus 4:10	ka’asher yuram, mishor cewaH hashelamim; wehiqTiram hakohein, ‘al micbaH ha‘olah. 
leviticus 4:11	we’et ‘or hapar we’et kal besaro, ‘al rosho we‘al kera‘aw; weqirbo ufirsho. 
leviticus 4:12	wehozi ’et kal hapar ’el miHuz lamaHaneh ’el maqom Tahor ’el shefekh hadeshen, wesaraf ’oto ‘al ‘eizim ba’eish; ‘al shefekh hadeshen yisareif.
leviticus 4:13	we’im kal ‘adat yisra’eil yishgu, wene‘lam dawar, mei‘einei haqahal; we‘asu ’aHat mikal mizwot yhoh ’asher lo tei‘asenah we’asheimu. 
leviticus 4:14	wenod‘ah haHaTat, ’asher HaTe’u ‘aleha; wehiqriwu haqahal par ben baqar leHaTat, weheiwi’u ’oto, lifnei ’ohel mo‘eid. 
leviticus 4:15	wesamekhu ciqnei ha‘eidah ’et yedeihem ‘al rosh hapar lifnei yhoh; weshaHaT ’et hapar lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 4:16	weheiwi hakohein hamashiaH midam hapar; ’el ’ohel mo‘eid. 
leviticus 4:17	weTawal hakohein ’ezba‘o min hadam; wehiccah shewa‘ pe‘amim lifnei yhoh, ’eit penei haparokhet. 
leviticus 4:18	umin hadam yitein ‘al qarnot hamicbeiaH, ’asher lifnei yhoh, ’asher be’ohel mo‘eid; we’eit kal hadam, yishpokh ’el yesod micbaH ha‘olah, ’asher petaH ’ohel mo‘eid. 
leviticus 4:19	we’eit kal Helbo yarim mimenu; wehiqTir hamicbeiHah. 
leviticus 4:20	we‘asah lapar, ka’asher ‘asah lefar haHaTat, kein ya‘aseh lo; wekhiper ‘aleihem hakohein wenislaH lahem. 
leviticus 4:21	wehozi ’et hapar, ’el miHuz lamaHaneh, wesaraf ’oto, ka’asher saraf, ’eit hapar harishon; HaTat haqahal hu.
leviticus 4:22	’asher nasi yeHeTa; we‘asah ’aHat mikal mizwot yhoh ’elohaw ’asher lo tei‘asenah bishgagah we’asheim. 
leviticus 4:23	’o hoda‘ ’eilaw HaTato, ’asher HaTa bah; weheiwi ’et qarebano se‘ir ‘iccim cakhar tamim. 
leviticus 4:24	wesamakh yado ‘al rosh hasa‘ir, weshaHaT ’oto, bimqom ’asher yishHaT ’et ha‘olah lifnei yhoh; HaTat hu. 
leviticus 4:25	welaqaH hakohein midam haHaTat be’ezba‘o, wenatan ‘al qarnot micbaH ha‘olah; we’et damo yishpokh, ’el yesod micbaH ha‘olah. 
leviticus 4:26	we’et kal Helbo yaqTir hamicbeiHah, keHeilew cewaH hashelamim; wekhiper ‘alaw hakohein meiHaTato wenislaH lo.
leviticus 4:27	we’im nefesh ’aHat teHeTa wishgagah mei‘am ha’arez; ba‘asotah ’aHat mimizwot yhoh ’asher lo tei‘asenah we’asheim. 
leviticus 4:28	’o hoda‘ ’eilaw, HaTato ’asher HaTa; weheiwi qarebano se‘irat ‘iccim temimah neqeiwah, ‘al HaTato ’asher HaTa. 
leviticus 4:29	wesamakh ’et yado, ‘al rosh haHaTat; weshaHaT ’et haHaTat, bimqom ha‘olah. 
leviticus 4:30	welaqaH hakohein midamah be’ezba‘o, wenatan ‘al qarnot micbaH ha‘olah; we’et kal damah yishpokh, ’el yesod hamicbeiaH. 
leviticus 4:31	we’et kal Helbah yasir, ka’asher husar Heilew mei‘al cewaH hashelamim wehiqTir hakohein hamicbeiHah, lereiaH niHoaH yhoh; wekhiper ‘alaw hakohein wenislaH lo.
leviticus 4:32	we’im kewes yawi qarebano leHaTat; neqeiwah temimah yewi’enah. 
leviticus 4:33	wesamakh ’et yado, ‘al rosh haHaTat; weshaHaT ’otah leHaTat, bimqom ’asher yishHaT ’et ha‘olah. 
leviticus 4:34	welaqaH hakohein midam haHaTat be’ezba‘o, wenatan ‘al qarnot micbaH ha‘olah; we’et kal damah yishpokh, ’el yesod hamicbeiaH. 
leviticus 4:35	we’et kal Helbah yasir, ka’asher yusar Heilew hakesew miccewaH hashelamim wehiqTir hakohein ’otam hamicbeiHah, ‘al ’ishei yhoh; wekhiper ‘alaw hakohein ‘al HaTato ’asher HaTa wenislaH lo.
leviticus 5:1	wenefesh ki teHeTa, weshame‘ah qol ’alah, wehu ‘eid, ’o ra’ah ’o yada‘; ’im lo yagid wenasa ‘awono. 
leviticus 5:2	’o nefesh, ’asher tiga‘ bekhal dawar Tamei ’o weniwlat Hayah Temei’ah, ’o beniwlat beheimah Temei’ah, ’o beniwlat sherez Tamei; wene‘lam mimenu, wehu Tamei we’asheim. 
leviticus 5:3	’o khi yiga‘ beTum’at ’adam, lekhol Tum’ato, ’asher yiTma bah; wene‘lam mimenu, wehu yada‘ we’asheim. 
leviticus 5:4	’o nefesh ki tishawa‘ lewaTei wisfatayim lehara‘ ’o leheiTiw, lekhol ’asher yewaTei ha’adam bishwu‘ah wene‘lam mimenu; wehu yada‘ we’asheim le’aHat mei’eileh. 
leviticus 5:5	wehayah khi ye’sham le’aHat mei’eileh; wehitwadah, ’asher HaTa ‘aleha. 
leviticus 5:6	weheiwi ’et ’ashamo yhoh ‘al HaTato ’asher HaTa neqeiwah min hazon kisbah ’o se‘irat ‘iccim leHaTat; wekhiper ‘alaw hakohein meiHaTato. 
leviticus 5:7	we’im lo tagi‘ yado dei seh weheiwi ’et ’ashamo ’asher HaTa, shetei torim ’o shenei wenei yonah yhoh; ’eHad leHaTat we’eHad le‘olah. 
leviticus 5:8	weheiwi ’otam ’el hakohein, wehiqriw ’et ’asher laHaTat rishonah; umalaq ’et rosho mimul ‘arepo welo yawdil. 
leviticus 5:9	wehiccah midam haHaTat ‘al qir hamicbeiaH, wehanish’ar badam, yimazeih ’el yesod hamicbeiaH; HaTat hu. 
leviticus 5:10	we’et hasheini ya‘aseh ‘olah kamishpaT; wekhiper ‘alaw hakohein meiHaTato ’asher HaTa wenislaH lo.
leviticus 5:11	we’im lo tasig yado lishtei torim, ’o lishnei wenei yonah weheiwi ’et qarebano ’asher HaTa, ‘asirit ha’eifah solet leHaTat; lo yasim ‘aleha shemen, welo yitein ‘aleha lewonah, ki HaTat hi. 
leviticus 5:12	wehewi’ah ’el hakohein weqamaz hakohein mimenah melo qumzo ’et ’ackaratah wehiqTir hamicbeiHah, ‘al ’ishei yhoh; HaTat hi 
leviticus 5:13	wekhiper ‘alaw hakohein ‘al HaTato ’asher HaTa mei’aHat mei’eileh wenislaH lo; wehayetah lakohein kaminHah.
leviticus 5:14	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 5:15	nefesh ki tim‘ol ma‘al, weHaTe’ah bishgagah, miqadeshei yhoh; weheiwi ’et ’ashamo yhoh ’ayil tamim min hazon, be‘erkekha kesef sheqalim besheqel haqodesh le’asham. 
leviticus 5:16	we’eit ’asher HaTa min haqodesh yeshaleim, we’et Hamishito yoseif ‘alaw, wenatan ’oto lakohein; wehakohein, yekhapeir ‘alaw be’eil ha’asham wenislaH lo.
leviticus 5:17	we’im nefesh ki teHeTa, we‘asetah, ’aHat mikal mizwot yhoh, ’asher lo tei‘asenah; welo yada‘ we’asheim wenasa ‘awono. 
leviticus 5:18	weheiwi ’ayil tamim min hazon be‘erkekha le’asham ’el hakohein; wekhiper ‘alaw hakohein ‘al shiggato ’asher shagag wehu lo yada‘ wenislaH lo. 
leviticus 5:19	’asham hu; ’ashom ’asham yhoh.
leviticus 6:1	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 6:2	nefesh ki teHeTa, uma‘alah ma‘al yhoh; wekhiHeish ba‘amito befiqadon, ’o witsumet yad ’o wegaceil, ’o ‘ashaq ’et ‘amito. 
leviticus 6:3	’o maza ’aweidah wekhiHesh bah wenishba‘ ‘al shaqer; ‘al ’aHat, mikol ’asher ya‘aseh ha’adam laHaTo waheinah. 
leviticus 6:4	wehayah ki yeHeTa we’asheim weheishiw ’et hageceilah ’asher gacal, ’o ’et ha‘osheq ’asher ‘ashaq, ’o ’et hapiqadon, ’asher hafeqad ’ito; ’o ’et ha’aweidah ’asher maza. 
leviticus 6:5	’o mikol ’asher yishawa‘ ‘alaw lasheqer weshilam ’oto berosho, waHamishitaw yoseif ‘alaw; la’asher hu lo yitenenu beyom ’ashmato. 
leviticus 6:6	we’et ’ashamo yawi yhoh; ’ayil tamim min hazon be‘erkekha le’asham ’el hakohein. 
leviticus 6:7	wekhiper ‘alaw hakohein lifnei yhoh wenislaH lo; ‘al ’aHat mikol ’asher ya‘aseh le’ashmah wah.
leviticus 6:8	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 6:9	zaw ’et ’aharon we’et banaw leimor, cot torat ha‘olah; hi ha‘olah ‘al moqdah ‘al hamicbeiaH kal halaylah ‘ad haboqer, we’eish hamicbeiaH tuqad bo. 
leviticus 6:10	welawash hakohein mido wad, umikhnesei wad yilbash ‘al besaro weheirim ’et hadeshen, ’asher tokhal ha’eish ’et ha‘olah ‘al hamicbeiaH; wesamo ’eizel hamicbeiaH. 
leviticus 6:11	ufashaT ’et begadaw, welawash begadim ’aHeirim; wehozi ’et hadeshen ’el miHuz lamaHaneh, ’el maqom Tahor. 
leviticus 6:12	weha’eish ‘al hamicbeiaH tuqad bo lo tikhbeh, uwi‘eir ‘aleha hakohein ‘eizim baboqer baboqer; we‘arakh ‘aleha ha‘olah, wehiqTir ‘aleha Helwei hashelamim. 
leviticus 6:13	’eish, tamid tuqad ‘al hamicbeiaH lo tikhweh
leviticus 6:14	wecot torat haminHah; haqreiw ’otah benei ’aharon lifnei yhoh, ’el penei hamicbeiaH. 
leviticus 6:15	weheirim mimenu bequmzo, missolet haminHah umishamnah, we’eit kal halewonah, ’asher ‘al haminHah; wehiqTir hamicbeiaH, reiaH niHoaH ’ackaratah yhoh. 
leviticus 6:16	wehanoteret mimenah, yokhelu ’aharon uwanaw; mazot tei’akheil bemaqom qadosh, baHazar ’ohel mo‘eid yokheluha. 
leviticus 6:17	lo tei’afeh Hameiz, Helqam natati ’otah mei’ishay; qodesh qadashim hi kaHaTat wekha’asham. 
leviticus 6:18	kal cakhar biwnei ’aharon yokhalenah, Haq ‘olam ledoroteikhem, mei’ishei yhoh; kol ’asher yiga‘ bahem yiqdash.
leviticus 6:19	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 6:20	ceh qareban ’aharon uwanaw ’asher yaqriwu yhoh beyom himashaH ’oto, ‘asirit ha’eifah solet minHah tamid; maHazitah baboqer, umaHazitah ba‘arew. 
leviticus 6:21	‘al maHawat, bashemen tei‘aseh murbekhet tewi’enah; tufinei minHat pitim, taqriw reiaH niHoaH yhoh. 
leviticus 6:22	wehakohein hamashiaH taHtaw mibanaw ya‘aseh ’otah; Haq ‘olam yhoh kalil taqeTar. 
leviticus 6:23	wekhal minHat kohein kalil tihyeh lo tei’akheil.
leviticus 6:24	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 6:25	dabeir ’el ’aharon we’el banaw leimor, cot torat haHaTat; bimqom ’asher tishaHeiT ha‘olah tishaHeiT haHaTat lifnei yhoh, qodesh qadashim hi 
leviticus 6:26	hakohein hamHaTei ’otah yokhalenah; bemaqom qadosh tei’akheil, baHazar ’ohel mo‘eid. 
leviticus 6:27	kol ’asher yiga‘ biwsarah yiqdash; wa’asher yicceh midamah ‘al habeged, ’asher yicceh ‘aleha, tekhabeis bemaqom qadosh. 
leviticus 6:28	ukheli Heres ’asher tewushal bo yishaweir; we’im bikhli neHoshet bushalah, umoraq weshuTaf bamayim. 
leviticus 6:29	kal cakhar bakohanim yokhal ’otah; qodesh qadashim hi 
leviticus 6:30	wekhal HaTat ’asher yuwa midamah ’el ’ohel mo‘eid lekhapeir baqodesh lo tei’akheil; ba’eish tisareif.
leviticus 7:1	wecot torat ha’asham; qodesh qadashim hu. 
leviticus 7:2	bimqom, ’asher yishHaTu ’et ha‘olah, yishHaTu ’et ha’asham; we’et damo yicroq ‘al hamicbeiaH sawiw. 
leviticus 7:3	we’eit kal Helbo yaqriw mimenu; ’eit ha’alyah, we’et haHeilew hamkhasseh ’et haqerew. 
leviticus 7:4	we’eit shetei hakelayot, we’et haHeilew ’asher ‘aleihen, ’asher ‘al hakesalim; we’et hayoteret ‘al hakaweid, ‘al hakelayot yesirenah. 
leviticus 7:5	wehiqTir ’otam hakohein hamicbeiHah, ’isheh yhoh; ’asham hu. 
leviticus 7:6	kal cakhar bakohanim yokhelenu; bemaqom qadosh yei’akheil, qodesh qadashim hu. 
leviticus 7:7	kaHaTat ka’asham, torah ’aHat lahem; hakohein ’asher yekhaper bo lo yihyeh. 
leviticus 7:8	wehakohein, hamaqriw ’et ‘olat ’ish; ‘or ha‘olah ’asher hiqriw, lakohein lo yihyeh. 
leviticus 7:9	wekhal minHah, ’asher tei’afeh batanur, wekhal na‘asah wamarHeshet we‘al maHawat; lakohein hamaqriw ’otah lo tihyeh. 
leviticus 7:10	wekhal minHah welulah washemen waHareiwah; lekhal benei ’aharon tihyeh ’ish ke’aHiw.
leviticus 7:11	wecot torat cewaH hashelamim; ’asher yaqriw yhoh. 
leviticus 7:12	’im ‘al todah yaqriwenu wehiqriw ‘al cewaH hatodah, Halot mazot belulot bashemen, ureqiqei mazot meshuHim bashamen; wesolet murbekhet, Halot belulot bashamen. 
leviticus 7:13	‘al Halot leHem Hameiz, yaqriw qarebano; ‘al cewaH todat shelamaw. 
leviticus 7:14	wehiqriw mimenu ’eHad mikal qarban terumah yhoh; lakohein, haccoreiq ’et dam hashelamim lo yihyeh. 
leviticus 7:15	uwesar, cewaH todat shelamaw, beyom qarebano yei’akheil; lo yaniaH mimenu ‘ad boqer. 
leviticus 7:16	we’im neder ’o nedawah, cewaH qarebano, beyom haqriwo ’et ciwHo yei’akheil; umimaHorat, wehanotar mimenu yei’akheil. 
leviticus 7:17	wehanotar mibesar haccawaH; bayom hashelishi, ba’eish yisareif. 
leviticus 7:18	we’im hei’akhol yei’akheil mibesar cewaH shelamaw bayom hashelishi lo yeirazeh hamaqriw ’oto, lo yeiHasheiw lo pigul yihyeh; wehanefesh ha’okhelet mimenu ‘awonah tisa. 
leviticus 7:19	wehabasar ’asher yiga‘ bekhal Tamei lo yei’akheil, ba’eish yisareif; wehabasar, kal Tahor yokhal basar. 
leviticus 7:20	wehanefesh ’asher tokhal basar, miccewaH hashelamim ’asher yhoh, weTum’ato ‘alaw; wenikhretah hanefesh hahiw mei‘ameha. 
leviticus 7:21	wenefesh ki tiga‘ bekhal Tamei, beTum’at ’adam ’o biwheimah Temei’ah, ’o bekhal sheqez Tamei, we’akhal mibesar cewaH hashelamim ’asher yhoh; wenikhretah hanefesh hahiw mei‘ameha.
leviticus 7:22	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 7:23	dabeir ’el benei yisra’eil leimor; kal Heilew shor wekhesew wa‘eic lo tokheilu. 
leviticus 7:24	weHeilew neweilah weHeilew Tereifah, yei‘aseh lekhal melakhah; we’akhol lo tokheluhu. 
leviticus 7:25	ki kal ’okheil Heilew, min habeheimah, ’asher yaqriw mimenah ’isheh yhoh; wenikhretah hanefesh ha’okhelet mei‘ameha. 
leviticus 7:26	wekhal dam lo tokhelu, bekhol moshewoteikhem; la‘of welabeheimah. 
leviticus 7:27	kal nefesh ’asher tokhal kal dam; wenikhretah hanefesh hahiw mei‘ameha.
leviticus 7:28	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 7:29	dabeir ’el benei yisra’eil leimor; hamaqriw ’et cewaH shelamaw yhoh, yawi ’et qarebano yhoh miccewaH shelamaw. 
leviticus 7:30	yadaw tewi’enah, ’eit ’ishei yhoh; ’et haHeilew ‘al heHaceh yewi’enu, ’eit heHaceh, lehanif ’oto tenufah lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 7:31	wehiqTir hakohein ’et haHeilew hamicbeiHah; wehayah heHaceh, le’aharon ulewanaw. 
leviticus 7:32	we’eit shoq hayamin, titenu terumah lakohein; micciwHei shalmeikhem. 
leviticus 7:33	hamaqriw ’et dam hashelamim we’et haHeilew mibenei ’aharon; lo tihyeh shoq hayamin lemanah. 
leviticus 7:34	ki ’et Haceih hatenufah we’eit shoq haterumah, laqaHti mei’eit benei yisra’eil, micciwHei shalmeihem; wa’etein ’otam le’aharon hakohein ulewanaw leHaq ‘olam, mei’eit benei yisra’eil. 
leviticus 7:35	cot mishHat ’aharon umishHat banaw, mei’ishei yhoh; beyom hiqriw ’otam, lekhahein yhoh. 
leviticus 7:36	’asher ziwwah yhoh lateit lahem, beyom masheHo ’otam, mei’eit benei yisra’eil; Huqat ‘olam ledorotam. 
leviticus 7:37	cot hatorah, la‘olah laminHah, welaHaTat wela’asham; welamilu’im, ulecewaH hashelamim. 
leviticus 7:38	’asher ziwwah yhoh ’et mosheh behar sinay; beyom zawwoto ’et benei yisra’eil, lehaqriw ’et qarebeneihem yhoh bemidbar sinay.
leviticus 8:1	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 8:2	qaH ’et ’aharon we’et banaw ’ito, we’eit habegadim, we’eit shemen hamishHah; we’eit par haHaTat, we’eit shenei ha’eilim, we’eit sal hamazot. 
leviticus 8:3	we’eit kal ha‘eidah haqheil; ’el petaH ’ohel mo‘eid. 
leviticus 8:4	waya‘as mosheh, ka’asher ziwwah yhoh ’oto; watiqaheil ha‘eidah, ’el petaH ’ohel mo‘eid. 
leviticus 8:5	wayomer mosheh ’el ha‘eidah; ceh hadawar, ’asher ziwwah yhoh la‘asot. 
leviticus 8:6	wayaqreiw mosheh, ’et ’aharon we’et banaw; wayirHaz ’otam bamayim. 
leviticus 8:7	wayitein ‘alaw ’et hakutonet, wayaHgor ’oto ba’awneiT, wayalbeish ’oto ’et hame‘il, wayitein ‘alaw ’et ha’eifod; wayaHgor ’oto, beHeishew ha’eifod, waye’pod lo bo. 
leviticus 8:8	wayasem ‘alaw ’et haHoshen; wayitein ’el haHoshen, ’et ha’urim we’et hatumim. 
leviticus 8:9	wayasem ’et hamiznefet ‘al rosho; wayasem ‘al hamiznefet ’el mul panaw, ’eit ziz haccahaw neicer haqodesh, ka’asher ziwwah yhoh ’et mosheh. 
leviticus 8:10	wayiqaH mosheh ’et shemen hamishHah, wayimshaH ’et hamishkan we’et kal ’asher bo; wayqadeish ’otam. 
leviticus 8:11	wayac mimenu ‘al hamicbeiaH shewa‘ pe‘amim; wayimshaH ’et hamicbeiaH we’et kal keilaw, we’et hakiyor we’et kano leqadesham. 
leviticus 8:12	wayizoq mishemen hamishHah, ‘al rosh ’aharon; wayimshaH ’oto leqadesho. 
leviticus 8:13	wayaqreiw mosheh ’et benei ’aharon, wayalbisheim kutonot wayaHgor ’otam ’awneiT, wayaHawosh lahem migba‘ot; ka’asher ziwwah yhoh ’et mosheh. 
leviticus 8:14	wayageish ’eit par haHaTat; wayismokh ’aharon uwanaw ’et yedeihem, ‘al rosh par haHaTat. 
leviticus 8:15	wayishHaT, wayiqaH mosheh ’et hadam wayitein ‘al qarnot hamicbeiaH sawiw be’ezba‘o, wayHaTei ’et hamicbeiaH; we’et hadam, yazaq ’el yesod hamicbeiaH, wayqadesheihu lekhapeir ‘alaw. 
leviticus 8:16	wayiqaH, ’et kal haHeilew ’asher ‘al haqerew we’eit yoteret hakaweid, we’et shetei hakelayot we’et Helbehen; wayaqTeir mosheh hamicbeiHah. 
leviticus 8:17	we’et hapar we’et ‘oro we’et besaro we’et pirsho, saraf ba’eish, miHuz lamaHaneh; ka’asher ziwwah yhoh ’et mosheh. 
leviticus 8:18	wayaqreiw ’eit ’eil ha‘olah; wayismekhu ’aharon uwanaw ’et yedeihem ‘al rosh ha’ayil. 
leviticus 8:19	wayishHaT; wayicroq mosheh ’et hadam ‘al hamicbeiaH sawiw. 
leviticus 8:20	we’et ha’ayil, nitaH lintaHaw; wayaqTeir mosheh ’et harosh, we’et hanetaHim we’et hapader. 
leviticus 8:21	we’et haqerew we’et hakera‘ayim raHaz bamayim; wayaqTeir mosheh ’et kal ha’ayil hamicbeiHah, ‘olah hu lereiaH niHoaH ’isheh hu yhoh, ka’asher ziwwah yhoh ’et mosheh. 
leviticus 8:22	wayaqreiw ’et ha’ayil hasheini, ’eil hamilu’im; wayismekhu ’aharon uwanaw ’et yedeihem ‘al rosh ha’ayil. 
leviticus 8:23	wayishHaT wayiqaH mosheh midamo, wayitein ‘al tenukh ’ocen ’aharon haymanit; we‘al bohen yado haymanit, we‘al bohen raglo haymanit. 
leviticus 8:24	wayaqreiw ’et benei ’aharon, wayitein mosheh min hadam ‘al tenukh ’acenam haymanit, we‘al bohen yadam haymanit, we‘al bohen raglam haymanit; wayicroq mosheh ’et hadam ‘al hamicbeiaH sawiw. 
leviticus 8:25	wayiqaH ’et haHeilew we’et ha’alyah, we’et kal haHeilew ’asher ‘al haqerew we’eit yoteret hakaweid, we’et shetei hakelayot we’et Helbehen; we’eit shoq hayamin. 
leviticus 8:26	umissal hamazot ’asher lifnei yhoh laqaH Halat mazah ’aHat weHalat leHem shemen ’aHat weraqiq ’eHad; wayasem ‘al haHalawim, we‘al shoq hayamin. 
leviticus 8:27	wayitein ’et hakol, ‘al kapei ’aharon, we‘al kapei wanaw; wayanef ’otam tenufah lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 8:28	wayiqaH mosheh ’otam mei‘al kapeihem, wayaqTeir hamicbeiHah ‘al ha‘olah; milu’im heim lereiaH niHoaH, ’isheh hu yhoh. 
leviticus 8:29	wayiqaH mosheh ’et heHaceh, waynifeihu tenufah lifnei yhoh; mei’eil hamilu’im, lemosheh hayah lemanah, ka’asher ziwwah yhoh ’et mosheh. 
leviticus 8:30	wayiqaH mosheh mishemen hamishHah, umin hadam ’asher ‘al hamicbeiaH wayac ‘al ’aharon ‘al begadaw, we‘al banaw we‘al bigdei wanaw ’ito; wayqadeish ’et ’aharon ’et begadaw, we’et banaw we’et bigdei wanaw ’ito. 
leviticus 8:31	wayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon we’el banaw, bashelu ’et habasar petaH ’ohel mo‘eid wesham tokhelu ’oto, we’et haleHem, ’asher besal hamilu’im; ka’asher ziwweiti leimor, ’aharon uwanaw yokheluhu. 
leviticus 8:32	wehanotar babasar uwalaHem; ba’eish tisrofu. 
leviticus 8:33	umipetaH ’ohel mo‘eid lo teize’u shiw‘at yamim, ‘ad yom melot, yemei milu’eikhem; ki shiw‘at yamim, yemalei ’et yedkhem. 
leviticus 8:34	ka’asher ‘asah bayom hacceh; ziwwah yhoh la‘asot lekhapeir ‘aleikhem. 
leviticus 8:35	ufetaH ’ohel mo‘eid teishewu yomam walaylah shiw‘at yamim, ushemartem ’et mishmeret yhoh welo tamutu; ki khein zuwweiti. 
leviticus 8:36	waya‘as ’aharon uwanaw; ’eit kal hadewarim, ’asher ziwwah yhoh beyad mosheh.
leviticus 9:1	wayhi bayom hashemini, qara mosheh, le’aharon ulewanaw; uleciqnei yisra’eil. 
leviticus 9:2	wayomer ’el ’aharon, qaH lekha ‘eigel ben baqar leHaTat we’ayil le‘olah temimim; wehaqreiw lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 9:3	we’el benei yisra’eil tedabeir leimor; qeHu se‘ir ‘iccim leHaTat, we‘eigel wakhewes benei shanah temimim le‘olah. 
leviticus 9:4	weshor wa’ayil lishlamim, licboaH lifnei yhoh, uminHah belulah washamen; ki hayom, yhoh nir’ah ’aleikhem. 
leviticus 9:5	wayiqHu, ’eit ’asher ziwwah mosheh, ’el penei ’ohel mo‘eid; wayiqrewu kal ha‘eidah, waya‘amdu lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 9:6	wayomer mosheh, ceh hadawar ’asher ziwwah yhoh ta‘asu; weyeira ’aleikhem kewod yhoh. 
leviticus 9:7	wayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon, qeraw ’el hamicbeiaH wa‘aseih ’et HaTatekha we’et ‘olatekha, wekhapeir ba‘adkha uwe‘ad ha‘am; wa‘aseih ’et qareban ha‘am wekhapeir ba‘adam, ka’asher ziwwah yhoh. 
leviticus 9:8	wayiqraw ’aharon ’el hamicbeiaH; wayishHaT ’et ‘eigel haHaTat ’asher lo. 
leviticus 9:9	wayaqriwu benei ’aharon ’et hadam ’eilaw wayiTbol ’ezba‘o badam, wayitein ‘al qarnot hamicbeiaH; we’et hadam yazaq, ’el yesod hamicbeiaH. 
leviticus 9:10	we’et haHeilew we’et hakelayot we’et hayoteret min hakaweid min haHaTat, hiqTir hamicbeiHah; ka’asher ziwwah yhoh ’et mosheh. 
leviticus 9:11	we’et habasar we’et ha‘or; saraf ba’eish, miHuz lamaHaneh. 
leviticus 9:12	wayishHaT ’et ha‘olah; wayamzi’u benei ’aharon ’eilaw ’et hadam, wayicreqeihu ‘al hamicbeiaH sawiw. 
leviticus 9:13	we’et ha‘olah, himzi’u ’eilaw lintaHeha we’et harosh; wayaqTeir ‘al hamicbeiaH. 
leviticus 9:14	wayirHaz ’et haqerew we’et hakera‘ayim; wayaqTeir ‘al ha‘olah hamicbeiHah. 
leviticus 9:15	wayaqreiw ’eit qareban ha‘am; wayiqaH ’et se‘ir haHaTat ’asher la‘am, wayishHaTeihu wayHaTe’eihu karishon. 
leviticus 9:16	wayaqreiw ’et ha‘olah; waya‘aseha kamishpaT. 
leviticus 9:17	wayaqreiw ’et haminHah waymalei khapo mimenah, wayaqTeir ‘al hamicbeiaH; milewad ‘olat haboqer. 
leviticus 9:18	wayishHaT ’et hashor we’et ha’ayil, cewaH hashelamim ’asher la‘am; wayamzi’u benei ’aharon ’et hadam ’eilaw, wayicreqeihu ‘al hamicbeiaH sawiw. 
leviticus 9:19	we’et haHalawim min hashor; umin ha’ayil, ha’alyah wehamkhasseh wehakelayot, weyoteret hakaweid. 
leviticus 9:20	wayasimu ’et haHalawim ‘al heHacot; wayaqTeir haHalawim hamicbeiHah. 
leviticus 9:21	we’eit heHacot, we’eit shoq hayamin, heinif ’aharon tenufah lifnei yhoh; ka’asher ziwwah mosheh. 
leviticus 9:22	wayisa ’aharon ’et yado yadaw ’el ha‘am waywarekheim; wayeired, mei‘asot haHaTat weha‘olah wehashelamim. 
leviticus 9:23	wayawo mosheh we’aharon ’el ’ohel mo‘eid, wayeize’u, waywarakhu ’et ha‘am; wayeira khewod yhoh ’el kal ha‘am. 
leviticus 9:24	wateizei ’eish milifnei yhoh, watokhal ‘al hamicbeiaH, ’et ha‘olah we’et haHalawim; wayar kal ha‘am wayaronu, wayipelu ‘al peneihem. 
leviticus 10:1	wayiqHu wenei ’aharon nadaw wa’awihu ’ish maHtato, wayitenu wahein ’eish, wayasimu ‘aleha qeToret; wayaqriwu lifnei yhoh ’eish carah, ’asher lo ziwwah ’otam. 
leviticus 10:2	wateizei ’eish milifnei yhoh watokhal ’otam; wayamutu lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 10:3	wayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon, hu ’asher diber yhoh leimor biqroway ’eqadeish, we‘al penei khal ha‘am ’ekaweid; wayidom ’aharon. 
leviticus 10:4	wayiqra mosheh, ’el misha’eil we’el ’elzafan, benei ‘ucci’eil dod ’aharon; wayomer ’aleihem, qirwu se’u ’et ’aHeikhem mei’eit penei haqodesh, ’el miHuz lamaHaneh. 
leviticus 10:5	wayiqrewu, wayisa’um bekhutonotam, ’el miHuz lamaHaneh; ka’asher diber mosheh. 
leviticus 10:6	wayomer mosheh ’el ’aharon ule’el‘acar ule’itamar banaw rasheikhem ’al tifra‘u uwigdeikhem lo tifromu welo tamutu, we‘al kal ha‘eidah yiqzof; wa’aHeikhem kal beit yisra’eil, yiwku ’et hasereifah, ’asher saraf yhoh. 
leviticus 10:7	umipetaH ’ohel mo‘eid lo teize’u pen tamutu, ki shemen mishHat yhoh ‘aleikhem; waya‘asu kidwar mosheh.
leviticus 10:8	waydabeir yhoh, ’el ’aharon leimor. 
leviticus 10:9	yayin wesheikhar ’al teishet ’atah uwanekha ’itakh, bewo’akhem ’el ’ohel mo‘eid welo tamutu; Huqat ‘olam ledoroteikhem. 
leviticus 10:10	ulahawdil, bein haqodesh uwein haHol; uwein haTamei uwein haTahor. 
leviticus 10:11	ulehorot ’et benei yisra’eil; ’eit kal haHuqim, ’asher diber yhoh ’aleihem beyad mosheh.
leviticus 10:12	waydabeir mosheh ’el ’aharon, we’el ’el‘acar we’el ’itamar banaw hanotarim qeHu ’et haminHah, hanoteret mei’ishei yhoh, we’ikhluha mazot ’eizel hamicbeiaH; ki qodesh qadashim hi 
leviticus 10:13	wa’akhaltem ’otah bemaqom qadosh, ki Haqekha weHaq banekha hi mei’ishei yhoh; ki khein zuwweiti. 
leviticus 10:14	we’eit Haceih hatenufah we’eit shoq haterumah, tokhelu bemaqom Tahor, ’atah uwanekha uwenotekha ’itakh; ki Haqekha weHaq banekha nitenu, micciwHei shalmei benei yisra’eil. 
leviticus 10:15	shoq haterumah waHaceih hatenufah, ‘al ’ishei haHalawim yawi’u, lehanif tenufah lifnei yhoh; wehayah lekha ulewanekha ’itekha leHaq ‘olam, ka’asher ziwwah yhoh. 
leviticus 10:16	we’eit se‘ir haHaTat, darosh darash mosheh wehineih soraf; wayiqzof ‘al ’el‘acar we‘al ’itamar benei ’aharon, hanotarim leimor. 
leviticus 10:17	madua‘, lo ’akhaltem ’et haHaTat bimqom haqodesh, ki qodesh qadashim hi we’otah natan lakhem, laseit ’et ‘awon ha‘eidah, lekhapeir ‘aleihem lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 10:18	hein lo huwa ’et damah, ’el haqodesh penimah; ’akhol tokhelu ’otah baqodesh ka’asher ziwweiti. 
leviticus 10:19	waydabeir ’aharon ’el mosheh, hein hayom hiqriwu ’et HaTatam we’et ‘olatam lifnei yhoh, watiqrenah ’oti ka’eileh; we’akhalti HaTat hayom, hayiTaw be‘einei yhoh. 
leviticus 10:20	wayishma‘ mosheh, wayiTaw be‘einaw.
leviticus 11:1	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh we’el ’aharon leimor ’aleihem. 
leviticus 11:2	daberu ’el benei yisra’eil leimor; cot haHayah ’asher tokhelu, mikal habeheimah ’asher ‘al ha’arez. 
leviticus 11:3	kol mafreset parsah, weshosa‘at shesa‘ perasot, ma‘alat geirah babeheimah; ’otah tokheilu. 
leviticus 11:4	’akh ’et ceh lo tokhelu, mima‘alei hageirah, umimafrisei haparsah; ’et hagamal ki ma‘aleih geirah hu, ufarsah ’einenu mafris, Tamei hu lakhem. 
leviticus 11:5	we’et hashafan, ki ma‘aleih geirah hu, ufarsah lo yafris; Tamei hu lakhem. 
leviticus 11:6	we’et ha’arnewet, ki ma‘alat geirah hi ufarsah lo hifrisah; Temei’ah hi lakhem. 
leviticus 11:7	we’et haHacir ki mafris parsah hu, weshosa‘ shesa‘ parsah, wehu geirah lo yigar; Tamei hu lakhem. 
leviticus 11:8	mibesaram lo tokheilu, uweniwlatam lo tiga‘u; Temei’im heim lakhem. 
leviticus 11:9	’et ceh tokhelu, mikol ’asher bamayim; kol ’asher lo senapir weqasqeset bamayim, bayamim uwaneHalim ’otam tokheilu. 
leviticus 11:10	wekhol ’asher ’ein lo senapir weqasqeset, bayamim uwaneHalim, mikol sherez hamayim, umikol nefesh haHayah ’asher bamayim; sheqez heim lakhem. 
leviticus 11:11	wesheqez yihyu lakhem; mibesaram lo tokheilu, we’et niwlatam teshaqeizu. 
leviticus 11:12	kol ’asher ’ein lo senapir weqasqeset bamayim; sheqez hu lakhem. 
leviticus 11:13	we’et ’eileh teshaqezu min ha‘of, lo yei’akhelu sheqez heim; ’et hanesher we’et haperes, we’eit ha‘aceniyah. 
leviticus 11:14	we’et hada’ah, we’et ha’ayah leminah. 
leviticus 11:15	’eit kal ‘oreiw lemino. 
leviticus 11:16	we’eit bat haya‘anah, we’et hataHmas we’et hashaHaf; we’et haneiz lemineihu. 
leviticus 11:17	we’et hakos we’et hashalakh we’et hayanshuf. 
leviticus 11:18	we’et hatinshemet we’et haqa’at we’et haraHam. 
leviticus 11:19	we’eit haHasidah, ha’anafah leminah; we’et hadukhifat we’et ha‘aTaleif. 
leviticus 11:20	kol sherez ha‘of, haholeikh ‘al ’arba‘; sheqez hu lakhem.
leviticus 11:21	’akh ’et ceh tokhelu, mikol sherez ha‘of, haholeikh ‘al ’arba‘; ’asher lo lo khera‘ayim mima‘al leraglaw, lenateir bahein ‘al ha’arez. 
leviticus 11:22	’et ’eileh meihem tokheilu, ’et ha’arbeh lemino, we’et hassale‘am lemineihu; we’et haHargol lemineihu, we’et heHagaw lemineihu. 
leviticus 11:23	wekhol sherez ha‘of, ’asher lo ’arba‘ raglayim; sheqez hu lakhem. 
leviticus 11:24	ule’eileh tiTama’u; kal hanogeia‘ beniwlatam yiTma ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 11:25	wekhal hanosei miniwlatam; yekhabeis begadaw weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 11:26	lekhal habeheimah ’asher hi mafreset parsah weshesa‘ ’einenah shosa‘at, wegeirah ’einenah ma‘alah, Temei’im heim lakhem; kal hanogeia‘ bahem yiTma. 
leviticus 11:27	wekhol holeikh ‘al kapaw, bekhal haHayah haholekhet ‘al ’arba‘, Temei’im heim lakhem; kal hanogeia‘ beniwlatam yiTma ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 11:28	wehanosei ’et niwlatam, yekhabeis begadaw weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew; Temei’im heimah lakhem.
leviticus 11:29	weceh lakhem haTamei, basherez hashoreiz ‘al ha’arez; haHoled weha‘akhbar wehazaw lemineihu. 
leviticus 11:30	weha’anaqah wehakoaH wehaleTa’ah; wehaHomeT wehatinshamet. 
leviticus 11:31	’eileh haTemei’im lakhem bekhal hasharez; kal hanogeia‘ bahem bemotam yiTma ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 11:32	wekhol ’asher yipol ‘alaw meihem bemotam yiTma, mikal keli ‘eiz ’o weged ’o ‘or ’o saq, kal keli ’asher yei‘aseh melakhah bahem; bamayim yuwa weTamei ‘ad ha‘erew weTaheir. 
leviticus 11:33	wekhal keli Heres, ’asher yipol meihem ’el tokho; kol ’asher betokho yiTma we’oto tishboru. 
leviticus 11:34	mikal ha’okhel ’asher yei’akheil, ’asher yawo ‘alaw mayim yiTma; wekhal mashqeh ’asher yishateh, bekhal keli yiTma. 
leviticus 11:35	wekhol ’asher yipol miniwlatam ‘alaw yiTma tanur wekhirayim yutaz Temei’im heim; uTemei’im yihyu lakhem. 
leviticus 11:36	’akh ma‘yan uwor miqweih mayim yihyeh Tahor; wenogeia‘ beniwlatam yiTma. 
leviticus 11:37	wekhi yipol miniwlatam, ‘al kal cera‘ ceirua‘ ’asher yiccareia‘; Tahor hu. 
leviticus 11:38	wekhi yutan mayim ‘al cera‘, wenafal miniwlatam ‘alaw; Tamei hu lakhem.
leviticus 11:39	wekhi yamut min habeheimah, ’asher hi lakhem le’akhlah hanogeia‘ beniwlatah yiTma ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 11:40	weha’okheil miniwlatah, yekhabeis begadaw weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew; wehanosei ’et niwlatah, yekhabeis begadaw weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 11:41	wekhal hasherez hashoreiz ‘al ha’arez; sheqez hu lo yei’akheil. 
leviticus 11:42	kol holeikh ‘al gaHon wekhol holeikh ‘al ’arba‘, ‘ad kal marbeih raglayim, lekhal hasherez hashoreiz ‘al ha’arez; lo tokhelum ki sheqez heim. 
leviticus 11:43	’al teshaqezu ’et nafshoteikhem, bekhal hasherez hashoreiz; welo tiTame’u bahem, weniTmeitem bam. 
leviticus 11:44	ki ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem wehitqadishtem wihyitem qedoshim, ki qadosh ’ani; welo teTame’u ’et nafshoteikhem, bekhal hasherez haromeis ‘al ha’arez. 
leviticus 11:45	ki ’ani yhoh hama‘aleh ’etkhem mei’erez mizrayim, lihyot lakhem leilohim; wihyitem qedoshim, ki qadosh ’ani. 
leviticus 11:46	cot torat habeheimah weha‘of, wekhol nefesh haHayah, haromeset bamayim; ulekhal nefesh hashorezet ‘al ha’arez. 
leviticus 11:47	lehawdil bein haTamei uwein haTahor; uwein haHayah hane’ekhelet, uwein haHayah, ’asher lo tei’akheil.
leviticus 12:1	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 12:2	dabeir ’el benei yisra’eil leimor, ’ishah ki tacria‘, weyaledah cakhar; weTame’ah shiw‘at yamim, kimei nidat dewotah tiTma. 
leviticus 12:3	uwayom hashemini; yimol besar ‘arelato. 
leviticus 12:4	usheloshim yom usheloshet yamim, teisheiw bidmei Tahorah; bekhal qodesh lo tiga‘, we’el hamiqdash lo tawo, ‘ad melot yemei Tahorah. 
leviticus 12:5	we’im neqeiwah teileid, weTame’ah shewu‘ayim kenidatah; weshishim yom wesheishet yamim, teisheiw ‘al demei Tahorah. 
leviticus 12:6	uwimlot yemei Tahorah, lewein ’o lewat tawi kewes ben shenato le‘olah, uwen yonah ’o tor leHaTat; ’el petaH ’ohel mo‘eid ’el hakohein. 
leviticus 12:7	wehiqriwo lifnei yhoh wekhiper ‘aleha, weTaharah mimeqor dameha; cot torat hayoledet, laccakhar ’o laneqeiwah. 
leviticus 12:8	we’im lo timza yadah dei seh welaqeHah shetei torim, ’o shenei benei yonah, ’eHad le‘olah we’eHad leHaTat; wekhiper ‘aleha hakohein weTaheirah.
leviticus 13:1	waydabeir yhoh, ’el mosheh we’el ’aharon leimor. 
leviticus 13:2	’adam, ki yihyeh we‘or besaro se’eit ’o sapaHat ’o waheret, wehayah we‘or besaro lenega‘ zara‘at; wehuwa ’el ’aharon hakohein, ’o ’el ’aHad mibanaw hakohanim. 
leviticus 13:3	wera’ah hakohein ’et hanega‘ be‘or habasar wesei‘ar banega‘ hafakh lawan, umar’eih hanega‘ ‘amoq mei‘or besaro, nega‘ zara‘at hu; wera’ahu hakohein weTimei ’oto. 
leviticus 13:4	we’im baheret lewanah hi be‘or besaro, we‘amoq ’ein mar’eha min ha‘or, use‘arah lo hafakh lawan; wehisgir hakohein ’et hanega‘ shiw‘at yamim. 
leviticus 13:5	wera’ahu hakohein bayom hashewi‘i wehineih hanega‘ ‘amad be‘einaw, lo fasah hanega‘ ba‘or; wehisgiro hakohein shiw‘at yamim sheinit. 
leviticus 13:6	wera’ah hakohein ’oto bayom hashewi‘i sheinit wehineih keihah hanega‘, welo fasah hanega‘ ba‘or; weTiharo hakohein mispaHat hi, wekhibes begadaw weTaheir. 
leviticus 13:7	we’im pasoh tifseh hamispaHat ba‘or, ’aHarei heira’oto ’el hakohein leTahorato; wenir’ah sheinit ’el hakohein. 
leviticus 13:8	wera’ah hakohein, wehineih pasetah hamispaHat ba‘or; weTime’o hakohein zara‘at hi
leviticus 13:9	nega‘ zara‘at, ki tihyeh be’adam; wehuwa ’el hakohein. 
leviticus 13:10	wera’ah hakohein, wehineih se’eit lewanah ba‘or, wehi hafekhah sei‘ar lawan; umiHyat basar Hay bas’eit. 
leviticus 13:11	zara‘at noshenet hi be‘or besaro, weTime’o hakohein; lo yasgirenu, ki Tamei hu. 
leviticus 13:12	we’im paroaH tifraH hazara‘at ba‘or, wekhissetah hazara‘at, ’eit kal ‘or hanega‘, meirosho we‘ad raglaw; lekhal mar’eih ‘einei hakohein. 
leviticus 13:13	wera’ah hakohein, wehineih khissetah hazara‘at ’et kal besaro, weTihar ’et hanaga‘; kulo hafakh lawan Tahor hu. 
leviticus 13:14	uweyom heira’ot bo basar Hay yiTma. 
leviticus 13:15	wera’ah hakohein ’et habasar haHay weTime’o; habasar haHay Tamei hu zara‘at hu. 
leviticus 13:16	’o khi yashuw habasar haHay wenehpakh lelawan; uwa ’el hakohein. 
leviticus 13:17	wera’ahu hakohein, wehineih nehpakh hanega‘ lelawan; weTihar hakohein ’et hanega‘ Tahor hu.
leviticus 13:18	uwasar ki yihyeh wo we‘oro sheHin; wenirpa. 
leviticus 13:19	wehayah bimqom hasheHin se’eit lewanah, ’o waheret lewanah ’adamdamet; wenir’ah ’el hakohein. 
leviticus 13:20	wera’ah hakohein, wehineih mar’eha shafal min ha‘or, use‘arah hafakh lawan; weTime’o hakohein nega‘ zara‘at hi basheHin paraHah. 
leviticus 13:21	we’im yir’enah hakohein, wehineih ’ein bah sei‘ar lawan, ushefalah ’einenah min ha‘or wehi kheihah; wehisgiro hakohein shiw‘at yamim. 
leviticus 13:22	we’im pasoh tifseh ba‘or; weTimei hakohein ’oto nega‘ hi 
leviticus 13:23	we’im taHteha ta‘amod habaheret lo fasatah, zarewet hasheHin hi weTiharo hakohein.
leviticus 13:24	’o wasar, ki yihyeh we‘oro mikhwat ’eish; wehayetah miHyat hamikhwah, baheret lewanah ’adamdemet ’o lewanah. 
leviticus 13:25	wera’ah ’otah hakohein wehineih nehpakh sei‘ar lawan babaheret, umar’eha ‘amoq min ha‘or, zara‘at hi bamikhwah paraHah; weTimei ’oto hakohein, nega‘ zara‘at hi 
leviticus 13:26	we’im yir’enah hakohein, wehineih ’ein babeheret sei‘ar lawan, ushefalah ’einenah min ha‘or wehiw kheihah; wehisgiro hakohein shiw‘at yamim. 
leviticus 13:27	wera’ahu hakohein bayom hashewi‘i; ’im pasoh tifseh ba‘or, weTimei hakohein ’oto, nega‘ zara‘at hi 
leviticus 13:28	we’im taHteha ta‘amod habaheret lo fasetah wa‘or wehiw kheihah, se’eit hamikhwah hi weTiharo hakohein, ki zarewet hamikhwah hi
leviticus 13:29	we’ish ’o ’ishah, ki yihyeh wo naga‘; berosh ’o wecaqan. 
leviticus 13:30	wera’ah hakohein ’et hanega‘, wehineih mar’eihu ‘amoq min ha‘or, uwo sei‘ar zahow daq; weTimei ’oto hakohein neteq hu, zara‘at harosh ’o haccaqan hu. 
leviticus 13:31	wekhi yir’eh hakohein ’et nega‘ haneteq, wehineih ’ein mar’eihu ‘amoq min ha‘or, wesei‘ar shaHor ’ein bo; wehisgir hakohein ’et nega‘ haneteq shiw‘at yamim. 
leviticus 13:32	wera’ah hakohein ’et hanega‘ bayom hashewi‘i wehineih lo fasah haneteq, welo hayah wo sei‘ar zahow; umar’eih haneteq, ’ein ‘amoq min ha‘or. 
leviticus 13:33	wehitgalaH, we’et haneteq lo yegaleiaH; wehisgir hakohein ’et haneteq shiw‘at yamim sheinit. 
leviticus 13:34	wera’ah hakohein ’et haneteq bayom hashewi‘i, wehineih lo fasah haneteq ba‘or, umar’eihu ’einenu ‘amoq min ha‘or; weTihar ’oto hakohein, wekhibes begadaw weTaheir. 
leviticus 13:35	we’im pasoh yifseh haneteq ba‘or; ’aHarei Tahorato. 
leviticus 13:36	wera’ahu hakohein, wehineih pasah haneteq ba‘or; lo yewaqeir hakohein lasei‘ar hazahow Tamei hu. 
leviticus 13:37	we’im be‘einaw ‘amad haneteq wesei‘ar shaHor zamaH bo nirpa haneteq Tahor hu; weTiharo hakohein.
leviticus 13:38	we’ish ’o ’ishah, ki yihyeh we‘or besaram beharot; beharot lewanot. 
leviticus 13:39	wera’ah hakohein, wehineih we‘or besaram beharot keihot lewanot; bohaq hu paraH ba‘or Tahor hu.
leviticus 13:40	we’ish ki yimareiT rosho; qeireiaH hu Tahor hu. 
leviticus 13:41	we’im mipe’at panaw, yimareiT rosho; gibeiaH hu Tahor hu. 
leviticus 13:42	wekhi yihyeh waqaraHat ’o wagabaHat, nega‘ lawan ’adamdam; zara‘at poraHat hi beqaraHto ’o wegabaHto. 
leviticus 13:43	wera’ah ’oto hakohein, wehineih se’eit hanega‘ lewanah ’adamdemet, beqaraHto ’o wegabaHto; kemar’eih zara‘at ‘or basar. 
leviticus 13:44	’ish zarua‘ hu Tamei hu; Tamei yeTame’enu hakohein berosho nig‘o. 
leviticus 13:45	wehazarua‘ ’asher bo hanega‘, begadaw yihyu ferumim werosho yihyeh farua‘, we‘al safam ya‘Teh; weTamei Tamei yiqra. 
leviticus 13:46	kal yemei ’asher hanega‘ bo yiTma Tamei hu; badad yeisheiw, miHuz lamaHaneh moshawo.
leviticus 13:47	wehabeged ki yihyeh wo nega‘ zara‘at; beweged zemer, ’o beweged pishtim. 
leviticus 13:48	’o wishti ’o we‘eirew, lapishtim welazamer; ’o we‘or, ’o bekhal melekhet ‘or. 
leviticus 13:49	wehayah hanega‘ yeraqraq ’o ’adamdam, babeged ’o wa‘or ’o washeti ’o wa‘eirew ’o wekhal keli ‘or, nega‘ zara‘at hu; wehare’ah ’et hakohein. 
leviticus 13:50	wera’ah hakohein ’et hanaga‘; wehisgir ’et hanega‘ shiw‘at yamim. 
leviticus 13:51	wera’ah ’et hanega‘ bayom hashewi‘i, ki fasah hanega‘ babeged ’o washeti ’o wa‘eirew ’o wa‘or, lekhol ’asher yei‘aseh ha‘or limlakhah; zara‘at mam’eret hanega‘ Tamei hu. 
leviticus 13:52	wesaraf ’et habeged ’o ’et hasheti ’o ’et ha‘eirew, bazemer ’o wapishtim, ’o ’et kal keli ha‘or, ’asher yihyeh wo hanaga‘; ki zara‘at mam’eret hi ba’eish tisareif. 
leviticus 13:53	we’im yir’eh hakohein wehineih lo fasah hanega‘, babeged ’o washeti ’o wa‘eirew; ’o bekhal keli ‘or. 
leviticus 13:54	weziwwah hakohein, wekhibesu, ’eit ’asher bo hanaga‘; wehisgiro shiw‘at yamim sheinit. 
leviticus 13:55	wera’ah hakohein ’aHarei hukabeis ’et hanega‘, wehineih lo hafakh hanega‘ ’et ‘eino wehanega‘ lo fasah, Tamei hu, ba’eish tisrefenu; peHetet hi beqaraHto ’o wegabaHto. 
leviticus 13:56	we’im ra’ah hakohein wehineih keihah hanega‘, ’aHarei hukabeis ’oto; weqara‘ ’oto, min habeged ’o min ha‘or, ’o min hasheti ’o min ha‘eirew. 
leviticus 13:57	we’im teira’eh ‘od babeged ’o washeti ’o wa‘eirew ’o wekhal keli ‘or, poraHat hi ba’eish tisrefenu, ’eit ’asher bo hanaga‘. 
leviticus 13:58	wehabeged ’o hasheti ’o ha‘eirew ’o khal keli ha‘or ’asher tekhabeis, wesar meihem hanaga‘; wekhubas sheinit weTaheir. 
leviticus 13:59	cot torat nega‘ zara‘at beged hazemer ’o hapishtim, ’o hasheti ’o ha‘eirew, ’o kal keli ‘or; leTaharo ’o leTame’o.
leviticus 14:1	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 14:2	cot tihyeh torat hamezora‘, beyom Tahorato; wehuwa ’el hakohein. 
leviticus 14:3	weyaza hakohein, ’el miHuz lamaHaneh; wera’ah hakohein, wehineih nirpa nega‘ hazara‘at min hazarua‘. 
leviticus 14:4	weziwwah hakohein, welaqaH lamiTaheir shetei ziporim Hayot Tehorot; we‘eiz ’erec, usheni tola‘at we’eicow. 
leviticus 14:5	weziwwah hakohein, weshaHaT ’et hazipor ha’eHat; ’el keli Heres ‘al mayim Hayim. 
leviticus 14:6	’et hazipor haHayah yiqaH ’otah, we’et ‘eiz ha’erec we’et sheni hatola‘at we’et ha’eicow; weTawal ’otam we’eit hazipor haHayah, bedam hazipor hasheHuTah, ‘al hamayim haHayim. 
leviticus 14:7	wehiccah, ‘al hamiTaheir min hazara‘at shewa‘ pe‘amim; weTiharo, weshilaH ’et hazipor haHayah ‘al penei hasadeh. 
leviticus 14:8	wekhibes hamiTaheir ’et begadaw wegilaH ’et kal se‘aro, weraHaz bamayim weTaheir, we’aHar yawo ’el hamaHaneh; weyashaw miHuz le’aholo shiw‘at yamim. 
leviticus 14:9	wehayah wayom hashewi‘i yegalaH ’et kal se‘aro, ’et rosho we’et ceqano we’eit gabot ‘einaw, we’et kal se‘aro yegaleiaH; wekhibes ’et begadaw, weraHaz ’et besaro bamayim weTaheir. 
leviticus 14:10	uwayom hashemini, yiqaH shenei khewasim temimim, wekhawsah ’aHat bat shenatah temimah; usheloshah ‘esronim, solet minHah belulah washemen, welog ’eHad shamen. 
leviticus 14:11	wehe‘emid hakohein hamTaheir, ’eit ha’ish hamiTaheir we’otam; lifnei yhoh, petaH ’ohel mo‘eid. 
leviticus 14:12	welaqaH hakohein ’et hakewes ha’eHad, wehiqriw ’oto le’asham we’et log hashamen; weheinif ’otam tenufah lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 14:13	weshaHaT ’et hakewes, bimqom ’asher yishHaT ’et haHaTat we’et ha‘olah bimqom haqodesh; ki kaHaTat ha’asham hu lakohein, qodesh qadashim hu. 
leviticus 14:14	welaqaH hakohein midam ha’asham wenatan hakohein, ‘al tenukh ’ocen hamiTaheir haymanit; we‘al bohen yado haymanit, we‘al bohen raglo haymanit. 
leviticus 14:15	welaqaH hakohein milog hashamen; weyazaq ‘al kaf hakohein hasemalit. 
leviticus 14:16	weTawal hakohein ’et ’ezba‘o haymanit, min hashemen ’asher ‘al kapo hasemalit; wehiccah min hashemen be’ezba‘o shewa‘ pe‘amim lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 14:17	umiyeter hashemen ’asher ‘al kapo, yitein hakohein ‘al tenukh ’ocen hamiTaheir haymanit, we‘al bohen yado haymanit, we‘al bohen raglo haymanit; ‘al dam ha’asham. 
leviticus 14:18	wehanotar, bashemen ’asher ‘al kaf hakohein, yitein ‘al rosh hamiTaheir; wekhiper ‘alaw hakohein lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 14:19	we‘asah hakohein ’et haHaTat, wekhiper ‘al hamiTaheir miTum’ato; we’aHar yishHaT ’et ha‘olah. 
leviticus 14:20	wehe‘elah hakohein ’et ha‘olah we’et haminHah hamicbeiHah; wekhiper ‘alaw hakohein weTaheir.
leviticus 14:21	we’im dal hu, we’ein yado maseget welaqaH kewes ’eHad ’asham litnufah lekhapeir ‘alaw; we‘isaron solet ’eHad balul bashemen leminHah welog shamen. 
leviticus 14:22	ushetei torim, ’o shenei benei yonah, ’asher tasig yado; wehayah ’eHad HaTat, weha’eHad ‘olah. 
leviticus 14:23	weheiwi ’otam bayom hashemini leTahorato ’el hakohein; ’el petaH ’ohel mo‘eid lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 14:24	welaqaH hakohein ’et kewes ha’asham we’et log hashamen; weheinif ’otam hakohein tenufah lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 14:25	weshaHaT ’et kewes ha’asham welaqaH hakohein midam ha’asham, wenatan ‘al tenukh ’ocen hamiTaheir haymanit; we‘al bohen yado haymanit, we‘al bohen raglo haymanit. 
leviticus 14:26	umin hashemen yizoq hakohein; ‘al kaf hakohein hasemalit. 
leviticus 14:27	wehiccah hakohein be’ezba‘o haymanit, min hashemen ’asher ‘al kapo hasemalit; shewa‘ pe‘amim lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 14:28	wenatan hakohein min hashemen ’asher ‘al kapo, ‘al tenukh ’ocen hamiTaheir haymanit, we‘al bohen yado haymanit, we‘al bohen raglo haymanit; ‘al meqom dam ha’asham. 
leviticus 14:29	wehanotar, min hashemen ’asher ‘al kaf hakohein, yitein ‘al rosh hamiTaheir; lekhapeir ‘alaw lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 14:30	we‘asah ’et ha’eHad min hatorim, ’o min benei hayonah; mei’asher tasig yado. 
leviticus 14:31	’eit ’asher tasig yado, ’et ha’eHad HaTat we’et ha’eHad ‘olah ‘al haminHah; wekhiper hakohein ‘al hamiTaheir lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 14:32	cot torat, ’asher bo nega‘ zara‘at; ’asher lo tasig yado beTahorato.
leviticus 14:33	waydabeir yhoh, ’el mosheh we’el ’aharon leimor. 
leviticus 14:34	ki tawo’u ’el ’erez kena‘an, ’asher ’ani notein lakhem la’aHuccah; wenatati nega‘ zara‘at, beweit ’erez ’aHuccatkhem. 
leviticus 14:35	uwa ’asher lo habayit, wehigid lakohein leimor; kenega‘ nir’ah li babayit. 
leviticus 14:36	weziwwah hakohein ufinu ’et habayit, beTerem yawo hakohein lir’ot ’et hanega‘, welo yiTma kal ’asher babayit; we’aHar kein yawo hakohein lir’ot ’et habayit. 
leviticus 14:37	wera’ah ’et hanega‘, wehineih hanega‘ beqirot habayit, sheqa‘arurot yeraqraqot, ’o ’adamdamot; umar’eihen shafal min haqir. 
leviticus 14:38	weyaza hakohein min habayit ’el petaH habayit; wehisgir ’et habayit shiw‘at yamim. 
leviticus 14:39	weshaw hakohein bayom hashewi‘i; wera’ah wehineih pasah hanega‘ beqirot habayit. 
leviticus 14:40	weziwwah hakohein, weHilezu ’et ha’awanim, ’asher bahein hanaga‘; wehishlikhu ’ethen ’el miHuz la‘ir, ’el maqom Tamei. 
leviticus 14:41	we’et habayit yaqzia‘ mibayit sawiw; weshafekhu, ’et he‘afar ’asher hiqzu, ’el miHuz la‘ir, ’el maqom Tamei. 
leviticus 14:42	welaqeHu ’awanim ’aHeirot, weheiwi’u ’el taHat ha’awanim; we‘afar ’aHeir yiqaH weTaH ’et habayit. 
leviticus 14:43	we’im yashuw hanega‘ ufaraH babayit, ’aHar Hileiz ’et ha’awanim; we’aHarei hiqzot ’et habayit we’aHarei hiToaH. 
leviticus 14:44	uwa hakohein, wera’ah wehineih pasah hanega‘ babayit; zara‘at mam’eret hi babayit Tamei hu. 
leviticus 14:45	wenataz ’et habayit, ’et ’awanaw we’et ‘eizaw, we’eit kal ‘afar habayit; wehozi ’el miHuz la‘ir, ’el maqom Tamei. 
leviticus 14:46	wehaba ’el habayit, kal yemei hisgir ’oto; yiTma ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 14:47	wehashokheiw babayit, yekhabeis ’et begadaw; weha’okheil babayit, yekhabeis ’et begadaw. 
leviticus 14:48	we’im bo yawo hakohein, wera’ah wehineih lo fasah hanega‘ babayit, ’aHarei hiToaH ’et habayit; weTihar hakohein ’et habayit, ki nirpa hanaga‘. 
leviticus 14:49	welaqaH leHaTei ’et habayit shetei ziporim; we‘eiz ’erec, usheni tola‘at we’eicow. 
leviticus 14:50	weshaHaT ’et hazipor ha’eHat; ’el keli Heres ‘al mayim Hayim. 
leviticus 14:51	welaqaH ’et ‘eiz ha’erec we’et ha’eicow we’eit sheni hatola‘at, we’eit hazipor haHayah weTawal ’otam, bedam hazipor hasheHuTah, uwamayim haHayim; wehiccah ’el habayit shewa‘ pe‘amim. 
leviticus 14:52	weHiTei ’et habayit, bedam hazipor, uwamayim haHayim; uwazipor haHayah, uwe‘eiz ha’erec uwa’eicow uwishni hatola‘at. 
leviticus 14:53	weshilaH ’et hazipor haHayah ’el miHuz la‘ir ’el penei hasadeh; wekhiper ‘al habayit weTaheir. 
leviticus 14:54	cot hatorah; lekhal nega‘ hazara‘at welanateq. 
leviticus 14:55	ulezara‘at habeged welabayit. 
leviticus 14:56	welas’eit welassapaHat welabeharet. 
leviticus 14:57	lehorot beyom haTamei uweyom haTahor; cot torat hazara‘at.
leviticus 15:1	waydabeir yhoh, ’el mosheh we’el ’aharon leimor. 
leviticus 15:2	daberu ’el benei yisra’eil, wa’amartem ’aleihem; ’ish ’ish, ki yihyeh caw mibesaro, cowo Tamei hu. 
leviticus 15:3	wecot tihyeh Tum’ato becowo; rar besaro ’et cowo, ’o heHtim besaro miccowo, Tum’ato hi 
leviticus 15:4	kal hamishkaw, ’asher yishkaw ‘alaw haccaw yiTma; wekhal hakeli ’asher yeisheiw ‘alaw yiTma. 
leviticus 15:5	we’ish ’asher yiga‘ bemishkawo; yekhabeis begadaw weraHaz bamayim weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 15:6	wehayosheiw ‘al hakeli, ’asher yeisheiw ‘alaw haccaw; yekhabeis begadaw weraHaz bamayim weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 15:7	wehanogeia‘ biwsar haccaw; yekhabeis begadaw weraHaz bamayim weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 15:8	wekhi yaroq haccaw baTahor; wekhibes begadaw weraHaz bamayim weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 15:9	wekhal hamerkaw, ’asher yirkaw ‘alaw haccaw yiTma. 
leviticus 15:10	wekhal hanogeia‘, bekhol ’asher yihyeh taHtaw, yiTma ‘ad ha‘arew; wehanosei ’otam, yekhabeis begadaw weraHaz bamayim weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 15:11	wekhol ’asher yiga‘ bo haccaw, weyadaw lo shaTaf bamayim; wekhibes begadaw weraHaz bamayim weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 15:12	ukheli Heres ’asher yiga‘ bo haccaw yishaweir; wekhal keli ‘eiz, yishaTeif bamayim. 
leviticus 15:13	wekhi yiThar haccaw miccowo, wesafar lo shiw‘at yamim leTahorato wekhibes begadaw; weraHaz besaro bemayim Hayim weTaheir. 
leviticus 15:14	uwayom hashemini, yiqaH lo shetei torim, ’o shenei benei yonah; uwa lifnei yhoh ’el petaH ’ohel mo‘eid, unetanam ’el hakohein. 
leviticus 15:15	we‘asah ’otam hakohein, ’eHad HaTat, weha’eHad ‘olah; wekhiper ‘alaw hakohein lifnei yhoh miccowo.
leviticus 15:16	we’ish ki teizei mimenu shikhwat cara‘; weraHaz bamayim ’et kal besaro weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 15:17	wekhal beged wekhal ‘or, ’asher yihyeh ‘alaw shikhwat cara‘; wekhubas bamayim weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew.
leviticus 15:18	we’ishah ’asher yishkaw ’ish ’otah shikhwat cara‘; weraHazu wamayim, weTame’u ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 15:19	we’ishah ki tihyeh cawah, dam yihyeh cowah biwsarah; shiw‘at yamim tihyeh wenidatah, wekhal hanogeia‘ bah yiTma ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 15:20	wekhol ’asher tishkaw ‘alaw benidatah yiTma; wekhol ’asher teisheiw ‘alaw yiTma. 
leviticus 15:21	wekhal hanogeia‘ bemishkawah; yekhabeis begadaw weraHaz bamayim weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 15:22	wekhal hanogeia‘, bekhal keli ’asher teisheiw ‘alaw; yekhabeis begadaw weraHaz bamayim weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 15:23	we’im ‘al hamishkaw hu, ’o ‘al hakeli ’asher hi yoshewet ‘alaw benage‘o wo; yiTma ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 15:24	we’im shakhow yishkaw ’ish ’otah, utehi nidatah ‘alaw, weTamei shiw‘at yamim; wekhal hamishkaw ’asher yishkaw ‘alaw yiTma.
leviticus 15:25	we’ishah ki yacuw cow damah yamim rabim, belo ‘et nidatah, ’o khi tacuw ‘al nidatah; kal yemei cow Tum’atah, kimei nidatah tihyeh Temei’ah hi 
leviticus 15:26	kal hamishkaw ’asher tishkaw ‘alaw kal yemei cowah, kemishkaw nidatah yihyeh lah; wekhal hakeli ’asher teisheiw ‘alaw, Tamei yihyeh, keTum’at nidatah. 
leviticus 15:27	wekhal hanogeia‘ bam yiTma; wekhibes begadaw weraHaz bamayim weTamei ‘ad ha‘arew. 
leviticus 15:28	we’im Taharah miccowah; wesaferah lah shiw‘at yamim we’aHar tiThar. 
leviticus 15:29	uwayom hashemini, tiqaH lah shetei torim, ’o shenei benei yonah; weheiwi’ah ’otam ’el hakohein, ’el petaH ’ohel mo‘eid. 
leviticus 15:30	we‘asah hakohein ’et ha’eHad HaTat, we’et ha’eHad ‘olah; wekhiper ‘aleha hakohein lifnei yhoh, miccow Tum’atah. 
leviticus 15:31	wehiccartem ’et benei yisra’eil miTum’atam; welo yamutu beTum’atam, beTame’am ’et mishkani ’asher betokham. 
leviticus 15:32	cot torat haccaw; wa’asher teizei mimenu shikhwat cera‘ leTame’ah wah. 
leviticus 15:33	wehadawah benidatah, wehaccaw ’et cowo, laccakhar welaneqeiwah; ule’ish ’asher yishkaw ‘im Temei’ah.
leviticus 16:1	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh, ’aHarei mot, shenei benei ’aharon; beqarewatam lifnei yhoh wayamutu. 
leviticus 16:2	wayomer yhoh ’el mosheh, dabeir ’el ’aharon ’aHikha we’al yawo wekhal ‘eit ’el haqodesh, mibeit laparokhet; ’el penei hakaporet ’asher ‘al ha’aron welo yamut, ki be‘anan, ’eira’eh ‘al hakaporet. 
leviticus 16:3	becot yawo ’aharon ’el haqodesh; befar ben baqar leHaTat we’ayil le‘olah. 
leviticus 16:4	ketonet bad qodesh yilbash, umikhnesei wad yihyu ‘al besaro uwe’awneiT bad yaHgor, uwemiznefet bad yiznof; bigdei qodesh heim, weraHaz bamayim ’et besaro uleweisham. 
leviticus 16:5	umei’eit, ‘adat benei yisra’eil, yiqaH shenei se‘irei ‘iccim leHaTat; we’ayil ’eHad le‘olah. 
leviticus 16:6	wehiqriw ’aharon ’et par haHaTat ’asher lo; wekhiper ba‘ado uwe‘ad beito. 
leviticus 16:7	welaqaH ’et shenei hase‘irim; wehe‘emid ’otam lifnei yhoh, petaH ’ohel mo‘eid. 
leviticus 16:8	wenatan ’aharon ‘al shenei hase‘irim goralot; goral ’eHad yhoh, wegoral ’eHad la‘acaceil. 
leviticus 16:9	wehiqriw ’aharon ’et hasa‘ir, ’asher ‘alah ‘alaw hagoral yhoh; we‘asahu HaTat. 
leviticus 16:10	wehasa‘ir, ’asher ‘alah ‘alaw hagoral la‘acaceil, ya‘omad Hay lifnei yhoh lekhapeir ‘alaw; leshalaH ’oto la‘acaceil hamidbarah. 
leviticus 16:11	wehiqriw ’aharon ’et par haHaTat ’asher lo, wekhiper ba‘ado uwe‘ad beito; weshaHaT ’et par haHaTat ’asher lo. 
leviticus 16:12	welaqaH melo hamaHtah gaHalei ’eish mei‘al hamicbeiaH milifnei yhoh, umelo Hafenaw, qeToret samim daqah; weheiwi mibeit laparokhet. 
leviticus 16:13	wenatan ’et haqeToret ‘al ha’eish lifnei yhoh; wekhissah ‘anan haqeToret, ’et hakaporet ’asher ‘al ha‘eidut welo yamut. 
leviticus 16:14	welaqaH midam hapar, wehiccah we’ezba‘o ‘al penei hakaporet qeidemah; welifnei hakaporet, yacceh shewa‘ pe‘amim min hadam be’ezba‘o. 
leviticus 16:15	weshaHaT ’et se‘ir haHaTat ’asher la‘am, weheiwi ’et damo, ’el mibeit laparokhet; we‘asah ’et damo, ka’asher ‘asah ledam hapar, wehiccah ’oto ‘al hakaporet welifnei hakaporet. 
leviticus 16:16	wekhiper ‘al haqodesh, miTum’ot benei yisra’eil, umipish‘eihem lekhal HaTotam; wekhein ya‘aseh le’ohel mo‘eid, hashokhein ’itam, betokh Tum’otam. 
leviticus 16:17	wekhal ’adam lo yihyeh be’ohel mo‘eid, bewo’o lekhapeir baqodesh ‘ad zeito; wekhiper ba‘ado uwe‘ad beito, uwe‘ad kal qehal yisra’eil. 
leviticus 16:18	weyaza, ’el hamicbeiaH ’asher lifnei yhoh wekhiper ‘alaw; welaqaH midam hapar umidam hasa‘ir, wenatan ‘al qarnot hamicbeiaH sawiw. 
leviticus 16:19	wehiccah ‘alaw min hadam be’ezba‘o shewa‘ pe‘amim; weTiharo weqidesho, miTum’ot benei yisra’eil. 
leviticus 16:20	wekhilah mikapeir ’et haqodesh, we’et ’ohel mo‘eid we’et hamicbeiaH; wehiqriw ’et hasa‘ir heHay. 
leviticus 16:21	wesamakh ’aharon ’et shetei yado yadaw, ‘al rosh hasa‘ir haHay wehitwadah ‘alaw, ’et kal ‘awonot benei yisra’eil, we’et kal pish‘eihem lekhal HaTotam; wenatan ’otam ‘al rosh hasa‘ir, weshilaH beyad ’ish ‘iti hamidbarah. 
leviticus 16:22	wenasa hasa‘ir ‘alaw ’et kal ‘awonotam ’el ’erez geceirah; weshilaH ’et hasa‘ir bamidbar. 
leviticus 16:23	uwa ’aharon ’el ’ohel mo‘eid, ufashaT ’et bigdei habad, ’asher lawash bewo’o ’el haqodesh; wehiniHam sham. 
leviticus 16:24	weraHaz ’et besaro wamayim bemaqom qadosh, welawash ’et begadaw; weyaza, we‘asah ’et ‘olato we’et ‘olat ha‘am, wekhiper ba‘ado uwe‘ad ha‘am. 
leviticus 16:25	we’eit Heilew haHaTat yaqTir hamicbeiHah. 
leviticus 16:26	wehamshaleiaH ’et hasa‘ir la‘acaceil, yekhabeis begadaw, weraHaz ’et besaro bamayim; we’aHarei khein yawo ’el hamaHaneh. 
leviticus 16:27	we’eit par haHaTat we’eit se‘ir haHaTat, ’asher huwa ’et damam lekhapeir baqodesh, yozi ’el miHuz lamaHaneh; wesarefu wa’eish, ’et ‘orotam we’et besaram we’et pirsham. 
leviticus 16:28	wehasoreif ’otam, yekhabeis begadaw, weraHaz ’et besaro bamayim; we’aHarei khein yawo ’el hamaHaneh. 
leviticus 16:29	wehayetah lakhem leHuqat ‘olam; baHodesh hashewi‘i be‘asor laHodesh te‘anu ’et nafshoteikhem, wekhal melakhah lo ta‘asu, ha’ecraH, wehageir hagar betokhkhem. 
leviticus 16:30	ki wayom hacceh yekhapeir ‘aleikhem leTaheir ’etkhem; mikol HaToteikhem, lifnei yhoh tiTharu. 
leviticus 16:31	shabat shabaton hi lakhem, we‘initem ’et nafshoteikhem; Huqat ‘olam. 
leviticus 16:32	wekhiper hakohein ’asher yimshaH ’oto, wa’asher yemalei ’et yado, lekhahein taHat ’awiw; welawash ’et bigdei habad bigdei haqodesh. 
leviticus 16:33	wekhiper ’et miqdash haqodesh, we’et ’ohel mo‘eid we’et hamicbeiaH yekhapeir; we‘al hakohanim we‘al kal ‘am haqahal yekhapeir. 
leviticus 16:34	wehayetah cot lakhem leHuqat ‘olam, lekhapeir ‘al benei yisra’eil mikal HaTotam, ’aHat bashanah; waya‘as ka’asher ziwwah yhoh ’et mosheh.
leviticus 17:1	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 17:2	dabeir ’el ’aharon we’el banaw, we’el kal benei yisra’eil, we’amarta ’aleihem; ceh hadawar, ’asher ziwwah yhoh leimor. 
leviticus 17:3	’ish ’ish mibeit yisra’eil, ’asher yishHaT shor ’o khesew ’o ‘eic bamaHaneh; ’o ’asher yishHaT, miHuz lamaHaneh. 
leviticus 17:4	we’el petaH ’ohel mo‘eid lo hewi’o lehaqriw qarban yhoh, lifnei mishkan yhoh; dam yeiHasheiw la’ish hahu dam shafakh, wenikhrat ha’ish hahu miqerew ‘amo. 
leviticus 17:5	lema‘an ’asher yawi’u benei yisra’eil, ’et ciwHeihem ’asher heim coweHim ‘al penei hasadeh wehewi’um yhoh ’el petaH ’ohel mo‘eid ’el hakohein; wecaweHu ciwHei shelamim yhoh ’otam. 
leviticus 17:6	wecaraq hakohein ’et hadam ‘al micbaH yhoh, petaH ’ohel mo‘eid; wehiqTir haHeilew, lereiaH niHoaH yhoh. 
leviticus 17:7	welo yicbeHu ‘od ’et ciwHeihem, lase‘irim ’asher heim conim ’aHareihem; Huqat ‘olam tihyeh cot lahem ledorotam. 
leviticus 17:8	wa’aleihem tomar, ’ish ’ish mibeit yisra’eil, umin hageir ’asher yagur betokham; ’asher ya‘aleh ‘olah ’o cawaH. 
leviticus 17:9	we’el petaH ’ohel mo‘eid lo yewi’enu, la‘asot ’oto yhoh; wenikhrat ha’ish hahu mei‘amaw. 
leviticus 17:10	we’ish ’ish mibeit yisra’eil, umin hageir hagar betokham, ’asher yokhal kal dam; wenatati fanay, banefesh ha’okhelet ’et hadam, wehikhrati ’otah miqerew ‘amah. 
leviticus 17:11	ki nefesh habasar badam hi wa’ani netatiw lakhem ‘al hamicbeiaH, lekhapeir ‘al nafshoteikhem; ki hadam hu banefesh yekhapeir. 
leviticus 17:12	‘al kein ’amarti liwnei yisra’eil, kal nefesh mikem lo tokhal dam; wehageir hagar betokhkhem lo yokhal dam.
leviticus 17:13	we’ish ’ish mibenei yisra’eil, umin hageir hagar betokham, ’asher yazud zeid Hayah ’o ‘of ’asher yei’akheil; weshafakh ’et damo, wekhissahu be‘afar. 
leviticus 17:14	ki nefesh kal basar, damo wenafsho hu wa’omar liwnei yisra’eil, dam kal basar lo tokheilu; ki nefesh kal basar damo hi kal ’okhelaw yikareit. 
leviticus 17:15	wekhal nefesh, ’asher tokhal neweilah uTereifah, ba’ecraH uwageir; wekhibes begadaw weraHaz bamayim weTamei ‘ad ha‘erew weTaheir. 
leviticus 17:16	we’im lo yekhabeis, uwesaro lo yirHaz; wenasa ‘awono.
leviticus 18:1	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 18:2	dabeir ’el benei yisra’eil, we’amarta ’aleihem; ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
leviticus 18:3	kema‘aseih ’erez mizrayim ’asher yeshawtem bah lo ta‘asu; ukhema‘aseih ’erez kena‘an ’asher ’ani meiwi ’etkhem shamah lo ta‘asu, uweHuqoteihem lo teileikhu. 
leviticus 18:4	’et mishpaTay ta‘asu we’et Huqotay tishmeru lalekhet bahem; ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
leviticus 18:5	ushemartem ’et Huqotay we’et mishpaTay, ’asher ya‘aseh ’otam ha’adam waHay bahem; ’ani yhoh.
leviticus 18:6	’ish ’ish ’el kal she’eir besaro, lo tiqrewu legalot ‘erwah; ’ani yhoh.
leviticus 18:7	‘erwat ’awikha we‘erwat ’imekha lo tegaleih; ’imekha hi lo tegaleh ‘erwatah.
leviticus 18:8	‘erwat ’eishet ’awikha lo tegaleih; ‘erwat ’awikha hi
leviticus 18:9	‘erwat ’aHotkha wat ’awikha ’o wat ’imekha, moledet bayit, ’o moledet Huz; lo tegaleh ‘erwatan.
leviticus 18:10	‘erwat bat binkha ’o wat bitekha, lo tegaleh ‘erwatan; ki ‘erwatekha heinah.
leviticus 18:11	‘erwat bat ’eishet ’awikha moledet ’awikha, ’aHotkha hi lo tegaleh ‘erwatah.
leviticus 18:12	‘erwat ’aHot ’awikha lo tegaleih; she’eir ’awikha hi
leviticus 18:13	‘erwat ’aHot ’imekha lo tegaleih; ki she’eir ’imekha hi
leviticus 18:14	‘erwat ’aHi ’awikha lo tegaleih; ’el ’ishto lo tiqraw, dodatekha hi
leviticus 18:15	‘erwat kalatekha lo tegaleih; ’eishet binkha hi lo tegaleh ‘erwatah.
leviticus 18:16	‘erwat ’eishet ’aHikha lo tegaleih; ‘erwat ’aHikha hi
leviticus 18:17	‘erwat ’ishah uwitah lo tegaleih; ’et bat benah we’et bat bitah, lo tiqaH legalot ‘erwatah, sha’arah heinah cimah hi 
leviticus 18:18	we’ishah ’el ’aHotah lo tiqaH; lizror, legalot ‘erwatah ‘aleha beHayeha. 
leviticus 18:19	we’el ’ishah benidat Tum’atah; lo tiqraw, legalot ‘erwatah. 
leviticus 18:20	we’el ’eishet ‘amitekha, lo titein shekhawetekha lecara‘; leTame’ah wah. 
leviticus 18:21	umiccar‘akha lo titein leha‘awir lamolekh; welo teHaleil ’et sheim ’elohekha ’ani yhoh. 
leviticus 18:22	we’et cakhar, lo tishkaw mishkewei ’ishah; to‘eiwah hi 
leviticus 18:23	uwekhal beheimah lo titein shekhawetekha leTame’ah wah; we’ishah, lo ta‘amod lifnei weheimah leriw‘ah tewel hu. 
leviticus 18:24	’al tiTame’u bekhal ’eileh; ki wekhal ’eileh niTme’u hagoyim, ’asher ’ani meshaleiaH mipeneikhem. 
leviticus 18:25	watiTma ha’arez, wa’efqod ‘awonah ‘aleha; wataqi ha’arez ’et yosheweha. 
leviticus 18:26	ushemartem ’atem, ’et Huqotay we’et mishpaTay, welo ta‘asu, mikol hato‘eiwot ha’eileh; ha’ecraH, wehageir hagar betokhkhem. 
leviticus 18:27	ki ’et kal hato‘eiwot ha’eil, ‘asu ’anshei ha’arez ’asher lifneikhem; watiTma ha’arez. 
leviticus 18:28	welo taqi ha’arez ’etkhem, beTama’akhem ’otah; ka’asher qa’ah ’et hago ’asher lifneikhem. 
leviticus 18:29	ki kal ’asher ya‘aseh, mikol hato‘eiwot ha’eileh; wenikhretu hanefashot ha‘osot miqerew ‘amam. 
leviticus 18:30	ushemartem ’et mishmarti, lewilti ‘asot meiHuqot hato‘eiwot ’asher na‘asu lifneikhem, welo tiTame’u bahem; ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem.
leviticus 19:1	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor 
leviticus 19:2	dabeir ’el kal ‘adat benei yisra’eil we’amarta ’aleihem qedoshim tihyu; ki qadosh, ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
leviticus 19:3	’ish ’imo we’awiw tira’u, we’et shabetotay tishmoru; ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
leviticus 19:4	’al tifnu ’el ha’elilim, weilohei masseikhah, lo ta‘asu lakhem; ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
leviticus 19:5	wekhi ticbeHu cewaH shelamim yhoh; lirzonekhem ticbaHuhu. 
leviticus 19:6	beyom ciwHakhem yei’akheil umimaHorat; wehanotar ‘ad yom hashelishi, ba’eish yisareif. 
leviticus 19:7	we’im hei’akhol yei’akheil bayom hashelishi; pigul hu lo yeirazeh. 
leviticus 19:8	we’okhelaw ‘awono yisa, ki ’et qodesh yhoh Hileil; wenikhretah hanefesh hahiw mei‘ameha. 
leviticus 19:9	uwequzrekhem ’et qezir ’arzekhem, lo tekhaleh pe’at sadekha liqzor; weleqeT qezirekha lo telaqeiT. 
leviticus 19:10	wekharmekha lo te‘oleil, ufereT karmekha lo telaqeiT; le‘ani welageir ta‘acow ’otam, ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
leviticus 19:11	lo tignowu; welo tekhaHashu welo teshaqeru ’ish ba‘amito. 
leviticus 19:12	welo tishawe‘u wishmi lashaqer; weHilalta ’et sheim ’elohekha ’ani yhoh. 
leviticus 19:13	lo ta‘ashoq ’et rei‘akha welo tigcol; lo talin pe‘ulat sakhir ’itekha ‘ad boqer. 
leviticus 19:14	lo teqaleil Heireish, welifnei ‘iwweir, lo titein mikhshol; weyareita mei’elohekha ’ani yhoh. 
leviticus 19:15	lo ta‘asu ‘awel bamishpaT, lo tisa fenei dal, welo tehdar penei gadol; bezedeq tishpoT ‘amitekha. 
leviticus 19:16	lo teileikh rakhil be‘amekha, lo ta‘amod ‘al dam rei‘ekha; ’ani yhoh. 
leviticus 19:17	lo tisna ’et ’aHikha bilwawekha; hokheiaH tokhiaH ’et ‘amitekha, welo tisa ‘alaw HeiT. 
leviticus 19:18	lo tiqom welo tiTor ’et benei ‘amekha, we’ahawta lerei‘akha kamokha; ’ani yhoh. 
leviticus 19:19	’et Huqotay tishmoru behemtekha lo tarbia‘ kil’ayim, sadekha lo ticra‘ kil’ayim; uweged kil’ayim sha‘aTneic, lo ya‘aleh ‘alekha.
leviticus 19:20	we’ish ki yishkaw ’et ’ishah shikhwat cera‘, wehiw shifHah neHerefet le’ish, wehafedeih lo nifdatah, ’o Hufshah lo nitan lah; biqoret tihyeh lo yumetu ki lo Hupashah. 
leviticus 19:21	weheiwi ’et ’ashamo yhoh, ’el petaH ’ohel mo‘eid; ’eil ’asham. 
leviticus 19:22	wekhiper ‘alaw hakohein be’eil ha’asham lifnei yhoh, ‘al HaTato ’asher HaTa; wenislaH lo, meiHaTato ’asher HaTa.
leviticus 19:23	wekhi tawo’u ’el ha’arez, uneTa‘tem kal ‘eiz ma’akhal, wa‘araltem ‘arelato ’et piryo; shalosh shanim, yihyeh lakhem ‘areilim lo yei’akheil. 
leviticus 19:24	uwashanah harewi‘it, yihyeh kal piryo; qodesh hilulim yhoh. 
leviticus 19:25	uwashanah haHamishit, tokhelu ’et piryo, lehosif lakhem tewu’ato; ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
leviticus 19:26	lo tokhelu ‘al hadam; lo tenaHashu welo te‘oneinu. 
leviticus 19:27	lo taqifu, pe’at roshekhem; welo tashHit, ’eit pe’at ceqanekha. 
leviticus 19:28	wesereT lanefesh, lo titenu biwsarkhem, ukhetowet qa‘aqa‘, lo titenu bakhem; ’ani yhoh. 
leviticus 19:29	’al teHaleil ’et bitekha lehacnotah; welo ticneh ha’arez, umale’ah ha’arez cimah. 
leviticus 19:30	’et shabetotay tishmoru, umiqdashi tira’u; ’ani yhoh. 
leviticus 19:31	’al tifnu ’el ha’owot we’el hayide‘onim, ’al tewaqshu leTame’ah wahem; ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
leviticus 19:32	mipenei seiwah taqum, wehadarta penei caqein; weyareita mei’elohekha ’ani yhoh.
leviticus 19:33	wekhi yagur ’itekha geir be’arzekhem; lo tonu ’oto. 
leviticus 19:34	ke’ecraH mikem yihyeh lakhem hageir hagar ’itekhem, we’ahawta lo kamokha, ki geirim heyitem be’erez mizrayim; ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
leviticus 19:35	lo ta‘asu ‘awel bamishpaT; bamidah bamishqal uwamesurah. 
leviticus 19:36	mocenei zedeq ’awnei zedeq, ’eifat zedeq wehin zedeq yihyeh lakhem; ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem, ’asher hozeiti ’etkhem mei’erez mizrayim. 
leviticus 19:37	ushemartem ’et kal Huqotay we’et kal mishpaTay, wa‘asitem ’otam; ’ani yhoh.
leviticus 20:1	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 20:2	we’el benei yisra’eil tomar ’ish ’ish mibenei yisra’eil umin hageir hagar beyisra’eil, ’asher yitein miccar‘o lamolekh mot yumat; ‘am ha’arez yirgemuhu wa’awen. 
leviticus 20:3	wa’ani ’etein ’et panay ba’ish hahu, wehikhrati ’oto miqerew ‘amo; ki miccar‘o natan lamolekh, lema‘an, Tamei ’et miqdashi, uleHaleil ’et sheim qadshi 
leviticus 20:4	we’im ha‘leim ya‘limu ‘am ha’arez ’et ‘eineihem min ha’ish hahu, betito miccar‘o lamolekh; lewilti hamit ’oto. 
leviticus 20:5	wesamti ’ani ’et panay ba’ish hahu uwemishpaHto; wehikhrati ’oto we’eit kal hacconim ’aHaraw, licnot ’aHarei hamolekh miqerew ‘amam. 
leviticus 20:6	wehanefesh, ’asher tifneh ’el ha’owot we’el hayide‘onim, licnot ’aHareihem; wenatati ’et panay banefesh hahiw, wehikhrati ’oto miqerew ‘amo. 
leviticus 20:7	wehitqadishtem, wihyitem qedoshim; ki ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
leviticus 20:8	ushemartem ’et Huqotay, wa‘asitem ’otam; ’ani yhoh meqadishkhem. 
leviticus 20:9	ki ’ish ’ish, ’asher yeqaleil ’et ’awiw we’et ’imo mot yumat; ’awiw we’imo qileil damaw bo. 
leviticus 20:10	we’ish, ’asher yin’af ’et ’eishet ’ish, ’asher yin’af ’et ’eishet rei‘eihu; mot yumat hano’eif wehano’afet. 
leviticus 20:11	we’ish, ’asher yishkaw ’et ’eishet ’awiw, ‘erwat ’awiw gilah; mot yumetu sheneihem demeihem bam. 
leviticus 20:12	we’ish, ’asher yishkaw ’et kalato, mot yumetu sheneihem; tewel ‘asu demeihem bam. 
leviticus 20:13	we’ish, ’asher yishkaw ’et cakhar mishkewei ’ishah, to‘eiwah ‘asu sheneihem; mot yumatu demeihem bam. 
leviticus 20:14	we’ish, ’asher yiqaH ’et ’ishah we’et ’imah cimah hi ba’eish yisrefu ’oto we’ethen, welo tihyeh cimah betokhkhem. 
leviticus 20:15	we’ish, ’asher yitein shekhaweto biwheimah mot yumat; we’et habeheimah taharogu. 
leviticus 20:16	we’ishah, ’asher tiqraw ’el kal beheimah leriw‘ah ’otah, weharagta ’et ha’ishah we’et habeheimah; mot yumatu demeihem bam. 
leviticus 20:17	we’ish ’asher yiqaH ’et ’aHoto bat ’awiw ’o wat ’imo wera’ah ’et ‘erwatah wehi tir’eh ’et ‘erwato Hesed hu, wenikhretu, le‘einei benei ‘amam; ‘erwat ’aHoto gilah ‘awono yisa. 
leviticus 20:18	we’ish ’asher yishkaw ’et ’ishah dawah, wegilah ’et ‘erwatah ’et meqorah he‘erah, wehi giletah ’et meqor dameha; wenikhretu sheneihem miqerew ‘amam. 
leviticus 20:19	we‘erwat ’aHot ’imekha wa’aHot ’awikha lo tegaleih; ki ’et she’eiro he‘erah ‘awonam yisa’u. 
leviticus 20:20	we’ish, ’asher yishkaw ’et dodato, ‘erwat dodo gilah; HeT’am yisa’u ‘aririm yamutu. 
leviticus 20:21	we’ish, ’asher yiqaH ’et ’eishet ’aHiw nidah hi ‘erwat ’aHiw gilah ‘aririm yihyu. 
leviticus 20:22	ushemartem ’et kal Huqotay we’et kal mishpaTay, wa‘asitem ’otam; welo taqi ’etkhem ha’arez, ’asher ’ani meiwi ’etkhem shamah lashewet bah. 
leviticus 20:23	welo teilekhu beHuqot hago, ’asher ’ani meshaleiaH mipeneikhem; ki ’et kal ’eileh ‘asu, wa’aquz bam. 
leviticus 20:24	wa’omar lakhem, ’atem tireshu ’et ’admatam wa’ani ’etenenah lakhem lareshet ’otah, ’erez cawat Halaw udewash; ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem, ’asher hiwdalti ’etkhem min ha‘amim. 
leviticus 20:25	wehiwdaltem bein habeheimah haTehorah laTemei’ah, uwein ha‘of haTamei laTahor; welo teshaqezu ’et nafshoteikhem babeheimah uwa‘of, uwekhol ’asher tirmos ha’adamah, ’asher hiwdalti lakhem leTamei. 
leviticus 20:26	wihyitem li qedoshim, ki qadosh ’ani yhoh; wa’awdil ’etkhem min ha‘amim lihyot li. 
leviticus 20:27	we’ish ’o ’ishah, ki yihyeh wahem ’ow ’o yide‘oni mot yumatu; ba’ewen yirgemu ’otam demeihem bam.
leviticus 21:1	wayomer yhoh ’el mosheh, ’emor ’el hakohanim benei ’aharon; we’amarta ’aleihem, lenefesh lo yiTama be‘amaw. 
leviticus 21:2	ki ’im lish’eiro, haqarow ’eilaw; le’imo ule’awiw, weliwno ulewito ule’aHiw. 
leviticus 21:3	wela’aHoto habetulah haqerowah ’eilaw, ’asher lo hayetah le’ish; lah yiTama. 
leviticus 21:4	lo yiTama ba‘al be‘amaw; leheiHalo. 
leviticus 21:5	lo yiqreHah yiqreHu qareHah berosham, ufe’at ceqanam lo yegaleiHu; uwiwsaram, lo yisreTu saraTet. 
leviticus 21:6	qedoshim yihyu leiloheihem, welo yeHalelu, sheim ’eloheihem; ki ’et ’ishei yhoh leHem ’eloheihem heim maqriwim wehayu qodesh. 
leviticus 21:7	’ishah conah waHalalah lo yiqaHu, we’ishah gerushah mei’ishah lo yiqaHu; ki qadosh hu leilohaw. 
leviticus 21:8	weqidashto, ki ’et leHem ’elohekha hu maqriw; qadosh yihyeh lakh, ki qadosh, ’ani yhoh meqadishkhem. 
leviticus 21:9	uwat ’ish kohein, ki teiHeil licnot; ’et ’awiha hi meHalelet, ba’eish tisareif.
leviticus 21:10	wehakohein hagadol mei’eHaw ’asher yuzaq ‘al rosho shemen hamishHah umilei ’et yado, lilbosh ’et habegadim; ’et rosho lo yifra‘, uwegadaw lo yifrom. 
leviticus 21:11	we‘al kal nafshot meit lo yawo; le’awiw ule’imo lo yiTama. 
leviticus 21:12	umin hamiqdash lo yeizei, welo yeHaleil, ’eit miqdash ’elohaw; ki neicer shemen mishHat ’elohaw ‘alaw ’ani yhoh. 
leviticus 21:13	wehu ’ishah wiwtuleha yiqaH. 
leviticus 21:14	’almanah ugerushah waHalalah conah, ’et ’eileh lo yiqaH; ki ’im betulah mei‘amaw yiqaH ’ishah. 
leviticus 21:15	welo yeHaleil car‘o be‘amaw; ki ’ani yhoh meqadesho.
leviticus 21:16	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 21:17	dabeir ’el ’aharon leimor; ’ish miccar‘akha ledorotam, ’asher yihyeh wo mum, lo yiqraw, lehaqriw leHem ’elohaw. 
leviticus 21:18	ki khal ’ish ’asher bo mum lo yiqraw; ’ish ‘iwweir ’o fisseiaH, ’o Harum ’o sarua‘. 
leviticus 21:19	’o ’ish, ’asher yihyeh wo shewer ragel; ’o shewer yad. 
leviticus 21:20	’o gibein ’o daq, ’o tewalul be‘eino; ’o garaw ’o yalefet, ’o meroaH ’ashekh. 
leviticus 21:21	kal ’ish ’asher bo mum, miccera‘ ’aharon hakohein, lo yigash, lehaqriw ’et ’ishei yhoh; mum bo, ’eit leHem ’elohaw, lo yigash lehaqriw. 
leviticus 21:22	leHem ’elohaw, miqadeshei haqodashim; umin haqodashim yokheil. 
leviticus 21:23	’akh ’el haparokhet lo yawo, we’el hamicbeiaH lo yigash ki mum bo; welo yeHaleil ’et miqdashay, ki ’ani yhoh meqadesham. 
leviticus 21:24	waydabeir mosheh, ’el ’aharon we’el banaw; we’el kal benei yisra’eil.
leviticus 22:1	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 22:2	dabeir ’el ’aharon we’el banaw, weyinaceru miqadeshei wenei yisra’eil, welo yeHalelu ’et sheim qadshi ’asher heim maqdishim li ’ani yhoh. 
leviticus 22:3	’emor ’aleihem, ledoroteikhem kal ’ish ’asher yiqraw mikal car‘akhem, ’el haqodashim ’asher yaqdishu wenei yisra’eil yhoh, weTum’ato ‘alaw; wenikhretah hanefesh hahiw milefanay ’ani yhoh. 
leviticus 22:4	’ish ’ish miccera‘ ’aharon, wehu zarua‘ ’o caw, baqodashim lo yokhal, ‘ad ’asher yiThar; wehanogeia‘ bekhal Temei nefesh, ’o ’ish, ’asher teizei mimenu shikhwat cara‘. 
leviticus 22:5	’o ’ish ’asher yiga‘, bekhal sherez ’asher yiTma lo; ’o we’adam ’asher yiTma lo, lekhol Tum’ato. 
leviticus 22:6	nefesh ’asher tiga‘ bo, weTame’ah ‘ad ha‘arew; welo yokhal min haqodashim, ki ’im raHaz besaro bamayim. 
leviticus 22:7	uwa hashemesh weTaheir; we’aHar yokhal min haqodashim, ki laHmo hu. 
leviticus 22:8	neweilah uTereifah lo yokhal leTame’ah wah; ’ani yhoh. 
leviticus 22:9	weshameru ’et mishmarti, welo yis’u ‘alaw HeiT, umeitu wo ki yeHaleluhu; ’ani yhoh meqadesham. 
leviticus 22:10	wekhal car lo yokhal qodesh; toshaw kohein wesakhir lo yokhal qodesh. 
leviticus 22:11	wekhohein, ki yiqneh nefesh qinyan kaspo, hu yokhal bo; wilid beito, heim yokhelu welaHmo. 
leviticus 22:12	uwat kohein, ki tihyeh le’ish car; hi bitrumat haqodashim lo tokheil. 
leviticus 22:13	uwat kohein ki tihyeh ’almanah ugerushah, wecera‘ ’ein lah weshawah ’el beit ’awiha kin‘ureha, mileHem ’awiha tokheil; wekhal car lo yokhal bo.
leviticus 22:14	we’ish ki yokhal qodesh bishgagah; weyasaf Hamishito ‘alaw, wenatan lakohein ’et haqodesh. 
leviticus 22:15	welo yeHalelu, ’et qadeshei benei yisra’eil; ’eit ’asher yarimu yhoh. 
leviticus 22:16	wehisi’u ’otam ‘awon ’ashmah, be’akhelam ’et qadesheihem; ki ’ani yhoh meqadesham.
leviticus 22:17	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 22:18	dabeir ’el ’aharon we’el banaw, we’el kal benei yisra’eil, we’amarta ’aleihem; ’ish ’ish mibeit yisra’eil umin hageir beyisra’eil, ’asher yaqriw qarebano lekhal nidreihem ulekhal nidwotam, ’asher yaqriwu yhoh le‘olah. 
leviticus 22:19	lirzonekhem; tamim cakhar, babaqar bakesawim uwa‘iccim. 
leviticus 22:20	kol ’asher bo mum lo taqriwu; ki lo lerazon yihyeh lakhem. 
leviticus 22:21	we’ish, ki yaqriw cewaH shelamim yhoh, lefalei neder ’o lindawah, babaqar ’o wazon; tamim yihyeh lerazon, kal mum lo yihyeh bo. 
leviticus 22:22	‘awweret ’o shawur ’o Haruz ’o yabelet, ’o garaw ’o yalefet, lo taqriwu ’eileh yhoh; we’isheh, lo titenu meihem ‘al hamicbeiaH yhoh. 
leviticus 22:23	weshor waseh sarua‘ weqaluT; nedawah ta‘aseh ’oto, uleneider lo yeirazeh. 
leviticus 22:24	uma‘ukh wekhatut wenatuq wekharut, lo taqriwu yhoh; uwe’arzekhem lo ta‘asu. 
leviticus 22:25	umiyad ben neikhar, lo taqriwu ’et leHem ’eloheikhem mikal ’eileh; ki masheHatam bahem mum bam, lo yeirazu lakhem.
leviticus 22:26	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 22:27	shor ’o khesew ’o ‘eic ki yiwwaleid, wehayah shiw‘at yamim taHat ’imo; umiyom hashemini wahale’ah, yeirazeh leqareban ’isheh yhoh. 
leviticus 22:28	weshor ’o seh; ’oto we’et beno, lo tishHaTu beyom ’eHad. 
leviticus 22:29	wekhi ticbeHu cewaH todah yhoh; lirzonekhem ticbaHu. 
leviticus 22:30	bayom hahu yei’akheil, lo totiru mimenu ‘ad boqer; ’ani yhoh. 
leviticus 22:31	ushemartem mizwotay, wa‘asitem ’otam; ’ani yhoh. 
leviticus 22:32	welo teHalelu ’et sheim qadshi weniqdashti, betokh benei yisra’eil; ’ani yhoh meqadishkhem. 
leviticus 22:33	hamozi ’etkhem mei’erez mizrayim, lihyot lakhem leilohim; ’ani yhoh.
leviticus 23:1	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 23:2	dabeir ’el benei yisra’eil we’amarta ’aleihem, mo‘adei yhoh, ’asher tiqre’u ’otam miqra’ei qodesh; ’eileh heim mo‘aday. 
leviticus 23:3	sheishet yamim tei‘aseh melakhah uwayom hashewi‘i, shabat shabaton miqra qodesh, kal melakhah lo ta‘asu; shabat hi yhoh, bekhol moshewoteikhem.
leviticus 23:4	’eileh mo‘adei yhoh, miqra’ei qodesh; ’asher tiqre’u ’otam bemo‘adam. 
leviticus 23:5	baHodesh harishon, be’arba‘ah ‘asar laHodesh bein ha‘arbayim; pesaH yhoh. 
leviticus 23:6	uwaHamishah ‘asar yom laHodesh hacceh, Hag hamazot yhoh; shiw‘at yamim mazot tokheilu. 
leviticus 23:7	bayom harishon, miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem; kal melekhet ‘awodah lo ta‘asu. 
leviticus 23:8	wehiqrawtem ’isheh yhoh shiw‘at yamim; bayom hashewi‘i miqra qodesh, kal melekhet ‘awodah lo ta‘asu.
leviticus 23:9	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 23:10	dabeir ’el benei yisra’eil we’amarta ’aleihem, ki tawo’u ’el ha’arez, ’asher ’ani notein lakhem, uqezartem ’et qezirah; wahaweitem ’et ‘omer reishit qezirekhem ’el hakohein. 
leviticus 23:11	weheinif ’et ha‘omer lifnei yhoh lirzonekhem; mimaHorat hashabat, yenifenu hakohein. 
leviticus 23:12	wa‘asitem beyom hanifekhem ’et ha‘omer; kewes tamim ben shenato le‘olah yhoh. 
leviticus 23:13	uminHato shenei ‘esronim solet belulah washemen ’isheh yhoh reiaH niHoaH; weniskoh yayin rewi‘it hahin. 
leviticus 23:14	weleHem weqali wekharmel lo tokhelu, ‘ad ‘ezem hayom hacceh, ‘ad hawi’akhem, ’et qareban ’eloheikhem; Huqat ‘olam ledoroteikhem, bekhol moshewoteikhem.
leviticus 23:15	usefartem lakhem mimaHorat hashabat, miyom hawi’akhem, ’et ‘omer hatenufah; shewa‘ shabatot temimot tihyenah. 
leviticus 23:16	‘ad mimaHorat hashabat hashewi‘it, tisperu Hamishim yom; wehiqrawtem minHah Hadashah yhoh. 
leviticus 23:17	mimoshewoteikhem tawi’’u leHem tenufah, tayim shenei ‘esronim, solet tihyenah, Hameiz tei’afenah; bikurim yhoh. 
leviticus 23:18	wehiqrawtem ‘al haleHem, shiw‘at kewasim temimim benei shanah, ufar ben baqar ’eHad we’eilim shenayim; yihyu ‘olah yhoh, uminHatam weniskeihem, ’isheih reiaH niHoaH yhoh. 
leviticus 23:19	wa‘asitem se‘ir ‘iccim ’eHad leHaTat; ushenei khewasim benei shanah lecewaH shelamim. 
leviticus 23:20	weheinif hakohein ’otam ‘al leHem habikurim tenufah lifnei yhoh, ‘al shenei kewasim; qodesh yihyu yhoh lakohein. 
leviticus 23:21	uqeratem be‘ezem hayom hacceh, miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem, kal melekhet ‘awodah lo ta‘asu; Huqat ‘olam bekhal moshewoteikhem ledoroteikhem. 
leviticus 23:22	uwequzrekhem ’et qezir ’arzekhem, lo tekhaleh pe’at sadekha bequzrekha, weleqeT qezirekha lo telaqeiT; le‘ani welageir ta‘acow ’otam, ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem.
leviticus 23:23	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 23:24	dabeir ’el benei yisra’eil leimor; baHodesh hashewi‘i be’eHad laHodesh, yihyeh lakhem shabaton, cikhron teru‘ah miqra qodesh. 
leviticus 23:25	kal melekhet ‘awodah lo ta‘asu; wehiqrawtem ’isheh yhoh.
leviticus 23:26	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 23:27	’akh be‘asor laHodesh hashewi‘i hacceh yom hakipurim hu, miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem, we‘initem ’et nafshoteikhem; wehiqrawtem ’isheh yhoh. 
leviticus 23:28	wekhal melakhah lo ta‘asu, be‘ezem hayom hacceh; ki yom kipurim hu, lekhapeir ‘aleikhem, lifnei yhoh ’eloheikhem 
leviticus 23:29	ki khal hanefesh ’asher lo te‘uneh, be‘ezem hayom hacceh; wenikhretah mei‘ameha. 
leviticus 23:30	wekhal hanefesh, ’asher ta‘aseh kal melakhah, be‘ezem hayom hacceh; weha’awadti ’et hanefesh hahiw miqerew ‘amah. 
leviticus 23:31	kal melakhah lo ta‘asu; Huqat ‘olam ledoroteikhem, bekhol moshewoteikhem. 
leviticus 23:32	shabat shabaton hu lakhem, we‘initem ’et nafshoteikhem; betish‘ah laHodesh ba‘erew, mei‘erew ‘ad ‘erew, tishbetu shabatekhem.
leviticus 23:33	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 23:34	dabeir ’el benei yisra’eil leimor; baHamishah ‘asar yom, laHodesh hashewi‘i hacceh, Hag hassukot shiw‘at yamim yhoh. 
leviticus 23:35	bayom harishon miqra qodesh; kal melekhet ‘awodah lo ta‘asu. 
leviticus 23:36	shiw‘at yamim, taqriwu ’isheh yhoh; bayom hashemini miqra qodesh yihyeh lakhem wehiqrawtem ’isheh yhoh ‘azeret hi kal melekhet ‘awodah lo ta‘asu. 
leviticus 23:37	’eileh mo‘adei yhoh, ’asher tiqre’u ’otam miqra’ei qodesh; lehaqriw ’isheh yhoh ‘olah uminHah cewaH unesakhim dewar yom beyomo. 
leviticus 23:38	milewad shabetot yhoh; umilewad matenoteikhem, umilewad kal nidreikhem umilewad kal nidwoteikhem, ’asher titenu yhoh. 
leviticus 23:39	’akh baHamishah ‘asar yom laHodesh hashewi‘i, be’asepekhem ’et tewu’at ha’arez, taHogu ’et Hag yhoh shiw‘at yamim; bayom harishon shabaton, uwayom hashemini shabaton. 
leviticus 23:40	uleqaHtem lakhem bayom harishon, peri ‘eiz hadar kapot temarim, wa‘anaf ‘eiz ‘awot we‘arwei naHal; usemaHtem, lifnei yhoh ’eloheikhem shiw‘at yamim. 
leviticus 23:41	weHagotem ’oto Hag yhoh, shiw‘at yamim bashanah; Huqat ‘olam ledoroteikhem, baHodesh hashewi‘i taHogu ’oto. 
leviticus 23:42	bassukot teishewu shiw‘at yamim; kal ha’ecraH beyisra’eil, yeishewu bassukot. 
leviticus 23:43	lema‘an yeide‘u doroteikhem ki wassukot, hoshawti ’et benei yisra’eil, behozi’i ’otam mei’erez mizrayim; ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
leviticus 23:44	waydabeir mosheh, ’et mo‘adei yhoh; ’el benei yisra’eil.
leviticus 24:1	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 24:2	zaw ’et benei yisra’eil, weyiqHu ’eilekha shemen cayit cakh katit lama’or; leha‘alot neir tamid. 
leviticus 24:3	miHuz lefarokhet ha‘eidut be’ohel mo‘eid, ya‘arokh ’oto ’aharon mei‘erew ‘ad boqer lifnei yhoh tamid; Huqat ‘olam ledoroteikhem. 
leviticus 24:4	‘al hamenorah haTehorah, ya‘arokh ’et haneirot; lifnei yhoh tamid.
leviticus 24:5	welaqaHta solet, we’afita ’otah, sheteim ‘esreih Halot; shenei ‘esronim, yihyeh haHalah ha’eHat. 
leviticus 24:6	wesamta ’otam shetayim ma‘arakhot sheish hama‘arakhet; ‘al hashulHan haTahor lifnei yhoh. 
leviticus 24:7	wenatata ‘al hama‘arekhet lewonah cakah; wehayetah laleHem le’ackarah, ’isheh yhoh. 
leviticus 24:8	beyom hashabat beyom hashabat, ya‘arkhenu lifnei yhoh tamid; mei’eit benei yisra’eil berit ‘olam. 
leviticus 24:9	wehayetah le’aharon ulewanaw, wa’akhaluhu bemaqom qadosh; ki qodesh qadashim hu lo mei’ishei yhoh Haq ‘olam.
leviticus 24:10	wayeizei ben ’ishah yisre’eilit, wehu ben ’ish mizri, betokh benei yisra’eil; wayinazu bamaHaneh, ben hayisre’eilit, we’ish hayisre’eili. 
leviticus 24:11	wayiqow ben ha’ishah hayisre’eilit ’et hasheim wayqaleil, wayawi’u ’oto ’el mosheh; wesheim ’imo shelomit bat diwri lemaTeih dan. 
leviticus 24:12	wayaniHuhu bamishmar; lifrosh lahem ‘al pi yhoh.
leviticus 24:13	waydabeir yhoh ’el mosheh leimor. 
leviticus 24:14	hozei ’et hamqaleil, ’el miHuz lamaHaneh, wesamekhu khal hashome‘im ’et yedeihem ‘al rosho; weragemu ’oto kal ha‘eidah. 
leviticus 24:15	we’el benei yisra’eil tedabeir leimor; ’ish ’ish ki yeqaleil ’elohaw wenasa HeT’o. 
leviticus 24:16	wenoqeiw sheim yhoh mot yumat, ragom yirgemu wo kal ha‘eidah; kageir ka’ecraH, benaqewo sheim yumat. 
leviticus 24:17	we’ish ki yakeh kal nefesh ’adam; mot yumat. 
leviticus 24:18	umakeih nefesh beheimah yeshalemenah; nefesh taHat nafesh. 
leviticus 24:19	we’ish ki yitein mum ba‘amito; ka’asher ‘asah, kein yei‘aseh lo. 
leviticus 24:20	wer taHat shewer, ‘ayin taHat ‘ayin, shein taHat shein; ka’asher yitein mum ba’adam, kein yinaten bo. 
leviticus 24:21	umakeih weheimah yeshalemenah; umakeih ’adam yumat. 
leviticus 24:22	mishpaT ’eHad yihyeh lakhem, kageir ka’ecraH yihyeh; ki ’ani yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
leviticus 24:23	waydabeir mosheh ’el benei yisra’eil wayozi’u ’et hamqaleil, ’el miHuz lamaHaneh, wayirgemu ’oto ’awen; uwenei yisra’eil ‘asu, ka’asher ziwwah yhoh ’et mosheh.
