judges 9:5	wayawo weit ’awiw ‘aferatah, wayaharog ’et ’eHaw benei yeruba‘al shiw‘im ’ish ‘al ’ewen ’eHat; wayiwwateir yotam ben yeruba‘al haqaTon ki neHba.
judges 9:6	wayei’asefu kal ba‘alei shekhem wekhal beit milo, wayeilekhu, wayamlikhu ’et ’awimelekh lemelekh; ‘im ’eilon muzaw ’asher bishkhem. 
judges 9:7	wayagidu leyotam, wayeilekh waya‘amod berosh har gericim, wayisa qolo wayiqra; wayomer lahem, shim‘u ’eilay ba‘alei shekhem, weyishma‘ ’aleikhem ’elohim. 
judges 9:8	halokh halekhu ha‘eizim, limshoaH ‘aleihem melekh; wayomeru laccayit melokhah malekhah ‘aleinu. 
judges 9:9	wayomer lahem haccayit, heHodalti ’et dishni, ’asher bi yekhabedu ’elohim wa’anashim; wehalakhti, lanua‘ ‘al ha‘eizim. 
judges 9:10	wayomeru ha‘eizim late’einah; lekhi ’at malekhi ‘aleinu. 
judges 9:11	watomer lahem hate’einah, heHodalti ’et mateqi, we’et tenuwati haTowah; wehalakhti, lanua‘ ‘al ha‘eizim. 
judges 9:12	wayomeru ha‘eizim lagafen; lekhi ’at malokhi malekhi ‘aleinu. 
judges 9:13	watomer lahem hagefen, heHodalti ’et tiroshi, hamsameiaH ’elohim wa’anashim; wehalakhti, lanua‘ ‘al ha‘eizim. 
judges 9:14	wayomeru khal ha‘eizim ’el ha’aTad; leikh ’atah melakh ‘aleinu. 
judges 9:15	wayomer ha’aTad ’el ha‘eizim ’im be’emet ’atem mosheHim ’oti lemelekh ‘aleikhem, bo’u Hasu wezili; we’im ’ayin teizei ’eish min ha’aTad, wetokhal ’et ’arcei halewanon. 
judges 9:16	we‘atah, ’im be’emet uwetamim ‘asitem, watamlikhu ’et ’awimelekh; we’im Towah ‘asitem ‘im yeruba‘al we‘im beito, we’im kigmul yadaw ‘asitem lo. 
judges 9:17	’asher nilHam ’awi ‘aleikhem; wayashleikh ’et nafsho mineged, wayazeil ’etkhem miyad midyan. 
judges 9:18	we’atem qamtem ‘al beit ’awi hayom, watahargu ’et banaw shiw‘im ’ish ‘al ’ewen ’eHat; watamlikhu ’et ’awimelekh ben ’amato ‘al ba‘alei shekhem, ki ’aHikhem hu. 
judges 9:19	we’im be’emet uwetamim ‘asitem ‘im yeruba‘al we‘im beito hayom hacceh; simHu ba’awimelekh, weyismaH gam hu bakhem. 
judges 9:20	we’im ’ayin teizei ’eish mei’awimelekh, wetokhal ’et ba‘alei shekhem we’et beit milo; weteizei ’eish miba‘alei shekhem umibeit milo, wetokhal ’et ’awimelekh. 
judges 9:21	wayanas yotam, wayiwraH wayeilekh be’eirah; wayeishew sham, mipenei ’awimelekh ’aHiw.
judges 9:22	wayasar ’awimelekh ‘al yisra’eil shalosh shanim. 
judges 9:23	wayishlaH ’elohim ruaH ra‘ah, bein ’awimelekh, uwein ba‘alei shekhem; wayiwgedu wa‘alei shekhem ba’awimelekh. 
judges 9:24	lawo Hamas shiw‘im benei yeruba‘al; wedamam, lasum ‘al ’awimelekh ’aHihem ’asher harag ’otam, we‘al ba‘alei shekhem, ’asher Hiccequ ’et yadaw laharog ’et ’eHaw. 
judges 9:25	wayasimu lo wa‘alei shekhem me’arewim, ‘al rashei heharim, wayigcelu, ’eit kal ’asher ya‘awor ‘aleihem badarekh; wayugad la’awimelekh.
judges 9:26	wayawo ga‘al ben ‘ewed we’eHaw, waya‘awru bishkhem; wayiwTeHu wo ba‘alei shekhem. 
judges 9:27	wayeize’u hasadeh wayiwzeru ’et karmeihem wayidrekhu, waya‘asu hilulim; wayawo’u beit ’eloheihem, wayokhelu wayishtu, wayqalu ’et ’awimelekh. 
judges 9:28	wayomer ga‘al ben ‘ewed, mi ’awimelekh umi shekhem ki na‘awdenu, halo wen yeruba‘al ucewul peqido; ‘iwdu, ’et ’anshei Hamor ’awi shekhem, umadua‘ na‘awdenu ’anaHenu. 
judges 9:29	umi yitein ’et ha‘am hacceh beyadi, we’asirah ’et ’awimelekh; wayomer la’awimelekh, rabeh zewa’akha wazei’ah. 
judges 9:30	wayishma‘, cewul sar ha‘ir, ’et diwrei ga‘al ben ‘awed; wayiHar ’apo. 
judges 9:31	wayishlaH mal’akhim ’el ’awimelekh betaremah leimor; hineih ga‘al ben ‘ewed we’eHaw ba’im shekhemah, wehinam zarim ’et ha‘ir ‘alekha. 
judges 9:32	we‘atah qum laylah, ’atah weha‘am ’asher ’itakh; we’erow basadeh. 
judges 9:33	wehayah waboqer kicroaH hashemesh, tashkim ufashaTta ‘al ha‘ir; wehineih hu weha‘am ’asher ’ito yoze’im ’eilekha, we‘asita lo, ka’asher timza yadekha.
judges 9:34	wayaqam ’awimelekh wekhal ha‘am ’asher ‘imo layelah; waye’erwu ‘al shekhem, ’arba‘ah rashim. 
judges 9:35	wayeizei ga‘al ben ‘ewed, waya‘amod petaH sha‘ar ha‘ir; wayaqam ’awimelekh weha‘am ’asher ’ito min hama’raw. 
judges 9:36	wayar ga‘al ’et ha‘am wayomer ’el cewul, hineih ‘am yoreid, meirashei heharim; wayomer ’eilaw cewul, ’eit zeil heharim ’atah ro’eh ka’anashim.
judges 9:37	wayosef ‘od ga‘al ledabeir wayomer hineih ‘am yordim, mei‘im Tabur ha’arez; werosh ’eHad ba, miderekh ’eilon me‘onim. 
judges 9:38	wayomer ’eilaw cewul, ’ayeih ’eifo fikha ’asher tomar, mi ’awimelekh ki na‘awdenu; halo ceh ha‘am ’asher ma’astah bo, zei na ‘atah wehilaHem bo.
judges 9:39	wayeizei ga‘al, lifnei ba‘alei shekhem; wayilaHem ba’awimelekh. 
judges 9:40	wayirdefeihu ’awimelekh, wayanas mipanaw; wayipelu Halalim rabim ‘ad petaH hasha‘ar. 
judges 9:41	wayeishew ’awimelekh barumah; waygaresh cewul ’et ga‘al we’et ’eHaw mishewet bishkhem. 
judges 9:42	wayhi mimaHorat, wayeizei ha‘am hasadeh; wayagidu la’awimelekh. 
judges 9:43	wayiqaH ’et ha‘am, wayeHezeim lishloshah rashim, waye’erow basadeh; wayar, wehineih ha‘am yozei min ha‘ir, wayaqam ‘aleihem wayakeim. 
judges 9:44	wa’awimelekh, weharashim ’asher ‘imo, pasheTu waya‘amdu, petaH sha‘ar ha‘ir; ushenei harashim, pasheTu ‘al kal ’asher basadeh wayakum. 
judges 9:45	wa’awimelekh nilHam ba‘ir, kol hayom hahu, wayilkod ’et ha‘ir, we’et ha‘am ’asher bah harag; wayitoz ’et ha‘ir, wayicra‘eha melaH.
judges 9:46	wayishme‘u, kal ba‘alei migdal shekhem; wayawo’u ’el zeriaH, beit ’eil berit. 
judges 9:47	wayugad la’awimelekh; ki hitqabezu, kal ba‘alei migdal shekhem. 
judges 9:48	waya‘al ’awimelekh har zalmon, hu wekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito wayiqaH ’awimelekh ’et haqardumot beyado, wayikhrot sokhat ‘eizim, wayisa’eha, wayasem ‘al shikhmo; wayomer ’el ha‘am ’asher ‘imo, mah re’item ‘asiti, maharu ‘asu khamoni. 
judges 9:49	wayikhretu gam kal ha‘am ’ish sokhoh, wayeilekhu ’aHarei ’awimelekh wayasimu ‘al hazeriaH, wayazitu ‘aleihem ’et hazeriaH ba’eish; wayamutu gam kal ’anshei migdal shekhem ke’elef ’ish we’ishah.
judges 9:50	wayeilekh ’awimelekh ’el teiweiz; wayiHan beteiweiz wayilkedah. 
judges 9:51	umigdal ‘oc hayah wetokh ha‘ir wayanusu shamah kal ha’anashim wehanashim, wekhol ba‘alei ha‘ir, wayisgeru ba‘adam; waya‘alu ‘al gag hamigdal. 
judges 9:52	wayawo ’awimelekh ‘ad hamigdal, wayilaHem bo; wayigash ‘ad petaH hamigdal lesarefo wa’eish. 
judges 9:53	watashleikh ’ishah ’aHat pelaH rekhew ‘al rosh ’awimelekh; watariz ’et gulgaleto. 
judges 9:54	wayiqra meheirah ’el hana‘ar nosei kheilaw, wayomer lo shelof Harbekha umotteini, pen yomeru li ’ishah haragatehu; wayidqereihu na‘aro wayamot. 
judges 9:55	wayir’u ’ish yisra’eil ki meit ’awimelekh; wayeilekhu ’ish limqomo. 
judges 9:56	wayashew ’elohim, ’eit ra‘at ’awimelekh; ’asher ‘asah le’awiw, laharog ’et shiw‘im ’eHaw. 
judges 9:57	we’eit, kal ra‘at ’anshei shekhem, heishiw ’elohim berosham; watawo ’aleihem, qilalat yotam ben yeruba‘al.
judges 10:1	wayaqam ’aHarei ’awimelekh lehoshia‘ ’et yisra’eil, tola‘ ben pu’ah ben dodo ’ish yisashkhar; wehu yosheiw beshamir behar ’efrayim. 
judges 10:2	wayishpoT ’et yisra’eil, ‘esrim weshalosh shanah; wayamat wayiqaweir beshamir.
judges 10:3	wayaqam ’aHaraw, ya’ir hagil‘adi; wayishpoT ’et yisra’eil, ‘esrim ushetayim shanah. 
judges 10:4	wayhi lo sheloshim banim, rokhewim ‘al sheloshim ‘ayarim, usheloshim ‘ayarim lahem; lahem yiqre’u Hawwot ya’ir, ‘ad hayom hacceh, ’asher be’erez hagil‘ad. 
judges 10:5	wayamat ya’ir, wayiqaweir beqamon.
judges 10:6	wayosifu benei yisra’eil, la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh waya‘awdu ’et habe‘alim we’et ha‘ashtarot we’et ’elohei ’aram we’et ’elohei zidon we’eit ’elohei mo’aw, we’eit ’elohei wenei ‘amon, we’eit ’elohei felishtim; waya‘acwu ’et yhoh welo ‘awaduhu. 
judges 10:7	wayiHar ’af yhoh beyisra’eil; wayimkereim beyad pelishtim, uweyad benei ‘amon. 
judges 10:8	wayir‘azu wayrozezu ’et benei yisra’eil, bashanah hahi; shemoneh ‘esreih shanah, ’et kal benei yisra’eil ’asher be‘eiwer hayardein, be’erez ha’emori ’asher bagil‘ad. 
judges 10:9	waya‘awru wenei ‘amon ’et hayardein, lehilaHeim gam bihudah uwewinyamin uweweit ’efrayim; wateizer leyisra’eil me’od. 
judges 10:10	wayic‘aqu benei yisra’eil, ’el yhoh leimor; HaTanu lakh, wekhi ‘acawnu ’et ’eloheinu, wana‘awod ’et habe‘alim.
judges 10:11	wayomer yhoh ’el benei yisra’eil; halo mimizrayim umin ha’emori, umin benei ‘amon umin pelishtim. 
judges 10:12	wezidonim wa‘amaleiq uma‘on, laHazu ’etkhem; watiz‘aqu ’eilay, wa’oshi‘ah ’etkhem miyadam. 
judges 10:13	we’atem ‘acawtem ’oti, wata‘awdu ’elohim ’aHeirim; lakhein lo ’osif lehoshia‘ ’etkhem. 
judges 10:14	lekhu, weca‘aqu ’el ha’elohim, ’asher beHartem bam; heimah yoshi‘u lakhem be‘eit zaratkhem. 
judges 10:15	wayomeru wenei yisra’eil ’el yhoh HaTanu, ‘aseih ’atah lanu, kekhal haTow be‘einekha; ’akh hazileinu na hayom hacceh. 
judges 10:16	wayasiru ’et ’elohei haneikhar miqirbam, waya‘awdu ’et yhoh; watiqzar nafsho ba‘amal yisra’eil.
judges 10:17	wayiza‘aqu benei ‘amon, wayaHanu bagil‘ad; wayei’asefu benei yisra’eil, wayaHanu bamizpah. 
judges 10:18	wayomeru ha‘am sarei gil‘ad ’ish ’el rei‘eihu, mi ha’ish, ’asher yaHeil, lehilaHeim biwnei ‘amon; yihyeh lerosh, lekhol yoshewei gil‘ad.
judges 11:1	weyiftaH hagil‘adi, hayah gibor Hayil, wehu ben ’ishah conah; wayoled gil‘ad ’et yiftaH. 
judges 11:2	wateiled ’eishet gil‘ad lo banim; wayigdelu wenei ha’ishah waygareshu ’et yiftaH, wayomeru lo lo tinHal beweit ’awinu, ki ben ’ishah ’aHeret ’atah. 
judges 11:3	wayiwraH yiftaH mipenei ’eHaw, wayeishew be’erez Tow; wayitlaqeTu ’el yiftaH ’anashim reiqim, wayeize’u ‘imo.
judges 11:4	wayhi miyamim; wayilaHamu wenei ‘amon ‘im yisra’eil. 
judges 11:5	wayhi ka’asher nilHamu wenei ‘amon ‘im yisra’eil; wayeilekhu ciqnei gil‘ad, laqaHat ’et yiftaH mei’erez Tow. 
judges 11:6	wayomeru leyiftaH, lekhah wehayitah lanu leqazin; wenilaHamah biwnei ‘amon. 
judges 11:7	wayomer yiftaH leciqnei gil‘ad, halo ’atem seneitem ’oti, wategareshuni mibeit ’awi; umadua‘ batem ’eilay ‘atah, ka’asher zar lakhem. 
judges 11:8	wayomeru ciqnei gil‘ad ’el yiftaH, lakhein ‘atah shawnu ’eilekha, wehalakhta ‘imanu, wenilHamta biwnei ‘amon; wehayita lanu lerosh, lekhol yoshewei gil‘ad. 
judges 11:9	wayomer yiftaH ’el ciqnei gil‘ad, ’im meshiwim ’atem ’oti lehilaHeim biwnei ‘amon, wenatan yhoh ’otam lefanay; ’anokhi ’ehyeh lakhem lerosh. 
judges 11:10	wayomeru ciqnei gil‘ad ’el yiftaH; yhoh yihyeh shomeia‘ beinoteinu, ’im lo khidwarekha kein na‘aseh. 
judges 11:11	wayeilekh yiftaH ‘im ciqnei gil‘ad, wayasimu ha‘am ’oto ‘aleihem lerosh uleqazin; waydabeir yiftaH ’et kal dewaraw lifnei yhoh bamizpah.
judges 11:12	wayishlaH yiftaH mal’akhim, ’el melekh benei ‘amon leimor; mah li walakh, ki wata ’eilay lehilaHeim be’arzi. 
judges 11:13	wayomer melekh benei ‘amon ’el mal’akhei yiftaH, ki laqaH yisra’eil ’et ’arzi ba‘aloto mimizrayim, mei’arnon we‘ad hayaboq we‘ad hayardein; we‘atah hashiwah ’ethen beshalom. 
judges 11:14	wayosef ‘od yiftaH; wayishlaH mal’akhim, ’el melekh benei ‘amon. 
judges 11:15	wayomer lo, koh ’amar yiftaH; lo laqaH yisra’eil ’et ’erez mo’aw, we’et ’erez benei ‘amon. 
judges 11:16	ki ba‘alotam mimizrayim; wayeilekh yisra’eil bamidbar ‘ad yam suf, wayawo qadeishah. 
judges 11:17	wayishlaH yisra’eil mal’akhim ’el melekh ’edom leimor ’e‘berah na we’arzekha, welo shama‘ melekh ’edom, wegam ’el melekh mo’aw shalaH welo ’awah; wayeishew yisra’eil beqadeish. 
judges 11:18	wayeilekh bamidbar, wayasaw ’et ’erez ’edom we’et ’erez mo’aw, wayawo mimicraH shemesh le’erez mo’aw, wayaHanun be‘eiwer ’arnon; welo wa’u bigwul mo’aw, ki ’arnon gewul mo’aw. 
judges 11:19	wayishlaH yisra’eil mal’akhim, ’el siHon melekh ha’emori melekh Heshbon; wayomer lo yisra’eil, na‘berah na we’arzekha ‘ad meqomi. 
judges 11:20	welo he’emin siHon ’et yisra’eil ‘awor bigwulo, waye’esof siHon ’et kal ‘amo, wayaHanu beyahezah; wayilaHem ‘im yisra’eil. 
judges 11:21	wayitein yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil ’et siHon we’et kal ‘amo beyad yisra’eil wayakum; wayirash yisra’eil, ’eit kal ’erez ha’emori, yosheiw ha’arez hahi. 
judges 11:22	wayireshu, ’eit kal gewul ha’emori; mei’arnon we‘ad hayaboq, umin hamidbar we‘ad hayardein. 
judges 11:23	we‘atah yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, horish ’et ha’emori, mipenei ‘amo yisra’eil; we’atah tirashenu. 
judges 11:24	halo ’eit ’asher yorishekha kemosh ’elohekha ’oto tirash; we’eit kal ’asher horish yhoh ’eloheinu mipaneinu ’oto nirash. 
judges 11:25	we‘atah, haTow Tow ’atah, mibalaq ben zipor melekh mo’aw; harow raw ‘im yisra’eil, ’im nilHom nilHam bam. 
judges 11:26	beshewet yisra’eil beHeshbon uwiwnoteha uwe‘ar‘or uwiwnoteha, uwekhal he‘arim ’asher ‘al yedei ’arnon, shelosh mei’ot shanah; umadua‘ lo hizaltem ba‘eit hahi. 
judges 11:27	we’anokhi lo HaTati lakh, we’atah ‘oseh ’iti ra‘ah lehilaHem bi; yishpoT yhoh hashofeiT hayom, bein benei yisra’eil, uwein benei ‘amon. 
judges 11:28	welo shama‘, melekh benei ‘amon; ’el diwrei yiftaH, ’asher shalaH ’eilaw.
judges 11:29	watehi ‘al yiftaH ruaH yhoh, waya‘awor ’et hagil‘ad we’et menasheh; waya‘awor ’et mizpeih gil‘ad, umimizpeih gil‘ad, ‘awar benei ‘amon. 
judges 11:30	wayidar yiftaH neder yhoh wayomar; ’im naton titein ’et benei ‘amon beyadi. 
judges 11:31	wehayah hayozei, ’asher yeizei midaltei weiti liqrati, beshuwi weshalom mibenei ‘amon; wehayah yhoh, weha‘alitihu ‘olah.
judges 11:32	waya‘awor yiftaH ’el benei ‘amon lehilaHem bam; wayiteneim yhoh beyado. 
judges 11:33	wayakeim mei‘aro‘eir we‘ad bo’akha minit ‘esrim ‘ir, we‘ad ’aweil keramim, makah gedolah me’od; wayikane‘u benei ‘amon, mipenei benei yisra’eil.
judges 11:34	wayawo yiftaH hamizpah ’el beito wehineih wito yozeit liqrato, wetupim uwimHolot; weraq hi yeHidah, ’ein lo mimenu bein ’o wat. 
judges 11:35	wayhi khir’oto ’otah wayiqra‘ ’et begadaw, wayomer ’ahah biti hakhreia‘ hikhra‘tini, we’at hayit be‘okheray; we’anokhi, paziti fi ’el yhoh, welo ’ukhal lashuw. 
judges 11:36	watomer ’eilaw, ’awi pazitah ’et pikha ’el yhoh, ‘aseih li, ka’asher yaza mipikha; ’aHarei ’asher ‘asah lekha yhoh neqamot mei’oyewekha mibenei ‘amon. 
judges 11:37	watomer ’el ’awiha, yei‘aseh li hadawar hacceh; harpeih mimeni shenayim Hodashim, we’eilekhah weyaradti ‘al heharim, we’ewkeh ‘al betulay, ’anokhi wera‘iti werei‘otay. 
judges 11:38	wayomer leikhi, wayishlaH ’otah shenei Hodashim; wateilekh hi werei‘oteha, wateiwek ‘al betuleha ‘al heharim. 
judges 11:39	wayhi miqeiz shenayim Hodashim, watashaw ’el ’awiha, waya‘as lah, ’et nidro ’asher nadar; wehi lo yade‘ah ’ish, watehi Hoq beyisra’eil. 
judges 11:40	miyamim yamimah, teilakhnah benot yisra’eil, letanot lewat yiftaH hagil‘adi; ’arba‘at yamim bashanah.
judges 12:1	wayiza‘eiq ’ish ’efrayim, waya‘awor zafonah; wayomeru leyiftaH madua‘ ‘awarta lehilaHeim biwnei ‘amon, welanu lo qarata lalekhet ‘imakh, beitekha nisrof ‘alekha ba’eish. 
judges 12:2	wayomer yiftaH ’aleihem, ’ish riw, hayiti ’ani we‘ami uwenei ‘amon me’od; wa’ec‘aq ’etkhem, welo hosha‘tem ’oti miyadam. 
judges 12:3	wa’er’eh ki ’einekha moshia‘, wa’asimah nafshi wekhapi wa’e‘berah ’el benei ‘amon, wayiteneim yhoh beyadi; welamah ‘alitem ’eilay hayom hacceh lehilaHem bi. 
judges 12:4	wayiqboz yiftaH ’et kal ’anshei gil‘ad, wayilaHem ’et ’efrayim; wayaku ’anshei gil‘ad ’et ’efrayim, ki ’ameru peliTei ’efrayim ’atem, gil‘ad betokh ’efrayim betokh menasheh. 
judges 12:5	wayilkod gil‘ad ’et ma‘berot hayardein le’efrayim; wehayah ki yomeru peliTei ’efrayim ’e‘eworah, wayomeru lo ’anshei gil‘ad ha’efrati ’atah wayomer lo. 
judges 12:6	wayomeru lo ’emar na shibolet wayomer sibolet, welo yakhin ledabeir kein, wayoHacu ’oto, wayishHaTuhu ’el ma‘berot hayardein; wayipol ba‘eit hahi mei’efrayim, ’arba‘im ushenayim ’alef. 
judges 12:7	wayishpoT yiftaH ’et yisra’eil sheish shanim; wayamat, yiftaH hagil‘adi, wayiqaweir be‘arei gil‘ad.
judges 12:8	wayishpoT ’aHaraw ’et yisra’eil, ’iwzan mibeit laHem. 
judges 12:9	wayhi lo sheloshim banim, usheloshim banot shilaH haHuzah, usheloshim banot, heiwi lewanaw min haHuz; wayishpoT ’et yisra’eil shewa‘ shanim. 
judges 12:10	wayamat ’iwzan, wayiqaweir beweit laHem.
judges 12:11	wayishpoT ’aHaraw ’et yisra’eil, ’eilon haccewuloni; wayishpoT ’et yisra’eil ‘eser shanim. 
judges 12:12	wayamat ’eilon haccewuloni; wayiqaweir be’ayalon be’erez cewulun.
judges 12:13	wayishpoT ’aHaraw ’et yisra’eil; ‘awdon ben hileil hapir‘atoni. 
judges 12:14	wayhi lo ’arba‘im banim, usheloshim benei wanim, rokhewim ‘al shiw‘im ‘ayarim; wayishpoT ’et yisra’eil shemoneh shanim. 
judges 12:15	wayamat ‘awdon ben hileil hapir‘atoni; wayiqaweir befir‘aton be’erez ’efrayim, behar ha‘amaleiqi.
judges 13:1	wayosifu benei yisra’eil, la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; wayiteneim yhoh beyad pelishtim ’arba‘im shanah.
judges 13:2	wayhi ’ish ’eHad mizare‘ah mimishpaHat hadani ushemo manoaH; we’ishto ‘aqarah welo yaladah. 
judges 13:3	wayeira mal’akh yhoh ’el ha’ishah; wayomer ’eileha, hineih na ’at ‘aqarah welo yaladt, weharit weyaladt bein. 
judges 13:4	we‘atah hishameri na, we’al tishti yayin wesheikhar; we’al tokheli kal Tamei. 
judges 13:5	ki hinakh harah weyoladt bein, umorah lo ya‘aleh ‘al rosho, ki necir ’elohim yihyeh hana‘ar min habaTen; wehu, yaHeil lehoshia‘ ’et yisra’eil miyad pelishtim. 
judges 13:6	watawo ha’ishah, watomer le’ishah leimor ’ish ha’elohim ba ’eilay, umar’eihu kemar’eih mal’akh ha’elohim nora me’od; welo she’iltihu ’ei micceh hu, we’et shemo lo higid li. 
judges 13:7	wayomer li, hinakh harah weyoladt bein; we‘atah ’al tishti yayin wesheikhar, we’al tokheli kal Tum’ah, ki necir ’elohim yihyeh hana‘ar, min habeTen ‘ad yom moto.
judges 13:8	waye‘tar manoaH ’el yhoh wayomar; bi ’adonay, ’ish ha’elohim ’asher shalaHta, yawo na ‘od ’eileinu, weyoreinu mah na‘aseh lana‘ar hayulad. 
judges 13:9	wayishma‘ ha’elohim beqol manoaH; wayawo mal’akh ha’elohim ‘od ’el ha’ishah, wehi yoshewet basadeh, umanoaH ’ishah ’ein ‘imah. 
judges 13:10	watemaheir ha’ishah, wataraz watageid le’ishah; watomer ’eilaw, hineih nir’ah ’eilay ha’ish, ’asher ba wayom ’eilay. 
judges 13:11	wayaqam wayeilekh manoaH ’aHarei ’ishto; wayawo ’el ha’ish, wayomer lo, ha’atah ha’ish ’asher dibarta ’el ha’ishah wayomer ’ani. 
judges 13:12	wayomer manoaH, ‘atah yawo dewarekha; mah yihyeh mishpaT hana‘ar uma‘aseihu. 
judges 13:13	wayomer mal’akh yhoh ’el manoaH; mikol ’asher ’amarti ’el ha’ishah tishameir. 
judges 13:14	mikol ’asher yeizei migefen hayayin lo tokhal, weyayin wesheikhar ’al teishet, wekhal Tum’ah ’al tokhal; kol ’asher ziwwitiha tishmor. 
judges 13:15	wayomer manoaH ’el mal’akh yhoh; na‘zerah na ’otakh, wena‘aseh lefanekha gedi ‘iccim. 
judges 13:16	wayomer mal’akh yhoh ’el manoaH, ’im ta‘zereini lo ’okhal belaHmekha, we’im ta‘aseh ‘olah, yhoh ta‘alenah; ki lo yada‘ manoaH, ki mal’akh yhoh hu. 
judges 13:17	wayomer manoaH ’el mal’akh yhoh mi shemekha; ki yawo diwreikha dewarekha wekhibadnukha. 
judges 13:18	wayomer lo mal’akh yhoh, lamah ceh tish’al lishmi; wehu feli.
judges 13:19	wayiqaH manoaH ’et gedi ha‘iccim we’et haminHah, waya‘al ‘al hazur yhoh; umafli la‘asot, umanoaH we’ishto ro’im. 
judges 13:20	wayhi wa‘alot halahaw mei‘al hamicbeiaH hashamaymah, waya‘al mal’akh yhoh belahaw hamicbeiaH; umanoaH we’ishto ro’im, wayipelu ‘al peneihem ’arezah. 
judges 13:21	welo yasaf ‘od mal’akh yhoh, leheira’oh ’el manoaH we’el ’ishto; ’ac yada‘ manoaH, ki mal’akh yhoh hu. 
judges 13:22	wayomer manoaH ’el ’ishto mot namut; ki ’elohim ra’inu. 
judges 13:23	watomer lo ’ishto, lu Hafeiz yhoh lahamiteinu lo laqaH miyadeinu ‘olah uminHah, welo her’anu ’et kal ’eileh; wekha‘eit lo hishmi‘anu kacot. 
judges 13:24	wateiled ha’ishah bein, watiqra ’et shemo shimshon; wayigdal hana‘ar, waywarekheihu yhoh. 
judges 13:25	wataHel ruaH yhoh, lefa‘amo bemaHaneih dan; bein zare‘ah uwein ’eshta’ol.
judges 14:1	wayeired shimshon timnatah; wayar ’ishah betimnatah mibenot pelishtim. 
judges 14:2	waya‘al, wayageid le’awiw ule’imo, wayomer, ’ishah ra’iti wetimnatah mibenot pelishtim; we‘atah qeHu ’otah li le’ishah. 
judges 14:3	wayomer lo ’awiw we’imo, ha’ein biwnot ’aHekha uwekhal ‘ami ’ishah, ki ’atah holeikh laqaHat ’ishah, mipelishtim ha‘areilim; wayomer shimshon ’el ’awiw ’otah qaH li, ki hi yasherah we‘einay. 
judges 14:4	we’awiw we’imo lo yade‘u, ki yhoh hi, ki to’anah hu mewaqeish mipelishtim; uwa‘eit hahi, pelishtim moshelim beyisra’eil.
judges 14:5	wayeired shimshon we’awiw we’imo timnatah; wayawo’u ‘ad karmei timnatah, wehineih kefir ’arayot, sho’eig liqrato. 
judges 14:6	watizlaH ‘alaw ruaH yhoh wayshasse‘eihu keshassa‘ hagedi, ume’umah ’ein beyado; welo higid le’awiw ule’imo, ’eit ’asher ‘asah. 
judges 14:7	wayeired waydabeir la’ishah; watishar be‘einei shimshon. 
judges 14:8	wayashaw miyamim leqaHtah, wayasar lir’ot, ’eit mapelet ha’aryeih; wehineih ‘adat deworim bigwiyat ha’aryeih udewash. 
judges 14:9	wayirdeihu ’el kapaw, wayeilekh halokh we’akhol, wayeilekh ’el ’awiw we’el ’imo, wayitein lahem wayokheilu; welo higid lahem, ki migewiyat ha’aryeih radah hadewash. 
judges 14:10	wayeired ’awihu ’el ha’ishah; waya‘as sham shimshon mishteh, ki kein ya‘asu habaHurim. 
judges 14:11	wayhi kir’otam ’oto; wayiqHu sheloshim meirei‘im, wayihyu ’ito. 
judges 14:12	wayomer lahem shimshon, ’aHudah na lakhem Hidah; ’im hageid tagidu ’otah li shiw‘at yemei hamishteh umezatem, wenatati lakhem sheloshim sedinim, usheloshim Halifot begadim. 
judges 14:13	we’im lo tukhelu lehagid li unetatem ’atem li sheloshim sedinim, usheloshim Halifot begadim; wayomeru lo, Hudah Hidatekha wenishma‘enah. 
judges 14:14	wayomer lahem, meiha’okheil yaza ma’akhal, umei‘ac yaza matoq; welo yakhelu lehagid haHidah sheloshet yamim. 
judges 14:15	wayhi bayom hashewi‘i, wayomeru le’eishet shimshon pati ’et ’isheikh, weyaged lanu ’et haHidah, pen nisrof ’otakh we’et beit ’awikh ba’eish; halyaresheinu qeratem lanu halo. 
judges 14:16	wateiwek ’eishet shimshon ‘alaw, watomer raq seneitani welo ’ahawtani, haHidah Hadta liwnei ‘ami, weli lo higadtah; wayomer lah, hineih le’awi ule’imi lo higadti welakh ’agid. 
judges 14:17	wateiwek ‘alaw shiw‘at hayamim, ’asher hayah lahem hamishteh; wayhi bayom hashewi‘i, wayaged lah ki heziqathu, watageid haHidah liwnei ‘amah. 
judges 14:18	wayomeru lo ’anshei ha‘ir bayom hashewi‘i, beTerem yawo haHarsah, mah matoq midewash, umeh ‘ac mei’ari; wayomer lahem, lulei Harashtem be‘eglati, lo mezatem Hidati. 
judges 14:19	watizlaH ‘alaw ruaH yhoh wayeired ’ashqelon wayakh meihem sheloshim ’ish, wayiqaH ’et Halizotam, wayitein haHalifot, lemagidei haHidah; wayiHar ’apo, waya‘al beit ’awihu.
judges 14:20	watehi ’eishet shimshon; lemeirei‘eihu, ’asher rei‘ah lo. 
judges 15:1	wayhi miyamim bimei qezir HiTim, wayifqod shimshon ’et ’ishto bigdi ‘iccim, wayomer ’awo’ah ’el ’ishti heHaderah; welo netano ’awiha lawo. 
judges 15:2	wayomer ’awiha, ’amor ’amarti ki sano seneitah, wa’etenenah lemeirei‘ekha; halo ’aHotah haqeTanah Towah mimenah, tehi na lekha taHteha. 
judges 15:3	wayomer lahem shimshon, niqeiti hapa‘am mipelishtim; ki ‘oseh ’ani ‘imam ra‘ah. 
judges 15:4	wayeilekh shimshon, wayilkod shelosh mei’ot shu‘alim; wayiqaH lapidim, wayefen canaw ’el canaw, wayasem lapid ’eHad bein shenei haccenawot batawekh. 
judges 15:5	wayaw‘er ’eish balapidim, wayshalaH beqamot pelishtim; wayaw‘eir migadish we‘ad qamah we‘ad kerem cayit. 
judges 15:6	wayomeru felishtim mi ‘asah cot wayomeru, shimshon Hatan hatimni, ki laqaH ’et ’ishto, wayitenah lemeirei‘eihu; waya‘alu felishtim, wayisrefu ’otah we’et ’awiha ba’eish. 
judges 15:7	wayomer lahem shimshon, ’im ta‘asun kacot; ki ’im niqamti wakhem we’aHar ’eHdal. 
judges 15:8	wayakh ’otam shoq ‘al yareikh makah gedolah; wayeired wayeishew, bis‘if sela‘ ‘eiTam.
judges 15:9	waya‘alu felishtim, wayaHanu bihudah; wayinaTeshu baleHi. 
judges 15:10	wayomeru ’ish yehudah, lamah ‘alitem ‘aleinu; wayomeru, le’esor ’et shimshon ‘alinu, la‘asot lo, ka’asher ‘asah lanu. 
judges 15:11	wayeiredu sheloshet ’alafim ’ish mihudah, ’el se‘if sela‘ ‘eiTam wayomeru leshimshon, halo yada‘ta ki moshelim banu pelishtim, umah cot ‘asita lanu; wayomer lahem, ka’asher ‘asu li, kein ‘asiti lahem. 
judges 15:12	wayomeru lo le’esarekha yaradnu, letitekha beyad pelishtim; wayomer lahem shimshon, hishawe‘u li, pen tifge‘un bi ’atem. 
judges 15:13	wayomeru lo leimor, lo ki ’asor ne’esarekha unetanukha weyadam, wehameit lo nemitekha; waya’asruhu, bishnayim ‘awotim Hadashim, waya‘aluhu min hassala‘. 
judges 15:14	hu wa ‘ad leHi, ufelishtim heiri‘u liqrato; watizlaH ‘alaw ruaH yhoh watihyenah ha‘awotim ’asher ‘al cero‘otaw, kapishtim ’asher ba‘aru wa’eish, wayimassu ’esuraw mei‘al yadaw. 
judges 15:15	wayimza leHi Hamor Teriyah; wayishlaH yado wayiqaHeha, wayakh bah ’elef ’ish. 
judges 15:16	wayomer shimshon, bilHi haHamor, Hamor Hamoratayim; bilHi haHamor, hikeiti ’elef ’ish. 
judges 15:17	wayhi kekhaloto ledabeir, wayashleikh haleHi miyado; wayiqra lamaqom hahu ramat leHi. 
judges 15:18	wayizma me’od wayiqra ’el yhoh wayomar, ’atah natata weyad ‘awdekha, ’et hateshu‘ah hagedolah haccot; we‘atah ’amut bazama, wenafalti beyad ha‘areilim. 
judges 15:19	wayiwqa‘ ’elohim ’et hamakhteish ’asher baleHi, wayeize’u mimenu mayim wayeishet, watashaw ruHo wayeHi; ‘al kein qara shemah, ‘ein haqorei ’asher baleHi, ‘ad hayom hacceh. 
judges 15:20	wayishpoT ’et yisra’eil bimei felishtim ‘esrim shanah.
judges 16:1	wayeilekh shimshon ‘accatah; wayar sham ’ishah conah, wayawo ’eileha. 
judges 16:2	la‘accatim leimor, ba shimshon heinah, wayasobu waye’erwu lo khal halaylah besha‘ar ha‘ir; wayitHareshu khal halaylah leimor, ‘ad ’or haboqer wahargenuhu 
judges 16:3	wayishkaw shimshon ‘ad Hazi halaylah wayaqam baHazi halaylah, waye’eHoc bedaltot sha‘ar ha‘ir uwishtei hamecucot, wayissa‘eim ‘im haberiaH, wayasem ‘al keteifaw; waya‘aleim ’el rosh hahar, ’asher ‘al penei Hewron.
judges 16:4	wayhi ’aHarei khein, waye’ehaw ’ishah benaHal soreiq; ushemah delilah. 
judges 16:5	waya‘alu ’eileha sarnei felishtim, wayomeru lah pati ’oto, ure’i bameh koHo gadol, uwameh nukhal lo, wa’asarnuhu le‘anoto; wa’anaHnu nitan lakh, ’ish ’elef umei’ah kasef. 
judges 16:6	watomer delilah ’el shimshon, hagidah na li, bameh koHakha gadol; uwameh tei’aseir le‘anotekha. 
judges 16:7	wayomer ’eileha shimshon, ’im ya’asruni, beshiw‘ah yetarim laHim ’asher lo Horawu weHaliti wehayiti ke’aHad ha’adam. 
judges 16:8	waya‘alu lah sarnei felishtim, shiw‘ah yetarim laHim ’asher lo Horawu; wata’asreihu bahem. 
judges 16:9	weha’oreiw, yosheiw lah baHeder, watomer ’eilaw, pelishtim ‘alekha shimshon; waynateiq ’et haytarim, ka’asher yinateiq petil hane‘oret bahariHo ’eish, welo noda‘ koHo. 
judges 16:10	watomer delilah ’el shimshon, hineih heitalta bi, watedabeir ’eilay kecawim; ‘atah hagidah na li, bameh tei’aseir. 
judges 16:11	wayomer ’eileha, ’im ’asor ya’asruni ba‘awotim Hadashim, ’asher lo na‘asah wahem melakhah; weHaliti wehayiti ke’aHad ha’adam. 
judges 16:12	watiqaH delilah ‘awotim Hadashim wata’asreihu wahem, watomer ’eilaw pelishtim ‘alekha shimshon, weha’oreiw yosheiw beHader; waynateqeim mei‘al cero‘otaw kaHuT. 
judges 16:13	watomer delilah ’el shimshon, ‘ad heinah heitalta bi watedabeir ’eilay kecawim, hagidah li, bameh tei’aseir; wayomer ’eileha, ’im ta’argi, ’et shewa‘ maHlefot roshi ‘im hamassakhet. 
judges 16:14	watitqa‘ bayateid, watomer ’eilaw, pelishtim ‘alekha shimshon; wayiqaz mishenato, wayissa‘ ’et haytad ha’ereg we’et hamassakhet. 
judges 16:15	watomer ’eilaw, ’eikh tomar ’ahawtikh, welibekha ’ein ’iti; ceh shalosh pe‘amim heitalta bi, welo higadta li, bameh koHakha gadol. 
judges 16:16	wayhi ki heiziqah lo widwareha kal hayamim wate’alazeihu; watiqzar nafsho lamut. 
judges 16:17	wayaged lah ’et kal libo, wayomer lah morah lo ‘alah ‘al roshi, ki necir ’elohim ’ani mibeTen ’imi; ’im gulaHti wesar mimeni khoHi, weHaliti wehayiti kekhal ha’adam. 
judges 16:18	wateire delilah, ki higid lah ’et kal libo watishlaH watiqra lesarnei felishtim leimor ‘alu hapa‘am, ki higid lah li ’et kal libo; we‘alu ’eileha sarnei felishtim, waya‘alu hakesef beyadam. 
judges 16:19	wateyasheneihu ‘al birkeha, watiqra la’ish, wategalaH ’et shewa‘ maHlefot rosho; wataHel le‘anoto, wayasar koHo mei‘alaw. 
judges 16:20	watomer pelishtim ‘alekha shimshon; wayiqaz mishenato, wayomer ’eizei kefa‘am befa‘am we’ina‘eir, wehu lo yada‘, ki yhoh sar mei‘alaw. 
judges 16:21	wayoHacuhu felishtim, waynaqeru ’et ‘einaw; wayoridu ’oto ‘accatah, waya’asruhu banHushtayim, wayhi ToHein beweit ha’asirim ha’asurim. 
judges 16:22	wayaHel se‘ar rosho lezameiaH ka’asher gulaH.
judges 16:23	wesarnei felishtim, ne’esfu licboaH cewaH gadol ledagon ’eloheihem ulesimHah; wayomeru, natan ’eloheinu beyadeinu, ’eit shimshon ’oyweinu. 
judges 16:24	wayir’u ’oto ha‘am, wayhalu ’et ’eloheihem; ki ’ameru, natan ’eloheinu weyadeinu ’et ’oyweinu, we’eit maHariw ’arzeinu, wa’asher hirbah ’et Halaleinu. 
judges 16:25	wayhi ki Tow keTow libam, wayomeru, qir’u leshimshon wisaHeq lanu; wayiqre’u leshimshon mibeit ha’asirim ha’asurim, wayzaHeiq lifneihem, waya‘amidu ’oto bein ha‘amudim. 
judges 16:26	wayomer shimshon ’el hana‘ar hamaHaciq beyado haniHah ’oti waheimisheini wahamisheini ’et ha‘amudim, ’asher habayit nakhon ‘aleihem; we’esha‘ein ‘aleihem. 
judges 16:27	wehabayit, malei ha’anashim wehanashim, weshamah kol sarnei felishtim; we‘al hagag, kishloshet ’alafim ’ish we’ishah, haro’im bisHoq shimshon. 
judges 16:28	wayiqra shimshon ’el yhoh wayomar; ’adonay yhoh cakhereini na weHacceqeini na ’akh hapa‘am hacceh ha’elohim, we’inaqemah neqam ’aHat mishetei ‘einay mipelishtim. 
judges 16:29	wayilpot shimshon ’et shenei ‘amudei hatawekh, ’asher habayit nakhon ‘aleihem, wayissameikh ‘aleihem; ’eHad bimino we’eHad bismolo. 
judges 16:30	wayomer shimshon, tamot nafshi ‘im pelishtim wayeiT bekhoaH, wayipol habayit ‘al hasseranim, we‘al kal ha‘am ’asher bo; wayihyu hameitim ’asher heimit bemoto, rabim mei’asher heimit beHayaw. 
judges 16:31	wayeiredu ’eHaw wekhal beit ’awihu wayis’u ’oto waya‘alu wayiqberu ’oto, bein zare‘ah uwein ’eshta’ol, beqewer manoaH ’awiw; wehu shafaT ’et yisra’eil ‘esrim shanah.
judges 17:1	wayhi ’ish meihar ’efrayim ushemo mikhayehu. 
judges 17:2	wayomer le’imo ’elef umei’ah hakesef ’asher luqaH lakh, we’ati we’at ’alit wegam ’amart be’acenay, hineih hakesef ’iti ’ani leqaHtiw; watomer ’imo, barukh beni yhoh. 
judges 17:3	wayashew ’et ’elef umei’ah hakesef le’imo; watomer ’imo haqdeish hiqdashti ’et hakesef yhoh miyadi liwni, la‘asot pesel umasseikhah, we‘atah ’ashiwenu lakh. 
judges 17:4	wayashew ’et hakesef le’imo; watiqaH ’imo matayim kesef watiteneihu lazoreif, waya‘aseihu pesel umasseikhah, wayhi beweit mikhayehu. 
judges 17:5	weha’ish mikhah, lo beit ’elohim; waya‘as ’eifod uterafim, waymalei, ’et yad ’aHad mibanaw, wayhi lo lekhohein. 
judges 17:6	bayamim haheim, ’ein melekh beyisra’eil; ’ish hayashar be‘einaw ya‘aseh.
judges 17:7	wayhi na‘ar, mibeit leHem yehudah, mimishpaHat yehudah; wehu leiwi wehu gar sham. 
judges 17:8	wayeilekh ha’ish meiha‘ir, mibeit leHem yehudah, lagur ba’asher yimza; wayawo har ’efrayim ‘ad beit mikhah la‘asot darko. 
judges 17:9	wayomer lo mikhah mei’ayin tawo; wayomer ’eilaw leiwi ’anokhi, mibeit leHem yehudah, we’anokhi holeikh, lagur ba’asher ’emza. 
judges 17:10	wayomer lo mikhah shewah ‘imadi, wehyeih li le’aw ulekhohein we’anokhi ’eten lekha ‘aseret kesef layamim, we‘eirekh begadim umiHyatekha; wayeilekh haleiwi. 
judges 17:11	wayo’el haleiwi lashewet ’et ha’ish; wayhi hana‘ar lo, ke’aHad mibanaw. 
judges 17:12	waymalei mikhah ’et yad haleiwi, wayhi lo hana‘ar lekhohein; wayhi beweit mikhah. 
judges 17:13	wayomer mikhah, ‘atah yada‘ti, ki yeiTiw yhoh li; ki hayah li haleiwi lekhohein. 
judges 18:1	bayamim haheim, ’ein melekh beyisra’eil; uwayamim haheim, sheiweT hadani mewaqesh lo naHalah lashewet, ki lo nafelah lo ‘ad hayom hahu betokh shiwTei yisra’eil benaHalah.
judges 18:2	wayishleHu wenei dan mimishpaHtam Hamishah ’anashim miqzotam ’anashim benei Hayil mizare‘ah umei’eshta’ol, lerageil ’et ha’arez uleHaqerah, wayomeru ’aleihem, lekhu Hiqru ’et ha’arez; wayawo’u har ’efrayim ‘ad beit mikhah, wayalinu sham. 
judges 18:3	heimah ‘im beit mikhah, weheimah hikiru, ’et qol hana‘ar haleiwi; wayasuru sham, wayomeru lo mi hewi’akha halom, umah ’atah ‘oseh baceh umah lekha foh. 
judges 18:4	wayomer ’aleihem, kacoh wekhaceh, ‘asah li mikhah; wayiskereini wa’ehi lo lekhohein. 
judges 18:5	wayomeru lo she’al na weilohim; weneide‘ah, hatazliaH darkeinu, ’asher ’anaHnu holekhim ‘aleha. 
judges 18:6	wayomer lahem hakohein lekhu leshalom; nokhaH yhoh, darkekhem ’asher teilekhu wah.
judges 18:7	wayeilekhu Hameishet ha’anashim, wayawo’u layeshah; wayir’u ’et ha‘am ’asher beqirbah yoshewet laweTaH kemishpaT zidonim shoqeiT uwoTeiaH, we’ein makhlim dawar ba’arez yoreish ‘ezer, ureHoqim heimah mizidonim, wedawar ’ein lahem ‘im ’adam. 
judges 18:8	wayawo’u ’el ’aHeihem, zare‘ah we’eshta’ol; wayomeru lahem ’aHeihem mah ’atem. 
judges 18:9	wayomeru, qumah wena‘aleh ‘aleihem, ki ra’inu ’et ha’arez, wehineih Towah me’od; we’atem maHshim, ’al tei‘azelu, lalekhet lawo lareshet ’et ha’arez. 
judges 18:10	kewo’akhem tawo’u ’el ‘am boTeiaH, weha’arez raHawat yadayim, ki netanah ’elohim beyedkhem; maqom ’asher ’ein sham maHsor, kal dawar ’asher ba’arez. 
judges 18:11	wayis‘u misham mimishpaHat hadani, mizare‘ah umei’eshta’ol; sheish mei’ot ’ish, Hagur kelei milHamah. 
judges 18:12	waya‘alu, wayaHanu beqiryat ye‘arim bihudah; ‘al kein qare’u lamaqom hahu maHaneih dan, ‘ad hayom hacceh, hineih ’aHarei qiryat ye‘arim. 
judges 18:13	waya‘awru misham har ’efrayim; wayawo’u ‘ad beit mikhah. 
judges 18:14	waya‘anu Hameishet ha’anashim, haholekhim lerageil ’et ha’arez layish wayomeru ’el ’aHeihem, hayda‘tem, ki yeish babatim ha’eileh ’eifod uterafim, ufesel umasseikhah; we‘atah de‘u mah ta‘asu. 
judges 18:15	wayasuru shamah, wayawo’u ’el beit hana‘ar haleiwi beit mikhah; wayish’alu lo leshalom. 
judges 18:16	wesheish mei’ot ’ish, Hagurim kelei milHamtam, nizawim petaH hasha‘ar; ’asher mibenei dan. 
judges 18:17	waya‘alu Hameishet ha’anashim, haholekhim lerageil ’et ha’arez ba’u shamah, laqeHu, ’et hapesel we’et ha’eifod, we’et haterafim we’et hamasseikhah; wehakohein, nizaw petaH hasha‘ar, wesheish mei’ot ha’ish, heHagur kelei hamilHamah. 
judges 18:18	we’eileh, ba’u beit mikhah, wayiqHu ’et pesel ha’eifod, we’et haterafim we’et hamasseikhah; wayomer ’aleihem hakohein, mah ’atem ‘osim. 
judges 18:19	wayomeru lo haHareish sim yadekha ‘al pikha weleikh ‘imanu, wehyeih lanu le’aw ulekhohein; haTow heyotkha khohein, leweit ’ish ’eHad, ’o heyotkha khohein, lesheiweT ulemishpaHah beyisra’eil. 
judges 18:20	wayiTaw leiw hakohein, wayiqaH ’et ha’eifod, we’et haterafim we’et hapasel; wayawo beqerew ha‘am. 
judges 18:21	wayifnu wayeileikhu; wayasimu ’et haTaf we’et hamiqneh we’et hakewudah lifneihem. 
judges 18:22	heimah hirHiqu mibeit mikhah; weha’anashim, ’asher babatim ’asher ‘im beit mikhah, nic‘aqu, wayadbiqu ’et benei dan. 
judges 18:23	wayiqre’u ’el benei dan, wayasseibu peneihem; wayomeru lemikhah, mah lekha ki nic‘aqeta. 
judges 18:24	wayomer ’et ’elohay ’asher ‘asiti leqaHtem we’et hakohein wateilekhu umah li ‘od; umah ceh tomeru ’eilay mah lakh. 
judges 18:25	wayomeru ’eilaw benei dan, ’al tashma‘ qolkha ‘imanu; pen yifge‘u wakhem, ’anashim marei nefesh, we’asaftah nafshekha wenefesh beitekha. 
judges 18:26	wayeilekhu wenei dan ledarkam; wayar mikhah, ki Hacaqim heimah mimenu, wayifen wayashaw ’el beito. 
judges 18:27	weheimah laqeHu ’eit ’asher ‘asah mikhah, we’et hakohein ’asher hayah lo wayawo’u ‘al layish, ‘al ‘am shoqeiT uwoTeiaH, wayaku ’otam lefi Harew; we’et ha‘ir sarefu wa’eish. 
judges 18:28	we’ein mazil ki reHoqah hi mizidon, wedawar ’ein lahem ‘im ’adam, wehi ba‘eimeq ’asher leweit reHow; wayiwnu ’et ha‘ir wayeishewu wah. 
judges 18:29	wayiqre’u sheim ha‘ir dan, besheim dan ’awihem, ’asher yulad leyisra’eil; we’ulam layish sheim ha‘ir larishonah. 
judges 18:30	wayaqimu lahem benei dan ’et hapasel; wihonatan ben geireshom ben menasheh hu uwanaw, hayu khohanim lesheiweT hadani, ‘ad yom gelot ha’arez. 
judges 18:31	wayasimu lahem, ’et pesel mikhah ’asher ‘asah; kal yemei heyot beit ha’elohim beshiloh.
judges 19:1	wayhi bayamim haheim, umelekh ’ein beyisra’eil; wayhi ’ish leiwi, gar beyarketei har ’efrayim, wayiqaH lo ’ishah filegesh, mibeit leHem yehudah. 
judges 19:2	waticneh ‘alaw pilagsho, wateilekh mei’ito ’el beit ’awiha, ’el beit leHem yehudah; watehi sham yamim ’arba‘ah Hodashim. 
judges 19:3	wayaqam ’ishah wayeilekh ’aHareha, ledabeir ‘al libah lahashiwo lahashiwah, wena‘aro ‘imo wezemed Hamorim; watewi’eihu beit ’awiha, wayir’eihu ’awi hana‘arah, wayismaH liqrato. 
judges 19:4	wayeHecaq bo Hoteno ’awi hana‘arah, wayeishew ’ito sheloshet yamim; wayokhelu wayishtu, wayalinu sham. 
judges 19:5	wayhi bayom harewi‘i, wayashkimu waboqer wayaqam lalekhet; wayomer ’awi hana‘arah ’el Hatano, se‘ad libekha pat leHem we’aHar teileikhu. 
judges 19:6	wayeishewu, wayokhelu sheneihem yaHdaw wayishtu; wayomer ’awi hana‘arah ’el ha’ish, ho’el na welin weyiTaw libekha. 
judges 19:7	wayaqam ha’ish lalekhet; wayifzar bo Hoteno, wayashaw wayalen sham. 
judges 19:8	wayashkeim baboqer bayom haHamishi lalekhet wayomer ’awi hana‘arah, se‘ad na lewawekha, wehitmahmehu ‘ad neTot hayom; wayokhelu sheneihem. 
judges 19:9	wayaqam ha’ish lalekhet, hu ufilagsho wena‘aro; wayomer lo Hoteno ’awi hana‘arah hineih na rafah hayom la‘arow, linu na hineih Hanot hayom lin poh weyiTaw lewawekha, wehishkamtem maHar ledarkekhem, wehalakhta le’ohalekha. 
judges 19:10	welo ’awah ha’ish lalun, wayaqam wayeilekh, wayawo ‘ad nokhaH yewus, hi yerushalim; we‘imo, zemed Hamorim Hawushim, ufilagsho ‘imo. 
judges 19:11	heim ‘im yewus, wehayom rad me’od; wayomer hana‘ar ’el ’adonaw, lekhah na wenasurah ’el ‘ir haywusi haccot wenalin bah. 
judges 19:12	wayomer ’eilaw ’adonaw, lo nasur ’el ‘ir nakheri, ’asher lo mibenei yisra’eil heinah; we‘awarnu ‘ad giw‘ah. 
judges 19:13	wayomer lena‘aro, lekha weniqrewah be’aHad hameqomot; welanu wagiw‘ah ’o waramah. 
judges 19:14	waya‘awru wayeileikhu; watawo lahem hashemesh, ’eizel hagiw‘ah ’asher lewinyamin. 
judges 19:15	wayasuru sham, lawo lalun bagiw‘ah; wayawo, wayeishew birHow ha‘ir, we’ein ’ish me’asseif ’otam habaytah lalun. 
judges 19:16	wehineih ’ish caqein, ba min ma‘aseihu min hasadeh ba‘erew, weha’ish meihar ’efrayim, wehu gar bagiw‘ah; we’anshei hamaqom benei yemini. 
judges 19:17	wayisa ‘einaw, wayar ’et ha’ish ha’oreiaH birHow ha‘ir; wayomer ha’ish haccaqein ’anah teileikh umei’ayin tawo. 
judges 19:18	wayomer ’eilaw, ‘owerim ’anaHnu mibeit leHem yehudah ‘ad yarketei har ’efrayim misham ’anokhi, wa’eileikh ‘ad beit leHem yehudah; we’et beit yhoh ’ani holeikh, we’ein ’ish, me’asseif ’oti habayetah. 
judges 19:19	wegam tewen gam mispo yeish laHamoreinu, wegam leHem wayayin yesh li wela’amatekha, welana‘ar ‘im ‘awadekha; ’ein maHsor kal dawar. 
judges 19:20	wayomer ha’ish haccaqein shalom lakh, raq kal maHsorkha ‘alay; raq bareHow ’al talan. 
judges 19:21	waywi’eihu leweito, wayibol laHamorim; wayirHazu ragleihem, wayokhelu wayishtu. 
judges 19:22	heimah meiTiwim ’et libam wehineih ’anshei ha‘ir ’anshei wenei weliya‘al, nasabu ’et habayit, mitdapeqim ‘al hadalet; wayomeru, ’el ha’ish ba‘al habayit haccaqein leimor, hozei, ’et ha’ish ’asher ba ’el beitekha weneida‘enu. 
judges 19:23	wayeizei ’aleihem, ha’ish ba‘al habayit, wayomer ’aleihem, ’al ’aHay ’al tarei‘u na; ’aHarei ’asher ba ha’ish hacceh ’al beiti, ’al ta‘asu ’et hanewalah haccot. 
judges 19:24	hineih witi habetulah ufilagsheihu, ’ozi’ah na ’otam we‘anu ’otam, wa‘asu lahem, haTow be‘eineikhem; wela’ish hacceh lo ta‘asu, dewar hanewalah haccot. 
judges 19:25	welo ’awu ha’anashim lishmoa‘ lo, wayaHaceiq ha’ish befilagsho, wayozei ’aleihem haHuz; wayeide‘u ’otah wayit‘alelu wah kal halaylah ‘ad haboqer, wayshaleHuha ba‘alot ka‘alot hashaHar. 
judges 19:26	watawo ha’ishah lifnot haboqer; watipol petaH beit ha’ish ’asher ’adoneha sham ‘ad ha’or. 
judges 19:27	wayaqam ’adoneha baboqer, wayiftaH daltot habayit, wayeizei lalekhet ledarko; wehineih ha’ishah filagsho, nofelet petaH habayit, weyadeha ‘al hassaf. 
judges 19:28	wayomer ’eileha qumi weneileikhah we’ein ‘oneh; wayiqaHeha ‘al haHamor, wayaqam ha’ish, wayeilekh limqomo. 
judges 19:29	wayawo ’el beito, wayiqaH ’et hama’akhelet wayaHaceiq befilagsho, waynateHeha la‘azameha, lishneim ‘asar netaHim; wayshaleHeha, bekhol gewul yisra’eil. 
judges 19:30	wehayah khal haro’eh, we’amar lo nihyetah welo nir’atah kacot, lemiyom ‘alot benei yisra’eil mei’erez mizrayim, ‘ad hayom hacceh; simu lakhem ‘aleha ‘uzu wedabeiru.
judges 20:1	wayeize’u kal benei yisra’eil watiqaheil ha‘eidah ke’ish ’eHad, lemidan we‘ad be’eir shewa‘, we’erez hagil‘ad; ’el yhoh hamizpah. 
judges 20:2	wayityazewu pinot kal ha‘am, kol shiwTei yisra’eil, biqhal ‘am ha’elohim; ’arba‘ mei’ot ’elef ’ish ragli sholeif Harew.
judges 20:3	wayishme‘u benei winyamin, ki ‘alu wenei yisra’eil hamizpah; wayomeru benei yisra’eil, daberu ’eikhah nihyetah hara‘ah haccot. 
judges 20:4	waya‘an ha’ish haleiwi, ’ish ha’ishah hanirzaHah wayomar; hagiw‘atah ’asher lewinyamin, bati ’ani ufilagshi lalun. 
judges 20:5	wayaqumu ‘alay ba‘alei hagiw‘ah, wayasobu ‘alay ’et habayit layelah; ’oti dimu laharog, we’et pilagshi ‘inu watamot. 
judges 20:6	wa’oHeic befilagshi wa’anateHeha, wa’ashaleHeha, bekhal sedeih naHalat yisra’eil; ki ‘asu cimah unewalah beyisra’eil. 
judges 20:7	hineih khulekhem benei yisra’eil; hawu lakhem dawar we‘eizah halom. 
judges 20:8	wayaqam kal ha‘am, ke’ish ’eHad leimor; lo neileikh ’ish le’aholo, welo nasur ’ish leweito. 
judges 20:9	we‘atah ceh hadawar, ’asher na‘aseh lagiw‘ah; ‘aleha begoral. 
judges 20:10	welaqaHnu ‘asarah ’anashim lamei’ah lekhol shiwTei yisra’eil, umei’ah la’elef we’elef larewawah, laqaHat zeidah la‘am; la‘asot, lewo’am legewa‘ binyamin, kekhal hanewalah, ’asher ‘asah beyisra’eil. 
judges 20:11	wayei’aseif kal ’ish yisra’eil ’el ha‘ir, ke’ish ’eHad Haweirim.
judges 20:12	wayishleHu shiwTei yisra’eil ’anashim, bekhal shiwTei winyamin leimor; mah hara‘ah haccot, ’asher nihyetah bakhem. 
judges 20:13	we‘atah tenu ’et ha’anashim benei weliya‘al ’asher bagiw‘ah unemiteim, unewa‘arah ra‘ah miyisra’eil; welo ’awu benei binyamin, lishmoa‘ beqol ’aHeihem benei yisra’eil. 
judges 20:14	wayei’asefu wenei winyamin min he‘arim hagiw‘atah; lazeit lamilHamah ‘im benei yisra’eil. 
judges 20:15	wayitpaqedu wenei winyamin bayom hahu meihe‘arim, ‘esrim weshishah ’elef ’ish sholeif Harew; lewad miyoshewei hagiw‘ah hitpaqedu, shewa‘ mei’ot ’ish baHur. 
judges 20:16	mikol ha‘am hacceh, shewa‘ mei’ot ’ish baHur, ’iTeir yad yemino; kal ceh, qoleia‘ ba’ewen ’el hasa‘arah welo yaHaTi.
judges 20:17	we’ish yisra’eil hitpaqedu, lewad mibinyamin, ’arba‘ mei’ot ’elef ’ish sholeif Harew; kal ceh ’ish milHamah. 
judges 20:18	wayaqumu waya‘alu weit ’eil wayish’alu weilohim wayomeru benei yisra’eil, mi ya‘aleh lanu wateHilah, lamilHamah ‘im benei winyamin; wayomer yhoh yehudah wateHilah. 
judges 20:19	wayaqumu wenei yisra’eil baboqer; wayaHanu ‘al hagiw‘ah.
judges 20:20	wayeizei ’ish yisra’eil, lamilHamah ‘im binyamin; waya‘arkhu ’itam ’ish yisra’eil milHamah ’el hagiw‘ah. 
judges 20:21	wayeize’u wenei winyamin min hagiw‘ah; wayashHitu weyisra’eil bayom hahu, shenayim we‘esrim ’elef ’ish ’arezah. 
judges 20:22	wayitHacceiq ha‘am ’ish yisra’eil; wayosifu la‘arokh milHamah, bamaqom ’asher ‘arekhu sham bayom harishon. 
judges 20:23	waya‘alu wenei yisra’eil, wayiwku lifnei yhoh ‘ad ha‘erew wayish’alu yhoh leimor, ha’osif, lageshet lamilHamah, ‘im benei winyamin ’aHi; wayomer yhoh ‘alu ’eilaw.
judges 20:24	wayiqrewu wenei yisra’eil ’el benei winyamin bayom hasheini. 
judges 20:25	wayeizei winyamin liqratam min hagiw‘ah bayom hasheini wayashHitu wiwnei yisra’eil ‘od, shemonat ‘asar ’elef ’ish ’arezah; kal ’eileh sholefei Harew. 
judges 20:26	waya‘alu khal benei yisra’eil wekhal ha‘am wayawo’u weit ’eil, wayiwku wayeishewu sham lifnei yhoh, wayazumu wayom hahu ‘ad ha‘arew; waya‘alu ‘olot ushelamim lifnei yhoh. 
judges 20:27	wayish’alu wenei yisra’eil yhoh; wesham, ’aron berit ha’elohim, bayamim haheim. 
judges 20:28	ufineHas ben ’el‘acar ben ’aharon ‘omeid lefanaw, bayamim haheim leimor ha’osif ‘od lazeit lamilHamah ‘im benei winyamin ’aHi ’im ’eHdal; wayomer yhoh ‘alu, ki maHar ’etenenu weyadekha. 
judges 20:29	wayasem yisra’eil ’orewim, ’el hagiw‘ah sawiw.
judges 20:30	waya‘alu wenei yisra’eil ’el benei winyamin bayom hashelishi; waya‘arkhu ’el hagiw‘ah kefa‘am befa‘am. 
judges 20:31	wayeize’u wenei winyamin liqrat ha‘am, hanetequ min ha‘ir; wayaHeilu lehakot meiha‘am Halalim kefa‘am befa‘am, bamsilot ’asher ’aHat ‘olah weit ’eil, we’aHat giw‘atah basadeh, kishloshim ’ish beyisra’eil. 
judges 20:32	wayomeru benei winyamin, nigafim heim lefaneinu kewarishonah; uwenei yisra’eil ’ameru, nanusah unetaqenuhu, min ha‘ir ’el hamsilot. 
judges 20:33	wekhol ’ish yisra’eil, qamu mimeqomo, waya‘arkhu bewa‘al tamar; we’oreiw yisra’eil meigiaH mimeqomo mima‘areih gawa‘. 
judges 20:34	wayawo’u mineged lagiw‘ah ‘aseret ’alafim ’ish baHur mikal yisra’eil, wehamilHamah kaweidah; weheim lo yade‘u, ki noga‘at ‘aleihem hara‘ah.
judges 20:35	wayigof yhoh ’et binyamin lifnei yisra’eil wayashHitu wenei yisra’eil bewinyamin bayom hahu, ‘esrim waHamishah ’elef umei’ah ’ish; kal ’eileh sholeif Harew. 
judges 20:36	wayir’u wenei winyamin ki nigafu; wayitenu ’ish yisra’eil maqom lewinyamin, ki waTeHu ’el ha’oreiw, ’asher samu ’el hagiw‘ah. 
judges 20:37	weha’oreiw heiHishu, wayifsheTu ’el hagiw‘ah; wayimshokh ha’oreiw, wayakh ’et kal ha‘ir lefi Harew. 
judges 20:38	wehamo‘eid, hayah le’ish yisra’eil ‘im ha’oreiw; herew leha‘alotam mas’at he‘ashan min ha‘ir. 
judges 20:39	wayahafokh ’ish yisra’eil bamilHamah; uwinyamin heiHeil lehakot Halalim be’ish yisra’eil kishloshim ’ish, ki ’ameru, ’akh nigof nigaf hu lefaneinu, kamilHamah harishonah. 
judges 20:40	wehamas’eit, heiHeilah la‘alot min ha‘ir ‘amud ‘ashan; wayifen binyamin ’aHaraw, wehineih ‘alah khelil ha‘ir hashamayemah. 
judges 20:41	we’ish yisra’eil hafakh, wayibaheil ’ish binyamin; ki ra’ah, ki nage‘ah ‘alaw hara‘ah. 
judges 20:42	wayifnu lifnei ’ish yisra’eil ’el derekh hamidbar, wehamilHamah hidbiqatehu; wa’asher meihe‘arim, mashHitim ’oto betokho. 
judges 20:43	kiteru ’et binyamin hirdifuhu, menuHah hidrikhuhu; ‘ad nokhaH hagiw‘ah mimicraH shamesh. 
judges 20:44	wayipelu mibinyamin, shemonah ‘asar ’elef ’ish; ’et kal ’eileh ’anshei Hayil. 
judges 20:45	wayifnu wayanusu hamidbarah ’el sela‘ harimon, way‘oleluhu bamsilot, Hameishet ’alafim ’ish; wayadbiqu ’aHaraw ‘ad gid‘om, wayaku mimenu ’alpayim ’ish. 
judges 20:46	wayhi khal hanofelim mibinyamin, ‘esrim waHamishah ’elef ’ish sholeif Herew bayom hahu; ’et kal ’eileh ’anshei Hayil. 
judges 20:47	wayifnu wayanusu hamidbarah ’el sela‘ harimon, sheish mei’ot ’ish; wayeishewu besela‘ rimon, ’arba‘ah Hodashim. 
judges 20:48	we’ish yisra’eil shawu ’el benei winyamin wayakum lefi Herew, mei‘ir metom ‘ad beheimah, ‘ad kal hanimza; gam kal he‘arim hanimza’ot shileHu wa’eish.
judges 21:1	we’ish yisra’eil, nishba‘ bamizpah leimor; ’ish mimenu, lo yitein bito lewinyamin le’ishah. 
judges 21:2	wayawo ha‘am beit ’eil, wayeishewu sham ‘ad ha‘erew, lifnei ha’elohim; wayis’u qolam, wayiwku bekhi gadol. 
judges 21:3	wayomeru, lamah, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, hayetah cot beyisra’eil; lehipaqeid hayom miyisra’eil sheiweT ’eHad. 
judges 21:4	wayhi mimaHorat, wayashkimu ha‘am, wayiwnu sham micbeiaH; waya‘alu ‘olot ushelamim.
judges 21:5	wayomeru benei yisra’eil, mi ’asher lo ‘alah waqahal mikal shiwTei yisra’eil ’el yhoh; ki hashewu‘ah hagedolah hayetah, la’asher lo ‘alah ’el yhoh hamizpah leimor mot yumat. 
judges 21:6	wayinaHamu benei yisra’eil, ’el binyamin ’aHiw; wayomeru, nigda‘ hayom sheiweT ’eHad miyisra’eil. 
judges 21:7	mah na‘aseh lahem lanotarim lenashim; wa’anaHnu nishba‘nu yhoh, lewilti teit lahem mibenoteinu lenashim. 
judges 21:8	wayomeru, mi, ’eHad mishiwTei yisra’eil, ’asher lo ‘alah ’el yhoh hamizpah; wehineih lo wa ’ish ’el hamaHaneh miyaweish gil‘ad ’el haqahal. 
judges 21:9	wayitpaqeid ha‘am; wehineih ’ein sham ’ish, miyoshewei yaweish gil‘ad. 
judges 21:10	wayishleHu sham ha‘eidah, sheneim ‘asar ’elef ’ish mibenei heHayil; wayzawwu ’otam leimor, lekhu wehikitem ’et yoshewei yaweish gil‘ad lefi Herew, wehanashim wehaTaf. 
judges 21:11	weceh hadawar ’asher ta‘asu; kal cakhar, wekhal ’ishah yoda‘at mishkaw cakhar taHarimu. 
judges 21:12	wayimze’u miyoshewei yaweish gil‘ad, ’arba‘ mei’ot na‘arah wetulah, ’asher lo yade‘ah ’ish lemishkaw cakhar; wayawi’u ’otam ’el hamaHaneh shiloh, ’asher be’erez kena‘an.
judges 21:13	wayishleHu kal ha‘eidah, waydaberu ’el benei winyamin, ’asher besela‘ rimon; wayiqre’u lahem shalom. 
judges 21:14	wayashaw binyamin ba‘eit hahi, wayitenu lahem hanashim, ’asher Hiyu, mineshei yaweish gil‘ad; welo maze’u lahem kein. 
judges 21:15	weha‘am niHam lewinyamin; ki ‘asah yhoh perez beshiwTei yisra’eil. 
judges 21:16	wayomeru ciqnei ha‘eidah, mah na‘aseh lanotarim lenashim; ki nishmedah mibinyamin ’ishah. 
judges 21:17	wayomeru, yerushat peleiTah lewinyamin; welo yimaHeh sheiweT miyisra’eil. 
judges 21:18	wa’anaHnu, lo nukhal lateit lahem nashim mibenoteinu; ki nishbe‘u wenei yisra’eil leimor, ’arur notein ’ishah lewinyamin.
judges 21:19	wayomeru hineih Hag yhoh beshilo miyamim yamimah, ’asher mizefonah leweit ’eil micreHah hashemesh, limsilah, ha‘olah mibeit ’eil shekhemah; uminegew lilwonah. 
judges 21:20	wayzaw wayzawwu ’et benei winyamin leimor; lekhu wa’arawtem bakeramim. 
judges 21:21	ure’item, wehineih ’im yeize’u wenot shilo laHul bameHolot wizatem min hakeramim, waHaTaftem lakhem ’ish ’ishto mibenot shilo; wahalakhtem ’erez binyamin. 
judges 21:22	wehayah ki yawo’u ’awotam ’o ’aHeihem larow lariw ’eileinu, we’amarnu ’aleihem Hanunu ’otam, ki lo laqaHnu ’ish ’ishto bamilHamah; ki lo ’atem netatem lahem ka‘eit te’shamu.
judges 21:23	waya‘asu khein benei winyamin, wayis’u nashim lemisparam, min hameHolelot ’asher gacalu; wayeilekhu, wayashuwu ’el naHalatam, wayiwnu ’et he‘arim, wayeishewu bahem. 
judges 21:24	wayithalekhu misham benei yisra’eil ba‘eit hahi, ’ish leshiwTo ulemishpaHto; wayeize’u misham, ’ish lenaHalato. 
judges 21:25	bayamim haheim, ’ein melekh beyisra’eil; ’ish hayashar be‘einaw ya‘aseh. 
1_samuel 1:1	wayhi ’ish ’eHad min haramatayim zofim meihar ’efrayim; ushemo ’elqanah ben yeroHam ben ’elihu ben toHu wen zuf ’efrati. 
1_samuel 1:2	welo shetei nashim, sheim ’aHat Hanah, wesheim hasheinit peninah; wayhi lifninah yeladim, uleHanah ’ein yeladim. 
1_samuel 1:3	we‘alah ha’ish hahu mei‘iro miyamim yamimah, lehishtaHawot welicboaH yhoh zewa’ot beshiloh; wesham shenei wenei ‘eili, Hafeni ufinHas, kohanim yhoh. 
1_samuel 1:4	wayhi hayom, wayicbaH ’elqanah; wenatan lifninah ’ishto, ulekhal baneha uwenoteha manot. 
1_samuel 1:5	uleHanah yitein manah ’aHat ’apayim; ki ’et Hanah ’aheiw, yhoh sagar raHmah. 
1_samuel 1:6	wekhi‘asatah zaratah gam ka‘as, ba‘awur hare‘imah; ki sagar yhoh be‘ad raHmah. 
1_samuel 1:7	wekhein ya‘aseh shanah weshanah, midei ‘alotah beweit yhoh, kein takh‘isenah; watiwkeh welo tokhal. 
1_samuel 1:8	wayomer lah ’elqanah ’ishah, Hanah lameh tiwki, welameh lo tokheli, welameh yeira‘ lewaweikh; halo ’anokhi Tow lakh, mei‘asarah banim. 
1_samuel 1:9	wataqam Hanah, ’aHarei ’akhelah weshiloh we’aHarei shatoh; we‘eili hakohein, yosheiw ‘al hakissei, ‘al mecucat heikhal yhoh. 
1_samuel 1:10	wehi marat nafesh; watitpaleil ‘al yhoh uwakhoh tiwkeh. 
1_samuel 1:11	watidor neder watomar, yhoh zewa’ot ’im ra’oh tir’eh ba‘oni ’amatekha, ucekhartani welo tishkaH ’et ’amatekha, wenatatah la’amatekha cera‘ ’anashim; unetatiw yhoh kal yemei Hayaw, umorah lo ya‘aleh ‘al rosho. 
1_samuel 1:12	wehayah ki hirbetah, lehitpaleil lifnei yhoh; we‘eili shomeir ’et piha. 
1_samuel 1:13	weHanah, hi medaberet ‘al libah, raq sefateha na‘ot, weqolah lo yishameia‘; wayaHsheweha ‘eili leshikorah. 
1_samuel 1:14	wayomer ’eileha ‘eili, ‘ad matay tishtakarin; hasiri ’et yeineikh mei‘alayikh. 
1_samuel 1:15	wata‘an Hanah watomer lo ’adoni, ’ishah qeshat ruaH ’anokhi, weyayin wesheikhar lo shatiti; wa’eshpokh ’et nafshi lifnei yhoh. 
1_samuel 1:16	’al titein ’et ’amatekha, lifnei bat beliya‘al; ki meirow siHi wekha‘si dibarti ‘ad heinah. 
1_samuel 1:17	waya‘an ‘eili wayomer lekhi leshalom; weilohei yisra’eil, yitein ’et sheilateikh, ’asher sha’alt mei‘imo. 
1_samuel 1:18	watomer timza shifHatekha Hein be‘einekha; wateilekh ha’ishah ledarkah watokhal, ufaneha lo hayu lah ‘od. 
1_samuel 1:19	wayashkimu waboqer, wayishtaHawu lifnei yhoh, wayashuwu wayawo’u ’el beitam haramatah; wayeida‘ ’elqanah ’et Hanah ’ishto, wayickereha yhoh. 
1_samuel 1:20	wayhi litqufot hayamim, watahar Hanah wateiled bein; watiqra ’et shemo shemu’eil, ki yhoh she’iltiw. 
1_samuel 1:21	waya‘al ha’ish ’elqanah wekhal beito; licboaH yhoh ’et cewaH hayamim we’et nidro. 
1_samuel 1:22	weHanah lo ‘alatah; ki ’amerah le’ishah, ‘ad yigameil hana‘ar wahawi’otiw, wenir’ah ’et penei yhoh, weyashaw sham ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_samuel 1:23	wayomer lah ’elqanah ’ishah ‘asi haTow be‘einayikh, shewi ‘ad gameleikh ’oto, ’akh yaqeim yhoh ’et dewaro; wateishew ha’ishah wateineq ’et benah, ‘ad gamelah ’oto. 
1_samuel 1:24	wata‘aleihu ‘imah ka’asher gemalatu, befarim sheloshah we’eifah ’aHat qemaH weneiwel yayin, watewi’eihu weit yhoh shilo; wehana‘ar na‘ar. 
1_samuel 1:25	wayishHaTu ’et hapar; wayawi’u ’et hana‘ar ’el ‘eili. 
1_samuel 1:26	watomer bi ’adoni, Hei nafshekha ’adoni; ’ani ha’ishah, hanizewet ‘imekhah baceh, lehitpaleil ’el yhoh. 
1_samuel 1:27	’el hana‘ar hacceh hitpalaleti; wayitein yhoh li ’et she’eilati, ’asher sha’alti mei‘imo. 
1_samuel 1:28	wegam ’anokhi, hish’iltihu yhoh, kal hayamim ’asher hayah, hu sha’ul yhoh; wayishtaHu sham yhoh.
1_samuel 2:1	watitpaleil Hanah watomar, ‘alaz libi yhoh, ramah qarni yhoh; raHaw pi ‘al ’oyway, ki samaHti bishu‘atekha. 
1_samuel 2:2	’ein qadosh yhoh ki ’ein biltekha; we’ein zur keiloheinu. 
1_samuel 2:3	’al tarbu tedaberu gewohah gewohah, yeizei ‘ataq mipikhem; ki ’eil dei‘ot yhoh, welo welo nitkenu ‘alilot. 
1_samuel 2:4	qeshet giborim Hatim; wenikhshalim ’aceru Hayil. 
1_samuel 2:5	sewei‘im baleHem niskaru, ure‘eiwim Hadeilu; ‘ad ‘aqarah yaledah shiw‘ah, werabat banim ’umlalah. 
1_samuel 2:6	yhoh meimit umeHayeh; morid she’ol waya‘al. 
1_samuel 2:7	yhoh morish uma‘ashir; mashpil ’af meromeim. 
1_samuel 2:8	meiqim mei‘afar dal, mei’ashpot yarim ’ewyon, lehoshiw ‘im nediwim, wekhissei khawod yanHileim; ki yhoh mezuqei ’erez, wayashet ‘aleihem teiweil. 
1_samuel 2:9	raglei Hasido Hasidaw yishmor, uresha‘im baHoshekh yidamu; ki lo wekhoaH yigbar ’ish. 
1_samuel 2:10	yhoh yeiHatu meriwo meriwaw, ‘alo ‘alaw bashamayim yar‘eim, yhoh yadin ’afsei ’arez; weyiten ‘oc lemalko, weyareim qeren meshiHo.
1_samuel 2:11	wayeilekh ’elqanah haramatah ‘al beito; wehana‘ar, hayah meshareit ’et yhoh, ’et penei ‘eili hakohein. 
1_samuel 2:12	uwenei ‘eili benei weliya‘al; lo yade‘u ’et yhoh. 
1_samuel 2:13	umishpaT hakohanim ’et ha‘am; kal ’ish coweiaH cewaH, uwa na‘ar hakohein kewasheil habasar, wehamacleig shelosh hashinayim beyado. 
1_samuel 2:14	wehikah wakiyor ’o wadud, ’o waqalaHat ’o waparur, kol ’asher ya‘aleh hamacleig, yiqaH hakohein bo; kakhah ya‘asu lekhal yisra’eil, haba’im sham beshiloh. 
1_samuel 2:15	gam beTerem yaqTirun ’et haHeilew uwa na‘ar hakohein, we’amar la’ish haccoweiaH, tenah wasar, lizlot lakohein; welo yiqaH mimekha basar mewushal ki ’im Hay. 
1_samuel 2:16	wayomer ’eilaw ha’ish, qaTeir yaqTirun kayom haHeilew, weqaH lekha, ka’asher te’awweh nafshekha; we’amar lo lo ki ‘atah titein, we’im lo laqaHti weHaceqah. 
1_samuel 2:17	watehi HaTat hane‘arim gedolah me’od ’et penei yhoh; ki ni’azu ha’anashim, ’eit minHat yhoh. 
1_samuel 2:18	ushemu’eil meshareit ’et penei yhoh; na‘ar Hagur ’eifod bad. 
1_samuel 2:19	ume‘il qaTon ta‘aseh lo ’imo, weha‘altah lo miyamim yamimah; ba‘alotah ’et ’ishah, licboaH ’et cewaH hayamim. 
1_samuel 2:20	uweirakh ‘eili ’et ’elqanah we’et ’ishto, we’amar yaseim yhoh lekha cera‘ min ha’ishah haccot, taHat hashe’eilah, ’asher sha’al yhoh; wehalekhu limqomo. 
1_samuel 2:21	ki faqad yhoh ’et Hanah, watahar wateiled sheloshah wanim ushetei wanot; wayigdal hana‘ar shemu’eil ‘im yhoh.
1_samuel 2:22	we‘eili caqein me’od; weshama‘, ’eit kal ’asher ya‘asun banaw lekhal yisra’eil, we’eit ’asher yishkewun ’et hanashim, hazowe’ot, petaH ’ohel mo‘eid. 
1_samuel 2:23	wayomer lahem, lamah ta‘asun kadewarim ha’eileh; ’asher ’anokhi shomeia‘ ’et diwreikhem ra‘im, mei’eit kal ha‘am ’eileh. 
1_samuel 2:24	’al banay; ki lo Towah hashemu‘ah ’asher ’anokhi shomeia‘, ma‘awirim ‘am yhoh. 
1_samuel 2:25	’im yeHeTa ’ish le’ish ufilo ’elohim, we’im yhoh yeHeTa ’ish, mi yitpalel lo; welo yishme‘u leqol ’awihem, ki Hafeiz yhoh lahamitam. 
1_samuel 2:26	wehana‘ar shemu’eil, holeikh wegadeil waTow; gam ‘im yhoh, wegam ‘im ’anashim.
1_samuel 2:27	wayawo ’ish ’elohim ’el ‘eili; wayomer ’eilaw, koh ’amar yhoh, hanigloh nigleiti ’el beit ’awikha, bihyotam bemizrayim leweit par‘oh. 
1_samuel 2:28	uwaHor ’oto mikal shiwTei yisra’eil li lekhohein, la‘alot ‘al micbeHi, lehaqTir qeToret laseit ’eifod lefanay; wa’etenah leweit ’awikha, ’et kal ’ishei benei yisra’eil. 
1_samuel 2:29	lamah tiw‘aTu, beciwHi uweminHati, ’asher ziwwiti ma‘on; watekhabeid ’et banekha mimeni, lehawri’akhem, meireishit kal minHat yisra’eil le‘ami. 
1_samuel 2:30	lakhein, ne’um yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil ’amor ’amarti, beitekha uweit ’awikha, yithalekhu lefanay ‘ad ‘olam; we‘atah ne’um yhoh Halilah li, ki mekhabeday ’akhabeid uwocay yeiqalu. 
1_samuel 2:31	hineih yamim ba’im, wegada‘ti ’et cero‘akha, we’et ceroa‘ beit ’awikha; mihyot caqein beweitekha. 
1_samuel 2:32	wehibaTta zar ma‘on, bekhol ’asher yeiTiw ’et yisra’eil; welo yihyeh caqein beweitekha kal hayamim. 
1_samuel 2:33	we’ish, lo ’akhrit lekha mei‘im micbeHi, lekhalot ’et ‘einekha wela’adiw ’et nafshekha; wekhal marbit beitekha yamutu ’anashim. 
1_samuel 2:34	weceh lekha ha’ot, ’asher yawo ’el shenei wanekha, ’el Hafeni ufineHas; beyom ’eHad yamutu sheneihem. 
1_samuel 2:35	wahaqimoti li kohein ne’eman, ka’asher bilwawi uwenafshi ya‘aseh; uwaniti lo bayit ne’eman, wehthaleikh lifnei meshiHi kal hayamim. 
1_samuel 2:36	wehayah, kal hanotar beweitekha, yawo lehishtaHawot lo, la’agorat kesef wekhikar laHem; we’amar, sefaHeini na ’el ’aHat hakehunot le’ekhol pat laHem.
1_samuel 3:1	wehana‘ar shemu’eil meshareit ’et yhoh lifnei ‘eili; udewar yhoh hayah yaqar bayamim haheim, ’ein Hacon nifraz.
1_samuel 3:2	wayhi bayom hahu, we‘eili shokheiw bimqomo; we‘eino we‘einaw heiHeilu kheihot, lo yukhal lir’ot. 
1_samuel 3:3	weneir ’elohim Terem yikhbeh, ushemu’eil shokheiw; beheikhal yhoh, ’asher sham ’aron ’elohim.
1_samuel 3:4	wayiqra yhoh ’el shemu’eil wayomer hineini. 
1_samuel 3:5	wayaraz ’el ‘eili, wayomer hini ki qarata li, wayomer lo qarati shuw shekhaw; wayeilekh wayishkaw.
1_samuel 3:6	wayosef yhoh qero ‘od shemu’eil wayaqam shemu’eil wayeilekh ’el ‘eili, wayomer hini, ki qarata li; wayomer lo qarati weni shuw shekhaw. 
1_samuel 3:7	ushemu’eil Terem yada‘ ’et yhoh; weTerem yigaleh ’eilaw dewar yhoh. 
1_samuel 3:8	wayosef yhoh qero shemu’eil bashelishit wayaqam wayeilekh ’el ‘eili, wayomer hini, ki qarata li; wayawen ‘eili, ki yhoh qorei lana‘ar. 
1_samuel 3:9	wayomer ‘eili lishmu’eil leikh shekhaw wehayah ’im yiqra ’eilekha, we’amarta dabeir yhoh, ki shomeia‘ ‘awdekha; wayeilekh shemu’eil, wayishkaw bimqomo. 
1_samuel 3:10	wayawo yhoh wayityazaw, wayiqra khefa‘am befa‘am shemu’eil shemu’eil; wayomer shemu’eil dabeir, ki shomeia‘ ‘awdekha.
1_samuel 3:11	wayomer yhoh ’el shemu’eil, hineih ’anokhi ‘oseh dawar beyisra’eil; ’asher kal shome‘o, tezilenah shetei ’acenaw. 
1_samuel 3:12	bayom hahu ’aqim ’el ‘eili, ’eit kal ’asher dibarti ’el beito; haHeil wekhaleih. 
1_samuel 3:13	wehigadti lo, ki shofeiT ’ani ’et beito ‘ad ‘olam; ba‘awon ’asher yada‘, ki meqalim lahem banaw, welo khihah bam. 
1_samuel 3:14	welakhein nishba‘ti leweit ‘eili; ’im yitkapeir ‘awon beit ‘eili becewaH uweminHah ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_samuel 3:15	wayishkaw shemu’eil ‘ad haboqer, wayiftaH ’et daltot beit yhoh; ushemu’eil yarei, meihagid ’et hamar’ah ’el ‘eili. 
1_samuel 3:16	wayiqra ‘eili ’et shemu’eil, wayomer shemu’eil beni; wayomer hineini. 
1_samuel 3:17	wayomer, mah hadawar ’asher diber ’eilekha, ’al na tekhaHeid mimeni; koh ya‘aseh lekha ’elohim wekhoh yosif, ’im tekhaHeid mimeni dawar, mikal hadawar ’asher diber ’eilekha. 
1_samuel 3:18	wayaged lo shemu’eil ’et kal hadewarim, welo khiHeid mimenu; wayomar yhoh hu, haTow be‘einaw ya‘aseh.
1_samuel 3:19	wayigdal shemu’eil; yhoh hayah ‘imo, welo hipil mikal dewaraw ’arezah. 
1_samuel 3:20	wayeida‘ kal yisra’eil, midan we‘ad be’eir shawa‘; ki ne’eman shemu’eil, lenawi yhoh. 
1_samuel 3:21	wayosef yhoh leheira’oh weshiloh; ki niglah yhoh ’el shemu’eil beshilo bidwar yhoh.
1_samuel 4:1	wayhi dewar shemu’eil lekhal yisra’eil; wayeizei yisra’eil liqrat pelishtim lamilHamah, wayaHanu ‘al ha’ewen ha‘eicer, ufelishtim Hanu wa’afeiq. 
1_samuel 4:2	waya‘arkhu felishtim liqrat yisra’eil, watiTosh hamilHamah, wayinagef yisra’eil lifnei felishtim; wayaku wama‘arakhah basadeh, ke’arba‘at ’alafim ’ish. 
1_samuel 4:3	wayawo ha‘am ’el hamaHaneh wayomeru ciqnei yisra’eil, lamah negafanu yhoh hayom lifnei felishtim; niqHah ’eileinu mishiloh, ’et ’aron berit yhoh, weyawo weqirbeinu, weyoshi‘einu mikaf ’oyeweinu. 
1_samuel 4:4	wayishlaH ha‘am shiloh, wayis’u misham, ’eit ’aron berit yhoh zewa’ot yosheiw hakeruwim; wesham shenei wenei ‘eili, ‘im ’aron berit ha’elohim, Hafeni ufineHas. 
1_samuel 4:5	wayhi, kewo ’aron berit yhoh ’el hamaHaneh, wayari‘u khal yisra’eil teru‘ah gedolah; wateihom ha’arez. 
1_samuel 4:6	wayishme‘u felishtim ’et qol hateru‘ah, wayomeru, meh qol hateru‘ah hagedolah haccot bemaHaneih ha‘iwrim; wayeide‘u, ki ’aron yhoh, ba ’el hamaHaneh. 
1_samuel 4:7	wayir’u hapelishtim, ki ’ameru, ba ’elohim ’el hamaHaneh; wayomeru ’o lanu, ki lo hayetah kacot ’etmol shilshom. 
1_samuel 4:8	’o lanu, mi yazileinu, miyad ha’elohim ha’adirim ha’eileh; ’eileh heim ha’elohim, hamakim ’et mizrayim bekhal makah bamidbar. 
1_samuel 4:9	hitHaccequ wihyu la’anashim pelishtim, pen ta‘awdu la‘iwrim, ka’asher ‘awedu lakhem; wihyitem la’anashim wenilHamtem. 
1_samuel 4:10	wayilaHamu felishtim, wayinagef yisra’eil wayanusu ’ish le’ohalaw, watehi hamakah gedolah me’od; wayipol miyisra’eil, sheloshim ’elef ragli. 
1_samuel 4:11	wa’aron ’elohim nilqaH; ushenei wenei ‘eili meitu, Hafeni ufineHas. 
1_samuel 4:12	wayaraz ’ish binyamin meihama‘arakhah, wayawo shiloh bayom hahu; umadaw qeru‘im, wa’adamah ‘al rosho. 
1_samuel 4:13	wayawo, wehineih ‘eili yosheiw ‘al hakissei yakh yad derekh mezapeh, ki hayah libo Hareid, ‘al ’aron ha’elohim; weha’ish, ba lehagid ba‘ir, watic‘aq kal ha‘ir. 
1_samuel 4:14	wayishma‘ ‘eili ’et qol haze‘aqah, wayomer meh qol hehamon hacceh; weha’ish mihar, wayawo wayageid le‘eili. 
1_samuel 4:15	we‘eili ben tish‘im ushemoneh shanah; we‘einaw qamah, welo yakhol lir’ot. 
1_samuel 4:16	wayomer ha’ish ’el ‘eili, ’anokhi haba min hama‘arakhah, wa’ani min hama‘arakhah nasti hayom; wayomer meh hayah hadawar beni. 
1_samuel 4:17	waya‘an hamwaseir wayomer, nas yisra’eil lifnei felishtim, wegam mageifah gedolah hayetah wa‘am; wegam shenei wanekha meitu, Hafeni ufineHas, wa’aron ha’elohim nilqaHah.
1_samuel 4:18	wayhi kehackiro ’et ’aron ha’elohim, wayipol mei‘al hakissei ’aHoranit be‘ad yad hasha‘ar, watishaweir mafraqto wayamot, ki caqein ha’ish wekhaweid; wehu shafaT ’et yisra’eil ’arba‘im shanah. 
1_samuel 4:19	wekhalato ’eishet pineHas harah lalat watishma‘ ’et hashemu‘ah, ’el hilaqaH ’aron ha’elohim, umeit Hamiha we’ishah; watikhra‘ wateiled, ki nehefkhu ‘aleha zireha. 
1_samuel 4:20	ukhe‘eit mutah, watedabeirenah hanizawot ‘aleha, ’al tire’i ki wein yaladet; welo ‘anetah welo shatah libah. 
1_samuel 4:21	watiqra lana‘ar, ’i khawod leimor, galah khawod miyisra’eil; ’el hilaqaH ’aron ha’elohim, we’el Hamiha we’ishah. 
1_samuel 4:22	watomer galah khawod miyisra’eil; ki nilqaH ’aron ha’elohim.
1_samuel 5:1	ufelishtim laqeHu, ’eit ’aron ha’elohim; waywi’uhu mei’ewen ha‘eicer ’ashdodah. 
1_samuel 5:2	wayiqHu felishtim ’et ’aron ha’elohim, wayawi’u ’oto beit dagon; wayazigu ’oto ’eizel dagon. 
1_samuel 5:3	wayashkimu ’ashdodim mimaHorat, wehineih dagon, nofeil lefanaw ’arzah, lifnei ’aron yhoh; wayiqHu ’et dagon, wayashiwu ’oto limqomo. 
1_samuel 5:4	wayashkimu waboqer mimaHorat wehineih dagon, nofeil lefanaw ’arzah, lifnei ’aron yhoh; werosh dagon ushetei kapot yadaw, kerutot ’el hamiftan, raq dagon nish’ar ‘alaw. 
1_samuel 5:5	‘al kein lo yidrekhu khohanei dagon wekhal haba’im beit dagon ‘al miftan dagon be’ashdod; ‘ad hayom hacceh.
1_samuel 5:6	watikhbad yad yhoh ’el ha’ashdodim wayshimeim; wayakh ’otam ba‘ofalim baTeHorim, ’et ’ashdod we’et gewuleha. 
1_samuel 5:7	wayir’u ’anshei ’ashdod ki khein; we’ameru, lo yeisheiw ’aron ’elohei yisra’eil ‘imanu, ki qashetah yado ‘aleinu, we‘al dagon ’eloheinu. 
1_samuel 5:8	wayishleHu waya’asfu ’et kal sarnei felishtim ’aleihem, wayomeru mah na‘aseh, la’aron ’elohei yisra’eil, wayomeru, gat yissow, ’aron ’elohei yisra’eil; wayasseibu ’et ’aron ’elohei yisra’eil.
1_samuel 5:9	wayhi ’aHarei heisabu ’oto, watehi yad yhoh ba‘ir mehumah gedolah me’od, wayakh ’et ’anshei ha‘ir, miqaTon we‘ad gadol; wayisateru lahem ‘ofalim TeHorim. 
1_samuel 5:10	wayshaleHu ’et ’aron ha’elohim ‘eqron; wayhi, kewo ’aron ha’elohim ‘eqron, wayic‘aqu ha‘eqronim leimor, heisabu ’eilay ’et ’aron ’elohei yisra’eil, lahamiteini we’et ‘ami. 
1_samuel 5:11	wayishleHu waya’asfu ’et kal sarnei felishtim, wayomeru shaleHu ’et ’aron ’elohei yisra’eil weyashow limqomo, welo yamit ’oti we’et ‘ami; ki hayetah mehumat mawet bekhal ha‘ir, kawedah me’od yad ha’elohim sham. 
1_samuel 5:12	weha’anashim ’asher lo meitu, huku ba‘ofalim baTeHorim; wata‘al shaw‘at ha‘ir hashamayim. 
1_samuel 6:1	wayhi ’aron yhoh bisdeih felishtim shiw‘ah Hodashim. 
1_samuel 6:2	wayiqre’u felishtim, lakohanim welaqosemim leimor, mah na‘aseh la’aron yhoh; hodi‘unu bameh neshaleHenu limqomo. 
1_samuel 6:3	wayomeru, ’im meshaleHim ’et ’aron ’elohei yisra’eil ’al teshaleHu ’oto reiqam, ki hasheiw tashiwu lo ’asham; ’ac teirafe’u wenoda‘ lakhem, lamah lo tasur yado mikem. 
1_samuel 6:4	wayomeru, mah ha’asham ’asher nashiw lo wayomeru, mispar sarnei felishtim, Hamishah ‘afelei TeHorei cahaw, waHamishah ‘akhberei cahaw; ki mageifah ’aHat lekhulam ulesarneikhem. 
1_samuel 6:5	wa‘asitem zalmei ‘afeleikhem TeHoreikhem wezalmei ‘akhbereikhem, hamashHitim ’et ha’arez, unetatem leilohei yisra’eil kawod; ’ulay, yaqeil ’et yado mei‘aleikhem, umei‘al ’eloheikhem umei‘al ’arzekhem. 
1_samuel 6:6	welamah tekhabedu ’et lewawkhem, ka’asher kibedu mizrayim ufar‘oh ’et libam; halo ka’asher hit‘aleil bahem, wayshaleHum wayeileikhu. 
1_samuel 6:7	we‘atah, qeHu wa‘asu ‘agalah Hadashah ’eHat, ushetei farot ‘alot, ’asher lo ‘alah ‘aleihem ‘ol; wa’asartem ’et haparot ba‘agalah, wahasheiwotem beneihem mei’aHareihem habayetah. 
1_samuel 6:8	uleqaHtem ’et ’aron yhoh unetatem ’oto ’el ha‘agalah, we’eit kelei haccahaw, ’asher hasheiwotem lo ’asham, tasimu wa’argac mizido; weshilaHtem ’oto wehalakh. 
1_samuel 6:9	ure’item, ’im derekh gewulo ya‘aleh beit shemesh, hu ‘asah lanu, ’et hara‘ah hagedolah haccot; we’im lo, weyada‘nu ki lo yado nage‘ah banu, miqreh hu hayah lanu. 
1_samuel 6:10	waya‘asu ha’anashim kein, wayiqHu, shetei farot ‘alot, waya’asrum ba‘agalah; we’et beneihem kalu wabayit. 
1_samuel 6:11	wayasimu ’et ’aron yhoh ’el ha‘agalah; we’eit ha’argac, we’eit ‘akhberei haccahaw, we’eit zalmei TeHoreihem. 
1_samuel 6:12	wayisharnah haparot baderekh, ‘al derekh beit shemesh, bimsilah ’aHat, halekhu halokh wega‘o, welo saru yamin usemol; wesarnei felishtim holekhim ’aHareihem, ‘ad gewul beit shamesh. 
1_samuel 6:13	uweit shemesh, qozerim qezir HiTim ba‘eimeq; wayis’u ’et ‘eineihem, wayir’u ’et ha’aron, wayismeHu lir’ot. 
1_samuel 6:14	weha‘agalah ba’ah ’el sedeih yehoshua‘ beit hashimshi wata‘amod sham, wesham ’ewen gedolah; waywaqe‘u ’et ‘azei ha‘agalah, we’et haparot, he‘elu ‘olah yhoh.
1_samuel 6:15	wehalwiyim horidu ’et ’aron yhoh we’et ha’argac ’asher ’ito ’asher bo khelei cahaw, wayasimu ’el ha’ewen hagedolah; we’anshei weit shemesh, he‘elu ‘olot wayicbeHu cewaHim bayom hahu yhoh. 
1_samuel 6:16	waHamishah sarnei felishtim ra’u; wayashuwu ‘eqron bayom hahu.
1_samuel 6:17	we’eileh TeHorei haccahaw, ’asher heishiwu felishtim ’asham yhoh; le’ashdod ’eHad, le‘accah ’eHad le’ashqelon ’eHad, legat ’eHad le‘eqron ’eHad.
1_samuel 6:18	we‘akhberei haccahaw, mispar kal ‘arei felishtim laHameishet hasseranim, mei‘ir miwzar, we‘ad kofer haperaci; we‘ad ’aweil hagedolah, ’asher hiniHu ‘aleha ’eit ’aron yhoh, ‘ad hayom hacceh, bisdeih yehoshua‘ beit hashimshi. 
1_samuel 6:19	wayakh be’anshei weit shemesh, ki ra’u ba’aron yhoh, wayakh ba‘am shiw‘im ’ish, Hamishim ’elef ’ish; wayit’abelu ha‘am, ki hikah yhoh ba‘am makah gedolah 
1_samuel 6:20	wayomeru ’anshei weit shemesh, mi yukhal la‘amod, lifnei yhoh ha’elohim haqadosh hacceh; we’el mi ya‘aleh mei‘aleinu.
1_samuel 6:21	wayishleHu mal’akhim, ’el yoshewei qiryat ye‘arim leimor; heishiwu felishtim ’et ’aron yhoh, redu ha‘alu ’oto ’aleikhem. 
1_samuel 7:1	wayawo’u ’anshei qiryat ye‘arim, waya‘alu ’et ’aron yhoh, wayawi’u ’oto, ’el beit ’awinadaw bagiw‘ah; we’et ’el‘acar beno qideshu, lishmor ’et ’aron yhoh.
1_samuel 7:2	wayhi, miyom shewet ha’aron beqiryat ye‘arim, wayirbu hayamim, wayihyu ‘esrim shanah; wayinahu kal beit yisra’eil ’aHarei yhoh.
1_samuel 7:3	wayomer shemu’eil, ’el kal beit yisra’eil leimor ’im bekhal lewawkhem, ’atem shawim ’el yhoh, hasiru ’et ’elohei haneikhar mitokhkhem weha‘ashtarot; wehakhinu lewawkhem ’el yhoh we‘iwduhu lewado, weyazeil ’etkhem miyad pelishtim. 
1_samuel 7:4	wayasiru benei yisra’eil, ’et habe‘alim we’et ha‘ashtarot; waya‘awdu ’et yhoh lewado.
1_samuel 7:5	wayomer shemu’eil, qiwzu ’et kal yisra’eil hamizpatah; we’etpaleil ba‘adkhem ’el yhoh. 
1_samuel 7:6	wayiqawezu hamizpatah wayish’awu mayim wayishpekhu lifnei yhoh wayazumu bayom hahu, wayomeru sham, HaTanu yhoh; wayishpoT shemu’eil ’et benei yisra’eil bamizpah. 
1_samuel 7:7	wayishme‘u felishtim, ki hitqabezu wenei yisra’eil hamizpatah, waya‘alu sarnei felishtim ’el yisra’eil; wayishme‘u benei yisra’eil, wayir’u mipenei felishtim. 
1_samuel 7:8	wayomeru wenei yisra’eil ’el shemu’eil, ’al taHareish mimenu, micce‘oq ’el yhoh ’eloheinu; weyoshi‘einu miyad pelishtim. 
1_samuel 7:9	wayiqaH shemu’eil, Teleih Halaw ’eHad, waya‘aleh waya‘aleihu ‘olah kalil yhoh; wayic‘aq shemu’eil ’el yhoh be‘ad yisra’eil, waya‘aneihu yhoh. 
1_samuel 7:10	wayhi shemu’eil ma‘aleh ha‘olah, ufelishtim nigeshu, lamilHamah beyisra’eil; wayar‘eim yhoh beqol gadol bayom hahu ‘al pelishtim wayhumeim, wayinagefu lifnei yisra’eil. 
1_samuel 7:11	wayeize’u ’anshei yisra’eil min hamizpah, wayirdefu ’et pelishtim; wayakum ‘ad mitaHat leweit kar. 
1_samuel 7:12	wayiqaH shemu’eil ’ewen ’aHat, wayasem bein hamizpah uwein hashein, wayiqra ’et shemah ’ewen ha‘acer; wayomar ‘ad heinah ‘acaranu yhoh. 
1_samuel 7:13	wayikane‘u hapelishtim, welo yasefu ‘od, lawo bigwul yisra’eil; watehi yad yhoh bapelishtim, kol yemei shemu’eil. 
1_samuel 7:14	watashowenah he‘arim ’asher laqeHu felishtim mei’eit yisra’eil leyisra’eil mei‘eqron we‘ad gat, we’et gewulan, hizil yisra’eil miyad pelishtim; wayhi shalom, bein yisra’eil uwein ha’emori. 
1_samuel 7:15	wayishpoT shemu’eil ’et yisra’eil, kol yemei Hayaw. 
1_samuel 7:16	wehalakh, midei shanah beshanah, wesawaw beit ’eil, wehagilgal wehamizpah; weshafaT ’et yisra’eil, ’eit kal hameqomot ha’eileh. 
1_samuel 7:17	uteshuwato haramatah ki sham beito, wesham shafaT ’et yisra’eil; wayiwen sham micbeiaH yhoh.
1_samuel 8:1	wayhi ka’asher caqein shemu’eil; wayasem ’et banaw shofeTim leyisra’eil. 
1_samuel 8:2	wayhi shem beno habekhor yo’eil, wesheim mishneihu ’awiyah; shofeTim biw’eir shawa‘. 
1_samuel 8:3	welo halekhu wanaw bedarkho bidrakhaw, wayiTu ’aHarei habaza‘; wayiqHu shoHad, wayaTu mishpaT.
1_samuel 8:4	wayitqabezu, kol ciqnei yisra’eil; wayawo’u ’el shemu’eil haramatah. 
1_samuel 8:5	wayomeru ’eilaw, hineih ’atah caqanta, uwanekha lo halekhu bidrakhekha; ‘atah, simah lanu melekh leshafeTeinu kekhal hagoyim. 
1_samuel 8:6	wayeira‘ hadawar be‘einei shemu’eil, ka’asher ’ameru, tenah lanu melekh leshafeTeinu; wayitpaleil shemu’eil ’el yhoh.
1_samuel 8:7	wayomer yhoh ’el shemu’eil, shema‘ beqol ha‘am, lekhol ’asher yomeru ’eilekha; ki lo ’otekha ma’asu, ki ’oti ma’asu mimelokh ‘aleihem. 
1_samuel 8:8	kekhal hama‘asim ’asher ‘asu, miyom ha‘aloti ’otam mimizrayim we‘ad hayom hacceh, waya‘acwuni, waya‘awdu ’elohim ’aHeirim; kein heimah ‘osim gam lakh. 
1_samuel 8:9	we‘atah shema‘ beqolam; ’akh, ki ha‘eid ta‘id bahem, wehigadta lahem, mishpaT hamelekh, ’asher yimlokh ‘aleihem.
1_samuel 8:10	wayomer shemu’eil, ’eit kal diwrei yhoh; ’el ha‘am hasho’alim mei’ito melekh.
1_samuel 8:11	wayomer ceh, yihyeh mishpaT hamelekh, ’asher yimlokh ‘aleikhem; ’et beneikhem yiqaH, wesam lo bemerkawto uwefarashaw, werazu lifnei merkawto. 
1_samuel 8:12	welasum lo, sarei ’alafim wesarei Hamishim; welaHarosh Harisho weliqzor qeziro, wela‘asot kelei milHamto ukhelei rikhbo. 
1_samuel 8:13	we’et benoteikhem yiqaH; leraqaHot uleTabaHot ule’ofot. 
1_samuel 8:14	we’ets doteikhem we’et karmeikhem weceiteikhem haTowim yiqaH; wenatan la‘awadaw. 
1_samuel 8:15	wecar‘eikhem wekharmeikhem ya‘sor; wenatan lesarisaw wela‘awadaw. 
1_samuel 8:16	we’et ‘awdeikhem we’et shifHoteikhem we’et baHureikhem haTowim we’et Hamoreikhem yiqaH; we‘asah limlakhto. 
1_samuel 8:17	zonekhem ya‘sor; we’atem tihyu lo la‘awadim. 
1_samuel 8:18	uce‘aqtem bayom hahu, milifnei malkekhem, ’asher beHartem lakhem; welo ya‘aneh yhoh ’etkhem bayom hahu. 
1_samuel 8:19	wayma’anu ha‘am, lishmoa‘ beqol shemu’eil; wayomeru lo, ki ’im melekh yihyeh ‘aleinu. 
1_samuel 8:20	wehayinu gam ’anaHnu kekhal hagoyim; ushefaTanu malkeinu weyaza lefaneinu, wenilHam ’et milHamoteinu. 
1_samuel 8:21	wayishma‘ shemu’eil, ’eit kal diwrei ha‘am; waydabereim be’acenei yhoh.
1_samuel 8:22	wayomer yhoh ’el shemu’eil shema‘ beqolam, wehimlakhta lahem melekh; wayomer shemu’eil ’el ’anshei yisra’eil, lekhu ’ish le‘iro.
1_samuel 9:1	wayhi ’ish mibin yamin mibinyamin, ushemo qish ben ’awi’eil ben zeror ben bekhorat ben ’afiaH ben ’ish yemini; gibor Hayil. 
1_samuel 9:2	welo hayah wein ushemo sha’ul baHur waTow, we’ein ’ish mibenei yisra’eil Tow mimenu; mishikhmo wama‘lah, gawoah mikal ha‘am. 
1_samuel 9:3	watowadnah ha’atonot, leqish ’awi sha’ul; wayomer qish ’el sha’ul beno, qaH na ’itekha ’et ’aHad meihane‘arim, wequm leikh, baqeish ’et ha’atonot. 
1_samuel 9:4	waya‘awor behar ’efrayim waya‘awor be’erez shalishah welo maza’u; waya‘awru we’erez sha‘alim wa’ayin, waya‘awor be’erez yemini welo maza’u. 
1_samuel 9:5	heimah, ba’u be’erez zuf, wesha’ul ’amar lena‘aro ’asher ‘imo lekhah wenashuwah; pen yeHdal ’awi min ha’atonot weda’ag lanu. 
1_samuel 9:6	wayomer lo, hineih na ’ish ’elohim ba‘ir haccot, weha’ish nikhbad, kol ’asher yedabeir bo yawo; ‘atah neilakhah sham, ’ulay yagid lanu, ’et darkeinu ’asher halakhnu ‘aleha. 
1_samuel 9:7	wayomer sha’ul lena‘aro, wehineih neileikh umah nawi la’ish ki haleHem ’acal mikeileinu, uteshurah ’ein lehawi le’ish ha’elohim; mah ’itanu. 
1_samuel 9:8	wayosef hana‘ar la‘anot ’et sha’ul, wayomer hineih nimza weyadi, rewa‘ sheqel kasef; wenatati le’ish ha’elohim, wehigid lanu ’et darkeinu. 
1_samuel 9:9	lefanim beyisra’eil, koh ’amar ha’ish belekhto lidrosh ’elohim, lekhu weneilekhah ‘ad haro’eh; ki lanawi hayom, yiqarei lefanim haro’eh. 
1_samuel 9:10	wayomer sha’ul lena‘aro Tow dewarekha lekhah neileikhah; wayeilekhu ’el ha‘ir, ’asher sham ’ish ha’elohim. 
1_samuel 9:11	heimah, ‘olim bema‘aleih ha‘ir, weheimah maze’u ne‘arot, yoze’ot lish’ow mayim; wayomeru lahen, hayeish baceh haro’eh. 
1_samuel 9:12	wata‘anenah ’otam watomarnah yeish hineih lefanekha; maheir ‘atah, ki hayom ba la‘ir, ki cewaH hayom la‘am babamah. 
1_samuel 9:13	kewo’akhem ha‘ir kein timze’un ’oto beTerem ya‘aleh habamatah le’ekhol, ki lo yokhal ha‘am ‘ad bo’o, ki hu yewareikh haccewaH, ’aHarei khein yokhelu haqeru’im; we‘atah ‘alu, ki ’oto khehayom timze’un ’oto. 
1_samuel 9:14	waya‘alu ha‘ir; heimah, ba’im betokh ha‘ir, wehineih shemu’eil yozei liqratam, la‘alot habamah.
1_samuel 9:15	yhoh, galah ’et ’ocen shemu’eil; yom ’eHad, lifnei wo sha’ul leimor. 
1_samuel 9:16	ka‘eit maHar ’eshlaH ’eilekha ’ish mei’erez binyamin, umeshaHto lenagid ‘al ‘ami yisra’eil, wehoshia‘ ’et ‘ami miyad pelishtim; ki ra’iti ’et ‘ami, ki ba’ah za‘aqato ’eilay. 
1_samuel 9:17	ushemu’eil ra’ah ’et sha’ul; yhoh ‘anahu, hineih ha’ish ’asher ’amarti ’eilekha, ceh ya‘zor be‘ami. 
1_samuel 9:18	wayigash sha’ul ’et shemu’eil betokh hasha‘ar; wayomer hagidah na li, ’ei ceh beit haro’eh. 
1_samuel 9:19	waya‘an shemu’eil ’et sha’ul, wayomer ’anokhi haro’eh, ‘aleih lefanay habamah, wa’akhaltem ‘imi hayom; weshilaHtikha waboqer, wekhol ’asher bilwawekha ’agid lakh. 
1_samuel 9:20	wela’atonot ha’owedot lekha, hayom sheloshet hayamim, ’al tasem ’et libekha lahem ki nimza’u; ulemi kal Hemdat yisra’eil, halo lekha, ulekhol beit ’awikha.
1_samuel 9:21	waya‘an sha’ul wayomer, halo wen yemini ’anokhi miqaTanei shiwTei yisra’eil, umishpaHti haze‘irah, mikal mishpeHot shiwTei winyamin; welamah dibarta ’eilay, kadawar hacceh.
1_samuel 9:22	wayiqaH shemu’eil ’et sha’ul we’et na‘aro, waywi’eim lishkatah; wayitein lahem maqom berosh haqeru’im, weheimah kishloshim ’ish. 
1_samuel 9:23	wayomer shemu’eil laTabaH, tenah ’et hamanah, ’asher natati lakh; ’asher ’amarti ’eilekha, sim ’otah ‘imakh. 
1_samuel 9:24	wayarem haTabaH ’et hashoq wehe‘aleha wayasem lifnei sha’ul, wayomer hineih hanish’ar sim lefanekha ’ekhol, ki lamo‘eid shamur lekha leimor ha‘am qarati; wayokhal sha’ul ‘im shemu’eil bayom hahu. 
1_samuel 9:25	wayeiredu meihabamah ha‘ir; waydabeir ‘im sha’ul ‘al hagag. 
1_samuel 9:26	wayashkimu, wayhi ka‘alot hashaHar wayiqra shemu’eil ’el sha’ul hagag hagagah leimor, qumah wa’ashaleHeka; wayaqam sha’ul, wayeize’u sheneihem hu ushemu’eil haHuzah. 
1_samuel 9:27	heimah, yordim biqzeih ha‘ir, ushemu’eil ’amar ’el sha’ul, ’emor lana‘ar weya‘awor lefaneinu waya‘awor; we’atah ‘amod kayom, we’ashmi‘akha ’et dewar ’elohim.
1_samuel 10:1	wayiqaH shemu’eil ’et pakh hashemen wayizoq ‘al rosho wayishaqeihu; wayomer halo, ki meshaHakha yhoh ‘al naHalato lenagid. 
1_samuel 10:2	belekhtekha hayom mei‘imadi, umazata shenei ’anashim ‘im qewurat raHeil bigwul binyamin bezelzaH; we’ameru ’eilekha, nimze’u ha’atonot ’asher halakhta lewaqeish, wehineih naTash ’awikha ’et diwrei ha’atonot, weda’ag lakhem leimor, mah ’e‘eseh liwni. 
1_samuel 10:3	weHalafta misham wahale’ah, uwata ‘ad ’eilon tawor, umeza’ukha sham sheloshah ’anashim, ‘olim ’el ha’elohim beit ’eil; ’eHad nosei sheloshah gedayim, we’eHad nosei, sheloshet kikerot leHem, we’eHad nosei neiwel yayin. 
1_samuel 10:4	wesha’alu lekha leshalom; wenatenu lekha shetei leHem, welaqaHta miyadam. 
1_samuel 10:5	’aHar kein, tawo giw‘at ha’elohim, ’asher sham neziwei felishtim; wihi khewo’akha sham ha‘ir, ufaga‘ta Hewel newi’im yoredim meihabamah, welifneihem neiwel wetof weHalil wekhinor, weheimah mitnabe’im. 
1_samuel 10:6	wezaleHah ‘alekha ruaH yhoh, wehitnabita ‘imam; wenehpakhta le’ish ’aHeir. 
1_samuel 10:7	wehayah, ki tewo’enah tawonah ha’otot ha’eileh lakh; ‘aseih lekha ’asher timza yadekha, ki ha’elohim ‘imakh. 
1_samuel 10:8	weyaradta lefanay hagilgal wehineih ’anokhi yoreid ’eilekha, leha‘alot ‘olot, licboaH ciwHei shelamim; shiw‘at yamim toHeil ‘ad bo’i ’eilekha, wehoda‘ti lekha, ’eit ’asher ta‘aseh. 
1_samuel 10:9	wehayah, kehafnoto shikhmo lalekhet mei‘im shemu’eil, wayahafakh lo ’elohim leiw ’aHeir; wayawo’u kal ha’otot ha’eileh bayom hahu.
1_samuel 10:10	wayawo’u sham hagiw‘atah, wehineih Hewel newi’im liqrato; watizlaH ‘alaw ruaH ’elohim, wayitnabei betokham. 
1_samuel 10:11	wayhi, kal yod‘o mei’itemol shilshom, wayir’u wehineih ‘im newi’im niba; wayomer ha‘am ’ish ’el rei‘eihu, mah ceh hayah lewen qish, hagam sha’ul banewi’im. 
1_samuel 10:12	waya‘an ’ish misham wayomer umi ’awihem; ‘al kein hayetah lemashal, hagam sha’ul banewi’im. 
1_samuel 10:13	waykhal meihitnabot, wayawo habamah. 
1_samuel 10:14	wayomer dod sha’ul ’eilaw we’el na‘aro ’an halakhtem; wayomer lewaqeish ’et ha’atonot, wanir’eh khi ’ayin, wanawo ’el shemu’eil. 
1_samuel 10:15	wayomer dod sha’ul; hagidah na li, mah ’amar lakhem shemu’eil. 
1_samuel 10:16	wayomer sha’ul ’el dodo, hageid higid lanu, ki nimze’u ha’atonot; we’et dewar hamelukhah lo higid lo, ’asher ’amar shemu’eil.
1_samuel 10:17	wayaz‘eiq shemu’eil ’et ha‘am, ’el yhoh hamizpah. 
1_samuel 10:18	wayomer ’el benei yisra’eil, f koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’anokhi he‘eleiti ’et yisra’eil mimizrayim; wa’azil ’etkhem miyad mizrayim, umiyad kal hamamlakhot, haloHazim ’etkhem.
