1_samuel 10:19	we’atem hayom me’astem ’et ’eloheikhem, ’asher hu moshia‘ lakhem mikal ra‘oteikhem wezaroteikhem watomeru lo, ki melekh tasim ‘aleinu; we‘atah, hityazewu lifnei yhoh, leshiwTeikhem ule’alfeikhem. 
1_samuel 10:20	wayaqreiw shemu’eil, ’eit kal shiwTei yisra’eil; wayilakheid sheiweT binyamin. 
1_samuel 10:21	wayaqreiw ’et sheiweT binyamin lemishpeHoto lemishpeHotaw, watilakheid mishpaHat hamaTri; wayilakheid sha’ul ben qish, waywaqshuhu welo nimza. 
1_samuel 10:22	wayish’alu ‘od yhoh, hawa ‘od halom ’ish; s wayomer yhoh, hineih hu neHba ’el hakeilim. 
1_samuel 10:23	wayaruzu wayiqaHuhu misham, wayityazeiw betokh ha‘am; wayigbah mikal ha‘am, mishikhmo wama‘elah. 
1_samuel 10:24	wayomer shemu’eil ’el kal ha‘am, hare’item ’asher baHar bo yhoh, ki ’ein kamohu bekhal ha‘am; wayari‘u khal ha‘am wayomeru yeHi hamelekh.
1_samuel 10:25	waydabeir shemu’eil ’el ha‘am, ’eit mishpaT hamelukhah, wayikhtow basseifer, wayanaH lifnei yhoh; wayshalaH shemu’eil ’et kal ha‘am ’ish leweito. 
1_samuel 10:26	wegam sha’ul, halakh leweito giw‘atah; wayeilekhu ‘imo, haHayil ’asher naga‘ ’elohim belibam. 
1_samuel 10:27	uwenei weliya‘al ’ameru, mah yoshi‘einu ceh, wayiwcuhu welo heiwi’u lo minHah; wayhi kemaHarish.
1_samuel 11:1	waya‘al, naHash ha‘amoni, wayiHan ‘al yaweish gil‘ad; wayomeru kal ’anshei yaweish ’el naHash, kerat lanu werit wena‘awdeka. 
1_samuel 11:2	wayomer ’aleihem, naHash ha‘amoni, becot ’ekhrot lakhem, binqor lakhem kal ‘ein yamin; wesamtiha Herpah ‘al kal yisra’eil. 
1_samuel 11:3	wayomeru ’eilaw ciqnei yaweish, heref lanu shiw‘at yamim, wenishleHah mal’akhim, bekhol gewul yisra’eil; we’im ’ein moshia‘ ’otanu weyazanu ’eilekha. 
1_samuel 11:4	wayawo’u hamal’akhim giw‘at sha’ul, waydaberu hadewarim be’acenei ha‘am; wayis’u khal ha‘am ’et qolam wayiwku. 
1_samuel 11:5	wehineih sha’ul, ba ’aHarei habaqar min hasadeh, wayomer sha’ul, mah la‘am ki yiwku; waysaperu lo, ’et diwrei ’anshei yaweish. 
1_samuel 11:6	watizlaH ruaH ’elohim ‘al sha’ul, beshame‘o keshame‘o ’et hadewarim ha’eileh; wayiHar ’apo me’od. 
1_samuel 11:7	wayiqaH zemed baqar waynateHeihu, wayshalaH bekhal gewul yisra’eil beyad hamal’akhim leimor ’asher ’einenu yozei ’aHarei sha’ul we’aHar shemu’eil, koh yei‘aseh liwqaro; wayipol paHad yhoh ‘al ha‘am, wayeize’u ke’ish ’eHad. 
1_samuel 11:8	wayifqedeim bewaceq; wayihyu wenei yisra’eil shelosh mei’ot ’elef, we’ish yehudah sheloshim ’alef. 
1_samuel 11:9	wayomeru lamal’akhim haba’im, koh tomerun le’ish yaweish gil‘ad, maHar tihyeh lakhem teshu‘ah beHom keHom hashamesh; wayawo’u hamal’akhim, wayagidu le’anshei yaweish wayismaHu. 
1_samuel 11:10	wayomeru ’anshei yaweish, maHar neizei ’aleikhem; wa‘asitem lanu, kekhal haTow be‘eineikhem.
1_samuel 11:11	wayhi mimaHorat, wayasem sha’ul ’et ha‘am sheloshah rashim wayawo’u wetokh hamaHaneh be’ashmoret haboqer, wayaku ’et ‘amon ‘ad Hom hayom; wayhi hanish’arim wayafuzu, welo nish’aru wam shenayim yaHad. 
1_samuel 11:12	wayomer ha‘am ’el shemu’eil, mi ha’omeir, sha’ul yimlokh ‘aleinu; tenu ha’anashim unemiteim. 
1_samuel 11:13	wayomer sha’ul, lo yumat ’ish bayom hacceh; ki hayom ‘asah yhoh teshu‘ah beyisra’eil.
1_samuel 11:14	wayomer shemu’eil ’el ha‘am, lekhu weneilekhah hagilgal; uneHadeish sham hamelukhah. 
1_samuel 11:15	wayeilekhu khal ha‘am hagilgal, wayamlikhu sham ’et sha’ul lifnei yhoh bagilgal, wayicbeHu sham cewaHim shelamim lifnei yhoh; wayismaH sham sha’ul wekhal ’anshei yisra’eil ‘ad me’od.
1_samuel 12:1	wayomer shemu’eil ’el kal yisra’eil, hineih shama‘ti weqolekhem, lekhol ’asher ’amartem li; wa’amlikh ‘aleikhem melekh. 
1_samuel 12:2	we‘atah hineih hamelekh mithaleikh lifneikhem, wa’ani caqanti wasawti, uwanay hinam ’itekhem; wa’ani hithalakhti lifneikhem, mine‘uray ‘ad hayom hacceh. 
1_samuel 12:3	hini ‘anu wi neged yhoh weneged meshiHo, ’et shor mi laqaHti waHamor mi laqaHti, we’et mi ‘ashaqti ’et mi razoti, umiyad mi laqaHti khofer, we’a‘lim ‘einay bo; we’ashiw lakhem. 
1_samuel 12:4	wayomeru, lo ‘ashaqtanu welo razotanu; welo laqaHta miyad ’ish me’umah. 
1_samuel 12:5	wayomer ’aleihem ‘eid yhoh bakhem, we‘eid meshiHo hayom hacceh, ki lo mezatem beyadi me’umah; wayomer ‘eid.
1_samuel 12:6	wayomer shemu’eil ’el ha‘am; yhoh ’asher ‘asah ’et mosheh we’et ’aharon, wa’asher he‘elah ’et ’awoteikhem mei’erez mizrayim. 
1_samuel 12:7	we‘atah, hityazewu we’ishafeTah ’itekhem lifnei yhoh; ’eit kal zidqot yhoh, ’asher ‘asah ’itekhem we’et ’awoteikhem. 
1_samuel 12:8	ka’asher ba ya‘aqow mizrayim; wayic‘aqu ’awoteikhem ’el yhoh, wayishlaH yhoh ’et mosheh we’et ’aharon, wayozi’u ’et ’awoteikhem mimizrayim, wayoshiwum bamaqom hacceh. 
1_samuel 12:9	wayishkeHu ’et yhoh ’eloheihem; wayimkor ’otam beyad sisera sar zewa Hazor uweyad pelishtim, uweyad melekh mo’aw, wayilaHamu bam. 
1_samuel 12:10	wayic‘aqu ’el yhoh wayomer wayomeru HaTanu, ki ‘acawnu ’et yhoh, wana‘awod ’et habe‘alim we’et ha‘ashtarot; we‘atah, hazileinu miyad ’oyeweinu wena‘awdeka. 
1_samuel 12:11	wayishlaH yhoh ’et yeruba‘al we’et bedan, we’et yiftaH we’et shemu’eil; wayazeil ’etkhem miyad ’oyeweikhem missawiw, wateishewu beTaH. 
1_samuel 12:12	watir’u, ki naHash melekh benei ‘amon ba ‘aleikhem watomeru li, lo ki melekh yimlokh ‘aleinu; yhoh ’eloheikhem malkekhem. 
1_samuel 12:13	we‘atah, hineih hamelekh ’asher beHartem ’asher she’eltem; wehineih natan yhoh ‘aleikhem melekh. 
1_samuel 12:14	’im tire’u ’et yhoh wa‘awadtem ’oto ushema‘tem beqolo, welo tamru ’et pi yhoh; wihyitem gam ’atem, wegam hamelekh ’asher malakh ‘aleikhem, ’aHar yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
1_samuel 12:15	we’im lo tishme‘u beqol yhoh, umeritem ’et pi yhoh; wehayetah yad yhoh bakhem uwa’awoteikhem. 
1_samuel 12:16	gam ‘atah hityazewu ure’u, ’et hadawar hagadol hacceh; ’asher yhoh, ‘oseh le‘eineikhem. 
1_samuel 12:17	halo qezir HiTim hayom, ’eqra ’el yhoh, weyitein qolot umaTar; ude‘u ure’u, ki ra‘atkhem rabah ’asher ‘asitem be‘einei yhoh, lish’ol lakhem melekh.
1_samuel 12:18	wayiqra shemu’eil ’el yhoh, wayitein yhoh qolot umaTar bayom hahu; wayira khal ha‘am me’od ’et yhoh we’et shemu’eil. 
1_samuel 12:19	wayomeru khal ha‘am ’el shemu’eil, hitpaleil be‘ad ‘awadekha ’el yhoh ’elohekha we’al namut; ki yasafnu ‘al kal HaToteinu ra‘ah, lish’ol lanu melekh.
1_samuel 12:20	wayomer shemu’eil ’el ha‘am ’al tira’u, ’atem ‘asitem, ’eit kal hara‘ah haccot; ’akh, ’al tasuru mei’aHarei yhoh, wa‘awadtem ’et yhoh bekhal lewawkhem. 
1_samuel 12:21	welo tasuru; ki ’aHarei hatohu, ’asher lo yo‘ilu welo yazilu ki tohu heimah. 
1_samuel 12:22	ki lo yiTosh yhoh ’et ‘amo, ba‘awur shemo hagadol; ki ho’il yhoh, la‘asot ’etkhem lo le‘am. 
1_samuel 12:23	gam ’anokhi, Halilah li meiHaTo yhoh, meiHadol lehitpaleil ba‘adkhem; wehoreiti ’etkhem, bederekh haTowah wehaysharah. 
1_samuel 12:24	’akh yer’u ’et yhoh wa‘awadtem ’oto be’emet bekhal lewawkhem; ki re’u, ’eit ’asher higdil ‘imakhem. 
1_samuel 12:25	we’im hareia‘ tarei‘u; gam ’atem gam malkekhem tissafu.
1_samuel 13:1	ben shanah sha’ul bemalekho; ushetei shanim, malakh ‘al yisra’eil. 
1_samuel 13:2	wayiwHar lo sha’ul sheloshet ’alafim miyisra’eil wayihyu ‘im sha’ul ’alpayim, bemikhmas uwehar beit ’eil, we’elef, hayu ‘im yonatan, begiw‘at binyamin; weyeter ha‘am, shilaH ’ish le’ohalaw. 
1_samuel 13:3	wayakh yonatan, ’eit neziw pelishtim ’asher begewa‘, wayishme‘u pelishtim; wesha’ul taqa‘ bashofar bekhal ha’arez leimor, yishme‘u ha‘iwrim. 
1_samuel 13:4	wekhal yisra’eil shame‘u leimor, hikah sha’ul ’et neziw pelishtim, wegam niw’ash yisra’eil bapelishtim; wayiza‘aqu ha‘am ’aHarei sha’ul hagilgal. 
1_samuel 13:5	ufelishtim ne’esfu lehilaHeim ‘im yisra’eil, sheloshim ’elef rekhew wesheishet ’alafim parashim, we‘am kaHol ’asher ‘al sefat hayam larow; waya‘alu wayaHanu wemikhmas, qidmat beit ’awen. 
1_samuel 13:6	we’ish yisra’eil ra’u ki zar lo, ki nigas ha‘am; wayitHabe’u ha‘am, bame‘arot uwaHawaHim uwassela‘im, uwazeriHim uwaborot. 
1_samuel 13:7	we‘iwrim, ‘aweru ’et hayardein, ’erez gad wegil‘ad; wesha’ul ‘odenu wagilgal, wekhal ha‘am Haredu ’aHaraw. 
1_samuel 13:8	wayiHel wayoHel shiw‘at yamim, lamo‘eid ’asher shemu’eil, welo wa shemu’eil hagilgal; wayafez ha‘am mei‘alaw. 
1_samuel 13:9	wayomer sha’ul, hagishu ’eilay, ha‘olah wehashelamim; waya‘al ha‘olah. 
1_samuel 13:10	wayhi, kekhaloto leha‘alot ha‘olah, wehineih shemu’eil ba; wayeizei sha’ul liqrato lewarakho. 
1_samuel 13:11	wayomer shemu’eil meh ‘asita; wayomer sha’ul ki ra’iti khi nafaz ha‘am mei‘alay, we’atah lo wata lemo‘eid hayamim, ufelishtim ne’esafim mikhmas. 
1_samuel 13:12	wa’omar, ‘atah yeiredu felishtim ’eilay hagilgal, ufenei yhoh lo Hiliti; wa’et’apaq, wa’a‘aleh ha‘olah.
1_samuel 13:13	wayomer shemu’eil ’el sha’ul niskaleta; lo shamarta, ’et mizwat yhoh ’elohekha ’asher ziwwakh, ki ‘atah, heikhin yhoh ’et mamlakhtekha ’el yisra’eil ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_samuel 13:14	we‘atah mamlakhtekha lo taqum; biqeish yhoh lo ’ish kilwawo, wayzawweihu yhoh lenagid ‘al ‘amo, ki lo shamarta, ’eit ’asher ziwwekha yhoh.
1_samuel 13:15	wayaqam shemu’eil, waya‘al min hagilgal giw‘at binyamin; wayifqod sha’ul, ’et ha‘am hanimze’im ‘imo, kesheish mei’ot ’ish. 
1_samuel 13:16	wesha’ul weyonatan beno, weha‘am hanimza ‘imam, yoshewim begewa‘ binyamin; ufelishtim Hanu wemikhmas. 
1_samuel 13:17	wayeizei hamashHit mimaHaneih felishtim sheloshah rashim; harosh ’eHad yifneh ’el derekh ‘aferah ’el ’erez shu‘al. 
1_samuel 13:18	weharosh ’eHad yifneh, derekh beit Horon; weharosh ’eHad yifneh derekh hagewul, hanishqaf ‘al gei hazewo‘im hamidbarah.
1_samuel 13:19	weHarash lo yimazei, bekhol ’erez yisra’eil; ki ’amar ’ameru felishtim, pen ya‘asu ha‘iwrim, Herew ’o Hanit. 
1_samuel 13:20	wayeiredu khal yisra’eil hapelishtim; lilTosh ’ish ’et maHarashto we’et ’eito we’et qardumo, we’eit maHareishato. 
1_samuel 13:21	wehayetah hapezirah fim, lamaHareishot wela’eitim, welishlosh qileshon ulehaqardumim; ulehaziw hadarewan. 
1_samuel 13:22	wehayah beyom milHemet, welo nimza Herew waHanit beyad kal ha‘am, ’asher ’et sha’ul we’et yonatan; watimazei lesha’ul, uleyonatan beno. 
1_samuel 13:23	wayeizei mazaw pelishtim, ’el ma‘awar mikhmas.
1_samuel 14:1	wayhi hayom, wayomer yonatan ben sha’ul ’el hana‘ar nosei kheilaw, lekhah, wena‘berah ’el mazaw pelishtim, ’asher mei‘eiwer halac; ule’awiw lo higid. 
1_samuel 14:2	wesha’ul, yosheiw biqzeih hagiw‘ah, taHat harimon ’asher bemigron; weha‘am ’asher ‘imo, kesheish mei’ot ’ish. 
1_samuel 14:3	wa’aHiyah wen ’aHiTuw ’aHi ’ikhawod ben pineHas ben ‘eili kohein yhoh beshilo nosei ’eifod; weha‘am lo yada‘, ki halakh yonatan. 
1_samuel 14:4	uwein hama‘berot, ’asher biqeish yonatan la‘awor ‘al mazaw pelishtim, shein hassela‘ meiha‘eiwer micceh, weshein hassela‘ meiha‘eiwer micceh; wesheim ha’eHad bozeiz, wesheim ha’eHad seneh. 
1_samuel 14:5	hashein ha’eHad mazuq mizafon mul mikhmas; weha’eHad minegew mul gawa‘.
1_samuel 14:6	wayomer yehonatan ’el hana‘ar nosei kheilaw, lekhah wena‘berah, ’el mazaw ha‘areilim ha’eileh, ’ulay ya‘aseh yhoh lanu; ki ’ein yhoh ma‘zor, lehoshia‘ beraw ’o wim‘aT. 
1_samuel 14:7	wayomer lo nosei kheilaw, ‘aseih kal ’asher bilwawekha; neTeih lakh, hini ‘imekha kilwawekha.
1_samuel 14:8	wayomer yehonatan, hineih ’anaHnu ‘owerim ’el ha’anashim; weniglinu ’aleihem. 
1_samuel 14:9	’im koh yomeru ’eileinu, domu ‘ad hagi‘einu ’aleikhem; we‘amadnu taHteinu, welo na‘aleh ’aleihem. 
1_samuel 14:10	we’im koh yomeru ‘alu ‘aleinu we‘alinu, ki netanam yhoh beyadeinu; weceh lanu ha’ot. 
1_samuel 14:11	wayigalu sheneihem, ’el mazaw pelishtim; wayomeru felishtim, hineih ‘iwrim yoze’im, min haHorim ’asher hitHabe’u sham. 
1_samuel 14:12	waya‘anu ’anshei hamazawah ’et yonatan we’et nosei kheilaw, wayomeru ‘alu ’eileinu, wenodi‘ah ’etkhem dawar; f wayomer yonatan ’el nosei kheilaw ‘aleih ’aHaray, ki netanam yhoh beyad yisra’eil. 
1_samuel 14:13	waya‘al yonatan, ‘al yadaw we‘al raglaw, wenosei kheilaw ’aHaraw; wayipelu lifnei yonatan, wenosei kheilaw memoteit ’aHaraw. 
1_samuel 14:14	watehi hamakah harishonah, ’asher hikah yonatan wenosei kheilaw ke‘esrim ’ish; kewaHazi ma‘anah zemed sadeh. 
1_samuel 14:15	watehi Haradah wamaHaneh wasadeh uwekhal ha‘am, hamazaw wehamashHit, Haredu gam heimah; watirgac ha’arez, watehi leHerdat ’elohim. 
1_samuel 14:16	wayir’u hazofim lesha’ul, begiw‘at binyamin; wehineih hehamon namog wayeilekh wahalom.
1_samuel 14:17	wayomer sha’ul, la‘am ’asher ’ito, piqdu na ure’u, mi halakh mei‘imanu; wayifqedu, wehineih ’ein yonatan wenosei kheilaw. 
1_samuel 14:18	wayomer sha’ul la’aHiyah, hagishah ’aron ha’elohim; ki hayah ’aron ha’elohim bayom hahu uwenei yisra’eil. 
1_samuel 14:19	wayhi, ‘ad diber sha’ul ’el hakohein, wehehamon, ’asher bemaHaneih felishtim, wayeilekh halokh waraw; f wayomer sha’ul ’el hakohein ’esof yadekha. 
1_samuel 14:20	wayicca‘eiq sha’ul, wekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito, wayawo’u ‘ad hamilHamah; wehineih hayetah Herew ’ish berei‘eihu, mehumah gedolah me’od. 
1_samuel 14:21	weha‘iwrim, hayu lapelishtim ke’etmol shilshom, ’asher ‘alu ‘imam bamaHaneh sawiw; wegam heimah, lihyot ‘im yisra’eil, ’asher ‘im sha’ul weyonatan. 
1_samuel 14:22	wekhol ’ish yisra’eil hamitHabe’im behar ’efrayim shame‘u, ki nasu pelishtim; wayadbequ gam heimah ’aHareihem bamilHamah. 
1_samuel 14:23	wayosha‘ yhoh bayom hahu ’et yisra’eil; wehamilHamah, ‘awerah ’et beit ’awen. 
1_samuel 14:24	we’ish yisra’eil nigas bayom hahu; wayo’el sha’ul ’et ha‘am leimor, ’arur ha’ish ’asher yokhal leHem ‘ad ha‘erew, weniqamti mei’oyeway, welo Ta‘am kal ha‘am laHem.
1_samuel 14:25	wekhal ha’arez ba’u waya‘ar; wayhi dewash ‘al penei hasadeh. 
1_samuel 14:26	wayawo ha‘am ’el haya‘ar, wehineih heilekh dewash; we’ein masig yado ’el piw, ki yarei ha‘am ’et hashewu‘ah. 
1_samuel 14:27	weyonatan lo shama‘, behashbia‘ ’awiw ’et ha‘am wayishlaH, ’et qezeih hamaTeh ’asher beyado, wayiTbol ’otah beya‘rat hadewash; wayashew yado ’el piw, wataronah wata’orenah ‘einaw. 
1_samuel 14:28	waya‘an ’ish meiha‘am wayomer, hashbeia‘ hishbia‘ ’awikha ’et ha‘am leimor, ’arur ha’ish ’asher yokhal leHem hayom; waya‘af ha‘am. 
1_samuel 14:29	wayomer yonatan, ‘akhar ’awi ’et ha’arez; re’u na ki ’oru ‘einay, ki Ta‘amti, me‘aT dewash hacceh. 
1_samuel 14:30	’af, ki lu ’akhol ’akhal hayom ha‘am, mishelal ’oyewaw ’asher maza; ki ‘atah lo rawetah makah bapelishtim. 
1_samuel 14:31	wayaku bayom hahu bapelishtim, mimikhmas ’ayalonah; waya‘af ha‘am me’od. 
1_samuel 14:32	waya‘as waya‘aT ha‘am ’el shalal hashalal, wayiqHu zon uwaqar uwenei waqar wayishHaTu ’arezah; wayokhal ha‘am ‘al hadam. 
1_samuel 14:33	wayagidu lesha’ul leimor, hineih ha‘am HoTim yhoh le’ekhol ‘al hadam; wayomer begadtem, golu ’eilay hayom ’ewen gedolah. 
1_samuel 14:34	wayomer sha’ul puzu wa‘am wa’amartem lahem hagishu ’eilay ’ish shoro we’ish seyeihu, usheHaTtem baceh wa’akhaltem, welo teHeT’u yhoh le’ekhol ’el hadam; wayagishu khal ha‘am ’ish shoro weyado halaylah wayishHaTu sham. 
1_samuel 14:35	wayiwen sha’ul micbeiaH yhoh; ’oto heiHeil, liwnot micbeiaH yhoh.
1_samuel 14:36	wayomer sha’ul neiredah ’aHarei felishtim laylah wenawocah wahem ‘ad ’or haboqer, welo nash’eir bahem ’ish, wayomeru, kal haTow be‘einekha ‘aseih; s wayomer hakohein, niqrewah halom ’el ha’elohim. 
1_samuel 14:37	wayish’al sha’ul beilohim, ha’eireid ’aHarei felishtim, hatiteneim beyad yisra’eil; welo ‘anahu bayom hahu. 
1_samuel 14:38	wayomer sha’ul, goshu halom, kol pinot ha‘am; ude‘u ure’u, bamah, hayetah haHaTat haccot hayom. 
1_samuel 14:39	ki Hay yhoh hamoshia‘ ’et yisra’eil, ki ’im yeshno beyonatan beni ki mot yamut; we’ein ‘oneihu mikal ha‘am. 
1_samuel 14:40	wayomer ’el kal yisra’eil, ’atem tihyu le‘eiwer ’eHad, wa’ani weyonatan beni, nihyeh le‘eiwer ’eHad; wayomeru ha‘am ’el sha’ul, haTow be‘einekha ‘aseih.
1_samuel 14:41	wayomer sha’ul, ’el yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil hawah tamim; wayilakheid yonatan wesha’ul weha‘am yaza’u. 
1_samuel 14:42	wayomer sha’ul, hapilu beini uwein yonatan beni; wayilakheid yonatan. 
1_samuel 14:43	wayomer sha’ul ’el yonatan, hagidah li meh ‘asitah; wayaged lo yonatan, wayomer Ta‘om Ta‘amti biqzeih hamaTeh ’asher beyadi me‘aT dewash hini ’amut. 
1_samuel 14:44	wayomer sha’ul, koh ya‘aseh ’elohim wekhoh yosif; ki mot tamut yonatan. 
1_samuel 14:45	wayomer ha‘am ’el sha’ul, hayonatan yamut ’asher ‘asah hayshu‘ah hagedolah haccot beyisra’eil Halilah, Hay yhoh ’im yipol misa‘arat rosho ’arzah, ki ‘im ’elohim ‘asah hayom hacceh; wayifdu ha‘am ’et yonatan welo meit.
1_samuel 14:46	waya‘al sha’ul, mei’aHarei pelishtim; ufelishtim halekhu limqomam. 
1_samuel 14:47	wesha’ul lakhad hamelukhah ‘al yisra’eil; wayilaHem sawiw bekhal ’oyewaw bemo’aw uwiwnei ‘amon uwe’edom uwemalkhei zowah uwapelishtim, uwekhol ’asher yifneh yarshia‘. 
1_samuel 14:48	waya‘as Hayil, wayakh ’et ‘amaleiq; wayazeil ’et yisra’eil miyad shoseihu.
1_samuel 14:49	wayihyu benei sha’ul, yonatan weyishwi umalki shua‘; wesheim shetei wenotaw, sheim habekhirah meiraw, wesheim haqeTanah mikhal. 
1_samuel 14:50	wesheim ’eishet sha’ul, ’aHino‘am bat ’aHima‘az; wesheim sar zewa’o ’awineir, ben neir dod sha’ul. 
1_samuel 14:51	weqish ’awi sha’ul weneir ’awi ’awneir ben ’awi’eil.
1_samuel 14:52	watehi hamilHamah Hacaqah ‘al pelishtim, kol yemei sha’ul; wera’ah sha’ul kal ’ish gibor wekhal ben Hayil, waya’asfeihu ’eilaw.
1_samuel 15:1	wayomer shemu’eil ’el sha’ul, ’oti shalaH yhoh limshaHokha lemelekh, ‘al ‘amo ‘al yisra’eil; we‘atah shema‘, leqol diwrei yhoh.
1_samuel 15:2	koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot, paqadti ’eit ’asher ‘asah ‘amaleiq leyisra’eil; ’asher sam lo baderekh, ba‘aloto mimizrayim. 
1_samuel 15:3	‘atah leikh wehikitah ’et ‘amaleiq, wehaHaramtem ’et kal ’asher lo, welo taHmol ‘alaw; weheimatah mei’ish ‘ad ’ishah, mei‘oleil we‘ad yoneiq, mishor we‘ad seh, migamal we‘ad Hamor.
1_samuel 15:4	wayshama‘ sha’ul ’et ha‘am, wayifqedeim baTela’im, matayim ’elef ragli; wa‘aseret ’alafim ’et ’ish yehudah. 
1_samuel 15:5	wayawo sha’ul ‘ad ‘ir ‘amaleiq; wayarew banaHal. 
1_samuel 15:6	wayomer sha’ul ’el haqeini lekhu suru redu mitokh ‘amaleiqi, pen ’osifkha ‘imo, we’atah ‘asitah Hesed ‘im kal benei yisra’eil, ba‘alotam mimizrayim; wayasar qeini mitokh ‘amaleiq. 
1_samuel 15:7	wayakh sha’ul ’et ‘amaleiq; meiHawilah bo’akha shur, ’asher ‘al penei mizrayim. 
1_samuel 15:8	wayitpos ’et ’agag melekh ‘amaleiq Hay; we’et kal ha‘am heHerim lefi Harew. 
1_samuel 15:9	wayaHmol sha’ul weha‘am ‘al ’agag, we‘al meiTaw hazon wehabaqar wehamishnim we‘al hakarim we‘al kal haTow, welo ’awu haHarimam; wekhal hamelakhah nemiwcah wenameis ’otah heHerimu.
1_samuel 15:10	wayhi dewar yhoh, ’el shemu’eil leimor. 
1_samuel 15:11	niHamti, ki himlakhti ’et sha’ul lemelekh, ki shaw mei’aHaray, we’et dewaray lo heiqim; wayiHar lishmu’eil, wayic‘aq ’el yhoh kal halayelah. 
1_samuel 15:12	wayashkeim shemu’eil liqrat sha’ul baboqer; wayugad lishmu’eil leimor, ba sha’ul hakarmelah wehineih maziw lo yad, wayissow waya‘awor, wayeired hagilgal. 
1_samuel 15:13	wayawo shemu’eil ’el sha’ul; wayomer lo sha’ul, barukh ’atah yhoh, haqimoti ’et dewar yhoh. 
1_samuel 15:14	wayomer shemu’eil, umeh qol hazon hacceh be’acenay; weqol habaqar, ’asher ’anokhi shomeia‘. 
1_samuel 15:15	wayomer sha’ul mei‘amaleiqi hewi’um, ’asher Hamal ha‘am ‘al meiTaw hazon wehabaqar, lema‘an cewoaH yhoh ’elohekha; we’et hayoteir heHeramnu.
1_samuel 15:16	wayomer shemu’eil ’el sha’ul, heref we’agidah lekha, ’eit ’asher diber yhoh ’eilay halayelah; wayomeru wayomer lo dabeir.
1_samuel 15:17	wayomer shemu’eil, halo, ’im qaTon ’atah be‘einekha, rosh shiwTei yisra’eil ’atah; wayimshaHakha yhoh lemelekh ‘al yisra’eil. 
1_samuel 15:18	wayishlaHakha yhoh bedarekh; wayomer, leikh wehaHaramtah ’et haHaTa’im ’et ‘amaleiq, wenilHamta wo, ‘ad kalotam ’otam. 
1_samuel 15:19	welamah lo shama‘ta beqol yhoh; wata‘aT ’el hashalal, wata‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh.
1_samuel 15:20	wayomer sha’ul ’el shemu’eil, ’asher shama‘ti beqol yhoh, wa’eileikh baderekh ’asher shelaHani yhoh; wa’awi, ’et ’agag melekh ‘amaleiq, we’et ‘amaleiq heHeramti. 
1_samuel 15:21	wayiqaH ha‘am meihashalal zon uwaqar reishit haHeirem; licboaH yhoh ’elohekha bagilgal. 
1_samuel 15:22	wayomer shemu’eil, haHeifez yhoh be‘olot ucewaHim, kishmoa‘ beqol yhoh; hineih shemoa‘ miccewaH Tow, lehaqshiw meiHeilew ’eilim. 
1_samuel 15:23	ki HaTat qesem meri, we’awen uterafim hafzar; ya‘an, ma’asta ’et dewar yhoh, wayim’asekha mimelekh.
1_samuel 15:24	wayomer sha’ul ’el shemu’eil HaTati, ki ‘awarti ’et pi yhoh we’et dewarekha; ki yareiti ’et ha‘am, wa’eshma‘ beqolam. 
1_samuel 15:25	we‘atah sa na ’et HaTati; weshuw ‘imi, we’eshtaHaweh yhoh. 
1_samuel 15:26	wayomer shemu’eil ’el sha’ul, lo ’ashuw ‘imakh; ki ma’astah ’et dewar yhoh, wayim’asekha yhoh, mihyot melekh ‘al yisra’eil.
1_samuel 15:27	wayissow shemu’eil lalekhet; wayaHaceiq bikhnaf me‘ilo wayiqara‘. 
1_samuel 15:28	wayomer ’eilaw shemu’eil, qara‘ yhoh ’et mamlekhut yisra’eil mei‘alekha hayom; unetanah lerei‘akha haTow mimeka. 
1_samuel 15:29	wegam neizaH yisra’eil, lo yeshaqeir welo yinaHeim; ki lo ’adam hu lehinaHeim. 
1_samuel 15:30	wayomer HaTati, ‘atah, kabedeini na neged ciqnei ‘ami weneged yisra’eil; weshuw ‘imi, wehishtaHaweiti yhoh ’elohekha. 
1_samuel 15:31	wayashaw shemu’eil ’aHarei sha’ul; wayishtaHu sha’ul yhoh.
1_samuel 15:32	wayomer shemu’eil, hagishu ’eilay ’et ’agag melekh ‘amaleiq, wayeilekh ’eilaw, ’agag ma‘adanot; wayomer ’agag, ’akhein sar mar hamawet.
1_samuel 15:33	wayomer shemu’eil, ka’asher shikelah nashim Harbekha, kein tishkal minashim ’imekha; wayshasseif shemu’eil ’et ’agag lifnei yhoh bagilgal.
1_samuel 15:34	wayeilekh shemu’eil haramatah; wesha’ul ‘alah ’el beito giw‘at sha’ul. 
1_samuel 15:35	welo yasaf shemu’eil lir’ot ’et sha’ul ‘ad yom moto, ki hit’abeil shemu’eil ’el sha’ul; yhoh niHam, ki himlikh ’et sha’ul ‘al yisra’eil.
1_samuel 16:1	wayomer yhoh ’el shemu’eil, ‘ad matay ’atah mit’abeil ’el sha’ul, wa’ani me’astiw, mimelokh ‘al yisra’eil; malei qarnekha shemen, weleikh ’eshlaHakha ’el yishay beit halaHmi, ki ra’iti bewanaw li melekh. 
1_samuel 16:2	wayomer shemu’eil ’eikh ’eileikh, weshama‘ sha’ul waharagani; s wayomer yhoh ‘eglat baqar tiqaH beyadekha, we’amarta, licboaH yhoh bati. 
1_samuel 16:3	weqarata leyishay baccawaH; we’anokhi, ’odi‘akha ’eit ’asher ta‘aseh, umashaHta li, ’eit ’asher ’omar ’eilekha. 
1_samuel 16:4	waya‘as shemu’eil, ’eit ’asher diber yhoh, wayawo beit laHem; wayeHerdu ciqnei ha‘ir liqrato, wayomer shalom bo’ekha. 
1_samuel 16:5	wayomer shalom, licboaH yhoh bati, hitqadeshu, uwatem ’iti baccawaH; wayqadeish ’et yishay we’et banaw, wayiqra lahem laccawaH. 
1_samuel 16:6	wayhi bewo’am, wayar ’et ’eli’aw; wayomer ’akh neged yhoh meshiHo. 
1_samuel 16:7	wayomer yhoh ’el shemu’eil, ’al tabeiT ’el mar’eihu we’el gewoah qomato ki me’astihu; ki lo, ’asher yir’eh ha’adam, ki ha’adam yir’eh la‘einayim, yhoh yir’eh laleiwaw. 
1_samuel 16:8	wayiqra yishay ’el ’awinadaw, waya‘awireihu lifnei shemu’eil; wayomer gam baceh lo waHar yhoh. 
1_samuel 16:9	waya‘aweir yishay shamah; wayomer gam baceh lo waHar yhoh. 
1_samuel 16:10	waya‘aweir yishay shiw‘at banaw lifnei shemu’eil; wayomer shemu’eil ’el yishay, lo waHar yhoh ba’eileh. 
1_samuel 16:11	wayomer shemu’eil ’el yishay hatamu hane‘arim wayomer, ‘od sha’ar haqaTan, wehineih ro‘eh bazon; wayomer shemu’eil ’el yishay shilHah weqaHenu, ki lo nasow ‘ad bo’o foh. 
1_samuel 16:12	wayishlaH waywi’eihu wehu ’admoni, ‘im yefeih ‘einayim weTow ro’i; f wayomer yhoh qum meshaHeihu ki ceh hu. 
1_samuel 16:13	wayiqaH shemu’eil ’et qeren hashemen, wayimshaH ’oto beqerew ’eHaw watizlaH ruaH yhoh ’el dawid, meihayom hahu wama‘elah; wayaqam shemu’eil, wayeilekh haramatah.
1_samuel 16:14	weruaH yhoh sarah mei‘im sha’ul; uwi‘atatu ruaH ra‘ah mei’eit yhoh. 
1_samuel 16:15	wayomeru ‘awdei sha’ul ’eilaw; hineih na ruaH ’elohim ra‘ah mewa‘itekha. 
1_samuel 16:16	yomar na ’adoneinu ‘awadekha lefanekha, yewaqshu ’ish yodeia‘ menagein bakinor; wehayah, bihyot ‘alekha ruaH ’elohim ra‘ah, wenigein beyado weTow lakh.
1_samuel 16:17	wayomer sha’ul ’el ‘awadaw; re’u na li, ’ish meiTiw lenagein, wahawi’otem ’eilay. 
1_samuel 16:18	waya‘an ’eHad meihane‘arim wayomer, hineih ra’iti bein leyishay beit halaHmi yodeia‘ nagein wegibor Hayil we’ish milHamah unewon dawar we’ish to’ar; yhoh ‘imo. 
1_samuel 16:19	wayishlaH sha’ul mal’akhim ’el yishay; wayomer shilHah ’eilay ’et dawid binkha ’asher bazon. 
1_samuel 16:20	wayiqaH yishay Hamor leHem wenod yayin, ugedi ‘iccim ’eHad; wayishlaH beyad dawid beno ’el sha’ul. 
1_samuel 16:21	wayawo dawid ’el sha’ul, waya‘amod lefanaw; waye’ehaweihu me’od, wayhi lo nosei kheilim. 
1_samuel 16:22	wayishlaH sha’ul, ’el yishay leimor; ya‘amad na dawid lefanay, ki maza Hein be‘einay. 
1_samuel 16:23	wehayah, bihyot ruaH ’elohim ’el sha’ul, welaqaH dawid ’et hakinor wenigein beyado; werawaH lesha’ul weTow lo, wesarah mei‘alaw ruaH hara‘ah.
1_samuel 17:1	waya’asfu felishtim ’et maHaneihem lamilHamah, wayei’asefu, sokhoh ’asher lihudah; wayaHanu bein sokhoh uwein ‘aceiqah be’efes damim. 
1_samuel 17:2	wesha’ul we’ish yisra’eil ne’esfu, wayaHanu be‘eimeq ha’eilah; waya‘arkhu milHamah liqrat pelishtim. 
1_samuel 17:3	ufelishtim ‘omedim ’el hahar micceh, weyisra’eil ‘omedim ’el hahar micceh; wehagay beineihem. 
1_samuel 17:4	wayeizei ’ish habeinayim mimaHanot pelishtim, galeyat shemo migat; gaweho sheish ’amot wacaret. 
1_samuel 17:5	wekhowa‘ neHoshet ‘al rosho, weshiryon qasqasim hu lawush; umishqal hashiryon, Hameishet ’alafim sheqalim neHoshet. 
1_samuel 17:6	umizHat neHoshet ‘al raglaw; wekhidon neHoshet bein keteifaw. 
1_samuel 17:7	weHaz we‘eiz Hanito, kimnor ’oregim, welahewet Hanito, sheish mei’ot sheqalim barcel; wenosei hazinah holeikh lefanaw. 
1_samuel 17:8	waya‘amod, wayiqra ’el ma‘arkhot yisra’eil, wayomer lahem, lamah teize’u la‘arokh milHamah; halo ’anokhi hapelishti, we’atem ‘awadim lesha’ul, beru lakhem ’ish weyeireid ’eilay. 
1_samuel 17:9	’im yukhal lehilaHeim ’iti wehikani, wehayinu lakhem la‘awadim; we’im ’ani ’ukhal lo wehikitiw, wihyitem lanu la‘awadim, wa‘awadtem ’otanu. 
1_samuel 17:10	wayomer hapelishti, ’ani, Heirafti ’et ma‘arkhot yisra’eil hayom hacceh; tenu li ’ish, wenilaHamah yaHad. 
1_samuel 17:11	wayishma‘ sha’ul wekhal yisra’eil, ’et diwrei hapelishti ha’eileh; wayeiHatu wayir’u me’od.
1_samuel 17:12	wedawid ben ’ish ’efrati hacceh, mibeit leHem yehudah, ushemo yishay, welo shemonah wanim; weha’ish bimei sha’ul, caqein ba wa’anashim. 
1_samuel 17:13	wayeilekhu sheloshet benei yishay hagedolim, halekhu ’aHarei sha’ul lamilHamah; wesheim sheloshet banaw, ’asher halekhu bamilHamah, ’eli’aw habekhor, umishneihu ’awinadaw, wehashelishi shamah. 
1_samuel 17:14	wedawid hu haqaTan; usheloshah hagedolim, halekhu ’aHarei sha’ul.
1_samuel 17:15	wedawid holeikh washaw mei‘al sha’ul; lir‘ot ’et zon ’awiw beit laHem. 
1_samuel 17:16	wayigash hapelishti hashkeim weha‘areiw; wayityazeiw ’arba‘im yom.
1_samuel 17:17	wayomer yishay ledawid beno, qaH na le’aHekha ’eifat haqali hacceh, wa‘asarah leHem hacceh; wehareiz hamaHaneh le’aHekha. 
1_samuel 17:18	we’eit ‘aseret Harizei heHalaw ha’eileh, tawi lesar ha’alef; we’et ’aHekha tifqod leshalom, we’et ‘arubatam tiqaH. 
1_samuel 17:19	wesha’ul weheimah wekhal ’ish yisra’eil, be‘eimeq ha’eilah; nilHamim ‘im pelishtim. 
1_samuel 17:20	wayashkeim dawid baboqer, wayiTosh ’et hazon ‘al shomeir, wayisa wayeilekh, ka’asher ziwwahu yishay; wayawo hama‘galah, wehaHayil, hayozei ’el hama‘arakhah, weheirei‘u bamilHamah. 
1_samuel 17:21	wata‘arokh yisra’eil ufelishtim, ma‘arakhah liqrat ma‘arakhah. 
1_samuel 17:22	wayiTosh dawid ’et hakeilim mei‘alaw, ‘al yad shomeir hakeilim, wayaraz hama‘arakhah; wayawo wayish’al le’eHaw leshalom. 
1_samuel 17:23	wehu medabeir ‘imam, wehineih ’ish habeinayim ‘oleh galeyat hapelishti shemo migat mima‘arot mima‘arkhot pelishtim, waydabeir kadewarim ha’eileh; wayishma‘ dawid. 
1_samuel 17:24	wekhol ’ish yisra’eil, bir’otam ’et ha’ish; wayanusu mipanaw, wayire’u me’od. 
1_samuel 17:25	wayomer ’ish yisra’eil, hare’item ha’ish ha‘oleh hacceh, ki leHareif ’et yisra’eil ‘oleh; wehayah ha’ish ’asher yakenu ya‘sherenu hamelekh ‘osher gadol, we’et bito yiten lo, we’eit beit ’awiw, ya‘aseh Hafeshi beyisra’eil. 
1_samuel 17:26	wayomer dawid, ’el ha’anashim ha‘omedim ‘imo leimor mah yei‘aseh, la’ish ’asher yakeh ’et hapelishti halac, weheisir Herpah mei‘al yisra’eil; ki mi, hapelishti he‘areil hacceh, ki Heireif, ma‘arkhot ’elohim Hayim. 
1_samuel 17:27	wayomer lo ha‘am, kadawar hacceh leimor; koh yei‘aseh, la’ish ’asher yakenu. 
1_samuel 17:28	wayishma‘ ’eli’aw ’aHiw hagadol, bedabero ’el ha’anashim; wayiHar ’af ’eli’aw bedawid wayomer lamah ceh yaradta, we‘al mi naTashta me‘aT hazon haheinah bamidbar, ’ani yada‘ti ’et cedonekha, we’eit roa‘ lewawekha, ki, lema‘an re’ot hamilHamah yaradeta. 
1_samuel 17:29	wayomer dawid, meh ‘asiti ‘atah; halo dawar hu. 
1_samuel 17:30	wayissow mei’ezlo ’el mul ’aHeir, wayomer kadawar hacceh; wayshiwuhu ha‘am dawar, kadawar harishon. 
1_samuel 17:31	wayeshame‘u hadewarim, ’asher diber dawid; wayagidu lifnei sha’ul wayiqaHeihu. 
1_samuel 17:32	wayomer dawid ’el sha’ul, ’al yipol leiw ’adam ‘alaw; ‘awdekha yeileikh, wenilHam ‘im hapelishti hacceh. 
1_samuel 17:33	wayomer sha’ul ’el dawid, lo tukhal lalekhet ’el hapelishti hacceh, lehilaHeim ‘imo; ki na‘ar ’atah, wehu ’ish milHamah mine‘uraw.
1_samuel 17:34	wayomer dawid ’el sha’ul, ro‘eh hayah ‘awdekha le’awiw bazon; uwa ha’ari we’et hadow, wenasa seh meiha‘eider. 
1_samuel 17:35	weyazati ’aHaraw wehikitiw wehizalti mipiw; wayaqam ‘alay, weheHecaqti bicqano, wehikitiw wahamitiw. 
1_samuel 17:36	gam ’et ha’ari gam hadow hikah ‘awdekha; wehayah hapelishti he‘areil hacceh ke’aHad meihem, ki Heireif, ma‘arkhot ’elohim Hayim.
1_samuel 17:37	wayomer dawid yhoh ’asher hizilani miyad ha’ari umiyad hadow, hu yazileini, miyad hapelishti hacceh; s wayomer sha’ul ’el dawid leikh, yhoh yihyeh ‘imakh. 
1_samuel 17:38	wayalbeish sha’ul ’et dawid madaw, wenatan qowa‘ neHoshet ‘al rosho; wayalbeish ’oto shiryon. 
1_samuel 17:39	wayaHgor dawid ’et Harbo mei‘al lemadaw wayo’el lalekhet ki lo nissah wayomer dawid ’el sha’ul, lo ’ukhal lalekhet ba’eileh ki lo nissiti; waysireim dawid mei‘alaw. 
1_samuel 17:40	wayiqaH maqlo beyado, wayiwHar lo Hamishah Haluqei ’awanim min hanaHal wayasem ’otam bikhli haro‘im ’asher lo uwayalquT weqale‘o weyado; wayigash ’el hapelishti. 
1_samuel 17:41	wayeilekh hapelishti, holeikh weqareiw ’el dawid; weha’ish nosei hazinah lefanaw. 
1_samuel 17:42	wayabeiT hapelishti wayir’eh ’et dawid wayiwceihu; ki hayah na‘ar, we’admoni ‘im yefeih mar’eh. 
1_samuel 17:43	wayomer hapelishti ’el dawid, hakhelew ’anokhi, ki ’atah wa ’eilay bamaqlot; wayqaleil hapelishti ’et dawid beilohaw. 
1_samuel 17:44	wayomer hapelishti ’el dawid; lekhah ’eilay, we’etenah ’et besarekha, le‘of hashamayim ulewehemat hasadeh.
1_samuel 17:45	wayomer dawid ’el hapelishti, ’atah ba ’eilay, beHerew uwaHanit uwekhidon; we’anokhi wa ’eilekha, besheim yhoh zewa’ot, ’elohei ma‘arkhot yisra’eil ’asher Heirafta. 
1_samuel 17:46	hayom hacceh yesagerkha yhoh beyadi wehikitikha, wahasiroti ’et roshekha mei‘alekha, wenatati peger maHaneih felishtim hayom hacceh, le‘of hashamayim uleHayat ha’arez; weyeide‘u kal ha’arez, ki yeish ’elohim leyisra’eil. 
1_samuel 17:47	weyeide‘u kal haqahal hacceh, ki lo beHerew uwaHanit yehoshia‘ yhoh; ki yhoh hamilHamah, wenatan ’etkhem beyadeinu. 
1_samuel 17:48	wehayah ki qam hapelishti, wayeilekh wayiqraw liqrat dawid; waymaheir dawid, wayaraz hama‘arakhah liqrat hapelishti. 
1_samuel 17:49	wayishlaH dawid ’et yado ’el hakeli, wayiqaH misham ’ewen wayqala‘, wayakh ’et hapelishti ’el mizHo; watiTba‘ ha’ewen bemizHo, wayipol ‘al panaw ’arezah. 
1_samuel 17:50	wayeHecaq dawid min hapelishti baqela‘ uwa’ewen, wayakh ’et hapelishti waymiteihu; weHerew ’ein beyad dawid. 
1_samuel 17:51	wayaraz dawid waya‘amod ’el hapelishti wayiqaH ’et Harbo wayishlefah mita‘rah waymoteteihu, wayikhrat bah ’et rosho; wayir’u hapelishtim ki meit giboram wayanusu. 
1_samuel 17:52	wayaqumu ’anshei yisra’eil wihudah wayari‘u, wayirdefu ’et hapelishtim, ‘ad bo’akha gay, we‘ad sha‘arei ‘eqron; wayipelu Halei felishtim bederekh sha‘arayim, we‘ad gat we‘ad ‘eqron. 
1_samuel 17:53	wayashuwu benei yisra’eil, mideloq ’aHarei felishtim; wayashossu ’et maHaneihem. 
1_samuel 17:54	wayiqaH dawid ’et rosh hapelishti, waywi’eihu yerushalim; we’et keilaw sam be’aholo.
1_samuel 17:55	wekhir’ot sha’ul ’et dawid, yozei liqrat hapelishti, ’amar, ’el ’awneir sar hazawa, ben mi ceh hana‘ar ’awneir; wayomer ’awneir, Hei nafshekha hamelekh ’im yada‘eti. 
1_samuel 17:56	wayomer hamelekh; she’al ’atah, ben mi ceh ha‘alem.
1_samuel 17:57	ukheshuw dawid, meihakot ’et hapelishti, wayiqaH ’oto ’awneir, waywi’eihu lifnei sha’ul; werosh hapelishti beyado. 
1_samuel 17:58	wayomer ’eilaw sha’ul, ben mi ’atah hana‘ar; wayomer dawid, ben ‘awdekha yishay beit halaHmi. 
1_samuel 18:1	wayhi, kekhaloto ledabeir ’el sha’ul, wenefesh yehonatan, niqsherah benefesh dawid; waye’ehawo waye’ehaweihu yehonatan kenafsho. 
1_samuel 18:2	wayiqaHeihu sha’ul bayom hahu; welo netano, lashuw beit ’awiw. 
1_samuel 18:3	wayikhrot yehonatan wedawid berit; be’ahawato ’oto kenafsho. 
1_samuel 18:4	wayitpasheiT yehonatan, ’et hame‘il ’asher ‘alaw, wayiteneihu ledawid; umadaw we‘ad Harbo we‘ad qashto we‘ad Hagoro. 
1_samuel 18:5	wayeizei dawid bekhol ’asher yishlaHenu sha’ul yaskil, waysimeihu sha’ul, ‘al ’anshei hamilHamah; wayiTaw be‘einei khal ha‘am, wegam be‘einei ‘awdei sha’ul.
1_samuel 18:6	wayhi bewo’am, beshuw dawid meihakot ’et hapelishti, wateizenah hanashim mikal ‘arei yisra’eil lashor lashir wehameHolot, liqrat sha’ul hamelekh; betupim besimHah uweshalishim. 
1_samuel 18:7	wata‘anenah hanashim hamsaHaqot watomarna; hikah sha’ul ba’elfo ba’alafaw, wedawid beriwwotaw. 
1_samuel 18:8	wayiHar lesha’ul me’od, wayeira‘ be‘einaw hadawar hacceh, wayomer, natenu ledawid rewawot, weli natenu ha’alafim; we‘od lo ’akh hamelukhah. 
1_samuel 18:9	wayhi sha’ul ‘awon ‘oyein ’et dawid; meihayom hahu wahale’ah.
1_samuel 18:10	wayhi mimaHorat, watizlaH ruaH ’elohim ra‘ah ’el sha’ul wayitnabei wetokh habayit, wedawid menagein beyado keyom beyom; wehaHanit beyad sha’ul. 
1_samuel 18:11	wayaTel sha’ul ’et haHanit, wayomer ’akeh wedawid uwaqir; wayissow dawid mipanaw pa‘amayim. 
1_samuel 18:12	wayira sha’ul milifnei dawid; ki hayah yhoh ‘imo, umei‘im sha’ul sar. 
1_samuel 18:13	waysireihu sha’ul mei‘imo, waysimeihu lo sar ’alef; wayeizei wayawo lifnei ha‘am.
1_samuel 18:14	wayhi dawid lekhal darekhaw maskil; yhoh ‘imo. 
1_samuel 18:15	wayar sha’ul, ’asher hu maskil me’od; wayagar mipanaw. 
1_samuel 18:16	wekhal yisra’eil wihudah, ’oheiw ’et dawid; ki hu yozei wawa lifneihem.
1_samuel 18:17	wayomer sha’ul ’el dawid, hineih witi hagedolah meiraw ’otah ’eten lekha le’ishah, ’akh heyeih li lewen Hayil, wehilaHeim milHamot yhoh; wesha’ul ’amar, ’al tehi yadi bo, utehi wo yad pelishtim.
1_samuel 18:18	wayomer dawid ’el sha’ul, mi ’anokhi umi Hayay, mishpaHat ’awi beyisra’eil; ki ’ehyeh Hatan lamelekh. 
1_samuel 18:19	wayhi, be‘eit teit ’et meiraw bat sha’ul ledawid; wehi nitenah le‘adri’eil hameHolati le’ishah. 
1_samuel 18:20	wate’ehaw mikhal bat sha’ul ’et dawid; wayagidu lesha’ul, wayishar hadawar be‘einaw. 
1_samuel 18:21	wayomer sha’ul ’etenenah lo utehi lo lemoqeish, utehi wo yad pelishtim; wayomer sha’ul ’el dawid, bishtayim titHatein bi hayom. 
1_samuel 18:22	wayzaw sha’ul ’et ‘awadaw, daberu ’el dawid balaT leimor, hineih Hafeiz bekha hamelekh, wekhal ‘awadaw ’aheiwukha; we‘atah hitHatein bamelekh. 
1_samuel 18:23	waydaberu ‘awdei sha’ul be’acenei dawid, ’et hadewarim ha’eileh; wayomer dawid, hanqalah we‘eineikhem hitHatein bamelekh, we’anokhi ’ish rash weniqleh. 
1_samuel 18:24	wayagidu ‘awdei sha’ul lo leimor; kadewarim ha’eileh diber dawid.
1_samuel 18:25	wayomer sha’ul koh tomeru ledawid, ’ein Heifez lamelekh bemohar, ki, bemei’ah ‘arelot pelishtim, lehinaqeim be’oyewei hamelekh; wesha’ul Hashaw, lehapil ’et dawid beyad pelishtim. 
1_samuel 18:26	wayagidu ‘awadaw ledawid ’et hadewarim ha’eileh, wayishar hadawar be‘einei dawid, lehitHatein bamelekh; welo male’u hayamim. 
1_samuel 18:27	wayaqam dawid wayeilekh hu wa’anashaw, wayakh bapelishtim matayim ’ish wayawei dawid ’et ‘areloteihem, waymal’um lamelekh, lehitHatein bamelekh; wayiten lo sha’ul ’et mikhal bito le’ishah.
1_samuel 18:28	wayar sha’ul wayeida‘, ki yhoh ‘im dawid; umikhal bat sha’ul ’aheiwathu. 
1_samuel 18:29	wayosef sha’ul, leiro mipenei dawid ‘od; wayhi sha’ul ’oyeiw ’et dawid kal hayamim.
1_samuel 18:30	wayeize’u sarei felishtim; wayhi midei zeitam, sakhal dawid mikol ‘awdei sha’ul, wayiqar shemo me’od.
1_samuel 19:1	waydabeir sha’ul, ’el yonatan beno we’el kal ‘awadaw, lehamit ’et dawid; wihonatan ben sha’ul, Hafeiz bedawid me’od. 
1_samuel 19:2	wayageid yehonatan ledawid leimor, mewaqeish sha’ul ’awi lahamitekha; we‘atah hishamer na waboqer, weyashawta wasseiter wenaHbeita. 
1_samuel 19:3	wa’ani ’eizei we‘amadti leyad ’awi, basadeh ’asher ’atah sham, wa’ani ’adabeir bekha ’el ’awi; wera’iti mah wehigadti lakh.
1_samuel 19:4	waydabeir yehonatan bedawid Tow, ’el sha’ul ’awiw; wayomer ’eilaw ’al yeHeTa hamelekh be‘awdo wedawid, ki lo HaTa lakh, wekhi ma‘asaw Tow lekha me’od. 
1_samuel 19:5	wayasem ’et nafsho wekhapo wayakh ’et hapelishti, waya‘as yhoh teshu‘ah gedolah lekhal yisra’eil, ra’ita watismaH; welamah teHeTa bedam naqi, lehamit ’et dawid Hinam. 
1_samuel 19:6	wayishma‘ sha’ul beqol yehonatan; wayishawa‘ sha’ul, Hay yhoh ’im yumat. 
1_samuel 19:7	wayiqra yehonatan ledawid, wayaged lo yehonatan, ’eit kal hadewarim ha’eileh; wayawei yehonatan ’et dawid ’el sha’ul, wayhi lefanaw ke’etmol shilshom.
1_samuel 19:8	watosef hamilHamah lihyot; wayeizei dawid wayilaHem bapelishtim, wayakh bahem makah gedolah, wayanusu mipanaw. 
1_samuel 19:9	watehi ruaH yhoh ra‘ah ’el sha’ul, wehu beweito yosheiw, waHanito beyado; wedawid menagein beyad. 
1_samuel 19:10	waywaqeish sha’ul lehakot baHanit bedawid uwaqir, wayifTar mipenei sha’ul, wayakh ’et haHanit baqir; wedawid nas wayimaleiT balaylah hu.
1_samuel 19:11	wayishlaH sha’ul mal’akhim ’el beit dawid leshamero, welahamito baboqer; watageid ledawid, mikhal ’ishto leimor, ’im ’einekha memaleiT ’et nafshekha halaylah, maHar ’atah mumat. 
1_samuel 19:12	watored mikhal ’et dawid be‘ad haHalon; wayeilekh wayiwraH wayimaleiT. 
1_samuel 19:13	watiqaH mikhal ’et haterafim, watasem ’el hamiTah, we’eit kewir ha‘iccim, samah mera’ashotaw; watekhas babaged.
1_samuel 19:14	wayishlaH sha’ul mal’akhim laqaHat ’et dawid; watomer Holeh hu.
1_samuel 19:15	wayishlaH sha’ul ’et hamal’akhim, lir’ot ’et dawid leimor; ha‘alu ’oto wamiTah ’eilay lahamito. 
1_samuel 19:16	wayawo’u hamal’akhim, wehineih haterafim ’el hamiTah; ukhewir ha‘iccim mera’ashotaw. 
1_samuel 19:17	wayomer sha’ul ’el mikhal, lamah kakhah rimitini, wateshaleHi ’et ’oyewi wayimaleiT; watomer mikhal ’el sha’ul, hu ’amar ’eilay shaleHini lamah ’amiteikh. 
1_samuel 19:18	wedawid baraH wayimaleiT, wayawo ’el shemu’eil haramatah, wayaged lo, ’eit kal ’asher ‘asah lo sha’ul; wayeilekh hu ushemu’eil, wayeishewu benoit benayot. 
1_samuel 19:19	wayugad lesha’ul leimor; hineih dawid, benoit benayot baramah. 
1_samuel 19:20	wayishlaH sha’ul mal’akhim laqaHat ’et dawid wayar, ’et lahaqat hanewi’im nibe’im, ushemu’eil ‘omeid nizaw ‘aleihem; watehi ‘al mal’akhei sha’ul ruaH ’elohim, wayitnabe’u gam heimah. 
1_samuel 19:21	wayagidu lesha’ul, wayishlaH mal’akhim ’aHeirim, wayitnabe’u gam heimah; wayosef sha’ul, wayishlaH mal’akhim shelishim, wayitnabe’u gam heimah. 
1_samuel 19:22	wayeilekh gam hu haramatah, wayawo ‘ad bor hagadol ’asher basekhu, wayish’al wayomer, ’eifoh shemu’eil wedawid; wayomer hineih benoit benayot baramah. 
1_samuel 19:23	wayeilekh sham, ’el noit nayot baramah; watehi ‘alaw gam hu ruaH ’elohim, wayeilekh halokh wayitnabei, ‘ad bo’o benoit benayot baramah. 
1_samuel 19:24	wayifshaT gam hu begadaw, wayitnabei gam hu lifnei shemu’eil, wayipol ‘arom, kal hayom hahu wekhal halayelah; ‘al kein yomeru, hagam sha’ul banewi’im.
1_samuel 20:1	wayiwraH dawid, minoiwt minayot baramah; wayawo wayomer lifnei yehonatan, meh ‘asiti meh ‘awoni umeh HaTati lifnei ’awikha, ki mewaqeish ’et nafshi. 
1_samuel 20:2	wayomer lo Halilah lo tamut hineih lo ‘asah lo ya‘aseh ’awi dawar gadol, ’o dawar qaTon, welo yigleh ’et ’aceni; umadua‘ yastir ’awi mimeni ’et hadawar hacceh ’ein cot. 
1_samuel 20:3	wayishawa‘ ‘od dawid, wayomer yadoa‘ yada‘ ’awikha, ki mazati Hein be‘einekha, wayomer ’al yeida‘ cot yehonatan pen yei‘azeiw; we’ulam, Hay yhoh weHei nafshekha, ki khefesa‘, beini uwein hamawet. 
1_samuel 20:4	wayomer yehonatan ’el dawid; mah tomar nafshekha we’e‘eseh lakh.
1_samuel 20:5	wayomer dawid ’el yehonatan, hineih Hodesh maHar, we’anokhi yashow ’eisheiw ‘im hamelekh le’ekhol; weshilaHtani wenistarti wasadeh, ‘ad ha‘erew hashelishit. 
1_samuel 20:6	’im paqod yifqedeini ’awikha; we’amarta, nish’ol nish’al mimeni dawid laruz beit leHem ‘iro, ki cewaH hayamim sham lekhal hamishpaHah. 
1_samuel 20:7	’im koh yomar Tow shalom le‘awdekha; we’im Haroh yeHereh lo, da‘ ki khaletah hara‘ah mei‘imo. 
1_samuel 20:8	we‘asita Hesed ‘al ‘awdekha, ki biwrit yhoh, heiweita ’et ‘awdekha ‘imakh; we’im yesh bi ‘awon hamiteini ’atah, we‘ad ’awikha lamah ceh tewi’eini.
1_samuel 20:9	wayomer yehonatan Halilah lakh; ki ’im yadoa‘ ’eida‘, ki khaletah hara‘ah mei‘im ’awi lawo ‘alekha, welo ’otah ’agid lakh.
1_samuel 20:10	wayomer dawid ’el yehonatan, mi yagid li; ’o mah ya‘ankha ’awikha qashah.
1_samuel 20:11	wayomer yehonatan ’el dawid, lekhah weneizei hasadeh; wayeize’u sheneihem hasadeh.
1_samuel 20:12	wayomer yehonatan ’el dawid, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil ki ’eHqor ’et ’awi, ka‘eit maHar hashelishit, wehineih Tow ’el dawid; welo ’ac ’eshlaH ’eilekha, wegaliti ’et ’acenekha. 
1_samuel 20:13	koh ya‘aseh yhoh lihonatan wekhoh yosif, ki yeiTiw ’el ’awi ’et hara‘ah ‘alekha, wegaliti ’et ’acenekha, weshilaHtikha wehalakhta leshalom; wihi yhoh ‘imakh, ka’asher hayah ‘im ’awi. 
1_samuel 20:14	welo ’im ‘odeni Hay; welo ta‘aseh ‘imadi Hesed yhoh welo ’amut. 
1_samuel 20:15	welo takhrit ’et Hasdekha mei‘im beiti ‘ad ‘olam; welo, behakhrit yhoh ’et ’oyewei dawid, ’ish mei‘al penei ha’adamah. 
1_samuel 20:16	wayikhrot yehonatan ‘im beit dawid; uwiqeish yhoh, miyad ’oyewei dawid. 
1_samuel 20:17	wayosef yehonatan lehashbia‘ ’et dawid, be’ahawato ’oto; ki ’ahawat nafsho ’aheiwo.
1_samuel 20:18	wayomer lo yehonatan maHar Hodesh; wenifqadta ki yipaqeid moshawekha. 
1_samuel 20:19	weshilashta teireid me’od, uwata ’el hamaqom, ’asher nistarta sham beyom hama‘aseh; weyashawta, ’eizel ha’ewen ha’acel. 
1_samuel 20:20	wa’ani sheloshet haHizim zidah ’oreh; leshalaH li lemaTarah. 
1_samuel 20:21	wehineih ’eshlaH ’et hana‘ar, leikh meza ’et haHizim; ’im ’amor ’omar lana‘ar hineih haHizim mimekha waheinah, qaHenu wawo’ah ki shalom lekha we’ein dawar Hay yhoh. 
1_samuel 20:22	we’im koh ’omar la‘elem, hineih haHizim mimekha wahale’ah; leikh ki shilaHakha yhoh. 
1_samuel 20:23	wehadawar, ’asher dibarnu ’ani wa’atah; hineih yhoh beini uweinekha ‘ad ‘olam.
1_samuel 20:24	wayissateir dawid basadeh; wayhi haHodesh, wayeishew hamelekh ‘al ’el haleHem le’ekhol. 
1_samuel 20:25	wayeishew hamelekh ‘al moshawo kefa‘am befa‘am, ’el moshaw haqir, wayaqam yehonatan, wayeishew ’awneir mizad sha’ul; wayipaqeid meqom dawid. 
1_samuel 20:26	welo diber sha’ul me’umah bayom hahu; ki ’amar miqreh hu, bilti Tahor hu ki lo Tahor.
1_samuel 20:27	wayhi, mimaHorat haHodesh hasheini, wayipaqeid meqom dawid; s wayomer sha’ul ’el yehonatan beno, madua‘ lo wa wen yishay gam temol gam hayom ’el halaHem. 
1_samuel 20:28	waya‘an yehonatan ’et sha’ul; nish’ol nish’al dawid mei‘imadi ‘ad beit laHem. 
1_samuel 20:29	wayomer shaleHeini na ki cewaH mishpaHah lanu ba‘ir, wehu ziwwah li ’aHi, we‘atah, ’im mazati Hein be‘einekha, ’imaleTah na we’er’eh ’et ’eHay; ‘al kein lo wa, ’el shulHan hamelekh.
1_samuel 20:30	wayiHar ’af sha’ul bihonatan, wayomer lo, ben na‘awat hamardut; halo yada‘ti, ki woHeir ’atah lewen yishay, lewashetekha, ulewoshet ‘erwat ’imekha. 
1_samuel 20:31	ki khal hayamim, ’asher ben yishay Hay ‘al ha’adamah, lo tikon ’atah umalkhutekha; we‘atah, shelaH weqaH ’oto ’eilay, ki wen mawet hu.
1_samuel 20:32	waya‘an yehonatan, ’et sha’ul ’awiw; wayomer ’eilaw lamah yumat meh ‘asah. 
1_samuel 20:33	wayaTel sha’ul ’et haHanit ‘alaw lehakoto; wayeida‘ yehonatan, ki khalah hi mei‘im ’awiw lehamit ’et dawid.
1_samuel 20:34	wayaqam yehonatan mei‘im hashulHan baHori ’af; welo ’akhal beyom haHodesh hasheini leHem, ki ne‘zaw ’el dawid, ki hikhlimo ’awiw.
1_samuel 20:35	wayhi waboqer, wayeizei yehonatan hasadeh lemo‘eid dawid; wena‘ar qaTon ‘imo. 
1_samuel 20:36	wayomer lena‘aro, ruz, meza na ’et haHizim, ’asher ’anokhi moreh; hana‘ar raz, wehu yarah haHeizi leha‘awiro. 
1_samuel 20:37	wayawo hana‘ar ‘ad meqom haHeizi, ’asher yarah yehonatan; wayiqra yehonatan ’aHarei hana‘ar wayomer, halo haHeizi mimekha wahale’ah. 
1_samuel 20:38	wayiqra yehonatan ’aHarei hana‘ar, meheirah Hushah ’al ta‘amod; waylaqeiT na‘ar yehonatan ’et haHeizi haHizim, wayawo ’el ’adonaw. 
1_samuel 20:39	wehana‘ar lo yada‘ me’umah; ’akh yehonatan wedawid, yade‘u ’et hadawar. 
1_samuel 20:40	wayitein yehonatan ’et keilaw, ’el hana‘ar ’asher lo; wayomer lo, leikh hawei ha‘ir. 
1_samuel 20:41	hana‘ar ba wedawid, qam mei’eizel hanegew, wayipol le’apaw ’arzah wayishtaHu shalosh pe‘amim; wayishequ ’ish ’et rei‘eihu, wayiwku ’ish ’et rei‘eihu, ‘ad dawid higdil. 
1_samuel 20:42	wayomer yehonatan ledawid leikh leshalom; ’asher nishba‘nu sheneinu ’anaHnu, besheim yhoh leimor, yhoh yihyeh beini uweinekha, uwein car‘i uwein car‘akha ‘ad ‘olam.
1_samuel 21:1	wayaqam wayeilakh; wihonatan ba ha‘ir. 
1_samuel 21:2	wayawo dawid noweh, ’el ’aHimelekh hakohein; wayeHerad ’aHimelekh liqrat dawid, wayomer lo madua‘ ’atah lewadekha, we’ish ’ein ’itakh. 
1_samuel 21:3	wayomer dawid la’aHimelekh hakohein, hamelekh ziwwani dawar wayomer ’eilay, ’ish ’al yeida‘ me’umah ’et hadawar ’asher ’anokhi sholeiHakha wa’asher ziwwitikha; we’et hane‘arim yoda‘ti, ’el meqom peloni ’almoni. 
1_samuel 21:4	we‘atah, mah yeish taHat yadekha Hamishah leHem tenah weyadi; ’o hanimza. 
1_samuel 21:5	waya‘an hakohein ’et dawid wayomer, ’ein leHem Hol ’el taHat yadi; ki ’im leHem qodesh yeish, ’im nishmeru hane‘arim ’akh mei’ishah.
1_samuel 21:6	waya‘an dawid ’et hakohein wayomer lo, ki ’im ’ishah ‘azurah lanu kitmol shilshom, bezeiti wayihyu khelei hane‘arim qodesh; wehu derekh Hol, we’af ki hayom yiqdash bakeli. 
1_samuel 21:7	wayiten lo hakohein qodesh; ki lo hayah sham leHem, ki ’im leHem hapanim hamusarim milifnei yhoh, lasum leHem Hom, beyom hilaqeHo. 
1_samuel 21:8	wesham ’ish mei‘awdei sha’ul bayom hahu, ne‘zar lifnei yhoh, ushemo do’eig ha’adomi; ’abir haro‘im ’asher lesha’ul. 
1_samuel 21:9	wayomer dawid la’aHimelekh, we’in yesh poh taHat yadekha Hanit ’o Harew; ki gam Harbi wegam keilay lo laqaHti weyadi, ki hayah dewar hamelekh naHuz.
1_samuel 21:10	wayomer hakohein, Herew galeyat hapelishti ’asher hikita be‘eimeq ha’eilah, hineih hi luTah wasimlah ’aHarei ha’eifod ’im ’otah tiqaH lekha qaH, ki ’ein ’aHeret culatah baceh; wayomer dawid ’ein kamoha tenenah li. 
1_samuel 21:11	wayaqam dawid, wayiwraH bayom hahu mipenei sha’ul; wayawo ’el ’akhish melekh gat. 
1_samuel 21:12	wayomeru ‘awdei ’akhish ’eilaw, halo ceh dawid melekh ha’arez; halo laceh, ya‘anu wameHolot leimor, hikah sha’ul ba’alafo ba’alafaw, wedawid beriwwoto beriwwotaw. 
1_samuel 21:13	wayasem dawid ’et hadewarim ha’eileh bilwawo; wayira me’od, mipenei ’akhish melekh gat. 
1_samuel 21:14	wayshano ’et Ta‘mo be‘eineihem, wayitholeil beyadam; waytaw waytaw ‘al daltot hasha‘ar, wayored riro ’el ceqano. 
1_samuel 21:15	wayomer ’akhish ’el ‘awadaw; hineih tir’u ’ish mishtageia‘, lamah tawi’u ’oto ’eilay. Hasar meshuga‘im ’ani, ki haweitem ’et ceh, lehishtageia‘ ‘alay; haceh yawo ’el beiti.
1_samuel 22:1	wayeilekh dawid misham, wayimaleiT ’el me‘arat ‘adulam; wayishme‘u ’eHaw wekhal beit ’awiw, wayeiredu ’eilaw shamah. 
1_samuel 22:2	wayitqabezu ’eilaw kal ’ish mazoq wekhal ’ish ’asher lo noshe wekhal ’ish mar nefesh, wayhi ‘aleihem lesar; wayihyu ‘imo, ke’arba‘ mei’ot ’ish. 
1_samuel 22:3	wayeilekh dawid misham mizpeih mo’aw; wayomer ’el melekh mo’aw, yeizei na ’awi we’imi ’itekhem, ‘ad ’asher ’eida‘, mah ya‘aseh li ’elohim. 
1_samuel 22:4	wayanHeim ’et penei melekh mo’aw; wayeishewu ‘imo, kal yemei heyot dawid bamezudah.
1_samuel 22:5	wayomer gad hanawi ’el dawid, lo teisheiw bamezudah, leikh uwata lekha ’erez yehudah; wayeilekh dawid, wayawo ya‘ar Haret.
1_samuel 22:6	wayishma‘ sha’ul, ki noda‘ dawid, wa’anashim ’asher ’ito; wesha’ul yosheiw bagiw‘ah taHat ha’eshel baramah waHanito weyado, wekhal ‘awadaw nizawim ‘alaw. 
1_samuel 22:7	wayomer sha’ul, la‘awadaw hanizawim ‘alaw, shim‘u na benei yemini; gam lekhulekhem, yitein ben yishay sadot ukheramim, lekhulekhem yasim, sarei ’alafim wesarei mei’ot. 
1_samuel 22:8	ki qeshartem kulekhem ‘alay, we’ein goleh ’et ’aceni bikhrat beni ‘im ben yishay, we’ein Holeh mikem ‘alay wegoleh ’et ’aceni; ki heiqim beni ’et ‘awdi ‘alay le’oreiw kayom hacceh.
1_samuel 22:9	waya‘an do’eig ha’adomi, wehu nizaw ‘al ‘awdei sha’ul wayomar; ra’iti ’et ben yishay, ba noweh, ’el ’aHimelekh ben ’aHiTuw. 
1_samuel 22:10	wayish’al lo yhoh, wezeidah natan lo; we’eit, Herew galeyat hapelishti natan lo. 
1_samuel 22:11	wayishlaH hamelekh liqro ’et ’aHimelekh ben ’aHiTuw hakohein, we’eit kal beit ’awiw hakohanim ’asher benow; wayawo’u khulam ’el hamelekh.
1_samuel 22:12	wayomer sha’ul, shema‘ na ben ’aHiTuw; wayomer hini ’adoni. 
1_samuel 22:13	wayomer ’eilo ’eilaw sha’ul, lamah qeshartem ‘alay, ’atah uwen yishay; betitekha lo leHem weHerew, wesha’ol lo beilohim, laqum ’eilay le’oreiw kayom hacceh.
1_samuel 22:14	waya‘an ’aHimelekh ’et hamelekh wayomar; umi wekhal ‘awadekha kedawid ne’eman, waHatan hamelekh wesar ’el mishma‘tekha wenikhbad beweitekha. 
1_samuel 22:15	hayom haHiloti lesha’ol lish’al lo weilohim Halilah li; ’al yaseim hamelekh be‘awdo dawar bekhal beit ’awi, ki lo yada‘ ‘awdekha bekhal cot, dawar qaTon ’o gadol. 
1_samuel 22:16	wayomer hamelekh, mot tamut ’aHimelekh; ’atah wekhal beit ’awikha. 
1_samuel 22:17	wayomer hamelekh larazim hanizawim ‘alaw sobu wehamitu kohanei yhoh ki gam yadam ‘im dawid, wekhi yade‘u ki woreiaH hu, welo galu ’et ’aceno ’aceni; welo ’awu ‘awdei hamelekh lishloaH ’et yadam, lifgoa‘ bekhohanei yhoh.
1_samuel 22:18	wayomer hamelekh ledoyeig ledo’eig, sow ’atah, ufega‘ bakohanim; wayissow doyeig do’eig ha’adomi, wayifga‘ hu bakohanim, wayamet bayom hahu, shemonim waHamishah ’ish, nosei ’eifod bad. 
1_samuel 22:19	we’eit now ‘ir hakohanim hikah lefi Herew, mei’ish we‘ad ’ishah, mei‘oleil we‘ad yoneiq; weshor waHamor waseh lefi Harew. 
1_samuel 22:20	wayimaleiT bein ’eHad, la’aHimelekh ben ’aHiTuw, ushemo ’ewyatar; wayiwraH ’aHarei dawid. 
1_samuel 22:21	wayageid ’ewyatar ledawid; ki harag sha’ul, ’eit kohanei yhoh. 
1_samuel 22:22	wayomer dawid le’ewyatar, yada‘ti bayom hahu ki sham doyeig do’eig ha’adomi, ki hageid yagid lesha’ul; ’anokhi saboti, bekhal nefesh beit ’awikha. 
1_samuel 22:23	shewah ’iti ’al tira, ki ’asher yewaqeish ’et nafshi yewaqeish ’et nafshekha; ki mishmeret ’atah ‘imadi. 
1_samuel 23:1	wayagidu ledawid leimor; hineih felishtim nilHamim biq‘ilah, weheimah shosim ’et hagoranot. 
1_samuel 23:2	wayish’al dawid yhoh leimor, ha’eileikh wehikeiti, bapelishtim ha’eileh; s wayomer yhoh ’el dawid, leikh wehikita wapelishtim, wehosha‘ta ’et qe‘ilah. 
1_samuel 23:3	wayomeru ’anshei dawid ’eilaw, hineih ’anaHnu foh bihudah yerei’im; we’af ki neileikh qe‘ilah, ’el ma‘arkhot pelishtim.
1_samuel 23:4	wayosef ‘od dawid lish’ol yhoh, s waya‘aneihu yhoh; wayomer, qum reid qe‘ilah, ki ’ani notein ’et pelishtim beyadekha. 
1_samuel 23:5	wayeilekh dawid wa’insho wa’anashaw qe‘ilah wayilaHem bapelishtim, wayinhag ’et miqneihem, wayakh bahem makah gedolah; wayosha‘ dawid, ’eit yoshewei qe‘ilah.
1_samuel 23:6	wayhi, biwroaH ’ewyatar ben ’aHimelekh ’el dawid qe‘ilah; ’eifod yarad beyado. 
1_samuel 23:7	wayugad lesha’ul, ki wa dawid qe‘ilah; wayomer sha’ul, nikar ’oto ’elohim beyadi, ki nisgar lawo, be‘ir delatayim uweriaH. 
1_samuel 23:8	wayshama‘ sha’ul ’et kal ha‘am lamilHamah; laredet qe‘ilah, lazur ’el dawid we’el ’anashaw. 
1_samuel 23:9	wayeida‘ dawid, ki ‘alaw, sha’ul maHarish hara‘ah; wayomer ’el ’ewyatar hakohein, hagishah ha’eifod.
1_samuel 23:10	wayomer dawid yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, shamoa‘ shama‘ ‘awdekha, ki mewaqeish sha’ul lawo ’el qe‘ilah; leshaHeit la‘ir ba‘awuri. 
1_samuel 23:11	hayasgiruni wa‘alei qe‘ilah weyado hayeireid sha’ul, ka’asher shama‘ ‘awdekha, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, haged na le‘awdekha; s wayomer yhoh yeireid. 
1_samuel 23:12	wayomer dawid, hayasgiru ba‘alei qe‘ilah ’oti we’et ’anashay beyad sha’ul; wayomer yhoh yasgiru.
1_samuel 23:13	wayaqam dawid wa’anashaw kesheish mei’ot ’ish, wayeize’u miqe‘ilah, wayithalekhu ba’asher yithalakhu; ulesha’ul hugad, ki nimlaT dawid miqe‘ilah, wayeHdal lazeit. 
1_samuel 23:14	wayeishew dawid bamidbar bamezadot, wayeishew bahar bemidbar cif; waywaqsheihu sha’ul kal hayamim, welo netano ’elohim beyado. 
1_samuel 23:15	wayar dawid, ki yaza sha’ul lewaqeish ’et nafsho; wedawid bemidbar cif baHoreshah.
1_samuel 23:16	wayaqam yehonatan ben sha’ul, wayeilekh ’el dawid Horeshah; wayHacceiq ’et yado beilohim. 
1_samuel 23:17	wayomer ’eilaw ’al tira, ki lo timza’akha yad sha’ul ’awi, we’atah timlokh ‘al yisra’eil, we’anokhi ’ehyeh lekha lemishneh; wegam sha’ul ’awi yodeia‘ kein. 
1_samuel 23:18	wayikhretu sheneihem berit lifnei yhoh; wayeishew dawid baHoreshah, wihonatan halakh leweito.
1_samuel 23:19	waya‘alu cifim ’el sha’ul, hagiw‘atah leimor; halo dawid mistateir ‘imanu wamezadot baHoreshah, begiw‘at haHakhilah, ’asher mimin hayshimon. 
1_samuel 23:20	we‘atah lekhal ’awwat nafshekha hamelekh laredet reid; welanu hasgiro beyad hamelekh. 
1_samuel 23:21	wayomer sha’ul, berukhim ’atem yhoh; ki Hamaltem ‘alay. 
1_samuel 23:22	lekhu na hakhinu ‘od, ude‘u ure’u ’et meqomo ’asher tihyeh raglo, mi ra’ahu sham; ki ’amar ’eilay, ‘arom ya‘rim hu. 
1_samuel 23:23	ure’u ude‘u, mikol hamaHawo’im ’asher yitHabei sham, weshawtem ’eilay ’el nakhon, wehalakhti ’itekhem; wehayah ’im yeshno wa’arez, weHipasti ’oto, bekhol ’alfei yehudah. 
1_samuel 23:24	wayaqumu wayeilekhu cifah lifnei sha’ul; wedawid wa’anashaw bemidbar ma‘on ba‘arawah, ’el yemin hayshimon. 
1_samuel 23:25	wayeilekh sha’ul wa’anashaw lewaqeish wayagidu ledawid, wayeired hassela‘, wayeishew bemidbar ma‘on; wayishma‘ sha’ul, wayirdof ’aHarei dawid midbar ma‘on. 
1_samuel 23:26	wayeilekh sha’ul mizad hahar micceh, wedawid wa’anashaw mizad hahar micceh; wayhi dawid neHpac lalekhet mipenei sha’ul, wesha’ul wa’anashaw, ‘oTerim ’el dawid we’el ’anashaw letafesam. 
1_samuel 23:27	umal’akh ba, ’el sha’ul leimor; maharah weleikhah, ki fasheTu felishtim ‘al ha’arez. 
1_samuel 23:28	wayashaw sha’ul, mirdof ’aHarei dawid, wayeilekh liqrat pelishtim; ‘al kein, qare’u lamaqom hahu, sela‘ hamaHleqot. 
1_samuel 23:29	waya‘al dawid misham; wayeishew bimzadot ‘ein gedi. 
1_samuel 24:1	wayhi, ka’asher shaw sha’ul, mei’aHarei pelishtim; wayagidu lo leimor, hineih dawid, bemidbar ‘ein gedi.
1_samuel 24:2	wayiqaH sha’ul, sheloshet ’alafim ’ish baHur mikal yisra’eil; wayeilekh, lewaqeish ’et dawid wa’anashaw, ‘al penei zurei haye‘eilim. 
1_samuel 24:3	wayawo ’el gidrot hazon ‘al haderekh wesham me‘arah, wayawo sha’ul lehaseikh ’et raglaw; wedawid wa’anashaw, beyarketei hame‘arah yoshewim. 
1_samuel 24:4	wayomeru ’anshei dawid ’eilaw, hineih hayom ’asher ’amar yhoh ’eilekha, hineih ’anokhi notein ’et ’oyeweikha ’oyiwkha beyadekha, we‘asita lo, ka’asher yiTaw be‘einekha; wayaqam dawid, wayikhrot ’et kenaf hame‘il ’asher lesha’ul balaT. 
1_samuel 24:5	wayhi ’aHarei khein, wayakh leiw dawid ’oto; ‘al ’asher karat, ’et kanaf ’asher lesha’ul.
1_samuel 24:6	wayomer la’anashaw Halilah li yhoh ’im ’e‘eseh ’et hadawar hacceh ladoni limshiaH yhoh, lishloaH yadi bo; ki meshiaH yhoh hu. 
1_samuel 24:7	wayshassa‘ dawid ’et ’anashaw badewarim, welo netanam laqum ’el sha’ul; wesha’ul qam meihame‘arah wayeilekh badarekh.
1_samuel 24:8	wayaqam dawid ’aHarei khein, wayeizei min hame‘arah meihame‘arah, wayiqra ’aHarei sha’ul leimor ’adoni hamelekh; wayabeiT sha’ul ’aHaraw, wayiqod dawid ’apayim ’arzah wayishtaHu.
1_samuel 24:9	wayomer dawid lesha’ul, lamah tishma‘ ’et diwrei ’adam leimor; hineih dawid, mewaqeish ra‘atekha. 
1_samuel 24:10	hineih hayom hacceh ra’u ‘einekha, ’eit ’asher netanekha yhoh hayom beyadi bame‘arah, we’amar laharagakha wataHas ‘alekha; wa’omar, lo ’eshlaH yadi badoni, ki meshiaH yhoh hu. 
1_samuel 24:11	we’awi re’eih, gam, re’eih ’et kenaf me‘ilekha beyadi; ki bekhareti ’et kenaf me‘ilekha welo haragtikha, da‘ ure’eih ki ’ein beyadi ra‘ah wafesha‘ welo HaTati lakh, we’atah zodeh ’et nafshi leqaHtah. 
1_samuel 24:12	yishpoT yhoh beini uweinekha, uneqamani yhoh mimeka; weyadi lo tihyeh bakh. 
1_samuel 24:13	ka’asher yomar, meshal haqadmoni, meiresha‘im yeizei resha‘; weyadi lo tihyeh bakh. 
1_samuel 24:14	’aHarei mi yaza melekh yisra’eil, ’aHarei mi ’atah rodeif; ’aHarei kelew meit, ’aHarei par‘osh ’eHad. 
1_samuel 24:15	wehayah yhoh ledayan, weshafaT beini uweinekha; weyeire weyareiw ’et riwi, weyishpeTeini miyadekha.
1_samuel 24:16	wayhi kekhalot dawid, ledabeir ’et hadewarim ha’eileh ’el sha’ul, wayomer sha’ul, haqolekha ceh beni dawid; wayisa sha’ul qolo wayeiwek. 
1_samuel 24:17	wayomer ’el dawid, zadiq ’atah mimeni; ki ’atah gemaltani haTowah, wa’ani gemaltikha hara‘ah. 
1_samuel 24:18	we’at we’atah higadta hayom, ’eit ’asher ‘asitah ’iti Towah; ’eit ’asher sigerani yhoh beyadekha welo haragtani. 
1_samuel 24:19	wekhi yimza ’ish ’et ’oyewo, weshileHo bederekh Towah; yhoh yeshalemkha Towah, taHat hayom hacceh, ’asher ‘asitah li. 
1_samuel 24:20	we‘atah hineih yada‘ti, ki malokh timlokh; weqamah beyadekha, mamlekhet yisra’eil. 
1_samuel 24:21	we‘atah, hishawe‘ah li yhoh, ’im takhrit ’et car‘i ’aHaray; we’im tashmid ’et shemi mibeit ’awi. 
1_samuel 24:22	wayishawa‘ dawid lesha’ul; wayeilekh sha’ul ’el beito, wedawid wa’anashaw, ‘alu ‘al hamezudah.
1_samuel 25:1	wayamat shemu’eil, wayiqawezu khal yisra’eil wayispedu lo, wayiqberuhu beweito baramah; wayaqam dawid, wayeired ’el midbar paran.
1_samuel 25:2	we’ish bema‘on uma‘aseihu wakarmel, weha’ish gadol me’od, welo zon sheloshet ’alafim we’elef ‘iccim; wayhi bigcoc ’et zono bakarmel. 
1_samuel 25:3	wesheim ha’ish nawal, wesheim ’ishto ’awigayil; weha’ishah Towat sekhel wifat to’ar, weha’ish qasheh wera‘ ma‘alalim wehu khalewo khalibi. 
1_samuel 25:4	wayishma‘ dawid bamidbar; ki goceic nawal ’et zono. 
1_samuel 25:5	wayishlaH dawid ‘asarah ne‘arim; wayomer dawid lane‘arim, ‘alu kharmelah uwatem ’el nawal, ushe’eltem lo wishmi leshalom. 
1_samuel 25:6	wa’amartem koh leHay; we’atah shalom uweitekha shalom, wekhol ’asher lekha shalom. 
1_samuel 25:7	we‘atah shama‘ti, ki gocecim lakh; ‘atah, haro‘im ’asher lekha hayu ‘imanu, lo hekhlamnum, welo nifqad lahem me’umah, kal yemei heyotam bakarmel. 
1_samuel 25:8	she’al ’et ne‘arekha weyagidu lakh, weyimze’u hane‘arim Hein be‘einekha, ki ‘al yom Tow banu; tenah na, ’eit ’asher timza yadekha la‘awadekha, ulewinkha ledawid. 
1_samuel 25:9	wayawo’u na‘arei dawid, waydaberu ’el nawal kekhal hadewarim ha’eileh besheim dawid; wayanuHu. 
1_samuel 25:10	waya‘an nawal ’et ‘awdei dawid wayomer, mi dawid umi wen yishay; hayom rabu ‘awadim, hamitparezim, ’ish mipenei ’adonaw. 
1_samuel 25:11	welaqaHti ’et laHmi we’et meimay, we’eit TiwHati, ’asher TawaHti legocecay; wenatati la’anashim, ’asher lo yada‘ti, ’ei micceh heimah. 
1_samuel 25:12	wayahafkhu na‘arei dawid ledarkam; wayashuwu wayawo’u, wayagidu lo, kekhol hadewarim ha’eileh. 
1_samuel 25:13	wayomer dawid la’anashaw Higru ’ish ’et Harbo, wayaHgeru ’ish ’et Harbo, wayaHgor gam dawid ’et Harbo; waya‘alu ’aHarei dawid, ke’arba‘ mei’ot ’ish, umatayim yashewu ‘al hakeilim. 
1_samuel 25:14	wela’awigayil ’eishet nawal, higid na‘ar ’eHad meihane‘arim leimor; hineih shalaH dawid mal’akhim meihamidbar lewareikh ’et ’adoneinu waya‘aT bahem. 
1_samuel 25:15	weha’anashim, Towim lanu me’od; welo hakhelamnu welo faqadnu me’umah, kal yemei hithalakhnu ’itam, bihyoteinu basadeh. 
1_samuel 25:16	Homah hayu ‘aleinu, gam laylah gam yomam; kal yemei heyoteinu ‘imam ro‘im hazon. 
1_samuel 25:17	we‘atah, de‘i ure’i mah ta‘asi, ki khaletah hara‘ah ’el ’adoneinu we‘al kal beito; wehu ben beliya‘al, midabeir ’eilaw. 
1_samuel 25:18	watemaheir ’awogayil ’awigayil watiqaH matayim leHem ushenayim niwlei yayin, weHameish zon ‘asawot ‘asuyot weHameish se’im qali, umei’ah zimuqim umatayim deweilim; watasem ‘al haHamorim. 
1_samuel 25:19	watomer lin‘areha ‘iwru lefanay, hini ’aHareikhem ba’ah; ule’ishah nawal lo higidah. 
1_samuel 25:20	wehayah hi rokhewet ‘al haHamor, weyoredet beseiter hahar, wehineih dawid wa’anashaw, yoredim liqratah; watifgosh ’otam. 
1_samuel 25:21	wedawid ’amar, ’akh lasheqer shamarti ’et kal ’asher laceh bamidbar, welo nifqad mikal ’asher lo me’umah; wayashew li ra‘ah taHat Towah. 
1_samuel 25:22	koh ya‘aseh ’elohim le’oyewei dawid wekhoh yosif; ’im ’ash’ir mikal ’asher lo ‘ad haboqer mashtin beqir. 
1_samuel 25:23	wateire ’awigayil ’et dawid, watemaheir wateired mei‘al haHamor; watipol le’apei dawid ‘al paneha, watishtaHu ’arez. 
1_samuel 25:24	watipol ‘al raglaw, watomer bi ’ani ’adoni he‘awon; utedaber na ’amatekha be’acenekha, ushema‘ ’eit diwrei ’amatekha. 
1_samuel 25:25	’al na yasim ’adoni ’et libo ’el ’ish habeliya‘al hacceh ‘al nawal, ki khishmo ken hu, nawal shemo, unewalah ‘imo; wa’ani ’amatekha, lo ra’iti ’et na‘arei ’adoni ’asher shalaHeta. 
1_samuel 25:26	we‘atah ’adoni, Hay yhoh weHei nafshekha ’asher mena‘akha yhoh mibo wedamim, wehosheia‘ yadekha lakh; we‘atah, yihyu khenawal ’oyewekha, wehamwaqshim ’el ’adoni ra‘ah. 
1_samuel 25:27	we‘atah haberakhah haccot, ’asher heiwi shifHatekha ladoni; wenitenah lane‘arim, hamithalekhim beraglei ’adoni. 
1_samuel 25:28	sa na lefesha‘ ’amatekha; ki ‘asoh ya‘aseh yhoh ladoni bayit ne’eman, ki milHamot yhoh ’adoni nilHam, wera‘ah lo timazei wekha miyamekha. 
1_samuel 25:29	wayaqam ’adam lirdafekha, ulewaqeish ’et nafshekha; wehayetah nefesh ’adoni zerurah bizror haHayim, ’eit yhoh ’elohekha, we’eit nefesh ’oyewekha yeqale‘enah, betokh kaf haqala‘. 
1_samuel 25:30	wehayah, ki ya‘aseh yhoh ladoni, kekhol ’asher diber ’et haTowah ‘alekha; weziwwekha lenagid ‘al yisra’eil. 
1_samuel 25:31	welo tihyeh cot lekha lefuqah ulemikhshol leiw ladoni, welishpakh dam Hinam, ulehoshia‘ ’adoni lo; weheiTiw yhoh ladoni, wecakharta ’et ’amatekha.
1_samuel 25:32	wayomer dawid la’awigal; barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’asher shelaHeikh hayom hacceh liqrati. 
1_samuel 25:33	uwarukh Ta‘meikh uwerukhah ’at; ’asher kelitini hayom hacceh mibo wedamim, wehosheia‘ yadi li. 
1_samuel 25:34	we’ulam, Hay yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’asher mena‘ani, meihara‘ ’otakh; ki lulei mihart, watawoti watawot liqrati, ki ’im notar lenawal ‘ad ’or haboqer mashtin beqir. 
1_samuel 25:35	wayiqaH dawid miyadah, ’eit ’asher heiwi’ah lo; welah ’amar, ‘ali leshalom leweiteikh, re’i shama‘ti weqoleikh, wa’esa panayikh. 
1_samuel 25:36	watawo ’awigayil ’el nawal wehineih lo mishteh beweito kemishteih hamelekh, weleiw nawal Tow ‘alaw, wehu shikor ‘ad me’od; welo higidah lo, dawar qaTon wegadol ‘ad ’or haboqer. 
1_samuel 25:37	wayhi waboqer, bezeit hayayin minawal, wataged lo ’ishto, ’et hadewarim ha’eileh; wayamat libo beqirbo, wehu hayah le’awen. 
1_samuel 25:38	wayhi ka‘aseret hayamim; wayigof yhoh ’et nawal wayamot. 
1_samuel 25:39	wayishma‘ dawid ki meit nawal wayomer barukh yhoh ’asher raw ’et riw Herpati miyad nawal, we’et ‘awdo Hasakh meira‘ah, we’eit ra‘at nawal, heishiw yhoh berosho; wayishlaH dawid waydabeir ba’awigayil, leqaHtah lo le’ishah. 
1_samuel 25:40	wayawo’u ‘awdei dawid ’el ’awigayil hakarmelah; waydaberu ’eileha leimor, dawid shelaHanu ’eilayikh, leqaHteikh lo le’ishah. 
1_samuel 25:41	wataqam watishtaHu ’apayim ’arezah; watomer, hineih ’amatekha leshifHah, lirHoz raglei ‘awdei ’adoni. 
1_samuel 25:42	watemaheir wataqam ’awigayil, watirkaw ‘al haHamor, weHameish na‘aroteha, haholekhot leraglah; wateilekh, ’aHarei mal’akhei dawid, watehi lo le’ishah. 
1_samuel 25:43	we’et ’aHino‘am laqaH dawid miyicre‘el; watihyena gam sheteihen lo lenashim.
1_samuel 25:44	wesha’ul, natan ’et mikhal bito ’eishet dawid; lefalTi wen layish ’asher migalim. 
1_samuel 26:1	wayawo’u haccifim ’el sha’ul, hagiw‘atah leimor; halo dawid mistateir begiw‘at haHakhilah, ‘al penei hayshimon. 
1_samuel 26:2	wayaqam sha’ul, wayeired ’el midbar cif, we’ito sheloshet ’alafim ’ish beHurei yisra’eil; lewaqeish ’et dawid bemidbar cif. 
1_samuel 26:3	wayiHan sha’ul begiw‘at haHakhilah, ’asher ‘al penei hayshimon ‘al hadarekh; wedawid yosheiw bamidbar, wayar ki wa sha’ul ’aHaraw hamidbarah. 
1_samuel 26:4	wayishlaH dawid meragelim; wayeida‘ ki wa sha’ul ’el nakhon. 
1_samuel 26:5	wayaqam dawid, wayawo ’el hamaqom ’asher Hanah sham sha’ul wayar dawid, ’et hamaqom ’asher shakhaw sham sha’ul, we’awneir ben neir sar zewa’o; wesha’ul shokheiw bama‘gal, weha‘am Honim sewiwoto sewiwotaw. 
1_samuel 26:6	waya‘an dawid wayomer ’el ’aHimelekh haHiti, we’el ’awishay ben zeruyah ’aHi yo’aw leimor, mi yeireid ’iti ’el sha’ul ’el hamaHaneh; wayomer ’awishay, ’ani ’eireid ‘imakh. 
1_samuel 26:7	wayawo dawid wa’awishay ’el ha‘am laylah wehineih sha’ul, shokheiw yashein bama‘gal, waHanito me‘ukhah wa’arez mera’ashoto mera’ashotaw; we’awneir weha‘am, shokhewim sewiwoto sewiwotaw.
1_samuel 26:8	wayomer ’awishay ’el dawid, sigar ’elohim hayom ’et ’oyiwkha beyadekha; we‘atah ’akenu na baHanit uwa’arez pa‘am ’aHat, welo ’eshneh lo. 
1_samuel 26:9	wayomer dawid ’el ’awishay ’al tashHiteihu; ki mi shalaH yado bimshiaH yhoh weniqah.
1_samuel 26:10	wayomer dawid Hay yhoh, ki ’im yhoh yigafenu; ’o yomo yawo wameit, ’o wamilHamah yeireid wenispah. 
1_samuel 26:11	Halilah li yhoh, misheloaH yadi bimshiaH yhoh; we‘atah qaH na ’et haHanit ’asher mera’ashoto mera’ashotaw we’et zapaHat hamayim weneilakhah lanu. 
1_samuel 26:12	wayiqaH dawid ’et haHanit we’et zapaHat hamayim meira’ashotei sha’ul, wayeilekhu lahem; we’ein ro’eh we’ein yodeia‘ we’ein meiqiz, ki khulam yesheinim, ki tardeimat yhoh, nafelah ‘aleihem. 
1_samuel 26:13	waya‘awor dawid ha‘eiwer, waya‘amod ‘al rosh hahar meiraHoq; raw hamaqom beineihem. 
1_samuel 26:14	wayiqra dawid ’el ha‘am, we’el ’awneir ben neir leimor, halo ta‘aneh ’awneir; waya‘an ’awneir wayomer, mi ’atah qarata ’el hamelekh.
1_samuel 26:15	wayomer dawid ’el ’awneir halo ’ish ’atah, umi khamokha beyisra’eil, welamah lo shamarta, ’el ’adonekha hamelekh; ki wa ’aHad ha‘am, lehashHit ’et hamelekh ’adonekha. 
1_samuel 26:16	lo Tow hadawar hacceh ’asher ‘asita Hay yhoh ki wenei mawet ’atem, ’asher lo shemartem ‘al ’adoneikhem ‘al meshiaH yhoh; we‘atah re’eih, ’ei Hanit hamelekh we’et zapaHat hamayim ’asher mera’ashoto mera’ashotaw. 
1_samuel 26:17	wayakeir sha’ul ’et qol dawid, wayomer haqolkha ceh beni dawid; wayomer dawid, qoli ’adoni hamelekh. 
1_samuel 26:18	wayomer lamah ceh ’adoni rodeif ’aHarei ‘awdo; ki meh ‘asiti, umah beyadi ra‘ah. 
1_samuel 26:19	we‘atah, yishma‘ na ’adoni hamelekh, ’eit diwrei ‘awdo; ’im yhoh hesitekha wi yaraH minHah, we’im benei ha’adam, ’arurim heim lifnei yhoh, ki geireshuni hayom, meihistapeiaH benaHalat yhoh leimor, leikh ‘awod ’elohim ’aHeirim. 
1_samuel 26:20	we‘atah, ’al yipol dami ’arzah, mineged penei yhoh; ki yaza melekh yisra’eil, lewaqeish ’et par‘osh ’eHad, ka’asher yirdof haqorei beharim. 
1_samuel 26:21	wayomer sha’ul HaTati shuw beni dawid, ki lo ’ara‘ lekha ‘od, taHat ’asher yaqerah nafshi be‘einekha hayom hacceh; hineih hiskalti wa’eshgeh harbeih me’od. 
1_samuel 26:22	waya‘an dawid wayomer, hineih haHanit Hanit hamelekh; weya‘awor ’eHad meihane‘arim weyiqaHeha. 
1_samuel 26:23	yhoh yashiw la’ish, ’et zidqato we’et ’emunato; ’asher netanekha yhoh hayom beyad, welo ’awiti, lishloaH yadi bimshiaH yhoh. 
1_samuel 26:24	wehineih, ka’asher gadelah nafshekha hayom hacceh be‘einay; kein tigdal nafshi be‘einei yhoh, weyazileini mikal zarah.
1_samuel 26:25	wayomer sha’ul ’el dawid, barukh ’atah beni dawid, gam ‘asoh ta‘aseh, wegam yakhol tukhal; wayeilekh dawid ledarko, wesha’ul shaw limqomo.
1_samuel 27:1	wayomer dawid ’el libo, ‘atah ’essafeh yom ’eHad beyad sha’ul; ’ein li Tow ki himaleiT ’imaleiT ’el ’erez pelishtim, weno’ash mimeni sha’ul lewaqsheini ‘od bekhal gewul yisra’eil, wenimlaTti miyado. 
1_samuel 27:2	wayaqam dawid, waya‘awor hu, wesheish mei’ot ’ish ’asher ‘imo; ’el ’akhish ben ma‘okh melekh gat. 
1_samuel 27:3	wayeishew dawid ‘im ’akhish begat hu wa’anashaw ’ish uweito; dawid ushetei nashaw, ’aHino‘am hayicre‘eilit, wa’awigayil ’eishet nawal hakarmelit. 
1_samuel 27:4	wayugad lesha’ul, ki waraH dawid gat; welo yosaf yasaf ‘od lewaqsho.
1_samuel 27:5	wayomer dawid ’el ’akhish, ’im na mazati Hein be‘einekha yitenu li maqom, be’aHat ‘arei hasadeh we’eishewah sham; welamah yeisheiw ‘awdekha be‘ir hamamlakhah ‘imakh. 
1_samuel 27:6	wayiten lo ’akhish bayom hahu ’et ziqlag; lakhein hayetah ziqlag lemalkhei yehudah, ‘ad hayom hacceh.
1_samuel 27:7	wayhi mispar hayamim, ’asher yashaw dawid bisdeih felishtim; yamim we’arba‘ah Hodashim. 
1_samuel 27:8	waya‘al dawid wa’anashaw, wayifsheTu ’el hageshuri wehagirci wehagicri weha‘amaleiqi; ki heinah yoshewot ha’arez ’asher mei‘olam, bo’akha shurah we‘ad ’erez mizrayim. 
1_samuel 27:9	wehikah dawid ’et ha’arez, welo yeHayeh ’ish we’ishah; welaqaH zon uwaqar waHamorim ugemalim uwegadim, wayashaw wayawo ’el ’akhish. 
1_samuel 27:10	wayomer ’akhish, ’al peshaTtem hayom; wayomer dawid, ‘al negew yehudah we‘al negew hayarHeme’eili, we’el negew haqeini. 
1_samuel 27:11	we’ish we’ishah lo yeHayeh dawid, lehawi gat leimor, pen yagidu ‘aleinu leimor; koh ‘asah dawid wekhoh mishpaTo, kal hayamim, ’asher yashaw bisdeih felishtim. 
1_samuel 27:12	waya’amein ’akhish bedawid leimor; haw’eish hiw’ish be‘amo weyisra’eil, wehayah li le‘ewed ‘olam.
1_samuel 28:1	wayhi bayamim haheim, wayiqbezu felishtim ’et maHaneihem lazawa, lehilaHeim beyisra’eil; wayomer ’akhish ’el dawid, yadoa‘ teida‘, ki ’iti teizei wamaHaneh, ’atah wa’anashekha. 
1_samuel 28:2	wayomer dawid ’el ’akhish, lakhein ’atah teida‘, ’eit ’asher ya‘aseh ‘awdekha; wayomer ’akhish ’el dawid, lakhein, shomeir leroshi ’asimekha kal hayamim.
1_samuel 28:3	ushemu’eil meit, wayispedu lo kal yisra’eil, wayiqberuhu waramah uwe‘iro; wesha’ul, heisir ha’owot we’et hayide‘onim meiha’arez. 
1_samuel 28:4	wayiqawezu felishtim, wayawo’u wayaHanu weshuneim; wayiqboz sha’ul ’et kal yisra’eil, wayaHanu bagilboa‘. 
1_samuel 28:5	wayar sha’ul ’et maHaneih felishtim; wayira wayeHerad libo me’od. 
1_samuel 28:6	wayish’al sha’ul yhoh, welo ‘anahu yhoh; gam baHalomot gam ba’urim gam banewi’im. 
1_samuel 28:7	wayomer sha’ul la‘awadaw, baqeshu li ’eishet ba‘alat ’ow, we’eilekhah ’eileha we’edreshah bah; wayomeru ‘awadaw ’eilaw, hineih ’eishet ba‘alat ’ow be‘ein dor. 
1_samuel 28:8	wayitHapeis sha’ul, wayilbash begadim ’aHeirim, wayeilekh hu, ushenei ’anashim ‘imo, wayawo’u ’el ha’ishah layelah; wayomer, qasomi qasomi na li ba’ow, weha‘ali li, ’eit ’asher ’omar ’eilayikh. 
1_samuel 28:9	watomer ha’ishah ’eilaw, hineih ’atah yada‘ta ’eit ’asher ‘asah sha’ul, ’asher hikhrit ’et ha’owot we’et hayide‘oni min ha’arez; welamah ’atah mitnaqeish benafshi lahamiteini. 
1_samuel 28:10	wayishawa‘ lah sha’ul, yhoh leimor; Hay yhoh ’im yiqereikh ‘awon badawar hacceh. 
1_samuel 28:11	watomer ha’ishah, ’et mi ’a‘aleh lakh; wayomer ’et shemu’eil ha‘ali li. 
1_samuel 28:12	wateire ha’ishah ’et shemu’eil, watic‘aq beqol gadol; watomer ha’ishah ’el sha’ul leimor lamah rimitani we’atah sha’ul. 
1_samuel 28:13	wayomer lah hamelekh ’al tire’i ki mah ra’it; watomer ha’ishah ’el sha’ul, ’elohim ra’iti ‘olim min ha’arez. 
1_samuel 28:14	wayomer lah mah ta’oro, watomer, ’ish caqein ‘oleh, wehu ‘oTeh me‘il; wayeida‘ sha’ul ki shemu’eil hu, wayiqod ’apayim ’arzah wayishtaHu.
1_samuel 28:15	wayomer shemu’eil ’el sha’ul, lamah hirgactani leha‘alot ’oti; wayomer ’ul zar li me’od ufelishtim nilHamim bi, weilohim sar mei‘alay welo ‘anani ‘od, gam beyad hanewi’im gam baHalomot, wa’eqra’eh lekha, lehodi‘eini mah ’e‘eseh.
1_samuel 28:16	wayomer shemu’eil, welamah tish’aleini; yhoh sar mei‘alekha wayhi ‘arekha. 
1_samuel 28:17	waya‘as yhoh lo, ka’asher diber beyadi; wayiqra‘ yhoh ’et hamamlakhah miyadekha, wayitenah lerei‘akha ledawid. 
1_samuel 28:18	ka’asher lo shama‘ta beqol yhoh, welo ‘asita Haron ’apo ba‘amaleiq; ‘al kein hadawar hacceh, ‘asah lekha yhoh hayom hacceh. 
1_samuel 28:19	weyitein yhoh gam ’et yisra’eil ‘imekha beyad pelishtim, umaHar ’atah uwanekha ‘imi; gam ’et maHaneih yisra’eil, yitein yhoh beyad pelishtim. 
1_samuel 28:20	waymaheir sha’ul, wayipol melo qomato ’arzah, wayira me’od midiwrei shemu’eil; gam koaH lo hayah wo, ki lo ’akhal leHem, kal hayom wekhal halayelah. 
1_samuel 28:21	watawo ha’ishah ’el sha’ul, wateire ki niwhal me’od; watomer ’eilaw, hineih shame‘ah shifHatekha beqolekha, wa’asim nafshi bekhapi, wa’eshma‘ ’et dewarekha, ’asher dibarta ’eilay. 
1_samuel 28:22	we‘atah, shema‘ na gam ’atah beqol shifHatekha, we’asimah lefanekha pat leHem we’ekhol; wihi wekha koaH, ki teileikh badarekh. 
1_samuel 28:23	wayma’ein, wayomer lo ’okhal, wayifrezu wo ‘awadaw wegam ha’ishah, wayishma‘ leqolam; wayaqam meiha’arez, wayeishew ’el hamiTah. 
1_samuel 28:24	wela’ishah ‘eigel marbeiq babayit, watemaheir waticbaHeihu; watiqaH qemaH watalash, watofeihu mazot. 
1_samuel 28:25	watageish lifnei sha’ul welifnei ‘awadaw wayokheilu; wayaqumu wayeilekhu balaylah hahu.
1_samuel 29:1	wayiqbezu felishtim ’et kal maHaneihem ’afeiqah; weyisra’eil Honim, ba‘ayin ’asher beyicre‘el. 
1_samuel 29:2	wesarnei felishtim ‘owerim, lemei’ot wela’alafim; wedawid wa’anashaw, ‘owerim ba’aHaronah ‘im ’akhish. 
1_samuel 29:3	wayomeru sarei felishtim, mah ha‘iwrim ha’eileh; wayomer ’akhish ’el sarei felishtim, halo ceh dawid ‘ewed sha’ul melekh yisra’eil, ’asher hayah ’iti ceh yamim ’o ceh shanim, welo mazati wo me’umah, miyom nafelo ‘ad hayom hacceh.
1_samuel 29:4	wayiqzefu ‘alaw sarei felishtim, wayomeru lo sarei felishtim hasheiw ’et ha’ish, weyashow ’el meqomo ’asher hifqadto sham, welo yeireid ‘imanu bamilHamah, welo yihyeh lanu lesaTan bamilHamah; uwameh, yitrazeh ceh ’el ’adonaw, halo berashei ha’anashim haheim. 
1_samuel 29:5	halo ceh dawid, ’asher ya‘anu lo bameHolot leimor; hikah sha’ul ba’alafaw, wedawid beriwwoto beriwwotaw.
1_samuel 29:6	wayiqra ’akhish ’el dawid, wayomer ’eilaw Hay yhoh ki yashar ’atah, weTow be‘einay zeitekha uwo’akha ’iti bamaHaneh, ki lo mazati wekha ra‘ah, miyom bo’akha ’eilay ‘ad hayom hacceh; uwe‘einei hasseranim lo Tow ’atah. 
1_samuel 29:7	we‘atah shuw weleikh beshalom; welo ta‘aseh ra‘, be‘einei sarnei felishtim.
1_samuel 29:8	wayomer dawid ’el ’akhish, ki meh ‘asiti umah mazata we‘awdekha, miyom ’asher hayiti lefanekha, ‘ad hayom hacceh; ki lo ’awo wenilHamti, be’oyewei ’adoni hamelekh. 
1_samuel 29:9	waya‘an ’akhish wayomer ’el dawid yada‘ti ki Tow ’atah be‘einay kemal’akh ’elohim; ’akh sarei felishtim ’ameru, lo ya‘aleh ‘imanu bamilHamah. 
1_samuel 29:10	we‘atah hashkeim baboqer, we‘awdei ’adonekha ’asher ba’u ’itakh; wehishkamtem baboqer, we’or lakhem waleikhu. 
1_samuel 29:11	wayashkeim dawid hu wa’anashaw lalekhet baboqer, lashuw ’el ’erez pelishtim; ufelishtim ‘alu yicre‘el.
1_samuel 30:1	wayhi bewo dawid wa’anashaw ziqlag bayom hashelishi; wa‘amaleiqi fasheTu, ’el negew we’el ziqlag, wayaku ’et ziqlag, wayisrefu ’otah ba’eish. 
1_samuel 30:2	wayishbu ’et hanashim ’asher bah miqaTon we‘ad gadol, lo heimitu ’ish; wayinhagu, wayeilekhu ledarkam. 
1_samuel 30:3	wayawo dawid wa’anashaw ’el ha‘ir, wehineih serufah ba’eish; unesheihem uweneihem uwenoteihem nishbu. 
1_samuel 30:4	wayisa dawid weha‘am ’asher ’ito ’et qolam wayiwku; ‘ad ’asher ’ein bahem koaH liwkot. 
1_samuel 30:5	ushetei neshei dawid nishbu; ’aHino‘am hayicre‘eilit, wa’awigayil ’eishet nawal hakarmeli. 
1_samuel 30:6	wateizer ledawid me’od, ki ’ameru ha‘am lesaqelo, ki marah nefesh kal ha‘am, ’ish ‘al beno banaw we‘al benotaw; wayitHacceiq dawid, yhoh ’elohaw.
1_samuel 30:7	wayomer dawid, ’el ’ewyatar hakohein ben ’aHimelekh, hagishah na li ha’eifod; wayageish ’ewyatar ’et ha’eifod ’el dawid. 
1_samuel 30:8	wayish’al dawid yhoh leimor, ’erdof ’aHarei hagedud hacceh ha’asigenu; wayomer lo redof, ki haseig tasig wehazeil tazil. 
1_samuel 30:9	wayeilekh dawid, hu wesheish mei’ot ’ish ’asher ’ito, wayawo’u ‘ad naHal habesor; wehanotarim ‘amadu. 
1_samuel 30:10	wayirdof dawid, hu we’arba‘ mei’ot ’ish; waya‘amdu matayim ’ish, ’asher pigeru, mei‘awor ’et naHal habesor. 
1_samuel 30:11	wayimze’u ’ish mizri basadeh, wayiqHu ’oto ’el dawid; wayitenu lo leHem wayokhal, wayashquhu mayim. 
1_samuel 30:12	wayitenu lo felaH deweilah ushenei zimuqim wayokhal, watashaw ruHo ’eilaw; ki lo ’akhal leHem welo shatah mayim, sheloshah yamim usheloshah leilot.
1_samuel 30:13	wayomer lo dawid lemi ’atah, we’ei micceh ’atah; wayomer na‘ar mizri ’anokhi, ‘ewed le’ish ‘amaleiqi, waya‘acweini ’adoni ki Haliti hayom sheloshah. 
1_samuel 30:14	’anaHnu pashaTnu negew hakereiti we‘al ’asher lihudah we‘al negew kaleiw; we’et ziqlag sarafnu wa’eish. 
1_samuel 30:15	wayomer ’eilaw dawid, hatorideini ’el hagedud hacceh; wayomer hishawe‘ah li weilohim ’im temiteini, we’im tasgireini beyad ’adoni, we’oridkha ’el hagedud hacceh. 
1_samuel 30:16	wayorideihu, wehineih neTushim ‘al penei khal ha’arez; ’okhelim weshotim weHogegim, bekhol hashalal hagadol, ’asher laqeHu mei’erez pelishtim umei’erez yehudah. 
1_samuel 30:17	wayakeim dawid meihaneshef we‘ad ha‘erew lemaHoratam; welo nimlaT meihem ’ish, ki ’im ’arba‘ mei’ot ’ish na‘ar ’asher rakhewu ‘al hagemalim wayanusu. 
1_samuel 30:18	wayazeil dawid, ’eit kal ’asher laqeHu ‘amaleiq; we’et shetei nashaw hizil dawid. 
1_samuel 30:19	welo ne‘dar lahem min haqaTon we‘ad hagadol we‘ad banim uwanot umishalal, we‘ad kal ’asher laqeHu lahem; hakol heishiw dawid. 
1_samuel 30:20	wayiqaH dawid, ’et kal hazon wehabaqar; nahagu, lifnei hamiqneh hahu, wayomeru, ceh shelal dawid. 
1_samuel 30:21	wayawo dawid, ’el matayim ha’anashim ’asher pigeru milekhet ’aHarei dawid, wayoshiwum benaHal habesor, wayeize’u liqrat dawid, weliqrat ha‘am ’asher ’ito; wayigash dawid ’et ha‘am, wayish’al lahem leshalom.
1_samuel 30:22	waya‘an kal ’ish ra‘ uweliya‘al, meiha’anashim ’asher halekhu ‘im dawid wayomeru, ya‘an ’asher lo halekhu ‘imi, lo nitein lahem, meihashalal ’asher hizalnu; ki ’im ’ish ’et ’ishto we’et banaw, weyinhagu weyeileikhu.
1_samuel 30:23	wayomer dawid, lo ta‘asu khein ’eHay; ’eit ’asher natan yhoh lanu wayishmor ’otanu, wayitein, ’et hagedud haba ‘aleinu beyadeinu. 
1_samuel 30:24	umi yishma‘ lakhem, ladawar hacceh; ki keHeileq hayoreid bamilHamah, ukheHeileq hayosheiw ‘al hakeilim yaHdaw yaHaloqu.
1_samuel 30:25	wayhi meihayom hahu wama‘elah; waysimeha leHoq ulemishpaT leyisra’eil, ‘ad hayom hacceh.
1_samuel 30:26	wayawo dawid ’el ziqlag, wayshalaH meihashalal leciqnei yehudah lerei‘eihu leimor; hineih lakhem berakhah, mishelal ’oyewei yhoh. 
1_samuel 30:27	la’asher beweit ’eil wela’asher beramot negew wela’asher beyatir. 
1_samuel 30:28	wela’asher ba‘aro‘eir wela’asher besifmot wela’asher be’eshtemoa‘.
1_samuel 30:29	wela’asher berakhal, wela’asher be‘arei hayeraHme’eili, wela’asher be‘arei haqeini. 
1_samuel 30:30	wela’asher beHaremah wela’asher bewor ‘ashan wela’asher ba‘atakh. 
1_samuel 30:31	wela’asher beHewron; ulekhal hameqomot ’asher hithalekh sham dawid hu wa’anashaw.
1_samuel 31:1	ufelishtim nilHamim beyisra’eil; wayanusu ’anshei yisra’eil mipenei felishtim, wayipelu Halalim behar hagilboa‘. 
1_samuel 31:2	wayadbequ felishtim, ’et sha’ul we’et banaw; wayaku felishtim, ’et yehonatan we’et ’awinadaw we’et malki shua‘ benei sha’ul. 
1_samuel 31:3	watikhbad hamilHamah ’el sha’ul, wayimza’uhu hamorim ’anashim baqashet; wayaHel me’od meihamorim. 
1_samuel 31:4	wayomer sha’ul lenosei kheilaw shelof Harbekha wedaqereini wah, pen yawo’u ha‘areilim ha’eileh udeqaruni wehit‘alelu wi, welo ’awah nosei kheilaw, ki yarei me’od; wayiqaH sha’ul ’et haHerew, wayipol ‘aleha. 
1_samuel 31:5	wayar nosei kheilaw ki meit sha’ul; wayipol gam hu ‘al Harbo wayamat ‘imo. 
1_samuel 31:6	wayamat sha’ul usheloshet banaw wenosei kheilaw gam kal ’anashaw bayom hahu yaHdaw. 
1_samuel 31:7	wayir’u ’anshei yisra’eil ’asher be‘eiwer ha‘eimeq wa’asher be‘eiwer hayardein, ki nasu ’anshei yisra’eil, wekhi meitu sha’ul uwanaw; waya‘acwu ’et he‘arim wayanusu, wayawo’u felishtim, wayeishewu bahen.
