1_samuel 31:8	wayhi mimaHorat, wayawo’u felishtim, lefasheiT ’et haHalalim; wayimze’u ’et sha’ul we’et sheloshet banaw, nofelim behar hagilboa‘. 
1_samuel 31:9	wayikhretu ’et rosho, wayafshiTu ’et keilaw; wayshaleHu we’erez pelishtim sawiw, lewaseir beit ‘azabeihem we’et ha‘am. 
1_samuel 31:10	wayasimu ’et keilaw, beit ‘ashtarot; we’et gewiyato taqe‘u, beHomat beit shan. 
1_samuel 31:11	wayishme‘u ’eilaw, yoshewei yaweish gil‘ad; ’eit ’asher ‘asu felishtim lesha’ul. 
1_samuel 31:12	wayaqumu kal ’ish Hayil wayeilekhu khal halaylah wayiqHu ’et gewiyat sha’ul, we’eit gewiyot banaw, meiHomat beit shan; wayawo’u yaweishah, wayisrefu ’otam sham. 
1_samuel 31:13	wayiqHu ’et ‘azmoteihem, wayiqberu taHat ha’eshel beyaweishah; wayazumu shiw‘at yamim.
2_samuel 1:1	wayhi, ’aHarei mot sha’ul, wedawid shaw, meihakot ’et ha‘amaleiq; wayeishew dawid beziqlag yamim shenayim. 
2_samuel 1:2	wayhi bayom hashelishi, wehineih ’ish ba min hamaHaneh mei‘im sha’ul, uwegadaw qeru‘im, wa’adamah ‘al rosho; wayhi bewo’o ’el dawid, wayipol ’arzah wayishtaHu. 
2_samuel 1:3	wayomer lo dawid, ’ei micceh tawo; wayomer ’eilaw, mimaHaneih yisra’eil nimlaTeti. 
2_samuel 1:4	wayomer ’eilaw dawid meh hayah hadawar haged na li; wayomer ’asher nas ha‘am min hamilHamah, wegam harbeih nafal min ha‘am wayamutu, wegam, sha’ul wihonatan beno meitu. 
2_samuel 1:5	wayomer dawid, ’el hana‘ar hamagid lo; ’eikh yada‘ta, ki meit sha’ul wihonatan beno. 
2_samuel 1:6	wayomer hana‘ar hamagid lo, niqro niqreiti behar hagilboa‘, wehineih sha’ul nish‘an ‘al Hanito; wehineih harekhew uwa‘alei haparashim hidbiquhu. 
2_samuel 1:7	wayifen ’aHaraw wayir’eini; wayiqra ’eilay, wa’omar hineini. 
2_samuel 1:8	wayomer li mi ’atah; wayomer wa’omar ’eilaw, ‘amaleiqi ’anokhi. 
2_samuel 1:9	wayomer ’eilay, ‘amad na ‘alay umoteteini, ki ’aHacani hashawaz; ki khal ‘od nafshi bi. 
2_samuel 1:10	wa’e‘emod ‘alaw wa’amoteteihu, ki yada‘ti, ki lo yiHyeh ’aHarei niflo; wa’eqaH haneicer ’asher ‘al rosho, we’ez‘adah ’asher ‘al cero‘o, wa’awi’eim ’el ’adoni heinah. 
2_samuel 1:11	wayaHaceiq dawid biwgado biwgadaw wayiqra‘eim; wegam kal ha’anashim ’asher ’ito. 
2_samuel 1:12	wayispedu wayiwku, wayazumu ‘ad ha‘arew; ‘al sha’ul we‘al yehonatan beno, we‘al ‘am yhoh we‘al beit yisra’eil, ki nafelu beHarew.
2_samuel 1:13	wayomer dawid, ’el hana‘ar hamagid lo, ’ei micceh ’atah; wayomer ben ’ish geir ‘amaleiqi ’anokhi. 
2_samuel 1:14	wayomer ’eilaw dawid; ’eikh lo yareita, lishloaH yadekha, leshaHeit ’et meshiaH yhoh. 
2_samuel 1:15	wayiqra dawid, le’aHad meihane‘arim, wayomer gash pega‘ bo; wayakeihu wayamot. 
2_samuel 1:16	wayomer ’eilaw dawid, dameikha damekha ‘al roshekha; ki fikha, ‘anah wekha leimor, ’anokhi motati ’et meshiaH yhoh.
2_samuel 1:17	wayqonein dawid, ’et haqinah haccot; ‘al sha’ul we‘al yehonatan beno. 
2_samuel 1:18	wayomer lelameid benei yehudah qashet; hineih khetuwah ‘al seifer hayashar. 
2_samuel 1:19	hazewi yisra’eil, ‘al bamotekha Halal; ’eikh nafelu giborim. 
2_samuel 1:20	’al tagidu wegat, ’al tewaseru beHuzot ’ashqelon; pen tismaHnah benot pelishtim, pen ta‘alocenah benot ha‘areilim. 
2_samuel 1:21	harei wagilboa‘, ’al Tal we’al maTar ‘aleikhem usedei terumot; ki sham nig‘al magein giborim, magein sha’ul, beli mashiaH bashamen. 
2_samuel 1:22	midam Halalim, meiHeilew giborim, qeshet yehonatan, lo nasog ’aHor; weHerew sha’ul, lo tashuw reiqam. 
2_samuel 1:23	sha’ul wihonatan, hane’ehawim wehane‘imim beHayeihem, uwemotam lo nifradu; minesharim qalu, mei’arayot gaweiru. 
2_samuel 1:24	benot yisra’eil, ’el sha’ul bekhenah; hamalbishkhem shani ‘im ‘adanim, hama‘aleh ‘adi cahaw, ‘al lewushekhen. 
2_samuel 1:25	’eikh nafelu giborim, betokh hamilHamah; yehonatan, ‘al bamotekha Halal. 
2_samuel 1:26	zar li ‘alekha, ’aHi yehonatan, na‘amta li me’od; nifle’atah ’ahawatekha li, mei’ahawat nashim. 
2_samuel 1:27	’eikh nafelu giborim, wayowedu kelei milHamah.
2_samuel 2:1	wayhi ’aHarei khein, wayish’al dawid yhoh leimor ha’e‘eleh, be’aHat ‘arei yehudah, wayomer yhoh ’eilaw ‘aleih; wayomer dawid ’anah ’e‘eleh wayomer Hewronah. 
2_samuel 2:2	waya‘al sham dawid, wegam shetei nashaw; ’aHino‘am hayicre‘eilit, wa’awigayil ’eishet nawal hakarmeli. 
2_samuel 2:3	wa’anashaw ’asher ‘imo he‘elah dawid ’ish uweito; wayeishewu be‘arei Hewron. 
2_samuel 2:4	wayawo’u ’anshei yehudah, wayimsheHu sham ’et dawid lemelekh ‘al beit yehudah; wayagidu ledawid leimor, ’anshei yaweish gil‘ad, ’asher qaweru ’et sha’ul.
2_samuel 2:5	wayishlaH dawid mal’akhim, ’el ’anshei yaweish gil‘ad; wayomer ’aleihem, berukhim ’atem yhoh, ’asher ‘asitem haHesed hacceh, ‘im ’adoneikhem ‘im sha’ul, watiqberu ’oto. 
2_samuel 2:6	we‘atah ya‘as yhoh ‘imakhem Hesed we’emet; wegam ’anokhi, ’e‘eseh ’itekhem haTowah haccot, ’asher ‘asitem hadawar hacceh. 
2_samuel 2:7	we‘atah teHecaqnah yedeikhem, wihyu liwnei Hayil, ki meit ’adoneikhem sha’ul; wegam ’oti, masheHu weit yehudah lemelekh ‘aleihem.
2_samuel 2:8	we’awneir ben neir, sar zawa ’asher lesha’ul; laqaH, ’et ’ish boshet ben sha’ul, waya‘awireihu maHanayim. 
2_samuel 2:9	wayamlikheihu ’el hagil‘ad, we’el ha’ashuri we’el yicre‘el; we‘al ’efrayim we‘al binyamin, we‘al yisra’eil kuloh.
2_samuel 2:10	ben ’arba‘im shanah ’ish boshet ben sha’ul, bemalekho ‘al yisra’eil, ushetayim shanim malakh; ’akh beit yehudah, hayu ’aHarei dawid. 
2_samuel 2:11	wayhi mispar hayamim, ’asher hayah dawid melekh beHewron ‘al beit yehudah; shewa‘ shanim weshishah Hodashim.
2_samuel 2:12	wayeizei ’awneir ben neir, we‘awdei ’ish boshet ben sha’ul; mimaHanayim giw‘onah. 
2_samuel 2:13	weyo’aw ben zeruyah we‘awdei dawid yaze’u, wayifgeshum ‘al bereikhat giw‘on yaHdaw; wayeishewu ’eileh ‘al habereikhah micceh, we’eileh ‘al habereikhah micceh. 
2_samuel 2:14	wayomer ’awneir ’el yo’aw, yaqumu na hane‘arim, wisaHaqu lefaneinu; wayomer yo’aw yaqumu. 
2_samuel 2:15	wayaqumu waya‘awru wemispar; sheneim ‘asar lewinyamin, ule’ish boshet ben sha’ul, usheneim ‘asar mei‘awdei dawid. 
2_samuel 2:16	wayaHaciqu ’ish berosh rei‘eihu, weHarbo bezad rei‘eihu, wayipelu yaHdaw; wayiqra lamaqom hahu, Helqat hazurim ’asher begiw‘on. 
2_samuel 2:17	watehi hamilHamah qashah ‘ad me’od bayom hahu; wayinagef ’awneir we’anshei yisra’eil, lifnei ‘awdei dawid. 
2_samuel 2:18	wayihyu sham, sheloshah benei zeruyah, yo’aw wa’awishay wa‘asah’eil; wa‘asah’eil qal beraglaw, ke’aHad hazewayim ’asher basadeh. 
2_samuel 2:19	wayirdof ‘asah’eil ’aHarei ’awneir; welo naTah lalekhet, ‘al hayamin we‘al hasemol, mei’aHarei ’awneir. 
2_samuel 2:20	wayifen ’awneir ’aHaraw, wayomer ha’atah ceh ‘asah’eil; wayomer ’anokhi. 
2_samuel 2:21	wayomer lo ’awneir, neTeih lekha ‘al yeminekha ’o ‘al semolekha, we’eHoc lekha, ’eHad meihane‘arim, weqaH lekha ’et Halizato; welo ’awah ‘asah’eil, lasur mei’aHaraw. 
2_samuel 2:22	wayosef ‘od ’awneir, leimor ’el ‘asah’eil, sur lekha mei’aHaray; lamah ’akekah ’arzah, we’eikh ’esa fanay, ’el yo’aw ’aHikha. 
2_samuel 2:23	wayma’ein lasur, wayakeihu ’awneir be’aHarei haHanit ’el haHomesh, wateizei haHanit mei’aHaraw, wayipal sham wayamat taHato taHtaw; wayhi kal haba ’el hamaqom ’asher nafal sham ‘asah’eil wayamot waya‘amodu. 
2_samuel 2:24	wayirdefu yo’aw wa’awishay ’aHarei ’awneir; wehashemesh ba’ah, weheimah, ba’u ‘ad giw‘at ’amah, ’asher ‘al penei giaH, derekh midbar giw‘on. 
2_samuel 2:25	wayitqabezu wenei winyamin ’aHarei ’awneir, wayihyu la’agudah ’eHat; waya‘amdu, ‘al rosh giw‘ah ’eHat. 
2_samuel 2:26	wayiqra ’awneir ’el yo’aw, wayomer halanezaH tokhal Herew, halo yada‘tah, ki marah tihyeh ba’aHaronah; we‘ad matay lo tomar la‘am, lashuw mei’aHarei ’aHeihem. 
2_samuel 2:27	wayomer yo’aw, Hay ha’elohim, ki lulei dibarta; ki ’ac meihaboqer na‘alah ha‘am, ’ish mei’aHarei ’aHiw. 
2_samuel 2:28	wayitqa‘ yo’aw bashofar, waya‘amdu kal ha‘am, welo yirdefu ‘od ’aHarei yisra’eil; welo yasefu ‘od lehilaHeim. 
2_samuel 2:29	we’awneir wa’anashaw, halekhu ba‘arawah, kol halaylah hahu; waya‘awru ’et hayardein, wayeilekhu kal habitron, wayawo’u maHanayim. 
2_samuel 2:30	weyo’aw, w mei’aHarei ’awneir, wayiqboz ’et kal ha‘am; wayipaqedu mei‘awdei dawid tish‘ah ‘asar ’ish wa‘asah ’eil 
2_samuel 2:31	we‘awdei dawid, hiku mibinyamin, uwe’anshei ’awneir; shelosh mei’ot weshishim ’ish meitu. 
2_samuel 2:32	wayis’u ’et ‘asah’eil, wayiqberuhu beqewer ’awiw, ’asher beit laHem; wayeilekhu khal halaylah, yo’aw wa’anashaw, wayei’or lahem beHewron. 
2_samuel 3:1	watehi hamilHamah ’arukah, bein beit sha’ul, uwein beit dawid; wedawid holeikh weHaceiq, uweit sha’ul holekhim wedalim.
2_samuel 3:2	wayeiledu wayiwwaledu ledawid banim beHewron; wayhi wekhoro ’amnon, la’aHino‘am hayicre‘eilit. 
2_samuel 3:3	umishneihu khil’aw, la’awigeil la’awigayil ’eishet nawal hakarmeli; wehashelishi ’awshalom ben ma‘akhah, bat talmay melekh geshur. 
2_samuel 3:4	weharewi‘i ’adoniyah wen Hagit; wehaHamishi shefaTyah wen ’awiTal. 
2_samuel 3:5	wehashishi yitre‘am, le‘eglah ’eishet dawid; ’eileh yuledu ledawid beHewron.
2_samuel 3:6	wayhi, bihyot hamilHamah, bein beit sha’ul, uwein beit dawid; we’awneir hayah mitHacceiq beweit sha’ul. 
2_samuel 3:7	ulesha’ul pilegesh, ushemah rizpah wat ’ayah; wayomer ’el ’awneir, madua‘ batah ’el pilegesh ’awi. 
2_samuel 3:8	wayiHar le’awneir me’od ‘al diwrei ’ish boshet, wayomer harosh kelew ’anokhi ’asher lihudah hayom ’e‘eseh Hesed ‘im beit sha’ul ’awikha, ’el ’eHaw we’el meirei‘eihu, welo himzitikha beyad dawid; watifqod ‘alay ‘awon ha’ishah hayom. 
2_samuel 3:9	koh ya‘aseh ’elohim le’awneir, wekhoh yosif lo; ki, ka’asher nishba‘ yhoh ledawid, ki khein ’e‘eseh lo. 
2_samuel 3:10	leha‘awir hamamlakhah mibeit sha’ul; ulehaqim ’et kissei dawid, ‘al yisra’eil we‘al yehudah, midan we‘ad be’eir shawa‘. 
2_samuel 3:11	welo yakhol ‘od, lehashiw ’et ’awneir dawar; miyir’ato ’oto.
2_samuel 3:12	wayishlaH ’awneir mal’akhim ’el dawid taHato taHtaw leimor lemi ’arez; leimor, karetah weritekha ’iti, wehineih yadi ‘imakh, lehaseiw ’eilekha ’et kal yisra’eil. 
2_samuel 3:13	wayomer Tow, ’ani ’ekhrot ’itekha berit; ’akh dawar ’eHad ’anokhi sho’eil mei’itekha leimor lo tir’eh ’et panay, ki ’im lifnei hewi’akha, ’eit mikhal bat sha’ul, bewo’akha lir’ot ’et panay.
2_samuel 3:14	wayishlaH dawid mal’akhim, ’el ’ish boshet ben sha’ul leimor; tenah ’et ’ishti ’et mikhal, ’asher ’eirasti li, bemei’ah ‘arelot pelishtim. 
2_samuel 3:15	wayishlaH ’ish boshet, wayiqaHeha mei‘im ’ish; mei‘im palTi’eil ben lush layish. 
2_samuel 3:16	wayeilekh ’itah ’ishah, halokh uwakhoh ’aHareha ‘ad baHurim; wayomer ’eilaw ’awneir leikh shuw wayashow. 
2_samuel 3:17	udewar ’awneir hayah, ‘im ciqnei yisra’eil leimor; gam temol gam shilshom, heyitem mewaqshim ’et dawid lemelekh ‘aleikhem. 
2_samuel 3:18	we‘atah ‘asu; ki yhoh ’amar ’el dawid leimor, beyad dawid ‘awdi, hoshia‘ ’et ‘ami yisra’eil miyad pelishtim, umiyad kal ’oyeweihem. 
2_samuel 3:19	waydabeir gam ’awneir be’acenei winyamin; wayeilekh gam ’awneir, ledabeir be’acenei dawid beHewron, ’eit kal ’asher Tow be‘einei yisra’eil, uwe‘einei kal beit binyamin. 
2_samuel 3:20	wayawo ’awneir ’el dawid Hewron, we’ito ‘esrim ’anashim; waya‘as dawid le’awneir wela’anashim ’asher ’ito mishteh. 
2_samuel 3:21	wayomer ’awneir ’el dawid ’aqumah we’eileikhah we’eqbezah ’el ’adoni hamelekh ’et kal yisra’eil, weyikhretu ’itekha berit, umalakhta, bekhol ’asher te’awweh nafshekha; wayeshalaH dawid ’et ’awneir wayeilekh beshalom. 
2_samuel 3:22	wehineih ‘awdei dawid weyo’aw ba meihagedud, weshalal raw ‘imam heiwi’u; we’awneir, ’einenu ‘im dawid beHewron, ki shileHo wayeilekh beshalom. 
2_samuel 3:23	weyo’aw wekhal hazawa ’asher ’ito ba’u; wayagidu leyo’aw leimor, ba ’awneir ben neir ’el hamelekh, wayshaleHeihu wayeilekh beshalom. 
2_samuel 3:24	wayawo yo’aw ’el hamelekh, wayomer meh ‘asitah; hineih wa ’awneir ’eilekha, lamah ceh shilaHto wayeilekh halokh. 
2_samuel 3:25	yada‘ta ’et ’awneir ben neir, ki lefatotekha ba; welada‘at ’et moza’akha we’et miwo’ekha mowa’ekha, welada‘at ’eit kal ’asher ’atah ‘oseh. 
2_samuel 3:26	wayeizei yo’aw mei‘im dawid, wayishlaH mal’akhim ’aHarei ’awneir, wayashiwu ’oto mibor hassirah; wedawid lo yada‘. 
2_samuel 3:27	wayashaw ’awneir Hewron, wayaTeihu yo’aw ’el tokh hasha‘ar, ledabeir ’ito basheli; wayakeihu sham haHomesh, wayamat bedam ‘asah ’eil ’aHiw. 
2_samuel 3:28	wayishma‘ dawid mei’aHarei khein, wayomer, naqi ’anokhi umamlakhti mei‘im yhoh ‘ad ‘olam; midemei ’awneir ben neir. 
2_samuel 3:29	yaHulu ‘al rosh yo’aw, we’el kal beit ’awiw; we’al yikareit mibeit yo’aw caw umezora‘ umaHaciq bapelekh wenofeil baHerew waHasar laHem. 
2_samuel 3:30	weyo’aw wa’awishay ’aHiw, haregu le’awneir; ‘al ’asher heimit ’et ‘asah’eil ’aHihem begiw‘on bamilHamah.
2_samuel 3:31	wayomer dawid ’el yo’aw we’el kal ha‘am ’asher ’ito, qir‘u wigdeikhem weHigru saqim, wesifdu lifnei ’awneir; wehamelekh dawid, holeikh ’aHarei hamiTah. 
2_samuel 3:32	wayiqberu ’et ’awneir beHewron; wayisa hamelekh ’et qolo, wayeiwek ’el qewer ’awneir, wayiwku kal ha‘am.
2_samuel 3:33	wayqonein hamelekh ’el ’awneir wayomar; hakemot nawal yamut ’awneir. 
2_samuel 3:34	yadekha lo ’asurot, weraglekha lo linHushtayim hugashu, kinfol lifnei wenei ‘awlah nafaleta; wayosifu khal ha‘am liwkot ‘alaw. 
2_samuel 3:35	wayawo khal ha‘am, lehawrot ’et dawid leHem be‘od hayom; wayishawa‘ dawid leimor, koh ya‘aseh li ’elohim wekhoh yosif, ki ’im lifnei wo hashemesh ’eT‘am leHem ’o khal me’umah. 
2_samuel 3:36	wekhal ha‘am hikiru, wayiTaw be‘eineihem; kekhol ’asher ‘asah hamelekh, be‘einei khal ha‘am Tow. 
2_samuel 3:37	wayeide‘u khal ha‘am wekhal yisra’eil bayom hahu; ki lo hayetah meihamelekh, lehamit ’et ’awneir ben neir.
2_samuel 3:38	wayomer hamelekh ’el ‘awadaw; halo teide‘u, ki sar wegadol, nafal hayom hacceh beyisra’eil. 
2_samuel 3:39	we’anokhi hayom rakh umashuaH melekh, weha’anashim ha’eileh benei zeruyah qashim mimeni; yeshaleim yhoh le‘oseih hara‘ah kera‘ato.
2_samuel 4:1	wayishma‘ ben sha’ul, ki meit ’awneir beHewron, wayirpu yadaw; wekhal yisra’eil niwhalu. 
2_samuel 4:2	ushenei ’anashim sarei gedudim hayu wen sha’ul sheim ha’eHad ba‘anah wesheim hasheini reikhaw, benei rimon habe’eroti mibenei winyamin; ki gam be’eirot, teiHasheiw ‘al binyamin. 
2_samuel 4:3	wayiwreHu habe’eirotim gitayemah; wayihyu sham garim, ‘ad hayom hacceh.
2_samuel 4:4	welihonatan ben sha’ul, bein nekheih raglayim; ben Hameish shanim hayah bewo shemu‘at sha’ul wihonatan miyicre‘el, watisa’eihu ’omanto watanos, wayhi beHafecah lanus wayipol wayipaseiaH ushemo mefiwoshet. 
2_samuel 4:5	wayeilekhu benei rimon habe’eiroti reikhaw uwa‘anah, wayawo’u keHom hayom, ’el beit ’ish boshet; wehu shokheiw, ’eit mishkaw hazahorayim. 
2_samuel 4:6	weheinah ba’u ‘ad tokh habayit loqeHei HiTim, wayakuhu ’el haHomesh; wereikhaw uwa‘anah ’aHiw nimlaTu. 
2_samuel 4:7	wayawo’u habayit, wehu shokheiw ‘al miTato baHadar mishkawo, wayakuhu waymituhu, wayasiru ’et rosho; wayiqHu ’et rosho, wayeilekhu derekh ha‘arawah kal halayelah. 
2_samuel 4:8	wayawi’u ’et rosh ’ish boshet ’el dawid Hewron wayomeru ’el hamelekh, hineih rosh ’ish boshet, ben sha’ul ’oyiwkha, ’asher biqeish ’et nafshekha; wayitein yhoh ladoni hamelekh neqamot hayom hacceh, misha’ul umiccar‘o.
2_samuel 4:9	waya‘an dawid ’et reikhaw we’et ba‘anah ’aHiw, benei rimon habe’eiroti wayomer lahem; Hay yhoh ’asher padah ’et nafshi mikal zarah. 
2_samuel 4:10	ki hamagid li leimor hineih meit sha’ul, wehu hayah khimwaseir be‘einaw, wa’oHacah wo, wa’ehregeihu beziqlag; ’asher letiti lo besorah. 
2_samuel 4:11	’af ki ’anashim resha‘im, haregu ’et ’ish zadiq beweito ‘al mishkawo; we‘atah, halo ’awaqeish ’et damo miyedkhem, uwi‘arti ’etkhem min ha’arez. 
2_samuel 4:12	wayzaw dawid ’et hane‘arim wayahargum, wayqazezu ’et yedeihem we’et ragleihem, wayitlu ‘al habereikhah beHewron; we’eit rosh ’ish boshet laqaHu, wayiqberu weqewer ’awneir beHewron.
2_samuel 5:1	wayawo’u kal shiwTei yisra’eil ’el dawid Hewronah; wayomeru leimor, hinu ‘azmekha uwesarekha ’anaHenu. 
2_samuel 5:2	gam ’etmol gam shilshom, bihyot sha’ul melekh ‘aleinu, ’atah, hayitah hayita mozi hamozi wehameiwi wehameiwi ’et yisra’eil; wayomer yhoh lekha, ’atah tir‘eh ’et ‘ami ’et yisra’eil, we’atah tihyeh lenagid ‘al yisra’eil. 
2_samuel 5:3	wayawo’u kal ciqnei yisra’eil ’el hamelekh Hewronah, wayikhrot lahem hamelekh dawid berit beHewron lifnei yhoh; wayimsheHu ’et dawid lemelekh ‘al yisra’eil.
2_samuel 5:4	ben sheloshim shanah dawid bemalekho; ’arba‘im shanah malakh. 
2_samuel 5:5	beHewron malakh ‘al yehudah, shewa‘ shanim weshishah Hodashim; uwirushalim malakh, sheloshim weshalosh shanah, ‘al kal yisra’eil wihudah. 
2_samuel 5:6	wayeilekh hamelekh wa’anashaw yerushalim, ’el haywusi yosheiw ha’arez; wayomer ledawid leimor lo tawo heinah, ki ’im hesirekha, ha‘iwrim wehapisHim leimor, lo yawo dawid heinah. 
2_samuel 5:7	wayilkod dawid, ’eit mezudat ziyon; hi ‘ir dawid. 
2_samuel 5:8	wayomer dawid bayom hahu, kal makeih yewusi weyiga‘ bazinor, we’et hapisHim we’et ha‘iwrim, seno senu’ei nefesh dawid; ‘al kein yomeru, ‘iwweir ufisseiaH, lo yawo ’el habayit. 
2_samuel 5:9	wayeishew dawid bamezudah, wayiqra lah ‘ir dawid; wayiwen dawid sawiw, min hamilo wawayetah. 
2_samuel 5:10	wayeilekh dawid halokh wegadol; yhoh ’elohei zewa’ot ‘imo.
2_samuel 5:11	wayishlaH Hiram melekh zor mal’akhim ’el dawid wa‘azei ’aracim, weHarashei ‘eiz, weHarashei ’ewen qir; wayiwnu wayit ledawid. 
2_samuel 5:12	wayeida‘ dawid, ki hekhino yhoh lemelekh ‘al yisra’eil; wekhi nisei mamlakhto, ba‘awur ‘amo yisra’eil.
2_samuel 5:13	wayiqaH dawid ‘od pilagshim wenashim mirushalim, ’aHarei bo’o meiHewron; wayiwwaledu ‘od ledawid banim uwanot. 
2_samuel 5:14	we’eileh, shemot hayilodim lo birushalim; shamua‘ weshowaw, wenatan ushelomoh. 
2_samuel 5:15	weyiwHar we’elishua‘ wenefeg weyafia‘. 
2_samuel 5:16	we’elishama‘ we’elyada‘ we’elifaleT.
2_samuel 5:17	wayishme‘u felishtim, ki masheHu ’et dawid lemelekh ‘al yisra’eil, waya‘alu khal pelishtim lewaqeish ’et dawid; wayishma‘ dawid, wayeired ’el hamezudah. 
2_samuel 5:18	ufelishtim ba’u; wayinaTeshu be‘eimeq refa’im. 
2_samuel 5:19	wayish’al dawid yhoh leimor, ha’e‘eleh ’el pelishtim, hatiteneim beyadi; wayomer yhoh ’el dawid ‘aleih, ki naton ’etein ’et hapelishtim beyadekha. 
2_samuel 5:20	wayawo dawid bewa‘al perazim wayakeim sham dawid wayomer paraz yhoh ’et ’oyeway lefanay keferez mayim; ‘al kein, qara sheim hamaqom hahu ba‘al perazim. 
2_samuel 5:21	waya‘acwu sham ’et ‘azabeihem; wayisa’eim dawid wa’anashaw.
2_samuel 5:22	wayosifu ‘od pelishtim la‘alot; wayinaTeshu be‘eimeq refa’im. 
2_samuel 5:23	wayish’al dawid yhoh, wayomer lo ta‘aleh; haseiw ’el ’aHareihem, uwata lahem mimul bekha’im. 
2_samuel 5:24	wihi beshame‘akha keshame‘akha ’et qol ze‘adah berashei habekha’im ’ac teHeraz; ki ’ac, yaza yhoh lefanekha, lehakot bemaHaneih felishtim. 
2_samuel 5:25	waya‘as dawid kein, ka’asher ziwwahu yhoh; wayakh ’et pelishtim, migewa‘ ‘ad bo’akha gacer.
2_samuel 6:1	wayosef ‘od dawid ’et kal baHur beyisra’eil sheloshim ’alef. 
2_samuel 6:2	wayaqam wayeilekh dawid, wekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito, miba‘alei yehudah; leha‘alot misham, ’eit ’aron ha’elohim, ’asher niqra sheim, sheim yhoh zewa’ot yosheiw hakeruwim ‘alaw. 
2_samuel 6:3	wayarkiwu ’et ’aron ha’elohim ’el ‘agalah Hadashah, wayisa’uhu, mibeit ’awinadaw ’asher bagiw‘ah; we‘ucca we’aHyo, benei ’awinadaw, nohagim ’et ha‘agalah Hadashah. 
2_samuel 6:4	wayisa’uhu, mibeit ’awinadaw ’asher bagiw‘ah, ‘im ’aron ha’elohim; we’aHyo holeikh lifnei ha’aron. 
2_samuel 6:5	wedawid wekhal beit yisra’eil, mesaHaqim lifnei yhoh, bekhol ‘azei weroshim; uwekhinorot uwinwalim uwetupim, uwimna‘an‘im uwezelzelim. 
2_samuel 6:6	wayawo’u ‘ad goren nakhon; wayishlaH ‘ucca ’el ’aron ha’elohim wayoHec bo, ki shameTu habaqar. 
2_samuel 6:7	wayiHar ’af yhoh be‘uccah, wayakeihu sham ha’elohim ‘al hashal; wayamat sham, ‘im ’aron ha’elohim. 
2_samuel 6:8	wayiHar ledawid, ‘al ’asher paraz yhoh perez be‘uccah; wayiqra lamaqom hahu perez ‘uccah, ‘ad hayom hacceh. 
2_samuel 6:9	wayira dawid ’et yhoh bayom hahu; wayomer ’eikh yawo ’eilay ’aron yhoh. 
2_samuel 6:10	welo ’awah dawid, lehasir ’eilaw ’et ’aron yhoh ‘al ‘ir dawid; wayaTeihu dawid, beit ‘oweid ’edom hagiti. 
2_samuel 6:11	wayeishew ’aron yhoh beit ‘oweid ’edom hagiti sheloshah Hodashim; waywarekh yhoh ’et ‘oweid ’edom we’et kal beito. 
2_samuel 6:12	wayugad, lamelekh dawid leimor beirakh yhoh ’et beit ‘oweid ’edom we’et kal ’asher lo, ba‘awur ’aron ha’elohim; wayeilekh dawid, waya‘al ’et ’aron ha’elohim mibeit ‘oweid ’edom ‘ir dawid besimHah. 
2_samuel 6:13	wayhi, ki za‘adu nose’ei ’aron yhoh shishah ze‘adim; wayicbaH shor umeri. 
2_samuel 6:14	wedawid mekharkeir bekhal ‘oc lifnei yhoh; wedawid Hagur ’eifod bad. 
2_samuel 6:15	wedawid wekhal beit yisra’eil, ma‘alim ’et ’aron yhoh; bitru‘ah uweqol shofar. 
2_samuel 6:16	wehayah ’aron yhoh, ba ‘ir dawid; umikhal bat sha’ul nishqefah be‘ad haHalon, wateire ’et hamelekh dawid mefacceic umekharkeir lifnei yhoh, watiwec lo belibah. 
2_samuel 6:17	wayawi’u ’et ’aron yhoh wayazigu ’oto bimqomo, betokh ha’ohel, ’asher naTah lo dawid; waya‘al dawid ‘olot lifnei yhoh ushelamim. 
2_samuel 6:18	waykhal dawid, meiha‘alot ha‘olah wehashelamim; waywarekh ’et ha‘am, besheim yhoh zewa’ot. 
2_samuel 6:19	wayHaleiq lekhal ha‘am lekhal hamon yisra’eil lemei’ish we‘ad ’ishah le’ish, Halat leHem ’aHat, we’eshpar ’eHad, wa’ashishah ’eHat; wayeilekh kal ha‘am ’ish leweito. 
2_samuel 6:20	wayashaw dawid lewareikh ’et beito; wateizei mikhal bat sha’ul liqrat dawid, watomer, mah nikhbad hayom melekh yisra’eil, ’asher niglah hayom le‘einei ’amhot ‘awadaw, kehigalot niglot ’aHad hareiqim. 
2_samuel 6:21	wayomer dawid ’el mikhal lifnei yhoh ’asher baHar bi mei’awikh umikal beito, lezawwot ’oti nagid ‘al ‘am yhoh ‘al yisra’eil; wesiHaqti lifnei yhoh. 
2_samuel 6:22	uneqaloti ‘od miccot, wehayiti shafal be‘einay; we‘im ha’amahot ’asher ’amart, ‘imam ’ikaweidah. 
2_samuel 6:23	ulemikhal bat sha’ul, lo hayah lah yaled; ‘ad yom motah.
2_samuel 7:1	wayhi ki yashaw hamelekh beweito; yhoh heiniaH lo missawiw mikal ’oyewaw. 
2_samuel 7:2	wayomer hamelekh ’el natan hanawi, re’eih na, ’anokhi yosheiw beweit ’aracim; wa’aron ha’elohim, yosheiw betokh hayri‘ah. 
2_samuel 7:3	wayomer natan ’el hamelekh, kol ’asher bilwawekha leikh ‘aseih; ki yhoh ‘imakh.
2_samuel 7:4	wayhi balaylah hahu; wayhi dewar yhoh, ’el natan leimor. 
2_samuel 7:5	leikh we’amarta ’el ‘awdi ’el dawid, koh ’amar yhoh; ha’atah tiwneh li wayit leshiwti. 
2_samuel 7:6	ki lo yashawti bewayit, lemiyom ha‘aloti ’et benei yisra’eil mimizrayim, we‘ad hayom hacceh; wa’ehyeh mithaleikh, be’ohel uwemishkan. 
2_samuel 7:7	bekhol ’asher hithalakhti bekhal benei yisra’eil hadawar dibarti, ’et ’aHad shiwTei yisra’eil, ’asher ziwwiti, lir‘ot ’et ‘ami ’et yisra’eil leimor; lamah lo wenitem li beit ’aracim. 
2_samuel 7:8	we‘atah koh tomar le‘awdi ledawid, koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot, ’ani leqaHtikha min hanaweh, mei’aHar hazon; lihyot nagid, ‘al ‘ami ‘al yisra’eil. 
2_samuel 7:9	wa’ehyeh ‘imekha, bekhol ’asher halakhta, wa’akhritah ’et kal ’oyewekha mipanekha; we‘asiti lekha sheim gadol, kesheim hagedolim ’asher ba’arez. 
2_samuel 7:10	wesamti maqom le‘ami leyisra’eil uneTa‘tiw weshakhan taHtaw, welo yirgac ‘od; welo yosifu wenei ‘awlah le‘anoto, ka’asher barishonah. 
2_samuel 7:11	ulemin hayom, ’asher ziwwiti shofeTim ‘al ‘ami yisra’eil, wahaniHoti lekha mikal ’oyewekha; wehigid lekha yhoh, ki wayit ya‘aseh lekha yhoh. 
2_samuel 7:12	ki yimle’u yamekha, weshakhawta ’et ’awotekha, wahaqimoti ’et car‘akha ’aHarekha, ’asher yeizei mimei‘ekha; wahakhinoti ’et mamlakhto. 
2_samuel 7:13	hu yiwneh bayit lishmi; wekhonanti ’et kissei mamlakhto ‘ad ‘olam. 
2_samuel 7:14	’ani ’ehyeh lo le’aw, wehu yihyeh li lewein; ’asher beha‘awoto, wehokhaHtiw besheiweT ’anashim, uwenig‘ei benei ’adam. 
2_samuel 7:15	weHasdi lo yasur mimenu; ka’asher hasiroti mei‘im sha’ul, ’asher hasiroti milefanekha. 
2_samuel 7:16	wene’man beitekha umamlakhtekha ‘ad ‘olam lefanekha; kis’akha, yihyeh nakhon ‘ad ‘olam. 
2_samuel 7:17	kekhol hadewarim ha’eileh, ukhekhol haHiccayon hacceh; kein diber natan ’el dawid.
2_samuel 7:18	wayawo hamelekh dawid, wayeishew lifnei yhoh; wayomer, mi ’anokhi ’adonay yhoh umi weiti, ki hawi’otani ‘ad halom. 
2_samuel 7:19	watiqTan ‘od cot be‘einekha ’adonay yhoh, watedabeir gam ’el beit ‘awdekha lemeiraHoq; wecot torat ha’adam ’adonay yhoh. 
2_samuel 7:20	umah yosif dawid ‘od ledabeir ’eilekha; we’atah yada‘ta ’et ‘awdekha ’adonay yhoh. 
2_samuel 7:21	ba‘awur dewarekha ukhelibekha, ‘asita ’eit kal hagedulah haccot; lehodia‘ ’et ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 7:22	‘al kein gadalta ’adonay yhoh; ki ’ein kamokha, we’ein ’elohim culatekha, bekhol ’asher shama‘nu be’aceneinu. 
2_samuel 7:23	umi khe‘amekha keyisra’eil, go ’eHad ba’arez; ’asher halekhu ’elohim lifdot lo le‘am welasum lo sheim, wela‘asot lakhem hagedulah wenora’ot le’arzekha, mipenei ‘amekha, ’asher padita lekha mimizrayim, goyim weilohaw. 
2_samuel 7:24	watekhonein lekha ’et ‘amekha yisra’eil lekha le‘am ‘ad ‘olam; we’atah yhoh, hayita lahem leilohim.
2_samuel 7:25	we‘atah yhoh ’elohim, hadawar, ’asher dibarta ‘al ‘awdekha we‘al beito, haqeim ‘ad ‘olam; wa‘aseih ka’asher dibarta. 
2_samuel 7:26	weyigdal shimkha ‘ad ‘olam leimor, yhoh zewa’ot, ’elohim ‘al yisra’eil; uweit ‘awdekha dawid, yihyeh nakhon lefanekha. 
2_samuel 7:27	ki ’atah yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, galitah ’et ’ocen ‘awdekha leimor, bayit ’ewneh lakh; ‘al kein, maza ‘awdekha ’et libo, lehitpaleil ’eilekha, ’et hatefilah haccot. 
2_samuel 7:28	we‘atah ’adonay yhoh ’atah hu ha’elohim, udewarekha yihyu ’emet; watedabeir ’el ‘awdekha, ’et haTowah haccot. 
2_samuel 7:29	we‘atah, ho’eil uwareikh ’et beit ‘awdekha, lihyot le‘olam lefanekha; ki ’atah ’adonay yhoh dibarta, umibirkhatekha, yeworakh beit ‘awdekha le‘olam.
2_samuel 8:1	wayhi ’aHarei khein, wayakh dawid ’et pelishtim wayakhni‘eim; wayiqaH dawid ’et meteg ha’amah miyad pelishtim. 
2_samuel 8:2	wayakh ’et mo’aw, waymadedeim baHewel hashkeiw ’otam ’arzah, waymadeid shenei Hawalim lehamit, umelo haHewel lehaHayot; watehi mo’aw ledawid, la‘awadim nose’ei minHah. 
2_samuel 8:3	wayakh dawid, ’et hadad‘ecer ben reHow melekh zowah; belekhto lehashiw yado binhar perat 
2_samuel 8:4	wayilkod dawid mimenu, ’elef ushewa‘ mei’ot parashim, we‘esrim ’elef ’ish ragli; way‘aqeir dawid ’et kal harekhew, wayoteir mimenu mei’ah rakhew. 
2_samuel 8:5	watawo ’aram dameseq, la‘cor lahadad‘ecer melekh zowah; wayakh dawid ba’aram, ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef ’ish. 
2_samuel 8:6	wayasem dawid neziwim ba’aram dameseq, watehi ’aram ledawid, la‘awadim nos’ei minHah; wayosha‘ yhoh ’et dawid, bekhol ’asher halakh. 
2_samuel 8:7	wayiqaH dawid, ’eit shilTei haccahaw, ’asher hayu, ’el ‘awdei hadad‘acer; waywi’eim yerushalim. 
2_samuel 8:8	umibeTaH umibeirotay ‘arei hadad‘acer; laqaH hamelekh dawid neHoshet harbeih me’od.
2_samuel 8:9	wayishma‘ to‘i melekh Hamat; ki hikah dawid, ’eit kal Heil hadad‘acer. 
2_samuel 8:10	wayishlaH to‘i ’et yoram beno ’el hamelekh dawid lish’al lo leshalom ulewarakho, ‘al ’asher nilHam bahadad‘ecer wayakeihu, ki ’ish milHamot to‘i hayah hadad‘acer; uweyado, hayu kelei khesef ukhelei cahaw ukhelei neHoshet. 
2_samuel 8:11	gam ’otam hiqdish hamelekh dawid yhoh; ‘im hakesef wehaccahaw ’asher hiqdish, mikal hagoyim ’asher kibeish. 
2_samuel 8:12	mei’aram umimo’aw umibenei ‘amon, umipelishtim umei‘amaleiq; umishelal hadad‘ecer ben reHow melekh zowah. 
2_samuel 8:13	waya‘as dawid sheim, beshuwo meihakoto ’et ’aram begei melaH; shemonah ‘asar ’alef. 
2_samuel 8:14	wayasem be’edom neziwim, bekhal ’edom sam neziwim, wayhi khal ’edom ‘awadim ledawid; wayosha‘ yhoh ’et dawid, bekhol ’asher halakh. 
2_samuel 8:15	wayimlokh dawid ‘al kal yisra’eil; wayhi dawid, ‘oseh mishpaT uzedaqah lekhal ‘amo. 
2_samuel 8:16	weyo’aw ben zeruyah ‘al hazawa; wihoshafaT ben ’aHilud mackir. 
2_samuel 8:17	wezadoq ben ’aHiTuw wa’aHimelekh ben ’ewyatar kohanim; userayah sofeir. 
2_samuel 8:18	uwenayahu ben yehoyada‘, wehakereiti wehapeleiti; uwenei dawid kohanim hayu.
2_samuel 9:1	wayomer dawid, hakhi yesh ‘od, ’asher notar leweit sha’ul; we’e‘eseh ‘imo Hesed, ba‘awur yehonatan. 
2_samuel 9:2	uleweit sha’ul ‘ewed ushemo ziwa, wayiqre’u lo ’el dawid; wayomer hamelekh ’eilaw ha’atah ziwa wayomer ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 9:3	wayomer hamelekh, ha’efes ‘od ’ish leweit sha’ul, we’e‘eseh ‘imo Hesed ’elohim; wayomer ziwa ’el hamelekh, ‘od bein lihonatan nekheih raglayim. 
2_samuel 9:4	wayomer lo hamelekh ’eifoh hu; wayomer ziwa ’el hamelekh, hineih hu, beit makhir ben ‘ami’eil belo dewar. 
2_samuel 9:5	wayishlaH hamelekh dawid; wayiqaHeihu, mibeit makhir ben ‘ami’eil milo dewar. 
2_samuel 9:6	wayawo mefiwoshet ben yehonatan ben sha’ul ’el dawid, wayipol ‘al panaw wayishtaHu; wayomer dawid mefiwoshet, wayomer hineih ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 9:7	wayomer lo dawid ’al tira, ki ‘asoh ’e‘eseh ‘imekha Hesed ba‘awur yehonatan ’awikha, wahashiwoti lekha, ’et kal sedeih sha’ul ’awikha; we’atah, tokhal leHem ‘al shulHani tamid. 
2_samuel 9:8	wayishtaHu wayomer meh ‘awdekha; ki fanita, ’el hakelew hameit ’asher kamoni. 
2_samuel 9:9	wayiqra hamelekh, ’el ziwa na‘ar sha’ul wayomer ’eilaw; kol ’asher hayah lesha’ul ulekhal beito, natati lewen ’adonekha. 
2_samuel 9:10	we‘awadta lo ’et ha’adamah ’atah uwanekha wa‘awadekha weheiweita, wehayah lewen ’adonekha leHem wa’akhalo, umefiwoshet ben ’adonekha, yokhal tamid leHem ‘al shulHani; uleziwa, Hamishah ‘asar banim we‘esrim ‘awadim. 
2_samuel 9:11	wayomer ziwa ’el hamelekh, kekhol ’asher yezawweh ’adoni hamelekh ’et ‘awdo, kein ya‘aseh ‘awdekha; umefiwoshet, ’okheil ‘al shulHani, ke’aHad mibenei hamelekh. 
2_samuel 9:12	welimfiwoshet bein qaTan ushemo mikha; wekhol moshaw beit ziwa, ‘awadim limfiwoshet. 
2_samuel 9:13	umefiwoshet, yosheiw birushalim, ki ‘al shulHan hamelekh tamid hu ’okheil; wehu pisseiaH shetei raglaw.
2_samuel 10:1	wayhi ’aHarei khein, wayamat melekh benei ‘amon; wayimlokh Hanun beno taHtaw. 
2_samuel 10:2	wayomer dawid ’e‘eseh Hesed ‘im Hanun ben naHash, ka’asher ‘asah ’awiw ‘imadi Hesed, wayishlaH dawid lenaHamo beyad ‘awadaw ’el ’awiw; wayawo’u ‘awdei dawid, ’erez benei ‘amon. 
2_samuel 10:3	wayomeru sarei wenei ‘amon ’el Hanun ’adoneihem, hamkhabeid dawid ’et ’awikha be‘einekha, ki shalaH lekha menaHamim; halo ba‘awur Haqor ’et ha‘ir uleragelah ulehafekhah, shalaH dawid ’et ‘awadaw ’eilekha. 
2_samuel 10:4	wayiqaH Hanun ’et ‘awdei dawid, waygalaH ’et Hazi ceqanam, wayikhrot ’et madweihem baHeizi ‘ad shetoteihem; wayshaleHeim. 
2_samuel 10:5	wayagidu ledawid wayishlaH liqratam, ki hayu ha’anashim nikhlamim me’od; wayomer hamelekh shewu wireiHo, ‘ad yezamaH ceqankhem weshawtem. 
2_samuel 10:6	wayir’u benei ‘amon, ki niw’ashu bedawid; wayishleHu wenei ‘amon wayiskeru ’et ’aram beit reHow we’et ’aram zowa, ‘esrim ’elef ragli, we’et melekh ma‘akhah ’elef ’ish, we’ish Tow, sheneim ‘asar ’elef ’ish. 
2_samuel 10:7	wayishma‘ dawid; wayishlaH ’et yo’aw, we’eit kal hazawa hagiborim. 
2_samuel 10:8	wayeize’u benei ‘amon, waya‘arkhu milHamah petaH hasha‘ar; wa’aram zowa ureHow we’ish Tow uma‘akhah, lewadam basadeh. 
2_samuel 10:9	wayar yo’aw, ki hayetah ’eilaw penei hamilHamah, mipanim umei’aHor; wayiwHar, mikol beHurei beyisra’eil yisra’eil, waya‘arokh liqrat ’aram. 
2_samuel 10:10	we’eit yeter ha‘am, natan beyad ’awshay ’aHiw; waya‘arokh liqrat benei ‘amon. 
2_samuel 10:11	wayomer, ’im teHecaq ’aram mimeni, wehayitah li lishu‘ah; we’im benei ‘amon yeHecqu mimekha, wehalakhti lehoshia‘ lakh. 
2_samuel 10:12	Hacaq wenitHaccaq be‘ad ‘ameinu, uwe‘ad ‘arei ’eloheinu; yhoh, ya‘aseh haTow be‘einaw. 
2_samuel 10:13	wayigash yo’aw, weha‘am ’asher ‘imo, lamilHamah ba’aram; wayanusu mipanaw. 
2_samuel 10:14	uwenei ‘amon ra’u ki nas ’aram, wayanusu mipenei ’awishay, wayawo’u ha‘ir; wayashaw yo’aw, mei‘al benei ‘amon, wayawo yerushalim. 
2_samuel 10:15	wayar ’aram, ki nigaf lifnei yisra’eil; wayei’asefu yaHad. 
2_samuel 10:16	wayishlaH hadad‘ecer, wayozei ’et ’aram ’asher mei‘eiwer hanahar, wayawo’u Heilam; weshowakh sar zewa hadad‘ecer lifneihem. 
2_samuel 10:17	wayugad ledawid, s waye’esof ’et kal yisra’eil waya‘awor ’et hayardein, wayawo Heilamah; waya‘arkhu ’aram liqrat dawid, wayilaHamu ‘imo. 
2_samuel 10:18	wayanas ’aram mipenei yisra’eil wayaharog dawid mei’aram, shewa‘ mei’ot rekhew, we’arba‘im ’elef parashim; we’eit showakh sar zewa’o hikah wayamat sham. 
2_samuel 10:19	wayir’u khal hamelakhim ‘awdei hadad‘ecer, ki nigefu lifnei yisra’eil, wayashlimu ’et yisra’eil waya‘awdum; wayir’u ’aram, lehoshia‘ ‘od ’et benei ‘amon.
2_samuel 11:1	wayhi litshuwat hashanah le‘eit zeit hamalkhim, wayishlaH dawid ’et yo’aw we’et ‘awadaw ‘imo we’et kal yisra’eil, wayashHitu ’et benei ‘amon, wayazuru ‘al rabah; wedawid yosheiw birushalim.
2_samuel 11:2	wayhi le‘eit ha‘erew, wayaqam dawid mei‘al mishkawo wayithaleikh ‘al gag beit hamelekh, wayar ’ishah roHezet mei‘al hagag; weha’ishah, Towat mar’eh me’od. 
2_samuel 11:3	wayishlaH dawid, wayidrosh la’ishah; wayomer, halo cot bat shewa‘ bat ’eli‘am, ’eishet ’uriyah haHiti. 
2_samuel 11:4	wayishlaH dawid mal’akhim wayiqaHeha, watawo ’eilaw wayishkaw ‘imah, wehi mitqadeshet miTum’atah; watashaw ’el beitah. 
2_samuel 11:5	watahar ha’ishah; watishlaH watageid ledawid, watomer harah ’anokhi. 
2_samuel 11:6	wayishlaH dawid ’el yo’aw, shelaH ’eilay, ’et ’uriyah haHiti; wayishlaH yo’aw ’et ’uriyah ’el dawid. 
2_samuel 11:7	wayawo ’uriyah ’eilaw; wayish’al dawid, lishlom yo’aw welishlom ha‘am, welishlom hamilHamah. 
2_samuel 11:8	wayomer dawid le’uriyah, reid leweitekha ureHaz raglekha; wayeizei ’uriyah mibeit hamelekh, wateizei ’aHaraw mas’at hamelekh. 
2_samuel 11:9	wayishkaw ’uriyah, petaH beit hamelekh, ’eit kal ‘awdei ’adonaw; welo yarad ’el beito. 
2_samuel 11:10	wayagidu ledawid leimor, lo yarad ’uriyah ’el beito; wayomer dawid ’el ’uriyah, halo miderekh ’atah wa, madua‘ lo yaradta ’el beitekha. 
2_samuel 11:11	wayomer ’uriyah ’el dawid, ha’aron weyisra’eil wihudah yoshewim bassukot, wadoni yo’aw we‘awdei ’adoni ‘al penei hasadeh Honim, wa’ani ’awo ’el beiti le’ekhol welishtot welishkaw ‘im ’ishti; Hayekha weHei nafshekha, ’im ’e‘eseh ’et hadawar hacceh. 
2_samuel 11:12	wayomer dawid ’el ’uriyah, sheiw baceh gam hayom umaHar ’ashaleHeka; wayeishew ’uriyah wirushalim bayom hahu umimaHorat. 
2_samuel 11:13	wayiqra lo dawid, wayokhal lefanaw wayeishet wayshakereihu; wayeizei wa‘erew, lishkaw bemishkawo ‘im ‘awdei ’adonaw, we’el beito lo yarad. 
2_samuel 11:14	wayhi waboqer, wayikhtow dawid seifer ’el yo’aw; wayishlaH beyad ’uriyah. 
2_samuel 11:15	wayikhtow basseifer leimor; hawu ’et ’uriyah, ’el mul penei hamilHamah haHacaqah, weshawtem mei’aHaraw wenikah wameit.
2_samuel 11:16	wayhi bishmor yo’aw ’el ha‘ir; wayitein ’et ’uriyah, ’el hamaqom ’asher yada‘, ki ’anshei Hayil sham. 
2_samuel 11:17	wayeize’u ’anshei ha‘ir wayilaHamu ’et yo’aw, wayipol min ha‘am mei‘awdei dawid; wayamat gam ’uriyah haHiti. 
2_samuel 11:18	wayishlaH yo’aw; wayageid ledawid, ’et kal diwrei hamilHamah. 
2_samuel 11:19	wayzaw ’et hamal’akh leimor; kekhalotkha, ’eit kal diwrei hamilHamah ledabeir ’el hamelekh. 
2_samuel 11:20	wehayah, ’im ta‘aleh Hamat hamelekh, we’amar lekha, madua‘ nigashtem ’el ha‘ir lehilaHeim; halo yeda‘tem, ’eit ’asher yoru mei‘al haHomah. 
2_samuel 11:21	mi hikah ’et ’awimelekh ben yerubeshet, halo ’ishah hishlikhah ‘alaw pelaH rekhew mei‘al haHomah wayamat beteiweiz, lamah nigashtem ’el haHomah; we’amarta, gam, ‘awdekha ’uriyah haHiti meit. 
2_samuel 11:22	wayeilekh hamal’akh; wayawo wayageid ledawid, ’eit kal ’asher shelaHo yo’aw. 
2_samuel 11:23	wayomer hamal’akh ’el dawid, ki gaweru ‘aleinu ha’anashim, wayeize’u ’eileinu hasadeh; wanihyeh ‘aleihem ‘ad petaH hasha‘ar. 
2_samuel 11:24	wayore’u wayoru hamor’im hamorim ’el ‘awadekha mei‘al haHomah, wayamutu mei‘awdei hamelekh; wegam, ‘awdekha ’uriyah haHiti meit.
2_samuel 11:25	wayomer dawid ’el hamal’akh, koh tomar ’el yo’aw ’al yeira‘ be‘einekha ’et hadawar hacceh, ki khacoh wekhaceh tokhal heHarew; haHaceiq milHamtekha ’el ha‘ir weharesah weHacceqeihu. 
2_samuel 11:26	watishma‘ ’eishet ’uriyah, ki meit ’uriyah ’ishah; watispod ‘al ba‘lah. 
2_samuel 11:27	waya‘awor ha’eiwel, wayishlaH dawid waya’asfah ’el beito watehi lo le’ishah, wateiled lo bein; wayeira‘ hadawar ’asher ‘asah dawid be‘einei yhoh.
2_samuel 12:1	wayishlaH yhoh ’et natan ’el dawid; wayawo ’eilaw, wayomer lo shenei ’anashim, hayu be‘ir ’eHat, ’eHad ‘ashir we’eHad rash. 
2_samuel 12:2	le‘ashir, hayah zon uwaqar harbeih me’od. 
2_samuel 12:3	welarash ’ein kol, ki ’im kiwsah ’aHat qeTanah ’asher qanah, wayHayeha watigdal ‘imo we‘im banaw yaHdaw; mipito tokhal umikoso tishteh uweHeiqo tishkaw, watehi lo kewat. 
2_samuel 12:4	wayawo heilekh le’ish he‘ashir wayaHmol, laqaHat mizono umibeqaro, la‘asot la’oreiaH haba lo; wayiqaH, ’et kiwsat ha’ish harash, waya‘aseha, la’ish haba ’eilaw. 
2_samuel 12:5	wayiHar ’af dawid ba’ish me’od; wayomer ’el natan, Hay yhoh ki wen mawet, ha’ish ha‘oseh cot. 
2_samuel 12:6	we’et hakiwsah yeshaleim ’arba‘tayim; ‘eiqew, ’asher ‘asah ’et hadawar hacceh, we‘al ’asher lo Hamal. 
2_samuel 12:7	wayomer natan ’el dawid ’atah ha’ish; koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’anokhi meshaHtikha lemelekh ‘al yisra’eil, we’anokhi hizaltikha miyad sha’ul. 
2_samuel 12:8	wa’etenah lekha ’et beit ’adonekha, we’et neshei ’adonekha beHeiqekha, wa’etenah lekha, ’et beit yisra’eil wihudah; we’im me‘aT, we’osifah lekha kaheinah wekhaheinah. 
2_samuel 12:9	madua‘ bacita ’et dewar yhoh la‘asot hara‘ be‘eino be‘einay ’eit ’uriyah haHiti hikita waHerew, we’et ’ishto, laqaHta lekha le’ishah; we’oto haragta, beHerew benei ‘amon. 
2_samuel 12:10	we‘atah, lo tasur Herew mibeitekha ‘ad ‘olam; ‘eiqew ki wecitani, watiqaH, ’et ’eishet ’uriyah haHiti, lihyot lekha le’ishah.
2_samuel 12:11	koh ’amar yhoh hini meiqim ‘alekha ra‘ah mibeitekha, welaqaHti ’et nashekha le‘einekha, wenatati lerei‘ekha; weshakhaw ‘im nashekha, le‘einei hashemesh haccot. 
2_samuel 12:12	ki ’atah ‘asita wassater; wa’ani, ’e‘eseh ’et hadawar hacceh, neged kal yisra’eil weneged hashamesh.
2_samuel 12:13	wayomer dawid ’el natan, HaTati yhoh; s wayomer natan ’el dawid, gam yhoh he‘ewir HaTatekha lo tamut. 
2_samuel 12:14	’efes, ki ni’eiz ni’azta ’et ’oyewei yhoh, badawar hacceh; gam, habein hayilod lekha mot yamut. 
2_samuel 12:15	wayeilekh natan ’el beito; wayigof yhoh ’et hayeled ’asher yaledah ’eishet ’uriyah ledawid wayei’anash. 
2_samuel 12:16	waywaqeish dawid ’et ha’elohim be‘ad hana‘ar; wayazam dawid zom, uwa welan weshakhaw ’arezah. 
2_samuel 12:17	wayaqumu ciqnei weito ‘alaw, lahaqimo min ha’arez; welo ’awah, welo wara ’itam laHem. 
2_samuel 12:18	wayhi bayom hashewi‘i wayamat hayaled; wayir’u ‘awdei dawid lehagid lo ki meit hayeled, ki ’ameru hineih wihyot hayeled Hay, dibarnu ’eilaw welo shama‘ beqoleinu, we’eikh nomar ’eilaw meit hayeled we‘asah ra‘ah. 
2_samuel 12:19	wayar dawid, ki ‘awadaw mitlaHashim, wayawen dawid ki meit hayaled; wayomer dawid ’el ‘awadaw hameit hayeled wayomeru meit. 
2_samuel 12:20	wayaqam dawid meiha’arez wayirHaz wayasekh, wayHaleif simloto simlotaw, wayawo weit yhoh wayishtaHu; wayawo ’el beito, wayish’al wayasimu lo leHem wayokhal. 
2_samuel 12:21	wayomeru ‘awadaw ’eilaw, mah hadawar hacceh ’asher ‘asitah; ba‘awur hayeled Hay zamta wateiwek, wekha’asher meit hayeled, qamta watokhal laHem. 
2_samuel 12:22	wayomer be‘od hayeled Hay, zamti wa’ewkeh; ki ’amarti mi yodeia‘, yeHanani weHanani yhoh weHay hayaled. 
2_samuel 12:23	we‘atah meit, lamah ceh ’ani zam, ha’ukhal lahashiwo ‘od; ’ani holeikh ’eilaw, wehu lo yashuw ’eilay. 
2_samuel 12:24	waynaHeim dawid, ’eit bat shewa‘ ’ishto, wayawo ’eileha wayishkaw ‘imah; wateiled bein, wayiqra watiqra ’et shemo shelomoh, yhoh ’aheiwo. 
2_samuel 12:25	wayishlaH, beyad natan hanawi, wayiqra ’et shemo yedideyah; ba‘awur yhoh.
2_samuel 12:26	wayilaHem yo’aw, berabat benei ‘amon; wayilkod ’et ‘ir hamelukhah. 
2_samuel 12:27	wayishlaH yo’aw mal’akhim ’el dawid; wayomer nilHamti werabah, gam lakhadti ’et ‘ir hamayim. 
2_samuel 12:28	we‘atah, ’esof ’et yeter ha‘am, waHaneih ‘al ha‘ir welakhedah; pen ’elkod ’ani ’et ha‘ir, weniqra shemi ‘aleha. 
2_samuel 12:29	waye’esof dawid ’et kal ha‘am wayeilekh rabatah; wayilaHem bah wayilkedah. 
2_samuel 12:30	wayiqaH ’et ‘aTeret malkam mei‘al rosho umishqalah kikar cahaw we’ewen yeqarah, watehi ‘al rosh dawid; ushelal ha‘ir hozi harbeih me’od. 
2_samuel 12:31	we’et ha‘am ’asher bah hozi, wayasem bamegeirah uwaHarizei habarcel uwemagcerot habarcel, wehe‘ewir ’otam bamalken bamalbein, wekhein ya‘aseh, lekhol ‘arei wenei ‘amon; wayashaw dawid wekhal ha‘am yerushalim.
2_samuel 13:1	wayhi ’aHarei khein, ule’awshalom ben dawid ’aHot yafah ushemah tamar; waye’ehaweha ’amnon ben dawid. 
2_samuel 13:2	wayeizer le’amnon lehitHalot, ba‘awur tamar ’aHoto, ki wetulah hi; wayipalei be‘einei ’amnon, la‘asot lah me’umah. 
2_samuel 13:3	ule’amnon reia‘, ushemo yonadaw, ben shim‘ah ’aHi dawid; weyonadaw, ’ish Hakham me’od. 
2_samuel 13:4	wayomer lo, madua‘ ’atah kakhah dal ben hamelekh baboqer baboqer, halo tagid li; wayomer lo ’amnon, ’et tamar, ’aHot ’awshalom ’aHi ’ani ’oheiw. 
2_samuel 13:5	wayomer lo yehonadaw, shekhaw ‘al mishkawekha wehitHal; uwa ’awikha lir’otekha, we’amarta ’eilaw tawo na tamar ’aHoti wetawreini leHem, we‘asetah le‘einay ’et habiryah, lema‘an ’asher ’er’eh, we’akhalti miyadah. 
2_samuel 13:6	wayishkaw ’amnon wayitHal; wayawo hamelekh lir’oto, wayomer ’amnon ’el hamelekh tawo na tamar ’aHoti, utelabeiw le‘einay shetei lewiwot, we’ewreh miyadah. 
2_samuel 13:7	wayishlaH dawid ’el tamar habaytah leimor; lekhi na, beit ’amnon ’aHikh, wa‘asi lo habiryah. 
2_samuel 13:8	wateilekh tamar, beit ’amnon ’aHiha wehu shokheiw; watiqaH ’et habazeiq watalosh watalash watelabeiw le‘einaw, watewasheil ’et halewiwot. 
2_samuel 13:9	watiqaH ’et hamasreit watizoq lefanaw, wayma’ein le’ekhol; wayomer ’amnon, hozi’u khal ’ish mei‘alay, wayeize’u khal ’ish mei‘alaw. 
2_samuel 13:10	wayomer ’amnon ’el tamar, hawi’i habiryah haHeder, we’ewreh miyadeikh; watiqaH tamar, ’et halewiwot ’asher ‘asatah, watawei le’amnon ’aHiha heHaderah. 
2_samuel 13:11	watageish ’eilaw le’ekhol; wayaHaceq bah wayomer lah, bo’i shikhwi ‘imi ’aHoti. 
2_samuel 13:12	watomer lo, ’al ’aHi ’al te‘aneini, ki lo yei‘aseh khein beyisra’eil; ’al ta‘aseih ’et hanewalah haccot. 
2_samuel 13:13	wa’ani, ’anah ’olikh ’et Herpati, we’atah, tihyeh ke’aHad hanewalim beyisra’eil; we‘atah daber na ’el hamelekh, ki lo yimna‘eini mimeka. 
2_samuel 13:14	welo ’awah lishmoa‘ beqolah; wayeHecaq mimenah way‘aneha, wayishkaw ’otah. 
2_samuel 13:15	wayisna’eha ’amnon, sin’ah gedolah me’od, ki gedolah, hasin’ah ’asher senei’ah, mei’ahawah ’asher ’aheiwah; wayomer lah ’amnon qumi leikhi. 
2_samuel 13:16	watomer lo, ’al ’odot hara‘ah hagedolah haccot, mei’aHeret ’asher ‘asita ‘imi leshaleHeini; welo ’awah lishmoa‘ lah. 
2_samuel 13:17	wayiqra, ’et na‘aro meshareto, wayomer shilHu na ’et cot mei‘alay haHuzah; une‘ol hadelet ’aHareha. 
2_samuel 13:18	we‘aleha ketonet passim, ki khein tilbashna wenot hamelekh habetulot me‘ilim; wayozei ’otah meshareto haHuz, wena‘al hadelet ’aHareha. 
2_samuel 13:19	watiqaH tamar ’eifer ‘al roshah, ukhetonet hapassim ’asher ‘aleha qara‘ah; watasem yadah ‘al roshah, wateilekh halokh weca‘aqah. 
2_samuel 13:20	wayomer ’eileha ’awshalom ’aHiha, ha’aminon ’aHikh hayah ‘imakh we‘atah ’aHoti haHarishi ’aHikh hu, ’al tashiti ’et libeikh ladawar hacceh; wateishew tamar weshomeimah, beit ’awshalom ’aHiha. 
2_samuel 13:21	wehamelekh dawid, shama‘ ’eit kal hadewarim ha’eileh; wayiHar lo me’od. 
2_samuel 13:22	welo diber ’awshalom ‘im ’amnon lemeira‘ we‘ad Tow; ki sanei ’awshalom ’et ’amnon, ‘al dewar ’asher ‘inah, ’eit tamar ’aHoto.
2_samuel 13:23	wayhi lishnatayim yamim, wayihyu gocecim le’awshalom, bewa‘al Hazor ’asher ‘im ’efrayim; wayiqra ’awshalom lekhal benei hamelekh. 
2_samuel 13:24	wayawo ’awshalom ’el hamelekh, wayomer hineih na gocecim le‘awdekha; yeilekh na hamelekh wa‘awadaw ‘im ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 13:25	wayomer hamelekh ’el ’awshalom, ’al beni ’al na neileikh kulanu, welo nikhbad ‘alekha; wayifraz bo welo ’awah lalekhet waywarakheihu. 
2_samuel 13:26	wayomer ’awshalom, walo yeilekh na ’itanu ’amnon ’aHi; wayomer lo hamelekh, lamah yeileikh ‘imakh. 
2_samuel 13:27	wayifraz bo ’awshalom; wayishlaH ’ito ’et ’amnon, we’eit kal benei hamelekh.
2_samuel 13:28	wayzaw ’awshalom ’et ne‘araw leimor, re’u na keTow leiw ’amnon bayayin we’amarti ’aleikhem, haku ’et ’amnon wahamitem ’oto ’al tira’u; halo, ki ’anokhi ziwwiti ’etkhem, Hicqu wihyu liwnei Hayil. 
2_samuel 13:29	waya‘asu na‘arei ’awshalom le’amnon, ka’asher ziwwah ’awshalom; wayaqumu kal benei hamelekh, wayirkewu ’ish ‘al pirdo wayanusu. 
2_samuel 13:30	wayhi heimah waderekh, wehashemu‘ah wa’ah, ’el dawid leimor; hikah ’awshalom ’et kal benei hamelekh, welo notar meihem ’eHad.
2_samuel 13:31	wayaqam hamelekh wayiqra‘ ’et begadaw wayishkaw ’arezah; wekhal ‘awadaw nizawim qeru‘ei wegadim.
2_samuel 13:32	waya‘an yonadaw ben shim‘ah ’aHi dawid wayomer, ’al yomar ’adoni ’eit kal hane‘arim benei hamelekh heimitu, ki ’amnon lewado meit; ki ‘al pi ’awshalom hayetah sumah, miyom ‘anoto, ’eit tamar ’aHoto. 
2_samuel 13:33	we‘atah ’al yaseim ’adoni hamelekh ’el libo dawar leimor, kal benei hamelekh meitu; ki ’im ’amnon lewado meit.
2_samuel 13:34	wayiwraH ’awshalom; wayisa hana‘ar hazofeh ’et ‘eino ‘einaw, wayar, wehineih ‘am raw holekhim miderekh ’aHaraw mizad hahar. 
2_samuel 13:35	wayomer yonadaw ’el hamelekh, hineih wenei hamelekh ba’u; kidwar ‘awdekha kein hayah. 
2_samuel 13:36	wayhi kekhaloto ledabeir, wehineih wenei hamelekh ba’u, wayis’u qolam wayiwku; wegam hamelekh wekhal ‘awadaw, bakhu bekhi gadol me’od. 
2_samuel 13:37	we’awshalom baraH, wayeilekh ’el talmay ben ‘amiHur ‘amihud melekh geshur; wayit’abeil ‘al beno kal hayamim. 
2_samuel 13:38	we’awshalom baraH wayeilekh geshur; wayhi sham shalosh shanim. 
2_samuel 13:39	watekhal dawid hamelekh, lazeit ’el ’awshalom; ki niHam ‘al ’amnon ki meit.
2_samuel 14:1	wayeida‘ yo’aw ben zeruyah; ki leiw hamelekh ‘al ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 14:2	wayishlaH yo’aw teqo‘ah, wayiqaH misham ’ishah Hakhamah; wayomer ’eileha hit’abeli na weliwshi na wigdei ’eiwel, we’al tasukhi shemen, wehayit ke’ishah, ceh yamim rabim, mit’abelet ‘al meit. 
2_samuel 14:3	uwat ’el hamelekh, wedibart ’eilaw kadawar hacceh; wayasem yo’aw ’et hadewarim befiha. 
2_samuel 14:4	watomer ha’ishah hateqo‘it ’el hamelekh, watipol ‘al ’apeha ’arzah watishtaHu; watomer hoshi‘ah hamelekh.
2_samuel 14:5	wayomer lah hamelekh mah lakh; watomer, ’awal ’ishah ’almanah ’ani wayamat ’ishi. 
2_samuel 14:6	uleshifHatekha shenei wanim, wayinazu sheneihem basadeh, we’ein mazil beineihem; wayako ha’eHad ’et ha’eHad wayamet ’oto. 
2_samuel 14:7	wehineih qamah khal hamishpaHah ‘al shifHatekha, wayomeru teni ’et makeih ’aHiw, unemiteihu benefesh ’aHiw ’asher harag, wenashmidah gam ’et hayoreish; wekhibu, ’et gaHalti ’asher nish’arah, lewilti som sim le’ishi sheim ushe’eirit ‘al penei ha’adamah.
2_samuel 14:8	wayomer hamelekh ’el ha’ishah lekhi leweiteikh; wa’ani ’azawweh ‘alayikh. 
2_samuel 14:9	watomer ha’ishah hateqo‘it ’el hamelekh, ‘alay ’adoni hamelekh he‘awon we‘al beit ’awi; wehamelekh wekhis’o naqi.
2_samuel 14:10	wayomer hamelekh; hamdabeir ’eilayikh wahaweito ’eilay, welo yosif ‘od laga‘at bakh. 
2_samuel 14:11	watomer yickar na hamelekh ’et yhoh ’elohekha, meiharwit meiharbat go’eil hadam leshaHeit, welo yashmidu ’et beni; wayomer Hay yhoh, ’im yipol misa‘arat beneikh ’arezah. 
2_samuel 14:12	watomer ha’ishah, tedaber na shifHatekha ’el ’adoni hamelekh dawar; wayomer dabeiri.
2_samuel 14:13	watomer ha’ishah, welamah Hashawtah kacot ‘al ‘am ’elohim; umidabeir hamelekh hadawar hacceh ke’asheim, lewilti hashiw hamelekh ’et nideHo. 
2_samuel 14:14	ki mot namut, wekhamayim hanigarim ’arzah, ’asher lo yei’aseifu; welo yisa ’elohim nefesh, weHashaw maHashawot, lewilti yidaH mimenu nidaH. 
2_samuel 14:15	we‘atah ’asher bati ledabeir ’el hamelekh ’adoni ’et hadawar hacceh, ki yeire’uni ha‘am; watomer shifHatekha ’adaberah na ’el hamelekh, ’ulay ya‘aseh hamelekh ’et dewar ’amato. 
2_samuel 14:16	ki yishma‘ hamelekh, lehazil ’et ’amato mikaf ha’ish; lehashmid ’oti we’et beni yaHad, minaHalat ’elohim. 
2_samuel 14:17	watomer shifHatekha, yihyeh na dewar ’adoni hamelekh limnuHah; ki kemal’akh ha’elohim, kein ’adoni hamelekh lishmoa‘ haTow wehara‘, yhoh ’elohekha yehi ‘imakh.
2_samuel 14:18	waya‘an hamelekh, wayomer ’el ha’ishah, ’al na tekhaHadi mimeni dawar, ’asher ’anokhi sho’eil ’otakh; watomer ha’ishah, yedaber na ’adoni hamelekh. 
2_samuel 14:19	wayomer hamelekh, hayad yo’aw ’itakh bekhal cot; wata‘an ha’ishah watomer Hei nafshekha ’adoni hamelekh ’im ’ish leheimin ulehasmil, mikol ’asher diber ’adoni hamelekh, ki ‘awdekha yo’aw hu ziwwani, wehu, m befi shifHatekha, ’eit kal hadewarim ha’eileh. 
2_samuel 14:20	lewa‘awur sabeiw ’et penei hadawar, ‘asah ‘awdekha yo’aw ’et hadawar hacceh; wadoni Hakham, keHakhemat mal’akh ha’elohim, lada‘at ’et kal ’asher ba’arez.
2_samuel 14:21	wayomer hamelekh ’el yo’aw, hineih na ‘asiti ’et hadawar hacceh; weleikh hasheiw ’et hana‘ar ’et ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 14:22	wayipol yo’aw ’el panaw ’arzah wayishtaHu waywarekh ’et hamelekh; wayomer yo’aw hayom yada‘ ‘awdekha ki mazati Hein be‘einekha ’adoni hamelekh, ’asher ‘asah hamelekh ’et dewar ‘awdo ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 14:23	wayaqam yo’aw wayeilekh geshurah; wayawei ’et ’awshalom yerushalim.
2_samuel 14:24	wayomer hamelekh yissow ’el beito, ufanay lo yir’eh; wayissow ’awshalom ’el beito, ufenei hamelekh lo ra’ah.
2_samuel 14:25	ukhe’awshalom, lo hayah ’ish yafeh bekhal yisra’eil lehaleil me’od; mikaf raglo we‘ad qadeqodo, lo hayah wo mum. 
2_samuel 14:26	uwegaleHo ’et rosho wehayah miqeiz yamim layamim ’asher yegaleiaH, ki khaweid ‘alaw wegileHo; weshaqal ’et se‘ar rosho, matayim sheqalim be’ewen hamelekh. 
2_samuel 14:27	wayiwwaledu le’awshalom sheloshah wanim, uwat ’aHat ushemah tamar; hi hayetah, ’ishah yefat mar’eh.
2_samuel 14:28	wayeishew ’awshalom birushalim shenatayim yamim; ufenei hamelekh lo ra’ah. 
2_samuel 14:29	wayishlaH ’awshalom ’el yo’aw, lishloaH ’oto ’el hamelekh, welo ’awah lawo ’eilaw; wayishlaH ‘od sheinit, welo ’awah lawo. 
2_samuel 14:30	wayomer ’el ‘awadaw re’u Helqat yo’aw ’el yadi welo sham se‘orim, lekhu wehoziteiha wehazituha wa’eish; wayazitu ‘awdei ’awshalom ’et haHelqah ba’eish.
2_samuel 14:31	wayaqam yo’aw, wayawo ’el ’awshalom habayetah; wayomer ’eilaw, lamah hizitu ‘awadekha ’et haHelqah ’asher li ba’eish. 
2_samuel 14:32	wayomer ’awshalom ’el yo’aw hineih shalaHti ’eilekha leimor bo heinah we’eshleHah ’otekha ’el hamelekh leimor, lamah bati migeshur, Tow li ‘od ’ani sham; we‘atah, ’er’eh penei hamelekh, we’im yesh bi ‘awon wehemitani. 
2_samuel 14:33	wayawo yo’aw ’el hamelekh wayaged lo wayiqra ’el ’awshalom wayawo ’el hamelekh, wayishtaHu lo ‘al ’apaw ’arzah lifnei hamelekh; wayishaq hamelekh le’awshalom.
2_samuel 15:1	wayhi mei’aHarei khein, waya‘as lo ’awshalom, merkawah wesusim; waHamishim ’ish razim lefanaw. 
2_samuel 15:2	wehishkim ’awshalom, we‘amad ‘al yad derekh hasha‘ar; wayhi kal ha’ish ’asher yihyeh lo riw lawo ’el hamelekh lamishpaT, wayiqra ’awshalom ’eilaw wayomer, ’ei micceh ‘ir ’atah, wayomer mei’aHad shiwTei yisra’eil ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 15:3	wayomer ’eilaw ’awshalom, re’eih dewarekha Towim unekhoHim; weshomeia‘ ’ein lekha mei’eit hamelekh. 
2_samuel 15:4	wayomer ’awshalom, mi yesimeini shofeiT ba’arez; we‘alay, yawo kal ’ish ’asher yihyeh lo riw umishpaT wehizdaqtiw. 
2_samuel 15:5	wehayah biqraw ’ish, lehishtaHawot lo; weshalaH ’et yado weheHeciq lo wenashaq lo. 
2_samuel 15:6	waya‘as ’awshalom kadawar hacceh lekhal yisra’eil, ’asher yawo’u lamishpaT ’el hamelekh; wayganeiw ’awshalom, ’et leiw ’anshei yisra’eil.
2_samuel 15:7	wayhi miqeiz ’arba‘im shanah; wayomer ’awshalom ’el hamelekh, ’eilakhah na, wa’ashaleim ’et nidri ’asher nadarti yhoh beHewron. 
2_samuel 15:8	ki neider nadar ‘awdekha, beshiwti wigshur ba’aram leimor; ’im yeshiw yashow yeshiweini yhoh yerushalim, we‘awadti ’et yhoh. 
2_samuel 15:9	wayomer lo hamelekh leikh beshalom; wayaqam wayeilekh Hewronah.
2_samuel 15:10	wayishlaH ’awshalom meragelim, bekhal shiwTei yisra’eil leimor; keshame‘akhem ’et qol hashofar, wa’amartem malakh ’awshalom beHewron. 
2_samuel 15:11	we’et ’awshalom, halekhu matayim ’ish mirushalim, qeru’im weholekhim letumam; welo yade‘u kal dawar. 
2_samuel 15:12	wayishlaH ’awshalom ’et ’aHitofel hagiloni yo‘eiz dawid, mei‘iro migiloh, becaweHo ’et haccewaHim; wayhi haqesher ’amiz, weha‘am holeikh waraw ’et ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 15:13	wayawo hamagid, ’el dawid leimor; hayah lew ’ish yisra’eil ’aHarei ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 15:14	wayomer dawid lekhal ‘awadaw ’asher ’ito wirushalim qumu weniwraHah, ki lo tihyeh lanu feleiTah mipenei ’awshalom; maharu lalekhet, pen yemaheir wehisiganu wehidiaH ‘aleinu ’et hara‘ah, wehikah ha‘ir lefi Harew. 
2_samuel 15:15	wayomeru ‘awdei hamelekh ’el hamelekh; kekhol ’asher yiwHar ’adoni hamelekh hineih ‘awadekha. 
2_samuel 15:16	wayeizei hamelekh wekhal beito beraglaw; waya‘acow hamelekh, ’eit ‘eser nashim pilagshim lishmor habayit. 
2_samuel 15:17	wayeizei hamelekh wekhal ha‘am beraglaw; waya‘amdu beit hamerHaq. 
2_samuel 15:18	wekhal ‘awadaw ‘owerim ‘al yado, wekhal hakereiti wekhal hapeleiti; wekhal hagitim sheish mei’ot ’ish, ’asher ba’u weraglo migat, ‘owerim ‘al penei hamelekh. 
2_samuel 15:19	wayomer hamelekh ’el ’itay hagiti, lamah teileikh gam ’atah ’itanu; shuw wesheiw ‘im hamelekh ki nakheri ’atah, wegam goleh ’atah limqomekha. 
2_samuel 15:20	temol bo’ekha, wehayom ’ano‘akha ’ani‘akha ‘imanu lalekhet, wa’ani holeikh, ‘al ’asher ’ani holeikh; shuw wehasheiw ’et ’aHekha ‘imakh Hesed we’emet. 
2_samuel 15:21	waya‘an ’itay ’et hamelekh wayomar; Hay yhoh weHei ’adoni hamelekh, ki ’im bimqom ’asher yihyeh sham ’adoni hamelekh, ’im lemawet ’im leHayim, ki sham yihyeh ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 15:22	wayomer dawid ’el ’itay leikh wa‘awor; waya‘awor ’itay hagiti wekhal ’anashaw, wekhal haTaf ’asher ’ito. 
2_samuel 15:23	wekhal ha’arez, bokhim qol gadol, wekhal ha‘am ‘owerim; wehamelekh, ‘oweir benaHal qidron, wekhal ha‘am ‘owerim, ‘al penei derekh ’et hamidbar. 
2_samuel 15:24	wehineih gam zadoq wekhal halwiyim ’ito, nose’im ’et ’aron berit ha’elohim, wayaziqu ’et ’aron ha’elohim, waya‘al ’ewyatar; ‘ad tom kal ha‘am la‘awor min ha‘ir. 
2_samuel 15:25	wayomer hamelekh lezadoq, hasheiw ’et ’aron ha’elohim ha‘ir; ’im ’emza Hein be‘einei yhoh, weheshiwani wehir’ani ’oto we’et naweihu. 
2_samuel 15:26	we’im koh yomar, lo Hafazti bakh; hini ya‘aseh li ka’asher Tow be‘einaw.
2_samuel 15:27	wayomer hamelekh ’el zadoq hakohein, haro’eh ’atah, shuwah ha‘ir beshalom; wa’aHima‘az binkha wihonatan ben ’ewyatar shenei weneikhem ’itekhem. 
2_samuel 15:28	re’u ’anokhi mitmahmeiah, be‘awrot be‘arwot hamidbar; ‘ad bo dawar mei‘imakhem lehagid li. 
2_samuel 15:29	wayashew zadoq we’ewyatar ’et ’aron ha’elohim yerushalim; wayeishewu sham. 
2_samuel 15:30	wedawid ‘oleh wema‘aleih hacceitim ‘oleh uwokheh, werosh lo Hafui, wehu holeikh yaHeif; wekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito, Hafu ’ish rosho, we‘alu ‘aloh uwakhoh. 
2_samuel 15:31	wedawid higid leimor, ’aHitofel baqosherim ‘im ’awshalom; wayomer dawid, sakel na ’et ‘azat ’aHitofel yhoh. 
2_samuel 15:32	wayhi dawid ba ‘ad harosh, ’asher yishtaHaweh sham leilohim; wehineih liqrato Hushay ha’arki, qarua‘ kutaneto, wa’adamah ‘al rosho. 
2_samuel 15:33	wayomer lo dawid; ’im ‘awarta ’iti, wehayita ‘alay lemasa. 
2_samuel 15:34	we’im ha‘ir tashuw, we’amarta le’awshalom ‘awdekha ’ani hamelekh ’ehyeh, ‘ewed ’awikha wa’ani mei’ac, we‘atah wa’ani ‘awdekha; weheifartah li, ’eit ‘azat ’aHitofel. 
2_samuel 15:35	wahalo ‘imekha sham, zadoq we’ewyatar hakohanim; wehayah, kal hadawar ’asher tishma‘ mibeit hamelekh, tagid lezadoq ule’ewyatar hakohanim. 
2_samuel 15:36	hineih sham ‘imam shenei weneihem, ’aHima‘az lezadoq, wihonatan le’ewyatar; ushelaHtem beyadam ’eilay, kal dawar ’asher tishma‘u. 
2_samuel 15:37	wayawo Hushay rei‘eh dawid ha‘ir; we’awshalom, yawo yerushalim. 
2_samuel 16:1	wedawid, ‘awar me‘aT meiharosh, wehineih ziwa na‘ar mefi woshet liqrato; wezemed Hamorim Hawushim, wa‘aleihem matayim leHem umei’ah zimuqim umei’ah qayiz weneiwel yayin. 
2_samuel 16:2	wayomer hamelekh ’el ziwa mah ’eileh lakh; wayomer ziwa haHamorim leweit hamelekh lirkow, ulehaleHem wehaleHem wehaqayiz le’ekhol hane‘arim, wehayayin lishtot haya‘eif bamidbar. 
2_samuel 16:3	wayomer hamelekh, we’ayeih ben ’adonekha; wayomer ziwa ’el hamelekh, hineih yosheiw birushalim, ki ’amar, hayom, yashiwu li beit yisra’eil, ’eit mamlekhut ’awi. 
2_samuel 16:4	wayomer hamelekh leziwa, hineih lekha, kol ’asher limfi woshet; wayomer ziwa hishtaHaweiti, ’emza Hein be‘einekha ’adoni hamelekh. 
2_samuel 16:5	uwa hamelekh dawid ‘ad baHurim; wehineih misham ’ish yozei mimishpaHat beit sha’ul, ushemo shim‘i wen geira, yozei yazo umeqaleil. 
2_samuel 16:6	waysaqeil ba’awanim ’et dawid, we’et kal ‘awdei hamelekh dawid; wekhal ha‘am wekhal hagiborim, mimino umisemolo. 
2_samuel 16:7	wekhoh ’amar shim‘i beqalo; zei zei ’ish hadamim we’ish habeliya‘al. 
2_samuel 16:8	heishiw ‘alekha yhoh kol demei weit sha’ul, ’asher malakhta taHto taHtaw, wayitein yhoh ’et hamelukhah, beyad ’awshalom benekha; wehinekha bera‘atekha, ki ’ish damim ’atah. 
2_samuel 16:9	wayomer ’awishay ben zeruyah ’el hamelekh, lamah yeqaleil hakelew hameit hacceh, ’et ’adoni hamelekh; ’e‘berah na we’asirah ’et rosho.
2_samuel 16:10	wayomer hamelekh, mah li welakhem benei zeruyah; ki koh yeqaleil, wekhi ki yhoh ’amar lo qaleil ’et dawid, umi yomar, madua‘ ‘asitah kein.
2_samuel 16:11	wayomer dawid ’el ’awishay we’el kal ‘awadaw, hineih weni ’asher yaza mimei‘ay mewaqeish ’et nafshi; we’af ki ‘atah ben haymini, haniHu lo wiqaleil, ki ’amar lo yhoh. 
2_samuel 16:12	’ulay yir’eh yhoh be‘owoni be‘eini; weheishiw yhoh li Towah, taHat qilato hayom hacceh. 
2_samuel 16:13	wayeilekh dawid wa’anashaw badarekh; s weshim‘i holeikh bezeila‘ hahar le‘umato, halokh wayqaleil, waysaqeil ba’awanim le‘umato, we‘ipar be‘afar.
2_samuel 16:14	wayawo hamelekh wekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito ‘ayeifim; wayinafeish sham. 
2_samuel 16:15	we’awshalom, wekhal ha‘am ’ish yisra’eil, ba’u yerushalim; wa’aHitofel ’ito. 
2_samuel 16:16	wayhi, ka’asher ba Hushay ha’arki rei‘eh dawid ’el ’awshalom; wayomer Hushay ’el ’awshalom, yeHi hamelekh yeHi hamelekh. 
2_samuel 16:17	wayomer ’awshalom ’el Hushay, ceh Hasdekha ’et rei‘ekha; lamah lo halakhta ’et rei‘ekha. 
2_samuel 16:18	wayomer Hushay ’el ’awshalom lo ki ’asher baHar yhoh weha‘am hacceh wekhal ’ish yisra’eil; lo lo ’ehyeh we’ito ’eisheiw. 
2_samuel 16:19	wehasheinit, lemi ’ani ’e‘ewod, halo lifnei weno; ka’asher ‘awadti lifnei ’awikha, kein ’ehyeh lifanekha.
2_samuel 16:20	wayomer ’awshalom ’el ’aHitofel; hawu lakhem ‘eizah mah na‘aseh. 
2_samuel 16:21	wayomer ’aHitofel ’el ’awshalom, bo ’el pilagshei ’awikha, ’asher hiniaH lishmor habayit; weshama‘ kal yisra’eil ki niw’ashta ’et ’awikha, weHacequ, yedei kal ’asher ’itakh. 
2_samuel 16:22	wayaTu le’awshalom ha’ohel ‘al hagag; wayawo ’awshalom ’el pilagshei ’awiw, le‘einei kal yisra’eil. 
2_samuel 16:23	wa‘azat ’aHitofel, ’asher ya‘az bayamim haheim, ka’asher yish’al ’ish bidwar ha’elohim; kein kal ‘azat ’aHitofel, gam ledawid gam le’awshalom.
2_samuel 17:1	wayomer ’aHitofel ’el ’awshalom; ’ewHarah na, sheneim ‘asar ’elef ’ish, we’aqumah we’erdefah ’aHarei dawid halayelah. 
2_samuel 17:2	we’awo ‘alaw, wehu yageia‘ urefeih yadayim, wehaHaradti ’oto, wenas kal ha‘am ’asher ’ito; wehikeiti ’et hamelekh lewado. 
2_samuel 17:3	we’ashiwah khal ha‘am ’eilekha; keshuw hakol, ha’ish ’asher ’atah mewaqeish, kal ha‘am yihyeh shalom. 
2_samuel 17:4	wayishar hadawar be‘einei ’awshalom; uwe‘einei kal ciqnei yisra’eil.
2_samuel 17:5	wayomer ’awshalom, qera na, gam leHushay ha’arki; wenishme‘ah mah befiw gam hu. 
2_samuel 17:6	wayawo Hushay ’el ’awshalom wayomer ’awshalom ’eilaw leimor, kadawar hacceh diber ’aHitofel, hana‘aseh ’et dewaro; ’im ’ayin ’atah dabeir.
2_samuel 17:7	wayomer Hushay ’el ’awshalom; lo Towah ha‘eizah ’asher ya‘az ’aHitofel bapa‘am haccot. 
2_samuel 17:8	wayomer Hushay, ’atah yada‘ta ’et ’awikha we’et ’anashaw ki giborim heimah, umarei nefesh heimah, kedow shakul basadeh; we’awikha ’ish milHamah, welo yalin ’et ha‘am. 
2_samuel 17:9	hineih ‘atah hu neHba be’aHat hapeHatim, ’o be’aHad hameqomot; wehayah, kinfol bahem bateHilah, weshama‘ hashomeia‘ we’amar, hayetah mageifah, ba‘am ’asher ’aHarei ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 17:10	wehu gam ben Hayil, ’asher libo keleiw ha’aryeih himeis yimas; ki yodeia‘ kal yisra’eil ki gibor ’awikha, uwenei Hayil ’asher ’ito. 
2_samuel 17:11	ki ya‘azti, hei’asof yei’aseif ‘alekha khal yisra’eil midan we‘ad be’eir shewa‘, kaHol ’asher ‘al hayam larow; ufanekha holekhim baqraw. 
2_samuel 17:12	uwanu ’eilaw, be’aHat be’aHad hameqomot ’asher nimza sham, wenaHnu ‘alaw, ka’asher yipol haTal ‘al ha’adamah; welo notar bo uwekhal ha’anashim ’asher ’ito gam ’eHad. 
2_samuel 17:13	we’im ’el ‘ir yei’aseif, wehisi’u khal yisra’eil ’el ha‘ir hahi Hawalim; wesaHawnu ’oto ‘ad hanaHal, ‘ad ’asher lo nimza sham gam zeror.
2_samuel 17:14	wayomer ’awshalom wekhal ’ish yisra’eil, Towah, ‘azat Hushay ha’arki, mei‘azat ’aHitofel; yhoh ziwwah, lehafeir ’et ‘azat ’aHitofel haTowah, lewa‘awur, hawi yhoh ’el ’awshalom ’et hara‘ah.
2_samuel 17:15	wayomer Hushay, ’el zadoq we’el ’ewyatar hakohanim, kacot wekhacot, ya‘az ’aHitofel ’et ’awshalom, we’eit ciqnei yisra’eil; wekhacot wekhacot ya‘azti ’ani. 
2_samuel 17:16	we‘atah shilHu meheirah wehagidu ledawid leimor, ’al talen halaylah be‘arwot hamidbar, wegam ‘awor ta‘awor; pen yewula‘ lamelekh, ulekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito. 
2_samuel 17:17	wihonatan wa’aHima‘az ‘omedim be‘ein rogeil, wehalekhah hashifHah wehigidah lahem, weheim yeilekhu, wehigidu lamelekh dawid; ki lo yukhelu leheira’ot lawo ha‘irah. 
2_samuel 17:18	wayar ’otam na‘ar, wayageid le’awshalom; wayeilekhu sheneihem meheirah wayawo’u ’el beit ’ish bewaHurim, welo we’eir baHazeiro wayeiredu sham. 
2_samuel 17:19	watiqaH ha’ishah, watifros ’et hamasakh ‘al penei habe’eir, watishTaH ‘alaw harifot; welo noda‘ dawar. 
2_samuel 17:20	wayawo’u ‘awdei ’awshalom ’el ha’ishah habaytah, wayomeru ’ayeih, ’aHima‘az wihonatan, watomer lahem ha’ishah, ‘aweru mikhal hamayim; waywaqshu welo maza’u, wayashuwu yerushalim.
2_samuel 17:21	wayhi ’aHarei lekhtam, waya‘alu meihabe’eir, wayeilekhu, wayagidu lamelekh dawid; wayomeru ’el dawid, qumu we‘iwru meheirah ’et hamayim, ki khakhah ya‘az ‘aleikhem ’aHitofel. 
2_samuel 17:22	wayaqam dawid, wekhal ha‘am ’asher ’ito, waya‘awru ’et hayardein; ‘ad ’or haboqer, ‘ad ’aHad lo ne‘dar, ’asher lo ‘awar ’et hayardein. 
2_samuel 17:23	wa’aHitofel ra’ah, ki lo ne‘estah ‘azato wayaHawosh ’et haHamor, wayaqam wayeilekh ’el beito ’el ‘iro, wayzaw ’el beito wayeiHanaq; wayamat wayiqaweir beqewer ’awiw.
2_samuel 17:24	wedawid ba maHanayemah; we’awshalom, ‘awar ’et hayardein, hu wekhal ’ish yisra’eil ‘imo. 
2_samuel 17:25	we’et ‘amasa, sam ’awshalom taHat yo’aw ‘al hazawa; wa‘amasa wen ’ish, ushemo yitra hayisre’eili, ’asher ba ’el ’awigal bat naHash, ’aHot zeruyah ’eim yo’aw. 
2_samuel 17:26	wayiHan yisra’eil we’awshalom, ’erez hagil‘ad.
2_samuel 17:27	wayhi kewo dawid maHanayemah; weshowi wen naHash meirabat benei ‘amon, umakhir ben ‘ami’eil milo dewar, uwarcilay hagil‘adi meirogelim. 
2_samuel 17:28	mishkaw wesapot ukheli yozeir, weHiTim use‘orim weqemaH weqali; ufol wa‘adashim weqali. 
2_samuel 17:29	udewash weHem’ah, wezon ushefot baqar, higishu ledawid wela‘am ’asher ’ito le’ekhol; ki ’ameru, ha‘am, ra‘eiw we‘ayeif wezamei bamidbar. 
2_samuel 18:1	wayifqod dawid, ’et ha‘am ’asher ’ito; wayasem ‘aleihem, sarei ’alafim wesarei mei’ot. 
2_samuel 18:2	wayshalaH dawid ’et ha‘am, hashelishit beyad yo’aw wehashelishit beyad ’awishay ben zeruyah ’aHi yo’aw, wehashelishit, beyad ’itay hagiti; s wayomer hamelekh ’el ha‘am, yazo ’eizei gam ’ani ‘imakhem. 
2_samuel 18:3	wayomer ha‘am lo teizei, ki ’im nos nanus lo yasimu ’eileinu leiw, we’im yamutu Hezyeinu lo yasimu ’eileinu leiw, ki ‘atah khamonu ‘asarah ’alafim; we‘atah Tow, ki tihyeh lanu mei‘ir la‘cir la‘cor.
2_samuel 18:4	wayomer ’aleihem hamelekh, ’asher yiTaw be‘eineikhem ’e‘eseh; waya‘amod hamelekh ’el yad hasha‘ar, wekhal ha‘am yaze’u, lemei’ot wela’alafim. 
2_samuel 18:5	wayzaw hamelekh ’et yo’aw we’et ’awishay we’et ’itay leimor, le’aT li lana‘ar le’awshalom; wekhal ha‘am shame‘u, bezawwot hamelekh ’et kal hasarim ‘al dewar ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 18:6	wayeizei ha‘am hasadeh liqrat yisra’eil; watehi hamilHamah beya‘ar ’efrayim. 
2_samuel 18:7	wayinagefu sham ‘am yisra’eil, lifnei ‘awdei dawid; watehi sham hamageifah gedolah bayom hahu ‘esrim ’alef. 
2_samuel 18:8	watehi sham hamilHamah nafozeit nafozet ‘al penei khal ha’arez; wayerew haya‘ar le’ekhol ba‘am, mei’asher ’akhelah haHerew bayom hahu. 
2_samuel 18:9	wayiqarei ’awshalom, lifnei ‘awdei dawid; we’awshalom rokheiw ‘al hapered, wayawo hapered taHat sowekh ha’eilah hagedolah wayeHecaq rosho wa’eilah, wayutan bein hashamayim uwein ha’arez, wehapered ’asher taHtaw ‘awar. 
2_samuel 18:10	wayar ’ish ’eHad, wayageid leyo’aw; wayomer, hineih ra’iti ’et ’awshalom, talui ba’eilah. 
2_samuel 18:11	wayomer yo’aw, la’ish hamagid lo, wehineih ra’ita, umadua‘ lo hikito sham ’arezah; we‘alay, latet lekha ‘asarah khesef, waHagorah ’eHat. 
2_samuel 18:12	wayomer ha’ish ’el yo’aw, welo welu ’anokhi shoqeil ‘al kapay ’elef kesef, lo ’eshlaH yadi ’el ben hamelekh; ki we’aceneinu ziwwah hamelekh, ’otekha we’et ’awishay we’et ’itay leimor, shimru mi bana‘ar be’awshalom. 
2_samuel 18:13	’o ‘asiti wenafsho wenafshi sheqer, wekhal dawar lo yikaHeid min hamelekh; we’atah tityazeiw mineged. 
2_samuel 18:14	wayomer yo’aw, lo khein ’oHilah lefanekha; wayiqaH sheloshah shewaTim bekhapo, wayitqa‘eim beleiw ’awshalom, ‘odenu Hay beleiw ha’eilah. 
2_samuel 18:15	wayasobu ‘asarah ne‘arim, nose’ei kelei yo’aw; wayaku ’et ’awshalom waymituhu. 
2_samuel 18:16	wayitqa‘ yo’aw bashofar, wayashaw ha‘am, mirdof ’aHarei yisra’eil; ki Hasakh yo’aw ’et ha‘am. 
2_samuel 18:17	wayiqHu ’et ’awshalom, wayashlikhu ’oto waya‘ar ’el hapaHat hagadol, wayaziwu ‘alaw gal ’awanim gadol me’od; wekhal yisra’eil, nasu ’ish le’oheilo le’ohalaw.
2_samuel 18:18	we’awshalom laqaH, wayazew lo weHayaw weHayaw ’et mazewet ’asher be‘eimeq hamelekh, ki ’amar ’ein li wein, ba‘awur hackir shemi; wayiqra lamazewet ‘al shemo, wayiqarei lah yad ’awshalom, ‘ad hayom hacceh.
2_samuel 18:19	wa’aHima‘az ben zadoq ’amar, ’aruzah na, wa’awaserah ’et hamelekh; ki shefaTo yhoh miyad ’oyewaw. 
2_samuel 18:20	wayomer lo yo’aw, lo ’ish besorah ’atah hayom hacceh, uwisarta beyom ’aHeir; wehayom hacceh lo tewaseir, ki ‘al ‘al kein ben hamelekh meit. 
2_samuel 18:21	wayomer yo’aw lakushi, leikh hageid lamelekh ’asher ra’itah; wayishtaHu khushi leyo’aw wayaroz. 
2_samuel 18:22	wayosef ‘od ’aHima‘az ben zadoq wayomer ’el yo’aw, wihi mah, ’aruzah na gam ’ani ’aHarei hakushi; wayomer yo’aw, lamah ceh ’atah raz beni, ulekhah ’ein besorah mozeit. 
2_samuel 18:23	wihi mah ’aruz, wayomer lo ruz; wayaraz ’aHima‘az derekh hakikar, waya‘awor ’et hakushi. 
2_samuel 18:24	wedawid yosheiw bein shenei hashe‘arim; wayeilekh hazofeh ’el gag hasha‘ar ’el haHomah, wayisa ’et ‘einaw wayar, wehineih ’ish raz lewado. 
2_samuel 18:25	wayiqra hazofeh wayageid lamelekh, wayomer hamelekh, ’im lewado besorah befiw; wayeilekh halokh weqareiw. 
2_samuel 18:26	wayar hazofeh ’ish ’aHeir raz wayiqra hazofeh ’el hasho‘eir, wayomer hineih ’ish raz lewado; wayomer hamelekh gam ceh mewaseir. 
2_samuel 18:27	wayomer hazofeh, ’ani ro’eh ’et meruzat harishon, kimruzat ’aHima‘az ben zadoq; wayomer hamelekh ’ish Tow ceh, we’el besorah Towah yawo. 
2_samuel 18:28	wayiqra ’aHima‘az, wayomer ’el hamelekh shalom, wayishtaHu lamelekh le’apaw ’arezah; s wayomer, barukh yhoh ’elohekha, ’asher sigar ’et ha’anashim, ’asher nase’u ’et yadam badoni hamelekh. 
2_samuel 18:29	wayomer hamelekh, shalom lana‘ar le’awshalom; wayomer ’aHima‘az ra’iti hehamon hagadol lishloaH ’et ‘ewed hamelekh yo’aw we’et ‘awdekha, welo yada‘ti mah. 
2_samuel 18:30	wayomer hamelekh, sow hityazeiw koh; wayissow waya‘amod. 
2_samuel 18:31	wehineih hakushi ba; wayomer hakushi, yitbaseir ’adoni hamelekh, ki shefaTekha yhoh hayom, miyad kal haqamim ‘alekha.
2_samuel 18:32	wayomer hamelekh ’el hakushi, hashalom lana‘ar le’awshalom; wayomer hakushi, yihyu khana‘ar ’oyewei ’adoni hamelekh, wekhol ’asher qamu ‘alekha lera‘ah.
2_samuel 18:33	wayirgac hamelekh, waya‘al ‘al ‘aliyat hasha‘ar wayeiwek; wekhoh ’amar belekhto, beni ’awshalom beni weni ’awshalom, mi yitein muti ’ani taHtekha, ’awshalom beni weni. 
2_samuel 19:1	wayugad leyo’aw; hineih hamelekh bokheh wayit’abeil ‘al ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 19:2	watehi hateshu‘ah bayom hahu le’eiwel lekhal ha‘am; ki shama‘ ha‘am, bayom hahu leimor, ne‘ezaw hamelekh ‘al beno. 
2_samuel 19:3	wayitganeiw ha‘am bayom hahu lawo ha‘ir; ka’asher yitganeiw, ha‘am hanikhlamim, benusam bamilHamah. 
2_samuel 19:4	wehamelekh la’aT ’et panaw, wayic‘aq hamelekh qol gadol; beni ’awshalom, ’awshalom beni weni.
2_samuel 19:5	wayawo yo’aw ’el hamelekh habayit; wayomer howashta hayom ’et penei khal ‘awadekha, hamaleTim ’et nafshekha hayom, we’eit nefesh banekha uwenotekha, wenefesh nashekha, wenefesh pilagshekha. 
2_samuel 19:6	le’ahawah ’et sone’ekha, welisno ’et ’ohawekha; ki higadta hayom, ki ’ein lekha sarim wa‘awadim, ki yada‘ti hayom, ki lo lu ’awshalom Hay wekhulanu hayom meitim, ki ’ac yashar be‘einekha. 
2_samuel 19:7	we‘atah qum zei, wedabeir ‘al leiw ‘awadekha; ki yhoh nishba‘ti ki ’einekha yozei, ’im yalin ’ish ’itekha halaylah, wera‘ah lekha cot, mikal hara‘ah ’asher ba’ah ‘alekha, mine‘urekha ‘ad ‘atah.
2_samuel 19:8	wayaqam hamelekh wayeishew basha‘ar; ulekhal ha‘am higidu leimor, hineih hamelekh yosheiw basha‘ar, wayawo khal ha‘am lifnei hamelekh, weyisra’eil, nas ’ish le’ohalaw.
2_samuel 19:9	wayhi khal ha‘am nadon, bekhal shiwTei yisra’eil leimor; hamelekh hizilanu mikaf ’oyeweinu, wehu mileTanu mikaf pelishtim, we‘atah baraH min ha’arez mei‘al ’awshalom. 
2_samuel 19:10	we’awshalom ’asher mashaHnu ‘aleinu, meit bamilHamah; we‘atah, lamah ’atem maHarishim lehashiw ’et hamelekh.
2_samuel 19:11	wehamelekh dawid, laH ’el zadoq we’el ’ewyatar hakohanim leimor daberu ’el ciqnei yehudah leimor, lamah tihyu ’aHaronim, lehashiw ’et hamelekh ’el beito; udewar kal yisra’eil, ba ’el hamelekh ’el beito. 
2_samuel 19:12	’aHay ’atem, ‘azmi uwesari ’atem; welamah tihyu ’aHaronim lehashiw ’et hamelekh. 
2_samuel 19:13	wela‘amasa tomeru, halo ‘azmi uwesari ’atah; koh ya‘aseh li ’elohim wekhoh yosif, ’im lo sar zawa tihyeh lefanay kal hayamim taHat yo’aw. 
2_samuel 19:14	wayaT ’et lewaw kal ’ish yehudah ke’ish ’eHad; wayishleHu ’el hamelekh, shuw ’atah wekhal ‘awadekha. 
2_samuel 19:15	wayashaw hamelekh, wayawo ‘ad hayardein; wihudah ba hagilgalah, lalekhet liqrat hamelekh, leha‘awir ’et hamelekh ’et hayardein. 
2_samuel 19:16	waymaheir, shim‘i wen geira ben haymini, ’asher mibaHurim; wayeired ‘im ’ish yehudah, liqrat hamelekh dawid. 
2_samuel 19:17	we’elef ’ish ‘imo mibinyamin weziwa, na‘ar beit sha’ul, waHameishet ‘asar banaw we‘esrim ‘awadaw ’ito; wezaleHu hayardein lifnei hamelekh. 
2_samuel 19:18	we‘awerah ha‘awarah, la‘awir ’et beit hamelekh, wela‘asot haTow be‘ayno be‘einaw; weshim‘i wen geira, nafal lifnei hamelekh, be‘awero bayardein. 
2_samuel 19:19	wayomer ’el hamelekh, ’al yaHashaw li ’adoni ‘awon we’al tickor, ’eit ’asher he‘ewah ‘awdekha, bayom ’asher yaza ’adoni hamelekh mirushalim; lasum hamelekh ’el libo. 
2_samuel 19:20	ki yada‘ ‘awdekha, ki ’ani HaTati; wehineih wati hayom, rishon lekhal beit yoseif, laredet liqrat ’adoni hamelekh.
2_samuel 19:21	waya‘an ’awishay ben zeruyah wayomer, hataHat cot, lo yumat shim‘i; ki qileil ’et meshiaH yhoh.
2_samuel 19:22	wayomer dawid, mah li welakhem benei zeruyah, ki tihyu li hayom lesaTan; hayom, yumat ’ish beyisra’eil, ki halo yada‘ti, ki hayom ’ani melekh ‘al yisra’eil. 
2_samuel 19:23	wayomer hamelekh ’el shim‘i lo tamut; wayishawa‘ lo hamelekh.
2_samuel 19:24	umefiwoshet ben sha’ul, yarad liqrat hamelekh; welo ‘asah raglaw welo ‘asah sefamo, we’et begadaw lo khibeis, lemin hayom lekhet hamelekh, ‘ad hayom ’asher ba weshalom. 
2_samuel 19:25	wayhi ki wa yerushalim liqrat hamelekh; wayomer lo hamelekh, lamah lo halakhta ‘imi mefiwoshet. 
2_samuel 19:26	wayomar ’adoni hamelekh ‘awdi rimani; ki ’amar ‘awdekha ’eHbeshah li haHamor we’erkaw ‘aleha we’eileikh ’et hamelekh, ki fisseiaH ‘awdekha. 
2_samuel 19:27	wayrageil be‘awdekha, ’el ’adoni hamelekh; wadoni hamelekh kemal’akh ha’elohim, wa‘aseih haTow be‘einekha. 
2_samuel 19:28	ki lo hayah kal beit ’awi, ki ’im ’anshei mawet ladoni hamelekh, watashet ’et ‘awdekha, be’okhelei shulHanekha; umah yesh li ‘od zedaqah, welic‘oq ‘od ’el hamelekh.
2_samuel 19:29	wayomer lo hamelekh, lamah tedabeir ‘od dewarekha; ’amarti ’atah weziwa, taHlequ ’et hasadeh. 
2_samuel 19:30	wayomer mefiwoshet ’el hamelekh, gam ’et hakol yiqaH; ’aHarei ’asher ba ’adoni hamelekh beshalom ’el beito.
2_samuel 19:31	uwarcilay hagil‘adi, yarad meirogelim; waya‘awor ’et hamelekh hayardein, leshaleHo ’et wayardein hayardein. 
2_samuel 19:32	uwarcilay caqein me’od, ben shemonim shanah; wehu khilkal ’et hamelekh weshiwato wemaHanayim, ki ’ish gadol hu me’od. 
2_samuel 19:33	wayomer hamelekh ’el barcilay; ’atah ‘awor ’iti, wekhilkalti ’otekha ‘imadi birushalim. 
2_samuel 19:34	wayomer barcilay ’el hamelekh; kamah, yemei shenei Hayay, ki ’e‘eleh ’et hamelekh yerushalim. 
2_samuel 19:35	ben shemonim shanah ’anokhi hayom ha’eida‘ bein Tow lera‘, ’im yiT‘am ‘awdekha ’et ’asher ’okhal we’et ’asher ’eshteh, ’im ’eshma‘ ‘od, beqol sharim wesharot; welamah yihyeh ‘awdekha ‘od lemasa, ’el ’adoni hamelekh. 
2_samuel 19:36	kim‘aT ya‘awor ‘awdekha ’et hayardein ’et hamelekh; welamah yigmeleini hamelekh, hagemulah haccot. 
2_samuel 19:37	yashaw na ‘awdekha we’amut be‘iri, ‘im qewer ’awi we’imi; wehineih ‘awdekha khimham, ya‘awor ‘im ’adoni hamelekh, wa‘aseih lo ’eit ’asher Tow be‘einekha.
2_samuel 19:38	wayomer hamelekh, ’iti ya‘awor kimham, wa’ani ’e‘eseh lo, ’et haTow be‘einekha; wekhol ’asher tiwHar ‘alay ’e‘eseh lakh. 
2_samuel 19:39	waya‘awor kal ha‘am ’et hayardein wehamelekh ‘awar; wayishaq hamelekh lewarcilay waywarakheihu, wayashaw limqomo.
2_samuel 19:40	waya‘awor hamelekh hagilgalah, wekhimhan ‘awar ‘imo; wekhal ‘am yehudah way‘ewiru he‘ewiru ’et hamelekh, wegam Hazi ‘am yisra’eil. 
2_samuel 19:41	wehineih kal ’ish yisra’eil ba’im ’el hamelekh; wayomeru ’el hamelekh madua‘ genawukha ’aHeinu ’ish yehudah, waya‘awiru ’et hamelekh we’et beito ’et hayardein, wekhal ’anshei dawid ‘imo.
2_samuel 19:42	waya‘an kal ’ish yehudah ‘al ’ish yisra’eil, ki qarow hamelekh ’eilay, welamah ceh Harah lekha, ‘al hadawar hacceh; he’akhol ’akhalnu min hamelekh, ’im niseit nisa lanu.
2_samuel 19:43	waya‘an ’ish yisra’eil ’et ’ish yehudah wayomer, ‘eser yadot li wamelekh wegam bedawid ’ani mimekha umadua‘ heqilotani, welo hayah dewari rishon li lehashiw ’et malki; wayiqesh dewar ’ish yehudah, midewar ’ish yisra’eil.
2_samuel 20:1	wesham niqra ’ish beliya‘al, ushemo shewa‘ ben bikhri ’ish yemini; wayitqa‘ bashofar, wayomer ’ein lanu Heileq bedawid, welo naHalah lanu bewen yishay, ’ish le’ohalaw yisra’eil. 
2_samuel 20:2	waya‘al kal ’ish yisra’eil mei’aHarei dawid, ’aHarei shewa‘ ben bikhri; we’ish yehudah dawequ wemalkam, min hayardein we‘ad yerushalim. 
2_samuel 20:3	wayawo dawid ’el beito yerushalim wayiqaH hamelekh ’eit ‘eser nashim pilagshim ’asher hiniaH lishmor habayit wayiteneim beit mishmeret waykhalkeleim, wa’aleihem lo wa; watihyenah zerurot ‘ad yom mutan ’almenut Hayut.
2_samuel 20:4	wayomer hamelekh ’el ‘amasa, hac‘eq li ’et ’ish yehudah sheloshet yamim; we’atah poh ‘amod. 
2_samuel 20:5	wayeilekh ‘amasa lehac‘iq ’et yehudah; wayiHer wayoHer min hamo‘eid ’asher ye‘ado.
2_samuel 20:6	wayomer dawid ’el ’awishay, ‘atah, yeira‘ lanu shewa‘ ben bikhri min ’awshalom; ’atah qaH ’et ‘awdei ’adonekha uredof ’aHaraw, pen maza lo ‘arim bezurot wehizil ‘eineinu. 
2_samuel 20:7	wayeize’u ’aHaraw ’anshei yo’aw, wehakereiti wehapeleiti wekhal hagiborim; wayeize’u mirushalim, lirdof ’aHarei shewa‘ ben bikhri. 
2_samuel 20:8	heim, ‘im ha’ewen hagedolah ’asher begiw‘on, wa‘amasa ba lifneihem; weyo’aw Hagur mido lewushu, we‘alo we‘alaw Hagor Herew mezumedet ‘al matenaw beta‘rah, wehu yaza watipol.
2_samuel 20:9	wayomer yo’aw la‘amasa, hashalom ’atah ’aHi; watoHec yad yemin yo’aw bicqan ‘amasa linshaq lo. 
2_samuel 20:10	wa‘amasa lo nishmar baHerew ’asher beyad yo’aw, wayakeihu wah ’el haHomesh wayishpokh mei‘aw ’arzah welo shanah lo wayamot; s weyo’aw wa’awishay ’aHiw, radaf ’aHarei shewa‘ ben bikhri. 
2_samuel 20:11	we’ish ‘amad ‘alaw, mina‘arei yo’aw; wayomer, mi ’asher Hafeiz beyo’aw umi ’asher ledawid ’aHarei yo’aw. 
2_samuel 20:12	wa‘amasa mitgoleil badam betokh hamesilah; wayar ha’ish ki ‘amad kal ha‘am, wayasseiw ’et ‘amasa min hamsilah hasadeh wayashleikh ‘alaw beged, ka’asher ra’ah, kal haba ‘alaw we‘amad. 
2_samuel 20:13	ka’asher hogah min hamsilah; ‘awar kal ’ish ’aHarei yo’aw, lirdof ’aHarei shewa‘ ben bikhri. 
2_samuel 20:14	waya‘awor bekhal shiwTei yisra’eil, ’aweilah uweit ma‘akhah wekhal habeirim; s wayiqleihu wayiqahalu, wayawo’u ’af ’aHaraw. 
2_samuel 20:15	wayawo’u wayazuru ‘alaw, be’aweilah beit hama‘akhah, wayishpekhu solelah ’el ha‘ir, wata‘amod baHeil; wekhal ha‘am ’asher ’et yo’aw, mashHitim lehapil haHomah. 
2_samuel 20:16	watiqra ’ishah Hakhamah min ha‘ir; shim‘u shim‘u ’imru na ’el yo’aw, qeraw ‘ad heinah, wa’adaberah ’eilekha. 
2_samuel 20:17	wayiqraw ’eileha, watomer ha’ishah ha’atah yo’aw wayomer ’ani; watomer lo, shema‘ diwrei ’amatekha, wayomer shomeia‘ ’anokhi. 
2_samuel 20:18	watomer leimor; dabeir yedaberu warishonah leimor, sha’ol yesha’alu be’aweil wekhein heitamu. 
2_samuel 20:19	’anokhi shelumei ’emunei yisra’eil; ’atah mewaqeish, lehamit ‘ir we’eim beyisra’eil, lamah tewala‘ naHalat yhoh.
2_samuel 20:20	waya‘an yo’aw wayomar; Halilah Halilah li, ’im ’awala‘ we’im ’ashHit. 
2_samuel 20:21	lo khein hadawar, ki ’ish meihar ’efrayim shewa‘ ben bikhri shemo, nasa yado bamelekh bedawid, tenu ’oto lewado, we’eilekhah mei‘al ha‘ir; watomer ha’ishah ’el yo’aw, hineih rosho mushlakh ’eilekha be‘ad haHomah. 
2_samuel 20:22	watawo ha’ishah ’el kal ha‘am beHakhematah, wayikhretu ’et rosh shewa‘ ben bikhri wayashlikhu ’el yo’aw, wayitqa‘ bashofar, wayafuzu mei‘al ha‘ir ’ish le’ohalaw; weyo’aw shaw yerushalim ’el hamelekh.
2_samuel 20:23	weyo’aw ’el kal hazawa yisra’eil; uwenayah ben yehoyada‘, ‘al hakeri hakereiti we‘al hapeleiti. 
2_samuel 20:24	wa’adoram ‘al hamas; wihoshafaT ben ’aHilud hamackir. 
2_samuel 20:25	usheiya ushewa sofeir; wezadoq we’ewyatar kohanim. 
2_samuel 20:26	wegam, ‘ira haya’iri, hayah khohein ledawid.
2_samuel 21:1	wayhi ra‘aw bimei dawid shalosh shanim, shanah ’aHarei shanah, waywaqeish dawid ’et penei yhoh; s wayomer yhoh ’el sha’ul we’el beit hadamim, ‘al ’asher heimit ’et hagiw‘onim. 
2_samuel 21:2	wayiqra hamelekh lagiw‘onim wayomer ’aleihem; wehagiw‘onim lo mibenei yisra’eil heimah, ki ’im miyeter ha’emori, uwenei yisra’eil nishbe‘u lahem, waywaqeish sha’ul lehakotam, beqanoto liwnei yisra’eil wihudah. 
2_samuel 21:3	wayomer dawid ’el hagiw‘onim, mah ’e‘eseh lakhem; uwamah ’akhapeir, uwarekhu ’et naHalat yhoh. 
2_samuel 21:4	wayomeru lo hagiw‘onim, ’ein li lanu kesef wecahaw ‘im sha’ul we‘im beito, we’ein lanu ’ish lehamit beyisra’eil; wayomer mah ’atem ’omerim ’e‘eseh lakhem. 
2_samuel 21:5	wayomeru ’el hamelekh, ha’ish ’asher kilanu, wa’asher dimah lanu; nishmadnu meihityazeiw bekhal gewul yisra’eil. 
2_samuel 21:6	yenatan yutan lanu shiw‘ah ’anashim mibanaw, wehoqa‘anum yhoh, begiw‘at sha’ul beHir yhoh; s wayomer hamelekh ’ani ’etein. 
2_samuel 21:7	wayaHmol hamelekh, ‘al mefi woshet ben yehonatan ben sha’ul; ‘al shewu‘at yhoh ’asher beinotam, bein dawid, uwein yehonatan ben sha’ul. 
2_samuel 21:8	wayiqaH hamelekh ’etosh nei benei rizpah wat ’ayah ’asher yaledah lesha’ul, ’et ’armoni we’et mefiwoshet; we’et Hameishet, benei mikhal bat sha’ul, ’asher yaledah le‘adri’eil ben barcilay hameHolati. 
2_samuel 21:9	wayiteneim beyad hagiw‘onim, wayoqi‘um bahar lifnei yhoh, wayipelu shiwa‘tayim shewa‘tam yaHad; weheim weheimah humtu bimei qazir barishonim, teHilat bitHilat qezir se‘orim. 
2_samuel 21:10	watiqaH rizpah wat ’ayah ’et hasaq wataTeihu lah ’el hazur miteHilat qazir, ‘ad nitakh mayim ‘aleihem min hashamayim; welo natenah ‘of hashamayim lanuaH ‘aleihem yomam, we’et Hayat hasadeh layelah. 
2_samuel 21:11	wayugad ledawid; ’eit ’asher ‘asetah rizpah wat ’ayah pilegesh sha’ul.
