2_samuel 21:12	wayeilekh dawid, wayiqaH ’et ‘azmot sha’ul we’et ‘azmot yehonatan beno, mei’eit ba‘alei yaweish gil‘ad; ’asher ganewu ’otam meireHow beit shan, ’asher telum tela’um sham hapelishtim shamah pelishtim, beyom hakot pelishtim ’et sha’ul bagilboa‘. 
2_samuel 21:13	waya‘al misham ’et ‘azmot sha’ul, we’et ‘azmot yehonatan beno; waya’asfu, ’et ‘azmot hamuqa‘im. 
2_samuel 21:14	wayiqberu ’et ‘azmot sha’ul wihonatan beno be’erez binyamin bezeila‘, beqewer qish ’awiw, waya‘asu, kol ’asher ziwwah hamelekh; wayei‘ateir ’elohim la’arez ’aHarei khein.
2_samuel 21:15	watehi ‘od milHamah lapelishtim ’et yisra’eil; wayeired dawid wa‘awadaw ‘imo wayilaHamu ’et pelishtim waya‘af dawid. 
2_samuel 21:16	weyishbo weyishbi benow ’asher bilidei harafah, umishqal qeino shelosh mei’ot mishqal neHoshet, wehu Hagur Hadashah; wayomer lehakot ’et dawid. 
2_samuel 21:17	waya‘acar lo ’awishay ben zeruyah, wayakh ’et hapelishti waymiteihu; ’ac nishbe‘u ’anshei dawid lo leimor, lo teizei ‘od ’itanu lamilHamah, welo tekhabeh ’et neir yisra’eil.
2_samuel 21:18	wayhi ’aHarei khein, watehi ‘od hamilHamah begow ‘im pelishtim; ’ac hikah, sibekhay haHushati, ’et saf ’asher bilidei harafah.
2_samuel 21:19	watehi ‘od hamilHamah begow ‘im pelishtim; wayakh ’elHanan ben ya‘rei ’oregim beit halaHmi, ’eit galeyat hagiti, we‘eiz Hanito, kimnor ’oregim.
2_samuel 21:20	watehi ‘od milHamah begat; wayhi ’ish madin madon, we’ezbe‘ot yadaw we’ezbe‘ot raglaw sheish washeish, ‘esrim we’arba‘ mispar, wegam hu yulad leharafah. 
2_samuel 21:21	wayHareif ’et yisra’eil; wayakeihu yehonatan, ben shim‘i shim‘ah ’aHi dawid. 
2_samuel 21:22	’et ’arba‘at ’eileh yuledu leharafah begat; wayipelu weyad dawid uweyad ‘awadaw.
2_samuel 22:1	waydabeir dawid yhoh, ’et diwrei hashirah haccot; beyom hizil yhoh ’oto mikaf kal ’oyewaw umikaf sha’ul. 
2_samuel 22:2	wayomar; yhoh sal‘i umezudati umefalTi li. 
2_samuel 22:3	’elohei zuri ’eHeseh bo; magini weqeren yish‘i, misgabi umenusi, moshi‘i meiHamas toshi‘eini. 
2_samuel 22:4	mehulal ’eqra yhoh; umei’oyeway ’iwwasheia‘. 
2_samuel 22:5	ki ’afafuni mishberei mawet; naHalei weliya‘al yewa‘atuni. 
2_samuel 22:6	Hewlei she’ol sabuni; qidemuni moqeshei mawet. 
2_samuel 22:7	bazar li ’eqra yhoh, we’el ’elohay ’eqra; wayishma‘ meiheikhalo qoli, weshaw‘ati be’acenaw. 
2_samuel 22:8	watga‘ash wayitga‘ash watir‘ash ha’arez, mosdot hashamayim yirgacu; wayitga‘ashu ki Harah lo. 
2_samuel 22:9	‘alah ‘ashan be’apo, we’eish mipiw tokheil; geHalim ba‘aru mimenu. 
2_samuel 22:10	wayeiT shamayim wayeirad; wa‘arafel taHat raglaw. 
2_samuel 22:11	wayirkaw ‘al keruw waya‘of; wayeira ‘al kanfei ruaH. 
2_samuel 22:12	wayashet Hoshekh sewiwotaw sukot; Hashrat mayim ‘awei sheHaqim. 
2_samuel 22:13	minogah negdo; ba‘aru gaHalei ’eish. 
2_samuel 22:14	yar‘eim min shamayim yhoh; we‘elyon yitein qolo. 
2_samuel 22:15	wayishlaH Hizim wayfizeim; baraq wayehumeim wayahom. 
2_samuel 22:16	wayeira’u ’afiqei yam, yigalu mosedot teiweil; bega‘arat yhoh, minishmat ruaH ’apo. 
2_samuel 22:17	yishlaH mimarom yiqaHeini; yamsheini mimayim rabim. 
2_samuel 22:18	yazileini mei’oyewi ‘ac; misone’ay, ki ’amezu mimeni. 
2_samuel 22:19	yeqademuni beyom ’eidi; wayhi yhoh mish‘an li. 
2_samuel 22:20	wayozei lamerHaw ’oti; yeHalezeini ki Hafeiz bi. 
2_samuel 22:21	yigmeleini yhoh kezidqati; kewor yaday yashiw li. 
2_samuel 22:22	ki shamarti darkhei yhoh; welo rasha‘ti mei’elohay. 
2_samuel 22:23	ki khal mishpoTo mishpaTaw lenegdi; weHuqotaw lo ’asur mimenah. 
2_samuel 22:24	wa’ehyeh tamim lo; wa’eshtamerah mei‘awoni. 
2_samuel 22:25	wayashew yhoh li kezidqati; kewori leneged ‘einaw. 
2_samuel 22:26	‘im Hasid titHassad; ‘im gibor tamim titamam. 
2_samuel 22:27	‘im nawar titawar; we‘im ‘iqeish titapal. 
2_samuel 22:28	we’et ‘am ‘ani toshia‘; we‘einekha ‘al ramim tashpil. 
2_samuel 22:29	ki ’atah neiri yhoh; yhoh yagiah Hasheki. 
2_samuel 22:30	ki wekhah ’aruz gedud; beilohay ’adaleg shur. 
2_samuel 22:31	ha’eil tamim darko; ’imrat yhoh zerufah, magein hu, lekhol haHosim bo. 
2_samuel 22:32	ki mi ’eil mibal‘adei yhoh; umi zur mibal‘adei ’eloheinu. 
2_samuel 22:33	ha’eil ma‘ucci Hayil; wayateir tamim darko darki. 
2_samuel 22:34	meshawweh raglaw raglay ka’ayalot; we‘al bamotay ya‘amideini. 
2_samuel 22:35	melameid yaday lamilHamah; weniHat qeshet neHushah cero‘otay. 
2_samuel 22:36	watiten li magein yish‘ekha; wa‘anotekha tarbeini. 
2_samuel 22:37	tarHiw za‘adi taHteini; welo ma‘adu qarsulay. 
2_samuel 22:38	’erdefah ’oyeway wa’ashmideim; welo ’ashuw ‘ad kalotam. 
2_samuel 22:39	wa’akhaleim wa’emHazeim welo yequmun; wayipelu taHat raglay. 
2_samuel 22:40	watacreini Hayil lamilHamah; takhria‘ qamay taHteini. 
2_samuel 22:41	we’oyeway, tatah li ‘oref; mesan’ay wa’azmiteim. 
2_samuel 22:42	yish‘u we’ein moshia‘; ’el yhoh welo ‘anam. 
2_samuel 22:43	we’eshHaqeim ka‘afar ’arez; keTiT Huzot ’adiqeim ’erqa‘eim. 
2_samuel 22:44	watefaleTeini, meiriwei ‘ami; tishmereini lerosh goyim, ‘am lo yada‘ti ya‘awduni. 
2_samuel 22:45	benei neikhar yitkaHashu li; lishmoa‘ ’ocen yishame‘u li. 
2_samuel 22:46	benei neikhar yibolu; weyaHgeru mimisgerotam. 
2_samuel 22:47	Hay yhoh uwarukh zuri; weyarum ’elohei zur yish‘i. 
2_samuel 22:48	ha’eil hanotein neqamot li; umorid ‘amim taHteini. 
2_samuel 22:49	umozi’i mei’oyeway; umiqamay teromeini, mei’ish Hamasim tazileini. 
2_samuel 22:50	‘al kein ’odkha yhoh bagoyim; uleshimkha ’acameir. 
2_samuel 22:51	migdil migdol yeshu‘ot malko; we‘oseh Hesed limshiHo ledawid ulecar‘o ‘ad ‘olam.
2_samuel 23:1	we’eileh diwrei dawid ha’aHaronim; ne’um dawid ben yishay, une’um hagewer huqam ‘al, meshiaH ’elohei ya‘aqow, une‘im cemirot yisra’eil. 
2_samuel 23:2	ruaH yhoh diber bi; umilato ‘al leshoni. 
2_samuel 23:3	’amar ’elohei yisra’eil, li diber zur yisra’eil; mosheil ba’adam, zadiq mosheil yir’at ’elohim. 
2_samuel 23:4	ukhe’or boqer yicraH shamesh; boqer lo ‘awot, minogah mimaTar deshe mei’arez. 
2_samuel 23:5	ki lo khein beiti ‘im ’eil; ki werit ‘olam sam li, ‘arukhah wakol ushemurah, ki khal yish‘i wekhal Heifez ki lo yazmiaH. 
2_samuel 23:6	uweliya‘al keqoz munad kulaham; ki lo weyad yiqaHu. 
2_samuel 23:7	we’ish yiga‘ bahem, yimalei warcel we‘eiz Hanit; uwa’eish sarof yisarefu bashawet.
2_samuel 23:8	’eileh shemot hagiborim ’asher ledawid; yosheiw bashewet taHkemoni rosh hashalishi, hu ‘adino ha‘ezno ha‘ezni, ‘al shemoneh mei’ot Halal befa‘am ’eHad ’eHat.
2_samuel 23:9	we’aHaro we’aHaraw ’el‘acar ben dodi dodo ben ’aHoHi; bishloshah giborim hagiborim ‘im dawid, beHarefam bapelishtim ne’esfu sham lamilHamah, waya‘alu ’ish yisra’eil. 
2_samuel 23:10	hu qam wayakh bapelishtim ‘ad ki yage‘ah yado, watidbaq yado ’el haHerew, waya‘as yhoh teshu‘ah gedolah bayom hahu; weha‘am yashuwu ’aHaraw ’akh lefasheiT.
2_samuel 23:11	we’aHaraw shama wen ’agei harari; wayei’asefu felishtim laHayah, watehi sham Helqat hasadeh melei’ah ‘adashim, weha‘am nas mipenei felishtim. 
2_samuel 23:12	wayityazeiw betokh haHelqah wayazileha, wayakh ’et pelishtim; waya‘as yhoh teshu‘ah gedolah.
2_samuel 23:13	wayeiredu sheloshim sheloshah meihasheloshim rosh, wayawo’u ’el qazir ’el dawid, ’el me‘arat ‘adulam; weHayat pelishtim, Honah be‘eimeq refa’im. 
2_samuel 23:14	wedawid ’ac bamezudah; umazaw pelishtim, ’ac beit laHem. 
2_samuel 23:15	wayit’awweh dawid wayomar; mi yashqeini mayim, mibor beit leHem ’asher basha‘ar. 
2_samuel 23:16	wayiwqe‘u sheloshet hagiborim bemaHaneih felishtim, wayish’awu mayim mibor beit leHem ’asher basha‘ar, wayis’u wayawi’u ’el dawid; welo ’awah lishtotam, wayasseikh ’otam yhoh. 
2_samuel 23:17	wayomer Halilah li yhoh mei‘asoti cot, hadam ha’anashim haholekhim benafshotam, welo ’awah lishtotam; ’eileh ‘asu, sheloshet hagiborim.
2_samuel 23:18	wa’awishay ’aHi yo’aw ben zeruyah, hu rosh hasheloshi hasheloshah, wehu ‘oreir ’et Hanito, ‘al shelosh mei’ot Halal; welo sheim basheloshah. 
2_samuel 23:19	min hasheloshah hakhi nikhbad, wayhi lahem lesar; we‘ad hasheloshah lo wa.
2_samuel 23:20	uwenayahu wen yehoyada‘ ben ’ish Hay Hayil raw pe‘alim miqawze’eil; hu hikah, ’eit shenei ’ari’eil mo’aw, wehu yarad wehikah ’et ha’ariyah ha’ari betokh habor beyom hashaleg. 
2_samuel 23:21	wehu hikah ’et ’ish mizri ’asher ’ish mar’eh, uweyad hamizri Hanit, wayeired ’eilaw bashaweT; wayigcol ’et haHanit miyad hamizri, wayahargeihu baHanito. 
2_samuel 23:22	’eileh ‘asah, benayahu ben yehoyada‘; welo sheim bishloshah hagiborim. 
2_samuel 23:23	min hasheloshim nikhbad, we’el hasheloshah lo wa; waysimeihu dawid ’el mishma‘to.
2_samuel 23:24	‘asah ’eil ’aHi yo’aw basheloshim; ’elHanan ben dodo beit laHem. 
2_samuel 23:25	shamah haHarodi, ’eliqa haHarodi.
2_samuel 23:26	Helez hapalTi, ‘ira wen ‘iqeish hateqo‘i.
2_samuel 23:27	’awi‘ecer ha‘anetoti, mewunay haHushati.
2_samuel 23:28	zalmon ha’aHoHi, mahray haneTofati.
2_samuel 23:29	Heilew ben ba‘anah haneTofati; s ’itay ben riway, migiw‘at benei winyamin.
2_samuel 23:30	benayahu pir‘atoni, hiday minaHalei ga‘ash.
2_samuel 23:31	’awi ‘alwon ha‘arwati, ‘acmawet habarHumi.
2_samuel 23:32	’elyaHba hasha‘alwoni, benei yashein yehonatan.
2_samuel 23:33	shamah haharari, ’aHi’am ben sharar harari.
2_samuel 23:34	’elifeleT ben ’aHasbay ben hama‘akhati; s ’eli‘am ben ’aHitofel hagiloni.
2_samuel 23:35	Hezro Hezray hakarmeli, pa‘aray ha’arbi.
2_samuel 23:36	yig’al ben natan mizowah, s bani hagadi.
2_samuel 23:37	zeleq ha‘amoni; s naHray habe’eiroti, nose’ei nosei kelei yo’aw ben zeruyah.
2_samuel 23:38	‘ira hayitri, gareiw hayitri.
2_samuel 23:39	’uriyah haHiti, kol sheloshim weshiw‘ah.
2_samuel 24:1	wayosef ’af yhoh, laHarot beyisra’eil; wayaset ’et dawid bahem leimor, leikh meneih ’et yisra’eil we’et yehudah. 
2_samuel 24:2	wayomer hamelekh ’el yo’aw sar haHayil ’asher ’ito, shuT na bekhal shiwTei yisra’eil midan we‘ad be’eir shewa‘, ufiqdu ’et ha‘am; weyada‘ti, ’eit mispar ha‘am.
2_samuel 24:3	wayomer yo’aw ’el hamelekh, weyoseif yhoh ’elohekha ’el ha‘am kaheim wekhaheim mei’ah fe‘amim, we‘einei ’adoni hamelekh ro’ot; wadoni hamelekh, lamah Hafeiz badawar hacceh. 
2_samuel 24:4	wayeHecaq dewar hamelekh ’el yo’aw, we‘al sarei heHayil; wayeizei yo’aw wesarei haHayil lifnei hamelekh, lifqod ’et ha‘am ’et yisra’eil. 
2_samuel 24:5	waya‘awru ’et hayardein; wayaHanu wa‘aro‘eir, yemin ha‘ir ’asher betokh hanaHal hagad we’el ya‘ceir. 
2_samuel 24:6	wayawo’u hagil‘adah, we’el ’erez taHtim Hadeshi; wayawo’u danah ya‘an, wesawiw ’el zidon. 
2_samuel 24:7	wayawo’u miwzar zor, wekhal ‘arei haHiwwi wehakena‘ani; wayeize’u ’el negew yehudah be’eir shawa‘. 
2_samuel 24:8	wayashuTu bekhal ha’arez; wayawo’u miqzeih tish‘ah Hodashim we‘esrim yom yerushalim. 
2_samuel 24:9	wayitein yo’aw ’et mispar mifqad ha‘am ’el hamelekh; watehi yisra’eil shemoneh mei’ot ’elef ’ish Hayil sholeif Herew, we’ish yehudah, Hameish mei’ot ’elef ’ish. 
2_samuel 24:10	wayakh leiw dawid ’oto, ’aHarei khein safar ’et ha‘am; s wayomer dawid ’el yhoh HaTati me’od ’asher ‘asiti, we‘atah yhoh, ha‘awer na ’et ‘awon ‘awdekha, ki niskalti me’od. 
2_samuel 24:11	wayaqam dawid baboqer; f udewar yhoh hayah ’el gad hanawi, Hoceih dawid leimor. 
2_samuel 24:12	halokh wedibarta ’el dawid, koh ’amar yhoh, shalosh ’anokhi noTeil ‘alekha; beHar lekha ’aHat meihem we’e‘eseh lakh. 
2_samuel 24:13	wayawo gad ’el dawid wayaged lo; wayomer lo hatawo lekha shewa‘ shanim ra‘aw be’arzekha ’im sheloshah Hodashim nuskha lifnei zarekha wehu rodefekha, we’im heyot sheloshet yamim dewer be’arzekha, ‘atah da‘ ure’eih, mah ’ashiw sholeHi dawar.
2_samuel 24:14	wayomer dawid ’el gad zar li me’od; nipelah na weyad yhoh ki rabim raHamo raHamaw, uweyad ’adam ’al ’epolah. 
2_samuel 24:15	wayitein yhoh dewer beyisra’eil, meihaboqer we‘ad ‘eit mo‘eid; wayamat min ha‘am, midan we‘ad be’eir shewa‘, shiw‘im ’elef ’ish. 
2_samuel 24:16	wayishlaH yado hamal’akh yerushalim leshaHatah wayinaHem yhoh ’el hara‘ah, wayomer lamal’akh hamashHit ba‘am raw, ‘atah heref yadekha; umal’akh yhoh hayah, ‘im goren ha’ornah ha’arawnah haywusi.
2_samuel 24:17	wayomer dawid ’el yhoh bir’oto ’et hamal’akh hamakeh wa‘am, wayomer hineih ’anokhi HaTati we’anokhi he‘eweiti, we’eileh hazon meh ‘asu; tehi na yadekha bi uweweit ’awi.
2_samuel 24:18	wayawo gad ’el dawid bayom hahu; wayomer lo, ‘aleih haqeim yhoh micbeiaH, begoren ’araneyah ’arawnah haywusi. 
2_samuel 24:19	waya‘al dawid kidwar gad, ka’asher ziwwah yhoh. 
2_samuel 24:20	wayashqeif ’arawnah, wayar ’et hamelekh we’et ‘awadaw, ‘owerim ‘alaw; wayeizei ’arawnah, wayishtaHu lamelekh ’apaw ’arezah. 
2_samuel 24:21	wayomer ’arawnah, madua‘ ba ’adoni hamelekh ’el ‘awdo; wayomer dawid liqnot mei‘imekha ’et hagoren, liwnot micbeiaH yhoh, wetei‘azar hamageifah mei‘al ha‘am. 
2_samuel 24:22	wayomer ’arawnah ’el dawid, yiqaH weya‘al ’adoni hamelekh haTow be‘ayno be‘einaw; re’eih habaqar la‘olah, wehamorigim ukhelei habaqar la‘eizim. 
2_samuel 24:23	hakol, natan ’arawnah hamelekh lamelekh; s wayomer ’arawnah ’el hamelekh, yhoh ’elohekha yirzekha. 
2_samuel 24:24	wayomer hamelekh ’el ’arawnah, lo ki qano ’eqneh mei’otkha bimHir, welo ’a‘aleh yhoh ’elohay ‘olot Hinam; wayiqen dawid ’et hagoren we’et habaqar, bekhesef sheqalim Hamishim. 
2_samuel 24:25	wayiwen sham dawid micbeiaH yhoh, waya‘al ‘olot ushelamim; wayei‘ateir yhoh la’arez, watei‘azar hamageifah mei‘al yisra’eil. 
1_kings 1:1	wehamelekh dawid caqein, ba bayamim; waykhassuhu babegadim, welo yiHam lo. 
1_kings 1:2	wayomeru lo ‘awadaw, yewaqshu ladoni hamelekh na‘arah wetulah, we‘amedah lifnei hamelekh, utehi lo sokhenet; weshakhewah weHeiqekha, weHam ladoni hamelekh. 
1_kings 1:3	waywaqshu na‘arah yafah, bekhol gewul yisra’eil; wayimze’u, ’et ’awishag hashunamit, wayawi’u ’otah lamelekh. 
1_kings 1:4	wehana‘arah yafah ‘ad me’od; watehi lamelekh sokhenet wateshareteihu, wehamelekh lo yeda‘ah. 
1_kings 1:5	wa’adoniyah wen Hagit mitnasei leimor ’ani ’emlokh; waya‘as lo, rekhew ufarashim, waHamishim ’ish razim lefanaw. 
1_kings 1:6	welo ‘azawo ’awiw miyamaw leimor, madua‘ kakhah ‘asita; wegam hu Tow to’ar me’od, we’oto yaledah ’aHarei ’awshalom. 
1_kings 1:7	wayihyu dewaraw, ‘im yo’aw ben zeruyah, we‘im ’ewyatar hakohein; waya‘ceru, ’aHarei ’adoniyah. 
1_kings 1:8	wezadoq hakohein uwenayahu wen yehoyada‘ wenatan hanawi weshim‘i werei‘i, wehagiborim ’asher ledawid; lo hayu ‘im ’adoniyahu. 
1_kings 1:9	wayicbaH ’adoniyahu, zon uwaqar umeri, ‘im ’ewen haccoHelet, ’asher ’eizel ‘ein rogeil; wayiqra, ’et kal ’eHaw benei hamelekh, ulekhal ’anshei yehudah ‘awdei hamelekh. 
1_kings 1:10	we’et natan hanawi uwenayahu we’et hagiborim we’et shelomoh ’aHiw lo qara. 
1_kings 1:11	wayomer natan, ’el bat shewa‘ ’eim shelomoh leimor, halo shama‘at, ki malakh ’adoniyahu wen Hagit; wa’adoneinu dawid lo yada‘. 
1_kings 1:12	we‘atah lekhi ’i‘azeikh na ‘eizah; umaleTi ’et nafsheikh, we’et nefesh beneikh shelomoh. 
1_kings 1:13	lekhi uwo’i ’el hamelekh dawid, we’amart ’eilaw halo ’atah ’adoni hamelekh, nishba‘ta la’amatekha leimor, ki shelomoh weneikh yimlokh ’aHaray, wehu yeisheiw ‘al kis’i; umadua‘ malakh ’adoniyahu 
1_kings 1:14	hineih, ‘odakh medaberet sham ‘im hamelekh; wa’ani ’awo ’aHarayikh, umileiti ’et dewarayikh. 
1_kings 1:15	watawo wat shewe‘ ’el hamelekh haHadrah, wehamelekh caqein me’od; wa’awishag hashunamit, mesharat ’et hamelekh. 
1_kings 1:16	watiqod bat shewa‘, watishtaHu lamelekh; wayomer hamelekh mah lakh. 
1_kings 1:17	watomer lo, ’adoni ’atah nishba‘ta yhoh ’elohekha la’amatekha, ki shelomoh weneikh yimlokh ’aHaray; wehu yeisheiw ‘al kis’i. 
1_kings 1:18	we‘atah hineih ’adoniyah malakh; we‘atah ’adoni hamelekh lo yada‘eta. 
1_kings 1:19	wayicbaH shor umeri wezon larow wayiqra lekhal benei hamelekh, ule’ewyatar hakohein, uleyo’aw sar hazawa; welishlomoh ‘awdekha lo qara. 
1_kings 1:20	we’atah ’adoni hamelekh, ‘einei khal yisra’eil ‘alekha; lehagid lahem, mi, yeisheiw ‘al kissei ’adoni hamelekh ’aHaraw. 
1_kings 1:21	wehayah kishkhaw ’adoni hamelekh ‘im ’awotaw; wehayiti, ’ani uweni shelomoh HaTa’im. 
1_kings 1:22	wehineih ‘odenah medaberet ‘im hamelekh; wenatan hanawi ba. 
1_kings 1:23	wayagidu lamelekh leimor, hineih natan hanawi; wayawo lifnei hamelekh, wayishtaHu lamelekh ‘al ’apaw ’arezah. 
1_kings 1:24	wayomer natan ’adoni hamelekh, ’atah ’amarta, ’adoniyahu yimlokh ’aHaray; wehu yeisheiw ‘al kis’i. 
1_kings 1:25	ki yarad hayom, wayicbaH shor umeri wezon larow wayiqra lekhal benei hamelekh ulesarei hazawa ule’ewyatar hakohein, wehinam ’okhelim weshotim lefanaw; wayomeru, yeHi hamelekh ’adoniyahu. 
1_kings 1:26	weli ’ani ‘awdekha ulezadoq hakohein weliwnayahu wen yehoyada‘ welishlomoh ‘awdekha lo qara. 
1_kings 1:27	’im, mei’eit ’adoni hamelekh, nihyah hadawar hacceh; welo hoda‘ta ’et ‘awdekha ‘awdekha, mi, yeisheiw ‘al kissei ’adoni hamelekh ’aHaraw.
1_kings 1:28	waya‘an hamelekh dawid wayomer, qir’u li lewat shawa‘; watawo lifnei hamelekh, wata‘amod lifnei hamelekh. 
1_kings 1:29	wayishawa‘ hamelekh wayomar; Hay yhoh ’asher padah ’et nafshi mikal zarah. 
1_kings 1:30	ki ka’asher nishba‘ti lakh yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil leimor, ki shelomoh weneikh yimlokh ’aHaray, wehu yeisheiw ‘al kis’i taHtay; ki kein ’e‘eseh hayom hacceh. 
1_kings 1:31	watiqod bat shewa‘ ’apayim ’erez, watishtaHu lamelekh; watomer yeHi, ’adoni hamelekh dawid le‘olam.
1_kings 1:32	wayomer hamelekh dawid, qir’u li lezadoq hakohein ulenatan hanawi, weliwnayahu ben yehoyada‘; wayawo’u lifnei hamelekh. 
1_kings 1:33	wayomer hamelekh lahem, qeHu ‘imakhem ’et ‘awdei ’adoneikhem, wehirkawtem ’et shelomoh weni, ‘al hapirdah ’asher li; wehoradtem ’oto ’el giHon. 
1_kings 1:34	umashaH ’oto m zadoq hakohein wenatan hanawi lemelekh ‘al yisra’eil; uteqa‘tem bashofar, wa’amartem yeHi hamelekh shelomoh. 
1_kings 1:35	wa‘alitem ’aHaraw, uwa weyashaw ‘al kis’i, wehu yimlokh taHtay; we’oto ziwwiti lihyot nagid, ‘al yisra’eil we‘al yehudah. 
1_kings 1:36	waya‘an benayahu wen yehoyada‘ ’et hamelekh wayomer ’amein; kein yomar yhoh, ’elohei ’adoni hamelekh. 
1_kings 1:37	ka’asher hayah yhoh ‘im ’adoni hamelekh, kein yehi yihyeh ‘im shelomoh; wigadeil ’et kis’o, mikissei, ’adoni hamelekh dawid. 
1_kings 1:38	wayeired zadoq hakohein wenatan hanawi uwenayahu wen yehoyada‘, wehakereiti wehapeleiti, wayarkiwu ’et shelomoh, ‘al pirdat hamelekh dawid; wayolikhu ’oto ‘al giHon. 
1_kings 1:39	wayiqaH zadoq hakohein ’et qeren hashemen min ha’ohel, wayimshaH ’et shelomoh; wayitqe‘u bashofar, wayomeru kal ha‘am, yeHi hamelekh shelomoh. 
1_kings 1:40	waya‘alu khal ha‘am ’aHaraw, weha‘am meHalelim baHalilim, usemeiHim simHah gedolah; watibaqa‘ ha’arez beqolam. 
1_kings 1:41	wayishma‘ ’adoniyahu, wekhal haqeru’im ’asher ’ito, weheim kilu le’ekhol; wayishma‘ yo’aw ’et qol hashofar, wayomer madua‘ qol haqiryah homah. 
1_kings 1:42	‘odenu medabeir, wehineih yonatan ben ’ewyatar hakohein ba; wayomer ’adoniyahu bo, ki ’ish Hayil ’atah weTow tewaseir. 
1_kings 1:43	waya‘an yonatan, wayomer la’adoniyahu; ’awal ’adoneinu hamelekh dawid himlikh ’et shelomoh. 
1_kings 1:44	wayishlaH ’ito hamelekh ’et zadoq hakohein we’et natan hanawi, uwenayahu ben yehoyada‘, wehakereiti wehapeleiti; wayarkiwu ’oto, ‘al pirdat hamelekh. 
1_kings 1:45	wayimsheHu ’oto zadoq hakohein wenatan hanawi lemelekh begiHon, waya‘alu misham semeiHim, wateihom haqiryah; hu haqol ’asher shema‘tem. 
1_kings 1:46	wegam yashaw shelomoh, ‘al kissei hamelukhah. 
1_kings 1:47	wegam ba’u ‘awdei hamelekh, lewareikh ’et ’adoneinu hamelekh dawid leimor yeiTeiw ’elohekha ’elohim ’et sheim shelomoh mishemekha, wigadeil ’et kis’o mikis’ekha; wayishtaHu hamelekh ‘al hamishkaw. 
1_kings 1:48	wegam kakhah ’amar hamelekh; barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’asher natan hayom yosheiw ‘al kis’i we‘einay ro’ot. 
1_kings 1:49	wayeHerdu wayaqumu, kal haqeru’im, ’asher la’adoniyahu; wayeilekhu ’ish ledarko. 
1_kings 1:50	wa’adoniyahu, yarei mipenei shelomoh; wayaqam wayeilekh, wayaHaceiq beqarnot hamicbeiaH. 
1_kings 1:51	wayugad lishlomoh leimor, hineih ’adoniyahu, yarei ’et hamelekh shelomoh; wehineih ’aHac beqarnot hamicbeiaH leimor, yishawa‘ li khayom hamelekh shelomoh, ’im yamit ’et ‘awdo beHarew. 
1_kings 1:52	wayomer shelomoh, ’im yihyeh lewen Hayil, lo yipol misa‘arato ’arezah; we’im ra‘ah timazei wo wameit. 
1_kings 1:53	wayishlaH hamelekh shelomoh, wayoriduhu mei‘al hamicbeiaH, wayawo wayishtaHu lamelekh shelomoh; wayomer lo shelomoh leikh leweitekha.
1_kings 2:1	wayiqrewu yemei dawid lamut; wayzaw ’et shelomoh weno leimor. 
1_kings 2:2	’anokhi holeikh, bederekh kal ha’arez; weHacaqta wehayita le’ish. 
1_kings 2:3	weshamarta ’et mishmeret yhoh ’elohekha, lalekhet bidrakhaw lishmor Huqotaw mizwotaw umishpaTaw we‘eidewotaw, kakatuw betorat mosheh; lema‘an taskil, ’eit kal ’asher ta‘aseh, we’eit kal ’asher tifneh sham. 
1_kings 2:4	lema‘an yaqim yhoh ’et dewaro, ’asher diber ‘alay leimor ’im yishmeru wanekha ’et darkam, lalekhet lefanay be’emet, bekhal lewawam uwekhal nafsham; leimor lo yikareit lekha ’ish, mei‘al kissei yisra’eil. 
1_kings 2:5	wegam ’atah yada‘ta ’eit ’asher ‘asah li yo’aw ben zeruyah, ’asher ‘asah lishnei sarei ziw’ot yisra’eil le’awneir ben neir wela‘amasa wen yeter wayahargeim, wayasem demei milHamah beshalom; wayitein demei milHamah, baHagorato ’asher bematenaw, uwena‘alo ’asher beraglaw. 
1_kings 2:6	we‘asita keHakhematekha; welo toreid seiwato beshalom she’ol.
1_kings 2:7	weliwnei warcilay hagil‘adi ta‘aseh Hesed, wehayu be’okhelei shulHanekha; ki khein qarewu ’eilay, bewareHi mipenei ’awshalom ’aHikha. 
1_kings 2:8	wehineih ‘imekha shim‘i wen geira wen haymini mibaHurim wehu qilani qelalah nimrezet, beyom lekhti maHanayim; wehu yarad liqrati hayardein, wa’eshawa‘ lo yhoh leimor, ’im ’amitekha beHarew. 
1_kings 2:9	we‘atah ’al tenaqeihu, ki ’ish Hakham ’atah; weyada‘ta ’eit ’asher ta‘aseh lo, wehoradta ’et seiwato bedam she’ol. 
1_kings 2:10	wayishkaw dawid ‘im ’awotaw; wayiqaweir be‘ir dawid.
1_kings 2:11	wehayamim, ’asher malakh dawid ‘al yisra’eil, ’arba‘im shanah; beHewron malakh shewa‘ shanim, uwirushalim malakh, sheloshim weshalosh shanim. 
1_kings 2:12	ushelomoh yashaw ‘al kissei dawid ’awiw; watikon malkhuto me’od. 
1_kings 2:13	wayawo ’adoniyahu wen Hageit, ’el bat shewa‘ ’eim shelomoh, watomer hashalom bo’ekha; wayomer shalom. 
1_kings 2:14	wayomer dawar li ’eilayikh; watomer dabeir. 
1_kings 2:15	wayomer, ’at yada‘at ki li hayetah hamelukhah, we‘alay samu khal yisra’eil peneihem limlokh; watissow hamelukhah watehi le’aHi, ki yhoh hayetah lo. 
1_kings 2:16	we‘atah, she’eilah ’aHat ’anokhi sho’eil mei’itakh, ’al tashiwi ’et panay; watomer ’eilaw dabeir. 
1_kings 2:17	wayomer, ’imri na lishlomoh hamelekh, ki lo yashiw ’et panayikh; weyiten li ’et ’awishag hashunamit le’ishah. 
1_kings 2:18	watomer bat shewa‘ Tow; ’anokhi ’adabeir ‘alekha ’el hamelekh. 
1_kings 2:19	watawo wat shewa‘ ’el hamelekh shelomoh, ledaber lo ‘al ’adoniyahu; wayaqam hamelekh liqratah wayishtaHu lah, wayeishew ‘al kis’o, wayasem kissei le’eim hamelekh, wateishew limino. 
1_kings 2:20	watomer, she’eilah ’aHat qeTanah ’anokhi sho’elet mei’itakh, ’al tashew ’et panay; wayomer lah hamelekh sha’ali ’imi, ki lo ’ashiw ’et panayikh. 
1_kings 2:21	watomer yutan ’et ’awishag hashunamit; la’adoniyahu ’aHikha le’ishah. 
1_kings 2:22	waya‘an hamelekh shelomoh wayomer le’imo, welamah ’at sho’elet ’et ’awishag hashunamit la’adoniyahu, wesha’ali lo ’et hamelukhah, ki hu ’aHi hagadol mimeni; welo ule’ewyatar hakohein, uleyo’aw ben zeruyah.
1_kings 2:23	wayishawa‘ hamelekh shelomoh, yhoh leimor; koh ya‘aseh li ’elohim wekhoh yosif, ki wenafsho, diber ’adoniyahu, ’et hadawar hacceh. 
1_kings 2:24	we‘atah, Hay yhoh ’asher hekhinani, wayoshiwini wayoshiwani ‘al kissei dawid ’awi, wa’asher ‘asah li bayit ka’asher dibeir; ki hayom, yumat ’adoniyahu. 
1_kings 2:25	wayishlaH hamelekh shelomoh, beyad benayahu wen yehoyada‘; wayifga‘ bo wayamot.
1_kings 2:26	ule’ewyatar hakohein ’amar hamelekh, ‘anatot leikh ‘al sadekha, ki ’ish mawet ’atah; uwayom hacceh lo ’amitekha, ki nasata ’et ’aron ’adonay yhoh lifnei dawid ’awi, wekhi hit‘anita, bekhol ’asher hit‘anah ’awi. 
1_kings 2:27	waygaresh shelomoh ’et ’ewyatar, mihyot kohein yhoh; lemalei ’et dewar yhoh, ’asher diber ‘al beit ‘eili beshiloh.
1_kings 2:28	wehashemu‘ah ba’ah ‘ad yo’aw, ki yo’aw, naTah ’aHarei ’adoniyah, we’aHarei ’awshalom lo naTah; wayanas yo’aw ’el ’ohel yhoh, wayaHaceiq beqarnot hamicbeiaH. 
1_kings 2:29	wayugad lamelekh shelomoh, ki nas yo’aw ’el ’ohel yhoh, wehineih ’eizel hamicbeiaH; wayishlaH shelomoh ’et benayahu wen yehoyada‘ leimor leikh pega‘ bo. 
1_kings 2:30	wayawo wenayahu ’el ’ohel yhoh wayomer ’eilaw koh ’amar hamelekh zei, wayomer lo ki foh ’amut; wayashew benayahu ’et hamelekh dawar leimor, koh diber yo’aw wekhoh ‘anani. 
1_kings 2:31	wayomer lo hamelekh, ‘aseih ka’asher diber, ufega‘ bo uqewarto; wahasirota demei Hinam, ’asher shafakh yo’aw, mei‘alay umei‘al beit ’awi. 
1_kings 2:32	weheishiw yhoh ’et damo ‘al rosho, ’asher paga‘ bishnei ’anashim zadiqim weTowim mimenu wayahargeim baHerew, we’awi dawid lo yada‘; ’et ’awneir ben neir sar zewa yisra’eil, we’et ‘amasa wen yeter sar zewa yehudah. 
1_kings 2:33	weshawu demeihem berosh yo’aw, uwerosh car‘o le‘olam; uledawid ulecar‘o uleweito ulekhis’o yihyeh shalom ‘ad ‘olam mei‘im yhoh. 
1_kings 2:34	waya‘al, benayahu ben yehoyada‘, wayifga‘ bo waymiteihu; wayiqaweir beweito bamidbar. 
1_kings 2:35	wayitein hamelekh ’et benayahu wen yehoyada‘ taHtaw ‘al hazawa; we’et zadoq hakohein natan hamelekh, taHat ’ewyatar. 
1_kings 2:36	wayishlaH hamelekh wayiqra leshim‘i, wayomer lo, beneih lekha wayit birushalim, weyashawta sham; welo teizei misham ’aneh wa’anah. 
1_kings 2:37	wehayah beyom zeitekha, we‘awarta ’et naHal qidron, yadoa‘ teida‘ ki mot tamut; damekha yihyeh weroshekha. 
1_kings 2:38	wayomer shim‘i lamelekh Tow hadawar, ka’asher diber ’adoni hamelekh, kein ya‘aseh ‘awdekha; wayeishew shim‘i birushalim yamim rabim.
1_kings 2:39	wayhi, miqeiz shalosh shanim, wayiwreHu shenei ‘awadim leshim‘i, ’el ’akhish ben ma‘akhah melekh gat; wayagidu leshim‘i leimor, hineih ‘awadekha begat. 
1_kings 2:40	wayaqam shim‘i, wayaHawosh ’et Hamoro, wayeilekh gatah ’el ’akhish, lewaqeish ’et ‘awadaw; wayeilekh shim‘i, wayawei ’et ‘awadaw migat. 
1_kings 2:41	wayugad lishlomoh; ki halakh shim‘i mirushalim gat wayashow. 
1_kings 2:42	wayishlaH hamelekh wayiqra leshim‘i, wayomer ’eilaw halo hishba‘tikha yhoh wa’a‘id bekha leimor, beyom zeitekha, wehalakhta ’aneh wa’anah, yadoa‘ teida‘ ki mot tamut; watomer ’eilay Tow hadawar shama‘eti. 
1_kings 2:43	umadua‘ lo shamarta, ’eit shewu‘at yhoh; we’et hamizwah ’asher ziwwiti ‘alekha. 
1_kings 2:44	wayomer hamelekh ’el shim‘i, ’atah yada‘ta ’eit kal hara‘ah, ’asher yada‘ lewawekha, ’asher ‘asita ledawid ’awi; weheishiw yhoh ’et ra‘atekha beroshekha. 
1_kings 2:45	wehamelekh shelomoh barukh; wekhissei dawid, yihyeh nakhon lifnei yhoh ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_kings 2:46	wayzaw hamelekh, ’et benayahu ben yehoyada‘, wayeizei wayifga‘ bo wayamot; wehamamlakhah nakhonah beyad shelomoh. 
1_kings 3:1	wayitHatein shelomoh, ’et par‘oh melekh mizrayim; wayiqaH ’et bat par‘oh, waywi’eha ’el ‘ir dawid, ‘ad kaloto, liwnot ’et beito we’et beit yhoh, we’et Homat yerushalim sawiw. 
1_kings 3:2	raq ha‘am, mecabeHim babamot; ki lo niwnah wayit lesheim yhoh, ‘ad hayamim haheim.
1_kings 3:3	waye’ehaw shelomoh ’et yhoh, lalekhet beHuqot dawid ’awiw; raq babamot, hu mecabeiaH umaqTir. 
1_kings 3:4	wayeilekh hamelekh giw‘onah licboaH sham, ki hi habamah hagedolah; ’elef ‘olot ya‘aleh shelomoh, ‘al hamicbeiaH hahu. 
1_kings 3:5	begiw‘on, nir’ah yhoh ’el shelomoh baHalom halayelah; wayomer ’elohim, she’al mah ’eten lakh. 
1_kings 3:6	wayomer shelomoh, ’atah ‘asita ‘im ‘awdekha dawid ’awi Hesed gadol ka’asher halakh lefanekha be’emet uwizdaqah uweyishrat leiwaw ‘imakh; watishmar lo, ’et haHesed hagadol hacceh, watiten lo wein yosheiw ‘al kis’o kayom hacceh. 
1_kings 3:7	we‘atah yhoh ’elohay, ’atah himlakhta ’et ‘awdekha, taHat dawid ’awi; we’anokhi na‘ar qaTon, lo ’eida‘ zeit wawo. 
1_kings 3:8	we‘awdekha, betokh ‘amekha ’asher baHareta; ‘am raw ’asher lo yimaneh welo yissafeir meirow. 
1_kings 3:9	wenatata le‘awdekha leiw shomeia‘ lishpoT ’et ‘amekha, lehawin bein Tow lera‘; ki mi yukhal lishpoT, ’et ‘amekha hakaweid hacceh. 
1_kings 3:10	wayiTaw hadawar be‘einei ’adonay; ki sha’al shelomoh, ’et hadawar hacceh. 
1_kings 3:11	wayomer ’elohim ’eilaw, ya‘an ’asher sha’alta ’et hadawar hacceh, welo sha’alta lekha yamim rabim, welo sha’alta lekha ‘osher, welo sha’alta nefesh ’oyewekha; wesha’alta lekha hawin lishmoa‘ mishpaT. 
1_kings 3:12	hineih ‘asiti kidwarekha; hineih natati lekha, leiw Hakham wenawon, ’asher kamokha lo hayah lefanekha, we’aHarekha lo yaqum kamokha. 
1_kings 3:13	wegam ’asher lo sha’alta natati lakh, gam ‘osher gam kawod; ’asher lo hayah khamokha ’ish bamelakhim kal yamekha. 
1_kings 3:14	we’im teileikh bidrakhay, lishmor Huqay umizwotay, ka’asher halakh dawid ’awikha; weha’arakhti ’et yamekha.
1_kings 3:15	wayiqaz shelomoh wehineih Halom; wayawo yerushalim waya‘amod lifnei ’aron berit ’adonay, waya‘al ‘olot waya‘as shelamim, waya‘as mishteh lekhal ‘awadaw.
1_kings 3:16	’ac tawonah, shetayim nashim conot ’el hamelekh; wata‘amodenah lefanaw. 
1_kings 3:17	watomer ha’ishah ha’aHat bi ’adoni, ’ani weha’ishah haccot, yoshewot bewayit ’eHad; wa’eileid ‘imah babayit. 
1_kings 3:18	wayhi bayom hashelishi lelidti, wateiled gam ha’ishah haccot; wa’anaHnu yaHdaw, ’ein car ’itanu babayit, culati shetayim ’anaHnu babayit. 
1_kings 3:19	wayamat ben ha’ishah haccot layelah; ’asher shakhewah ‘alaw. 
1_kings 3:20	wataqam betokh halaylah watiqaH ’et beni mei’ezli, wa’amatekha yesheinah, watashkiweihu beHeiqah; we’et benah hameit hishkiwah weHeiqi. 
1_kings 3:21	wa’aqum baboqer leheiniq ’et beni wehineih meit; wa’etbonein ’eilaw baboqer, wehineih lo hayah weni ’asher yaladeti. 
1_kings 3:22	watomer ha’ishah ha’aHeret lo khi, beni haHay uweneikh hameit, wecot ’omeret lo khi, beneikh hameit uweni heHay; watedabeirenah lifnei hamelekh. 
1_kings 3:23	wayomer hamelekh, cot ’omeret, ceh beni haHay uweneikh hameit; wecot ’omeret lo khi, beneikh hameit uweni heHay.
1_kings 3:24	wayomer hamelekh qeHu li Harew; wayawi’u haHerew lifnei hamelekh. 
1_kings 3:25	wayomer hamelekh, gicru ’et hayeled haHay lishnayim; utenu ’et haHazi le’aHat, we’et haHazi le’eHat. 
1_kings 3:26	watomer ha’ishah ’asher benah haHay ’el hamelekh, ki nikhmeru raHameha ‘al benah watomer bi ’adoni, tenu lah ’et hayalud haHay, wehameit ’al temituhu; wecot ’omeret, gam li gam lakh lo yihyeh gecoru. 
1_kings 3:27	waya‘an hamelekh wayomer, tenu lah ’et hayalud haHay, wehameit lo temituhu; hi ’imo. 
1_kings 3:28	wayishme‘u khal yisra’eil, ’et hamishpaT ’asher shafaT hamelekh, wayir’u mipenei hamelekh; ki ra’u, ki Hakhemat ’elohim beqirbo la‘asot mishpaT.
1_kings 4:1	wayhi hamelekh shelomoh, melekh ‘al kal yisra’eil.
1_kings 4:2	we’eileh hasarim ’asher lo; ‘acaryahu wen zadoq hakohein.
1_kings 4:3	’eliHoref wa’aHiyah benei shisha soferim; yehoshafaT ben ’aHilud hamackir. 
1_kings 4:4	uwenayahu wen yehoyada‘ ‘al hazawa; wezadoq we’ewyatar kohanim.
1_kings 4:5	wa‘acaryahu wen natan ‘al hanizawim; wecawud ben natan kohein rei‘eh hamelekh. 
1_kings 4:6	wa’aHishar ‘al habayit; wa’adoniram ben ‘awda ‘al hamas.
1_kings 4:7	welishlomoh sheneim ‘asar nizawim ‘al kal yisra’eil, wekhilkelu ’et hamelekh we’et beito; Hodesh bashanah yihyeh ‘al ’eHad ha’eHad lekhalkeil.
1_kings 4:8	we’eileh shemotam, ben Hur behar ’efrayim.
1_kings 4:9	ben deqer bemaqaz uwesha‘alwim uweit shamesh; we’eilon beit Hanan.
1_kings 4:10	ben Hesed ba’arubot; lo sokhoh wekhal ’erez Heifer.
1_kings 4:11	ben ’awinadaw kal nafat dor; Tafat bat shelomoh, hayetah lo le’ishah.
1_kings 4:12	ba‘ana ben ’aHilud, ta‘nakh umegido; wekhal beit she’an ’asher ’eizel zaretanah mitaHat leyicre‘el, mibeit she’an ‘ad ’aweil meHolah, ‘ad mei‘eiwer leyaqemo‘am.
1_kings 4:13	ben gewer beramot gil‘ad; lo Hawwot ya’ir ben menasheh ’asher bagil‘ad, lo Hewel ’argow ’asher babashan, shishim ‘arim gedolot, Homah uweriaH neHoshet.
1_kings 4:14	’aHinadaw ben ‘ido maHanayemah. 
1_kings 4:15	’aHima‘az benaftali; gam hu, laqaH ’et basemat bat shelomoh le’ishah. 
1_kings 4:16	ba‘ana ben Hushay, be’asheir uwe‘alot.
1_kings 4:17	yehoshafaT ben paruaH beyisashkhar.
1_kings 4:18	shim‘i wen ’eila bewinyamin.
1_kings 4:19	gewer ben ’uri be’erez gil‘ad; ’erez siHon melekh ha’emori, we‘og melekh habashan, uneziw ’eHad ’asher ba’arez. 
1_kings 4:20	yehudah weyisra’eil rabim, kaHol ’asher ‘al hayam larow; ’okhelim weshotim usemeiHim. 
1_kings 4:21	ushelomoh, hayah mosheil bekhal hamamlakhot, min hanahar ’erez pelishtim, we‘ad gewul mizrayim; magishim minHah we‘owedim ’et shelomoh kal yemei Hayaw.
1_kings 4:22	wayhi leHem shelomoh leyom ’eHad; sheloshim kor solet, weshishim kor qamaH. 
1_kings 4:23	‘asarah waqar beri’im, we‘esrim baqar re‘i umei’ah zon; lewad mei’ayal uzewi weyaHmur, uwarburim ’awusim. 
1_kings 4:24	ki hu rodeh bekhal ‘eiwer hanahar, mitifsaH we‘ad ‘accah, bekhal malkhei ‘eiwer hanahar; weshalom, hayah lo mikal ‘awaraw missawiw. 
1_kings 4:25	wayeishew yehudah weyisra’eil laweTaH, ’ish taHat gafno wetaHat te’einato, midan we‘ad be’eir shawa‘; kol yemei shelomoh.
1_kings 4:26	wayhi lishlomoh, ’arba‘im ’elef ’urwot susim lemerkawo; usheneim ‘asar ’elef parashim. 
1_kings 4:27	wekhilkelu hanizawim ha’eileh ’et hamelekh shelomoh, we’eit kal haqareiw ’el shulHan hamelekh shelomoh ’ish Hadesho; lo ye‘aderu dawar. 
1_kings 4:28	wehase‘orim wehatewen, lassusim welarakhesh; yawi’u, ’el hamaqom ’asher yihyeh sham, ’ish kemishpaTo.
1_kings 4:29	wayitein ’elohim Hakhmah lishlomoh utewunah harbeih me’od; weroHaw leiw, kaHol ’asher ‘al sefat hayam. 
1_kings 4:30	wateirew Hakhemat shelomoh, meiHakhemat kal benei qedem; umikol Hakhemat mizrayim. 
1_kings 4:31	wayeHkam mikal ha’adam mei’eitan ha’ecraHi, weheiman wekhalkol wedarda‘ benei maHol; wayhi shemo wekhal hagoyim sawiw. 
1_kings 4:32	waydabeir sheloshet ’alafim mashal; wayhi shiro Hamishah wa’alef. 
1_kings 4:33	waydabeir ‘al ha‘eizim min ha’erec ’asher balewanon, we‘ad ha’eicow, ’asher yozei baqir; waydabeir ‘al habeheimah we‘al ha‘of, we‘al haremes we‘al hadagim. 
1_kings 4:34	wayawo’u mikal ha‘amim, lishmoa‘ ’eit Hakhemat shelomoh; mei’eit kal malkhei ha’arez, ’asher shame‘u ’et Hakhemato.
1_kings 5:1	wayishlaH Hiram melekh zor ’et ‘awadaw ’el shelomoh, ki shama‘, ki ’oto masheHu lemelekh taHat ’awihu; ki ’oheiw, hayah Hiram ledawid kal hayamim.
1_kings 5:2	wayishlaH shelomoh, ’el Hiram leimor. 
1_kings 5:3	’atah yada‘ta ’et dawid ’awi, ki lo yakhol liwnot bayit, lesheim yhoh ’elohaw, mipenei hamilHamah ’asher sewawuhu; ‘ad teit yhoh ’otam, taHat kapot raglo raglay. 
1_kings 5:4	we‘atah heiniaH yhoh ’elohay li missawiw; ’ein saTan, we’ein pega‘ ra‘. 
1_kings 5:5	wehini ’omeir, liwnot bayit, lesheim yhoh ’elohay; ka’asher diber yhoh ’el dawid ’awi leimor, binkha, ’asher ’etein taHtekha ‘al kis’ekha, hu yiwneh habayit lishmi. 
1_kings 5:6	we‘atah zawweih weyikhretu li ’aracim min halewanon, wa‘awaday yihyu ‘im ‘awadekha, usekhar ‘awadekha ’etein lekha, kekhol ’asher tomeir; ki ’atah yada‘ta, ki ’ein banu ’ish yodeia‘ likhrat ‘eizim kazidonim. 
1_kings 5:7	wayhi kishmoa‘ Hiram ’et diwrei shelomoh wayismaH me’od; wayomer, barukh yhoh hayom, ’asher natan ledawid bein Hakham, ‘al ha‘am haraw hacceh. 
1_kings 5:8	wayishlaH Hiram ’el shelomoh leimor, shama‘ti ’eit ’asher shalaHta ’eilay; ’ani ’e‘eseh ’et kal Hefzekha, ba‘azei ’aracim uwa‘azei weroshim. 
1_kings 5:9	‘awaday yoridu min halewanon yamah, wa’ani ’asimeim dowerot bayam ‘ad hamaqom ’asher tishlaH ’eilay wenipaztim sham we’atah tisa; we’atah ta‘aseh ’et Hefzi, lateit leHem beiti. 
1_kings 5:10	wayhi Hirom notein lishlomoh, ‘azei ’aracim wa‘azei weroshim kal Hefzo. 
1_kings 5:11	ushelomoh natan leHiram ‘esrim ’elef kor HiTim makolet leweito, we‘esrim kor shemen katit; koh yitein shelomoh leHiram shanah weshanah.
1_kings 5:12	yhoh natan Hakhmah lishlomoh, ka’asher diber lo; wayhi shalom, bein Hiram uwein shelomoh, wayikhretu werit sheneihem. 
1_kings 5:13	waya‘al hamelekh shelomoh mas mikal yisra’eil; wayhi hamas, sheloshim ’elef ’ish. 
1_kings 5:14	wayishlaHeim lewanonah, ‘aseret ’alafim baHodesh Halifot, Hodesh yihyu walewanon, shenayim Hodashim beweito; wa’adoniram ‘al hamas.
1_kings 5:15	wayhi lishlomoh shiw‘im ’elef nosei sabal; ushemonim ’elef Hozeiw bahar. 
1_kings 5:16	lewad misarei hanizawim lishlomoh ’asher ‘al hamelakhah, sheloshet ’alafim ushelosh mei’ot; harodim ba‘am, ha‘osim bamelakhah. 
1_kings 5:17	wayzaw hamelekh wayassi‘u ’awanim gedolot ’awanim yeqarot leyasseid habayit ’awnei gacit. 
1_kings 5:18	wayifselu bonei shelomoh uwonei Hirom wehagiwlim; wayakhinu ha‘eizim weha’awanim liwnot habayit.
1_kings 6:1	wayhi wishmonim shanah we’arba‘ mei’ot shanah lezeit benei yisra’eil mei’erez mizrayim bashanah harewi‘it beHodesh ciw, hu haHodesh hasheini, limlokh shelomoh ‘al yisra’eil; wayiwen habayit yhoh. 
1_kings 6:2	wehabayit, ’asher banah hamelekh shelomoh yhoh, shishim ’amah ’areko we‘esrim raHebo; usheloshim ’amah qomato. 
1_kings 6:3	weha’ulam, ‘al penei heikhal habayit, ‘esrim ’amah ’areko, ‘al penei roHaw habayit; ‘eser ba’amah raHebo ‘al penei habayit. 
1_kings 6:4	waya‘as labayit, Halonei shequfim ’aTumim. 
1_kings 6:5	wayiwen ‘al qir habayit yazoa‘ yazia‘ sawiw, ’et qirot habayit sawiw, laheikhal weladewir; waya‘as zela‘ot sawiw. 
1_kings 6:6	hayazoa‘ hayazia‘ hataHtonah Hameish ba’amah raHebah, wehatikhonah sheish ba’amah raHebah, wehashelishit, shewa‘ ba’amah raHebah; ki migra‘ot natan labayit sawiw Huzah, lewilti ’aHoc beqirot habayit. 
1_kings 6:7	wehabayit behibanoto, ’ewen sheleimah massa‘ niwnah; umaqawot wehagarcen kal keli warcel, lo nishma‘ babayit behibanoto. 
1_kings 6:8	petaH, hazeila‘ hatikhonah, ’el ketef habayit haymanit; uwelulim, ya‘alu ‘al hatikhonah, umin hatikhonah ’el hashelishim. 
1_kings 6:9	wayiwen ’et habayit waykhaleihu; wayispon ’et habayit geiwim, usedeirot ba’aracim. 
1_kings 6:10	wayiwen ’et hayazoa‘ hayazia‘ ‘al kal habayit, Hameish ’amot qomato; waye’eHoc ’et habayit ba‘azei ’aracim.
1_kings 6:11	wayhi dewar yhoh, ’el shelomoh leimor. 
1_kings 6:12	habayit hacceh ’asher ’atah woneh, ’im teileikh beHuqotay we’et mishpaTay ta‘aseh, weshamarta ’et kal mizwotay lalekhet bahem; wahaqimoti ’et dewari ’itakh, ’asher dibarti ’el dawid ’awikha. 
1_kings 6:13	weshakhanti, betokh benei yisra’eil; welo ’e‘ecow ’et ‘ami yisra’eil.
1_kings 6:14	wayiwen shelomoh ’et habayit waykhaleihu. 
1_kings 6:15	wayiwen ’et qirot habayit mibaytah bezal‘ot ’aracim, miqarqa‘ habayit ‘ad qirot hassipun, zipah ‘eiz mibayit; wayzaf ’et qarqa‘ habayit bezal‘ot beroshim. 
1_kings 6:16	wayiwen ’et ‘esrim ’amah miyarkotei miyarketei habayit bezal‘ot ’aracim, min haqarqa‘ ‘ad haqirot; wayiwen lo mibayit lidwir, leqodesh haqodashim. 
1_kings 6:17	we’arba‘im ba’amah hayah habayit; hu haheikhal lifnay. 
1_kings 6:18	we’erec ’el habayit penimah, miqla‘at peqa‘im, ufeTurei zizim; hakol ’erec, ’ein ’ewen nir’ah. 
1_kings 6:19	udewir betokh habayit mipenimah heikhin; letitein sham, ’et ’aron berit yhoh. 
1_kings 6:20	welifnei hadewir ‘esrim ’amah ’orekh we‘esrim ’amah roHaw, we‘esrim ’amah qomato, wayzapeihu cahaw sagur; wayzaf micbeiaH ’arec. 
1_kings 6:21	wayzaf shelomoh ’et habayit mipenimah cahaw sagur; way‘abeir beratiqot beratuqot cahaw lifnei hadewir, wayzapeihu cahaw. 
1_kings 6:22	we’et kal habayit zipah cahaw ‘ad tom kal habayit; wekhal hamicbeiaH ’asher ladewir zipah cahaw. 
1_kings 6:23	waya‘as badewir, shenei kheruwim ‘azei shamen; ‘eser ’amot qomato. 
1_kings 6:24	weHameish ’amot, kenaf hakeruw ha’eHat, weHameish ’amot, kenaf hakeruw hasheinit; ‘eser ’amot, miqzot kenafaw we‘ad qezot kenafaw. 
1_kings 6:25	we‘eser ba’amah, hakeruw hasheini; midah ’aHat weqezew ’eHad lishnei hakeruwim. 
1_kings 6:26	qomat hakeruw ha’eHad, ‘eser ba’amah; wekhein hakeruw hasheini. 
1_kings 6:27	wayitein ’et hakeruwim betokh habayit hapenimi, wayifresu ’et kanfei hakeruwim watiga‘ kenaf ha’eHad baqir, ukhenaf hakeruw hasheini, noga‘at baqir hasheini; wekhanfeihem ’el tokh habayit, noge‘ot kanaf ’el kanaf. 
1_kings 6:28	wayzaf ’et hakeruwim cahaw. 
1_kings 6:29	we’eit kal qirot habayit meisaw qala‘, pituHei miqle‘ot keruwim wetimorot, ufeTurei zizim; milifnim welaHizon. 
1_kings 6:30	we’et qarqa‘ habayit zipah cahaw; lifnimah welaHizon. 
1_kings 6:31	we’eit petaH hadewir, ‘asah daltot ‘azei shamen; ha’ayil mecucot Hamishit. 
1_kings 6:32	ushetei daltot ‘azei shemen weqala‘ ‘aleihem miqle‘ot keruwim wetimorot ufeTurei zizim wezipah cahaw; wayared ‘al hakeruwim we‘al hatimorot ’et haccahaw. 
1_kings 6:33	wekhein ‘asah lefetaH haheikhal mecucot ‘azei shamen; mei’eit rewi‘it. 
1_kings 6:34	ushetei daltot ‘azei weroshim; shenei zela‘im hadelet ha’aHat gelilim, ushenei qela‘im hadelet hasheinit gelilim. 
1_kings 6:35	weqala‘ keruwim wetimorot, ufeTurei zizim; wezipah cahaw, meyushar ‘al hameHuqeh. 
1_kings 6:36	wayiwen ’et heHazeir hapenimit, sheloshah Turei gacit; weTur kerutot ’aracim. 
1_kings 6:37	bashanah harewi‘it, yussad beit yhoh; beyeraH ciw. 
1_kings 6:38	uwashanah ha’aHat ‘esreih beyeraH bul, hu haHodesh hashemini, kalah habayit, lekhal dewaraw ulekhal mishpaTo mishpaTaw; wayiwneihu shewa‘ shanim. 
1_kings 7:1	we’et beito banah shelomoh, shelosh ‘esreih shanah; waykhal ’et kal beito. 
1_kings 7:2	wayiwen ’et beit ya‘ar halewanon, mei’ah ’amah ’areko waHamishim ’amah raHebo, usheloshim ’amah qomato; ‘al, ’arba‘ah Turei ‘amudei ’aracim, ukherutot ’aracim ‘al ha‘amudim. 
1_kings 7:3	wesafun ba’erec, mima‘al ‘al hazela‘ot ’asher ‘al ha‘amudim, ’arba‘im waHamishah; Hamishah ‘asar haTur. 
1_kings 7:4	ushequfim sheloshah Turim; umeHecah ’el meHecah shalosh pe‘amim. 
1_kings 7:5	wekhal hapetaHim wehamecucot rewu‘im shaqef; umul meHecah ’el meHecah shalosh pe‘amim. 
1_kings 7:6	we’eit ’ulam ha‘amudim ‘asah, Hamishim ’amah ’areko, usheloshim ’amah raHebo; we’ulam ‘al peneihem, we‘amudim we‘aw ‘al peneihem. 
1_kings 7:7	we’ulam hakissei ’asher yishpaT sham, ’ulam hamishpaT ‘asah; wesafun ba’erec, meihaqarqa‘ ‘ad haqarqa‘. 
1_kings 7:8	uweito ’asher yeishew sham Hazeir ha’aHeret, mibeit la’ulam, kama‘aseh hacceh hayah; uwayit ya‘aseh lewat par‘oh ’asher laqaH shelomoh, ka’ulam hacceh. 
1_kings 7:9	kal ’eileh ’awanim yeqarot kemidot gacit, megorarot bamegeirah mibayit umiHuz; umimassad ‘ad haTefaHot, umiHuz ‘ad heHazeir hagedolah. 
1_kings 7:10	umeyussad ’awanim yeqarot ’awanim gedolot; ’awnei ‘eser ’amot, we’awnei shemoneh ’amot. 
1_kings 7:11	umilma‘lah, ’awanim yeqarot kemidot gacit wa’arec. 
1_kings 7:12	weHazeir hagedolah sawiw, sheloshah Turim gacit, weTur kerutot ’aracim; welaHazar beit yhoh hapenimit ule’ulam habayit.
1_kings 7:13	wayishlaH hamelekh shelomoh, wayiqaH ’et Hiram mizor. 
1_kings 7:14	ben ’ishah ’almanah hu mimaTeih naftali, we’awiw ’ish zori Horeish neHoshet wayimalei ’et haHakhemah we’et hatewunah we’et hada‘at, la‘asot kal melakhah baneHoshet; wayawo ’el hamelekh shelomoh, waya‘as ’et kal melakhto. 
1_kings 7:15	wayazar ’et shenei ha‘amudim neHoshet; shemoneh ‘esreih ’amah, qomat ha‘amud ha’eHad, weHuT sheteim ‘esreih ’amah, yasow ’et ha‘amud hasheini. 
1_kings 7:16	ushetei khotarot ‘asah, lateit ‘al rashei ha‘amudim muzaq neHoshet; Hameish ’amot, qomat hakoteret ha’eHat, weHameish ’amot, qomat hakoteret hasheinit. 
1_kings 7:17	sewakhim ma‘aseih sewakhah, gedilim ma‘aseih sharsherot, lakotarot, ’asher ‘al rosh ha‘amudim; shiw‘ah lakoteret ha’eHat, weshiw‘ah lakoteret hasheinit. 
1_kings 7:18	waya‘as ’et ha‘amudim; ushenei Turim sawiw ‘al hasewakhah ha’eHat, lekhassot ’et hakotarot ’asher ‘al rosh harimonim, wekhein ‘asah, lakoteret hasheinit. 
1_kings 7:19	wekhotarot, ’asher ‘al rosh ha‘amudim, ma‘aseih shushan ba’ulam; ’arba‘ ’amot. 
1_kings 7:20	wekhotarot, ‘al shenei ha‘amudim, gam mima‘al mile‘umat habeTen, ’asher le‘eiwer sewakhah hasewakhah; weharimonim matayim Turim sawiw, ‘al hakoteret hasheinit. 
1_kings 7:21	wayaqem ’et ha‘amudim, le’ulam haheikhal; wayaqem ’et ha‘amud haymani, wayiqra ’et shemo yakhin, wayaqem ’et ha‘amud hasemali, wayiqra ’et shemo bo‘ac. 
1_kings 7:22	we‘al rosh ha‘amudim ma‘aseih shoshan; watitom melekhet ha‘amudim. 
1_kings 7:23	waya‘as ’et hayam muzaq; ‘eser ba’amah misefato ‘ad sefato ‘agol sawiw, weHameish ba’amah qomato, uqeweih weqaw sheloshim ba’amah, yasow ’oto sawiw. 
1_kings 7:24	ufeqa‘im mitaHat lisfato sawiw sowewim ’oto, ‘eser ba’amah, maqifim ’et hayam sawiw; shenei Turim hapeqa‘im, yezuqim bizuqato. 
1_kings 7:25	‘omeid ‘al shenei ‘asar baqar, sheloshah fonim zafonah usheloshah fonim yamah usheloshah ponim negbah, usheloshah ponim micraHah, wehayam ‘aleihem milma‘elah; wekhal ’aHoreihem bayetah. 
1_kings 7:26	we‘aweyo TefaH, usefato kema‘aseih sefat kos peraH shoshan; ’alpayim bat yakhil.
1_kings 7:27	waya‘as ’et hamekhonot ‘eser neHoshet; ’arba‘ ba’amah, ’orekh hamekhonah ha’eHat, we’arba‘ ba’amah raHebah, weshalosh ba’amah qomatah. 
1_kings 7:28	weceh ma‘aseih hamekhonah misgerot lahem; umisgerot bein hashlabim. 
1_kings 7:29	we‘al hamisgerot ’asher bein hashlabim, ’arayot baqar ukheruwim, we‘al hashlabim kein mima‘al; umitaHat la’arayot welabaqar, loyot ma‘aseih morad. 
1_kings 7:30	we’arba‘ah ’ofanei neHoshet lamekhonah ha’aHat wesarnei neHoshet, we’arba‘ah fa‘amotaw keteifot lahem; mitaHat lakiyor haketeifot yezuqot, mei‘eiwer ’ish loyot. 
1_kings 7:31	ufihu mibeit lakoteret wama‘lah ba’amah, ufiha ‘agol ma‘aseih khein, ’amah waHazi ha’amah; wegam ‘al piha miqla‘ot, umisgeroteihem meruba‘ot lo ‘agulot. 
1_kings 7:32	we’arba‘at ha’ofanim, lemitaHat lamisgerot, widot ha’ofanim bamekhonah; weqomat ha’ofan ha’eHad, ’amah waHazi ha’amah. 
1_kings 7:33	uma‘aseih ha’ofanim, kema‘aseih ’ofan hamerkawah; yedotam wegabeihem, weHishuqeihem weHishureihem hakol muzaq. 
1_kings 7:34	we’arba‘ keteifot, ’el ’arba‘ pinot, hamekhonah ha’eHat; min hamekhonah keteifeha. 
1_kings 7:35	uwerosh hamekhonah, Hazi ha’amah qomah ‘agol sawiw; we‘al rosh hamekhonah yedoteha, umisgeroteha mimenah. 
1_kings 7:36	wayfataH ‘al haluHot yedoteha, we‘al wamisgeroteha misgeroteha, keruwim ’arayot wetimorot; kema‘ar ’ish weloyot sawiw. 
1_kings 7:37	kacot ‘asah, ’eit ‘eser hamekhonot; muzaq ’eHad midah ’aHat qezew ’eHad lekhulahenah.
1_kings 7:38	waya‘as ‘asarah khiyorot neHoshet; ’arba‘im bat yakhil hakiyor ha’eHad, ’arba‘ ba’amah hakiyor ha’eHad, kiyor ’eHad ‘al hamekhonah ha’aHat, le‘eser hamekhonot. 
1_kings 7:39	wayitein ’et hamekhonot, Hameish ‘al ketef habayit miyamin, weHameish ‘al ketef habayit misemolo; we’et hayam, natan miketef habayit haymanit qeidemah mimul negew.
1_kings 7:40	waya‘as Hirom, ’et hakiyorot, we’et haya‘im we’et hamicraqot; waykhal Hiram, la‘asot ’et kal hamelakhah, ’asher ‘asah lamelekh shelomoh beit yhoh. 
1_kings 7:41	‘amudim shenayim, wegulot hakotarot ’asher ‘al rosh ha‘amudim shetayim; wehasewakhot shetayim, lekhassot, ’et shetei gulot hakotarot, ’asher ‘al rosh ha‘amudim. 
1_kings 7:42	we’et harimonim ’arba‘ mei’ot lishtei hasewakhot; shenei Turim rimonim lasewakhah ha’eHat, lekhassot, ’et shetei gulot hakotarot, ’asher ‘al penei ha‘amudim. 
1_kings 7:43	we’et hamekhonot ‘aser; we’et hakiyorot ‘asarah ‘al hamekhonot. 
1_kings 7:44	we’et hayam ha’eHad; we’et habaqar sheneim ‘asar taHat hayam. 
1_kings 7:45	we’et hassirot we’et haya‘im we’et hamicraqot, we’eit kal hakeilim ha’ohel ha’eileh, ’asher ‘asah Hiram lamelekh shelomoh beit yhoh; neHoshet memoraT. 
1_kings 7:46	bekhikar hayardein yezaqam hamelekh, bema‘aweih ha’adamah; bein sukot uwein zaretan. 
1_kings 7:47	wayanaH shelomoh ’et kal hakeilim, meirow me’od me’od; lo neHqar mishqal haneHoshet. 
1_kings 7:48	waya‘as shelomoh, ’eit kal hakeilim, ’asher beit yhoh; ’eit micbaH haccahaw, we’et hashulHan, ’asher ‘alaw leHem hapanim cahaw. 
1_kings 7:49	we’et hamenorot Hameish miyamin weHameish misemol lifnei hadewir cahaw sagur; wehaperaH wehaneirot wehamelqaHayim cahaw. 
1_kings 7:50	wehassipot wehamcamerot wehamicraqot wehakapot wehamaHtot cahaw sagur; wehapotot ledaltot habayit hapenimi leqodesh haqodashim, ledaltei habayit laheikhal cahaw.
1_kings 7:51	watishlam kal hamelakhah, ’asher ‘asah hamelekh shelomoh beit yhoh; wayawei shelomoh ’et qadeshei dawid ’awiw, ’et hakesef we’et haccahaw we’et hakeilim, natan be’ozerot beit yhoh.
1_kings 8:1	’ac yaqheil shelomoh ’et ciqnei yisra’eil ’et kal rashei hamaTot nesi’ei ha’awot liwnei yisra’eil ’el hamelekh shelomoh yerushalim; leha‘alot ’et ’aron berit yhoh mei‘ir dawid hi ziyon. 
1_kings 8:2	wayiqahalu ’el hamelekh shelomoh kal ’ish yisra’eil, beyeraH ha’eitanim beHag; hu haHodesh hashewi‘i. 
1_kings 8:3	wayawo’u kol ciqnei yisra’eil; wayis’u hakohanim ’et ha’aron. 
1_kings 8:4	waya‘alu ’et ’aron yhoh we’et ’ohel mo‘eid, we’et kal kelei haqodesh ’asher ba’ohel; waya‘alu ’otam, hakohanim wehalwiyim. 
1_kings 8:5	wehamelekh shelomoh, wekhal ‘adat yisra’eil hano‘adim ‘alaw, ’ito lifnei ha’aron; mecabeHim zon uwaqar, ’asher lo yissaferu welo yimanu meirow. 
1_kings 8:6	wayawi’u hakohanim ’et ’aron berit yhoh ’el meqomo ’el dewir habayit ’el qodesh haqodashim; ’el taHat kanfei hakeruwim. 
1_kings 8:7	ki hakeruwim poresim kenafayim, ’el meqom ha’aron; wayasoku hakeruwim ‘al ha’aron we‘al badaw milma‘elah. 
1_kings 8:8	waya’arikhu habadim wayeira’u rashei habadim min haqodesh ‘al penei hadewir, welo yeira’u haHuzah; wayihyu sham, ‘ad hayom hacceh. 
1_kings 8:9	’ein ba’aron, raq, shenei luHot ha’awanim, ’asher hiniaH sham mosheh beHoreiw; ’asher karat yhoh ‘im benei yisra’eil, bezeitam mei’erez mizrayim. 
1_kings 8:10	wayhi bezeit hakohanim min haqodesh; wehe‘anan malei ’et beit yhoh. 
1_kings 8:11	welo yakhelu hakohanim la‘amod leshareit mipenei he‘anan; ki malei khewod yhoh ’et beit yhoh.
1_kings 8:12	’ac ’amar shelomoh; yhoh ’amar, lishkon ba‘arafel. 
1_kings 8:13	banoh waniti beit cewul lakh; makhon leshiwtekha ‘olamim. 
1_kings 8:14	wayasseiw hamelekh ’et panaw, waywarekh ’eit kal qehal yisra’eil; wekhal qehal yisra’eil ‘omeid. 
1_kings 8:15	wayomer, barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’asher diber befiw, ’eit dawid ’awi; uweyado milei leimor. 
1_kings 8:16	min hayom, ’asher hozeiti ’et ‘ami ’et yisra’eil mimizrayim lo waHarti we‘ir, mikol shiwTei yisra’eil, liwnot bayit, lihyot shemi sham; wa’ewHar bedawid, lihyot ‘al ‘ami yisra’eil. 
1_kings 8:17	wayhi ‘im lewaw dawid ’awi; liwnot bayit, lesheim yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. 
1_kings 8:18	wayomer yhoh ’el dawid ’awi, ya‘an, ’asher hayah ‘im lewawekha, liwnot bayit lishmi; heTiwota, ki hayah ‘im lewawekha. 
1_kings 8:19	raq ’atah, lo tiwneh habayit; ki ’im binkha hayozei meiHalazekha, hu yiwneh habayit lishmi. 
1_kings 8:20	wayaqem yhoh, ’et dewaro ’asher dibeir; wa’aqum taHat dawid ’awi wa’eisheiw ‘al kissei yisra’eil, ka’asher diber yhoh, wa’ewneh habayit, lesheim yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. 
1_kings 8:21	wa’asim sham maqom la’aron, ’asher sham berit yhoh; ’asher karat ‘im ’awoteinu, behozi’o ’otam mei’erez mizrayim.
1_kings 8:22	waya‘amod shelomoh, lifnei micbaH yhoh, neged kal qehal yisra’eil; wayifros kapaw hashamayim. 
1_kings 8:23	wayomar, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil ’ein kamokha ’elohim, bashamayim mima‘al, we‘al ha’arez mitaHat; shomeir haberit wehaHesed, la‘awadekha haholekhim lefanekha bekhal libam. 
1_kings 8:24	’asher shamarta, le‘awdekha dawid ’awi, ’eit ’asher dibarta lo; watedabeir befikha uweyadekha mileita kayom hacceh. 
1_kings 8:25	we‘atah yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, mor le‘awdekha dawid ’awi ’eit ’asher dibarta lo leimor, lo yikareit lekha ’ish milefanay, yosheiw ‘al kissei yisra’eil; raq ’im yishmeru wanekha ’et darkam lalekhet lefanay, ka’asher halakhta lefanay. 
1_kings 8:26	we‘atah ’elohei yisra’eil; yei’amen na dewarekha dewarekha, ’asher dibarta, le‘awdekha dawid ’awi. 
1_kings 8:27	ki ha’umnam, yeisheiw ’elohim ‘al ha’arez; hineih hashamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkelukha, ’af ki habayit hacceh ’asher baniti. 
1_kings 8:28	ufanita ’el tefilat ‘awdekha we’el teHinato yhoh ’elohay; lishmoa‘ ’el harinah we’el hatefilah, ’asher ‘awdekha mitpaleil lefanekha hayom. 
1_kings 8:29	lihyot ‘einekha fetuHot ’el habayit hacceh laylah wayom, ’el hamaqom, ’asher ’amarta, yihyeh shemi sham; lishmoa‘ ’el hatefilah, ’asher yitpaleil ‘awdekha, ’el hamaqom hacceh. 
1_kings 8:30	weshama‘ta ’el teHinat ‘awdekha we‘amekha yisra’eil, ’asher yitpalu ’el hamaqom hacceh; we’atah tishma‘ ’el meqom shiwtekha ’el hashamayim, weshama‘ta wesalaHeta. 
1_kings 8:31	’eit ’asher yeHeTa ’ish lerei‘eihu, wenasha wo ’alah leha’aloto; uwa, ’alah lifnei micbaHakha babayit hacceh. 
1_kings 8:32	we’atah tishma‘ hashamayim, we‘asita weshafaTta ’et ‘awadekha, leharshia‘ rasha‘, lateit darko berosho; ulehazdiq zadiq, latet lo kezidqato.
1_kings 8:33	behinageif ‘amekha yisra’eil lifnei ’oyeiw ’asher yeHeT’u lakh; weshawu ’eilekha wehodu ’et shemekha, wehitpalu wehitHanenu ’eilekha babayit hacceh. 
1_kings 8:34	we’atah tishma‘ hashamayim, wesalaHta, leHaTat ‘amekha yisra’eil; wahasheiwotam ’el ha’adamah, ’asher natata la’awotam.
1_kings 8:35	behei‘azeir shamayim welo yihyeh maTar ki yeHeT’u lakh; wehitpalu ’el hamaqom hacceh wehodu ’et shemekha, umeiHaTatam yeshuwun ki ta‘aneim. 
1_kings 8:36	we’atah tishma‘ hashamayim, wesalaHta leHaTat ‘awadekha we‘amekha yisra’eil, ki toreim ’et haderekh haTowah ’asher yeilekhu wah; wenatatah maTar ‘al ’arzekha, ’asher natatah le‘amekha lenaHalah.
1_kings 8:37	ra‘aw ki yihyeh wa’arez, dewer ki yihyeh shidafon yeiraqon ’arbeh Hasil ki yihyeh, ki yazar lo ’oyewo be’erez she‘araw; kal nega‘ kal maHalah. 
1_kings 8:38	kal tefilah khal teHinah, ’asher tihyeh lekhal ha’adam, lekhol ‘amekha yisra’eil; ’asher yeide‘un, ’ish nega‘ lewawo, ufaras kapaw ’el habayit hacceh. 
1_kings 8:39	we’atah tishma‘ hashamayim mekhon shiwtekha wesalaHta we‘asita, wenatata la’ish kekhal derakhaw, ’asher teida‘ ’et lewawo; ki ’atah yada‘ta lewadekha, ’et lewaw kal benei ha’adam. 
1_kings 8:40	lema‘an yira’ukha, kal hayamim, ’asher heim Hayim ‘al penei ha’adamah; ’asher natatah la’awoteinu. 
1_kings 8:41	wegam ’el hanakheri, ’asher lo mei‘amekha yisra’eil hu; uwa mei’erez reHoqah lema‘an shemekha. 
1_kings 8:42	ki yishme‘un ’et shimkha hagadol, we’et yadekha haHacaqah, ucero‘akha haneTuyah; uwa wehitpaleil ’el habayit hacceh. 
1_kings 8:43	’atah tishma‘ hashamayim mekhon shiwtekha, we‘asita kekhol ’asher yiqra ’eilekha hanakheri; lema‘an yeide‘un kal ‘amei ha’arez ’et shemekha, leyir’ah ’otekha ke‘amekha yisra’eil, welada‘at ki shimkha niqra, ‘al habayit hacceh ’asher baniti. 
1_kings 8:44	ki yeizei ‘amekha lamilHamah ‘al ’oyewo, baderekh ’asher tishlaHeim; wehitpalu ’el yhoh derekh ha‘ir ’asher baHarta bah, wehabayit ’asher baniti lishmekha. 
1_kings 8:45	weshama‘ta hashamayim, ’et tefilatam we’et teHinatam; we‘asita mishpaTam. 
1_kings 8:46	ki yeHeT’u lakh, ki ’ein ’adam ’asher lo yeHeTa, we’anafta wam, unetatam lifnei ’oyeiw; weshawum showeihem ’el ’erez ha’oyeiw, reHoqah ’o qerowah. 
1_kings 8:47	weheishiwu ’el libam, ba’arez ’asher nishbu sham; weshawu wehitHanenu ’eilekha, be’erez showeihem leimor, HaTanu wehe‘ewinu rasha‘enu. 
1_kings 8:48	weshawu ’eilekha, bekhal lewawam uwekhal nafsham, be’erez ’oyeweihem ’asher shawu ’otam; wehitpalu ’eilekha, derekh ’arzam ’asher natatah la’awotam, ha‘ir ’asher baHarta, wehabayit ’asher banita baniti lishmekha. 
1_kings 8:49	weshama‘ta hashamayim mekhon shiwtekha, ’et tefilatam we’et teHinatam; we‘asita mishpaTam. 
1_kings 8:50	wesalaHta le‘amekha ’asher HaTe’u lakh, ulekhal pish‘eihem ’asher pashe‘u wakh; unetatam leraHamim lifnei showeihem weriHamum. 
1_kings 8:51	ki ‘amekha wenaHalatekha heim; ’asher hozeita mimizrayim, mitokh kur habarcel. 
1_kings 8:52	lihyot ‘einekha fetuHot ’el teHinat ‘awdekha, we’el teHinat ‘amekha yisra’eil; lishmoa‘ ’aleihem, bekhol qare’am ’eilekha. 
1_kings 8:53	ki ’atah hiwdaltam lekha lenaHalah, mikol ‘amei ha’arez; ka’asher dibarta beyad mosheh ‘awdekha, behozi’akha ’et ’awoteinu mimizrayim ’adonay yhoh.
1_kings 8:54	wayhi kekhalot shelomoh, lehitpaleil ’el yhoh, ’eit kal hatefilah wehateHinah haccot; qam milifnei micbaH yhoh mikeroa‘ ‘al birkaw, wekhapaw perusot hashamayim. 
1_kings 8:55	waya‘mod waywarekh ’eit kal qehal yisra’eil; qol gadol leimor. 
1_kings 8:56	barukh yhoh ’asher natan menuHah le‘amo yisra’eil, kekhol ’asher dibeir; lo nafal dawar ’eHad, mikol dewaro haTow, ’asher diber, beyad mosheh ‘awdo. 
1_kings 8:57	yehi yhoh ’eloheinu ‘imanu, ka’asher hayah ‘im ’awoteinu; ’al ya‘acweinu we’al yiTesheinu. 
1_kings 8:58	lehaTot lewaweinu ’eilaw; lalekhet bekhal derakhaw, welishmor mizwotaw weHuqaw umishpaTaw, ’asher ziwwah ’et ’awoteinu. 
1_kings 8:59	weyihyu dewaray ’eileh, ’asher hitHananti lifnei yhoh, qerowim ’el yhoh ’eloheinu yomam walayelah; la‘asot mishpaT ‘awdo, umishpaT ‘amo yisra’eil dewar yom beyomo. 
1_kings 8:60	lema‘an, da‘at kal ‘amei ha’arez, ki yhoh hu ha’elohim; ’ein ‘od. 
1_kings 8:61	wehayah lewawkhem shaleim, ‘im yhoh ’eloheinu; lalekhet beHuqaw welishmor mizwotaw kayom hacceh. 
1_kings 8:62	wehamelekh, wekhal yisra’eil ‘imo; coweHim cewaH lifnei yhoh. 
1_kings 8:63	wayicbaH shelomoh, ’eit cewaH hashelamim ’asher cawaH yhoh baqar, ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef, wezon mei’ah we‘esrim ’alef; wayaHnekhu ’et beit yhoh, hamelekh wekhal benei yisra’eil. 
1_kings 8:64	bayom hahu, qidash hamelekh ’et tokh heHazeir, ’asher lifnei weit yhoh, ki ‘asah sham, ’et ha‘olah we’et haminHah, we’eit Helwei hashelamim; ki micbaH haneHoshet ’asher lifnei yhoh, qaTon, meihakhil ’et ha‘olah we’et haminHah, we’eit Helwei hashelamim. 
1_kings 8:65	waya‘as shelomoh wa‘eit hahi ’et heHag wekhal yisra’eil ‘imo qahal gadol milewo Hamat ‘ad naHal mizrayim, lifnei yhoh ’eloheinu, shiw‘at yamim weshiw‘at yamim; ’arba‘ah ‘asar yom. 
1_kings 8:66	bayom hashemini shilaH ’et ha‘am, waywarakhu ’et hamelekh; wayeilekhu le’aholeihem, semeiHim weTowei leiw, ‘al kal haTowah, ’asher ‘asah yhoh ledawid ‘awdo, uleyisra’eil ‘amo. 
1_kings 9:1	wayhi kekhalot shelomoh, liwnot ’et beit yhoh we’et beit hamelekh; we’eit kal Heisheq shelomoh, ’asher Hafeiz la‘asot.
1_kings 9:2	wayeira yhoh ’el shelomoh sheinit; ka’asher nir’ah ’eilaw begiw‘on. 
1_kings 9:3	wayomer yhoh ’eilaw, ma‘ti ’et tefilatekha we’et teHinatekha ’asher hitHanantah lefanay hiqdashti, ’et habayit hacceh ’asher banitah, lasum shemi sham ‘ad ‘olam; wehayu ‘einay welibi sham kal hayamim. 
1_kings 9:4	we’atah ’im teileikh lefanay, ka’asher halakh dawid ’awikha betam leiwaw uweyosher, la‘asot kekhol ’asher ziwwitikha; Huqay umishpaTay tishmor. 
1_kings 9:5	wahaqimoti ’et kissei mamlakhtekha ‘al yisra’eil le‘olam; ka’asher dibarti, ‘al dawid ’awikha leimor, lo yikareit lekha ’ish, mei‘al kissei yisra’eil. 
1_kings 9:6	’im show teshuwun ’atem uweneikhem mei’aHaray, welo tishmeru mizwotay Huqotay, ’asher natati lifneikhem; wahalakhtem, wa‘awadtem ’elohim ’aHeirim, wehishtaHawitem lahem. 
1_kings 9:7	wehikhrati ’et yisra’eil, mei‘al penei ha’adamah ’asher natati lahem, we’et habayit ’asher hiqdashti lishmi, ’ashalaH mei‘al panay; wehayah yisra’eil lemashal welishninah bekhal ha‘amim. 
1_kings 9:8	wehabayit hacceh yihyeh ‘elyon, kal ‘oweir ‘alaw yishom wesharaq; we’ameru, ‘al meh ‘asah yhoh kakhah, la’arez haccot welabayit hacceh. 
1_kings 9:9	we’ameru, ‘al ’asher ‘acewu ’et yhoh ’eloheihem, ’asher hozi ’et ’awotam mei’erez mizrayim wayaHaciqu beilohim ’aHeirim, wayishtaHu wayishtaHawu lahem waya‘awdum; ‘al kein, heiwi yhoh ‘aleihem, ’eit kal hara‘ah haccot.
1_kings 9:10	wayhi, miqzeih ‘esrim shanah, ’asher banah shelomoh ’et shenei habatim; ’et beit yhoh we’et beit hamelekh. 
1_kings 9:11	Hiram melekh zor nisa ’et shelomoh ba‘azei ’aracim uwa‘azei weroshim uwaccahaw lekhal Hefzo; ’ac yitein hamelekh shelomoh leHiram ‘esrim ‘ir, be’erez hagalil. 
1_kings 9:12	wayeizei Hiram mizor, lir’ot ’et he‘arim, ’asher natan lo shelomoh; welo yasheru be‘einaw. 
1_kings 9:13	wayomer mah he‘arim ha’eileh, ’asher natatah li ’aHi; wayiqra lahem ’erez kawul, ‘ad hayom hacceh.
1_kings 9:14	wayishlaH Hiram lamelekh; mei’ah we‘esrim kikar cahaw. 
1_kings 9:15	weceh dewar hamas ’asher he‘elah hamelekh shelomoh, liwnot ’et beit yhoh we’et beito we’et hamilo, we’eit Homat yerushalim; we’et Hazor we’et megido we’et gacer. 
1_kings 9:16	par‘oh melekh mizrayim ‘alah, wayilkod ’et gecer wayisrefah ba’eish, we’et hakena‘ani hayosheiw ba‘ir harag; wayitenah shiluHim, lewito ’eishet shelomoh. 
1_kings 9:17	wayiwen shelomoh ’et gacer, we’et beit Horon taHton. 
1_kings 9:18	we’et ba‘alat we’et tamar tadmor bamidbar ba’arez. 
1_kings 9:19	we’eit kal ‘arei hamiskenot ’asher hayu lishlomoh, we’eit ‘arei harekhew, we’eit ‘arei haparashim; we’eit Heisheq shelomoh, ’asher Hashaq liwnot birushalim uwalewanon, uwekhol ’erez memshalto. 
1_kings 9:20	kal ha‘am hanotar min ha’emori haHiti hapericci haHiwwi wehaywusi, ’asher lo mibenei yisra’eil heimah. 
1_kings 9:21	beneihem, ’asher noteru ’aHareihem ba’arez, ’asher lo yakhelu benei yisra’eil lehaHarimam; waya‘aleim shelomoh lemas ‘oweid, ‘ad hayom hacceh. 
1_kings 9:22	umibenei yisra’eil, lo natan shelomoh ‘awed; ki heim ’anshei hamilHamah, wa‘awadaw wesaraw weshalishaw, wesarei rikhbo ufarashaw.
1_kings 9:23	’eileh sarei hanizawim, ’asher ‘al hamelakhah lishlomoh, Hamishim waHameish mei’ot; harodim ba‘am, ha‘osim bamelakhah. 
1_kings 9:24	’akh bat par‘oh, ‘aletah mei‘ir dawid, ’el beitah ’asher banah lah; ’ac banah ’et hamilo. 
1_kings 9:25	wehe‘elah shelomoh shalosh pe‘amim bashanah ‘olot ushelamim, ‘al hamicbeiaH ’asher banah yhoh, wehaqTeir ’ito, ’asher lifnei yhoh; weshilam ’et habayit. 
1_kings 9:26	wa’oni ‘asah hamelekh shelomoh be‘ezyon gewer ’asher ’et ’eilot ‘al sefat yam suf be’erez ’edom. 
1_kings 9:27	wayishlaH Hiram ba’oni ’et ‘awadaw, ’anshei ’oniyot, yode‘ei hayam; ‘im ‘awdei shelomoh. 
1_kings 9:28	wayawo’u ’ofirah, wayiqHu misham cahaw, ’arba‘ mei’ot we‘esrim kikar; wayawi’u ’el hamelekh shelomoh.
1_kings 10:1	umalkat shewa, shoma‘at ’et sheima‘ shelomoh lesheim yhoh; watawo lenassoto beHidot. 
1_kings 10:2	watawo yerushalemah, beHayil kaweid me’od gemalim nose’im besamim wecahaw raw me’od we’ewen yeqarah; watawo ’el shelomoh, watedabeir ’eilaw, ’eit kal ’asher hayah ‘im lewawah. 
1_kings 10:3	wayaged lah shelomoh ’et kal dewareha; lo hayah dawar ne‘lam min hamelekh, ’asher lo higid lah. 
1_kings 10:4	wateire malkat shewa, ’eit kal Hakhemat shelomoh; wehabayit ’asher banah. 
1_kings 10:5	uma’akhal shulHano umoshaw ‘awadaw uma‘amad meshareto mesharetaw umalbusheihem umashqaw, we‘olato, ’asher ya‘aleh beit yhoh; welo hayah wah ‘od ruaH. 
1_kings 10:6	watomer ’el hamelekh, ’emet hayah hadawar, ’asher shama‘ti be’arzi; ‘al dewarekha we‘al Hakhematekha. 
1_kings 10:7	welo he’emanti ladewarim, ‘ad ’asher bati watir’enah ‘einay, wehineih lo hugad li haHeizi; hosafta Hakhmah waTow, ’el hashemu‘ah ’asher shama‘eti. 
1_kings 10:8	’ashrei ’anashekha, ’ashrei ‘awadekha ’eileh; ha‘omedim lefanekha tamid, hashome‘im ’et Hakhematekha. 
1_kings 10:9	yehi yhoh ’elohekha barukh, ’asher Hafeiz bekha, letitekha ‘al kissei yisra’eil; be’ahawat yhoh ’et yisra’eil le‘olam, waysimekha lemelekh, la‘asot mishpaT uzedaqah. 
1_kings 10:10	watitein lamelekh mei’ah we‘esrim kikar cahaw, uwesamim harbeih me’od we’ewen yeqarah; lo wa khabosem hahu ‘od larow, ’asher natenah malkat shewa lamelekh shelomoh. 
1_kings 10:11	wegam ’oni Hiram, ’asher nasa cahaw mei’ofir; heiwi mei’ofir ‘azei ’almugim harbeih me’od we’ewen yeqarah. 
1_kings 10:12	waya‘as hamelekh ’et ‘azei ha’almugim mis‘ad leweit yhoh uleweit hamelekh, wekhinorot unewalim lasharim; lo wa khein ‘azei ’almugim welo nir’ah, ‘ad hayom hacceh. 
1_kings 10:13	wehamelekh shelomoh natan lemalkat shewa, ’et kal Hefzah ’asher sha’alah, milewad ’asher natan lah, keyad hamelekh shelomoh; wateifen wateilekh le’arzah hi wa‘awadeha.
1_kings 10:14	wayhi mishqal haccahaw, ’asher ba lishlomoh beshanah ’eHat; sheish mei’ot shishim washeish kikar cahaw. 
1_kings 10:15	lewad mei’anshei hatarim, umisHar harokhelim; wekhal malkhei ha‘erew ufaHot ha’arez. 
1_kings 10:16	waya‘as hamelekh shelomoh matayim zinah cahaw shaHuT; sheish mei’ot cahaw, ya‘aleh ‘al hazinah ha’eHat. 
1_kings 10:17	ushelosh mei’ot maginim cahaw shaHuT, sheloshet manim cahaw, ya‘aleh ‘al hamagein ha’eHat; wayiteneim hamelekh, beit ya‘ar halewanon.
1_kings 10:18	waya‘as hamelekh kissei shein gadol; wayzapeihu cahaw mufac. 
1_kings 10:19	sheish ma‘alot lakisseih, werosh ‘agol lakisseih mei’aHaraw, weyadot micceh umicceh ’el meqom hashawet; ushenayim ’arayot, ‘omedim ’eizel hayadot. 
1_kings 10:20	usheneim ‘asar ’arayim, ‘omedim sham ‘al sheish hama‘alot micceh umicceh; lo na‘asah khein lekhal mamlakhot. 
1_kings 10:21	wekhol kelei mashqeih hamelekh shelomoh cahaw, wekhol, kelei beit ya‘ar halewanon cahaw sagur; ’ein kesef, lo neHshaw bimei shelomoh lim’umah. 
1_kings 10:22	ki ’oni tarshish lamelekh bayam, ‘im ’oni Hiram; ’aHat leshalosh shanim tawo ’oni tarshish, nose’eit cahaw wakhesef, shenhabim weqofim wetukiyim. 
1_kings 10:23	wayigdal hamelekh shelomoh, mikol malkhei ha’arez; le‘osher uleHakhemah. 
1_kings 10:24	wekhal ha’arez, mewaqshim ’et penei shelomoh; lishmoa‘ ’et Hakhemato, ’asher natan ’elohim belibo. 
1_kings 10:25	weheimah mewi’im ’ish minHato kelei khesef ukhelei cahaw uselamot weneisheq uwesamim, susim uferadim; dewar shanah beshanah.
1_kings 10:26	waye’esof shelomoh rekhew ufarashim wayhi lo, ’elef we’arba‘ mei’ot rekhew, usheneim ‘asar ’elef parashim; wayanHeim be‘arei harekhew, we‘im hamelekh birushalim. 
1_kings 10:27	wayitein hamelekh ’et hakesef birushalim ka’awanim; we’eit ha’aracim, natan kashiqmim ’asher bashefeilah larow. 
1_kings 10:28	umoza hassusim ’asher lishlomoh mimizrayim; umiqweih soHarei hamelekh, yiqHu miqweih bimHir. 
1_kings 10:29	wata‘aleh wateizei merkawah mimizrayim besheish mei’ot kesef, wesus baHamishim umei’ah; wekhein lekhal malkhei haHitim ulemalkhei ’aram beyadam yozi’u.
1_kings 11:1	wehamelekh shelomoh, ’ahaw nashim nakheriyot rabot we’et bat par‘oh; mo’awiyot ‘amoniyot ’adomiyot, zeideniyot Hitiyot. 
1_kings 11:2	min hagoyim, ’asher ’amar yhoh ’el benei yisra’eil lo tawo’u wahem, weheim lo yawo’u wakhem, ’akhein yaTu ’et lewawkhem, ’aHarei ’eloheihem; bahem dawaq shelomoh le’ahawah. 
1_kings 11:3	wayhi lo nashim, sarot shewa‘ mei’ot, ufilagshim shelosh mei’ot; wayaTu nashaw ’et libo. 
1_kings 11:4	wayhi, le‘eit ciqnat shelomoh, nashaw hiTu ’et lewawo, ’aHarei ’elohim ’aHeirim; welo hayah lewawo shaleim ‘im yhoh ’elohaw, kilwaw dawid ’awiw. 
1_kings 11:5	wayeilekh shelomoh, ’aHarei ‘ashtoret, ’elohei zidonim; we’aHarei milkom, shiquz ‘amonim. 
1_kings 11:6	waya‘as shelomoh hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; welo milei ’aHarei yhoh kedawid ’awiw.
1_kings 11:7	’ac yiwneh shelomoh bamah, likhmosh shiquz mo’aw, bahar ’asher ‘al penei yerushalim; ulemolekh shiquz benei ‘amon. 
1_kings 11:8	wekhein ‘asah, lekhal nashaw hanakheriyot; maqTirot umecabeHot leiloheihen. 
1_kings 11:9	wayit’anaf yhoh bishlomoh; ki naTah lewawo, mei‘im yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, hanir’ah ’eilaw pa‘amayim. 
1_kings 11:10	weziwwah ’eilaw ‘al hadawar hacceh, lewilti lekhet, ’aHarei ’elohim ’aHeirim; welo shamar, ’eit ’asher ziwwah yhoh.
1_kings 11:11	wayomer yhoh lishlomoh, ya‘an ’asher hayetah cot ‘imakh, welo shamarta beriti weHuqotay, ’asher ziwwiti ‘alekha; qaroa‘ ’eqra‘ ’et hamamlakhah mei‘alekha, unetatiha le‘awdekha. 
1_kings 11:12	’akh beyamekha lo ’e‘esenah, lema‘an dawid ’awikha; miyad binkha ’eqra‘enah. 
1_kings 11:13	raq ’et kal hamamlakhah lo ’eqra‘, sheiweT ’eHad ’etein liwnekha; lema‘an dawid ‘awdi, ulema‘an yerushalim ’asher baHareti. 
1_kings 11:14	wayaqem yhoh saTan lishlomoh, ’eit hadad ha’adomi; miccera‘ hamelekh hu be’edom. 
1_kings 11:15	wayhi, bihyot dawid ’et ’edom, ba‘alot, yo’aw sar hazawa, leqabeir ’et haHalalim; wayakh kal cakhar be’edom. 
1_kings 11:16	ki sheishet Hodashim yashaw sham yo’aw wekhal yisra’eil; ‘ad hikhrit kal cakhar be’edom. 
1_kings 11:17	wayiwraH ’adad hu wa’anashim ’adomiyim mei‘awdei ’awiw ’ito lawo mizrayim; wahadad na‘ar qaTan. 
1_kings 11:18	wayaqumu mimidyan, wayawo’u paran; wayiqHu ’anashim ‘imam miparan, wayawo’u mizrayim ’el par‘oh melekh mizrayim, wayiten lo wayit, weleHem ’amar lo, we’erez natan lo. 
1_kings 11:19	wayimza hadad Hein be‘einei far‘oh me’od; wayiten lo ’ishah ’et ’aHot ’ishto, ’aHot taHpeneis hagewirah. 
1_kings 11:20	wateiled lo ’aHot taHpeneis, ’eit genuwat beno, watigmeleihu taHpeneis, betokh beit par‘oh; wayhi genuwat beit par‘oh, betokh benei far‘oh. 
1_kings 11:21	wahadad shama‘ bemizrayim, ki shakhaw dawid ‘im ’awotaw, wekhi meit yo’aw sar hazawa; wayomer hadad ’el par‘oh, shaleHeini we’eileikh ’el ’arzi. 
1_kings 11:22	wayomer lo far‘oh, ki mah ’atah Haseir ‘imi, wehinekha mewaqeish lalekhet ’el ’arzekha; wayomer lo, ki shaleiaH teshaleHeini. 
1_kings 11:23	wayaqem ’elohim lo saTan, ’et recon ben ’elyada‘; ’asher baraH, mei’eit hadad‘ecer melekh zowah ’adonaw. 
1_kings 11:24	wayiqboz ‘alaw ’anashim, wayhi sar gedud, baharog dawid ’otam; wayeilekhu dameseq wayeishewu wah, wayimlekhu bedamaseq. 
1_kings 11:25	wayhi saTan leyisra’eil kal yemei shelomoh, we’et hara‘ah ’asher hadad; wayaqaz beyisra’eil, wayimlokh ‘al ’aram.
1_kings 11:26	weyarawe‘am ben newaT ’efrati min hazereidah, wesheim ’imo zeru‘ah ’ishah ’almanah, ‘ewed lishlomoh; wayarem yad bamelekh. 
1_kings 11:27	weceh hadawar, ’asher heirim yad bamelekh; shelomoh banah ’et hamilo, sagar ’et perez ‘ir dawid ’awiw. 
1_kings 11:28	weha’ish yarawe‘am gibor Hayil; wayar shelomoh ’et hana‘ar, ki ‘oseih melakhah hu, wayafqeid ’oto, lekhal seiwel beit yoseif.
1_kings 11:29	wayhi ba‘eit hahi, weyarawe‘am yaza mirushalim; wayimza ’oto ’aHiyah hashiloni hanawi baderekh, wehu mitkasseh besalmah Hadashah, usheneihem lewadam basadeh. 
1_kings 11:30	wayitpos ’aHiyah, basalmah haHadashah ’asher ‘alaw; wayiqra‘eha, sheneim ‘asar qera‘im. 
1_kings 11:31	wayomer leyarawe‘am, qaH lekha ‘asarah qera‘im; ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, hini qoreia‘ ’et hamamlakhah miyad shelomoh, wenatati lekha, ’eit ‘asarah hashewaTim. 
1_kings 11:32	wehasheiweT ha’eHad yihyeh lo; lema‘an ‘awdi dawid, ulema‘an yerushalim, ha‘ir ’asher baHarti wah, mikol shiwTei yisra’eil. 
1_kings 11:33	ya‘an ’asher ‘acawuni, wayishtaHawu le‘ashtoret ’elohei zidonin likhmosh ’elohei mo’aw, ulemilkom ’elohei wenei ‘amon; welo halekhu widrakhay, la‘asot hayashar be‘einay weHuqotay umishpaTay kedawid ’awiw. 
1_kings 11:34	welo ’eqaH ’et kal hamamlakhah miyado; ki nasi ’ashitenu, kol yemei Hayaw, lema‘an dawid ‘awdi ’asher baHarti ’oto, ’asher shamar mizwotay weHuqotay. 
1_kings 11:35	welaqaHti hamelukhah miyad beno; unetatiha lekha, ’eit ‘aseret hashewaTim. 
1_kings 11:36	weliwno ’etein sheiweT ’eHad; lema‘an heyot nir ledawid ‘awdi kal hayamim lefanay birushalim, ha‘ir ’asher baHarti li, lasum shemi sham. 
1_kings 11:37	we’otekha ’eqaH, umalakhta, bekhol ’asher te’awweh nafshekha; wehayita melekh ‘al yisra’eil. 
1_kings 11:38	wehayah, ’im tishma‘ ’et kal ’asher ’azawwekha wehalakhta widrakhay, we‘asita hayashar be‘einay lishmor Huqotay umizwotay, ka’asher ‘asah dawid ‘awdi; wehayiti ‘imakh, uwaniti lekha wayit ne’eman ka’asher baniti ledawid, wenatati lekha ’et yisra’eil. 
1_kings 11:39	wa‘aneh ’et cera‘ dawid lema‘an cot; ’akh lo khal hayamim.
1_kings 11:40	waywaqeish shelomoh lehamit ’et yarawe‘am; wayaqam yarawe‘am, wayiwraH mizrayim ’el shishaq melekh mizrayim, wayhi wemizrayim ‘ad mot shelomoh. 
1_kings 11:41	weyeter diwrei shelomoh wekhal ’asher ‘asah weHakhemato; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei shelomoh. 
1_kings 11:42	wehayamim, ’asher malakh shelomoh wirushalim ‘al kal yisra’eil, ’arba‘im shanah. 
1_kings 11:43	wayishkaw shelomoh ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqaweir, be‘ir dawid ’awiw; wayimlokh reHaw‘am beno taHtaw.
1_kings 12:1	wayeilekh reHaw‘am shekhem; ki shekhem ba khal yisra’eil lehamlikh ’oto. 
1_kings 12:2	wayhi kishmoa‘ yarawe‘am ben newaT, wehu ‘odenu wemizrayim, ’asher baraH, mipenei hamelekh shelomoh; wayeishew yarawe‘am bemizrayim. 
1_kings 12:3	wayishleHu wayiqre’u lo, wayawo’u wayawo yarawe‘am wekhal qehal yisra’eil; waydaberu, ’el reHaw‘am leimor. 
1_kings 12:4	’awikha hiqshah ’et ‘uleinu; we’atah ‘atah haqeil mei‘awodat ’awikha haqashah, umei‘ulo hakaweid ’asher natan ‘aleinu wena‘awdeka. 
1_kings 12:5	wayomer ’aleihem, lekhu ‘od sheloshah yamim weshuwu ’eilay; wayeilekhu ha‘am. 
1_kings 12:6	wayiwwa‘az hamelekh reHaw‘am, ’et hacceqeinim ’asher hayu ‘omedim, ’et penei shelomoh ’awiw, bihyoto Hay leimor; ’eikh ’atem no‘azim, lehashiw ’et ha‘am hacceh dawar. 
1_kings 12:7	waydabeir waydaberu ’eilaw leimor, ’im hayom tihyeh ‘ewed la‘am hacceh wa‘awadtam, wa‘anitam wedibarta ’aleihem dewarim Towim; wehayu lekha ‘awadim kal hayamim. 
1_kings 12:8	waya‘acow ’et ‘azat hacceqeinim ’asher ye‘azuhu; wayiwwa‘az, ’et hayladim ’asher gadelu ’ito, ’asher ha‘omedim lefanaw. 
1_kings 12:9	wayomer ’aleihem, mah ’atem no‘azim, wenashiw dawar ’et ha‘am hacceh; ’asher diberu ’eilay leimor, haqeil min ha‘ol, ’asher natan ’awikha ‘aleinu. 
1_kings 12:10	waydaberu ’eilaw, hayladim ’asher gadelu ’ito leimor koh tomar la‘am hacceh ’asher diberu ’eilekha leimor, ’awikha hikhbid ’et ‘uleinu, we’atah haqeil mei‘aleinu; koh tedabeir ’aleihem, qaTani ‘awah mimatenei ’awi. 
1_kings 12:11	we‘atah, ’awi he‘mis ‘aleikhem ‘ol kaweid, wa’ani ’osif ‘al ‘ulekhem; ’awi, yissar ’etkhem bashoTim, wa’ani ’ayasseir ’etkhem ba‘aqrabim. 
1_kings 12:12	wayawo wayawo yarawe‘am wekhal ha‘am ’el reHaw‘am bayom hashelishi; ka’asher diber hamelekh leimor, shuwu ’eilay bayom hashelishi. 
1_kings 12:13	waya‘an hamelekh ’et ha‘am qashah; waya‘acow ’et ‘azat hacceqeinim ’asher ye‘azuhu. 
1_kings 12:14	waydabeir ’aleihem, ka‘azat hayladim leimor, ’awi hikhbid ’et ‘ulekhem, wa’ani ’osif ‘al ‘ulekhem; ’awi, yissar ’etkhem bashoTim, wa’ani ’ayasseir ’etkhem ba‘aqrabim. 
1_kings 12:15	welo shama‘ hamelekh ’el ha‘am; ki hayetah sibah mei‘im yhoh, lema‘an haqim ’et dewaro, ’asher diber yhoh beyad ’aHiyah hashiloni, ’el yarawe‘am ben newaT. 
1_kings 12:16	wayar kal yisra’eil, ki lo shama‘ hamelekh ’aleihem wayashiwu ha‘am ’et hamelekh dawar leimor mah lanu Heileq bedawid welo naHalah bewen yishay, le’ohalekha yisra’eil, ‘atah re’eih weitekha dawid; wayeilekh yisra’eil le’ohalaw. 
1_kings 12:17	uwenei yisra’eil, hayoshewim be‘arei yehudah; wayimlokh ‘aleihem reHaw‘am.
1_kings 12:18	wayishlaH hamelekh reHaw‘am, ’et ’adoram ’asher ‘al hamas, wayirgemu khal yisra’eil bo ’ewen wayamot; wehamelekh reHaw‘am, hit’ameiz la‘alot bamerkawah, lanus yerushalim. 
1_kings 12:19	wayifshe‘u yisra’eil beweit dawid, ‘ad hayom hacceh.
1_kings 12:20	wayhi kishmoa‘ kal yisra’eil ki shaw yarawe‘am, wayishleHu, wayiqre’u ’oto ’el ha‘eidah, wayamlikhu ’oto ‘al kal yisra’eil; lo hayah ’aHarei weit dawid, culati sheiweT yehudah lewado. 
1_kings 12:21	wayawo’u wayawo reHaw‘am yerushalim wayaqheil ’et kal beit yehudah we’et sheiweT binyamin, mei’ah ushemonim ’elef baHur ‘oseih milHamah; lehilaHeim ‘im beit yisra’eil, lehashiw ’et hamelukhah, lirHaw‘am ben shelomoh.
1_kings 12:22	wayhi dewar ha’elohim, ’el shema‘yah ’ish ha’elohim leimor. 
1_kings 12:23	’emor, ’el reHaw‘am ben shelomoh melekh yehudah, we’el kal beit yehudah uwinyamin; weyeter ha‘am leimor. 
1_kings 12:24	koh ’amar yhoh lo ta‘alu welo tilaHamun ‘im ’aHeikhem benei yisra’eil, uwu ’ish leweito, ki mei’iti nihyah hadawar hacceh; wayishme‘u ’et dewar yhoh, wayashuwu lalekhet kidwar yhoh.
1_kings 12:25	wayiwen yarawe‘am ’et shekhem behar ’efrayim wayeishew bah; wayeizei misham, wayiwen ’et penu’eil. 
1_kings 12:26	wayomer yarawe‘am belibo; ‘atah tashuw hamamlakhah leweit dawid. 
1_kings 12:27	’im ya‘aleh ha‘am hacceh, la‘asot cewaHim beweit yhoh birushalim, weshaw leiw ha‘am hacceh ’el ’adoneihem, ’el reHaw‘am melekh yehudah; waharaguni weshawu ’el reHaw‘am melekh yehudah. 
1_kings 12:28	wayiwwa‘az hamelekh, waya‘as shenei ‘eglei cahaw; wayomer ’aleihem, raw lakhem mei‘alot yerushalim, hineih ’elohekha yisra’eil, ’asher he‘elukha mei’erez mizrayim. 
1_kings 12:29	wayasem ’et ha’eHad beweit ’eil; we’et ha’eHad natan bedan. 
1_kings 12:30	wayhi hadawar hacceh leHaTat; wayeilekhu ha‘am lifnei ha’eHad ‘ad dan. 
1_kings 12:31	waya‘as ’et beit bamot; waya‘as kohanim miqzot ha‘am, ’asher lo hayu mibenei leiwi. 
1_kings 12:32	waya‘as yarawe‘am Hag baHodesh hashemini baHamishah ‘asar yom laHodesh keHag ’asher bihudah, waya‘al ‘al hamicbeiaH, kein ‘asah beweit ’eil, lecabeiaH la‘agalim ’asher ‘asah; wehe‘emid beweit ’eil, ’et kohanei habamot ’asher ‘asah. 
1_kings 12:33	waya‘al ‘al hamicbeiaH ’asher ‘asah beweit ’eil, baHamishah ‘asar yom baHodesh hashemini, baHodesh ’asher bada milibad milibo; waya‘as Hag liwnei yisra’eil, waya‘al ‘al hamicbeiaH lehaqTir.
1_kings 13:1	wehineih ’ish ’elohim, ba mihudah bidwar yhoh ’el beit ’eil; weyarawe‘am ‘omeid ‘al hamicbeiaH lehaqTir. 
1_kings 13:2	wayiqra ‘al hamicbeiaH bidwar yhoh, wayomer micbeiaH micbeiaH, koh ’amar yhoh; hineih wein nolad leweit dawid yoshiyahu shemo, wecawaH ‘alekha, ’et kohanei habamot hamaqTirim ‘alekha, we‘azmot ’adam yisrefu ‘alekha. 
1_kings 13:3	wenatan bayom hahu mofeit leimor, ceh hamofeit, ’asher diber yhoh; hineih hamicbeiaH niqra‘, wenishpakh hadeshen ’asher ‘alaw. 
1_kings 13:4	wayhi khishmoa‘ hamelekh ’et dewar ’ish ha’elohim, ’asher qara ‘al hamicbeiaH beweit ’eil, wayishlaH yarawe‘am ’et yado mei‘al hamicbeiaH leimor tifsuhu; watiwash yado ’asher shalaH ‘alaw, welo yakhol lahashiwah ’eilaw. 
1_kings 13:5	wehamicbeiaH niqra‘, wayishafeikh hadeshen min hamicbeiaH; kamofeit, ’asher natan ’ish ha’elohim bidwar yhoh. 
1_kings 13:6	waya‘an hamelekh wayomer ’el ’ish ha’elohim, Hal na ’et penei yhoh ’elohekha wehitpaleil ba‘adi, wetashow yadi ’eilay; wayHal ’ish ha’elohim ’et penei yhoh, watashaw yad hamelekh ’eilaw, watehi kewarishonah. 
1_kings 13:7	waydabeir hamelekh ’el ’ish ha’elohim, bo’ah ’iti habaytah use‘adah; we’etenah lekha matat. 
1_kings 13:8	wayomer ’ish ha’elohim ’el hamelekh, ’im titen li ’et Hazi weitekha, lo ’awo ‘imakh; welo ’okhal leHem welo ’eshteh mayim, bamaqom hacceh. 
1_kings 13:9	ki khein ziwwah ’oti, bidwar yhoh leimor, lo tokhal leHem welo tishteh mayim; welo tashuw, baderekh ’asher halakheta. 
1_kings 13:10	wayeilekh bederekh ’aHeir; welo shaw baderekh, ’asher ba wah ’el beit ’eil.
1_kings 13:11	wenawi ’eHad caqein, yosheiw beweit ’eil; wayawo weno waysaper lo ’et kal hama‘aseh ’asher ‘asah ’ish ha’elohim hayom beweit ’eil, ’et hadewarim ’asher diber ’el hamelekh, waysaperum la’awihem. 
1_kings 13:12	waydabeir ’aleihem ’awihem, ’ei ceh haderekh halakh; wayir’u wanaw, ’et haderekh ’asher halakh ’ish ha’elohim, ’asher ba mihudah. 
1_kings 13:13	wayomer ’el banaw, Hiwshu li haHamor; wayaHbeshu lo haHamor, wayirkaw ‘alaw. 
1_kings 13:14	wayeilekh, ’aHarei ’ish ha’elohim, wayimza’eihu, yosheiw taHat ha’eilah; wayomer ’eilaw, ha’atah ’ish ha’elohim ’asher bata mihudah wayomer ’ani. 
1_kings 13:15	wayomer ’eilaw, leikh ’iti habayetah; we’ekhol laHem. 
1_kings 13:16	wayomer, lo ’ukhal lashuw ’itakh welawo ’itakh; welo ’okhal leHem, welo ’eshteh ’itekha mayim, bamaqom hacceh. 
1_kings 13:17	ki dawar ’eilay bidwar yhoh, lo tokhal leHem, welo tishteh sham mayim; lo tashuw lalekhet, baderekh ’asher halakhta bah. 
1_kings 13:18	wayomer lo, gam ’ani nawi kamokha umal’akh diber ’eilay bidwar yhoh leimor, hashiweihu ’itekha ’el beitekha, weyokhal leHem weyeishet mayim; kiHeish lo. 
1_kings 13:19	wayashaw ’ito, wayokhal leHem beweito wayeishet mayim. 
1_kings 13:20	wayhi heim yoshewim ’el hashulHan; f wayhi dewar yhoh, ’el hanawi ’asher heshiwo. 
1_kings 13:21	wayiqra ’el ’ish ha’elohim, ’asher ba mihudah leimor, koh ’amar yhoh; ya‘an, ki marita pi yhoh, welo shamarta ’et hamizwah, ’asher ziwwekha yhoh ’elohekha. 
1_kings 13:22	watashaw, watokhal leHem wateishet mayim, bamaqom ’asher diber ’eilekha, ’al tokhal leHem we’al teishet mayim; lo tawo niwlatekha ’el qewer ’awotekha. 
1_kings 13:23	wayhi, ’aHarei ’akhelo leHem we’aHarei shetoto; wayaHawash lo haHamor, lanawi ’asher heshiwo. 
1_kings 13:24	wayeilekh wayimza’eihu ’aryeih baderekh waymiteihu; watehi niwlato mushlekhet baderekh, wehaHamor ‘omeid ’ezlah, weha’aryeih, ‘omeid ’eizel haneweilah. 
1_kings 13:25	wehineih ’anashim ‘owerim, wayir’u ’et haneweilah mushlekhet baderekh, we’et ha’aryeih, ‘omeid ’eizel haneweilah; wayawo’u waydaberu wa‘ir, ’asher hanawi haccaqein yosheiw bah. 
1_kings 13:26	wayishma‘ hanawi ’asher heshiwo min haderekh wayomer ’ish ha’elohim hu, ’asher marah ’et pi yhoh; wayiteneihu yhoh la’aryeih, wayishbereihu waymiteihu, kidwar yhoh ’asher diber lo. 
1_kings 13:27	waydabeir ’el banaw leimor, Hiwshu li ’et haHamor; wayaHawoshu. 
1_kings 13:28	wayeilekh, wayimza ’et niwlato mushlekhet baderekh, waHamor weha’aryeih, ‘omedim ’eizel haneweilah; lo ’akhal ha’aryeih ’et haneweilah, welo shawar ’et haHamor.
