1_kings 13:29	wayisa hanawi ’et niwlat ’ish ha’elohim wayaniHeihu ’el haHamor wayshiweihu; wayawo, ’el ‘ir hanawi haccaqein, lispod uleqawero. 
1_kings 13:30	wayanaH ’et niwlato beqiwro; wayispedu ‘alaw ho ’aHi. 
1_kings 13:31	wayhi ’aHarei qawero ’oto wayomer ’el banaw leimor, bemoti uqewartem ’oti, baqewer ’asher ’ish ha’elohim qawur bo; ’eizel ‘azmotaw, haniHu ’et ‘azmotay. 
1_kings 13:32	ki hayoh yihyeh hadawar, ’asher qara bidwar yhoh, ‘al hamicbeiaH ’asher beweit ’eil; we‘al kal batei habamot, ’asher be‘arei shomeron.
1_kings 13:33	’aHar hadawar hacceh, lo shaw yarawe‘am midarko hara‘ah; wayashaw waya‘as miqzot ha‘am kohanei wamot, heHafeiz yemalei ’et yado, wihi kohanei wamot. 
1_kings 13:34	wayhi badawar hacceh, leHaTat beit yarawe‘am; ulehakhHid ulehashmid, mei‘al penei ha’adamah.
1_kings 14:1	ba‘eit hahi, Halah ’awiyah wen yarawe‘am. 
1_kings 14:2	wayomer yarawe‘am le’ishto, qumi na wehishtanit, welo yeide‘u, ki ’ati ’at ’eishet yarawe‘am; wehalakht shiloh, hineih sham ’aHiyah hanawi, hu diber ‘alay lemelekh ‘al ha‘am hacceh. 
1_kings 14:3	welaqaHat beyadeikh ‘asarah leHem weniqudim uwaqbuq dewash uwat ’eilaw; hu yagid lakh, mah yihyeh lana‘ar. 
1_kings 14:4	wata‘as kein ’eishet yarawe‘am, wataqam wateilekh shiloh, watawo beit ’aHiyah; wa’aHiyahu lo yakhol lir’ot, ki qamu ‘einaw miseiwo.
1_kings 14:5	yhoh ’amar ’el ’aHiyahu, hineih ’eishet yarawe‘am ba’ah lidrosh dawar mei‘imekha ’el benah ki Holeh hu, kacoh wekhaceh tedabeir ’eileha; wihi khewo’ah, wehi mitnakeirah. 
1_kings 14:6	wayhi khishmoa‘ ’aHiyahu ’et qol ragleha ba’ah wapetaH, wayomer bo’i ’eishet yarawe‘am; lamah ceh, ’at mitnakeirah, we’anokhi, shaluaH ’eilayikh qashah. 
1_kings 14:7	lekhi ’imri leyarawe‘am, koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ya‘an ’asher harimotikha mitokh ha‘am; wa’etenkha nagid, ‘al ‘ami yisra’eil. 
1_kings 14:8	wa’eqra‘ ’et hamamlakhah mibeit dawid, wa’eteneha lakh; welo hayita ke‘awdi dawid, ’asher shamar mizwotay wa’asher halakh ’aHaray bekhal lewawo, la‘asot raq hayashar be‘einay. 
1_kings 14:9	watara‘ la‘asot, mikol ’asher hayu lefanekha; wateilekh wata‘aseh lekha ’elohim ’aHeirim umasseikhot lehakh‘iseini, we’oti hishlakhta ’aHarei gawwekha.
1_kings 14:10	lakhein, hini meiwi ra‘ah ’el beit yarawe‘am, wehikhrati leyarawe‘am mashtin beqir, ‘azur we‘acuw beyisra’eil; uwi‘arti ’aHarei weit yarawe‘am, ka’asher yewa‘eir hagalal ‘ad tumo. 
1_kings 14:11	hameit leyarawe‘am ba‘ir yokhelu hakelawim, wehameit basadeh, yokhelu ‘of hashamayim; ki yhoh dibeir. 
1_kings 14:12	we’at qumi lekhi leweiteikh; bewo’ah raglayikh ha‘irah umeit hayaled. 
1_kings 14:13	wesafedu lo khal yisra’eil weqaweru ’oto, ki ceh lewado, yawo leyarawe‘am ’el qawer; ya‘an nimza wo dawar Tow, ’el yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil beweit yarawe‘am. 
1_kings 14:14	weheiqim yhoh lo melekh ‘al yisra’eil, ’asher yakhrit ’et beit yarawe‘am ceh hayom; umeh gam ‘atah. 
1_kings 14:15	wehikah yhoh ’et yisra’eil, ka’asher yanud haqaneh bamayim wenatash ’et yisra’eil, mei‘al ha’adamah haTowah haccot ’asher natan la’awoteihem, weceiram mei‘eiwer lanahar; ya‘an, ’asher ‘asu ’et ’asheireihem, makh‘isim ’et yhoh. 
1_kings 14:16	weyitein ’et yisra’eil; biglal HaTot yarawe‘am ’asher HaTa, wa’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil. 
1_kings 14:17	wataqam ’eishet yarawe‘am, wateilekh watawo tirzatah; hi ba’ah wesaf habayit wehana‘ar meit. 
1_kings 14:18	wayiqberu ’oto wayispedu lo kal yisra’eil; kidwar yhoh ’asher diber, beyad ‘awdo ’aHiyahu hanawi. 
1_kings 14:19	weyeter diwrei yarawe‘am, ’asher nilHam wa’asher malakh; hinam ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil. 
1_kings 14:20	wehayamim ’asher malakh yarawe‘am, ‘esrim ushetayim shanah; wayishkaw ‘im ’awotaw, wayimlokh nadaw beno taHtaw.
1_kings 14:21	ureHaw‘am ben shelomoh, malakh bihudah; ben ’arba‘im we’aHat shanah reHaw‘am bemalekho ushawa‘ ‘esreih shanah malakh birushalim, ha‘ir ’asher baHar yhoh lasum ’et shemo sham mikol shiwTei yisra’eil, wesheim ’imo, na‘amah ha‘amonit. 
1_kings 14:22	waya‘as yehudah hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; wayqan’u ’oto, mikol ’asher ‘asu ’awotam, beHaTotam ’asher HaTa’u. 
1_kings 14:23	wayiwnu gam heimah lahem bamot umazeiwot wa’asheirim; ‘al kal giw‘ah gewohah, wetaHat kal ‘eiz ra‘anan. 
1_kings 14:24	wegam qadeish hayah wa’arez; ‘asu, kekhol hato‘awot hagoyim, ’asher horish yhoh, mipenei benei yisra’eil.
1_kings 14:25	wayhi bashanah haHamishit lamelekh reHaw‘am; ‘alah shushaq shishaq melekh mizrayim ‘al yerushalim. 
1_kings 14:26	wayiqaH ’et ’ozerot beit yhoh we’et ’ozrot beit hamelekh, we’et hakol laqaH; wayiqaH ’et kal maginei haccahaw, ’asher ‘asah shelomoh. 
1_kings 14:27	waya‘as hamelekh reHaw‘am taHtam, maginei neHoshet; wehifqid, ‘al yad sarei harazim, hashomerim, petaH beit hamelekh. 
1_kings 14:28	wayhi midei wo hamelekh beit yhoh; yisa’um harazim, weheshiwum ’el ta harazim. 
1_kings 14:29	weyeter diwrei reHaw‘am wekhal ’asher ‘asah; halo heimah khetuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
1_kings 14:30	umilHamah hayetah wein reHaw‘am uwein yarawe‘am kal hayamim. 
1_kings 14:31	wayishkaw reHaw‘am ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqaweir ‘im ’awotaw be‘ir dawid, wesheim ’imo, na‘amah ha‘amonit; wayimlokh ’awiyam beno taHtaw.
1_kings 15:1	uwishnat shemoneh ‘esreih, lamelekh yarawe‘am ben newaT; malakh ’awiyam ‘al yehudah. 
1_kings 15:2	shalosh shanim, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, ma‘akhah bat ’awishalom. 
1_kings 15:3	wayeilekh bekhal HaTot ’awiw ’asher ‘asah lefanaw; welo hayah lewawo shaleim ‘im yhoh ’elohaw, kilwaw dawid ’awiw. 
1_kings 15:4	ki lema‘an dawid, natan yhoh ’elohaw lo nir birushalim; lehaqim ’et beno ’aHaraw, uleha‘amid ’et yerushalim. 
1_kings 15:5	’asher ‘asah dawid ’et hayashar be‘einei yhoh; welo sar mikol ’asher ziwwahu, kol yemei Hayaw, raq bidwar ’uriyah haHiti. 
1_kings 15:6	umilHamah hayetah wein reHaw‘am uwein yarawe‘am kal yemei Hayaw. 
1_kings 15:7	weyeter diwrei ’awiyam wekhal ’asher ‘asah, halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah; umilHamah hayetah bein ’awiyam uwein yarawe‘am. 
1_kings 15:8	wayishkaw ’awiyam ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqberu ’oto be‘ir dawid; wayimlokh ’asa weno taHtaw.
1_kings 15:9	uwishnat ‘esrim, leyarawe‘am melekh yisra’eil; malakh ’asa melekh yehudah. 
1_kings 15:10	we’arba‘im we’aHat shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, ma‘akhah bat ’awishalom. 
1_kings 15:11	waya‘as ’asa hayashar be‘einei yhoh; kedawid ’awiw. 
1_kings 15:12	waya‘aweir haqedeishim min ha’arez; wayasar ’et kal hagilulim, ’asher ‘asu ’awotaw. 
1_kings 15:13	wegam ’et ma‘akhah ’imo, waysireha migewirah, ’asher ‘asetah miflezet la’asheirah; wayikhrot ’asa ’et miflaztah, wayisrof benaHal qidron. 
1_kings 15:14	wehabamot lo saru; raq lewaw ’asa, hayah shaleim ‘im yhoh kal yamaw. 
1_kings 15:15	wayawei ’et qadeshei ’awiw, weqadesho weqadeshei beit yhoh; kesef wecahaw wekheilim. 
1_kings 15:16	umilHamah hayetah bein ’asa, uwein ba‘sha melekh yisra’eil kal yemeihem. 
1_kings 15:17	waya‘al ba‘sha melekh yisra’eil ‘al yehudah, wayiwen ’et haramah; lewilti, teit yozei wawa, le’asa melekh yehudah. 
1_kings 15:18	wayiqaH ’asa ’et kal hakesef wehaccahaw hanotarim be’ozrot beit yhoh we’et ’ozrot beit melekh hamelekh, wayiteneim beyad ‘awadaw; wayishlaHeim hamelekh ’asa, ’el ben hadad ben Tawrimon ben Hecyon melekh ’aram, hayosheiw bedameseq leimor. 
1_kings 15:19	berit beini uweinekha, bein ’awi uwein ’awikha; hineih shalaHti lekha shoHad kesef wecahaw, leikh hafeirah, ’et beritekha ’et ba‘sha melekh yisra’eil, weya‘aleh mei‘alay. 
1_kings 15:20	wayishma‘ ben hadad ’el hamelekh ’asa, wayishlaH ’et sarei haHayalim ’asher lo ‘al ‘arei yisra’eil, wayakh ’et ‘iyon we’et dan, we’eit ’aweil beit ma‘akhah; we’eit kal kinrot, ‘al kal ’erez naftali. 
1_kings 15:21	wayhi kishmoa‘ ba‘sha, wayeHdal mibenot ’et haramah; wayeishew betirzah. 
1_kings 15:22	wehamelekh ’asa hishmia‘ ’et kal yehudah ’ein naqi, wayis’u ’et ’awnei haramah we’et ‘eizeha, ’asher banah ba‘sha; wayiwen bam hamelekh ’asa, ’et gewa‘ binyamin we’et hamizpah. 
1_kings 15:23	weyeter kal diwrei ’asa wekhal gewurato wekhal ’asher ‘asah, wehe‘arim ’asher banah, halo heimah khetuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah; raq le‘eit ciqnato, Halah ’et raglaw. 
1_kings 15:24	wayishkaw ’asa ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqaweir ‘im ’awotaw, be‘ir dawid ’awiw; wayimlokh yehoshafaT beno taHtaw.
1_kings 15:25	wenadaw ben yarawe‘am, malakh ‘al yisra’eil, bishnat shetayim, le’asa melekh yehudah; wayimlokh ‘al yisra’eil shenatayim. 
1_kings 15:26	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; wayeilekh bederekh ’awiw, uweHaTato, ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil. 
1_kings 15:27	wayiqshor ‘alaw ba‘sha wen ’aHiyah leweit yisashkhar, wayakeihu wa‘sha, begibeton ’asher lapelishtim; wenadaw wekhal yisra’eil, zarim ‘al gibeton. 
1_kings 15:28	waymiteihu wa‘sha, bishnat shalosh, le’asa melekh yehudah; wayimlokh taHtaw. 
1_kings 15:29	wayhi khemalekho, hikah ’et kal beit yarawe‘am, lo hish’ir kal neshamah leyarawe‘am ‘ad hishmido; kidwar yhoh, ’asher diber, beyad ‘awdo ’aHiyah hashiloni. 
1_kings 15:30	‘al HaTot yarawe‘am ’asher HaTa, wa’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil; bekha‘so ’asher hikh‘is, ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. 
1_kings 15:31	weyeter diwrei nadaw wekhal ’asher ‘asah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil. 
1_kings 15:32	umilHamah hayetah bein ’asa, uwein ba‘sha melekh yisra’eil kal yemeihem.
1_kings 15:33	bishnat shalosh, le’asa melekh yehudah; malakh ba‘sha wen ’aHiyah ‘al kal yisra’eil betirzah, ‘esrim we’arba‘ shanah. 
1_kings 15:34	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; wayeilekh bederekh yarawe‘am, uweHaTato, ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil.
1_kings 16:1	wayhi dewar yhoh ’el yeihu wen Hanani, ‘al ba‘sha leimor. 
1_kings 16:2	ya‘an, ’asher harimotikha min he‘afar, wa’etenkha nagid, ‘al ‘ami yisra’eil; wateilekh bederekh yarawe‘am, wataHaTi ’et ‘ami yisra’eil, lehakh‘iseini beHaTotam. 
1_kings 16:3	hini maw‘ir ’aHarei wa‘sha we’aHarei weito; wenatati ’et beitekha, keweit yarawe‘am ben newaT. 
1_kings 16:4	hameit lewa‘sha ba‘ir, yokhelu hakelawim; wehameit lo basadeh, yokhelu ‘of hashamayim. 
1_kings 16:5	weyeter diwrei wa‘sha wa’asher ‘asah ugewurato; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil. 
1_kings 16:6	wayishkaw ba‘sha ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqaweir betirzah; wayimlokh ’eilah weno taHtaw. 
1_kings 16:7	wegam beyad yeihu wen Hanani hanawi, dewar yhoh hayah ’el ba‘sha we’el beito we‘al kal hara‘ah ’asher ‘asah be‘einei yhoh lehakh‘iso bema‘aseih yadaw, lihyot keweit yarawe‘am; we‘al ’asher hikah ’oto.
1_kings 16:8	bishnat ‘esrim washeish shanah, le’asa melekh yehudah; malakh ’eilah wen ba‘sha ‘al yisra’eil betirzah shenatayim. 
1_kings 16:9	wayiqshor ‘alaw ‘awdo cimri, sar maHazit harakhew; wehu wetirzah shoteh shikor, beit ’arza, ’asher ‘al habayit betirzah. 
1_kings 16:10	wayawo cimri wayakeihu waymiteihu, bishnat ‘esrim washewa‘, le’asa melekh yehudah; wayimlokh taHtaw. 
1_kings 16:11	wayhi wemalekho keshiwto ‘al kis’o, hikah ’et kal beit ba‘sha, lo hish’ir lo mashtin beqir; wego’alaw werei‘eihu. 
1_kings 16:12	wayashmeid cimri, ’eit kal beit ba‘sha; kidwar yhoh ’asher diber ’el ba‘sha, beyad yeihu hanawi. 
1_kings 16:13	’el kal HaTot ba‘sha, weHaTot ’eilah weno; ’asher HaTe’u, wa’asher heHeTi’u ’et yisra’eil, lehakh‘is, ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil behawleihem. 
1_kings 16:14	weyeter diwrei ’eilah wekhal ’asher ‘asah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil.
1_kings 16:15	bishnat ‘esrim washewa‘ shanah, le’asa melekh yehudah, malakh cimri shiw‘at yamim betirzah; weha‘am Honim, ‘al gibeton ’asher lapelishtim. 
1_kings 16:16	wayishma‘ ha‘am haHonim leimor, qashar cimri, wegam hikah ’et hamelekh; wayamlikhu khal yisra’eil ’et ‘ameri sar zawa ‘al yisra’eil bayom hahu bamaHaneh. 
1_kings 16:17	waya‘aleh ‘ameri wekhal yisra’eil ‘imo migibeton; wayazuru ‘al tirzah. 
1_kings 16:18	wayhi kir’ot cimri ki nilkedah ha‘ir, wayawo ’el ’armon beit hamelekh; wayisrof ‘alaw ’et beit melekh ba’eish wayamot. 
1_kings 16:19	‘al HaTato HaTotaw ’asher HaTa, la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; lalekhet bederekh yarawe‘am, uweHaTato ’asher ‘asah, lehaHaTi ’et yisra’eil. 
1_kings 16:20	weyeter diwrei cimri, weqishro ’asher qashar; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil.
1_kings 16:21	’ac yeiHaleiq ha‘am yisra’eil laHeizi; Hazi ha‘am hayah ’aHarei tiwni wen ginat lehamlikho, wehaHazi ’aHarei ‘ameri. 
1_kings 16:22	wayeHecaq ha‘am ’asher ’aHarei ‘ameri, ’et ha‘am ’asher ’aHarei tiwni wen ginat; wayamat tiwni, wayimlokh ‘ameri.
1_kings 16:23	bishnat sheloshim we’aHat shanah, le’asa melekh yehudah, malakh ‘ameri ‘al yisra’eil, sheteim ‘esreih shanah; betirzah malakh sheish shanim. 
1_kings 16:24	wayiqen ’et hahar shomeron mei’et shemer bekhikerayim kasef; wayiwen ’et hahar, wayiqra, ’et sheim ha‘ir ’asher banah, ‘al shem shemer, ’adonei hahar shomeron. 
1_kings 16:25	waya‘aseh ‘ameri hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; wayara‘ mikol ’asher lefanaw. 
1_kings 16:26	wayeilekh, bekhal derekh yarawe‘am ben newaT, uweHaTotaw uweHaTato, ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil; lehakh‘is, ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil behawleihem 
1_kings 16:27	weyeter diwrei ‘ameri ’asher ‘asah, ugewurato ’asher ‘asah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil. 
1_kings 16:28	wayishkaw ‘ameri ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqaweir beshomeron; wayimlokh ’aH’aw beno taHtaw.
1_kings 16:29	we’aH’aw ben ‘ameri, malakh ‘al yisra’eil, bishnat sheloshim ushemoneh shanah, le’asa melekh yehudah; wayimlokh ’aH’aw ben ‘ameri ‘al yisra’eil beshomeron, ‘esrim ushetayim shanah. 
1_kings 16:30	waya‘as ’aH’aw ben ‘ameri hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; mikol ’asher lefanaw. 
1_kings 16:31	wayhi hanaqeil lekhto, beHaTot yarawe‘am ben newaT; wayiqaH ’ishah ’et ’icewel, bat ’etba‘al melekh zidonim, wayeilekh waya‘awod ’et haba‘al, wayishtaHu lo. 
1_kings 16:32	wayaqem micbeiaH laba‘al; beit haba‘al, ’asher banah beshomeron. 
1_kings 16:33	waya‘as ’aH’aw ’et ha’asheirah; wayosef ’aH’aw la‘asot, lehakh‘is ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, mikol malkhei yisra’eil, ’asher hayu lefanaw. 
1_kings 16:34	beyamaw banah Hi’eil beit ha’eli ’et yeriHoh; ba’awiram bekhoro yissedah, uwisgiw uwisguw ze‘iro hiziw delateha, kidwar yhoh, ’asher diber, beyad yehoshua‘ bin nun.
1_kings 17:1	wayomer ’eiliyahu hatishbi mitoshawei gil‘ad ’el ’aH’aw Hay yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil ’asher ‘amadti lefanaw, ’im yihyeh hashanim ha’eileh Tal umaTar; ki ’im lefi dewari.
1_kings 17:2	wayhi dewar yhoh ’eilaw leimor. 
1_kings 17:3	leikh micceh, ufanita lekha qeidemah; wenistarta benaHal kerit, ’asher ‘al penei hayardein. 
1_kings 17:4	wehayah meihanaHal tishteh; we’et ha‘orewim ziwwiti, lekhalkelkha sham. 
1_kings 17:5	wayeilekh waya‘as kidwar yhoh; wayeilekh, wayeishew benaHal kerit, ’asher ‘al penei hayardein. 
1_kings 17:6	weha‘orewim, mewi’im lo leHem uwasar baboqer, weleHem uwasar ba‘arew; umin hanaHal yishteh. 
1_kings 17:7	wayhi miqeiz yamim wayiwash hanaHal; ki lo hayah geshem ba’arez.
1_kings 17:8	wayhi dewar yhoh ’eilaw leimor. 
1_kings 17:9	qum leikh zarefatah ’asher lezidon, weyashawta sham; hineih ziwwiti sham ’ishah ’almanah lekhalkelekha. 
1_kings 17:10	wayaqam wayeilekh zarefatah, wayawo ’el petaH ha‘ir, wehineih sham ’ishah ’almanah meqosheshet ‘eizim; wayiqra ’eileha wayomar, qeHi na li me‘aT mayim bakeli we’eshteh. 
1_kings 17:11	wateilekh laqaHat; wayiqra ’eileha wayomar, liqHi na li pat leHem beyadeikh. 
1_kings 17:12	watomer, Hay yhoh ’elohekha ’im yesh li ma‘og, ki ’im melo khaf qemaH bakad, ume‘aT shemen bazapaHat; wehini meqosheshet shenayim ‘eizim, uwati wa‘asitihu li weliwni, wa’akhalnuhu wamatenu. 
1_kings 17:13	wayomer ’eileha ’eiliyahu ’al tire’i, bo’i ‘asi khidwareikh; ’akh ‘asi li misham ‘ugah qeTanah warishonah wehozeit li, welakh weliwneikh, ta‘asi ba’aHaronah.
1_kings 17:14	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, kad haqemaH lo tikhlah, wezapaHat hashemen lo teHsar; ‘ad yom titen teit hasheim geshem ‘al penei ha’adamah. 
1_kings 17:15	wateilekh wata‘aseh kidwar ’eiliyahu; watokhal hu wahi hi wahu uweitah yamim. 
1_kings 17:16	kad haqemaH lo khalatah, wezapaHat hashemen lo Haseir; kidwar yhoh, ’asher diber beyad ’eiliyahu.
1_kings 17:17	wayhi, ’aHar hadewarim ha’eileh, Halah ben ha’ishah ba‘alat habayit; wayhi Haleyo Hacaq me’od, ‘ad ’asher lo notrah bo neshamah. 
1_kings 17:18	watomer ’el ’eiliyahu, mah li walakh ’ish ha’elohim; bata ’eilay lehackir ’et ‘awoni ulehamit ’et beni. 
1_kings 17:19	wayomer ’eileha teni li ’et beneikh; wayiqaHeihu meiHeiqah, waya‘aleihu ’el ha‘aliyah, ’asher hu yosheiw sham, wayashkiweihu ‘al miTato. 
1_kings 17:20	wayiqra ’el yhoh wayomar; yhoh ’elohay, hagam ‘al ha’almanah ’asher ’ani mitgoreir ‘imah harei‘ota lehamit ’et benah. 
1_kings 17:21	wayitmodeid ‘al hayeled shalosh pe‘amim, wayiqra ’el yhoh wayomar; yhoh ’elohay, tashaw na nefesh hayeled hacceh ‘al qirbo. 
1_kings 17:22	wayishma‘ yhoh beqol ’eiliyahu; watashaw nefesh hayeled ‘al qirbo wayeHi. 
1_kings 17:23	wayiqaH ’eiliyahu ’et hayeled, wayorideihu min ha‘aliyah habaytah, wayiteneihu le’imo; wayomer ’eiliyahu, re’i Hay beneikh. 
1_kings 17:24	watomer ha’ishah ’el ’eiliyahu, ‘atah ceh yada‘ti, ki ’ish ’elohim ’atah; udewar yhoh befikha ’emet.
1_kings 18:1	wayhi yamim rabim, udewar yhoh hayah ’el ’eiliyahu, bashanah hashelishit leimor; leikh heira’eih ’el ’aH’aw, we’etenah maTar ‘al penei ha’adamah. 
1_kings 18:2	wayeilekh ’eiliyahu, leheira’ot ’el ’aH’aw; wehara‘aw Hacaq beshomeron. 
1_kings 18:3	wayiqra ’aH’aw, ’el ‘owadyahu ’asher ‘al habayit; we‘owadyahu, hayah yarei ’et yhoh me’od. 
1_kings 18:4	wayhi behakhrit ’icewel, ’eit newi’ei yhoh; wayiqaH ‘owadyahu mei’ah newi’im, wayaHbi’eim Hamishim ’ish bame‘arah, wekhilkelam leHem wamayim. 
1_kings 18:5	wayomer ’aH’aw ’el ‘owadyahu, leikh ba’arez ’el kal ma‘yenei hamayim, we’el kal haneHalim; ’ulay nimza Hazir, uneHayeh sus wafered, welo nakhrit meihabeheimah. 
1_kings 18:6	wayHalequ lahem ’et ha’arez la‘awar bah; ’aH’aw halakh bederekh ’eHad lewado, we‘owadyahu halakh bederekh ’eHad lewado. 
1_kings 18:7	wayhi ‘owadyahu baderekh, wehineih ’eiliyahu liqrato; wayakireihu wayipol ‘al panaw, wayomer ha’atah ceh ’adoni ’eiliyahu. 
1_kings 18:8	wayomer lo ’ani; leikh ’emor ladonekha hineih ’eiliyahu. 
1_kings 18:9	wayomer meh HaTati; ki ’atah notein ’et ‘awdekha beyad ’aH’aw lahamiteini. 
1_kings 18:10	Hay yhoh ’elohekha, ’im yesh go umamlakhah ’asher lo shalaH ’adoni sham lewaqeshkha, we’ameru ’ayin; wehishbia‘ ’et hamamlakhah we’et hago, ki lo yimza’ekah. 
1_kings 18:11	we‘atah ’atah ’omeir; leikh ’emor ladonekha hineih ’eiliyahu. 
1_kings 18:12	wehayah ’ani ’eileikh mei’itakh, weruaH yhoh yisa’akha ‘al ’asher lo ’eida‘, uwati lehagid le’aH’aw welo yimza’akha waharagani; we‘awdekha yarei ’et yhoh mine‘uray. 
1_kings 18:13	halo hugad ladoni ’eit ’asher ‘asiti, baharog ’icewel, ’eit newi’ei yhoh; wa’aHbi minewi’ei yhoh mei’ah ’ish, Hamishim Hamishim ’ish bame‘arah, wa’akhalkeleim leHem wamayim. 
1_kings 18:14	we‘atah ’atah ’omeir, leikh ’emor ladonekha hineih ’eiliyahu; waharagani.
1_kings 18:15	wayomer ’eiliyahu, Hay yhoh zewa’ot, ’asher ‘amadti lefanaw; ki hayom ’eira’eh ’eilaw. 
1_kings 18:16	wayeilekh ‘owadyahu liqrat ’aH’aw wayaged lo; wayeilekh ’aH’aw liqrat ’eiliyahu. 
1_kings 18:17	wayhi kir’ot ’aH’aw ’et ’eiliyahu; wayomer ’aH’aw ’eilaw, ha’atah ceh ‘okheir yisra’eil. 
1_kings 18:18	wayomer, lo ‘akharti ’et yisra’eil, ki ’im ’atah uweit ’awikha; ba‘acawekhem ’et mizwot yhoh, wateilekh ’aHarei habe‘alim. 
1_kings 18:19	we‘atah, shelaH qewoz ’eilay ’et kal yisra’eil ’el har hakarmel; we’et newi’ei haba‘al ’arba‘ mei’ot waHamishim, unewi’ei ha’asheirah ’arba‘ mei’ot, ’okhelei shulHan ’icawel. 
1_kings 18:20	wayishlaH ’aH’aw bekhal benei yisra’eil; wayiqboz ’et hanewi’im ’el har hakarmel. 
1_kings 18:21	wayigash ’eiliyahu ’el kal ha‘am, wayomer ‘ad matay ’atem poseHim ‘al shetei hasse‘ipim ’im yhoh ha’elohim lekhu ’aHaraw, we’im haba‘al lekhu ’aHaraw; welo ‘anu ha‘am ’oto dawar. 
1_kings 18:22	wayomer ’eiliyahu ’el ha‘am, ’ani notarti nawi yhoh lewadi; unewi’ei haba‘al, ’arba‘ mei’ot waHamishim ’ish. 
1_kings 18:23	weyitenu lanu shenayim parim, weyiwHaru lahem hapar ha’eHad winateHuhu, weyasimu ‘al ha‘eizim, we’eish lo yasimu; wa’ani ’e‘eseh ’et hapar ha’eHad, wenatati ‘al ha‘eizim, we’eish lo ’asim. 
1_kings 18:24	uqeratem besheim ’eloheikhem, wa’ani ’eqra wesheim yhoh, wehayah ha’elohim ’asher ya‘aneh wa’eish hu ha’elohim; waya‘an kal ha‘am wayomeru Tow hadawar. 
1_kings 18:25	wayomer ’eiliyahu linwi’ei haba‘al, baHaru lakhem hapar ha’eHad wa‘asu rishonah, ki ’atem harabim; weqir’u besheim ’eloheikhem, we’eish lo tasimu. 
1_kings 18:26	wayiqHu ’et hapar ’asher natan lahem waya‘asu wayiqre’u wesheim haba‘al meihaboqer we‘ad hazahorayim leimor haba‘al ‘aneinu, we’ein qol we’ein ‘oneh; wayfasseHu, ‘al hamicbeiaH ’asher ‘asah. 
1_kings 18:27	wayhi wazahorayim wayhateil bahem ’eiliyahu, wayomer qir’u weqol gadol ki ’elohim hu, ki siaH wekhi sig lo wekhi derekh lo; ’ulay yashein hu weyiqaz. 
1_kings 18:28	wayiqre’u beqol gadol, wayitgodedu kemishpaTam, baHarawot uwaremaHim; ‘ad shefakh dam ‘aleihem. 
1_kings 18:29	wayhi ka‘awor hazahorayim, wayitnabe’u, ‘ad la‘alot haminHah; we’ein qol we’ein ‘oneh we’ein qashew. 
1_kings 18:30	wayomer ’eiliyahu lekhal ha‘am geshu ’eilay, wayigeshu khal ha‘am ’eilaw; wayrapei ’et micbaH yhoh heharus. 
1_kings 18:31	wayiqaH ’eiliyahu, sheteim ‘esreih ’awanim, kemispar shiwTei wenei ya‘aqow; ’asher hayah dewar yhoh ’eilaw leimor, yisra’eil yihyeh shemekha. 
1_kings 18:32	wayiwneh ’et ha’awanim micbeiaH besheim yhoh; waya‘as te‘alah, keweit satayim cera‘, sawiw lamicbeiaH. 
1_kings 18:33	waya‘arokh ’et ha‘eizim; waynataH ’et hapar, wayasem ‘al ha‘eizim. 
1_kings 18:34	wayomer, mil’u ’arba‘ah khadim mayim, weyizqu ‘al ha‘olah we‘al ha‘eizim; wayomer shenu wayishnu, wayomer shaleishu wayshaleishu. 
1_kings 18:35	wayeilekhu hamayim, sawiw lamicbeiaH; wegam ’et hate‘alah milei mayim. 
1_kings 18:36	wayhi ba‘alot haminHah, wayigash ’eiliyahu hanawi wayomar yhoh ’elohei ’awraham yizHaq weyisra’eil, hayom yiwwada‘, ki ’atah ’elohim beyisra’eil wa’ani ‘awdekha; uwediwreikha uwidwarekha ‘asiti, ’eit kal hadewarim ha’eileh. 
1_kings 18:37	‘aneini yhoh ‘aneini, weyeide‘u ha‘am hacceh, ki ’atah yhoh ha’elohim; we’atah hasibota ’et libam ’aHoranit. 
1_kings 18:38	watipol ’eish yhoh watokhal ’et ha‘olah we’et ha‘eizim, we’et ha’awanim we’et he‘afar; we’et hamayim ’asher bate‘alah liHeikhah. 
1_kings 18:39	wayar kal ha‘am, wayipelu ‘al peneihem; wayomeru, yhoh hu ha’elohim, yhoh hu ha’elohim. 
1_kings 18:40	wayomer ’eiliyahu lahem tifsu ’et newi’ei haba‘al, ’ish ’al yimaleiT meihem wayitpesum; wayorideim ’eiliyahu ’el naHal qishon, wayishHaTeim sham. 
1_kings 18:41	wayomer ’eiliyahu le’aH’aw, ‘aleih ’ekhol usheteih; ki qol hamon hagashem. 
1_kings 18:42	waya‘aleh ’aH’aw le’ekhol welishtot; we’eiliyahu ‘alah ’el rosh hakarmel wayighar ’arzah, wayasem panaw bein berakho birkaw. 
1_kings 18:43	wayomer ’el na‘aro, ‘aleih na habeiT derekh yam, waya‘al wayabeiT, wayomer ’ein me’umah; wayomer shuw shewa‘ pe‘amim. 
1_kings 18:44	wayhi bashewi‘it, wayomer, hineih ‘aw qeTanah kekhaf ’ish ‘olah miyam; wayomer, ‘aleih ’emor ’el ’aH’aw ’esor wareid, welo ya‘azarekhah hagashem. 
1_kings 18:45	wayhi ‘ad koh we‘ad koh, wehashamayim hitqaderu ‘awim weruaH, wayhi geshem gadol; wayirkaw ’aH’aw wayeilekh yicre‘elah. 
1_kings 18:46	weyad yhoh hayetah ’el ’eiliyahu, wayshaneis matenaw; wayaraz lifnei ’aH’aw, ‘ad bo’akhah yicre‘elah. 
1_kings 19:1	wayageid ’aH’aw le’icewel, ’eit kal ’asher ‘asah ’eiliyahu; we’eit kal ’asher harag ’et kal hanewi’im beHarew. 
1_kings 19:2	watishlaH ’icewel mal’akh, ’el ’eiliyahu leimor; koh ya‘asun ’elohim wekhoh yosifun, ki kha‘eit maHar ’asim ’et nafshekha, kenefesh ’aHad meihem. 
1_kings 19:3	wayar, wayaqam wayeilekh ’el nafsho, wayawo be’eir shewa‘ ’asher lihudah; wayanaH ’et na‘aro sham. 
1_kings 19:4	wehu halakh bamidbar derekh yom, wayawo wayeishew taHat rotem ’eHat ’eHad; wayish’al ’et nafsho lamut, wayomer raw, ‘atah yhoh qaH nafshi, ki lo Tow ’anokhi mei’awotay. 
1_kings 19:5	wayishkaw wayishan, taHat rotem ’eHad; wehineih ceh mal’akh nogeia‘ bo, wayomer lo qum ’ekhol. 
1_kings 19:6	wayabeiT wehineih mera’ashotaw ‘ugat rezafim wezapaHat mayim; wayokhal wayeishet, wayashaw wayishkaw. 
1_kings 19:7	wayashaw mal’akh yhoh sheinit wayiga‘ bo, wayomer qum ’ekhol; ki raw mimekha hadarekh. 
1_kings 19:8	wayaqam wayokhal wayishteh; wayeilekh bekhoaH ha’akhilah hahi, ’arba‘im yom we’arba‘im laylah, ‘ad har ha’elohim Horeiw. 
1_kings 19:9	wayawo sham ’el hame‘arah wayalen sham; wehineih dewar yhoh ’eilaw, wayomer lo, mah lekha foh ’eiliyahu. 
1_kings 19:10	wayomer qano qineiti yhoh ’elohei zewa’ot, ki ‘acewu weritekha benei yisra’eil, ’et micbeHotekha harasu, we’et newi’ekha haregu weHarew; wa’iwwateir ’ani lewadi, waywaqshu ’et nafshi leqaHtah. 
1_kings 19:11	wayomer, zei we‘amadta wahar lifnei yhoh wehineih yhoh ‘oweir, weruaH gedolah weHacaq mefareiq harim umeshabeir sela‘im lifnei yhoh, lo waruaH yhoh; we’aHar haruaH ra‘ash, lo wara‘ash yhoh. 
1_kings 19:12	we’aHar hara‘ash ’eish, lo wa’eish yhoh; we’aHar ha’eish, qol demamah daqah. 
1_kings 19:13	wayhi kishmoa‘ ’eiliyahu, wayaleT panaw be’adarto, wayeizei waya‘amod petaH hame‘arah; wehineih ’eilaw qol, wayomer mah lekha foh ’eiliyahu. 
1_kings 19:14	wayomer qano qineiti yhoh ’elohei zewa’ot, ki ‘acewu weritekha benei yisra’eil, ’et micbeHotekha harasu, we’et newi’ekha haregu weHarew; wa’iwwateir ’ani lewadi, waywaqshu ’et nafshi leqaHtah.
1_kings 19:15	wayomer yhoh ’eilaw, leikh shuw ledarkekha midbarah damaseq; uwata, umashaHta ’et Haca’eil lemelekh ‘al ’aram. 
1_kings 19:16	we’eit yeihu wen nimshi, timshaH lemelekh ‘al yisra’eil; we’et ’elisha‘ ben shafaT mei’aweil meHolah, timshaH lenawi taHtekha. 
1_kings 19:17	wehayah, hanimlaT meiHerew Haca’eil yamit yeihu; wehanimlaT meiHerew yeihu yamit ’elisha‘. 
1_kings 19:18	wehish’arti weyisra’eil shiw‘at ’alafim; kal habirkayim, ’asher lo khare‘u laba‘al, wekhal hapeh, ’asher lo nashaq lo. 
1_kings 19:19	wayeilekh misham wayimza ’et ’elisha‘ ben shafaT wehu Horeish, sheneim ‘asar zemadim lefanaw, wehu bishneim he‘asar; waya‘awor ’eiliyahu ’eilaw, wayashleikh ’adarto ’eilaw. 
1_kings 19:20	waya‘acow ’et habaqar, wayaraz ’aHarei ’eiliyahu, wayomer, ’esheqah na le’awi ule’imi, we’eilekhah ’aHarekha; wayomer lo leikh shuw, ki meh ‘asiti lakh. 
1_kings 19:21	wayashaw mei’aHaraw wayiqaH ’et zemed habaqar wayicbaHeihu, uwikhli habaqar bishelam habasar, wayitein la‘am wayokheilu; wayaqam, wayeilekh ’aHarei ’eiliyahu wayshareteihu.
1_kings 20:1	uwen hadad melekh ’aram, qawaz ’et kal Heilo, usheloshim ushenayim melekh ’ito wesus warakhew; waya‘al, wayazar ‘al shomeron, wayilaHem bah. 
1_kings 20:2	wayishlaH mal’akhim ’el ’aH’aw melekh yisra’eil ha‘irah. 
1_kings 20:3	wayomer lo, koh ’amar ben hadad, kaspekha ucehawekha li hu; wenashekha uwanekha haTowim li heim. 
1_kings 20:4	waya‘an melekh yisra’eil wayomer, kidwarekha ’adoni hamelekh; lekha ’ani wekhal ’asher li. 
1_kings 20:5	wayashuwu hamal’akhim, wayomeru, koh ’amar ben hadad leimor; ki shalaHti ’eilekha leimor, kaspekha ucehawekha wenashekha uwanekha li titein. 
1_kings 20:6	ki ’im ka‘eit maHar, ’eshlaH ’et ‘awaday ’eilekha, weHipesu ’et beitekha, we’eit batei ‘awadekha; wehayah kal maHmad ‘einekha, yasimu weyadam welaqaHu. 
1_kings 20:7	wayiqra melekh yisra’eil lekhal ciqnei ha’arez, wayomer de‘u na ure’u, ki ra‘ah ceh mewaqeish; ki shalaH ’eilay lenashay ulewanay ulekhaspi welichawi, welo mana‘ti mimenu. 
1_kings 20:8	wayomeru ’eilaw kal hacceqeinim wekhal ha‘am; ’al tishma‘ welo toweh. 
1_kings 20:9	wayomer lemal’akhei wen hadad, ’imru ladoni hamelekh kol ’asher shalaHta ’el ‘awdekha warishonah ’e‘eseh, wehadawar hacceh, lo ’ukhal la‘asot; wayeilekhu hamal’akhim, wayshiwuhu dawar. 
1_kings 20:10	wayishlaH ’eilaw ben hadad, wayomer koh ya‘asun li ’elohim wekhoh yosifu; ’im yispoq ‘afar shomeron, lish‘alim lekhal ha‘am ’asher beraglay. 
1_kings 20:11	waya‘an melekh yisra’eil wayomer daberu, ’al yithaleil Hogeir kimfateiaH. 
1_kings 20:12	wayhi, kishmoa‘ ’et hadawar hacceh, wehu shoteh hu wehamelakhim bassukot; wayomer ’el ‘awadaw simu, wayasimu ‘al ha‘ir. 
1_kings 20:13	wehineih nawi ’eHad, nigash ’el ’aH’aw melekh yisra’eil wayomer, koh ’amar yhoh, hera’ita, ’eit kal hehamon hagadol hacceh; hini noteno weyadekha hayom, weyada‘ta ki ’ani yhoh. 
1_kings 20:14	wayomer ’aH’aw bemi, wayomer koh ’amar yhoh, bena‘arei sarei hamedinot; wayomer mi ye’sor hamilHamah wayomer ’atah. 
1_kings 20:15	wayifqod, ’et na‘arei sarei hamedinot, wayihyu matayim shenayim usheloshim; we’aHareihem, paqad ’et kal ha‘am kal benei yisra’eil shiw‘at ’alafim. 
1_kings 20:16	wayeize’u bazahorayim; uwen hadad shoteh shikor bassukot, hu wehamelakhim sheloshim ushenayim melekh ‘oceir ’oto. 
1_kings 20:17	wayeize’u, na‘arei sarei hamedinot barishonah; wayishlaH ben hadad, wayagidu lo leimor, ’anashim yaze’u mishomeron. 
1_kings 20:18	wayomer ’im leshalom yaza’u tifsum Hayim; we’im lemilHamah yaza’u Hayim tifsum. 
1_kings 20:19	we’eileh yaze’u min ha‘ir, na‘arei sarei hamedinot; wehaHayil ’asher ’aHareihem. 
1_kings 20:20	wayaku ’ish ’isho, wayanusu ’aram, wayirdefeim yisra’eil; wayimaleiT, ben hadad melekh ’aram, ‘al sus ufarashim. 
1_kings 20:21	wayeizei melekh yisra’eil, wayakh ’et hassus we’et harakhew; wehikah wa’aram makah gedolah. 
1_kings 20:22	wayigash hanawi ’el melekh yisra’eil, wayomer lo leikh hitHaccaq, weda‘ ure’eih ’eit ’asher ta‘aseh; ki litshuwat hashanah, melekh ’aram ‘oleh ‘alekha.
1_kings 20:23	we‘awdei melekh ’aram ’ameru ’eilaw, ’elohei harim ’eloheihem, ‘al kein Hacequ mimenu; we’ulam, nilaHeim ’itam bamishor, ’im lo neHecaq meihem. 
1_kings 20:24	we’et hadawar hacceh ‘aseih; haseir hamelakhim ’ish mimeqomo, wesim paHot taHteihem. 
1_kings 20:25	we’atah timneh lekha Hayil kaHayil hanofeil mei’otakh wesus kassus werekhew karekhew, wenilaHamah ’otam bamishor, ’im lo neHecaq meihem; wayishma‘ leqolam waya‘as kein.
1_kings 20:26	wayhi litshuwat hashanah, wayifqod ben hadad ’et ’aram; waya‘al ’afeiqah, lamilHamah ‘im yisra’eil. 
1_kings 20:27	uwenei yisra’eil, hatepaqedu wekhalekelu, wayeilekhu liqratam; wayaHanu wenei yisra’eil negdam, kishnei Hasifei ‘iccim, wa’aram mil’u ’et ha’arez. 
1_kings 20:28	wayigash ’ish ha’elohim, wayomer ’el melekh yisra’eil wayomer koh ’amar yhoh ya‘an ’asher ’ameru ’aram ’elohei harim yhoh, welo ’elohei ‘amaqim hu; wenatati ’et kal hehamon hagadol hacceh beyadekha, wida‘tem ki ’ani yhoh. 
1_kings 20:29	wayaHanu ’eileh nokhaH ’eileh shiw‘at yamim; wayhi bayom hashewi‘i, watiqraw hamilHamah, wayaku wenei yisra’eil ’et ’aram mei’ah ’elef ragli beyom ’eHad. 
1_kings 20:30	wayanusu hanotarim ’afeiqah ’el ha‘ir watipol haHomah, ‘al ‘esrim weshiw‘ah ’elef ’ish hanotarim; uwen hadad nas, wayawo ’el ha‘ir Heder beHader.
1_kings 20:31	wayomeru ’eilaw ‘awadaw hineih na shama‘nu, ki, malkhei beit yisra’eil, ki malkhei Hesed heim; nasimah na saqim bemateneinu waHawalim berosheinu, weneizei ’el melekh yisra’eil, ’ulay yeHayeh ’et nafshekha. 
1_kings 20:32	wayaHgeru saqim bemateneihem waHawalim berasheihem, wayawo’u ’el melekh yisra’eil, wayomeru, ‘awdekha wen hadad ’amar teHi na nafshi; wayomer ha‘odenu Hay ’aHi hu. 
1_kings 20:33	weha’anashim yenaHashu waymaharu wayaHleTu hamimenu, wayomeru ’aHikha wen hadad, wayomer bo’u qaHuhu; wayeizei ’eilaw ben hadad, waya‘aleihu ‘al hamerkawah. 
1_kings 20:34	wayomer ’eilaw he‘arim ’asher laqaH ’awi mei’eit ’awikha ’ashiw, weHuzot tasim lekha wedameseq ka’asher sam ’awi beshomeron, wa’ani baberit ’ashaleHeka; wayikhrat lo werit wayshaleHeihu.
1_kings 20:35	we’ish ’eHad mibenei hanewi’im, ’amar ’el rei‘eihu bidwar yhoh hakeini na; wayma’ein ha’ish lehakoto. 
1_kings 20:36	wayomer lo, ya‘an ’asher lo shama‘ta beqol yhoh, hinekha holeikh mei’iti, wehikekha ha’aryeih; wayeilekh mei’ezlo, wayimza’eihu ha’aryeih wayakeihu. 
1_kings 20:37	wayimza ’ish ’aHeir, wayomer hakeini na; wayakeihu ha’ish hakeih ufazoa‘. 
1_kings 20:38	wayeilekh hanawi, waya‘amod lamelekh ‘al hadarekh; wayitHapeis ba’afeir ‘al ‘einaw. 
1_kings 20:39	wayhi hamelekh ‘oweir, wehu za‘aq ’el hamelekh; wayomer ‘awdekha yaza weqerew hamilHamah, wehineih ’ish sar wayawei ’eilay ’ish, wayomer shemor ’et ha’ish hacceh, ’im hipaqeid yipaqeid, wehayetah nafshekha taHat nafsho, ’o khikar kesef tishqol. 
1_kings 20:40	wayhi ‘awdekha, ‘oseih heinah waheinah wehu ’einenu; wayomer ’eilaw melekh yisra’eil kein mishpaTekha ’atah Harazeta. 
1_kings 20:41	waymaheir wayasar ’et ha’afeir, mei‘al mei‘alei ‘einaw; wayakeir ’oto melekh yisra’eil, ki meihanewi’im hu. 
1_kings 20:42	wayomer ’eilaw, koh ’amar yhoh, ya‘an shilaHta ’et ’ish Hermi miyad; wehayetah nafshekha taHat nafsho, we‘amekha taHat ‘amo. 
1_kings 20:43	wayeilekh melekh yisra’eil ‘al beito sar weca‘eif; wayawo shomeronah.
1_kings 21:1	wayhi, ’aHar hadewarim ha’eileh, kerem hayah lenawot hayicre‘eili ’asher beyicre‘el; ’eizel heikhal ’aH’aw, melekh shomeron. 
1_kings 21:2	waydabeir ’aH’aw ’el nawot leimor tenah li ’et karmekha wihi li legan yaraq, ki hu qarow ’eizel beiti, we’etenah lekha taHtaw, kerem Tow mimenu; ’im Tow be‘einekha, ’etenah lekha khesef meHir ceh. 
1_kings 21:3	wayomer nawot ’el ’aH’aw; Halilah li yhoh, mititi ’et naHalat ’awotay lakh. 
1_kings 21:4	wayawo ’aH’aw ’el beito sar weca‘eif, ‘al hadawar ’asher diber ’eilaw, nawot hayicre‘eili, wayomer lo ’etein lekha ’et naHalat ’awotay; wayishkaw ‘al miTato, wayasseiw ’et panaw welo ’akhal laHem. 
1_kings 21:5	watawo ’eilaw ’icewel ’ishto; watedabeir ’eilaw, mah ceh ruHakha sarah, we’einekha ’okheil laHem. 
1_kings 21:6	waydabeir ’eileha, ki ’adabeir ’el nawot hayicre‘eili wa’omar lo, tenah li ’et karmekha bekhesef, ’o ’im Hafeiz ’atah, ’etenah lekha kherem taHtaw; wayomer lo ’etein lekha ’et karmi. 
1_kings 21:7	watomer ’eilaw ’icewel ’ishto, ’atah ‘atah ta‘aseh melukhah ‘al yisra’eil; qum ’ekhal leHem weyiTaw libekha, ’ani ’etein lekha, ’et kerem nawot hayicre‘eili. 
1_kings 21:8	watikhtow sefarim besheim ’aH’aw, wataHtom beHotamo; watishlaH hasfarim sefarim, ’el hacqeinim we’el haHorim ’asher be‘iro, hayoshewim ’et nawot. 
1_kings 21:9	watikhtow bassefarim leimor; qir’u zom, wehoshiwu ’et nawot berosh ha‘am. 
1_kings 21:10	wehoshiwu shenayim ’anashim benei weliya‘al negdo wi‘iduhu leimor, beirakhta ’elohim wamelekh; wehozi’uhu wesiqluhu weyamot. 
1_kings 21:11	waya‘asu ’anshei ‘iro hacceqeinim wehaHorim, ’asher hayoshewim be‘iro, ka’asher shaleHah ’aleihem ’icawel; ka’asher katuw bassefarim, ’asher shaleHah ’aleihem. 
1_kings 21:12	qare’u zom; wehoshiwu ’et nawot berosh ha‘am. 
1_kings 21:13	wayawo’u shenei ha’anashim benei weliya‘al wayeishewu negdo way‘iduhu ’anshei habeliya‘al ’et nawot, neged ha‘am leimor, beirakh nawot ’elohim wamelekh; wayozi’uhu miHuz la‘ir, wayisqeluhu wa’awanim wayamot. 
1_kings 21:14	wayishleHu ’el ’icewel leimor; suqal nawot wayamot. 
1_kings 21:15	wayhi kishmoa‘ ’icewel, ki suqal nawot wayamot; watomer ’icewel ’el ’aH’aw, qum reish ’et kerem nawot hayicre‘eili, ’asher mei’ein latet lekha wekhesef, ki ’ein nawot Hay ki meit. 
1_kings 21:16	wayhi kishmoa‘ ’aH’aw ki meit nawot; wayaqam ’aH’aw, laredet ’el kerem nawot hayicre‘eili lerishto.
1_kings 21:17	wayhi dewar yhoh, ’el ’eiliyahu hatishbi leimor. 
1_kings 21:18	qum reid, liqrat ’aH’aw melekh yisra’eil ’asher beshomeron; hineih bekherem nawot, ’asher yarad sham lerishto. 
1_kings 21:19	wedibarta ’eilaw leimor, koh ’amar yhoh, harazaHta wegam yarasheta; wedibarta ’eilaw leimor, koh ’amar yhoh, bimqom, ’asher laqequ hakelawim ’et dam nawot, yaloqu hakelawim ’et damekha gam ’atah. 
1_kings 21:20	wayomer ’aH’aw ’el ’eiliyahu, hamzatani ’oyewi; wayomer mazati, ya‘an hitmakerkha, la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh. 
1_kings 21:21	hini meiwi meiwi ’eilekha ra‘ah, uwi‘arti ’aHarekha; wehikhrati le’aH’aw mashtin beqir, we‘azur we‘acuw beyisra’eil. 
1_kings 21:22	wenatati ’et beitekha, keweit yarawe‘am ben newaT, ukheweit ba‘sha wen ’aHiyah; ’el haka‘as ’asher hikh‘asta, wataHaTi ’et yisra’eil. 
1_kings 21:23	wegam le’icewel, diber yhoh leimor; hakelawim yokhelu ’et ’icewel beHeil yicre‘el. 
1_kings 21:24	hameit le’aH’aw ba‘ir, yokhelu hakelawim; wehameit basadeh, yokhelu ‘of hashamayim. 
1_kings 21:25	raq lo hayah khe’aH’aw, ’asher hitmakeir, la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; ’asher heisatah ’oto ’icewel ’ishto. 
1_kings 21:26	wayat‘eiw me’od, lalekhet ’aHarei hagilulim; kekhol ’asher ‘asu ha’emori, ’asher horish yhoh, mipenei benei yisra’eil.
1_kings 21:27	wayhi khishmoa‘ ’aH’aw ’et hadewarim ha’eileh wayiqra‘ begadaw, wayasem saq ‘al besaro wayazom; wayishkaw basaq, wayhaleikh ’aT.
1_kings 21:28	wayhi dewar yhoh, ’el ’eiliyahu hatishbi leimor. 
1_kings 21:29	hara’ita, ki nikhna‘ ’aH’aw milefanay; ya‘an ki nikhna‘ mipanay, lo ’awi ’awi hara‘ah beyamaw, bimei weno, ’awi hara‘ah ‘al beito. 
1_kings 22:1	wayeishewu shalosh shanim; ’ein milHamah, bein ’aram uwein yisra’eil.
1_kings 22:2	wayhi bashanah hashelishit; wayeired yehoshafaT melekh yehudah ’el melekh yisra’eil. 
1_kings 22:3	wayomer melekh yisra’eil ’el ‘awadaw, hayda‘tem ki lanu ramot gil‘ad; wa’anaHnu maHshim, miqaHat ’otah, miyad melekh ’aram. 
1_kings 22:4	wayomer ’el yehoshafaT, hateileikh ’iti lamilHamah ramot gil‘ad; wayomer yehoshafaT ’el melekh yisra’eil, kamoni khamokha ke‘ami khe‘amekha kesusay kesusekha. 
1_kings 22:5	wayomer yehoshafaT ’el melekh yisra’eil; derash na khayom ’et dewar yhoh. 
1_kings 22:6	wayiqboz melekh yisra’eil ’et hanewi’im ke’arba‘ mei’ot ’ish wayomer ’aleihem, ha’eileikh ‘al ramot gil‘ad lamilHamah ’im ’eHdal; wayomeru ‘aleih, weyitein ’adonay beyad hamelekh. 
1_kings 22:7	wayomer yehoshafaT, ha’ein poh nawi yhoh ‘od; wenidreshah mei’oto. 
1_kings 22:8	wayomer melekh yisra’eil ’el yehoshafaT ‘od ’ish ’eHad lidrosh ’et yhoh mei’oto wa’ani seneitiw, ki lo yitnabei ‘alay Tow ki ’im ra‘, mikhayehu ben yimlah; wayomer yehoshafaT, ’al yomar hamelekh kein. 
1_kings 22:9	wayiqra melekh yisra’eil, ’el saris ’eHad; wayomer maharah mikhayehu wen yimlah. 
1_kings 22:10	umelekh yisra’eil wihoshafaT melekh yehudah yoshewim ’ish ‘al kis’o melubashim begadim begoren, petaH sha‘ar shomeron; wekhal hanewi’im, mitnabe’im lifneihem. 
1_kings 22:11	waya‘as lo zidqiyah wen kena‘anah qarnei warcel; wayomer koh ’amar yhoh, be’eileh tenagaH ’et ’aram ‘ad kalotam. 
1_kings 22:12	wekhal hanewi’im, nibe’im kein leimor; ‘aleih ramot gil‘ad wehazlaH, wenatan yhoh beyad hamelekh. 
1_kings 22:13	wehamal’akh ’asher halakh liqro mikhayehu, diber ’eilaw leimor, hineih na diwrei hanewi’im peh ’eHad Tow ’el hamelekh; yehi na diwreikha dewarekha, kidwar ’aHad meihem wedibarta Tow. 
1_kings 22:14	wayomer mikhayehu; Hay yhoh ki ’et ’asher yomar yhoh ’eilay ’oto ’adabeir. 
1_kings 22:15	wayawo ’el hamelekh wayomer hamelekh ’eilaw, mikhayehu haneileikh ’el ramot gil‘ad lamilHamah ’im neHdal; wayomer ’eilaw ‘aleih wehazlaH, wenatan yhoh beyad hamelekh. 
1_kings 22:16	wayomer ’eilaw hamelekh, ‘ad kameh fe‘amim ’ani mashbi‘ekha; ’asher lo tedabeir ’eilay raq ’emet besheim yhoh. 
1_kings 22:17	wayomer, ra’iti ’et kal yisra’eil nefozim ’el heharim, kazon ’asher ’ein lahem ro‘eh; wayomer yhoh lo ’adonim la’eileh, yashuwu ’ish leweito beshalom. 
1_kings 22:18	wayomer melekh yisra’eil ’el yehoshafaT; halo ’amarti ’eilekha, lo yitnabei ‘alay Tow ki ’im ra‘. 
1_kings 22:19	wayomer lakhein shema‘ dewar yhoh; ra’iti ’et yhoh yosheiw ‘al kis’o, wekhal zewa hashamayim ‘omeid ‘alaw, mimino umisemolo. 
1_kings 22:20	wayomer yhoh mi yefateh ’et ’aH’aw, weya‘al weyipol beramot gil‘ad; wayomer ceh bekhoh, weceh ’omeir bekhoh. 
1_kings 22:21	wayeizei haruaH, waya‘amod lifnei yhoh, wayomer ’ani ’afatenu; wayomer yhoh ’eilaw bamah. 
1_kings 22:22	wayomer, ’eizei wehayiti ruaH sheqer, befi kal newi’aw; wayomer, tefateh wegam tukhal, zei wa‘aseih khein. 
1_kings 22:23	we‘atah, hineih natan yhoh ruaH sheqer, befi kal newi’ekha ’eileh; yhoh, diber ‘alekha ra‘ah. 
1_kings 22:24	wayigash zidqiyahu wen kena‘anah, wayakeh ’et mikhayehu ‘al haleHi; wayomer ’ei ceh ‘awar ruaH yhoh mei’iti ledabeir ’otakh. 
1_kings 22:25	wayomer mikhayehu, hinekha ro’eh bayom hahu; ’asher tawo Heder beHeder leheiHaweih. 
1_kings 22:26	wayomer melekh yisra’eil, qaH ’et mikhayehu, wahashiweihu ’el ’amon sar ha‘ir; we’el yo’ash ben hamelekh. 
1_kings 22:27	we’amarta, koh ’amar hamelekh, simu ’et ceh beit hakele; weha’akhiluhu leHem laHaz umayim laHaz, ‘ad bo’i weshalom. 
1_kings 22:28	wayomer mikhayehu, ’im show tashuw beshalom, lo diber yhoh bi; wayomer shim‘u ‘amim kulam. 
1_kings 22:29	waya‘al melekh yisra’eil whoshafaT melekh yehudah ramot gil‘ad. 
1_kings 22:30	wayomer melekh yisra’eil ’el yehoshafaT, hitHapeis wawo wamilHamah, we’atah lewash begadekha; wayitHapeis melekh yisra’eil, wayawo bamilHamah. 
1_kings 22:31	umelekh ’aram ziwwah ’et sarei harekhew ’asher lo sheloshim ushenayim leimor, lo tilaHamu, ’et qaTon we’et gadol; ki ’im ’et melekh yisra’eil lewado. 
1_kings 22:32	wayhi kir’ot sarei harekhew ’et yehoshafaT, weheimah ’ameru ’akh melekh yisra’eil hu, wayasuru ‘alaw lehilaHeim; wayic‘aq yehoshafaT. 
1_kings 22:33	wayhi, kir’ot sarei harekhew, ki lo melekh yisra’eil hu; wayashuwu mei’aHaraw. 
1_kings 22:34	we’ish, mashakh baqeshet letumo, wayakeh ’et melekh yisra’eil, bein hadewaqim uwein hashiryan; wayomer lerakawo, hafokh yadekha wehozi’eini min hamaHaneh ki haHoleiti. 
1_kings 22:35	wata‘aleh hamilHamah bayom hahu, wehamelekh, hayah ma‘omad bamerkawah nokhaH ’aram; wayamat ba‘erew, wayizeq dam hamakah ’el Heiq harakhew. 
1_kings 22:36	waya‘awor harinah bamaHaneh, kewo hashemesh leimor; ’ish ’el ‘iro we’ish ’el ’arzo. 
1_kings 22:37	wayamat hamelekh, wayawo shomeron; wayiqberu ’et hamelekh beshomeron. 
1_kings 22:38	wayishTof ’et harekhew ‘al bereikhat shomeron, wayaloqu hakelawim ’et damo, wehacconot raHazu; kidwar yhoh ’asher dibeir. 
1_kings 22:39	weyeter diwrei ’aH’aw wekhal ’asher ‘asah, uweit hashein ’asher banah, wekhal he‘arim ’asher banah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil. 
1_kings 22:40	wayishkaw ’aH’aw ‘im ’awotaw; wayimlokh ’aHacyahu weno taHtaw.
1_kings 22:41	wihoshafaT ben ’asa, malakh ‘al yehudah; bishnat ’arba‘, le’aH’aw melekh yisra’eil. 
1_kings 22:42	yehoshafaT, ben sheloshim weHameish shanah bemalekho, we‘esrim weHameish shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, ‘acuwah bat shilHi. 
1_kings 22:43	wayeilekh, bekhal derekh ’asa ’awiw lo sar mimenu; la‘asot hayashar be‘einei yhoh. ’akh habamot lo saru; ‘od ha‘am mecabeHim umeqaTerim babamot. 
1_kings 22:44	wayashleim yehoshafaT ‘im melekh yisra’eil. 
1_kings 22:45	weyeter diwrei yehoshafaT ugewurato ’asher ‘asah wa’asher nilHam; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
1_kings 22:46	weyeter haqadeish, ’asher nish’ar, bimei ’asa ’awiw; bi‘eir min ha’arez. 
1_kings 22:47	umelekh ’ein be’edom nizaw melekh. 
1_kings 22:48	yehoshafaT ‘asar ‘asah ’oniyot tarshish lalekhet ’ofirah laccahaw welo halakh; ki nishberah nishberu ’oniyot be‘ezyon gawer. 
1_kings 22:49	’ac ’amar ’aHacyahu wen ’aH’aw ’el yehoshafaT, yeilekhu ‘awaday ‘im ‘awadekha ba’oniyot; welo ’awah yehoshafaT. 
1_kings 22:50	wayishkaw yehoshafaT ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqaweir ‘im ’awotaw, be‘ir dawid ’awiw; wayimlokh yehoram beno taHtaw.
1_kings 22:51	’aHacyahu wen ’aH’aw, malakh ‘al yisra’eil beshomeron, bishnat shewa‘ ‘esreih, lihoshafaT melekh yehudah; wayimlokh ‘al yisra’eil shenatayim. 
1_kings 22:52	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; wayeilekh, bederekh ’awiw uwederekh ’imo, uwederekh yarawe‘am ben newaT, ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil. 
1_kings 22:53	waya‘awod ’et haba‘al, wayishtaHaweh lo; wayakh‘eis, ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, kekhol ’asher ‘asah ’awiw. 
2_kings 1:1	wayifsha‘ mo’aw beyisra’eil, ’aHarei mot ’aH’aw. 
2_kings 1:2	wayipol ’aHacyah be‘ad hasewakhah, ba‘aliyato ’asher beshomeron wayaHal; wayishlaH mal’akhim, wayomer ’aleihem lekhu dirshu, bewa‘al cewuw ’elohei ‘eqron, ’im ’eHyeh meiHoli ceh.
2_kings 1:3	umal’akh yhoh diber ’el ’eiliyah hatishbi, qum ‘aleih, liqrat mal’akhei melekh shomeron; wedabeir ’aleihem, hamibeli ’ein ’elohim beyisra’eil, ’atem holekhim, lidrosh bewa‘al cewuw ’elohei ‘eqron. 
2_kings 1:4	welakhein koh ’amar yhoh, hamiTah ’asher ‘alita sham lo teireid mimenah ki mot tamut; wayeilekh ’eiliyah. 
2_kings 1:5	wayashuwu hamal’akhim ’eilaw; wayomer ’aleihem mah ceh shawtem. 
2_kings 1:6	wayomeru ’eilaw ’ish ‘alah liqrateinu, wayomer ’eileinu lekhu shuwu ’el hamelekh ’asher shalaH ’etkhem wedibartem ’eilaw, koh ’amar yhoh, hamibeli ’ein ’elohim beyisra’eil, ’atah sholeiaH, lidrosh bewa‘al cewuw ’elohei ‘eqron; lakhein hamiTah ’asher ‘alita sham lo teireid mimenah ki mot tamut. 
2_kings 1:7	waydabeir ’aleihem, meh mishpaT ha’ish, ’asher ‘alah liqratkhem; waydabeir ’aleikhem, ’et hadewarim ha’eileh. 
2_kings 1:8	wayomeru ’eilaw, ’ish ba‘al sei‘ar, we’eicor ‘or ’acur bematenaw; wayomar ’eiliyah hatishbi hu. 
2_kings 1:9	wayishlaH ’eilaw sar Hamishim waHamishaw; waya‘al ’eilaw, wehineih yosheiw ‘al rosh hahar, waydabeir ’eilaw, ’ish ha’elohim, hamelekh diber reidah. 
2_kings 1:10	waya‘aneh ’eiliyahu, waydabeir ’el sar haHamishim we’im ’ish ’elohim ’ani, teired ’eish min hashamayim, wetokhal ’otekha we’et Hamishekha; wateired ’eish min hashamayim, watokhal ’oto we’et Hamishaw. 
2_kings 1:11	wayashaw wayishlaH ’eilaw sar Hamishim ’aHeir waHamishaw; waya‘an waydabeir ’eilaw, ’ish ha’elohim, koh ’amar hamelekh meheirah reidah. 
2_kings 1:12	waya‘an ’eiliyah waydabeir ’aleihem ’im ’ish ha’elohim ’ani, teired ’eish min hashamayim, wetokhal ’otekha we’et Hamishekha; wateired ’eish ’elohim min hashamayim, watokhal ’oto we’et Hamishaw. 
2_kings 1:13	wayashaw, wayishlaH sar Hamishim shelishim waHamishaw; waya‘al wayawo sar haHamishim hashelishi wayikhra‘ ‘al birkaw leneged ’eiliyahu, wayitHanein ’eilaw waydabeir ’eilaw, ’ish ha’elohim, tiqar na nafshi, wenefesh ‘awadekha ’eileh Hamishim be‘einekha. 
2_kings 1:14	hineih yaredah ’eish min hashamayim, watokhal ’et shenei sarei haHamishim harishonim we’et Hamisheihem; we‘atah tiqar nafshi be‘einekha.
2_kings 1:15	waydabeir mal’akh yhoh ’el ’eiliyahu, reid ’oto, ’al tira mipanaw; wayaqam wayeired ’oto ’el hamelekh. 
2_kings 1:16	waydabeir ’eilaw koh ’amar yhoh ya‘an ’asher shalaHta mal’akhim lidrosh bewa‘al cewuw ’elohei ‘eqron hamibeli ’ein ’elohim beyisra’eil, lidrosh bidwaro; lakhein hamiTah ’asher ‘alita sham lo teireid mimenah ki mot tamut. 
2_kings 1:17	wayamat kidwar yhoh ’asher diber ’eiliyahu, wayimlokh yehoram taHtaw, f bishnat shetayim, lihoram ben yehoshafaT melekh yehudah; ki lo hayah lo bein. 
2_kings 1:18	weyeter diwrei ’aHacyahu ’asher ‘asah; halo heimah khetuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil.
2_kings 2:1	wayhi, beha‘alot yhoh ’et ’eiliyahu, bas‘arah hashamayim; wayeilekh ’eiliyahu we’elisha‘ min hagilgal. 
2_kings 2:2	wayomer ’eiliyahu ’el ’elisha‘ sheiw na foh, ki yhoh shelaHani ‘ad beit ’eil, wayomer ’elisha‘, Hay yhoh weHei nafshekha ’im ’e‘ecweka; wayeiredu beit ’eil. 
2_kings 2:3	wayeize’u wenei hanewi’im ’asher beit ’eil ’el ’elisha‘ wayomeru ’eilaw, hayada‘ta ki hayom, yhoh loqeiaH ’et ’adonekha mei‘al roshekha; wayomer gam ’ani yada‘ti heHeshu. 
2_kings 2:4	wayomer lo ’eiliyahu ’elisha‘ sheiw na foh, ki yhoh shelaHani yeriHo, wayomer Hay yhoh weHei nafshekha ’im ’e‘ecweka; wayawo’u yeriHo. 
2_kings 2:5	wayigeshu wenei hanewi’im ’asher biriHo ’el ’elisha‘ wayomeru ’eilaw, hayada‘ta ki hayom, yhoh loqeiaH ’et ’adonekha mei‘al roshekha; wayomer gam ’ani yada‘ti heHeshu. 
2_kings 2:6	wayomer lo ’eiliyahu sheiw na foh, ki yhoh shelaHani hayardeinah, wayomer Hay yhoh weHei nafshekha ’im ’e‘ecweka; wayeilekhu sheneihem. 
2_kings 2:7	waHamishim ’ish mibenei hanewi’im halekhu, waya‘amdu mineged meiraHoq; usheneihem ‘amedu ‘al hayardein. 
2_kings 2:8	wayiqaH ’eiliyahu ’et ’adarto wayiglom wayakeh ’et hamayim, wayeiHazu heinah waheinah; waya‘awru sheneihem beHarawah. 
2_kings 2:9	wayhi khe‘aweram, we’eiliyahu ’amar ’el ’elisha‘ she’al mah ’e‘eseh lakh, beTerem ’elaqaH mei‘imakh; wayomer ’elisha‘, wihi na pi shenayim beruHakha ’eilay. 
2_kings 2:10	wayomer hiqshita lish’ol; ’im tir’eh ’oti luqaH mei’itakh yehi lekha khein, we’im ’ayin lo yihyeh. 
2_kings 2:11	wayhi, heimah holekhim halokh wedabeir, wehineih rekhew ’eish wesusei ’eish, wayafridu bein sheneihem; waya‘al ’eiliyahu, basse‘arah hashamayim. 
2_kings 2:12	we’elisha‘ ro’eh, wehu meza‘eiq ’awi ’awi, rekhew yisra’eil ufarashaw, welo ra’ahu ‘od; wayaHaceiq biwgadaw, wayiqra‘eim lishnayim qera‘im. 
2_kings 2:13	wayarem ’et ’aderet ’eiliyahu, ’asher nafelah mei‘alaw; wayashaw waya‘amod ‘al sefat hayardein. 
2_kings 2:14	wayiqaH ’et ’aderet ’eiliyahu ’asher nafelah mei‘alaw wayakeh ’et hamayim, wayomar ’ayeih yhoh ’elohei ’eiliyahu; ’af hu wayakeh ’et hamayim, wayeiHazu heinah waheinah, waya‘awor ’elisha‘. 
2_kings 2:15	wayir’uhu wenei hanewi’im ’asher biriHo mineged, wayomeru, naHah ruaH ’eiliyahu ‘al ’elisha‘; wayawo’u liqrato, wayishtaHawu lo ’arezah. 
2_kings 2:16	wayomeru ’eilaw hineih na yeish ’et ‘awadekha Hamishim ’anashim benei Hayil, yeilekhu na wiwaqshu ’et ’adonekha pen nesa’o ruaH yhoh, wayashlikheihu be’aHad heharim, ’o be’aHat hageya’ot hagei’ayot; wayomer lo tishlaHu. 
2_kings 2:17	wayifzeru wo ‘ad bosh wayomer shelaHu; wayishleHu Hamishim ’ish, waywaqshu sheloshah yamim welo meza’uhu. 
2_kings 2:18	wayashuwu ’eilaw, wehu yosheiw biriHo; wayomer ’aleihem, halo ’amarti ’aleikhem ’al teileikhu. 
2_kings 2:19	wayomeru ’anshei ha‘ir ’el ’elisha‘, hineih na moshaw ha‘ir Tow, ka’asher ’adoni ro’eh; wehamayim ra‘im weha’arez meshakalet. 
2_kings 2:20	wayomer, qeHu li zeloHit Hadashah, wesimu sham melaH; wayiqHu ’eilaw. 
2_kings 2:21	wayeizei ’el moza hamayim, wayashlekh sham melaH; wayomer koh ’amar yhoh ripiti lamayim ha’eileh, lo yihyeh misham ‘od mawet umeshakalet. 
2_kings 2:22	wayeirafu hamayim, ‘ad hayom hacceh; kidwar ’elisha‘ ’asher dibeir.
2_kings 2:23	waya‘al misham beit ’eil; wehu ‘oleh waderekh, une‘arim qeTanim yaze’u min ha‘ir, wayitqalesu wo wayomeru lo, ‘aleih qeireiaH ‘aleih qeireiaH. 
2_kings 2:24	wayifen ’aHaraw wayir’eim, wayqaleim besheim yhoh; wateizenah shetayim dubim min haya‘ar, watewaqa‘nah meihem, ’arba‘im ushenei yeladim. 
2_kings 2:25	wayeilekh misham ’el har hakarmel; umisham shaw shomeron.
2_kings 3:1	wihoram ben ’aH’aw, malakh ‘al yisra’eil beshomeron, bishnat shemoneh ‘esreih, lihoshafaT melekh yehudah; wayimlokh sheteim ‘esreih shanah. 
2_kings 3:2	waya‘aseh hara‘ be‘einei yhoh, raq lo khe’awiw ukhe’imo; wayasar ’et mazewat haba‘al, ’asher ‘asah ’awiw. 
2_kings 3:3	raq beHaTot yarawe‘am ben newaT ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil daweiq; lo sar mimenah.
2_kings 3:4	umeisha‘ melekh mo’aw hayah noqeid; weheishiw lemelekh yisra’eil mei’ah ’elef karim, umei’ah ’elef ’eilim zamer. 
2_kings 3:5	wayhi kemot ’aH’aw; wayifsha‘ melekh mo’aw bemelekh yisra’eil. 
2_kings 3:6	wayeizei hamelekh yehoram bayom hahu mishomeron; wayifqod ’et kal yisra’eil. 
2_kings 3:7	wayeilekh wayishlaH ’el yehoshafaT melekh yehudah leimor, melekh mo’aw pasha‘ bi, hateileikh ’iti ’el mo’aw lamilHamah; wayomer ’e‘eleh, kamoni khamokha ke‘ami khe‘amekha kesusay kesusekha. 
2_kings 3:8	wayomer ’ei ceh haderekh na‘aleh; wayomer derekh midbar ’edom. 
2_kings 3:9	wayeilekh melekh yisra’eil umelekh yehudah umelekh ’edom, wayasobu derekh shiw‘at yamim; welo hayah mayim lamaHaneh welabeheimah ’asher beragleihem. 
2_kings 3:10	wayomer melekh yisra’eil; ’ahah ki qara yhoh lishloshet hamelakhim ha’eileh, lateit ’otam beyad mo’aw. 
2_kings 3:11	wayomer yehoshafaT, ha’ein poh nawi yhoh, wenidreshah ’et yhoh mei’oto; waya‘an ’eHad mei‘awdei melekh yisra’eil wayomer, poh ’elisha‘ ben shafaT, ’asher yazaq mayim ‘al yedei ’eiliyahu. 
2_kings 3:12	wayomer yehoshafaT, yeish ’oto dewar yhoh; wayeiredu ’eilaw, melekh yisra’eil wihoshafaT umelekh ’edom. 
2_kings 3:13	wayomer ’elisha‘ ’el melekh yisra’eil mah li walakh, leikh ’el newi’ei ’awikha, we’el newi’ei ’imekha; wayomer lo melekh yisra’eil, ’al, ki qara yhoh lishloshet hamelakhim ha’eileh, lateit ’otam beyad mo’aw. 
2_kings 3:14	wayomer ’elisha‘, Hay yhoh zewa’ot ’asher ‘amadti lefanaw, ki, lulei penei yehoshafaT melekh yehudah ’ani nosei; ’im ’abiT ’eilekha we’im ’er’eka. 
2_kings 3:15	we‘atah qeHu li menagein; wehayah kenagein hamnagein, watehi ‘alaw yad yhoh. 
2_kings 3:16	wayomer koh ’amar yhoh; ‘asoh hanaHal hacceh geiwim geiwim. 
2_kings 3:17	ki khoh ’amar yhoh lo tir’u ruaH welo tir’u geshem, wehanaHal hahu yimalei mayim; ushetitem ’atem umiqneikhem uwehemtekhem. 
2_kings 3:18	wenaqal cot be‘einei yhoh; wenatan ’et mo’aw beyedkhem. 
2_kings 3:19	wehikitem kal ‘ir miwzar wekhal ‘ir miwHor, wekhal ‘eiz Tow tapilu, wekhal ma‘yenei mayim tistomu; wekhol haHelqah haTowah, takh’iwu ba’awanim. 
2_kings 3:20	wayhi waboqer ka‘alot haminHah, wehineih mayim ba’im miderekh ’edom; watimalei ha’arez ’et hamayim. 
2_kings 3:21	wekhal mo’aw shame‘u, ki ‘alu hamelakhim lehilaHem bam; wayiza‘aqu, mikol Hogeir Hagorah wama‘lah, waya‘amdu ‘al hagewul. 
2_kings 3:22	wayashkimu waboqer, wehashemesh careHah ‘al hamayim; wayir’u mo’aw mineged ’et hamayim ’adumim kadam. 
2_kings 3:23	wayomeru dam ceh, haHoreiw neHerwu hamelakhim, wayaku ’ish ’et rei‘eihu; we‘atah lashalal mo’aw. 
2_kings 3:24	wayawo’u ’el maHaneih yisra’eil wayaqumu yisra’eil wayaku ’et mo’aw, wayanusu mipeneihem; wayawo wayaku wah, wehakot ’et mo’aw. 
2_kings 3:25	wehe‘arim yaharosu wekhal Helqah Towah yashlikhu ’ish ’awno umil’uha, wekhal ma‘yan mayim yistomu wekhal ‘eiz Tow yapilu, ‘ad hish’ir ’awaneha baqir Haraset; wayasobu haqala‘im wayakuha. 
2_kings 3:26	wayar melekh mo’aw, ki Hacaq mimenu hamilHamah; wayiqaH ’oto shewa‘ mei’ot ’ish sholeif Herew, lehawqia‘ ’el melekh ’edom welo yakholu. 
2_kings 3:27	wayiqaH ’et beno habekhor ’asher yimlokh taHtaw, waya‘aleihu ‘olah ‘al haHomah, wayhi qezef gadol ‘al yisra’eil; wayis‘u mei‘alaw, wayashuwu la’arez.
2_kings 4:1	we’ishah ’aHat mineshei wenei hanewi’im za‘aqah ’el ’elisha‘ leimor, ‘awdekha ’ishi meit, we’atah yada‘ta, ki ‘awdekha, hayah yarei ’et yhoh; wehanosheh, ba, laqaHat ’et shenei yeladay lo la‘awadim. 
2_kings 4:2	wayomer ’eileha ’elisha‘ mah ’e‘eseh lakh, hagidi li, mah yesh lekhi lakh babayit; watomer, ’ein leshifHatekha khol babayit, ki ’im ’asukh shamen. 
2_kings 4:3	wayomer, lekhi sha’ali lakh keilim min haHuz, mei’eit kal shikhnakhei shekheinayikh; keilim reiqim ’al tam‘iTi. 
2_kings 4:4	uwat, wesagart hadelet ba‘adeikh uwe‘ad banayikh, weyazaqt ‘al kal hakeilim ha’eileh; wehamalei tassi‘i. 
2_kings 4:5	wateilekh mei’ito, watisgor hadelet, ba‘adah uwe‘ad baneha; heim magishim ’eileha wehi meizaqet mozaqet. 
2_kings 4:6	wayhi kimlot hakeilim, watomer ’el benah hagishah ’eilay ‘od keli, wayomer ’eileha, ’ein ‘od keli; waya‘amod hashamen. 
2_kings 4:7	watawo, watageid le’ish ha’elohim, wayomer, lekhi mikhri ’et hashemen, weshalemi ’et nishyeikhi nishyeikh; we’at beneikhi uwanayikh, tiHyi banotar.
2_kings 4:8	wayhi hayom waya‘awor ’elisha‘ ’el shuneim, wesham ’ishah gedolah, wataHaceq bo le’ekhal laHem; wayhi midei ‘awero, yasur shamah le’ekhal laHem. 
2_kings 4:9	watomer ’el ’ishah, hineih na yada‘ti, ki ’ish ’elohim qadosh hu; ‘oweir ‘aleinu tamid. 
2_kings 4:10	na‘aseh na ‘aliyat qir qeTanah, wenasim lo sham miTah weshulHan wekhissei umenorah; wehayah bewo’o ’eileinu yasur shamah. 
2_kings 4:11	wayhi hayom wayawo shamah; wayasar ’el ha‘aliyah wayishkaw shamah. 
2_kings 4:12	wayomer ’el geiHaci na‘aro, qera lashunamit haccot; wayiqra lah, wata‘amod lefanaw. 
2_kings 4:13	wayomer lo, ’emar na ’eileha hineih Haradt ’eileinu ’et kal haHaradah haccot meh la‘asot lakh, hayeish ledaber lakh ’el hamelekh, ’o ’el sar hazawa; watomer betokh ‘ami ’anokhi yoshawet. 
2_kings 4:14	wayomer umeh la‘asot lah; wayomer geiHaci, ’awal bein ’ein lah we’ishah caqein. 
2_kings 4:15	wayomer qera lah; wayiqra lah, wata‘amod bapataH. 
2_kings 4:16	wayomer, lamo‘eid hacceh ka‘eit Hayah, ’ati ’at Howeqet bein; watomer, ’al ’adoni ’ish ha’elohim, ’al tekhacceiw beshifHatekha. 
2_kings 4:17	watahar ha’ishah wateiled bein; lamo‘eid hacceh ka‘eit Hayah, ’asher diber ’eileha ’elisha‘. 
2_kings 4:18	wayigdal hayaled; wayhi hayom, wayeizei ’el ’awiw ’el haqozerim. 
2_kings 4:19	wayomer ’el ’awiw roshi roshi; wayomer ’el hana‘ar, sa’eihu ’el ’imo. 
2_kings 4:20	wayisa’eihu, waywi’eihu ’el ’imo; wayeishew ‘al birkeha ‘ad hazahorayim wayamot. 
2_kings 4:21	wata‘al watashkiweihu, ‘al miTat ’ish ha’elohim; watisgor ba‘ado wateizei. 
2_kings 4:22	watiqra ’el ’ishah watomer, shilHah na li ’eHad min hane‘arim, we’aHat ha’atonot; we’aruzah ‘ad ’ish ha’elohim we’ashuwah. 
2_kings 4:23	wayomer, madua‘ ’ati ’at holakhti holekhet ’eilaw hayom, lo Hodesh welo shabat; watomer shalom. 
2_kings 4:24	wataHawosh ha’aton, watomer ’el na‘arah nehag waleikh; ’al ta‘azar li lirkow, ki ’im ’amarti lakh. 
2_kings 4:25	wateilekh, watawo ’el ’ish ha’elohim ’el har hakarmel; wayhi kir’ot ’ish ha’elohim ’otah mineged, wayomer ’el geiHaci na‘aro, hineih hashunamit halac. 
2_kings 4:26	‘atah ruz na liqratah we’emar lah, hashalom lakh hashalom le’isheikh hashalom layaled; watomer shalom. 
2_kings 4:27	watawo ’el ’ish ha’elohim ’el hahar, wataHaceiq beraglaw; wayigash geiHaci lehadefah, wayomer ’ish ha’elohim harpeih lah ki nafshah marah lah, yhoh he‘lim mimeni, welo higid li. 
2_kings 4:28	watomer hasha’alti wein mei’eit ’adoni; halo ’amarti, lo tashleh ’oti. 
2_kings 4:29	wayomer legeiHaci Hagor matenekha, weqaH mish‘anti weyadekha waleikh ki timza ’ish lo tewarekhenu, wekhi yewarekhkha ’ish lo ta‘anenu; wesamta mish‘anti ‘al penei hana‘ar. 
2_kings 4:30	watomer ’eim hana‘ar, Hay yhoh weHei nafshekha ’im ’e‘ecweka; wayaqam wayeilekh ’aHareha. 
2_kings 4:31	wegeiHaci ‘awar lifneihem, wayasem ’et hamish‘enet ‘al penei hana‘ar, we’ein qol we’ein qashew; wayashaw liqrato wayaged lo leimor, lo heiqiz hana‘ar. 
2_kings 4:32	wayawo ’elisha‘ habayetah; wehineih hana‘ar meit, mushkaw ‘al miTato. 
2_kings 4:33	wayawo wayisgor hadelet be‘ad sheneihem; wayitpaleil ’el yhoh. 
2_kings 4:34	waya‘al wayishkaw ‘al hayeled, wayasem piw ‘al piw we‘einaw ‘al ‘einaw wekhapaw ‘al kapo kapaw, wayighar ‘alaw; wayaHam besar hayaled. 
2_kings 4:35	wayashaw wayeilekh babayit, ’aHat heinah we’aHat heinah, waya‘al wayighar ‘alaw; waycoreir hana‘ar ‘ad shewa‘ pe‘amim, wayifqaH hana‘ar ’et ‘einaw. 
2_kings 4:36	wayiqra ’el geiHaci, wayomer qera ’el hashunamit haccot, wayiqra’eha watawo ’eilaw; wayomer se’i weneikh. 
2_kings 4:37	watawo watipol ‘al raglaw, watishtaHu ’arezah; watisa ’et benah wateizei.
2_kings 4:38	we’elisha‘ shaw hagilgalah wehara‘aw ba’arez, uwenei hanewi’im, yoshewim lefanaw; wayomer lena‘aro, shefot hassir hagedolah, uwasheil nacid liwnei hanewi’im. 
2_kings 4:39	wayeizei ’eHad ’el hasadeh lelaqeiT ’orot wayimza gefen sadeh, waylaqeiT mimenu paqu‘ot sadeh melo wigdo; wayawo, wayfalaH ’el sir hanacid ki lo yada‘u. 
2_kings 4:40	wayizqu la’anashim le’ekhol; wayhi ke’akhelam meihanacid weheimah za‘aqu, wayomeru mawet bassir ’ish ha’elohim, welo yakhelu le’ekhol. 
2_kings 4:41	wayomer uqeHu qemaH, wayashleikh ’el hassir; wayomer, zaq la‘am weyokheilu, welo hayah dawar ra‘ bassir.
2_kings 4:42	we’ish ba miba‘al shalishah, wayawei le’ish ha’elohim leHem bikurim ‘esrim leHem se‘orim, wekharmel beziqlono; wayomer tein la‘am weyokheilu. 
2_kings 4:43	wayomer meshareto, mah ’etein ceh, lifnei mei’ah ’ish; wayomer, tein la‘am weyokheilu, ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’akhol wehoteir. 
2_kings 4:44	wayitein lifneihem wayokhelu wayotiru kidwar yhoh.
2_kings 5:1	wena‘aman sar zewa melekh ’aram hayah ’ish gadol lifnei ’adonaw unesu fanim, ki wo natan yhoh teshu‘ah la’aram; weha’ish, hayah gibor Hayil mezora‘. 
2_kings 5:2	wa’aram yaze’u gedudim, wayishbu mei’erez yisra’eil na‘arah qeTanah; watehi lifnei ’eishet na‘aman. 
2_kings 5:3	watomer ’el gewirtah, ’aHalei ’adoni, lifnei hanawi ’asher beshomeron; ’ac ye’esof ’oto mizara‘to. 
2_kings 5:4	wayawo wayageid ladonaw leimor; kacot wekhacot diberah hana‘arah, ’asher mei’erez yisra’eil. 
2_kings 5:5	wayomer melekh ’aram lekh bo, we’eshleHah seifer ’el melekh yisra’eil; wayeilekh wayiqaH beyado ‘eser kikerei khesef, wesheishet ’alafim cahaw, we‘eser Halifot begadim. 
2_kings 5:6	wayawei hasseifer, ’el melekh yisra’eil leimor; we‘atah, kewo hasseifer hacceh ’eilekha, hineih shalaHti ’eilekha ’et na‘aman ‘awdi, wa’asafto mizara‘to. 
2_kings 5:7	wayhi kiqro melekh yisra’eil ’et hasseifer wayiqra‘ begadaw, wayomer ha’elohim ’ani lehamit ulehaHayot, ki ceh sholeiaH ’eilay, le’esof ’ish mizara‘to; ki ’akh de‘u na ure’u, ki mit’aneh hu li. 
2_kings 5:8	wayhi kishmoa‘ ’elisha‘ ’ish ha’elohim, ki qara‘ melekh yisra’eil ’et begadaw, wayishlaH ’el hamelekh leimor, lamah qara‘ta begadekha; yawo na ’eilay, weyeida‘ ki yeish nawi beyisra’eil. 
2_kings 5:9	wayawo na‘aman besuso besusaw uwerikhbo; waya‘amod petaH habayit le’elisha‘. 
2_kings 5:10	wayishlaH ’eilaw ’elisha‘ mal’akh leimor; halokh, weraHazta shewa‘ pe‘amim bayardein, weyashow besarekha lekha uTehar. 
2_kings 5:11	wayiqzof na‘aman wayeilakh; wayomer hineih ’amarti ’eilay yeizei yazo, we‘amad weqara besheim yhoh ’elohaw, weheinif yado ’el hamaqom we’asaf hamezora‘. 
2_kings 5:12	halo Tow ’awanah ’amanah ufarpar naharot dameseq, mikol meimei yisra’eil, halo ’erHaz bahem weTahareti; wayifen wayeilekh beHeimah. 
2_kings 5:13	wayigeshu ‘awadaw waydaberu ’eilaw wayomeru, ’awi dawar gadol, hanawi diber ’eilekha halo ta‘aseh; we’af ki ’amar ’eilekha reHaz uTehar. 
2_kings 5:14	wayeired, wayiTbol bayardein shewa‘ pe‘amim, kidwar ’ish ha’elohim; wayashaw besaro, kiwsar na‘ar qaTon wayiThar. 
2_kings 5:15	wayashaw ’el ’ish ha’elohim hu wekhal maHaneihu, wayawo waya‘amod lefanaw wayomer, hineih na yada‘ti ki ’ein ’elohim bekhal ha’arez, ki ’im beyisra’eil; we‘atah qaH na werakhah mei’eit ‘awdekha. 
2_kings 5:16	wayomer Hay yhoh ’asher ‘amadti lefanaw ’im ’eqaH; wayifzar bo laqaHat wayma’ein. 
2_kings 5:17	wayomer na‘aman walo yutan na le‘awdekha, masa zemed peradim ’adamah; ki lo ya‘aseh ‘od ‘awdekha ‘olah wacewaH leilohim ’aHeirim, ki ’im yhoh. 
2_kings 5:18	ladawar hacceh, yislaH yhoh le‘awdekha; bewo ’adoni weit rimon lehishtaHawot shamah wehu nish‘an ‘al yadi, wehishtaHaweiti beit rimon, behishtaHawayati beit rimon, yislaH na yhoh le‘awdekha badawar hacceh. 
2_kings 5:19	wayomer lo leikh leshalom; wayeilekh mei’ito kiwrat ’arez.
2_kings 5:20	wayomer geiHaci, na‘ar ’elisha‘ ’ish ha’elohim hineih Hasakh ’adoni, ’et na‘aman ha’arami hacceh, miqaHat miyado ’eit ’asher heiwi; Hay yhoh ki ’im razti ’aHaraw, welaqaHti mei’ito me’umah. 
2_kings 5:21	wayirdof geiHaci ’aHarei na‘aman; wayir’eh na‘aman raz ’aHaraw, wayipol mei‘al hamerkawah liqrato wayomer hashalom. 
2_kings 5:22	wayomer shalom, ’adoni shelaHani leimor hineih ‘atah ceh ba’u ’eilay shenei ne‘arim meihar ’efrayim mibenei hanewi’im; tenah na lahem kikar kesef, ushetei Halifot begadim. 
2_kings 5:23	wayomer na‘aman, ho’eil qaH kikarayim; wayifraz bo, wayazar kikerayim kesef bishnei HariTim, ushetei Halifot begadim, wayitein ’el shenei ne‘araw, wayis’u lefanaw. 
2_kings 5:24	wayawo ’el ha‘ofel, wayiqaH miyadam wayifqod babayit; wayshalaH ’et ha’anashim wayeileikhu. 
2_kings 5:25	wehu wa waya‘amod ’el ’adonaw, wayomer ’eilaw ’elisha‘, mei’an mei’ayin geiHaci; wayomer lo halakh ‘awdekha ’aneh wa’anah. 
2_kings 5:26	wayomer ’eilaw lo libi halakh, ka’asher hafakh ’ish mei‘al merkawto liqratekha; ha‘eit laqaHat ’et hakesef welaqaHat begadim, weceitim ukheramim wezon uwaqar, wa‘awadim ushefaHot. 
2_kings 5:27	wezara‘at na‘aman tidbaq bekha, uwecar‘akha le‘olam; wayeizei milefanaw mezora‘ kashaleg.
2_kings 6:1	wayomeru wenei hanewi’im ’el ’elisha‘; hineih na hamaqom, ’asher ’anaHnu yoshewim sham lefanekha zar mimenu. 
2_kings 6:2	neilekhah na ‘ad hayardein, weniqHah misham ’ish qorah ’eHat, wena‘aseh lanu sham maqom lashewet sham; wayomer leikhu. 
2_kings 6:3	wayomer ha’eHad, ho’el na weleikh ’et ‘awadekha; wayomer ’ani ’eileikh. 
2_kings 6:4	wayeilekh ’itam; wayawo’u hayardeinah, wayigceru ha‘eizim. 
2_kings 6:5	wayhi ha’eHad mapil haqorah, we’et habarcel nafal ’el hamayim; wayiz‘aq wayomer ’ahah ’adoni wehu sha’ul. 
2_kings 6:6	wayomer ’ish ha’elohim ’anah nafal; wayar’eihu ’et hamaqom, wayiqzaw ‘eiz wayashlekh shamah, wayazef habarcel. 
2_kings 6:7	wayomer harem lakh; wayishlaH yado wayiqaHeihu.
2_kings 6:8	umelekh ’aram, hayah nilHam beyisra’eil; wayiwwa‘az ’el ‘awadaw leimor, ’el meqom peloni ’almoni taHanoti. 
2_kings 6:9	wayishlaH ’ish ha’elohim, ’el melekh yisra’eil leimor, hishamer mei‘awor hamaqom hacceh; ki sham ’aram neHitim. 
2_kings 6:10	wayishlaH melekh yisra’eil, ’el hamaqom ’asher ’amar lo ’ish ha’elohim wehichirah wehichiro wenishmar sham; lo ’aHat welo shetayim. 
2_kings 6:11	wayissa‘eir leiw melekh ’aram, ‘al hadawar hacceh; wayiqra ’el ‘awadaw wayomer ’aleihem, halo tagidu li, mi mishelanu ’el melekh yisra’eil. 
2_kings 6:12	wayomer ’aHad mei‘awadaw, lo ’adoni hamelekh; ki ’elisha‘ hanawi ’asher beyisra’eil, yagid lemelekh yisra’eil, ’et hadewarim, ’asher tedabeir baHadar mishkawekha. 
2_kings 6:13	wayomer, lekhu ure’u ’eikhoh hu, we’eshlaH we’eqaHeihu; wayugad lo leimor hineih wedotan. 
2_kings 6:14	wayishlaH shamah susim werekhew weHayil kaweid; wayawo’u laylah, wayaqifu ‘al ha‘ir. 
2_kings 6:15	wayashkeim meshareit ’ish ha’elohim laqum wayeizei wehineih Hayil soweiw ’et ha‘ir wesus warakhew; wayomer na‘aro ’eilaw ’ahah ’adoni ’eikhah na‘aseh. 
2_kings 6:16	wayomer ’al tira; ki rabim ’asher ’itanu, mei’asher ’otam. 
2_kings 6:17	wayitpaleil ’elisha‘ wayomar, yhoh peqaH na ’et ‘einaw weyir’eh; wayifqaH yhoh ’et ‘einei hana‘ar, wayar, wehineih hahar malei susim werekhew ’eish sewiwot ’elisha‘. 
2_kings 6:18	wayeiredu ’eilaw wayitpaleil ’elisha‘ ’el yhoh wayomar, hakh na ’et hago hacceh bassanweirim; wayakeim bassanweirim kidwar ’elisha‘. 
2_kings 6:19	wayomer ’aleihem ’elisha‘, lo ceh haderekh welo coh ha‘ir lekhu ’aHaray, we’olikhah ’etkhem, ’el ha’ish ’asher tewaqeishun; wayolekh ’otam shomeronah. 
2_kings 6:20	wayhi kewo’am shomeron wayomer ’elisha‘, yhoh peqaH ’et ‘einei ’eileh weyir’u; wayifqaH yhoh ’et ‘eineihem, wayir’u wehineih betokh shomeron. 
2_kings 6:21	wayomer melekh yisra’eil ’el ’elisha‘, kir’oto ’otam; ha’akeh ’akeh ’awi. 
2_kings 6:22	wayomer lo takeh, ha’asher shawita beHarbekha uweqashtekha ’atah makeh; sim leHem wamayim lifneihem, weyokhelu weyishtu, weyeilekhu ’el ’adoneihem. 
2_kings 6:23	wayikhreh lahem keirah gedolah, wayokhelu wayishtu, wayshaleHeim, wayeilekhu ’el ’adoneihem; welo yasefu ‘od gedudei ’aram, lawo be’erez yisra’eil.
2_kings 6:24	wayhi ’aHarei khein, wayiqboz ben hadad melekh ’aram ’et kal maHaneihu; waya‘al wayazar ‘al shomeron. 
2_kings 6:25	wayhi ra‘aw gadol beshomeron, wehineih zarim ‘aleha; ‘ad heyot rosh Hamor bishmonim kesef, werowa‘ haqaw Hareiyonim diwyonim baHamishah khasef. 
2_kings 6:26	wayhi melekh yisra’eil, ‘oweir ‘al haHomah; we’ishah, za‘aqah ’eilaw leimor, hoshi‘ah ’adoni hamelekh. 
2_kings 6:27	wayomer ’al yoshi‘eikh yhoh, mei’ayin ’oshi‘eikh; hamin hagoren ’o min hayaqew. 
2_kings 6:28	wayomer lah hamelekh mah lakh; watomer, ha’ishah haccot ’amerah ’eilay, teni ’et beneikh wenokhelenu hayom, we’et beni nokhal maHar. 
2_kings 6:29	wanewasheil ’et beni wanokheleihu; wa’omar ’eileha bayom ha’aHeir, teni ’et beneikh wenokhelenu, wataHbi ’et benah. 
2_kings 6:30	wayhi khishmoa‘ hamelekh ’et diwrei ha’ishah wayiqra‘ ’et begadaw, wehu ‘oweir ‘al haHomah; wayar ha‘am, wehineih hasaq ‘al besaro mibayit. 
2_kings 6:31	wayomer koh ya‘aseh li ’elohim wekhoh yosif; ’im ya‘amod rosh ’elisha‘ ben shafaT ‘alaw hayom. 
2_kings 6:32	we’elisha‘ yosheiw beweito, wehacceqeinim yoshewim ’ito; wayishlaH ’ish milefanaw, beTerem yawo hamal’akh ’eilaw wehu ’amar ’el hacceqeinim, hare’item ki shalaH ben hamrazeiaH hacceh lehasir ’et roshi, re’u kewo hamal’akh, sigru hadelet uleHaztem ’oto badelet, halo, qol raglei ’adonaw ’aHaraw. 
2_kings 6:33	‘odenu medabeir ‘imam, wehineih hamal’akh yoreid ’eilaw; wayomer, hineih cot hara‘ah mei’eit yhoh, mah ’oHil yhoh ‘od.
2_kings 7:1	wayomer ’elisha‘, shim‘u dewar yhoh; koh ’amar yhoh ka‘eit maHar se’ah solet besheqel, wesatayim se‘orim besheqel besha‘ar shomeron. 
2_kings 7:2	waya‘an hashalish ’asher lamelekh nish‘an ‘al yado ’et ’ish ha’elohim wayomar hineih yhoh ‘oseh ’arubot bashamayim, hayihyeh hadawar hacceh; wayomer, hinekhah ro’eh be‘einekha, umisham lo tokheil.
2_kings 7:3	we’arba‘ah ’anashim hayu mezora‘im petaH hasha‘ar; wayomeru ’ish ’el rei‘eihu, mah, ’anaHnu yoshewim poh ‘ad matenu. 
2_kings 7:4	’im ’amarnu nawo ha‘ir wehara‘aw ba‘ir wamatnu sham, we’im yashawnu foh wamatenu; we‘atah, lekhu wenipelah ’el maHaneih ’aram, ’im yeHayunu niHyeh, we’im yemitunu wamatenu. 
2_kings 7:5	wayaqumu waneshef, lawo ’el maHaneih ’aram; wayawo’u, ‘ad qezeih maHaneih ’aram, wehineih ’ein sham ’ish. 
2_kings 7:6	wadonay hishmia‘ ’et maHaneih ’aram, qol rekhew qol sus, qol Hayil gadol; wayomeru ’ish ’el ’aHiw, hineih sakhar ‘aleinu melekh yisra’eil ’et malkhei haHitim we’et malkhei mizrayim lawo ‘aleinu. 
2_kings 7:7	wayaqumu wayanusu waneshef waya‘acwu ’et ’aholeihem, we’et suseihem we’et Hamoreihem, hamaHaneh ka’asher hi; wayanusu ’el nafsham. 
2_kings 7:8	wayawo’u hamzora‘im ha’eileh ‘ad qezeih hamaHaneh, wayawo’u ’el ’ohel ’eHad wayokhelu wayishtu, wayis’u misham, kesef wecahaw uwegadim, wayeilekhu wayaTminu; wayashuwu, wayawo’u ’el ’ohel ’aHeir, wayis’u misham, wayeilekhu wayaTminu. 
2_kings 7:9	wayomeru ’ish ’el rei‘eihu lo khein ’anaHnu ‘osim, hayom hacceh yom besorah hu, wa’anaHnu maHshim, weHikinu ‘ad ’or haboqer umeza’anu ‘awon; we‘atah lekhu wenawo’ah, wenagidah beit hamelekh. 
2_kings 7:10	wayawo’u, wayiqre’u ’el sho‘eir ha‘ir wayagidu lahem leimor, banu ’el maHaneih ’aram, wehineih ’ein sham ’ish weqol ’adam; ki ’im hassus ’asur wehaHamor ’asur, we’ohalim ka’asher heimah. 
2_kings 7:11	wayiqra hasho‘arim; wayagidu beit hamelekh penimah. 
2_kings 7:12	wayaqam hamelekh laylah, wayomer ’el ‘awadaw, ’agidah na lakhem, ’eit ’asher ‘asu lanu ’aram; yade‘u ki re‘eiwim ’anaHnu, wayeize’u min hamaHaneh leheiHaweih wehasadeh wasadeh leimor, ki yeize’u min ha‘ir wenitpeseim Hayim, we’el ha‘ir nawo. 
2_kings 7:13	waya‘an ’eHad mei‘awadaw wayomer, weyiqHu na Hamishah min hassusim hanish’arim ’asher nish’aru wah hinam, kekhal hehamon hamon yisra’eil ’asher nish’aru wah, hinam kekhal hamon yisra’eil ’asher tamu; wenishleHah wenir’eh. 
2_kings 7:14	wayiqHu shenei rekhew susim; wayishlaH hamelekh ’aHarei maHaneih ’aram leimor lekhu ure’u. 
2_kings 7:15	wayeilekhu ’aHareihem ‘ad hayardein wehineih khal haderekh, melei’ah wegadim wekheilim, ’asher hishlikhu ’aram beheiHafecam beHafecam; wayashuwu hamal’akhim, wayagidu lamelekh. 
2_kings 7:16	wayeizei ha‘am, wayawoccu ’eit maHaneih ’aram; wayhi se’ah solet besheqel, wesatayim se‘orim besheqel kidwar yhoh. 
2_kings 7:17	wehamelekh hifqid ’et hashalish ’asher nish‘an ‘al yado ‘al hasha‘ar, wayirmesuhu ha‘am basha‘ar wayamot; ka’asher diber ’ish ha’elohim, ’asher diber, beredet hamelekh ’eilaw. 
2_kings 7:18	wayhi, kedabeir ’ish ha’elohim, ’el hamelekh leimor; satayim se‘orim besheqel, use’ah solet besheqel, yihyeh ka‘eit maHar, besha‘ar shomeron. 
2_kings 7:19	waya‘an hashalish ’et ’ish ha’elohim wayomar wehineih yhoh ‘oseh ’arubot bashamayim, hayihyeh kadawar hacceh; wayomer, hinekha ro’eh be‘einekha, umisham lo tokheil. 
2_kings 7:20	wayhi lo kein; wayirmesu ’oto ha‘am basha‘ar wayamot.
2_kings 8:1	we’elisha‘ diber ’el ha’ishah ’asher heHeyah ’et benah leimor, qumi ulekhi ’ati ’at uweiteikh, weguri ba’asher taguri; ki qara yhoh lara‘aw, wegam ba ’el ha’arez shewa‘ shanim. 
2_kings 8:2	wataqam ha’ishah, wata‘as kidwar ’ish ha’elohim; wateilekh hi uweitah, watagar be’erez pelishtim shewa‘ shanim. 
2_kings 8:3	wayhi, miqzeih shewa‘ shanim, watashaw ha’ishah mei’erez pelishtim; wateizei liz‘oq ’el hamelekh, ’el beitah we’el sadah. 
2_kings 8:4	wehamelekh, medabeir ’el geiHaci, na‘ar ’ish ha’elohim leimor; saperah na li, ’eit kal hagedolot ’asher ‘asah ’elisha‘. 
2_kings 8:5	wayhi hu mesapeir lamelekh ’eit ’asher heHeyah ’et hameit wehineih ha’ishah ’asher heHeyah ’et benah zo‘eqet ’el hamelekh, ‘al beitah we‘al sadah; wayomer geiHaci ’adoni hamelekh, cot ha’ishah, weceh benah ’asher heHeyah ’elisha‘. 
2_kings 8:6	wayish’al hamelekh la’ishah watesaper lo; wayiten lah hamelekh saris ’eHad leimor, hasheiw ’et kal ’asher lah we’eit kal tewu’ot hasadeh, miyom ‘acewah ’et ha’arez we‘ad ‘atah.
2_kings 8:7	wayawo ’elisha‘ dameseq, uwen hadad melekh ’aram Holeh; wayugad lo leimor, ba ’ish ha’elohim ‘ad heinah. 
2_kings 8:8	wayomer hamelekh ’el Hacah’eil, qaH beyadekha minHah, weleikh liqrat ’ish ha’elohim; wedarashta ’et yhoh mei’oto leimor, ha’eHyeh meiHoli ceh. 
2_kings 8:9	wayeilekh Haca’eil liqrato wayiqaH minHah weyado wekhal Tuw dameseq, masa ’arba‘im gamal; wayawo waya‘amod lefanaw, wayomer, binkha wen hadad melekh ’aram shelaHani ’eilekha leimor, ha’eHyeh meiHoli ceh. 
2_kings 8:10	wayomer ’eilaw ’elisha‘, leikh ’emar lo lo Hayoh tiHyeh; wehir’ani yhoh ki mot yamut. 
2_kings 8:11	waya‘ameid ’et panaw wayasem ‘ad bosh; wayeiwek ’ish ha’elohim. 
2_kings 8:12	wayomer Haca’eil, madua‘ ’adoni wokheh; wayomer ki yada‘ti ’eit ’asher ta‘aseh liwnei yisra’eil ra‘ah, miwzereihem teshalaH ba’eish uwaHureihem baHerew taharog, we‘oleleihem teraTeish, weharoteihem tewaqeia‘. 
2_kings 8:13	wayomer Hacah’eil, ki mah ‘awdekha hakelew, ki ya‘aseh, hadawar hagadol hacceh; wayomer ’elisha‘, hir’ani yhoh ’otekha melekh ‘al ’aram. 
2_kings 8:14	wayeilekh mei’eit ’elisha‘, wayawo ’el ’adonaw, wayomer lo, mah ’amar lekha ’elisha‘; wayomer ’amar li Hayoh tiHyeh. 
2_kings 8:15	wayhi mimaHorat, wayiqaH hamakhbeir wayiTbol bamayim, wayifros ‘al panaw wayamot; wayimlokh Hacah’eil taHtaw.
2_kings 8:16	uwishnat Hameish, leyoram ben ’aH’aw melekh yisra’eil, wihoshafaT melekh yehudah; malakh yehoram ben yehoshafaT melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 8:17	ben sheloshim ushetayim shanah hayah wemalekho; ushemoneh shanah shanim, malakh birushalim. 
2_kings 8:18	wayeilekh bederekh malkhei yisra’eil, ka’asher ‘asu beit ’aH’aw, ki bat ’aH’aw, hayetah lo le’ishah; waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh. 
2_kings 8:19	welo ’awah yhoh lehashHit ’et yehudah, lema‘an dawid ‘awdo; ka’asher ’amar lo, lateit lo nir lewanaw kal hayamim. 
2_kings 8:20	beyamaw pasha‘ ’edom, mitaHat yad yehudah; wayamlikhu ‘aleihem melekh. 
2_kings 8:21	waya‘awor yoram za‘irah, wekhal harekhew ‘imo; wayhi hu qam laylah, wayakeh ’et ’edom hassoweiw ’eilaw we’eit sarei harekhew, wayanas ha‘am le’ohalaw. 
2_kings 8:22	wayifsha‘ ’edom, mitaHat yad yehudah, ‘ad hayom hacceh; ’ac tifsha‘ liwnah ba‘eit hahi. 
2_kings 8:23	weyeter diwrei yoram wekhal ’asher ‘asah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 8:24	wayishkaw yoram ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqaweir ‘im ’awotaw be‘ir dawid; wayimlokh ’aHacyahu weno taHtaw.
2_kings 8:25	bishnat sheteim ‘esreih shanah, leyoram ben ’aH’aw melekh yisra’eil; malakh ’aHacyahu wen yehoram melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 8:26	ben ‘esrim ushetayim shanah ’aHacyahu wemalekho, weshanah ’aHat, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo ‘atalyahu, bat ‘ameri melekh yisra’eil. 
2_kings 8:27	wayeilekh, bederekh beit ’aH’aw, waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh keweit ’aH’aw; ki Hatan beit ’aH’aw hu. 
2_kings 8:28	wayeilekh ’et yoram ben ’aH’aw, lamilHamah ‘im Hacah’eil melekh ’aram beramot gil‘ad; wayaku ’aramim ’et yoram. 
2_kings 8:29	wayashaw yoram hamelekh lehitrapei weyicre‘el, min hamakim ’asher yakuhu ’aramim baramah, behilaHamo, ’et Hacah’eil melekh ’aram; wa’aHacyahu wen yehoram melekh yehudah, yarad lir’ot ’et yoram ben ’aH’aw beyicre‘el ki Holeh hu.
2_kings 9:1	we’elisha‘ hanawi, qara le’aHad mibenei hanewi’im; wayomer lo Hagor matenekha, weqaH pakh hashemen hacceh beyadekha, weleikh ramot gil‘ad. 
2_kings 9:2	uwata shamah; ure’eihosha m yeihu wen yehoshafaT ben nimshi, uwata wahaqeimoto mitokh ’eHaw, weheiweita ’oto Heder beHader. 
2_kings 9:3	welaqaHta fakh hashemen weyazaqta ‘al rosho, we’amarta koh ’amar yhoh, meshaHtikha lemelekh ’el yisra’eil; ufataHta hadelet wenastah welo teHakeh. 
2_kings 9:4	wayeilekh hana‘ar hana‘ar hanawi ramot gil‘ad. 
2_kings 9:5	wayawo, wehineih sarei haHayil yoshewim, wayomer dawar li ’eilekha hasar; wayomer yeihu ’el mi mikulanu, wayomer ’eilekha hasar. 
2_kings 9:6	wayaqam wayawo habaytah, wayizoq hashemen ’el rosho; wayomer lo, koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, meshaHtikha lemelekh ’el ‘am yhoh ’el yisra’eil. 
2_kings 9:7	wehikitah, ’et beit ’aH’aw ’adonekha; weniqamti demei ‘awaday hanewi’im, udemei kal ‘awdei yhoh miyad ’icawel. 
2_kings 9:8	we’awad kal beit ’aH’aw; wehikhrati le’aH’aw mashtin beqir, we‘azur we‘acuw beyisra’eil. 
2_kings 9:9	wenatati ’et beit ’aH’aw, keweit yarawe‘am ben newaT; ukheweit ba‘sha wen ’aHiyah. 
2_kings 9:10	we’et ’icewel yokhelu hakelawim beHeileq yicre‘el we’ein qoweir; wayiftaH hadelet wayanos. 
2_kings 9:11	weyeihu, yaza ’el ‘awdei ’adonaw, wayomer lo hashalom, madua‘ ba hamshuga‘ hacceh ’eilekha; wayomer ’aleihem, ’atem yeda‘tem ’et ha’ish we’et siHo. 
2_kings 9:12	wayomeru sheqer, haged na lanu; wayomer, kacot wekhacot ’amar ’eilay leimor, koh ’amar yhoh, meshaHtikha lemelekh ’el yisra’eil. 
2_kings 9:13	waymaharu, wayiqHu ’ish bigdo, wayasimu taHtaw ’el gerem hama‘alot; wayitqe‘u bashofar, wayomeru malakh yeihu. 
2_kings 9:14	wayitqasheir, yeihu ben yehoshafaT ben nimshi ’el yoram; weyoram hayah shomeir beramot gil‘ad, hu wekhal yisra’eil, mipenei Haca’eil melekh ’aram. 
2_kings 9:15	wayashaw yehoram hamelekh lehitrapei wiycere‘el, min hamakim ’asher yakuhu ’aramim, behilaHamo, ’et Haca’eil melekh ’aram; wayomer yeihu ’im yeish nafshekhem, ’al yeizei faliT min ha‘ir, lalekhet legid lehagid beyicre‘el. 
2_kings 9:16	wayirkaw yeihu wayeilekh yicre‘elah, ki yoram shokheiw shamah; wa’aHacyah melekh yehudah, yarad lir’ot ’et yoram. 
2_kings 9:17	wehazofeh ‘omeid ‘al hamigdal beyicre‘el, wayar ’et shif‘at yeihu bewo’o, wayomer shif‘at ’ani ro’eh; wayomer yehoram, qaH rakaw ushelaH liqratam weyomar hashalom. 
2_kings 9:18	wayeilekh rokheiw hassus liqrato, wayomer koh ’amar hamelekh hashalom, wayomer yeihu mah lekha uleshalom sow ’el ’aHaray; wayageid hazofeh leimor, ba hamal’akh ‘ad heim welo shaw. 
2_kings 9:19	wayishlaH, rokheiw sus sheini wayawo ’aleihem, wayomer koh ’amar hamelekh shalom; wayomer yeihu mah lekha uleshalom sow ’el ’aHaray. 
2_kings 9:20	wayageid hazofeh leimor, ba ‘ad ’aleihem welo shaw; wehaminhag, keminhag yeihu wen nimshi, ki weshiga‘on yinhag. 
2_kings 9:21	wayomer yehoram ’esor, waye’sor rikhbo; wayeizei yehoram melekh yisra’eil wa’aHacyahu melekh yehudah ’ish berikhbo, wayeize’u liqrat yeihu, wayimza’uhu, beHelqat nawot hayicre‘eili. 
2_kings 9:22	wayhi, kir’ot yehoram ’et yeihu, wayomer hashalom yeihu; wayomer mah hashalom, ‘ad cenunei ’icewel ’imekha ukheshafeha harabim. 
2_kings 9:23	wayahafokh yehoram yadaw wayanos; wayomer ’el ’aHacyahu mirmah ’aHacyah. 
2_kings 9:24	weyeihu milei yado waqeshet, wayakh ’et yehoram bein cero‘aw, wayeizei haHeizi milibo; wayikhra‘ berikhbo. 
2_kings 9:25	wayomer, ’el bidqar sheloshah shalisho, sa hashlikheihu, beHelqat sedeih nawot hayicre‘eili; ki cekhor ’ani wa’atah, ’eit rokhewim zemadim ’aHarei ’aH’aw ’awiw, yhoh nasa ‘alaw, ’et hamasa hacceh. 
2_kings 9:26	’im lo ’et demei nawot we’et demei wanaw ra’iti ’emesh ne’um yhoh, weshilamti lekha baHelqah haccot ne’um yhoh; we‘atah, sa hashlikheihu baHelqah kidwar yhoh. 
2_kings 9:27	wa’aHacyah melekh yehudah ra’ah, wayanas derekh beit hagan; wayirdof ’aHaraw yeihu, wayomer gam ’oto hakuhu ’el hamerkawah, bema‘aleih gur ’asher ’et yiwle‘am, wayanas megido wayamat sham. 
2_kings 9:28	wayarkiwu ’oto ‘awadaw yerushalemah; wayiqberu ’oto wiqwurato ‘im ’awotaw be‘ir dawid.
2_kings 9:29	uwishnat ’aHat ‘esreih shanah, leyoram ben ’aH’aw; malakh ’aHacyah ‘al yehudah. 
2_kings 9:30	wayawo yeihu yicre‘elah; we’icewel shame‘ah, watasem bapukh ‘eineha wateiTew ’et roshah, watashqeif be‘ad haHalon. 
2_kings 9:31	weyeihu ba washa‘ar; watomer hashalom, cimri horeig ’adonaw. 
2_kings 9:32	wayisa fanaw ’el haHalon, wayomer mi ’iti mi; wayashqifu ’eilaw, shenayim sheloshah sarisim. 
2_kings 9:33	wayomer shimTuhu shimTuha wayishmeTuha; wayic midamah ’el haqir we’el hassusim wayirmesenah. 
2_kings 9:34	wayawo wayokhal wayeishet; wayomer, piqdu na ’et ha’arurah haccot weqiwruha, ki wat melekh hi. 
2_kings 9:35	wayeilekhu leqawerah; welo maze’u wah, ki ’im hagulgolet weharaglayim wekhapot hayadayim. 
2_kings 9:36	wayashuwu wayagidu lo wayomer dewar yhoh hu, ’asher diber, beyad ‘awdo ’eiliyahu hatishbi leimor; beHeileq yicre‘el, yokhelu hakelawim ’et besar ’icawel.
