2_kings 9:37	wehayat wehayetah niwlat ’icewel, kedomen ‘al penei hasadeh beHeileq yicre‘el; ’asher lo yomeru cot ’icawel.
2_kings 10:1	ule’aH’aw shiw‘im banim beshomeron; wayikhtow yeihu sefarim wayishlaH shomeron, ’el sarei yicre‘el hacceqeinim, we’el ha’omenim ’aH’aw leimor. 
2_kings 10:2	we‘atah, kewo hasseifer hacceh ’aleikhem, we’itekhem benei ’adoneikhem; we’itekhem harekhew wehassusim, we‘ir miwzar wehanasheq. 
2_kings 10:3	ure’item haTow wehayashar mibenei ’adoneikhem, wesamtem ‘al kissei ’awiw; wehilaHamu ‘al beit ’adoneikhem. 
2_kings 10:4	wayir’u me’od me’od, wayomeru, hineih shenei hamelakhim, lo ‘amedu lefanaw; we’eikh na‘amod ’anaHenu. 
2_kings 10:5	wayishlaH ’asher ‘al habayit wa’asher ‘al ha‘ir wehacceqeinim weha’omenim ’el yeihu leimor ‘awadekha ’anaHnu, wekhol ’asher tomar ’eileinu na‘aseh; lo namlikh ’ish, haTow be‘einekha ‘aseih. 
2_kings 10:6	wayikhtow ’aleihem seifer sheinit leimor, ’im li ’atem uleqoli ’atem shome‘im, qeHu ’et rashei ’anshei wenei ’adoneikhem, uwo’u ’eilay ka‘eit maHar yicre‘elah; uwenei hamelekh shiw‘im ’ish, ’et gedolei ha‘ir megadelim ’otam. 
2_kings 10:7	wayhi, kewo hasseifer ’aleihem, wayiqHu ’et benei hamelekh, wayishHaTu shiw‘im ’ish; wayasimu ’et rasheihem badudim, wayishleHu ’eilaw yicre‘elah. 
2_kings 10:8	wayawo hamal’akh wayaged lo leimor, heiwi’u rashei wenei hamelekh; wayomer, simu ’otam shenei ziburim petaH hasha‘ar ‘ad haboqer. 
2_kings 10:9	wayhi waboqer wayeizei waya‘amod, wayomer ’el kal ha‘am, zadiqim ’atem; hineih ’ani qasharti ‘al ’adoni wa’ehregeihu, umi hikah ’et kal ’eileh. 
2_kings 10:10	de‘u ’eifo, ki lo yipol midewar yhoh ’arzah, ’asher diber yhoh ‘al beit ’aH’aw; yhoh ‘asah, ’eit ’asher diber, beyad ‘awdo ’eiliyahu. 
2_kings 10:11	wayakh yeihu, ’eit kal hanish’arim leweit ’aH’aw beyicre‘el, wekhal gedolaw umeyuda‘aw wekhohanaw; ‘ad bilti hish’ir lo sarid. 
2_kings 10:12	wayaqam wayawo, wayeilekh shomeron; hu beit ‘eiqed haro‘im badarekh. 
2_kings 10:13	weyeihu, maza ’et ’aHei ’aHacyahu melekh yehudah, wayomer mi ’atem; wayomeru, ’aHei ’aHacyahu ’anaHnu, waneired lishlom benei hamelekh uwenei hagewirah. 
2_kings 10:14	wayomer tifsum Hayim, wayitpesum Hayim; wayishHaTum ’el bor beit ‘eiqed, ’arba‘im ushenayim ’ish, welo hish’ir ’ish meihem.
2_kings 10:15	wayeilekh misham wayimza ’et yehonadaw ben reikhaw liqrato waywarekheihu, wayomer ’eilaw hayeish ’et lewawekha yashar, ka’asher lewawi ‘im lewawekha, wayomer yehonadaw yeish wayeish tenah ’et yadekha; wayitein yado, waya‘aleihu ’eilaw ’el hamerkawah. 
2_kings 10:16	wayomer lekhah ’iti, ure’eih beqin’ati yhoh; wayarkiwu ’oto berikhbo. 
2_kings 10:17	wayawo shomeron, wayakh ’et kal hanish’arim le’aH’aw beshomeron ‘ad hishmido; kidwar yhoh, ’asher diber ’el ’eiliyahu.
2_kings 10:18	wayiqboz yeihu ’et kal ha‘am, wayomer ’aleihem, ’aH’aw ‘awad ’et haba‘al me‘aT; yeihu ya‘awdenu harbeih. 
2_kings 10:19	we‘atah khal newi’ei haba‘al kal ‘owedaw wekhal kohanaw qir’u ’eilay ’ish ’al yipaqeid, ki cewaH gadol li laba‘al, kol ’asher yipaqeid lo yiHyeh; weyeihu ‘asah we‘aqebah, lema‘an ha’awid ’et ‘owedei haba‘al. 
2_kings 10:20	wayomer yeihu, qadeshu ‘azarah laba‘al wayiqra’u. 
2_kings 10:21	wayishlaH yeihu bekhal yisra’eil, wayawo’u kal ‘owedei haba‘al, welo nish’ar ’ish ’asher lo wa; wayawo’u beit haba‘al, wayimalei weit haba‘al peh lafeh. 
2_kings 10:22	wayomer, la’asher ‘al hameltaHah, hozei lewush, lekhol ‘owedei haba‘al; wayozei lahem hamalbush. 
2_kings 10:23	wayawo yeihu wihonadaw ben reikhaw beit haba‘al; wayomer le‘owedei haba‘al, Hapesu ure’u pen yesh poh ‘imakhem mei‘awdei yhoh, ki ’im ‘owedei haba‘al lewadam. 
2_kings 10:24	wayawo’u la‘asot cewaHim we‘olot; weyeihu sam lo waHuz shemonim ’ish, wayomer, ha’ish ’asher yimaleiT min ha’anashim, ’asher ’ani meiwi ‘al yedeikhem, nafsho taHat nafsho. 
2_kings 10:25	wayhi kekhaloto la‘asot ha‘olah, wayomer yeihu larazim welashalishim bo’u hakum ’ish ’al yeizei, wayakum lefi Harew; wayashlikhu, harazim wehashalishim, wayeilekhu ‘ad ‘ir beit haba‘al. 
2_kings 10:26	wayozi’u ’et mazewot beit haba‘al wayisrefuha. 
2_kings 10:27	wayitezu, ’eit mazewat haba‘al; wayitezu ’et beit haba‘al, waysimuhu lemaHara’ot lemoza’ot ‘ad hayom. 
2_kings 10:28	wayashmeid yeihu ’et haba‘al miyisra’eil. 
2_kings 10:29	raq HaTa’ei yarawe‘am ben newaT ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil, lo sar yeihu mei’aHareihem; ‘eglei haccahaw, ’asher beit ’eil wa’asher bedan.
2_kings 10:30	wayomer yhoh ’el yeihu, ya‘an ’asher heTiwota la‘asot hayashar be‘einay, kekhol ’asher bilwawi, ‘asita leweit ’aH’aw; benei rewi‘im, yeishewu lekha ‘al kissei yisra’eil. 
2_kings 10:31	weyeihu, lo shamar lalekhet betorat yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil bekhal lewawo; lo sar, mei‘al HaTot yarawe‘am, ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil. 
2_kings 10:32	bayamim haheim, heiHeil yhoh, leqazot beyisra’eil; wayakeim Haca’eil bekhal gewul yisra’eil. 
2_kings 10:33	min hayardein micraH hashemesh, ’eit kal ’erez hagil‘ad, hagadi weharuwweini wehamnashi; mei‘aro‘eir ’asher ‘al naHal ’arnon, wehagil‘ad wehabashan. 
2_kings 10:34	weyeter diwrei yeihu wekhal ’asher ‘asah wekhal gewurato; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil. 
2_kings 10:35	wayishkaw yeihu ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqberu ’oto beshomeron; wayimlokh yeho’aHac beno taHtaw. 
2_kings 10:36	wehayamim, ’asher malakh yeihu ‘al yisra’eil, ‘esrim ushemoneh shanah beshomeron.
2_kings 11:1	wa‘atalyah ’eim ’aHacyahu, ura’atah ra’atah ki meit benah; wataqam wate’abeid, ’eit kal cera‘ hamamlakhah. 
2_kings 11:2	watiqaH yehoshewa‘ bat hamelekh yoram ’aHot ’aHacyahu ’et yo’ash ben ’aHacyah, watignow ’oto mitokh benei hamelekh hamamottim hamumatim, ’oto we’et meiniqto baHadar hamiTot; wayastiru ’oto mipenei ‘atalyahu welo humat. 
2_kings 11:3	wayhi ’itah beit yhoh, mitHabei sheish shanim; wa‘atalyah molekhet ‘al ha’arez.
2_kings 11:4	uwashanah hashewi‘it shalaH yehoyada‘ wayiqaH ’et sarei hameiyot hamei’ot, lakari welarazim, wayawei ’otam ’eilaw beit yhoh; wayikhrot lahem berit wayashba‘ ’otam beweit yhoh, wayar ’otam ’et ben hamelekh. 
2_kings 11:5	wayzawweim leimor, ceh hadawar ’asher ta‘asun; hashelishit mikem ba’ei hashabat, weshomerei, mishmeret beit hamelekh. 
2_kings 11:6	wehashelishit besha‘ar sur, wehashelishit basha‘ar ’aHar harazim; ushemartem ’et mishmeret habayit massaH. 
2_kings 11:7	ushetei hayadot bakhem, kol yoze’ei hashabat; weshameru ’et mishmeret beit yhoh ’el hamelekh. 
2_kings 11:8	wehiqaftem ‘al hamelekh sawiw, ’ish wekheilaw beyado, wehaba ’el hasedeirot yumat; wihyu ’et hamelekh bezeito uwewo’o. 
2_kings 11:9	waya‘asu sarei hameiyot hamei’ot, kekhol ’asher ziwwah yehoyada‘ hakohein wayiqHu ’ish ’et ’anashaw, ba’ei hashabat, ‘im yoze’ei hashabat; wayawo’u ’el yehoyada‘ hakohein. 
2_kings 11:10	wayitein hakohein lesarei hameiyot hamei’ot, ’et haHanit we’et hashelaTim, ’asher lamelekh dawid; ’asher beweit yhoh. 
2_kings 11:11	waya‘amdu harazim ’ish wekheilaw beyado, miketef habayit haymanit ‘ad ketef habayit hasemalit, lamicbeiaH welabayit; ‘al hamelekh sawiw. 
2_kings 11:12	wayozi ’et ben hamelekh, wayitein ‘alaw ’et haneicer we’et ha‘eidut, wayamlikhu ’oto wayimshaHuhu; wayaku khaf, wayomeru yeHi hamelekh.
2_kings 11:13	watishma‘ ‘atalyah, ’et qol harazin ha‘am; watawo ’el ha‘am beit yhoh. 
2_kings 11:14	wateire wehineih hamelekh ‘omeid ‘al ha‘amud kamishpaT, wehasarim wehaHazozerot ’el hamelekh, wekhal ‘am ha’arez sameiaH, wetoqeia‘ baHazozerot; watiqra‘ ‘atalyah ’et begadeha, watiqra qesher qasher.
2_kings 11:15	wayzaw yehoyada‘ hakohein ’et sarei hamei’ot hamei’ot pequdei haHayil, wayomer ’aleihem hozi’u ’otah ’el mibeit lasedeirot, wehaba ’aHareha hameit beHarew; ki ’amar hakohein, ’al tumat beit yhoh. 
2_kings 11:16	wayasimu lah yadayim, watawo derekh mewo hassusim beit hamelekh; watumat sham.
2_kings 11:17	wayikhrot yehoyada‘ ’et haberit, bein yhoh uwein hamelekh uwein ha‘am, lihyot le‘am yhoh; uwein hamelekh uwein ha‘am. 
2_kings 11:18	wayawo’u khal ‘am ha’arez beit haba‘al wayitezuhu, ’et micbeHoto micbeHotaw we’et zelamaw shiberu heiTeiw, we’eit, matan kohein haba‘al, haregu lifnei hamicbeHot; wayasem hakohein pequdot ‘al beit yhoh. 
2_kings 11:19	wayiqaH ’et sarei hamei’ot we’et hakari we’et harazim we’eit kal ‘am ha’arez, wayoridu ’et hamelekh mibeit yhoh, wayawo’u derekh sha‘ar harazim beit hamelekh; wayeishew ‘al kissei hamelakhim. 
2_kings 11:20	wayismaH kal ‘am ha’arez weha‘ir shaqaTah; we’et ‘atalyahu heimitu waHerew beit melekh hamelekh.
2_kings 11:21	ben shewa‘ shanim yeho’ash bemalekho.
2_kings 12:1	bishnat shewa‘ leyeihu malakh yeho’ash, we’arba‘im shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, ziwyah mibe’eir shawa‘. 
2_kings 12:2	waya‘as yeho’ash hayashar be‘einei yhoh kal yamaw; ’asher horahu, yehoyada‘ hakohein. 
2_kings 12:3	raq habamot lo saru; ‘od ha‘am mecabeHim umeqaTerim babamot. 
2_kings 12:4	wayomer yeho’ash ’el hakohanim, kol kesef haqodashim ’asher yuwa weit yhoh kesef ‘oweir, ’ish kesef nafshot ‘erko; kal kesef, ’asher ya‘aleh ‘al lew ’ish, lehawi beit yhoh. 
2_kings 12:5	yiqHu lahem hakohanim, ’ish mei’eit makaro; weheim, yeHaccequ ’et bedeq habayit, lekhol ’asher yimazei sham badeq.
2_kings 12:6	wayhi, bishnat ‘esrim weshalosh shanah lamelekh yeho’ash; lo Hiccequ hakohanim ’et bedeq habayit. 
2_kings 12:7	wayiqra hamelekh yeho’ash lihoyada‘ hakohein welakohanim, wayomer ’aleihem, madua‘ ’einekhem meHacceqim ’et bedeq habayit; we‘atah, ’al tiqHu khesef mei’eit makareikhem, ki lewedeq habayit titenuhu. 
2_kings 12:8	wayei’otu hakohanim; lewilti qeHat kesef mei’eit ha‘am, ulewilti Hacceiq ’et bedeq habayit. 
2_kings 12:9	wayiqaH yehoyada‘ hakohein ’aron ’eHad, wayiqow Hor bedalto; wayitein ’oto ’eizel hamicbeiaH bayamin miyamin, bewo ’ish beit yhoh, wenatenu shamah hakohanim shomerei hassaf, ’et kal hakesef hamuwa weit yhoh. 
2_kings 12:10	wayhi kir’otam, ki raw hakesef ba’aron; waya‘al sofeir hamelekh wehakohein hagadol, wayazuru wayimnu, ’et hakesef hanimza weit yhoh. 
2_kings 12:11	wenatenu ’et hakesef hamtukan, ‘al yad yedei ‘osei hamelakhah, hapequdim hamufqadim beit yhoh; wayozi’uhu leHarashei ha‘eiz welabonim, ha‘osim beit yhoh. 
2_kings 12:12	welagoderim uleHozewei ha’ewen, weliqnot ‘eizim we’awnei maHzeiw, leHacceiq ’et bedeq beit yhoh; ulekhol ’asher yeizei ‘al habayit leHaceqah. 
2_kings 12:13	’akh lo yei‘aseh beit yhoh sipot kesef mecamerot micraqot Hazozerot, kal keli cahaw ukheli khasef; min hakesef hamuwa weit yhoh. 
2_kings 12:14	ki le‘osei hamelakhah yitenuhu; weHiccequ wo ’et beit yhoh. 
2_kings 12:15	welo yeHashewu ’et ha’anashim, ’asher yitenu ’et hakesef ‘al yadam, lateit le‘osei hamelakhah; ki we’emunah heim ‘osim. 
2_kings 12:16	kesef ’asham wekhesef HaTa’ot, lo yuwa beit yhoh; lakohanim yihyu.
2_kings 12:17	’ac ya‘aleh, Haca’eil melekh ’aram, wayilaHem ‘al gat wayilkedah; wayasem Haca’eil panaw, la‘alot ‘al yerushalim. 
2_kings 12:18	wayiqaH yeho’ash melekh yehudah, ’eit kal haqodashim ’asher hiqdishu yehoshafaT wihoram wa’aHacyahu ’awotaw malkhei yehudah we’et qodashaw, we’eit kal haccahaw, hanimza be’ozerot beit yhoh uweit hamelekh; wayishlaH, laHaca’eil melekh ’aram, waya‘al mei‘al yerushalim. 
2_kings 12:19	weyeter diwrei yo’ash wekhal ’asher ‘asah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 12:20	wayaqumu ‘awadaw wayiqsheru qasher; wayaku ’et yo’ash, beit milo hayoreid sila. 
2_kings 12:21	weyocawad benoshi me‘at wihocawad ben shomeir ‘awadaw hikuhu wayamot, wayiqberu ’oto ‘im ’awotaw be‘ir dawid; wayimlokh ’amazyah weno taHtaw.
2_kings 13:1	bishnat ‘esrim weshalosh shanah, leyo’ash ben ’aHacyahu melekh yehudah; malakh yeho’aHac ben yeihu ‘al yisra’eil beshomeron, shewa‘ ‘esreih shanah. 
2_kings 13:2	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; wayeilekh ’aHar HaTot yarawe‘am ben newaT ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil lo sar mimenah. 
2_kings 13:3	wayiHar ’af yhoh beyisra’eil; wayiteneim beyad Haca’eil melekh ’aram, uweyad ben hadad ben Haca’eil kal hayamim. 
2_kings 13:4	wayHal yeho’aHac ’et penei yhoh; wayishma‘ ’eilaw yhoh, ki ra’ah ’et laHaz yisra’eil, ki laHaz ’otam melekh ’aram. 
2_kings 13:5	wayitein yhoh leyisra’eil moshia‘, wayeize’u, mitaHat yad ’aram; wayeishewu wenei yisra’eil be’aholeihem kitmol shilshom. 
2_kings 13:6	’akh lo saru meiHaTot beit yarawe‘am ’asher heHeTi heHeTi ’et yisra’eil bah halakh; wegam ha’asheirah, ‘amedah beshomeron. 
2_kings 13:7	ki lo hish’ir liho’aHac ‘am, ki ’im Hamishim parashim wa‘asarah rekhew, wa‘aseret ’alafim ragli; ki ’ibedam melekh ’aram, waysimeim ke‘afar ladush. 
2_kings 13:8	weyeter diwrei yeho’aHac wekhal ’asher ‘asah ugewurato; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil. 
2_kings 13:9	wayishkaw yeho’aHac ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqberuhu beshomeron; wayimlokh yo’ash beno taHtaw.
2_kings 13:10	bishnat sheloshim washewa‘ shanah, leyo’ash melekh yehudah; malakh yeho’ash ben yeho’aHac ‘al yisra’eil beshomeron, sheish ‘esreih shanah. 
2_kings 13:11	waya‘aseh hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; lo sar, mikal HaTot yarawe‘am ben newaT ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil bah halakh. 
2_kings 13:12	weyeter diwrei yo’ash wekhal ’asher ‘asah, ugewurato, ’asher nilHam, ‘im ’amazyah melekh yehudah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil. 
2_kings 13:13	wayishkaw yo’ash ‘im ’awotaw, weyarawe‘am yashaw ‘al kis’o; wayiqaweir yo’ash beshomeron, ‘im malkhei yisra’eil.
2_kings 13:14	we’elisha‘ Halah ’et Haleyo, ’asher yamut bo; wayeired ’eilaw yo’ash melekh yisra’eil, wayeiwek ‘al panaw wayomar, ’awi ’awi, rekhew yisra’eil ufarashaw. 
2_kings 13:15	wayomer lo ’elisha‘, qaH qeshet weHizim; wayiqaH ’eilaw qeshet weHizim. 
2_kings 13:16	wayomer lemelekh yisra’eil, harkeiw yadekha ‘al haqeshet, wayarkeiw yado; wayasem ’elisha‘ yadaw ‘al yedei hamelekh. 
2_kings 13:17	wayomer, petaH haHalon qeidemah wayiftaH; wayomer ’elisha‘ yereih wayor, wayomer, Heiz teshu‘ah yhoh weHeiz teshu‘ah wa’aram, wehikita ’et ’aram ba’afeiq ‘ad kaleih. 
2_kings 13:18	wayomer qaH haHizim wayiqaH; wayomer lemelekh yisra’eil hakh ’arzah, wayakh shalosh pe‘amim waya‘amod. 
2_kings 13:19	wayiqzof ‘alaw ’ish ha’elohim, wayomer lehakot Hameish ’o sheish pe‘amim, ’ac hikita ’et ’aram ‘ad kaleih; we‘atah shalosh pe‘amim takeh ’et ’aram.
2_kings 13:20	wayamat ’elisha‘ wayiqberuhu; ugedudei mo’aw yawo’u wa’arez ba shanah. 
2_kings 13:21	wayhi heim qowerim ’ish, wehineih ra’u ’et hagedud, wayashlikhu ’et ha’ish beqewer ’elisha‘; wayeilekh wayiga‘ ha’ish be‘azmot ’elisha‘, wayHi wayaqam ‘al raglaw.
2_kings 13:22	waHaca’eil melekh ’aram, laHaz ’et yisra’eil; kol yemei yeho’aHac. 
2_kings 13:23	wayaHan yhoh ’otam wayraHameim wayifen ’aleihem, lema‘an berito, ’et ’awraham yizHaq weya‘aqow; welo ’awah hashHitam, welo hishlikham mei‘al panaw ‘ad ‘atah. 
2_kings 13:24	wayamat Haca’eil melekh ’aram; wayimlokh ben hadad beno taHtaw. 
2_kings 13:25	wayashaw yeho’ash ben yeho’aHac, wayiqaH ’et he‘arim miyad ben hadad ben Haca’eil, ’asher laqaH, miyad yeho’aHac ’awiw bamilHamah; shalosh pe‘amim hikahu yo’ash, wayashew ’et ‘arei yisra’eil.
2_kings 14:1	bishnat shetayim, leyo’ash ben yo’aHac melekh yisra’eil; malakh ’amazyahu wen yo’ash melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 14:2	ben ‘esrim weHameish shanah hayah wemalekho, we‘esrim wateisha‘ shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, yeho‘adin yeho‘adan min yerushalim. 
2_kings 14:3	waya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh, raq lo kedawid ’awiw; kekhol ’asher ‘asah yo’ash ’awiw ‘asah. 
2_kings 14:4	raq habamot lo saru; ‘od ha‘am mecabeHim umeqaTerim babamot. 
2_kings 14:5	wayhi ka’asher Haceqah hamamlakhah beyado; wayakh ’et ‘awadaw, hamakim ’et hamelekh ’awiw. 
2_kings 14:6	we’et benei hamakim lo heimit; kakatuw beseifer torat mosheh ’asher ziwwah yhoh leimor, lo yumetu ’awot ‘al banim uwanim lo yumetu ‘al ’awot, ki ’im ’ish beHeT’o yamut yumat. 
2_kings 14:7	hu hikah ’et ’edom begei hamelaH melaH ‘aseret ’alafim, wetafas ’et hassela‘ bamilHamah; wayiqra ’et shemah yaqete’eil, ‘ad hayom hacceh.
2_kings 14:8	’ac shalaH ’amazyah mal’akhim, ’el yeho’ash ben yeho’aHac ben yeihu melekh yisra’eil leimor; lekhah nitra’eh fanim. 
2_kings 14:9	wayishlaH yeho’ash melekh yisra’eil, ’el ’amazyahu melekh yehudah leimor haHoaH ’asher balewanon, laH ’el ha’erec ’asher balewanon leimor, tenah ’et bitekha liwni le’ishah; wata‘awor Hayat hasadeh ’asher balewanon, watirmos ’et haHoaH. 
2_kings 14:10	hakeih hikita ’et ’edom, unesa’akha libekha; hikaweid wesheiw beweitekha, welamah titgareh bera‘ah, wenafaltah, ’atah wihudah ‘imakh. 
2_kings 14:11	welo shama‘ ’amazyahu, waya‘al yeho’ash melekh yisra’eil wayitra’u fanim, hu wa’amazyahu melekh yehudah; beweit shemesh ’asher lihudah. 
2_kings 14:12	wayinagef yehudah lifnei yisra’eil; wayanusu ’ish le’aholo le’ohalaw. 
2_kings 14:13	we’eit ’amazyahu melekh yehudah ben yeho’ash ben ’aHacyahu, tafas yeho’ash melekh yisra’eil beweit shamesh; wayawo’u wayawo yerushalim, wayifroz beHomat yerushalim besha‘ar ’efrayim ‘ad sha‘ar hapinah, ’arba‘ mei’ot ’amah. 
2_kings 14:14	welaqaH ’et kal haccahaw wehakesef we’eit kal hakeilim hanimze’im beit yhoh uwe’ozerot beit hamelekh, we’eit benei hata‘aruwot; wayashaw shomeronah. 
2_kings 14:15	weyeter diwrei yeho’ash ’asher ‘asah ugewurato, wa’asher nilHam, ‘im ’amazyahu melekh yehudah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil. 
2_kings 14:16	wayishkaw yeho’ash ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqaweir beshomeron, ‘im malkhei yisra’eil; wayimlokh yarawe‘am beno taHtaw.
2_kings 14:17	wayHi ’amazyahu wen yo’ash melekh yehudah, ’aHarei mot, yeho’ash ben yeho’aHac melekh yisra’eil; Hameish ‘esreih shanah. 
2_kings 14:18	weyeter diwrei ’amazyahu; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 14:19	wayiqsheru ‘alaw qesher birushalim wayanas lakhishah; wayishleHu ’aHaraw lakhishah, waymituhu sham. 
2_kings 14:20	wayis’u ’oto ‘al hassusim; wayiqaweir birushalim ‘im ’awotaw be‘ir dawid. 
2_kings 14:21	wayiqHu kal ‘am yehudah ’et ‘acaryah, wehu ben sheish ‘esreih shanah; wayamlikhu ’oto, taHat ’awiw ’amazyahu. 
2_kings 14:22	hu banah ’et ’eilat, wayshiweha lihudah; ’aHarei shekhaw hamelekh ‘im ’awotaw.
2_kings 14:23	bishnat Hameish ‘esreih shanah, la’amazyahu wen yo’ash melekh yehudah; malakh yarawe‘am ben yo’ash melekh yisra’eil beshomeron, ’arba‘im we’aHat shanah. 
2_kings 14:24	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; lo sar, mikal HaTot yarawe‘am ben newaT, ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil. 
2_kings 14:25	hu, heishiw ’et gewul yisra’eil, milewo Hamat ‘ad yam ha‘arawah; kidwar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’asher diber, beyad ‘awdo yonah wen ’amitay hanawi, ’asher migat haHeifer. 
2_kings 14:26	ki ra’ah yhoh ’et ‘oni yisra’eil moreh me’od; we’efes ‘azur we’efes ‘acuw, we’ein ‘oceir leyisra’eil. 
2_kings 14:27	welo diber yhoh, limHot ’et sheim yisra’eil, mitaHat hashamayim; wayoshi‘eim, beyad yarawe‘am ben yo’ash. 
2_kings 14:28	weyeter diwrei yarawe‘am wekhal ’asher ‘asah ugewurato ’asher nilHam, wa’asher heishiw ’et dameseq we’et Hamat lihudah beyisra’eil; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil. 
2_kings 14:29	wayishkaw yarawe‘am ‘im ’awotaw, ‘im malkhei yisra’eil; wayimlokh cekharyah weno taHtaw.
2_kings 15:1	bishnat ‘esrim washewa‘ shanah, leyarawe‘am melekh yisra’eil; malakh ‘acaryah wen ’amazyah melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 15:2	ben sheish ‘esreih shanah hayah wemalekho, waHamishim ushetayim shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, yekhaleyahu mirushalim. 
2_kings 15:3	waya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh; kekhol ’asher ‘asah ’amazyahu ’awiw. 
2_kings 15:4	raq habamot lo saru; ‘od ha‘am mecabeHim umeqaTerim babamot. 
2_kings 15:5	waynaga‘ yhoh ’et hamelekh, wayhi mezora‘ ‘ad yom moto, wayeishew beweit haHafeshit; weyotam ben hamelekh ‘al habayit, shofeiT ’et ‘am ha’arez. 
2_kings 15:6	weyeter diwrei ‘acaryahu wekhal ’asher ‘asah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 15:7	wayishkaw ‘acaryah ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqberu ’oto ‘im ’awotaw be‘ir dawid; wayimlokh yotam beno taHtaw.
2_kings 15:8	bishnat sheloshim ushemoneh shanah, la‘acaryahu melekh yehudah; malakh cekharyahu wen yarawe‘am ‘al yisra’eil beshomeron shishah Hodashim. 
2_kings 15:9	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh, ka’asher ‘asu ’awotaw; lo sar, meiHaTot yarawe‘am ben newaT, ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil. 
2_kings 15:10	wayiqshor ‘alaw shalum ben yaweish, wayakeihu qawale‘am ‘am waymiteihu; wayimlokh taHtaw. 
2_kings 15:11	weyeter diwrei cekharyah; hinam ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil. 
2_kings 15:12	hu dewar yhoh ’asher diber ’el yeihu leimor, benei rewi‘im, yeishewu lekha ‘al kissei yisra’eil; wayhi khein.
2_kings 15:13	shalum ben yaweish malakh, bishnat sheloshim wateisha‘ shanah, le‘uciyah melekh yehudah; wayimlokh yeraH yamim beshomeron. 
2_kings 15:14	waya‘al menaHeim ben gadi mitirzah, wayawo shomeron, wayakh ’et shalum ben yaweish beshomeron; waymiteihu wayimlokh taHtaw. 
2_kings 15:15	weyeter diwrei shalum, weqishro ’asher qashar; hinam ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil.
2_kings 15:16	’ac yakeh menaHeim ’et tifsaH we’et kal ’asher bah we’et gewuleha mitirzah, ki lo fataH wayakh; ’eit kal heharoteha biqeia‘.
2_kings 15:17	bishnat sheloshim wateisha‘ shanah, la‘acaryah melekh yehudah; malakh menaHeim ben gadi ‘al yisra’eil ‘eser shanim beshomeron. 
2_kings 15:18	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; lo sar mei‘al HaTot yarawe‘am ben newaT ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil kal yamaw. 
2_kings 15:19	ba ful melekh ’ashur ‘al ha’arez, wayitein menaHeim leful, ’elef kikar kasef; lihyot yadaw ’ito, lehaHaciq hamamlakhah beyado. 
2_kings 15:20	wayozei menaHeim ’et hakesef ‘al yisra’eil, ‘al kal giborei haHayil, lateit lemelekh ’ashur, Hamishim sheqalim kesef le’ish ’eHad; wayashaw melekh ’ashur, welo ‘amad sham ba’arez. 
2_kings 15:21	weyeter diwrei menaHeim wekhal ’asher ‘asah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil. 
2_kings 15:22	wayishkaw menaHeim ‘im ’awotaw; wayimlokh peqaHyah weno taHtaw.
2_kings 15:23	bishnat Hamishim shanah, la‘acaryah melekh yehudah; malakh peqaHyah wen menaHeim ‘al yisra’eil beshomeron shenatayim. 
2_kings 15:24	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; lo sar, meiHaTot yarawe‘am ben newaT, ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil. 
2_kings 15:25	wayiqshor ‘alaw peqaH ben remalyahu shalisho, wayakeihu weshomeron be’armon beit melekh hamelekh ’et ’argow we’et ha’aryeih, we‘imo Hamishim ’ish mibenei gil‘adim; waymiteihu wayimlokh taHtaw. 
2_kings 15:26	weyeter diwrei feqaHyah wekhal ’asher ‘asah; hinam ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil.
2_kings 15:27	bishnat Hamishim ushetayim shanah, la‘acaryah melekh yehudah; malakh peqaH ben remalyahu ‘al yisra’eil beshomeron ‘esrim shanah. 
2_kings 15:28	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; lo sar, min HaTot yarawe‘am ben newaT, ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil. 
2_kings 15:29	bimei peqaH melekh yisra’eil, ba tiglat pil’eser melekh ’ashur wayiqaH ’et ‘iyon we’et ’aweil beit ma‘akhah we’et yanoaH we’et qedesh we’et Hazor we’et hagil‘ad we’et hagalilah, kol ’erez naftali; wayagleim ’ashurah. 
2_kings 15:30	wayiqshar qesher hosheia‘ ben ’eilah, ‘al peqaH ben remalyahu, wayakeihu waymiteihu, wayimlokh taHtaw; bishnat ‘esrim, leyotam ben ‘uciyah. 
2_kings 15:31	weyeter diwrei feqaH wekhal ’asher ‘asah; hinam ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yisra’eil.
2_kings 15:32	bishnat shetayim, lefeqaH ben remalyahu melekh yisra’eil; malakh yotam ben ‘uciyahu melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 15:33	ben ‘esrim weHameish shanah hayah wemalekho, wesheish ‘esreih shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, yerusha bat zadoq. 
2_kings 15:34	waya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh; kekhol ’asher ‘asah ‘uciyahu ’awiw ‘asah. 
2_kings 15:35	raq habamot lo saru, ‘od, ha‘am mecabeHim umeqaTerim babamot; hu, banah ’et sha‘ar beit yhoh ha‘elyon. 
2_kings 15:36	weyeter diwrei yotam ’asher ‘asah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 15:37	bayamim haheim, heiHeil yhoh lehashliaH bihudah, rezin melekh ’aram; we’eit peqaH ben remalyahu. 
2_kings 15:38	wayishkaw yotam ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqaweir ‘im ’awotaw, be‘ir dawid ’awiw; wayimlokh ’aHac beno taHtaw.
2_kings 16:1	bishnat shewa‘ ‘esreih shanah, lefeqaH ben remalyahu; malakh ’aHac ben yotam melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 16:2	ben ‘esrim shanah ’aHac bemalekho, wesheish ‘esreih shanah, malakh birushalim; welo ‘asah hayashar, be‘einei yhoh ’elohaw kedawid ’awiw. 
2_kings 16:3	wayeilekh bederekh malkhei yisra’eil; wegam ’et beno he‘ewir ba’eish, keto‘awot hagoyim, ’asher horish yhoh ’otam, mipenei benei yisra’eil. 
2_kings 16:4	waycabeiaH wayqaTeir babamot we‘al hagewa‘ot; wetaHat kal ‘eiz ra‘anan. 
2_kings 16:5	’ac ya‘aleh rezin melekh ’aram ufeqaH ben remalyahu melekh yisra’eil yerushalim lamilHamah; wayazuru ‘al ’aHac, welo yakhelu lehilaHeim. 
2_kings 16:6	ba‘eit hahi, heishiw rezin melekh ’aram ’et ’eilat la’aram, waynasheil ’et hayhudim mei’eilot; wa’aramim wa’adomim ba’u ’eilat, wayeishewu sham, ‘ad hayom hacceh.
2_kings 16:7	wayishlaH ’aHac mal’akhim, ’el tiglat peleser melekh ’ashur leimor, ‘awdekha uwinkha ’ani; ‘aleih wehoshi‘eini mikaf melekh ’aram, umikaf melekh yisra’eil, haqomim ‘alay. 
2_kings 16:8	wayiqaH ’aHac ’et hakesef we’et haccahaw, hanimza beit yhoh, uwe’ozerot beit hamelekh; wayishlaH lemelekh ’ashur shoHad. 
2_kings 16:9	wayishma‘ ’eilaw melekh ’ashur, waya‘al melekh ’ashur ’el dameseq wayitpeseha, wayagleha qirah; we’et rezin heimit. 
2_kings 16:10	wayeilekh hamelekh ’aHac liqrat tiglat pil’eser melekh ’ashur dumeseq, wayar ’et hamicbeiaH ’asher bedamaseq; wayishlaH hamelekh ’aHac ’el ’uriyah hakohein, ’et demut hamicbeiaH we’et tawnito lekhal ma‘aseihu. 
2_kings 16:11	wayiwen ’uriyah hakohein ’et hamicbeiaH; kekhol ’asher shalaH hamelekh ’aHac midameseq, kein ‘asah ’uriyah hakohein, ‘ad bo hamelekh ’aHac midamaseq. 
2_kings 16:12	wayawo hamelekh midameseq, wayar hamelekh ’et hamicbeiaH; wayiqraw hamelekh ‘al hamicbeiaH waya‘al ‘alaw. 
2_kings 16:13	wayaqTeir ’et ‘olato we’et minHato, wayasseikh ’et nisko; wayicroq ’et dam hashelamim ’asher lo ‘al hamicbeiaH. 
2_kings 16:14	we’eit hamicbaH haneHoshet ’asher lifnei yhoh wayaqreiw, mei’eit penei habayit, mibein hamicbeiaH, umibein beit yhoh; wayitein ’oto ‘al yerekh hamicbeiaH zafonah. 
2_kings 16:15	wayzawweihu wayzawweh hamelekh ’aHac ’et ’uriyah hakohein leimor, ‘al hamicbeiaH hagadol haqTeir ’et ‘olat haboqer we’et minHat ha‘erew we’et ‘olat hamelekh we’et minHato, we’eit ‘olat kal ‘am ha’arez uminHatam weniskeihem, wekhal dam ‘olah wekhal dam cewaH ‘alaw ticroq; umicbaH haneHoshet yihyeh li lewaqeir. 
2_kings 16:16	waya‘as ’uriyah hakohein; kekhol ’asher ziwwah hamelekh ’aHac. 
2_kings 16:17	wayqazeiz hamelekh ’aHac ’et hamisgerot hamekhonot, wayasar mei‘aleihem we’et ’et hakiyor, we’et hayam horid, mei‘al habaqar haneHoshet ’asher taHteha; wayitein ’oto, ‘al marzefet ’awanim. 
2_kings 16:18	we’et misakh musakh hashabat ’asher banu wabayit, we’et mewo hamelekh haHizonah, heiseiw beit yhoh; mipenei melekh ’ashur. 
2_kings 16:19	weyeter diwrei ’aHac ’asher ‘asah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 16:20	wayishkaw ’aHac ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqaweir ‘im ’awotaw be‘ir dawid; wayimlokh Hicqiyahu weno taHtaw.
2_kings 17:1	bishnat sheteim ‘esreih, le’aHac melekh yehudah; malakh hosheia‘ ben ’eilah weshomeron ‘al yisra’eil teisha‘ shanim. 
2_kings 17:2	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; raq, lo kemalkhei yisra’eil, ’asher hayu lefanaw. 
2_kings 17:3	‘alaw ‘alah, shalman’eser melekh ’ashur; wayhi lo hosheia‘ ‘ewed, wayashew lo minHah. 
2_kings 17:4	wayimza melekh ’ashur behosheia‘ qesher, ’asher shalaH mal’akhim ’el so melekh mizrayim, welo he‘elah minHah lemelekh ’ashur keshanah weshanah; waya‘azreihu melekh ’ashur, waya’asreihu beit kele. 
2_kings 17:5	waya‘al melekh ’ashur bekhal ha’arez; waya‘al shomeron, wayazar ‘aleha shalosh shanim. 
2_kings 17:6	bishnat hateshi‘it lehosheia‘, lakhad melekh ’ashur ’et shomeron, wayegel ’et yisra’eil ’ashurah; wayoshew ’otam baHlaH uweHawor nehar gocan we‘arei maday.
2_kings 17:7	wayhi, ki HaTe’u wenei yisra’eil yhoh ’eloheihem, hama‘aleh ’otam mei’erez mizrayim, mitaHat yad par‘oh melekh mizrayim; wayire’u ’elohim ’aHeirim. 
2_kings 17:8	wayeilekhu beHuqot hagoyim, ’asher horish yhoh, mipenei benei yisra’eil; umalkhei yisra’eil ’asher ‘asu. 
2_kings 17:9	wayHape’u wenei yisra’eil, dewarim ’asher lo khein, ‘al yhoh ’eloheihem; wayiwnu lahem bamot bekhal ‘areihem, mimigdal nozrim ‘ad ‘ir miwzar. 
2_kings 17:10	wayaziwu lahem mazeiwot wa’asheirim; ‘al kal giw‘ah gewohah, wetaHat kal ‘eiz ra‘anan. 
2_kings 17:11	wayqaTeru sham bekhal bamot, kagoyim ’asher heglah yhoh mipeneihem; waya‘asu dewarim ra‘im, lehakh‘is ’et yhoh. 
2_kings 17:12	waya‘awdu hagilulim; ’asher ’amar yhoh lahem, lo ta‘asu ’et hadawar hacceh. 
2_kings 17:13	waya‘ad yhoh beyisra’eil uwihudah beyad kal newi’o newi’ei khal Hoceh leimor, wu midarkheikhem hara‘im weshimru mizwotay Huqotay, kekhal hatorah, ’asher ziwwiti ’et ’awoteikhem; wa’asher shalaHti ’aleikhem, beyad ‘awaday hanewi’im. 
2_kings 17:14	welo shamei‘u; wayaqshu ’et ‘arepam ke‘oref ’awotam, ’asher lo he’eminu, yhoh ’eloheihem. 
2_kings 17:15	wayim’asu ’et Huqaw, we’et berito ’asher karat ’et ’awotam, we’eit ‘eidewotaw, ’asher hei‘id bam; wayeilekhu ’aHarei hahewel wayehbalu, we’aHarei hagoyim ’asher sewiwotam, ’asher ziwwah yhoh ’otam, lewilti ‘asot kahem. 
2_kings 17:16	waya‘acwu, ’et kal mizwot yhoh ’eloheihem, waya‘asu lahem masseikhah sheneim shenei ‘agalim; waya‘asu ’asheirah, wayishtaHawu lekhal zewa hashamayim, waya‘awdu ’et haba‘al. 
2_kings 17:17	waya‘awiru ’et beneihem we’et benoteihem ba’eish, wayiqsemu qesamim waynaHeishu; wayitmakeru, la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh lehakh‘iso. 
2_kings 17:18	wayit’anaf yhoh me’od beyisra’eil, waysireim mei‘al panaw; lo nish’ar, raq sheiweT yehudah lewado. 
2_kings 17:19	gam yehudah lo shamar, ’et mizwot yhoh ’eloheihem; wayeilekhu, beHuqot yisra’eil ’asher ‘asu. 
2_kings 17:20	wayim’as yhoh bekhal cera‘ yisra’eil way‘aneim, wayiteneim beyad shosim; ‘ad ’asher hishlikham mipanaw. 
2_kings 17:21	ki qara‘ yisra’eil, mei‘al beit dawid, wayamlikhu ’et yarawe‘am ben newaT; wayadei wayadaH yarawe‘am ’et yisra’eil mei’aHarei yhoh, weheHeTei’am HaTa’ah gedolah. 
2_kings 17:22	wayeilekhu benei yisra’eil, bekhal HaTot yarawe‘am ’asher ‘asah; lo saru mimenah. 
2_kings 17:23	‘ad ’asher heisir yhoh ’et yisra’eil mei‘al panaw, ka’asher diber, beyad kal ‘awadaw hanewi’im; wayigel yisra’eil mei‘al ’admato ’ashurah, ‘ad hayom hacceh.
2_kings 17:24	wayawei melekh ’ashur mibawel umikutah umei‘awwa umeiHamat usefarwayim, wayoshew be‘arei shomeron, taHat benei yisra’eil; wayirshu ’et shomeron, wayeishewu be‘areha. 
2_kings 17:25	wayhi, bitHilat shiwtam sham, lo yare’u ’et yhoh; wayshalaH yhoh bahem ’et ha’arayot, wayihyu horegim bahem. 
2_kings 17:26	wayomeru, lemelekh ’ashur leimor hagoyim, ’asher higlita watoshew be‘arei shomeron, lo yade‘u, ’et mishpaT ’elohei ha’arez; wayshalaH bam ’et ha’arayot, wehinam memitim ’otam, ka’asher ’einam yode‘im, ’et mishpaT ’elohei ha’arez. 
2_kings 17:27	wayzaw melekh ’ashur leimor, holikhu shamah ’eHad meihakohanim ’asher higlitem misham, weyeilekhu weyeishewu sham; weyoreim ’et mishpaT ’elohei ha’arez. 
2_kings 17:28	wayawo ’eHad meihakohanim, ’asher higlu mishomeron, wayeishew beweit ’eil; wayhi moreh ’otam, ’eikh yire’u ’et yhoh. 
2_kings 17:29	wayihyu ‘osim, go go ’elohaw; wayaniHu beweit habamot, ’asher ‘asu hashomeronim, go go be‘areihem, ’asher heim yoshewim sham. 
2_kings 17:30	we’anshei wawel, ‘asu ’et sukot benot, we’anshei khut, ‘asu ’et neiregal; we’anshei Hamat ‘asu ’et ’ashima. 
2_kings 17:31	weha‘awwim ‘asu niwHac we’et tartaq; wehasfarwim, sorefim ’et beneihem ba’eish, le’adramelekh wa‘anamelekh ’eloah ’elohei sefarim sefarwayim. 
2_kings 17:32	wayihyu yerei’im ’et yhoh; waya‘asu lahem miqzotam kohanei wamot, wayihyu ‘osim lahem beweit habamot. 
2_kings 17:33	’et yhoh hayu yerei’im; we’et ’eloheihem hayu ‘owedim, kemishpaT hagoyim, ’asher higlu ’otam misham. 
2_kings 17:34	‘ad hayom hacceh heim ‘osim, kamishpaTim harishonim; ’einam yerei’im ’et yhoh, we’einam ‘osim, keHuqotam ukhemishpaTam, wekhatorah wekhamizwah, ’asher ziwwah yhoh ’et benei ya‘aqow, ’asher sam shemo yisra’eil. 
2_kings 17:35	wayikhrot yhoh ’itam berit, wayzawweim leimor, lo tire’u ’elohim ’aHeirim; welo tishtaHawu lahem, welo ta‘awdum, welo ticbeHu lahem. 
2_kings 17:36	ki ’im ’et yhoh ’asher he‘elah ’etkhem mei’erez mizrayim bekhoaH gadol uwicroa‘ neTuyah ’oto tira’u; welo tishtaHawu welo ticbaHu. 
2_kings 17:37	we’et haHuqim we’et hamishpaTim wehatorah wehamizwah ’asher kataw lakhem, tishmerun la‘asot kal hayamim; welo tire’u ’elohim ’aHeirim. 
2_kings 17:38	wehaberit ’asher karati ’itekhem lo tishkaHu; welo tire’u ’elohim ’aHeirim. 
2_kings 17:39	ki ’im ’et yhoh ’eloheikhem tira’u; wehu yazil ’etkhem, miyad kal ’oyeweikhem. 
2_kings 17:40	welo shamei‘u; ki ’im kemishpaTam harishon heim ‘osim. 
2_kings 17:41	wayihyu hagoyim ha’eileh, yerei’im ’et yhoh, we’et pesileihem hayu ‘owedim; gam beneihem uwenei weneihem, ka’asher ‘asu ’awotam heim ‘osim, ‘ad hayom hacceh.
2_kings 18:1	wayhi bishnat shalosh, lehosheia‘ ben ’eilah melekh yisra’eil; malakh Hicqiyah wen ’aHac melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 18:2	ben ‘esrim weHameish shanah hayah wemalekho, we‘esrim wateisha‘ shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, ’awi bat cekharyah. 
2_kings 18:3	waya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh; kekhol ’asher ‘asah dawid ’awiw. 
2_kings 18:4	hu heisir ’et habamot, weshibar ’et hamazeiwot, wekharat ’et ha’asheirah; wekhitat neHash haneHoshet ’asher ‘asah mosheh, ki ‘ad hayamim haheimah hayu wenei yisra’eil meqaTerim lo, wayiqra lo neHushtan. 
2_kings 18:5	yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil baTaH; we’aHaraw lo hayah khamohu, bekhol malkhei yehudah, wa’asher hayu lefanaw. 
2_kings 18:6	wayidbaq yhoh, lo sar mei’aHaraw; wayishmor mizwotaw, ’asher ziwwah yhoh ’et mosheh. 
2_kings 18:7	wehayah yhoh ‘imo, bekhol ’asher yeizei yaskil; wayimrod bemelekh ’ashur welo ‘awado. 
2_kings 18:8	hu hikah ’et pelishtim ‘ad ‘accah we’et gewuleha; mimigdal nozrim ‘ad ‘ir miwzar.
2_kings 18:9	wayhi bashanah harewi‘it lamelekh Hicqiyahu, hi hashanah hashewi‘it, lehosheia‘ ben ’eilah melekh yisra’eil; ‘alah shalman’eser melekh ’ashur ‘al shomeron wayazar ‘aleha. 
2_kings 18:10	wayilkeduha, miqzeih shalosh shanim, bishnat sheish leHicqiyah; hi shenat teisha‘, lehosheia‘ melekh yisra’eil, nilkedah shomeron. 
2_kings 18:11	wayegel melekh ’ashur ’et yisra’eil ’ashurah; wayanHeim baHlaH uweHawor nehar gocan we‘arei maday. 
2_kings 18:12	‘al ’asher lo shame‘u, beqol yhoh ’eloheihem, waya‘awru ’et berito, ’eit kal ’asher ziwwah, mosheh ‘ewed yhoh; welo shame‘u welo ‘asu.
2_kings 18:13	uwe’arba‘ ‘esreih shanah lamelekh Hicqiyah, ‘alah sanHeiriw melekh ’ashur ‘al kal ‘arei yehudah habezurot wayitpeseim. 
2_kings 18:14	wayishlaH Hicqiyah melekh yehudah ’el melekh ’ashur lakhishah leimor HaTati shuw mei‘alay, ’eit ’asher titein ‘alay ’esa; wayasem melekh ’ashur ‘al Hicqiyah melekh yehudah, shelosh mei’ot kikar kesef, usheloshim kikar cahaw. 
2_kings 18:15	wayitein Hicqiyah, ’et kal hakesef hanimza weit yhoh; uwe’ozerot beit hamelekh. 
2_kings 18:16	ba‘eit hahi, qizaz Hicqiyah ’et daltot heikhal yhoh we’et ha’omenot, ’asher zipah, Hicqiyah melekh yehudah; wayiteneim lemelekh ’ashur.
2_kings 18:17	wayishlaH melekh ’ashur ’et tartan we’et raw saris we’et raw shaqeih min lakhish ’el hamelekh Hicqiyahu beHeil kaweid yerushalim; waya‘alu wayawo’u yerushalim, waya‘alu wayawo’u, waya‘amdu bit‘alat habereikhah ha‘elyonah, ’asher bimsilat sedeih khoweis. 
2_kings 18:18	wayiqre’u ’el hamelekh, wayeizei ’aleihem ’elyaqim ben Hilqiyahu ’asher ‘al habayit; weshewnah hassofeir, weyo’aH ben ’asaf hamackir. 
2_kings 18:19	wayomer ’aleihem raw shaqeih, ’imru na ’el Hicqiyahu; koh ’amar hamelekh hagadol melekh ’ashur, mah habiTaHon hacceh ’asher baTaHeta. 
2_kings 18:20	’amarta ’akh dewar sefatayim, ‘eizah ugewurah lamilHamah; ‘atah ‘al mi waTaHta, ki maradta bi. 
2_kings 18:21	‘atah hineih waTaHta lekha ‘al mish‘enet haqaneh harazuz hacceh ‘al mizrayim, ’asher yissameikh ’ish ‘alaw, uwa wekhapo uneqawah; kein par‘oh melekh mizrayim, lekhal haboTeHim ‘alaw. 
2_kings 18:22	wekhi tomerun ’eilay, ’el yhoh ’eloheinu baTaHenu; halo hu, ’asher heisir Hicqiyahu ’et bamotaw we’et micbeHotaw, wayomer lihudah welirushalim, lifnei hamicbeiaH hacceh, tishtaHawu birushalim. 
2_kings 18:23	we‘atah hit‘arew na, ’et ’adoni ’et melekh ’ashur; we’etenah lekha ’alpayim susim, ’im tukhal latet lekha rokhewim ‘aleihem. 
2_kings 18:24	we’eikh tashiw, ’eit penei faHat ’aHad ‘awdei ’adoni haqeTanim; watiwTaH lekha ‘al mizrayim, lerekhew ulefarashim. 
2_kings 18:25	‘atah hamibal‘adei yhoh, ‘aliti ‘al hamaqom hacceh lehashHito; yhoh ’amar ’eilay, ‘aleih ‘al ha’arez haccot wehashHitah. 
2_kings 18:26	wayomer ’elyaqim ben Hilqiyahu weshewnah weyo’aH ’el raw shaqeih, daber na ’el ‘awadekha ’aramit, ki shome‘im ’anaHenu; we’al tedabeir ‘imanu yehudit, be’acenei ha‘am, ’asher ‘al haHomah. 
2_kings 18:27	wayomer ’aleihem raw shaqeih, ha‘al ’adonekha we’eilekha shelaHani ’adoni, ledabeir ’et hadewarim ha’eileh; halo ‘al ha’anashim, hayoshewim ‘al haHomah, le’ekhol ’et Hareihem zo’atam, welishtot ’et sheineihem meimei ragleihem ‘imakhem. 
2_kings 18:28	waya‘amod raw shaqeih, wayiqra weqol gadol yehudit; waydabeir wayomer, shim‘u dewar hamelekh hagadol melekh ’ashur. 
2_kings 18:29	koh ’amar hamelekh, ’al yashi lakhem Hicqiyahu; ki lo yukhal, lehazil ’etkhem miyado. 
2_kings 18:30	we’al yawTaH ’etkhem Hicqiyahu ’el yhoh leimor, hazeil yazileinu yhoh; welo tinatein ’et ha‘ir haccot, beyad melekh ’ashur. 
2_kings 18:31	’al tishme‘u ’el Hicqiyahu; ki khoh ’amar melekh ’ashur, ‘asu ’iti werakhah uze’u ’eilay, we’ikhlu ’ish gafno we’ish te’einato, ushetu ’ish mei woro. 
2_kings 18:32	‘ad bo’i welaqaHti ’etkhem ’el ’erez ke’arzekhem, ’erez dagan wetirosh ’erez leHem ukheramim, ’erez ceit yizhar udewash, wiHyu welo tamutu; we’al tishme‘u ’el Hicqiyahu, ki yassit ’etkhem leimor, yhoh yazileinu. 
2_kings 18:33	hahazeil hizilu ’elohei hagoyim ’ish ’et ’arzo; miyad melekh ’ashur. 
2_kings 18:34	’ayeih ’elohei Hamat we’arpad, ’ayeih ’elohei sefarwayim heina‘ we‘iwwah; ki hizilu ’et shomeron miyadi. 
2_kings 18:35	mi bekhal ’elohei ha’arazot, ’asher hizilu ’et ’arzam miyadi; ki yazil yhoh ’et yerushalim miyadi. 
2_kings 18:36	weheHerishu ha‘am, welo ‘anu ’oto dawar; ki mizwat hamelekh hi leimor lo ta‘anuhu. 
2_kings 18:37	wayawo ’elyaqim ben Hilqiyah ’asher ‘al habayit weshewna hassofeir weyo’aH ben ’asaf hamackir ’el Hicqiyahu qeru‘ei wegadim; wayagidu lo, diwrei raw shaqeih. 
2_kings 19:1	wayhi, kishmoa‘ hamelekh Hicqiyahu, wayiqra‘ ’et begadaw; wayitkas basaq, wayawo beit yhoh. 
2_kings 19:2	wayishlaH ’et ’elyaqim ’asher ‘al habayit weshewna hassofeir, we’eit ciqnei hakohanim, mitkassim basaqim; ’el yesha‘yahu hanawi ben ’amoz. 
2_kings 19:3	wayomeru ’eilaw, koh ’amar Hicqiyahu, yom zarah wetokheiHah une’azah hayom hacceh; ki wa’u wanim ‘ad mashbeir, wekhoaH ’ayin leleidah. 
2_kings 19:4	’ulay yishma‘ yhoh ’elohekha ’eit kal diwrei raw shaqeih, ’asher shelaHo melekh ’ashur ’adonaw leHareif ’elohim Hay, wehokhiaH badewarim, ’asher shama‘ yhoh ’elohekha; wenasata tefilah, be‘ad hashe’eirit hanimza’ah. 
2_kings 19:5	wayawo’u, ‘awdei hamelekh Hicqiyahu ’el yesha‘ayahu. 
2_kings 19:6	wayomer lahem yesha‘yahu, koh tomerun ’el ’adoneikhem; koh ’amar yhoh ’al tira mipenei hadewarim ’asher shama‘ta, ’asher gidefu na‘arei melekh ’ashur ’oti. 
2_kings 19:7	hini notein bo ruaH, weshama‘ shemu‘ah weshaw le’arzo; wehipaltiw baHerew be’arzo. 
2_kings 19:8	wayashaw raw shaqeih, wayimza ’et melekh ’ashur, nilHam ‘al liwnah; ki shama‘, ki nasa‘ milakhish. 
2_kings 19:9	wayishma‘, ’el tirhaqah melekh kush leimor, hineih yaza lehilaHeim ’itakh; wayashaw wayishlaH mal’akhim, ’el Hicqiyahu leimor. 
2_kings 19:10	koh tomerun, ’el Hicqiyahu melekh yehudah leimor, ’al yashi’akha ’elohekha, ’asher ’atah boTeiaH bo leimor; lo tinatein yerushalim, beyad melekh ’ashur. 
2_kings 19:11	hineih ’atah shama‘ta, ’eit ’asher ‘asu malkhei ’ashur lekhal ha’arazot lehaHarimam; we’atah tinazeil. 
2_kings 19:12	hahizilu ’otam ’elohei hagoyim ’asher shiHatu ’awotay, ’et gocan we’et Haran; werezef uwenei ‘eden ’asher bitlasar. 
2_kings 19:13	’ayo melekh Hamat umelekh ’arpad, umelekh la‘ir sefarwayim; heina‘ we‘iwwah. 
2_kings 19:14	wayiqaH Hicqiyahu ’et hassefarim miyad hamal’akhim wayiqra’eim; waya‘al beit yhoh, wayifreseihu Hicqiyahu lifnei yhoh.
2_kings 19:15	wayitpaleil Hicqiyahu lifnei yhoh wayomar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil yosheiw hakeruwim, ’atah hu ha’elohim lewadekha, lekhol mamlekhot ha’arez; ’atah ‘asita, ’et hashamayim we’et ha’arez. 
2_kings 19:16	haTeih yhoh ’acenekha ushama‘, peqaH yhoh ‘einekha ure’eih; ushema‘, ’eit diwrei sanHeiriw, ’asher shelaHo, leHareif ’elohim Hay. 
2_kings 19:17	’amenam yhoh; heHeriwu malkhei ’ashur ’et hagoyim we’et ’arzam. 
2_kings 19:18	wenatenu ’et ’eloheihem ba’eish; ki lo ’elohim heimah, ki ’im ma‘aseih yedei ’adam ‘eiz wa’ewen way’abedum. 
2_kings 19:19	we‘atah yhoh ’eloheinu, hoshi‘einu na miyado; weyeide‘u kal mamlekhot ha’arez, ki ’atah yhoh ’elohim lewadekha.
2_kings 19:20	wayishlaH yesha‘yahu wen ’amoz, ’el Hicqiyahu leimor; koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’asher hitpalalta ’eilay ’el sanHeiriw melekh ’ashur shama‘eti. 
2_kings 19:21	ceh hadawar, ’asher diber yhoh ‘alaw; bacah lekha la‘agah lekha, betulat bat ziyon, ’aHarekha rosh heini‘ah, bat yerushalim. 
2_kings 19:22	’et mi Heirafta wegidafta, we‘al mi harimota qol; watisa marom ‘einekha ‘al qedosh yisra’eil. 
2_kings 19:23	beyad mal’akhekha Heirafta ’adonay watomer, berekhew berow rikhbi ’ani ‘aliti merom harim yarketei lewanon; we’ekhrot qomat ’aracaw miwHor beroshaw, we’awo’ah melon qizoh, ya‘ar karmilo. 
2_kings 19:24	’ani qarti, weshatiti mayim carim; we’aHriw bekhaf pe‘amay, kol ye’orei mazor. 
2_kings 19:25	halo shama‘ta lemeiraHoq ’otah ‘asiti, lemimei qedem wizartiha; ‘atah haweitiha, utehi, lahshot galim nizim ‘arim bezurot. 
2_kings 19:26	weyosheweihen qizrei yad, Hatu wayeiwoshu; hayu ‘eisew sadeh wiraq deshe, Hazir gagot, ushedeifah lifnei qamah. 
2_kings 19:27	weshiwtekha wezeitekha uwo’akha yada‘eti; we’eit hitrageckha ’eilay. 
2_kings 19:28	ya‘an hitrageckha ’eilay, wesha’anankha ‘alah we’acenay; wesamti HaHi be’apekha, umitgi bisfatekha, wahashiwotikha, baderekh ’asher bata bah. 
2_kings 19:29	weceh lekha ha’ot, ’akhol hashanah safiaH, uwashanah hasheinit saHish; uwashanah hashelishit, cir‘u weqizru weniT‘u kheramim we’ikhlu firyam. 
2_kings 19:30	weyasefah peleiTat beit yehudah hanish’arah shoresh lemaTah; we‘asah feri lema‘elah. 
2_kings 19:31	ki mirushalim teizei she’eirit, ufeleiTah meihar ziyon; qin’at yhoh zewa’ot ta‘aseh cot.
2_kings 19:32	lakhein, koh ’amar yhoh ’el melekh ’ashur, lo yawo ’el ha‘ir haccot, welo yoreh sham Heiz; welo yeqademenah magein, welo yishpokh ‘aleha solelah. 
2_kings 19:33	baderekh ’asher yawo bah yashuw; we’el ha‘ir haccot lo yawo ne’um yhoh. 
2_kings 19:34	weganoti ’el ha‘ir haccot lehoshi‘ah; lema‘ani, ulema‘an dawid ‘awdi. 
2_kings 19:35	wayhi balaylah hahu wayeizei mal’akh yhoh wayakh bemaHaneih ’ashur, mei’ah shemonim waHamishah ’alef; wayashkimu waboqer, wehineih khulam pegarim meitim. 
2_kings 19:36	wayissa‘ wayeilekh, wayashaw sanHeiriw melekh ’ashur; wayeishew benineweih. 
2_kings 19:37	wayhi hu mishtaHaweh beit nisrokh ’elohaw, we’adramelekh wesar’ezer banaw hikuhu waHerew, weheimah nimleTu ’erez ’araraT; wayimlokh ’eisar Hadon beno taHtaw.
2_kings 20:1	bayamim haheim, Halah Hicqiyahu lamut; wayawo ’eilaw yesha‘yahu wen ’amoz hanawi, wayomer ’eilaw koh ’amar yhoh zaw leweitekha, ki meit ’atah welo tiHyeh. 
2_kings 20:2	wayasseiw ’et panaw ’el haqir; wayitpaleil, ’el yhoh leimor. 
2_kings 20:3	’anah yhoh cekhar na ’eit ’asher hithalakhti lefanekha, be’emet uweleiwaw shaleim, wehaTow be‘einekha ‘asiti; wayeiwek Hicqiyahu bekhi gadol.
2_kings 20:4	wayhi yesha‘yahu, lo yaza, ha‘ir Hazeir hatikhonah; udewar yhoh, hayah ’eilaw leimor. 
2_kings 20:5	shuw we’amarta ’el Hicqiyahu negid ‘ami, koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei dawid ’awikha, shama‘ti ’et tefilatekha, ra’iti ’et dim‘atekha; hini rofe lakh, bayom hashelishi, ta‘aleh beit yhoh. 
2_kings 20:6	wehosafti ‘al yamekha, Hameish ‘esreih shanah, umikaf melekh ’ashur ’azilekha, we’eit ha‘ir haccot; weganoti ‘al ha‘ir haccot, lema‘ani, ulema‘an dawid ‘awdi. 
2_kings 20:7	wayomer yesha‘yahu, qeHu dewelet te’einim; wayiqHu wayasimu ‘al hasheHin wayeHi. 
2_kings 20:8	wayomer Hicqiyahu ’el yesha‘yahu, mah ’ot, ki yirpa yhoh li; we‘aliti bayom hashelishi beit yhoh. 
2_kings 20:9	wayomer yesha‘yahu, ceh lekha ha’ot mei’eit yhoh, ki ya‘aseh yhoh, ’et hadawar ’asher dibeir; halakh hazeil ‘eser ma‘alot, ’im yashuw ‘eser ma‘alot. 
2_kings 20:10	wayomer yeHicqiyahu, naqeil lazeil, linTot ‘eser ma‘alot; lo khi, yashuw hazeil ’aHoranit ‘eser ma‘alot. 
2_kings 20:11	wayiqra yesha‘yahu hanawi ’el yhoh; wayashew ’et hazeil, bama‘alot ’asher yaredah bema‘alot ’aHac ’aHoranit ‘eser ma‘alot.
2_kings 20:12	ba‘eit hahi shalaH berodakh bal’adan ben bal’adan melekh bawel sefarim uminHah ’el Hicqiyahu; ki shama‘, ki Halah Hicqiyahu. 
2_kings 20:13	wayishma‘ ‘aleihem Hicqiyahu wayar’eim ’et kal beit nekhotoh ’et hakesef we’et haccahaw we’et habesamim we’eit shemen haTow, we’eit beit keilaw, we’eit kal ’asher nimza be’ozrotaw; lo hayah dawar, ’asher lo her’am Hicqiyahu beweito uwekhal memshalto. 
2_kings 20:14	wayawo yesha‘yahu hanawi, ’el hamelekh Hicqiyahu; wayomer ’eilaw mah ’ameru ha’anashim ha’eileh, umei’ayin yawo’u ’eilekha, wayomer Hicqiyahu, mei’erez reHoqah ba’u mibawel. 
2_kings 20:15	wayomer mah ra’u beweitekha; wayomer Hicqiyahu, ’eit kal ’asher beweiti ra’u, lo hayah dawar ’asher lo hir’itim be’ozerotay. 
2_kings 20:16	wayomer yesha‘yahu ’el Hicqiyahu; shema‘ dewar yhoh. 
2_kings 20:17	hineih yamim ba’im wenisa kal ’asher beweitekha, wa’asher ’azeru ’awotekha ‘ad hayom hacceh bawelah; lo yiwwateir dawar ’amar yhoh. 
2_kings 20:18	umibanekha ’asher yeize’u mimekha ’asher tolid yiqaH yiqaHu; wehayu sarisim, beheikhal melekh bawel. 
2_kings 20:19	wayomer Hicqiyahu ’el yesha‘yahu, Tow dewar yhoh ’asher dibarta; wayomer halo ’im shalom we’emet yihyeh weyamay. 
2_kings 20:20	weyeter diwrei Hicqiyahu wekhal gewurato, wa’asher ‘asah, ’et habereikhah we’et hate‘alah, wayawei ’et hamayim ha‘irah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 20:21	wayishkaw Hicqiyahu ‘im ’awotaw; wayimlokh menasheh weno taHtaw.
2_kings 21:1	ben sheteim ‘esreih shanah menasheh wemalekho, waHamishim weHameish shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo Hefzi wah. 
2_kings 21:2	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; keto‘awot hagoyim, ’asher horish yhoh, mipenei benei yisra’eil. 
2_kings 21:3	wayashaw, wayiwen ’et habamot, ’asher ’ibad Hicqiyahu ’awiw; wayaqem micbeHot laba‘al, waya‘as ’asheirah ka’asher ‘asah, ’aH’aw melekh yisra’eil, wayishtaHu lekhal zewa hashamayim, waya‘awod ’otam. 
2_kings 21:4	uwanah micbeHot beweit yhoh; ’asher ’amar yhoh, birushalim ’asim ’et shemi. 
2_kings 21:5	wayiwen micbeHot lekhal zewa hashamayim; bishtei Hazrot beit yhoh. 
2_kings 21:6	wehe‘ewir ’et beno ba’eish, we‘onein weniHeish, we‘asah ’ow weyide‘onim; hirbah, la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh lehakh‘is. 
2_kings 21:7	wayasem ’et pesel ha’asheirah ’asher ‘asah; babayit, ’asher ’amar yhoh ’el dawid we’el shelomoh weno, babayit hacceh uwirushalim, ’asher baHarti mikol shiwTei yisra’eil, ’asim ’et shemi le‘olam. 
2_kings 21:8	welo ’osif, lehanid regel yisra’eil, min ha’adamah, ’asher natati la’awotam; raq ’im yishmeru la‘asot, kekhol ’asher ziwwitim, ulekhal hatorah, ’asher ziwwah ’otam ‘awdi mosheh. 
2_kings 21:9	welo shamei‘u; wayat‘eim menasheh la‘asot ’et hara‘, min hagoyim, ’asher hishmid yhoh, mipenei benei yisra’eil. 
2_kings 21:10	waydabeir yhoh beyad ‘awadaw hanewi’im leimor. 
2_kings 21:11	ya‘an ’asher ‘asah menasheh melekh yehudah hato‘eiwot ha’eileh, heira‘ mikol ’asher ‘asu ha’emori ’asher lefanaw; wayaHaTi gam ’et yehudah begilulaw.
2_kings 21:12	lakhein, koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, hini meiwi ra‘ah, ‘al yerushalim wihudah; ’asher kal shome‘aw shome‘ah, tizalnah shetei ’acenaw. 
2_kings 21:13	wenaTiti ‘al yerushalim, ’eit qaw shomeron, we’et mishqolet beit ’aH’aw; umaHiti ’et yerushalim ka’asher yimHeh ’et hazalaHat maHah, wehafakh ‘al paneha. 
2_kings 21:14	wenaTashti, ’eit she’eirit naHalati, unetatim beyad ’oyeweihem; wehayu lewac welimshissah lekhal ’oyeweihem. 
2_kings 21:15	ya‘an, ’asher ‘asu ’et hara‘ be‘einay, wayihyu makh‘isim ’oti; min hayom, ’asher yaze’u ’awotam mimizrayim, we‘ad hayom hacceh. 
2_kings 21:16	wegam dam naqi shafakh menasheh harbeih me’od, ‘ad ’asher milei ’et yerushalim peh lafeh; lewad meiHaTato ’asher heHeTi ’et yehudah, la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh. 
2_kings 21:17	weyeter diwrei menasheh wekhal ’asher ‘asah, weHaTato ’asher HaTa; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 21:18	wayishkaw menasheh ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqaweir began beito began ‘ucca; wayimlokh ’amon beno taHtaw.
2_kings 21:19	ben ‘esrim ushetayim shanah ’amon bemalekho, ushetayim shanim, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, meshulemet bat Haruz min yaTewah. 
2_kings 21:20	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; ka’asher ‘asah menasheh ’awiw. 
2_kings 21:21	wayeilekh bekhal haderekh ’asher halakh ’awiw; waya‘awod, ’et hagilulim ’asher ‘awad ’awiw, wayishtaHu lahem. 
2_kings 21:22	waya‘acow ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awotaw; welo halakh bederekh yhoh. 
2_kings 21:23	wayiqsheru ‘awdei ’amon ‘alaw; wayamitu ’et hamelekh beweito. 
2_kings 21:24	wayakh ‘am ha’arez, ’eit kal haqosherim ‘al hamelekh ’amon; wayamlikhu ‘am ha’arez ’et yoshiyahu weno taHtaw. 
2_kings 21:25	weyeter diwrei ’amon ’asher ‘asah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 21:26	wayiqber ’oto biqwurato began ‘ucca; wayimlokh yoshiyahu weno taHtaw.
2_kings 22:1	ben shemoneh shanah yoshiyahu wemalekho, usheloshim we’aHat shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, yedidah wat ‘adayah mibazeqat. 
2_kings 22:2	waya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh; wayeilekh, bekhal derekh dawid ’awiw, welo sar yamin usemol.
2_kings 22:3	wayhi, bishmoneh ‘esreih shanah, lamelekh yoshiyahu; shalaH hamelekh ’et shafan ben ’azalyahu wen meshulam hassofeir, beit yhoh leimor. 
2_kings 22:4	‘aleih, ’el Hilqiyahu hakohein hagadol, weyateim ’et hakesef, hamuwa beit yhoh; ’asher ’asefu shomerei hassaf mei’eit ha‘am. 
2_kings 22:5	weyitenoh weyitenuhu, ‘al yad ‘osei hamelakhah, hamufqadim beweit beit yhoh; weyitenu ’oto, le‘osei hamelakhah ’asher beweit yhoh, leHacceiq bedeq habayit. 
2_kings 22:6	leHarashim, welabonim welagoderim; weliqnot ‘eizim we’awnei maHzeiw, leHacceiq ’et habayit. 
2_kings 22:7	’akh lo yeiHasheiw ’itam, hakesef hanitan ‘al yadam; ki we’emunah heim ‘osim. 
2_kings 22:8	wayomer Hilqiyahu hakohein hagadol ‘al shafan hassofeir, seifer hatorah mazati beweit yhoh; wayitein Hilqiyah ’et hasseifer ’el shafan wayiqra’eihu. 
2_kings 22:9	wayawo shafan hassofeir ’el hamelekh, wayashew ’et hamelekh dawar; wayomer, hitikhu ‘awadekha ’et hakesef hanimza wabayit, wayitenuhu, ‘al yad ‘osei hamelakhah, hamufqadim beit yhoh. 
2_kings 22:10	wayageid shafan hassofeir lamelekh leimor, seifer natan li, Hilqiyah hakohein; wayiqra’eihu shafan lifnei hamelekh. 
2_kings 22:11	wayhi kishmoa‘ hamelekh, ’et diwrei seifer hatorah; wayiqra‘ ’et begadaw. 
2_kings 22:12	wayzaw hamelekh ’et Hilqiyah hakohein we’et ’aHiqam benosha fan we’et ‘akhbor ben mikhayah we’eit shafan hassofeir, we’eit ‘asayah ‘ewed hamelekh leimor. 
2_kings 22:13	lekhu dirshu ’et yhoh ba‘adi uwe‘ad ha‘am, uwe‘ad kal yehudah, ‘al diwrei hasseifer hanimza hacceh; ki gedolah Hamat yhoh ’asher hi nizetah wanu, ‘al ’asher lo shame‘u ’awoteinu, ‘al diwrei hasseifer hacceh, la‘asot kekhal hakatuw ‘aleinu. 
2_kings 22:14	wayeilekh Hilqiyahu hakohein wa’aHiqam we‘akhbor weshafan wa‘asayah, ’el Huldah hanewi’ah ’eishet shalum ben tiqwah, ben HarHas shomeir habegadim, wehi yoshewet birushalim bamishneh; waydaberu ’eileha. 
2_kings 22:15	watomer ’aleihem, koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil; ’imru la’ish, ’asher shalaH ’etkhem ’eilay. 
2_kings 22:16	koh ’amar yhoh, hini meiwi ra‘ah ’el hamaqom hacceh we‘al yoshewaw; ’eit kal diwrei hasseifer, ’asher qara melekh yehudah. 
2_kings 22:17	taHat ’asher ‘acawuni, wayqaTeru leilohim ’aHeirim, lema‘an hakh‘iseini, bekhol ma‘aseih yedeihem; wenizetah Hamati bamaqom hacceh welo tikhbeh. 
2_kings 22:18	we’el melekh yehudah, hasholeiaH ’etkhem lidrosh ’et yhoh, koh tomeru ’eilaw; koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, hadewarim ’asher shama‘eta. 
2_kings 22:19	ya‘an rakh lewawekha watikana‘ mipenei yhoh beshame‘akha ’asher dibarti ‘al hamaqom hacceh we‘al yoshewaw, lihyot leshamah weliqlalah, watiqra‘ ’et begadekha, watiwkeh lefanay; wegam ’anokhi shama‘ti ne’um yhoh. 
2_kings 22:20	lakhein hini ’osifkha ‘al ’awotekha, wene’esafta ’el qiwrotekha beshalom welo tir’enah ‘einekha, bekhol hara‘ah, ’asher ’ani meiwi ‘al hamaqom hacceh; wayashiwu ’et hamelekh dawar. 
2_kings 23:1	wayishlaH hamelekh; waya’asfu ’eilaw, kal ciqnei yehudah wirushalim. 
2_kings 23:2	waya‘al hamelekh beit yhoh wekhal ’ish yehudah wekhal yoshewei yerushalim ’ito, wehakohanim wehanewi’im, wekhal ha‘am lemiqaTon we‘ad gadol; wayiqra we’aceneihem, ’et kal diwrei seifer haberit, hanimza beweit yhoh. 
2_kings 23:3	waya‘amod hamelekh ‘al ha‘amud wayikhrot ’et haberit lifnei yhoh lalekhet ’aHar yhoh welishmor mizwotaw we’et ‘eidewotaw we’et Huqotaw bekhal leiw uwekhal nefesh, lehaqim, ’et diwrei haberit haccot, haketuwim ‘al hasseifer hacceh; waya‘amod kal ha‘am baberit. 
2_kings 23:4	wayzaw hamelekh ’et Hilqiyahu hakohein hagadol we’et kohanei hamishneh we’et shomerei hassaf lehozi meiheikhal yhoh, ’eit kal hakeilim, ha‘asuyim laba‘al wela’asheirah, ulekhol zewa hashamayim; wayisrefeim miHuz lirushalim beshadmot qidron, wenasa ’et ‘afaram beit ’eil. 
2_kings 23:5	wehishbit ’et hakemarim, ’asher natenu malkhei yehudah, wayqaTeir babamot be‘arei yehudah, umesibei yerushalim; we’et hamqaTerim laba‘al, lashemesh welayareiaH welamaccalot, ulekhol zewa hashamayim. 
2_kings 23:6	wayozei ’et ha’asheirah mibeit yhoh miHuz lirushalim ’el naHal qidron, wayisrof ’otah benaHal qidron wayadeq le‘afar; wayashleikh ’et ‘afarah, ‘al qewer benei ha‘am. 
2_kings 23:7	wayitoz ’et batei haqedeishim, ’asher beweit yhoh; ’asher hanashim, ’oregot sham batim la’asheirah. 
2_kings 23:8	wayawei ’et kal hakohanim mei‘arei yehudah, wayTamei ’et habamot, ’asher qiTeru shamah hakohanim, migewa‘ ‘ad be’eir shawa‘; wenataz ’et bamot hashe‘arim, ’asher petaH sha‘ar yehoshua‘ sar ha‘ir, ’asher ‘al semol ’ish besha‘ar ha‘ir. 
2_kings 23:9	’akh, lo ya‘alu kohanei habamot, ’el micbaH yhoh birushalim; ki ’im ’akhelu mazot betokh ’aHeihem. 
2_kings 23:10	weTimei ’et hatofet, ’asher begei wenei wen hinom; lewilti, leha‘awir ’ish ’et beno we’et bito ba’eish lamolekh. 
2_kings 23:11	wayashbeit ’et hassusim, ’asher natenu malkhei yehudah lashemesh mibo weit yhoh, ’el lishkat netan melekh hassaris, ’asher baparwarim; we’et markewot hashemesh saraf ba’eish. 
2_kings 23:12	we’et hamicbeHot ’asher ‘al hagag ‘aliyat ’aHac ’asher ‘asu malkhei yehudah, we’et hamicbeHot ’asher ‘asah menasheh, bishtei Hazrot beit yhoh nataz hamelekh; wayaraz misham, wehishlikh ’et ‘afaram ’el naHal qidron. 
2_kings 23:13	we’et habamot ’asher ‘al penei yerushalim, ’asher mimin lehar hamashHit ’asher banah shelomoh melekh yisra’eil le‘ashtoret shiquz zidonim, welikhmosh shiquz mo’aw, ulemilkom to‘awat benei ‘amon; Timei hamelekh. 
2_kings 23:14	weshibar ’et hamazeiwot, wayikhrot ’et ha’asheirim; waymalei ’et meqomam ‘azmot ’adam. 
2_kings 23:15	wegam ’et hamicbeiaH ’asher beweit ’eil, habamah ’asher ‘asah yarawe‘am ben newaT ’asher heHeTi ’et yisra’eil, gam ’et hamicbeiaH hahu we’et habamah nataz; wayisrof ’et habamah heidaq le‘afar wesaraf ’asheirah. 
2_kings 23:16	wayifen yoshiyahu, wayar ’et haqewarim ’asher sham bahar, wayishlaH, wayiqaH ’et ha‘azamot min haqewarim, wayisrof ‘al hamicbeiaH wayTame’eihu; kidwar yhoh ’asher qara ’ish ha’elohim, ’asher qara, ’et hadewarim ha’eileh. 
2_kings 23:17	wayomer mah haziyun halac, ’asher ’ani ro’eh; wayomeru ’eilaw ’anshei ha‘ir, haqewer ’ish ha’elohim ’asher ba mihudah, wayiqra, ’et hadewarim ha’eileh ’asher ‘asita, ‘al hamicbaH beit ’eil. 
2_kings 23:18	wayomer haniHu lo, ’ish ’al yana‘ ‘azmotaw; waymaleTu ‘azmotaw, ’eit ‘azmot hanawi, ’asher ba mishomeron. 
2_kings 23:19	wegam ’et kal batei habamot ’asher be‘arei shomeron, ’asher ‘asu malkhei yisra’eil lehakh‘is, heisir yoshiyahu; waya‘as lahem, kekhal hama‘asim, ’asher ‘asah beweit ’eil. 
2_kings 23:20	wayicbaH ’et kal kohanei habamot ’asher sham ‘al hamicbeHot, wayisrof ’et ‘azmot ’adam ‘aleihem; wayashaw yerushalim. 
2_kings 23:21	wayzaw hamelekh ’et kal ha‘am leimor, ‘asu fesaH, yhoh ’eloheikhem; kakatuw ‘al seifer haberit hacceh. 
2_kings 23:22	ki lo na‘asah kapesaH hacceh, mimei hashofeTim, ’asher shafeTu ’et yisra’eil; wekhol, yemei malkhei yisra’eil umalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 23:23	ki, ’im bishmoneh ‘esreih shanah, lamelekh yoshiyahu; na‘asah hapesaH hacceh yhoh birushalim. 
2_kings 23:24	wegam ’et ha’owot we’et hayide‘onim we’et haterafim we’et hagilulim we’eit kal hashiquzim, ’asher nir’u be’erez yehudah uwirushalim, bi‘eir yoshiyahu; lema‘an haqim ’et diwrei hatorah haketuwim ‘al hasseifer, ’asher maza Hilqiyahu hakohein beit yhoh. 
2_kings 23:25	wekhamohu lo hayah lefanaw melekh, ’asher shaw ’el yhoh bekhal lewawo uwekhal nafsho uwekhal me’odo, kekhol torat mosheh; we’aHaraw lo qam kamohu. 
2_kings 23:26	’akh lo shaw yhoh meiHaron ’apo hagadol, ’asher Harah ’apo bihudah; ‘al kal hake‘asim, ’asher hikh‘iso menasheh. 
2_kings 23:27	wayomer yhoh gam ’et yehudah ’asir mei‘al panay, ka’asher hasiroti ’et yisra’eil; uma’asti ’et ha‘ir haccot ’asher baHarti ’et yerushalim, we’et habayit, ’asher ’amarti, yihyeh shemi sham. 
2_kings 23:28	weyeter diwrei yoshiyahu wekhal ’asher ‘asah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 23:29	beyamaw ‘alah far‘oh nekhoh melekh mizrayim ‘al melekh ’ashur ‘al nehar perat; wayeilekh hamelekh yoshiyahu liqrato, waymiteihu bimgido, kir’oto ’oto. 
2_kings 23:30	wayarkiwuhu ‘awadaw meit mimegido, waywi’uhu yerushalim, wayiqberuhu biqwurato; wayiqaH ‘am ha’arez, ’et yeho’aHac ben yoshiyahu, wayimsheHu ’oto wayamlikhu ’oto taHat ’awiw.
2_kings 23:31	ben ‘esrim weshalosh shanah yeho’aHac bemalekho, usheloshah Hodashim, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, HamuTal bat yirmeyahu miliwnah. 
2_kings 23:32	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; kekhol ’asher ‘asu ’awotaw. 
2_kings 23:33	waya’asreihu far‘oh nekhoh weriwlah be’erez Hamat, bimlokh mimelokh birushalim; wayiten ‘onesh ‘al ha’arez, mei’ah khikar kesef wekhikar cahaw. 
2_kings 23:34	wayamleikh par‘oh nekhoh ’et ’elyaqim ben yoshiyahu, taHat yoshiyahu ’awiw, wayasseiw ’et shemo yehoyaqim; we’et yeho’aHac laqaH, wayawo mizrayim wayamat sham. 
2_kings 23:35	wehakesef wehaccahaw, natan yehoyaqim lefar‘oh, ’akh he‘erikh ’et ha’arez, lateit ’et hakesef ‘al pi far‘oh; ’ish ke‘erko, nagas ’et hakesef we’et haccahaw ’et ‘am ha’arez, lateit lefar‘oh nekhoh.
2_kings 23:36	ben ‘esrim weHameish shanah yehoyaqim bemalekho, we’aHat ‘esreih shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, cewidah cewudah wat pedayah min rumah. 
2_kings 23:37	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; kekhol ’asher ‘asu ’awotaw. 
2_kings 24:1	beyamaw ‘alah, newukhadnezar melekh bawel; wayhi lo yehoyaqim ‘ewed shalosh shanim, wayashaw wayimrad bo. 
2_kings 24:2	wayshalaH yhoh bo ’et gedudei khasdim we’et gedudei ’aram we’eit gedudei mo’aw, we’eit gedudei wenei ‘amon, wayshaleHeim bihudah leha’awido; kidwar yhoh, ’asher diber, beyad ‘awadaw hanewi’im. 
2_kings 24:3	’akh ‘al pi yhoh hayetah bihudah, lehasir mei‘al panaw; beHaTot menasheh, kekhol ’asher ‘asah. 
2_kings 24:4	wegam dam hanaqi ’asher shafakh, waymalei ’et yerushalim dam naqi; welo ’awah yhoh lisloaH. 
2_kings 24:5	weyeter diwrei yehoyaqim wekhal ’asher ‘asah; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim lemalkhei yehudah. 
2_kings 24:6	wayishkaw yehoyaqim ‘im ’awotaw; wayimlokh yehoyakhin beno taHtaw. 
2_kings 24:7	welo hosif ‘od melekh mizrayim, lazeit mei’arzo; ki laqaH melekh bawel, minaHal mizrayim ‘ad nehar perat, kol ’asher hayetah lemelekh mizrayim.
2_kings 24:8	ben shemoneh ‘esreih shanah yehoyakhin bemalekho, usheloshah Hodashim, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, neHushta wat ’elnatan mirushalim. 
2_kings 24:9	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; kekhol ’asher ‘asah ’awiw. 
2_kings 24:10	ba‘eit hahi, ‘alah ‘alu, ‘awdei newukhadnezar melekh bawel yerushalim; watawo ha‘ir bamazor. 
2_kings 24:11	wayawo newukhadnezar melekh bawel ‘al ha‘ir; wa‘awadaw zarim ‘aleha. 
2_kings 24:12	wayeizei yehoyakhin melekh yehudah ‘al melekh bawel, hu we’imo, wa‘awadaw wesaraw wesarisaw; wayiqaH ’oto melekh bawel, bishnat shemoneh lemalekho. 
2_kings 24:13	wayozei misham, ’et kal ’ozrot beit yhoh, we’ozrot beit hamelekh; wayqazeiz ’et kal kelei haccahaw, ’asher ‘asah shelomoh melekh yisra’eil beheikhal yhoh, ka’asher diber yhoh. 
2_kings 24:14	wehiglah ’et kal yerushalim we’et kal hasarim we’eit kal giborei haHayil, ‘asarah ‘aseret ’alafim goleh, wekhal heHarash wehamasgeir; lo nish’ar, culat dalat ‘am ha’arez. 
2_kings 24:15	wayegel ’et yehoyakhin bawelah; we’et ’eim hamelekh we’et neshei hamelekh we’et sarisaw, we’eit ’ewilei ’eilei ha’arez, holikh golah mirushalim bawelah. 
2_kings 24:16	we’eit kal ’anshei haHayil shiw‘at ’alafim, weheHarash wehamasgeir ’elef, hakol giborim ‘osei milHamah; waywi’eim melekh bawel golah bawelah. 
2_kings 24:17	wayamleikh melekh bawel ’et matanyah dodo taHtaw; wayasseiw ’et shemo zidqiyahu.
2_kings 24:18	ben ‘esrim we’aHat shanah zidqiyahu wemalekho, we’aHat ‘esreih shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, HamiTal HamuTal bat yirmeyahu miliwnah. 
2_kings 24:19	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; kekhol ’asher ‘asah yehoyaqim. 
2_kings 24:20	ki ‘al ’af yhoh hayetah wirushalim uwihudah, ‘ad hishlikho ’otam mei‘al panaw; wayimrod zidqiyahu bemelekh bawel.
2_kings 25:1	wayhi wishnat hateshi‘it lemalekho, baHodesh ha‘asiri be‘asor laHodesh ba newukhadnezar melekh bawel hu wekhal Heilo ‘al yerushalim wayiHan ‘aleha; wayiwnu ‘aleha dayeiq sawiw. 
2_kings 25:2	watawo ha‘ir bamazor; ‘ad ‘ashtei ‘esreih shanah, lamelekh zidqiyahu. 
2_kings 25:3	betish‘ah laHodesh, wayeHecaq hara‘aw ba‘ir; welo hayah leHem le‘am ha’arez. 
2_kings 25:4	watibaqa‘ ha‘ir, wekhal ’anshei hamilHamah halaylah derekh sha‘ar bein haHomotayim, ’asher ‘al gan hamelekh, wekhasdim ‘al ha‘ir sawiw; wayeilekh derekh ha‘arawah. 
2_kings 25:5	wayirdefu Heil kasdim ’aHar hamelekh, wayasigu ’oto be‘arwot yereiHo; wekhal Heilo, nafozu mei‘alaw. 
2_kings 25:6	wayitpesu ’et hamelekh, waya‘alu ’oto ’el melekh bawel riwlatah; waydaberu ’ito mishpaT. 
2_kings 25:7	we’et benei zidqiyahu, shaHaTu le‘einaw; we’et ‘einei zidqiyahu ‘iwweir, waya’asreihu wanHushtayim, waywi’eihu bawel.
2_kings 25:8	uwaHodesh haHamishi beshiw‘ah laHodesh, hi, shenat tesha‘ ‘esreih shanah, lamelekh newukhadnezar melekh bawel; ba newucar’adan raw TabaHim ‘ewed melekh bawel yerushalim. 
2_kings 25:9	wayisrof ’et beit yhoh we’et beit hamelekh; we’eit kal batei yerushalim we’et kal beit gadol saraf ba’eish. 
2_kings 25:10	we’et Homot yerushalim sawiw; natezu kal Heil kasdim, ’asher raw TabaHim. 
2_kings 25:11	we’eit yeter ha‘am hanish’arim ba‘ir, we’et hanofelim ’asher nafelu ‘al hamelekh bawel, we’eit yeter hehamon; heglah newucar’adan raw TabaHim. 
2_kings 25:12	umidalat ha’arez, hish’ir raw TabaHim; lekhoremim uleyogewim. 
2_kings 25:13	we’et ‘amudei haneHoshet ’asher beit yhoh we’et hamekhonot we’et yam haneHoshet ’asher beweit yhoh shiberu khasdim; wayis’u ’et neHushtam bawelah. 
2_kings 25:14	we’et hassirot we’et haya‘im we’et hamcamerot we’et hakapot, we’eit kal kelei haneHoshet ’asher yesharetu wam laqaHu. 
2_kings 25:15	we’et hamaHtot we’et hamicraqot, ’asher cahaw cahaw, wa’asher kesef kasef; laqaH raw TabaHim. 
2_kings 25:16	ha‘amudim shenayim, hayam ha’eHad wehamekhonot, ’asher ‘asah shelomoh leweit yhoh; lo hayah mishqal, linHoshet kal hakeilim ha’eileh. 
2_kings 25:17	shemoneh ‘esreih ’amah qomat ha‘amud ha’eHad, wekhoteret ‘alaw neHoshet weqomat hakoteret shalosh ’amah ’amot usewakhah werimonim ‘al hakoteret sawiw hakol neHoshet; wekha’eileh la‘amud hasheini ‘al hasewakhah. 
2_kings 25:18	wayiqaH raw TabaHim, ’et serayah kohein harosh, we’et zefanyahu kohein mishneh; we’et sheloshet shomerei hassaf. 
2_kings 25:19	umin ha‘ir laqaH saris ’eHad ’asher hu faqid ‘al ’anshei hamilHamah, waHamishah ’anashim meiro’ei fenei hamelekh ’asher nimze’u wa‘ir, we’eit, hassofeir sar hazawa, hamazbi ’et ‘am ha’arez; weshishim ’ish mei‘am ha’arez, hanimze’im ba‘ir. 
2_kings 25:20	wayiqaH ’otam, newucar’adan raw TabaHim; wayolekh ’otam ‘al melekh bawel riwlatah. 
2_kings 25:21	wayakh ’otam melekh bawel waymiteim beriwlah be’erez Hamat; wayigel yehudah mei‘al ’admato. 
2_kings 25:22	weha‘am, hanish’ar be’erez yehudah, ’asher hish’ir, newukhadnezar melekh bawel; wayafqeid ‘aleihem, ’et gedalyahu ben ’aHiqam ben shafan.
2_kings 25:23	wayishme‘u khal sarei haHayalim heimah weha’anashim, ki hifqid melekh bawel ’et gedalyahu, wayawo’u ’el gedalyahu hamizpah; weyishma‘eil ben netanyah weyoHanan ben qareiaH userayah wen tanHumet haneTofati, weya’acanyahu ben hama‘akhati, heimah we’ansheihem. 
2_kings 25:24	wayishawa‘ lahem gedalyahu ule’ansheihem, wayomer lahem, ’al tire’u mei‘awdei hakasdim; shewu wa’arez, we‘iwdu ’et melekh bawel weyiTaw lakhem.
2_kings 25:25	wayhi baHodesh hashewi‘i, ba yishma‘eil ben netanyah ben ’elishama‘ miccera‘ hamelukhah, wa‘asarah ’anashim ’ito, wayaku ’et gedalyahu wayamot; we’et hayehudim we’et hakasdim, ’asher hayu ’ito bamizpah. 
2_kings 25:26	wayaqumu khal ha‘am miqaTon we‘ad gadol wesarei haHayalim, wayawo’u mizrayim; ki yare’u mipenei khasdim.
2_kings 25:27	wayhi wishloshim washewa‘ shanah, legalut yehoyakhin melekh yehudah, bishneim ‘asar Hodesh, be‘esrim weshiw‘ah laHodesh; nasa ’ewil merodakh melekh bawel bishnat malekho, ’et rosh yehoyakhin melekh yehudah mibeit kele. 
2_kings 25:28	waydabeir ’ito Towot; wayitein ’et kis’o, mei‘al, kissei hamelakhim ’asher ’ito bewawel. 
2_kings 25:29	weshina ’eit bigdei khil’o; we’akhal leHem tamid lefanaw kal yemei Hayaw. 
2_kings 25:30	wa’aruHato, ’aruHat tamid nitenah lo mei’eit hamelekh dewar yom beyomo; kol yemei Hayaw. 
isaiah 1:1	Hacon yesha‘yahu wen ’amoz, ’asher Hacah, ‘al yehudah wirushalim; bimei ‘ucciyahu yotam ’aHac yeHicqiyahu malkhei yehudah. 
isaiah 1:2	shim‘u shamayim weha’acini ’erez, ki yhoh dibeir; banim gidalti weromamti, weheim pashe‘u wi. 
isaiah 1:3	yada‘ shor qoneihu, waHamor ’eiwus be‘alaw; yisra’eil lo yada‘, ‘ami lo hitbonan. 
isaiah 1:4	ho go HoTei, ‘am kewed ‘awon, cera‘ merei‘im, banim mashHitim; ‘acewu ’et yhoh ni’azu ’et qedosh yisra’eil nacoru ’aHor. 
isaiah 1:5	‘al meh tuku ‘od tosifu sarah; kal rosh laHoli, wekhal leiwaw dawway. 
isaiah 1:6	mikaf regel we‘ad rosh ’ein bo metom, peza‘ weHaburah umakah Teriyah; lo coru welo Hubashu, welo rukekhah bashamen. 
isaiah 1:7	’arzekhem shemamah, ‘areikhem serufot ’eish; ’admatkhem, lenegdekhem carim ’okhelim ’otah, ushemamah kemahpeikhat carim. 
isaiah 1:8	wenotrah wat ziyon kesukah wekharem; kimlunah wemiqshah ke‘ir nezurah. 
isaiah 1:9	lulei yhoh zewa’ot, hotir lanu sarid kim‘aT; kisdom hayinu, la‘amorah daminu.
isaiah 1:10	shim‘u dewar yhoh qezinei sedom; ha’acinu torat ’eloheinu ‘am ‘amorah. 
isaiah 1:11	lamah li row ciwHeikhem yomar yhoh, sawa‘ti ‘olot ’eilim weHeilew meri’im; wedam parim ukhewasim we‘atudim lo Hafazeti. 
isaiah 1:12	ki tawo’u, leira’ot panay; mi wiqeish cot miyedkhem remos Hazeiray. 
isaiah 1:13	lo tosifu, hawi minHat shaw, qeToret to‘eiwah hi li; Hodesh weshabat qero miqra, lo ’ukhal ’awen wa‘azarah. 
isaiah 1:14	Hadesheikhem umo‘adeikhem sane’ah nafshi, hayu ‘alay laToraH; nil’eiti neso. 
isaiah 1:15	uwefariskhem kapeikhem, ’a‘lim ‘einay mikem, gam ki tarbu tefilah ’eineni shomeia‘; yedeikhem damim malei’u. 
isaiah 1:16	raHazu hiccaku, hasiru roa‘ ma‘aleikhem mineged ‘einay; Hidlu hareia‘. 
isaiah 1:17	limdu heiTeiw dirshu mishpaT ’asheru Hamoz; shifTu yatom, riwu ’almanah.
isaiah 1:18	lekhu na weniwwakheHah yomar yhoh; ’im yihyu HaTa’eikhem kashanim kasheleg yalbinu, ’im ya’dimu khatola‘ kazemer yihyu. 
isaiah 1:19	’im towu ushema‘tem; Tuw ha’arez tokheilu. 
isaiah 1:20	we’im tema’anu umeritem; Herew te’ukelu, ki pi yhoh dibeir.
isaiah 1:21	’eikhah hayetah leconah, qiryah ne’emanah; melei’ati mishpaT, zedeq yalin bah we‘atah merazeHim. 
isaiah 1:22	kaspeikh hayah lesigim; sawe’eikh mahul bamayim. 
isaiah 1:23	sarayikh sorim, weHawrei ganawim, kulo ’oheiw shoHad, werodeif shalmonim; yatom lo yishpoTu, weriw ’almanah lo yawo ’aleihem.
isaiah 1:24	lakhein, ne’um ha’adon yhoh zewa’ot, ’awir yisra’eil; ho ’enaHeim mizaray, we’inaqemah mei’oyway. 
isaiah 1:25	we’ashiwah yadi ‘alayikh, we’ezrof kabor sigayikh; we’asirah kal bedilayikh. 
isaiah 1:26	we’ashiwah shofeTayikh kewarishonah, weyo‘azayikh kewateHilah; ’aHarei khein, yiqarei lakh ‘ir hazedeq, qiryah ne’emanah. 
isaiah 1:27	ziyon bemishpaT tipadeh; weshaweha bizdaqah. 
isaiah 1:28	weshewer poshe‘im weHaTa’im yaHdaw; we‘ocewei yhoh yikhlu. 
isaiah 1:29	ki yeiwoshu, mei’eilim ’asher Hamadtem; wetaHperu, meihaganot ’asher beHartem. 
isaiah 1:30	ki tihyu, ke’eilah nowelet ‘aleha; ukheganah, ’asher mayim ’ein lah. 
isaiah 1:31	wehayah heHason lin‘oret, ufo‘alo lenizoz; uwa‘aru sheneihem yaHdaw we’ein mekhabeh.
isaiah 2:1	hadawar ’asher Hacah, yesha‘yahu ben ’amoz; ‘al yehudah wirushalim. 
isaiah 2:2	wehayah be’aHarit hayamim, nakhon yihyeh har beit yhoh berosh heharim, wenisa migewa‘ot; wenaharu ’eilaw kal hagoyim. 
isaiah 2:3	wehalekhu ‘amim rabim, we’ameru lekhu wena‘aleh ’el har yhoh ’el beit ’elohei ya‘aqow, weyoreinu miderakhaw, weneilekhah be’oreHotaw; ki miziyon teizei torah, udewar yhoh mirushalim. 
isaiah 2:4	weshafaT bein hagoyim, wehokhiaH le‘amim rabim; wekhitetu Harwotam le’itim, waHanitoteihem lemacmeirot, lo yisa go ’el go Herew, welo yilmedu ‘od milHamah.
isaiah 2:5	beit ya‘aqow; lekhu weneilekhah be’or yhoh. 
isaiah 2:6	ki naTashtah, ‘amekha beit ya‘aqow, ki male’u miqedem, we‘onenim kapelishtim; uweyaldei nakherim yaspiqu. 
isaiah 2:7	watimalei ’arzo kesef wecahaw, we’ein qeizeh le’ozerotaw; watimalei ’arzo susim, we’ein qeizeh lemarkewotaw. 
isaiah 2:8	watimalei ’arzo ’elilim; lema‘aseih yadaw yishtaHawu, la’asher ‘asu ’ezbe‘otaw. 
isaiah 2:9	wayishaH ’adam wayishpal ’ish; we’al tisa lahem. 
isaiah 2:10	bo wazur, wehiTamein be‘afar; mipenei paHad yhoh, umeihadar ge’ono. 
isaiah 2:11	‘einei gawhut ’adam shafeil, weshaH rum ’anashim; wenisgaw yhoh lewado bayom hahu.
isaiah 2:12	ki yom yhoh zewa’ot ‘al kal gei’eh waram; we‘al kal nisa weshafeil. 
isaiah 2:13	we‘al kal ’arcei halewanon, haramim wehanisa’im; we‘al kal ’alonei habashan. 
isaiah 2:14	we‘al kal heharim haramim; we‘al kal hagewa‘ot hanisa’ot. 
isaiah 2:15	we‘al kal migdal gawoha; we‘al kal Homah wezurah. 
isaiah 2:16	we‘al kal ’oniyot tarshish; we‘al kal sekhiyot haHemdah. 
isaiah 2:17	weshaH gawhut ha’adam, weshafeil rum ’anashim; wenisgaw yhoh lewado bayom hahu. 
isaiah 2:18	weha’elilim kalil yaHalof. 
isaiah 2:19	uwa’u bim‘arot zurim, uwimHilot ‘afar; mipenei paHad yhoh umeihadar ge’ono, bequmo la‘aroz ha’arez. 
isaiah 2:20	bayom hahu yashlikh ha’adam, ’eit ’elilei khaspo, we’eit ’elilei cehawo; ’asher ‘asu lo lehishtaHawot, laHpor peirot wela‘aTaleifim. 
isaiah 2:21	lawo beniqrot hazurim, uwis‘ifei hassela‘im; mipenei paHad yhoh umeihadar ge’ono, bequmo la‘aroz ha’arez. 
isaiah 2:22	Hidlu lakhem min ha’adam, ’asher neshamah be’apo; ki wameh neHshaw hu.
isaiah 3:1	ki hineih ha’adon yhoh zewa’ot, meisir mirushalim umihudah, mash‘ein umash‘einah; kol mish‘an leHem, wekhol mish‘an mayim. 
isaiah 3:2	gibor we’ish milHamah; shofeiT wenawi weqoseim wecaqein. 
isaiah 3:3	sar Hamishim unesu fanim; weyo‘eiz waHakham Harashim unewon laHash. 
isaiah 3:4	wenatati ne‘arim sareihem; weta‘alulim yimshelu wam. 
isaiah 3:5	wenigas ha‘am, ’ish be’ish we’ish berei‘eihu; yirhawu, hana‘ar baccaqein, wehaniqleh banikhbad. 
isaiah 3:6	ki yitpos ’ish be’aHiw beit ’awiw, simlah lekhah, qazin tihyeh lanu; wehamakhsheilah haccot taHat yadekha. 
isaiah 3:7	yisa wayom hahu leimor lo ’ehyeh Howeish, uweweiti ’ein leHem we’ein simlah; lo tesimuni qezin ‘am. 
isaiah 3:8	ki khashelah yerushalim, wihudah nafal; ki leshonam uma‘aleihem ’el yhoh, lamrot ‘einei khewodo. 
isaiah 3:9	hakarat peneihem ‘anetah bam, weHaTatam kisdom higidu lo khiHeidu; ’o lenafsham, ki gamelu lahem ra‘ah. 
isaiah 3:10	’imru zadiq ki Tow; ki feri ma‘aleihem yokheilu. 
isaiah 3:11	’o lerasha‘ ra‘; ki gemul yadaw yei‘aseh lo. 
isaiah 3:12	‘ami nogesaw me‘oleil, wenashim mashelu wo; ‘ami me’asherekha mat‘im, wederekh ’oreHotekha bilei‘u.
isaiah 3:13	nizaw lariw yhoh; we‘omeid ladin ‘amim. 
isaiah 3:14	yhoh bemishpaT yawo, ‘im ciqnei ‘amo wesaraw; we’atem bi‘artem hakerem, geceilat he‘ani bewateikhem. 
isaiah 3:15	malakhem mah lakhem tedake’u ‘ami, ufenei ‘aniyim tiTHanu; ne’um ’adonay yhoh zewa’ot.
isaiah 3:16	wayomer yhoh ya‘an ki gawehu benot ziyon, wateilakhnah neTwwot neTuyot garon, umesaqerot ‘einayim; halokh weTafof teilakhnah, uweragleihem te‘akasnah. 
isaiah 3:17	wesipaH ’adonay, qadeqod benot ziyon; yhoh patehein ye‘areh.
isaiah 3:18	bayom hahu yasir ’adonay, ’eit tif’eret ha‘akhasim wehashewisim wehasaharonim. 
isaiah 3:19	haneTifot wehasheirot wehare‘alot. 
isaiah 3:20	hape’eirim wehaze‘adot wehaqishurim, uwatei hanefesh wehaleHashim. 
isaiah 3:21	haTaba‘ot wenicmei ha’af. 
isaiah 3:22	hamaHalazot wehama‘aTafot, wehamiTpaHot wehaHariTim. 
isaiah 3:23	wehagilyonim wehassedinim, wehazenifot weharedidim. 
isaiah 3:24	wehayah taHat bosem maq yihyeh, wetaHat Hagorah niqpah wetaHat ma‘aseh miqsheh qareHah, wetaHat petigil maHagoret saq; ki taHat yofi. 
isaiah 3:25	metayikh baHerew yipolu; ugewurateikh bamilHamah. 
isaiah 3:26	we’anu we’awelu petaHeha; weniqatah la’arez teisheiw. 
isaiah 4:1	weheHeciqu shewa‘ nashim be’ish ’eHad, bayom hahu leimor, laHmeinu nokheil, wesimlateinu nilbash; raq, yiqarei shimkha ‘aleinu, ’esof Herpateinu.
isaiah 4:2	bayom hahu, yihyeh zemaH yhoh, lizwi ulekhawod; uferi ha’arez lega’on uletif’eret, lifleiTat yisra’eil. 
isaiah 4:3	wehayah hanish’ar beziyon, wehanotar birushalim, qadosh yei’amer lo; kal hakatuw laHayim birushalim. 
isaiah 4:4	’im raHaz ’adonay, ’eit zo’at benot ziyon, we’et demei yerushalim yadiaH miqirbah; beruaH mishpaT uweruaH ba‘eir. 
isaiah 4:5	uwara yhoh ‘al kal mekhon har ziyon we‘al miqra’eha, ‘anan yomam we‘ashan, wenogah ’eish lehawah layelah; ki ‘al kal kawod Hupah. 
isaiah 4:6	wesukah tihyeh lezeil yomam meiHorew; ulemaHseh ulemistor, miccerem umimaTar.
isaiah 5:1	’ashirah na lididi, shirat dodi lekharmo; kerem hayah lididi beqeren ben shamen. 
isaiah 5:2	way‘acceqeihu waysaqeleihu, wayiTa‘eihu soreiq, wayiwen migdal betokho, wegam yeqew Hazeiw bo; wayqaw la‘asot ‘anawim waya‘as be’ushim. 
isaiah 5:3	we‘atah yosheiw yerushalim we’ish yehudah; shifTu na beini uwein karmi. 
isaiah 5:4	mah la‘asot ‘od lekharmi, welo ‘asiti bo; madua‘ qiwweiti la‘asot ‘anawim waya‘as be’ushim. 
isaiah 5:5	we‘atah ’odi‘ah na ’etkhem, ’eit ’asher ’ani ‘oseh lekharmi; haseir mesukato wehayah lewa‘eir, paroz gedeiro wehayah lemirmas. 
isaiah 5:6	wa’ashiteihu watah, lo yiccameir welo yei‘adeir, we‘alah shamir washayit; we‘al he‘awim ’azawweh, meihamTir ‘alaw maTar. 
isaiah 5:7	ki kherem yhoh zewa’ot beit yisra’eil, we’ish yehudah, neTa‘ sha‘ashu‘aw; wayqaw lemishpaT wehineih mispaH, lizdaqah wehineih ze‘aqah.
isaiah 5:8	ho, magi‘ei wayit bewayit, sadeh wesadeh yaqriwu; ‘ad ’efes maqom, wehushawtem lewadekhem beqerew ha’arez. 
isaiah 5:9	be’acenay yhoh zewa’ot; ’im lo batim rabim leshamah yihyu, gedolim weTowim mei’ein yosheiw. 
isaiah 5:10	ki, ‘aseret zimdei kherem, ya‘asu bat ’eHat; wecera‘ Homer ya‘aseh ’eifah.
isaiah 5:11	ho mashkimei waboqer sheikhar yirdofu; me’aHarei waneshef, yayin yadliqeim. 
isaiah 5:12	wehayah khinor wanewel, tof weHalil wayayin mishteihem; we’eit po‘al yhoh lo yabiTu, uma‘aseih yadaw lo ra’u. 
isaiah 5:13	lakhein galah ‘ami mibeli da‘at; ukhewodo metei ra‘aw, wahamono ziHeih zama. 
isaiah 5:14	lakhein, hirHiwah she’ol nafshah, ufa‘arah fiha liwli Hoq; weyarad hadarah wahamonah ushe’onah we‘aleic bah. 
isaiah 5:15	wayishaH ’adam wayishpal ’ish; we‘einei gewohim tishpalnah. 
isaiah 5:16	wayigbah yhoh zewa’ot bamishpaT; weha’eil haqadosh, niqdash bizdaqah. 
isaiah 5:17	wera‘u khewasim kedaweram; weHarewot meiHim garim yokheilu. 
isaiah 5:18	ho moshekhei he‘awon beHawlei hashaw; wekha‘awot ha‘agalah HaTa’ah. 
isaiah 5:19	ha’omerim, yemaheir yaHishah ma‘aseihu lema‘an nir’eh; wetiqraw wetawo’ah, ‘azat qedosh yisra’eil weneida‘ah.
isaiah 5:20	ho ha’omerim lara‘ Tow welaTow ra‘; samim Hoshekh le’or we’or leHoshekh, samim mar lematoq umatoq lemar.
isaiah 5:21	ho Hakhamim be‘eineihem; weneged peneihem newonim. 
isaiah 5:22	ho giborim lishtot yayin; we’anshei Hayil limsokh sheikhar. 
isaiah 5:23	mazdiqei rasha‘ ‘eiqew shoHad; wezidqat zadiqim yasiru mimenu.
isaiah 5:24	lakhein ke’ekhol qash leshon ’eish, waHashash lehawah yirpeh, sharesham kamaq yihyeh, ufirHam ka’awaq ya‘aleh; ki ma’asu, ’eit torat yhoh zewa’ot, we’eit ’imrat qedosh yisra’eil ni’eizu. 
isaiah 5:25	‘al kein Harah ’af yhoh be‘amo wayeiT yado ‘alaw wayakeihu, wayirgecu heharim, watehi niwlatam kassuHah beqerew Huzot; bekhal cot lo shaw ’apo, we‘od yado neTuyah. 
isaiah 5:26	wenasa neis lagoyim meiraHoq, wesharaq lo miqzeih ha’arez; wehineih meheirah qal yawo. 
isaiah 5:27	’ein ‘ayeif we’ein kosheil bo, lo yanum welo yishan; welo niftaH ’eicor Halazaw, welo nitaq serokh ne‘alaw. 
isaiah 5:28	’asher Hizaw shenunim, wekhal qashetotaw derukhot; parsot susaw kazar neHshawu, wegalgilaw kassufah. 
isaiah 5:29	she’agah lo kalawi; wesha’ag yish’ag kakefirim weyinhom weyoHeic Teref, weyafliT we’ein mazil. 
isaiah 5:30	weyinhom ‘alaw bayom hahu kenahamat yam; wenibaT la’arez wehineih Hoshekh, zar wa’or, Hashakh ba‘arifeha.
isaiah 6:1	bishnat mot hamelekh ‘ucciyahu, wa’er’eh ’et ’adonay yosheiw ‘al kissei ram wenisa; weshulaw melei’im ’et haheikhal. 
isaiah 6:2	serafim ‘omedim mima‘al lo, sheish kenafayim sheish kenafayim le’eHad; bishtayim yekhasseh fanaw, uwishtayim yekhasseh raglaw uwishtayim ye‘ofeif. 
isaiah 6:3	weqara ceh ’el ceh we’amar, qadosh qadosh qadosh yhoh zewa’ot; melo khal ha’arez kewodo. 
isaiah 6:4	wayanu‘u ’amot hassipim, miqol haqorei; wehabayit yimalei ‘ashan. 
isaiah 6:5	wa’omar ’o li khi nidmeiti, ki ’ish Temei sefatayim ’anokhi, uwetokh ‘am Temei sefatayim, ’anokhi yosheiw; ki, ’et hamelekh yhoh zewa’ot ra’u ‘einay. 
isaiah 6:6	waya‘af ’eilay, ’eHad min haserafim, uweyado rizpah; bemelqaHayim, laqaH mei‘al hamicbeiaH. 
isaiah 6:7	wayaga‘ ‘al pi, wayomer hineih naga‘ ceh ‘al sefatekha; wesar ‘awonekha, weHaTatekha tekhupar. 
isaiah 6:8	wa’eshma‘ ’et qol ’adonay ’omeir, ’et mi ’eshlaH umi yeilekh lanu; wa’omar hini shelaHeini. 
isaiah 6:9	wayomer leikh we’amarta la‘am hacceh; shim‘u shamoa‘ we’al tawinu, ure’u ra’o we’al teida‘u. 
isaiah 6:10	hashmein leiw ha‘am hacceh, we’acenaw hakhbeid we‘einaw hasha‘; pen yir’eh we‘einaw uwe’acenaw yishma‘, ulewawo yawin washaw werafa lo. 
isaiah 6:11	wa’omar ‘ad matay ’adonay; wayomer ‘ad ’asher ’im sha’u ‘arim mei’ein yosheiw, uwatim mei’ein ’adam, weha’adamah tisha’eh shemamah. 
isaiah 6:12	weriHaq yhoh ’et ha’adam; werabah ha‘acuwah beqerew ha’arez. 
isaiah 6:13	we‘od bah ‘asiriyah, weshawah wehayetah lewa‘eir; ka’eilah wekha’alon, ’asher beshalekhet mazewet bam, cera‘ qodesh mazawtah.
isaiah 7:1	wayhi bimei ’aHac ben yotam ben ‘ucciyahu melekh yehudah, ‘alah rezin melekh ’aram ufeqaH ben remalyahu melekh yisra’eil yerushalim, lamilHamah ‘aleha; welo yakhol lehilaHeim ‘aleha. 
isaiah 7:2	wayugad, leweit dawid leimor, naHah ’aram ‘al ’efrayim; wayana‘ lewawo ulewaw ‘amo, kenoa‘ ‘azei ya‘ar mipenei ruaH. 
isaiah 7:3	wayomer yhoh ’el yesha‘yahu zei na liqrat ’aHac, ’atah ushe’ar yashuw benekha; ’el qezeih, te‘alat habereikhah ha‘elyonah, ’el mesilat sedeih khoweis. 
isaiah 7:4	we’amarta ’eilaw hishameir wehashqeiT ’al tira, ulewawekha ’al yeirakh, mishenei canwot ha’udim ha‘asheinim ha’eileh; baHori ’af rezin wa’aram uwen remalyahu. 
isaiah 7:5	ya‘an, ki ya‘az ‘alekha ’aram ra‘ah; ’efrayim uwen remalyahu leimor. 
isaiah 7:6	na‘aleh wihudah uneqizenah, wenawqi‘enah ’eileinu; wenamlikh melekh betokhah, ’eit ben Tawe’al.
isaiah 7:7	koh ’amar ’adonay yhoh; lo taqum welo tihyeh.
