isaiah 7:8	ki rosh ’aram dameseq, werosh dameseq rezin; uwe‘od, shishim weHameish shanah, yeiHat ’efrayim mei‘am. 
isaiah 7:9	werosh ’efrayim shomeron, werosh shomeron ben remalyahu; ’im lo ta’aminu, ki lo tei’ameinu.
isaiah 7:10	wayosef yhoh, dabeir ’el ’aHac leimor. 
isaiah 7:11	she’al lekha ’ot, mei‘im yhoh ’elohekha; ha‘meiq she’alah, ’o hagbeiah lema‘elah. 
isaiah 7:12	wayomer ’aHac; lo ’esh’al welo ’anasseh ’et yhoh. 
isaiah 7:13	wayomer shim‘u na beit dawid; ham‘aT mikem hal’ot ’anashim, ki tal’u gam ’et ’elohay. 
isaiah 7:14	lakhein yitein ’adonay hu lakhem ’ot; hineih ha‘almah, harah weyoledet bein, weqarat shemo ‘imanu ’eil. 
isaiah 7:15	Hem’ah udewash yokheil; leda‘to ma’os bara‘ uwaHor baTow. 
isaiah 7:16	ki beTerem yeida‘ hana‘ar ma’os bara‘ uwaHor baTow; tei‘aceiw ha’adamah ’asher ’atah qaz, mipenei shenei melakheha. 
isaiah 7:17	yawi yhoh ‘alekha, we‘al ‘amekha we‘al beit ’awikha yamim ’asher lo wa’u, lemiyom sur ’efrayim mei‘al yehudah; ’eit melekh ’ashur.
isaiah 7:18	wehayah bayom hahu, yishroq yhoh laccewuw, ’asher biqzeih ye’orei mizrayim; weladeworah, ’asher be’erez ’ashur. 
isaiah 7:19	uwa’u wenaHu khulam benaHalei habatot, uwinqiqei hassela‘im; uwekhol hana‘azuzim, uwekhol hanahalolim. 
isaiah 7:20	bayom hahu yegalaH ’adonay beta‘ar hasekhirah be‘ewrei nahar bemelekh ’ashur, ’et harosh wesa‘ar haraglayim; wegam ’et haccaqan tispeh.
isaiah 7:21	wehayah bayom hahu; yeHayeh ’ish ‘eglat baqar ushetei zon. 
isaiah 7:22	wehayah, meirow ‘asot Halaw yokhal Hem’ah; ki Hem’ah udewash yokheil, kal hanotar beqerew ha’arez. 
isaiah 7:23	wehayah bayom hahu, yihyeh khal maqom, ’asher yihyeh sham ’elef gefen be’elef kasef; lashamir welashayit yihyeh. 
isaiah 7:24	baHizim uwaqeshet yawo shamah; ki shamir washayit tihyeh khal ha’arez. 
isaiah 7:25	wekhol heharim, ’asher bama‘deir yei‘adeirun, lo tawo shamah, yir’at shamir washayit; wehayah lemishlaH shor, ulemirmas seh.
isaiah 8:1	wayomer yhoh ’eilay, qaH lekha gilayon gadol; ukhetow ‘alaw beHereT ’enosh, lemaheir shalal Hash bac. 
isaiah 8:2	we’a‘idah li, ‘eidim ne’emanim; ’eit ’uriyah hakohein, we’et cekharyahu ben yewerekhyahu. 
isaiah 8:3	wa’eqraw ’el hanewi’ah, watahar wateiled bein; wayomer yhoh ’eilay, qera shemo, maheir shalal Hash bac. 
isaiah 8:4	ki, beTerem yeida‘ hana‘ar, qero ’awi we’imi; yisa ’et Heil dameseq, we’eit shelal shomeron, lifnei melekh ’ashur.
isaiah 8:5	wayosef yhoh, dabeir ’eilay ‘od leimor. 
isaiah 8:6	ya‘an, ki ma’as ha‘am hacceh, ’eit mei hashiloaH, haholekhim le’aT; umesos ’et rezin uwen remalyahu. 
isaiah 8:7	welakhein hineih ’adonay ma‘aleh ‘aleihem ’et mei hanahar, ha‘azumim weharabim, ’et melekh ’ashur we’et kal kewodo; we‘alah ‘al kal ’afiqaw, wehalakh ‘al kal gedotaw. 
isaiah 8:8	weHalaf bihudah shaTaf we‘awar, ‘ad zawwar yagia‘; wehayah muTot kenafaw, melo roHaw ’arzekha ‘imanu ’eil.
isaiah 8:9	ro‘u ‘amim waHotu, weha’acinu, kol merHaqei ’arez; hit’acceru waHotu, hit’acceru waHotu. 
isaiah 8:10	‘uzu ‘eizah wetufar; daberu dawar welo yaqum, ki ‘imanu ’eil.
isaiah 8:11	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’eilay keHecqat hayad; weyissereini milekhet bederekh ha‘am hacceh leimor. 
isaiah 8:12	lo tomerun qesher, lekhol ’asher yomar ha‘am hacceh qasher; we’et mora’o lo tire’u welo ta‘arizu. 
isaiah 8:13	’et yhoh zewa’ot ’oto taqdishu; wehu mora’akhem wehu ma‘arizkhem. 
isaiah 8:14	wehayah lemiqdash; ule’ewen negef ulezur mikhshol lishnei watei yisra’eil lefaH ulemoqeish, leyosheiw yerushalim. 
isaiah 8:15	wekhashelu wam rabim; wenafelu wenishbaru, wenoqshu wenilkadu.
isaiah 8:16	zor te‘udah; Hatom torah belimuday. 
isaiah 8:17	weHikiti yhoh, hamastir panaw mibeit ya‘aqow; weqiwweiti lo. 
isaiah 8:18	hineih ’anokhi, wehayladim ’asher natan li yhoh, le’otot ulemoftim beyisra’eil; mei‘im yhoh zewa’ot, hashokhein behar ziyon.
isaiah 8:19	wekhi yomeru ’aleikhem, dirshu ’el ha’owot we’el hayide‘onim, hamzafzefim wehamahgim; halo ‘am ’el ’elohaw yidrosh, be‘ad haHayim ’el hameitim. 
isaiah 8:20	letorah welit‘udah; ’im lo yomeru kadawar hacceh, ’asher ’ein lo shaHar. 
isaiah 8:21	we‘awar bah niqsheh wera‘eiw; wehayah khi yir‘aw wehitqazaf, weqileil bemalko uweilohaw ufanah lema‘elah. 
isaiah 8:22	we’el ’erez yabiT; wehineih zarah waHasheikhah me‘uf zuqah, wa’afeilah menudaH. 
isaiah 9:1	ki lo mu‘af la’asher muzaq lah ka‘eit harishon, heiqal ’arzah cewulun we’arzah naftali, weha’aHaron hikhbid; derekh hayam ‘eiwer hayardein, gelil hagoyim. 
isaiah 9:2	ha‘am haholekhim baHoshekh, ra’u ’or gadol; yoshewei be’erez zalmawet, ’or nagah ‘aleihem. 
isaiah 9:3	hirbita hago, lo lo higdalta hasimHah; sameHu lefanekha kesimHat baqazir, ka’asher yagilu beHaleqam shalal. 
isaiah 9:4	ki ’et ‘ol subolo, we’eit maTeih shikhmo, sheiweT hanogeis bo; haHitota keyom midyan. 
isaiah 9:5	ki khal se’on so’ein bera‘ash, wesimlah megolalah wedamim; wehayetah lisreifah ma’akholet ’eish. 
isaiah 9:6	ki yeled yulad lanu, bein nitan lanu, watehi hamisrah ‘al shikhmo; wayiqra shemo pele yo‘eiz ’eil gibor, ’awi‘ad sar shalom. 
isaiah 9:7	lemarbeih lemarbeih hamisrah uleshalom ’ein qeiz, ‘al kissei dawid we‘al mamlakhto, lehakhin ’otah ulesa‘adah, bemishpaT uwizdaqah; mei‘atah we‘ad ‘olam, qin’at yhoh zewa’ot ta‘aseh cot.
isaiah 9:8	dawar shalaH ’adonay beya‘aqow; wenafal beyisra’eil. 
isaiah 9:9	weyade‘u ha‘am kulo, ’efrayim weyosheiw shomeron; bega’awah uwegodel leiwaw leimor. 
isaiah 9:10	leweinim nafalu wegacit niwneh; shiqmim guda‘u, wa’aracim naHalif. 
isaiah 9:11	waysageiw yhoh ’et zarei rezin ‘alaw; we’et ’oyewaw yesakhseikh. 
isaiah 9:12	’aram miqedem, ufelishtim mei’aHor, wayokhelu ’et yisra’eil bekhal peh; bekhal cot lo shaw ’apo, we‘od yado neTuyah. 
isaiah 9:13	weha‘am lo shaw ‘ad hamakeihu; we’et yhoh zewa’ot lo darashu.
isaiah 9:14	wayakhreit yhoh miyisra’eil, rosh wecanaw kipah we’agmon yom ’eHad. 
isaiah 9:15	caqein unesu fanim hu harosh; wenawi moreh sheqer hu haccanaw. 
isaiah 9:16	wayihyu me’asherei ha‘am hacceh mat‘im; ume’usharaw mewula‘im. 
isaiah 9:17	‘al kein ‘al baHuraw lo yismaH ’adonay, we’et yetomaw we’et ’almenotaw lo yeraHeim, ki khulo Haneif umeira‘, wekhal peh doweir newalah; bekhal cot lo shaw ’apo, we‘od yado neTuyah. 
isaiah 9:18	ki wa‘arah kha’eish rish‘ah, shamir washayit tokheil; watizat besiwkhei haya‘ar, wayit’abekhu gei’ut ‘ashan. 
isaiah 9:19	be‘ewrat yhoh zewa’ot ne‘tam ’arez; wayhi ha‘am kema’akholet ’eish, ’ish ’el ’aHiw lo yaHmolu. 
isaiah 9:20	wayigcor ‘al yamin wera‘eiw, wayokhal ‘al semol welo sawei‘u; ’ish besar cero‘o yokheilu. 
isaiah 9:21	menasheh ’et ’efrayim, we’efrayim ’et menasheh, yaHdaw heimah ‘al yehudah; bekhal cot lo shaw ’apo, we‘od yado neTuyah.
isaiah 10:1	ho haHoqeqim Hiqei ’awen; umekhatewim ‘amal kiteiwu. 
isaiah 10:2	lehaTot midin dalim, weligcol mishpaT ‘aniyei ‘ami; lihyot ’almanot shelalam, we’et yetomim yawoccu. 
isaiah 10:3	umah ta‘asu leyom pequdah, ulesho’ah mimerHaq tawo; ‘al mi tanusu le‘ecrah, we’anah ta‘acwu kewodkhem. 
isaiah 10:4	bilti khara‘ taHat ’assir, wetaHat harugim yipolu; bekhal cot lo shaw ’apo, we‘od yado neTuyah.
isaiah 10:5	ho ’ashur sheiweT ’api; umaTeh hu weyadam ca‘mi. 
isaiah 10:6	bego Haneif ’ashaleHenu, we‘al ‘am ‘ewrati ’azawwenu; lishlol shalal welawoc bac, ulesimo ulesumo mirmas keHomer Huzot. 
isaiah 10:7	wehu lo khein yedameh, ulewawo lo khein yaHshow; ki lehashmid bilwawo, ulehakhrit goyim lo me‘aT. 
isaiah 10:8	ki yomar; halo saray yaHdaw melakhim. 
isaiah 10:9	halo kekharkemish kalno; ’im lo khe’arpad Hamat, ’im lo khedameseq shomeron. 
isaiah 10:10	ka’asher maze’ah yadi, lemamlekhot ha’elil; ufesileihem, mirushalim umishomeron. 
isaiah 10:11	halo, ka’asher ‘asiti leshomeron wele’elileha; kein ’e‘eseh lirushalim wela‘azabeha.
isaiah 10:12	wehayah, ki yewaza‘ ’adonay ’et kal ma‘aseihu, behar ziyon uwirushalim; ’efqod, ‘al peri godel lewaw melekh ’ashur, we‘al tif’eret rum ‘einaw. 
isaiah 10:13	ki ’amar, bekhoaH yadi ‘asiti, uweHakhemati ki newunoti; we’asir gewulot ‘amim, wa‘atidoteihem wa‘atudoteihem shoseiti, we’orid kabir yoshewim. 
isaiah 10:14	watimza khaqein yadi leHeil ha‘amim, wekhe’esof beizim ‘acuwot, kal ha’arez ’ani ’asafeti; welo hayah nodeid kanaf, ufozeh feh umezafzeif. 
isaiah 10:15	hayitpa’eir hagarcen, ‘al haHozeiw bo; ’im yitgadeil hamasor ‘al menifo, kehanif sheiweT we’et merimaw, keharim maTeh lo ‘eiz. 
isaiah 10:16	lakhein yeshalaH ha’adon yhoh zewa’ot bemishmanaw racon; wetaHat kewodo yeiqad yeqod kiqod ’eish. 
isaiah 10:17	wehayah ’or yisra’eil le’eish, uqedosho lelehawah; uwa‘arah, we’akhelah shito ushemiro beyom ’eHad. 
isaiah 10:18	ukhewod ya‘ro wekharmilo, minefesh we‘ad basar yekhaleh; wehayah kimsos noseis. 
isaiah 10:19	ushe’ar ‘eiz ya‘ro mispar yihyu; wena‘ar yikhteweim.
isaiah 10:20	wehayah bayom hahu, lo yosif ‘od she’ar yisra’eil ufeleiTat beit ya‘aqow, lehisha‘ein ‘al makeihu; wenish‘an, ‘al yhoh qedosh yisra’eil be’emet. 
isaiah 10:21	she’ar yashuw she’ar ya‘aqow; ’el ’eil gibor. 
isaiah 10:22	ki ’im yihyeh ‘amekha yisra’eil keHol hayam, she’ar yashuw bo; kilayon Haruz shoTeif zedaqah. 
isaiah 10:23	ki khalah weneHerazah; ’adonay yhoh zewa’ot, ‘oseh beqerew kal ha’arez.
isaiah 10:24	lakhein, koh ’amar ’adonay yhoh zewa’ot, ’al tira ‘ami yosheiw ziyon mei’ashur; basheiweT yakekah, umaTeihu yisa ‘alekha bederekh mizrayim. 
isaiah 10:25	ki ‘od me‘aT mic‘ar; wekhalah ca‘am, we’api ‘al tawlitam. 
isaiah 10:26	we‘oreir ‘alaw yhoh zewa’ot shoT, kemakat midyan bezur ‘oreiw; umaTeihu ‘al hayam, unesa’o bederekh mizrayim. 
isaiah 10:27	wehayah bayom hahu, yasur subolo mei‘al shikhmekha, we‘ulo mei‘al zawwarekha; weHubal ‘ol mipenei shamen. 
isaiah 10:28	ba ‘al ‘ayat ‘awar bemigron; lemikhmas yafqid keilaw. 
isaiah 10:29	‘aweru ma‘barah, gewa‘ malon lanu; Haredah haramah, giw‘at sha’ul nasah. 
isaiah 10:30	zahali qoleikh bat galim; haqshiwi layshah ‘aniyah ‘anatot. 
isaiah 10:31	nadedah madmeinah; yoshewei hageiwim hei‘icu. 
isaiah 10:32	‘od hayom benow la‘amod; yenofeif yado har beit bat ziyon, giw‘at yerushalim.
isaiah 10:33	hineih ha’adon yhoh zewa’ot, mesa‘eif purah bema‘arazah; weramei haqomah gedu‘im, wehagewohim yishpalu. 
isaiah 10:34	weniqaf siwkhei haya‘ar babarcel; wehalewanon be’adir yipol.
isaiah 11:1	weyaza HoTer migeica‘ yishay; weneizer misharashaw yifreh. 
isaiah 11:2	wenaHah ‘alaw ruaH yhoh; ruaH Hakhmah uwinah, ruaH ‘eizah ugewurah, ruaH da‘at weyir’at yhoh. 
isaiah 11:3	wahariHo beyir’at yhoh; welo lemar’eih ‘einaw yishpoT, welo lemishma‘ ’acenaw yokhiaH. 
isaiah 11:4	weshafaT bezedeq dalim, wehokhiaH bemishor le‘anwei ’arez; wehikah ’erez besheiweT piw, uweruaH sefataw yamit rasha‘. 
isaiah 11:5	wehayah zedeq ’eicor matenaw; weha’emunah ’eicor Halazaw. 
isaiah 11:6	wegar ce’eiw ‘im kewes, wenameir ‘im gedi yirbaz; we‘eigel ukhefir umeri yaHdaw, wena‘ar qaTon noheig bam. 
isaiah 11:7	ufarah wadow tir‘enah, yaHdaw yirbezu yaldeihen; we’aryeih kabaqar yokhal tewen. 
isaiah 11:8	weshi‘asha‘ yoneiq ‘al Hur paten; we‘al me’urat zif‘oni, gamul yado hadah. 
isaiah 11:9	lo yarei‘u welo yashHitu bekhal har qadshi ki male’ah ha’arez, dei‘ah ’et yhoh, kamayim layam mekhassim.
isaiah 11:10	wehayah bayom hahu, shoresh yishay, ’asher ‘omeid leneis ‘amim, ’eilaw goyim yidroshu; wehayetah menuHato kawod.
isaiah 11:11	wehayah bayom hahu, yosif ’adonay sheinit yado, liqnot ’et she’ar ‘amo; ’asher yisha’eir mei’ashur umimizrayim umipatros umikush, umei‘eilam umishin‘ar umeiHamat, umei’iyei hayam. 
isaiah 11:12	wenasa neis lagoyim, we’asaf nidHei yisra’eil; unefuzot yehudah yeqabeiz, mei’arba‘ kanfot ha’arez. 
isaiah 11:13	wesarah qin’at ’efrayim, wezorerei yehudah yikareitu; ’efrayim lo yeqanei ’et yehudah, wihudah lo yazor ’et ’efrayim. 
isaiah 11:14	we‘afu wekhateif pelishtim yamah, yaHdaw yawoccu ’et benei qedem; ’edom umo’aw mishloH yadam, uwenei ‘amon mishma‘tam. 
isaiah 11:15	weheHerim yhoh ’eit leshon yam mizrayim, weheinif yado ‘al hanahar ba‘yam ruHo; wehikahu leshiw‘ah neHalim, wehidrikh bane‘alim. 
isaiah 11:16	wehayetah mesilah, lish’ar ‘amo, ’asher yisha’eir mei’ashur; ka’asher hayetah leyisra’eil, beyom ‘aloto mei’erez mizrayim. 
isaiah 12:1	we’amarta bayom hahu, ’odkha yhoh, ki ’anafta bi; yashow ’apekha utenaHameini. 
isaiah 12:2	hineih ’eil yeshu‘ati ’ewTaH welo ’efHad; ki ‘acci wecimrat yah yhoh, wayhi li lishu‘ah. 
isaiah 12:3	ushe’awtem mayim besason; mima‘aynei hayshu‘ah. 
isaiah 12:4	wa’amartem bayom hahu, hodu yhoh qir’u wishmo, hodi‘u wa‘amim ‘alilotaw; hackiru ki nisgaw shemo. 
isaiah 12:5	cameru yhoh, ki gei’ut ‘asah; meyuda‘at muda‘at cot bekhal ha’arez. 
isaiah 12:6	zahali waroni yoshewet ziyon; ki gadol beqirbeikh qedosh yisra’eil.
isaiah 13:1	masa bawel; ’asher Hacah, yesha‘yahu ben ’amoz. 
isaiah 13:2	‘al har nishpeh se’u neis, harimu qol lahem; hanifu yad, weyawo’u pitHei nediwim. 
isaiah 13:3	’ani ziwweiti limqudashay; gam qarati giboray le’api, ‘alicei ga’awati. 
isaiah 13:4	qol hamon beharim demut ‘am raw; qol she’on mamlekhot goyim ne’esafim, yhoh zewa’ot, mefaqeid zewa milHamah. 
isaiah 13:5	ba’im mei’erez merHaq miqzeih hashamayim; yhoh ukhelei ca‘mo, leHabeil kal ha’arez. 
isaiah 13:6	heililu ki qarow yom yhoh; keshod mishaday yawo. 
isaiah 13:7	‘al kein kal yadayim tirpenah; wekhal lewaw ’enosh yimas 
isaiah 13:8	weniwhalu zirim waHawalim yoHeicun, kayoleidah yeHilun; ’ish ’el rei‘eihu yitmahu, penei lehawim peneihem. 
isaiah 13:9	hineih yom yhoh ba, ’akhcari we‘ewrah waHaron ’af; lasum ha’arez leshamah, weHaTa’eha yashmid mimenah. 
isaiah 13:10	ki khokhwei hashamayim ukhesileihem, lo yaheilu ’oram; Hashakh hashemesh bezeito, weyareiaH lo yagiha ’oro. 
isaiah 13:11	ufaqadti ‘al teiweil ra‘ah, we‘al resha‘im ‘awonam; wehishbati ge’on ceidim, wega’awat ‘arizim ’ashpil. 
isaiah 13:12	’oqir ’enosh mipac; we’adam miketem ’ofir. 
isaiah 13:13	‘al kein shamayim ’argic, wetir‘ash ha’arez mimeqomah; be‘ewrat yhoh zewa’ot, uweyom Haron ’apo. 
isaiah 13:14	wehayah kizwi mudaH, ukhezon we’ein meqabeiz; ’ish ’el ‘amo yifnu, we’ish ’el ’arzo yanusu. 
isaiah 13:15	kal hanimza yidaqeir; wekhal hanispeh yipol beHarew. 
isaiah 13:16	we‘oleleihem yeruTeshu le‘eineihem; yishassu bateihem, unesheihem tishagalnah tishakhawnah. 
isaiah 13:17	hini mei‘ir ‘aleihem ’et maday; ’asher kesef lo yaHshowu, wecahaw lo yaHpezu wo. 
isaiah 13:18	uqeshatot ne‘arim teraTashnah; uferi weTen lo yeraHeimu, ‘al banim lo taHus ‘einam. 
isaiah 13:19	wehayetah wawel zewi mamlakhot, tif’eret ge’on kasdim; kemahpeikhat ’elohim, ’et sedom we’et ‘amorah. 
isaiah 13:20	lo teisheiw lanezaH, welo tishkon ‘ad dor wador; welo yaheil sham ‘arawi, wero‘im lo yarbizu sham. 
isaiah 13:21	werawezu sham ziyim, umale’u wateihem ’oHim; weshakhenu sham benot ya‘anah, use‘irim yeraqedu sham. 
isaiah 13:22	we‘anah ’iyim be’almnotaw, wetanim beheikhelei ‘oneg; weqarow lawo ‘itah, weyameha lo yimasheikhu. 
isaiah 14:1	ki yeraHeim yhoh ’et ya‘aqow, uwaHar ‘od beyisra’eil, wehiniHam ‘al ’admatam; wenilwah hageir ‘aleihem, wenispeHu ‘al beit ya‘aqow. 
isaiah 14:2	uleqaHum ‘amim wehewi’um ’el meqomam wehitnaHalum beit yisra’eil, ‘al ’admat yhoh, la‘awadim welishfaHot; wehayu showim leshoweihem, weradu benogeseihem.
isaiah 14:3	wehayah, beyom haniaH yhoh lekha, mei‘azebekha umeiragecekha; umin ha‘awodah haqashah ’asher ‘ubad bakh. 
isaiah 14:4	wenasata hamashal hacceh ‘al melekh bawel we’amareta; ’eikh shawat nogeis, shawetah madheiwah. 
isaiah 14:5	shawar yhoh maTeih resha‘im; sheiweT moshelim. 
isaiah 14:6	makeh ‘amim be‘ewrah, makat bilti sarah; rodeh wa’af goyim, murdaf beli Hasakh. 
isaiah 14:7	naHah shaqeTah kal ha’arez; pazeHu rinah. 
isaiah 14:8	gam beroshim sameHu lekha ’arcei lewanon; mei’ac shakhawta, lo ya‘aleh hakoreit ‘aleinu. 
isaiah 14:9	she’ol, mitaHat ragecah lekha liqrat bo’ekha; ‘oreir lekha refa’im kal ‘atudei ’arez, heiqim mikis’otam, kol malkhei goyim. 
isaiah 14:10	kulam ya‘anu, weyomeru ’eilekha; gam ’atah Huleita khamonu ’eileinu nimshaleta. 
isaiah 14:11	hurad she’ol ge’onekha hemyat newalekha; taHtekha yuza‘ rimah, umekhassekha tolei‘ah. 
isaiah 14:12	’eikh nafalta mishamayim heileil ben shaHar; nigda‘ta la’arez, Holeish ‘al goyim. 
isaiah 14:13	we’atah ’amarta wilwawekha hashamayim ’e‘eleh, mima‘al lekhokhwei ’eil ’arim kis’i; we’eisheiw behar mo‘eid beyarketei zafon. 
isaiah 14:14	’e‘eleh ‘al bamotei ‘aw; ’edameh le‘elyon. 
isaiah 14:15	’akh ’el she’ol turad ’el yarketei wor. 
isaiah 14:16	ro’ekha ’eilekha yashgiHu, ’eilekha yitbonanu; haceh ha’ish margic ha’arez, mar‘ish mamlakhot. 
isaiah 14:17	sam teiweil kamidbar we‘araw haras; ’asiraw lo fataH bayetah. 
isaiah 14:18	kal malkhei goyim kulam; shakhewu wekhawod ’ish beweito. 
isaiah 14:19	we’atah hashelakhta miqiwrekha keneizer nit‘aw, lewush harugim meTo‘anei Harew; yordei ’el ’awnei wor kefeger muwas. 
isaiah 14:20	lo teiHad ’itam biqwurah, ki ’arzekha shiHata ‘amekha harageta; lo yiqarei le‘olam cera‘ merei‘im. 
isaiah 14:21	hakhinu lewanaw maTbeiaH ba‘awon ’awotam; bal yaqumu weyareshu ’arez, umale’u fenei teiweil ‘arim. 
isaiah 14:22	weqamti ‘aleihem, ne’um yhoh zewa’ot; wehikhrati lewawel sheim ushe’ar wenin wanekhed ne’um yhoh. 
isaiah 14:23	wesamtiha lemorash qipod we’agmei mayim; weTeiTeitiha bemaT’aTei hashmeid, ne’um yhoh zewa’ot.
isaiah 14:24	nishba‘ yhoh zewa’ot leimor; ’im lo ka’asher dimiti kein hayatah, wekha’asher ya‘azti hi taqum. 
isaiah 14:25	lishbor ’ashur be’arzi, we‘al haray ’awusenu; wesar mei‘aleihem ‘ulo, wesubolo, mei‘al shikhmo yasur. 
isaiah 14:26	cot ha‘eizah haye‘uzah ‘al kal ha’arez; wecot hayad haneTuyah ‘al kal hagoyim. 
isaiah 14:27	ki yhoh zewa’ot ya‘az umi yafeir; weyado haneTuyah umi yeshiwenah.
isaiah 14:28	bishnat mot hamelekh ’aHac; hayah hamasa hacceh. 
isaiah 14:29	’al tismeHi feleshet kuleikh, ki nishbar sheiweT makeikh; ki mishoresh naHash yeizei zefa‘, ufiryo saraf me‘ofeif. 
isaiah 14:30	wera‘u bekhorei dalim, we’ewyonim laweTaH yirbazu; weheimati wara‘aw sharesheikh, ushe’eiriteikh yaharog. 
isaiah 14:31	heilili sha‘ar ca‘aqi ‘ir, namog peleshet kuleikh; ki mizafon ‘ashan ba, we’ein bodeid bemo‘adaw. 
isaiah 14:32	umah ya‘aneh mal’akhei go; ki yhoh yissad ziyon, uwah yeHesu ‘aniyei ‘amo.
isaiah 15:1	masa mo’aw; ki beleil shudad ‘ar mo’aw nidmah, ki, beleil shudad qir mo’aw nidmah. 
isaiah 15:2	‘alah habayit wediwon habamot lewekhi; ‘al newo we‘al meidewa mo’aw yeyeilil, bekhal roshaw qareHah, kal caqan geru‘ah. 
isaiah 15:3	beHuzotaw Hageru saq; ‘al gagoteha uwirHowoteha kuloh yeyeilil yoreid babekhi. 
isaiah 15:4	watic‘aq Heshbon we’el‘aleih, ‘ad yahaz nishma‘ qolam; ‘al kein, Haluzei mo’aw yari‘u, nafsho yare‘ah lo. 
isaiah 15:5	libi lemo’aw yic‘aq, beriHeha ‘ad zo‘ar ‘eglat shelishiyah; ki ma‘aleih haluHit, biwkhi ya‘aleh bo, ki derekh Horonayim, ca‘aqat shewer ye‘o‘eiru. 
isaiah 15:6	ki mei nimrim meshamot yihyu; ki yaweish Hazir kalah deshe, yereq lo hayah. 
isaiah 15:7	‘al kein yitrah ‘asah; ufequdatam, ‘al naHal ha‘arawim yisa’um. 
isaiah 15:8	ki hiqifah hacce‘aqah ’et gewul mo’aw; ‘ad ’eglayim yilatah, uwe’eir ’eilim yilatah. 
isaiah 15:9	ki mei dimon male’u dam, ki ’ashit ‘al dimon nosafot; lifleiTat mo’aw ’aryeih, welish’eirit ’adamah. 
isaiah 16:1	shilHu khar mosheil ’erez missela‘ midbarah; ’el har bat ziyon. 
isaiah 16:2	wehayah khe‘of nodeid qein meshulaH; tihyenah benot mo’aw, ma‘barot le’arnon. 
isaiah 16:3	hawi’u hawi’i ‘eizah ‘asu felilah, shiti khalayil zileikh betokh zahorayim; sateri nidaHim, nodeid ’al tegali. 
isaiah 16:4	yaguru wakh nidaHay, mo’aw hewi seiter lamo mipenei shodeid; ki ’afeis hameiz kalah shod, tamu romeis min ha’arez. 
isaiah 16:5	wehukhan baHesed kissei, weyashaw ‘alaw be’emet be’ohel dawid; shofeiT wedoreish mishpaT umehir zedeq. 
isaiah 16:6	shama‘nu ge’on mo’aw gei me’od; ga’awato uge’ono we‘ewrato lo khein badaw.
isaiah 16:7	lakhein, yeyeilil mo’aw lemo’aw kuloh yeyeilil; la’ashishei qir Hareset tehgu ’akh nekha’im. 
isaiah 16:8	ki shadmot Heshbon ’umlal gefen siwmah, ba‘alei goyim halemu seruqeha, ‘ad ya‘ceir naga‘u ta‘u midbar; sheluHoteha, niTeshu ‘aweru yam. 
isaiah 16:9	‘al kein ’ewkeh biwkhi ya‘ceir gefen siwmah, ’arayawekh dim‘ati, Heshbon we’el‘aleih; ki ‘al qeizeikh we‘al qezireikh heidad nafal. 
isaiah 16:10	wene’esaf simHah wagil min hakarmel, uwakeramim lo yerunan lo yero‘a‘; yayin, bayqawim lo yidrokh hadoreikh heidad hishbati. 
isaiah 16:11	‘al kein mei‘ay lemo’aw, kakinor yehemu; weqirbi leqir Hares. 
isaiah 16:12	wehayah khi nir’ah ki nil’ah mo’aw ‘al habamah; uwa ’el miqdasho lehitpaleil welo yukhal. 
isaiah 16:13	ceh hadawar, ’asher diber yhoh ’el mo’aw mei’ac. 
isaiah 16:14	we‘atah, diber yhoh leimor beshalosh shanim kishnei sakhir, weniqlah kewod mo’aw, bekhol hehamon haraw; ushe’ar me‘aT mic‘ar lo khabir.
isaiah 17:1	masa damaseq; hineih dameseq musar mei‘ir, wehayetah me‘i mapalah. 
isaiah 17:2	‘acuwot ‘arei ‘aro‘eir; la‘adarim tihyenah, werawezu we’ein maHarid. 
isaiah 17:3	wenishbat miwzar mei’efrayim, umamlakhah midameseq ushe’ar ’aram; kikhwod benei yisra’eil yihyu, ne’um yhoh zewa’ot.
isaiah 17:4	wehayah bayom hahu, yidal kewod ya‘aqow; umishman besaro yeiraceh. 
isaiah 17:5	wehayah, ke’esof qazir qamah, ucero‘o shibolim yiqzor; wehayah kimlaqeiT shibolim be‘eimeq refa’im. 
isaiah 17:6	wenish’ar bo ‘oleilot kenoqef cayit, shenayim sheloshah gargerim berosh ’amir; ’arba‘ah Hamishah, bis‘ifeha poriyah, ne’um yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil.
isaiah 17:7	bayom hahu, yish‘eh ha’adam ‘al ‘oseihu; we‘einaw ’el qedosh yisra’eil tir’enah. 
isaiah 17:8	welo yish‘eh, ’el hamicbeHot ma‘aseih yadaw; wa’asher ‘asu ’ezbe‘otaw lo yir’eh, weha’asheirim wehaHamanim. 
isaiah 17:9	bayom hahu yihyu ‘arei ma‘ucco, ka‘acuwat haHoresh weha’amir, ’asher ‘acewu, mipenei benei yisra’eil; wehayetah shemamah. 
isaiah 17:10	ki shakhaHat ’elohei yish‘eikh, wezur ma‘ucceikh lo cakharet; ‘al kein, tiTe‘i niT‘ei na‘amanim, ucemorat car ticra‘enu. 
isaiah 17:11	beyom niT‘eikh tesagseigi, uwaboqer car‘eikh tafriHi; neid qazir beyom naHalah ukhe’eiw ’anush.
isaiah 17:12	ho, hamon ‘amim rabim, kahamot yamim yehemayun; ushe’on le’umim, kish’on mayim kabirim yisha’un. 
isaiah 17:13	le’umim, kish’on mayim rabim yisha’un, wega‘ar bo wenas mimerHaq; werudaf, kemoz harim lifnei ruaH, ukhegalgal lifnei sufah. 
isaiah 17:14	le‘eit ‘erew wehineih walahah, beTerem boqer ’einenu; ceh Heileq shoseinu, wegoral lewoceceinu.
isaiah 18:1	ho ’erez zilzal kenafayim; ’asher mei‘eiwer lenaharei khush. 
isaiah 18:2	hasholeiaH bayam zirim, uwikhlei gome ‘al penei mayim lekhu mal’akhim qalim, ’el go memushakh umoraT, ’el ‘am nora min hu wahale’ah; go qaw qaw umewusah, ’asher bace’u neharim ’arzo. 
isaiah 18:3	kal yoshewei teiweil weshokhenei ’arez; kinso neis harim tir’u, wekhitqoa‘ shofar tishma‘u.
isaiah 18:4	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’eilay, ’eshqoTah ’eshqoTah we’abiTah wimkhoni; keHom zaH ‘alei ’or, ke‘aw Tal beHom qazir. 
isaiah 18:5	ki lifnei qazir ketam peraH, uwoser gomeil yihyeh nizah; wekharat haccalcalim bamacmeirot, we’et haneTishot heisir heitac. 
isaiah 18:6	yei‘acewu yaHdaw le‘eiT harim, ulewehemat ha’arez; weqaz ‘alaw ha‘ayiT, wekhal behemat ha’arez ‘alaw teHeraf. 
isaiah 18:7	ba‘eit hahi yuwal shay yhoh zewa’ot, ‘am memushakh umoraT, umei‘am nora min hu wahale’ah; go qaw qaw umewusah, ’asher bace’u neharim ’arzo, ’el meqom sheim yhoh zewa’ot har ziyon.
isaiah 19:1	masa mizrayim; hineih yhoh rokheiw ‘al ‘aw qal uwa mizrayim, wena‘u ’elilei mizrayim mipanaw, ulewaw mizrayim yimas beqirbo. 
isaiah 19:2	wesikhsakhti mizrayim bemizrayim, wenilHamu ’ish be’aHiw we’ish berei‘eihu; ‘ir be‘ir, mamlakhah bemamlakhah. 
isaiah 19:3	wenaweqah ruaH mizrayim beqirbo, wa‘azato ’awaleia‘; wedareshu ’el ha’elilim we’el ha’iTim, we’el ha’owot we’el hayide‘onim. 
isaiah 19:4	wesikarti ’et mizrayim, beyad ’adonim qasheh; umelekh ‘ac yimshal bam, ne’um ha’adon yhoh zewa’ot. 
isaiah 19:5	wenishetu mayim meihayam; wenahar yeHeraw weyaweish. 
isaiah 19:6	wehe’ecniHu neharot, dalalu weHarewu ye’orei mazor; qaneh wasuf qameilu. 
isaiah 19:7	‘arot ‘al ye’or ‘al pi ye’or; wekhol micra‘ ye’or, yiwash nidaf we’einenu. 
isaiah 19:8	we’anu hadayagim, we’awelu, kal mashlikhei way’or Hakah; uforesei mikhmoret ‘al penei mayim ’umlalu. 
isaiah 19:9	uwoshu ‘owedei fishtim seriqot; we’oregim Horay. 
isaiah 19:10	wehayu shatoteha meduka’im; kal ‘osei sekher ’agmei nafesh. 
isaiah 19:11	’akh ’ewilim sarei zo‘an, Hakhmei yo‘azei far‘oh, ‘eizah niw‘arah; ’eikh tomeru ’el par‘oh, ben Hakhamim ’ani ben malkhei qedem. 
isaiah 19:12	’ayam ’eifo Hakhamekha, weyagidu na lakh; weyeide‘u, mah ya‘az yhoh zewa’ot ‘al mizrayim. 
isaiah 19:13	no’alu sarei zo‘an, nishe’u sarei nof; hit‘u ’et mizrayim pinat shewaTeha. 
isaiah 19:14	yhoh masakh beqirbah ruaH ‘iw‘im; wehit‘u ’et mizrayim bekhal ma‘aseihu, kehita‘ot shikor beqi’o. 
isaiah 19:15	welo yihyeh lemizrayim ma‘aseh; ’asher ya‘aseh rosh wecanaw kipah we’agmon.
isaiah 19:16	bayom hahu, yihyeh mizrayim kanashim; weHarad ufaHad, mipenei tenufat yad yhoh zewa’ot, ’asher hu meinif ‘alaw. 
isaiah 19:17	wehayetah ’admat yehudah lemizrayim leHaga, kol ’asher yackir ’otah ’eilaw yifHad; mipenei, ‘azat yhoh zewa’ot, ’asher hu yo‘eiz ‘alaw.
isaiah 19:18	bayom hahu yihyu Hameish ‘arim be’erez mizrayim, medaberot sefat kena‘an, wenishba‘ot yhoh zewa’ot; ‘ir haheres, yei’ameir le’eHat.
isaiah 19:19	bayom hahu, yihyeh micbeiaH yhoh, betokh ’erez mizrayim; umazeiwah ’eizel gewulah yhoh. 
isaiah 19:20	wehayah le’ot ule‘eid yhoh zewa’ot be’erez mizrayim; ki yiz‘aqu ’el yhoh mipenei loHazim, weyishlaH lahem moshia‘ waraw wehizilam. 
isaiah 19:21	wenoda‘ yhoh lemizrayim, weyade‘u mizrayim ’et yhoh bayom hahu; we‘awedu cewaH uminHah, wenaderu neider yhoh weshileimu. 
isaiah 19:22	wenagaf yhoh ’et mizrayim nagof werafo; weshawu ‘ad yhoh, wene‘tar lahem urefa’am. 
isaiah 19:23	bayom hahu, tihyeh mesilah mimizrayim ’ashurah, uwa ’ashur bemizrayim umizrayim be’ashur; we‘awedu mizrayim ’et ’ashur.
isaiah 19:24	bayom hahu, yihyeh yisra’eil shelishiyah, lemizrayim ule’ashur; berakhah beqerew ha’arez. 
isaiah 19:25	’asher beirakho yhoh zewa’ot leimor; barukh ‘ami mizrayim, uma‘aseih yaday ’ashur, wenaHalati yisra’eil.
isaiah 20:1	bishnat bo tartan ’ashdodah, bishloH ’oto, sargon melekh ’ashur; wayilaHem be’ashdod wayilkedah. 
isaiah 20:2	ba‘eit hahi, diber yhoh beyad yesha‘yahu wen ’amoz leimor leikh, ufitaHta hasaq mei‘al matenekha, wena‘alkha taHaloz mei‘al raglekha; waya‘as kein, halokh ‘arom weyaHeif.
isaiah 20:3	wayomer yhoh, ka’asher halakh ‘awdi yesha‘yahu ‘arom weyaHeif; shalosh shanim ’ot umofeit, ‘al mizrayim we‘al kush. 
isaiah 20:4	kein yinhag melekh ’ashur ’et shewi mizrayim we’et galut kush ne‘arim uceqeinim ‘arom weyaHeif; waHasufay sheit ‘erwat mizrayim. 
isaiah 20:5	weHatu wawoshu; mikush mabaTam, umin mizrayim tif’artam. 
isaiah 20:6	we’amar yosheiw ha’i hacceh bayom hahu hineih khoh mabaTeinu, ’asher nasnu sham le‘ecrah, lehinazeil, mipenei melekh ’ashur; we’eikh nimaleiT ’anaHenu.
isaiah 21:1	masa midbar yam; kesufot banegew laHalof, mimidbar ba, mei’erez nora’ah. 
isaiah 21:2	Hacut qashah hugad li; habogeid bogeid wehashodeid shodeid, ‘ali ‘eilam zuri maday, kal ’anHatah hishbati. 
isaiah 21:3	‘al kein, male’u matenay HalHalah, zirim ’aHacuni, kezirei yoleidah; na‘aweiti mishemoa‘, niwhalti meire’ot. 
isaiah 21:4	ta‘ah lewawi, palazut bi‘atateni; ’eit neshef Hishqi, sam li laHaradah. 
isaiah 21:5	‘arokh hashulHan zafoh hazafit ’akhol shatoh; qumu hasarim mishHu magein.
isaiah 21:6	ki khoh ’amar ’eilay ’adonay; leikh ha‘ameid hamzapeh, ’asher yir’eh yagid. 
isaiah 21:7	wera’ah rekhew, zemed parashim, rekhew Hamor rekhew gamal; wehiqshiw qeshew raw qashew. 
isaiah 21:8	wayiqra ’aryeih; ‘al mizpeh ’adonay, ’anokhi ‘omeid tamid yomam, we‘al mishmarti, ’anokhi nizaw kal haleilot. 
isaiah 21:9	wehineih ceh wa rekhew ’ish, zemed parashim; waya‘an wayomer, nafelah nafelah bawel, wekhal pesilei ’eloheha shibar la’arez. 
isaiah 21:10	medushati uwen gareni; ’asher shama‘ti, mei’eit yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil higadti lakhem.
isaiah 21:11	masa dumah; ’eilay qorei misei‘ir, shomeir mah milaylah, shomeir mah mileil. 
isaiah 21:12	’amar shomeir, ’atah woqer wegam layelah; ’im tiw‘ayun be‘ayu shuwu ’eitayu.
isaiah 21:13	masa ba‘raw; baya‘ar ba‘raw talinu, ’oreHot dedanim. 
isaiah 21:14	liqrat zamei heitayu mayim; yoshewei ’erez teima, belaHmo qidemu nodeid. 
isaiah 21:15	ki mipenei Harawot nadadu; mipenei Herew neTushah, umipenei qeshet derukhah, umipenei kowed milHamah.
isaiah 21:16	ki khoh ’amar ’adonay ’eilay; be‘od shanah kishnei sakhir, wekhalah kal kewod qeidar. 
isaiah 21:17	ushe’ar mispar qeshet giborei wenei qeidar yim‘aTu; ki yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil dibeir.
isaiah 22:1	masa gei Hiccayon; mah lakh ’eifo, ki ‘alit kulakh lagagot. 
isaiah 22:2	teshu’ot melei’ah, ‘ir homiyah, qiryah ‘alicah; Halalayikh lo Halei Herew, welo meitei milHamah. 
isaiah 22:3	kal qezinayikh nadedu yaHad miqeshet ’ussaru; kal nimza’ayikh ’usseru yaHdaw, meiraHoq baraHu. 
isaiah 22:4	‘al kein ’amarti she‘u mini ’amareir babekhi; ’al ta’izu lenaHameini, ‘al shod bat ‘ami. 
isaiah 22:5	ki yom mehumah umewusah umewukhah, ladonay yhoh zewa’ot begei Hiccayon; meqarqar qir weshoa‘ ’el hahar. 
isaiah 22:6	we‘eilam nasa ’ashpah, berekhew ’adam parashim; weqir ‘eirah magein. 
isaiah 22:7	wayhi miwHar ‘amaqayikh male’u rakhew; wehaparashim, shot shatu hasha‘erah. 
isaiah 22:8	waygal ’eit masakh yehudah; watabeiT bayom hahu, ’el nesheq beit haya‘ar. 
isaiah 22:9	we’eit beqi‘ei ‘ir dawid re’item ki rabu; wateqabezu, ’et mei habereikhah hataHtonah. 
isaiah 22:10	we’et batei yerushalim sefartem; watitzew habatim, lewazeir haHomah. 
isaiah 22:11	umiqwah ‘asitem, bein haHomotayim, lemei habereikhah hayshanah; welo hibaTtem ’el ‘oseha, weyozerah meiraHoq lo re’item. 
isaiah 22:12	wayiqra, ’adonay yhoh zewa’ot bayom hahu; liwkhi ulemispeid, uleqareHah welaHagor saq. 
isaiah 22:13	wehineih sason wesimHah, harog baqar weshaHoT zon, ’akhol basar weshatot yayin; ’akhol weshato, ki maHar namut. 
isaiah 22:14	weniglah we’acenay yhoh zewa’ot; ’im yekhupar he‘awon hacceh lakhem ‘ad temutun, ’amar ’adonay yhoh zewa’ot.
isaiah 22:15	koh ’amar ’adonay yhoh zewa’ot; lekh bo ’el hassokhein hacceh, ‘al shewna ’asher ‘al habayit. 
isaiah 22:16	mah lekha foh umi lekha foh, ki Hazawta lekha poh qawer; Hozewi marom qiwro, Hoqeqi wassela‘ mishkan lo. 
isaiah 22:17	hineih yhoh meTalTelkha, TalTeilah gawer; we‘oTekha ‘aToh. 
isaiah 22:18	zanof yiznafekha zeneifah, kadur ’el ’erez raHawat yadayim; shamah tamut, weshamah markewot kewodekha, qelon beit ’adonekha. 
isaiah 22:19	wahadaftikha mimazawekha; umima‘amadekha yehersekha. 
isaiah 22:20	wehayah bayom hahu; weqarati le‘awdi, le’elyaqim ben Hilqiyahu. 
isaiah 22:21	wehilbashtiw kutanetekha, we’awneiTekha ’aHacceqenu, umemsheltekha ’etein beyado; wehayah le’aw leyosheiw yerushalim uleweit yehudah. 
isaiah 22:22	wenatati mafteiaH beit dawid ‘al shikhmo; ufataH we’ein sogeir, wesagar we’ein poteiaH. 
isaiah 22:23	uteqa‘tiw yateid bemaqom ne’eman; wehayah lekhissei khawod leweit ’awiw. 
isaiah 22:24	wetalu ‘alaw kol kewod beit ’awiw, haze’eza’im wehazefi‘ot, kol kelei haqaTan; mikelei ha’aganot, we‘ad kal kelei hanewalim. 
isaiah 22:25	bayom hahu, ne’um yhoh zewa’ot, tamush hayateid, hatequ‘ah bemaqom ne’eman; wenigde‘ah wenafelah, wenikhrat hamasa ’asher ‘aleha, ki yhoh dibeir.
isaiah 23:1	masa zor; heililu ’oniyot tarshish, ki shudad mibayit mibo, mei’erez kitim niglah lamo. 
isaiah 23:2	domu yoshewei ’i; soHeir zidon ‘oweir yam mil’ukh. 
isaiah 23:3	uwemayim rabim cera‘ shiHor, qezir ye’or tewu’atah; watehi seHar goyim. 
isaiah 23:4	boshi zidon, ki ’amar yam, ma‘oc hayam leimor; lo Halti welo yaladti, welo gidalti baHurim romamti wetulot. 
isaiah 23:5	ka’asher sheima‘ lemizrayim; yaHilu kesheima‘ zor. 
isaiah 23:6	‘iwru tarshishah; heililu yoshewei ’i. 
isaiah 23:7	hacot lakhem ‘alicah; mimei qedem qadmatah yowiluha ragleha, meiraHoq lagur. 
isaiah 23:8	mi ya‘az cot, ‘al zor hama‘aTirah; ’asher soHareh sarim, kin‘aneha nikhbadei ’arez. 
isaiah 23:9	yhoh zewa’ot ye‘azah; leHaleil ge’on kal zewi, lehaqeil kal nikhbadei ’arez. 
isaiah 23:10	‘iwri ’arzeikh kay’or; bat tarshish ’ein meicaH ‘od. 
isaiah 23:11	yado naTah ‘al hayam, hirgic mamlakhot; yhoh ziwwah ’el kena‘an, lashmid ma‘ucneha. 
isaiah 23:12	wayomer lo tosifi ‘od la‘loc; ham‘ushaqah betulat bat zidon, kitiyim kitim qumi ‘awori, gam sham lo yanuaH lakh. 
isaiah 23:13	hein ’erez kasdim, ceh ha‘am lo hayah, ’ashur yesadah leziyim; heiqimu weHinaw waHunaw, ‘oreru ’armenoteha, samah lemapeilah. 
isaiah 23:14	heililu ’oniyot tarshish; ki shudad ma‘uccekhen.
isaiah 23:15	wehayah bayom hahu, wenishkaHat zor shiw‘im shanah, kimei melekh ’eHad; miqeiz shiw‘im shanah yihyeh lezor, keshirat hacconah. 
isaiah 23:16	qeHi khinor sobi ‘ir conah nishkaHah; heiTiwi nagein harbi shir, lema‘an ticcakheiri. 
isaiah 23:17	wehayah miqeiz shiw‘im shanah, yifqod yhoh ’et zor, weshawah le’etnanah; wecanetah ’et kal mamlekhot ha’arez ‘al penei ha’adamah. 
isaiah 23:18	wehayah saHrah we’etnanah, qodesh yhoh, lo yei’azeir welo yeiHasein; ki layoshewim lifnei yhoh yihyeh saHrah, le’ekhol lesawe‘ah welimkhasseh ‘atiq.
isaiah 24:1	hineih yhoh boqeiq ha’arez uwolqah; we‘iwwah faneha, weheifiz yosheweha. 
isaiah 24:2	wehayah kha‘am kakohein, ka‘ewed kadonaw, kashifHah kagewirtah; kaqoneh kamokheir, kamalweh kaloeh, kanosheh ka’asher noshe wo. 
isaiah 24:3	hiboq tiboq ha’arez wehiboc tiboc; ki yhoh, diber ’et hadawar hacceh. 
isaiah 24:4	’awelah nawelah ha’arez, ’umlelah nawelah teiweil; ’umlalu merom ‘am ha’arez. 
isaiah 24:5	weha’arez Hanefah taHat yosheweha; ki ‘aweru torot Halefu Hoq, heifeiru berit ‘olam. 
isaiah 24:6	‘al kein, ’alah ’akhelah ’erez, waye’shemu yoshewei wah; ‘al kein, Haru yoshewei ’erez, wenish’ar ’enosh mic‘ar. 
isaiah 24:7	’awal tirosh ’umlelah gafen; ne’enHu kal simHei leiw. 
isaiah 24:8	shawat mesos tupim, Hadal she’on ‘alicim; shawat mesos kinor. 
isaiah 24:9	bashir lo yishtu yayin; yeimar sheikhar leshotaw. 
isaiah 24:10	nishberah qiryat tohu; sugar kal bayit mibo. 
isaiah 24:11	zewaHah ‘al hayayin baHuzot; ‘arewah kal simHah, galah mesos ha’arez. 
isaiah 24:12	nish’ar ba‘ir shamah; ushe’iyah yukat sha‘ar. 
isaiah 24:13	ki khoh yihyeh beqerew ha’arez betokh ha‘amim; kenoqef cayit, ke‘oleilot ’im kalah wazir. 
isaiah 24:14	heimah yis’u qolam yaronu; big’on yhoh, zahalu miyam. 
isaiah 24:15	‘al kein ba’urim kabedu yhoh; be’iyei hayam, sheim yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil.
isaiah 24:16	mikenaf ha’arez cemirot shama‘nu zewi lazadiq, wa’omar raci li raci li ’o li; bogedim bagadu, uweged bogdim bagadu. 
isaiah 24:17	paHad wafaHat wafaH; ‘alekha yosheiw ha’arez. 
isaiah 24:18	wehayah hanas miqol hapaHad yipol ’el hapaHat, weha‘oleh mitokh hapaHat, yilakheid bapaH; ki ’arubot mimarom niftaHu, wayir‘ashu mosdei ’arez. 
isaiah 24:19	ro‘ah hitro‘a‘ah ha’arez; por hitporah ’erez, moT hitmoTah ’arez. 
isaiah 24:20	noa‘ tanua‘ ’erez kashikor, wehitnoddah kamelunah; wekhawad ‘aleha pish‘ah, wenafelah welo tosif qum.
isaiah 24:21	wehayah bayom hahu, yifqod yhoh ‘al zewa hamarom bamarom; we‘al malkhei ha’adamah ‘al ha’adamah. 
isaiah 24:22	we’ussefu ’aseifah ’assir ‘al bor, wesugeru ‘al masgeir; umeirow yamim yipaqeidu. 
isaiah 24:23	weHaferah halewanah, uwoshah haHamah; ki malakh yhoh zewa’ot, behar ziyon uwirushalim, weneged ceqeinaw kawod.
isaiah 25:1	yhoh ’elohay ’atah, ’aromimkha ’odeh shimkha, ki ‘asita pele; ‘eizot meiraHoq ’emunah ’omen. 
isaiah 25:2	ki samta mei‘ir lagal, qiryah wezurah lemapeilah; ’armon carim mei‘ir, le‘olam lo yibaneh. 
isaiah 25:3	‘al kein yekhabedukha ‘am ‘ac; qiryat goyim ‘arizim yira’ukha. 
isaiah 25:4	ki hayita ma‘oc ladal ma‘oc la’ewyon bazar lo; maHseh miccerem zeil meiHorew, ki ruaH ‘arizim kecerem qir. 
isaiah 25:5	keHorew bezayon, she’on carim takhnia‘; Horew bezeil ‘aw, cemir ‘arizim ya‘aneh.
isaiah 25:6	we‘asah yhoh zewa’ot lekhal ha‘amim bahar hacceh, mishteih shemanim mishteih shemarim; shemanim memuHayim, shemarim mecuqaqim. 
isaiah 25:7	uwila‘ bahar hacceh, penei haloT haloT ‘al kal ha‘amim; wehamasseikhah hanesukhah ‘al kal hagoyim. 
isaiah 25:8	bila‘ hamawet lanezaH, umaHah ’adonay yhoh dim‘ah mei‘al kal panim; weHerpat ‘amo, yasir mei‘al kal ha’arez, ki yhoh dibeir.
isaiah 25:9	we’amar bayom hahu, hineih ’eloheinu ceh qiwwinu lo weyoshi‘einu; ceh yhoh qiwwinu lo, nagilah wenismeHah bishu‘ato. 
isaiah 25:10	ki tanuaH yad yhoh bahar hacceh; wenadosh mo’aw taHtaw, kehidush matbein bemei bemo madmeinah. 
isaiah 25:11	ufeiras yadaw beqirbo, ka’asher yefareis hasoHeh lisHot; wehishpil ga’awato, ‘im ’arebot yadaw. 
isaiah 25:12	umiwzar misgaw Homotekha, heishaH hishpil higia‘ la’arez ‘ad ‘afar.
isaiah 26:1	bayom hahu, yushar hashir hacceh be’erez yehudah; ‘ir ‘ac lanu, yeshu‘ah yashit Homot waHeil. 
isaiah 26:2	pitHu she‘arim; weyawo go zadiq shomeir ’emunim. 
isaiah 26:3	yeizer samukh, tizor shalom shalom; ki wekha baTuaH. 
isaiah 26:4	biTHu yhoh ‘adei ‘ad; ki beyah yhoh, zur ‘olamim. 
isaiah 26:5	ki heishaH yoshewei marom, qiryah nisgawah; yashpilenah yashpilah ‘ad ’erez, yagi‘enah ‘ad ‘afar. 
isaiah 26:6	tirmesenah ragel; raglei ‘ani pa‘amei dalim. 
isaiah 26:7	’oraH lazadiq meisharim; yashar ma‘gal zadiq tefaleis. 
isaiah 26:8	’af ’oraH mishpaTekha yhoh qiwwinukha; leshimkha ulecikhrekha ta’awat nafesh. 
isaiah 26:9	nafshi ’iwwitikha balaylah, ’af ruHi weqirbi ’ashaHareka; ki ka’asher mishpaTekha la’arez, zedeq lamedu yoshewei teiweil. 
isaiah 26:10	yuHan rasha‘ bal lamad zedeq, be’erez nekhoHot ye‘awweil; uwal yir’eh gei’ut yhoh.
isaiah 26:11	yhoh ramah yadekha bal yeHecayun; yeHecu weyeiwoshu qin’at ‘am, ’af ’eish zarekha tokheleim.
isaiah 26:12	yhoh tishpot shalom lanu; ki gam kal ma‘aseinu pa‘alta lanu. 
isaiah 26:13	yhoh ’eloheinu, be‘alunu ’adonim culatekha; lewad bekha nackir shemekha. 
isaiah 26:14	meitim bal yiHyu, refa’im bal yaqumu; lakhein paqadta watashmideim, wate’abeid kal ceikher lamo. 
isaiah 26:15	yasafta lago yhoh, yasafta lago nikhbadeta; riHaqta kal qazwei ’arez. 
isaiah 26:16	yhoh bazar peqadukha; zaqun laHash, musarekha lamo. 
isaiah 26:17	kemo harah taqriw laledet, taHil tic‘aq baHawaleha; kein hayinu mipanekha yhoh. 
isaiah 26:18	harinu Halnu, kemo yaladnu ruaH; yeshu‘ot bal na‘aseh ’erez, uwal yipelu yoshewei teiweil. 
isaiah 26:19	yiHyu meitekha, neweilati yequmun; haqizu weranenu shokhenei ‘afar, ki Tal ’orot Talekha, wa’arez refa’im tapil.
isaiah 26:20	leikh ‘ami bo waHadarekha, usegor delatekha delatekha ba‘adekha; Hawi khim‘aT rega‘ ‘ad ya‘awor ya‘awar ca‘am. 
isaiah 26:21	ki hineih yhoh yozei mimeqomo, lifqod ‘awon yosheiw ha’arez ‘alaw; wegiletah ha’arez ’et dameha, welo tekhasseh ‘od ‘al harugeha.
isaiah 27:1	bayom hahu yifqod yhoh beHarwo haqashah wehagedolah wehaHacaqah, ‘al liwyatan naHash bariaH, we‘al liwyatan, naHash ‘aqalaton; weharag ’et hatanin ’asher bayam.
isaiah 27:2	bayom hahu; kerem Hemed ‘anu lah. 
isaiah 27:3	’ani yhoh nozerah, lirga‘im ’ashqenah; pen yifqod ‘aleha, laylah wayom ’ezorenah. 
isaiah 27:4	Heimah ’ein li; mi yiteneini shamir shayit bamilHamah, ’efse‘ah wah ’azitenah yaHad. 
isaiah 27:5	’o yaHaceiq bema‘ucci, ya‘aseh shalom li; shalom ya‘aseh li. 
isaiah 27:6	haba’im yashreish ya‘aqow, yaziz ufaraH yisra’eil; umale’u fenei teiweil tenuwah.
isaiah 27:7	hakemakat makeihu hikahu; ’im kehereg harugaw horag. 
isaiah 27:8	besasse’ah beshalHah teriwenah; hagah beruHo haqashah beyom qadim. 
isaiah 27:9	lakhein, becot yekhupar ‘awon ya‘aqow, weceh kal peri hasir HaTato; besumo kal ’awnei micbeiaH, ke’awnei gir menupazot, lo yaqumu ’asheirim weHamanim. 
isaiah 27:10	ki ‘ir bezurah badad, naweh meshulaH wene‘ecaw kamidbar; sham yir‘eh ‘eigel wesham yirbaz wekhilah se‘ifeha. 
isaiah 27:11	biwosh qezirah tishawarnah, nashim ba’ot me’irot ’otah; ki lo ‘am binot hu, ‘al kein lo yeraHamenu ‘oseihu, weyozero lo yeHunenu.
isaiah 27:12	wehayah bayom hahu, yaHboT yhoh mishibolet hanahar ‘ad naHal mizrayim; we’atem teluqeTu le’aHad ’eHad benei yisra’eil.
isaiah 27:13	wehayah bayom hahu, yitaqa‘ beshofar gadol uwa’u, ha’owedim be’erez ’ashur, wehanidaHim be’erez mizrayim; wehishtaHawu yhoh behar haqodesh birushalim. 
isaiah 28:1	ho, ‘aTeret gei’ut shikorei ’efrayim, weziz noweil zewi tif’arto; ’asher ‘al rosh gei shemanim halumei yayin. 
isaiah 28:2	hineih Hacaq we’amiz ladonay, kecerem barad sa‘ar qaTew; kecerem mayim kabirim shoTefim hiniaH la’arez beyad. 
isaiah 28:3	beraglayim teiramasnah; ‘aTeret gei’ut shikorei ’efrayim. 
isaiah 28:4	wehayetah zizat noweil zewi tif’arto, ’asher ‘al rosh gei shemanim; kewikurah beTerem qayiz, ’asher yir’eh haro’eh ’otah, be‘odah bekhapo yiwla‘enah.
isaiah 28:5	bayom hahu, yihyeh yhoh zewa’ot, la‘aTeret zewi, welizfirat tif’arah; lish’ar ‘amo. 
isaiah 28:6	uleruaH mishpaT; layosheiw ‘al hamishpaT, weligwurah, meshiwei milHamah sha‘erah.
isaiah 28:7	wegam ’eileh bayayin shagu, uwasheikhar ta‘u; kohein wenawi shagu washeikhar niwle‘u min hayayin, ta‘u min hasheikhar, shagu baro’eh, paqu peliliyah. 
isaiah 28:8	ki kal shulHanot, male’u qi zo’ah; beli maqom.
isaiah 28:9	’et mi yoreh dei‘ah, we’et mi yawin shemu‘ah; gemulei meiHalaw, ‘atiqei mishadayim. 
isaiah 28:10	ki zaw lazaw zaw lazaw, qaw laqaw qaw laqaw; ce‘eir sham ce‘eir sham. 
isaiah 28:11	ki bela‘agei safah, uwelashon ’aHeret; yedabeir ’el ha‘am hacceh. 
isaiah 28:12	’asher ’amar ’aleihem, cot hamenuHah haniHu le‘ayeif, wecot hamargei‘ah; welo ’awu shemoa‘. 
isaiah 28:13	wehayah lahem dewar yhoh zaw lazaw zaw lazaw qaw laqaw qaw laqaw, ce‘eir sham ce‘eir sham; lema‘an yeilekhu wekhashelu ’aHor wenishbaru, wenoqshu wenilkadu.
isaiah 28:14	lakhein shim‘u dewar yhoh ’anshei lazon; moshelei ha‘am hacceh, ’asher birushalim. 
isaiah 28:15	ki ’amartem, karatnu werit ’et mawet, we‘im she’ol ‘asinu Hoceh; shiT shoT shoTeif ki ‘awar ya‘awor lo yewo’einu, ki samnu khacaw maHseinu uwasheqer nistarenu.
isaiah 28:16	lakhein, koh ’amar ’adonay yhoh, hini yissad beziyon ’awen; ’ewen boHan pinat yiqrat musad mussad, hama’amin lo yaHish. 
isaiah 28:17	wesamti mishpaT leqaw, uzedaqah lemishqalet; weya‘ah warad maHseih khacaw, weseiter mayim yishTofu. 
isaiah 28:18	wekhupar beritekhem ’et mawet, weHacutekhem ’et she’ol lo taqum; shoT shoTeif ki ya‘awor, wihyitem lo lemirmas. 
isaiah 28:19	midei ‘awero yiqaH ’etkhem, ki waboqer baboqer ya‘awor bayom uwalayelah; wehayah raq cewa‘ah hawin shemu‘ah. 
isaiah 28:20	ki qazar hamaza‘ meihistareia‘; wehamasseikhah zarah kehitkaneis. 
isaiah 28:21	ki khehar perazim yaqum yhoh, ke‘eimeq begiw‘on yirgac; la‘asot ma‘aseihu car ma‘aseihu, wela‘awod ‘awodato, nakheriyah ‘awodato. 
isaiah 28:22	we‘atah ’al titlozazu, pen yeHcequ mosreikhem; ki khalah weneHerazah shama‘ti, mei’eit ’adonay yhoh zewa’ot ‘al kal ha’arez. 
isaiah 28:23	ha’acinu weshim‘u qoli; haqshiwu weshim‘u ’imrati. 
isaiah 28:24	hakhol hayom, yaHarosh haHoreish licroa‘; yefataH wisadeid ’admato. 
isaiah 28:25	halo ’im shiwwah faneha, weheifiz qezaH wekhamon yicroq; wesam HiTah sorah use‘orah nisman, wekhussemet gewulato. 
isaiah 28:26	weyissero lamishpaT ’elohaw yorenu. 
isaiah 28:27	ki lo weHaruz yudash qezaH, we’ofan ‘agalah, ‘al kamon yussaw; ki wamaTeh yeiHaweT qezaH wekhamon bashaweT. 
isaiah 28:28	leHem yudaq, ki lo lanezaH ’adosh yedushenu; wehamam gilgal ‘eglato ufarashaw lo yeduqenu. 
isaiah 28:29	gam cot mei‘im yhoh zewa’ot yaza’ah; hifli ‘eizah, higdil tushiyah.
isaiah 29:1	ho ’ari’eil ’ari’eil, qiryat Hanah dawid; sefu shanah ‘al shanah Hagim yinqofu. 
isaiah 29:2	wahaziqoti la’ari’eil; wehayetah ta’aniyah wa’aniyah, wehayetah li ka’ari’eil. 
isaiah 29:3	weHaniti khadur ‘alayikh; wezarti ‘alayikh muzaw, wahaqimoti ‘alayikh mezurot. 
isaiah 29:4	weshafalt mei’erez tedabeiri, umei‘afar tishaH ’imrateikh; wehayah ke’ow mei’erez qoleikh, umei‘afar ’imrateikh tezafzeif. 
isaiah 29:5	wehayah ke’awaq daq hamon carayikh; ukhemoz ‘oweir hamon ‘arizim, wehayah lefeta‘ pit’om. 
isaiah 29:6	mei‘im yhoh zewa’ot tipaqeid, bera‘am uwera‘ash weqol gadol; sufah use‘arah, welahaw ’eish ’okheilah. 
isaiah 29:7	wehayah, kaHalom Hacon laylah, hamon kal hagoyim, hazowe’im ‘al ’ari’eil; wekhal zoweha umezodatah, wehameziqim lah. 
isaiah 29:8	wehayah ka’asher yaHalom hara‘eiw wehineih ’okheil, weheiqiz wereiqah nafsho wekha’asher yaHalom hazamei wehineih shoteh, weheiqiz wehineih ‘ayeif, wenafsho shoqeiqah; kein yihyeh, hamon kal hagoyim, hazowe’im ‘al har ziyon.
isaiah 29:9	hitmahmehu utemahu, hishta‘ash‘u washo‘u; shakheru welo yayin, na‘u welo sheikhar. 
isaiah 29:10	ki nasakh ‘aleikhem yhoh ruaH tardeimah, way‘azeim ’et ‘eineikhem; ’et hanewi’im we’et rasheikhem haHocim kissah. 
isaiah 29:11	watehi lakhem Hacut hakol, kediwrei hasseifer heHatum ’asher yitenu ’oto, ’el yodeia‘ hasseifer seifer leimor qera na ceh; we’amar lo ’ukhal, ki Hatum hu. 
isaiah 29:12	wenitan hasseifer, ‘al ’asher lo yada‘ seifer leimor qera na ceh; we’amar lo yada‘ti seifer.
isaiah 29:13	wayomer ’adonay, ya‘an ki nigash ha‘am hacceh, befiw uwisfataw kibeduni, welibo riHaq mimeni; watehi yir’atam ’oti, mizwat ’anashim melumadah. 
isaiah 29:14	lakhein, hini yosif lehafli ’et ha‘am hacceh haflei wafele; we’awedah Hakhemat Hakhamaw, uwinat newonaw tistatar.
isaiah 29:15	ho hama‘amiqim yhoh lastir ‘eizah; wehayah wemaHshakh ma‘aseihem, wayomeru, mi ro’einu umi yod‘einu. 
isaiah 29:16	hafkekhem, ’im keHomer hayozeir yeiHasheiw; ki yomar ma‘aseh le‘oseihu lo ‘asani, weyeizer ’amar leyozro lo heiwin. 
isaiah 29:17	halo ‘od me‘aT mic‘ar, weshaw lewanon lakarmel; wehakarmel laya‘ar yeiHasheiw. 
isaiah 29:18	weshame‘u wayom hahu haHeireshim diwrei seifer; umei’ofel umeiHoshekh, ‘einei ‘iwrim tir’enah. 
isaiah 29:19	weyasefu ‘anawim yhoh simHah; we’ewyonei ’adam, biqdosh yisra’eil yagilu. 
isaiah 29:20	ki ’afeis ‘ariz wekhalah leiz; wenikhretu kal shoqedei ’awen. 
isaiah 29:21	maHaTi’ei ’adam bedawar, welamokhiaH basha‘ar yeqoshun; wayaTu watohu zadiq.
isaiah 29:22	lakhein, koh ’amar yhoh ’el beit ya‘aqow, ’asher padah ’et ’awraham; lo ‘atah yeiwosh ya‘aqow, welo ‘atah panaw yeHewaru. 
isaiah 29:23	ki wir’oto yeladaw ma‘aseih yaday beqirbo yaqdishu shemi; wehiqdishu ’et qedosh ya‘aqow, we’et ’elohei yisra’eil ya‘arizu. 
isaiah 29:24	weyade‘u to‘ei ruaH binah; werognim yilmedu leqaH. 
isaiah 30:1	ho banim sorim ne’um yhoh, la‘asot ‘eizah welo mini, welinsokh masseikhah welo ruHi; lema‘an sefot HaTat ‘al HaTat. 
isaiah 30:2	haholekhim laredet mizrayim, ufi lo sha’alu; la‘oc bema‘oc par‘oh, welaHsot bezeil mizrayim. 
isaiah 30:3	wehayah lakhem ma‘oc par‘oh lewoshet; weheHasut bezeil mizrayim likhlimah. 
isaiah 30:4	ki hayu wezo‘an saraw; umal’akhaw Haneis yagi‘u. 
isaiah 30:5	kol hiw’ish howish, ‘al ‘am lo yo‘ilu lamo; lo le‘eicer welo leho‘il, ki lewoshet wegam leHerpah.
isaiah 30:6	masa bahamot negew; be’erez zarah wezuqah lawi walayish meihem, ’ef‘eh wesaraf me‘ofeif, yis’u ‘al ketef ‘ayarim Heileihem, we‘al dabeshet gemalim ’ozrotam, ‘al ‘am lo yo‘ilu. 
isaiah 30:7	umizrayim hewel wariq ya‘coru; lakhein qarati lacot, rahaw heim shawet. 
isaiah 30:8	‘atah, bo khatewah ‘al luaH ’itam we‘al seifer Huqah; utehi leyom ’aHaron, la‘ad ‘ad ‘olam. 
isaiah 30:9	ki ‘am meri hu, banim keHashim; banim lo ’awu shemoa‘ torat yhoh. 
isaiah 30:10	’asher ’ameru laro’im lo tir’u, welaHocim, lo teHecu lanu nekhoHot; daberu lanu Halaqot, Hacu mahatalot. 
isaiah 30:11	suru minei derekh, haTu minei ’oraH; hashbitu mipaneinu ’et qedosh yisra’eil.
isaiah 30:12	lakhein, koh ’amar qedosh yisra’eil, ya‘an ma’asekhem badawar hacceh; watiwTeHu be‘osheq wenaloc, watisha‘anu ‘alaw. 
isaiah 30:13	lakhein, yihyeh lakhem he‘awon hacceh, keferez nofeil, niw‘eh beHomah nisgawah; ’asher pit’om lefeta‘ yawo shiwrah. 
isaiah 30:14	ushewarah kesheiwer neiwel yozrim katut lo yaHmol; welo yimazei wimkhitato Heres, laHtot ’eish miyaqud, welaHsof mayim migewe.
isaiah 30:15	ki khoh ’amar ’adonay yhoh qedosh yisra’eil, beshuwah wanaHat tiwwashei‘un, behashqeiT uwewiTHah, tihyeh gewuratkhem; welo ’awitem. 
isaiah 30:16	watomeru lo khi ‘al sus nanus ‘al kein tenusun; we‘al qal nirkaw, ‘al kein yiqalu rodefeikhem. 
isaiah 30:17	’elef ’eHad, mipenei ga‘arat ’eHad, mipenei ga‘arat Hamishah tanusu; ‘ad ’im notartem, katoren ‘al rosh hahar, wekhaneis ‘al hagiw‘ah. 
isaiah 30:18	welakhein yeHakeh yhoh laHanankhem, welakhein yarum leraHemkhem; ki ’elohei mishpaT yhoh, ’ashrei kal Hokhei lo.
isaiah 30:19	ki ‘am beziyon yeisheiw birushalim; bakho lo tiwkeh, Hanon yaHenekha leqol ca‘aqekha, keshame‘ato ‘anakh. 
isaiah 30:20	wenatan lakhem ’adonay leHem zar umayim laHaz; welo yikaneif ‘od morekha, wehayu ‘einekha ro’ot ’et morekha. 
isaiah 30:21	we’acenekha tishma‘nah dawar, mei’aHarekha leimor; ceh haderekh lekhu wo, ki ta’aminu wekhi tasme’ilu. 
isaiah 30:22	weTimeitem, ’et zipui pesilei khaspekha, we’et ’afudat masseikhat cehawekha; ticreim kemo dawah, zei tomar lo. 
isaiah 30:23	wenatan meTar car‘akha ’asher ticra‘ ’et ha’adamah, weleHem tewu’at ha’adamah, wehayah dashein weshamein; yir‘eh miqnekha bayom hahu kar nirHaw. 
isaiah 30:24	weha’alafim weha‘ayarim, ‘owedei ha’adamah, belil Hamiz yokheilu; ’asher coreh waraHat uwamicreh. 
isaiah 30:25	wehayah ‘al kal har gawoha, we‘al kal giw‘ah nisa’ah, pelagim yiwlei mayim; beyom hereg raw, binfol migdalim. 
isaiah 30:26	wehayah ’or halewanah ke’or haHamah, we’or haHamah yihyeh shiw‘atayim, ke’or shiw‘at hayamim; beyom, Hawosh yhoh ’et shewer ‘amo, umaHaz makato yirpa.
isaiah 30:27	hineih sheim yhoh ba mimerHaq, bo‘eir ’apo, wekhowed masa’ah; sefataw male’u ca‘am, uleshono ke’eish ’okhalet. 
isaiah 30:28	weruHo kenaHal shoTeif ‘ad zawwar yeHezeh, lahanafah goyim benafat shaw; weresen mat‘eh, ‘al leHayei ‘amim. 
isaiah 30:29	hashir yihyeh lakhem, keleil hitqadesh Hag; wesimHat leiwaw, kaholeikh beHalil, lawo wehar yhoh ’el zur yisra’eil. 
isaiah 30:30	wehishmia‘ yhoh ’et hod qolo, wenaHat cero‘o yar’eh, beca‘af ’af, welahaw ’eish ’okheilah; nefez wacerem we’ewen barad. 
isaiah 30:31	ki miqol yhoh yeiHat ’ashur; basheiweT yakeh. 
isaiah 30:32	wehayah, kol ma‘awar maTeih musadah, ’asher yaniaH yhoh ‘alaw, betupim uwekhinorot; uwemilHamot tenufah nilHam bah bam. 
isaiah 30:33	ki ‘arukh mei’etmul tafeteh, gam hu hi lamelekh hukhan he‘miq hirHiw; meduratah, ’eish we‘eizim harbeih, nishmat yhoh kenaHal gaferit, bo‘arah bah.
isaiah 31:1	ho hayoredim mizrayim le‘ecrah, ‘al susim yisha‘einu; wayiwTeHu ‘al rekhew ki raw, we‘al parashim ki ‘azemu me’od, welo sha‘u ‘al qedosh yisra’eil, we’et yhoh lo darashu. 
isaiah 31:2	wegam hu Hakham wayawei ra‘, we’et dewaraw lo heisir; weqam ‘al beit merei‘im, we‘al ‘ecrat po‘alei ’awen. 
isaiah 31:3	umizrayim ’adam welo ’eil, wesuseihem basar welo ruaH; yhoh yaTeh yado, wekhashal ‘oceir wenafal ‘acur, weyaHdaw kulam yikhlayun.
isaiah 31:4	ki khoh ’amar yhoh ’eilay ka’asher yehgeh ha’aryeih wehakefir ‘al Tarpo, ’asher yiqarei ‘alaw melo ro‘im, miqolam lo yeiHat, umeihamonam lo ya‘aneh; kein, yeireid yhoh zewa’ot, lizbo ‘al har ziyon we‘al giw‘atah. 
isaiah 31:5	keziporim ‘afot, kein, yagein yhoh zewa’ot ‘al yerushalim; ganon wehizil pasoaH wehimliT. 
isaiah 31:6	shuwu, la’asher he‘miqu sarah benei yisra’eil. 
isaiah 31:7	ki bayom hahu, yim’asun, ’ish ’elilei khaspo, we’elilei cehawo; ’asher ‘asu lakhem yedeikhem HeiT. 
isaiah 31:8	wenafal ’ashur beHerew lo ’ish, weHerew lo ’adam tokhalenu; wenas lo mipenei Herew, uwaHuraw lamas yihyu. 
isaiah 31:9	wesal‘o mimagor ya‘awor, weHatu mineis saraw; ne’um yhoh ’asher ’ur lo beziyon, wetanur lo birushalim.
isaiah 32:1	hein lezedeq yimlakh melekh; ulesarim lemishpaT yasoru. 
isaiah 32:2	wehayah ’ish kemaHawei ruaH weseiter carem; kefalgei mayim bezayon, kezeil sela‘ kaweid be’erez ‘ayeifah. 
isaiah 32:3	welo tish‘enah ‘einei ro’im; we’acenei shome‘im tiqshawnah. 
isaiah 32:4	ulewaw nimharim yawin lada‘at; uleshon ‘ilegim, temaheir ledabeir zaHot. 
isaiah 32:5	lo yiqarei ‘od lenawal nadiw; ulekhilay lo yei’ameir shoa‘. 
isaiah 32:6	ki nawal newalah yedabeir, welibo ya‘aseh ’awen; la‘asot Honef, uledabeir ’el yhoh to‘ah, lehariq nefesh ra‘eiw, umashqeh zamei yaHsir. 
isaiah 32:7	wekheilay keilaw ra‘im; hu cimot ya‘az, leHabeil ‘anawim ‘aniyim be’imrei sheqer, uwedabeir ’ewyon mishpaT. 
isaiah 32:8	wenadiw nediwot ya‘az; wehu ‘al nediwot yaqum.
isaiah 32:9	nashim sha’ananot, qomenah shema‘nah qoli; banot boTHot, ha’ceinah ’imrati. 
isaiah 32:10	yamim ‘al shanah, tirgacnah boTeHot; ki kalah wazir, ’osef beli yawo. 
isaiah 32:11	Hirdu sha’ananot, regacah boTeHot; peshoTah we‘orah, waHagorah ‘al Halazayim. 
isaiah 32:12	‘al shadayim sofedim; ‘al sedei Hemed ‘al gefen poriyah. 
isaiah 32:13	‘al ’admat ‘ami, qoz shamir ta‘aleh; ki ‘al kal batei masos, qiryah ‘alicah. 
isaiah 32:14	ki ’armon nuTash, hamon ‘ir ‘uccaw; ‘ofel wawaHan hayah we‘ad me‘arot ‘ad ‘olam, mesos pera’im mir‘eih ‘adarim. 
isaiah 32:15	‘ad yei‘areh ‘aleinu ruaH mimarom; wehayah midbar lakarmel, wekharmel wehakarmel laya‘ar yeiHasheiw. 
isaiah 32:16	weshakhan bamidbar mishpaT; uzedaqah bakarmel teisheiw. 
isaiah 32:17	wehayah ma‘aseih hazedaqah shalom; wa‘awodat hazedaqah, hashqeiT waweTaH ‘ad ‘olam. 
isaiah 32:18	weyashaw ‘ami binweih shalom; uwemishkenot miwTaHim, uwimnuHot sha’ananot. 
isaiah 32:19	uwarad beredet haya‘ar; uwashiflah tishpal ha‘ir. 
isaiah 32:20	’ashreikhem core‘ei ‘al kal mayim; meshaleHei regel hashor wehaHamor.
isaiah 33:1	ho shodeid, we’atah lo shadud, uwogeid welo wagedu wo; kahatimkha shodeid tushad, kanelotekha liwgod yiwgedu wakh.
isaiah 33:2	yhoh Haneinu lekha qiwwinu; heyeih cero‘am labeqarim, ’af yeshu‘ateinu be‘eit zarah. 
isaiah 33:3	miqol hamon, nadedu ‘amim; meiromutekha, nafezu goyim. 
isaiah 33:4	we’ussaf shelalkhem, ’osef heHasil; kemashaq geiwim shoqeiq bo. 
isaiah 33:5	nisgaw yhoh, ki shokhein marom; milei ziyon, mishpaT uzedaqah. 
isaiah 33:6	wehayah ’emunat ‘itekha, Hosen yeshu‘ot Hakhemat wada‘at; yir’at yhoh hi ’ozaro.
isaiah 33:7	hein ’er’elam, za‘aqu Huzah; mal’akhei shalom, mar yiwkayun. 
isaiah 33:8	nashamu mesilot, shawat ‘oweir ’oraH; heifeir berit ma’as ‘arim, lo Hashaw ’enosh. 
isaiah 33:9	’awal ’umlelah ’arez, heHpir lewanon qamal; hayah hasharon ka‘arawah, weno‘eir bashan wekharmel. 
isaiah 33:10	‘atah ’aqum yomar yhoh; ‘atah ’eiromam, ‘atah ’enasei. 
isaiah 33:11	taharu Hashash teiledu qash; ruHakhem ’eish tokhalkhem. 
isaiah 33:12	wehayu ‘amim misrefot sid; qozim kesuHim ba’eish yizatu.
isaiah 33:13	shim‘u reHoqim ’asher ‘asiti; ude‘u qerowim gewurati. 
isaiah 33:14	paHadu weziyon HaTa’im, ’aHacah re‘adah Haneifim; mi yagur lanu, ’eish ’okheilah, mi yagur lanu moqdei ‘olam. 
isaiah 33:15	holeikh zedaqot, wedoweir meisharim; mo’eis beweza‘ ma‘ashaqot, no‘eir kapaw mitemokh bashoHad, ’oTeim ’aceno mishemoa‘ damim, we‘ozeim ‘einaw meire’ot bera‘. 
isaiah 33:16	hu meromim yishkon, mezadot sela‘im misgabo; laHmo nitan, meimaw ne’emanim. 
isaiah 33:17	melekh beyafeyo teHecenah ‘einekha; tir’enah ’erez marHaqim. 
isaiah 33:18	libekha yehgeh ’eimah; ’ayeih sofeir ’ayeih shoqeil, ’ayeih sofeir ’et hamigdalim. 
isaiah 33:19	’et ‘am no‘ac lo tir’eh; ‘am ‘imqei safah mishemoa‘, nil‘ag lashon ’ein binah. 
isaiah 33:20	Haceih ziyon, qiryat mo‘adeinu; ‘einekha tir’enah yerushalim naweh sha’anan, ’ohel bal yiz‘an bal yissa‘ yeteidotaw lanezaH, wekhal Hawalaw bal yinateiqu. 
isaiah 33:21	ki ’im sham ’adir yhoh lanu, meqom neharim ye’orim raHawei yadayim; bal teilekh bo ’oni shayiT, wezi ’adir lo ya‘awrenu. 
isaiah 33:22	ki yhoh shofeTeinu, yhoh meHoqeqeinu; yhoh malkeinu hu yoshi‘einu. 
isaiah 33:23	niTeshu Hawalayikh; bal yeHaccequ khein tarenam bal paresu neis, ’ac Hulaq ‘ad shalal marbeh, pisHim bacecu wac. 
isaiah 33:24	uwal yomar shakhein Haliti; ha‘am hayosheiw bah nesu ‘awon. 
isaiah 34:1	qirwu goyim lishmoa‘, ule’umim haqshiwu; tishma‘ ha’arez umelo’ah, teiweil wekhal ze’eza’eha. 
isaiah 34:2	ki qezef yhoh ‘al kal hagoyim, weHeimah ‘al kal zewa’am; heHerimam netanam laTawaH. 
isaiah 34:3	weHaleihem yushlakhu, ufigreihem ya‘aleh wa’esham; wenamassu harim midamam. 
isaiah 34:4	wenamaqu kal zewa hashamayim, wenagolu khasseifer hashamayim; wekhal zewa’am yibol, kinwol ‘aleh migefen, ukhenowelet mite’einah. 
isaiah 34:5	ki riwwetah washamayim Harbi; hineih ‘al ’edom teireid, we‘al ‘am Hermi lemishpaT. 
isaiah 34:6	Herew yhoh male’ah dam hudashnah meiHeilew, midam karim we‘atudim, meiHeilew kilyot ’eilim; ki cewaH yhoh bewazerah, weTewaH gadol be’erez ’edom. 
isaiah 34:7	weyaredu re’eimim ‘imam, ufarim ‘im ’abirim; weriwwetah ’arzam midam, wa‘afaram meiHeilew yedushan. 
isaiah 34:8	ki yom naqam yhoh; shenat shilumim leriw ziyon. 
isaiah 34:9	wenehefkhu neHaleha lecefet, wa‘afarah legaferit; wehayetah ’arzah, lecefet bo‘eirah. 
isaiah 34:10	laylah weyomam lo tikhbeh, le‘olam ya‘aleh ‘ashanah; midor lador teHeraw, leneizaH nezaHim, ’ein ‘oweir bah. 
isaiah 34:11	wireishuha qa’at weqipod, weyanshof we‘oreiw yishkenu wah; wenaTah ‘aleha qaw tohu we’awnei wohu. 
isaiah 34:12	Horeha we’ein sham melukhah yiqra’u; wekhal sareha yihyu ’afes. 
isaiah 34:13	we‘aletah ’armenoteha sirim, qimos waHoaH bemiwzareha; wehayetah neweih tanim, Hazir liwnot ya‘anah. 
isaiah 34:14	ufageshu ziyim ’et ’iyim, wesa‘ir ‘al rei‘eihu yiqra; ’akh sham hirgi‘ah lilit, umaze’ah lah manoaH. 
isaiah 34:15	shamah qinenah qipoc watemaleiT, uwaqe‘ah wedagerah wezilah; ’akh sham niqbezu dayot ’ishah re‘utah. 
isaiah 34:16	dirshu mei‘al seifer yhoh uqera’u, ’aHat meiheinah lo ne‘darah, ’ishah re‘utah lo faqadu; ki fi hu ziwwah, weruHo hu qibezan. 
isaiah 34:17	wehu hipil lahen goral, weyado Hileqatah lahem baqaw; ‘ad ‘olam yirashuha, ledor wador yishkenu wah.
isaiah 35:1	yesusum midbar weziyah; wetageil ‘arawah wetifraH kaHawazalet. 
isaiah 35:2	paroaH tifraH wetageil, ’af gilat weranein, kewod halewanon nitan lah, hadar hakarmel wehasharon; heimah yir’u khewod yhoh hadar ’eloheinu.
isaiah 35:3	Haccequ yadayim rafot; uwirkayim koshelot ’ameizu. 
isaiah 35:4	’imru lenimharei leiw, Hicqu ’al tira’u; hineih ’eloheikhem naqam yawo, gemul ’elohim, hu yawo weyosha‘akhem. 
isaiah 35:5	’ac tipaqaHnah ‘einei ‘iwrim; we’acenei Heireshim tipataHnah. 
isaiah 35:6	’ac yedaleig ka’ayal pisseiaH, wetaron leshon ’ileim; ki niwqe‘u wamidbar mayim, uneHalim ba‘arawah. 
isaiah 35:7	wehayah hasharaw la’agam, wezima’on lemabu‘ei mayim; binweih tanim riwzah, Hazir leqaneh wagome. 
isaiah 35:8	wehayah sham maslul waderekh, wederekh haqodesh yiqarei lah, lo ya‘awrenu Tamei wehu lamo; holeikh derekh we’ewilim lo yit‘u. 
isaiah 35:9	lo yihyeh sham ’aryeih, uferiz Hayot bal ya‘alenah, lo timazei sham; wehalekhu ge’ulim. 
isaiah 35:10	ufeduyei yhoh yeshuwun, uwa’u ziyon berinah, wesimHat ‘olam ‘al rosham; sason wesimHah yasigu, wenasu yagon wa’anaHah.
isaiah 36:1	wayhi be’arba‘ ‘esreih shanah lamelekh Hicqiyahu, ‘alah sanHeiriw melekh ’ashur ‘al kal ‘arei yehudah habezurot wayitpeseim. 
isaiah 36:2	wayishlaH melekh ’ashur ’et raw shaqeih milakhish yerushalemah ’el hamelekh Hicqiyahu beHeil kaweid; waya‘amod, bit‘alat habereikhah ha‘elyonah, bimsilat sedeih khoweis. 
isaiah 36:3	wayeizei ’eilaw ’elyaqim ben Hilqiyahu ’asher ‘al habayit; weshewna hassofeir, weyo’aH ben ’asaf hamackir. 
isaiah 36:4	wayomer ’aleihem raw shaqeih, ’imru na ’el Hicqiyahu; koh ’amar hamelekh hagadol melekh ’ashur, mah habiTaHon hacceh ’asher baTaHeta. 
isaiah 36:5	’amarti ’akh dewar sefatayim, ‘eizah ugewurah lamilHamah; ‘atah ‘al mi waTaHta, ki maradta bi. 
isaiah 36:6	hineih waTaHta ‘al mish‘enet haqaneh harazuz hacceh ‘al mizrayim, ’asher yissameikh ’ish ‘alaw, uwa wekhapo uneqawah; kein par‘oh melekh mizrayim, lekhal haboTeHim ‘alaw. 
isaiah 36:7	wekhi tomar ’eilay, ’el yhoh ’eloheinu baTaHenu; halo hu, ’asher heisir Hicqiyahu ’et bamotaw we’et micbeHotaw, wayomer lihudah welirushalim, lifnei hamicbeiaH hacceh tishtaHawu. 
isaiah 36:8	we‘atah hit‘arew na, ’et ’adoni hamelekh ’ashur; we’etenah lekha ’alpayim susim, ’im tukhal latet lekha rokhewim ‘aleihem. 
isaiah 36:9	we’eikh tashiw, ’eit penei faHat ’aHad ‘awdei ’adoni haqTanim; watiwTaH lekha ‘al mizrayim, lerekhew ulefarashim. 
isaiah 36:10	we‘atah hamibal‘adei yhoh, ‘aliti ‘al ha’arez haccot lehashHitah; yhoh ’amar ’eilay, ‘aleih ’el ha’arez haccot wehashHitah. 
isaiah 36:11	wayomer ’elyaqim weshewna weyo’aH ’el raw shaqeih, daber na ’el ‘awadekha ’aramit, ki shome‘im ’anaHenu; we’al tedabeir ’eileinu yehudit, be’acenei ha‘am, ’asher ‘al haHomah. 
isaiah 36:12	wayomer raw shaqeih, ha’el ’adonekha we’eilekha shelaHani ’adoni, ledabeir ’et hadewarim ha’eileh; halo ‘al ha’anashim, hayoshewim ‘al haHomah, le’ekhol ’et Har’eihem zo’atam, welishtot ’et sheineihem meimei ragleihem ‘imakhem. 
isaiah 36:13	waya‘amod raw shaqeih, wayiqra weqol gadol yehudit; wayomer shim‘u, ’et diwrei hamelekh hagadol melekh ’ashur. 
isaiah 36:14	koh ’amar hamelekh, ’al yashi lakhem Hicqiyahu; ki lo yukhal lehazil ’etkhem. 
isaiah 36:15	we’al yawTaH ’etkhem Hicqiyahu ’el yhoh leimor, hazeil yazileinu yhoh; lo tinatein ha‘ir haccot, beyad melekh ’ashur. 
isaiah 36:16	’al tishme‘u ’el Hicqiyahu; s ki khoh ’amar hamelekh ’ashur, ‘asu ’iti werakhah uze’u ’eilay, we’ikhlu ’ish gafno we’ish te’einato, ushetu ’ish mei woro. 
isaiah 36:17	‘ad bo’i welaqaHti ’etkhem ’el ’erez ke’arzekhem; ’erez dagan wetirosh, ’erez leHem ukheramim. 
isaiah 36:18	pen yassit ’etkhem Hicqiyahu leimor, yhoh yazileinu; hahizilu ’elohei hagoyim ’ish ’et ’arzo, miyad melekh ’ashur. 
isaiah 36:19	’ayeih ’elohei Hamat we’arpad, ’ayeih ’elohei sefarwayim; wekhi hizilu ’et shomeron miyadi. 
isaiah 36:20	mi, bekhal ’elohei ha’arazot ha’eileh, ’asher hizilu ’et ’arzam miyadi; ki yazil yhoh ’et yerushalim miyadi. 
isaiah 36:21	wayaHarishu, welo ‘anu ’oto dawar; ki mizwat hamelekh hi leimor lo ta‘anuhu. 
isaiah 36:22	wayawo ’elyaqim ben Hilqiyahu ’asher ‘al habayit weshewna hassofeir weyo’aH ben ’asaf hamackir ’el Hicqiyahu qeru‘ei wegadim; wayagidu lo, ’eit diwrei raw shaqeih.
isaiah 37:1	wayhi, kishmoa‘ hamelekh Hicqiyahu, wayiqra‘ ’et begadaw; wayitkas basaq, wayawo beit yhoh. 
isaiah 37:2	wayishlaH ’et ’elyaqim ’asher ‘al habayit we’eit shewna hassofeir, we’eit ciqnei hakohanim, mitkassim basaqim; ’el yesha‘yahu wen ’amoz hanawi. 
isaiah 37:3	wayomeru ’eilaw, koh ’amar Hicqiyahu, yom zarah wetokheiHah une’azah hayom hacceh; ki wa’u wanim ‘ad mashbeir, wekhoaH ’ayin leleidah. 
isaiah 37:4	’ulay yishma‘ yhoh ’elohekha ’eit diwrei raw shaqeih, ’asher shelaHo melekh ’ashur ’adonaw leHareif ’elohim Hay, wehokhiaH badewarim, ’asher shama‘ yhoh ’elohekha; wenasata tefilah, be‘ad hashe’eirit hanimza’ah. 
isaiah 37:5	wayawo’u, ‘awdei hamelekh Hicqiyahu ’el yesha‘yahu. 
isaiah 37:6	wayomer ’aleihem yesha‘yahu, koh tomerun ’el ’adoneikhem; koh ’amar yhoh ’al tira mipenei hadewarim ’asher shama‘ta, ’asher gidefu na‘arei melekh ’ashur ’oti. 
isaiah 37:7	hini notein bo ruaH, weshama‘ shemu‘ah weshaw ’el ’arzo; wehipaltiw baHerew be’arzo. 
isaiah 37:8	wayashaw raw shaqeih, wayimza ’et melekh ’ashur, nilHam ‘al liwnah; ki shama‘, ki nasa‘ milakhish. 
isaiah 37:9	wayishma‘, ‘al tirhaqah melekh kush leimor, yaza lehilaHeim ’itakh; wayishma‘ wayishlaH mal’akhim, ’el Hicqiyahu leimor. 
isaiah 37:10	koh tomerun, ’el Hicqiyahu melekh yehudah leimor, ’al yashi’akha ’elohekha, ’asher ’atah boTeiaH bo leimor; lo tinatein yerushalim, beyad melekh ’ashur. 
isaiah 37:11	hineih ’atah shama‘ta, ’asher ‘asu malkhei ’ashur lekhal ha’arazot lehaHarimam; we’atah tinazeil. 
isaiah 37:12	hahizilu ’otam ’elohei hagoyim ’asher hishHitu ’awotay, ’et gocan we’et Haran; werezef uwenei ‘eden ’asher bitlasar. 
isaiah 37:13	’ayeih melekh Hamat umelekh ’arpad, umelekh la‘ir sefarwayim; heina‘ we‘iwwah. 
isaiah 37:14	wayiqaH Hicqiyahu ’et hassefarim miyad hamal’akhim wayiqra’eihu; waya‘al beit yhoh, wayifreseihu Hicqiyahu lifnei yhoh. 
isaiah 37:15	wayitpaleil Hicqiyahu, ’el yhoh leimor. 
isaiah 37:16	yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil yosheiw hakeruwim, ’atah hu ha’elohim lewadekha, lekhol mamlekhot ha’arez; ’atah ‘asita, ’et hashamayim we’et ha’arez. 
isaiah 37:17	haTeih yhoh ’acenekha ushema‘, peqaH yhoh ‘einekha ure’eih; ushema‘, ’eit kal diwrei sanHeiriw, ’asher shalaH, leHareif ’elohim Hay. 
isaiah 37:18	’amenam yhoh; heHeriwu malkhei ’ashur ’et kal ha’arazot we’et ’arzam. 
isaiah 37:19	wenaton ’et ’eloheihem ba’eish; ki lo ’elohim heimah, ki ’im ma‘aseih yedei ’adam ‘eiz wa’ewen way’abedum. 
isaiah 37:20	we‘atah yhoh ’eloheinu, hoshi‘einu miyado; weyeide‘u kal mamlekhot ha’arez, ki ’atah yhoh lewadekha. 
isaiah 37:21	wayishlaH yesha‘yahu wen ’amoz, ’el Hicqiyahu leimor; koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’asher hitpalalta ’eilay, ’el sanHeiriw melekh ’ashur. 
isaiah 37:22	ceh hadawar, ’asher diber yhoh ‘alaw; bacah lekha la‘agah lekha, betulat bat ziyon, ’aHarekha rosh heini‘ah, bat yerushalim. 
isaiah 37:23	’et mi Heirafta wegidafta, we‘al mi harimotah qol; watisa marom ‘einekha ’el qedosh yisra’eil. 
isaiah 37:24	beyad ‘awadekha Heirafta ’adonay watomer, berow rikhbi ’ani ‘aliti merom harim yarketei lewanon; we’ekhrot qomat ’aracaw miwHar beroshaw, we’awo merom qizo, ya‘ar karmilo. 
isaiah 37:25	’ani qarti weshatiti mayim; we’aHriw bekhaf pe‘amay, kol ye’orei mazor. 
isaiah 37:26	halo shama‘ta lemeiraHoq ’otah ‘asiti, mimei qedem wizartiha; ‘atah haweitiha, utehi, lehash’ot galim nizim ‘arim bezurot. 
isaiah 37:27	weyosheweihen qizrei yad, Hatu wawoshu; hayu ‘eisew sadeh wiraq deshe, Hazir gagot, ushedeimah lifnei qamah. 
isaiah 37:28	weshiwtekha wezeitekha uwo’akha yada‘eti; we’eit hitrageckha ’eilay. 
isaiah 37:29	ya‘an hitrageckha ’eilay, wesha’anankha ‘alah we’acenay; wesamti HaHi be’apekha, umitgi bisfatekha, wahashiwotikha, baderekh ’asher bata bah. 
isaiah 37:30	weceh lekha ha’ot, ’akhol hashanah safiaH, uwashanah hasheinit shaHis; uwashanah hashelishit, cir‘u weqizru weniT‘u kheramim we’akhol we’ikhlu firyam. 
isaiah 37:31	weyasefah peleiTat beit yehudah hanish’arah shoresh lemaTah; we‘asah feri lema‘elah. 
isaiah 37:32	ki mirushalim teizei she’eirit, ufeleiTah meihar ziyon; qin’at yhoh zewa’ot ta‘aseh cot.
isaiah 37:33	lakhein, koh ’amar yhoh ’el melekh ’ashur, lo yawo ’el ha‘ir haccot, welo yoreh sham Heiz; welo yeqademenah magein, welo yishpokh ‘oleha solelah. 
isaiah 37:34	baderekh ’asher ba bah yashuw; we’el ha‘ir haccot lo yawo ne’um yhoh. 
isaiah 37:35	weganoti ‘al ha‘ir haccot lehoshi‘ah; lema‘ani, ulema‘an dawid ‘awdi.
isaiah 37:36	wayeizei mal’akh yhoh wayakeh bemaHaneih ’ashur, mei’ah ushemonim waHamishah ’alef; wayashkimu waboqer, wehineih khulam pegarim meitim. 
isaiah 37:37	wayissa‘ wayeilekh, wayashaw sanHeiriw melekh ’ashur; wayeishew benineweih. 
isaiah 37:38	wayhi hu mishtaHaweh beit nisrokh ’elohaw, we’adramelekh wesar’ezer banaw hikuhu waHerew, weheimah nimleTu ’erez ’araraT; wayimlokh ’eisar Hadon beno taHtaw.
isaiah 38:1	bayamim haheim, Halah Hicqiyahu lamut; wayawo ’eilaw yesha‘yahu wen ’amoz hanawi, wayomer ’eilaw koh ’amar yhoh zaw leweitekha, ki meit ’atah welo tiHyeh. 
isaiah 38:2	wayasseiw Hicqiyahu panaw ’el haqir; wayitpaleil ’el yhoh. 
isaiah 38:3	wayomar, ’anah yhoh cekhar na ’eit ’asher hithalakhti lefanekha, be’emet uweleiw shaleim, wehaTow be‘einekha ‘asiti; wayeiwek Hicqiyahu bekhi gadol.
isaiah 38:4	wayhi dewar yhoh, ’el yesha‘yahu leimor. 
isaiah 38:5	halokh we’amarta ’el Hicqiyahu, koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei dawid ’awikha, shama‘ti ’et tefilatekha, ra’iti ’et dim‘atekha; hini yosif ‘al yamekha, Hameish ‘esreih shanah. 
isaiah 38:6	umikaf melekh ’ashur ’azilekha, we’eit ha‘ir haccot; weganoti ‘al ha‘ir haccot. 
isaiah 38:7	weceh lekha ha’ot mei’eit yhoh; ’asher ya‘aseh yhoh, ’et hadawar hacceh ’asher dibeir. 
isaiah 38:8	hini meishiw ’et zeil hama‘alot ’asher yaredah wema‘alot ’aHac bashemesh ’aHoranit ‘eser ma‘alot; watashaw hashemesh ‘eser ma‘alot, bama‘alot ’asher yaradah.
isaiah 38:9	mikhtaw leHicqiyahu melekh yehudah; baHaloto wayHi meiHaleyo. 
isaiah 38:10	’ani ’amarti, bidmi yamay ’eileikhah besha‘arei she’ol; puqadti yeter shenotay. 
isaiah 38:11	’amarti lo ’er’eh yah, yah be’erez haHayim; lo ’abiT ’adam ‘od ‘im yoshewei Hadel. 
isaiah 38:12	dori, nissa‘ weniglah mini ke’ohel ro‘i; qipadti kha’oreig Hayay midalah yewaze‘eini, miyom ‘ad laylah tashlimeini. 
isaiah 38:13	shiwwiti ‘ad boqer ka’ari, kein yeshabeir kal ‘azmotay; miyom ‘ad laylah tashlimeini. 
isaiah 38:14	kesus ‘agur kein ’azafzeif, ’ehgeh kayonah; dalu ‘einay lamarom, ’adonay ‘asheqah li ‘areweini. 
isaiah 38:15	mah ’adabeir we’amar li wehu ‘asah; ’edadeh khal shenotay ‘al mar nafshi. 
isaiah 38:16	’adonay ‘aleihem yiHyu; ulekhal bahen Hayei ruHi, wetaHalimeini wehaHayeini. 
isaiah 38:17	hineih leshalom mar li mar; we’atah Hashaqta nafshi mishaHat beli, ki hishlakhta ’aHarei geiwekha kal HaTa’ay. 
isaiah 38:18	ki lo she’ol todeka mawet yehaleka; lo yesaberu yordei wor ’el ’amitekha. 
isaiah 38:19	Hay Hay hu yodekha kamoni hayom; ’aw lewanim, yodia‘ ’el ’amitekha. 
isaiah 38:20	yhoh lehoshi‘eini; uneginotay nenagein kal yemei Hayeinu ‘al beit yhoh. 
isaiah 38:21	wayomer yesha‘yahu, yis’u dewelet te’einim; weyimreHu ‘al hasheHin weyeHi. 
isaiah 38:22	wayomer Hicqiyahu mah ’ot; ki ’e‘eleh beit yhoh.
isaiah 39:1	ba‘eit hahiw shalaH merodakh bal’adan ben bal’adan melekh bawel sefarim uminHah ’el Hicqiyahu; wayishma‘ ki Halah wayeHecaq. 
isaiah 39:2	wayismaH ‘aleihem Hicqiyahu wayar’eim ’et beit nekhotah nekhoto ’et hakesef we’et haccahaw we’et habesamim we’eit hashemen haTow, we’eit kal beit keilaw, we’eit kal ’asher nimza be’ozerotaw; lo hayah dawar, ’asher lo her’am Hicqiyahu beweito uwekhal memshalto. 
isaiah 39:3	wayawo yesha‘yahu hanawi, ’el hamelekh Hicqiyahu; wayomer ’eilaw mah ’ameru ha’anashim ha’eileh, umei’ayin yawo’u ’eilekha, wayomer Hicqiyahu, mei’erez reHoqah ba’u ’eilay mibawel. 
isaiah 39:4	wayomer mah ra’u beweitekha; wayomer Hicqiyahu, ’eit kal ’asher beweiti ra’u, lo hayah dawar ’asher lo hir’itim be’ozrotay. 
isaiah 39:5	wayomer yesha‘yahu ’el Hicqiyahu; shema‘ dewar yhoh zewa’ot. 
isaiah 39:6	hineih yamim ba’im wenisa kal ’asher beweitekha, wa’asher ’azeru ’awotekha ‘ad hayom hacceh bawel; lo yiwwateir dawar ’amar yhoh. 
isaiah 39:7	umibanekha ’asher yeize’u mimekha ’asher tolid yiqaHu; wehayu sarisim, beheikhal melekh bawel. 
isaiah 39:8	wayomer Hicqiyahu ’el yesha‘yahu, Tow dewar yhoh ’asher dibarta; wayomer ki yihyeh shalom we’emet beyamay.
isaiah 40:1	naHamu naHamu ‘ami; yomar ’eloheikhem. 
isaiah 40:2	daberu ‘al leiw yerushalim weqir’u ’eileha, ki male’ah zewa’ah, ki nirzah ‘awonah; ki laqeHah miyad yhoh, kiflayim bekhal HaToteha.
isaiah 40:3	qol qorei, bamidbar panu derekh yhoh; yasheru ba‘arawah, mesilah leiloheinu. 
isaiah 40:4	kal ge yinasei, wekhal har wegiw‘ah yishpalu; wehayah he‘aqow lemishor, weharekhasim lewiq‘ah. 
isaiah 40:5	weniglah kewod yhoh; wera’u khal basar yaHdaw, ki pi yhoh dibeir.
isaiah 40:6	qol ’omeir qera, we’amar mah ’eqra; kal habasar Hazir, wekhal Hasdo keziz hasadeh. 
isaiah 40:7	yaweish Hazir naweil ziz, ki ruaH yhoh nashewah bo; ’akhein Hazir ha‘am. 
isaiah 40:8	yaweish Hazir naweil ziz; udewar ’eloheinu yaqum le‘olam.
isaiah 40:9	‘al har gawoha ‘ali lakh mewaseret ziyon, harimi wakoaH qoleikh, mewaseret yerushalim; harimi ’al tira’i, ’imri le‘arei yehudah, hineih ’eloheikhem. 
isaiah 40:10	hineih ’adonay yhoh beHacaq yawo, ucero‘o moshelah lo; hineih sekharo ’ito, ufe‘ulato lefanaw. 
isaiah 40:11	kero‘eh ‘edro yir‘eh, bicro‘o yeqabeiz Tela’im, uweHeiqo yisa; ‘alot yenaheil.
isaiah 40:12	mi madad besha‘olo mayim, weshamayim bacceret tikein, wekhal bashalish ‘afar ha’arez; weshaqal bapeles harim, ugewa‘ot bemocenayim. 
isaiah 40:13	mi tikein ’et ruaH yhoh; we’ish ‘azato yodi‘enu. 
isaiah 40:14	’et mi no‘az waywineihu, waylamedeihu be’oraH mishpaT; waylamedeihu da‘at, wederekh tewunot yodi‘enu. 
isaiah 40:15	hein goyim kemar mideli, ukheshaHaq mocenayim neHshawu; hein ’iyim kadaq yiTol. 
isaiah 40:16	ulewanon ’ein dei ba‘eir; weHayato, ’ein dei ‘olah.
isaiah 40:17	kal hagoyim ke’ayin negdo; mei’efes watohu neHshewu lo. 
isaiah 40:18	we’el mi tedameyun ’eil; umah demut ta‘arkhu lo. 
isaiah 40:19	hapesel nasakh Harash, wezoreif baccahaw yeraqe‘enu; uretuqot kesef zoreif. 
isaiah 40:20	hamsukan terumah, ‘eiz lo yirqaw yiwHar; Harash Hakham yewaqesh lo, lehakhin pesel lo yimoT. 
isaiah 40:21	halo teide‘u halo tishma‘u, halo hugad meirosh lakhem; halo hawinotem, mosdot ha’arez. 
isaiah 40:22	hayosheiw ‘al Hug ha’arez, weyosheweha kaHagawim; hanoTeh khadoq shamayim, wayimtaHeim ka’ohel lashawet. 
isaiah 40:23	hanotein rocnim le’ayin; shofeTei ’erez katohu ‘asah. 
isaiah 40:24	’af bal niTa‘u, ’af bal cora‘u, ’af bal shoreish ba’arez gic‘am; wegam nashaf bahem wayiwashu, use‘arah kaqash tisa’eim.
isaiah 40:25	we’el mi tedameyuni we’eshweh; yomar qadosh. 
isaiah 40:26	se’u marom ‘eineikhem ure’u mi wara ’eileh, hamozi wemispar zewa’am; lekhulam besheim yiqra, meirow ’onim we’amiz koaH, ’ish lo ne‘dar.
isaiah 40:27	lamah tomar ya‘aqow, utedabeir yisra’eil; nisterah darki yhoh, umei’elohay mishpaTi ya‘awor. 
isaiah 40:28	halo yada‘ta ’im lo shama‘ta, ’elohei ‘olam yhoh borei qezot ha’arez, lo yi‘af welo yiga‘; ’ein Heiqer litwunato. 
isaiah 40:29	notein laya‘eif koaH; ule’ein ’onim ‘azemah yarbeh. 
isaiah 40:30	weyi‘afu ne‘arim weyiga‘u; uwaHurim kashol yikasheilu. 
isaiah 40:31	weqoyei yhoh yaHalifu khoaH, ya‘alu ’eiwer kanesharim; yaruzu welo yiga‘u, yeilekhu welo yi‘afu.
isaiah 41:1	haHarishu ’eilay ’iyim, ule’umim yaHalifu khoaH; yigeshu ’ac yedabeiru, yaHdaw lamishpaT niqrawah. 
isaiah 41:2	mi hei‘ir mimicraH, zedeq yiqra’eihu leraglo; yitein lefanaw goyim umelakhim yard, yitein ke‘afar Harbo, keqash nidaf qashto. 
isaiah 41:3	yirdefeim ya‘awor shalom; ’oraH beraglaw lo yawo. 
isaiah 41:4	mi fa‘al we‘asah, qorei hadorot meirosh; ’ani yhoh rishon, we’et ’aHaronim ’ani hu. 
isaiah 41:5	ra’u ’iyim weyira’u, qezot ha’arez yeHeradu; qarewu waye’etayun. 
isaiah 41:6	’ish ’et rei‘eihu ya‘coru; ule’aHiw yomar Hacaq. 
isaiah 41:7	wayHacceiq Harash ’et zoreif, maHaliq paTish ’et holem pa‘am; ’omeir ladeweq Tow hu, wayHacceqeihu wemasmerim lo yimoT.
isaiah 41:8	we’atah yisra’eil ‘awdi, ya‘aqow ’asher beHartikha; cera‘ ’awraham ’ohawi. 
isaiah 41:9	’asher heHecaqtikha miqzot ha’arez, umei’azileha qeratikha; wa’omar lekha ‘awdi ’atah, beHartikha welo me’astikha. 
isaiah 41:10	’al tira ki ‘imekha ’ani, ’al tishta‘ ki ’ani ’elohekha; ’imaztikha ’af ‘acartikha, ’af temakhtikha bimin zidqi. 
isaiah 41:11	hein yeiwoshu weyikalemu, kol haneHerim bakh; yihyu khe’ayin weyowedu ’anshei riwekha. 
isaiah 41:12	tewaqsheim welo timza’eim, ’anshei mazutekha; yihyu khe’ayin ukhe’efes ’anshei milHamtekha. 
isaiah 41:13	ki, ’ani yhoh ’elohekha maHaciq yeminekha; ha’omeir lekha ’al tira ’ani ‘acartikha.
isaiah 41:14	’al tire’i tola‘at ya‘aqow, metei yisra’eil; ’ani ‘acartikh ne’um yhoh, wego’aleikh qedosh yisra’eil. 
isaiah 41:15	hineih samtikh, lemorag Haruz Hadash, ba‘al pifiyot; tadush harim wetadoq, ugewa‘ot kamoz tasim. 
isaiah 41:16	ticreim weruaH tisa’eim, use‘arah tafiz ’otam; we’atah tagil yhoh, biqdosh yisra’eil tithalal.
isaiah 41:17	ha‘aniyim weha’ewyonim mewaqshim mayim wa’ayin, leshonam bazama nashatah; ’ani yhoh ’e‘eneim, ’elohei yisra’eil lo ’e‘ecweim. 
isaiah 41:18	’eftaH ‘al shefayim neharot, uwetokh beqa‘ot ma‘yanot; ’asim midbar la’agam mayim, we’erez ziyah lemoza’ei mayim. 
isaiah 41:19	’etein bamidbar ’erec shiTah, wahadas we‘eiz shamen; ’asim ba‘arawah, berosh tidhar ute’ashur yaHdaw. 
isaiah 41:20	lema‘an yir’u weyeide‘u, weyasimu weyaskilu yaHdaw, ki yad yhoh ‘asetah cot; uqedosh yisra’eil bera’ah.
isaiah 41:21	qarewu riwekhem yomar yhoh; hagishu ‘azumoteikhem, yomar melekh ya‘aqow. 
isaiah 41:22	yagishu weyagidu lanu, ’eit ’asher tiqrenah; harishonot mah heinah, hagidu wenasimah libeinu weneide‘ah ’aHaritan, ’o haba’ot hashmi‘unu. 
isaiah 41:23	hagidu ha’otiyot le’aHor, weneide‘ah, ki ’elohim ’atem; ’af teiTiwu wetarei‘u, wenishta‘ah weneire wenir’eh yaHdaw. 
isaiah 41:24	hein ’atem mei’ayin, ufa‘alekhem mei’afa‘; to‘eiwah yiwHar bakhem. 
isaiah 41:25	ha‘iroti mizafon wayat, mimicraH shemesh yiqra wishmi; weyawo seganim kemo Homer, ukhemo yozeir yirmas TiT. 
isaiah 41:26	mi higid meirosh weneida‘ah, umilefanim wenomar zadiq; ’af ’ein magid, ’af ’ein mashmia‘, ’af ’ein shomeia‘ ’imreikhem. 
isaiah 41:27	rishon leziyon hineih hinam; welirushalim mewaseir ’etein. 
isaiah 41:28	we’eire we’ein ’ish, umei’eileh we’ein yo‘eiz; we’esh’aleim weyashiwu dawar. 
isaiah 41:29	hein kulam, ’awen ’efes ma‘aseihem; ruaH watohu niskeihem.
isaiah 42:1	hein ‘awdi ’etmakh bo, beHiri razetah nafshi; natati ruHi ‘alaw, mishpaT lagoyim yozi. 
isaiah 42:2	lo yiz‘aq welo yisa; welo yashmia‘ baHuz qolo. 
isaiah 42:3	qaneh razuz lo yishbor, ufishtah kheihah lo yekhabenah; le’emet yozi mishpaT. 
isaiah 42:4	lo yikhheh welo yaruz, ‘ad yasim ba’arez mishpaT; uletorato ’iyim yeyaHeilu.
isaiah 42:5	koh ’amar ha’eil yhoh borei hashamayim wenoTeihem, roqa‘ ha’arez weze’eza’eha; notein neshamah la‘am ‘aleha, weruaH laholekhim bah. 
isaiah 42:6	’ani yhoh qeratikha wezedeq we’aHceiq beyadekha; we’ezarekha, we’etenkha liwrit ‘am le’or goyim. 
isaiah 42:7	lifqoaH ‘einayim ‘iwrot; lehozi mimasgeir ’assir, mibeit kele yoshewei Hoshekh. 
isaiah 42:8	’ani yhoh hu shemi; ukhewodi le’aHeir lo ’etein, utehilati lapesilim. 
isaiah 42:9	harishonot hineih wa’u; waHadashot ’ani magid, beTerem tizmaHnah ’ashmi‘ ’etkhem.
isaiah 42:10	shiru yhoh shir Hadash, tehilato miqzeih ha’arez; yordei hayam umelo’o, ’iyim weyosheweihem. 
isaiah 42:11	yis’u midbar we‘araw, Hazeirim teisheiw qeidar; yaronu yoshewei sela‘, meirosh harim yizwaHu. 
isaiah 42:12	yasimu yhoh kawod; utehilato ba’iyim yagidu. 
isaiah 42:13	yhoh kagibor yeizei, ke’ish milHamot ya‘ir qin’ah; yaria‘ ’af yazriaH, ‘al ’oyewaw yitgabar.
isaiah 42:14	heHesheiti mei‘olam, ’aHarish ’et’apaq; kayoleidah ’ef‘eh, ’eshom we’esh’af yaHad. 
isaiah 42:15	’aHariw harim ugewa‘ot, wekhal ‘esbam ’owish; wesamti neharot la’iyim, wa’agamim ’owish. 
isaiah 42:16	weholakhti ‘iwrim, bederekh lo yada‘u, bintiwot lo yade‘u ’adrikheim; ’asim maHshakh lifneihem la’or, uma‘aqashim lemishor, ’eileh hadewarim, ‘asitim welo ‘acawtim. 
isaiah 42:17	nasogu ’aHor yeiwoshu woshet, haboTeHim bapasel; ha’omerim lemasseikhah ’atem ’eloheinu.
isaiah 42:18	haHeireshim shema‘u; weha‘iwrim habiTu lir’ot. 
isaiah 42:19	mi ‘iwweir ki ’im ‘awdi, weHeireish kemal’akhi ’eshlaH; mi ‘iwweir kimshulam, we‘iwweir ke‘ewed yhoh. 
isaiah 42:20	ra’ita ra’ot rabot welo tishmor; paqoaH ’acenayim welo yishma‘. 
isaiah 42:21	yhoh Hafeiz lema‘an zidqo; yagdil torah weya’dir. 
isaiah 42:22	wehu ‘am bacuc weshasui hafeiaH baHurim kulam, uwewatei khela’im haHeba’u; hayu lawac we’ein mazil, meshissah we’ein ’omeir hashaw. 
isaiah 42:23	mi wakhem ya’acin cot; yaqshiw weyishma‘ le’aHor. 
isaiah 42:24	mi natan limshoseh limshissah ya‘aqow weyisra’eil lewocecim halo yhoh; cu HaTanu lo, welo ’awu widrakhaw halokh, welo shame‘u betorato. 
isaiah 42:25	wayishpokh ‘alaw Heimah ’apo, we‘ecuc milHamah; watelahaTeihu missawiw welo yada‘, watiw‘ar bo welo yasim ‘al leiw.
isaiah 43:1	we‘atah koh ’amar yhoh bora’akha ya‘aqow, weyozerkha yisra’eil; ’al tira ki ge’altikha, qarati weshimkha li ’atah. 
isaiah 43:2	ki ta‘awor bamayim ’itekha ’ani, uwaneharot lo yishTefukha; ki teileikh bemo ’eish lo tikaweh, welehawah lo tiw‘ar bakh. 
isaiah 43:3	ki, ’ani yhoh ’elohekha, qedosh yisra’eil moshi‘ekha; natati khaferekha mizrayim, kush usewa taHtekha. 
isaiah 43:4	mei’asher yaqarta we‘einay nikhbadta wa’ani ’ahawtikha; we’etein ’adam taHtekha, ule’umim taHat nafshekha. 
isaiah 43:5	’al tira ki ’itekha ’ani; mimicraH ’awi car‘ekha, umima‘araw ’aqabezeka. 
isaiah 43:6	’omar lazafon teini, uleteiman ’al tikhla’i; hawi’i wanay meiraHoq, uwenotay miqzeih ha’arez. 
isaiah 43:7	kol haniqra wishmi, welikhwodi beratiw; yezartiw ’af ‘asitiw. 
isaiah 43:8	hozi ‘am ‘iwweir we‘einayim yeish; weHeireshim we’acenayim lamo. 
isaiah 43:9	kal hagoyim niqbezu yaHdaw, weyei’asefu le’umim, mi wahem yagid cot, werishonot yashmi‘unu; yitenu ‘eideihem weyizdaqu, weyishme‘u weyomeru ’emet. 
isaiah 43:10	’atem ‘eiday ne’um yhoh, we‘awdi ’asher baHareti; lema‘an teide‘u weta’aminu li wetawinu ki ’ani hu, lefanay lo nozar ’eil, we’aHaray lo yihyeh.
isaiah 43:11	’anokhi ’anokhi yhoh; we’ein mibal‘aday moshia‘. 
isaiah 43:12	’anokhi higadti wehosha‘ti wehishma‘ti, we’ein bakhem car; we’atem ‘eiday ne’um yhoh wa’ani ’eil. 
isaiah 43:13	gam miyom ’ani hu, we’ein miyadi mazil; ’ef‘al umi yeshiwenah.
isaiah 43:14	koh ’amar yhoh go’alkhem qedosh yisra’eil; lema‘ankhem shilaHti wawelah, wehoradti wariHim kulam, wekhasdim ba’oniyot rinatam. 
isaiah 43:15	’ani yhoh qedoshekhem; borei yisra’eil malkekhem.
isaiah 43:16	koh ’amar yhoh, hanotein bayam darekh; uwemayim ‘accim netiwah. 
isaiah 43:17	hamozi rekhew wasus Hayil we‘iccuc; yaHdaw yishkewu bal yaqumu, da‘akhu kapishtah khawu. 
isaiah 43:18	’al tickeru rishonot; weqadmoniyot ’al titbonanu.
