isaiah 43:19	hini ‘oseh Hadashah ‘atah tizmaH, halo teida‘uha; ’af ’asim bamidbar derekh, bishimon neharot. 
isaiah 43:20	tekhabedeini Hayat hasadeh, tanim uwenot ya‘anah; ki natati wamidbar mayim, neharot bishimon, lehashqot ‘ami weHiri. 
isaiah 43:21	‘am cu yazarti li, tehilati yesapeiru.
isaiah 43:22	welo ’oti qarata ya‘aqow; ki yaga‘ta bi yisra’eil. 
isaiah 43:23	lo heiweita li seih ‘olotekha, ucewaHekha lo khibadtani; lo he‘ewadtikha beminHah, welo hoga‘tikha bilwonah. 
isaiah 43:24	lo qanita li wakesef qaneh, weHeilew cewaHekha lo hirwitani; ’akh, he‘ewadtani beHaTotekha, hoga‘tani ba‘awonotekha.
isaiah 43:25	’anokhi ’anokhi hu moHeh fesha‘ekha lema‘ani; weHaTotekha lo ’eckor. 
isaiah 43:26	hackireini nishafeTah yaHad; sapeir ’atah lema‘an tizdaq. 
isaiah 43:27	’awikha harishon HaTa; umelizekha pashe‘u wi. 
isaiah 43:28	wa’aHaleil sarei qodesh; we’etenah laHeirem ya‘aqow, weyisra’eil legidufim.
isaiah 44:1	we‘atah shema‘ ya‘aqow ‘awdi; weyisra’eil baHarti wo. 
isaiah 44:2	koh ’amar yhoh ‘osekha weyozerkha mibeTen ya‘cereka; ’al tira ‘awdi ya‘aqow, wishurun baHarti wo. 
isaiah 44:3	ki ’ezaq mayim ‘al zamei, wenocelim ‘al yabashah; ’ezoq ruHi ‘al car‘ekha, uwirkhati ‘al ze’eza’ekha. 
isaiah 44:4	wezameHu bewein Hazir; ka‘arawim ‘al yiwlei mayim. 
isaiah 44:5	ceh yomar yhoh ’ani, weceh yiqra wesheim ya‘aqow; weceh, yikhtow yado yhoh, uwesheim yisra’eil yekhaneh.
isaiah 44:6	koh ’amar yhoh melekh yisra’eil wego’alo yhoh zewa’ot; ’ani rishon wa’ani ’aHaron, umibal‘aday ’ein ’elohim. 
isaiah 44:7	umi khamoni yiqra, weyagideha weya‘rekheha li, misumi ‘am ‘olam; we’otiyot wa’asher tawonah yagidu lamo. 
isaiah 44:8	’al tifHadu we’al tirhu, halo mei’ac hishma‘tikha wehigadti we’atem ‘eiday; hayeish ’eloah mibal‘aday, we’ein zur bal yada‘eti. 
isaiah 44:9	yozerei fesel kulam tohu, waHamudeihem bal yo‘ilu; we‘eideihem heimah, bal yir’u uwal yeide‘u lema‘an yeiwoshu. 
isaiah 44:10	mi yazar ’eil ufesel nasakh; lewilti ho‘il. 
isaiah 44:11	hein kal Haweiraw yeiwoshu, weHarashim heimah mei’adam; yitqabezu khulam ya‘amodu, yifHadu yeiwoshu yaHad. 
isaiah 44:12	Harash barcel ma‘azad, ufa‘al bapeHam, uwamaqawot yizereihu; wayif‘aleihu bicroa‘ koHo, gam ra‘eiw we’ein koaH, lo shatah mayim wayi‘af. 
isaiah 44:13	Harash ‘eizim naTah qaw yeta’areihu wasered, ya‘aseihu bamaqzu‘ot, uwameHugah yeta’oreihu; waya‘aseihu ketawnit ’ish, ketif’eret ’adam lashewet bayit. 
isaiah 44:14	likhrat lo ’aracim, wayiqaH tircah we’alon, way’amez lo ba‘azei ya‘ar; naTa‘ ’oren wegeshem yegadeil. 
isaiah 44:15	wehayah le’adam lewa‘eir, wayiqaH meihem wayaHam, ’af yasiq we’afah laHem; ’af yif‘al ’eil wayishtaHu, ‘asahu fesel wayisgad lamo. 
isaiah 44:16	Hezyo saraf bemo ’eish, ‘al Hezyo basar yokheil, yizleh zali weyisba‘; ’af yaHom weyomar he’aH, Hamoti ra’iti ’ur. 
isaiah 44:17	ushe’eirito, le’eil ‘asah lefislo; yisgod yisgad lo weyishtaHu weyitpaleil ’eilaw, weyomar hazileini, ki ’eili ’atah. 
isaiah 44:18	lo yade‘u welo yawinu; ki TaH meire’ot ‘eineihem, meihaskil libotam. 
isaiah 44:19	welo yashiw ’el libo, welo da‘at welo tewunah leimor Hezyo sarafti wemo ’eish, we’af ’afiti ‘al geHalaw leHem, ’ezleh wasar we’okheil; weyitro leto‘eiwah ’e‘eseh, lewul ‘eiz ’esgod. 
isaiah 44:20	ro‘eh ’eifer, leiw hutal hiTahu; welo yazil ’et nafsho welo yomar, halo sheqer bimini.
isaiah 44:21	cekhar ’eileh ya‘aqow, weyisra’eil ki ‘awdi ’atah; yezartikha ‘ewed li ’atah, yisra’eil lo tinasheini. 
isaiah 44:22	maHiti kha‘aw pesha‘ekha, wekhe‘anan HaTotekha; shuwah ’eilay ki ge’altikha. 
isaiah 44:23	ranu shamayim ki ‘asah yhoh hari‘u taHtiyot ’arez, pizHu harim rinah, ya‘ar wekhal ‘eiz bo; ki ga’al yhoh ya‘aqow, uweyisra’eil yitpa’ar.
isaiah 44:24	koh ’amar yhoh go’alekha, weyozerkha mibaTen; ’anokhi yhoh ‘oseh kol, noTeh shamayim lewadi, roqa‘ ha’arez mi ’iti mei’iti. 
isaiah 44:25	meifeir ’otot badim, weqosemim yeholeil; meishiw Hakhamim ’aHor weda‘tam yesakeil. 
isaiah 44:26	meiqim dewar ‘awdo, wa‘azat mal’akhaw yashlim; ha’omeir lirushalim tushaw, ule‘arei yehudah tibanenah, weHarewoteha ’aqomeim. 
isaiah 44:27	ha’omeir lazulah Horawi; wenaharotayikh ’owish. 
isaiah 44:28	ha’omeir lekhoresh ro‘i, wekhal Hefzi yashlim; weleimor lirushalim tibaneh, weheikhal tiwwaseid.
isaiah 45:1	koh ’amar yhoh limshiHo lekhoresh ’asher heHecaqti wimino, lerad lefanaw goyim, umatenei melakhim ’afateiaH; liftoaH lefanaw delatayim, ushe‘arim lo yissageiru. 
isaiah 45:2	’ani lefanekha ’eileikh, wahadurim ’oshir ’ayasheir; daltot neHushah ’ashabeir, uweriHei warcel ’agadeia‘. 
isaiah 45:3	wenatati lekha ’ozrot Hoshekh, umaTmunei mistarim; lema‘an teida‘, ki ’ani yhoh haqorei weshimkha ’elohei yisra’eil. 
isaiah 45:4	lema‘an ‘awdi ya‘aqow, weyisra’eil beHiri; wa’eqra lekha bishmekha, ’akhanekha welo yeda‘tani. 
isaiah 45:5	’ani yhoh we’ein ‘od, culati ’ein ’elohim; ’a’accerkha welo yeda‘tani. 
isaiah 45:6	lema‘an yeide‘u, mimicraH shemesh umima‘arawah, ki ’efes bil‘aday; ’ani yhoh we’ein ‘od. 
isaiah 45:7	yozeir ’or uworei Hoshekh, ‘oseh shalom uworei ra‘; ’ani yhoh ‘oseh khal ’eileh.
isaiah 45:8	har‘ifu shamayim mima‘al, usheHaqim yiccelu zedeq; tiftaH ’erez weyifru yesha‘, uzedaqah tazmiaH yaHad, ’ani yhoh beratiw.
isaiah 45:9	ho, raw ’et yozero, Heres ’et Harsei ’adamah; hayomar Homer leyozero mah ta‘aseh, ufa‘alekha ’ein yadayim lo.
isaiah 45:10	ho ’omeir le’aw mah tolid; ule’ishah mah teHilin.
isaiah 45:11	koh ’amar yhoh qedosh yisra’eil weyozero; ha’otiyot she’aluni, ‘al banay we‘al po‘al yaday tezawwuni. 
isaiah 45:12	’anokhi ‘asiti ’erez, we’adam ‘aleha warati; ’ani, yaday naTu shamayim, wekhal zewa’am ziwweiti. 
isaiah 45:13	’anokhi ha‘irotihu wezedeq, wekhal derakhaw ’ayasheir; hu yiwneh ‘iri wegaluti yeshaleiaH, lo wimHir welo weshoHad, ’amar yhoh zewa’ot.
isaiah 45:14	koh ’amar yhoh yegia‘ mizrayim useHar kush usewa’im ’anshei midah ‘alayikh ya‘aworu welakh yihyu, ’aHarayikh yeileikhu, bacciqim ya‘aworu; we’eilayikh yishtaHawwu ’eilayikh yitpalalu, ’akh bakh ’eil we’ein ‘od ’efes ’elohim. 
isaiah 45:15	’akhein ’atah ’eil mistateir; ’elohei yisra’eil moshia‘. 
isaiah 45:16	boshu wegam nikhlemu kulam; yaHdaw halekhu wakelimah, Harashei zirim. 
isaiah 45:17	yisra’eil nosha‘ yhoh, teshu‘at ‘olamim; lo teiwoshu welo tikalemu ‘ad ‘olmei ‘ad.
isaiah 45:18	ki khoh ’amar yhoh borei hashamayim hu ha’elohim, yozeir ha’arez we‘osah hu khonah, lo tohu wera’ah lashewet yezarah; ’ani yhoh we’ein ‘od. 
isaiah 45:19	lo wasseiter dibarti, bimqom ’erez Hoshekh, lo ’amarti lecera‘ ya‘aqow tohu waqeshuni; ’ani yhoh doweir zedeq, magid meisharim. 
isaiah 45:20	hiqawezu wawo’u hitnageshu yaHdaw peliTei hagoyim; lo yade‘u, hanose’im ’et ‘eiz pislam, umitpalim, ’el ’eil lo yoshia‘. 
isaiah 45:21	hagidu wehagishu, ’af yiwwa‘azu yaHdaw; mi hishmia‘ cot miqedem mei’ac higidah, halo ’ani yhoh we’ein ‘od ’elohim mibal‘aday, ’eil zadiq umoshia‘, ’ayin culati. 
isaiah 45:22	penu ’eilay wehiwwashe‘u kal ’afsei ’arez; ki ’ani ’eil we’ein ‘od. 
isaiah 45:23	bi nishba‘ti, yaza mipi zedaqah dawar welo yashuw; ki li tikhra‘ kal berekh, tishawa‘ kal lashon. 
isaiah 45:24	’akh yhoh li ’amar zedaqot wa‘oc; ‘adaw yawo weyeiwoshu, kol haneHerim bo. 
isaiah 45:25	yhoh yizdequ weyithalu kal cera‘ yisra’eil. 
isaiah 46:1	kara‘ beil qoreis newo, hayu ‘azabeihem, laHayah welabeheimah; nesu’oteikhem ‘amusot, masa la‘ayeifah. 
isaiah 46:2	qaresu khare‘u yaHdaw, lo yakhelu maleiT masa; wenafsham bashewi halakhah.
isaiah 46:3	shim‘u ’eilay beit ya‘aqow, wekhal she’eirit beit yisra’eil; ha‘amusim mini weTen, hanesu’im mini raHam. 
isaiah 46:4	we‘ad ciqnah ’ani hu, we‘ad sheiwah ’ani ’esbol; ’ani ‘asiti wa’ani ’esa, wa’ani ’esbol wa’amaleiT.
isaiah 46:5	lemi tedamyuni wetashwu; wetamshiluni wenidmeh. 
isaiah 46:6	haccalim cahaw mikis, wekhesef baqaneh yishqolu; yiskeru zoreif weya‘aseihu ’eil, yisgedu ’af yishtaHawwu 
isaiah 46:7	yisa’uhu ‘al kateif yisbeluhu weyaniHuhu taHtaw weya‘amod, mimeqomo lo yamish; ’af yiz‘aq ’eilaw welo ya‘aneh, mizarato lo yoshi‘enu.
isaiah 46:8	cikhru cot wehit’oshashu; hashiwu foshe‘im ‘al leiw. 
isaiah 46:9	cikhru rishonot mei‘olam; ki ’anokhi ’eil we’ein ‘od, ’elohim we’efes kamoni. 
isaiah 46:10	magid meireishit ’aHarit, umiqedem ’asher lo na‘asu; ’omeir ‘azati taqum, wekhal Hefzi ’e‘eseh. 
isaiah 46:11	qorei mimicraH ‘ayiT, mei’erez merHaq ’ish ‘azato ‘azati; ’af dibarti ’af ’awi’enah, yazarti ’af ’e‘esenah.
isaiah 46:12	shim‘u ’eilay ’abirei leiw; hareHoqim mizedaqah. 
isaiah 46:13	qeirawti zidqati lo tirHaq, uteshu‘ati lo te’aHeir; wenatati weziyon teshu‘ah, leyisra’eil tif’arti.
isaiah 47:1	redi ushewi ‘al ‘afar, betulat bat bawel, shewi la’arez ’ein kissei bat kasdim; ki lo tosifi yiqre’u lakh, rakah wa‘anugah. 
isaiah 47:2	qeHi reiHayim weTaHani qamaH; gali zamateikh Hespi showel gali shoq ‘iwri neharot. 
isaiah 47:3	tigal ‘erwateikh, gam teira’eh Herpateikh; naqam ’eqaH, welo ’efga‘ ’adam.
isaiah 47:4	go’aleinu yhoh zewa’ot shemo; qedosh yisra’eil. 
isaiah 47:5	shewi dumam uwo’i waHoshekh bat kasdim; ki lo tosifi yiqre’u lakh, geweret mamlakhot. 
isaiah 47:6	qazafti ‘al ‘ami, Hilalti naHalati, wa’eteneim beyadeikh; lo samt lahem raHamim, ‘al caqein hikhbadt ‘uleikh me’od. 
isaiah 47:7	watomeri, le‘olam ’ehyeh gewaret; ‘ad lo samt ’eileh ‘al libeikh, lo cakhart ’aHaritah.
isaiah 47:8	we‘atah shim‘i cot ‘adinah hayoshewet laweTaH, ha’omerah bilwawah, ’ani we’afsi ‘od; lo ’eisheiw ’almanah, welo ’eida‘ shekhol. 
isaiah 47:9	wetawonah lakh shetei ’eileh rega‘ beyom ’eHad shekhol we’almon; ketumam ba’u ‘alayikh, berow keshafayikh, be‘azemat Hawarayikh me’od. 
isaiah 47:10	watiwTeHi wera‘ateikh, ’amart ’ein ro’ani, Hakhemateikh weda‘teikh hi showwatekh; watomeri welibeikh, ’ani we’afsi ‘od. 
isaiah 47:11	uwa ‘alayikh ra‘ah, lo teide‘i shaHrah, wetipol ‘alayikh hoah, lo tukheli kaperah; wetawo ‘alayikh pit’om sho’ah lo teida‘i. 
isaiah 47:12	‘imdi na waHawarayikh uwerow keshafayikh, ba’asher yaga‘at mine‘urayikh; ’ulay tukheli ho‘il ’ulay ta‘arozi. 
isaiah 47:13	nil’eit berow ‘azatayikh; ya‘amdu na weyoshi‘ukh haweru howerei shamayim, haHocim bakokhawim, modi‘im leHodashim, mei’asher yawo’u ‘alayikh. 
isaiah 47:14	hineih hayu kheqash ’eish serafatam, lo yazilu ’et nafsham miyad lehawah; ’ein gaHelet laHmam, ’ur lashewet negdo. 
isaiah 47:15	kein hayu lakh ’asher yaga‘at; soHarayikh mine‘urayikh, ’ish le‘ewro ta‘u, ’ein moshi‘eikh.
isaiah 48:1	shim‘u cot beit ya‘aqow, haniqra’im besheim yisra’eil, umimei yehudah yaza’u; hanishba‘im besheim yhoh uweilohei yisra’eil yackiru, lo we’emet welo wizdaqah. 
isaiah 48:2	ki mei‘ir haqodesh niqra’u, we‘al ’elohei yisra’eil nismakhu; yhoh zewa’ot shemo.
isaiah 48:3	harishonot mei’ac higadti, umipi yaze’u we’ashmi‘eim; pit’om ‘asiti watawonah. 
isaiah 48:4	mida‘ti ki qasheh ’atah; wegid barcel ‘arepekha, umizHakha neHushah. 
isaiah 48:5	wa’agid lekha mei’ac, beTerem tawo hishma‘tikha; pen tomar ‘azebi ‘asam, ufisli weniski ziwwam. 
isaiah 48:6	shama‘ta Haceih kulah, we’atem halo tagidu; hishma‘tikha Hadashot mei‘atah, unezurot welo yeda‘tam. 
isaiah 48:7	‘atah niwre’u welo mei’ac, welifnei yom welo shema‘tam; pen tomar hineih yeda‘tin. 
isaiah 48:8	gam lo shama‘ta, gam lo yada‘ta, gam mei’ac lo fiteHah ’acenekha; ki yada‘ti bagod tiwgod, ufosheia‘ mibeTen qora lakh. 
isaiah 48:9	lema‘an shemi ’a’arikh ’api, utehilati ’eHeTam lakh; lewilti hakhritekha. 
isaiah 48:10	hineih zeraftikha welo wekhasef; beHartikha bekhur ‘oni. 
isaiah 48:11	lema‘ani lema‘ani ’e‘eseh ki ’eikh yeiHal; ukhewodi le’aHeir lo ’etein.
isaiah 48:12	shema‘ ’eilay ya‘aqow, weyisra’eil meqora’i; ’ani hu ’ani rishon, ’af ’ani ’aHaron. 
isaiah 48:13	’af yadi yasedah ’erez, wimini TipeHah shamayim; qorei ’ani ’aleihem ya‘amdu yaHdaw. 
isaiah 48:14	hiqawezu khulekhem ushama‘u, mi wahem higid ’et ’eileh; yhoh ’aheiwo, ya‘aseh Hefzo bewawel, ucero‘o kasdim. 
isaiah 48:15	’ani ’ani dibarti ’af qeratiw; hawi’otiw wehizliaH darko. 
isaiah 48:16	qirwu ’eilay shim‘u cot, lo meirosh basseiter dibarti, mei‘eit heyotah sham ’ani; we‘atah, ’adonay yhoh shelaHani weruHo.
isaiah 48:17	koh ’amar yhoh go’alkha qedosh yisra’eil; ’ani yhoh ’elohekha melamedkha leho‘il, madrikhakha bederekh teileikh. 
isaiah 48:18	lu hiqshawta lemizwotay; wayhi khanahar shelomekha, wezidqatekha kegalei hayam. 
isaiah 48:19	wayhi khaHol car‘ekha, weze’eza’ei mei‘ekha kim‘otaw; lo yikareit welo yishameid shemo milefanay. 
isaiah 48:20	ze’u mibawel birHu mikasdim beqol rinah, hagidu hashmi‘u cot, hozi’uha ‘ad qezeih ha’arez; ’imru ga’al yhoh ‘awdo ya‘aqow. 
isaiah 48:21	welo zame’u, baHorawot holikham, mayim mizur hiccil lamo; wayiwqa‘ zur, wayacuwu mayim. 
isaiah 48:22	’ein shalom, ’amar yhoh laresha‘im.
isaiah 49:1	shim‘u ’iyim ’eilay, wehaqshiwu le’umim meiraHoq; yhoh mibeTen qera’ani, mime‘ei ’imi hickir shemi. 
isaiah 49:2	wayasem pi keHerew Hadah, bezeil yado heHbi’ani; waysimeini leHeiz barur, be’ashpato histirani. 
isaiah 49:3	wayomer li ‘awdi ’atah; yisra’eil ’asher bekha ’etpa’ar. 
isaiah 49:4	wa’ani ’amarti leriq yaga‘ti, letohu wehewel koHi khileiti; ’akhein mishpaTi ’et yhoh, ufe‘ulati ’et ’elohay. 
isaiah 49:5	we‘atah ’amar yhoh yozeri mibeTen le‘ewed lo, leshoweiw ya‘aqow ’eilaw, weyisra’eil lo lo yei’aseif; we’ekaweid be‘einei yhoh, weilohay hayah ‘ucci. 
isaiah 49:6	wayomer, naqeil mihyotkha li ‘ewed, lehaqim ’et shiwTei ya‘aqow, unezirei unezurei yisra’eil lehashiw; unetatikha le’or goyim, lihyot yeshu‘ati ‘ad qezeih ha’arez.
isaiah 49:7	koh ’amar yhoh go’eil yisra’eil qedosho, liwcoh nefesh limta‘eiw go le‘ewed moshelim, melakhim yir’u waqamu, sarim weyishtaHawwu; lema‘an yhoh ’asher ne’eman, qedosh yisra’eil wayiwHareka. 
isaiah 49:8	koh ’amar yhoh be‘eit razon ‘anitikha, uweyom yeshu‘ah ‘acartikha; we’ezarekha, we’etenkha liwrit ‘am, lehaqim ’erez, lehanHil neHalot shomeimot. 
isaiah 49:9	leimor la’asurim zei’u, la’asher baHoshekh higalu; ‘al derakhim yir‘u, uwekhal shefayim mar‘itam. 
isaiah 49:10	lo yir‘awu welo yizma’u, welo yakeim sharaw washamesh; ki meraHamam yenahageim, we‘al mabu‘ei mayim yenahaleim. 
isaiah 49:11	wesamti khal haray ladarekh; umesilotay yerumun. 
isaiah 49:12	hineih ’eileh meiraHoq yawo’u; wehineih ’eileh mizafon umiyam, we’eileh mei’erez sinim. 
isaiah 49:13	ranu shamayim wegili ’arez, yifzeHu ufizHu harim rinah; ki niHam yhoh ‘amo, wa‘aniyaw yeraHeim.
isaiah 49:14	watomer ziyon ‘acawani yhoh; wadonay shekheiHani. 
isaiah 49:15	hatishkaH ’ishah ‘ulah, meiraHeim ben biTnah; gam ’eileh tishkaHnah, we’anokhi lo ’eshkaHeikh. 
isaiah 49:16	hein ‘al kapayim Haqotikh; Homotayikh negdi tamid. 
isaiah 49:17	miharu banayikh; meharesayikh umaHariwayikh mimeikh yeizei’u. 
isaiah 49:18	se’i sawiw ‘einayikh ure’i, kulam niqbezu wa’u lakh; Hay ’ani ne’um yhoh ki khulam ka‘adi tilbashi, uteqasherim kakalah. 
isaiah 49:19	ki Harewotayikh weshomemotayikh, we’erez harisuteikh; ki ‘atah teizeri miyosheiw, weraHaqu mewale‘ayikh. 
isaiah 49:20	‘od yomeru we’acenayikh, benei shikulayikh; zar li hamaqom geshah li we’eisheiwah. 
isaiah 49:21	we’amart bilwaweikh, mi yalad li ’et ’eileh, wa’ani shekhulah wegalmudah; golah wesurah, we’eileh mi gideil, hein ’ani nish’arti lewadi, ’eileh ’eifoh heim.
isaiah 49:22	koh ’amar ’adonay yhoh hineih ’esa ’el goyim yadi, we’el ‘amim ’arim nissi; weheiwi’u wanayikh beHozen, uwenotayikh ‘al kateif tinasenah. 
isaiah 49:23	wehayu melakhim ’omenayikh, wesaroteihem meiniqotayikh, ’apayim, ’erez yishtaHawu lakh, wa‘afar raglayikh yelaHeikhu; weyada‘at ki ’ani yhoh, ’asher lo yeiwoshu qoay.
isaiah 49:24	hayuqaH migibor malqoaH; we’im shewi zadiq yimaleiT. 
isaiah 49:25	ki khoh ’amar yhoh gam shewi gibor yuqaH, umalqoaH ‘ariz yimaleiT; we’et yeriweikh ’anokhi ’ariw, we’et banayikh ’anokhi ’oshia‘. 
isaiah 49:26	weha’akhalti ’et monayikh ’et besaram, wekhe‘asis damam yishkarun; weyade‘u khal basar, ki ’ani yhoh moshi‘eikh, wego’aleikh ’awir ya‘aqow.
isaiah 50:1	koh ’amar yhoh ’ei ceh seifer keritut ’imekhem ’asher shilaHtiha, ’o mi minoshay, ’asher makharti ’etkhem lo; hein ba‘awonoteikhem nimkartem, uwefish‘eikhem shuleHah ’imekhem. 
isaiah 50:2	madua‘ bati we’ein ’ish, qarati we’ein ‘oneh haqazor qazerah yadi mipedut, we’im ’ein bi khoaH lehazil; hein bega‘arati ’aHariw yam, ’asim neharot midbar, tiw’ash degatam mei’ein mayim, wetamot bazama. 
isaiah 50:3	’albish shamayim qadrut; wesaq ’asim kesutam.
isaiah 50:4	’adonay yhoh natan li leshon limudim, lada‘at la‘ut ’et ya‘eif dawar; ya‘ir baboqer baboqer, ya‘ir li ’ocen, lishmoa‘ kalimudim. 
isaiah 50:5	’adonay yhoh pataH li ’ocen, we’anokhi lo mariti; ’aHor lo nesugoti. 
isaiah 50:6	geiwi natati lemakim, uleHayay lemoreTim; panay lo histarti, mikelimot waroq. 
isaiah 50:7	wadonay yhoh ya‘acar li, ‘al kein lo nikhlameti; ‘al kein samti fanay kaHalamish, wa’eida‘ ki lo ’eiwosh. 
isaiah 50:8	qarow mazdiqi, mi yariw ’iti na‘amdah yaHad; mi wa‘al mishpaTi yigash ’eilay. 
isaiah 50:9	hein ’adonay yhoh ya‘acar li, mi hu yarshi‘eini; hein kulam kabeged yiwlu, ‘ash yokheleim. 
isaiah 50:10	mi wakhem yerei yhoh, shomeia‘ beqol ‘awdo; ’asher halakh Hasheikhim, we’ein nogah lo, yiwTaH besheim yhoh, weyisha‘ein beilohaw. 
isaiah 50:11	hein kulekhem qodeHei ’eish me’accerei ciqot; lekhu be’ur ’eshkhem, uweciqot bi‘artem, miyadi hayetah cot lakhem, lema‘azeiwah tishkawun.
isaiah 51:1	shim‘u ’eilay rodefei zedeq mewaqshei yhoh; habiTu ’el zur Huzawtem, we’el maqewet bor nuqartem. 
isaiah 51:2	habiTu ’el ’awraham ’awikhem, we’el sarah teHolelkhem; ki ’eHad qeratiw, wa’awarekheihu we’arbeihu.
isaiah 51:3	ki niHam yhoh ziyon, niHam kal Harewoteha, wayasem midbarah ke‘eiden, we‘arwatah kegan yhoh; sason wesimHah yimazei wah, todah weqol cimrah.
isaiah 51:4	haqshiwu ’eilay ‘ami, ule’umi ’eilay ha’acinu; ki torah mei’iti teizei, umishpaTi, le’or ‘amim ’argia‘. 
isaiah 51:5	qarow zidqi yaza yish‘i, ucero‘ay ‘amim yishpoTu; ’eilay ’iyim yeqawwu, we’el cero‘i yeyaHeilun. 
isaiah 51:6	se’u lashamayim ‘eineikhem wehabiTu ’el ha’arez mitaHat, ki shamayim ke‘ashan nimlaHu weha’arez kabeged tiwleh, weyosheweha kemo khein yemutun; wishu‘ati le‘olam tihyeh, wezidqati lo teiHat.
isaiah 51:7	shim‘u ’eilay yode‘ei zedeq, ‘am torati welibam; ’al tire’u Herpat ’enosh, umigidufotam ’al teiHatu. 
isaiah 51:8	ki khabeged yokheleim ‘ash, wekhazemer yokheleim sas; wezidqati le‘olam tihyeh, wishu‘ati ledor dorim.
isaiah 51:9	‘uri ‘uri liwshi ‘oc ceroa‘ yhoh, ‘uri kimei qedem, dorot ‘olamim; halo ’at hi hamaHzewet rahaw meHolelet tanin. 
isaiah 51:10	halo ’at hi hamaHarewet yam, mei tehom rabah; hasamah ma‘amaqei yam, derekh la‘awor ge’ulim. 
isaiah 51:11	ufeduyei yhoh yeshuwun, uwa’u ziyon berinah, wesimHat ‘olam ‘al rosham; sason wesimHah yasigun, nasu yagon wa’anaHah.
isaiah 51:12	’anokhi ’anokhi hu menaHemkhem; mi ’at watire’i mei’enosh yamut, umiben ’adam Hazir yinatein. 
isaiah 51:13	watishkaH yhoh ‘osekha, noTeh shamayim weyoseid ’arez watefaHeid tamid kal hayom, mipenei Hamat hameiziq, ka’asher konein lehashHit; we’ayeih Hamat hameiziq. 
isaiah 51:14	mihar zo‘eh lehipateiaH; welo yamut lashaHat, welo yeHsar laHmo. 
isaiah 51:15	we’anokhi yhoh ’elohekha, roga‘ hayam, wayehemu galaw; yhoh zewa’ot shemo. 
isaiah 51:16	wa’asim dewaray befikha, uwezeil yadi kissitikha; linToa‘ shamayim welisod ’arez, weleimor leziyon ‘ami ’atah.
isaiah 51:17	hit‘ori hit‘ori, qumi yerushalim, ’asher shatit miyad yhoh ’et kos Hamato; ’et quba‘at kos hatar‘eilah shatit mazit. 
isaiah 51:18	’ein menaheil lah, mikal banim yaladah; we’ein maHaciq beyadah, mikal banim gideilah. 
isaiah 51:19	shetayim heinah qore’otayikh, mi yanud lakh; hashod wehashewer wehara‘aw wehaHerew mi ’anaHameikh. 
isaiah 51:20	banayikh ‘ulefu shakhewu berosh kal Huzot keto mikhmar; hamlei’im Hamat yhoh ga‘arat ’elohayikh. 
isaiah 51:21	lakhein shim‘i na cot ‘aniyah; ushekhurat welo miyayin.
isaiah 51:22	koh ’amar ’adonayikh yhoh weilohayikh yariw ‘amo, hineih laqaHti miyadeikh ’et kos hatar‘eilah; ’et quba‘at kos Hamati, lo tosifi lishtotah ‘od. 
isaiah 51:23	wesamtiha beyad mogayikh, ’asher ’ameru lenafsheikh sheHi wena‘aworah; watasimi kha’arez geiweikh, wekhaHuz la‘owerim.
isaiah 52:1	‘uri ‘uri liwshi ‘ucceikh ziyon; liwshi bigdei tif’arteikh, yerushalim ‘ir haqodesh, ki lo yosif yawo wakh ‘od ‘areil weTamei. 
isaiah 52:2	hitna‘ari mei‘afar qumi shewi yerushalim; hitpateHu hitpateHi mosrei zawwareikh, shewiyah bat ziyon.
isaiah 52:3	ki khoh ’amar yhoh, Hinam nimkartem; welo wekhesef tiga’eilu. 
isaiah 52:4	ki khoh ’amar ’adonay yhoh, mizrayim yarad ‘ami warishonah lagur sham; we’ashur be’efes ‘ashaqo. 
isaiah 52:5	we‘atah mi li mah li foh ne’um yhoh, ki luqaH ‘ami Hinam; moshelo moshelaw yeheililu ne’um yhoh, wetamid kal hayom shemi mino’az. 
isaiah 52:6	lakhein yeida‘ ‘ami shemi; lakhein bayom hahu, ki ’ani hu hamdabeir hineini. 
isaiah 52:7	mah nawu ‘al heharim raglei mewaseir, mashmia‘ shalom mewaseir Tow mashmia‘ yeshu‘ah; ’omeir leziyon malakh ’elohayikh. 
isaiah 52:8	qol zofayikh nase’u qol yaHdaw yeraneinu; ki ‘ayin be‘ayin yir’u, beshuw yhoh ziyon. 
isaiah 52:9	pizHu ranenu yaHdaw, Harewot yerushalim; ki niHam yhoh ‘amo, ga’al yerushalim. 
isaiah 52:10	Hasaf yhoh ’et ceroa‘ qadesho, le‘einei kal hagoyim; wera’u kal ’afsei ’arez, ’eit yeshu‘at ’eloheinu.
isaiah 52:11	suru suru ze’u misham, Tamei ’al tiga‘u; ze’u mitokhah, hibaru nose’ei kelei yhoh. 
isaiah 52:12	ki lo weHipacon teizei’u, uwimnusah lo teileikhun; ki holeikh lifneikhem yhoh, ume’assifkhem ’elohei yisra’eil.
isaiah 52:13	hineih yaskil ‘awdi; yarum wenisa wegawah me’od. 
isaiah 52:14	ka’asher shamemu ‘alekha rabim, kein mishHat mei’ish mar’eihu; weto’aro mibenei ’adam. 
isaiah 52:15	kein yacceh goyim rabim, ‘alaw yiqpezu melakhim pihem; ki ’asher lo supar lahem ra’u, wa’asher lo shame‘u hitbonanu. 
isaiah 53:1	mi he’emin lishmu‘ateinu; uceroa‘ yhoh ‘al mi niglatah. 
isaiah 53:2	waya‘al kayoneiq lefanaw, wekhashoresh mei’erez ziyah, lo to’ar lo welo hadar; wenir’eihu welo mar’eh weneHmedeihu. 
isaiah 53:3	niwceh waHadal ’ishim, ’ish makh’owot widua‘ Holi; ukhemasteir panim mimenu, niwceh welo Hashawnuhu. 
isaiah 53:4	’akhein Holayeinu hu nasa, umakh’oweinu sewalam; wa’anaHnu Hashawnuhu, nagua‘ mukeih ’elohim ume‘uneh. 
isaiah 53:5	wehu meHolal mipesha‘einu, meduka mei‘awonoteinu; musar shelomeinu ‘alaw, uwaHawurato nirpa lanu. 
isaiah 53:6	kulanu kazon ta‘inu, ’ish ledarko paninu; yhoh hifgia‘ bo, ’eit ‘awon kulanu. 
isaiah 53:7	nigas wehu na‘aneh welo yiftaH piw kaseh laTewaH yuwal, ukheraHeil lifnei goceceha ne’elamah; welo yiftaH piw. 
isaiah 53:8	mei‘ozer umimishpaT luqaH, we’et doro mi yesoHeiaH; ki nigcar mei’erez Hayim, mipesha‘ ‘ami nega‘ lamo. 
isaiah 53:9	wayitein ’et resha‘im qiwro, we’et ‘ashir bemotaw; ‘al lo Hamas ‘asah, welo mirmah befiw. 
isaiah 53:10	yhoh Hafeiz dake’o heHeli, ’im tasim ’asham nafsho, yir’eh cera‘ ya’arikh yamim; weHeifez yhoh beyado yizlaH. 
isaiah 53:11	mei‘amal nafsho yir’eh yisba‘, beda‘to, yazdiq zadiq ‘awdi larabim; wa‘awonotam hu yisbol. 
isaiah 53:12	lakhein ’aHaleq lo warabim, we’et ‘azumim yeHaleiq shalal taHat, ’asher he‘erah lamawet nafsho, we’et poshe‘im nimnah; wehu HeiT rabim nasa, welaposhe‘im yafgia‘.
isaiah 54:1	rani ‘aqarah lo yaladah; pizHi rinah wezahali lo Halah, ki rabim benei shomeimah mibenei we‘ulah ’amar yhoh. 
isaiah 54:2	harHiwi meqom ’aholeikh, wiri‘ot mishkenotayikh yaTu ’al taHsokhi; ha’arikhi meitarayikh, witeidotayikh Hacceiqi. 
isaiah 54:3	ki yamin usemol tifrozi; wecar‘eikh goyim yirash, we‘arim neshamot yoshiwu. 
isaiah 54:4	’al tire’i ki lo teiwoshi, we’al tikalemi ki lo taHpiri; ki woshet ‘alumayikh tishkaHi, weHerpat ’almenutayikh lo tickeri ‘od. 
isaiah 54:5	ki wo‘alayikh ‘osayikh, yhoh zewa’ot shemo; wego’aleikh qedosh yisra’eil, ’elohei khal ha’arez yiqarei. 
isaiah 54:6	ki khe’ishah ‘acuwah wa‘azuwat ruaH qera’akh yhoh; we’eishet ne‘urim ki tima’eis ’amar ’elohayikh. 
isaiah 54:7	berega‘ qaTon ‘acawtikh; uweraHamim gedolim ’aqabezeikh. 
isaiah 54:8	beshezef qezef, histarti fanay rega‘ mimeikh, uweHesed ‘olam riHamtikh; ’amar go’aleikh yhoh.
isaiah 54:9	ki mei noaH cot li, ’asher nishba‘ti, mei‘awor mei noaH ‘od ‘al ha’arez; kein nishba‘ti miqezof ‘alayikh umige‘ar bakh. 
isaiah 54:10	ki heharim yamushu, wehagewa‘ot temuTenah; weHasdi mei’iteikh lo yamush, uwerit shelomi lo tamuT, ’amar meraHameikh yhoh.
isaiah 54:11	‘aniyah so‘arah lo nuHamah; hineih ’anokhi marbiz bapukh ’awanayikh, wisadtikh bassapirim. 
isaiah 54:12	wesamti kadkhod shimshotayikh, ushe‘arayikh le’awnei ’eqdaH; wekhal gewuleikh le’awnei Heifez. 
isaiah 54:13	wekhal banayikh limudei yhoh; weraw shelom banayikh. 
isaiah 54:14	bizdaqah tikonani; raHaqi mei‘osheq ki lo tira’i, umimeHitah, ki lo tiqraw ’eilayikh. 
isaiah 54:15	hein gor yagur ’efes mei’oti; mi gar ’itakh ‘alayikh yipol. 
isaiah 54:16	hein hineih ’anokhi barati Harash, nofeiaH be’eish peHam, umozi kheli lema‘aseihu; we’anokhi barati mashHit leHabeil. 
isaiah 54:17	kal keli yuzar ‘alayikh lo yizlaH, wekhal lashon taqum ’itakh lamishpaT tarshi‘i; cot naHalat ‘awdei yhoh wezidqatam mei’iti ne’um yhoh.
isaiah 55:1	ho kal zamei lekhu lamayim, wa’asher ’ein lo kasef; lekhu shiwru we’ekholu, ulekhu shiwru, belo khesef uwelo meHir yayin weHalaw. 
isaiah 55:2	lamah tishqelu khesef belo leHem, wigi‘akhem belo lesawe‘ah; shim‘u shamoa‘ ’eilay we’ikhlu Tow, wetit‘anag badeshen nafshekhem. 
isaiah 55:3	haTu ’acenekhem ulekhu ’eilay, shim‘u uteHi nafshekhem; we’ekhretah lakhem berit ‘olam, Hasdei dawid hane’emanim. 
isaiah 55:4	hein ‘eid le’umim netatiw; nagid umezawweih le’umim. 
isaiah 55:5	hein go lo teida‘ tiqra, wego lo yeda‘ukha ’eilekha yaruzu; lema‘an yhoh ’elohekha, weliqdosh yisra’eil ki fei’arakh.
isaiah 55:6	dirshu yhoh behimaze’o; qera’uhu bihyoto qarow. 
isaiah 55:7	ya‘acow rasha‘ darko, we’ish ’awen maHshewotaw; weyashow ’el yhoh wiraHameihu, we’el ’eloheinu ki yarbeh lisloaH. 
isaiah 55:8	ki lo maHshewotay maHshewoteikhem, welo darkheikhem derakhay; ne’um yhoh. 
isaiah 55:9	ki gawehu shamayim mei’arez; kein gawehu derakhay midarkheikhem, umaHshewotay mimaHshewoteikhem. 
isaiah 55:10	ki ka’asher yeireid hageshem wehasheleg min hashamayim, weshamah lo yashuw, ki ’im hirwah ’et ha’arez, weholidah wehizmiHah; wenatan cera‘ laccoreia‘, weleHem la’okheil. 
isaiah 55:11	kein yihyeh dewari ’asher yeizei mipi, lo yashuw ’eilay reiqam; ki ’im ‘asah ’et ’asher Hafazti, wehizliaH ’asher shelaHtiw. 
isaiah 55:12	ki wesimHah teizei’u, uweshalom tuwalun; heharim wehagewa‘ot, yifzeHu lifneikhem rinah, wekhal ‘azei hasadeh yimHa’u khaf. 
isaiah 55:13	taHat hana‘azuz ya‘aleh werosh, taHat wetaHat hassirpad ya‘aleh hadas; wehayah yhoh lesheim, le’ot ‘olam lo yikareit.
isaiah 56:1	koh ’amar yhoh, shimru mishpaT wa‘asu zedaqah; ki qerowah yeshu‘ati lawo, wezidqati lehigalot. 
isaiah 56:2	’ashrei ’enosh ya‘aseh cot, uwen ’adam yaHaciq bah; shomeir shabat meiHalelo, weshomeir yado mei‘asot kal ra‘.
isaiah 56:3	we’al yomar ben haneikhar, hanilwah ’el yhoh leimor, hawdeil yawdilani yhoh mei‘al ‘amo; we’al yomar hassaris, hein ’ani ‘eiz yaweish.
isaiah 56:4	ki khoh ’amar yhoh lassarisim ’asher yishmeru ’et shabetotay, uwaHaru ba’asher Hafazeti; umaHaciqim biwriti. 
isaiah 56:5	wenatati lahem beweiti uweHomotay yad washeim, Tow mibanim umibanot; sheim ‘olam ’eten lo, ’asher lo yikareit.
isaiah 56:6	uwenei haneikhar, hanilwim ‘al yhoh leshareto, ule’ahawah ’et sheim yhoh, lihyot lo la‘awadim; kal shomeir shabat meiHalelo, umaHaciqim biwriti. 
isaiah 56:7	wahawi’otim ’el har qadshi wesimaHtim beweit tefilati, ‘oloteihem weciwHeihem lerazon ‘al micbeHi; ki weiti, beit tefilah yiqarei lekhal ha‘amim. 
isaiah 56:8	ne’um ’adonay yhoh, meqabeiz nidHei yisra’eil; ‘od ’aqabeiz ‘alaw leniqbazaw. 
isaiah 56:9	kol Hayto saday; ’eitayu le’ekhol kal Hayto baya‘ar.
isaiah 56:10	zafu zofaw ‘iwrim kulam lo yada‘u, kulam kelawim ’ilemim, lo yukhelu linboaH; hocim shokhewim, ’ohawei lanum. 
isaiah 56:11	wehakelawim ‘accei nefesh, lo yade‘u sawe‘ah, weheimah ro‘im, lo yade‘u hawin; kulam ledarkam panu, ’ish lewiz‘o miqazeihu. 
isaiah 56:12	’eitayu ’eqHah yayin wenisbe’ah sheikhar; wehayah khaceh yom maHar, gadol yeter me’od. 
isaiah 57:1	hazadiq ’awad, we’ein ’ish sam ‘al leiw; we’anshei Hesed ne’esafim be’ein meiwin, ki mipenei hara‘ah ne’esaf hazadiq. 
isaiah 57:2	yawo shalom, yanuHu ‘al mishkewotam; holeikh nekhoHo. 
isaiah 57:3	we’atem qirwu heinah benei ‘onenah; cera‘ mena’eif waticneh. 
isaiah 57:4	‘al mi tit‘anagu, ‘al mi tarHiwu feh ta’arikhu lashon; halo ’atem yildei fesha‘ cera‘ shaqer. 
isaiah 57:5	haneiHamim ba’eilim, taHat kal ‘eiz ra‘anan; shoHaTei hayladim baneHalim, taHat se‘ifei hassela‘im. 
isaiah 57:6	beHaleqei naHal Helqeikh, heim heim goraleikh; gam lahem shafakht nesekh he‘elit minHah, ha‘al ’eileh ’enaHeim. 
isaiah 57:7	‘al har gawoah wenisa, samt mishkaweikh; gam sham ‘alit licboaH cawaH. 
isaiah 57:8	we’aHar hadelet wehamecucah, samt cikhroneikh; ki mei’iti gilit wata‘ali, hirHawt mishkaweikh watikhrat lakh meihem, ’ahawt mishkawam yad Hacit. 
isaiah 57:9	watashuri lamelekh bashemen, watarbi riquHayikh; wateshaleHi ziraykh ‘ad meiraHoq, watashpili ‘ad she’ol. 
isaiah 57:10	berow darkeikh yaga‘at, lo ’amart no’ash; Hayat yadeikh mazat, ‘al kein lo Halit. 
isaiah 57:11	we’et mi da’agt watire’i ki tekhacceiwi, we’oti lo cakhart, lo samt ‘al libeikh; halo ’ani maHsheh umei‘olam, we’oti lo tira’i. 
isaiah 57:12	’ani ’agid zidqateikh; we’et ma‘asayikh welo yo‘ilukh. 
isaiah 57:13	beca‘aqeikh yazilukh qibuzayikh, we’et kulam yisa ruaH yiqaH hawel; wehaHoseh wi yinHal ’erez, weyirash har qadshi 
isaiah 57:14	we’amar solu solu panu darekh; harimu mikhshol miderekh ‘ami.
isaiah 57:15	ki khoh ’amar ram wenisa, shokhein ‘ad weqadosh shemo, marom weqadosh ’eshkon; we’et daka ushefal ruaH, lehaHayot ruaH shefalim, ulehaHayot leiw nidka’im. 
isaiah 57:16	ki lo le‘olam ’ariw, welo lanezaH ’eqezof; ki ruaH milefanay ya‘aTof, uneshamot ’ani ‘asiti. 
isaiah 57:17	ba‘awon biz‘o qazafti we’akeihu hasteir we’eqzof; wayeilekh showaw bederekh libo. 
isaiah 57:18	derakhaw ra’iti we’erpa’eihu; we’anHeihu wa’ashaleim niHumim lo wela’aweilaw. 
isaiah 57:19	borei nuw niw sefatayim; shalom shalom laraHoq welaqarow ’amar yhoh urefatiw. 
isaiah 57:20	weharesha‘im kayam nigrash; ki hashqeiT lo yukhal, wayigreshu meimaw refesh waTiT. 
isaiah 57:21	’ein shalom, ’amar ’elohay laresha‘im.
isaiah 58:1	qera wegaron ’al taHsokh, kashofar hareim qolekha; wehageid le‘ami pish‘am, uleweit ya‘aqow HaTotam. 
isaiah 58:2	we’oti, yom yom yidroshun, weda‘at derakhay yeHpazun; kego ’asher zedaqah ‘asah, umishpaT ’elohaw lo ‘acaw, yish’aluni mishpeTei zedeq, qirwat ’elohim yeHpazun. 
isaiah 58:3	lamah zamnu welo ra’ita, ‘ininu nafsheinu welo teida‘; hein beyom zomekhem timze’u Heifez, wekhal ‘azeweikhem tingosu. 
isaiah 58:4	hein leriw umazah tazumu, ulehakot be’egrof resha‘; lo tazumu khayom, lehashmia‘ bamarom qolkhem. 
isaiah 58:5	hakhaceh, yihyeh zom ’ewHareihu, yom ‘anot ’adam nafsho; halakhof ke’agmon rosho, wesaq wa’eifer yazia‘, halaceh tiqra zom, weyom razon yhoh. 
isaiah 58:6	halo ceh zom ’ewHareihu pateiaH Harzubot resha‘, hateir ’agudot moTah; weshalaH rezuzim Hafeshim, wekhal moTah tenateiqu. 
isaiah 58:7	halo faros lara‘eiw laHmekha, wa‘aniyim merudim tawi wayit; ki tir’eh ‘arom wekhissito, umibesarekha lo tit‘alam. 
isaiah 58:8	’ac yibaqa‘ kashaHar ’orekha, wa’arukhatekha meheirah tizmaH; wehalakh lefanekha zidqekha, kewod yhoh ya’asfekha. 
isaiah 58:9	’ac tiqra yhoh ya‘aneh, teshawwa‘ weyomar hineini; ’im tasir mitokhkha moTah, shelaH ’ezba‘ wedaber ’awen. 
isaiah 58:10	wetafeiq lara‘eiw nafshekha, wenefesh na‘anah tasbia‘; wecaraH baHoshekh ’orekha, wa’afeilatekha kazahorayim. 
isaiah 58:11	wenaHakha yhoh tamid wehisbia‘ bezaHzaHot nafshekha, we‘azmotekha yaHaliz; wehayita kegan raweh, ukhemoza mayim, ’asher lo yekhaccewu meimaw. 
isaiah 58:12	uwanu mimekha Harewot ‘olam, mosdei dor wador teqomeim; weqora lekha godeir perez, meshoweiw netiwot lashawet. 
isaiah 58:13	’im tashiw mishabat raglekha, ‘asot Hafazekha beyom qadshi weqarata lashabat ‘oneg, liqdosh yhoh mekhubad, wekhibadto mei‘asot derakhekha, mimezo Hefzekha wedabeir dawar. 
isaiah 58:14	’ac, tit‘anag ‘al yhoh, wehirkawtikha ‘al bamotei ’arez; weha’akhaltikha, naHalat ya‘aqow ’awikha, ki pi yhoh dibeir.
isaiah 59:1	hein lo qazerah yad yhoh meihoshia‘; welo khawedah ’aceno mishemoa‘. 
isaiah 59:2	ki ’im ‘awonoteikhem hayu mawdilim, beineikhem lewein ’eloheikhem; weHaToteikhem, histiru fanim mikem mishemoa‘. 
isaiah 59:3	ki khapeikhem nego’alu wadam, we’ezbe‘oteikhem be‘awon; siftoteikhem diberu sheqer, leshonkhem ‘awlah tehgeh. 
isaiah 59:4	’ein qorei wezedeq, we’ein nishpaT be’emunah; baToaH ‘al tohu wedaber shaw, haro ‘amal weholeid ’awen. 
isaiah 59:5	beizei zif‘oni biqei‘u, wequrei ‘akawish ye’erogu; ha’okheil mibeizeihem yamut, wehaccureh tibaqa‘ ’ef‘eh. 
isaiah 59:6	qureihem lo yihyu leweged, welo yitkassu bema‘aseihem; ma‘aseihem ma‘asei ’awen, ufo‘al Hamas bekhapeihem. 
isaiah 59:7	ragleihem lara‘ yaruzu, wimaharu, lishpokh dam naqi; maHshewoteihem maHshewot ’awen, shod washewer bimsilotam. 
isaiah 59:8	derekh shalom lo yada‘u, we’ein mishpaT bema‘gelotam; netiwoteihem ‘iqeshu lahem, kol doreikh bah, lo yada‘ shalom. 
isaiah 59:9	‘al kein, raHaq mishpaT mimenu, welo tasigeinu zedaqah; neqawweh la’or wehineih Hoshekh, lingohot ba’afeilot nehaleikh. 
isaiah 59:10	negashah kha‘iwrim qir, ukhe’ein ‘einayim negasheishah; kashalnu wazahorayim kaneshef, ba’ashmanim kameitim. 
isaiah 59:11	nehemeh khadubim kulanu, wekhayonim hagoh nehgeh; neqawweh lamishpaT wa’ayin, lishu‘ah raHaqah mimenu. 
isaiah 59:12	ki rabu fesha‘einu negdekha, weHaToteinu ‘anetah banu; ki fesha‘einu ’itanu, wa‘awonoteinu yeda‘anum. 
isaiah 59:13	pashoa‘ wekhaHeish yhoh, wenasog mei’aHar ’eloheinu; daber ‘osheq wesarah, horo wehogo mileiw diwrei shaqer. 
isaiah 59:14	wehussag ’aHor mishpaT, uzedaqah meiraHoq ta‘amod; ki khashelah wareHow ’emet, unekhoHah lo tukhal lawo. 
isaiah 59:15	watehi ha’emet ne‘deret, wesar meira‘ mishtoleil; wayar yhoh wayeira‘ be‘einaw ki ’ein mishpaT. 
isaiah 59:16	wayar ki ’ein ’ish, wayishtomeim ki ’ein mafgia‘; watosha‘ lo cero‘o, wezidqato hi semakhatehu. 
isaiah 59:17	wayilbash zedaqah kashiryan, wekhowa‘ yeshu‘ah berosho; wayilbash bigdei naqam tilboshet, waya‘aT kam‘il qin’ah. 
isaiah 59:18	ke‘al gemulot ke‘al yeshaleim, Heimah lezaraw, gemul le’oyewaw; la’iyim gemul yeshaleim. 
isaiah 59:19	weyire’u mima‘araw ’et sheim yhoh, umimicraH shemesh ’et kewodo; ki yawo khanahar zar, ruaH yhoh nosesah wo. 
isaiah 59:20	uwa leziyon go’eil, uleshawei fesha‘ beya‘aqow; ne’um yhoh. 
isaiah 59:21	wa’ani, cot beriti ’otam ’amar yhoh, ruHi ’asher ‘alekha, udewaray ’asher samti befikha; lo yamushu mipikha umipi car‘akha umipi cera‘ car‘akha ’amar yhoh, mei‘atah we‘ad ‘olam.
isaiah 60:1	qumi ’ori ki wa ’oreikh; ukhewod yhoh ‘alayikh caraH. 
isaiah 60:2	ki hineih haHoshekh yekhasseh ’erez, wa‘arafel le’umim; we‘alayikh yicraH yhoh, ukhewodo ‘alayikh yeira’eh. 
isaiah 60:3	wehalekhu goyim le’oreikh; umelakhim lenogah carHeikh. 
isaiah 60:4	se’i sawiw ‘einayikh ure’i, kulam niqbezu wa’u lakh; banayikh meiraHoq yawo’u, uwenotayikh ‘al zad tei’amanah. 
isaiah 60:5	’ac tir’i wenahart, ufaHad weraHaw lewaweikh; ki yeihafeikh ‘alayikh hamon yam, Heil goyim yawo’u lakh. 
isaiah 60:6	shif‘at gemalim tekhasseikh, bikhrei midyan we‘eifah, kulam mishewa yawo’u; cahaw ulewonah yisa’u, utehilot yhoh yewaseiru. 
isaiah 60:7	kal zon qeidar yiqawezu lakh, ’eilei newayot yesharetunekh; ya‘alu ‘al razon micbeHi, uweit tif’arti ’afa’eir. 
isaiah 60:8	mi ’eileh ka‘aw te‘ufenah; wekhayonim ’el ’aruboteihem. 
isaiah 60:9	ki li ’iyim yeqawwu, wa’oniyot tarshish barishonah, lehawi wanayikh meiraHoq, kaspam ucehawam ’itam; lesheim yhoh ’elohayikh, weliqdosh yisra’eil ki fei’arakh. 
isaiah 60:10	uwanu wenei neikhar Homotayikh, umalkheihem yesharetunekh; ki weqizpi hikitikh, uwirzoni riHamtikh. 
isaiah 60:11	ufiteHu she‘arayikh tamid yomam walaylah lo yissageiru; lehawi ’eilayikh Heil goyim, umalkheihem nehugim. 
isaiah 60:12	ki hago wehamamlakhah ’asher lo ya‘awdukh yoweidu; wehagoyim Harow yeHerawu. 
isaiah 60:13	kewod halewanon ’eilayikh yawo, berosh tidhar ute’ashur yaHdaw; lefa’eir meqom miqdashi, umeqom raglay ’akhabeid. 
isaiah 60:14	wehalekhu ’eilayikh sheHoaH benei me‘anayikh, wehishtaHawu ‘al kapot raglayikh kal mena’azayikh; weqare’u lakh ‘ir yhoh, ziyon qedosh yisra’eil. 
isaiah 60:15	taHat heyoteikh ‘acuwah usenu’ah we’ein ‘oweir; wesamtikh lig’on ‘olam, mesos dor wador. 
isaiah 60:16	weyanaqt Haleiw goyim, weshod melakhim tinaqi; weyada‘at, ki ’ani yhoh moshi‘eikh, wego’aleikh ’awir ya‘aqow. 
isaiah 60:17	taHat haneHoshet ’awi cahaw, wetaHat habarcel ’awi khesef, wetaHat ha‘eizim neHoshet, wetaHat ha’awanim barcel; wesamti fequdateikh shalom, wenogesayikh zedaqah. 
isaiah 60:18	lo yishama‘ ‘od Hamas be’arzeikh, shod washewer bigwulayikh; weqarat yeshu‘ah Homotayikh, ushe‘arayikh tehilah. 
isaiah 60:19	lo yihyeh lakh ‘od hashemesh le’or yomam, ulenogah hayareiaH lo ya’ir lakh; wehayah lakh yhoh le’or ‘olam, weilohayikh letif’arteikh. 
isaiah 60:20	lo yawo ‘od shimsheikh, wireiHeikh lo yei’aseif; ki yhoh yihyeh lakh le’or ‘olam, weshalemu yemei ’ewleikh. 
isaiah 60:21	we‘ameikh kulam zadiqim, le‘olam yireshu ’arez; neizer maTa‘o maTa‘ay ma‘aseih yaday lehitpa’eir. 
isaiah 60:22	haqaTon yihyeh la’elef, wehaza‘ir lego ‘azum; ’ani yhoh be‘itah ’aHishenah.
isaiah 61:1	ruaH ’adonay yhoh ‘alay; ya‘an mashaH yhoh ’oti lewaseir ‘anawim, shelaHani laHawosh lenishberei leiw, liqro lishwuyim deror, wela’asurim peqaH qoaH. 
isaiah 61:2	liqro shenat razon yhoh, weyom naqam leiloheinu; lenaHeim kal ’aweilim. 
isaiah 61:3	lasum la’aweilei ziyon, lateit lahem pe’eir taHat ’eifer, shemen sason taHat ’eiwel, ma‘aTeih tehilah, taHat ruaH keihah; weqora lahem ’eilei hazedeq, maTa‘ yhoh lehitpa’eir. 
isaiah 61:4	uwanu Harewot ‘olam, shomemot rishonim yeqomeimu; weHideshu ‘arei Horew, shomemot dor wador. 
isaiah 61:5	we‘amedu carim, wera‘u zonekhem; uwenei neikhar, ’ikareikhem wekhoremeikhem. 
isaiah 61:6	we’atem, kohanei yhoh tiqarei’u, mesharetei ’eloheinu, yei’ameir lakhem; Heil goyim tokheilu, uwikhwodam tityamaru. 
isaiah 61:7	taHat bashetekhem mishneh, ukhelimah yaronu Helqam; lakhein be’arzam mishneh yirashu, simHat ‘olam tihyeh lahem. 
isaiah 61:8	ki ’ani yhoh ’oheiw mishpaT, sonei gaceil be‘olah; wenatati fe‘ulatam be’emet, uwerit ‘olam ’ekhrot lahem. 
isaiah 61:9	wenoda‘ bagoyim car‘am, weze’eza’eihem betokh ha‘amim; kal ro’eihem yakirum, ki heim cera‘ beirakh yhoh.
isaiah 61:10	sos ’asis yhoh tageil nafshi beilohay, ki hilbishani bigdei yesha‘, me‘il zedaqah ye‘aTani; keHatan yekhahein pe’eir, wekhakalah ta‘deh kheileha. 
isaiah 61:11	ki kha’arez tozi zimHah, ukheganah ceiru‘eha tazmiaH; kein ’adonay yhoh yazmiaH zedaqah utehilah, neged kal hagoyim. 
isaiah 62:1	lema‘an ziyon lo ’eHesheh, ulema‘an yerushalim lo ’eshqoT; ‘ad yeizei khanogah zidqah, wishu‘atah kelapid yiw‘ar. 
isaiah 62:2	wera’u goyim zidqeikh, wekhal melakhim kewodeikh; weqora lakh sheim Hadash, ’asher pi yhoh yiqowenu. 
isaiah 62:3	wehayit ‘aTeret tif’eret beyad yhoh; uzenof uzenif melukhah bekhaf ’elohayikh. 
isaiah 62:4	lo yei’ameir lakh ‘od ‘acuwah, ule’arzeikh lo yei’ameir ‘od shemamah, ki lakh, yiqarei Hefzi wah, ule’arzeikh be‘ulah; ki Hafeiz yhoh bakh, we’arzeikh tiba‘eil. 
isaiah 62:5	ki yiw‘al baHur betulah, yiw‘alukh banayikh; umesos Hatan ‘al kalah, yasis ‘alayikh ’elohayikh. 
isaiah 62:6	‘al Homotayikh yerushalim, hifqadti shomerim, kal hayom wekhal halaylah tamid lo yeHeshu; hamackirim ’et yhoh, ’al domi lakhem. 
isaiah 62:7	we’al titenu domi lo; ‘ad yekhonein we‘ad yasim ’et yerushalim tehilah ba’arez. 
isaiah 62:8	nishba‘ yhoh bimino uwicroa‘ ‘ucco; ’im ’etein ’et deganeikh ‘od ma’akhal le’oyewayikh, we’im yishtu wenei neikhar tirosheikh, ’asher yaga‘at bo. 
isaiah 62:9	ki me’asfaw yokheluhu, wehilu ’et yhoh; umeqabezaw yishtuhu beHazrot qadshi
isaiah 62:10	‘iwru ‘iwru bashe‘arim, panu derekh ha‘am; solu solu hamsilah saqelu mei’ewen, harimu neis ‘al ha‘amim. 
isaiah 62:11	hineih yhoh hishmia‘ ’el qezeih ha’arez, ’imru lewat ziyon, hineih yish‘eikh ba; hineih sekharo ’ito, ufe‘ulato lefanaw. 
isaiah 62:12	weqare’u lahem ‘am haqodesh ge’ulei yhoh; welakh yiqarei derushah, ‘ir lo ne‘ecawah.
isaiah 63:1	mi ceh ba mei’edom, Hamuz begadim mibazerah, ceh hadur bilwusho, zo‘eh berow koHo; ’ani medabeir bizdaqah raw lehoshia‘. 
isaiah 63:2	madua‘ ’adom lilwushekha; uwegadekha kedoreikh begat. 
isaiah 63:3	purah darakhti lewadi, umei‘amim ’ein ’ish ’iti, we’edrekheim be’api, we’ermeseim baHamati; weyeic nizHam ‘al begaday, wekhal malbushay ’eg’aleti. 
isaiah 63:4	ki yom naqam belibi; ushenat ge’ulay ba’ah. 
isaiah 63:5	we’abiT we’ein ‘oceir, we’eshtomeim we’ein someikh; watosha‘ li cero‘i, waHamati hi semakhateni. 
isaiah 63:6	we’awus ‘amim be’api, wa’ashakereim baHamati; we’orid la’arez nizHam.
isaiah 63:7	Hasdei yhoh ’ackir tehilot yhoh, ke‘al kol ’asher gemalanu yhoh; weraw Tuw leweit yisra’eil, ’asher gemalam keraHamaw ukherow Hasadaw. 
isaiah 63:8	wayomer ’akh ‘ami heimah, banim lo yeshaqeiru; wayhi lahem lemoshia‘. 
isaiah 63:9	bekhal zaratam lo lo zar, umal’akh panaw hoshi‘am, be’ahawato uweHemlato hu ge’alam; waynaTeleim waynase’eim kal yemei ‘olam. 
isaiah 63:10	weheimah maru we‘izewu ’et ruaH qadesho; wayeihafeikh lahem le’oyeiw hu nilHam bam. 
isaiah 63:11	wayickor yemei ‘olam mosheh ‘amo; ’ayeih hama‘aleim miyam, ’eit ro‘ei zono, ’ayeih hasam beqirbo ’et ruaH qadesho. 
isaiah 63:12	molikh limin mosheh, ceroa‘ tif’arto; boqeia‘ mayim mipeneihem, la‘asot lo sheim ‘olam. 
isaiah 63:13	molikham batehomot; kassus bamidbar lo yikasheilu. 
isaiah 63:14	kabeheimah babiq‘ah teireid, ruaH yhoh teniHenu; kein nihagta ‘amekha, la‘asot lekha sheim tif’aret. 
isaiah 63:15	habeiT mishamayim ure’eih, miccewul qadshekha wetif’artekha; ’ayeih qin’atekha ugewurotekha, hamon mei‘ekha weraHamekha ’eilay hit’apaqu. 
isaiah 63:16	ki ’atah ’awinu, ki ’awraham lo yeda‘anu, weyisra’eil lo yakiranu; ’atah yhoh ’awinu, go’aleinu mei‘olam shemekha. 
isaiah 63:17	lamah tat‘einu yhoh miderakhekha, taqshiaH libeinu miyir’atekha; uw lema‘an ‘awadekha, shiwTei naHalatekha. 
isaiah 63:18	lamiz‘ar yareshu ‘am qadshekha zareinu bossu miqdashekha. 
isaiah 63:19	hayinu, mei‘olam lo mashalta bam, lo niqra shimkha ‘aleihem; 
nulllu 
isaiah 64:	qara‘ta shamayim yaradta, mipanekha harim nacolu. 
isaiah 64:2	kiqdoaH ’eish hamasim, mayim tiw‘eh ’eish, lehodia‘ shimkha lezarekha; mipanekha goyim yirgacu. 
isaiah 64:3	ba‘asotkha nora’ot lo neqawweh; yaradta mipanekha harim nacolu. 
isaiah 64:4	umei‘olam lo shame‘u lo he’ecinu; ‘ayin lo ra’atah, ’elohim culatekha, ya‘aseh limHakeih lo. 
isaiah 64:5	paga‘ta ’et sas we‘oseih zedeq, bidrakhekha yickerukha; hein ’atah qazafta waneHeTa, bahem ‘olam weniwwasheia‘. 
isaiah 64:6	wanehi khaTamei kulanu, ukheweged ‘idim kal zidqoteinu; wanawel ke‘aleh kulanu, wa‘awoneinu karuaH yisa’unu. 
isaiah 64:7	we’ein qorei weshimkha, mit‘oreir lehaHaciq bakh; ki histarta fanekha mimenu, watemugeinu beyad ‘awoneinu. 
isaiah 64:8	we‘atah yhoh ’awinu ’atah; ’anaHnu haHomer we’atah yozereinu, uma‘aseih yadekha kulanu. 
isaiah 64:9	’al tiqzof yhoh ‘ad me’od, we’al la‘ad tickor ‘awon; hein habeT na ‘amekha khulanu. 
isaiah 64:10	‘arei qadshekha hayu midbar; ziyon midbar hayatah, yerushalim shemamah. 
isaiah 64:11	beit qadesheinu wetif’arteinu, ’asher hilukha ’awoteinu, hayah lisreifat ’eish; wekhal maHamadeinu hayah leHarebah. 
isaiah 64:12	ha‘al ’eileh tit’apaq yhoh; teHesheh ute‘aneinu ‘ad me’od.
isaiah 65:1	nidrashti lelo sha’alu, nimzeiti lelo wiqshuni; ’amarti hineini hineini, ’el go lo qora wishmi. 
isaiah 65:2	peirasti yaday kal hayom ’el ‘am soreir; haholekhim haderekh lo Tow, ’aHar maHshewoteihem. 
isaiah 65:3	ha‘am, hamakh‘isim ’oti ‘al panay tamid; coweHim baganot, umeqaTerim ‘al haleweinim. 
isaiah 65:4	hayoshewim baqewarim, uwanezurim yalinu; ha’okhelim besar haHacir, uferaq umeraq pigulim keleihem. 
isaiah 65:5	ha’omerim qeraw ’eilekha, ’al tigash bi ki qedashtikha; ’eileh ‘ashan be’api, ’eish yoqedet kal hayom. 
isaiah 65:6	hineih khetuwah lefanay; lo ’eHeseh ki ’im shilamti, weshilamti ‘al Heiqam. 
isaiah 65:7	‘awonoteikhem wa‘awonot ’awoteikhem yaHdaw ’amar yhoh, ’asher qiTeru ‘al heharim, we‘al hagewa‘ot Heirefuni; umadoti fe‘ulatam rishonah ‘al ’el Heiqam.
isaiah 65:8	koh ’amar yhoh ka’asher yimazei hatirosh ba’eshkol, we’amar ’al tashHiteihu, ki werakhah bo; kein ’e‘eseh lema‘an ‘awaday, lewilti hashHit hakol. 
isaiah 65:9	wehozeiti miya‘aqow cera‘, umihudah yoreish haray; wireishuha weHiray, wa‘awaday yishkenu shamah. 
isaiah 65:10	wehayah hasharon linweih zon, we‘eimeq ‘akhor lereiwez baqar; le‘ami ’asher derashuni. 
isaiah 65:11	we’atem ‘ocewei yhoh, hashekheiHim ’et har qadshi ha‘orekhim lagad shulHan, wehamal’im lamni mimsakh. 
isaiah 65:12	umaniti ’etkhem laHerew, wekhulekhem laTewaH tikhra‘u, ya‘an qarati welo ‘anitem, dibarti welo shema‘tem; wata‘asu hara‘ be‘einay, uwa’asher lo Hafazti beHartem.
isaiah 65:13	lakhein koh ’amar ’adonay yhoh hineih ‘awaday yokheilu we’atem tir‘awu, hineih ‘awaday yishtu we’atem tizma’u; hineih ‘awaday yismaHu we’atem teiwoshu. 
isaiah 65:14	hineih ‘awaday yaronu miTuw leiw; we’atem tiz‘aqu mike’eiw leiw, umisheiwer ruaH teyeililu. 
isaiah 65:15	wehinaHtem shimkhem lishwu‘ah liwHiray, wehemitekha ’adonay yhoh; wela‘awadaw yiqra sheim ’aHeir. 
isaiah 65:16	’asher hamitbareikh ba’arez, yitbareikh beilohei ’amein, wehanishba‘ ba’arez, yishawa‘ beilohei ’amein; ki nishkeHu, hazarot harishonot, wekhi nisteru mei‘einay. 
isaiah 65:17	ki hini worei shamayim Hadashim wa’arez Hadashah; welo ticcakharnah harishonot, welo ta‘alenah ‘al leiw. 
isaiah 65:18	ki ’im sisu wegilu ‘adei ‘ad, ’asher ’ani worei; ki hini worei ’et yerushalim gilah we‘amah masos. 
isaiah 65:19	wegalti wirushalim wesasti we‘ami; welo yishama‘ bah ‘od, qol bekhi weqol ce‘aqah. 
isaiah 65:20	lo yihyeh misham ‘od, ‘ul yamim wecaqein, ’asher lo yemalei ’et yamaw; ki hana‘ar, ben mei’ah shanah yamut, wehaHoTe, ben mei’ah shanah yequlal. 
isaiah 65:21	uwanu watim weyashawu; wenaTe‘u kheramim, we’akhelu piryam. 
isaiah 65:22	lo yiwnu we’aHeir yeisheiw, lo yiTe‘u we’aHeir yokheil; ki khimei ha‘eiz yemei ‘ami, uma‘aseih yedeihem yewalu weHiray. 
isaiah 65:23	lo yige‘u lariq, welo yeiledu labehalah; ki cera‘ berukhei yhoh heimah, weze’eza’eihem ’itam. 
isaiah 65:24	wehayah Terem yiqra’u wa’ani ’e‘eneh; ‘od heim medaberim wa’ani ’eshma‘. 
isaiah 65:25	ce’eiw weTaleh yir‘u khe’eHad, we’aryeih kabaqar yokhal tewen, wenaHash ‘afar laHmo; lo yarei‘u welo yashHitu bekhal har qadshi ’amar yhoh.
isaiah 66:1	koh ’amar yhoh, hashamayim kis’i, weha’arez hadom raglay; ’ei ceh wayit ’asher tiwnu li, we’ei ceh maqom menuHati. 
isaiah 66:2	we’et kal ’eileh yadi ‘asatah, wayihyu khal ’eileh ne’um yhoh; we’el ceh ’abiT, ’el ‘ani unekheih ruaH, weHareid ‘al dewari. 
isaiah 66:3	shoHeiT hashor makeih ’ish, coweiaH haseh ‘oreif kelew, ma‘aleih minHah dam Hacir, mackir lewonah mewareikh ’awen; gam heimah, baHaru bedarkheihem, uweshiquzeihem nafsham Hafeizah. 
isaiah 66:4	gam ’ani ’ewHar beta‘aluleihem, umegurotam ’awi lahem, ya‘an qarati we’ein ‘oneh, dibarti welo shamei‘u; waya‘asu hara‘ be‘einay, uwa’asher lo Hafazti baHaru.
isaiah 66:5	shim‘u dewar yhoh, haHareidim ’el dewaro; ’ameru ’aHeikhem sone’eikhem menadeikhem, lema‘an shemi yikhbad yhoh, wenir’eh wesimHatkhem weheim yeiwoshu. 
isaiah 66:6	qol sha’on mei‘ir, qol meiheikhal; qol yhoh, meshaleim gemul le’oyewaw. 
isaiah 66:7	beTerem taHil yaladah; beTerem yawo Heiwel lah wehimliTah cakhar. 
isaiah 66:8	mi shama‘ kacot, mi ra’ah ka’eileh, hayuHal ’erez beyom ’eHad, ’im yiwwaleid go pa‘am ’eHat; ki Halah gam yaledah ziyon ’et baneha. 
isaiah 66:9	ha’ani ’ashbir welo ’olid yomar yhoh; ’im ’ani hamolid we‘azarti ’amar ’elohayikh.
isaiah 66:10	simHu ’et yerushalim wegilu wah kal ’ohaweha; sisu ’itah masos, kal hamit’abelim ‘aleha. 
isaiah 66:11	lema‘an tinequ usewa‘tem, mishod tanHumeha; lema‘an tamozu wehit‘anagtem miccic kewodah.
isaiah 66:12	ki khoh ’amar yhoh hini noTeh ’eileha kenahar shalom ukhenaHal shoTeif kewod goyim winaqtem; ‘al zad tinasei’u, we‘al birkayim tesha‘osha‘u. 
isaiah 66:13	ke’ish ’asher ’imo tenaHamenu; kein ’anokhi ’anaHemkhem, uwirushalim tenuHamu. 
isaiah 66:14	ure’item wesas libekhem, we‘azmoteikhem kadeshe tifraHnah; wenod‘ah yad yhoh ’et ‘awadaw, weca‘am ’et ’oyewaw. 
isaiah 66:15	ki hineih yhoh ba’eish yawo, wekhassufah markewotaw; lehashiw beHeimah ’apo, wega‘arato belahawei ’eish. 
isaiah 66:16	ki wa’eish yhoh nishpaT, uweHarbo ’et kal basar; werabu Halei yhoh. 
isaiah 66:17	hamitqadeshim wehamiTaharim ’el haganot, ’aHar ’eHad ’aHat batawekh, ’okhelei besar haHacir, wehasheqez weha‘akhbar; yaHdaw yasufu ne’um yhoh. 
isaiah 66:18	we’anokhi, ma‘aseihem umaHshewoteihem, ba’ah leqabeiz ’et kal hagoyim wehaleshonot; uwa’u wera’u ’et kewodi. 
isaiah 66:19	wesamti wahem ’ot, weshilaHti meihem peleiTim ’el hagoyim tarshish pul welud moshekhei qeshet tuwal weyawan; ha’iyim hareHoqim, ’asher lo shame‘u ’et shim‘i welo ra’u ’et kewodi, wehigidu ’et kewodi bagoyim. 
isaiah 66:20	weheiwi’u ’et kal ’aHeikhem mikal hagoyim minHah yhoh bassusim uwarekhew uwazabim uwaperadim uwakirkarot, ‘al har qadshi yerushalim ’amar yhoh; ka’asher yawi’u wenei yisra’eil ’et haminHah bikhli Tahor beit yhoh. 
isaiah 66:21	wegam meihem ’eqaH lakohanim lalwiyim ’amar yhoh. 
isaiah 66:22	ki kha’asher hashamayim haHodashim weha’arez haHadashah ’asher ’ani ‘oseh ‘omedim lefanay ne’um yhoh; kein ya‘amod car‘akhem weshimkhem. 
isaiah 66:23	wehayah, midei Hodesh beHadesho, umidei shabat beshabato; yawo khal basar lehishtaHawot lefanay ’amar yhoh. 
isaiah 66:24	weyaze’u wera’u, befigrei ha’anashim, haposhe‘im bi; ki tola‘tam lo tamut, we’isham lo tikhbeh, wehayu deira’on lekhal basar. 
jeremiah 1:1	diwrei yirmeyahu ben Hilqiyahu; min hakohanim ’asher ba‘anatot, be’erez binyamin. 
jeremiah 1:2	’asher hayah dewar yhoh ’eilaw, bimei yoshiyahu wen ’amon melekh yehudah; bishlosh ‘esreih shanah lemalekho. 
jeremiah 1:3	wayhi, bimei yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah, ‘ad tom ‘ashtei ‘esreih shanah, lezidqiyahu wen yoshiyahu melekh yehudah; ‘ad gelot yerushalim baHodesh haHamishi.
jeremiah 1:4	wayhi dewar yhoh ’eilay leimor. 
jeremiah 1:5	beTerem ’ezorkha ’ezarekha wabeTen yeda‘tikha, uweTerem teizei meireHem hiqdashtikha; nawi lagoyim netatikha. 
jeremiah 1:6	wa’omar, ’ahah ’adonay yhoh, hineih lo yada‘ti dabeir; ki na‘ar ’anokhi.
jeremiah 1:7	wayomer yhoh ’eilay, ’al tomar na‘ar ’anokhi; ki ‘al kal ’asher ’eshlaHakha teileikh, we’eit kal ’asher ’azawwekha tedabeir. 
jeremiah 1:8	’al tira mipeneihem; ki ’itekha ’ani lehazilekha ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 1:9	wayishlaH yhoh ’et yado, wayaga‘ ‘al pi; wayomer yhoh ’eilay, hineih natati dewaray befikha. 
jeremiah 1:10	re’eih hifqadtikha hayom hacceh, ‘al hagoyim we‘al hamamlakhot, lintosh welintoz uleha’awid welaharos; liwnot welinToa‘.
jeremiah 1:11	wayhi dewar yhoh ’eilay leimor, mah ’atah ro’eh yirmeyahu; wa’omar maqeil shaqeid ’ani ro’eh. 
jeremiah 1:12	wayomer yhoh ’eilay heiTawta lir’ot; ki shoqeid ’ani ‘al dewari la‘asoto.
jeremiah 1:13	wayhi dewar yhoh ’eilay sheinit leimor, mah ’atah ro’eh; wa’omar, sir nafuaH ’ani ro’eh, ufanaw mipenei zafonah. 
jeremiah 1:14	wayomer yhoh ’eilay; mizafon tipataH hara‘ah, ‘al kal yoshewei ha’arez. 
jeremiah 1:15	ki hini qorei, lekhal mishpeHot mamlekhot zafonah ne’um yhoh; uwa’u wenatenu ’ish kis’o petaH sha‘arei yerushalim, we‘al kal Homoteha sawiw, we‘al kal ‘arei yehudah. 
jeremiah 1:16	wedibarti mishpaTay ’otam, ‘al kal ra‘atam; ’asher ‘acawuni, wayqaTeru leilohim ’aHeirim, wayishtaHawu lema‘asei yedeihem. 
jeremiah 1:17	we’atah te’cor matenekha, weqamta wedibarta ’aleihem, ’eit kal ’asher ’anokhi ’azawweka; ’al teiHat mipeneihem, pen ’aHitekha lifneihem. 
jeremiah 1:18	wa’ani hineih netatikha hayom, le‘ir miwzar ule‘amud barcel uleHomot neHoshet ‘al kal ha’arez; lemalkhei yehudah lesareha, lekhohaneha ule‘am ha’arez. 
jeremiah 1:19	wenilHamu ’eilekha welo yukhelu lakh; ki ’itekha ’ani ne’um yhoh lehazilekha.
jeremiah 2:1	wayhi dewar yhoh ’eilay leimor. 
jeremiah 2:2	halokh weqarata we’acenei yerushalim leimor, koh ’amar yhoh, cakharti lakh Hesed ne‘urayikh, ’ahawat kelulotayikh; lekhteikh ’aHaray bamidbar, be’erez lo ceru‘ah. 
jeremiah 2:3	qodesh yisra’eil yhoh, reishit tewu’atoh; kal ’okhelaw ye’shamu, ra‘ah tawo ’aleihem ne’um yhoh.
jeremiah 2:4	shim‘u dewar yhoh beit ya‘aqow; wekhal mishpeHot beit yisra’eil. 
jeremiah 2:5	koh ’amar yhoh mah maze’u ’awoteikhem bi ‘awel, ki raHaqu mei‘alay; wayeilekhu ’aHarei hahewel wayehbalu. 
jeremiah 2:6	welo ’ameru, ’ayeih yhoh, hama‘aleh ’otanu mei’erez mizrayim; hamolikh ’otanu bamidbar, be’erez ‘arawah weshuHah be’erez ziyah wezalmawet, be’erez, lo ‘awar bah ’ish, welo yashaw ’adam sham. 
jeremiah 2:7	wa’awi ’etkhem ’el ’erez hakarmel, le’ekhol piryah weTuwah; watawo’u wateTame’u ’et ’arzi, wenaHalati samtem leto‘eiwah. 
jeremiah 2:8	hakohanim, lo ’ameru ’ayeih yhoh, wetofesei hatorah lo yeda‘uni, weharo‘im pashe‘u wi; wehanewi’im nibe’u waba‘al, we’aHarei lo yo‘ilu halakhu. 
jeremiah 2:9	lakhein, ‘od ’ariw ’itekhem ne’um yhoh; we’et benei weneikhem ’ariw. 
jeremiah 2:10	ki ‘iwru ’iyei khitiyim ure’u, weqeidar shilHu wehitbonu me’od; ure’u hein hayetah kacot. 
jeremiah 2:11	haheimir go ’elohim, weheimah lo ’elohim; we‘ami heimir kewodo belo yo‘il. 
jeremiah 2:12	shomu shamayim ‘al cot; wesa‘aru Harewu me’od ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 2:13	ki shetayim ra‘ot ‘asah ‘ami; ’oti ‘acewu meqor mayim Hayim, laHzow lahem borot, borot nishbarim, ’asher lo yakhilu hamayim. 
jeremiah 2:14	ha‘ewed yisra’eil, ’im yelid bayit hu; madua‘ hayah lawac. 
jeremiah 2:15	‘alaw yish’agu khefirim, natenu qolam; wayashitu ’arzo leshamah, ‘araw nizetah nizetu mibeli yosheiw. 
jeremiah 2:16	gam benei nof wetaHpeneis wetaHpanHeis; yir‘ukh qadeqod. 
jeremiah 2:17	halo cot ta‘aseh lakh; ‘aceweikh ’et yhoh ’elohayikh, be‘eit molikheikh badarekh. 
jeremiah 2:18	we‘atah, mah lakh lederekh mizrayim, lishtot mei shiHor; umah lakh lederekh ’ashur, lishtot mei nahar. 
jeremiah 2:19	teyassereikh ra‘ateikh, umeshuwotayikh tokhiHukh, ude‘i ure’i ki ra‘ wamar, ‘aceweikh ’et yhoh ’elohayikh; welo faHdati ’eilayikh, ne’um ’adonay yhoh zewa’ot. 
jeremiah 2:20	ki mei‘olam shawarti ‘uleikh, nitaqti mosrotayikh, watomeri lo ’e‘ewod ’e‘ewor; ki ‘al kal giw‘ah gewohah, wetaHat kal ‘eiz ra‘anan, ’at zo‘ah conah. 
jeremiah 2:21	we’anokhi neTa‘tikh soreiq, kuloh cera‘ ’emet; we’eikh nehpakht li, surei hagefen nakheriyah. 
jeremiah 2:22	ki ’im tekhabesi baneter, wetarbi lakh borit; nikhtam ‘awoneikh lefanay, ne’um ’adonay yhoh. 
jeremiah 2:23	’eikh tomeri lo niTmeiti, ’aHarei habe‘alim lo halakhti, re’i darkeikh bagay, de‘i meh ‘asit; bikhrah qalah mesarekhet derakheha. 
jeremiah 2:24	pereh limud midbar, be’awwat nafosho nafshah sha’afah ruaH, ta’anatah mi yeshiwenah; kal mewaqsheha lo yi‘afu, beHadeshah yimza’uneha. 
jeremiah 2:25	min‘i ragleikh miyaHeif, ugoroneikh ugeroneikh mizim’ah; watomeri no’ash, lo ki ’ahawti carim we’aHareihem ’eileikh. 
jeremiah 2:26	kewoshet ganaw ki yimazei, kein howishu beit yisra’eil; heimah malkheihem sareihem, wekhohaneihem unewi’eihem. 
jeremiah 2:27	’omerim la‘eiz ’awi ’atah, wela’ewen ’at yelidtin yelidtanu, ki fanu ’eilay ‘oref welo fanim; uwe‘eit ra‘atam yomeru, qumah wehoshi‘einu. 
jeremiah 2:28	we’ayeih ’elohekha ’asher ‘asita lakh, yaqumu ’im yoshi‘ukha be‘eit ra‘atekha; ki mispar ‘arekha, hayu ’elohekha yehudah.
jeremiah 2:29	lamah tariwu ’eilay; kulekhem pesha‘tem bi ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 2:30	lashaw hikeiti ’et beneikhem, musar lo laqaHu; ’akhelah Harbekhem newi’eikhem ke’aryeih mashHit. 
jeremiah 2:31	hador, ’atem re’u dewar yhoh, hamidbar hayiti leyisra’eil, ’im ’erez ma’peileyah; madua‘ ’ameru ‘ami radnu, lo nawo ‘od ’eilekha. 
jeremiah 2:32	hatishkaH betulah ‘edyah, kalah qishureha; we‘ami shekheiHuni, yamim ’ein mispar. 
jeremiah 2:33	mah teiTiwi darkeikh lewaqeish ’ahawah; lakhein gam ’et hara‘ot, limadti limadt ’et derakhayikh. 
jeremiah 2:34	gam bikhnafayikh nimze’u, dam nafshot ’ewyonim neqiyim; lo wamaHteret mezatim ki ‘al kal ’eileh. 
jeremiah 2:35	watomeri ki niqeiti, ’akh shaw ’apo mimeni; hini nishpaT ’otakh, ‘al ’amereikh lo HaTati. 
jeremiah 2:36	mah teiceli me’od leshanot ’et darkeikh; gam mimizrayim teiwoshi, ka’asher boshet mei’ashur. 
jeremiah 2:37	gam mei’eit ceh teize’i, weyadayikh ‘al rosheikh; ki ma’as yhoh bemiwTaHayikh, welo tazliHi lahem. 
jeremiah 3:1	leimor hein yeshalaH ’ish ’et ’ishto wehalekhah mei’ito wehayetah le’ish ’aHeir, hayashuw ’eileha ‘od, halo Hanof teHenaf ha’arez hahi; we’at, canit rei‘im rabim, weshow ’eilay ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 3:2	se’i ‘einayikh ‘al shefayim ure’i, ’eifoh lo shugalt shukabet, ‘al derakhim yashawt lahem, ka‘arawi bamidbar; wataHanifi ’erez, bicnutayikh uwera‘ateikh. 
jeremiah 3:3	wayimane‘u rewiwim, umalqosh lo hayah; umeizaH ’ishah conah hayah lakh, mei’ant hikaleim. 
jeremiah 3:4	halo mei‘atah, qarati qarat li ’awi; ’aluf ne‘uray ’atah. 
jeremiah 3:5	hayinTor le‘olam, ’im yishmor lanezaH; hineih dibarti dibart wata‘asi hara‘ot watukhal.
jeremiah 3:6	wayomer yhoh ’eilay, bimei yoshiyahu hamelekh, hara’ita, ’asher ‘asetah meshuwah yisra’eil; holekhah hi ‘al kal har gawoah, we’el taHat kal ‘eiz ra‘anan waticni sham. 
jeremiah 3:7	wa’omar, ’aHarei ‘asotah ’et kal ’eileh ’eilay tashuw welo shawah; wateireh wateire bagodah ’aHotah yehudah. 
jeremiah 3:8	wa’eire, ki ‘al kal ’odot ’asher ni’afah meshuwah yisra’eil, shilaHtiha wa’etein ’et seifer kerituteha ’eileha; welo yare’ah bogeidah yehudah ’aHotah, wateilekh waticen gam hi. 
jeremiah 3:9	wehayah miqol cenutah, wateHenaf ’et ha’arez; watin’af ’et ha’ewen we’et ha‘eiz. 
jeremiah 3:10	wegam bekhal cot, lo shawah ’eilay bagodah ’aHotah yehudah bekhal libah; ki ’im besheqer ne’um yhoh.
jeremiah 3:11	wayomer yhoh ’eilay, zideqah nafshah meshuwah yisra’eil; mibogeidah yehudah. 
jeremiah 3:12	halokh weqarata ’et hadewarim ha’eileh zafonah, we’amarta shuwah meshuwah yisra’eil ne’um yhoh, lo ’apil panay bakhem; ki Hasid ’ani ne’um yhoh, lo ’eTor le‘olam. 
jeremiah 3:13	’akh de‘i ‘awoneikh, ki yhoh ’elohayikh pasha‘at; watefacceri ’et derakhayikh laccarim, taHat kal ‘eiz ra‘anan, uweqoli lo shema‘tem ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 3:14	shuwu wanim showawim ne’um yhoh, ki ’anokhi ba‘alti wakhem; welaqaHti ’etkhem ’eHad mei‘ir, ushenayim mimishpaHah, weheiweiti ’etkhem ziyon. 
jeremiah 3:15	wenatati lakhem ro‘im kelibi; wera‘u ’etkhem dei‘ah wehaskeil. 
jeremiah 3:16	wehayah ki tirbu uferitem ba’arez bayamim haheimah ne’um yhoh, lo yomeru ‘od, ’aron berit yhoh, welo ya‘aleh ‘al leiw; welo yickeru wo welo yifqodu, welo yei‘aseh ‘od. 
jeremiah 3:17	ba‘eit hahi, yiqre’u lirushalim kissei yhoh, weniqwwu ’eileha khal hagoyim lesheim yhoh lirushalim; welo yeilekhu ‘od, ’aHarei sherirut libam hara‘.
jeremiah 3:18	bayamim haheimah, yeilekhu weit yehudah ‘al beit yisra’eil; weyawo’u yaHdaw mei’erez zafon, ‘al ha’arez ’asher hinHalti ’et ’awoteikhem. 
jeremiah 3:19	we’anokhi ’amarti, ’eikh ’ashiteikh babanim, we’eten lakh ’erez Hemdah, naHalat zewi ziw’ot goyim; wa’omar, ’awi tiqre’u tiqre’i li, umei’aHaray lo tashuwu tashuwi. 
jeremiah 3:20	’akhein bagedah ’ishah meirei‘ah; kein begadtem bi beit yisra’eil ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 3:21	qol ‘al shefayim nishma‘, bekhi taHanunei benei yisra’eil; ki he‘ewwu ’et darkam, shakheHu ’et yhoh ’eloheihem. 
jeremiah 3:22	uwu banim showawim, ’erpah meshuwoteikhem; hinu ’atanu lakh, ki ’atah yhoh ’eloheinu. 
jeremiah 3:23	’akhein lasheqer migewa‘ot hamon harim; ’akhein yhoh ’eloheinu, teshu‘at yisra’eil. 
jeremiah 3:24	wehaboshet, ’akhelah ’et yegia‘ ’awoteinu mine‘ureinu; ’et zonam we’et beqaram, ’et beneihem we’et benoteihem. 
jeremiah 3:25	nishkewah bewasheteinu, utekhasseinu kelimateinu ki yhoh ’eloheinu HaTanu, ’anaHnu wa’awoteinu, mine‘ureinu we‘ad hayom hacceh; welo shama‘nu, beqol yhoh ’eloheinu.
jeremiah 4:1	’im tashuw yisra’eil ne’um yhoh ’eilay tashuw; we’im tasir shiquzekha mipanay welo tanud. 
jeremiah 4:2	wenishba‘ta Hay yhoh, be’emet bemishpaT uwizdaqah; wehitbarekhu wo goyim uwo yithalalu.
jeremiah 4:3	ki khoh ’amar yhoh le’ish yehudah welirushalim, niru lakhem nir; we’al ticre‘u ’el qozim. 
jeremiah 4:4	himolu yhoh wehasiru ‘arelot lewawkhem, ’ish yehudah weyoshewei yerushalim; pen teizei kha’eish Hamati, uwa‘arah we’ein mekhabeh, mipenei roa‘ ma‘aleikhem. 
jeremiah 4:5	hagidu wihudah, uwirushalim hashmi‘u, we’imru wtiq‘u tiq‘u shofar ba’arez; qir’u mal’u we’imru, hei’asefu wenawo’ah ’el ‘arei hamiwzar. 
jeremiah 4:6	se’u neis ziyonah, ha‘icu ’al ta‘amodu; ki ra‘ah, ’anokhi meiwi mizafon weshewer gadol. 
jeremiah 4:7	‘alah ’aryeih missubekho, umashHit goyim, nasa‘ yaza mimeqomo; lasum ’arzeikh leshamah, ‘arayikh tizenah mei’ein yosheiw. 
jeremiah 4:8	‘al cot Higru saqim sifdu weheililu; ki lo shaw Haron ’af yhoh mimenu.
jeremiah 4:9	wehayah wayom hahu ne’um yhoh, yowad leiw hamelekh weleiw hasarim; wenashamu hakohanim, wehanewi’im yitmahu. 
jeremiah 4:10	wa’omar ’ahah ’adonay yhoh ’akhein hashei hisheita la‘am hacceh welirushalim leimor, shalom yihyeh lakhem; wenage‘ah Herew ‘ad hanafesh. 
jeremiah 4:11	ba‘eit hahi, yei’ameir la‘am hacceh welirushalim, ruaH zaH shefayim bamidbar, derekh bat ‘ami; lo licrot welo lehawar. 
jeremiah 4:12	ruaH malei mei’eileh yawo li; ‘atah gam ’ani ’adabeir mishpaTim ’otam. 
jeremiah 4:13	hineih ka‘ananim ya‘aleh, wekhassufah markewotaw, qalu minesharim susaw; ’o lanu ki shudadenu. 
jeremiah 4:14	kabesi meira‘ah libeikh yerushalim, lema‘an tiwwashei‘i; ‘ad matay talin beqirbeikh maHshewot ’oneikh. 
jeremiah 4:15	ki qol magid midan; umashmia‘ ’awen meihar ’efrayim. 
jeremiah 4:16	hackiru lagoyim, hineih hashmi‘u ‘al yerushalim, nozerim ba’im mei’erez hamerHaq; wayitenu ‘al ‘arei yehudah qolam. 
jeremiah 4:17	keshomerei saday, hayu ‘aleha missawiw; ki ’oti maratah ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 4:18	darkeikh uma‘alalayikh, ‘aso ’eileh lakh; cot ra‘ateikh ki mar, ki naga‘ ‘ad libeikh.
jeremiah 4:19	mei‘ay mei‘ay ’aHulah ’oHilah qirot libi homeh li libi lo ’aHarish; ki qol shofar shama‘ti shama‘at nafshi, teru‘at milHamah. 
jeremiah 4:20	shewer ‘al shewer niqra, ki shudedah kal ha’arez; pit’om shudedu ’ohalay, rega‘ yeri‘otay. 
jeremiah 4:21	‘ad matay ’er’eh neis; ’eshme‘ah qol shofar.
jeremiah 4:22	ki ’ewil ‘ami, ’oti lo yada‘u, banim sekhalim heimah, welo newonim heimah; Hakhamim heimah lehara‘, uleheiTiw lo yada‘u. 
jeremiah 4:23	ra’iti ’et ha’arez, wehineih tohu wawohu; we’el hashamayim we’ein ’oram. 
jeremiah 4:24	ra’iti heharim, wehineih ro‘ashim; wekhal hagewa‘ot hitqalqalu. 
jeremiah 4:25	ra’iti wehineih ’ein ha’adam; wekhal ‘of hashamayim nadadu. 
jeremiah 4:26	ra’iti wehineih hakarmel hamidbar; wekhal ‘araw, nitezu mipenei yhoh, mipenei Haron ’apo.
jeremiah 4:27	ki khoh ’amar yhoh, shemamah tihyeh kal ha’arez; wekhalah lo ’e‘eseh. 
jeremiah 4:28	‘al cot te’ewal ha’arez, weqaderu hashamayim mima‘al; ‘al ki dibarti camoti, welo niHamti welo ’ashuw mimenah. 
jeremiah 4:29	miqol parash weromeih qeshet, boraHat kal ha‘ir, ba’u be‘awim, uwakeifim ‘alu; kal ha‘ir ‘acuwah, we’ein yosheiw bahein ’ish. 
jeremiah 4:30	we’ati we’at shadud mah ta‘asi, ki tilbeshi shani ki ta‘di ‘adi cahaw, ki tiqre‘i wapukh ‘einayikh, lashaw tityapi; ma’asu wakh ‘ogewim nafsheikh yewaqeishu. 
jeremiah 4:31	ki qol keHolah shama‘ti, zarah kemawkirah, qol bat ziyon tityapeiaH tefareis kapeha; ’o na li, ki ‘ayefah nafshi lehoregim.
jeremiah 5:1	shoTu beHuzot yerushalim, ure’u na ude‘u uwaqshu wirHowoteha, ’im timze’u ’ish, ’im yeish ‘oseh mishpaT mewaqeish ’emunah; we’eslaH lah. 
jeremiah 5:2	we’im Hay yhoh yomeiru; lakhein lasheqer yishawei‘u. 
jeremiah 5:3	yhoh ‘einekha halo le’emunah hikitah ’otam welo Halu, kilitam mei’anu qaHat musar; Hiccequ feneihem missela‘, mei’anu lashuw. 
jeremiah 5:4	wa’ani ’amarti, ’akh dalim heim; no’alu ki lo yade‘u derekh yhoh, mishpaT ’eloheihem. 
jeremiah 5:5	’eilakhah li ’el hagedolim wa’adaberah ’otam, ki heimah, yade‘u derekh yhoh, mishpaT ’eloheihem; ’akh heimah yaHdaw shaweru ‘ol, nitequ moseirot. 
jeremiah 5:6	‘al kein hikam ’aryeih miya‘ar, ce’eiw ‘arawot yeshadedeim, nameir shoqeid ‘al ‘areihem, kal hayozei meiheinah yiTareif; ki rabu pish‘eihem, ‘azemu meshuwoteihem meshuwoteihem 
jeremiah 5:7	’ei lacot ’esloaH ’eslaH lakh, banayikh ‘acawuni, wayishawe‘u belo ’elohim; wa’asbia‘ ’otam wayin’afu, uweit conah yitgodadu. 
jeremiah 5:8	susim meyuccanim mashkim hayu; ’ish ’el ’eishet rei‘eihu yizhalu. 
jeremiah 5:9	ha‘al ’eileh lo ’efqod ne’um yhoh; we’im bego ’asher kaceh, lo titnaqeim nafshi.
jeremiah 5:10	‘alu wesharoteha weshaHeitu, wekhalah ’al ta‘asu; hasiru neTishoteha, ki lo yhoh heimah. 
jeremiah 5:11	ki wagod bagedu bi, beit yisra’eil uweit yehudah ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 5:12	kiHashu yhoh, wayomeru lo hu; welo tawo ‘aleinu ra‘ah, weHerew wera‘aw lo nir’eh. 
jeremiah 5:13	wehanewi’im yihyu leruaH, wehadibeir ’ein bahem; koh yei‘aseh lahem.
jeremiah 5:14	lakhein, koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei zewa’ot, ya‘an daberkhem, ’et hadawar hacceh; hini notein dewaray befikha le’eish, weha‘am hacceh ‘eizim wa’akhalatam. 
jeremiah 5:15	hini meiwi ‘aleikhem go mimerHaq beit yisra’eil ne’um yhoh; go ’eitan hu, go mei‘olam hu, go lo teida‘ leshono, welo tishma‘ mah yedabeir. 
jeremiah 5:16	’ashpato keqewer patuaH; kulam giborim. 
jeremiah 5:17	we’akhal qezirekha welaHmekha, yokhelu banekha uwenotekha, yokhal zonekha uweqarekha, yokhal gafnekha ute’einatekha; yerosheish ‘arei miwzarekha, ’asher ’atah boTeiaH baheinah beHarew. 
jeremiah 5:18	wegam bayamim haheimah ne’um yhoh; lo ’e‘eseh ’itekhem kalah. 
jeremiah 5:19	wehayah ki tomeru, taHat meh, ‘asah yhoh ’eloheinu lanu ’et kal ’eileh; we’amarta ’aleihem, ka’asher ‘acawtem ’oti wata‘awdu ’elohei neikhar be’arzekhem, kein ta‘awdu carim, be’erez lo lakhem.
jeremiah 5:20	hagidu cot beweit ya‘aqow; wehashmi‘uha wihudah leimor. 
jeremiah 5:21	shim‘u na cot, ‘am sakhal we’ein leiw; ‘einayim lahem welo yir’u, ’acenayim lahem welo yishma‘u. 
jeremiah 5:22	ha’oti lo tira’u ne’um yhoh ’im mipanay lo taHilu, ’asher samti Hol gewul layam, Haq ‘olam welo ya‘awrenhu; wayitga‘ashu welo yukhalu, wehamu galaw welo ya‘awrunhu. 
jeremiah 5:23	wela‘am hacceh hayah, leiw soreir umoreh; saru wayeileikhu. 
jeremiah 5:24	welo ’ameru wilwawam, nira na ’et yhoh ’eloheinu, hanotein, geshem weyoreh yoreh umalqosh be‘ito; shewu‘ot Huqot qazir yishmar lanu. 
jeremiah 5:25	‘awonoteikhem hiTu ’eileh; weHaToteikhem, mane‘u haTow mikem. 
jeremiah 5:26	ki nimze’u we‘ami resha‘im; yashur keshakh yequshim, hiziwu mashHit ’anashim yilkodu. 
jeremiah 5:27	kikhluw malei ‘of, kein bateihem melei’im mirmah; ‘al kein gadelu waya‘ashiru. 
jeremiah 5:28	shamenu ‘ashetu, gam ‘aweru diwrei ra‘, din lo danu, din yatom weyazliHu; umishpaT ’ewyonim lo shafaTu. 
jeremiah 5:29	ha‘al ’eileh lo ’efqod ne’um yhoh; ’im bego ’asher kaceh, lo titnaqeim nafshi.
jeremiah 5:30	shamah wesha‘arurah, nihyetah ba’arez. 
jeremiah 5:31	hanewi’im nibe’u washeqer, wehakohanim yirdu ‘al yedeihem, we‘ami ’ahawu khein; umah ta‘asu le’aHaritah. 
jeremiah 6:1	ha‘icu benei winyamin, miqerew yerushalim, uwitqoa‘ tiq‘u shofar, we‘al beit hakerem se’u mas’eit; ki ra‘ah nishqefah mizafon weshewer gadol. 
jeremiah 6:2	hanawah wehame‘unagah, damiti bat ziyon. 
jeremiah 6:3	’eileha yawo’u ro‘im we‘edreihem; taqe‘u ‘aleha ’ohalim sawiw, ra‘u ’ish ’et yado. 
jeremiah 6:4	qadeshu ‘aleha milHamah, qumu wena‘aleh wazahorayim; ’o lanu ki fanah hayom, ki yinaTu zilei ‘arew. 
jeremiah 6:5	qumu wena‘aleh walayelah, wenashHitah ’armenoteha.
jeremiah 6:6	ki khoh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot, kirtu ‘eizah, weshifkhu ‘al yerushalim solelah; hi ha‘ir hafeqad, kulah ‘osheq beqirbah. 
jeremiah 6:7	kehaqir beweir bayir meimeha, kein heiqeirah ra‘atah; Hamas washod yishama‘ bah ‘al panay tamid Holi umakah. 
jeremiah 6:8	hiwwaseri yerushalim, pen teiqa‘ nafshi mimeikh; pen ’asimeikh shemamah, ’erez lo noshawah.
jeremiah 6:9	koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot, ‘oleil ye‘olu khagefen she’eirit yisra’eil; hasheiw yadekha, kewozeir ‘al salsilot. 
jeremiah 6:10	‘al mi ’adaberah we’a‘idah weyishma‘u, hineih ‘areilah ’acenam, welo yukhelu lehaqshiw; hineih dewar yhoh hayah lahem leHerpah lo yaHpezu wo. 
jeremiah 6:11	we’eit Hamat yhoh maleiti nil’eiti hakhil, shefokh ‘al ‘olal baHuz, we‘al sod baHurim yaHdaw; ki gam ’ish ‘im ’ishah yilakheidu, caqein ‘im melei yamim. 
jeremiah 6:12	wenasabu wateihem la’aHeirim, sadot wenashim yaHdaw; ki ’aTeh ’et yadi ‘al yoshewei ha’arez ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 6:13	ki miqeTanam we‘ad gedolam, kulo bozeia‘ baza‘; uminawi we‘ad kohein, kulo ‘oseh shaqer. 
jeremiah 6:14	wayrape’u ’et shewer ‘ami ‘al neqalah, leimor shalom shalom; we’ein shalom. 
jeremiah 6:15	howishu ki to‘eiwah ‘asu; gam bosh lo yeiwoshu, gam hakhlim lo yada‘u, lakhein yipelu wanofelim be‘eit peqadtim yikashelu ’amar yhoh.
jeremiah 6:16	koh ’amar yhoh ‘imdu ‘al derakhim ure’u wesha’alu lintiwot ‘olam, ’ei ceh derekh haTow ulekhu wah, umiz’u margoa‘ lenafshekhem; wayomeru lo neileikh. 
jeremiah 6:17	wahaqimoti ‘aleikhem zofim, haqshiwu leqol shofar; wayomeru lo naqshiw. 
jeremiah 6:18	lakhein shim‘u hagoyim; ude‘i ‘eidah ’et ’asher bam. 
jeremiah 6:19	shim‘i ha’arez, hineih ’anokhi meiwi ra‘ah ’el ha‘am hacceh peri maHshewotam; ki ‘al dewaray lo hiqshiwu, wetorati wayim’asu wah. 
jeremiah 6:20	lamah ceh li lewonah mishewa tawo, weqaneh haTow mei’erez merHaq; ‘oloteikhem lo lerazon, weciwHeikhem lo ‘arewu li.
jeremiah 6:21	lakhein, koh ’amar yhoh, hini notein ’el ha‘am hacceh mikhsholim; wekhashelu wam ’awot uwanim yaHdaw shakhein werei‘o yoweidu we’awadu.
jeremiah 6:22	koh ’amar yhoh, hineih ‘am ba mei’erez zafon; wego gadol, yei‘or miyarketei ’arez. 
jeremiah 6:23	qeshet wekhidon yaHaciqu, ’akhcari hu welo yeraHeimu, qolam kayam yehemeh, we‘al susim yirkawu; ‘arukh, ke’ish lamilHamah, ‘alayikh bat ziyon. 
jeremiah 6:24	shama‘nu ’et shame‘o rafu yadeinu; zarah heHeciqatnu, Hil kayoleidah. 
jeremiah 6:25	’al teize’i teize’u hasadeh, uwaderekh ’al teileikhi teileikhu; ki Herew le’oyeiw, magor missawiw. 
jeremiah 6:26	bat ‘ami Higri saq wehitpaleshi wa’eifer, ’eiwel yaHid ‘asi lakh, mispad tamrurim; ki fit’om, yawo hashodeid ‘aleinu. 
jeremiah 6:27	baHon netatikha we‘ami miwzar; weteida‘ uwaHanta ’et darkam. 
jeremiah 6:28	kulam sarei sorim, holekhei rakhil neHoshet uwarcel; kulam mashHitim heimah. 
jeremiah 6:29	naHar mapuaH, mei’ishtam mei’eish tam ‘ofaret; lashaw zaraf zarof, wera‘im lo nitaqu. 
jeremiah 6:30	kesef nim’as, qare’u lahem; ki ma’as yhoh bahem.
jeremiah 7:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu, mei’eit yhoh leimor. 
jeremiah 7:2	‘amod, besha‘ar beit yhoh, weqarata sham, ’et hadawar hacceh; we’amarta shim‘u dewar yhoh kal yehudah haba’im bashe‘arim ha’eileh, lehishtaHawot yhoh.
jeremiah 7:3	koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, heiTiwu darkheikhem uma‘aleikhem; wa’ashakenah ’etkhem, bamaqom hacceh. 
jeremiah 7:4	’al tiwTeHu lakhem, ’el diwrei hasheqer leimor; heikhal yhoh heikhal yhoh, heikhal yhoh heimah. 
jeremiah 7:5	ki ’im heiTeiw teiTiwu, ’et darkheikhem we’et ma‘aleikhem; ’im ‘aso ta‘asu mishpaT, bein ’ish uwein rei‘eihu. 
jeremiah 7:6	geir yatom we’almanah lo ta‘ashoqu, wedam naqi, ’al tishpekhu bamaqom hacceh; we’aHarei ’elohim ’aHeirim lo teilekhu lera‘ lakhem. 
jeremiah 7:7	weshikanti ’etkhem bamaqom hacceh, ba’arez ’asher natati la’awoteikhem; lemin ‘olam we‘ad ‘olam. 
jeremiah 7:8	hineih ’atem boTeHim lakhem, ‘al diwrei hashaqer; lewilti ho‘il. 
jeremiah 7:9	haganow razoaH wena’of, wehishaweia‘ lasheqer weqaTeir laba‘al; wehalokh, ’aHarei ’elohim ’aHeirim ’asher lo yeda‘tem. 
jeremiah 7:10	uwatem wa‘amadtem lefanay, babayit hacceh ’asher niqra shemi ‘alaw, wa’amartem nizalnu; lema‘an ‘asot, ’eit kal hato‘eiwot ha’eileh. 
jeremiah 7:11	ham‘arat parizim, hayah habayit hacceh ’asher niqra shemi ‘alaw be‘eineikhem; gam ’anokhi hineih ra’iti ne’um yhoh.
jeremiah 7:12	ki lekhu na, ’el meqomi ’asher beshilo, ’asher shikanti shemi sham barishonah; ure’u ’eit ’asher ‘asiti lo, mipenei ra‘at ‘ami yisra’eil. 
jeremiah 7:13	we‘atah, ya‘an ‘asotkhem ’et kal hama‘asim ha’eileh ne’um yhoh; wa’adabeir ’aleikhem hashkeim wedabeir welo shema‘tem, wa’eqra ’etkhem welo ‘anitem. 
jeremiah 7:14	we‘asiti labayit ’asher niqra shemi ‘alaw, ’asher ’atem boTeHim bo, welamaqom, ’asher natati lakhem wela’awoteikhem; ka’asher ‘asiti leshilo. 
jeremiah 7:15	wehishlakhti ’etkhem mei‘al panay; ka’asher hishlakhti ’et kal ’aHeikhem, ’eit kal cera‘ ’efrayim.
jeremiah 7:16	we’atah ’al titpaleil be‘ad ha‘am hacceh, we’al tisa wa‘adam rinah utefilah we’al tifga‘ bi; ki ’eineni shomeia‘ ’otakh. 
jeremiah 7:17	ha’einekha ro’eh, mah heimah ‘osim be‘arei yehudah; uweHuzot yerushalim. 
jeremiah 7:18	habanim melaqeTim ‘eizim, weha’awot mewa‘arim ’et ha’eish, wehanashim lashot bazeiq; la‘asot kawwanim limlekhet hashamayim, wehasseikh nesakhim leilohim ’aHeirim, lema‘an hakh‘iseini. 
jeremiah 7:19	ha’oti heim makh‘isim ne’um yhoh; halo ’otam, lema‘an boshet peneihem.
jeremiah 7:20	lakhein koh ’amar ’adonay yhoh hineih ’api waHamati nitekhet ’el hamaqom hacceh, ‘al ha’adam we‘al habeheimah, we‘al ‘eiz hasadeh we‘al peri ha’adamah; uwa‘arah welo tikhbeh.
jeremiah 7:21	koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil; ‘oloteikhem sefu ‘al ciwHeikhem we’ikhlu wasar. 
jeremiah 7:22	ki lo dibarti ’et ’awoteikhem welo ziwwitim, beyom hozi hozi’i ’otam mei’erez mizrayim; ‘al diwrei ‘olah wacawaH. 
jeremiah 7:23	ki ’im ’et hadawar hacceh ziwwiti ’otam leimor shim‘u weqoli, wehayiti lakhem leilohim, we’atem tihyu li le‘am; wahalakhtem, bekhal haderekh ’asher ’azawweh ’etkhem, lema‘an yiTaw lakhem. 
jeremiah 7:24	welo shame‘u welo hiTu ’et ’acenam, wayeilekhu bemo‘eizot, bishrirut libam hara‘; wayihyu le’aHor welo lefanim. 
jeremiah 7:25	lemin hayom, ’asher yaze’u ’awoteikhem mei’erez mizrayim, ‘ad hayom hacceh; wa’eshlaH ’aleikhem ’et kal ‘awaday hanewi’im, yom hashkeim weshaloaH. 
jeremiah 7:26	welo shame‘u ’eilay, welo hiTu ’et ’acenam; wayaqshu ’et ‘arepam, heirei‘u mei’awotam. 
jeremiah 7:27	wedibarta ’aleihem ’et kal hadewarim ha’eileh, welo yishme‘u ’eilekha; weqarata ’aleihem welo ya‘anukhah. 
jeremiah 7:28	we’amarta ’aleihem, ceh hago ’asher lo shame‘u, beqol yhoh ’elohaw, welo laqeHu musar; ’awedah ha’emunah, wenikhretah mipihem.
jeremiah 7:29	gacci nicreikh wehashlikhi, use’i ‘al shefayim qinah; ki ma’as yhoh, wayiTosh ’et dor ‘ewrato. 
jeremiah 7:30	ki ‘asu wenei yehudah hara‘ be‘einay ne’uwm yhoh; samu shiquzeihem, babayit ’asher niqra shemi ‘alaw leTame’o. 
jeremiah 7:31	uwanu bamot hatofet, ’asher begei wen hinom, lisrof ’et beneihem we’et benoteihem ba’eish; ’asher lo ziwwiti, welo ‘aletah ‘al libi.
jeremiah 7:32	lakhein hineih yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh, welo yei’ameir ‘od hatofet wegei wen hinom, ki ’im gei hahareigah; weqaweru wetofet mei’ein maqom. 
jeremiah 7:33	wehayetah niwlat ha‘am hacceh lema’akhal, le‘of hashamayim ulewehemat ha’arez; we’ein maHarid. 
jeremiah 7:34	wehishbati mei‘arei yehudah, umeiHuzot yerushalim, qol sason weqol simHah, qol Hatan weqol kalah; ki leHarebah tihyeh ha’arez. 
jeremiah 8:1	ba‘eit hahi ne’um yhoh weyozi’u yozi’u ’et ‘azmot malkhei yehudah we’et ‘azmot saraw we’et ‘azmot hakohanim we’eit ‘azmot hanewi’im, we’eit ‘azmot yoshewei yerushalim miqiwreihem. 
jeremiah 8:2	usheTaHum lashemesh welayareiaH ulekhol zewa hashamayim, ’asher ’aheiwum wa’asher ‘awadum wa’asher halekhu ’aHareihem, wa’asher derashum, wa’asher hishtaHawu lahem; lo yei’asefu welo yiqaweiru, ledomen ‘al penei ha’adamah yihyu. 
jeremiah 8:3	weniwHar mawet meiHayim, lekhol, hashe’eirit hanish’arim, min hamishpaHah hara‘ah haccot; bekhal hameqomot hanish’arim ’asher hidaHtim sham, ne’um yhoh zewa’ot.
jeremiah 8:4	we’amarta ’aleihem, koh ’amar yhoh, hayipelu welo yaqumu; ’im yashuw welo yashuw. 
jeremiah 8:5	madua‘ showwah ha‘am hacceh yerushalim meshuwah nizaHat; heHeciqu batarmit, mei’anu lashuw. 
jeremiah 8:6	hiqshawti wa’eshma‘ lo khein yedabeiru, ’ein ’ish, niHam ‘al ra‘ato, leimor meh ‘asiti; kuloh, w bimruzotam bimruzatam, kesus shoTeif bamilHamah. 
jeremiah 8:7	gam Hasidah washamayim, yade‘ah mo‘adeha, wetor wesus wesis we‘agur, shameru ’et ‘eit bo’anah; we‘ami lo yade‘u, ’eit mishpaT yhoh. 
jeremiah 8:8	’eikhah tomeru Hakhamim ’anaHnu, wetorat yhoh ’itanu; ’akhein hineih lasheqer ‘asah, ‘eiT sheqer soferim. 
jeremiah 8:9	howishu Hakhamim, Hatu wayilakheidu; hineih widwar yhoh ma’asu, weHakhemat meh lahem.
jeremiah 8:10	lakhein ’etein ’et nesheihem la’aHeirim, sedoteihem leyorshim, ki miqaTon we‘ad gadol, kuloh bozeia‘ baza‘; minawi we‘ad kohein, kuloh ‘oseh shaqer. 
jeremiah 8:11	wayrapu ’et shewer bat ‘ami ‘al neqalah, leimor shalom shalom; we’ein shalom. 
jeremiah 8:12	howishu ki to‘eiwah ‘asu; gam bosh lo yeiwoshu, wehikaleim lo yada‘u, lakhein yipelu wanofelim, be‘eit pequdatam yikashelu ’amar yhoh.
jeremiah 8:13	’asof ’asifeim ne’um yhoh; ’ein ‘anawim bagefen we’ein te’einim bate’einah, wehe‘aleh naweil, wa’etein lahem ya‘awrum. 
jeremiah 8:14	‘al mah ’anaHnu yoshewim, hei’asefu, wenawo ’el ‘arei hamiwzar wenidemah sham; ki yhoh ’eloheinu hadimanu wayashqeinu mei rosh, ki HaTanu yhoh. 
jeremiah 8:15	qawweih leshalom we’ein Tow; le‘eit marpeih wehineih we‘atah. 
jeremiah 8:16	midan nishma‘ naHrat susaw, miqol mizhalot ’abiraw, ra‘ashah kal ha’arez; wayawo’u, wayokhelu ’erez umelo’ah, ‘ir weyoshewei wah.
jeremiah 8:17	ki hini meshaleiaH bakhem, neHashim zif‘onim, ’asher ’ein lahem laHash; wenishekhu ’etkhem ne’um yhoh.
jeremiah 8:18	mawligiti ‘alei yagon; ‘alay libi dawway. 
jeremiah 8:19	hineih qol shaw‘at bat ‘ami, mei’erez marHaqim, yhoh ’ein beziyon, ’im malkah ’ein bah; madua‘, hikh‘isuni bifsileihem behawlei neikhar. 
jeremiah 8:20	‘awar qazir kalah qayiz; wa’anaHnu lo nosha‘enu. 
jeremiah 8:21	‘al shewer bat ‘ami hashebareti; qadarti shamah heHeciqateni. 
jeremiah 8:22	hazori ’ein begil‘ad, ’im rofei ’ein sham; ki, madua‘ lo ‘aletah, ’arukhat bat ‘ami. 
jeremiah 9:1	mi yitein roshi mayim, we‘eini meqor dim‘ah; we’ewkeh yomam walaylah, ’eit Halei wat ‘ami. 
jeremiah 9:2	mi yiteneini wamidbar, melon ’oreHim, we’e‘ecwah ’et ‘ami, we’eilekhah mei’itam; ki khulam mena’afim, ‘azeret bogedim. 
jeremiah 9:3	wayadrekhu ’et leshonam qashtam sheqer, welo le’emunah gaweru wa’arez; ki meira‘ah ’el ra‘ah yaza’u we’oti lo yada‘u ne’um yhoh.
jeremiah 9:4	’ish meirei‘eihu hishameiru, we‘al kal ’aH ’al tiwTaHu; ki khal ’aH ‘aqow ya‘qow, wekhal reia‘ rakhil yahalokh. 
jeremiah 9:5	we’ish berei‘eihu yehateilu, we’emet lo yedabeiru; limedu leshonam daber sheqer ha‘aweih nil’u. 
jeremiah 9:6	shiwtekha betokh mirmah; bemirmah mei’anu da‘at ’oti ne’um yhoh.
jeremiah 9:7	lakhein, koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot, hini zorfam uweHantim; ki ’eikh ’e‘eseh, mipenei bat ‘ami. 
jeremiah 9:8	Heiz shoHeiT shaHuT leshonam mirmah dibeir; befiw, shalom ’et rei‘eihu yedabeir, uweqirbo yasim ’arebo. 
jeremiah 9:9	ha‘al ’eileh lo ’efqad bam ne’um yhoh; ’im bego ’asher kaceh, lo titnaqeim nafshi.
jeremiah 9:10	‘al heharim ’esa wekhi wanehi, we‘al ne’ot midbar qinah, ki nizetu mibeli ’ish ‘oweir, welo shame‘u qol miqneh; mei‘of hashamayim we‘ad beheimah, nadedu halakhu. 
jeremiah 9:11	wenatati ’et yerushalim legalim me‘on tanim; we’et ‘arei yehudah ’etein shemamah mibeli yosheiw.
jeremiah 9:12	mi ha’ish heHakham weyawein ’et cot, wa’asher diber pi yhoh ’eilaw weyagidah; ‘al mah ’awedah ha’arez, nizetah khamidbar mibeli ‘oweir.
jeremiah 9:13	wayomer yhoh, ‘al ‘acewam ’et torati, ’asher natati lifneihem; welo shame‘u weqoli welo halekhu wah. 
jeremiah 9:14	wayeilekhu, ’aHarei sherirut libam; we’aHarei habe‘alim, ’asher limedum ’awotam.
jeremiah 9:15	lakhein, koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, hini ma’akhilam ’et ha‘am hacceh la‘anah; wehishqitim mei rosh. 
jeremiah 9:16	wahafizotim bagoyim, ’asher lo yade‘u, heimah wa’awotam; weshilaHti ’aHareihem ’et haHerew, ‘ad kaloti ’otam.
jeremiah 9:17	koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot, hitbonu weqir’u lamqonot utewo’enah; we’el haHakhamot shilHu wetawonah. 
jeremiah 9:18	utemaheirenah wetisenah ‘aleinu nehi; weteiradnah ‘eineinu dim‘ah, we‘af‘apeinu yiccelu mayim. 
jeremiah 9:19	ki qol nehi nishma‘ miziyon ’eikh shudadenu; boshenu me’od ki ‘acawnu ’arez, ki hishlikhu mishkenoteinu.
jeremiah 9:20	ki shema‘nah nashim dewar yhoh, wetiqaH ’acenekhem dewar piw; welameidenah wenoteikhem nehi, we’ishah re‘utah qinah. 
jeremiah 9:21	ki ‘alah mawet beHaloneinu, ba be’armenoteinu; lehakhrit ‘olal miHuz, baHurim meireHowot. 
jeremiah 9:22	dabeir, koh ne’um yhoh, wenafelah niwlat ha’adam, kedomen ‘al penei hasadeh; ukhe‘amir mei’aHarei haqozeir we’ein me’asseif.
