jeremiah 33:21	gam beriti tufar ’et dawid ‘awdi, mihyot lo wein moleikh ‘al kis’o; we’et halwiyim hakohanim mesharetay. 
jeremiah 33:22	’asher lo yissafeir zewa hashamayim, welo yimad Hol hayam; kein ’arbeh, ’et cera‘ dawid ‘awdi, we’et halwiyim mesharetei ’oti.
jeremiah 33:23	wayhi dewar yhoh, ’el yirmeyahu leimor. 
jeremiah 33:24	halo ra’ita, mah ha‘am hacceh diberu leimor, shetei hamishpaHot, ’asher baHar yhoh bahem wayim’aseim; we’et ‘ami yin’azun, mihyot ‘od go lifneihem.
jeremiah 33:25	koh ’amar yhoh, ’im lo weriti yomam walayelah; Huqot shamayim wa’arez lo sameti. 
jeremiah 33:26	gam cera‘ ya‘aqow wedawid ‘awdi ’em’as, miqaHat miccar‘o moshelim, ’el cera‘ ’awraham yisHaq weya‘aqow; ki ’ashuw ’ashiw ’et shewutam weriHamtim.
jeremiah 34:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu mei’eit yhoh; unewukhadrezar melekh bawel wekhal Heilo wekhal mamlekhot ’erez memshelet yado wekhal ha‘amim, nilHamim ‘al yerushalim we‘al kal ‘areha leimor. 
jeremiah 34:2	koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, halokh we’amarta, ’el zidqiyahu melekh yehudah; we’amarta ’eilaw, koh ’amar yhoh, hini notein ’et ha‘ir haccot beyad melekh bawel, userafah ba’eish. 
jeremiah 34:3	we’atah, lo timaleiT miyado, ki tafos titafeis, uweyado tinatein; we‘einekha ’et ‘einei melekh bawel tir’enah, ufihu ’et pikha yedabeir uwawel tawo. 
jeremiah 34:4	’akh shema‘ dewar yhoh, zidqiyahu melekh yehudah; koh ’amar yhoh ‘alekha, lo tamut beHarew. 
jeremiah 34:5	beshalom tamut, ukhemisrefot ’awotekha hamelakhim harishonim ’asher hayu lefanekha, kein yisrefu lakh, weho ’adon yispedu lakh; ki dawar ’ani dibarti ne’um yhoh.
jeremiah 34:6	waydabeir yirmeyahu hanawi, ’el zidqiyahu melekh yehudah; ’eit kal hadewarim ha’eileh birushalim. 
jeremiah 34:7	weHeil melekh bawel, nilHamim ‘al yerushalim, we‘al kal ‘arei yehudah hanotarot; ’el lakhish we’el ‘aceiqah, ki heinah, nish’aru be‘arei yehudah ‘arei miwzar.
jeremiah 34:8	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu mei’eit yhoh; ’aHarei kerot hamelekh zidqiyahu berit, ’et kal ha‘am ’asher birushalim, liqro lahem deror. 
jeremiah 34:9	leshalaH ’ish ’et ‘awdo we’ish ’et shifHato ha‘iwri weha‘iwriyah Hafeshim; lewilti ‘awad bam bihudi ’aHihu ’ish. 
jeremiah 34:10	wayishme‘u khal hasarim wekhal ha‘am ’asher ba’u waberit, leshalaH ’ish ’et ‘awdo we’ish ’et shifHato Hafeshim, lewilti ‘awad bam ‘od; wayishme‘u wayshaleiHu. 
jeremiah 34:11	wayashuwu ’aHarei khein, wayashiwu, ’et ha‘awadim we’et hashefaHot, ’asher shileHu Hafeshim; wayakhbishum wayikhbeshum, la‘awadim welishfaHot.
jeremiah 34:12	wayhi dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu, mei’eit yhoh leimor. 
jeremiah 34:13	koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil; ’anokhi, karati werit ’et ’awoteikhem, beyom hozi’i ’otam mei’erez mizrayim, mibeit ‘awadim leimor. 
jeremiah 34:14	miqeiz shewa‘ shanim teshaleHu ’ish ’et ’aHiw ha‘iwri ’asher yimakheir lekha, wa‘awadekha sheish shanim, weshilaHto Hafeshi mei‘imakh; welo shame‘u ’awoteikhem ’eilay, welo hiTu ’et ’acenam. 
jeremiah 34:15	watashuwu ’atem hayom, wata‘asu ’et hayashar be‘einay, liqro deror ’ish lerei‘eihu; watikhretu werit lefanay, babayit ’asher niqra shemi ‘alaw. 
jeremiah 34:16	watashuwu wateHalelu ’et shemi, watashiwu, ’ish ’et ‘awdo we’ish ’et shifHato, ’asher shilaHtem Hafeshim lenafsham; watikhbeshu ’otam, lihyot lakhem, la‘awadim welishfaHot.
jeremiah 34:17	lakhein koh ’amar yhoh ’atem lo shema‘tem ’eilay, liqro deror, ’ish le’aHiw we’ish lerei‘eihu; hini qorei lakhem deror ne’um yhoh ’el haHerew ’el hadewer we’el hara‘aw, wenatati ’etkhem licwa‘ah leca‘awah, lekhol mamlekhot ha’arez. 
jeremiah 34:18	wenatati ’et ha’anashim, ha‘owerim ’et beriti, ’asher lo heiqimu ’et diwrei haberit, ’asher karetu lefanay; ha‘eigel ’asher karetu lishnayim, waya‘awru bein betaraw. 
jeremiah 34:19	sarei yehudah wesarei yerushalim, hassarisim wehakohanim, wekhol ‘am ha’arez; ha‘owerim, bein bitrei ha‘eigel. 
jeremiah 34:20	wenatati ’otam beyad ’oyeweihem, uweyad mewaqshei nafsham; wehayetah niwlatam lema’akhal, le‘of hashamayim ulewehemat ha’arez. 
jeremiah 34:21	we’et zidqiyahu melekh yehudah we’et saraw, ’etein beyad ’oyeweihem, uweyad mewaqshei nafsham; uweyad Heil melekh bawel, ha‘olim mei‘aleikhem. 
jeremiah 34:22	hini mezawweh ne’um yhoh wahashiwotim ’el ha‘ir haccot wenilHamu ‘aleha, ulekhaduha userafuha wa’eish; we’et ‘arei yehudah ’etein shemamah mei’ein yosheiw.
jeremiah 35:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu mei’eit yhoh; bimei yehoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah leimor. 
jeremiah 35:2	halokh ’el beit hareikhawim wedibarta ’otam, wahawi’otam beit yhoh, ’el ’aHat haleshakhot; wehishqita ’otam yayin. 
jeremiah 35:3	wa’eqaH ’et ya’acanyah wen yirmeyahu ben Hawazinyah, we’et ’eHaw we’et kal banaw; we’eit kal beit hareikhawim. 
jeremiah 35:4	wa’awi ’otam beit yhoh, ’el lishkat, benei Hanan ben yigdalyahu ’ish ha’elohim; ’asher ’eizel lishkat hasarim, ’asher mima‘al, lelishkat ma‘aseiyahu wen shalum shomeir hassaf. 
jeremiah 35:5	wa’etein lifnei benei weit hareikhawim, gewi‘im melei’im yayin wekhosot; wa’omar ’aleihem shetu yayin. 
jeremiah 35:6	wayomeru lo nishteh yayin; ki yonadaw ben reikhaw ’awinu, ziwwah ‘aleinu leimor, lo tishtu yayin ’atem uweneikhem ‘ad ‘olam. 
jeremiah 35:7	uwayit lo tiwnu, wecera‘ lo ticra‘u wekherem lo tiTa‘u, welo yihyeh lakhem; ki ba’ohalim teishewu kal yemeikhem, lema‘an tiHyu yamim rabim ‘al penei ha’adamah, ’asher ’atem garim sham. 
jeremiah 35:8	wanishma‘, beqol yehonadaw ben reikhaw ’awinu, lekhol ’asher ziwwanu; lewilti shetot yayin kal yameinu, ’anaHnu nasheinu, baneinu uwenoteinu. 
jeremiah 35:9	ulewilti benot batim leshiwteinu; wekherem wesadeh wacera‘ lo yihyeh lanu. 
jeremiah 35:10	waneishew ba’ohalim; wanishma‘ wana‘as, kekhol ’asher ziwwanu yonadaw ’awinu. 
jeremiah 35:11	wayhi, ba‘alot newukhadrezar melekh bawel ’el ha’arez wanomer, bo’u wenawo yerushalim, mipenei Heil hakasdim, umipenei Heil ’aram; waneishew birushalim.
jeremiah 35:12	wayhi dewar yhoh, ’el yirmeyahu leimor. 
jeremiah 35:13	koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, halokh we’amarta le’ish yehudah, uleyoshewei yerushalim; halo tiqHu musar lishmoa‘ ’el dewaray ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 35:14	huqam ’et diwrei yehonadaw ben reikhaw ’asher ziwwah ’et banaw lewilti shetot yayin, welo shatu ‘ad hayom hacceh, ki shame‘u, ’eit mizwat ’awihem; we’anokhi dibarti ’aleikhem hashkeim wedabeir, welo shema‘tem ’eilay. 
jeremiah 35:15	wa’eshlaH ’aleikhem ’et kal ‘awaday hanewi’im hashkeim weshaloaH leimor shuwu na ’ish midarko hara‘ah weheiTiwu ma‘aleikhem, we’al teilekhu ’aHarei ’elohim ’aHeirim le‘awedam, ushewu ’el ha’adamah, ’asher natati lakhem wela’awoteikhem; welo hiTitem ’et ’acenekhem, welo shema‘tem ’eilay. 
jeremiah 35:16	ki heiqimu, benei yehonadaw ben reikhaw, ’et mizwat ’awihem ’asher ziwwam; weha‘am hacceh, lo shame‘u ’eilay.
jeremiah 35:17	lakhein koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, hini meiwi ’el yehudah, we’el kal yoshewei yerushalim, ’eit kal hara‘ah, ’asher dibarti ‘aleihem; ya‘an dibarti ’aleihem welo shamei‘u, wa’eqra lahem welo ‘anu. 
jeremiah 35:18	uleweit hareikhawim ’amar yirmeyahu, koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, ya‘an ’asher shema‘tem, ‘al mizwat yehonadaw ’awikhem; watishmeru ’et kal mizwotaw, wata‘asu, kekhol ’asher ziwwah ’etkhem.
jeremiah 35:19	lakhein, koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil; lo yikareit ’ish leyonadaw ben reikhaw ‘omeid lefanay kal hayamim.
jeremiah 36:1	wayhi bashanah harewi‘it, lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah; hayah hadawar hacceh ’el yirmeyahu, mei’eit yhoh leimor. 
jeremiah 36:2	qaH lekha megilat seifer wekhatawta ’eileha, ’eit kal hadewarim ’asher dibarti ’eilekha ‘al yisra’eil we‘al yehudah we‘al kal hagoyim; miyom dibarti ’eilekha mimei yoshiyahu, we‘ad hayom hacceh. 
jeremiah 36:3	’ulay yishme‘u beit yehudah, ’eit kal hara‘ah, ’asher ’anokhi Hosheiw la‘asot lahem; lema‘an yashuwu, ’ish midarko hara‘ah, wesalaHti la‘awonam uleHaTatam.
jeremiah 36:4	wayiqra yirmeyahu, ’et barukh ben neiriyah; wayikhtow barukh mipi yirmeyahu, ’eit kal diwrei yhoh ’asher diber ’eilaw ‘al megilat seifer. 
jeremiah 36:5	wayzawweh yirmeyahu, ’et barukh leimor; ’ani ‘azur, lo ’ukhal, lawo beit yhoh. 
jeremiah 36:6	uwata ’atah weqarata wamegilah ’asher katawta mipi ’et diwrei yhoh be’acenei ha‘am beit yhoh beyom zom; wegam be’acenei khal yehudah haba’im mei‘areihem tiqra’eim. 
jeremiah 36:7	’ulay tipol teHinatam lifnei yhoh, weyashuwu ’ish midarko hara‘ah; ki gadol ha’af wehaHeimah, ’asher diber yhoh ’el ha‘am hacceh. 
jeremiah 36:8	waya‘as, barukh ben neiriyah, kekhol ’asher ziwwahu yirmeyahu hanawi; liqro wasseifer diwrei yhoh beit yhoh.
jeremiah 36:9	wayhi washanah haHamishit lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah baHodesh hateshi‘i, qare’u zom lifnei yhoh kal ha‘am birushalim; wekhal ha‘am, haba’im mei‘arei yehudah birushalim. 
jeremiah 36:10	wayiqra warukh basseifer ’et diwrei yirmeyahu beit yhoh; belishkat gemaryahu wen shafan hassofeir beHazeir ha‘elyon, petaH sha‘ar beit yhoh heHadash, be’acenei kal ha‘am. 
jeremiah 36:11	wayishma‘, mikhayehu wen gemaryahu wen shafan ’et kal diwrei yhoh mei‘al hasseifer. 
jeremiah 36:12	wayeired beit hamelekh ‘al lishkat hassofeir, wehineih sham, kal hasarim yoshewim; ’elishama‘ hassofeir udelayahu wenosh ma‘yahu we’elnatan ben ‘akhbor ugemaryahu wen shafan wezidqiyahu wen Hananyahu wekhal hasarim. 
jeremiah 36:13	wayageid lahem mikhayehu, ’eit kal hadewarim ’asher shameia‘; biqro warukh basseifer be’acenei ha‘am. 
jeremiah 36:14	wayishleHu khal hasarim ’el barukh, ’et yehudi ben netanyahu ben shelemyahu wen kushi leimor hamegilah, ’asher qarata bah be’acenei ha‘am, qaHenah weyadekha waleikh; wayiqaH barukh ben neiriyahu ’et hamegilah beyado, wayawo ’aleihem. 
jeremiah 36:15	wayomeru ’eilaw, sheiw na, uqera’enah be’aceneinu; wayiqra warukh be’aceneihem. 
jeremiah 36:16	wayhi, keshame‘am ’et kal hadewarim, paHadu ’ish ’el rei‘eihu; wayomeru ’el barukh, hageid nagid lamelekh, ’eit kal hadewarim ha’eileh. 
jeremiah 36:17	we’et barukh, sha’alu leimor; haged na lanu, ’eikh, katawta ’et kal hadewarim ha’eileh mipiw. 
jeremiah 36:18	wayomer lahem barukh, mipiw yiqra ’eilay, ’eit kal hadewarim ha’eileh; wa’ani koteiw ‘al hasseifer badeyo.
jeremiah 36:19	wayomeru hasarim ’el barukh, leikh hissateir ’atah weyirmeyahu; we’ish ’al yeida‘ ’eifoh ’atem. 
jeremiah 36:20	wayawo’u ’el hamelekh Hazeirah, we’et hamegilah hifqidu, belishkat ’elishama‘ hassofeir; wayagidu be’acenei hamelekh, ’eit kal hadewarim. 
jeremiah 36:21	wayishlaH hamelekh ’et yehudi, laqaHat ’et hamegilah, wayiqaHeha, milishkat ’elishama‘ hassofeir; wayiqra’eha yehudi be’acenei hamelekh, uwe’acenei kal hasarim, ha‘omedim mei‘al hamelekh. 
jeremiah 36:22	wehamelekh, yosheiw beit haHoref, baHodesh hateshi‘i; we’et ha’aH lefanaw mewo‘aret. 
jeremiah 36:23	wayhi kiqro yehudi, shalosh delatot we’arba‘ah yiqra‘eha beta‘ar hassofeir, wehashleikh ’el ha’eish ’asher ’el ha’aH; ‘ad tom kal hamegilah, ‘al ha’eish ’asher ‘al ha’aH. 
jeremiah 36:24	welo faHadu, welo qare‘u ’et bigdeihem; hamelekh wekhal ‘awadaw, hashome‘im, ’eit kal hadewarim ha’eileh. 
jeremiah 36:25	wegam ’elnatan udelayahu ugemaryahu hifgi‘u wamelekh, lewilti serof ’et hamegilah; welo shama‘ ’aleihem. 
jeremiah 36:26	wayzawweh hamelekh ’et yeraHme’eil ben hamelekh we’et serayahu wen ‘acri’eil, we’et shelemyahu ben ‘awde’eil, laqaHat ’et barukh hassofeir, we’eit yirmeyahu hanawi; wayastireim yhoh.
jeremiah 36:27	wayhi dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu; ’aHarei serof hamelekh, ’et hamegilah we’et hadewarim, ’asher kataw barukh mipi yirmeyahu leimor. 
jeremiah 36:28	shuw qaH lekha megilah ’aHeret; ukhetow ‘aleha, ’eit kal hadewarim harishonim, ’asher hayu, ‘al hamegilah harishonah, ’asher saraf yehoyaqim melekh yehudah. 
jeremiah 36:29	we‘al yehoyaqim melekh yehudah tomar, koh ’amar yhoh; ’atah sarafta ’et hamegilah haccot leimor, madua‘ katawta ‘aleha leimor, bo yawo melekh bawel wehishHit ’et ha’arez haccot, wehishbit mimenah ’adam uweheimah.
jeremiah 36:30	lakhein koh ’amar yhoh ‘al yehoyaqim melekh yehudah, lo yihyeh lo yosheiw ‘al kissei dawid; weniwlato tihyeh mushlekhet, laHorew bayom welaqeraH balayelah. 
jeremiah 36:31	ufaqadti ‘alaw we‘al car‘o we‘al ‘awadaw ’et ‘awonam; weheiweiti ‘aleihem we‘al yoshewei yerushalim we’el ’ish yehudah, ’eit kal hara‘ah ’asher dibarti ’aleihem welo shamei‘u.
jeremiah 36:32	weyirmeyahu laqaH megilah ’aHeret, wayitenah ’el barukh ben neiriyahu hassofeir wayikhtow ‘aleha mipi yirmeyahu, ’eit kal diwrei hasseifer, ’asher saraf yehoyaqim melekh yehudah ba’eish; we‘od nosaf ‘aleihem dewarim rabim kaheimah.
jeremiah 37:1	wayimlakh melekh, zidqiyahu ben yoshiyahu; taHat, kaneyahu ben yehoyaqim, ’asher himlikh newukhadrezar melekh bawel be’erez yehudah. 
jeremiah 37:2	welo shama‘ hu wa‘awadaw we‘am ha’arez; ’el diwrei yhoh, ’asher diber, beyad yirmeyahu hanawi. 
jeremiah 37:3	wayishlaH hamelekh zidqiyahu ’et yehukhal ben shelemyah, we’et zefanyahu wen ma‘aseiyah hakohein, ’el yirmeyahu hanawi leimor; hitpalel na wa‘adeinu, ’el yhoh ’eloheinu. 
jeremiah 37:4	weyirmeyahu ba weyozei betokh ha‘am; welo natenu ’oto beit hakeli hakelu. 
jeremiah 37:5	weHeil par‘oh yaza mimizrayim; wayishme‘u hakasdim hazarim ‘al yerushalim ’et shim‘am, wayei‘alu, mei‘al yerushalim.
jeremiah 37:6	wayhi dewar yhoh, ’el yirmeyahu hanawi leimor. 
jeremiah 37:7	koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, koh tomeru ’el melekh yehudah, hasholeiaH ’etkhem ’eilay ledaresheini; hineih Heil par‘oh, hayozei lakhem le‘ecrah, shaw le’arzo mizrayim. 
jeremiah 37:8	weshawu hakasdim, wenilHamu ‘al ha‘ir haccot; ulekhaduha userafuha wa’eish.
jeremiah 37:9	koh ’amar yhoh ’al tashi’u nafshoteikhem leimor, halokh yeilekhu mei‘aleinu hakasdim; ki lo yeileikhu. 
jeremiah 37:10	ki ’im hikitem kal Heil kasdim hanilHamim ’itekhem, wenish’aru wam, ’anashim meduqarim; ’ish be’aholo yaqumu, wesarefu ’et ha‘ir haccot ba’eish. 
jeremiah 37:11	wehayah, behei‘alot Heil hakasdim, mei‘al yerushalim; mipenei Heil par‘oh.
jeremiah 37:12	wayeizei yirmeyahu mirushalim, lalekhet ’erez binyamin; laHaliq misham betokh ha‘am. 
jeremiah 37:13	wayhi hu besha‘ar binyamin, wesham ba‘al peqidut, ushemo yir’iyayh, ben shelemyah ben Hananyah; wayitpos ’et yirmeyahu hanawi leimor, ’el hakasdim ’atah nofeil. 
jeremiah 37:14	wayomer yirmeyahu sheqer, ’eineni nofeil ‘al hakasdim, welo shama‘ ’eilaw; wayitpos yir’iyayh beyirmeyahu, waywi’eihu ’el hasarim. 
jeremiah 37:15	wayiqzefu hasarim ‘al yirmeyahu wehiku ’oto; wenatenu ’oto beit ha’eisur, beit yehonatan hassofeir, ki ’oto ‘asu leweit hakele. 
jeremiah 37:16	ki wa yirmeyahu ’el beit habor we’el haHanuyot; wayeishew sham yirmeyahu yamim rabim.
jeremiah 37:17	wayishlaH hamelekh zidqiyahu wayiqaHeihu, wayish’aleihu hamelekh beweito basseiter, wayomer hayeish dawar mei’eit yhoh; wayomer yirmeyahu yeish, wayomer beyad melekh bawel tinatein.
jeremiah 37:18	wayomer yirmeyahu, ’el hamelekh zidqiyahu; meh HaTati lekha wela‘awadekha wela‘am hacceh, ki netatem ’oti ’el beit hakele. 
jeremiah 37:19	we’ayo we’ayeih newi’eikhem, ’asher nibe’u lakhem leimor; lo yawo melekh bawel ‘aleikhem, we‘al ha’arez haccot. 
jeremiah 37:20	we‘atah shema‘ na ’adoni hamelekh; tipal na teHinati lefanekha, we’al teshiweini, beit yehonatan hassofeir, welo ’amut sham. 
jeremiah 37:21	wayzawweh hamelekh zidqiyahu, wayafqidu ’et yirmeyahu baHazar hamaTarah wenaton lo khikar leHem layom miHuz ha’ofim, ‘ad tom kal haleHem min ha‘ir; wayeishew yirmeyahu, baHazar hamaTarah. 
jeremiah 38:1	wayishma‘ shefaTyah wen matan, ugedalyahu ben pashHur, weyukhal ben shelemyahu, ufashHur ben malkiyah; ’et hadewarim, ’asher yirmeyahu medabeir ’el kal ha‘am leimor.
jeremiah 38:2	koh ’amar yhoh hayosheiw ba‘ir haccot, yamut baHerew bara‘aw uwadawer; wehayozei ’el hakasdim yiHyeh weHayah, wehayetah lo nafsho leshalal waHay.
jeremiah 38:3	koh ’amar yhoh; hinaton tinatein ha‘ir haccot, beyad Heil melekh bawel ulekhadah. 
jeremiah 38:4	wayomeru hasarim ’el hamelekh, yumat na ’et ha’ish hacceh ki ‘al kein hu merapei ’et yedei ’anshei hamilHamah hanish’arim ba‘ir haccot, we’eit yedei khal ha‘am, ledabeir ’aleihem, kadewarim ha’eileh; ki ha’ish hacceh, ’einenu doreish leshalom la‘am hacceh ki ’im lera‘ah. 
jeremiah 38:5	wayomer hamelekh zidqiyahu, hineih hu beyedkhem; ki ’ein hamelekh, yukhal ’etkhem dawar. 
jeremiah 38:6	wayiqHu ’et yirmeyahu, wayashlikhu ’oto ’el habor malkiyahu wen hamelekh, ’asher baHazar hamaTarah, wayshaleHu ’et yirmeyahu baHawalim; uwabor ’ein mayim ki ’im TiT, wayiTba‘ yirmeyahu baTiT.
jeremiah 38:7	wayishma‘ ‘ewed melekh hakushi ’ish saris, wehu beweit hamelekh, ki natenu ’et yirmeyahu ’el habor; wehamelekh yosheiw besha‘ar binyamin. 
jeremiah 38:8	wayeizei ‘ewed melekh mibeit hamelekh; waydabeir ’el hamelekh leimor. 
jeremiah 38:9	’adoni hamelekh, heirei‘u ha’anashim ha’eileh ’eit kal ’asher ‘asu leyirmeyahu hanawi, ’eit ’asher hishlikhu ’el habor; wayamat taHtaw mipenei hara‘aw, ki ’ein haleHem ‘od ba‘ir. 
jeremiah 38:10	wayzawweh hamelekh, ’eit ‘ewed melekh hakushi leimor; qaH beyadekha micceh sheloshim ’anashim, weha‘alita ’et yirmeyahu hanawi min habor beTerem yamut. 
jeremiah 38:11	wayiqaH ‘ewed melekh ’et ha’anashim beyado, wayawo weit hamelekh ’el taHat ha’ozar, wayiqaH misham beloyei hasseHawot seHawot, uweloyei melaHim; wayshaleHeim ’el yirmeyahu ’el habor baHawalim. 
jeremiah 38:12	wayomer ‘ewed melekh hakushi ’el yirmeyahu, sim na belo’ei hasseHawot wehamelaHim taHat ’azilot yadekha, mitaHat laHawalim; waya‘as yirmeyahu kein. 
jeremiah 38:13	wayimshekhu ’et yirmeyahu baHawalim, waya‘alu ’oto min habor; wayeishew yirmeyahu, baHazar hamaTarah.
jeremiah 38:14	wayishlaH hamelekh zidqiyahu, wayiqaH ’et yirmeyahu hanawi ’eilaw, ’el mawo hashelishi, ’asher beweit yhoh; wayomer hamelekh ’el yirmeyahu, sho’eil ’ani ’otekha dawar, ’al tekhaHeid mimeni dawar. 
jeremiah 38:15	wayomer yirmeyahu ’el zidqiyahu, ki ’agid lekha, halo hameit temiteini; wekhi ’i‘azekha, lo tishma‘ ’eilay. 
jeremiah 38:16	wayishawa‘ hamelekh zidqiyahu ’el yirmeyahu basseiter leimor; Hay yhoh ’et ’asher ‘asah lanu ’et hanefesh haccot ’im ’amitekha, we’im ’etenkha, beyad ha’anashim ha’eileh, ’asher mewaqshim ’et nafshekha.
jeremiah 38:17	wayomer yirmeyahu ’el zidqiyahu koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, ’im yazo teizei ’el sarei melekh bawel weHayetah nafshekha, weha‘ir haccot, lo tisareif ba’eish; weHayitah ’atah uweitekha. 
jeremiah 38:18	we’im lo teizei, ’el sarei melekh bawel, wenitenah ha‘ir haccot beyad hakasdim, userafuha ba’eish; we’atah lo timaleiT miyadam.
jeremiah 38:19	wayomer hamelekh zidqiyahu ’el yirmeyahu; ’ani do’eig ’et hayehudim, ’asher nafelu ’el hakasdim, pen yitenu ’oti beyadam wehit‘alelu wi.
jeremiah 38:20	wayomer yirmeyahu lo yiteinu; shema‘ na beqol yhoh la’asher ’ani doweir ’eilekha, weyiTaw lekha uteHi nafshekha. 
jeremiah 38:21	we’im ma’ein ’atah lazeit; ceh hadawar, ’asher hir’ani yhoh. 
jeremiah 38:22	wehineih khal hanashim, ’asher nish’aru beweit melekh yehudah, muza’ot ’el sarei melekh bawel; weheinah ’omerot, hissitukha weyakhelu lekha ’anshei shelomekha, haTebe‘u waboz raglekha nasogu ’aHor. 
jeremiah 38:23	we’et kal nashekha we’et banekha, mozi’im ’el hakasdim, we’atah lo timaleiT miyadam; ki weyad melekh bawel titafeis, we’et ha‘ir haccot tisrof ba’eish.
jeremiah 38:24	wayomer zidqiyahu ’el yirmeyahu, ’ish ’al yeida‘ badewarim ha’eileh welo tamut. 
jeremiah 38:25	wekhi yishme‘u hasarim ki dibarti ’itakh uwa’u ’eilekha we’ameru ’eilekha hagidah na lanu mah dibarta ’el hamelekh ’al tekhaHeid mimenu welo nemitekha; umah diber ’eilekha hamelekh. 
jeremiah 38:26	we’amarta ’aleihem, mapil ’ani teHinati lifnei hamelekh; lewilti hashiweini beit yehonatan lamut sham.
jeremiah 38:27	wayawo’u khal hasarim ’el yirmeyahu wayish’alu ’oto, wayageid lahem kekhal hadewarim ha’eileh, ’asher ziwwah hamelekh; wayaHarishu mimenu, ki lo nishma‘ hadawar.
jeremiah 38:28	wayeishew yirmeyahu baHazar hamaTarah, ‘ad yom ’asher nilkedah yerushalim; s wehayah ka’asher nilkedah yerushalim.
jeremiah 39:1	bashanah hateshi‘it lezidqiyahu melekh yehudah baHodesh ha‘asiri, ba newukhadrezar melekh bawel wekhal Heilo ’el yerushalim, wayazuru ‘aleha.
jeremiah 39:2	be‘ashtei ‘esreih shanah lezidqiyahu, baHodesh harewi‘i betish‘ah laHodesh; haweqe‘ah ha‘ir. 
jeremiah 39:3	wayawo’u, kol sarei melekh bawel, wayeishewu besha‘ar hatawekh; neiregal sar ’ezer samgar newu sar sekhim raw saris, neiregal sar ’ezer raw mag, wekhal she’eirit, sarei melekh bawel. 
jeremiah 39:4	wayhi ka’asher ra’am zidqiyahu melekh yehudah wekhol ’anshei hamilHamah, wayiwreHu wayeize’u laylah min ha‘ir derekh gan hamelekh, besha‘ar bein haHomotayim; wayeizei derekh ha‘arawah. 
jeremiah 39:5	wayirdefu Heil kasdim ’aHareihem, wayasigu ’et zidqiyahu be‘arwot yereiHo wayiqHu ’oto, waya‘aluhu ’el newukhadrezar melekh bawel riwlatah be’erez Hamat; waydabeir ’ito mishpaTim. 
jeremiah 39:6	wayishHaT melekh bawel ’et benei zidqiyahu beriwlah le‘einaw; we’eit kal Horei yehudah, shaHaT melekh bawel. 
jeremiah 39:7	we’et ‘einei zidqiyahu ‘iwweir; waya’asreihu banHushtayim, lawi ’oto bawelah. 
jeremiah 39:8	we’et beit hamelekh we’et beit ha‘am, sarefu hakasdim ba’eish; we’et Homot yerushalim natazu. 
jeremiah 39:9	we’eit yeter ha‘am hanish’arim ba‘ir, we’et hanofelim ’asher nafelu ‘alaw, we’eit yeter ha‘am hanish’arim; heglah newucar ’adan raw TabaHim bawel. 
jeremiah 39:10	umin ha‘am hadalim, ’asher ’ein lahem me’umah, hish’ir newucar’adan raw TabaHim be’erez yehudah; wayitein lahem keramim wigeiwim bayom hahu. 
jeremiah 39:11	wayzaw newukhadrezar melekh bawel ‘al yirmeyahu; beyad newucar’adan raw TabaHim leimor. 
jeremiah 39:12	qaHenu, we‘einekha sim ‘alaw, we’al ta‘as lo me’umah ra‘; ki, ’im ka’asher yedabeir ’eilekha, kein ‘aseih ‘imo. 
jeremiah 39:13	wayishlaH newucar’adan raw TabaHim, unewushacban raw saris, weneiregal sar ’ezer raw mag; wekhol rabei melekh bawel. 
jeremiah 39:14	wayishleHu wayiqHu ’et yirmeyahu meiHazar hamaTarah, wayitenu ’oto ’el gedalyahu ben ’aHiqam ben shafan, lehozi’eihu ’el habayit; wayeishew betokh ha‘am.
jeremiah 39:15	we’el yirmeyahu hayah dewar yhoh; bihyoto ‘azur, baHazar hamaTarah leimor. 
jeremiah 39:16	halokh we’amarta le‘ewed melekh hakushi leimor, koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, hini meiwi meiwi ’et dewaray ’el ha‘ir haccot lera‘ah welo leTowah; wehayu lefanekha bayom hahu. 
jeremiah 39:17	wehizaltikha wayom hahu ne’um yhoh; welo tinatein beyad ha’anashim, ’asher ’atah yagor mipeneihem. 
jeremiah 39:18	ki maleiT ’amaleTkha, uwaHerew lo tipol; wehayetah lekha nafshekha leshalal, ki waTaHta bi ne’um yhoh.
jeremiah 40:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu mei’eit yhoh, ’aHar shalaH ’oto, newucar’adan raw TabaHim min haramah; beqaHto ’oto, wehu ’asur baciqim betokh kal galut yerushalim wihudah, hamuglim bawelah. 
jeremiah 40:2	wayiqaH raw TabaHim leyirmeyahu; wayomer ’eilaw, yhoh ’elohekha, diber ’et hara‘ah haccot, ’el hamaqom hacceh. 
jeremiah 40:3	wayawei waya‘as yhoh ka’asher dibeir; ki HaTatem yhoh welo shema‘tem beqolo, wehayah lakhem dawar hadawar hacceh. 
jeremiah 40:4	we‘atah hineih fitaHtikha hayom, min haciqim ’asher ‘al yadekha ’im Tow be‘einekha lawo ’iti wawel, bo we’asim ’et ‘eini ‘alekha, we’im ra‘ be‘einekha lawo ’iti wawel Hadal; re’eih kal ha’arez lefanekha, ’el Tow we’el hayashar be‘einekha lalekhet shamah leikh. 
jeremiah 40:5	we‘odenu lo yashuw, weshuwah ’el gedalyah wen ’aHiqam ben shafan ’asher hifqid melekh bawel be‘arei yehudah, wesheiw ’ito betokh ha‘am, ’o ’el kal hayashar be‘einekha lalekhet leikh; wayiten lo raw TabaHim ’aruHah umas’eit wayshaleHeihu. 
jeremiah 40:6	wayawo yirmeyahu ’el gedalyah wen ’aHiqam hamizpatah; wayeishew ’ito betokh ha‘am, hanish’arim ba’arez.
jeremiah 40:7	wayishme‘u khal sarei haHayalim ’asher basadeh, heimah we’ansheihem, ki hifqid melekh bawel ’et gedalyahu wen ’aHiqam ba’arez; wekhi hifqid ’ito, ’anashim wenashim waTaf, umidalat ha’arez, mei’asher lo hagelu bawelah. 
jeremiah 40:8	wayawo’u ’el gedalyah hamizpatah; weyishma‘eil ben netanyahu weyoHanan weyonatan benei qareiaH userayah wen tanHumet uwenei ‘ofay ‘eifay haneTofati, wicanyahu ben hama‘akhati, heimah we’ansheihem. 
jeremiah 40:9	wayishawa‘ lahem gedalyahu wen ’aHiqam ben shafan ule’ansheihem leimor, ’al tire’u mei‘awod hakasdim; shewu wa’arez, we‘iwdu ’et melekh bawel weyiTaw lakhem. 
jeremiah 40:10	wa’ani, hini yosheiw bamizpah, la‘amod lifnei hakasdim, ’asher yawo’u ’eileinu; we’atem ’isfu yayin weqayiz weshemen, wesimu bikhleikhem, ushewu be‘areikhem ’asher tefastem. 
jeremiah 40:11	wegam kal hayehudim ’asher bemo’aw uwiwnei ‘amon uwe’edom wa’asher bekhal ha’arazot shame‘u, ki natan melekh bawel she’eirit lihudah; wekhi hifqid ‘aleihem, ’et gedalyahu ben ’aHiqam ben shafan. 
jeremiah 40:12	wayashuwu khal hayehudim, mikal hameqomot ’asher nideHu sham, wayawo’u ’erez yehudah ’el gedalyahu hamizpatah; waya’asfu yayin waqayiz harbeih me’od.
jeremiah 40:13	weyoHanan ben qareiaH, wekhal sarei haHayalim ’asher basadeh; ba’u ’el gedalyahu hamizpatah. 
jeremiah 40:14	wayomeru ’eilaw, hayadoa‘ teida‘ ki ba‘alis melekh benei ‘amon, shalaH ’et yishma‘eil ben netanyah, lehakotekha nafesh; welo he’emin lahem, gedalyahu ben ’aHiqam. 
jeremiah 40:15	weyoHanan ben qareiaH ’amar ’el gedalyahu wasseiter bamizpah leimor, ’eilekhah na we’akeh ’et yishma‘eil ben netanyah, we’ish lo yeida‘; lamah yakekah nefesh, wenafozu kal yehudah, haniqbazim ’eilekha, we’awedah she’eirit yehudah. 
jeremiah 40:16	wayomer gedalyahu wen ’aHiqam ’el yoHanan ben qareiaH, ’al ta‘as ta‘aseih ’et hadawar hacceh; ki sheqer ’atah doweir ’el yishma‘eil.
jeremiah 41:1	wayhi baHodesh hashewi‘i, ba yishma‘eil ben netanyah wen ’elishama‘ miccera‘ hamelukhah werabei hamelekh wa‘asarah ’anashim ’ito ’el gedalyahu wen ’aHiqam hamizpatah; wayokhelu sham leHem yaHdaw bamizpah. 
jeremiah 41:2	wayaqam yishma‘eil ben netanyah wa‘aseret ha’anashim ’asher hayu ’ito, wayaku ’et gedalyahu wen ’aHiqam ben shafan baHerew wayamet ’oto; ’asher hifqid melekh bawel ba’arez. 
jeremiah 41:3	we’eit kal hayehudim, ’asher hayu ’ito ’et gedalyahu bamizpah, we’et hakasdim ’asher nimze’u sham; ’eit ’anshei hamilHamah, hikah yishma‘eil. 
jeremiah 41:4	wayhi bayom hasheini lehamit ’et gedalyahu; we’ish lo yada‘. 
jeremiah 41:5	wayawo’u ’anashim mishekhem mishilo umishomeron shemonim ’ish, meguleHei caqan uqeru‘ei wegadim umitgodedim; uminHah ulewonah beyadam, lehawi beit yhoh. 
jeremiah 41:6	wayeizei yishma‘eil ben netanyah liqratam min hamizpah, holeikh halokh uwokheh; wayhi kifgosh ’otam, wayomer ’aleihem, bo’u ’el gedalyahu wen ’aHiqam.
jeremiah 41:7	wayhi kewo’am ’el tokh ha‘ir; wayishHaTeim yishma‘eil ben netanyah ’el tokh habor, hu weha’anashim ’asher ’ito. 
jeremiah 41:8	wa‘asarah ’anashim nimze’u wam, wayomeru ’el yishma‘eil ’al temiteinu, ki yesh lanu maTmonim basadeh, HiTim use‘orim weshemen udewash; wayeHdal welo hemitam betokh ’aHeihem. 
jeremiah 41:9	wehabor, ’asher hishlikh sham yishma‘eil ’eit kal pigrei ha’anashim, ’asher hikah beyad gedalyahu, hu, ’asher ‘asah hamelekh ’asa, mipenei ba‘sha melekh yisra’eil; ’oto, milei yishma‘eil ben netanyahu Halalim. 
jeremiah 41:10	wayishb yishma‘eil ’et kal she’eirit ha‘am ’asher bamizpah, ’et benot hamelekh we’et kal ha‘am hanish’arim bamizpah, ’asher hifqid, newucar’adan raw TabaHim, ’et gedalyahu ben ’aHiqam; wayishbeim yishma‘eil ben netanyah, wayeilekh la‘awor ’el benei ‘amon.
jeremiah 41:11	wayishma‘ yoHanan ben qareiaH, wekhal sarei haHayalim ’asher ’ito; ’eit kal hara‘ah ’asher ‘asah, yishma‘eil ben netanyah. 
jeremiah 41:12	wayiqHu ’et kal ha’anashim, wayeilekhu, lehilaHeim ‘im yishma‘eil ben netanyah; wayimze’u ’oto, ’el mayim rabim ’asher begiw‘on. 
jeremiah 41:13	wayhi, kir’ot kal ha‘am ’asher ’et yishma‘eil, ’et yoHanan ben qareiaH, we’eit kal sarei haHayalim ’asher ’ito; wayismaHu. 
jeremiah 41:14	wayasobu kal ha‘am, ’asher shawah yishma‘eil min hamizpah; wayashuwu wayeilekhu, ’el yoHanan ben qareiaH. 
jeremiah 41:15	weyishma‘eil ben netanyah, nimlaT bishmonah ’anashim, mipenei yoHanan; wayeilekh ’el benei ‘amon.
jeremiah 41:16	wayiqaH yoHanan ben qareiaH wekhal sarei haHayalim ’asher ’ito, ’eit kal she’eirit ha‘am ’asher heishiw mei’eit yishma‘eil ben netanyah min hamizpah, ’aHar hikah, ’et gedalyah ben ’aHiqam; gewarim ’anshei hamilHamah, wenashim weTaf wesarisim, ’asher heishiw migiw‘on. 
jeremiah 41:17	wayeilekhu, wayeishewu begeirut khemohem kimham, ’asher ’eizel beit laHem; lalekhet lawo mizrayim. 
jeremiah 41:18	mipenei hakasdim, ki yare’u mipeneihem; ki hikah yishma‘eil ben netanyah, ’et gedalyahu ben ’aHiqam, ’asher hifqid melekh bawel ba’arez.
jeremiah 42:1	wayigeshu kal sarei haHayalim, weyoHanan ben qareiaH, wicanyah ben hosha‘yah; wekhal ha‘am miqaTon we‘ad gadol. 
jeremiah 42:2	wayomeru ’el yirmeyahu hanawi, tipal na teHinateinu lefanekha, wehitpaleil ba‘adeinu ’el yhoh ’elohekha, be‘ad kal hashe’eirit haccot; ki nish’arnu me‘aT meiharbeih, ka’asher ‘einekha ro’ot ’otanu. 
jeremiah 42:3	weyaged lanu yhoh ’elohekha, ’et haderekh ’asher neilekh bah; we’et hadawar ’asher na‘aseh. 
jeremiah 42:4	wayomer ’aleihem yirmeyahu hanawi shama‘ti, hini mitpaleil ’el yhoh ’eloheikhem kediwreikhem; wehayah kal hadawar ’asher ya‘aneh yhoh ’etkhem ’agid lakhem, lo ’emna‘ mikem dawar. 
jeremiah 42:5	weheimah ’ameru ’el yirmeyahu, yehi yhoh banu, le‘eid ’emet wene’eman; ’im lo kekhal hadawar ’asher yishlaHakha yhoh ’elohekha ’eileinu kein na‘aseh. 
jeremiah 42:6	’im Tow we’im ra‘, beqol yhoh ’eloheinu, ’asher ’anu ’anaHnu sholeHim ’otekha ’eilaw nishma‘; lema‘an ’asher yiTaw lanu, ki nishma‘, beqol yhoh ’eloheinu.
jeremiah 42:7	wayhi miqeiz ‘aseret yamim; wayhi dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu. 
jeremiah 42:8	wayiqra, ’el yoHanan ben qareiaH, we’el kal sarei haHayalim ’asher ’ito; ulekhal ha‘am, lemiqaTon we‘ad gadol. 
jeremiah 42:9	wayomer ’aleihem, koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil; ’asher shelaHtem ’oti ’eilaw, lehapil teHinatkhem lefanaw. 
jeremiah 42:10	’im show teishewu ba’arez haccot, uwaniti ’etkhem welo ’eheros, wenaTa‘ti ’etkhem welo ’etosh; ki niHamti ’el hara‘ah, ’asher ‘asiti lakhem. 
jeremiah 42:11	’al tire’u, mipenei melekh bawel, ’asher ’atem yerei’im mipanaw; ’al tire’u mimenu ne’um yhoh, ki ’itekhem ’ani, lehoshia‘ ’etkhem ulehazil ’etkhem miyado. 
jeremiah 42:12	we’etein lakhem raHamim weriHam ’etkhem; weheishiw ’etkhem ’el ’admatkhem. 
jeremiah 42:13	we’im ’omerim ’atem, lo neisheiw ba’arez haccot; lewilti shemoa‘, beqol yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
jeremiah 42:14	leimor, lo ki ’erez mizrayim nawo, ’asher lo nir’eh milHamah, weqol shofar lo nishma‘; welaleHem lo nir‘aw wesham neisheiw. 
jeremiah 42:15	we‘atah lakhein shim‘u dewar yhoh she’eirit yehudah; koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, ’im ’atem som tesimun peneikhem lawo mizrayim, uwatem lagur sham. 
jeremiah 42:16	wehayetah haHerew, ’asher ’atem yerei’im mimenah, sham tasig ’etkhem be’erez mizrayim; wehara‘aw ’asher ’atem do’agim mimenu, sham yidbaq ’aHareikhem mizrayim wesham tamutu. 
jeremiah 42:17	weyihyu khal ha’anashim, ’asher samu ’et peneihem lawo mizrayim lagur sham, yamutu baHerew bara‘aw uwadawer; welo yihyeh lahem sarid ufaliT, mipenei hara‘ah, ’asher ’ani meiwi ‘aleihem.
jeremiah 42:18	ki khoh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil ka’asher nitakh ’api waHamati, ‘al yoshewei yerushalim, kein titakh Hamati ‘aleikhem, bewo’akhem mizrayim; wihyitem le’alah uleshamah weliqlalah uleHerpah, welo tir’u ‘od, ’et hamaqom hacceh. 
jeremiah 42:19	diber yhoh ‘aleikhem she’eirit yehudah, ’al tawo’u mizrayim; yadoa‘ teide‘u, ki ha‘idoti wakhem hayom. 
jeremiah 42:20	ki hit‘eitem hit‘eitem benafshoteikhem ki ’atem shelaHtem ’oti, ’el yhoh ’eloheikhem leimor, hitpaleil ba‘adeinu, ’el yhoh ’eloheinu; ukhekhol ’asher yomar yhoh ’eloheinu kein haged lanu we‘asinu. 
jeremiah 42:21	wa’agid lakhem hayom; welo shema‘tem, beqol yhoh ’eloheikhem, ulekhol ’asher shelaHani ’aleikhem. 
jeremiah 42:22	we‘atah yadoa‘ teide‘u, ki, baHerew bara‘aw uwadewer tamutu; bamaqom ’asher Hafaztem, lawo lagur sham.
jeremiah 43:1	wayhi kekhalot yirmeyahu ledabeir ’el kal ha‘am, ’et kal diwrei yhoh ’eloheihem, ’asher shelaHo yhoh ’eloheihem ’aleihem; ’eit kal hadewarim ha’eileh.
jeremiah 43:2	wayomer ‘acaryah wen hosha‘yah weyoHanan ben qareiaH, wekhal ha’anashim hacceidim; ’omerim ’el yirmeyahu, qer ’atah medabeir, lo shelaHakha yhoh ’eloheinu leimor, lo tawo’u mizrayim lagur sham. 
jeremiah 43:3	ki, barukh ben neiriyah, massit ’otekha banu; lema‘an teit ’otanu weyad hakasdim lehamit ’otanu, ulehaglot ’otanu bawel. 
jeremiah 43:4	welo shama‘ yoHanan ben qareiaH wekhal sarei haHayalim wekhal ha‘am beqol yhoh; lashewet be’erez yehudah. 
jeremiah 43:5	wayiqaH yoHanan ben qareiaH wekhal sarei haHayalim, ’eit kal she’eirit yehudah; ’asher shawu, mikal hagoyim ’asher nideHu sham, lagur be’erez yehudah. 
jeremiah 43:6	’et hagewarim we’et hanashim we’et haTaf we’et benot hamelekh we’eit kal hanefesh, ’asher hiniaH newucar’adan raw TabaHim, ’et gedalyahu ben ’aHiqam ben shafan; we’eit yirmeyahu hanawi, we’et barukh ben neiriyahu. 
jeremiah 43:7	wayawo’u ’erez mizrayim, ki lo shame‘u beqol yhoh; wayawo’u ‘ad taHpanHeis.
jeremiah 43:8	wayhi dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu, betaHpanHeis leimor. 
jeremiah 43:9	qaH beyadekha ’awanim gedolot, uTemantam bameleT bamalbein, ’asher befetaH beit par‘oh betaHpanHeis; le‘einei ’anashim yehudim. 
jeremiah 43:10	we’amarta ’aleihem koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, hini sholeiaH welaqaHti ’et newukhadrezar melekh bawel ‘awdi, wesamti khis’o, mima‘al la’awanim ha’eileh ’asher Tamaneti; wenaTah ’et shafruro shafriro ‘aleihem. 
jeremiah 43:11	uwa’ah uwa wehikah ’et ’erez mizrayim; ’asher lamawet lamawet, wa’asher lashewi lashewi, wa’asher laHerew leHarew. 
jeremiah 43:12	wehizati ’eish, bewatei ’elohei mizrayim, userafam weshawam; we‘aTah ’et ’erez mizrayim ka’asher ya‘Teh haro‘eh ’et bigdo, weyaza misham beshalom. 
jeremiah 43:13	weshibar, ’et mazewot beit shemesh, ’asher be’erez mizrayim; we’et batei ’elohei mizrayim yisrof ba’eish.
jeremiah 44:1	hadawar ’asher hayah ’el yirmeyahu, ’el kal hayehudim, hayoshewim be’erez mizrayim; hayoshewim bemigdol uwetaHpanHeis uwenof, uwe’erez patros leimor.
jeremiah 44:2	koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, ’atem re’item, ’eit kal hara‘ah ’asher heiweiti ‘al yerushalim, we‘al kal ‘arei yehudah; wehinam Harebah hayom hacceh, we’ein bahem yosheiw. 
jeremiah 44:3	mipenei ra‘atam, ’asher ‘asu lehakh‘iseini, lalekhet leqaTeir, la‘awod leilohim ’aHeirim; ’asher lo yeda‘um, heimah ’atem wa’awoteikhem. 
jeremiah 44:4	wa’eshlaH ’aleikhem ’et kal ‘awaday hanewi’im, hashkeim weshaloaH leimor; ’al na ta‘asu, ’eit dewar hato‘eiwah haccot ’asher saneiti. 
jeremiah 44:5	welo shame‘u welo hiTu ’et ’acenam, lashuw meira‘atam; lewilti qaTeir leilohim ’aHeirim. 
jeremiah 44:6	watitakh Hamati we’api, watiw‘ar be‘arei yehudah, uweHuzot yerushalim; watihyenah leHarebah lishmamah kayom hacceh.
jeremiah 44:7	we‘atah koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, lamah ’atem ‘osim ra‘ah gedolah ’el nafshoteikhem, lehakhrit lakhem ’ish we’ishah ‘oleil weyoneiq mitokh yehudah; lewilti hotir lakhem she’eirit. 
jeremiah 44:8	lehakh‘iseini bema‘asei yedeikhem, leqaTeir leilohim ’aHeirim be’erez mizrayim, ’asher ’atem ba’im lagur sham; lema‘an hakhrit lakhem, ulema‘an heyotkhem liqlalah uleHerpah, bekhol goyei ha’arez. 
jeremiah 44:9	hashkhaHtem ’et ra‘ot ’awoteikhem we’et ra‘ot malkhei yehudah, we’eit ra‘ot nashaw, we’eit ra‘oteikhem, we’eit ra‘ot nesheikhem; ’asher ‘asu be’erez yehudah, uweHuzot yerushalim. 
jeremiah 44:10	lo duke’u, ‘ad hayom hacceh; welo yare’u, welo halekhu wetorati uweHuqotay, ’asher natati lifneikhem welifnei ’awoteikhem.
jeremiah 44:11	lakhein, koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, hini sam panay bakhem lera‘ah; ulehakhrit ’et kal yehudah. 
jeremiah 44:12	welaqaHti ’et she’eirit yehudah, ’asher samu feneihem lawo ’erez mizrayim lagur sham wetamu khol be’erez mizrayim yipolu, baHerew bara‘aw yitamu, miqaTon we‘ad gadol, baHerew uwara‘aw yamutu; wehayu le’alah leshamah, weliqlalah uleHerpah. 
jeremiah 44:13	ufaqadti, ‘al hayoshewim be’erez mizrayim, ka’asher paqadti ‘al yerushalim; baHerew bara‘aw uwadawer. 
jeremiah 44:14	welo yihyeh paliT wesarid lish’eirit yehudah, haba’im lagur sham be’erez mizrayim; welashuw ’erez yehudah, ’asher heimah menase’im ’et nafsham lashuw lashewet sham, ki lo yashuwu ki ’im peleiTim.
jeremiah 44:15	waya‘anu ’et yirmeyahu, kal ha’anashim hayode‘im ki meqaTerot nesheihem leilohim ’aHeirim, wekhal hanashim ha‘omedot qahal gadol; wekhal ha‘am hayoshewim be’erez mizrayim befatros leimor. 
jeremiah 44:16	hadawar ’asher dibarta ’eileinu besheim yhoh; ’einenu shome‘im ’eilekha. 
jeremiah 44:17	ki ‘asoh na‘aseh ’et kal hadawar ’asher yaza mipinu, leqaTeir limlekhet hashamayim wehasseikh lah nesakhim ka’asher ‘asinu ’anaHnu wa’awoteinu melakheinu wesareinu, be‘arei yehudah, uweHuzot yerushalim; wanisba‘ leHem wanihyeh Towim, wera‘ah lo ra’inu. 
jeremiah 44:18	umin ’ac Hadalnu leqaTeir limlekhet hashamayim wehasseikh lah nesakhim Hasarnu khol; uwaHerew uwara‘aw tamenu. 
jeremiah 44:19	wekhi ’anaHnu meqaTerim limlekhet hashamayim, ulehasseikh lah nesakhim; hamibal‘adei ’anasheinu, ‘asinu lah kawwanim leha‘aziwah, wehasseikh lah nesakhim.
jeremiah 44:20	wayomer yirmeyahu ’el kal ha‘am; ‘al hagewarim we‘al hanashim we‘al kal ha‘am, ha‘onim ’oto dawar leimor. 
jeremiah 44:21	halo ’et haqiTeir, ’asher qiTartem be‘arei yehudah uweHuzot yerushalim, ’atem wa’awoteikhem malkheikhem wesareikhem we‘am ha’arez; ’otam cakhar yhoh, wata‘aleh ‘al libo. 
jeremiah 44:22	welo yukhal yhoh ‘od laseit, mipenei roa‘ ma‘aleikhem, mipenei hato‘eiwot ’asher ‘asitem; watehi ’arzekhem leHarebah uleshamah weliqlalah mei’ein yosheiw kehayom hacceh. 
jeremiah 44:23	mipenei ’asher qiTartem wa’asher HaTatem yhoh welo shema‘tem beqol yhoh, uwetorato uweHuqotaw uwe‘eidewotaw lo halakhtem; ‘al kein qarat ’etkhem hara‘ah haccot kayom hacceh.
jeremiah 44:24	wayomer yirmeyahu ’el kal ha‘am, we’el kal hanashim; shim‘u dewar yhoh, kal yehudah ’asher be’erez mizrayim.
jeremiah 44:25	koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil leimor, ’atem unesheikhem watedabeirenah befikhem uwideikhem mileitem leimor ‘asoh na‘aseh ’et nedareinu, ’asher nadarnu leqaTeir limlekhet hashamayim, ulehasseikh lah nesakhim; haqeim taqimenah ’et nidreikhem, we‘asoh ta‘asenah ’et nidreikhem.
jeremiah 44:26	lakhein shim‘u dewar yhoh, kal yehudah hayoshewim be’erez mizrayim; hini nishba‘ti bishmi hagadol ’amar yhoh, ’im yihyeh ‘od shemi niqra befi kal ’ish yehudah, ’omeir Hay ’adonay yhoh bekhal ’erez mizrayim. 
jeremiah 44:27	hini shoqeid ‘aleihem lera‘ah welo leTowah; wetamu khal ’ish yehudah ’asher be’erez mizrayim baHerew uwara‘aw ‘ad kelotam. 
jeremiah 44:28	ufeliTei Herew yeshuwun min ’erez mizrayim ’erez yehudah metei mispar; weyade‘u kal she’eirit yehudah, haba’im le’erez mizrayim lagur sham, dewar mi yaqum mimeni umeihem. 
jeremiah 44:29	wecot lakhem ha’ot ne’um yhoh, ki foqeid ’ani ‘aleikhem bamaqom hacceh; lema‘an teide‘u, ki qom yaqumu dewaray ‘aleikhem lera‘ah.
jeremiah 44:30	koh ’amar yhoh hini notein ’et par‘oh Hafera‘ melekh mizrayim beyad ’oyewaw, uweyad mewaqshei nafsho; ka’asher natati ’et zidqiyahu melekh yehudah, beyad newukhadrezar melekh bawel ’oyewo umewaqeish nafsho.
jeremiah 45:1	hadawar, ’asher diber yirmeyahu hanawi, ’el barukh ben neiriyah; bekhatewo ’et hadewarim ha’eileh ‘al seifer mipi yirmeyahu, bashanah harewi‘it, lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah leimor.
jeremiah 45:2	koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil; ‘alekha barukh. 
jeremiah 45:3	’amarta ’o na li, ki yasaf yhoh yagon ‘al makh’owi; yaga‘ti be’anHati, umenuHah lo mazati.
jeremiah 45:4	koh tomar ’eilaw, koh ’amar yhoh, hineih ’asher baniti ’ani horeis, we’eit ’asher naTa‘ti ’ani noteish; we’et kal ha’arez hi. 
jeremiah 45:5	we’atah tewaqesh lekha gedolot ’al tewaqeish; ki hini meiwi ra‘ah ‘al kal basar ne’um yhoh, wenatati lekha ’et nafshekha leshalal, ‘al kal hameqomot ’asher teilekh sham.
jeremiah 46:1	’asher hayah dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu hanawi ‘al hagoyim. 
jeremiah 46:2	lemizrayim, ‘al Heil par‘oh nekho melekh mizrayim, ’asher hayah ‘al nehar perat bekharkemish; ’asher hikah, newukhadrezar melekh bawel, bishnat harewi‘it, lihoyaqim ben yoshiyahu melekh yehudah. 
jeremiah 46:3	‘irkhu magein wezinah, ugeshu lamilHamah. 
jeremiah 46:4	’isru hassusim, wa‘alu haparashim, wehityazewu bekhowa‘im; mirqu haremaHim, liwshu hassiryonot. 
jeremiah 46:5	madua‘ ra’iti, heimah Hatim nesogim ’aHor wegiboreihem yukatu, umanos nasu welo hifnu; magor missawiw ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 46:6	’al yanus haqal, we’al yimaleiT hagibor; zafonah ‘al yad nehar perat, kashelu wenafalu. 
jeremiah 46:7	mi ceh kay’or ya‘aleh; kaneharot yitga‘ashu meimaw. 
jeremiah 46:8	mizrayim kay’or ya‘aleh, wekhaneharot yitgo‘ashu mayim; wayomer, ’a‘aleh ’akhasseh ’erez, ’owidah ‘ir weyoshewei wah. 
jeremiah 46:9	‘alu hassusim wehitholelu harekhew, weyeize’u hagiborim; kush ufuT tofesei magein, weludim tofesei dorekhei qashet. 
jeremiah 46:10	wehayom hahu ladonay yhoh zewa’ot, yom neqamah lehinaqeim mizaraw, we’akhelah Herew wesawe‘ah, werawetah midamam; ki cewaH ladonay yhoh zewa’ot be’erez zafon ’el nehar perat. 
jeremiah 46:11	‘ali gil‘ad uqeHi zori, betulat bat mizrayim; lashaw hirbeiti hirbeit refu’ot, te‘alah ’ein lakh. 
jeremiah 46:12	shame‘u goyim qeloneikh, weziwHateikh male’ah ha’arez; ki gibor begibor kashalu, yaHdaw nafelu sheneihem.
jeremiah 46:13	hadawar ’asher diber yhoh, ’el yirmeyahu hanawi; lawo, newukhadrezar melekh bawel, lehakot ’et ’erez mizrayim. 
jeremiah 46:14	hagidu wemizrayim wehashmi‘u wemigdol, wehashmi‘u wenof uwetaHpanHeis; ’imru, hityazeiw wehakhein lakh, ki ’akhelah Herew sewiwekha. 
jeremiah 46:15	madua‘ nisHaf ’abirekha; lo ‘amad, ki yhoh hadafo. 
jeremiah 46:16	hirbah kosheil; gam nafal ’ish ’el rei‘eihu, wayomeru qumah wenashuwah ’el ‘ameinu, we’el ’erez moladteinu, mipenei Herew hayonah. 
jeremiah 46:17	qare’u sham; par‘oh melekh mizrayim sha’on, he‘ewir hamo‘eid. 
jeremiah 46:18	Hay ’ani ne’um hamelekh, yhoh zewa’ot shemo; ki ketawor beharim, ukhekharmel bayam yawo. 
jeremiah 46:19	kelei golah ‘asi lakh, yoshewet bat mizrayim; ki nof leshamah tihyeh, wenizetah mei’ein yosheiw.
jeremiah 46:20	‘eglah yefeih fiyah mizrayim; qerez mizafon ba wa. 
jeremiah 46:21	gam sekhireha weqirbah ke‘eglei marbeiq, ki gam heimah hifnu nasu yaHdaw lo ‘amadu; ki yom ’eidam ba ‘aleihem ‘eit pequdatam. 
jeremiah 46:22	qolah kanaHash yeileikh; ki weHayil yeileikhu, uweqardumot ba’u lah, keHoTewei ‘eizim. 
jeremiah 46:23	karetu ya‘rah ne’um yhoh, ki lo yeiHaqeir; ki rabu mei’arbeh, we’ein lahem mispar. 
jeremiah 46:24	howishah bat mizrayim; nitenah beyad ‘am zafon. 
jeremiah 46:25	’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, hini foqeid ’el ’amon mino, we‘al par‘oh we‘al mizrayim, we‘al ’eloheha we‘al melakheha; we‘al par‘oh, we‘al haboTeHim bo. 
jeremiah 46:26	unetatim, beyad mewaqshei nafsham, uweyad newukhadrezar melekh bawel uweyad ‘awadaw; we’aHarei khein tishkon kimei qedem ne’um yhoh.
jeremiah 46:27	we’atah ’al tira ‘awdi ya‘aqow we’al teiHat yisra’eil, ki hini moshi‘akha meiraHoq, we’et car‘akha mei’erez shiwyam; weshaw ya‘aqow weshaqaT wesha’anan we’ein maHarid.
jeremiah 46:28	’atah ’al tira ‘awdi ya‘aqow ne’um yhoh, ki ’itekha ’ani; ki ’e‘eseh khalah bekhal hagoyim ’asher hidaHtikha shamah, we’otekha lo ’e‘eseh khalah, weyissartikha lamishpaT, wenaqeih lo ’anaqeka.
jeremiah 47:1	’asher hayah dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu hanawi ’el pelishtim; beTerem yakeh far‘oh ’et ‘accah.
jeremiah 47:2	koh ’amar yhoh hineih mayim ‘olim mizafon wehayu lenaHal shoTeif, weyishTefu ’erez umelo’ah, ‘ir weyoshewei wah; weca‘aqu ha’adam, weheilil kol yosheiw ha’arez. 
jeremiah 47:3	miqol, sha‘aTat parsot ’abiraw, meira‘ash lerikhbo, hamon galgilaw; lo hifnu ’awot ’el banim, meirifyon yadayim. 
jeremiah 47:4	‘al hayom, haba lishdod ’et kal pelishtim, lehakhrit lezor ulezidon, kol sarid ‘oceir; ki shodeid yhoh ’et pelishtim, she’eirit ’i khaftor. 
jeremiah 47:5	ba’ah qareHah ’el ‘accah, nidmetah ’ashqelon she’eirit ‘imqam; ‘ad matay titgodadi.
jeremiah 47:6	ho, Herew yhoh, ‘ad ’anah lo tishqoTi; hei’asefi ’al ta‘reikh, heirage‘i wadomi. 
jeremiah 47:7	’eikh tishqoTi, yhoh ziwwah lah; ’el ’ashqelon we’el Hof hayam sham ye‘adah.
jeremiah 48:1	lemo’aw koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, ho ’el newo ki shudadah, howishah nilkedah qiryatayim; howishah hamisgaw waHatah. 
jeremiah 48:2	’ein ‘od tehilat mo’aw beHeshbon, Hashewu ‘aleha ra‘ah, lekhu wenakhritenah migo; gam madmein tidomi, ’aHarayikh teilekh Harew. 
jeremiah 48:3	qol ze‘aqah meiHoronayim; shod washewer gadol. 
jeremiah 48:4	nishberah mo’aw; hishmi‘u ce‘aqah ze‘oreha ze‘ireha. 
jeremiah 48:5	ki ma‘aleih haluHot haluHit, biwkhi ya‘aleh bekhi; ki bemorad Horonayim, zarei za‘aqat shewer shamei‘u. 
jeremiah 48:6	nusu maleTu nafshekhem; wetihyenah ka‘aro‘eir bamidbar. 
jeremiah 48:7	ki ya‘an biTHeikh bema‘asayikh uwe’ozrotayikh, gam ’at tilakheidi; weyaza khemish khemosh bagolah, kohanaw wesaraw yaHad yaHdaw. 
jeremiah 48:8	weyawo shodeid ’el kal ‘ir, we‘ir lo timaleiT, we’awad ha‘eimeq wenishmad hamishor; ’asher ’amar yhoh. 
jeremiah 48:9	tenu ziz lemo’aw, ki nazo teizei; we‘areha leshamah tihyenah, mei’ein yosheiw bahein. 
jeremiah 48:10	’arur, ‘oseh melekhet yhoh remiyah; we’arur moneia‘ Harbo midam. 
jeremiah 48:11	sha’anan mo’aw mine‘uraw, weshoqeiT hu ’el shemaraw, welo huraq mikeli ’el keli, uwagolah lo halakh; ‘al kein, ‘amad Ta‘mo bo, wereiHo lo namar.
jeremiah 48:12	lakhein hineih yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh, weshilaHti lo zo‘im wezei‘uhu; wekheilaw yariqu, weniwleihem yenapeizu. 
jeremiah 48:13	uwosh mo’aw mikemosh; ka’asher boshu beit yisra’eil, mibeit ’eil miwTeHam. 
jeremiah 48:14	’eikh tomeru, giborim ’anaHenu; we’anshei Hayil lamilHamah. 
jeremiah 48:15	shudad mo’aw we‘areha ‘alah, umiwHar baHuraw yaredu laTawaH; ne’um hamelekh, yhoh zewa’ot shemo. 
jeremiah 48:16	qarow ’eid mo’aw lawo; wera‘ato, miharah me’od. 
jeremiah 48:17	nudu lo kal sewiwaw, wekhol yode‘ei shemo; ’imru, ’eikhah nishbar maTeih ‘oc, maqeil tif’arah. 
jeremiah 48:18	redi mikawod yoshewe ushewi wazama, yoshewet bat diwon; ki shodeid mo’aw ‘alah wakh, shiHeit miwzarayikh. 
jeremiah 48:19	’el derekh ‘imdi wezapi yoshewet ‘aro‘eir; sha’ali nas wenimlaTah, ’imri mah nihyatah. 
jeremiah 48:20	howish mo’aw ki Hatah heilili heililu uce‘aqi uce‘aqu; hagidu we’arnon, ki shudad mo’aw. 
jeremiah 48:21	umishpaT ba ’el ’erez hamishor; ’el Holon we’el yahzah we‘al mofa‘at meifa‘at. 
jeremiah 48:22	we‘al diwon we‘al newo, we‘al beit diwlatayim. 
jeremiah 48:23	we‘al qiryatayim we‘al beit gamul we‘al beit me‘on. 
jeremiah 48:24	we‘al qeriyot we‘al bazrah we‘al, kal ‘arei ’erez mo’aw, hareHoqot wehaqerowot. 
jeremiah 48:25	nigde‘ah qeren mo’aw, ucero‘o nishbarah; ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 48:26	hashkiruhu ki ‘al yhoh higdil; wesafaq mo’aw beqi’o, wehayah lisHoq gam hu. 
jeremiah 48:27	we’im lo haseHoq, hayah lekha yisra’eil, ’im beganawim nimza’ah nimza; ki midei dewarekha bo titnodad. 
jeremiah 48:28	‘icwu ‘arim weshikhnu bassela‘, yoshewei mo’aw; wihyu kheyonah, teqanein be‘ewrei fi faHat. 
jeremiah 48:29	shama‘nu ge’on mo’aw gei’eh me’od; gaweho uge’ono wega’awato werum libo. 
jeremiah 48:30	’ani yada‘ti ne’um yhoh, ‘ewrato welo khein; badaw lo khein ‘asu. 
jeremiah 48:31	‘al kein ‘al mo’aw ’ayeilil, ulemo’aw kuloh ’ec‘aq; ’el ’anshei qir Heres yehgeh. 
jeremiah 48:32	mibekhi ya‘ceir ’ewkeh lakh hagefen siwmah, neTishotayikh ‘aweru yam, ‘ad yam ya‘ceir naga‘u; ‘al qeizeikh we‘al bezireikh shodeid nafal. 
jeremiah 48:33	wene’esfah simHah wagil mikarmel umei’erez mo’aw; weyayin miqawim hishbati, lo yidrokh heidad, heidad lo heidad. 
jeremiah 48:34	micca‘aqat Heshbon ‘ad ’el‘aleih, ‘ad yahaz natenu qolam, mizo‘ar ‘ad Horonayim, ‘eglat shelishiyah; ki gam mei nimrim, limshamot yihyu. 
jeremiah 48:35	wehishbati lemo’aw ne’um yhoh; ma‘aleh wamah, umaqTir leilohaw. 
jeremiah 48:36	‘al kein libi lemo’aw kaHalilim yehemeh, welibi ’el ’anshei qir Heres, kaHalilim yehemeh; ‘al kein yitrat ‘asah ’awadu. 
jeremiah 48:37	ki khal rosh qareHah, wekhal caqan geru‘ah; ‘al kal yadayim gedudot, we‘al matenayim saq. 
jeremiah 48:38	‘al kal gagot mo’aw uwirHowoteha kuloh mispeid; ki shawarti ’et mo’aw, kikhli ’ein Heifez bo ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 48:39	’eikh Hatah heililu, ’eikh hifnah ‘oref mo’aw bosh; wehayah mo’aw lisHoq welimHitah lekhal sewiwaw.
jeremiah 48:40	ki khoh ’amar yhoh, hineih khanesher yid’eh; ufaras kenafaw ’el mo’aw. 
jeremiah 48:41	nilkedah haqeriyot, wehamezadot nitpasah; wehayah leiw giborei mo’aw bayom hahu, keleiw ’ishah mezeirah. 
jeremiah 48:42	wenishmad mo’aw mei‘am; ki ‘al yhoh higdil. 
jeremiah 48:43	paHad wafaHat wafaH; ‘alekha yosheiw mo’aw ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 48:44	hanis hanas mipenei hapaHad yipol ’el hapaHat, weha‘oleh min hapaHat, yilakheid bapaH; ki ’awi ’eileha ’el mo’aw shenat pequdatam ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 48:45	bezeil Heshbon ‘amedu mikoaH nasim; ki ’eish yaza meiHeshbon, welehawah mibein siHon, watokhal pe’at mo’aw, weqadeqod benei sha’on. 
jeremiah 48:46	’o lekha mo’aw, ’awad ‘am kemosh; ki luqeHu wanekha bashewi, uwenotekha bashiwyah. 
jeremiah 48:47	weshawti shewut mo’aw be’aHarit hayamim ne’um yhoh; ‘ad heinah mishpaT mo’aw.
jeremiah 49:1	liwnei ‘amon, koh ’amar yhoh, hawanim ’ein leyisra’eil, ’im yoreish ’ein lo; madua‘, yarash malkam ’et gad, we‘amo be‘araw yashaw. 
jeremiah 49:2	lakhein hineih yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh wehishma‘ti ’el rabat benei ‘amon teru‘at milHamah, wehayetah leteil shemamah, uwenoteha ba’eish tizatnah; weyarash yisra’eil ’et yoreshaw ’amar yhoh. 
jeremiah 49:3	heilili Heshbon ki shudedah ‘ay, ze‘aqnah benot rabah Hagorenah saqim, sefodenah wehitshoTaTnah bagedeirot; ki malkam bagolah yeileikh, kohanaw wesaraw yaHdaw. 
jeremiah 49:4	mah tithali ba‘amaqim, caw ‘imqeikh, habat hashoweiwah; haboTeHah be’ozeroteha, mi yawo ’eilay. 
jeremiah 49:5	hini meiwi ‘alayikh paHad, ne’um ’adonay yhoh zewa’ot mikal sewiwayikh; wenidaHtem ’ish lefanaw, we’ein meqabeiz lanodeid. 
jeremiah 49:6	we’aHarei khein, ’ashiw ’et shewut benei ‘amon ne’um yhoh.
jeremiah 49:7	le’edom, koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot, ha’ein ‘od Hakhmah beteiman; ’awedah ‘eizah mibanim, nisreHah Hakhematam. 
jeremiah 49:8	nusu hafenu he‘miqu lashewet, yoshewei dedan; ki ’eid ‘eisaw heiweiti ‘alaw ‘eit peqadtiw. 
jeremiah 49:9	’im bozerim ba’u lakh, lo yash’iru ‘oleilot; ’im ganawim balaylah hishHitu dayam. 
jeremiah 49:10	ki ’ani Hasafti ’et ‘eisaw, gileiti ’et mistaraw, weneHbah lo yukhal; shudad car‘o we’eHaw ushekheinaw we’einenu. 
jeremiah 49:11	‘acewah yetomekha ’ani ’aHayeh; we’almenotekha ‘alay tiwTaHu.
jeremiah 49:12	ki khoh ’amar yhoh hineih ’asher ’ein mishpaTam lishtot hakos shato yishtu, we’atah hu, naqoh tinaqeh; lo tinaqeh, ki shatoh tishteh. 
jeremiah 49:13	ki wi nishba‘ti ne’um yhoh, ki leshamah leHerpah leHorew weliqlalah tihyeh wazerah; wekhal ‘areha tihyenah leHarewot ‘olam. 
jeremiah 49:14	shemu‘ah shama‘ti mei’eit yhoh, wezir bagoyim shaluaH; hitqabezu uwo’u ‘aleha, wequmu lamilHamah. 
jeremiah 49:15	ki hineih qaTon netatikha bagoyim; bacui ba’adam. 
jeremiah 49:16	tiflaztekha hishi ’otakh cedon libekha, shokheni beHagwei hassela‘, tofesi merom giw‘ah; ki tagbiha kanesher qinekha, misham ’oridekha ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 49:17	wehayetah ’edom leshamah; kol ‘oweir ‘aleha, yishom weyishroq ‘al kal makoteha. 
jeremiah 49:18	kemahpeikhat sedom wa‘amorah ushekheineha ’amar yhoh; lo yeisheiw sham ’ish, welo yagur bah ben ’adam. 
jeremiah 49:19	hineih ke’aryeih ya‘aleh mige’on hayardein ’el neweih ’eitan ki ’argi‘ah ’arizenu mei‘aleha, umi waHur ’eileha ’efqod; ki mi khamoni umi yo‘ideni, umi ceh ro‘eh, ’asher ya‘amod lefanay.
jeremiah 49:20	lakhein shim‘u ‘azat yhoh ’asher ya‘az ’el ’edom, umaHshewotaw, ’asher Hashaw ’el yoshewei teiman; ’im lo yisHawum ze‘irei hazon, ’im lo yashim ‘aleihem neweihem. 
jeremiah 49:21	miqol niflam, ra‘ashah ha’arez; ze‘aqah beyam suf nishma‘ qolah. 
jeremiah 49:22	hineih khanesher ya‘aleh weyid’eh, weyifros kenafaw ‘al bazrah wehayah leiw giborei ’edom bayom hahu, keleiw ’ishah mezeirah.
jeremiah 49:23	ledameseq, boshah Hamat we’arpad, ki shemu‘ah ra‘ah shame‘u namogu; bayam de’agah, hashqeiT lo yukhal. 
jeremiah 49:24	rafetah dameseq hifnetah lanus wereTeT heHeciqah; zarah waHawalim ’aHacatah kayoleidah. 
jeremiah 49:25	’eikh lo ‘uccewah ‘ir tehilah tehilat; qiryat mesosi. 
jeremiah 49:26	lakhein yipelu waHureha birHowoteha; wekhal ’anshei hamilHamah yidamu bayom hahu, ne’um yhoh zewa’ot. 
jeremiah 49:27	wehizati ’eish beHomat damaseq; we’akhelah ’armenot ben hadad.
jeremiah 49:28	leqeidar ulemamlekhot Hazor, ’asher hikah newukhadrezor newukhadrezar melekh bawel, koh ’amar yhoh; qumu ‘alu ’el qeidar, weshadedu ’et benei qedem. 
jeremiah 49:29	’aholeihem wezonam yiqaHu, yeri‘oteihem wekhal keleihem ugemaleihem yis’u lahem; weqare’u ‘aleihem magor missawiw. 
jeremiah 49:30	nusu nudu me’od he‘miqu lashewet yoshewei Hazor ne’um yhoh; ki ya‘az ‘aleikhem newukhadrezar melekh bawel ‘eizah, weHashaw ‘aleihem ‘aleikhem maHashawah. 
jeremiah 49:31	qumu ‘alu, ’el go sheleiw yosheiw laweTaH ne’um yhoh; lo delatayim welo weriaH lo badad yishkonu. 
jeremiah 49:32	wehayu gemaleihem lawac, wahamon miqneihem leshalal, weceiritim lekhal ruaH qezuzei fei’ah; umikal ‘awaraw ’awi ’et ’eidam ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 49:33	wehayetah Hazor lim‘on tanim shemamah ‘ad ‘olam; lo yeisheiw sham ’ish, welo yagur bah ben ’adam.
jeremiah 49:34	’asher hayah dewar yhoh ’el yirmeyahu hanawi ’el ‘eilam; bereishit, malkhut zidqiyah melekh yehudah leimor. 
jeremiah 49:35	koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot, hini showeir ’et qeshet ‘eilam; reishit gewuratam. 
jeremiah 49:36	weheiweiti ’el ‘eilam ’arba‘ ruHot, mei’arba‘ qezot hashamayim, weceiritim, lekhol haruHot ha’eileh; welo yihyeh hago, ’asher lo yawo sham nideHei ‘olam ‘eilam. 
jeremiah 49:37	wehaHtati ’et ‘eilam lifnei ’oyeweihem welifnei mewaqshei nafsham, weheiweiti ‘aleihem ra‘ah ’et Haron ’api ne’um yhoh; weshilaHti ’aHareihem ’et haHerew, ‘ad kaloti ’otam. 
jeremiah 49:38	wesamti khis’i be‘eilam; weha’awadti misham melekh wesarim ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 49:39	wehayah be’aHarit hayamim, ’ashuw ’ashiw ’et shewit shewut ‘eilam ne’um yhoh.
jeremiah 50:1	hadawar, ’asher diber yhoh ’el bawel ’el ’erez kasdim; beyad yirmeyahu hanawi. 
jeremiah 50:2	hagidu wagoyim wehashmi‘u use’u neis, hashmi‘u ’al tekhaHeidu; ’imru nilkedah wawel howish beil Hat merodakh, howishu ‘azabeha, Hatu giluleha. 
jeremiah 50:3	ki ‘alah ‘aleha go mizafon, hu yashit ’et ’arzah leshamah, welo yihyeh yosheiw bah; mei’adam we‘ad beheimah nadu halakhu. 
jeremiah 50:4	bayamim haheimah uwa‘eit hahi ne’um yhoh, yawo’u wenei yisra’eil heimah uwenei yehudah yaHdaw; halokh uwakho yeileikhu, we’et yhoh ’eloheihem yewaqeishu. 
jeremiah 50:5	ziyon yish’alu, derekh heinah feneihem; bo’u wenilwu ’el yhoh, berit ‘olam lo tishakheiaH.
jeremiah 50:6	zon ’owedot hayah hayu ‘ami, ro‘eihem hit‘um, harim showeiwim showwum; meihar ’el giw‘ah halakhu, shakheHu riwzam. 
jeremiah 50:7	kal moz’eihem ’akhalum, wezareihem ’ameru lo ne’sham; taHat, ’asher HaTe’u yhoh neweih zedeq, umiqweih ’awoteihem yhoh.
jeremiah 50:8	nudu mitokh bawel, umei’erez kasdim yaze’u zei’u; wihyu ke‘atudim lifnei zon. 
jeremiah 50:9	ki hineih ’anokhi mei‘ir uma‘aleh ‘al bawel qehal goyim gedolim mei’erez zafon, we‘arekhu lah, misham tilakheid; Hizaw kegibor mashkil, lo yashuw reiqam. 
jeremiah 50:10	wehayetah khasdim leshalal; kal sholeleha yisba‘u ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 50:11	ki tismeHi tismeHu ki ta‘alci ta‘alcu, shosei naHalati; ki tafushi tafushu ke‘eglah dashah, wetizhali wetizhalu ka’abirim. 
jeremiah 50:12	boshah ’imekhem me’od, Haferah yoladtekhem; hineih ’aHarit goyim, midbar ziyah wa‘arawah. 
jeremiah 50:13	miqezef yhoh lo teisheiw, wehayetah shemamah kulah; kol ‘oweir ‘al bawel, yishom weyishroq ‘al kal makoteha. 
jeremiah 50:14	‘irkhu ‘al bawel sawiw kal dorekhei qeshet, yedu ’eileha, ’al taHmelu ’el Heiz; ki yhoh HaTa’ah. 
jeremiah 50:15	hari‘u ‘aleha sawiw natenah yadah, nafelu ’ashwiyoteha ’asheyoteha, nehersu Homoteha; ki niqmat yhoh hi hinaqemu wah, ka’asher ‘asetah ‘asu lah. 
jeremiah 50:16	kirtu coreia‘ mibawel, wetofeis magal be‘eit qazir; mipenei Herew hayonah, ’ish ’el ‘amo yifnu, we’ish le’arzo yanusu.
jeremiah 50:17	seh fecurah yisra’eil ’arayot hidiHu; harishon ’akhalo melekh ’ashur, weceh ha’aHaron ‘izemo, newukhadrezar melekh bawel.
jeremiah 50:18	lakhein, koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, hini foqeid ’el melekh bawel we’el ’arzo; ka’asher paqadti ’el melekh ’ashur. 
jeremiah 50:19	weshowawti ’et yisra’eil ’el naweihu, wera‘ah hakarmel wehabashan; uwehar ’efrayim wehagil‘ad tisba‘ nafsho. 
jeremiah 50:20	bayamim haheim uwa‘eit hahi ne’um yhoh yewuqash ’et ‘awon yisra’eil we’einenu, we’et HaTot yehudah welo timazenah; ki ’eslaH la’asher ’ash’ir. 
jeremiah 50:21	‘al ha’arez meratayim ‘aleih ‘aleha, we’el yoshewei peqod; Harow wehaHareim ’aHareihem ne’um yhoh, wa‘aseih kekhol ’asher ziwwitikha.
jeremiah 50:22	qol milHamah ba’arez; weshewer gadol. 
jeremiah 50:23	’eikh nigda‘ wayishaweir, paTish kal ha’arez; ’eikh hayetah leshamah bawel bagoyim. 
jeremiah 50:24	yaqosheti lakh wegam nilkadt bawel, we’at lo yada‘at; nimzeit wegam nitpast, ki yhoh hitgarit. 
jeremiah 50:25	pataH yhoh ’et ’ozaro, wayozei ’et kelei ca‘mo; ki melakhah hi, ladonay yhoh zewa’ot be’erez kasdim. 
jeremiah 50:26	bo’u lah miqeiz pitHu ma’awuseha, saluha khemo ‘areimim wehaHarimuha; ’al tehi lah she’eirit. 
jeremiah 50:27	Hirwu kal pareha, yeiredu laTawaH; ho ‘aleihem, ki wa yomam ‘eit pequdatam.
jeremiah 50:28	qol nasim ufeleiTim mei’erez bawel; lehagid beziyon, ’et niqmat yhoh ’eloheinu, niqmat heikhalo. 
jeremiah 50:29	hashmi‘u ’el bawel rabim kal dorekhei qeshet Hanu ‘aleha sawiw, ’al yehi lah peleiTah, shalemu lah kefa‘olah, kekhol ’asher ‘asetah ‘asu lah; ki ’el yhoh cadah ’el qedosh yisra’eil. 
jeremiah 50:30	lakhein yipelu waHureha birHowoteha; wekhal ’anshei milHamtah yidamu bayom hahu ne’um yhoh.
jeremiah 50:31	hini ’eilekha cadon, ne’um ’adonay yhoh zewa’ot; ki ba yomkha ‘eit peqadtikha. 
jeremiah 50:32	wekhashal cadon wenafal, we’ein lo meiqim; wehizati ’eish be‘araw, we’akhelah kal sewiwotaw.
jeremiah 50:33	koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot, ‘ashuqim benei yisra’eil uwenei yehudah yaHdaw; wekhal showeihem heHeciqu wam, mei’anu shaleHam. 
jeremiah 50:34	go’alam Hacaq, yhoh zewa’ot shemo, riw yariw ’et riwam; lema‘an hirgia‘ ’et ha’arez, wehirgic leyoshewei wawel. 
jeremiah 50:35	Herew ‘al kasdim ne’um yhoh; we’el yoshewei wawel, we’el sareha we’el Hakhameha. 
jeremiah 50:36	Herew ’el habadim weno’alu; Herew ’el giboreha waHatu. 
jeremiah 50:37	Herew ’el susaw we’el rikhbo, we’el kal ha‘erew ’asher betokhah wehayu lenashim; Herew ’el ’ozroteha uwuccacu. 
jeremiah 50:38	Horew ’el meimeha weyaweishu; ki ’erez pesilim hi, uwa’eimim yitholalu. 
jeremiah 50:39	lakhein, yeishewu ziyim ’et ’iyim, weyashewu wah benot ya‘anah; welo teisheiw ‘od lanezaH, welo tishkon ‘ad dor wador. 
jeremiah 50:40	kemahpeikhat ’elohim ’et sedom we’et ‘amorah we’et shekheineha ne’um yhoh; lo yeisheiw sham ’ish, welo yagur bah ben ’adam. 
jeremiah 50:41	hineih ‘am ba mizafon; wego gadol umelakhim rabim, yei‘oru miyarketei ’arez. 
jeremiah 50:42	qeshet wekhidon yaHaciqu, ’akhcari heimah welo yeraHeimu, qolam kayam yehemeh, we‘al susim yirkawu; ‘arukh, ke’ish lamilHamah, ‘alayikh bat bawel. 
jeremiah 50:43	shama‘ melekh bawel ’et shim‘am werafu yadaw; zarah heHeciqathu, Hil kayoleidah. 
jeremiah 50:44	hineih ke’aryeih ya‘aleh mige’on hayardein ’el neweih ’eitan ki ’argi‘ah ’aruzeim ’arizeim mei‘aleha, umi waHur ’eileha ’efqod; ki mi khamoni umi yo‘ideni, umi ceh ro‘eh, ’asher ya‘amod lefanay. 
jeremiah 50:45	lakhein shim‘u ‘azat yhoh ’asher ya‘az ’el bawel, umaHshewotaw, ’asher Hashaw ’el ’erez kasdim; ’im lo yisHawum ze‘irei hazon, ’im lo yashim ‘aleihem naweh. 
jeremiah 50:46	miqol nitpesah wawel, nir‘ashah ha’arez; uce‘aqah bagoyim nishma‘.
jeremiah 51:1	koh ’amar yhoh, hini mei‘ir ‘al bawel, we’el yoshewei leiw qamay; ruaH mashHit. 
jeremiah 51:2	weshilaHti lewawel carim weceiruha, wiwoqequ ’et ’arzah; ki hayu ‘aleha missawiw beyom ra‘ah. 
jeremiah 51:3	’el yidrokh yidrokh hadoreikh qashto, we’el yit‘al besiryono; we’al taHmelu ’el baHureha, haHarimu kal zewa’ah. 
jeremiah 51:4	wenafelu Halalim be’erez kasdim; umeduqarim beHuzoteha. 
jeremiah 51:5	ki lo ’alman yisra’eil wihudah mei’elohaw, yhoh zewa’ot; ki ’arzam male’ah ’asham, miqedosh yisra’eil. 
jeremiah 51:6	nusu mitokh bawel, umaleTu ’ish nafsho, ’al tidamu ba‘awonah; ki ‘eit neqamah hi yhoh, gemul hu meshaleim lah. 
jeremiah 51:7	kos cahaw bawel beyad yhoh, meshakeret kal ha’arez; miyeinah shatu goyim, ‘al kein yitholelu goyim. 
jeremiah 51:8	pit’om nafelah wawel watishaweir; heililu ‘aleha, qeHu zori lemakh’owah, ’ulay teirafei. 
jeremiah 51:9	ripinu ripinu ’et bawel welo nirpatah, ‘icwuha weneileikh ’ish le’arzo; ki naga‘ ’el hashamayim mishpaTah, wenisa ‘ad sheHaqim. 
jeremiah 51:10	hozi yhoh ’et zidqoteinu; bo’u unesaperah weziyon, ’et ma‘aseih yhoh ’eloheinu. 
jeremiah 51:11	haweiru haHizim mil’u hashelaTim hei‘ir yhoh ’et ruaH malkhei maday, ki ‘al bawel mecimato lehashHitah; ki niqmat yhoh hi, niqmat heikhalo. 
jeremiah 51:12	’el Homot bawel se’u neis, haHaciqu hamishmar, haqimu shomerim, hakhinu ha’orewim; ki gam camam yhoh, gam ‘asah ’eit ’asher diber ’el yoshewei wawel. 
jeremiah 51:13	shokhanti shokhant ‘al mayim rabim, rabat ’ozarot; ba qizeikh ’amat biz‘eikh. 
jeremiah 51:14	nishba‘ yhoh zewa’ot benafsho; ki ’im mileitikh ’adam kayeleq, we‘anu ‘alayikh heidad.
jeremiah 51:15	‘oseih ’erez bekhoHo, meikhin teiweil beHakhemato; uwitwunato naTah shamayim. 
jeremiah 51:16	leqol tito hamon mayim bashamayim, waya‘al nesi’im miqzeih ’arez; beraqim lamaTar ‘asah, wayozei ruaH mei’ozerotaw. 
jeremiah 51:17	niw‘ar kal ’adam mida‘at, howish kal zoreif mipasel; ki sheqer nisko welo ruaH bam. 
jeremiah 51:18	hewel heimah, ma‘aseih ta‘tu‘im; be‘eit pequdatam yoweidu. 
jeremiah 51:19	lo khe’eileh Heileq ya‘aqow, ki yozeir hakol hu, wesheiweT naHalato; yhoh zewa’ot shemo.
jeremiah 51:20	mapeiz ’atah li, kelei milHamah; wenipazti wekha goyim, wehishHati wekha mamlakhot. 
jeremiah 51:21	wenipazti wekha, sus werokhewo; wenipazti wekha, rekhew werokhewo. 
jeremiah 51:22	wenipazti wekha ’ish we’ishah, wenipazti wekha caqein wana‘ar; wenipazti wekha, baHur uwetulah. 
jeremiah 51:23	wenipazti wekha ro‘eh we‘edro, wenipazti wekha ’ikar wezimdo; wenipazti wekha, paHot useganim. 
jeremiah 51:24	weshilamti lewawel ulekhol yoshewei khasdim, ’eit kal ra‘atam ’asher ‘asu weziyon le‘eineikhem; ne’um yhoh.
jeremiah 51:25	hini ’eilekha har hamashHit ne’um yhoh, hamashHit ’et kal ha’arez; wenaTiti ’et yadi ‘alekha, wegilgaltikha min hassela‘im, unetatikha lehar sereifah. 
jeremiah 51:26	welo yiqHu mimekha ’ewen lefinah, we’ewen lemosadot; ki shimot ‘olam tihyeh ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 51:27	se’u neis ba’arez, tiq‘u shofar bagoyim qadeshu ‘aleha goyim, hashmi‘u ‘aleha mamlekhot ’araraT mini we’ashkenac; piqdu ‘aleha Tifsar, ha‘alu sus keyeleq samar. 
jeremiah 51:28	qadeshu ‘aleha goyim ’et malkhei maday, ’et paHoteha we’et kal seganeha; we’eit kal ’erez memshalto. 
jeremiah 51:29	watir‘ash ha’arez wataHol; ki qamah ‘al bawel maHshewot yhoh, lasum ’et ’erez bawel leshamah mei’ein yosheiw. 
jeremiah 51:30	Hadelu giborei wawel lehilaHeim, yashewu bamezadot, nashetah gewuratam hayu lenashim; hizitu mishkenoteha nishberu weriHeha. 
jeremiah 51:31	raz liqrat raz yaruz, umagid liqrat magid; lehagid lemelekh bawel, ki nilkedah ‘iro miqazeh. 
jeremiah 51:32	wehama‘barot nitpasu, we’et ha’agamim sarefu wa’eish; we’anshei hamilHamah niwhalu.
jeremiah 51:33	ki khoh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, bat bawel kegoren ‘eit hidrikhah; ‘od me‘aT, uwa’ah ‘eit haqazir lah. 
jeremiah 51:34	’akhalanu ’akhalani hamamanu hamamani, newukhadrezar melekh bawel hiziganu hizigani keli riq, bela‘anu bela‘ani katanin, mila khereiso mei‘adanay; hediHanu hediHani. 
jeremiah 51:35	Hamasi ushe’eiri ‘al bawel, tomar yoshewet ziyon; wedami ’el yoshewei khasdim, tomar yerushalim.
jeremiah 51:36	lakhein, koh ’amar yhoh, hini raw ’et riweikh, weniqamti ’et niqmateikh; wehaHarawti ’et yamah, wehowashti ’et meqorah. 
jeremiah 51:37	wehayetah wawel legalim me‘on tanim shamah ushereiqah mei’ein yosheiw. 
jeremiah 51:38	yaHdaw kakefirim yish’agu; na‘aru kegorei ’arayot. 
jeremiah 51:39	beHumam ’ashit ’et mishteihem, wehishkartim lema‘an ya‘alocu, weyashenu shenat ‘olam welo yaqizu; ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 51:40	’orideim kekharim liTwoaH; ke’eilim ‘im ‘atudim. 
jeremiah 51:41	’eikh nilkedah sheishakh, watitafeis tehilat kal ha’arez; ’eikh hayetah leshamah bawel bagoyim. 
jeremiah 51:42	‘alah ‘al bawel hayam; bahamon galaw nikhsatah. 
jeremiah 51:43	hayu ‘areha leshamah, ’erez ziyah wa‘arawah; ’erez, lo yeisheiw bahein kal ’ish, welo ya‘awor bahein ben ’adam. 
jeremiah 51:44	ufaqadti ‘al beil bewawel, wehozeiti ’et bil‘o mipiw, welo yinharu ’eilaw ‘od goyim; gam Homat bawel nafalah. 
jeremiah 51:45	ze’u mitokhah ‘ami, umaleTu ’ish ’et nafsho; meiHaron ’af yhoh. 
jeremiah 51:46	ufen yeirakh lewawkhem wetire’u, bashemu‘ah hanishma‘at ba’arez; uwa washanah hashemu‘ah, we’aHaraw bashanah hashemu‘ah, weHamas ba’arez, umosheil ‘al mosheil. 
jeremiah 51:47	lakhein hineih yamim ba’im, ufaqadti ‘al pesilei wawel, wekhal ’arzah teiwosh; wekhal Halaleha yipelu wetokhah. 
jeremiah 51:48	werinenu ‘al bawel shamayim wa’arez, wekhol ’asher bahem; ki mizafon yawo lah hashoddim ne’um yhoh. 
jeremiah 51:49	gam bawel linpol Halei yisra’eil; gam lewawel nafelu Halei khal ha’arez. 
jeremiah 51:50	peleiTim meiHerew, hilkhu ’al ta‘amodu; cikhru meiraHoq ’et yhoh, wirushalim ta‘aleh ‘al lewawkhem. 
jeremiah 51:51	boshenu ki shama‘nu Herpah, kissetah khelimah paneinu; ki ba’u carim, ‘al miqdeshei beit yhoh.
jeremiah 51:52	lakhein hineih yamim ba’im ne’um yhoh, ufaqadti ‘al pesileha; uwekhal ’arzah ye’enoq Halal. 
jeremiah 51:53	ki ta‘aleh wawel hashamayim, wekhi tewazeir merom ‘uccah; mei’iti, yawo’u shodedim lah ne’um yhoh.
jeremiah 51:54	qol ce‘aqah mibawel; weshewer gadol mei’erez kasdim. 
jeremiah 51:55	ki shodeid yhoh ’et bawel, we’ibad mimenah qol gadol; wehamu galeihem kemayim rabim, nitan she’on qolam. 
jeremiah 51:56	ki wa ‘aleha ‘al bawel shodeid, wenilkedu giboreha, Hitetah qashetotam; ki ’eil gemulot yhoh shaleim yeshaleim. 
jeremiah 51:57	wehishkarti sareha waHakhameha paHoteha useganeha wegiboreha, weyashenu shenat ‘olam welo yaqizu; ne’um hamelekh, yhoh zewa’ot shemo.
jeremiah 51:58	koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot, Homot bawel hareHawah ‘ar‘eir tit‘ar‘ar, ushe‘areha hagewohim ba’eish yizatu; weyig‘u ‘amim bedei riq ule’umim bedei ’eish weya‘eifu.
jeremiah 51:59	hadawar ’asher ziwwah yirmeyahu hanawi, ’et serayah wen neiriyah ben maHseiyah belekhto ’et zidqiyahu melekh yehudah bawel, bishnat harewi‘it lemalekho; userayah sar menuHah. 
jeremiah 51:60	wayikhtow yirmeyahu, ’eit kal hara‘ah ’asher tawo ’el bawel ’el seifer ’eHad; ’eit kal hadewarim ha’eileh, haketuwim ’el bawel. 
jeremiah 51:61	wayomer yirmeyahu ’el serayah; kewo’akha wawel, wera’ita, weqarata, ’eit kal hadewarim ha’eileh. 
jeremiah 51:62	we’amarta, yhoh ’atah dibarta ’el hamaqom hacceh lehakhrito, lewilti heyot bo yosheiw, lemei’adam we‘ad beheimah; ki shimot ‘olam tihyeh. 
jeremiah 51:63	wehayah kekhalotekha, liqro ’et hasseifer hacceh; tiqshor ‘alaw ’ewen, wehishlakhto ’el tokh perat. 
jeremiah 51:64	we’amarta, kakhah tishqa‘ bawel welo taqum mipenei hara‘ah, ’asher ’anokhi meiwi ‘aleha weya‘eifu; ‘ad heinah diwrei yirmeyahu.
jeremiah 52:1	ben ‘esrim we’aHat shanah zidqiyahu wemalekho, we’aHat ‘esreih shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, HamiTal HamuTal bat yirmeyahu miliwnah. 
jeremiah 52:2	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; kekhol ’asher ‘asah yehoyaqim. 
jeremiah 52:3	ki ‘al ’af yhoh hayetah birushalim wihudah, ‘ad hishlikho ’otam mei‘al panaw; wayimrod zidqiyahu bemelekh bawel. 
jeremiah 52:4	wayhi washanah hateshi‘it lemalekho, baHodesh ha‘asiri be‘asor laHodesh ba newukhadrezar melekh bawel hu wekhal Heilo ‘al yerushalim, wayaHanu ‘aleha; wayiwnu ‘aleha dayeiq sawiw. 
jeremiah 52:5	watawo ha‘ir bamazor; ‘ad ‘ashtei ‘esreih shanah, lamelekh zidqiyahu. 
jeremiah 52:6	baHodesh harewi‘i betish‘ah laHodesh, wayeHecaq hara‘aw ba‘ir; welo hayah leHem le‘am ha’arez. 
jeremiah 52:7	watibaqa‘ ha‘ir, wekhal ’anshei hamilHamah yiwreHu wayeize’u meiha‘ir laylah, derekh sha‘ar bein haHomotayim ’asher ‘al gan hamelekh, wekhasdim ‘al ha‘ir sawiw; wayeilekhu derekh ha‘arawah. 
jeremiah 52:8	wayirdefu Heil kasdim ’aHarei hamelekh, wayasigu ’et zidqiyahu be‘arwot yereiHo; wekhal Heilo, nafozu mei‘alaw. 
jeremiah 52:9	wayitpesu ’et hamelekh, waya‘alu ’oto ’el melekh bawel riwlatah be’erez Hamat; waydabeir ’ito mishpaTim. 
jeremiah 52:10	wayishHaT melekh bawel ’et benei zidqiyahu le‘einaw; wegam ’et kal sarei yehudah shaHaT beriwlatah. 
jeremiah 52:11	we’et ‘einei zidqiyahu ‘iwweir; waya’asreihu wanHushtayim, waywi’eihu melekh bawel bawelah, wayiteneihu weweit weit hapequdot ‘ad yom moto. 
jeremiah 52:12	uwaHodesh haHamishi be‘asor laHodesh, hi, shenat tesha‘ ‘esreih shanah, lamelekh newukhadrezar melekh bawel; ba, newucar’adan raw TabaHim, ‘amad lifnei melekh bawel birushalim. 
jeremiah 52:13	wayisrof ’et beit yhoh we’et beit hamelekh; we’eit kal batei yerushalim we’et kal beit hagadol saraf ba’eish. 
jeremiah 52:14	we’et kal Homot yerushalim sawiw; natezu kal Heil kasdim, ’asher ’et raw TabaHim. 
jeremiah 52:15	umidalot ha‘am we’et yeter ha‘am hanish’arim ba‘ir, we’et hanofelim ’asher nafelu ’el melekh bawel, we’eit yeter ha’amon; heglah newucar’adan raw TabaHim. 
jeremiah 52:16	umidalot ha’arez, hish’ir newucar’adan raw TabaHim; lekhoremim uleyogewim. 
jeremiah 52:17	we’et ‘amudei haneHoshet ’asher leweit yhoh we’et hamekhonot we’et yam haneHoshet ’asher beweit yhoh shiberu khasdim; wayis’u ’et kal neHushtam bawelah. 
jeremiah 52:18	we’et hassirot we’et haya‘im we’et hamcamerot we’et hamicraqot we’et hakapot, we’eit kal kelei haneHoshet ’asher yesharetu wahem laqaHu. 
jeremiah 52:19	we’et hassipim we’et hamaHtot we’et hamicraqot we’et hassirot we’et hamenorot, we’et hakapot we’et hamenaqiyot, ’asher cahaw cahaw, wa’asher kesef kasef; laqaH raw TabaHim. 
jeremiah 52:20	ha‘amudim shenayim, hayam ’eHad wehabaqar sheneim ‘asar neHoshet ’asher taHat hamekhonot, ’asher ‘asah hamelekh shelomoh leweit yhoh; lo hayah mishqal, linHushtam kal hakeilim ha’eileh. 
jeremiah 52:21	weha‘amudim, shemoneh ‘esreih ’amah qomah qomat ha‘amud ha’eHad, weHuT sheteim ‘esreih ’amah yesubenu; we‘aweyo ’arba‘ ’azba‘ot nawuw. 
jeremiah 52:22	wekhoteret ‘alaw neHoshet, weqomat hakoteret ha’aHat Hameish ’amot usewakhah werimonim ‘al hakoteret sawiw hakol neHoshet; wekha’eileh la‘amud hasheini werimonim. 
jeremiah 52:23	wayihyu harimonim, tish‘im weshishah ruHah; kal harimonim mei’ah ‘al hasewakhah sawiw. 
jeremiah 52:24	wayiqaH raw TabaHim, ’et serayah kohein harosh, we’et zefanyah kohein hamishneh; we’et sheloshet shomerei hassaf. 
jeremiah 52:25	umin ha‘ir laqaH saris ’eHad ’asher hayah faqid ‘al ’anshei hamilHamah, weshiw‘ah ’anashim meiro’ei fenei hamelekh ’asher nimze’u wa‘ir, we’eit, sofeir sar hazawa, hamazbi ’et ‘am ha’arez; weshishim ’ish mei‘am ha’arez, hanimze’im betokh ha‘ir. 
jeremiah 52:26	wayiqaH ’otam, newucar’adan raw TabaHim; wayolekh ’otam ’el melekh bawel riwlatah. 
jeremiah 52:27	wayakeh ’otam melekh bawel waymiteim beriwlah be’erez Hamat; wayigel yehudah mei‘al ’admato. 
jeremiah 52:28	ceh ha‘am, ’asher heglah newukhadrezar; bishnat shewa‘ yehudim sheloshet ’alafim we‘esrim usheloshah. 
jeremiah 52:29	bishnat shemoneh ‘esreih linwukhadrezar; mirushalim, nefesh shemoneh mei’ot sheloshim ushenayim. 
jeremiah 52:30	bishnat shalosh we‘esrim linwukhadrezar heglah, newucar’adan raw TabaHim, yehudim nefesh shewa‘ mei’ot ’arba‘im waHamishah; kal nefesh ’arba‘at ’alafim wesheish mei’ot.
jeremiah 52:31	wayhi wishloshim washewa‘ shanah, legalut yehoyakhin melekh yehudah, bishneim ‘asar Hodesh, be‘esrim waHamishah laHodesh; nasa ’ewil merodakh melekh bawel bishnat malkhuto, ’et rosh yehoyakhin melekh yehudah, wayozei ’oto mibeit hakeli hakelu. 
jeremiah 52:32	waydabeir ’ito Towot; wayitein ’et kis’o, mima‘al, lekhissei melakhim hamelakhim ’asher ’ito bewawel. 
jeremiah 52:33	weshinah ’eit bigdei khil’o; we’akhal leHem lefanaw tamid kal yemei Hayaw. 
jeremiah 52:34	wa’aruHato, ’aruHat tamid nitenah lo mei’eit melekh bawel dewar yom beyomo ‘ad yom moto; kol yemei Hayaw. 
ecekiel 1:1	wayhi bishloshim shanah, barewi‘i baHamishah laHodesh, wa’ani wetokh hagolah ‘al nehar kewar; nifteHu hashamayim, wa’er’eh mar’ot ’elohim. 
ecekiel 1:2	baHamishah laHodesh; hi hashanah haHamishit, legalut hamelekh yoyakhin. 
ecekiel 1:3	hayoh hayah dewar yhoh ’el yeHecqeil ben buci hakohein be’erez kasdim ‘al nehar kewar; watehi ‘alaw sham yad yhoh. 
ecekiel 1:4	wa’eire wehineih ruaH se‘arah ba’ah min hazafon, ‘anan gadol we’eish mitlaqaHat, wenogah lo sawiw; umitokhah, ke‘ein haHashmal mitokh ha’eish. 
ecekiel 1:5	umitokhah, demut ’arba‘ Hayot; weceh mar’eihen, demut ’adam laheinah. 
ecekiel 1:6	we’arba‘ah fanim le’eHat; we’arba‘ kenafayim le’aHat lahem. 
ecekiel 1:7	weragleihem regel yesharah; wekhaf ragleihem, kekhaf regel ‘eigel, wenozezim, ke‘ein neHoshet qalal. 
ecekiel 1:8	weyado widei ’adam, mitaHat kanfeihem, ‘al ’arba‘at riw‘eihem; ufeneihem wekhanfeihem le’arba‘tam. 
ecekiel 1:9	Howerot ’ishah ’el ’aHotah kanfeihem; lo yissabu welekhtan, ’ish ’el ‘eiwer panaw yeileikhu. 
ecekiel 1:10	udemut peneihem penei ’adam ufenei ’aryeih ’el hayamin le’arba‘tam, ufenei shor meihasemol le’arba‘tan; ufenei nesher le’arba‘tan. 
ecekiel 1:11	ufeneihem wekhanfeihem perudot milma‘elah; le’ish, tayim Howerot ’ish, ushetayim mekhassot, ’eit gewiyoteihenah 
ecekiel 1:12	we’ish ’el ‘eiwer panaw yeileikhu; ’el ’asher yihyeh shamah haruaH lalekhet yeileikhu, lo yissabu belekhtan. 
ecekiel 1:13	udemut haHayot mar’eihem kegaHalei ’eish, bo‘arot kemar’eih halapidim, hi mithalekhet bein haHayot; wenogah la’eish, umin ha’eish yozei waraq. 
ecekiel 1:14	wehaHayot razo washow; kemar’eih habacaq. 
ecekiel 1:15	wa’eire haHayot; wehineih ’ofan ’eHad ba’arez ’eizel haHayot le’arba‘at panaw. 
ecekiel 1:16	mar’eih ha’ofanim uma‘aseihem ke‘ein tarshish, udemut ’eHad le’arba‘tan; umar’eihem uma‘aseihem, ka’asher yihyeh ha’ofan betokh ha’ofan. 
ecekiel 1:17	‘al ’arba‘at riw‘eihen belekhtam yeileikhu; lo yissabu belekhtan. 
ecekiel 1:18	wegabeihen, wegowah lahem weyir’ah lahem; wegabotam, melei’ot ‘einayim sawiw le’arba‘tan. 
ecekiel 1:19	uwelekhet haHayot, yeilekhu ha’ofanim ’ezlam; uwehinasei haHayot mei‘al ha’arez, yinase’u ha’ofanim. 
ecekiel 1:20	‘al ’asher yihyeh sham haruaH lalekhet yeileikhu, shamah haruaH lalekhet; weha’ofanim, yinase’u le‘umatam, ki ruaH haHayah ba’ofanim. 
ecekiel 1:21	belekhtam yeileikhu, uwe‘amedam ya‘amodu; uwehinase’am mei‘al ha’arez, yinase’u ha’ofanim le‘umatam, ki ruaH haHayah ba’ofanim. 
ecekiel 1:22	udemut ‘al rashei haHayah raqia‘, ke‘ein haqeraH hanora; naTui ‘al rasheihem milma‘elah. 
ecekiel 1:23	wetaHat haraqia‘, kanfeihem yesharot, ’ishah ’el ’aHotah; le’ish, shetayim mekhassot laheinah, ule’ish, shetayim mekhassot laheinah, ’eit gewiyoteihem. 
ecekiel 1:24	wa’eshma‘ ’et qol kanfeihem keqol mayim rabim keqol shaday belekhtam, qol hamulah keqol maHaneh; be‘amedam terapenah khanfeihen. 
ecekiel 1:25	wayhi qol mei‘al laraqia‘ ’asher ‘al rosham; be‘amedam terapenah khanfeihen. 
ecekiel 1:26	umima‘al, laraqia‘ ’asher ‘al rosham, kemar’eih ’ewen sapir demut kissei; we‘al demut hakissei, demut kemar’eih ’adam ‘alaw milma‘elah. 
ecekiel 1:27	wa’eire ke‘ein Hashmal, kemar’eih ’eish beit lah sawiw, mimar’eih matenaw ulema‘elah; umimar’eih matenaw ulemaTah, ra’iti kemar’eih ’eish, wenogah lo sawiw. 
ecekiel 1:28	kemar’eih haqeshet ’asher yihyeh we‘anan beyom hageshem, kein mar’eih hanogah sawiw, hu mar’eih demut kewod yhoh; wa’er’eh wa’epol ‘al panay, wa’eshma‘ qol medabeir.
ecekiel 2:1	wayomer ’eilay; ben ’adam ‘amod ‘al raglekha, wa’adabeir ’otakh. 
ecekiel 2:2	watawo wi ruaH, ka’asher diber ’eilay, wata‘amideini ‘al raglay; wa’eshma‘ ’eit midabeir ’eilay.
ecekiel 2:3	wayomer ’eilay, ben ’adam sholeiaH ’ani ’otkha ’el benei yisra’eil, ’el goyim hamordim ’asher maredu wi; heimah wa’awotam pashe‘u wi, ‘ad ‘ezem hayom hacceh. 
ecekiel 2:4	wehabanim, qeshei fanim weHicqei leiw, ’ani sholeiaH ’otkha ’aleihem; we’amarta ’aleihem, koh ’amar ’adonay yhoh. 
ecekiel 2:5	weheimah ’im yishme‘u we’im yeHdalu, ki beit meri heimah; weyade‘u, ki nawi hayah wetokham.
ecekiel 2:6	we’atah wen ’adam ’al tira meihem umidiwreihem ’al tira, ki sarawim wesalonim ’otakh, we’el ‘aqrabim ’atah yosheiw; midiwreihem ’al tira umipeneihem ’al teiHat, ki beit meri heimah. 
ecekiel 2:7	wedibarta ’et dewaray ’aleihem, ’im yishme‘u we’im yeHdalu; ki meri heimah.
ecekiel 2:8	we’atah wen ’adam, shema‘ ’eit ’asher ’ani medabeir ’eilekha, ’al tehi meri keweit hameri; pezeih fikha, we’ekhol ’eit ’asher ’ani notein ’eilekha. 
ecekiel 2:9	wa’er’eh wehineih yad sheluHah ’eilay; wehineih wo megilat seifer. 
ecekiel 2:10	wayifros ’otah lefanay, wehi khetuwah panim we’aHor; wekhatuw ’eileha, qinim wahegeh wahi.
ecekiel 3:1	wayomer ’eilay, ben ’adam ’eit ’asher timza ’ekhol; ’ekhol ’et hamegilah haccot, weleikh dabeir ’el beit yisra’eil. 
ecekiel 3:2	wa’eftaH ’et pi; waya’akhileini, ’eit hamegilah haccot. 
ecekiel 3:3	wayomer ’eilay, ben ’adam biTnekha ta’akheil umei‘ekha temalei, ’eit hamegilah haccot, ’asher ’ani notein ’eilekha; wa’okhelah, watehi befi kidwash lematoq.
ecekiel 3:4	wayomer ’eilay; ben ’adam, lekh bo ’el beit yisra’eil, wedibarta widwaray ’aleihem. 
ecekiel 3:5	ki lo ’el ‘am ‘imqei safah wekhiwdei lashon ’atah shaluaH; ’el beit yisra’eil. 
ecekiel 3:6	lo ’el ‘amim rabim, ‘imqei safah wekhiwdei lashon, ’asher lo tishma‘ diwreihem; ’im lo ’aleihem shelaHtikha, heimah yishme‘u ’eilekha. 
ecekiel 3:7	uweit yisra’eil, lo yowu lishmoa‘ ’eilekha, ki ’einam ’owim lishmoa‘ ’eilay; ki kal beit yisra’eil, Hicqei meizaH uqeshei leiw heimah. 
ecekiel 3:8	hineih natati ’et panekha Hacaqim le‘umat peneihem; we’et mizHakha Hacaq le‘umat mizHam. 
ecekiel 3:9	keshamir Hacaq mizor natati mizHekha; lo tira ’otam welo teiHat mipeneihem, ki beit meri heimah.
ecekiel 3:10	wayomer ’eilay; ben ’adam ’et kal dewaray ’asher ’adabeir ’eilekha, qaH bilwawekha uwe’acenekha shema‘. 
ecekiel 3:11	weleikh bo ’el hagolah ’el benei ‘amekha, wedibarta ’aleihem we’amarta ’aleihem, koh ’amar ’adonay yhoh; ’im yishme‘u we’im yeHdalu. 
ecekiel 3:12	watisa’eini ruaH, wa’eshma‘ ’aHaray, qol ra‘ash gadol; barukh kewod yhoh mimeqomo. 
ecekiel 3:13	weqol kanfei haHayot, mashiqot ’ishah ’el ’aHotah, weqol ha’ofanim le‘umatam; weqol ra‘ash gadol. 
ecekiel 3:14	weruaH nesa’atni watiqaHeini; wa’eileikh mar baHamat ruHi, weyad yhoh ‘alay Hacaqah. 
ecekiel 3:15	wa’awo ’el hagolah teil ’awiw hayoshewim ’el nehar kewar wa’asher wa’eisheiw, heimah yoshewim sham; wa’eisheiw sham shiw‘at yamim mashmim betokham. 
ecekiel 3:16	wayhi miqzeih shiw‘at yamim; f wayhi dewar yhoh ’eilay leimor. 
ecekiel 3:17	ben ’adam zofeh netatikha leweit yisra’eil; weshama‘ta mipi dawar, wehicharta ’otam mimeni. 
ecekiel 3:18	be’ameri larasha‘ mot tamut, welo hicharto, welo dibarta lehachir rasha‘ midarko haresha‘ah leHayoto; hu rasha‘ ba‘awono yamut, wedamo miyadekha ’awaqeish. 
ecekiel 3:19	we’atah ki hicharta rasha‘, welo shaw meirish‘o, umidarko haresha‘ah; hu ba‘awono yamut, we’atah ’et nafshekha hizalta.
ecekiel 3:20	uweshuw zadiq mizidqo we‘asah ‘awel, wenatati mikhshol lefanaw hu yamut; ki lo hicharto beHaTato yamut, welo ticcakharna, zidqotaw ’asher ‘asah, wedamo miyadekha ’awaqeish. 
ecekiel 3:21	we’atah ki hicharto zadiq, lewilti HaTo zadiq wehu lo HaTa; Hayo yiHyeh ki nichar, we’atah ’et nafshekha hizalta.
ecekiel 3:22	watehi ‘alay sham yad yhoh; wayomer ’eilay, qum zei ’el habiq‘ah, wesham ’adabeir ’otakh. 
ecekiel 3:23	wa’aqum wa’eizei ’el habiq‘ah wehineih sham kewod yhoh ‘omeid, kakawod ’asher ra’iti ‘al nehar kewar; wa’epol ‘al panay. 
ecekiel 3:24	watawo wi ruaH, wata‘amideini ‘al raglay; waydabeir ’oti wayomer ’eilay, bo hissageir betokh beitekha. 
ecekiel 3:25	we’atah wen ’adam, hineih natenu ‘alekha ‘awotim, wa’asarukha bahem; welo teizei betokham. 
ecekiel 3:26	uleshonkha ’adbiq ’el Hikekha, wene’elamta, welo tihyeh lahem le’ish mokhiaH; ki beit meri heimah. 
ecekiel 3:27	uwedaberi ’otkha ’eftaH ’et pikha, we’amarta ’aleihem, koh ’amar ’adonay yhoh; hashomeia‘ yishma‘ weheHadeil yeHdal, ki beit meri heimah.
