psalms 138:8	yhoh yigmor ba‘adi yhoh Hasdekha le‘olam; ma‘asei yadekha ’al teref. 
psalms 139:1	lamnazeiaH ledawid micmor; yhoh Haqartani, wateida‘. 
psalms 139:2	’atah yada‘ta shiwti wequmi; bantah lerei‘i, meiraHoq. 
psalms 139:3	’areHi weriw‘i ceirita; wekhal derakhay hiskantah. 
psalms 139:4	ki ’ein milah bilshoni; hein yhoh yada‘ta khulah. 
psalms 139:5	’aHor waqedem zartani; watashet ‘alay kapekhah. 
psalms 139:6	pil’iyah peli’ah da‘at mimeni; nisgewah, lo ’ukhal lah. 
psalms 139:7	’anah ’eileikh meiruHekha; we’anah, mipanekha ’ewraH. 
psalms 139:8	’im ’essaq mayim sham ’atah; we’azi‘ah she’ol hineka. 
psalms 139:9	’esa khanfei shaHar; ’eshkenah, be’aHarit yam. 
psalms 139:10	gamosha m yadekha tanHeini; wetoHaceini yeminekha. 
psalms 139:11	wa’omar ’akh Hoshekh yeshufeini; welaylah, ’or ba‘adeini. 
psalms 139:12	gam Hoshekh lo yaHshikh mimekha welaylah kayom ya’ir; kaHasheikhah, ka’orah. 
psalms 139:13	ki ’atah qanita khilyotay; tesukeini, beweTen ’imi. 
psalms 139:14	’odkha, ‘al ki nora’ot, nifleiti nifla’im ma‘asekha; wenafshi, yoda‘at me’od. 
psalms 139:15	lo nikhHad ‘azemi, mimeka ’asher ‘useiti wasseiter; ruqamti, betaHtiyot ’arez. 
psalms 139:16	galemi ra’u ‘einekha, we‘al sifrekha kulam yikateiwu yamim yuzaru; welo welo ’eHad bahem. 
psalms 139:17	weli, mah yaqeru rei‘ekha ’eil; meh ‘azemu rasheihem. 
psalms 139:18	’espereim meiHol yirbun; heqizoti, we‘odi ‘imakh. 
psalms 139:19	’im tiqTol ’eloah rasha‘; we’anshei damim, suru meni. 
psalms 139:20	’asher yomerukha limcimah; nasu lashaw ‘arekha. 
psalms 139:21	halo mesan’ekha yhoh ’esna; uwitqomekha, ’etqoTaT. 
psalms 139:22	takhlit sin’ah seneitim; le’oywim, hayu li. 
psalms 139:23	Haqereini ’eil weda‘ lewawi; beHaneini, weda‘ sar‘apay. 
psalms 139:24	ure’eih, ’im derekh ‘ozew bi; uneHeini, bederekh ‘olam. 
psalms 140:1	lamnazeiaH, micmor ledawid. Halezeini yhoh mei’adam ra‘; mei’ish Hamasim tinzereini. 
psalms 140:2	’asher Hashewu ra‘ot beleiw; kal yom, yaguru milHamot. 
psalms 140:3	shananu leshonam kemo naHash Hamat ‘akhshuw; taHat sefateimo selah. 
psalms 140:4	shamereini yhoh midei rasha‘, mei’ish Hamasim tinzereini; ’asher Hashewu, lidHot pe‘amay. 
psalms 140:5	Tamenu gei’im paH li, waHawalim, paresu reshet leyad ma‘gal; moqeshim shatu li selah. 
psalms 140:6	’amarti yhoh ’eili ’atah; ha’acinah yhoh qol taHanunay. 
psalms 140:7	yhoh ’adonay ‘oc yeshu‘ati; sakotah leroshi, beyom nasheq. 
psalms 140:8	’al titein yhoh ma’awayei rasha‘; cemamo ’al tafeiq, yarumu selah. 
psalms 140:9	rosh mesibay; ‘amal sefateimo yekhassumo yekhasseimo 
psalms 140:10	yamiTu yimoTu ‘aleihem, geHalim ba’eish yapileim; bemahamorot, bal yaqumu. 
psalms 140:11	’ish lashon bal yikon ba’arez ’ish Hamas ra‘; yezudenu, lemadHeifot. 
psalms 140:12	yada‘ta yada‘ti, ki ya‘aseh yhoh din ‘ani; mishpaT, ’ewyonim. 
psalms 140:13	’akh zadiqim yodu lishmekha; yeishewu yesharim, ’et panekha. 
psalms 141:1	micmor, ledawid yhoh qeratikha Hushah li; ha’acinah qoli, beqare’i lakh. 
psalms 141:2	tikon tefilati qeToret lefanekha; mas’at kapay, minHat ‘arew. 
psalms 141:3	shitah yhoh shamerah lefi; nizerah, ‘al dal sefatay. 
psalms 141:4	’al taT libi ledawar ra‘ lehit‘oleil ‘alilot beresha‘, ’et ’ishim po‘alei ’awen; uwal ’elHam, beman‘ameihem. 
psalms 141:5	yehelmeini zadiq Hesed weyokhiHeini, shemen rosh ’al yani roshi; ki ‘od utefilati, bera‘oteihem. 
psalms 141:6	nishmeTu widei sela‘ shofeTeihem; weshame‘u ’amaray, ki na‘eimu. 
psalms 141:7	kemo foleiaH uwoqeia‘ ba’arez; nifceru ‘azameinu, lefi she’ol. 
psalms 141:8	ki ’eilekha yhoh ’adonay ‘einay; bekhah Hasiti, ’al te‘ar nafshi. 
psalms 141:9	shamereini, midei faH yaqeshu li; umoqeshot, po‘alei ’awen. 
psalms 141:10	yipelu wemakhmoraw resha‘im; yaHad ’anokhi, ‘ad ’e‘ewor. 
psalms 142:1	maskil ledawid; bihyoto wame‘arah tefilah. qoli ’el yhoh ’ec‘aq; qoli, ’el yhoh ’etHanan. 
psalms 142:2	’eshpokh lefanaw siHi; zarati, lefanaw ’agid. 
psalms 142:3	behit‘aTeif ‘alay ruHi, we’atah yada‘ta netiwati be’oraH cu ’ahaleikh; Tamenu faH li. 
psalms 142:4	habeiT yamin ure’eih we’ein li makir ’awad manos mimeni; ’ein doreish lenafshi. 
psalms 142:5	ca‘aqti ’eilekha, yhoh ’amarti ’atah maHsi; Helqi, be’erez haHayim. 
psalms 142:6	haqshiwah ’el rinati ki daloti me’od hazileini meirodefay; ki ’amezu mimeni. 
psalms 142:7	hozi’ah mimasgeir nafshi lehodot ’et shemekha bi yakhtiru zadiqim; ki tigmol ‘alay. 
psalms 143:1	micmor, ledawid yhoh shema‘ tefilati, ha’acinah ’el taHanunay; be’emunatekha ‘aneini, bezidqatekha. 
psalms 143:2	we’al tawo wemishpaT ’et ‘awdekha; ki lo yizdaq lefanekha khal Hay. 
psalms 143:3	ki radaf ’oyeiw nafshi, dika la’arez Hayati; hoshiwani wemaHashakim, kemeitei ‘olam. 
psalms 143:4	watit‘aTeif ‘alay ruHi; betokhi, yishtomeim libi. 
psalms 143:5	cakharti yamim miqedem, hagiti wekhal pa‘olekha; bema‘aseih yadekha ’asoHeiaH. 
psalms 143:6	peirasti yaday ’eilekha; nafshi ke’erez ‘ayeifah lekha selah. 
psalms 143:7	maheir ‘aneini yhoh kaletah ruHi ’al tasteir panekha mimeni; wenimshalti, ‘im yoredei wor. 
psalms 143:8	hashmi‘eini waboqer Hasdekha ki wekha waTaHeti hodi‘eini, derekh cu ’eileikh; ki ’eilekha nasati nafshi. 
psalms 143:9	hazileini mei’oyeway yhoh ’eilekha khissiti. 
psalms 143:10	lamedeini la‘asot rezonekha ki ’atah ’elohay ruHakha Towah; tanHeini, be’erez mishor. 
psalms 143:11	lema‘an shimkha yhoh teHayeini; bezidqatekha tozi mizarah nafshi. 
psalms 143:12	uweHasdekha tazmit ’oyeway weha’awadta kal zorarei nafshi; ki, ’ani ‘awdekha. 
psalms 144:1	ledawid barukh yhoh zuri, hamlameid yaday laqraw; ’ezbe‘otay, lamilHamah. 
psalms 144:2	Hasdi umezudati misgabi umefalTi li magini uwo Hasiti; harodeid ‘ami taHtay. 
psalms 144:3	yhoh mah ’adam wateida‘eihu; ben ’enosh, wateHasheweihu. 
psalms 144:4	’adam lahewel damah; yamaw, kezeil ‘oweir. 
psalms 144:5	yhoh haT shamekha weteireid; ga‘ beharim weye‘eshanu. 
psalms 144:6	beroq baraq utefizeim; shelaH Hizekha, utehumeim. 
psalms 144:7	shelaH yadekha, mimarom pezeini wehazileini mimayim rabim; miyad, benei neikhar. 
psalms 144:8	’asher pihem diber shaw; wiminam, yemin shaqer. 
psalms 144:9	’elohim, shir Hadash ’ashirah lakh; beneiwel ‘asor, ’acamerah lakh. 
psalms 144:10	hanotein teshu‘ah, lamelakhim hapozeh ’et dawid ‘awdo, meiHerew ra‘ah. 
psalms 144:11	pezeini wehazileini miyad benei neikhar ’asher pihem diber shaw; wiminam, yemin shaqer. 
psalms 144:12	’asher baneinu kinTi‘im megudalim bin‘ureihem benoteinu khecawiyot; meHuTawot, tawnit heikhal. 
psalms 144:13	mecaweinu melei’im mefiqim miccan, ’el can zoneinu ma’alifot merubawot, beHuzoteinu. 
psalms 144:14	’alufeinu, mesubalim ’ein perez we’ein yozeit; we’ein zewaHah, birHowoteinu. 
psalms 144:15	’ashrei ha‘am shekakhah lo; ’ashrei ha‘am, yhoh ’elohaw. 
psalms 145:1	tehilah, ledawid ’aromimkha ’elohay hamelekh; wa’awarakhah mekha, le‘olam wa‘ed. 
psalms 145:2	bekhal yom ’awarakheka; wa’ahalah mekha, le‘olam wa‘ed. 
psalms 145:3	gadol yhoh umehulal me’od; weligdulato, ’ein Heiqer. 
psalms 145:4	dor ledor yeshabaH ma‘asekha; ugewurotekha yagidu. 
psalms 145:5	hadar kewod hodekha; wediwrei nifle’otekha ’asiHah. 
psalms 145:6	we‘ecuc nor’otekha yomeiru; ugedulotekha ugedulatekha ’asaperenah. 
psalms 145:7	ceikher raw Tuwekha yabi‘u; wezidqatekha yeraneinu. 
psalms 145:8	Hanun weraHum yhoh; ’erekh ’apayim, ugedal Hased. 
psalms 145:9	Tow yhoh lakol; weraHamaw, ‘al kal ma‘asaw. 
psalms 145:10	yodukha yhoh kal ma‘asekha; waHasidekha, yewarakhukhah. 
psalms 145:11	kewod malkhutekha yomeiru; ugewuratekha yedabeiru. 
psalms 145:12	lehodia‘ liwnei ha’adam gewurotaw; ukhewod, hadar malkhuto. 
psalms 145:13	malkhutekha, malkhut kal ‘olamim; umemsheltekha, bekhal dor wador. 
psalms 145:14	someikh yhoh lekhal hanofelim; wecoqeif, lekhal hakefufim. 
psalms 145:15	‘einei khol ’eilekha yesabeiru; we’atah notein lahem ’et ’akhelam be‘ito. 
psalms 145:16	poteiaH ’et yadekha; umasbia‘ lekhal Hay razon. 
psalms 145:17	zadiq yhoh bekhal derakhaw; weHasid, bekhal ma‘asaw. 
psalms 145:18	qarow yhoh lekhal qore’aw; lekhol ’asher yiqra’uhu we’emet. 
psalms 145:19	rezon yerei’aw ya‘aseh; we’et shaw‘atam yishma‘, weyoshi‘eim. 
psalms 145:20	shomeir yhoh ’et kal ’ohawaw; we’eit kal haresha‘im yashmid. 
psalms 145:21	tehilat yhoh yedaber pi wiwareikh kal basar sheim qadesho, le‘olam wa‘ed. 
psalms 146:1	halu yah hali nafshi, ’et yhoh. 
psalms 146:2	’ahalah yhoh beHayay; ’acamerah leilohay be‘odi. 
psalms 146:3	’al tiwTeHu windiwim; bewen ’adam she’ein lo teshu‘ah. 
psalms 146:4	teizei ruHo yashuw le’admato; bayom hahu, ’awedu ‘eshtonotaw. 
psalms 146:5	’ashrei, she’eil ya‘aqow be‘ecro; wero, ‘al yhoh ’elohaw. 
psalms 146:6	‘oseh shamayim wa’arez, ’et hayam we’et kal ’asher bam; hashomeir ’emet le‘olam. 
psalms 146:7	‘oseh mishpaT la‘ashuqim, notein leHem lare‘eiwim; yhoh matir ’asurim. 
psalms 146:8	yhoh poqeiaH ‘iwrim, yhoh coqeif kefufim; yhoh ’oheiw zadiqim. 
psalms 146:9	yhoh shomeir ’et geirim, yatom we’almanah ye‘odeid; wederekh resha‘im ye‘awweit. 
psalms 146:10	yimlokh yhoh le‘olam, ’elohayikh ziyon ledor wador, halu yah. 
psalms 147:1	halu yah ki Tow camerah ’eloheinu; ki na‘im nawah tehilah. 
psalms 147:2	boneih yerushalim yhoh; nidHei yisra’eil yekhaneis. 
psalms 147:3	harofei lishwurei leiw; umeHabeish, le‘azewotam. 
psalms 147:4	moneh mispar lakokhawim; lekhulam, sheimot yiqra. 
psalms 147:5	gadol ’adoneinu weraw koaH; litwunato, ’ein mispar. 
psalms 147:6	me‘odeid ‘anawim yhoh; mashpil resha‘im ‘adei ’arez. 
psalms 147:7	‘enu yhoh betodah; cameru leiloheinu wekhinor. 
psalms 147:8	hamkhasseh shamayim be‘awim, hameikhin la’arez maTar; hamazmiaH harim Hazir. 
psalms 147:9	notein liwheimah laHmah; liwnei ‘oreiw, ’asher yiqra’u. 
psalms 147:10	lo wigwurat hassus yeHpaz; lo weshoqei ha’ish yirzeh. 
psalms 147:11	rozeh yhoh ’et yerei’aw; ’et hamyaHalim leHasdo. 
psalms 147:12	shabeHi yerushalim ’et yhoh; hali ’elohayikh ziyon. 
psalms 147:13	ki Hiccaq beriHei she‘arayikh; beirakh banayikh beqirbeikh. 
psalms 147:14	hasam gewuleikh shalom; Heilew HiTim, yasbi‘eikh. 
psalms 147:15	hasholeiaH ’imrato ’arez; ‘ad meheirah, yaruz dewaro. 
psalms 147:16	hanotein sheleg kazamer; kefor, ka’eifer yefacceir. 
psalms 147:17	mashlikh qarHo khefitim; lifnei qarato, mi ya‘amod. 
psalms 147:18	yishlaH dewaro weyamseim; yasheiw ruHo, yiccelu mayim. 
psalms 147:19	magid dewaro dewaraw leya‘aqow; Huqaw umishpaTaw, leyisra’eil. 
psalms 147:20	lo ‘asah khein lekhal go, umishpaTim bal yeda‘um, halu yah. 
psalms 148:1	halu yah halu ’et yhoh min hashamayim; haluhu, bameromim. 
psalms 148:2	haluhu khal mal’akhaw; haluhu, kal zewa’o zewa’aw. 
psalms 148:3	haluhu shemesh weyareiaH; haluhu, kal kokhwei ’or. 
psalms 148:4	haluhu shemei hashamayim; wehamayim, ’asher mei‘al hashamayim. 
psalms 148:5	yehalu ’et sheim yhoh; ki hu ziwwah weniwra’u. 
psalms 148:6	waya‘amideim la‘ad le‘olam; Haq natan, welo ya‘awor. 
psalms 148:7	halu ’et yhoh min ha’arez; taninim, wekhal tehomot. 
psalms 148:8	’eish uwarad sheleg weqiTor; ruaH se‘arah, ‘osah dewaro. 
psalms 148:9	heharim wekhal gewa‘ot; ‘eiz peri, wekhal ’aracim. 
psalms 148:10	haHayah wekhal beheimah; remes, wezipor kanaf. 
psalms 148:11	malkhei ’erez wekhal le’umim; rim, wekhal shofeTei ’arez. 
psalms 148:12	baHurim wegam betulot; ceqeinim, ‘im ne‘arim. 
psalms 148:13	yehalu ’et sheim yhoh ki nisgaw shemo lewado; hodo, ‘al ’erez weshamayim. 
psalms 148:14	wayarem qeren le‘amo tehilah lekhal Hasidaw, liwnei yisra’eil ‘am qerowo, halu yah. 
psalms 149:1	halu yah shiru yhoh shir Hadash; tehilato, biqhal Hasidim. 
psalms 149:2	yismaH yisra’eil be‘osaw; benei ziyon, yagilu wemalkam. 
psalms 149:3	yehalu shemo wemaHol; betof wekhinor, yecameru lo. 
psalms 149:4	ki rozeh yhoh be‘amo; yefa’eir ‘anawim, bishu‘ah. 
psalms 149:5	ya‘lecu Hasidim bekhawod; yeranenu, ‘al mishkewotam. 
psalms 149:6	romot ’eil bigronam; weHerew pifiyot beyadam. 
psalms 149:7	la‘asot neqamah bagoyim; tokheiHot, bal ’umim. 
psalms 149:8	le’sor malkheihem beciqim; wenikhbedeihem, bekhawlei warcel. 
psalms 149:9	la‘asot bahem mishpaT katuw, hadar hu lekhal Hasidaw, halu yah. 
psalms 150:1	halu yah halu ’eil beqadesho; haluhu, birqia‘ ‘ucco. 
psalms 150:2	haluhu wigwurotaw; haluhu, kerow gudlo. 
psalms 150:3	haluhu beteiqa‘ shofar; haluhu, beneiwel wekhinor. 
psalms 150:4	haluhu wetof umaHol; haluhu, beminim we‘ugaw. 
psalms 150:5	haluhu wezilzelei shama‘; haluhu, bezilzelei teru‘ah. 
psalms 150:6	kol haneshamah tehaleil yah, halu yah. 
proverbs 1:1	mishlei shelomoh wen dawid; melekh, yisra’eil. 
proverbs 1:2	lada‘at Hakhmah umusar; lehawin, ’imrei winah. 
proverbs 1:3	laqaHat musar haskeil; zedeq umishpaT, umeisharim. 
proverbs 1:4	lateit liftayim ‘aremah; lena‘ar, da‘at umecimah. 
proverbs 1:5	yishma‘ Hakham weyosef leqaH; wenawon, taHbulot yiqneh. 
proverbs 1:6	lehawin mashal umelizah; diwrei Hakhamim, weHidotam. 
proverbs 1:7	yir’at yhoh reishit da‘at; Hakhmah umusar, ’ewilim bacu.
proverbs 1:8	shema‘ beni musar ’awikha; we’al tiTosh, torat ’imekha. 
proverbs 1:9	ki liwyat Hein heim leroshekha; wa‘anaqim, legargerotekha. 
proverbs 1:10	beni ’im yefatukha HaTa’im, ’al towei. 
proverbs 1:11	’im yomeru lekhah ’itanu ne’erwah ledam; nizpenah lenaqi Hinam. 
proverbs 1:12	niwla‘eim kish’ol Hayim; utemimim, keyordei wor. 
proverbs 1:13	kal hon yaqar nimza; nemalei wateinu shalal. 
proverbs 1:14	goralekha tapil betokheinu; kis ’eHad, yihyeh lekhulanu. 
proverbs 1:15	beni, ’al teileikh bederekh ’itam; mena‘ raglekha, minetiwatam. 
proverbs 1:16	ki ragleihem lara‘ yaruzu; wimaharu, lishpakh dam. 
proverbs 1:17	ki Hinam mecorah harashet; be‘einei, khal ba‘al kanaf. 
proverbs 1:18	weheim ledamam ye’erowu; yizpenu, lenafshotam. 
proverbs 1:19	kein, ’areHot kal bozeia‘ baza‘; ’et nefesh be‘alaw yiqaH.
proverbs 1:20	Hakhemot baHuz taronah; bareHowot, titein qolah. 
proverbs 1:21	berosh homiyot, tiqra befitHei she‘arim ba‘ir, ’amareha tomeir. 
proverbs 1:22	‘ad matay petayim te’eihawu feti weleizim, lazon Hamedu lahem; ukhesilim, yisne’u da‘at. 
proverbs 1:23	tashuwu, letokhaHti hineih ’abi‘ah lakhem ruHi; ’odi‘ah dewaray ’etkhem. 
proverbs 1:24	ya‘an qarati watema’einu; naTiti yadi, we’ein maqshiw. 
proverbs 1:25	watifre‘u khal ‘azati; wetokhaHti, lo ’awitem. 
proverbs 1:26	gam ’ani be’eidekhem ’esHaq; ’el‘ag, bewo faHdekhem. 
proverbs 1:27	bewo khesha’awah khesho’ah paHdekhem, we’eidekhem kesufah ye’eteh; bewo ‘aleikhem, zarah wezuqah. 
proverbs 1:28	’ac yiqra’uni welo ’e‘eneh; yeshaHaruni, welo yimza’uni. 
proverbs 1:29	taHat ki sane’u da‘at; weyir’at yhoh lo waHaru. 
proverbs 1:30	lo ’awu la‘azati; na’azu, kal tokhaHti. 
proverbs 1:31	weyokhelu miperi darkam; umimo‘azoteihem yisba‘u. 
proverbs 1:32	ki meshuwat petayim tahargeim; weshalwat kesilim te’abedeim. 
proverbs 1:33	weshomeia‘ li yishkan beTaH; wesha’anan, mipaHad ra‘ah.
proverbs 2:1	beni ’im tiqaH ’amaray; umizwotay, tizpon ’itakh. 
proverbs 2:2	lehaqshiw laHakhemah ’acenekha; taTeh libekha, latewunah. 
proverbs 2:3	ki ’im labinah tiqra; latewunah, titein qolekha. 
proverbs 2:4	’im tewaqshenah khakasef; wekhamaTmonim taHpesenah. 
proverbs 2:5	’ac, tawin yir’at yhoh; weda‘at ’elohim timza. 
proverbs 2:6	ki yhoh yitein Hakhmah mipiw, da‘at utewunah. 
proverbs 2:7	wezafan yizpon laysharim tushiyah; magein, leholekhei tom. 
proverbs 2:8	linzor ’areHot mishpaT; wederekh Hasido Hasidaw yishmor. 
proverbs 2:9	’ac, tawin zedeq umishpaT; umeisharim, kal ma‘gal Tow. 
proverbs 2:10	ki tawo Hakhmah welibekha; weda‘at, lenafshekha yin‘am. 
proverbs 2:11	mecimah tishmor ‘alekha, tewunah tinzerekah. 
proverbs 2:12	lehazilekha miderekh ra‘; mei’ish, medabeir tahpukhot. 
proverbs 2:13	ha‘ocewim ’areHot yosher; lalekhet, bedarkhei Hoshekh. 
proverbs 2:14	hasemeiHim la‘asot ra‘; yagilu, betahpukhot ra‘. 
proverbs 2:15	’asher ’areHoteihem ‘iqeshim; unelocim, bema‘gelotam. 
proverbs 2:16	lehazilekha mei’ishah carah; minakheriyah, ’amareha heHeliqah. 
proverbs 2:17	ha‘ocewet ’aluf ne‘ureha; we’et berit ’eloheha shakheiHah. 
proverbs 2:18	ki shaHah ’el mawet beitah; we’el refa’im, ma‘geloteha. 
proverbs 2:19	kal ba’eha lo yeshuwun; welo yasigu, ’areHot Hayim. 
proverbs 2:20	lema‘an, teileikh bederekh Towim; we’areHot zadiqim tishmor. 
proverbs 2:21	ki yesharim yishkenu ’arez; utemimim, yiwwateru wah. 
proverbs 2:22	uresha‘im mei’erez yikareitu; uwogdim, yisseHu mimenah.
proverbs 3:1	beni torati ’al tishkaH; umizwotay, yizor libekha. 
proverbs 3:2	ki ’orekh yamim ushenot Hayim; weshalom, yosifu lakh. 
proverbs 3:3	Hesed we’emet, ’al ya‘acwukha qashereim ‘al gargerotekha; kateweim, ‘al luaH libekha. 
proverbs 3:4	umeza Hein weseikhel Tow; be‘einei ’elohim we’adam.
proverbs 3:5	beTaH ’el yhoh bekhal libekha; we’el binatekha, ’al tisha‘ein. 
proverbs 3:6	bekhal derakhekha da‘eihu; wehu, yeyasheir ’oreHotekha. 
proverbs 3:7	’al tehi Hakham be‘einekha; yera ’et yhoh wesur meira‘. 
proverbs 3:8	rif’ut tehi lesharekha; weshiqui, le‘azmotekha. 
proverbs 3:9	kabeid ’et yhoh meihonekha; umeireishit, kal tewu’atekha. 
proverbs 3:10	weyimale’u ’asamekha sawa‘; wetirosh, yeqawekha yifrozu.
proverbs 3:11	musar yhoh beni ’al tim’as; we’al taqoz, betokhaHto. 
proverbs 3:12	ki ’et ’asher ye’ehaw yhoh yokhiaH; ukhe’aw, ’et bein yirzeh. 
proverbs 3:13	’ashrei ’adam maza Hakhmah we’adam, yafiq tewunah. 
proverbs 3:14	ki Tow saHrah misseHar kasef; umeiHaruz, tewu’atah. 
proverbs 3:15	yeqarah hi mipeniyim mipeninim; wekhal Hafazekha, lo yishwu wah. 
proverbs 3:16	’orekh yamim biminah; bismolah, ‘osher wekhawod. 
proverbs 3:17	derakheha darkhei no‘am; wekhal netiwoteha shalom. 
proverbs 3:18	‘eiz Hayim hi lamaHaciqim bah; wetomekheha me’ushar.
proverbs 3:19	yhoh beHakhemah yasad ’arez; konein mayim, bitwunah. 
proverbs 3:20	beda‘to tehomot niwqa‘u; usheHaqim, yir‘afu Tal. 
proverbs 3:21	beni ’al yalucu mei‘einekha; nezor tushiyah, umecimah. 
proverbs 3:22	weyihyu Hayim lenafshekha; weHein, legargerotekha. 
proverbs 3:23	’ac teileikh laweTaH darkekha; weraglekha, lo tigof. 
proverbs 3:24	’im tishkaw lo tifHad; weshakhawta, we‘arewah shenatekha. 
proverbs 3:25	’al tira mipaHad pit’om; umisho’at resha‘im, ki tawo. 
proverbs 3:26	ki yhoh yihyeh wekhislekha; weshamar raglekha milakhed. 
proverbs 3:27	’al timna‘ Tow mibe‘alaw; bihyot le’eil yadekha yadekha la‘asot. 
proverbs 3:28	’al tomar lerei‘ekha lerei‘akha leikh washuw umaHar ’etein, weyeish ’itakh. 
proverbs 3:29	’al taHarosh ‘al rei‘akha ra‘ah; wehu yosheiw laweTaH ’itakh. 
proverbs 3:30	’al tarow tariw ‘im ’adam Hinam; ’im lo gemalekha ra‘ah. 
proverbs 3:31	’al teqanei be’ish Hamas; we’al tiwHar, bekhal derakhaw. 
proverbs 3:32	ki to‘awat yhoh naloc; we’et yesharim sodo. 
proverbs 3:33	me’eirat yhoh beweit rasha‘; uneweih zadiqim yewareikh. 
proverbs 3:34	’im laleizim hu yaliz; wela‘aniyim wela‘anawim, yiten Hein. 
proverbs 3:35	kawod Hakhamim yinHalu; ukhesilim, meirim qalon.
proverbs 4:1	shim‘u wanim musar ’aw; wehaqshiwu, lada‘at binah. 
proverbs 4:2	ki leqaH Tow natati lakhem; torati, ’al ta‘acowu. 
proverbs 4:3	ki wein hayiti le’awi; rakh weyaHid, lifnei ’imi. 
proverbs 4:4	wayoreini, wayomer li, yitmakh dewaray libekha; shemor mizwotay weHyeih. 
proverbs 4:5	qeneih Hakhmah qeneih winah; ’al tishkaH we’al teiT, mei’imrei fi. 
proverbs 4:6	’al ta‘acweha wetishmereka; ’ehaweha wetizereka. 
proverbs 4:7	reishit Hakhmah qeneih Hakhmah uwekhal qinyanekha, qeneih winah. 
proverbs 4:8	salseleha uteromeka; tekhabeidekha, ki teHabeqenah. 
proverbs 4:9	titein leroshekha liwyat Hein; ‘aTeret tif’eret temageneka. 
proverbs 4:10	shema‘ beni weqaH ’amaray; weyirbu lekha, shenot Hayim. 
proverbs 4:11	bederekh Hakhmah horeitikha; hidrakhtikha, bema‘gelei yosher. 
proverbs 4:12	belekhtekha lo yeizar za‘adekha; we’im taruz, lo tikasheil. 
proverbs 4:13	haHaceiq bamusar ’al teref; nizereha, ki hi Hayekha. 
proverbs 4:14	be’oraH resha‘im ’al tawo; we’al te’asheir, bederekh ra‘im. 
proverbs 4:15	pera‘eihu ’al ta‘awar bo; seTeih mei‘alaw wa‘awor. 
proverbs 4:16	ki lo yishnu ’im lo yarei‘u; wenigcelah natam, ’im lo yikhsholu yakhshilu. 
proverbs 4:17	ki laHamu leHem resha‘; weyein Hamasim yishtu. 
proverbs 4:18	we’oraH zadiqim ke’or nogah; holeikh wa’or, ‘ad nekhon hayom. 
proverbs 4:19	derekh resha‘im ka’afeilah; lo yade‘u, bameh yikasheilu.
proverbs 4:20	beni lidwaray haqshiwah; la’amaray, haT ’acenekha. 
proverbs 4:21	’al yalicu mei‘einekha; mereim, betokh lewawekha. 
proverbs 4:22	ki Hayim heim lemoze’eihem; ulekhal besaro marpei. 
proverbs 4:23	mikal mishmar nezor libekha; ki mimenu, toz’ot Hayim. 
proverbs 4:24	haseir mimekha ‘iqeshut peh; ulecut fatayim, harHeiq mimeka. 
proverbs 4:25	‘einekha lenokhaH yabiTu; we‘af‘apekha, yayshiru negdekha. 
proverbs 4:26	paleis ma‘gal raglekha; wekhal derakhekha yikonu. 
proverbs 4:27	’al teiT yamin usemol; haseir raglekha meira‘. 
proverbs 5:1	beni leHakhemati haqshiwah; litwunati, haT ’acenekha. 
proverbs 5:2	lishmor mecimot; weda‘at, sefatekha yinzoru. 
proverbs 5:3	ki nofet tiTofenah siftei carah; weHalaq mishemen Hikah. 
proverbs 5:4	we’aHaritah marah khala‘anah; Hadah, keHerew piyot. 
proverbs 5:5	ragleha yoredot mawet; ’ol, ze‘adeha yitmokhu. 
proverbs 5:6	’oraH Hayim pen tefaleis; na‘u ma‘geloteha, lo teida‘.
proverbs 5:7	we‘atah wanim shim‘u li; we’al tasuru, mei’imrei fi. 
proverbs 5:8	harHeiq mei‘aleha darkekha; we’al tiqraw, ’el petaH beitah. 
proverbs 5:9	pen titein la’aHeirim hodekha; ushenotekha, le’akhcari. 
proverbs 5:10	pen yisbe‘u carim koHekha; wa‘azawekha, beweit nakheri. 
proverbs 5:11	wenahamta we’aHaritekha; bikhlot besarekha, ushe’eirekha. 
proverbs 5:12	we’amarta, ’eikh saneiti musar; wetokhaHat, na’az libi. 
proverbs 5:13	welosha ma‘ti beqol moray; welimlameday, lo hiTiti ’aceni. 
proverbs 5:14	kim‘aT hayiti wekhal ra‘; betokh qahal we‘eidah. 
proverbs 5:15	sheteih mayim miborekha; wenocelim, mitokh be’eirekha. 
proverbs 5:16	yafuzu ma‘yenotekha Huzah; bareHowot, palgei mayim. 
proverbs 5:17	yihyu lekha lewadekha; we’ein lecarim ’itakh. 
proverbs 5:18	yehi meqorkha warukh; usemaH, mei’eishet ne‘urekha. 
proverbs 5:19	’ayelet ’ahawim, weya‘alat Hein dadeha yerawwukha wekhal ‘eit; be’ahawatah, tishgeh tamid. 
proverbs 5:20	welamah tishgeh weni wecarah; uteHabeiq, Heiq nakheriyah. 
proverbs 5:21	ki nokhaH ‘einei yhoh darkhei ’ish; wekhal ma‘gelotaw mefaleis. 
proverbs 5:22	‘awonotaw, yilkeduno ’et harasha‘; uweHawlei HaTato, yitameikh. 
proverbs 5:23	hu, yamut be’ein musar; uwerow ’iwwalto yishgeh.
proverbs 6:1	beni ’im ‘arawta lerei‘ekha; taqa‘ta laccar kapekha. 
proverbs 6:2	noqashta we’imrei fikha; nilkadta, be’imrei fikha. 
proverbs 6:3	‘aseih cot ’eifo beni wehinazeil, ki wata wekhaf rei‘ekha; leikh hitrapeis, urehaw rei‘ekha. 
proverbs 6:4	’al titein sheinah le‘einekha; utenumah, le‘af‘apekha. 
proverbs 6:5	hinazeil kizwi miyad; ukhezipor, miyad yaqush.
proverbs 6:6	leikh ’el nemalah ‘azeil; re’eih derakheha waHakham. 
proverbs 6:7	’asher ’ein lah qazin, shoTeir umosheil. 
proverbs 6:8	takhin baqayiz laHmah; ’agerah waqazir, ma’akhalah. 
proverbs 6:9	‘ad matay ‘azeil tishkaw; matay, taqum mishenatekha. 
proverbs 6:10	me‘aT not me‘aT tenumot; me‘aT Hibuq yadayim lishkaw. 
proverbs 6:11	uwa khimhaleikh reishekha; umaHsorekha, ke’ish magein.
proverbs 6:12	’adam beliya‘al ’ish ’awen; holeikh, ‘iqeshut peh. 
proverbs 6:13	qoreiz be‘einaw moleil beraglaw; moreh, be’ezbe‘otaw. 
proverbs 6:14	tahpukhot belibo, Horeish ra‘ bekhal ‘eit; medanim midyanim yeshaleiaH. 
proverbs 6:15	‘al kein, pit’om yawo ’eido; peta‘ yishaweir, we’ein marpei.
proverbs 6:16	shesh heinah sanei yhoh; weshewa‘, to‘awot to‘awat nafsho. 
proverbs 6:17	‘einayim ramot leshon shaqer; weyadayim, shofekhot dam naqi. 
proverbs 6:18	leiw, Horeish maHshewot ’awen; raglayim memaharot, laruz lara‘ah. 
proverbs 6:19	yafiaH kecawim ‘eid shaqer; umeshaleiaH medanim, bein ’aHim.
proverbs 6:20	nezor beni mizwat ’awikha; we’al tiTosh, torat ’imekha. 
proverbs 6:21	qashereim ‘al libekha tamid; ‘anedeim, ‘al gargerotekha. 
proverbs 6:22	behithalekhkha tanHeh ’otakh, beshakhebekha tishmor ‘alekha; wahaqizota, hi tesiHekha. 
proverbs 6:23	ki neir mizwah wetorah ’or; wederekh Hayim, tokhHot musar. 
proverbs 6:24	lishmarekha mei’eishet ra‘; meiHelqat, lashon nakheriyah. 
proverbs 6:25	’al taHmod yafeyah bilwawekha; we’al tiqaHakha, be‘af‘apeha. 
proverbs 6:26	ki we‘ad ’ishah conah, ‘ad kikar laHem we’eishet ’ish; nefesh yeqarah tazud.
proverbs 6:27	hayaHteh ’ish ’eish beHeiqo; uwegadaw, lo tisarafnah. 
proverbs 6:28	’im yehaleikh ’ish ‘al hageHalim; weraglaw, lo tikawenah. 
proverbs 6:29	kein, haba ’el ’eishet rei‘eihu; lo yinaqeh, kal hanogeia‘ bah. 
proverbs 6:30	lo yawucu laganaw ki yignow; lemalei nafsho, ki yir‘aw. 
proverbs 6:31	wenimza yeshaleim shiw‘atayim; ’et kal hon beito yitein. 
proverbs 6:32	no’eif ’ishah Hasar leiw; mashHit nafsho, hu ya‘asenah. 
proverbs 6:33	nega‘ weqalon yimza; weHerpato, lo timaHeh. 
proverbs 6:34	ki qin’ah Hamat gawer; welo yaHmol, beyom naqam. 
proverbs 6:35	lo yisa penei khal kofer; welo yoweh, ki tarbeh shoHad.
proverbs 7:1	beni shemor ’amaray; umizwotay, tizpon ’itakh.

proverbs 7:4	’emor laHakhemah ’aHoti ’at; umoda‘, labinah tiqra. 
proverbs 7:5	lishmarekha mei’ishah carah; minakheriyah, ’amareha heHeliqah. 
proverbs 7:6	ki beHalon beiti; be‘ad ’eshnabi nishqafeti. 
proverbs 7:7	wa’eire wapetayim, ’awinah wabanim, na‘ar Hasar leiw. 
proverbs 7:8	‘oweir bashuq ’eizel pinah; wederekh beitah yiz‘ad. 
proverbs 7:9	beneshef be‘erew yom; be’ishon laylah, wa’afeilah. 
proverbs 7:10	wehineih ’ishah liqrato; shit conah, unezurat leiw. 
proverbs 7:11	homiyah hi wesoraret; beweitah, lo yishkenu ragleha. 
proverbs 7:12	pa‘am baHuz, pa‘am bareHowot; we’eizel kal pinah te’erow. 
proverbs 7:13	weheHeciqah bo wenasheqah lo; hei‘eicah faneha, watomar lo. 
proverbs 7:14	ciwHei shelamim ‘alay; hayom, shilamti nedaray. 
proverbs 7:15	‘al kein yazati liqratekha; leshaHeir panekha, wa’emza’eka. 
proverbs 7:16	marwadim rawadti ‘arsi; HaTuwot, ’eiTun mizrayim. 
proverbs 7:17	nafti mishkawi; mor ’ahalim, weqinamon.

proverbs 10:1	mishlei, shelomoh f bein Hakham yesamaH ’aw; uwein kesil, tugat ’imo. 
proverbs 10:2	lo yo‘ilu ’ozrot resha‘; uzedaqah, tazil mimawet. 
proverbs 10:3	lo yar‘iw yhoh nefesh zadiq; wehawwat resha‘im yehdof. 
proverbs 10:4	rash, ‘oseh khaf remiyah; weyad Haruzim ta‘ashir. 
proverbs 10:5	’ogeir baqayiz bein maskil; nirdam baqazir, bein meiwish. 
proverbs 10:6	berakhot lerosh zadiq; ufi resha‘im, yekhasseh Hamas. 
proverbs 10:7	ceikher zadiq liwrakhah; wesheim resha‘im yirqaw. 
proverbs 10:8	Hakham leiw yiqaH mizwot; we’ewil fatayim, yilaweiT. 
proverbs 10:9	holeikh batom yeilekh beTaH; ume‘aqeish derakhaw, yiwwadeia‘. 
proverbs 10:10	qoreiz ‘ayin yitein ‘azawet; we’ewil fatayim, yilaweiT. 
proverbs 10:11	meqor Hayim pi zadiq; ufi resha‘im, yekhasseh Hamas. 
proverbs 10:12	ne’ah te‘oreir medanim; we‘al kal pesha‘im, tekhasseh ’ahawah. 
proverbs 10:13	besiftei nawon timazei Hakhmah wesheiweT, legeiw Hasar leiw. 
proverbs 10:14	Hakhamim yizpenu da‘at; ufi ’ewil meHitah qerowah. 
proverbs 10:15	hon ‘ashir qiryat ‘ucco; meHitat dalim reisham. 
proverbs 10:16	pe‘ulat zadiq leHayim; tewu’at rasha‘ leHaTat. 
proverbs 10:17	’oraH leHayim shomeir musar; we‘oceiw tokhaHat mat‘eh. 
proverbs 10:18	mekhasseh ne’ah siftei shaqer; umozi dibah, hu khesil. 
proverbs 10:19	berow dewarim lo yeHdal pasha‘; weHoseikh sefataw maskil. 
proverbs 10:20	kesef niwHar leshon zadiq; leiw resha‘im kim‘aT. 
proverbs 10:21	siftei zadiq yir‘u rabim; we’ewilim, baHasar leiw yamutu. 
proverbs 10:22	birkat yhoh hi ta‘ashir; welo yosif ‘ezew ‘imah. 
proverbs 10:23	kisHoq likhsil ‘asot cimah; weHakhemah, le’ish tewunah. 
proverbs 10:24	megorat rasha‘ hi tewo’enu; weta’awat zadiqim yitein. 
proverbs 10:25	ka‘awor sufah we’ein rasha‘; wezadiq, yesod ‘olam. 
proverbs 10:26	kaHomez lashinayim, wekhe‘ashan la‘einayim; kein he‘azeil, lesholeHaw. 
proverbs 10:27	yir’at yhoh tosif yamim; ushenot resha‘im tiqzorenah. 
proverbs 10:28	toHelet zadiqim simHah; wetiqwat resha‘im toweid. 
proverbs 10:29	ma‘oc latom derekh yhoh; umeHitah, lefo‘alei ’awen. 
proverbs 10:30	zadiq le‘olam bal yimoT; uresha‘im, lo yishkenu ’arez. 
proverbs 10:31	pi zadiq yanuw Hakhmah uleshon tahpukhot, tikareit. 
proverbs 10:32	siftei zadiq yeide‘un razon; ufi resha‘im, tahpukhot. 
proverbs 11:1	mocenei mirmah to‘awat yhoh; we’ewen sheleimah rezono. 
proverbs 11:2	ba cadon wayawo qalon; we’et zenu‘im Hakhmah 
proverbs 11:3	tumat yesharim tanHeim; weselef bogdim weshadam yeshadeim. 
proverbs 11:4	lo yo‘il hon beyom ‘ewrah; uzedaqah, tazil mimawet. 
proverbs 11:5	zidqat tamim teyasheir darko; uwerish‘ato, yipol rasha‘. 
proverbs 11:6	zidqat yesharim tazileim; uwehawwat, bogedim yilakheidu. 
proverbs 11:7	bemot ’adam rasha‘ towad tiqwah; wetoHelet ’onim ’awadah. 
proverbs 11:8	zadiq mizarah neHelaz; wayawo rasha‘ taHtaw. 
proverbs 11:9	befeh, Haneif yashHit rei‘eihu; uweda‘at, zadiqim yeiHaleizu. 
proverbs 11:10	beTuw zadiqim ta‘aloz qiryah; uwa’awod resha‘im rinah. 
proverbs 11:11	bewirkat yesharim tarum qaret; uwefi resha‘im, teihareis. 
proverbs 11:12	bac lerei‘eihu Hasar leiw; we’ish tewunot yaHarish. 
proverbs 11:13	holeikh rakhil megaleh sod; wene’eman ruaH, mekhasseh dawar. 
proverbs 11:14	be’ein taHbulot yipal ‘am; uteshu‘ah, berow yo‘eiz. 
proverbs 11:15	ra‘ yeiroa‘ ki ‘araw car; wesonei toqe‘im boTeiaH. 
proverbs 11:16	’eishet Hein titmokh kawod; we‘arizim, yitmekhu ‘osher. 
proverbs 11:17	gomeil nafsho ’ish Hased; we‘okheir ’eiro, ’akhcari. 
proverbs 11:18	rasha‘, ‘oseh fe‘ulat shaqer; wecoreia‘ zedaqah, sekher ’emet. 
proverbs 11:19	kein zedaqah leHayim; umeradeif ra‘ah lemoto. 
proverbs 11:20	to‘awat yhoh ‘iqeshei leiw; urezono, temimei darekh. 
proverbs 11:21	yad leyad lo yinaqeh ra‘; wecera‘ zadiqim nimlaT. 
proverbs 11:22	necem cahaw be’af Hacir; ’ishah yafah, wesarat Ta‘am. 
proverbs 11:23	ta’awat zadiqim ’akh Tow; tiqwat resha‘im ‘ewrah. 
proverbs 11:24	yeish mefacceir wenosaf ‘od; weHoseikh miyosher, ’akh lemaHsor. 
proverbs 11:25	nefesh berakhah tedushan; umarweh, gam hu yore. 
proverbs 11:26	moneia‘ bar yiqewuhu le’om; uwerakhah, lerosh mashbir. 
proverbs 11:27	shoHeir Tow yewaqeish razon; wedoreish ra‘ah tewo’enu. 
proverbs 11:28	boTeiaH be‘ashero hu yipol; wekhe‘aleh, zadiqim yifraHu. 
proverbs 11:29	‘okheir beito yinHal ruaH; we‘ewed ’ewil, laHakham leiw. 
proverbs 11:30	peri zadiq ‘eiz Hayim; weloqeiaH nefasot Hakham. 
proverbs 11:31	hein zadiq ba’arez yeshulam; ’af, ki rasha‘ weHoTei. 
proverbs 12:1	’oheiw musar ’oheiw da‘at; wesonei tokhaHat ba‘ar. 
proverbs 12:2	Tow, yafiq razon yhoh; we’ish mecimot yarshia‘. 
proverbs 12:3	lo yikon ’adam beresha‘; weshoresh zadiqim, bal yimoT. 
proverbs 12:4	’eishet Hayil ‘aTeret ba‘lah; ukheraqaw be‘azmotaw mewishah. 
proverbs 12:5	maHshewot zadiqim mishpaT; taHbulot resha‘im mirmah. 
proverbs 12:6	diwrei resha‘im ’eraw dam; ufi yesharim, yazileim. 
proverbs 12:7	hafokh resha‘im we’einam; uweit zadiqim ya‘amod. 
proverbs 12:8	lefisi khelo yehulal ’ish; wena‘aweih leiw, yihyeh lawuc. 
proverbs 12:9	Tow niqleh we‘ewed lo; mimetakabeid, waHasar laHem. 
proverbs 12:10	yodeia‘ zadiq nefesh behemto; weraHamei resha‘im, ’akhcari. 
proverbs 12:11	‘oweid ’admato yisba‘ laHem; umeradeif reiqim Hasar leiw. 
proverbs 12:12	Hamad rasha‘ mezod ra‘im; weshoresh zadiqim yitein. 
proverbs 12:13	befesha‘ fatayim moqeish ra‘; wayeizei mizarah zadiq. 
proverbs 12:14	miperi fi ’ish yisba‘ Tow; ugemul yedei ’adam, yashuw yashiw lo. 
proverbs 12:15	derekh ’ewil yashar be‘einaw; weshomeia‘ le‘eizah Hakham. 
proverbs 12:16	’ewil, bayom yiwwada‘ ka‘so; wekhoseh qalon ‘arum. 
proverbs 12:17	yafiaH ’emunah yagid zedeq; we‘eid sheqarim mirmah. 
proverbs 12:18	yeish boTeh kemadqerot Harew; uleshon Hakhamim marpei. 
proverbs 12:19	sefat ’emet tikon la‘ad; we‘ad ’argi‘ah, leshon shaqer. 
proverbs 12:20	mirmah belew Horeshei ra‘; uleyo‘azei shalom simHah. 
proverbs 12:21	lo ye’uneh lazadiq kal ’awen; uresha‘im, male’u ra‘. 
proverbs 12:22	to‘awat yhoh siftei shaqer; we‘osei ’emunah rezono. 
proverbs 12:23	’adam ‘arum koseh da‘at; weleiw kesilim, yiqra ’iwwelet. 
proverbs 12:24	yad Haruzim timshol; uremiyah, tihyeh lamas. 
proverbs 12:25	de’agah welew ’ish yashHenah; wedawar Tow yesameHenah. 
proverbs 12:26	yateir meirei‘eihu zadiq; wederekh resha‘im tat‘eim. 
proverbs 12:27	lo yaHarokh remiyah zeido; wehon ’adam yaqar Haruz. 
proverbs 12:28	be’oraH zedaqah Hayim; wederekh netiwah ’al mawet. 
proverbs 13:1	bein Hakham musar ’aw; weleiz, lo shama‘ ge‘arah. 
proverbs 13:2	miperi fi ’ish yokhal Tow; wenefesh bogedim Hamas. 
proverbs 13:3	nozeir piw shomeir nafsho; poseiq fataw, meHitah lo. 
proverbs 13:4	mit’awwah wa’ayin nafsho ‘azeil; wenefesh Haruzim tedushan. 
proverbs 13:5	dewaroshe qer yisna zadiq; werasha‘, yaw’ish weyaHpir. 
proverbs 13:6	zedaqah tizor tam darekh; werish‘ah, tesaleif HaTat. 
proverbs 13:7	yeish mit‘asheir we’ein kol; mitrosheish, wehon raw. 
proverbs 13:8	kofer nefesh ’ish ‘ashero; werash, lo shama‘ ge‘arah. 
proverbs 13:9	’or zadiqim yismaH; weneir resha‘im yid‘akh. 
proverbs 13:10	raq becadon yitein mazah; we’et no‘azim Hakhmah 
proverbs 13:11	hon meihewel yim‘aT; weqoweiz ‘al yad yarbeh. 
proverbs 13:12	toHelet memushakhah maHalah leiw; we‘eiz Hayim, ta’awah wa’ah. 
proverbs 13:13	bac ledawar yeiHawel lo; wirei mizwah, hu yeshulam. 
proverbs 13:14	torat Hakham meqor Hayim; lasur, mimoqeshei mawet. 
proverbs 13:15	seikhel Tow yiten Hein; wederekh bogedim ’eitan. 
proverbs 13:16	kal ‘arum ya‘aseh weda‘at; ukhesil, yifros ’iwwelet. 
proverbs 13:17	mal’akh rasha‘ yipol bera‘; wezir ’emunim marpei. 
proverbs 13:18	reish weqalon poreia‘ musar; weshomeir tokhaHat yekhubad. 
proverbs 13:19	ta’awah nihyah te‘eraw lenafesh; weto‘awat kesilim, sur meira‘. 
proverbs 13:20	halokh holeikh ’et Hakhamim waHakham yeHkam; wero‘eh khesilim yeiroa‘. 
proverbs 13:21	HaTa’im teradeif ra‘ah; we’et zadiqim, yeshalem Tow. 
proverbs 13:22	Tow, yanHil benei wanim; wezafun lazadiq, Heil HoTei. 
proverbs 13:23	raw ’okhel nir rashim; weyeish nispeh, belo mishpaT. 
proverbs 13:24	Hoseikh weTo sonei weno; we’ohawo, shiHaro musar. 
proverbs 13:25	zadiq, ’okheil lesowa‘ nafsho; uweTen resha‘im teHsar.
proverbs 14:1	Hakhmot nashim banetah weitah; we’iwwelet, beyadeha tehersenu. 
proverbs 14:2	holeikh beyashero yerei yhoh; uneloc derakhaw boceihu. 
proverbs 14:3	befi ’ewil HoTer ga’awah; wesiftei Hakhamim, tishmureim. 
proverbs 14:4	be’ein ’alafim ’eiwus bar; weraw tewu’ot, bekhoaH shor. 
proverbs 14:5	‘eid ’emunim lo yekhacceiw; weyafiaH kecawim, ‘eid shaqer. 
proverbs 14:6	biqesh leiz Hakhmah wa’ayin; weda‘at lenawon naqal. 
proverbs 14:7	leikh mineged le’ish kesil; uwal yada‘ta, siftei da‘at. 
proverbs 14:8	Hakhemat ‘arum hawin darko; we’iwwelet kesilim mirmah. 
proverbs 14:9	’ewilim yaliz ’asham; uwein yesharim razon. 
proverbs 14:10	leiw, yodeia‘ marat nafsho; uwesimHato, lo yit‘araw car. 
proverbs 14:11	beit resha‘im yishameid; we’ohel yesharim yafriaH. 
proverbs 14:12	yeish derekh yashar lifnei ’ish; we’aHaritah, darkhei mawet. 
proverbs 14:13	gam bisHoq yikh’aw leiw; we’aHaritah simHah tugah. 
proverbs 14:14	miderakhaw yisba‘ sug leiw; umei‘alaw, ’ish Tow. 
proverbs 14:15	peti ya’amin lekhal dawar; we‘arum, yawin la’ashuro. 
proverbs 14:16	Hakham yarei wesar meira‘; ukhesil, mit‘abeir uwoTeiaH. 
proverbs 14:17	qezar ’apayim ya‘aseh ’iwwelet; we’ish mecimot, yisanei. 
proverbs 14:18	naHalu fetayim ’iwwelet; wa‘arumim, yakhtiru da‘at. 
proverbs 14:19	shaHu ra‘im lifnei Towim; uresha‘im, ‘al sha‘arei zadiq. 
proverbs 14:20	gam lerei‘eihu yisanei rash; we’ohawei ‘ashir rabim. 
proverbs 14:21	bac lerei‘eihu HoTei; umeHonein ‘anayim ‘anawim ’ashraw. 
proverbs 14:22	halo yit‘u Horeshei ra‘; weHesed we’emet, Horeshei Tow. 
proverbs 14:23	bekhal ‘ezew yihyeh motar; udewars fatayim, ’akh lemaHsor. 
proverbs 14:24	‘aTeret Hakhamim ‘asheram; ’iwwelet kesilim ’iwwelet. 
proverbs 14:25	mazil nefashot ‘eid ’emet; weyafiaH kecawim mirmah. 
proverbs 14:26	beyir’at yhoh miwTaH ‘oc; ulewanaw, yihyeh maHseh. 
proverbs 14:27	yir’at yhoh meqor Hayim; lasur, mimoqeshei mawet. 
proverbs 14:28	beraw ‘am hadrat melekh; uwe’efes le’om, meHitat racon. 
proverbs 14:29	’erekh ’apayim raw tewunah; uqezar ruaH, meirim ’iwwelet. 
proverbs 14:30	Hayei wesarim leiw marpei; ureqaw ‘azamot qin’ah. 
proverbs 14:31	‘osheiq dal Heireif ‘oseihu; umekhabedo, Honein ’ewyon. 
proverbs 14:32	bera‘ato yidaHeh rasha‘; weHoseh wemoto zadiq. 
proverbs 14:33	beleiw nawon tanuaH Hakhmah uweqerew kesilim, tiwwadeia‘. 
proverbs 14:34	zedaqah teromeim go; weHesed le’umim HaTat. 
proverbs 14:35	rezon melekh le‘ewed maskil; we‘ewrato, tihyeh meiwish. 
proverbs 15:1	ma‘aneh rakh yashiw Heimah; udewar ‘ezew, ya‘aleh ’af. 
proverbs 15:2	leshon Hakhamim teiTiw da‘at; ufi khesilim, yabia‘ ’iwwelet. 
proverbs 15:3	bekhal maqom ‘einei yhoh; zofot, ra‘im wTowim 
proverbs 15:4	marpei lashon ‘eiz Hayim; weselef bah, shewer beruaH. 
proverbs 15:5	’ewil, yin’az musar ’awiw; weshomeir tokhaHat ya‘rim. 
proverbs 15:6	beit zadiq Hosen raw; uwitwu’at rasha‘ ne‘karet. 
proverbs 15:7	siftei Hakhamim yecaru da‘at; weleiw kesilim lo khein. 
proverbs 15:8	cewaH resha‘im to‘awat yhoh; utefilat yesharim rezono. 
proverbs 15:9	to‘awat yhoh derekh rasha‘; umeradeif zedaqah ye’ehaw. 
proverbs 15:10	musar ra‘ le‘oceiw ’oraH; sonei tokhaHat yamut. 
proverbs 15:11	she’ol wa’awadon neged yhoh; ’af, ki libot benei ’adam. 
proverbs 15:12	lo ye’ehaw leiz hokheiaH lo; ’el Hakhamim, lo yeileikh. 
proverbs 15:13	leiw meiaH yeiTiw panim; uwe‘azewat leiw ruaH nekhei’ah. 
proverbs 15:14	leiw nawon yewaqesh da‘at; ufenei ufi khesilim, yir‘eh ’iwwelet. 
proverbs 15:15	kal yemei ‘ani ra‘im; weTow leiw, mishteh tamid. 
proverbs 15:16	Tow me‘aT beyir’at yhoh; mei’ozar raw, umehumah wo. 
proverbs 15:17	Tow ’aruHat yaraq we’ahawah sham; mishor ’awus, wesin’ah wo. 
proverbs 15:18	’ish Heimah yegareh madon; we’erekh ’apayim, yashqiT riw. 
proverbs 15:19	derekh ‘azeil kimsukhat Hadeq; we’oraH yesharim selulah. 
proverbs 15:20	bein Hakham yesamaH ’aw; ukhesil ’adam, boceh ’imo. 
proverbs 15:21	’iwwelet simHah laHasar leiw; we’ish tewunah, yeyasher lakhet. 
proverbs 15:22	hafeir maHashawot be’ein sod; uwerow yo‘azim taqum. 
proverbs 15:23	simHah la’ish bema‘aneih fiw; wedawar be‘ito mah Tow. 
proverbs 15:24	’oraH Hayim lema‘lah lemaskil; lema‘an sur, mishe’ol maTah. 
proverbs 15:25	beit gei’im yissaH yhoh; weyazeiw, gewul ’almanah. 
proverbs 15:26	to‘awat yhoh maHshewot ra‘; uTehorim, ’imrei no‘am. 
proverbs 15:27	‘okheir beito bozeia‘ baza‘; wesonei matanot yiHyeh. 
proverbs 15:28	leiw zadiq yehgeh la‘anot; ufi resha‘im, yabia‘ ra‘ot. 
proverbs 15:29	raHoq yhoh meiresha‘im; utefilat zadiqim yishma‘. 
proverbs 15:30	me’or ‘einayim yesamaH leiw; shemu‘ah Towah, tedashen ‘azem. 
proverbs 15:31	’ocen, shoma‘at tokhaHat Hayim; beqerew Hakhamim talin. 
proverbs 15:32	poreia‘ musar mo’eis nafsho; weshomeia‘ tokhaHat, qoneh leiw. 
proverbs 15:33	yir’at yhoh musar Hakhmah welifnei khawod ‘anawah. 
proverbs 16:1	le’adam ma‘arkhei leiw; yhoh ma‘aneih lashon. 
proverbs 16:2	kal darkhei ’ish cakh be‘einaw; wetokhein ruHot yhoh. 
proverbs 16:3	gol ’el yhoh ma‘asekha; weyikonu, maHshewotekha. 
proverbs 16:4	kol pa‘al yhoh lama‘aneihu; wegam rasha‘, leyom ra‘ah. 
proverbs 16:5	to‘awat yhoh kal gewah leiw; yad leyad, lo yinaqeh. 
proverbs 16:6	beHesed we’emet yekhupar ‘awon; uweyir’at yhoh sur meira‘. 
proverbs 16:7	birzot yhoh darkhei ’ish; gam ’oywaw, yashlim ’ito. 
proverbs 16:8	Tow me‘aT bizdaqah; meirow tewu’ot, belo mishpaT. 
proverbs 16:9	leiw ’adam yeHasheiw darko; yhoh yakhin za‘ado. 
proverbs 16:10	qesem ‘al siftei melekh; bemishpaT, lo yim‘al piw. 
proverbs 16:11	peles umocenei mishpaT yhoh; ma‘aseihu, kal ’awnei khis. 
proverbs 16:12	to‘awat melakhim ‘asot resha‘; ki wizdaqah, yikon kissei. 
proverbs 16:13	rezon melakhim siftei zedeq; wedoweir yesharim ye’ehaw. 
proverbs 16:14	Hamat melekh mal’akhei mawet; we’ish Hakham yekhaperenah. 
proverbs 16:15	be’or penei melekh Hayim; urezono, ke‘aw malqosh. 
proverbs 16:16	qenoh Hakhmah mah Tow meiHaruz; uqenot binah, niwHar mikasef. 
proverbs 16:17	mesilat yesharim sur meira‘; shomeir nafsho, nozeir darko. 
proverbs 16:18	lifnei shewer ga’on; welifnei khishalon, gowah ruaH. 
proverbs 16:19	Tow shefal ruaH ’et ‘aniyim ‘anawim; meiHaleiq lal, ’et gei’im. 
proverbs 16:20	maskil ‘al dawar yimza Tow; uwoTeiaH yhoh ’ashraw. 
proverbs 16:21	laHakham leiw yiqarei nawon; umeteq fatayim, yosif leqaH. 
proverbs 16:22	meqor Hayim seikhel be‘alaw; umusar ’ewilim ’iwwelet. 
proverbs 16:23	leiw Hakham yaskil pihu; we‘als fataw, yosif leqaH. 
proverbs 16:24	zuf dewash ’imrei no‘am; matoq lanefesh umarpei la‘azem. 
proverbs 16:25	yeish derekh yashar lifnei ’ish; we’aHaritah, darkhei mawet. 
proverbs 16:26	nefesh ‘ameil ‘amelah lo; ki ’akhaf ‘alaw pihu. 
proverbs 16:27	’ish beliya‘al koreh ra‘ah; we‘al sefataw fato, ke’eish zarawet. 
proverbs 16:28	’ish tahpukhot yeshalaH madon; wenirgan, mafrid ’aluf. 
proverbs 16:29	’ish Hamas yefateh rei‘eihu; weholikho, bederekh lo Tow. 
proverbs 16:30	‘ozeh ‘einaw laHshow tahpukhot; qoreiz fataw, kilah ra‘ah. 
proverbs 16:31	‘aTeret tif’eret seiwah; bederekh zedaqah, timazei. 
proverbs 16:32	Tow ’erekh ’apayim migibor; umosheil beruHo, milokheid ‘ir. 
proverbs 16:33	baHeiq yuTal ’et hagoral; yhoh kal mishpaTo. 
proverbs 17:1	Tow pat Hareiwah weshalwah wah; mibayit, malei ciwHei riw. 
proverbs 17:2	‘ewed maskil, yimshol bewein meiwish; uwetokh ’aHim, yaHaloq naHalah. 
proverbs 17:3	mazreif lakesef wekhur laccahaw; uwoHein libot yhoh. 
proverbs 17:4	meira‘ maqshiw ‘al sefat ’awen; sheqer meicin ‘al leshon hawwot. 
proverbs 17:5	lo‘eig larash Heireif ‘oseihu; sameiaH le’eid, lo yinaqeh. 
proverbs 17:6	‘aTeret ceqeinim benei wanim; wetif’eret banim ’awotam. 
proverbs 17:7	lo nawah lenawal sefat yeter; ’af, ki lenadiw sefat shaqer. 
proverbs 17:8	’ewen Hein hashoHad be‘einei we‘alaw; ’el kal ’asher yifneh yaskil. 
proverbs 17:9	mekhasseh pesha‘ mewaqeish ’ahawah; weshoneh wedawar, mafrid ’aluf. 
proverbs 17:10	teiHat ge‘arah wemeiwin; meihakot kesil mei’ah. 
proverbs 17:11	’akh meri yewaqesh ra‘; umal’akh ’akhcari, yeshulaH bo. 
proverbs 17:12	pagosh dow shakul be’ish; we’al kesil, be’iwwalto. 
proverbs 17:13	meishiw ra‘ah taHat Towah; lo tamish tamush ra‘ah, mibeito. 
proverbs 17:14	poTeir mayim reishit madon; welifnei hitgala‘, hariw neTosh. 
proverbs 17:15	mazdiq rasha‘ umarshia‘ zadiq; to‘awat yhoh gam sheneihem. 
proverbs 17:16	lamah ceh meHir beyad kesil; liqnot Hakhmah welew ’ayin. 
proverbs 17:17	bekhal ‘eit ’oheiw hareia‘; we’aH lezarah, yiwwaleid. 
proverbs 17:18	’adam Hasar leiw toqeia‘ kaf; ‘oreiw ‘arubah, lifnei rei‘eihu. 
proverbs 17:19	’oheiw pesha‘ ’oheiw mazah; magbiah pitHo, mewaqesh shawer. 
proverbs 17:20	‘iqesh leiw lo yimza Tow; wenehpakh bilshono, yipol bera‘ah. 
proverbs 17:21	yoleid kesil letugah lo; welo yismaH, ’awi nawal. 
proverbs 17:22	leiw meiaH yeiTiw geihah; weruaH nekhei’ah, teyabesh garem. 
proverbs 17:23	shoHad meiHeiq rasha‘ yiqaH; lehaTot, ’areHot mishpaT. 
proverbs 17:24	’et penei meiwin Hakhmah we‘einei khesil, biqzeih ’arez. 
proverbs 17:25	ka‘as le’awiw bein kesil; umemer, leyoladto. 
proverbs 17:26	gam ‘anosh lazadiq lo Tow; lehakot nediwim ‘al yosher. 
proverbs 17:27	Hoseikh ’amaraw yodeia‘ da‘at; weqar yeqar  ’ish tewunah. 
proverbs 17:28	gam ’ewil maHarish Hakham yeiHasheiw; ’oTeim sefataw nawon. 
proverbs 18:1	leta’awah yewaqeish nifrad; bekhal tushiyah, yitgala‘. 
proverbs 18:2	lo yaHpoz kesil bitwunah; ki, ’im behitgalot libo. 
proverbs 18:3	bewo rasha‘ ba gam buc; we‘im qalon Herpah. 
proverbs 18:4	mayim ‘amuqim diwrei fi ’ish; naHal noweia‘, meqor Hakhmah 
proverbs 18:5	se’eit penei rasha‘ lo Tow; lehaTot zadiq, bamishpaT. 
proverbs 18:6	siftei khesil yawo’u weriw; ufiw, lemahalumot yiqra. 
proverbs 18:7	pi khesil meHitah lo; usefataw, moqeish nafsho. 
proverbs 18:8	diwrei nirgan kemitlahamim; weheim, yaredu Hadrei waTen. 
proverbs 18:9	gam mitrapeh wimlakhto; ’aH hu, lewa‘al mashHit. 
proverbs 18:10	migdal ‘oc sheim yhoh; bo yaruz zadiq wenisgaw. 
proverbs 18:11	hon ‘ashir qiryat ‘ucco; ukheHomah nisgawah, bemaskito. 
proverbs 18:12	lifneishe wer yigbah leiw ’ish; welifnei khawod ‘anawah. 
proverbs 18:13	meishiw dawar beTerem yishma‘; ’iwwelet hi lo, ukhelimah. 
proverbs 18:14	ruaH ’ish yekhalkeil maHaleihu; weruaH nekhei’ah, mi yisa’enah. 
proverbs 18:15	leiw nawon yiqneh da‘at; we’ocen Hakhamim, tewaqesh da‘at. 
proverbs 18:16	matan ’adam yarHiw lo; welifnei gedolim yanHenu. 
proverbs 18:17	zadiq harishon beriwo; yawo uwa  waHaqaro. 
proverbs 18:18	midyanim yashbit hagoral; uwein ‘azumim yafrid. 
proverbs 18:19	’aH, nifsha‘ miqiryat ‘oc; umedonim umidyanim, kiwriaH ’armon. 
proverbs 18:20	miperi fi ’ish tisba‘ biTno; tewu’at sefataw yisba‘. 
proverbs 18:21	mawet weHayim beyad lashon; we’ohaweha, yokhal piryah. 
proverbs 18:22	maza ’ishah maza Tow; wayafeq razon, yhoh. 
proverbs 18:23	taHanunim yedaber rash; we‘ashir, ya‘aneh ‘accot. 
proverbs 18:24	’ish rei‘im lehitro‘eia‘; weyeish ’oheiw, daweiq mei’aH. 
proverbs 19:1	Tow rash holeikh betumo; mei‘iqeish fataw, wehu khesil. 
proverbs 19:2	gam belo da‘at nefesh lo Tow; we’az beraglayim HoTei. 
proverbs 19:3	’iwwelet ’adam tesaleif darko; we‘al yhoh yic‘af libo. 
proverbs 19:4	hon, yosif rei‘im rabim; wedal, meirei‘hu yipareid. 
proverbs 19:5	‘eid qarim lo yinaqeh; weyafiaH kecawim, lo yimaleiT. 
proverbs 19:6	rabim yeHalu fenei nadiw; wekhal hareia‘, le’ish matan. 
proverbs 19:7	kal ’aHei rash senei’uhu, ’af ki merei‘eihu raHaqu mimenu; meradeif ’amarim lo lo heimah. 
proverbs 19:8	qoneh leiw ’oheiw nafsho; shomeir tewunah, limzo Tow. 
proverbs 19:9	‘eid qarim lo yinaqeh; weyafiaH kecawim yoweid.
proverbs 19:10	lo naweh likhsil ta‘anug; ’af, ki le‘ewed meshol besarim. 
proverbs 19:11	seikhel ’adam he’erikh ’apo; wetif’arto, ‘awor ‘al pasha‘. 
proverbs 19:12	naham kakefir ca‘af melekh; ukheTal ‘al ‘eisew rezono. 
proverbs 19:13	hawwot le’awiw bein kesil; wedelef Toreid, midyenei ’ishah. 
proverbs 19:14	bayit wahon naHalat ’awot; yhoh ’ishah maskalet. 
proverbs 19:15	‘azlah tapil tardeimah; wenefesh remiyah tir‘aw. 
proverbs 19:16	shomeir mizwah shomeir nafsho; boceih derakhaw yumat yamut. 
proverbs 19:17	malweih yhoh Honein dal; ugemulo, yeshalem lo. 
proverbs 19:18	yasseir binkha ki yeish tiqwah; we’el hamito, ’al tisa nafshekha. 
proverbs 19:19	goral gedal Heimah nosei ‘onesh; ki ’im tazil, we‘od tosif. 
proverbs 19:20	shema‘ ‘eizah weqabeil musar; lema‘an, teHkam be’aHaritekha. 
proverbs 19:21	rabot maHashawot belew ’ish; wa‘azat yhoh hi taqum. 
proverbs 19:22	ta’awat ’adam Hasdo; weTow rash mei’ish kacaw. 
proverbs 19:23	yir’at yhoh leHayim; wesaweia‘ yalin, bal yipaqed ra‘. 
proverbs 19:24	Taman ‘azeil yado bazalaHat; gam ’el pihu, lo yeshiwenah. 
proverbs 19:25	leiz takeh ufeti ya‘rim; wehokhiaH lenawon, yawin da‘at. 
proverbs 19:26	meshaded ’aw yawriaH ’eim; bein, meiwish umaHpir. 
proverbs 19:27	Hadal beni lishmoa‘ musar; lishgot, mei’imrei da‘at. 
proverbs 19:28	‘eid beliya‘al yaliz mishpaT; ufi resha‘im, yewala‘ ’awen. 
proverbs 19:29	nakhonu laleizim shefaTim; umahalumot, legeiw kesilim.

proverbs 20:2	naham kakefir ’eimat melekh; mit‘abero, HoTei nafsho. 
proverbs 20:3	kawod la’ish shewet meiriw; wekhal ’ewil, yitgala‘. 
proverbs 20:4	meiHoref ‘azeil lo yaHarosh; yish’al wesha’al baqazir wa’ayin. 
proverbs 20:5	mayim ‘amuqim ‘eizah welew ’ish; we’ish tewunah yidlenah. 
proverbs 20:6	raw ’adam, yiqra ’ish Hasdo; we’ish ’emunim, mi yimza. 
proverbs 20:7	mithaleikh betumo zadiq; ’ashrei wanaw ’aHaraw. 
proverbs 20:8	melekh, yosheiw ‘al kissei din; mecareh we‘einaw kal ra‘. 
proverbs 20:9	mi yomar cikiti libi; Taharti, meiHaTati. 
proverbs 20:10	’ewen wa’ewen ’eifah we’eifah; to‘awat yhoh gam sheneihem. 
proverbs 20:11	gam bema‘alalaw yitnaker na‘ar; ’im cakh we’im yashar pa‘olo. 
proverbs 20:12	’ocen ma‘at we‘ayin ro’ah; yhoh ‘asah gam sheneihem.

proverbs 20:14	ra‘ ra‘ yomar haqoneh; we’oceil lo, ’ac yithalal. 
proverbs 20:15	yeish cahaw weraw peninim; ukheli yeqar, siftei da‘at. 
proverbs 20:16	leqaH bigdo ki ‘araw car; uwe‘ad nakherim nakheriyah Hawleihu.

proverbs 21:7	shod resha‘im yegoreim; ki mei’anu, la‘asot mishpaT.

proverbs 25:4	hago sigim mikasef; wayeizei lazoreif keli.

proverbs 25:19	shein ro‘ah weregel mu‘adet; miwTaH bogeid, beyom zarah.

proverbs 25:21	’im ra‘eiw na’akha ha’akhileihu laHem; we’im zamei, hashqeihu mayim.

proverbs 25:23	ruaH zafon teHoleil gashem; ufanim nic‘amim, leshon sater.
