proverbs 25:25	mayim qarim ‘al nefesh ‘ayeifah; ushemu‘ah Towah, mei’erez merHaq. 
proverbs 25:26	ma‘yan nirpas umaqor masheHat; zadiq, maT lifnei rasha‘. 
proverbs 25:27	’akhol dewash harbot lo Tow; weHeiqer kewodam kawod. 
proverbs 25:28	‘ir peruzah ’ein Homah; ’ish, ’asher ’ein ma‘zar leruHo. 
proverbs 26:1	kasheleg baqayiz, wekhamaTar baqazir; kein lo naweh likhsil kawod. 
proverbs 26:2	kazipor lanud kaderor la‘uf; kein qilat Hinam, lo lo tawo. 
proverbs 26:3	shoT lassus meteg laHamor; wesheiweT, legeiw kesilim. 
proverbs 26:4	’al ta‘an kesil ke’iwwalto; pen tishweh lo gam ’atah. 
proverbs 26:5	‘aneih khesil ke’iwwalto; pen yihyeh Hakham be‘einaw. 
proverbs 26:6	meqazeh raglayim Hamas shoteh; sholeiaH dewarim beyad kesil. 
proverbs 26:7	dalyu qayim mipisseiaH; umashal, befi khesilim. 
proverbs 26:8	kizror ’ewen bemargeimah; kein notein likhsil kawod. 
proverbs 26:9	HoaH ‘alah weyad shikor; umashal, befi khesilim. 
proverbs 26:10	raw meHoleil kol; wesokheir kesil, wesokheir ‘owerim. 
proverbs 26:11	kekhelew shaw ‘al qei’o; kesil, shoneh we’iwwalto. 
proverbs 26:12	ra’ita, ’ish Hakham be‘einaw; tiqwah likhsil mimenu. 
proverbs 26:13	’amar ‘azeil shaHal badarekh; ’ari, bein hareHowot. 
proverbs 26:14	hadelet tissow ‘al zirah; we‘azeil, ‘al miTato. 
proverbs 26:15	Taman ‘azeil yado bazalaHat; nil’ah, lahashiwah ’el piw. 
proverbs 26:16	Hakham ‘azeil be‘einaw; mishiw‘ah, meshiwei Ta‘am. 
proverbs 26:17	maHaciq be’acenei khalew; ‘oweir mit‘abeir, ‘al riw lo lo. 
proverbs 26:18	kemitlahleiah hayoreh ciqim, Hizim wamawet. 
proverbs 26:19	kein ’ish rimah ’et rei‘eihu; we’amar, halo mesaHeiq ’ani. 
proverbs 26:20	be’efes ‘eizim tikhbeh ’eish; uwe’ein nirgan, yishtoq madon. 
proverbs 26:21	peHam legeHalim we‘eizim le’eish; we’ish midonim midyanim, leHarHar riw.
proverbs 26:22	diwrei nirgan kemitlahamim; weheim, yaredu Hadrei waTen. 
proverbs 26:23	kesef sigim mezupeh ‘al Hares; sefatayim doleqim welew ra‘. 
proverbs 26:24	bisfato bisfataw yinakheir sonei; uweqirbo, yashit mirmah. 
proverbs 26:25	ki yeHanein qolo ’al ta’amen bo; ki shewa‘ to‘eiwot belibo. 
proverbs 26:26	tikasseh ne’ah bemasha’on; tigaleh ra‘ato weqahal. 
proverbs 26:27	korehosha Hat bah yipol; wegoleil ’ewen ’eilaw tashuw. 
proverbs 26:28	leshonoshe qer yisna dakaw; ufeh Halaq, ya‘aseh midHeh. 
proverbs 27:1	’al tithaleil beyom maHar; ki lo teida‘, mah yeiled yom. 
proverbs 27:2	yehalelkha car welo fikha; nakheri, we’al sefatekha. 
proverbs 27:3	kowed ’ewen weneiTel haHol; wekha‘as ’ewil, kaweid misheneihem. 
proverbs 27:4	’akhceriyut Heimah wesheTef ’af; umi ya‘amod lifnei qin’ah. 
proverbs 27:5	Towah tokhaHat megulah; mei’ahawah mesutaret. 
proverbs 27:6	ne’emanim piz‘ei ’oheiw; wena‘tarot, neshiqot sonei. 
proverbs 27:7	nefesh wei‘ah tawus nofet; wenefesh re‘eiwah, kal mar matoq. 
proverbs 27:8	kezipor nodedet min qinah; kein ’ish, nodeid mimeqomo. 
proverbs 27:9	shemen uqeToret yesamaH leiw; umeteq rei‘eihu, mei‘azat nafesh. 
proverbs 27:10	rei‘akha werei‘eh wereia‘ ’awikha ’al ta‘acow, uweit ’aHikha, ’al tawo beyom ’eidekha; Tow shakhein qarow, mei’aH raHoq. 
proverbs 27:11	Hakham beni wesamaH libi; we’ashiwah Horefi dawar. 
proverbs 27:12	‘arum ra’ah ra‘ah nistar; petayim, ‘aweru ne‘enashu. 
proverbs 27:13	qaH bigdo ki ‘araw car; uwe‘ad nakheriyah Hawleihu. 
proverbs 27:14	mewareikh rei‘eihu beqol gadol baboqer hashkeim; qelalah, teiHashew lo. 
proverbs 27:15	delef Toreid beyom sagrir; we’eishet midonim midyanim, nishtawah. 
proverbs 27:16	zofeneha zafan ruaH; weshemen yemino yiqra. 
proverbs 27:17	barcel bewarcel yaHad; we’ish, yaHad penei rei‘eihu. 
proverbs 27:18	nozeir te’einah yokhal piryah; weshomeir ’adonaw yekhubad. 
proverbs 27:19	kamayim hapanim lapanim; kein leiw ha’adam, la’adam. 
proverbs 27:20	she’ol wa’awadoh wa’awado lo tisba‘nah; we‘einei ha’adam, lo tisba‘nah. 
proverbs 27:21	mazreif lakesef wekhur laccahaw; we’ish, lefi mahalalo. 
proverbs 27:22	’im tikhtosh ’et ha’ewil bamakhteish betokh harifot ba‘eli; lo tasur mei‘alaw, ’iwwalto.
proverbs 27:23	yadoa‘ teida‘ penei zonekha; shit libekha, la‘adarim. 
proverbs 27:24	ki lo le‘olam Hosen; we’im neicer, ledor dor wador. 
proverbs 27:25	galah Hazir wenir’ah deshe; wene’esfu, ‘isewot harim. 
proverbs 27:26	kewasim lilwushekha; umeHir deh, ‘atudim. 
proverbs 27:27	wedei Haleiw ‘iccim, lelaHmekha leleHem beitekha; weHayim, lena‘arotekha. 
proverbs 28:1	nasu we’ein rodeif rasha‘; wezadiqim, kikhfir yiwTaH. 
proverbs 28:2	befesha‘ ’erez rabim sareha; uwe’adam meiwin yodeia‘, kein ya’arikh. 
proverbs 28:3	gewer rash we‘osheiq dalim; maTar soHeif, we’ein laHem. 
proverbs 28:4	‘ocewei torah yehalu rasha‘; weshomerei torah, yitgaru wam.
proverbs 28:5	’anshei ra‘ lo yawinu mishpaT; umewaqshei yhoh yawinu khol. 
proverbs 28:6	Tow rash holeikh betumo; mei‘iqeish derakhayim, wehu ‘ashir. 
proverbs 28:7	nozeir torah bein meiwin; wero‘eh colim, yakhlim ’awiw. 
proverbs 28:8	marbeh hono beneshekh uwetarbit wetarbit; leHonein dalim yiqbezenu. 
proverbs 28:9	meisir ’aceno mishemoa‘ torah; gam tefilato, to‘eiwah. 
proverbs 28:10	mashgeh yesharim bederekh ra‘, bishHuto hu yipol; utemimim, yinHalu Tow. 
proverbs 28:11	Hakham be‘einaw ’ish ‘ashir; wedal meiwin yaHqerenu. 
proverbs 28:12	ba‘aloz zadiqim rabah tif’aret; uwequm resha‘im, yeHupas ’adam. 
proverbs 28:13	mekhasseh fesha‘aw lo yazliaH; umodeh we‘oceiw yeruHam. 
proverbs 28:14	’ashrei ’adam mefaHeid tamid; umaqsheh libo, yipol bera‘ah. 
proverbs 28:15	’ari noheim wedow shoqeiq; mosheil rasha‘, ‘al ‘am dal. 
proverbs 28:16	nagid, Hasar tewunot weraw ma‘ashaqot; sone’ei sonei weza‘, ya’arikh yamim.
proverbs 28:17	’adam ‘ashuq bedam nafesh; ‘ad bor yanus, ’al yitmekhu wo. 
proverbs 28:18	holeikh tamim yiwwasheia‘; wene‘qash derakhayim, yipol be’eHat. 
proverbs 28:19	‘oweid ’admato yisba‘ laHem; umeradeif reiqim, yisba‘ rish. 
proverbs 28:20	’ish ’emunot raw berakhot; we’az leha‘ashir, lo yinaqeh. 
proverbs 28:21	hakeir panim lo Tow; we‘al pat leHem, yifsha‘ gawer. 
proverbs 28:22	niwohal lahon, ’ish ra‘ ‘ayin; welo yeida‘ ki Heser yewo’enu. 
proverbs 28:23	mokhiaH ’adam ’aHaray Hein yimza; mimaHaliq lashon. 
proverbs 28:24	goceil ’awiw we’imo, we’omeir ’ein pasha‘; Haweir hu, le’ish mashHit. 
proverbs 28:25	reHaw nefesh yegareh madon; uwoTeiaH ‘al yhoh yedushan. 
proverbs 28:26	boTeiaH belibo hu khesil; weholeikh beHakhemah, hu yimaleiT. 
proverbs 28:27	notein larash ’ein maHsor; uma‘lim ‘einaw, raw me’eirot. 
proverbs 28:28	bequm resha‘im yissateir ’adam; uwe’awedam, yirbu zadiqim. 
proverbs 29:1	’ish tokhaHot maqsheh ‘oref; peta‘ yishaweir, we’ein marpei. 
proverbs 29:2	birwot zadiqim yismaH ha‘am; uwimshol rasha‘, yei’anaH ‘am. 
proverbs 29:3	’ish ’oheiw Hakhmah yesamaH ’awiw; wero‘eh conot, ye’abed hon. 
proverbs 29:4	melekh, bemishpaT ya‘amid ’arez; we’ish terumot yehersenah. 
proverbs 29:5	gewer maHaliq ‘al rei‘eihu; reshet, poreis ‘al pe‘amaw. 
proverbs 29:6	befesha‘ ’ish ra‘ moqeish; wezadiq, yarun wesameiaH. 
proverbs 29:7	yodeia‘ zadiq din dalim; rasha‘, lo yawin da‘at. 
proverbs 29:8	’anshei lazon yafiHu qiryah; waHakhamim, yashiwu ’af. 
proverbs 29:9	’ish Hakham, nishpaT ’et ’ish ’ewil; weragac wesaHaq, we’ein naHat. 
proverbs 29:10	’anshei damim yisne’u tam; wisharim, yewaqshu nafsho. 
proverbs 29:11	kal ruHo yozi khesil; weHakham, be’aHor yeshabeHenah. 
proverbs 29:12	mosheil maqshiw ‘al dewar shaqer; kal mesharetaw resha‘im. 
proverbs 29:13	rash we’ish tekhakhim nifgashu; mei’ir ‘einei sheneihem yhoh. 
proverbs 29:14	melekh shofeiT be’emet dalim; kis’o, la‘ad yikon. 
proverbs 29:15	sheiweT wetokhaHat yitein Hakhmah wena‘ar meshulaH, meiwish ’imo. 
proverbs 29:16	birwot resha‘im yirbeh pasha‘; wezadiqim, bemapaltam yir’u. 
proverbs 29:17	yasseir binkha winiHekha; weyitein ma‘adanim lenafshekha.
proverbs 29:18	be’ein Hacon yipara‘ ‘am; weshomeir torah ’ashreihu. 
proverbs 29:19	bidwarim lo yiwwaser ‘awed; ki yawin, we’ein ma‘aneh. 
proverbs 29:20	Hacita, ’ish ’az bidwaraw; tiqwah likhsil mimenu. 
proverbs 29:21	mefaneiq mino‘ar ‘awdo; we’aHarito, yihyeh manon. 
proverbs 29:22	’ish ’af yegareh madon; uwa‘al Heimah raw pasha‘. 
proverbs 29:23	ga’awat ’adam tashpilenu; ushefal ruaH, yitmokh kawod. 
proverbs 29:24	Holeiq ‘im ganaw sonei nafsho; ’alah yishma‘, welo yagid. 
proverbs 29:25	Herdat ’adam yitein moqeish; uwoTeiaH yhoh yesugaw. 
proverbs 29:26	rabim mewaqshim penei mosheil; yhoh mishpaT ’ish. 
proverbs 29:27	to‘awat zadiqim ’ish ‘awel; weto‘awat rasha‘ yeshar darekh.
proverbs 30:1	diwrei ’agur bin yaqeh, hamasa ne’um hagewer le’iti’eil; le’iti’eil we’ukhal. 
proverbs 30:2	ki wa‘ar ’anokhi mei’ish; welo winat ’adam li. 
proverbs 30:3	welo lamadti Hakhmah weda‘at qedoshim ’eida‘. 
proverbs 30:4	mi ‘alah shamayim wayeirad mi ’asaf ruaH beHafenaw mi zarar mayim basimlah, mi heiqim kal ’afsei ’arez; mah shemo umah shem beno, ki teida‘. 
proverbs 30:5	kal ’imrat ’eloah zerufah; magein hu, laHosim bo. 
proverbs 30:6	’al tosp ‘al dewaraw; pen yokhiaH bekha wenikhcaweta.
proverbs 30:7	tayim sha’alti mei’itakh; ’al timna‘ mimeni, beTerem ’amut. 
proverbs 30:8	shaw udewar kacaw harHeiq mimeni, reish wa‘osher ’al titen li; haTrifeini, leHem Huqi. 
proverbs 30:9	pen ’esba‘ wekhiHashti we’amarti, mi yhoh ufen ’iwwareish weganawti; wetafasti, sheim ’elohay.
proverbs 30:10	’al talshein ‘ewed ’el ’adono ’adonaw; pen yeqalelkha we’ashameta. 
proverbs 30:11	dor ’awiw yeqaleil; we’et ’imo, lo yewareikh. 
proverbs 30:12	dor Tahor be‘einaw; umizo’ato, lo ruHaz. 
proverbs 30:13	dor mah ramu ‘einaw; we‘af‘apaw, yinasei’u. 
proverbs 30:14	dor Harawot shinaw uma’akhalot metale‘otaw le’ekhol ‘aniyim mei’erez; we’ewyonim, mei’adam.
proverbs 30:15	la‘aluqah shetei wanot haw haw shalosh heinah lo tisba‘nah; ’arba‘, lo ’ameru hon. 
proverbs 30:16	she’ol we‘ozer raHam ’erez lo sawe‘ah mayim; we’eish, lo ’amerah hon. 
proverbs 30:17	‘ayin til‘ag le’aw wetawuc liqahat ’eim yiqeruha ‘orewei naHal; weyokheluha wenei nasher.
proverbs 30:18	sheloshah heimah nifle’u mimeni; we’arba‘ we’arba‘ah, lo yeda‘tim. 
proverbs 30:19	derekh hanesher bashamayim derekh naHash, ‘alei zur derekh ’oniyah welew yam; wederekh gewer be‘almah. 
proverbs 30:20	kein derekh ’ishah, mena’afet ’akhelah umaHatah fiha; we’amerah, lo fa‘alti ’awen.
proverbs 30:21	taHat losh ragecah ’erez; wetaHat ’arba‘, lo tukhal se’eit. 
proverbs 30:22	taHat ‘ewed ki yimlokh; wenawal, ki yisba‘ laHem. 
proverbs 30:23	taHat nu’ah ki tiba‘eil; weshifHah, ki tirash gewirtah.
proverbs 30:24	’arba‘ah heim qeTanei ’arez; weheimah, Hakhamim meHukamim. 
proverbs 30:25	hanemalim ‘am lo ‘ac; wayakhinu waqayiz laHmam. 
proverbs 30:26	fanim ‘am lo ‘azum; wayasimu wassela‘ beitam. 
proverbs 30:27	melekh ’ein la’arbeh; wayeizei Hozeiz kulo. 
proverbs 30:28	mamit beyadayim tetapeis; wehi, beheikhelei melekh.
proverbs 30:29	sheloshah heimah meiTiwei za‘ad; we’arba‘ah, meiTiwei lakhet. 
proverbs 30:30	layish gibor babeheimah; welo yashuw, mipenei khol. 
proverbs 30:31	carcir matenayim ’o tayish; umelekh, ’alqum ‘imo. 
proverbs 30:32	’im nawalta wehitnasei; we’im camota, yad lefeh. 
proverbs 30:33	ki miz Halaw yozi Hem’ah, umiz ’af yozi dam; umiz ’apayim, yozi riw.
proverbs 31:1	diwrei lemu’eil melekh; masa, ’asher yisseratu ’imo. 
proverbs 31:2	mah beri umah bar biTni; umeh bar nedaray. 
proverbs 31:3	’al titein lanashim Heilekha; uderakhekha, lamHot melakhin. 
proverbs 31:4	’al lamlakhim lemo’eil, ’al lamlakhim sheto yayin; ulerocnim, ’o ’ei sheikhar. 
proverbs 31:5	pen yishteh weyishkaH meHuqaq; wishaneh din kal benei ‘oni. 
proverbs 31:6	tenu sheikhar le’oweid; weyayin lemarei nafesh. 
proverbs 31:7	yishteh weyishkaH risho; wa‘amalo, lo yickar ‘od. 
proverbs 31:8	petaH pikha le’ileim; ’el din, kal benei Halof. 
proverbs 31:9	petaH pikha shefaT zedeq; wedin, ‘ani we’ewyon.
proverbs 31:10	’eishet Hayil mi yimza; weraHoq mipeninim mikhrah. 
proverbs 31:11	baTaH bah leiw ba‘lah; weshalal, lo yeHsar. 
proverbs 31:12	gemalathu Tow welo ra‘; kol, yemei Hayeh 
proverbs 31:13	dareshah zemer ufishtim; wata‘as, beHeifez kapeha. 
proverbs 31:14	hayetah ka’oniyot soHeir; mimerHaq, tawi laHmah. 
proverbs 31:15	wataqam be‘od laylah, watitein Teref leweitah; weHoq, lena‘aroteha. 
proverbs 31:16	camemah deh watiqaHeihu; miperi khapeha, neTa‘ naTe‘ah karem. 
proverbs 31:17	Hagerah we‘oc mateneha; wate’ameiz, cero‘oteha. 
proverbs 31:18	Ta‘amah ki Tow saHrah; lo yikhbeh walayil walaylah neirah. 
proverbs 31:19	yadeha shileHah wakishor; wekhapeha, tamekhu falekh. 
proverbs 31:20	kapah paresah le‘ani; weyadeha, shileHah la’ewyon. 
proverbs 31:21	lo tira leweitah mishaleg; ki khal beitah, lawush shanim. 
proverbs 31:22	marwadim ‘asetah lah; sheish we’argaman lewushah. 
proverbs 31:23	noda‘ bashe‘arim ba‘lah; beshiwto, ‘im ciqnei ’arez. 
proverbs 31:24	sadin ‘asetah watimkor; waHagor, natenah lakena‘ani. 
proverbs 31:25	‘oc wehadar lewushah; watisHaq, leyom ’aHaron. 
proverbs 31:26	piha pateHah weHakhemah; wetorat Hesed, ‘al leshonah. 
proverbs 31:27	zofiyah halikhot beitah; weleHem ‘azlut, lo tokheil. 
proverbs 31:28	qamu waneha way’asheruha; ba‘lah, wayhalah. 
proverbs 31:29	rabot banot ‘asu Hayil; we’at, ‘alit ‘al kulanah. 
proverbs 31:30	sheqer haHein wehewel hayofi; ’ishah yir’at yhoh hi tithalal. 
proverbs 31:31	tenu lah miperi yadeha; wihaluha washe‘arim ma‘aseha. 
job 1:1	’ish hayah we’erez ‘uz ’iyow shemo; wehayah ha’ish hahu, tam weyashar wirei ’elohim wesar meira‘. 
job 1:2	wayiwwaledu lo shiw‘ah wanim weshalosh banot. 
job 1:3	wayhi miqneihu shiw‘at ’alfei zon usheloshet ’alfei gemalim, waHameish mei’ot zemed baqar waHameish mei’ot ’atonot, wa‘awudah rabah me’od; wayhi ha’ish hahu, gadol mikal benei qedem. 
job 1:4	wehalekhu wanaw we‘asu mishteh, beit ’ish yomo; weshaleHu, weqare’u lishloshet ’aHyoteihem ’aHyoteihem, le’ekhol welishtot ‘imahem. 
job 1:5	wayhi ki hiqifu yemei hamishteh wayishlaH ’iyow wayqadesheim, wehishkim baboqer wehe‘elah ‘olot mispar kulam ki ’amar ’iyow, ’ulay HaTe’u wanay, uweirakhu ’elohim bilwawam; kakhah ya‘aseh ’iyow kal hayamim.
job 1:6	wayhi hayom, wayawo’u benei ha’elohim, lehityazeiw ‘al yhoh; wayawo gam hasaTan betokham. 
job 1:7	wayomer yhoh ’el hasaTan mei’ayin tawo; waya‘an hasaTan ’et yhoh wayomar, mishuT ba’arez, umeihithaleikh bah. 
job 1:8	wayomer yhoh ’el hasaTan, hasamta libekha ‘al ‘awdi ’iyow; ki ’ein kamohu ba’arez, ’ish tam weyashar yerei ’elohim wesar meira‘. 
job 1:9	waya‘an hasaTan ’et yhoh wayomar; haHinam, yarei ’iyow ’elohim. 
job 1:10	halo ’at ’atah sakhta wa‘ado uwe‘ad beito uwe‘ad kal ’asher lo missawiw; ma‘aseih yadaw beirakhta, umiqneihu paraz ba’arez. 
job 1:11	we’ulam shelaH na yadekha, wega‘ bekhal ’asher lo; ’im lo ‘al panekha yewarakheka. 
job 1:12	wayomer yhoh ’el hasaTan, hineih khal ’asher lo beyadekha, raq ’eilaw, ’al tishlaH yadekha; wayeizei hasaTan, mei‘im penei yhoh. 
job 1:13	wayhi hayom; uwanaw uwenotaw ’okhelim weshotim yayin, beweit ’aHihem habekhor. 
job 1:14	umal’akh ba ’el ’iyow wayomar; habaqar hayu Horeshot, weha’atonot ro‘ot ‘al yedeihem. 
job 1:15	watipol shewa watiqaHeim, we’et hane‘arim hiku lefi Harew; wa’imaleTah raq ’ani lewadi lehagid lakh. 
job 1:16	‘od ceh medabeir, weceh ba wayomar ’eish ’elohim, nafelah min hashamayim, watiw‘ar bazon uwane‘arim watokheleim; wa’imaleTah raq ’ani lewadi lehagid lakh. 
job 1:17	‘od ceh medabeir, weceh ba wayomar kasdim samu sheloshah rashim, wayifsheTu ‘al hagemalim wayiqaHum, we’et hane‘arim hiku lefi Harew; wa’imaleTah raq ’ani lewadi lehagid lakh. 
job 1:18	‘ad ceh medabeir, weceh ba wayomar; banekha uwenotekha ’okhelim weshotim yayin, beweit ’aHihem habekhor. 
job 1:19	wehineih ruaH gedolah ba’ah mei‘eiwer hamidbar, wayiga‘ be’arba‘ pinot habayit, wayipol ‘al hane‘arim wayamutu; wa’imaleTah raq ’ani lewadi lehagid lakh. 
job 1:20	wayaqam ’iyow wayiqra‘ ’et me‘ilo, wayagac ’et rosho; wayipol ’arzah wayishtaHu. 
job 1:21	wayomer ‘arom yazati yazati mibeTen ’imi, we‘arom ’ashuw shamah, yhoh natan, yhoh laqaH; yehi sheim yhoh meworakh. 
job 1:22	bekhal cot lo HaTa ’iyow; welo natan tiflah leilohim.
job 2:1	wayhi hayom, wayawo’u benei ha’elohim, lehityazeiw ‘al yhoh; wayawo gam hasaTan betokham, lehityazeiw ‘al yhoh. 
job 2:2	wayomer yhoh ’el hasaTan, ’ei micceh tawo; waya‘an hasaTan ’et yhoh wayomar, mishuT ba’arez, umeihithaleikh bah. 
job 2:3	wayomer yhoh ’el hasaTan, hasamta libekha ’el ‘awdi ’iyow ki ’ein kamohu ba’arez, ’ish tam weyashar yerei ’elohim wesar meira‘; we‘odenu maHaciq betumato, watesiteini wo lewale‘o Hinam. 
job 2:4	waya‘an hasaTan ’et yhoh wayomar; ‘or be‘ad ‘or, wekhol ’asher la’ish, yitein be‘ad nafsho. 
job 2:5	’ulam shelaH na yadekha, wega‘ ’el ‘azmo we’el besaro; ’im lo ’el panekha yewarakheka. 
job 2:6	wayomer yhoh ’el hasaTan hino weyadekha; ’akh ’et nafsho shemor. 
job 2:7	wayeizei hasaTan, mei’eit penei yhoh; wayakh ’et ’iyow bishHin ra‘, mikaf raglo ‘ad we‘ad qadeqodo. 
job 2:8	wayiqaH lo Heres, lehitgareid bo; wehu yosheiw betokh ha’eifer. 
job 2:9	watomer lo ’ishto, ‘odekha maHaciq betumatekha; bareikh ’elohim wamut. 
job 2:10	wayomer ’eileha, kedabeir ’aHat hanewalot tedabeiri, gam ’et haTow, neqabeil mei’eit ha’elohim, we’et hara‘ lo neqabeil; bekhal cot lo HaTa ’iyow bisfataw.
job 2:11	wayishme‘u sheloshet rei‘ei ’iyow, ’eit kal hara‘ah haccot haba’ah ‘alaw wayawo’u ’ish mimeqomo, ’elifac hateimani uwildad hashuHi, wezofar hana‘amati; wayiwwa‘adu yaHdaw, lawo lanud lo ulenaHamo. 
job 2:12	wayis’u ’et ‘eineihem meiraHoq welo hikiruhu, wayis’u qolam wayiwku; wayiqre‘u ’ish me‘ilo, wayicrequ ‘afar ‘al rasheihem hashamayemah. 
job 2:13	wayeishewu ’ito la’arez, shiw‘at yamim weshiw‘at leilot; we’ein doweir ’eilaw dawar, ki ra’u, ki gadal hake’eiw me’od. 
job 3:1	’aHarei khein, pataH ’iyow ’et pihu, wayqaleil ’et yomo.
job 3:2	waya‘an ’iyow, wayomar. 
job 3:3	yowad yom ’iwwaled bo; wehalaylah ’amar, horah gawer. 
job 3:4	hayom hahu, yehi Hoshekh ’al yidresheihu ’eloah mima‘al; we’al tofa‘ ‘alaw neharah. 
job 3:5	yig’aluhu Hoshekh wezalmawet tishkan ‘alaw ‘ananah; yewa‘atuhu, kimrirei yom. 
job 3:6	halaylah hahu yiqaHeihu ’ofel ’al yiHad bimei shanah; bemispar yeraHim, ’al yawo. 
job 3:7	hineih halaylah hahu yehi galmud; ’al tawo renanah wo. 
job 3:8	yiqewuhu ’orerei yom; ha‘atidim, ‘oreir liwyatan. 
job 3:9	yeHshekhu kokhwei nishpo yeqaw le’or wa’ayin; we’al yir’eh, be‘af‘apei shaHar. 
job 3:10	ki lo sagar daltei wiTni; wayasteir ‘amal, mei‘einay. 
job 3:11	lamah lo meireHem ’amut; mibeTen yazati we’egwa‘. 
job 3:12	madua‘ qidemuni wirkayim; umahosha dayim, ki ’inaq. 
job 3:13	ki ‘atah shakhawti we’eshqoT; yashanti, ’ac yanuaH li. 
job 3:14	‘im melakhim weyo‘azei ’arez; habonim Horawot lamo. 
job 3:15	’o ‘imsa rim cahaw lahem; hamal’im bateihem kasef. 
job 3:16	’o kheneifel Tamun lo ’ehyeh; ke‘olelim, lo ra’u ’or. 
job 3:17	sham resha‘im Hadelu rogec; wesham yanuHu, yegi‘ei khoaH. 
job 3:18	yaHad ’asirim sha’ananu; lo me‘u, qol nogeis. 
job 3:19	qaTon wegadol sham hu; we‘ewed, Hafeshi mei’adonaw. 
job 3:20	lamah yitein le‘ameil ’or; weHayim, lemarei nafesh. 
job 3:21	hamHakim lamawet we’einenu; wayaHperuhu, mimaTmonim. 
job 3:22	hasemeiHim ’elei gil; yasisu, ki yimze’u qawer. 
job 3:23	legewer ’asher darko nistarah; wayasekh ’eloah ba‘ado. 
job 3:24	ki lifnei laHmi ’anHati tawo; wayitekhu khamayim, sha’agotay. 
job 3:25	ki faHad paHadti waye’etayeini; wa’asher yagoreti, yawo li. 
job 3:26	lo shalawti welo shaqaTti welo naHeti, wayawo rogec.
job 4:1	waya‘an ’elifac hateimani, wayomar. 
job 4:2	hanissah dawar ’eilekha til’eh; wa‘zor bemilin, mi yukhal. 
job 4:3	hineih yissarta rabim; weyadayim rafot teHacceiq. 
job 4:4	kosheil yeqimun milekha; uwirkayim kore‘ot te’ameiz. 
job 4:5	ki ‘atah tawo ’eilekha wateile; tiga‘ ‘adekha, watibaheil. 
job 4:6	halo yir’atekha kislatekha; tiqwatekha, wetom derakhekha. 
job 4:7	cekhar na, mi hu naqi ’awad; we’eifoh, yesharim nikhHadu. 
job 4:8	ka’asher ra’iti Horeshei ’awen; wecore‘ei ‘amal yiqzeruhu. 
job 4:9	minishmat ’eloha yoweidu; umeiruaH ’apo yikhlu. 
job 4:10	sha’agat ’aryeih weqol shaHal; weshinei khefirim nita‘u. 
job 4:11	layish ’oweid mibeli Taref; uwenei lawi, yitparadu. 
job 4:12	we’eilay dawar yegunaw; watiqaH ’aceni, sheimez menhu. 
job 4:13	bis‘ipim meiHecyonot layelah; binfol tardeimah, ‘al ’anashim. 
job 4:14	paHad qera’ani ure‘adah; werow ‘azmotay hifHid. 
job 4:15	weruaH ‘al panay yaHalof; tesameir, sa‘arat besari. 
job 4:16	ya‘amod welo ’akir mar’eihu, temunah leneged ‘einay; demamah waqol ’eshma‘. 
job 4:17	ha’enosh mei’eloha yizdaq; ’im mei‘oseihu, yiThar gawer. 
job 4:18	hein ba‘awadaw lo ya’amin; uwemal’akhaw, yasim taholah. 
job 4:19	’af shokhenei watei Homer, ’asher be‘afar yesodam; yedake’um, lifnei ‘ash. 
job 4:20	miboqer la‘erew yukatu; mibeli meisim, lanezaH yoweidu. 
job 4:21	halo nissa‘ yitram bam; yamutu, welo weHakhemah. 
job 5:1	qera na hayeish ‘oneka; we’el mi miqedoshim tifneh. 
job 5:2	ki le’ewil yaharag ka‘as; ufoteh, tamit qin’ah. 
job 5:3	’ani ra’iti ’ewil mashrish; wa’eqow naweihu fit’om. 
job 5:4	yirHaqu wanaw miyesha‘; weyidake’u washa‘ar, we’ein mazil. 
job 5:5	’asher qeziro ra‘eiw yokheil, we’el mizinim yiqaHeihu; wesha’af zamim Heilam. 
job 5:6	ki lo yeizei mei‘afar ’awen; umei’adamah, lo yizmaH ‘amal. 
job 5:7	ki ’adam le‘amal yulad; uwenei reshef, yagbihu ‘uf. 
job 5:8	’ulam, ’ani ’edrosh ’el ’eil; we’el ’elohim, ’asim diwrati. 
job 5:9	‘oseh gedolot we’ein Heiqer; nifla’ot, ‘ad ’ein mispar. 
job 5:10	hanotein maTar ‘al penei ’arez; wesholeiaH mayim ‘al penei Huzot. 
job 5:11	lasum shefalim lemarom; weqoderim, sagewu yesha‘. 
job 5:12	meifeir maHshewot ‘arumim; welo ta‘asenah yedeihem, tushiyah. 
job 5:13	lokheid Hakhamim be‘aremam; wa‘azat niftalim nimharah. 
job 5:14	yomam yefageshu Hoshekh; wekhalaylah, yemashu wazahorayim. 
job 5:15	wayosha‘ meiHerew mipihem; umiyad Hacaq ’ewyon. 
job 5:16	watehi ladal tiqwah; we‘olatah, qafezah piha. 
job 5:17	hineih ’ashrei ’enosh yokhiHenu ’eloah; umusar day, ’al tim’as. 
job 5:18	ki hu yakh’iw weyeHbash; yimHaz, weyado weyadaw tirpenah. 
job 5:19	besheish zarot yazileka; uweshewa‘ lo yiga‘ bekha ra‘. 
job 5:20	bera‘aw padekha mimawet; uwemilHamah, midei Harew. 
job 5:21	beshoT lashon teiHawei; welo tira mishod, ki yawo. 
job 5:22	leshod ulekhafan tisHaq; umeiHayat ha’arez, ’al tira. 
job 5:23	ki ‘im ’awnei hasadeh weritekha; weHayat hasadeh, hashelemah lakh. 
job 5:24	weyada‘ta ki shalom ’aholekha; ufaqadta nawekha welo teHeTa. 
job 5:25	weyada‘ta ki raw car‘ekha; weze’eza’ekha, ke‘eisew ha’arez. 
job 5:26	tawo wekhelaH ’elei qawer; ka‘alot gadish be‘ito. 
job 5:27	hineih cot Haqarnuha ken hi; ma‘enah, we’atah da‘ lakh.
job 6:1	waya‘an ’iyow, wayomar. 
job 6:2	lu, shaqol yishaqeil ka‘si; wehayati wehawwati, bemocenayim yis’u yaHad. 
job 6:3	ki ‘atah, meiHol yamim yikhbad; ‘al kein, dewaray la‘u. 
job 6:4	ki Hizei shaday ‘imadi, ’asher Hamatam shotah ruHi; bi‘utei ’eloah ya‘arkhuni. 
job 6:5	hayinhaq pere ‘alei deshe; ’im yig‘ehosho, wr ‘al belilo. 
job 6:6	hayei’akheil tafeil mibeli melaH; ’im yesh Ta‘am, berir Halamut. 
job 6:7	mei’anah lingoa‘ nafshi; heimah, kidwei laHmi. 
job 6:8	mi yitein tawo she’elati; wetiqwati, yitein ’eloah. 
job 6:9	weyo’eil ’eloah widake’eini; yateir yado, wiwaze‘eini. 
job 6:10	utehi ‘od neHamati, wa’asaledah weHilah lo yaHmol; ki lo khiHadti, ’imrei qadosh. 
job 6:11	mah koHi khi ’ayaHeil; umah qizi, ki ’a’arikh nafshi. 
job 6:12	’im koaH ’awanim koHi; ’im besari naHush. 
job 6:13	ha’im ’ein ‘ecrati wi; wetushiyah, nideHah mimeni. 
job 6:14	lamas meirei‘eihu Hased; weyir’at shaday ya‘acow. 
job 6:15	’aHay bagedu khemo naHal; ka’afiq neHalim ya‘aworu. 
job 6:16	haqoderim mini qaraH; ‘aleimo, yit‘alem shaleg. 
job 6:17	be‘eit yecorewu nizmatu; beHumo, nid‘akhu mimeqomam. 
job 6:18	yilafetu ’areHot darkam; ya‘alu watohu weyoweidu. 
job 6:19	hibiTu ’areHot teima; halikhot wa, qiwwu lamo. 
job 6:20	boshu ki waTaH; ba’u ‘adeha, wayeHparu. 
job 6:21	ki ‘atah heyitem lo lo; tir’u Hatat, watira’u. 
job 6:22	hakhi ’amarti hawu li; umikoHakhem, shiHadu wa‘adi. 
job 6:23	umaleTuni miyad zar; umiyad ‘arizim tifduni. 
job 6:24	horuni wa’ani ’aHarish; umahosha giti, hawinu li. 
job 6:25	mah nimrezu ’imrei yosher; umah yokhiaH hokheiaH mikem. 
job 6:26	halhokhaH milim taHshowu; uleruaH, ’imrei no’ash. 
job 6:27	’af ‘al yatom tapilu; wetikhru, ‘al rei‘akhem. 
job 6:28	we‘atah ho’ilu fenu wi; we‘al peneikhem, ’im ’akhacceiw. 
job 6:29	shuwu na ’al tehi ‘awlah; weshuwi weshuwu ‘od zidqi wah. 
job 6:30	hayeish bilshoni ‘awlah; ’im Hiki, lo yawin hawwot. 
job 7:1	halo zawa le’enosh ‘al ‘alei ’arez; wekhimei sakhir yamaw. 
job 7:2	ke‘ewed yish’af zeil; ukhesakhir, yeqawweh fa‘olo. 
job 7:3	kein haneHalti li yarHei shaw; weleilot ‘amal, minu li. 
job 7:4	’im shakhawti, we’amarti, matay ’aqum umidad ‘arew; wesawa‘ti nedudim ‘adei nashef. 
job 7:5	lawash besari rimah wegish wegush ‘afar; ‘ori raga‘, wayima’eis. 
job 7:6	yamay qalu mini ’areg; wayikhlu, be’efes tiqwah. 
job 7:7	cekhor ki ruaH Hayay; lo tashuw ‘eini, lir’ot Tow. 
job 7:8	lo teshureini ‘ein ro’i; ‘einekha bi we’eineni. 
job 7:9	kalah ‘anan wayeilakh; kein yoreid ’ol, lo ya‘aleh. 
job 7:10	lo yashuw ‘od leweito; welo yakirenu ‘od meqomo. 
job 7:11	gam ’ani lo ’eHesakh pi ’adaberah bezar ruHi; ’asiHah, bemar nafshi. 
job 7:12	hayam ’ani ’im tanin; ki tasim ‘alay mishmar. 
job 7:13	ki ’amarti tenaHameini ‘arsi; yisa wesiHi, mishkawi. 
job 7:14	weHitatani waHalomot; umeiHecyonot tewa‘atani. 
job 7:15	watiwHar maHanaq nafshi; mawet, mei‘azmotay. 
job 7:16	ma’asti lo le‘olam ’eHyeh; Hadal mimeni, ki hewel yamay. 
job 7:17	mah ’enosh ki tegadelenu; wekhi tashit ’eilaw libekha. 
job 7:18	watifqedenu liwqarim; lirga‘im, tiwHanenu. 
job 7:19	kamah lo tish‘eh mimeni; lo tarpeini, ‘ad bil‘i ruqi. 
job 7:20	HaTati mah ’ef‘al lakh nozeir ha’adam lamah samtani lemifga‘ lakh; wa’ehyeh ‘alay lemasa. 
job 7:21	umeh lo tisa fish‘i weta‘awir ’et ‘awoni ki ‘atah le‘afar ’eshkaw; weshiHartani we’eineni.
job 8:1	waya‘an bildad hashuHi, wayomar 
job 8:2	‘ad ’an temalel ’eileh; weruaH kabir ’imrei fikha. 
job 8:3	ha’eil ye‘awweit mishpaT; we’imosha day, ye‘awweit zedeq. 
job 8:4	’im banekha HaTe’u lo; wayshaleHeim, beyad pish‘am. 
job 8:5	’im ’atah teshaHeir ’el ’eil; we’elosha day, titHanan. 
job 8:6	’im cakh weyashar, ’atah ki ‘atah ya‘ir ‘alekha; weshilam, newat zidqekha. 
job 8:7	wehayah reishitekha miz‘ar; we’aHaritekha, yisgeh me’od. 
job 8:8	ki she’al na ledor rishon; wekhonein, leHeiqer ’awotam. 
job 8:9	ki temol ’anaHnu welo neida‘; ki zeil yameinu ‘alei ’arez. 
job 8:10	halo heim yorukha yomeru lakh; umilibam, yozi’u milim. 
job 8:11	hayig’eh gome belo wizah; yisgeh ’aHu weli mayim. 
job 8:12	‘odenu we’ibo lo yiqaTeif; welifnei khal Hazir yiwash. 
job 8:13	kein, ’areHot kal shokheHei ’eil; wetiqwat Haneif toweid. 
job 8:14	’asher yaqoT kislo; uweit ‘akawish, miwTaHo. 
job 8:15	yisha‘ein ‘al beito welo ya‘amod; yaHaciq bo, welo yaqum. 
job 8:16	raTow hu lifnei shamesh; we‘al ganato, yonaqto teizei. 
job 8:17	‘al gal sharashaw yesubakhu; beit ’awanim yeHeceh. 
job 8:18	’im yewale‘enu mimeqomo; wekhiHesh bo, lo re’itikha. 
job 8:19	hen hu mesos darko; umei‘afar, ’aHeir yizmaHu. 
job 8:20	hen ’eil lo yim’as tam; welo yaHaciq, beyad merei‘im. 
job 8:21	‘ad yemaleih seHoq pikha; usefatekha teru‘ah. 
job 8:22	sone’ekha yilbeshu woshet; we’ohel resha‘im ’einenu.
job 9:1	waya‘an ’iyow, wayomar. 
job 9:2	’amenam yada‘ti khi khein; umah yizdaq ’enosh ‘im ’eil. 
job 9:3	’im yaHpoz lariw ‘imo; lo ya‘anenu, ’aHat mini ’alef. 
job 9:4	Hakham leiwaw we’amiz koaH; mi hiqshah ’eilaw, wayishlam. 
job 9:5	hama‘tiq harim welo yada‘u; ’asher hafakham be’apo. 
job 9:6	hamargic ’erez mimeqomah; we‘amudeha, yitfalazun 
job 9:7	ha’omeir laHeres welo yicraH; uwe‘ad kokhawim yaHtom. 
job 9:8	noTeh shamayim lewado; wedoreikh, ‘al bamotei yam. 
job 9:9	‘oseh ‘ash kesil wekhimah, weHadrei teiman. 
job 9:10	‘oseh gedolot ‘ad ’ein Heiqer; wenifla’ot, ‘ad ’ein mispar. 
job 9:11	hein ya‘awor ‘alay welo ’er’eh; weyaHalof, welo ’awin lo. 
job 9:12	hein yaHtof mi yeshiwenu; mi yomar ’eilaw, mah ta‘aseh. 
job 9:13	’eloah lo yashiw ’apo; taHato taHtaw HaHu, ‘ocerei rahaw. 
job 9:14	’af ki ’anokhi ’e‘enenu; ’ewHarah dewaray ‘imo. 
job 9:15	’asher ’im zadaqti lo ’e‘eneh; limshofeTi, ’etHanan. 
job 9:16	’im qarati waya‘aneini; lo ’a’amin, ki ya’acin qoli. 
job 9:17	’asher bis‘arah yeshufeini; wehirbah feza‘ay Hinam. 
job 9:18	lo yiteneini hasheiw ruHi; ki yasbi‘ani, mamerorim. 
job 9:19	’im lekhoaH ’amiz hineih; we’im lemishpaT, mi yo‘ideini. 
job 9:20	’im ’ezdaq pi yarshi‘eini; tam ’ani, waya‘qesheini. 
job 9:21	tam ’ani lo ’eida‘ nafshi, ’em’as Hayay. 
job 9:22	’aHat, hi ‘al kein ’amarti; tam werasha‘, hu mekhaleh. 
job 9:23	’imosho wT yamit pit’om; lemassat neqiyim yil‘ag. 
job 9:24	’erez nitenah weyad rasha‘, penei shofeTeha yekhasseh; ’im lo ’eifo mi hu. 
job 9:25	weyamay qalu mini raz; bareHu, lo ra’u Towah. 
job 9:26	Halefu ‘im ’oniyot ’eiweh; kenesher, yaTus ‘alei ’okhel. 
job 9:27	’im ’ameri ’eshkeHah siHi; ’e‘ecwah fanay we’awligah. 
job 9:28	yagoreti khal ‘azewotay; yada‘ti, ki lo tenaqeini. 
job 9:29	’anokhi ’ersha‘; lamah ceh, hewel ’iga‘. 
job 9:30	’im hitraHazti wemo wemei shaleg; wahacikoti, bewor kapay. 
job 9:31	’ac bashaHat tiTbeleini; weti‘awuni, salmotay. 
job 9:32	ki lo ’ish kamoni ’e‘enenu; nawo yaHdaw, bamishpaT. 
job 9:33	lo yeish beineinu mokhiaH; yasheit yado ‘al sheneinu. 
job 9:34	yaseir mei‘alay shiwTo; we’eimato, ’al tewa‘atani. 
job 9:35	’adaberah welo ’ira’enu; ki lo khein ’anokhi, ‘imadi. 
job 10:1	naqeTah nafshi, beHayay ’e‘ecwah ‘alay siHi; ’adaberah, bemar nafshi. 
job 10:2	’omar ’el ’eloah ’al tarshi‘eini; hodi‘eini, ‘al mah teriweini. 
job 10:3	haTow lekha ki ta‘ashoq, ki tim’as yegia‘ kapekha; we‘al ‘azat resha‘im hofa‘eta. 
job 10:4	ha‘einei wasar lakh; ’im kir’ot ’enosh tir’eh. 
job 10:5	hakhimei ’enosh yamekha; ’imosh notekha, kimei gawer. 
job 10:6	ki tewaqeish la‘awoni; uleHaTati tidrosh. 
job 10:7	‘al da‘tekha ki lo ’ersha‘; we’ein miyadekha mazil. 
job 10:8	yadekha ‘izewuni waya‘asuni; yaHad sawiw, watewale‘eini. 
job 10:9	cekhar na ki khaHomer ‘asitani; we’el ‘afar teshiweini. 
job 10:10	halo kheHalaw tatikheini; wekhagewinah, taqpi’eini. 
job 10:11	‘or uwasar talbisheini; uwa‘azamot wegidim, tesokhekheini. 
job 10:12	Hayim waHesed ‘asita ‘imadi; ufequdatekha, shamerah ruHi. 
job 10:13	we’eileh zafanta wilwawekha; yada‘ti, ki cot ‘imakh. 
job 10:14	’im HaTati ushemartani; umei‘awoni, lo tenaqeini. 
job 10:15	’im rasha‘ti ’alay li, wezadaqti lo ’esa roshi; sewa‘ qalon, ure’eih ‘aneyi. 
job 10:16	weyig’eh kashaHal tezudeini; wetashow, titpala wi. 
job 10:17	teHadeish ‘eidekha negdi, weterew ka‘askha ‘imadi; Halifot wezawa ‘imi. 
job 10:18	welamah meireHem hozeitani; ’egwa‘, we‘ayin lo tir’eini. 
job 10:19	ka’asher lo hayiti ’ehyeh; mibeTen, laqewer ’uwal. 
job 10:20	halo me‘aT yamay yeHdal waHadal; yashit weshit mimeni, we’awligah me‘aT. 
job 10:21	beTerem ’eileikh welo ’ashuw; ’el ’erez Hoshekh wezalmawet. 
job 10:22	’erez ‘eifatah kemo ’ofel, zalmawet welo sedarim, watofa‘ kemo ’ofel.
job 11:1	waya‘an zofar hana‘amati, wayomar. 
job 11:2	harow dewarim lo yei‘aneh; we’im ’ish sefatayim yizdaq. 
job 11:3	badekha metim yaHarishw; watil‘ag, we’ein makhlim. 
job 11:4	watomer cakh liqHi; uwar, hayiti we‘einekha. 
job 11:5	we’ulam, mi yitein ’eloah dabeir; weyiftaH sefataw ‘imakh. 
job 11:6	weyaged lekha ta‘alumot Hakhmah ki khiflayim letushiyah weda‘ ki yasheh lekha ’eloha, mei‘awonekha. 
job 11:7	haHeiqer ’eloha timza; ’im ‘ad takhlit shaday timza. 
job 11:8	gawehei mayim mah tif‘al; ‘amuqah mishe’ol, mah teida‘. 
job 11:9	’arukah mei’erez midah; ureHawah, mini yam. 
job 11:10	’im yaHalof weyasgir; weyaqhil, umi yeshiwenu. 
job 11:11	ki hu yada‘ metei shaw; wayar ’awen, welo yitbonan. 
job 11:12	we’ish nawuw yilaweiw; we‘ayir pere, ’adam yiwwaleid. 
job 11:13	’im ’atah, hakhinota libekha; ufarasta ’eilaw kapekha. 
job 11:14	’im ’awen beyadekha harHiqeihu; we’al tashkein be’ohalekha ‘awlah. 
job 11:15	ki ’ac tisa fanekha mimum; wehayita muzaq, welo tira. 
job 11:16	ki ’atah ‘amal tishkaH; kemayim ‘aweru tickor. 
job 11:17	umizahorayim yaqum Haled; ta‘ufah, kaboqer tihyeh. 
job 11:18	uwaTaHta ki yeish tiqwah; weHafarta, laweTaH tishkaw. 
job 11:19	werawazta we’ein maHarid; weHilu fanekha rabim. 
job 11:20	we‘einei resha‘im, tikhlenah umanos ’awad minhem; wetiqwatam, mapaH nafesh.
job 12:1	waya‘an ’iyow, wayomar. 
job 12:2	’amenam ki ’atem ‘am; we‘imakhem, tamut Hakhmah 
job 12:3	gam li leiwaw kemokhem, lo nofeil ’anokhi mikem; we’et mi ’ein kemo ’eileh. 
job 12:4	seHoq lerei‘eihu ’ehyeh, qorei le’eloah waya‘aneihu; Hoq, zadiq tamim. 
job 12:5	lapid buc le‘ashtut sha’anan; nakhon, lemo‘adei ragel. 
job 12:6	yishlayu ’ohalim leshodedim, uwaTuHot lemargicei ’eil; la’asher heiwi ’eloah beyado. 
job 12:7	we’ulam, she’al na weheimot wetoreka; we‘of hashamayim, weyaged lakh. 
job 12:8	’o siaH la’arez wetoreka; wisaperu lekha, degei hayam. 
job 12:9	mi lo yada‘ bekhal ’eileh; ki yad yhoh ‘asetah cot. 
job 12:10	’asher beyado nefesh kal Hay; weruaH, kal besar ’ish. 
job 12:11	halo ’ocen milin tiwHan; weHeikh, ’okhel yiT‘am lo. 
job 12:12	bishishim Hakhmah we’orekh yamim tewunah. 
job 12:13	‘imo Hakhmah ugewurah; lo, ‘eizah utewunah. 
job 12:14	hein yaharos welo yibaneh; yisgor ‘al ’ish, welo yipateiaH. 
job 12:15	hein ya‘zor bamayim weyiwashu; wishaleHeim, weyahafkhu ’arez. 
job 12:16	‘imo ‘oc wetushiyah; lo, shogeig umashgeh. 
job 12:17	molikh yo‘azim sholal; weshofeTim yeholeil. 
job 12:18	musar melakhim piteiaH; waye’sor ’eicor, bemateneihem. 
job 12:19	molikh kohanim sholal; we’eitanim yesaleif. 
job 12:20	meisir fah lene’emanim; weTa‘am ceqeinim yiqaH. 
job 12:21	shofeikh buc ‘al nediwim; umeciaH ’afiqim ripah. 
job 12:22	megaleh ‘amuqot mini Hoshekh; wayozei la’or zalmawet. 
job 12:23	masgi lagoyim way’abedeim; shoTeiaH lagoyim, wayanHeim. 
job 12:24	meisir, leiw rashei ‘am ha’arez; wayat‘eim, betohu lo darekh. 
job 12:25	yemashu Hoshekh welo ’or; wayat‘eim, kashikor. 
job 13:1	hen kol ra’atah ‘eini; shame‘ah ’aceni, watawen lah. 
job 13:2	keda‘tekhem yada‘ti gam ’ani; lo nofeil ’anokhi mikem. 
job 13:3	’ulam, ’ani ’el shaday ’adabeir; wehokheiaH ’el ’eil ’eHpaz. 
job 13:4	we’ulam, ’atem Tofelei shaqer; rofe’ei ’elil kulekhem. 
job 13:5	mi yitein haHareish taHarishun; utehi lakhem leHakhemah. 
job 13:6	shim‘u na tokhaHti; weriwot sefatay haqshiwu. 
job 13:7	hal’eil tedaberu ‘awlah; welo, tedaberu remiyah. 
job 13:8	hafanaw tisa’un; ’im la’eil teriwun. 
job 13:9	haTow ki yaHqor ’etkhem; ’im kehateil be’enosh, tehateilu wo. 
job 13:10	hokheiaH yokhiaH ’etkhem; ’im basseiter, panim tisa’un. 
job 13:11	halo ’eito tewa‘eit ’etkhem; ufaHdo, yipol ‘aleikhem. 
job 13:12	cikhroneikhem mishlei ’eifer; legabei Homer, gabeikhem. 
job 13:13	haHarishu mimeni wa’adaberah ’ani; weya‘awor ‘alay mah. 
job 13:14	‘al mah ’esa wesari weshinay; wenafshi, ’asim bekhapi. 
job 13:15	hein yiqTeleini lo lo ’ayaHeil; ’akh derakhay, ’el panaw ’okhiaH. 
job 13:16	gam hu li lishu‘ah; ki lo lefanaw, Haneif yawo. 
job 13:17	shim‘u moa‘ milati; we’aHawati, be’aceneikhem. 
job 13:18	hineih na ‘arakhti mishpaT; yada‘ti, ki ’ani ’ezdaq. 
job 13:19	mi hu yariw ‘imadi; ki ‘atah ’aHarish we’egwa‘. 
job 13:20	’akhosh tayim ’al ta‘as ‘imadi; ’ac mipanekha, lo ’essateir. 
job 13:21	kapekha mei‘alay harHaq; we’eimatekha, ’al tewa‘atani. 
job 13:22	uqera we’anokhi ’e‘eneh; ’o ’adabeir, wahashiweini. 
job 13:23	kamah li ‘awonot weHaTa’ot; pish‘i weHaTati, hodi‘eini 
job 13:24	lamah fanekha tastir; wetaHsheweini le’oyeiw lakh. 
job 13:25	he‘aleh nidaf ta‘aroz; we’et qash yaweish tirdof. 
job 13:26	ki tikhtow ‘alay merorot; wetorisheini, ‘awonot ne‘uray. 
job 13:27	wetaseim bassad raglay, wetishmor kal ’areHotay; ‘al shareshei raglay, titHaqeh. 
job 13:28	wehu keraqaw yiwleh; keweged, ’akhalo ‘ash. 
job 14:1	’adam yelud ’ishah; qezar yamim, usewa‘ rogec. 
job 14:2	keziz yaza wayimal; wayiwraH kazeil, welo ya‘amod. 
job 14:3	’af ‘al ceh paqaHta ‘einekha; we’oti tawi wemishpaT ‘imakh. 
job 14:4	mi yitein Tahor miTamei, lo ’eHad. 
job 14:5	’im Haruzim yamaw, mispar Hodashaw ’itakh; Huqo Huqaw ‘asita, welo ya‘awor. 
job 14:6	she‘eih mei‘alaw weyeHdal; ‘ad yirzeh, kesakhir yomo. 
job 14:7	ki yeish la‘eiz, tiqwah ’im yikareit we‘od yaHalif; weyonaqto, lo teHdal. 
job 14:8	’im yacqin ba’arez sharesho; uwe‘afar, yamut gic‘o. 
job 14:9	meireiaH mayim yafriaH; we‘asah qazir kemo naTa‘. 
job 14:10	wegewer yamut wayeHelash; wayigwa‘ ’adam we’ayo. 
job 14:11	’acelu mayim mini yam; wenahar, yeHeraw weyaweish. 
job 14:12	we’ish shakhaw, welo yaqum ‘ad bilti mayim lo yaqizu; welo yei‘oru, mishenatam. 
job 14:13	mi yitein bish’ol tazpineini, tastireini ‘ad shuw ’apekha; tashit li Hoq wetickereini. 
job 14:14	’im yamut gewer, hayiHyeh kal yemei zewa’i ’ayaHeil; ‘ad bo, Halifati. 
job 14:15	tiqra we’anokhi ’e‘eneka; lema‘aseih yadekha tikhsof. 
job 14:16	ki ‘atah ze‘aday tispor; lo tishmor, ‘al HaTati. 
job 14:17	Hatum bizror pish‘i; watiTpol, ‘al ‘awoni. 
job 14:18	we’ulam har nofeil yibol; wezur, ye‘taq mimeqomo. 
job 14:19	’awanim shaHaqu mayim, tishTof sefiHeha ‘afar ’arez; wetiqwat ’enosh he’ewadta. 
job 14:20	titqefeihu lanezaH wayahalokh; meshaneh fanaw, wateshaleHeihu. 
job 14:21	yikhbedu wanaw welo yeida‘; weyiz‘aru, welo yawin lamo. 
job 14:22	’akh besaro ‘alaw yikh’aw; wenafsho, ‘alaw te’ewal.
job 15:1	waya‘an ’elifac hateimani, wayomar. 
job 15:2	heHakham, ya‘aneh da‘at ruaH; wimalei qadim biTno. 
job 15:3	hokheiaH bedawar lo yiskon; umilim, lo yo‘il bam. 
job 15:4	’af ’atah tafeir yir’ah; wetigra‘ Hah, lifnei ’eil. 
job 15:5	ki ye’aleif ‘awonekha fikha; wetiwHar, leshon ‘arumim. 
job 15:6	yarshi‘akha fikha welo ’ani; usefatekha, ya‘anu wakh. 
job 15:7	hariyoshon ’adam tiwwaleid; welifnei gewa‘ot Holaleta. 
job 15:8	hawsod ’eloha tishma‘; wetigra‘ ’eilekha Hakhmah 
job 15:9	mah yada‘ta welo neida‘; tawin, welo ‘imanu hu. 
job 15:10	gam saw gam yashish banu; kabir mei’awikha yamim. 
job 15:11	ham‘aT mimekha tanHumot ’eil; wedawar, la’aT ‘imakh. 
job 15:12	mah yiqaHakha libekha; umah yircemun ‘einekha. 
job 15:13	ki tashiw ’el ’eil ruHekha; wehozeita mipikha milin. 
job 15:14	mah ’enosh ki yickeh; wekhi yizdaq, yelud ’ishah. 
job 15:15	hein biqdosho biqdoshaw lo ya’amin; weshamayim, lo caku we‘einaw. 
job 15:16	’af ki nit‘aw wene’elaH; ’ish shoteh khamayim ‘awlah. 
job 15:17	’aHawkha shema‘ li; weceh Haciti, wa’asapeirah. 
job 15:18	’asher Hakhamim yagidu; welo khiHadu, mei’awotam. 
job 15:19	lahem lewadam nitenah ha’arez; welo ‘awar car betokham. 
job 15:20	kal yemei rasha‘ hu mitHoleil; umispar nim, nizpenu le‘ariz. 
job 15:21	qol peHadim be’acenaw; bashalom, shodeid yewo’enu. 
job 15:22	lo ya’amin uw mini Hoshekh; wezafu wezafui hu ’elei Harew. 
job 15:23	nodeid hu laleHem ’ayeih; yada‘ ki nakhon beyado yom Hoshekh. 
job 15:24	yewa‘atuhu zar umezuqah; titqefeihu, kemelekh ‘atid lakidor. 
job 15:25	ki naTah ’el ’eil yado; we’elosha day, yitgabar. 
job 15:26	yaruz ’eilaw bezawwar; ba‘awi, gabei maginaw. 
job 15:27	ki khissah fanaw beHelbo; waya‘as pimah ‘alei khasel. 
job 15:28	wayishkon ‘arim nikhHadot, batim lo yeishewu lamo; ’asher hit‘atedu legalim. 
job 15:29	lo ye‘shar welo yaqum Heilo; welo yiTeh la’arez minlam. 
job 15:30	lo yasur mini Hoshekh, yonaqto teyabeish shalhawet; weyasur, beruaH piw. 
job 15:31	’al ya’amein basho bashaw nit‘ah; kisha, w tihyeh temurato. 
job 15:32	belo yomo timalei; wekhipato, lo ra‘ananah. 
job 15:33	yaHmos kagefen bisro; weyashleikh kaccayit, nizato. 
job 15:34	ki ‘adat Haneif galmud; we’eish, ’akhelah ’aholei shoHad. 
job 15:35	haroh ‘amal weyalod ’awen; uwiTnam, takhin mirmah.
job 16:1	waya‘an ’iyow, wayomar. 
job 16:2	shama‘ti khe’eileh rabot; menaHamei ‘amal kulekhem. 
job 16:3	haqeiz lediwrei ruaH; ’o mah yamrizekha, ki ta‘aneh. 
job 16:4	gam ’anokhi kakhem ’adabeirah lu yeish nafshekhem taHat nafshi, ’aHbirah ‘aleikhem bemilim; we’ani‘ah ‘aleikhem, bemo roshi. 
job 16:5	’a’amizkhem bemo fi; wenid sefatay yaHsokh. 
job 16:6	’im ’adaberah lo yeiHaseikh ke’eiwi; we’aHdelah, mah mini yahalokh. 
job 16:7	’akh ‘atah hel’ani; hashimota, kal ‘adati. 
job 16:8	watiqmeTeini le‘eid hayah; wayaqam bi khaHashi, befanay ya‘aneh. 
job 16:9	’apo Taraf wayisTemeini, Haraq ‘alay beshinaw; zari yilTosh ‘einaw li. 
job 16:10	pa‘aru ‘alay befihem, beHerpah hiku leHayay; yaHad, ‘alay yitmala’un. 
job 16:11	yasgireini ’eil ’el ‘awil; we‘al yedei resha‘im yirTeini. 
job 16:12	shaleiw hayiti wayfarpereini, we’aHac be‘arepi wayfazpezeini; wayqimeini lo, lemaTarah. 
job 16:13	yasobu ‘alay rabaw, yefalaH kilyotay welo yaHmol; yishpokh la’arez, mereirati. 
job 16:14	yifrezeini ferez ‘al penei farez; yaruz ‘alay kegibor. 
job 16:15	saq tafarti ‘alei gildi; we‘olalti we‘afar qarni. 
job 16:16	panay Homarmerah Homarmeru mini wekhi; we‘al ‘af‘apay zalmawet. 
job 16:17	‘al lo Hamas bekhapay; utefilati cakah. 
job 16:18	’erez ’al tekhassi dami; we’al yehi maqom, leca‘aqati. 
job 16:19	gam ‘atah hineih washamayim ‘eidi; wesahadi, bameromim. 
job 16:20	melizay rei‘ay; ’el ’eloha, dalefah ‘eini. 
job 16:21	weyokhaH legewer ‘im ’eloah; uwen ’adam lerei‘eihu. 
job 16:22	ki shenot mispar ye’etayu; we’oraH lo ’ashuw ’ehelokh. 
job 17:1	ruHi Hubalah yamay nic‘akhu, qewarim li. 
job 17:2	’im lo hatulim ‘imadi; uwehamerotam, talan ‘eini. 
job 17:3	simah na ‘areweini ‘imakh; mi hu, leyadi yitaqeia‘. 
job 17:4	ki libam zafanta misakhel; ‘al kein, lo teromeim. 
job 17:5	leHeileq yagid rei‘im; we‘einei wanaw tikhlenah. 
job 17:6	wehizigani limshol ‘amim; wetofet lefanim ’ehyeh. 
job 17:7	wateikhah mika‘as ‘eini; wizuray kazeil kulam. 
job 17:8	yashomu yesharim ‘al cot; wenaqi, ‘al Haneif yit‘orar. 
job 17:9	weyoHeic zadiq darko; uTohar yadayim, yosif ’omez. 
job 17:10	we’ulam, kulam tashuwu uwo’u na; welo ’emza wakhem Hakham. 
job 17:11	yamay ‘aweru cimotay nitequ; morashei lewawi. 
job 17:12	laylah leyom yasimu; ’or, qarow mipenei Hoshekh. 
job 17:13	’im ’aqawweh she’ol beiti; baHoshekh, ripadti yezu‘ay. 
job 17:14	lashaHat qarati ’awi ’atah; ’imi wa’aHoti, larimah. 
job 17:15	we’ayeih ’eifo tiqwati; wetiqwati, mi yeshurenah. 
job 17:16	badei she’ol teiradnah; ’im yaHad ‘al ‘afar naHat.
job 18:1	waya‘an bildad hashuHi, wayomar. 
job 18:2	‘ad ’anah tesimun qinzei lemilin; tawinu, we’aHar nedabeir. 
job 18:3	madua‘ neHshawnu khabeheimah; niTminu, be‘eineikhem. 
job 18:4	Toreif nafsho, be’apo halma‘ankha tei‘acaw ’arez; weye‘taq zur, mimeqomo. 
job 18:5	gam ’or resha‘im yid‘akh; welo yigah, shewiw ’isho. 
job 18:6	’or Hashakh be’aholo; weneiro, ‘alaw yid‘akh. 
job 18:7	yeizeru za‘adei ’ono; wetashlikheihu ‘azato. 
job 18:8	ki shulaH bereshet beraglaw; we‘als wakhah, yithalakh. 
job 18:9	yoHeic be‘aqeiw paH; yaHaceiq ‘alaw zamim. 
job 18:10	Tamun ba’arez Hawlo; umalkudto, ‘alei natiw. 
job 18:11	sawiw bi‘atuhu walahot; wehefizuhu leraglaw. 
job 18:12	yehi ra‘eiw ’ono; we’eid, nakhon lezal‘o. 
job 18:13	yokhal badei ‘oro; yokhal badaw, bekhor mawet. 
job 18:14	yinateiq mei’aholo miwTaHo; wetaz‘ideihu, lemelekh balahot. 
job 18:15	tishkon be’aholo mibeli lo; yecoreh ‘al naweihu gaferit. 
job 18:16	mitaHat sharashaw yiwashu; umima‘al, yimal qeziro. 
job 18:17	cikhro ’awad mini ’arez; welo sheim lo, ‘al penei Huz. 
job 18:18	yehdefuhu mei’or ’el Hoshekh; umiteiweil yeniduhu. 
job 18:19	lo nin lo welo nekhed be‘amo; we’ein rid, bimguraw. 
job 18:20	‘al yomo nashamu ’aHaronim; weqadmonim, ’aHacu sa‘ar. 
job 18:21	’akh ’eileh mishkenot ‘awwal; weceh, meqom lo yada‘ ’eil.
job 19:1	waya‘an ’iyow, wayomar. 
job 19:2	‘ad ’anah togyun nafshi; utedake’unani wemilim. 
job 19:3	ceh ‘eser pe‘amim takhlimuni; lo teiwoshu, tahkeru li. 
job 19:4	we’af ’amenam shagiti; ’iti, talin meshugati. 
job 19:5	’im ’amenam ‘alay tagdilu; wetokhiHu ‘alay, Herpati 
job 19:6	de‘u ’eifo ki ’eloah ‘iwwetani; umezudo, ‘alay hiqif. 
job 19:7	hein ’ez‘aq Hamas welo ’ei‘aneh; ’ashawwa‘, we’ein mishpaT. 
job 19:8	’areHi gadar welo ’e‘ewor; we‘al netiwotay, Hoshekh yasim. 
job 19:9	kewodi mei‘alay hifshiT; wayasar, ‘aTeret roshi. 
job 19:10	yitezeini sawiw wa’eilakh; wayassa‘ ka‘eiz, tiqwati. 
job 19:11	wayaHar ‘alay ’apo; wayaHsheweini lo khezaraw. 
job 19:12	yaHad yawo’u gedudaw, wayasolu ‘alay darkam; wayaHanu sawiw le’aholi. 
job 19:13	’aHay mei‘alay hirHiq; weyode‘ay, ’akh caru mimeni. 
job 19:14	Hadelu qeroway; umeyuda‘ay shekheiHuni. 
job 19:15	garei weiti we’amhotay lecar taHshewuni; nakheri, hayiti we‘eineihem. 
job 19:16	le‘awdi qarati welo ya‘aneh; bemo fi, ’etHanen lo. 
job 19:17	ruHi carah le’ishti; weHanoti, liwnei wiTni. 
job 19:18	gam ‘awilim ma’asu wi; ’aqumah, waydaberu wi. 
job 19:19	ti‘awuni kal metei sodi; weceh ’ahawti, nehpekhu wi. 
job 19:20	be‘ori uwiwsari daweqah ‘azmi; wa’etmaleTah, be‘or shinay. 
job 19:21	Hanuni Hanuni ’atem rei‘ay; ki yad ’eloah, nage‘ah bi. 
job 19:22	lamah tirdefuni khemo ’eil; umibesari, lo tisba‘u. 
job 19:23	mi yitein ’eifo weyikatewun milay; mi yitein basseifer weyuHaqu. 
job 19:24	be‘eiT barcel we‘ofaret; la‘ad, bazur yeiHazewun. 
job 19:25	wa’ani yada‘ti go’ali Hay; we’aHaron, ‘al ‘afar yaqum. 
job 19:26	we’aHar ‘ori niqefu cot; umibesari, ’eHeceh ’eloah. 
job 19:27	’asher ’ani ’eHeceh li, we‘einay ra’u welo car; kalu khilyotay beHeiqi. 
job 19:28	ki tomeru mah nirdaf lo; weshoresh dawar, nimza wi. 
job 19:29	guru lakhem mipenei Herew, ki Heimah ‘awonot Harew; lema‘an teide‘un shadin shadun.
job 20:1	waya‘an zofar hana‘amati, wayomar. 
job 20:2	lakhein se‘ipay yeshiwuni; uwa‘awur, Hushi wi. 
job 20:3	musar kelimati ’eshma‘; weruaH, mibinati ya‘aneini. 
job 20:4	hacot yada‘ta mini ‘ad; mini sim ’adam ‘alei ’arez. 
job 20:5	ki rinat resha‘im miqarow; wesimHat Haneif ‘adei raga‘. 
job 20:6	’im ya‘aleh lashamayim si’o; werosho, la‘aw yagia‘. 
job 20:7	kegelalo lanezaH yoweid; ro’aw, yomeru ’ayo. 
job 20:8	kaHalom ya‘uf welo yimza’uhu; weyudad, keHecyon layelah. 
job 20:9	‘ayin cafatu welo tosif; welo ‘od, teshurenu meqomo. 
job 20:10	banaw yerazu dalim; weyadaw, tasheiwenah ’ono. 
job 20:11	‘azmotaw male’u ‘alumo ‘alumaw; we‘imo, ‘al ‘afar tishkaw. 
job 20:12	’im tamtiq befiw ra‘ah; yakhHidenah, taHat leshono. 
job 20:13	yaHmol ‘aleha welo ya‘acwenah; weyimna‘enah, betokh Hiko. 
job 20:14	laHmo bemei‘aw nehpakh; merorat petanim beqirbo. 
job 20:15	Hayil bala‘ wayqi’enu; mibiTno, yorishenu ’eil. 
job 20:16	rosh petanim yinaq; tahargeihu, leshon ’ef‘eh. 
job 20:17	’al yeire wiflagot; naharei naHalei, dewash weHem’ah. 
job 20:18	meishiw yaga‘ welo yiwla‘; keHeil temurato, welo ya‘alos. 
job 20:19	ki rizaz ‘acaw dalim; bayit gacal, welo yiweneihu. 
job 20:20	ki lo yada‘ shaleiw bewiTno; baHamudo, lo yemaleiT. 
job 20:21	’ein sarid le’akhelo; ‘al kein, lo yaHil Tuwo. 
job 20:22	bimlot feqo yeizer lo; kal yad ‘ameil tewo’enu. 
job 20:23	yehi lemalei wiTno, yeshalaH bo Haron ’apo; weyamTeir ‘aleimo, bilHumo. 
job 20:24	yiwraH mineisheq barcel; taHlefeihu, qeshet neHushah. 
job 20:25	shalaf wayeizei migeiwah uwaraq mimerorato yahalokh, ‘alaw ’eimim. 
job 20:26	kal Hoshekh Tamun lizpunaw te’akheleihu ’eish lo nupaH; yeira‘ sarid be’aholo. 
job 20:27	yegalu shamayim ‘awono; we’erez, mitqomamah lo. 
job 20:28	yigel yewul beito; nigarot, beyom ’apo. 
job 20:29	ceh Heileq ’adam rasha‘ mei’elohim; wenaHalat ’imro mei’eil.
job 21:1	waya‘an ’iyow, wayomar. 
job 21:2	shim‘u moa‘ milati; utehi cot, tanHumoteikhem. 
job 21:3	’uni we’anokhi ’adabeir; we’aHar daberi tal‘ig. 
job 21:4	he’anokhi le’adam siHi; we’im madua‘, lo tiqzar ruHi. 
job 21:5	penu ’eilay wehashamu; wesimu yad ‘al peh. 
job 21:6	we’im cakharti weniwhaleti; we’aHac besari, palazut. 
job 21:7	madua‘ resha‘im yiHyu; ‘atequ, gam gaweru Hayil. 
job 21:8	car‘am nakhon lifneihem ‘imam; weze’eza’eihem, le‘eineihem. 
job 21:9	bateihem shalom mipaHad; welo sheiweT ’eloah ‘aleihem. 
job 21:10	shoro ‘ibar welo yag‘il; tefaleiT parato, welo teshakeil. 
job 21:11	yeshaleHu khazon ‘awileihem; weyaldeihem, yeraqeidun. 
job 21:12	yis’u ketof wekhinor; weyismeHu, leqol ‘ugaw. 
job 21:13	yewalu yekhalu waTow yemeihem; uwerega‘, she’ol yeiHatu. 
job 21:14	wayomeru la’eil sur mimenu; weda‘at derakhekha, lo Hafazenu. 
job 21:15	mah shaday ki na‘awdenu; umah no‘il, ki nifga‘ bo. 
job 21:16	hein lo weyadam Tuwam; ‘azat resha‘im, raHaqah meni. 
job 21:17	kamah neir resha‘im yid‘akh, weyawo ‘aleimo ’eidam; Hawalim, yeHaleiq be’apo. 
job 21:18	yihyu, ketewen lifnei ruaH; ukhemoz, genawatu sufah. 
job 21:19	’eloah, yizpon lewanaw ’ono; yeshaleim ’eilaw weyeida‘. 
job 21:20	yir’u ‘eino ‘einaw kido; umeiHamat shaday yishteh. 
job 21:21	ki mah Hefzo beweito ’aHaraw; umispar Hodashaw Huzazu. 
job 21:22	hal’eil yelamed da‘at; wehu, ramim yishpoT. 
job 21:23	ceh, yamut be‘ezem tumo; kulo, shal’anan weshaleiw. 
job 21:24	‘aTinaw male’u Halaw; umoaH ‘azmotaw yeshuqeh. 
job 21:25	weceh, yamut benefesh marah; welo ’akhal, baTowah. 
job 21:26	yaHad ‘al ‘afar yishkawu; werimah, tekhasseh ‘aleihem. 
job 21:27	hein yada‘ti maHshewoteikhem; umecimot, ‘alay taHmosu. 
job 21:28	ki tomeru, ’ayeih weit nadiw; we’ayeih, ’ohel mishkenot resha‘im. 
job 21:29	halo ’eltem ‘owrei darekh; we’ototam, lo tenakeiru. 
job 21:30	ki leyom ’eid yeiHasekh ra‘; leyom ‘awarot yuwalu. 
job 21:31	mi yagid ‘al panaw darko; wehu ‘asah, mi yeshalem lo. 
job 21:32	wehu liqwarot yuwal; we‘al gadish yishqod. 
job 21:33	matequ lo, rigwei naHal we’aHaraw kal ’adam yimshokh; ulefanaw, ’ein mispar. 
job 21:34	we’eikh tenaHamuni hawel; uteshuwoteikhem, nish’ar ma‘al.
job 22:1	waya‘an ’elifac hateimani, wayomar. 
job 22:2	hal’eil yiskan gawer; ki yiskon ‘aleimo maskil. 
job 22:3	haHeifez leshaday ki tizdaq; we’im beza‘, ki tateim derakhekha. 
job 22:4	hamiyir’atekha yokhiHekha; yawo ‘imekha, bamishpaT. 
job 22:5	halo ra‘atekha rabah; we’ein qeiz, la‘awonotekha. 
job 22:6	ki taHbol ’aHekha Hinam; uwigdei ‘arumim tafshiT. 
job 22:7	lo mayim ‘ayeif tashqeh; umeira‘eiw, timna‘ laHem. 
job 22:8	we’ish ceroa‘ lo ha’arez; unesu fanim, yeishew bah. 
job 22:9	’almanot shilaHta reiqam; ucero‘ot yetomim yeduka. 
job 22:10	‘al kein sewiwotekha faHim; wiwahelkha paHad pit’om. 
job 22:11	’o Hoshekh lo tir’eh; weshif‘at mayim tekhasseka. 
job 22:12	halo ’eloah gowah shamayim; ure’eih rosh kokhawim ki ramu. 
job 22:13	we’amarta mah yada‘ ’eil; haw‘ad ‘arafel yishpoT. 
job 22:14	‘awim seiter lo welo yir’eh; weHug mayim, yithalakh. 
job 22:15	ha’oraH ‘olam tishmor; ’asher darekhu metei ’awen. 
job 22:16	’asher qumeTu welo ‘eit; nahar, yuzaq yesodam. 
job 22:17	ha’omerim la’eil sur mimenu; umah yif‘al shaday lamo. 
job 22:18	wehu milei wateihem Tow; wa‘azat resha‘im, raHaqah meni. 
job 22:19	yir’u zadiqim weyismaHu; wenaqi, yil‘ag lamo. 
job 22:20	’im lo nikhHad qimanu; weyitram, ’akhelah ’eish. 
job 22:21	hasken na ‘imo; ushelm bahem, tewo’atkha Towah. 
job 22:22	qaH na mipiw torah; wesim ’amaraw, bilwawekha. 
job 22:23	’im tashuw ‘adosha day tibaneh; tarHiq ‘awlah, mei’aholekha. 
job 22:24	weshit ‘al ‘afar bazer; uwezur neHalim ’ofir. 
job 22:25	wehayah shaday bezarekha; wekhesef to‘afot lakh. 
job 22:26	ki ’ac ‘al shaday tit‘anag; wetisa ’el ’eloah panekha. 
job 22:27	ta‘tir ’eilaw weyishma‘eka; unedarekha teshaleim. 
job 22:28	wetigcar ’omer weyaqam lakh; we‘al derakhekha, nagah ’or. 
job 22:29	ki hishpilu watomer geiwah; weshaH ‘einayim yoshia‘. 
job 22:30	yemaleiT ’i naqi; wenimlaT, bewor kapekha.
job 23:1	waya‘an ’iyow, wayomar. 
job 23:2	gam hayom meri siHi; yadi, kawedah ‘al ’anHati. 
job 23:3	mi yitein yada‘ti we’emza’eihu; ’awo, ‘ad tekhunato. 
job 23:4	’e‘erkhah lefanaw mishpaT; ufi, ’amalei tokhaHot. 
job 23:5	’eide‘ah milim ya‘aneini; we’awinah, mah yomar li. 
job 23:6	haberaw koaH yariw ‘imadi; lo ’akh hu, yasim bi. 
job 23:7	sham, yashar nokhaH ‘imo; wa’afaleTah lanezaH, mishofeTi. 
job 23:8	hein qedem ’ehelokh we’einenu; we’aHor, welo ’awin lo. 
job 23:9	semol ba‘asoto welo ’aHac; ya‘Tof yamin, welo ’er’eh. 
job 23:10	ki yada‘ derekh ‘imadi; beHanani, kaccahaw ’eizei. 
job 23:11	ba’ashuro ’aHacah ragli; darko shamarti welo ’aT. 
job 23:12	mizwat fataw welo ’amish; meiHuqi, zafanti ’imrei fiw. 
job 23:13	wehu we’eHad umi yeshiwenu; wenafsho ’iwwetah waya‘as. 
job 23:14	ki yashlim Huqi; wekhaheinah rabot ‘imo. 
job 23:15	‘al kein mipanaw ’ebaheil; ’etbonein, we’efHad mimenu. 
job 23:16	we’eil heirakh libi; weshaday, hiwhilani. 
job 23:17	ki lo nizmati mipenei Hoshekh; umipanay, kissah ’ofel. 
job 24:1	madua‘, mishaday lo nizpenu ‘itim; weyode‘o weyode‘aw, lo Hacu yamaw. 
job 24:2	gewulot yasigu; ‘eider gacelu, wayir‘u. 
job 24:3	Hamor yetomim yinhagu; yaHbelu, shor ’almanah. 
job 24:4	yaTu ’ewyonim midarekh; yaHad Hube’u, ‘aniyei ’arez. 
job 24:5	hein pera’im bamidbar, yaze’u befa‘olam meshaHarei laTaref; ‘arawah lo leHem, lane‘arim. 
job 24:6	basadeh belilo yaqziru yiqzoru; wekherem rasha‘ yelaqeishu. 
job 24:7	‘arom yalinu mibeli lewush; we’ein kesut, baqarah. 
job 24:8	miccerem harim yirTawu; umibeli maHseh, Hibequ zur. 
job 24:9	yigcelu mishod yatom; we‘al ‘ani yaHbolu. 
job 24:10	‘arom hilekhu beli lewush; ure‘eiwim, nase’u ‘omer. 
job 24:11	bein shurotam yazhiru; yeqawim darekhu, wayizma’u. 
job 24:12	mei‘ir metim yin’aqu, wenefesh Halalim teshawweia‘; we’eloah, lo yasim tiflah. 
job 24:13	heimah hayu bemoredei ’or lo hikiru derakhaw; welo yashewu, bintiwotaw. 
job 24:14	la’or yaqum rozeiaH, yiqTal ‘ani we’ewyon; uwalaylah, yehi khaganaw. 
job 24:15	we‘ein no’eif shamerah neshef leimor lo teshureini ‘ayin; weseiter panim yasim. 
job 24:16	Hatar baHoshekh, batim yomam Hitemu lamo, lo yade‘u ’or. 
job 24:17	ki yaHdaw boqer lamo zalmawet; ki yakir, balhot zalmawet. 
job 24:18	qal hu ‘al penei mayim, tequlal Helqatam ba’arez; lo yifneh derekh keramim. 
job 24:19	ziyah gam Hom, yigcelu meimei sheleg, she’ol HaTa’u. 
job 24:20	yishkaHeihu reHem metaqo rimah, ‘od lo yiccakheir; watishaweir ka‘eiz ‘awlah. 
job 24:21	ro‘eh ‘aqarah lo teileid; we’almanah, lo yeyeiTiw. 
job 24:22	umashakh ’abirim bekhoHo; yaqum, welo ya’amin baHayin. 
job 24:23	yiten lo laweTaH weyisha‘ein; we‘eineihu, ‘al darkheihem. 
job 24:24	romu me‘aT we’einenu, wehumekhu, kakol yiqafezun; ukherosh shibolet yimalu. 
job 24:25	we’im lo ’eifo mi yakhciweini; weyaseim le’al, milati.
job 25:1	waya‘an bildad hashuHi, wayomar. 
job 25:2	hamsheil wafaHad ‘imo; ‘oseh lom, bimromaw. 
job 25:3	hayeish mispar ligdudaw; we‘al mi, lo yaqum ’oreihu. 
job 25:4	umah yizdaq ’enosh ‘im ’eil; umah yickeh, yelud ’ishah. 
job 25:5	hein ‘ad yareiaH welo ya’ahil; wekhokhawim, lo caku we‘einaw. 
job 25:6	’af ki ’enosh rimah; uwen ’adam, tolei‘ah.
job 26:1	waya‘an ’iyow, wayomar. 
job 26:2	meh ‘acarta lelo khoaH; hosha‘ta, ceroa‘ lo ‘oc. 
job 26:3	mah ya‘azta lelo Hakhmah wetushiyah, larow hoda‘eta. 
job 26:4	’et mi higadta milin; wenishmat mi yaze’ah mimeka. 
job 26:5	harefa’im yeHolalu; mitaHat mayim, weshokheneihem. 
job 26:6	‘arom she’ol negdo; we’ein kesut, la’awadon. 
job 26:7	noTeh zafon ‘al tohu; toleh ’erez, ‘al beli mah. 
job 26:8	zoreir mayim be‘awaw; welo niwqa‘ ‘anan taHtam. 
job 26:9	me’aHeic penei khisseih; parsheic ‘alaw ‘anano. 
job 26:10	Hoq Hag ‘al penei mayim; ‘ad takhlit ’or ‘im Hoshekh. 
job 26:11	‘amudei shamayim yerofafu; weyitmehu, miga‘arato. 
job 26:12	bekhoHo raga‘ hayam; uwituwenato uwitwunato, maHaz rahaw. 
job 26:13	beruHo shamayim shifrah; Holalah yado, naHash bariaH. 
job 26:14	hen ’eileh qezot darko derakhaw, umah sheimez dawar nishma‘ bo; wera‘am gewurato gewurotaw, mi yitbonan.
job 27:1	wayosef ’iyow se’eit meshalo, wayomar. 
job 27:2	Hay ’eil heisir mishpaTi; weshaday, heimar nafshi. 
job 27:3	ki khal ‘od nishmati wi; weruaH ’eloah be’api. 
job 27:4	’im tedabeirenah sefatay ‘awlah; uleshoni, ’im yehgeh remiyah. 
job 27:5	Halilah li ’im ’azdiq ’etkhem ‘ad ’egwa‘; lo ’asir tumati mimeni. 
job 27:6	bezidqati heHecaqti welo ’arpeha; lo yeHeraf lewawi, miyamay. 
job 27:7	yehi kherasha‘ ’oyewi; umitqomi khe‘awwal. 
job 27:8	ki mah tiqwat Haneif ki yiwza‘; ki yeishel ’eloah nafsho. 
job 27:9	haza‘aqato yishma‘ ’eil; ki tawo ‘alaw zarah. 
job 27:10	’im ‘al shaday yit‘anag; yiqra ’eloah bekhal ‘eit. 
job 27:11	’oreh ’etkhem beyad ’eil; ’asher ‘imosha day, lo ’akhaHeid. 
job 27:12	hein ’atem kulekhem Hacitem; welamah ceh, hewel tehbalu. 
job 27:13	ceh Heileq ’adam rasha‘ ‘im ’eil; wenaHalat ‘arizim, mishaday yiqaHu. 
job 27:14	’im yirbu wanaw lemo Harew; weze’eza’aw, lo yisbe‘u laHem. 
job 27:15	serido ridaw bamawet yiqaweiru; we’almenotaw, lo tiwkenah. 
job 27:16	’im yizbor ke‘afar kasef; wekhaHomer, yakhin malbush. 
job 27:17	yakhin wezadiq yilbash; wekhesef, naqi yaHaloq. 
job 27:18	banah kha‘ash beito; ukhesukah, ‘asah nozeir. 
job 27:19	‘ashir yishkaw welo yei’aseif; ‘einaw paqaH we’einenu. 
job 27:20	tasigeihu khamayim balahot; laylah, genawatu sufah. 
job 27:21	yisa’eihu qadim weyeilakh; wisa‘areihu, mimeqomo. 
job 27:22	weyashleikh ‘alaw welo yaHmol; miyado, baroaH yiwraH. 
job 27:23	yispoq ‘aleimo khapeimo; weyishroq ‘alaw, mimeqomo. 
job 28:1	ki yeish lakesef moza; umaqom, laccahaw yacoqu. 
job 28:2	barcel mei‘afar yuqaH; we’ewen, yazuq neHushah. 
job 28:3	qeiz sam laHoshekh, ulekhal takhlit hu Hoqeir; ’ewen ’ofel wezalmawet. 
job 28:4	paraz naHal mei‘im gar, hanishkaHim mini ragel; dalu mei’enosh na‘u. 
job 28:5	’erez, mimenah yeizei laHem; wetaHteha, nehpakh kemo ’eish. 
job 28:6	meqom sapir ’awaneha; we‘afrot cahaw lo. 
job 28:7	natiw lo yeda‘o ‘ayiT; welo cafatu, ‘ein ’ayah. 
job 28:8	lo hidrikhuhu wenei shaHaz; lo ‘adah ‘alaw shaHal. 
job 28:9	baHalamish shalaH yado; hafakh mishoresh harim. 
job 28:10	bazurot ye’orim biqeia‘; wekhal yeqar, ra’atah ‘eino. 
job 28:11	mibekhi neharot Hibeish; weta‘alumah, yozi ’or.
job 28:12	wehaHakhemah mei’ayin timazei; we’ei ceh meqom binah. 
job 28:13	lo yada‘ ’enosh ‘erkah; welo timazei, be’erez haHayim. 
job 28:14	tehom ’amar lo wi hi; weyam ’amar, ’ein ‘imadi. 
job 28:15	lo yutan segor taHteha; welo yishaqeil, kesef meHirah. 
job 28:16	lo tesuleh bekhetem ’ofir; beshoham yaqar wesapir. 
job 28:17	lo ya‘arkhenah cahaw ucekhokhit; utemuratah keli fac. 
job 28:18	ramot wegawish lo yiccakheir; umeshekh Hakhmah mipeninim. 
job 28:19	lo ya‘arkhenah piTdat kush; bekhetem Tahor, lo tesuleh.
job 28:20	wehaHakhemah mei’ayin tawo; we’ei ceh, meqom binah. 
job 28:21	wene‘elmah mei‘einei khal Hay; umei‘of hashamayim nistarah. 
job 28:22	’awadon wamawet ’ameru; be’aceneinu, shama‘nu shim‘ah. 
job 28:23	’elohim heiwin darkah; wehu, yada‘ ’et meqomah. 
job 28:24	ki hu liqzot ha’arez yabiT; taHat kal hashamayim yir’eh. 
job 28:25	la‘asot laruaH mishqal; umayim, tikein bemidah. 
job 28:26	ba‘asto lamaTar Hoq; wederekh, laHacic qolot. 
job 28:27	’ac ra’ah waysaperah; hekhinah, wegam Haqarah. 
job 28:28	wayomer la’adam, hein yir’at ’adonay hi Hakhmah wesur meira‘ binah.
job 29:1	wayosef ’iyow se’eit meshalo, wayomar. 
job 29:2	mi yiteneini kheyarHei qedem; kimei, ’eloah yishmereini. 
job 29:3	behilo neiro ‘alei roshi; le’oro ’eilekh Hoshekh. 
job 29:4	ka’asher hayiti bimei Harepi; besod ’eloah, ‘alei ’aholi. 
job 29:5	be‘od day ‘imadi; sewiwotay ne‘aray. 
job 29:6	birHoz halikhay beHeimah; wezur yazuq ‘imadi, palgei shamen. 
job 29:7	bezeiti sha‘ar ‘alei qaret; bareHow, ’akhin moshawi. 
job 29:8	ra’uni ne‘arim weneHba’u; wishishim qamu ‘amadu. 
job 29:9	rim ‘azeru wemilim; wekhaf, yasimu lefihem. 
job 29:10	qol negidim neHba’u; uleshonam, leHikam daweiqah. 
job 29:11	ki ’ocen me‘ah wate’ashereini; we‘ayin ra’atah, wate‘ideini. 
job 29:12	ki ’amaleiT ‘ani meshawweia‘; weyatom, welo ‘oceir lo. 
job 29:13	birkat ’oweid ‘alay tawo; weleiw ’almanah ’arnin. 
job 29:14	zedeq lawashti wayilbasheini; kim‘il wezanif, mishpaTi. 
job 29:15	‘einayim hayiti la‘iwweir; weraglayim lapisseiaH ’ani. 
job 29:16	’aw ’anokhi la’ewyonim; weriw lo yada‘ti ’eHqereihu. 
job 29:17	wa’ashaberah metale‘ot ‘awwal; umishinaw, ’ashlikh Taref. 
job 29:18	wa’omar ‘im qini ’egwa‘; wekhaHol, ’arbeh yamim. 
job 29:19	shareshi fatuaH ’elei mayim; weTal, yalin biqziri. 
job 29:20	kewodi Hadash ‘imadi; weqashti, beyadi taHalif. 
job 29:21	li shame‘u weyiHeilu; weyidemu, lemo ‘azati. 
job 29:22	’aHarei dewari lo yishnu; we‘aleimo, tiTof milati. 
job 29:23	weyiHalu khamaTar li; ufihem, pa‘aru lemalqosh. 
job 29:24	’esHaq ’aleihem lo ya’aminu; we’or panay, lo yapilun. 
job 29:25	’ewaHar darkam we’eisheiw rosh we’eshkon kemelekh bagedud; ka’asher ’aweilim yenaHeim. 
job 30:1	we‘atah saHaqu ‘alay ze‘irim mimeni, leyamim ’asher ma’asti ’awotam; lashit, ‘im kalwei zoni. 
job 30:2	gam koaH yedeihem lamah li; ‘aleimo, ’awad kalaH. 
job 30:3	beHeser uwekhafan, galmud ha‘oreqim ziyah; ’emesh, sho’ah umesho’ah. 
job 30:4	haqoTefim maluaH ‘alei siaH; weshoresh retamim laHmam. 
job 30:5	min geiw yegorashu; yari‘u ‘aleimo, kaganaw. 
job 30:6	ba‘aruz neHalim lishkon; Horei ‘afar wekheifim. 
job 30:7	bein siHim yinhaqu; taHat Harul yesupaHu. 
job 30:8	benei nawal gam benei weli sheim; nike’u, min ha’arez. 
job 30:9	we‘atah neginatam hayiti; wa’ehi lahem lemilah. 
job 30:10	ti‘awuni raHaqu meni; umipanay, lo Hasekhu roq. 
job 30:11	ki yitro yitri fitaH way‘aneini; weresen, mipanay shileiHu. 
job 30:12	‘al yamin pirHaH yaqumu raglay shileiHu; wayasolu ‘alay, ’areHot ’eidam. 
job 30:13	natesu, netiwati lehawwati yo‘ilu; lo ‘oceir lamo. 
job 30:14	keferez raHaw ye’etayu; taHat ’ah, hitgalgalu. 
job 30:15	hahepakh ‘alay, balahot tirdof karuaH nediwati; ukhe‘aw, ‘awerah yeshu‘ati. 
job 30:16	we‘atah, ‘alay tishtapeikh nafshi; yoHacuni yemei ‘oni. 
job 30:17	laylah, ‘azamay niqar mei‘alay; we‘oreqay, lo yishkawun. 
job 30:18	beraw koaH yitHapeis lewushi; kefi khutaneti ya’acreini. 
job 30:19	horani laHomer; wa’etmasheil, ke‘afar wa’eifer. 
job 30:20	’ashawwa‘ ’eilekha welo ta‘aneini; ‘amadti, watitbonen bi. 
job 30:21	teihafeikh le’akhcar li; be‘ozem yadekha tisTemeini. 
job 30:22	tisa’eini ’el ruaH tarkiweini; utemogegeini, teshuwweh tushiyah. 
job 30:23	ki yada‘ti mawet teshiweini; uweit mo‘eid lekhal Hay. 
job 30:24	’akh lo we‘i yishlaH yad; ’im befido, lahen shua‘. 
job 30:25	’im lo wakhiti liqsheih yom; ‘agemah nafshi, la’ewyon. 
job 30:26	ki Tow qiwwiti wayawo ra‘; wa’ayaHalah le’or, wayawo ’ofel. 
job 30:27	mei‘ay ruteHu welo damu, qidemuni yemei ‘oni. 
job 30:28	qodeir hilakhti belo Hamah; qamti waqahal ’ashawweia‘. 
job 30:29	’aH hayiti letanim; wereia‘, liwnot ya‘anah. 
job 30:30	‘ori shaHar mei‘alay; we‘azmi Harah, mini Horew. 
job 30:31	wayhi le’eiwel kinori; we‘ugawi, leqol bokhim. 
job 31:1	berit karati le‘einay; umah ’etbonein, ‘al betulah. 
job 31:2	umeh Heileq ’eloah mima‘al; wenaHalat day, mimeromim. 
job 31:3	halo ’eid le‘awwal; weneikher, lefo‘alei ’awen. 
job 31:4	halo hu yir’eh derakhay; wekhal ze‘aday yispor. 
job 31:5	’im halakhti ‘im shaw; wataHash ‘al mirmah ragli. 
job 31:6	yishqeleini wemocenei zedeq; weyeida‘ ’eloah, tumati. 
job 31:7	’im tiTeh ’ashuri mini hadarekh we’aHar ‘einay halakh libi; uwekhapay, dawaq mu’um
job 31:8	’ecre‘ah we’aHeir yokheil; weze’eza’ay yeshorashu. 
job 31:9	’im niftah libi ‘al ’ishah; we‘al petaH rei‘i ’araweti. 
job 31:10	tiTHan le’aHeir ’ishti; we‘aleha, yikhre‘un ’aHeirin. 
job 31:11	ki hu hi cimah; wehi wehu, ‘awon pelilim. 
job 31:12	ki ’eish hi ‘ad ’awadon tokheil; uwekhal tewu’ati teshareish. 
job 31:13	’im ’em’as, mishpaT ‘awdi wa’amati; beriwam, ‘imadi. 
job 31:14	umah ’e‘eseh ki yaqum ’eil; wekhi yifqod, mah ’ashiwenu. 
job 31:15	halo wabeTen ‘oseini ‘asahu; waykhunenu, bareHem ’eHad. 
job 31:16	’im ’emna‘ meiHeifez dalim; we‘einei ’almanah ’akhaleh. 
job 31:17	we’okhal piti lewadi; welo ’akhal yatom mimenah. 
job 31:18	ki mine‘uray gedeilani khe’aw; umibeTen ’imi ’anHenah. 
job 31:19	’im ’er’eh ’oweid mibeli lewush; we’ein kesut, la’ewyon. 
job 31:20	’im lo weirakhuni Halazo Halazaw; umigeic kewasay yitHamam. 
job 31:21	’im hanifoti ‘al yatom yadi; ki ’er’eh washa‘ar, ‘ecrati. 
job 31:22	keteifi mishikhmah tipol; we’ecro‘i, miqanah tishaweir. 
job 31:23	ki faHad ’eilay ’eid ’eil; umise’eito, lo ’ukhal. 
job 31:24	’im samti cahaw kisli; welaketem, ’amarti miwTaHi. 
job 31:25	’im ’esmaH ki raw Heili; wekhi khabir, maze’ah yadi. 
job 31:26	’im ’er’eh ’or ki yaheil; weyareiaH, yaqar holeikh. 
job 31:27	wayift basseiter libi; watishaq yadi lefi. 
job 31:28	gam hu ‘awon pelili; ki khiHashti la’eil mima‘al. 
job 31:29	’im ’esmaH befid mesan’i; wehit‘orarti, ki meza’o ra‘. 
job 31:30	welo natati laHaTo Hiki; lish’ol be’alah nafsho. 
job 31:31	’im lo ’ameru metei ’aholi; mi yitein mibesaro, lo nisba‘. 
job 31:32	baHuz lo yalin geir; delatay, la’oraH ’eftaH. 
job 31:33	’im kissiti khe’adam pesha‘ay; liTmon beHubi ‘awoni. 
job 31:34	ki ’e‘eroz hamon rabah, uwuc mishpaHot yeHiteini; wa’edom, lo ’eizei fataH. 
job 31:35	mi yiten li shomeia‘ li, hen tawi shaday ya‘aneini; weseifer kataw, ’ish riwi. 
job 31:36	’im lo ‘aloshi khemi ’esa’enu; ’e‘endenu ‘aTarot li. 
job 31:37	mispar ze‘aday ’agidenu; kemo nagid, ’aqarawenu. 
job 31:38	’im ‘alay ’admati tic‘aq; weyaHad, telameha yiwkayun. 
job 31:39	’im koHah ’akhalti weli khasef; wenefesh be‘aleha hipaHeti. 
job 31:40	taHat HiTah yeizei HoaH, wetaHat se‘orah wa’eshah; tamu, diwrei ’iyow.
job 32:1	wayishbetu sheloshet ha’anashim ha’eileh mei‘anot ’et ’iyow; ki hu zadiq be‘einaw.
job 32:2	wayiHar ’af ’elihu wen barakh’eil habuci mimishpaHat ram be’iyow Harah ’apo; ‘al zadeqo nafsho, mei’elohim. 
job 32:3	uwishloshet rei‘aw Harah ’apo ‘al ’asher lo maze’u ma‘aneh; wayarshi‘u, ’et ’iyow. 
job 32:4	we’elihu, Hikah ’et ’iyow bidwarim; ki ceqeinim heimah mimenu leyamim. 
job 32:5	wayar ’elihu, ki ’ein ma‘aneh, befi sheloshet ha’anashim, wayiHar ’apo.
job 32:6	waya‘an ’elihu wen barakh’eil habuci, wayomar za‘ir ’ani leyamim we’atem yeshishim; ‘al kein caHalti wa’ira meiHawwot dei‘i ’etkhem. 
job 32:7	’amarti yamim yedabeiru; werow nim, yodi‘u Hakhmah 
job 32:8	’akhein ruaH hi we’enosh; wenishmat shaday tewineim. 
job 32:9	lo rabim yeHkamu; uceqeinim, yawinu mishpaT. 
job 32:10	lakhein ’amarti shim‘ah li; ’aHawweh dei‘i ’af ’ani. 
job 32:11	hein hoHalti lediwreikhem, ’acin ‘ad tewunoteikhem; ‘ad taHqerun milin. 
job 32:12	we‘adeikhem, ’etbonan wehineih ’ein le’iyow mokhiaH; ‘oneh ’amaraw mikem. 
job 32:13	pen tomeru mazanu Hakhmah ’eil yidefenu lo ’ish. 
job 32:14	welo ‘arakh ’eilay milin; uwe’imreikhem, lo ’ashiwenu. 
job 32:15	Hatu lo ‘anu ‘od; he‘tiqu meihem milim. 
job 32:16	wehoHalti ki lo yedabeiru; ki ‘amedu, lo ‘anu ‘od. 
job 32:17	’a‘aneh ’af ’ani Helqi; ’aHawweh dei‘i ’af ’ani. 
job 32:18	ki maleiti milim; heziqatni, ruaH biTni. 
job 32:19	hineih wiTni, keyayin lo yipateiaH; ke’owot Hadashim, yibaqeia‘. 
job 32:20	’adaberah weyirwaH li; ’eftaH sefatay we’e‘eneh. 
job 32:21	’al na ’esa fenei ’ish; we’el ’adam, lo ’akhaneh. 
job 32:22	ki lo yada‘ti ’akhaneh; kim‘aT, yisa’eini ‘oseini. 
job 33:1	we’ulam, shema‘ na ’iyow milay; wekhal dewaray ha’acinah. 
job 33:2	hineih na pataHti fi; diberah leshoni weHiki. 
job 33:3	yosher libi ’amaray; weda‘at fatay, barur mileilu. 
job 33:4	ruaH ’eil ‘asateni; wenishmat shaday teHayeini. 
job 33:5	’im tukhal hashiweini; ‘erkhah lefanay, hityazawah. 
job 33:6	hein ’ani khefikha la’eil; meiHomer, qorazti gam ’ani. 
job 33:7	hineih ’eimati lo tewa‘ateka; we’akhpi, ‘alekha lo yikhbad. 
job 33:8	’akh ’amarta we’acenay; weqol milin ’eshma‘. 
job 33:9	cakh ’ani, beli fasha‘ Haf ’anokhi; welo ‘awon li. 
job 33:10	hein tenu’ot ‘alay yimza; yaHsheweini le’oyeiw lo. 
job 33:11	yaseim bassad raglay; yishmor, kal ’areHotay. 
job 33:12	hen cot lo zadaqta ’e‘eneka; ki yirbeh ’eloha, mei’enosh. 
job 33:13	madua‘ ’eilaw riwota; ki khal dewaraw, lo ya‘aneh. 
job 33:14	ki we’aHat yedaber ’eil; uwishtayim, lo yeshurenah. 
job 33:15	baHalom Hecyon laylah, binfol tardeimah ‘al ’anashim; bitnumot, ‘alei mishkaw. 
job 33:16	’ac yigleh ’ocen ’anashim; uwemosaram yaHtom. 
job 33:17	lehasir ’adam ma‘aseh; wegeiwah migewer yekhasseh. 
job 33:18	yaHsokh nafsho mini shaHat; weHayato, mei‘awor bashalaH. 
job 33:19	wehukhaH bemakh’ow ‘al mishkawo; weriw werow ‘azamaw ’eitan. 
job 33:20	wecihamatu Hayato laHem; wenafsho, ma’akhal ta’awah. 
job 33:21	yikhel besaro meiro’i; ushefi weshupu ‘azmotaw, lo ru’’u. 
job 33:22	watiqraw lashaHat nafsho; weHayato, lamitim. 
job 33:23	’im yeish ‘alaw mal’akh, meiliz, ’eHad mini ’alef; lehagid le’adam yashero. 
job 33:24	wayHunenu, wayomer, peda‘eihu meiredet shaHat, mazati khofer. 
job 33:25	ruTafash besaro mino‘ar; yashuw, limei ‘alumaw. 
job 33:26	ye‘tar ’el ’eloah wayirzeihu, wayar panaw bitru‘ah; wayashew le’enosh, zidqato. 
job 33:27	yashor ‘al ’anashim, wayomer, HaTati weyashar he‘eweiti, welo shawah li. 
job 33:28	padah nafshi nafsho mei‘awor bashaHat; weHayati weHayato ba’or tir’eh. 
job 33:29	hen kal ’eileh yif‘al ’eil; pa‘amayim shalosh ‘im gawer. 
job 33:30	lehashiw nafsho mini shaHat; lei’or, be’or haHayim. 
job 33:31	haqsheiw ’iyow shema‘ li; haHareish, we’anokhi ’adabeir. 
job 33:32	’im yeish milin hashiweini; dabeir, ki Hafazti zadeqeka. 
job 33:33	’im ’ayin ’atah shema‘ li; haHareish, wa’a’alefkha Hakhmah
job 34:1	waya‘an ’elihu, wayomar. 
job 34:2	shim‘u Hakhamim milay; weyode‘im, ha’acinu li. 
job 34:3	ki ’ocen milin tiwHan; weHeikh, yiT‘am le’ekhol. 
job 34:4	mishpaT niwHarah lanu; neide‘ah weineinu mah Tow. 
job 34:5	ki ’amar ’iyow zadaqti; we’eil, heisir mishpaTi. 
job 34:6	‘al mishpaTi ’akhacceiw; ’anush Hizi weli fasha‘. 
job 34:7	mi gewer ke’iyow; yishteh la‘ag kamayim. 
job 34:8	we’araH leHewrah ‘im po‘alei ’awen; welalekhet, ‘im ’anshei resha‘. 
job 34:9	ki ’amar lo yiskan gawer; birzoto, ‘im ’elohim. 
job 34:10	lakhein ’anashei leiwaw, shim‘u li Halilah la’eil meiresha‘, weshaday mei‘awel. 
job 34:11	ki fo‘al ’adam yeshalem lo; ukhe’oraH ’ish, yamzi’enu. 
job 34:12	’af ’amenam, ’eil lo yarshia‘; weshaday, lo ye‘awweit mishpaT. 
job 34:13	mi faqad ‘alaw ’arezah; umi m teiweil kulah. 
job 34:14	’im yasim ’eilaw libo; ruHo wenishmato, ’eilaw ye’esof. 
job 34:15	yigwa‘ kal basar yaHad; we’adam, ‘al ‘afar yashuw. 
job 34:16	we’im binah shim‘ah cot; ha’acinah, leqol milay. 
job 34:17	ha’af sonei mishpaT yaHawosh; we’im zadiq kabir tarshia‘. 
job 34:18	ha’amor lemelekh beliya‘al; rasha‘, ’el nediwim. 
job 34:19	’asher lo nasa penei sarim, welo nikar shoa‘ lifnei dal; ki ma‘aseih yadaw kulam. 
job 34:20	rega‘ yamutu waHazot layelah yego‘ashu ‘am weya‘aworu; weyasiru ’abir, lo weyad. 
job 34:21	ki ‘einaw ‘al darkhei ’ish; wekhal ze‘adaw yir’eh. 
job 34:22	’ein Hoshekh we’ein zalmawet; lehissater m po‘alei ’awen. 
job 34:23	ki lo ‘al ’ish yasim ‘od; lahalokh ’el ’eil, bamishpaT. 
job 34:24	yaroa‘ kabirim lo Heiqer; waya‘ameid ’aHeirim taHtam. 
job 34:25	lakhein, yakir ma‘badeihem; wehafakh laylah, weyidaka’u. 
job 34:26	taHat resha‘im sefaqam, bimqom ro’im. 
job 34:27	’asher ‘al kein saru mei’aHaraw; wekhal derakhaw, lo hiskilu. 
job 34:28	lehawi ‘alaw za‘aqat dal; weza‘aqat ‘aniyim yishma‘. 
job 34:29	wehu yashqiT umi yarshia‘, weyasteir panim umi yeshurenu; we‘al go we‘al ’adam yaHad. 
job 34:30	mimelokh ’adam Haneif, mimoqeshei ‘am. 
job 34:31	ki ’el ’eil he’amar nasati, lo ’eHbol. 
job 34:32	bil‘adei ’eHeceh ’atah horeini; ’im ‘awel pa‘alti, lo ’osif. 
job 34:33	hamei‘imekha yeshalmenah ki ma’asta, ki ’atah tiwHar welo ’ani; umah yada‘ta dabeir. 
job 34:34	’anshei leiwaw yomeru li; wegewer Hakham, shomeia‘ li. 
job 34:35	’iyow lo weda‘at yedabeir; udewaraw, lo wehaskeil. 
job 34:36	’awi, yibaHein ’iyow ‘ad nezaH; ‘al teshuwot, be’anshei ’awen. 
job 34:37	ki yosif ‘al HaTato fesha‘ beineinu yispoq; weyerew ’amaraw la’eil.
job 35:1	waya‘an ’elihu, wayomar. 
job 35:2	hacot Hashawta lemishpaT; ’amarta, zidqi mei’eil. 
job 35:3	ki tomar mah yiskan lakh; mah ’o‘il, meiHaTati. 
job 35:4	’ani ’ashiwekha milin; we’et rei‘ekha ‘imakh. 
job 35:5	habeiT shamayim ure’eih; weshur Haqim, gawehu mimeka. 
job 35:6	’im HaTata mah tif‘al bo; werabu fesha‘ekha, mah ta‘aseh lo. 
job 35:7	’im zadaqta mah titen lo; ’o mah miyadekha yiqaH. 
job 35:8	le’ish kamokha rish‘ekha; ulewen ’adam, zidqatekha. 
job 35:9	meirow ‘ashuqim yac‘iqu; yeshawwe‘u micceroa‘ rabim. 
job 35:10	welo ’amar, ’ayeih ’eloah ‘osay; notein cemirot balayelah. 
job 35:11	malefeinu mibahamot ’arez; umei‘of hashamayim yeHakemeinu. 
job 35:12	sham yiz‘aqu welo ya‘aneh; mipenei, ge’on ra‘im. 
job 35:13	’akhosha w lo yishma‘ ’eil; weshaday, lo yeshurenah.

job 35:15	we‘atah, ki ’ayin paqad ’apo; welo yada‘ bapash me’od. 
job 35:16	we’iyow hewel yifzeh pihu; biwli da‘at, milin yakhbir.
job 36:1	wayosef ’elihu, wayomar. 
job 36:2	katar li ce‘eir wa’aHawweka; ki ‘od le’eloah milim. 
job 36:3	’esa dei‘i lemeiraHoq; ulefo‘ali, ’etein zedeq. 
job 36:4	ki ’amenam lo sheqer milay; temim dei‘ot ‘imakh. 
job 36:5	hen ’eil kabir welo yim’as; kabir, koaH leiw. 
job 36:6	lo yeHayeh rasha‘; umishpaT ‘aniyim yitein. 
job 36:7	lo yigra‘ mizadiq, ‘einaw we’et melakhim lakissei; wayoshiweim lanezaH, wayigbahu. 
job 36:8	we’im ’asurim bacciqim; yilakhedun, beHawlei ‘oni. 
job 36:9	wayageid lahem pa‘olam; ufish‘eihem, ki yitgabaru.

job 36:13	weHanfei leiw yasimu ’af; lo yeshawwe‘u, ki ’asaram. 
job 36:14	tamot bano‘ar nafsham; weHayatam, baqedeishim. 
job 36:15	yeHaleiz ‘ani we‘aneyo; weyigel balaHaz ’acenam. 
job 36:16	we’af hasitekha mipi zar, raHaw lo muzaq taHteha; wenaHat leHanekha, malei dashen. 
job 36:17	wedin rasha‘ maleita; din umishpaT yitmokhu. 
job 36:18	ki Heimah pen yesitekha wesafeq; weraw kofer, ’al yaTeka. 
job 36:19	haya‘arokh shu‘akha lo wezar; wekhol, ma’amazei khoaH. 
job 36:20	’al tish’af halayelah; la‘alot ‘amim taHtam. 
job 36:21	hishamer ’al teifen ’el ’awen; ki ‘al ceh, baHarta mei‘oni. 
job 36:22	hen ’eil yasgiw bekhoHo; mi khamohu moreh. 
job 36:23	mi faqad ‘alaw darko; umi ’amar, pa‘alta ‘awlah. 
job 36:24	cekhor ki tasgi fa‘olo; ’asher shoreru ’anashim. 
job 36:25	kal ’adam Hacu wo; ’enosh, yabiT meiraHoq. 
job 36:26	hen ’eil gi welo neida‘; mispar shanaw welo Heiqer. 
job 36:27	ki yegara‘ niTfei mayim; yacoqu maTar le’eido. 
job 36:28	’asher yiccelu sheHaqim; yir‘afu, ‘alei ’adam raw. 
job 36:29	’af ’im yawin mifresei ‘aw; teshu’ot, sukato. 
job 36:30	hein paras ‘alaw ’oro; weshareshei hayam kissah. 
job 36:31	ki wam yadin ‘amim; yiten ’okhel lemakhbir. 
job 36:32	‘al kapayim kissah ’or; wayzaw ‘aleha wemafgia‘. 
job 36:33	yagid ‘alaw rei‘o; miqneh, ’af ‘al ‘oleh. 
job 37:1	’af lecot yeHerad libi; weyitar, mimeqomo. 
job 37:2	shim‘u shamoa‘ berogec qolo; wehegeh, mipiw yeizei.

job 37:5	yar‘eim ’eil beqolo nifla’ot; ‘oseh gedolot, welo neida‘.

job 39:26	hamibinatekha ya’awer neiz; yifros kenafo kenafaw leteiman.
