job 40:1	waya‘an yhoh ’et ’iyow, wayomar. 
job 40:2	harow ‘im shaday yissor; mokhiaH ’eloah ya‘anenah.
job 40:3	waya‘an ’iyow ’et yhoh wayomar. 
job 40:4	hein qaloti mah ’ashiweka; yadi, samti lemo fi. 
job 40:5	’aHat dibarti welo ’e‘eneh; ushetayim, welo ’osif.
job 40:6	waya‘an yhoh ’et ’iyow min se‘arah min se‘arah, wayomar. 
job 40:7	’ecar na khegewer Halazekha; ’esh’alekha, wehodi‘eini. 
job 40:8	ha’af tafeir mishpaTi; tarshi‘eini, lema‘an tizdaq. 
job 40:9	we’im ceroa‘ ka’eil lakh; uweqol, kamohu tar‘eim. 
job 40:10	‘adeih na ga’on wagowah; wehod wehadar tilbash. 
job 40:11	hafeiz ‘ewrot ’apekha; ure’eih khal gei’eh, wehashpileihu. 
job 40:12	re’eih khal gei’eh hakhni‘eihu; wahadokh resha‘im taHtam. 
job 40:13	Tameneim be‘afar yaHad; peneihem, Hawosh baTamun. 
job 40:14	wegam ’ani ’odeka; ki toshia‘ lekha yeminekha. 
job 40:15	hineih na weheimot ’asher ‘asiti ‘imakh; Hazir, kabaqar yokheil. 
job 40:16	hineih na khoHo wematenaw; we’ono, bishrirei wiTno. 
job 40:17	yaHpoz cenawo khemo ’arec; gidei faHado faHadaw yesoragu. 
job 40:18	‘azamaw ’afiqei neHushah; geramaw, kimTil barcel. 
job 40:19	hu reishit darkhei ’eil; ha‘oso yageish Harbo. 
job 40:20	ki wul harim yis’u lo; wekhal Hayat hasadeh, yesaHaqu sham. 
job 40:21	taHat ze’elim yishkaw; beseiter qaneh uwizah. 
job 40:22	yesukuhu ze’elim zilalo; yesubuhu, ‘arwei naHal. 
job 40:23	hein ya‘ashoq nahar lo yaHpoc; yiwTaH ki yagiaH yardein ’el pihu. 
job 40:24	be‘einaw yiqaHenu; bemoqshim, yinqaw ’af. 
job 41:1	timshokh liwyatan beHakah; uweHewel, tashqia‘ leshono. 
job 41:2	hatasim ’agmon be’apo; uweHoaH, tiqow leHeyo. 
job 41:3	hayarbeh ’eilekha taHanunim; ’im yedabeir ’eilekha rakot. 
job 41:4	hayikhrot berit ‘imakh; tiqaHenu, le‘ewed ‘olam. 
job 41:5	hatsaHeq bo kazipor; wetiqsherenu, lena‘arotekha. 
job 41:6	yikhru ‘alaw Habarim; yeHezuhu, bein kena‘anim. 
job 41:7	hatmalei wesukot ‘oro; uwezilzal dagim rosho. 
job 41:8	sim ‘alaw kapekha; cekhor milHamah, ’al tosaf. 
job 41:9	hein toHalto nikhcawah; hagam ’el mar’aw yuTal. 
job 41:10	lo ’akhcar ki ye‘urenu; umi hu, lefanay yityazaw. 
job 41:11	mi hiqdimani wa’ashaleim; taHat kal hashamayim li hu. 
job 41:12	lo lo ’aHarish badaw; udewar gewurot, weHin ‘erko. 
job 41:13	mi gilah penei lewusho; bekhefel risno, mi yawo. 
job 41:14	daltei fanaw mi fiteiaH; sewiwot shinaw ’eimah. 
job 41:15	ga’awah ’afiqei maginim; sagur, Hotam zar. 
job 41:16	’eHad be’eHad yigashu; weruaH, lo yawo weineihem. 
job 41:17	’ish be’aHihu yedubaqu; yitlakedu, welo yitparadu. 
job 41:18	‘aTishotaw tahel ’or; we‘einaw, ke‘af‘apei shaHar. 
job 41:19	mipiw lapidim yahalokhu; kidodei ’eish, yitmalaTu. 
job 41:20	mineHiraw yeizei ‘ashan; kedud nafuaH we’agmon. 
job 41:21	nafsho geHalim telaheiT; welahaw, mipiw yeizei. 
job 41:22	bezawwaro yalin ‘oc; ulefanaw, taduz de’awah. 
job 41:23	mapelei wesaro daweiqu; yazuq ‘alaw, bal yimoT. 
job 41:24	libo yazuq kemo ’awen; weyazuq, kefelaH taHtit. 
job 41:25	miseito yaguru ’eilim; mishewarim, yitHaTa’u. 
job 41:26	masigeihu Herew beli taqum; Hanit massa‘ weshiryah. 
job 41:27	yaHshow letewen barcel; le‘eiz riqawon neHushah. 
job 41:28	lo yawriHenu wen qashet; leqash, nehpekhu lo ’awnei qala‘. 
job 41:29	keqash neHshewu totaH; weyisHaq, lera‘ash kidon. 
job 41:30	taHtaw Hadudei Hares; yirpad Haruz ‘alei TiT. 
job 41:31	yartiaH kassir mezulah; yam, yasim kamerqaHah. 
job 41:32	’aHaraw ya’ir natiw; yaHshow tehom leseiwah. 
job 41:33	’ein ‘al ‘afar mashelo; he‘asu, liwli Hat. 
job 41:34	’eit kal gawoah yir’eh; hu, melekh ‘al kal benei shaHaz.
job 42:1	waya‘an ’iyow ’et yhoh wayomar. 
job 42:2	yada‘ta yada‘ti ki khol tukhal; welo yibazeir mimekha mecimah. 
job 42:3	mi ceh ma‘lim ‘eizah, beli da‘at lakhein higadti welo ’awin; nifla’ot mimeni, welo ’eida‘. 
job 42:4	shema‘ na we’anokhi ’adabeir; ’esh’alekha, wehodi‘eini. 
job 42:5	lesheima‘ ’ocen shema‘tikha; we‘atah, ‘eini ra’atekha. 
job 42:6	‘al kein ’em’as weniHamti; ‘al ‘afar wa’eifer.
job 42:7	wayhi, ’aHar diber yhoh ’et hadewarim ha’eileh ’el ’iyow; wayomer yhoh ’el ’elifac hateimani, Harah ’api wekha uwishnei rei‘ekha, ki lo dibartem ’eilay nekhonah ke‘awdi ’iyow. 
job 42:8	we‘atah qeHu lakhem shiw‘ah farim weshiw‘ah ’eilim ulekhu ’el ‘awdi ’iyow, weha‘alitem ‘olah ba‘adkhem, we’iyow ‘awdi, yitpaleil ‘aleikhem; ki ’im panaw ’esa, lewilti ‘asot ‘imakhem newalah, ki lo dibartem ’eilay nekhonah ke‘awdi ’iyow. 
job 42:9	wayeilekhu ’elifac hateimani uwildad hashuHi, zofar hana‘amati, waya‘asu, ka’asher diber ’aleihem yhoh; wayisa yhoh ’et penei ’iyow. 
job 42:10	yhoh w ’et shewit shewut ’iyow, behitpalo be‘ad rei‘eihu; wayosef yhoh ’et kal ’asher le’iyow lemishneh. 
job 42:11	wayawo’u ’eilaw kal ’eHaw wekhal ’aHyotaw ’aHyotaw wekhal yode‘aw lefanim, wayokhelu ‘imo leHem beweito wayanudu lo waynaHamu ’oto, ‘al kal hara‘ah, ’asher heiwi yhoh ‘alaw; wayitenu lo, ’ish qesiTah ’eHat, we’ish necem cahaw ’eHad.
job 42:12	yhoh beirakh ’et ’aHarit ’iyow meireishito; wayhi lo ’arba‘ah ‘asar ’elef zon, wesheishet ’alafim gemalim, we’elef zemed baqar we’elef ’atonot. 
job 42:13	wayhi lo shiw‘anah wanim weshalosh banot. 
job 42:14	wayiqra sheim ha’aHat yemimah, wesheim hasheinit qezi‘ah; wesheim hashelishit qeren hapukh. 
job 42:15	welo nimza nashim yafot kiwnot ’iyow bekhal ha’arez; wayitein lahem ’awihem naHalah betokh ’aHeihem.
job 42:16	wayHi ’iyow ’aHarei cot, mei’ah we’arba‘im shanah; wayar wayir’eh, ’et banaw we’et benei wanaw, ’arba‘ah dorot. 
job 42:17	wayamat ’iyow, caqein usewa‘ yamim. 
songs 1:1	shir hashirim ’asher lishlomoh. 
songs 1:2	yishaqeini mineshiqot pihu, ki Towim dodekha miyayin. 
songs 1:3	lereiaH shemanekha Towim, shemen turaq shemekha; ‘al kein ‘alamot ’aheiwukha. 
songs 1:4	mashekheini ’aHarekha naruzah; hewi’ani hamelekh Hadaraw, nagilah wenismeHah bakh, nackirah dodekha miyayin, meisharim ’aheiwukha.
songs 1:5	sheHorah ’ani wenawah, benot yerushalim; ke’aholei qeidar, kiri‘ot shelomoh. 
songs 1:6	’al tir’uni she’ani sheHarHoret, sheshecafatni hashamesh; benei ’imi niHaru wi, samuni noTeirah ’et hakeramim, karmi sheli lo naTareti. 
songs 1:7	hagidah li, she’ahawah nafshi, ’eikhah tir‘eh, ’eikhah tarbiz bazahorayim; shalamah ’ehyeh ke‘oTeyah, ‘al ‘edrei Haweirekha. 
songs 1:8	’im lo teide‘i lakh, hayafah banashim; ze’i lakh be‘iqwei hazon, ure‘i ’et gediyotayikh, ‘al mishkenot haro‘im.
songs 1:9	lesusati berikhwei far‘oh, dimitikh ra‘yati. 
songs 1:10	nawu leHayayikh batorim, zawwareikh baHarucim. 
songs 1:11	torei cahaw na‘aseh lakh, ‘im nequdot hakasef. 
songs 1:12	‘ad shehamelekh bimsibo, nirdi natan reiHo. 
songs 1:13	zeror hamor dodi li, bein shaday yalin. 
songs 1:14	’eshkol hakofer dodi li, bekharmei ‘ein gedi.
songs 1:15	hinakh yafah ra‘yati, hinakh yafah ‘einayikh yonim. 
songs 1:16	hinekha yafeh dodi ’af na‘im, ’af ‘arseinu ra‘ananah. 
songs 1:17	qorot bateinu ’aracim, raHiTeinu rahiTeinu berotim. 
songs 2:1	’ani Hawazelet hasharon, shoshanat ha‘amaqim. 
songs 2:2	keshoshanah bein haHoHim, kein ra‘yati bein habanot. 
songs 2:3	ketapuaH ba‘azei haya‘ar, kein dodi bein habanim; bezilo Himadti weyashawti, ufiryo matoq leHiki. 
songs 2:4	hewi’ani ’el beit hayayin, wediglo ‘alay ’ahawah. 
songs 2:5	samekhuni ba’ashishot, rapeduni batapuHim; ki Holat ’ahawah ’ani. 
songs 2:6	semolo taHat leroshi, wimino teHabeqeini. 
songs 2:7	hishba‘ti ’etkhem benot yerushalim bizwa’ot, ’o be’aylot hasadeh; ’im ta‘iru we’im te‘oru ’et ha’ahawah ‘ad sheteHpaz.
songs 2:8	qol dodi, hineih ceh ba; medaleig ‘al heharim, meqapeiz ‘al hagewa‘ot. 
songs 2:9	domeh dodi lizwi, ’o le‘ofer ha’ayalim; hineih ceh ‘omeid ’aHar kateleinu, mashgiaH min haHalonot, meiziz min haHarakim. 
songs 2:10	‘anah dodi we’amar li; qumi lakh ra‘yati yafati ulekhi lakh. 
songs 2:11	ki hineih hassetaw hassetaw ‘awar; hageshem Halaf halakh lo. 
songs 2:12	hanizanim nir’u wa’arez, ‘eit haccamir higia‘; weqol hator nishma‘ be’arzeinu. 
songs 2:13	hate’einah HaneTah fageha, wehagefanim semadar natenu reiaH; qumi lekhi lakh ra‘yati yafati ulekhi lakh.
songs 2:14	yonati beHagwei hassela‘, beseiter hamadreigah, har’ini ’et mar’ayikh, hashmi‘ini ’et qoleikh; ki qoleikh ‘areiw umar’eikh naweh.
songs 2:15	’eHecu lanu shu‘alim, shu‘alim qeTanim meHabelim keramim; ukherameinu semadar. 
songs 2:16	dodi li wa’ani lo, haro‘eh bashoshanim. 
songs 2:17	‘ad sheyafuaH hayom, wenasu hazelalim; sow demeih lekha dodi lizwi, ’o le‘ofer ha’ayalim ‘al harei water.
songs 3:1	‘al mishkawi baleilot, biqashti ’eit she’ahawah nafshi; biqashtiw welo mezatiw. 
songs 3:2	’aqumah na wa’asowwah wa‘ir, bashewaqim uwareHowot, ’awaqshah ’eit she’ahawah nafshi; biqashtiw welo mezatiw. 
songs 3:3	meza’uni hashomerim, hassowewim ba‘ir; ’eit she’ahawah nafshi re’item. 
songs 3:4	kim‘aT she‘awarti meihem, ‘ad shemazati, ’eit she’ahawah nafshi; ’aHactiw welo ’arpenu, ‘ad shehaweitiw ’el beit ’imi, we’el Heder horati. 
songs 3:5	hishba‘ti ’etkhem benot yerushalim bizwa’ot, ’o be’aylot hasadeh; ’im ta‘iru we’im te‘oru ’et ha’ahawah ‘ad sheteHpaz.
songs 3:6	mi cot, ‘olah min hamidbar, ketimarot ‘ashan; mequTeret mor ulewonah, mikol ’awqat rokheil. 
songs 3:7	hineih, miTato shelishlomoh, shishim giborim sawiw lah; migiborei yisra’eil. 
songs 3:8	kulam ’aHucei Herew, melumedei milHamah; ’ish Harbo ‘al yereikho, mipaHad baleilot.
songs 3:9	’apiryon, ‘asah lo hamelekh shelomoh, mei‘azei halewanon. 
songs 3:10	‘amudaw ‘asah khesef, refidato cahaw, merkawo ’argaman; tokho razuf ’ahawah, mibenot yerushalim. 
songs 3:11	ze’enah ure’enah benot ziyon bamelekh shelomoh; ba‘aTarah, she‘iTerah lo ’imo beyom Hatunato, uweyom simHat libo.
songs 4:1	hinakh yafah ra‘yati hinakh yafah, ‘einayikh yonim, miba‘ad lezamateikh; sa‘reikh ke‘eider ha‘iccim, shegaleshu meihar gil‘ad. 
songs 4:2	shinayikh ke‘eider haqezuwot, she‘alu min haraHzah; shekulam mat’imot, weshakulah ’ein bahem. 
songs 4:3	keHuT hashani siftotayikh, umidbareikh naweh; kefelaH harimon raqateikh, miba‘ad lezamateikh. 
songs 4:4	kemigdal dawid zawwareikh, banui letalpiyot; ’elef hamagein talui ‘alaw, kol shilTei hagiborim. 
songs 4:5	shenei shadayikh kishnei ‘ofarim te’omei zewiyah; haro‘im bashoshanim. 
songs 4:6	‘ad sheyafuaH hayom, wenasu hazelalim; ’eilekh li ’el har hamor, we’el giw‘at halewonah. 
songs 4:7	kulakh yafah ra‘yati, umum ’ein bakh.
songs 4:8	’iti milewanon kalah, ’iti milewanon tawo’i; tashuri meirosh ’amanah, meirosh senir weHermon, mime‘onot ’arayot, meiharei nemeirim. 
songs 4:9	libawtini ’aHoti khalah; libawtini be’aHad be’aHat mei‘einayikh, be’aHad ‘anaq mizawweronayikh. 
songs 4:10	mah yafu dodayikh ’aHoti khalah; mah Towu dodayikh miyayin, wereiaH shemanayikh mikal besamim. 
songs 4:11	nofet tiTofenah siftotayikh kalah; dewash weHalaw taHat leshoneikh, wereiaH salmotayikh kereiaH lewanon.
songs 4:12	gan na‘ul ’aHoti khalah; gal na‘ul ma‘yan Hatum. 
songs 4:13	shelaHayikh pardeis rimonim, ‘im peri megadim; kefarim ‘im neradim. 
songs 4:14	neired wekharkom, qaneh weqinamon, ‘im kal ‘azei lewonah; mor wa’ahalot, ‘im kal rashei wesamim. 
songs 4:15	ma‘yan ganim, be’eir mayim Hayim; wenocelim min lewanon. 
songs 4:16	‘uri zafon uwo’i teiman, hafiHi gani yiccelu wesamaw; yawo dodi legano, weyokhal peri megadaw. 
songs 5:1	bati legani ’aHoti khalah ’ariti mori ‘im besami, ’akhalti ya‘ri ‘im diwshi, shatiti yeini ‘im Halawi; ’ikhlu rei‘im, shetu weshikhru dodim.
songs 5:2	’ani yesheinah welibi ‘eir; qol dodi dofeiq, pitHi li ’aHoti ra‘yati yonati tamati, sheroshi nimla Tal, qewwuzotay resisei layelah. 
songs 5:3	pashaTti ’et kutaneti, ’eikhakhah ’elbashenah; raHazti ’et raglay ’eikhakhah ’aTanefeim. 
songs 5:4	dodi, shalaH yado min haHor, umei‘ay hamu ‘alaw. 
songs 5:5	qamti ’ani liftoaH ledodi; weyaday naTefu mor, we’ezbe‘otay mor ‘oweir, ‘al kapot haman‘ul. 
songs 5:6	pataHti ’ani ledodi, wedodi Hamaq ‘awar; nafshi yaze’ah wedabero, biqashtihu welo mezatihu, qeratiw welo ‘anani. 
songs 5:7	meza’uni hashomerim hassowewim ba‘ir hikuni feza‘uni; nase’u ’et redidi mei‘alay, shomerei haHomot. 
songs 5:8	hishba‘ti ’etkhem benot yerushalim; ’im timze’u ’et dodi, mah tagidu lo, sheHolat ’ahawah ’ani. 
songs 5:9	mah dodeikh midod, hayafah banashim; mah dodeikh midod, shekakhah hishba‘tanu. 
songs 5:10	dodi zaH we’adom, dagul meirewawah. 
songs 5:11	rosho ketem pac; qewwzotaw taltalim, sheHorot ka‘oreiw. 
songs 5:12	‘einaw keyonim ‘al ’afiqei mayim; roHazot beHalaw, yoshewot ‘al mileit. 
songs 5:13	leHayaw ka‘arugat habosem, migdelot merqaHim; siftotaw shoshanim, noTefot mor ‘oweir. 
songs 5:14	yadaw gelilei cahaw, memula’im batarshish; mei‘aw ‘eshet shein, me‘ulefet sapirim. 
songs 5:15	shoqaw ‘amudei sheish, meyussadim ‘al ’adnei fac; mar’eihu kalewanon, baHur ka’aracim. 
songs 5:16	Hiko mamtaqim, wekhulo maHamadim; ceh dodi weceh rei‘i, benot yerushalim. 
songs 6:1	’anah halakh dodeikh, hayafah banashim; ’anah panah dodeikh, unewaqshenu ‘imakh. 
songs 6:2	dodi yarad legano, la‘arugot habosem; lir‘ot baganim, welilqoT shoshanim. 
songs 6:3	’ani ledodi wedodi li, haro‘eh bashoshanim.
songs 6:4	yafah ’at ra‘yati ketirzah, nawah kirushalim; ’ayumah kanidgalot. 
songs 6:5	haseibi ‘einayikh minegdi, sheheim hirhiwuni; sa‘reikh ke‘eider ha‘iccim, shegaleshu min hagil‘ad. 
songs 6:6	shinayikh ke‘eider hareHeilim, she‘alu min haraHzah; shekulam mat’imot, weshakulah ’ein bahem. 
songs 6:7	kefelaH harimon raqateikh, miba‘ad lezamateikh. 
songs 6:8	shishim heimah melakhot, ushemonim pilagshim; wa‘alamot ’ein mispar. 
songs 6:9	’aHat hi yonati tamati, ’aHat hi le’imah, barah hi leyoladtah; ra’uha wanot way’asheruha, melakhot ufilagshim wayhaluha.
songs 6:10	mi cot hanishqafah kemo shaHar; yafah khalewanah, barah kaHamah, ’ayumah kanidgalot.
songs 6:11	’el ginat ’egoc yaradti, lir’ot be’ibei hanaHal; lir’ot hafareHah hagefen, heineizu harimonim. 
songs 6:12	lo yada‘ti, nafshi samatni, markewot ‘ami nadiw. 
songs 6:13	shuwi shuwi hashulamit, shuwi shuwi weneHeceh bakh; mah teHecu bashulamit, kimHolat hamaHanayim.

songs 7:2	sharereikh ’agan hassahar, ’al yeHsar hamaceg; biTneikh ‘areimat HiTim, sugah bashoshanim. 
songs 7:3	shenei shadayikh kishnei ‘ofarim ta’omei zewiyah. 
songs 7:4	zawwareikh kemigdal hashein; ‘einayikh bereikhot beHeshbon, ‘al sha‘ar bat rabim, ’apeikh kemigdal halewanon, zofeh penei damaseq. 
songs 7:5	rosheikh ‘alayikh kakarmel, wedalat rosheikh ka’argaman; melekh ’asur barehaTim. 
songs 7:6	mah yafit umah na‘amt, ’ahawah bata‘anugim. 
songs 7:7	cot qomateikh dametah letamar, weshadayikh le’ashkolot. 
songs 7:8	’amarti ’e‘eleh wetamar, ’oHacah besansinaw; weyihyu na shadayikh ke’eshkelot hagefen, wereiaH ’apeikh katapuHim. 
songs 7:9	weHikeikh keyein haTow holeikh ledodi lemeisharim; doweiw siftei yesheinim. 
songs 7:10	’ani ledodi, we‘alay teshuqato.
songs 7:11	lekhah dodi neizei hasadeh, nalinah bakefarim. 
songs 7:12	nashkimah lakeramim, nir’eh ’im pareHah hagefen pitaH hassemadar, heineizu harimonim; sham ’etein ’et doday lakh. 
songs 7:13	haduda’im natenu reiaH, we‘al petaHeinu kal megadim, Hadashim gam yeshanim; dodi zafanti lakh. 
songs 8:1	mi yitenkha ke’aH li, yoneiq shedei ’imi; ’emza’akha waHuz ’eshaqekha, gam lo yawucu li. 
songs 8:2	’enhagakha, ’awi’akha ’el beit ’imi telamedeini; ’ashqekha miyayin hareqaH, mei‘asis rimoni. 
songs 8:3	semolo taHat roshi, wimino teHabeqeini. 
songs 8:4	hishba‘ti ’etkhem benot yerushalim; mah ta‘iru umah te‘oreru ’et ha’ahawah ‘ad sheteHpaz.
songs 8:5	mi cot, ‘olah min hamidbar, mitrapeqet ‘al dodah; taHat hatapuaH ‘orartikha, mah Hibelatkha ’imekha, shamah Hibelah yeladatkha. 
songs 8:6	simeini khaHotam ‘al libekha, kaHotam ‘al cero‘ekha, ki ‘accah khamawet ’ahawah, qashah khish’ol qin’ah; reshafeha rishpei ’eish shalhewetyah. 
songs 8:7	mayim rabim, lo yukhelu lekhabot ’et ha’ahawah, uneharot lo yishTefuha; ’im yitein ’ish ’et kal hon beito ba’ahawah, boc yawucu lo.
songs 8:8	’aHot lanu qeTanah, weshadayim ’ein lah; mah na‘aseh la’aHoteinu, bayom sheyedubar bah. 
songs 8:9	’im Homah hi, niwneh ‘aleha Tirat kasef; we’im delet hi, nazur ‘aleha luaH ’arec. 
songs 8:10	’ani Homah, weshaday kamigdalot; ’ac hayiti we‘einaw kemoz’eit shalom.
songs 8:11	kerem hayah lishlomoh bewa‘al hamon, natan ’et hakerem lanoTerim; ’ish yawi befiryo ’elef kasef. 
songs 8:12	karmi sheli lefanay; ha’elef lekha shelomoh, umatayim lenoTerim ’et piryo. 
songs 8:13	hayoshewet baganim, Haweirim maqshiwim leqoleikh hashmi‘ini. 
songs 8:14	beraH dodi, udemeih lekha lizwi ’o le‘ofer ha’ayalim, ‘al harei wesamim. 
ruth 1:1	wayhi, bimei shefoT hashofeTim, wayhi ra‘aw ba’arez; wayeilekh ’ish mibeit leHem yehudah, lagur bisdei mo’aw, hu we’ishto ushenei wanaw. 
ruth 1:2	wesheim ha’ish ’elimelekh wesheim ’ishto na‘omi wesheim shenei wanaw maHlon wekhilyon ’efratim, mibeit leHem yehudah; wayawo’u sedei mo’aw wayihyu sham. 
ruth 1:3	wayamat ’elimelekh ’ish na‘omi; watisha’eir hi ushenei waneha. 
ruth 1:4	wayis’u lahem, nashim mo’awiyot, sheim ha’aHat ‘arepah, wesheim hasheinit rut; wayeishewu sham ke‘eser shanim. 
ruth 1:5	wayamutu gam sheneihem maHlon wekhilyon; watisha’eir ha’ishah, mishenei yeladeha umei’ishah. 
ruth 1:6	wataqam hi wekhaloteha, watashaw misedei mo’aw; ki shame‘ah bisdeih mo’aw, ki faqad yhoh ’et ‘amo, lateit lahem laHem. 
ruth 1:7	wateizei, min hamaqom ’asher hayetah shamah, ushetei khaloteha ‘imah; wateilakhnah waderekh, lashuw ’el ’erez yehudah. 
ruth 1:8	watomer na‘omi lishtei khaloteha, leikhenah showenah, ’ishah leweit ’imah; ya‘aseh ya‘as yhoh ‘imakhem Hesed, ka’asher ‘asitem ‘im hameitim we‘imadi. 
ruth 1:9	yitein yhoh lakhem, umezena menuHah, ’ishah beit ’ishah; watishaq lahen, watisenah qolan watiwkenah. 
ruth 1:10	watomarnah lah; ki ’itakh nashuw le‘ameikh. 
ruth 1:11	watomer na‘omi showenah wenotay, lamah teilakhnah ‘imi; ha‘od li wanim bemei‘ay, wehayu lakhem la’anashim. 
ruth 1:12	showenah wenotay leikhena, ki caqanti mihyot le’ish; ki ’amarti yesh li tiqwah, gam hayiti halaylah le’ish, wegam yaladti wanim. 
ruth 1:13	halahein tesabeirenah, ‘ad ’asher yigdalu, halahein tei‘ageinah, lewilti heyot le’ish; ’al benotay, ki mar li me’od mikem, ki yaze’ah wi yad yhoh. 
ruth 1:14	watisenah qolan, watiwkenah ‘od; watishaq ‘arepah laHamotah, werut daweqah bah. 
ruth 1:15	watomer, hineih shawah yewimteikh, ’el ‘amah we’el ’eloheha; shuwi ’aHarei yewimteikh. 
ruth 1:16	watomer rut ’al tifge‘i wi, le‘aceweikh lashuw mei’aHarayikh; ki ’el ’asher teilekhi ’eileikh, uwa’asher talini ’alin, ‘ameikh ‘ami, weilohayikh ’elohay. 
ruth 1:17	ba’asher tamuti ’amut, wesham ’eqaweir; koh ya‘aseh yhoh li wekhoh yosif, ki hamawet, yafrid beini uweineikh. 
ruth 1:18	wateire ki mit’amezet hi lalekhet ’itah; wateHdal ledabeir ’eileha. 
ruth 1:19	wateilakhnah sheteihem, ‘ad bo’anah beit laHem; wayhi, kewo’anah beit leHem, wateihom kal ha‘ir ‘aleihen, watomarnah hacot na‘omi. 
ruth 1:20	watomer ’aleihen, ’al tiqrenah li na‘omi; qerena li mara, ki heimar shaday li me’od. 
ruth 1:21	’ani melei’ah halakhti, wereiqam heshiwani yhoh; lamah tiqrenah li na‘omi, yhoh ‘anah wi, weshaday heira‘ li. 
ruth 1:22	watashaw na‘omi, werut hamo’awiyah khalatah ‘imah, hashawah misedei mo’aw; weheimah, ba’u beit leHem, bitHilat qezir se‘orim. 
ruth 2:1	ulena‘omi meyuda‘ moda‘ le’ishah, ’ish gibor Hayil, mimishpaHat ’elimelekh; ushemo bo‘ac. 
ruth 2:2	watomer rut hamo’awiyah ’el na‘omi, ’eilekhah na hasadeh wa’alaqoTah washibolim, ’aHar ’asher ’emza Hein be‘einaw; watomer lah lekhi witi. 
ruth 2:3	wateilekh watawo watelaqeiT basadeh, ’aHarei haqozerim; wayiqer miqreha, Helqat hasadeh lewo‘ac, ’asher mimishpaHat ’elimelekh. 
ruth 2:4	wehineih wo‘ac, ba mibeit leHem, wayomer laqozrim yhoh ‘imakhem; wayomeru lo yewarekhkha yhoh. 
ruth 2:5	wayomer bo‘ac lena‘aro, hanizaw ‘al haqozrim; lemi hana‘arah haccot. 
ruth 2:6	waya‘an, hana‘ar hanizaw ‘al haqozrim wayomar; na‘arah mo’awiyah hi, hashawah ‘im na‘omi misedeih mo’aw. 
ruth 2:7	watomer, ’alaqoTah na we’asafti wa‘omarim, ’aHarei haqozrim; watawo wata‘amod, mei’ac haboqer we‘ad ‘atah, ceh shiwtah habayit me‘aT. 
ruth 2:8	wayomer bo‘ac ’el rut halo shama‘at biti, ’al teilekhi lilqoT besadeh ’aHeir, wegam lo ta‘awuri micceh; wekhoh tidbaqin ‘im na‘arotay. 
ruth 2:9	‘einayikh basadeh ’asher yiqzorun wehalakht ’aHareihen, halo ziwwiti ’et hane‘arim lewilti nage‘eikh; wezamit, wehalakht ’el hakeilim, weshatit mei’asher yish’awun hane‘arim. 
ruth 2:10	watipol ‘al paneha, watishtaHu ’arezah; watomer ’eilaw, madua‘ mazati Hein be‘einekha lehakireini, we’anokhi nakheriyah. 
ruth 2:11	waya‘an bo‘ac wayomer lah, hugeid hugad li, kol ’asher ‘asit ’et Hamoteikh, ’aHarei mot ’isheikh; wata‘acwi ’awikh we’imeikh, we’erez moladteikh, wateilekhi, ’el ‘am ’asher lo yada‘at temol shilshom. 
ruth 2:12	yeshaleim yhoh pa‘oleikh; utehi maskurteikh sheleimah, mei‘im yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’asher bat laHasot taHat kenafaw. 
ruth 2:13	watomer ’emza Hein be‘einekha ’adoni ki niHamtani, wekhi dibarta ‘al leiw shifHatekha; we’anokhi lo ’ehyeh, ke’aHat shifHotekha. 
ruth 2:14	wayomer lah wo‘ac le‘eit ha’okhel, goshi halom we’akhalt min haleHem, weTawalt piteikh baHomez; wateishew mizad haqozrim, wayizbaT lah qali, watokhal watisba‘ watotar. 
ruth 2:15	wataqam lelaqeiT; wayzaw bo‘ac ’et ne‘araw leimor, gam bein ha‘omarim telaqeiT welo takhlimuha. 
ruth 2:16	wegam shol tasholu lah min hazewatim; wa‘acawtem weliqeTah welo tig‘aru wah. 
ruth 2:17	watelaqeiT basadeh ‘ad ha‘arew; wataHboT ’eit ’asher liqeiTah, wayhi ke’eifah se‘orim. 
ruth 2:18	watisa watawo ha‘ir, wateire Hamotah ’eit ’asher liqeiTah; watozei watiten lah, ’eit ’asher hotirah misawe‘ah. 
ruth 2:19	watomer lah Hamotah ’eifoh liqaTt hayom we’anah ‘asit, yehi makireikh barukh; watageid laHamotah, ’eit ’asher ‘asetah ‘imo, watomer, sheim ha’ish ’asher ‘asiti ‘imo hayom bo‘ac. 
ruth 2:20	watomer na‘omi lekhalatah, barukh hu yhoh, ’asher lo ‘acaw Hasdo, ’et haHayim we’et hameitim; watomer lah na‘omi, qarow lanu ha’ish, migo’aleinu hu. 
ruth 2:21	watomer rut hamo’awiyah; gam ki ’amar ’eilay, ‘im hane‘arim ’asher li tidbaqin, ‘ad ’im kilu, ’eit kal haqazir ’asher li. 
ruth 2:22	watomer na‘omi ’el rut kalatah; Tow biti, ki teize’i ‘im na‘arotaw, welo yifge‘u wakh besadeh ’aHeir. 
ruth 2:23	watidbaq bena‘arot bo‘ac lelaqeiT, ‘ad kelot qezir hase‘orim uqezir haHiTim; wateishew ’et Hamotah. 
ruth 3:1	watomer lah na‘omi Hamotah; biti halo ’awaqesh lakh manoaH ’asher yiTaw lakh. 
ruth 3:2	we‘atah, halo wo‘ac moda‘tanu, ’asher hayit ’et na‘arotaw; hineih hu, coreh ’et goren hase‘orim halayelah. 
ruth 3:3	weraHazt wasakht, wesamt simloteikh simlotayikh ‘alayikh weyaradti weyaradt hagoren; ’al tiwwade‘i la’ish, ‘ad kaloto le’ekhol welishtot. 
ruth 3:4	wihi weshakhewo, weyada‘at ’et hamaqom ’asher yishkaw sham, uwat wegilit margelotaw weshakhaweti weshakhawet; wehu yagid lakh, ’eit ’asher ta‘asin. 
ruth 3:5	watomer ’eileha; kol ’asher tomeri ’eilay ’e‘eseh. 
ruth 3:6	wateired hagoren; wata‘as kekhol ’asher ziwwatah Hamotah. 
ruth 3:7	wayokhal bo‘ac wayeishet wayiTaw libo, wayawo lishkaw biqzeih ha‘areimah; watawo walaT, wategal margelotaw watishkaw. 
ruth 3:8	wayhi baHazi halaylah, wayeHerad ha’ish wayilafeit; wehineih ’ishah, shokhewet margelotaw. 
ruth 3:9	wayomer mi ’at; watomer, ’anokhi rut ’amatekha, ufarasta khenafekha ‘al ’amatekha, ki go’eil ’atah. 
ruth 3:10	wayomer, berukhah ’at yhoh biti, heiTawt Hasdeikh ha’aHaron min harishon; lewilti lekhet, ’aHarei habaHurim, ’im dal we’im ‘ashir. 
ruth 3:11	we‘atah, biti ’al tire’i, kol ’asher tomeri ’e‘eseh lakh; ki yodeia‘ kal sha‘ar ‘ami, ki ’eishet Hayil ’at. 
ruth 3:12	we‘atah ki ’amenam, ki ’im go’eil ’anokhi; wegam yeish go’eil qarow mimeni. 
ruth 3:13	lini halaylah, wehayah waboqer ’im yig’aleikh Tow yig’al, we’im lo yaHpoz lega’oleikh uge’altikh ’anokhi Hay yhoh; shikhwi ‘ad haboqer. 
ruth 3:14	watishkaw margelataw margelotaw ‘ad haboqer, wataqam biTrom beTerem yakir ’ish ’et rei‘eihu; wayomer ’al yiwwada‘, ki wa’ah ha’ishah hagoren. 
ruth 3:15	wayomer, hawi hamiTpaHat ’asher ‘alayikh we’eHoci wah watoHec bah; wayamad sheish se‘orim wayashet ‘aleha, wayawo ha‘ir. 
ruth 3:16	watawo ’el Hamotah, watomer mi ’at biti; wataged lah, ’eit kal ’asher ‘asah lah ha’ish. 
ruth 3:17	watomer sheish hase‘orim ha’eileh natan li; ki ’amar ’eilay, ’al tawo’i reiqam ’el Hamoteikh. 
ruth 3:18	watomer shewi witi, ‘ad ’asher teide‘in, ’eikh yipol dawar; ki lo yishqoT ha’ish, ki ’im kilah hadawar hayom. 
ruth 4:1	uwo‘ac ‘alah hasha‘ar wayeishew sham wehineih hago’eil ‘oweir ’asher diber bo‘ac, wayomer surah shewah poh peloni ’almoni; wayasar wayeisheiw. 
ruth 4:2	wayiqaH ‘asarah ’anashim micciqnei ha‘ir wayomer shewu foh; wayeisheiwu. 
ruth 4:3	wayomer lago’eil, Helqat hasadeh, ’asher le’aHinu le’elimelekh; makherah na‘omi, hashawah misedeih mo’aw. 
ruth 4:4	wa’ani ’amarti ’egleh ’acenekha leimor, qeneih neged hayoshewim weneged ciqnei ‘ami ’im tig’al ge’al, we’im lo yig’al hagidah li, we’eida‘ we’eide‘ah ki ’ein culatekha lig’ol, we’anokhi ’aHarekha; wayomer ’anokhi ’eg’al. 
ruth 4:5	wayomer bo‘ac, beyom qenotkha hasadeh miyad na‘omi; umei’eit rut hamo’awiyah ’eishet hameit qaniti qanitah, lehaqim sheim hameit ‘al naHalato. 
ruth 4:6	wayomer hago’eil, lo ’ukhal lig’ol lig’al  pen ’ashHit ’et naHalati; ge’al lekha ’atah ’et ge’ulati, ki lo ’ukhal lig’ol. 
ruth 4:7	wecot lefanim beyisra’eil ‘al hage’ulah we‘al hatemurah leqayeim kal dawar, shalaf ’ish na‘alo wenatan lerei‘eihu; wecot hate‘udah beyisra’eil. 
ruth 4:8	wayomer hago’eil lewo‘ac qeneih lakh; wayishlof na‘alo. 
ruth 4:9	wayomer bo‘ac lacceqeinim wekhal ha‘am, ‘eidim ’atem hayom, ki qaniti ’et kal ’asher le’elimelekh, we’eit kal ’asher lekhilyon umaHlon; miyad na‘omi. 
ruth 4:10	wegam ’et rut hamo’awiyah ’eishet maHlon qaniti li le’ishah, lehaqim sheim hameit ‘al naHalato, welo yikareit sheim hameit mei‘im ’eHaw umisha‘ar meqomo; ‘eidim ’atem hayom. 
ruth 4:11	wayomeru kal ha‘am ’asher basha‘ar wehacceqeinim ‘eidim; yitein yhoh ’et ha’ishah haba’ah ’el beitekha, keraHeil ukhelei’ah ’asher banu sheteihem ’et beit yisra’eil, wa‘aseih Hayil be’efratah, uqera sheim beweit laHem. 
ruth 4:12	wihi weitekha keweit perez, ’asher yaledah tamar lihudah; min haccera‘, ’asher yitein yhoh lekha, min hana‘arah haccot. 
ruth 4:13	wayiqaH bo‘ac ’et rut watehi lo le’ishah, wayawo ’eileha; wayitein yhoh lah heirayon wateiled bein. 
ruth 4:14	watomarnah hanashim ’el na‘omi, barukh yhoh, ’asher lo hishbit lakh go’eil hayom; weyiqarei shemo beyisra’eil. 
ruth 4:15	wehayah lakh lemeishiw nefesh, ulekhalkeil ’et seiwateikh; ki khalateikh ’asher ’aheiwatekh yeladatu, ’asher hi Towah lakh, mishiw‘ah banim. 
ruth 4:16	watiqaH na‘omi ’et hayeled wateshiteihu weHeiqah, watehi lo le’omenet. 
ruth 4:17	watiqrenah lo hashekheinot sheim leimor, yulad bein lena‘omi; watiqrenah shemo ‘oweid, hu ’awi yishay ’awi dawid.
ruth 4:18	we’eileh toldot parez, perez holid ’et Hezron. 
ruth 4:19	weHezron holid ’et ram, weram holid ’et ‘aminadaw. 
ruth 4:20	we‘aminadaw holid ’et naHshon, wenaHshon holid ’et salmah. 
ruth 4:21	wesalmon holid ’et bo‘ac, uwo‘ac holid ’et ‘oweid. 
ruth 4:22	we‘oweid holid ’et yishay, weyishay holid ’et dawid. 
lamentations 1:1	’eikhah yashewah wadad, ha‘ir rabati ‘am, hayetah ke’almanah; rabati wagoyim, sarati bamedinot, hayetah lamas.
lamentations 1:2	bakho tiwkeh balaylah, wedim‘atah ‘al leHeyah, ’ein lah menaHeim mikal ’ohaweha; kal rei‘eha bagedu wah, hayu lah le’oyewim.
lamentations 1:3	galetah yehudah mei‘oni umeirow ‘awodah, hi yashewah wagoyim, lo maze’ah manoaH; kal rodefeha hisiguha bein hamezarim.
lamentations 1:4	darkhei ziyon ’aweilot, mibeli ba’ei mo‘eid, kal she‘areha shomeimin, kohaneha ne’enaHim; betuloteha nugot wehi mar lah.
lamentations 1:5	hayu zareha lerosh ’oyeweha shalu, ki yhoh hogah ‘al row pesha‘eha; ‘olaleha halekhu shewi lifnei zar.
lamentations 1:6	wayeizei min wat mibat ziyon kal hadarah; hayu sareha, ke’ayalim lo maze’u mir‘eh, wayeilekhu welo khoaH lifnei rodeif.
lamentations 1:7	cakherah yerushalim, yemei ‘aneyah umerudeha, kol maHamudeha, ’asher hayu mimei qedem; binfol ‘amah beyad zar, we’ein ‘oceir lah, ra’uha zarim, saHaqu ‘al mishbateha.
lamentations 1:8	HeiT HaTe’ah yerushalim, ‘al kein lenidah hayatah; kal mekhabedeha hicciluha ki ra’u ‘erwatah, gam hi ne’enHah watashaw ’aHor.
lamentations 1:9	Tum’atah beshuleha, lo cakherah ’aHaritah, wateired pela’im, ’ein menaHeim lah; re’eih yhoh ’et ‘aneyi, ki higdil ’oyeiw.
lamentations 1:10	yado paras zar, ‘al kal maHamadeha; ki ra’atah goyim ba’u miqdashah, ’asher ziwwitah, lo yawo’u waqahal lakh.
lamentations 1:11	kal ‘amah ne’enaHim mewaqeshim leHem, natenu maHamodeihem maHamadeihem be’okhel lehashiw nafesh; re’eih yhoh wehabiTah, ki hayiti coleilah.
lamentations 1:12	lo ’aleikhem kal ‘owerei derekh habiTu ure’u, ’im yeish makh’ow kemakh’owi, ’asher ‘olal li; ’asher hogah yhoh, beyom Haron ’apo.
lamentations 1:13	mimarom shalaH ’eish be‘azmotay wayirdenah; paras reshet leraglay heshiwani ’aHor, netanani shomeimah, kal hayom dawah.
lamentations 1:14	nisqad ‘ol pesha‘ay beyado, yistaregu ‘alu ‘al zawwari hikhshil koHi; netanani ’adonay, bidei lo ’ukhal qum.
lamentations 1:15	silah khal ’abiray ’adonay beqirbi, qara ‘alay mo‘eid lishbor baHuray; gat darakh ’adonay, liwtulat bat yehudah.
lamentations 1:16	‘al ’eileh ’ani wokhiyah, ‘eini ‘eini yoredah mayim, ki raHaq mimeni menaHeim meishiw nafshi; hayu wanay shomeimim, ki gawar ’oyeiw.
lamentations 1:17	peiresah ziyon beyadeha, ’ein menaHeim lah, ziwwah yhoh leya‘aqow sewiwaw zaraw; hayetah yerushalim lenidah beineihem.
lamentations 1:18	zadiq hu yhoh ki fihu mariti; shim‘u na khal ‘amim ha‘amim, ure’u makh’owi, betulotay uwaHuray halekhu washewi.
lamentations 1:19	qarati lam’ahaway heimah rimuni, kohanay uceqeinay ba‘ir gawa‘u; ki wiqshu ’okhel lamo, weyashiwu ’et nafsham.
lamentations 1:20	re’eih yhoh ki zar li mei‘ay Homarmaru, nehpakh libi beqirbi, ki maro mariti; miHuz shikelah Herew babayit kamawet.
lamentations 1:21	shame‘u ki ne’enaHah ’ani, ’ein menaHeim li, kal ’oyeway shame‘u ra‘ati sasu, ki ’atah ‘asita; heiweita yom qarata weyihyu khamoni.
lamentations 1:22	tawo khal ra‘atam lefanekha we‘oleil lamo, ka’asher ‘olalta li ‘al kal pesha‘ay; ki rabot ’anHotay welibi dawway.
lamentations 2:1	’eikhah ya‘iw be’apo ’adonay ’et bat ziyon, hishlikh mishamayim ’erez, tif’eret yisra’eil; welo cakhar hadom raglaw beyom ’apo.
lamentations 2:2	bila‘ ’adonay lo welo Hamal, ’eit kal ne’ot ya‘aqow, haras be‘ewrato miwzerei wat yehudah higia‘ la’arez; Hileil mamlakhah wesareha.
lamentations 2:3	gada‘ baHori ’af, kol qeren yisra’eil, heishiw ’aHor yemino mipenei ’oyeiw; wayiw‘ar beya‘aqow ke’eish lehawah, ’akhelah sawiw.
lamentations 2:4	darakh qashto ke’oyeiw, nizaw yemino kezar, wayaharog, kol maHamadei ‘ayin; be’ohel bat ziyon, shafakh ka’eish Hamato.
lamentations 2:5	hayah ’adonay ke’oyeiw bila‘ yisra’eil, bila‘ kal ’armenoteha, shiHeit miwzaraw; wayerew bewat yehudah, ta’aniyah wa’aniyah.
lamentations 2:6	wayaHmos kagan suko, shiHeit mo‘ado; shikaH yhoh beziyon mo‘eid weshabat, wayin’az beca‘am ’apo melekh wekhohein.
lamentations 2:7	canaH ’adonay micbeHo ni’eir miqdasho, hisgir beyad ’oyeiw, Homot ’armenoteha; qol natenu beweit yhoh keyom mo‘eid.
lamentations 2:8	Hashaw yhoh lehashHit Homat bat ziyon, naTah qaw, lo heishiw yado mibaleia‘; waya’awel Heil weHomah yaHdaw ’umlalu.
lamentations 2:9	Tawe‘u wa’arez she‘areha, ’ibad weshibar beriHeha; malkah wesareha wagoyim ’ein torah, gam newi’eha lo maze’u Hacon yhoh.
lamentations 2:10	yeishewu la’arez yidemu ciqnei wat ziyon, he‘elu ‘afar ‘al rosham, Hageru saqim; horidu la’arez roshan, betulot yerushalim.
lamentations 2:11	kalu wadema‘ot ‘einay Homarmeru mei‘ay, nishpakh la’arez keweidi, ‘al shewer bat ‘ami; bei‘aTeif ‘oleil weyoneiq, birHowot qiryah.
lamentations 2:12	le’imotam yomeru, ’ayeih dagan wayayin; behit‘aTefam keHalal birHowot ‘ir, behishtapeikh nafsham, ’el Heiq ’imotam.
lamentations 2:13	mah ’a‘ideikh mah ’adameh lakh, habat yerushalim, mah ’ashweh lakh wa’anaHameikh, betulat bat ziyon; ki gadol kayam shiwreikh mi yirpa lakh.
lamentations 2:14	newi’ayikh, Hacu lakh shaw wetafeil, welo gilu ‘al ‘awoneikh lehashiw shewiteikh shewuteikh; wayeHecu lakh, mas’ot shaw umaduHim.
lamentations 2:15	safequ ‘alayikh kapayim kal ‘owerei derekh, sharequ wayani‘u rosham, ‘al bat yerushalim; hacot ha‘ir, sheyomeru kelilat yofi, masos lekhal ha’arez.
lamentations 2:16	pazu ‘alayikh pihem kal ’oywayikh, sharequ wayaHarqu shein, ’ameru bila‘enu; ’akh ceh hayom sheqiwwinuhu mazanu ra’inu.
lamentations 2:17	‘asah yhoh ’asher camam, biza‘ ’emrato ’asher ziwwah mimei qedem, haras welo Hamal; waysamaH ‘alayikh ’oyeiw, heirim qeren zarayikh.
lamentations 2:18	za‘aq libam ’el ’adonay; Homat bat ziyon horidi khanaHal dim‘ah yomam walaylah, ’al titeni fugat lakh, ’al tidom bat ‘eineikh.
lamentations 2:19	qumi roni walayil walaylah, lerosh ’ashmurot, shifkhi khamayim libeikh, nokhaH penei ’adonay; se’i ’eilaw kapayikh, ‘al nefesh ‘olalayikh, ha‘aTufim bera‘aw berosh kal Huzot.
lamentations 2:20	re’eih yhoh wehabiTah, lemi ‘olalta koh; ’im tokhalnah nashim piryam ‘olalei TipuHim, ’im yeihareig bemiqdash ’adonay kohein wenawi.
lamentations 2:21	shakhewu la’arez Huzot na‘ar wecaqein, betulotay uwaHuray nafelu weHarew; haragta beyom ’apekha, TawaHta lo Hamaleta.
lamentations 2:22	tiqra kheyom mo‘eid meguray missawiw, welo hayah beyom ’af yhoh paliT wesarid; ’asher TipaHti weribiti ’oyewi khilam.
lamentations 3:1	’ani hagewer ra’ah ‘oni, besheiweT ‘ewrato. 
lamentations 3:2	’oti nahag wayolakh Hoshekh welo ’or. 
lamentations 3:3	’akh bi yashuw yahafokh yado kal hayom.
lamentations 3:4	bilah wesari we‘ori, shibar ‘azmotay. 
lamentations 3:5	banah ‘alay wayaqaf rosh utela’ah. 
lamentations 3:6	bemaHashakim hoshiwani kemeitei ‘olam.
lamentations 3:7	gadar ba‘adi welo ’eizei hikhbid neHasheti. 
lamentations 3:8	gam ki ’ec‘aq wa’ashawweia‘, satam tefilati. 
lamentations 3:9	gadar derakhay begacit, netiwotay ‘iwwah.
lamentations 3:10	dow ’oreiw hu li, ’aryeih ’ari bemistarim. 
lamentations 3:11	derakhay soreir wayfasheHeini samani shomeim. 
lamentations 3:12	darakh qashto wayaziweini, kamaTara laHeiz.
lamentations 3:13	heiwi bekhilyotay, benei ’ashpato. 
lamentations 3:14	hayiti seHoq lekhal ‘ami, neginatam kal hayom. 
lamentations 3:15	hisbi‘ani wamerorim hirwani la‘anah.
lamentations 3:16	wayagreis beHazaz shinay, hikhpishani ba’eifer. 
lamentations 3:17	waticnaH mishalom nafshi nashiti Towah. 
lamentations 3:18	wa’omar ’awad nizHi, wetoHalti yhoh.
lamentations 3:19	cekhar ‘aneyi umerudi la‘anah warosh. 
lamentations 3:20	cakhor tickor, wetashiaH wetashoaH ‘alay nafshi. 
lamentations 3:21	cot ’ashiw ’el libi ‘al kein ’oHil.
lamentations 3:22	Hasdei yhoh ki lo tamenu, ki lo khalu raHamaw. 
lamentations 3:23	Hadashim labeqarim, rabah ’emunatekha. 
lamentations 3:24	Helqi yhoh ’amerah nafshi, ‘al kein ’oHil lo.
lamentations 3:25	Tow yhoh leqoaw, lenefesh tidreshenu. 
lamentations 3:26	Tow weyaHil wedumam, litshu‘at yhoh. 
lamentations 3:27	Tow lagewer, ki yisa ‘ol bin‘uraw.
lamentations 3:28	yeisheiw badad weyidom, ki naTal ‘alaw. 
lamentations 3:29	yitein be‘afar pihu, ’ulay yeish tiqwah. 
lamentations 3:30	yitein lemakeihu leHi yisba‘ beHerpah.
lamentations 3:31	ki lo yicnaH le‘olam ’adonay. 
lamentations 3:32	ki ’im hogah, weriHam kerow Hasdo Hasadaw. 
lamentations 3:33	ki lo ‘inah milibo, wayageh benei ’ish.
lamentations 3:34	ledakei taHat raglaw, kol ’asirei ’arez. 
lamentations 3:35	lehaTot mishpaT gawer, neged penei ‘elyon. 
lamentations 3:36	le‘awweit ’adam beriwo, ’adonay lo ra’ah.
lamentations 3:37	mi ceh ’amar watehi, ’adonay lo ziwwah. 
lamentations 3:38	mipi ‘elyon lo teizei, hara‘ot wehaTow. 
lamentations 3:39	mah yit’onein ’adam Hay, gewer ‘al HeT’o HaTa’aw.
lamentations 3:40	naHpesah derakheinu wenaHqorah, wenashuwah ‘ad yhoh. 
lamentations 3:41	nisa lewaweinu ’el kapayim, ’el ’eil bashamayim. 
lamentations 3:42	naHnu fasha‘nu umarinu, ’atah lo salaHeta.
lamentations 3:43	sakotah wa’af watirdefeinu, haragta lo Hamaleta. 
lamentations 3:44	sakotah we‘anan lakh, mei‘awor tefilah. 
lamentations 3:45	seHi uma’os tesimeinu beqerew ha‘amim.
lamentations 3:46	pazu ‘aleinu pihem kal ’oyeweinu. 
lamentations 3:47	paHad wafaHat hayah lanu hasheit wehashawer. 
lamentations 3:48	palgei mayim teirad ‘eini, ‘al shewer bat ‘ami.
lamentations 3:49	‘eini nigerah welo tidmeh mei’ein hafugot. 
lamentations 3:50	‘ad yashqif weyeire, yhoh mishamayim. 
lamentations 3:51	‘eini ‘olah lenafshi, mikol benot ‘iri.
lamentations 3:52	zod zaduni kazipor ’oyeway Hinam. 
lamentations 3:53	zametu wabor Hayay, wayadu ’ewen bi. 
lamentations 3:54	zafu mayim ‘al roshi ’amarti nigcareti.
lamentations 3:55	qarati shimkha yhoh, mibor taHtiyot. 
lamentations 3:56	qoli shama‘eta; ’al ta‘leim ’acenekha lerawHati leshaw‘ati. 
lamentations 3:57	qarawta beyom ’eqra’eka, ’amarta ’al tira.
lamentations 3:58	rawta ’adonay riwei nafshi ga’alta Hayay. 
lamentations 3:59	ra’itah yhoh ‘awwatati, shafeTah mishpaTi. 
lamentations 3:60	ra’itah kal niqmatam, kal maHshewotam li.
lamentations 3:61	shama‘ta Herpatam yhoh, kal maHshewotam ‘alay. 
lamentations 3:62	siftei qamay wehegyonam, ‘alay kal hayom. 
lamentations 3:63	shiwtam weqimatam habiTah, ’ani manginatam.
lamentations 3:64	tashiw lahem gemul yhoh kema‘aseih yedeihem. 
lamentations 3:65	titein lahem meginat leiw, ta’alatekha lahem. 
lamentations 3:66	tirdof be’af wetashmideim, mitaHat shemei yhoh.
lamentations 4:1	’eikhah yu‘am cahaw, yishne haketem haTow; tishtapeikhenah ’awnei qodesh, berosh kal Huzot.
lamentations 4:2	benei ziyon hayqarim, hamsula’im bapac; ’eikhah neHshewu leniwlei Heres, ma‘aseih yedei yozeir.
lamentations 4:3	gam tanin tanim Halezu shad, heiniqu gureihen; bat ‘ami le’akhcar, ki ‘einim kay‘einim bamidbar.
lamentations 4:4	dawaq leshon yoneiq ’el Hiko bazama; ‘olalim sha’alu leHem, poreis ’ein lahem.
lamentations 4:5	ha’okhelim lema‘adanim, nashamu baHuzot; ha’emunim ‘alei tola‘, Hibequ ’ashpatot.
lamentations 4:6	wayigdal ‘awon bat ‘ami, meiHaTat sedom; hahafukhah khemo raga‘, welo Halu wah yadayim.
lamentations 4:7	caku necireha misheleg, zaHu meiHalaw; ’ademu ‘ezem mipeninim, sapir gicratam.
lamentations 4:8	Hashakh misheHor ta’oram, lo nikeru baHuzot; zafad ‘oram ‘al ‘azmam, yaweish hayah kha‘eiz.
lamentations 4:9	Towim hayu Halei Herew, meiHalei ra‘aw; sheheim yacuwu meduqarim, mitenuwot saday.
lamentations 4:10	yedei, nashim raHamaniyot, bishelu yaldeihen; hayu lewarot lamo, beshewer bat ‘ami.
lamentations 4:11	kilah yhoh ’et Hamato, shafakh Haron ’apo; wayazet ’eish beziyon, watokhal yesodoteha.
lamentations 4:12	lo he’eminu malkhei ’erez, wekhol kol yoshewei teiweil; ki yawo zar we’oyeiw, besha‘arei yerushalim.
lamentations 4:13	meiHaTot newi’eha, ‘awonot kohaneha; hashofekhim beqirbah dam zadiqim.
lamentations 4:14	na‘u ‘iwrim baHuzot, nego’alu badam; belo yukhelu, yige‘u bilwusheihem.
lamentations 4:15	suru Tamei qare’u lamo, suru suru ’al tiga‘u, ki nazu gam na‘u; ’ameru bagoyim, lo yosifu lagur.
lamentations 4:16	penei yhoh Hileqam, lo yosif lehabiTam; penei khohanim lo nasa’u, ceqeinim uceqeinim lo Hananu.
lamentations 4:17	‘odeinah ‘odeinu tikhlenah ‘eineinu, ’el ‘ecrateinu hawel; bezipiyateinu zipinu, ’el go lo yoshia‘.
lamentations 4:18	zadu ze‘adeinu, milekhet birHowoteinu; qaraw qizeinu male’u yameinu ki wa qizeinu.
lamentations 4:19	qalim hayu rodefeinu, minishrei shamayim; ‘al heharim delaqunu, bamidbar ’arewu lanu.
lamentations 4:20	ruaH ’apeinu meshiaH yhoh, nilkad bishHitotam; ’asher ’amarnu, bezilo niHyeh wagoyim.
lamentations 4:21	sisi wesimHi bat ’edom, yoshawti yoshewet be’erez ‘uz; gam ‘alayikh ta‘awar kos, tishkeri wetit‘ari.
lamentations 4:22	tam ‘awoneikh bat ziyon, lo yosif lehagloteikh; paqad ‘awoneikh bat ’edom, gilah ‘al HaTotayikh.
lamentations 5:1	cekhor yhoh meh hayah lanu, habeiT habiTah ure’eih ’et Herpateinu. 
lamentations 5:2	naHalateinu nehefkhah lecarim, bateinu lenakherim. 
lamentations 5:3	yetomim hayinu ’ein we’ein ’aw, ’imoteinu ke’almanot. 
lamentations 5:4	meimeinu bekhesef shatinu, ‘eizeinu bimHir yawo’u. 
lamentations 5:5	‘al zawwareinu nirdafenu, yaga‘nu lo welo hunaH lanu. 
lamentations 5:6	mizrayim natanu yad, ’ashur lisboa‘ laHem. 
lamentations 5:7	’awoteinu HaTe’u ’einam we’einam, ’anaHnu wa’anaHnu ‘awonoteihem sawalenu. 
lamentations 5:8	‘awadim mashelu wanu, poreiq ’ein miyadam. 
lamentations 5:9	benafsheinu nawi laHmeinu, mipenei Herew hamidbar. 
lamentations 5:10	‘oreinu ketanur nikhmaru, mipenei cal‘afot ra‘aw. 
lamentations 5:11	nashim beziyon ‘inu, betulot be‘arei yehudah. 
lamentations 5:12	sarim beyadam nitlu, penei ceqeinim lo nehdaru. 
lamentations 5:13	baHurim TeHon nasa’u, une‘arim ba‘eiz kashalu. 
lamentations 5:14	ceqeinim misha‘ar shawatu, baHurim mineginatam. 
lamentations 5:15	shawat mesos libeinu, nehpakh le’eiwel meHoleinu. 
lamentations 5:16	nafelah ‘aTeret rosheinu, ’o na lanu ki HaTanu. 
lamentations 5:17	‘al ceh, hayah daweh libeinu, ‘al ’eileh Hashekhu ‘eineinu. 
lamentations 5:18	‘al har ziyon sheshameim, shu‘alim hilekhu wo.
lamentations 5:19	’atah yhoh le‘olam teisheiw, kis’akha ledor wador. 
lamentations 5:20	lamah lanezaH tishkaHeinu, ta‘acweinu le’orekh yamim. 
lamentations 5:21	hashiweinu yhoh ’eilekha wenashuw wenashuwah, Hadeish yameinu keqedem. 
lamentations 5:22	ki ’im ma’os me’astanu, qazafta ‘aleinu ‘ad me’od. 
ecclesiastes 1:1	diwrei qohelet ben dawid, melekh birushalim. 
ecclesiastes 1:2	haweil hawalim ’amar qohelet, haweil hawalim hakol hawel. 
ecclesiastes 1:3	mah yitron la’adam; bekhal ‘amalo, sheya‘amol taHat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 1:4	dor holeikh wedor ba, weha’arez le‘olam ‘omadet. 
ecclesiastes 1:5	wecaraH hashemesh uwa hashamesh; we’el meqomo, sho’eif coreiaH hu sham. 
ecclesiastes 1:6	holeikh ’el darom, wesoweiw ’el zafon; soweiw soweiw holeikh haruaH, we‘al sewiwotaw shaw haruaH. 
ecclesiastes 1:7	kal haneHalim holekhim ’el hayam, wehayam ’einenu malei; ’el meqom, shehaneHalim holekhim, sham heim shawim lalakhet. 
ecclesiastes 1:8	kal hadewarim yegei‘im, lo yukhal ’ish ledabeir; lo tisba‘ ‘ayin lir’ot, welo timalei ’ocen mishemoa‘. 
ecclesiastes 1:9	mah shehayah hu sheyihyeh, umah shena‘asah, hu sheyei‘aseh; we’ein kal Hadash taHat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 1:10	yeish dawar sheyomar re’eih ceh Hadash hu; kewar hayah le‘olamim, ’asher hayah milefaneinu. 
ecclesiastes 1:11	’ein cikhron larishonim; wegam la’aHaronim sheyihyu, lo yihyeh lahem cikaron, ‘im sheyihyu la’aHaronah.
ecclesiastes 1:12	’ani qohelet, hayiti melekh ‘al yisra’eil birushalim. 
ecclesiastes 1:13	wenatati ’et libi, lidrosh welatur baHakhemah, ‘al kal ’asher na‘asah taHat hashamayim; hu ‘inyan ra‘, natan ’elohim liwnei ha’adam la‘anot bo. 
ecclesiastes 1:14	ra’iti ’et kal hama‘asim, shena‘asu taHat hashamesh; wehineih hakol hewel ure‘ut ruaH. 
ecclesiastes 1:15	me‘uwwat lo yukhal litqon; weHesron lo yukhal lehimanot. 
ecclesiastes 1:16	dibarti ’ani ‘im libi leimor, ’ani, hineih higdalti wehosafti Hakhmah ‘al kal ’asher hayah lefanay ‘al yerushalim; welibi ra’ah harbeih Hakhmah wada‘at. 
ecclesiastes 1:17	wa’etenah libi lada‘at Hakhmah weda‘at holeilot wesikhlut; yada‘ti shegam ceh hu ra‘yon ruaH. 
ecclesiastes 1:18	ki berow Hakhmah raw ka‘as; weyosif da‘at yosif makh’ow. 
ecclesiastes 2:1	’amarti ’ani belibi, lekhah na ’anassekhah wesimHah ure’eih weTow; wehineih gam hu hawel. 
ecclesiastes 2:2	lisHoq ’amarti meholal; ulesimHah mah coh ‘osah. 
ecclesiastes 2:3	tarti welibi, limshokh bayayin ’et besari; welibi noheig baHakhemah wele’eHoc besikhlut, ‘ad ’asher ’er’eh, ’ei ceh Tow liwnei ha’adam ’asher ya‘asu taHat hashamayim, mispar yemei Hayeihem. 
ecclesiastes 2:4	higdalti ma‘asay; baniti li batim, naTa‘ti li keramim. 
ecclesiastes 2:5	‘asiti li, ganot ufardeisim; wenaTa‘ti wahem ‘eiz kal peri. 
ecclesiastes 2:6	‘asiti li bereikhot mayim; lehashqot meihem, ya‘ar zomeiaH ‘eizim. 
ecclesiastes 2:7	qaniti ‘awadim ushefaHot, uwenei wayit hayah li; gam miqneh waqar wazon harbeih hayah li, mikol shehayu lefanay birushalim. 
ecclesiastes 2:8	kanasti li gam kesef wecahaw, usegulat melakhim wehamedinot; ‘asiti li sharim wesharot, weta‘anugot benei ha’adam shidah weshidot. 
ecclesiastes 2:9	wegadalti wehosafti, mikol shehayah lefanay birushalim; ’af Hakhemati ‘amedah li. 
ecclesiastes 2:10	wekhol ’asher sha’alu ‘einay, lo ’azalti meihem; lo mana‘ti ’et libi mikal simHah, ki libi sameiaH mikal ‘amali, weceh hayah Helqi mikal ‘amali. 
ecclesiastes 2:11	ufaniti ’ani, bekhal ma‘asay she‘asu yaday, uwe‘amal she‘amalti la‘asot; wehineih hakol hewel ure‘ut ruaH, we’ein yitron taHat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 2:12	ufaniti ’ani lir’ot Hakhmah weholeilot wesikhlut; ki meh ha’adam, sheyawo ’aHarei hamelekh, ’eit ’asher kewar ‘asuhu. 
ecclesiastes 2:13	wera’iti ’ani, sheyeish yitron laHakhemah min hassikhlut; kiteron ha’or min haHoshekh. 
ecclesiastes 2:14	heHakham ‘einaw berosho, wehakesil baHoshekh holeikh; weyada‘ti gam ’ani, shemiqreh ’eHad yiqreh ’et kulam. 
ecclesiastes 2:15	we’amarti ’ani belibi, kemiqreih hakesil gam ’ani yiqreini, welamah Hakhamti ’ani ’ac yoteir; wedibarti welibi, shegam ceh hawel. 
ecclesiastes 2:16	ki ’ein cikhron leHakham ‘im hakesil le‘olam; beshekewar hayamim haba’im hakol nishkaH, we’eikh yamut heHakham ‘im hakesil. 
ecclesiastes 2:17	wesaneiti ’et haHayim, ki ra‘ ‘alay hama‘aseh, shena‘asah taHat hashamesh; ki hakol hewel ure‘ut ruaH. 
ecclesiastes 2:18	wesaneiti ’ani ’et kal ‘amali, she’ani ‘ameil taHat hashamesh; she’aniHenu, la’adam sheyihyeh ’aHaray. 
ecclesiastes 2:19	umi yodeia‘, heHakham yihyeh ’o sakhal, weyishlaT bekhal ‘amali, she‘amalti wesheHakhamti taHat hashamesh; gam ceh hawel. 
ecclesiastes 2:20	wesaboti ’ani leya’eish ’et libi; ‘al kal he‘amal, she‘amalti taHat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 2:21	ki yeish ’adam, she‘amalo beHakhemah uweda‘at uwekhishron; ule’adam shelo ‘amal bo yitenenu Helqo, gam ceh hewel wera‘ah rabah. 
ecclesiastes 2:22	ki meh hoeh la’adam bekhal ‘amalo, uwera‘yon libo; shehu ‘ameil taHat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 2:23	ki khal yamaw makh’owim, wakha‘as ‘inyano, gam balaylah lo shakhaw libo; gam ceh hewel hu. 
ecclesiastes 2:24	’ein Tow ba’adam sheyokhal weshatah, weher’ah ’et nafsho Tow ba‘amalo; gam coh ra’iti ’ani, ki miyad ha’elohim hi. 
ecclesiastes 2:25	ki mi yokhal umi yaHush Huz mimeni. 
ecclesiastes 2:26	ki le’adam sheTow lefanaw, natan Hakhmah weda‘at wesimHah; welaHoTe natan ‘inyan le’esof welikhnos, lateit leTow lifnei ha’elohim, gam ceh hewel ure‘ut ruaH. 
ecclesiastes 3:1	lakol ceman; we‘eit lekhal Heifez taHat hashamayim.
ecclesiastes 3:2	‘eit laledet we‘eit lamut; ‘eit laTa‘at, we‘eit la‘aqor naTua‘. 
ecclesiastes 3:3	‘eit laharog we‘eit lirpo, ‘eit lifroz we‘eit liwnot. 
ecclesiastes 3:4	‘eit liwkot we‘eit lisHoq, ‘eit sefod we‘eit reqod. 
ecclesiastes 3:5	‘eit lehashlikh ’awanim, we‘eit kenos ’awanim; ‘eit laHawoq, we‘eit lirHoq meiHabeiq. 
ecclesiastes 3:6	‘eit lewaqeish we‘eit le’abeid, ‘eit lishmor we‘eit lehashlikh. 
ecclesiastes 3:7	‘eit liqroa‘ we‘eit litpor, ‘eit laHashot we‘eit ledabeir. 
ecclesiastes 3:8	‘eit le’ehow we‘eit lisno, ‘eit milHamah we‘eit shalom.
ecclesiastes 3:9	mah yitron ha‘oseh, ba’asher hu ‘ameil. 
ecclesiastes 3:10	ra’iti ’et ha‘inyan, ’asher natan ’elohim liwnei ha’adam la‘anot bo. 
ecclesiastes 3:11	’et hakol ‘asah yafeh we‘ito; gam ’et ha‘olam natan belibam, mibeli ’asher lo yimza ha’adam, ’et hama‘aseh ’asher ‘asah ha’elohim meirosh we‘ad sof. 
ecclesiastes 3:12	yada‘ti ki ’ein Tow bam; ki ’im lismoaH, wela‘asot Tow beHayaw. 
ecclesiastes 3:13	wegam kal ha’adam sheyokhal weshatah, wera’ah Tow bekhal ‘amalo; matat ’elohim hi. 
ecclesiastes 3:14	yada‘ti, ki kal ’asher ya‘aseh ha’elohim hu yihyeh le‘olam, ‘alaw ’ein lehosif, umimenu ’ein ligroa‘; weha’elohim ‘asah, sheyir’u milefanaw. 
ecclesiastes 3:15	mah shehayah kewar hu, wa’asher lihyot kewar hayah; weha’elohim yewaqeish ’et nirdaf. 
ecclesiastes 3:16	we‘od ra’iti taHat hashamesh; meqom hamishpaT shamah haresha‘, umeqom hazedeq shamah harasha‘. 
ecclesiastes 3:17	’amarti ’ani belibi, ’et hazadiq we’et harasha‘, yishpoT ha’elohim; ki ‘eit lekhal Heifez, we‘al kal hama‘aseh sham. 
ecclesiastes 3:18	’amarti ’ani belibi, ‘al diwrat benei ha’adam, lewaram ha’elohim; welir’ot shehem beheimah heimah lahem. 
ecclesiastes 3:19	ki miqreh wenei ha’adam umiqreh habeheimah, umiqreh ’eHad lahem, kemot ceh kein mot ceh, weruaH ’eHad lakol; umotar ha’adam min habeheimah ’ayin, ki hakol hawel. 
ecclesiastes 3:20	hakol holeikh ’el maqom ’eHad; hakol hayah min he‘afar, wehakol shaw ’el he‘afar. 
ecclesiastes 3:21	mi yodeia‘, ruaH benei ha’adam, ha‘olah hi lema‘elah; weruaH habeheimah, hayoredet hi lemaTah la’arez. 
ecclesiastes 3:22	wera’iti, ki ’ein Tow mei’asher yismaH ha’adam bema‘asaw, ki hu Helqo; ki mi yewi’enu lir’ot, bemeh sheyihyeh ’aHaraw. 
ecclesiastes 4:1	weshawti ’ani, wa’er’eh ’et kal ha‘ashuqim, ’asher na‘asim taHat hashamesh; wehineih dim‘at ha‘ashuqim, we’ein lahem menaHeim, umiyad ‘osheqeihem koaH, we’ein lahem menaHeim. 
ecclesiastes 4:2	weshabeiaH ’ani ’et hameitim shekewar meitu; min haHayim, ’asher heimah Hayim ‘adenah. 
ecclesiastes 4:3	weTow misheneihem, ’eit ’asher ‘aden lo hayah; ’asher lo ra’ah ’et hama‘aseh hara‘, ’asher na‘asah taHat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 4:4	wera’iti ’ani ’et kal ‘amal, we’eit kal kishron hama‘aseh, ki hi qin’at ’ish meirei‘eihu; gam ceh hewel ure‘ut ruaH. 
ecclesiastes 4:5	hakesil Howeiq ’et yadaw, we’okheil ’et besaro. 
ecclesiastes 4:6	Tow melo khaf naHat; mimelo Hafenayim ‘amal ure‘ut ruaH. 
ecclesiastes 4:7	weshawti ’ani wa’er’eh hewel taHat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 4:8	yeish ’eHad we’ein sheini gam bein wa’aH ’ein lo, we’ein qeiz lekhal ‘amalo, gam ‘einaw ‘eino lo tisba‘ ‘osher; ulemi ’ani ‘ameil, umeHasseir ’et nafshi miTowah, gam ceh hewel we‘inyan ra‘ hu. 
ecclesiastes 4:9	Towim hashenayim min ha’eHad; ’asher yeish lahem sakhar Tow ba‘amalam. 
ecclesiastes 4:10	ki ’im yipolu, ha’eHad yaqim ’et Haweiro; we’ilo, ha’eHad sheyipol, we’ein sheini lahaqimo. 
ecclesiastes 4:11	gam ’im yishkewu shenayim weHam lahem; ule’eHad ’eikh yeiHam. 
ecclesiastes 4:12	we’im yitqefo ha’eHad, hashenayim ya‘amdu negdo; wehaHuT hamshulash, lo wimheirah yinateiq. 
ecclesiastes 4:13	Tow yeled miskein weHakham; mimelekh caqein ukhesil, ’asher lo yada‘ lehiccaheir ‘od. 
ecclesiastes 4:14	ki mibeit hasurim yaza limlokh; ki gam bemalkhuto nolad rash. 
ecclesiastes 4:15	ra’iti ’et kal haHayim, hamhalekhim taHat hashamesh; ‘im hayeled hasheini, ’asher ya‘amod taHtaw. 
ecclesiastes 4:16	’ein qeiz lekhal ha‘am, lekhol ’asher hayah lifneihem, gam ha’aHaronim lo yismeHu wo; ki gam ceh hewel wera‘yon ruaH. 
ecclesiastes 5:1	shemor raglekha raglekha, ka’asher teileikh ’el beit ha’elohim, weqarow lishmoa‘, miteit hakesilim cawaH; ki ’einam yod‘im la‘asot ra‘. 
ecclesiastes 5:2	’al tewaheil ‘al pikha welibekha ’al yemaheir lehozi dawar lifnei ha’elohim; ki ha’elohim bashamayim we’atah ‘al ha’arez, ‘al kein yihyu dewarekha me‘aTim. 
ecclesiastes 5:3	ki ba haHalom berow ‘inyan; weqol kesil berow dewarim. 
ecclesiastes 5:4	ka’asher tidor neder leilohim, ’al te’aHeir leshalemo, ki ’ein Heifez bakesilim; ’eit ’asher tidor shaleim. 
ecclesiastes 5:5	Tow ’asher lo tidor; mishetidor welo teshaleim. 
ecclesiastes 5:6	’al titein ’et pikha laHaTi ’et besarekha, we’al tomar lifnei hamal’akh, ki shegagah hi; lamah yiqzof ha’elohim ‘al qolekha, weHibeil ’et ma‘aseih yadekha. 
ecclesiastes 5:7	ki werow Halomot wahawalim, udewarim harbeih; ki ’et ha’elohim yera. 
ecclesiastes 5:8	’im ‘osheq rash wegeicel mishpaT wazedeq tir’eh wamedinah, ’al titmah ‘al haHeifez; ki gawoah mei‘al gawoah shomeir, ugewohim ‘aleihem. 
ecclesiastes 5:9	weyitron ’erez bakol hi hu; melekh lesadeh ne‘ewad. 
ecclesiastes 5:10	’oheiw kesef lo yisba‘ kesef, umi ’oheiw behamon lo tewu’ah; gam ceh hawel. 
ecclesiastes 5:11	birwot haTowah, rabu ’okhleha; umah kishron liw‘aleha, ki ’im re’iyat re’ut ‘einaw. 
ecclesiastes 5:12	metuqah shenat ha‘oweid, ’im me‘aT we’im harbeih yokheil; wehasawa‘ le‘ashir, ’einenu maniaH lo lishon. 
ecclesiastes 5:13	yeish ra‘ah Holah, ra’iti taHat hashamesh; ‘osher shamur liw‘alaw lera‘ato. 
ecclesiastes 5:14	we’awad ha‘osher hahu be‘inyan ra‘; weholid bein, we’ein beyado me’umah. 
ecclesiastes 5:15	ka’asher yaza mibeTen ’imo, ‘arom yashuw lalekhet kesheba; ume’umah lo yisa wa‘amalo, sheyoleikh beyado. 
ecclesiastes 5:16	wegam coh ra‘ah Holah, kal ‘umat sheba kein yeileikh; umah yitron lo, sheya‘amol laruaH. 
ecclesiastes 5:17	gam kal yamaw baHoshekh yokheil; wekha‘as harbeih weHaleyo waqazef. 
ecclesiastes 5:18	hineih ’asher ra’iti ’ani, Tow ’asher yafeh le’ekhol welishtot welir’ot Towah bekhal ‘amalo sheya‘amol taHat hashemesh, mispar yemei Hayaw Hayaw ’asher natan lo ha’elohim ki hu Helqo. 
ecclesiastes 5:19	gam kal ha’adam ’asher natan lo ha’elohim ‘osher unekhasim wehishliTo le’ekhol mimenu welaseit ’et Helqo, welismoaH ba‘amalo; coh matat ’elohim hi. 
ecclesiastes 5:20	ki lo harbeih, yickor ’et yemei Hayaw; ki ha’elohim ma‘aneh besimHat libo. 
ecclesiastes 6:1	yeish ra‘ah, ’asher ra’iti taHat hashamesh; werabah hi ‘al ha’adam. 
ecclesiastes 6:2	’ish ’asher yiten lo ha’elohim ‘osher unekhasim wekhawod we’einenu Haseir lenafsho mikol ’asher yit’awweh, welo yashliTenu ha’elohim le’ekhol mimenu, ki ’ish nakheri yokhalenu; ceh hewel waHoli ra‘ hu. 
ecclesiastes 6:3	’im yolid ’ish mei’ah weshanim rabot yiHyeh weraw sheyihyu yemei shanaw, wenafsho lo tisba‘ min haTowah, wegam qewurah lo hayetah lo; ’amarti Tow mimenu hanafel. 
ecclesiastes 6:4	ki wahewel ba uwaHoshekh yeileikh; uwaHoshekh shemo yekhusseh. 
ecclesiastes 6:5	gam shemesh lo ra’ah welo yada‘; naHat laceh micceh. 
ecclesiastes 6:6	we’ilu Hayah, ’elef shanim pa‘amayim, weTowah lo ra’ah; halo ’el maqom ’eHad hakol holeikh. 
ecclesiastes 6:7	kal ‘amal ha’adam lefihu; wegam hanefesh lo timalei. 
ecclesiastes 6:8	ki mah yoteir leHakham min hakesil; mah le‘ani yodeia‘, lahalokh neged haHayim. 
ecclesiastes 6:9	Tow mar’eih ‘einayim meihalakh nafesh; gam ceh hewel ure‘ut ruaH. 
ecclesiastes 6:10	mah shehayah, kewar niqra shemo, wenoda‘ ’asher hu ’adam; welo yukhal ladin, ‘im shehatqif shetaqif mimenu. 
ecclesiastes 6:11	ki yeish dewarim harbeih marbim hawel; mah yoteir la’adam. 
ecclesiastes 6:12	ki mi yodeia‘ mah Tow la’adam baHayim, mispar yemei Hayei hewlo weya‘aseim kazeil; ’asher mi yagid la’adam, mah yihyeh ’aHaraw taHat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 7:1	Tow sheim mishemen Tow; weyom hamawet, miyom hiwwaledo. 
ecclesiastes 7:2	Tow lalekhet ’el beit ’eiwel, milekhet ’el beit mishteh, ba’asher hu sof kal ha’adam; wehaHay yitein ’el libo. 
ecclesiastes 7:3	Tow ka‘as miseHoq; ki weroa‘ panim yiTaw leiw. 
ecclesiastes 7:4	leiw Hakhamim beweit ’eiwel, weleiw kesilim beweit simHah. 
ecclesiastes 7:5	Tow lishmoa‘ ga‘arat Hakham; mei’ish shomeia‘ shir kesilim. 
ecclesiastes 7:6	ki kheqol hassirim taHat hassir, kein seHoq hakesil; wegam ceh hawel. 
ecclesiastes 7:7	ki ha‘osheq yeholeil Hakham; wi’abeid ’et leiw matanah. 
ecclesiastes 7:8	Tow ’aHarit dawar meireishito; Tow ’erekh ruaH migewah ruaH. 
ecclesiastes 7:9	’al tewaheil beruHakha likh‘os; ki kha‘as, beHeiq kesilim yanuaH. 
ecclesiastes 7:10	’al tomar meh hayah, shehayamim harishonim, hayu Towim mei’eileh; ki lo meiHakhemah sha’alta ‘al ceh. 
ecclesiastes 7:11	Towah Hakhmah ‘im naHalah; weyoteir lero’ei hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 7:12	ki bezeil haHakhemah bezeil hakasef; weyitron da‘at, haHakhemah teHayeh we‘aleha. 
ecclesiastes 7:13	re’eih ’et ma‘aseih ha’elohim; ki mi yukhal letaqein, ’eit ’asher ‘iwweto. 
ecclesiastes 7:14	beyom Towah heyeih weTow, uweyom ra‘ah re’eih; gam ’et ceh le‘umat ceh ‘asah ha’elohim, ‘al diwrat, shelo yimza ha’adam ’aHaraw me’umah. 
ecclesiastes 7:15	’et hakol ra’iti bimei hewli; yeish zadiq ’oweid bezidqo, weyeish rasha‘, ma’arikh bera‘ato. 
ecclesiastes 7:16	’al tehi zadiq harbeih, we’al titHakam yoteir; lamah tishomeim. 
ecclesiastes 7:17	’al tirsha‘ harbeih we’al tehi sakhal; lamah tamut belo ‘itekha. 
ecclesiastes 7:18	Tow ’asher te’eHoc baceh, wegam micceh ’al tanaH ’et yadekha; ki yerei ’elohim yeizei ’et kulam. 
ecclesiastes 7:19	haHakhemah ta‘oc leHakham; mei‘asarah shaliTim, ’asher hayu ba‘ir. 
ecclesiastes 7:20	ki ’adam, ’ein zadiq ba’arez; ’asher ya‘aseh Tow welo yeHeTa. 
ecclesiastes 7:21	gam lekhal hadewarim ’asher yedabeiru, ’al titein libekha; ’asher lo tishma‘ ’et ‘awdekha meqalekha. 
ecclesiastes 7:22	ki gam pe‘amim rabot yada‘ libekha; ’asher gam ’at ’atah qilalta ’aHeirim. 
ecclesiastes 7:23	kal coh nissiti waHakhemah; ’amarti ’eHkamah, wehi reHoqah mimeni. 
ecclesiastes 7:24	raHoq mah shehayah; we‘amoq ‘amoq mi yimza’enu. 
ecclesiastes 7:25	saboti ’ani welibi lada‘at welatur, uwaqeish Hakhmah weHeshbon; welada‘at resha‘ kesel, wehassikhlut holeilot. 
ecclesiastes 7:26	umoze ’ani mar mimawet, ’et ha’ishah ’asher hi mezodim waHaramim libah ’asurim yadeha; Tow lifnei ha’elohim yimaleiT mimenah, weHoTei yilakhed bah. 
ecclesiastes 7:27	re’eih ceh mazati, ’amerah qohelet; ’aHat le’aHat limzo Heshbon. 
ecclesiastes 7:28	’asher ‘od biqshah nafshi welo mazati; ’adam ’eHad mei’elef mazati, we’ishah wekhal ’eileh lo mazati. 
ecclesiastes 7:29	lewad re’eih ceh mazati, ’asher ‘asah ha’elohim ’et ha’adam yashar; weheimah wiqshu Hishewonot rabim. 
ecclesiastes 8:1	mi keheHakham, umi yodeia‘ peisher dawar; Hakhemat ’adam ta’ir panaw, we‘oc panaw yeshune. 
ecclesiastes 8:2	’ani pi melekh shemor, we‘al diwrat shewu‘at ’elohim. 
ecclesiastes 8:3	’al tibaheil mipanaw teileikh, ’al ta‘amod bedawar ra‘; ki kal ’asher yaHpoz ya‘aseh. 
ecclesiastes 8:4	ba’asher dewar melekh shilTon; umi yomar lo mah ta‘aseh. 
ecclesiastes 8:5	shomeir mizwah, lo yeida‘ dawar ra‘; we‘eit umishpaT, yeida‘ leiw Hakham. 
ecclesiastes 8:6	ki lekhal Heifez, yeish ‘eit umishpaT; ki ra‘at ha’adam rabah ‘alaw. 
ecclesiastes 8:7	ki ’einenu yodeia‘ mah sheyihyeh; ki ka’asher yihyeh, mi yagid lo. 
ecclesiastes 8:8	’ein ’adam shaliT baruaH likhlo ’et haruaH, we’ein shilTon beyom hamawet, we’ein mishlaHat bamilHamah; welo yemaleiT resha‘ ’et be‘alaw. 
ecclesiastes 8:9	’et kal ceh ra’iti wenaton ’et libi, lekhal ma‘aseh, ’asher na‘asah taHat hashamesh; ‘eit, ’asher shalaT ha’adam be’adam lera‘ lo. 
ecclesiastes 8:10	uwekhein ra’iti resha‘im qewurim wawa’u, umimeqom qadosh yehaleikhu, weyishtakeHu wa‘ir ’asher kein ‘asu; gam ceh hawel. 
ecclesiastes 8:11	’asher ’ein na‘asah fitgam, ma‘aseih hara‘ah meheirah; ‘al kein malei leiw benei ha’adam bahem la‘asot ra‘. 
ecclesiastes 8:12	’asher HoTe, ‘oseh ra‘ me’at uma’arikh lo; ki gam yodeia‘ ’ani, ’asher yihyeh Tow leyir’ei ha’elohim, ’asher yire’u milefanaw. 
ecclesiastes 8:13	weTow lo yihyeh larasha‘, welo ya’arikh yamim kazeil; ’asher ’einenu yarei milifnei ’elohim. 
ecclesiastes 8:14	yesh hewel ’asher na‘asah ‘al ha’arez ’asher yeish zadiqim, ’asher magia‘ ’aleihem kema‘aseih haresha‘im, weyeish resha‘im, shemagia‘ ’aleihem kema‘aseih hazadiqim; ’amarti shegam ceh hawel. 
ecclesiastes 8:15	weshibaHti ’ani ’et hasimHah, ’asher ’ein Tow la’adam taHat hashemesh, ki ’im le’ekhol welishtot welismoaH; wehu yilwenu wa‘amalo, yemei Hayaw ’asher natan lo ha’elohim taHat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 8:16	ka’asher natati ’et libi lada‘at Hakhmah welir’ot ’et ha‘inyan, ’asher na‘asah ‘al ha’arez; ki gam bayom uwalaylah, sheinah be‘einaw ’einenu ro’eh. 
ecclesiastes 8:17	wera’iti ’et kal ma‘aseih ha’elohim ki lo yukhal ha’adam, limzo ’et hama‘aseh ’asher na‘asah taHat hashemesh, beshel ’asher ya‘amol ha’adam lewaqeish welo yimza; wegam ’im yomar heHakham lada‘at, lo yukhal limzo. 
ecclesiastes 9:1	ki ’et kal ceh natati ’el libi welawur ’et kal ceh, ’asher hazadiqim wehaHakhamim wa‘awadeihem beyad ha’elohim; gam ’ahawah gam sin’ah, ’ein yodeia‘ ha’adam, hakol lifneihem. 
ecclesiastes 9:2	hakol ka’asher lakol, miqreh ’eHad lazadiq welarasha‘ laTow welaTahor welaTamei, welaccoweiaH, wela’asher ’einenu coweiaH; kaTow kaHoTe, hanishba‘ ka’asher shewu‘ah yarei. 
ecclesiastes 9:3	ceh ra‘, bekhol ’asher na‘asah taHat hashemesh, ki miqreh ’eHad lakol; wegam leiw benei ha’adam malei ra‘ weholeilot bilwawam beHayeihem, we’aHaraw ’el hameitim. 
ecclesiastes 9:4	ki mi ’asher yibaHeir yeHubar, ’el kal haHayim yeish biTaHon; ki lekhelew Hay hu Tow, min ha’aryeih hameit. 
ecclesiastes 9:5	ki haHayim yod‘im sheyamutu; wehameitim ’einam yod‘im me’umah, we’ein ‘od lahem sakhar, ki nishkaH cikhram. 
ecclesiastes 9:6	gam ’ahawatam gam sin’atam gam qin’atam kewar ’awadah; weHeileq ’ein lahem ‘od le‘olam, bekhol ’asher na‘asah taHat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 9:7	leikh ’ekhol besimHah laHmekha, ushateih welew Tow yeinekha; ki khewar, razah ha’elohim ’et ma‘asekha. 
ecclesiastes 9:8	bekhal ‘eit yihyu wegadekha lewanim; weshemen ‘al roshekha ’al yeHsar. 
ecclesiastes 9:9	re’eih Hayim ‘im ’ishah ’asher ’ahawta, kal yemei Hayei hewlekha, ’asher natan lekha taHat hashemesh, kol yemei hewlekha; ki hu Helqekha baHayim, uwa‘amalekha, ’asher ’atah ‘ameil taHat hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 9:10	kol ’asher timza yadekha la‘asot bekhoHakha ‘aseih; ki ’ein ma‘aseh weHeshbon weda‘at weHakhemah, bish’ol ’asher ’atah holeikh shamah.
ecclesiastes 9:11	shawti wera’oh taHat hashemesh, ki lo laqalim hameiroz welo lagiborim hamilHamah, wegam lo laHakhamim leHem wegam lo lanewonim ‘osher, wegam lo layode‘im Hein; ki ‘eit wafega‘ yiqreh ’et kulam. 
ecclesiastes 9:12	ki gam lo yeida‘ ha’adam ’et ‘ito, kadagim shene’eHacim bimzodah ra‘ah, wekhaziporim, ha’aHucot bapaH; kaheim, yuqashim benei ha’adam, le‘eit ra‘ah, keshetipol ‘aleihem pit’om. 
ecclesiastes 9:13	gam coh ra’iti Hakhmah taHat hashamesh; ugedolah hi ’eilay. 
ecclesiastes 9:14	‘ir qeTanah, wa’anashim bah me‘aT; uwa ’eileha melekh gadol wesawaw ’otah, uwanah ‘aleha mezodim gedolim. 
ecclesiastes 9:15	umaza wah, ’ish miskein Hakham, umilaT hu ’et ha‘ir beHakhemato; we’adam lo cakhar, ’et ha’ish hamiskein hahu. 
ecclesiastes 9:16	we’amarti ’ani, Towah Hakhmah migewurah; weHakhemat hamiskein becuyah, udewaraw ’einam nishma‘im. 
ecclesiastes 9:17	diwrei Hakhamim, benaHat nishma‘im; micca‘aqat mosheil bakesilim. 
ecclesiastes 9:18	Towah Hakhmah mikelei qeraw; weHoTe ’eHad, ye’abeid Towah harbeih. 
ecclesiastes 10:1	cewuwei mawet, yaw’ish yabia‘ shemen roqeiaH; yaqar meiHakhemah mikawod sikhlut me‘aT. 
ecclesiastes 10:2	leiw Hakham limino, weleiw kesil lismolo. 
ecclesiastes 10:3	wegam baderekh keshehassakhal keshessakhal holeikh libo Haseir; we’amar lakol sakhal hu. 
ecclesiastes 10:4	’im ruaH hamosheil ta‘aleh ‘alekha, meqomkha ’al tanaH; ki marpei, yaniaH HaTa’im gedolim. 
ecclesiastes 10:5	yeish ra‘ah, ra’iti taHat hashamesh; kishgagah sheyoza milifnei hashaliT. 
ecclesiastes 10:6	nitan hassekhel, bameromim rabim; wa‘ashirim basheifel yeisheiwu. 
ecclesiastes 10:7	ra’iti ‘awadim ‘al susim; wesarim holekhim ka‘awadim ‘al ha’arez. 
ecclesiastes 10:8	Hofeir gumaz bo yipol; uforeiz gadeir yishekhenu naHash. 
ecclesiastes 10:9	massia‘ ’awanim, yei‘azeiw bahem; boqeia‘ ‘eizim yissakhen bam. 
ecclesiastes 10:10	’im qeihah habarcel, wehu lo fanim qilqal, waHayalim yegabeir; weyitron hakhsheir Hakhmah 
ecclesiastes 10:11	’im yishokh hanaHash belo laHash; we’ein yitron, lewa‘al halashon. 
ecclesiastes 10:12	diwrei fi Hakham Hein; wesiftot kesil tewale‘enu. 
ecclesiastes 10:13	teHilat diwrei fihu sikhlut; we’aHarit pihu, holeilut ra‘ah. 
ecclesiastes 10:14	wehassakhal yarbeh dewarim; lo yeida‘ ha’adam mah sheyihyeh, wa’asher yihyeh mei’aHaraw, mi yagid lo. 
ecclesiastes 10:15	‘amal hakesilim teyage‘enu; ’asher lo yada‘ lalekhet ’el ‘ir. 
ecclesiastes 10:16	’i lakh ’erez, shemalkeikh na‘ar; wesarayikh baboqer yokheilu. 
ecclesiastes 10:17	’ashreikh ’erez, shemalkeikh ben Horim; wesarayikh ba‘eit yokheilu, bigwurah welo washeti. 
ecclesiastes 10:18	ba‘azaltayim yimakh hameqareh; uweshiflut yadayim yidlof habayit. 
ecclesiastes 10:19	lisHoq ‘osim leHem, weyayin yesamaH Hayim; wehakesef ya‘aneh ’et hakol. 
ecclesiastes 10:20	gam bemada‘akha, melekh ’al teqaleil, uweHadrei mishkawekha, ’al teqaleil ‘ashir; ki ‘of hashamayim yolikh ’et haqol, uwa‘al hakenafayim kenafayim yageid dawar. 
ecclesiastes 11:1	shalaH laHmekha ‘al penei hamayim; ki werow hayamim timza’enu. 
ecclesiastes 11:2	ten Heileq leshiw‘ah wegam lishmonah; ki lo teida‘, mah yihyeh ra‘ah ‘al ha’arez. 
ecclesiastes 11:3	’im yimale’u he‘awim geshem ‘al ha’arez yariqu, we’im yipol ‘eiz badarom we’im bazafon; meqom sheyipol ha‘eiz sham yehu. 
ecclesiastes 11:4	shomeir ruaH lo yicra‘; wero’eh we‘awim lo yiqzor. 
ecclesiastes 11:5	ka’asher ’einekha yodeia‘ mah derekh haruaH, ka‘azamim beweTen hamelei’ah; kakhah, lo teida‘ ’et ma‘aseih ha’elohim, ’asher ya‘aseh ’et hakol. 
ecclesiastes 11:6	baboqer cera‘ ’et car‘ekha, wela‘erew ’al tanaH yadekha; ki ’einekha yodei‘ ’ei ceh yikhshar haceh ’o ceh, we’im sheneihem ke’eHad Towim. 
ecclesiastes 11:7	umatoq ha’or; weTow la‘einayim lir’ot ’et hashamesh. 
ecclesiastes 11:8	ki ’im shanim harbeih yiHyeh ha’adam bekhulam yismaH; weyickor ’et yemei haHoshekh, ki harbeih yihyu kal sheba hawel. 
ecclesiastes 11:9	semaH baHur beyaldutekha, wiTiwekha libekha bimei weHurotekha, wehaleikh bedarkhei libekha, uwemar’ei ‘einekha; weda‘ ki ‘al kal ’eileh yewi’akha ha’elohim bamishpaT. 
ecclesiastes 11:10	wehaseir ka‘as milibekha, weha‘aweir ra‘ah mibesarekha; ki hayaldut wehashaHarut hawel. 
ecclesiastes 12:1	ucekhor ’et bor’ekha, bimei beHurotekha; ‘ad ’asher lo yawo’u yemei hara‘ah, wehigi‘u shanim, ’asher tomar, ’ein li wahem Heifez. 
ecclesiastes 12:2	‘ad ’asher lo teHshakh hashemesh weha’or, wehayareiaH wehakokhawim; weshawu he‘awim ’aHar hagashem. 
ecclesiastes 12:3	bayom, sheyacu‘u shomerei habayit, wehit‘awwetu ’anshei heHayil; uwaTelu haToHanot ki mi‘eiTu, weHashekhu haro’ot ba’arubot. 
ecclesiastes 12:4	wesugeru delatayim bashuq, bishfal qol haTaHanah; weyaqum leqol hazipor, weyishaHu kal benot hashir. 
ecclesiastes 12:5	gam migawoah yira’u weHatHatim baderekh, weyaneiz hashaqeid weyistabeil heHagaw, wetafeir ha’awiyonah; ki holeikh ha’adam ’el beit ‘olamo, wesawewu washuq hassofedim. 
ecclesiastes 12:6	‘ad ’asher lo yirHaq yeirateiq Hewel hakesef, wetaruz gulat haccahaw; wetishawer kad ‘al hamabua‘, wenaroz hagalgal ’el habor. 
ecclesiastes 12:7	weyashow he‘afar ‘al ha’arez keshehayah; weharuaH tashuw, ’el ha’elohim ’asher netanah. 
ecclesiastes 12:8	haweil hawalim ’amar haqohelet hakol hawel. 
ecclesiastes 12:9	weyoteir shehayah qohelet Hakham; ‘od, limad da‘at ’et ha‘am, we’iccein weHiqeir, tiqein meshalim harbeih. 
ecclesiastes 12:10	biqeish qohelet, limzo diwrei Heifez; wekhatuw yosher diwrei ’emet. 
ecclesiastes 12:11	diwrei Hakhamim kadarewonot, ukhemasmerot neTu‘im ba‘alei ’asupot; nitenu meiro‘eh ’eHad. 
ecclesiastes 12:12	weyoteir meiheimah beni hiccaheir; ‘asot sefarim harbeih ’ein qeiz, welahag harbeih yegi‘at basar. 
ecclesiastes 12:13	sof dawar hakol nishma‘; ’et ha’elohim yera we’et mizwotaw shemor, ki ceh kal ha’adam. 
ecclesiastes 12:14	ki ’et kal ma‘aseh, ha’elohim yawi wemishpaT ‘al kal ne‘lam; ’im Tow we’im ra‘. 
esther 1:1	wayhi bimei ’aHashweirosh; hu ’aHashweirosh, hamoleikh meihodu we‘ad kush, shewa‘ we‘esrim umei’ah medinah. 
esther 1:2	bayamim haheim; keshewet hamelekh ’aHashweirosh, ‘al kissei malkhuto, ’asher beshushan habirah. 
esther 1:3	bishnat shalosh lemalekho, ‘asah mishteh, lekhal saraw wa‘awadaw; Heil paras umaday, hapartemim wesarei hamedinot lefanaw. 
esther 1:4	behar’oto, ’et ‘osher kewod malkhuto, we’et yeqar, tif’eret gedulato; yamim rabim, shemonim ume’at yom. 
esther 1:5	uwimlot hayamim ha’eileh, ‘asah hamelekh lekhal ha‘am hanimze’im beshushan habirah lemigadol we‘ad qaTan mishteh shiw‘at yamim; baHazar ginat bitan hamelekh. 
esther 1:6	Hur karpas utekheilet, ’aHuc beHawlei wuz we’argaman, ‘al gelilei khesef we‘amudei sheish; miTot cahaw wakhesef, ‘al rizfat bahaT washeish wedar wesoHaret. 
esther 1:7	wehashqot bikhlei cahaw, wekheilim mikeilim shonim; weyein malkhut raw keyad hamelekh. 
esther 1:8	wehashetiyah khadat ’ein ’oneis; ki khein yissad hamelekh, ‘al kal raw beito, la‘asot kirzon ’ish wa’ish. 
esther 1:9	gam washti hamalkah, ‘asetah mishteih nashim; beit hamalkhut, ’asher lamelekh ’aHashweirosh.
esther 1:10	bayom hashewi‘i, keTow leiw hamelekh bayayin; ’amar limhuman bicceta Harwona bigta wa’awagta ceitar wekharkas, shiw‘at hassarisim, hamsharetim, ’et penei hamelekh ’aHashweirosh. 
esther 1:11	lehawi ’et washti hamalkah lifnei hamelekh bekheter malkhut; lehar’ot ha‘amim wehasarim ’et yafeyah, ki Towat mar’eh hi. 
esther 1:12	watema’ein hamalkah washti, lawo bidwar hamelekh, ’asher beyad hassarisim; wayiqzof hamelekh me’od, waHamato ba‘arah wo. 
esther 1:13	wayomer hamelekh, laHakhamim yode‘ei ha‘itim; ki khein dewar hamelekh, lifnei kal yode‘ei dat wadin. 
esther 1:14	wehaqarow ’eilaw, karshena sheitar ’admata tarshish, meres marsena memukhan; shiw‘at sarei paras umaday, ro’ei penei hamelekh, hayoshewim rishonah bamalkhut. 
esther 1:15	kedat mah la‘asot, bamalkah washti; ‘al ’asher lo ‘asetah, ’et ma’amar hamelekh ’aHashweirosh, beyad hassarisim.
esther 1:16	wayomer mumekhan memukhan, lifnei hamelekh wehasarim, lo ‘al hamelekh lewado, ‘awetah washti hamalkah; ki ‘al kal hasarim we‘al kal ha‘amim, ’asher bekhal medinot hamelekh ’aHashweirosh. 
esther 1:17	ki yeizei dewar hamalkah ‘al kal hanashim, lehawcot ba‘leihen be‘eineihen; be’ameram, hamelekh ’aHashweirosh ’amar lehawi ’et washti hamalkah lefanaw welo wa’ah. 
esther 1:18	wehayom hacceh tomarnah sarot paras umaday, ’asher shame‘u ’et dewar hamalkah, lekhol sarei hamelekh; ukheday biccayon waqazef. 
esther 1:19	’im ‘al hamelekh Tow, yeizei dewar malkhut milefanaw, weyikateiw bedatei faras umaday welo ya‘awor; ’asher lo tawo washti, lifnei hamelekh ’aHashweirosh, umalkhutah yitein hamelekh, lir‘utah haTowah mimenah. 
esther 1:20	wenishma‘ pitgam hamelekh ’asher ya‘aseh bekhal malkhuto, ki rabah hi; wekhal hanashim, yitenu yeqar lewa‘leihen, lemigadol we‘ad qaTan. 
esther 1:21	wayiTaw hadawar, be‘einei hamelekh wehasarim; waya‘as hamelekh kidwar memukhan. 
esther 1:22	wayishlaH sefarim ’el kal medinot hamelekh, ’el medinah umedinah kikhtawah, we’el ‘am wa‘am kilshono; lihyot kal ’ish soreir beweito, umedabeir kilshon ‘amo.
esther 2:1	’aHar hadewarim ha’eileh, keshokh Hamat hamelekh ’aHashweirosh; cakhar ’et washti we’eit ’asher ‘asatah, we’eit ’asher nigcar ‘aleha. 
esther 2:2	wayomeru na‘arei hamelekh mesharetaw; yewaqshu lamelekh ne‘arot betulot Towot mar’eh. 
esther 2:3	weyafqeid hamelekh peqidim bekhal medinot malkhuto weyiqbezu ’et kal na‘arah wetulah Towat mar’eh ’el shushan habirah ’el beit hanashim, ’el yad heige seris hamelekh shomeir hanashim; wenaton tamruqeihen. 
esther 2:4	wehana‘arah, ’asher tiTaw be‘einei hamelekh, timlokh taHat washti; wayiTaw hadawar be‘einei hamelekh waya‘as kein.
esther 2:5	’ish yehudi, hayah beshushan habirah; ushemo maredokhay, ben ya’ir ben shim‘i ben qish ’ish yemini. 
esther 2:6	’asher hagelah mirushalayim, ‘im hagolah ’asher hageletah, ‘im yekhaneyah melekh yehudah; ’asher heglah, newukhadnezar melekh bawel. 
esther 2:7	wayhi ’omein ’et hadassah, hi ’esteir bat dodo, ki ’ein lah ’aw wa’eim; wehana‘arah yefat to’ar weTowat mar’eh, uwemot ’awiha we’imah, leqaHah maredokhay lo lewat. 
esther 2:8	wayhi, behishama‘ dewar hamelekh wedato, uwehiqaweiz ne‘arot rabot ’el shushan habirah ’el yad heigay; watilaqaH ’esteir ’el beit hamelekh, ’el yad heigay shomeir hanashim. 
esther 2:9	watiTaw hana‘arah we‘einaw watisa Hesed lefanaw waywaheil ’et tamruqeha we’et manoteha lateit lah, we’eit shewa‘ hane‘arot, hare’uyot latet lah mibeit hamelekh; wayshaneha we’et na‘aroteha leTow beit hanashim. 
esther 2:10	lo higidah ’esteir, ’et ‘amah we’et moladtah; ki maredokhay ziwwah ‘aleha ’asher lo tagid. 
esther 2:11	uwekhal yom wayom, maredokhay mithaleikh, lifnei Hazar beit hanashim; lada‘at ’et shelom ’esteir, umah yei‘aseh bah. 
esther 2:12	uwehagia‘ tor na‘arah wena‘arah lawo ’el hamelekh ’aHashweirosh, miqeiz heyot lah kedat hanashim sheneim ‘asar Hodesh, ki kein yimle’u yemei meruqeihen; shishah Hodashim beshemen hamor, weshishah Hodashim babesamim, uwetamruqei hanashim. 
esther 2:13	uwaceh hana‘arah ba’ah ’el hamelekh; ’eit kal ’asher tomar yinatein lah lawo ‘imah, mibeit hanashim ‘ad beit hamelekh. 
esther 2:14	ba‘erew hi wa’ah, uwaboqer hi shawah ’el beit hanashim sheini, ’el yad sha‘ashgac seris hamelekh shomeir hapilagshim; lo tawo ‘od ’el hamelekh, ki ’im Hafeiz bah hamelekh weniqre’ah wesheim. 
esther 2:15	uwehagia‘ tor ’esteir bat ’awiHayil dod maredokhay ’asher laqaH lo lewat lawo ’el hamelekh, lo wiqshah dawar, ki ’im ’et ’asher yomar heigay seris hamelekh shomeir hanashim; watehi ’esteir noseit Hein, be‘einei kal ro’eha. 
esther 2:16	watilaqaH ’esteir ’el hamelekh ’aHashweirosh ’el beit malkhuto, baHodesh ha‘asiri hu Hodesh Teiweit; bishnat shewa‘ lemalkhuto. 
esther 2:17	waye’ehaw hamelekh ’et ’esteir mikal hanashim, watisa Hein waHesed lefanaw mikal habetulot; wayasem keter malkhut beroshah, wayamlikheha taHat washti. 
esther 2:18	waya‘as hamelekh mishteh gadol, lekhal saraw wa‘awadaw, ’eit mishteih ’esteir; wahanaHah lamedinot ‘asah, wayitein mas’eit keyad hamelekh. 
esther 2:19	uwehiqaweiz betulot sheinit; umaredokhay yosheiw besha‘ar hamelekh. 
esther 2:20	’ein ’esteir, magedet moladtah we’et ‘amah, ka’asher ziwwah ‘aleha maredokhay; we’et ma’amar maredokhay ’esteir ‘osah, ka’asher hayetah we’amenah ’ito.
esther 2:21	bayamim haheim, umaredokhay yosheiw besha‘ar hamelekh; qazaf bigtan wateresh shenei sarisei hamelekh mishomerei hassaf, waywaqshu lishloaH yad, bamelekh ’aHashweirosh. 
esther 2:22	wayiwwada‘ hadawar lemaredokhay, wayageid le’esteir hamalkah; watomer ’esteir lamelekh besheim maredokhay. 
esther 2:23	waywuqash hadawar wayimazei, wayitalu sheneihem ‘al ‘eiz; wayikateiw, beseifer diwrei hayamim lifnei hamelekh.
esther 3:1	’aHar hadewarim ha’eileh, gidal hamelekh ’aHashweirosh ’et haman ben hamedata ha’agagi waynase’eihu; wayasem ’et kis’o, mei‘al kal hasarim ’asher ’ito. 
esther 3:2	wekhal ‘awdei hamelekh ’asher besha‘ar hamelekh, kore‘im umishtaHawim lehaman, ki khein ziwwah lo hamelekh; umaredokhay, lo yikhra‘ welo yishtaHaweh. 
esther 3:3	wayomeru ‘awdei hamelekh ’asher besha‘ar hamelekh lemaredokhay; madua‘ ’atah ‘oweir, ’eit mizwat hamelekh. 
esther 3:4	wayhi, be’ameram ke’ameram ’eilaw yom wayom, welo shama‘ ’aleihem; wayagidu lehaman, lir’ot haya‘amdu diwrei maredokhay, ki higid lahem ’asher hu yehudi. 
esther 3:5	wayar haman, ki ’ein maredokhay, koreia‘ umishtaHaweh lo; wayimalei haman Heimah. 
esther 3:6	wayiwec be‘einaw, lishloH yad bemaredokhay lewado, ki higidu lo ’et ‘am maredokhay; waywaqeish haman, lehashmid ’et kal hayehudim ’asher bekhal malkhut ’aHashweirosh ‘am maredokhay. 
esther 3:7	baHodesh harishon hu Hodesh nisan, bishnat sheteim ‘esreih, lamelekh ’aHashweirosh; hipil pur hu hagoral lifnei haman, miyom leyom umeiHodesh leHodesh sheneim ‘asar hu Hodesh ’adar.
esther 3:8	wayomer haman lamelekh ’aHashweirosh, yeshno ‘am ’eHad, mefuccar umeforad bein ha‘amim, bekhol medinot malkhutekha; wedateihem shonot mikal ‘am, we’et datei hamelekh ’einam ‘osim, welamelekh ’ein shoeh lehaniHam. 
esther 3:9	’im ‘al hamelekh Tow, yikateiw le’abedam; wa‘aseret ’alafim kikar kesef, ’eshqol ‘al yedei ‘osei hamelakhah, lehawi ’el gincei hamelekh. 
esther 3:10	wayasar hamelekh ’et Taba‘to mei‘al yado; wayitenah, lehaman ben hamedata ha’agagi zoreir hayehudim. 
esther 3:11	wayomer hamelekh lehaman, hakesef natun lakh; weha‘am la‘asot bo kaTow be‘einekha. 
esther 3:12	wayiqare’u soferei hamelekh baHodesh harishon, bishloshah ‘asar yom bo wayikateiw kekhal ’asher ziwwah haman ’el ’aHashdarpenei hamelekh we’el hapaHot ’asher ‘al medinah umedinah, we’el sarei ‘am wa‘am, medinah umedinah kikhtawah, we‘am wa‘am kilshono; besheim hamelekh ’aHashweirosh nikhtaw, weneHtam beTaba‘at hamelekh. 
esther 3:13	wenishloaH sefarim beyad harazim ’el kal medinot hamelekh lehashmid laharog ule’abeid ’et kal hayehudim mina‘ar we‘ad caqein Taf wenashim beyom ’eHad, bishloshah ‘asar leHodesh sheneim ‘asar hu Hodesh ’adar; ushelalam lawoc. 
esther 3:14	patshegen haketaw, lehinatein dat bekhal medinah umedinah, galui lekhal ha‘amim; lihyot ‘atidim layom hacceh. 
esther 3:15	harazim yaze’u deHufim bidwar hamelekh, wehadat nitenah beshushan habirah; wehamelekh wehaman yashewu lishtot, weha‘ir shushan nawokhah.
esther 4:1	umaredokhay, yada‘ ’et kal ’asher na‘asah, wayiqra‘ maredokhay ’et begadaw, wayilbash saq wa’eifer; wayeizei betokh ha‘ir, wayic‘aq ce‘aqah gedolah umarah. 
esther 4:2	wayawo ‘ad lifnei sha‘ar hamelekh; ki ’ein lawo ’el sha‘ar hamelekh bilwush saq. 
esther 4:3	uwekhal medinah umedinah, meqom ’asher dewar hamelekh wedato magia‘, ’eiwel gadol layehudim, wezom uwekhi umispeid; saq wa’eifer, yuza‘ larabim. 
esther 4:4	watewo’enah na‘arot ’esteir wesariseha wayagidu lah, watitHalHal hamalkah me’od; watishlaH begadim lehalbish ’et maredokhay, ulehasir saqo mei‘alaw welo qibeil. 
esther 4:5	watiqra ’esteir lahatakh missarisei hamelekh ’asher he‘emid lefaneha, watezawweihu ‘al maredokhay; lada‘at mah ceh we‘al mah ceh. 
esther 4:6	wayeizei hatakh ’el maredokhay; ’el reHow ha‘ir, ’asher lifnei sha‘ar hamelekh. 
esther 4:7	wayaged lo maredokhay, ’eit kal ’asher qarahu; we’eit parashat hakesef, ’asher ’amar haman lishqol ‘al gincei hamelekh bayehudiyim bayehudim le’abedam. 
esther 4:8	we’et patshegen ketaw hadat ’asher nitan beshushan lehashmidam natan lo, lehar’ot ’et ’esteir ulehagid lah; ulezawwot ‘aleha, lawo ’el hamelekh lehitHanen lo ulewaqeish milefanaw ‘al ‘amah. 
esther 4:9	wayawo hatakh; wayageid le’esteir, ’eit diwrei maredokhay. 
esther 4:10	watomer ’esteir lahatakh, watezawweihu ’el maredokhay. 
esther 4:11	kal ‘awdei hamelekh we‘am medinot hamelekh yod‘im, ’asher kal ’ish we’ishah ’asher yawo ’el hamelekh ’el heHazeir hapenimit ’asher lo yiqarei, ’aHat dato lehamit, lewad mei’asher yoshiT lo hamelekh ’et sharwiT haccahaw weHayah; wa’ani, lo niqreiti lawo ’el hamelekh, ceh sheloshim yom. 
esther 4:12	wayagidu lemaredokhay, ’eit diwrei ’esteir.
esther 4:13	wayomer maredokhay lehashiw ’el ’esteir; ’al tedami wenafsheikh, lehimaleiT beit hamelekh mikal hayehudim. 
esther 4:14	ki ’im haHareish taHarishi ba‘eit haccot rewaH wehazalah ya‘amod layehudim mimaqom ’aHeir, we’at uweit ’awikh toweidu; umi yodeia‘, ’im le‘eit kacot, higa‘at lamalkhut. 
esther 4:15	watomer ’esteir lehashiw ’el maredokhay. 
esther 4:16	leikh kenos ’et kal hayehudim hanimze’im beshushan, wezumu ‘alay we’al tokhelu we’al tishtu sheloshet yamim laylah wayom, gam ’ani wena‘arotay ’azum kein; uwekhein ’awo ’el hamelekh ’asher lo khadat, wekha’asher ’awadti ’awadeti. 
esther 4:17	waya‘awor maredokhay; waya‘as kekhol ’asher ziwwetah ‘alaw ’esteir.
esther 5:1	wayhi bayom hashelishi, watilbash ’esteir malkhut, wata‘amod baHazar beit hamelekh hapenimit, nokhaH beit hamelekh; wehamelekh yosheiw ‘al kissei malkhuto beweit hamalkhut, nokhaH petaH habayit. 
esther 5:2	wayhi khir’ot hamelekh ’et ’esteir hamalkah, ‘omedet beHazeir, nase’ah Hein be‘einaw; wayosheT hamelekh le’esteir, ’et sharwiT haccahaw ’asher beyado, watiqraw ’esteir, watiga‘ berosh hasharwiT.
esther 5:3	wayomer lah hamelekh, mah lakh ’esteir hamalkah; umah baqashateikh ‘ad Hazi hamalkhut weyinatein lakh. 
esther 5:4	watomer ’esteir, ’im ‘al hamelekh Tow; yawo hamelekh wehaman hayom, ’el hamishteh ’asher ‘asiti lo. 
esther 5:5	wayomer hamelekh, maharu ’et haman, la‘asot ’et dewar ’esteir; wayawo hamelekh wehaman, ’el hamishteh ’asher ‘asetah ’esteir. 
esther 5:6	wayomer hamelekh le’esteir bemishteih hayayin, mah she’eilateikh weyinatein lakh; umah baqashateikh ‘ad Hazi hamalkhut wetei‘as. 
esther 5:7	wata‘an ’esteir watomar; she’eilati uwaqashati. 
esther 5:8	’im mazati Hein be‘einei hamelekh, we’im ‘al hamelekh Tow, lateit ’et she’eilati, wela‘asot ’et baqashati; yawo hamelekh wehaman, ’el hamishteh ’asher ’e‘eseh lahem, umaHar ’e‘eseh kidwar hamelekh. 
esther 5:9	wayeizei haman bayom hahu, sameiaH weTow leiw; wekhir’ot haman ’et maredokhay besha‘ar hamelekh, welo qam welo ca‘ mimenu, wayimalei haman ‘al maredokhay Heimah. 
esther 5:10	wayit’apaq haman, wayawo ’el beito; wayishlaH wayawei ’et ’ohawaw we’et ceresh ’ishto. 
esther 5:11	waysapeir lahem haman ’et kewod ‘ashero werow banaw; we’eit kal ’asher gidelo hamelekh we’eit ’asher nise’o, ‘al hasarim we‘awdei hamelekh. 
esther 5:12	wayomer haman ’af lo heiwi’ah ’esteir hamalkah ‘im hamelekh ’el hamishteh ’asher ‘asatah ki ’im ’oti; wegam lemaHar ’ani qaru lah ‘im hamelekh. 
esther 5:13	wekhal ceh ’einenu shoeh li; bekhal ‘eit, ’asher ’ani ro’eh ’et maredokhay hayehudi, yosheiw besha‘ar hamelekh.
