esther 5:14	watomer lo ceresh ’ishto wekhal ’ohawaw, ya‘asu ‘eiz gawoah Hamishim ’amah uwaboqer ’emor lamelekh, weyitlu ’et maredokhay ‘alaw, uwo ‘im hamelekh ’el hamishteh sameiaH; wayiTaw hadawar lifnei haman waya‘as ha‘eiz.
esther 6:1	balaylah hahu, nadedah shenat hamelekh; wayomer, lehawi ’et seifer haccikhronot diwrei hayamim, wayihyu niqra’im lifnei hamelekh. 
esther 6:2	wayimazei khatuw, ’asher higid maredokhay ‘al bigtana wateresh, shenei sarisei hamelekh, mishomerei hassaf; ’asher biqshu lishloaH yad, bamelekh ’aHashweirosh. 
esther 6:3	wayomer hamelekh, mah na‘asah yeqar ugedulah lemaredokhay ‘al ceh; wayomeru na‘arei hamelekh mesharetaw, lo na‘asah ‘imo dawar. 
esther 6:4	wayomer hamelekh mi weHazeir; wehaman ba, laHazar beit hamelekh haHizonah, leimor lamelekh, litlot ’et maredokhay, ‘al ha‘eiz ’asher heikhin lo. 
esther 6:5	wayomeru na‘arei hamelekh ’eilaw, hineih haman ‘omeid beHazeir; wayomer hamelekh yawo. 
esther 6:6	wayawo haman wayomer lo hamelekh, mah la‘asot ba’ish ’asher hamelekh Hafeiz biqaro; wayomer haman belibo, lemi yaHpoz hamelekh la‘asot yeqar yoteir mimeni. 
esther 6:7	wayomer haman ’el hamelekh; ’ish ’asher hamelekh Hafeiz biqaro. 
esther 6:8	yawi’u lewush malkhut, ’asher lawash bo hamelekh; wesus, ’asher rakhaw ‘alaw hamelekh, wa’asher nitan keter malkhut berosho. 
esther 6:9	wenaton halewush wehassus, ‘al yad ’ish misarei hamelekh hapartemim, wehilbishu ’et ha’ish, ’asher hamelekh Hafeiz biqaro; wehirkiwuhu ‘al hassus birHow ha‘ir, weqare’u lefanaw, kakhah yei‘aseh la’ish, ’asher hamelekh Hafeiz biqaro. 
esther 6:10	wayomer hamelekh lehaman, maheir qaH ’et halewush we’et hassus ka’asher dibarta, wa‘aseih khein lemaredokhay hayehudi, hayosheiw besha‘ar hamelekh; ’al tapeil dawar, mikol ’asher dibarta. 
esther 6:11	wayiqaH haman ’et halewush we’et hassus, wayalbeish ’et maredokhay; wayarkiweihu birHow ha‘ir, wayiqra lefanaw, kakhah yei‘aseh la’ish, ’asher hamelekh Hafeiz biqaro. 
esther 6:12	wayashaw maredokhay ’el sha‘ar hamelekh; wehaman nidHaf ’el beito, ’aweil waHafui rosh. 
esther 6:13	waysapeir haman leceresh ’ishto ulekhal ’ohawaw, ’eit kal ’asher qarahu; wayomeru lo Hakhamaw weceresh ’ishto, ’im miccera‘ hayehudim maredokhay ’asher haHilota linpol lefanaw lo tukhal lo, ki nafol tipol lefanaw. 
esther 6:14	‘odam medaberim ‘imo, wesarisei hamelekh higi‘u; wayawhilu lehawi ’et haman, ’el hamishteh ’asher ‘asetah ’esteir. 
esther 7:1	wayawo hamelekh wehaman, lishtot ‘im ’esteir hamalkah. 
esther 7:2	wayomer hamelekh le’esteir gam bayom hasheini bemishteih hayayin, mah she’eilateikh ’esteir hamalkah wetinatein lakh; umah baqashateikh ‘ad Hazi hamalkhut wetei‘as. 
esther 7:3	wata‘an ’esteir hamalkah watomar, ’im mazati Hein be‘einekha hamelekh, we’im ‘al hamelekh Tow; tinaten li nafshi bish’eilati, we‘ami bewaqashati. 
esther 7:4	ki nimkarnu ’ani we‘ami, lehashmid laharog ule’abeid; we’ilu la‘awadim welishfaHot nimkarnu heHerashti, ki ’ein hazar shoeh beneiceq hamelekh.
esther 7:5	wayomer hamelekh ’aHashweirosh, wayomer le’esteir hamalkah; mi hu ceh we’ei ceh hu, ’asher mela’o libo la‘asot kein. 
esther 7:6	watomer ’esteir, ’ish zar we’oyeiw, haman hara‘ hacceh; wehaman niw‘at, milifnei hamelekh wehamalkah. 
esther 7:7	wehamelekh qam baHamato mimishteih hayayin, ’el ginat habitan; wehaman ‘amad, lewaqeish ‘al nafsho mei’esteir hamalkah, ki ra’ah, ki khaletah ’eilaw hara‘ah mei’eit hamelekh. 
esther 7:8	wehamelekh shaw miginat habitan ’el beit mishteih hayayin, wehaman nofeil, ‘al hamiTah ’asher ’esteir ‘aleha, wayomer hamelekh, hagam likhbosh ’et hamalkah ‘imi babayit; hadawar, yaza mipi hamelekh, ufenei haman Hafu.
esther 7:9	wayomer Harwonah ’eHad min hassarisim lifnei hamelekh, gam hineih ha‘eiz ’asher ‘asah haman lemaredokhay ’asher diber Tow ‘al hamelekh, ‘omeid beweit haman, gawoah Hamishim ’amah; wayomer hamelekh teluhu ‘alaw. 
esther 7:10	wayitlu ’et haman, ‘al ha‘eiz ’asher heikhin lemaredokhay; waHamat hamelekh shakhakhah.
esther 8:1	bayom hahu, natan hamelekh ’aHashweirosh le’esteir hamalkah, ’et beit haman zoreir hayehudiyim hayehudim; umaredokhay, ba lifnei hamelekh, ki higidah ’esteir mah hu lah. 
esther 8:2	wayasar hamelekh ’et Taba‘to, ’asher he‘ewir meihaman, wayitenah lemaredokhay; watasem ’esteir ’et maredokhay ‘al beit haman.
esther 8:3	watosef ’esteir, watedabeir lifnei hamelekh, watipol lifnei raglaw; wateiwek watitHanen lo, leha‘awir ’et ra‘at haman ha’agagi, we’eit maHashawto, ’asher Hashaw ‘al hayehudim. 
esther 8:4	wayosheT hamelekh le’esteir, ’eit sharwiT haccahaw; wataqam ’esteir, wata‘amod lifnei hamelekh. 
esther 8:5	watomer ’im ‘al hamelekh Tow we’im mazati Hein lefanaw, wekhasheir hadawar lifnei hamelekh, weTowah ’ani be‘einaw; yikateiw lehashiw ’et hassefarim, maHashewet haman ben hamedata ha’agagi, ’asher kataw, le’abeid ’et hayehudim, ’asher bekhal medinot hamelekh. 
esther 8:6	ki ’eikhakhah ’ukhal wera’iti, bara‘ah ’asher yimza ’et ‘ami; we’eikhakhah ’ukhal wera’iti, be’awedan moladti.
esther 8:7	wayomer hamelekh ’aHashweirosh le’esteir hamalkah, ulemaredokhay hayehudi; hineih weit haman natati le’esteir, we’oto talu ‘al ha‘eiz, ‘al ’asher shalaH yado bayehudiyim bayehudim. 
esther 8:8	we’atem kitwu ‘al hayehudim kaTow be‘eineikhem besheim hamelekh, weHitmu beTaba‘at hamelekh; ki khetaw ’asher nikhtaw besheim hamelekh, wenaHtom beTaba‘at hamelekh ’ein lehashiw. 
esther 8:9	wayiqare’u soferei hamelekh ba‘eit hahi baHodesh hashelishi hu Hodesh siwan, bishloshah we‘esrim bo wayikateiw kekhal ’asher ziwwah maredokhay ’el hayehudim we’el ha’aHashdarpenim wehapaHot wesarei hamedinot ’asher meihodu we‘ad kush, shewa‘ we‘esrim umei’ah medinah, medinah umedinah kikhtawah, we‘am wa‘am kilshono; we’el hayehudim, kikhtawam wekhilshonam. 
esther 8:10	wayikhtow, besheim hamelekh ’aHashweirosh, wayaHtom beTaba‘at hamelekh; wayishlaH sefarim beyad harazim bassusim rokhewei harekhesh ha’aHashteranim, benei haramakhim. 
esther 8:11	’asher natan hamelekh layehudim ’asher bekhal ‘ir wa‘ir, lehiqaheil wela‘amod ‘al nafsham lehashmid welaharog ule’abeid ’et kal Heil ‘am umedinah hazarim ’otam Taf wenashim; ushelalam lawoc. 
esther 8:12	beyom ’eHad, bekhal medinot hamelekh ’aHashweirosh; bishloshah ‘asar leHodesh sheneim ‘asar hu Hodesh ’adar. 
esther 8:13	patshegen haketaw, lehinatein dat bekhal medinah umedinah, galui lekhal ha‘amim; welihyot hayehudiyim hayehudim ‘atudim ‘atidim layom hacceh, lehinaqeim mei’oyeweihem. 
esther 8:14	harazim rokhewei harekhesh ha’aHashteranim, yaze’u mewohalim udeHufim bidwar hamelekh; wehadat nitenah beshushan habirah.
esther 8:15	umaredokhay yaza milifnei hamelekh, bilwush malkhut tekheilet waHur, wa‘aTeret cahaw gedolah, wetakhrikh buz we’argaman; weha‘ir shushan, zahalah wesameiHah. 
esther 8:16	layehudim hayetah ’orah wesimHah; wesason wiqar. 
esther 8:17	uwekhal medinah umedinah uwekhal ‘ir wa‘ir, meqom ’asher dewar hamelekh wedato magia‘, simHah wesason layehudim, mishteh weyom Tow; werabim mei‘amei ha’arez mityahadim, ki nafal paHad hayehudim ‘aleihem. 
esther 9:1	uwishneim ‘asar Hodesh hu Hodesh ’adar, bishloshah ‘asar yom bo, ’asher higia‘ dewar hamelekh wedato lehei‘asot; bayom, ’asher siberu ’oyewei hayehudim lishloT bahem, wenahafokh hu, ’asher yishleTu hayehudim heimah besone’eihem. 
esther 9:2	niqhalu hayehudim be‘areihem, bekhal medinot hamelekh ’oHashweirosh, lishloaH yad, bimwaqshei ra‘atam; we’ish lo ‘amad lifneihem, ki nafal paHdam ‘al kal ha‘amim. 
esther 9:3	wekhal sarei hamedinot weha’aHashdarpenim wehapaHot, we‘osei hamelakhah ’asher lamelekh, menase’im ’et hayehudim; ki nafal paHad maredokhay ‘aleihem. 
esther 9:4	ki gadol maredokhay beweit hamelekh, weshame‘o holeikh bekhal hamedinot; ki ha’ish maredokhay holeikh wegadol.
esther 9:5	wayaku hayehudim bekhal ’oyeweihem, makat Herew wehereg we’awdan; waya‘asu wesone’eihem kirzonam. 
esther 9:6	uweshushan habirah, haregu hayehudim we’abeid, Hameish mei’ot ’ish. 
esther 9:7	we’eit parshandata we’eit dalfon we’eit ’aspata. 
esther 9:8	we’eit porata we’eit ’adalya we’eit ’aridata. 
esther 9:9	we’eit parmashta we’eit ’arisay, we’eit ’ariday we’eit waycata. 
esther 9:10	‘aseret benei haman ben hamedata zoreir hayehudim haragu; uwabiccah, lo shaleHu ’et yadam. 
esther 9:11	bayom hahu, ba mispar haharugim beshushan habirah lifnei hamelekh.
esther 9:12	wayomer hamelekh le’esteir hamalkah, beshushan habirah haregu hayehudim we’abeid Hameish mei’ot ’ish, we’eit ‘aseret benei haman, bish’ar medinot hamelekh meh ‘asu; umah she’eilateikh weyinatein lakh, umah baqashateikh ‘od wetei‘as. 
esther 9:13	watomer ’esteir ’im ‘al hamelekh Tow, yinatein gam maHar, layehudim ’asher beshushan, la‘asot kedat hayom; we’eit ‘aseret benei haman yitlu ‘al ha‘eiz. 
esther 9:14	wayomer hamelekh lehei‘asot kein, watinatein dat beshushan; we’eit ‘aseret benei haman talu. 
esther 9:15	wayiqahalu hayehudiyim hayehudim ’asher beshushan, gam beyom ’arba‘ah ‘asar leHodesh ’adar, wayahargu weshushan, shelosh mei’ot ’ish; uwabiccah, lo shaleHu ’et yadam. 
esther 9:16	ushe’ar hayehudim ’asher bimdinot hamelekh niqhalu we‘amod ‘al nafsham, wenoaH mei’oyeweihem, weharog besone’eihem, Hamishah weshiw‘im ’alef; uwabiccah, lo shaleHu ’et yadam. 
esther 9:17	beyom sheloshah ‘asar leHodesh ’adar; wenoaH, be’arba‘ah ‘asar bo, we‘asoh ’oto, yom mishteh wesimHah. 
esther 9:18	wehayehudiyim wehayehudim ’asher beshushan, niqhalu bishloshah ‘asar bo, uwe’arba‘ah ‘asar bo; wenoaH, baHamishah ‘asar bo, we‘asoh ’oto, yom mishteh wesimHah. 
esther 9:19	‘al kein hayehudim haperocim haperacim, hayoshewim be‘arei haperacot ‘osim, ’eit yom ’arba‘ah ‘asar leHodesh ’adar, simHah umishteh weyom Tow; umishloaH manot ’ish lerei‘eihu.
esther 9:20	wayikhtow maredokhay, ’et hadewarim ha’eileh; wayishlaH sefarim ’el kal hayehudim, ’asher bekhal medinot hamelekh ’aHashweirosh, haqerowim wehareHoqim. 
esther 9:21	leqayeim ‘aleihem lihyot ‘osim, ’eit yom ’arba‘ah ‘asar leHodesh ’adar, we’eit yom Hamishah ‘asar bo; bekhal shanah weshanah. 
esther 9:22	kayamim, ’asher naHu wahem hayehudim mei’oyweihem, wehaHodesh, ’asher nehpakh lahem miyagon lesimHah, umei’eiwel leyom Tow; la‘asot ’otam, yemei mishteh wesimHah, umishloaH manot ’ish lerei‘eihu, umatanot la’ewyonim. 
esther 9:23	weqibeil hayehudim, ’eit ’asher heiHeilu la‘asot; we’eit ’asher kataw maredokhay ’aleihem. 
esther 9:24	ki haman ben hamedata ha’agagi, zoreir kal hayehudim, Hashaw ‘al hayehudim le’abedam; wehipil pur hu hagoral, lehumam ule’abedam. 
esther 9:25	uwewo’ah lifnei hamelekh ’amar ‘im hasseifer, yashuw maHashawto hara‘ah ’asher Hashaw ‘al hayehudim ‘al rosho; wetalu ’oto we’et banaw ‘al ha‘eiz. 
esther 9:26	‘al kein qare’u layamim ha’eileh furim ‘al sheim hapur, ‘al kein ‘al kal diwrei ha’igeret haccot; umah ra’u ‘al kakhah, umah higia‘ ’aleihem. 
esther 9:27	qiyemu weqibeil weqibelu hayehudim ‘aleihem we‘al car‘am we‘al kal hanilwim ‘aleihem welo ya‘awor, lihyot ‘osim, ’eit shenei hayamim ha’eileh, kikhtawam wekhicmanam; bekhal shanah weshanah. 
esther 9:28	wehayamim ha’eileh nickarim wena‘asim bekhal dor wador, mishpaHah umishpaHah, medinah umedinah we‘ir wa‘ir; wimei hapurim ha’eileh, lo ya‘awru mitokh hayehudim, wecikhram lo yasuf miccar‘am.
esther 9:29	watikhtow ’esteir hamalkah wat ’awiHayil umaredokhay hayehudi ’et kal toqef; leqayeim, ’eit ’igeret hapurim haccot hasheinit. 
esther 9:30	wayishlaH sefarim ’el kal hayehudim, ’el shewa‘ we‘esrim umei’ah medinah, malkhut ’aHashweirosh; diwrei shalom we’emet. 
esther 9:31	leqayeim ’eit yemei hapurim ha’eileh bicmaneihem, ka’asher qiyam ‘aleihem maredokhay hayehudi we’esteir hamalkah, wekha’asher qiyemu ‘al nafsham we‘al car‘am; diwrei hazomot weca‘aqatam. 
esther 9:32	uma’amar ’esteir, qiyam diwrei hapurim ha’eileh; wenikhtaw basseifer.
esther 10:1	wayasem hamelekh ’aHasheirosh ’aHashweirosh mas ‘al ha’arez we’iyei hayam. 
esther 10:2	wekhal ma‘aseih taqepo ugewurato, ufarashat gedulat maredokhay, ’asher gidelo hamelekh; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim, lemalkhei maday ufaras. 
esther 10:3	ki maredokhay hayehudi, mishneh lamelekh ’aHashweirosh, wegadol layehudim, werazui lerow ’eHaw; doreish Tow le‘amo, wedoweir shalom lekhal car‘o. 
daniel 1:1	bishnat shalosh, lemalkhut yehoyaqim melekh yehudah; ba newukhadnezar melekh bawel yerushalim wayazar ‘aleha. 
daniel 1:2	wayitein ’adonay beyado ’et yehoyaqim melekh yehudah, umiqzat kelei weit ha’elohim, waywi’eim ’erez shin‘ar beit ’elohaw; we’et hakeilim heiwi, beit ’ozar ’elohaw. 
daniel 1:3	wayomer hamelekh, le’ashpenac raw sarisaw; lehawi mibenei yisra’eil umiccera‘ hamelukhah umin hapartemim. 
daniel 1:4	yeladim ’asher ’ein bahem kal me’um mum weTowei mar’eh umaskilim bekhal Hakhmah weyode‘ei da‘at umewinei mada‘, wa’asher koaH bahem, la‘amod beheikhal hamelekh; ulalamedam seifer uleshon kasdim. 
daniel 1:5	wayman lahem hamelekh dewar yom beyomo, mipat bag hamelekh umiyein mishtaw, ulegadelam shanim shalosh; umiqzatam, ya‘amdu lifnei hamelekh. 
daniel 1:6	wayhi wahem mibenei yehudah; daniyeil Hananyah, misha’eil wa‘acaryah. 
daniel 1:7	wayasem lahem sar hassarisim sheimot; wayasem ledaniyeil beileTeshazar, welaHananyah shadrakh, ulemisha’eil meishakh, wela‘acaryah ‘aweid nego. 
daniel 1:8	wayasem daniyeil ‘al libo, ’asher lo yitga’al befatbag hamelekh uweyein mishtaw; waywaqeish misar hassarisim, ’asher lo yitga’al. 
daniel 1:9	wayitein ha’elohim ’et daniyeil, leHesed uleraHamim; lifnei sar hassarisim. 
daniel 1:10	wayomer sar hassarisim ledaniyeil, yarei ’ani ’et ’adoni hamelekh, ’asher minah, ’et ma’akhalkhem we’et mishteikhem; ’asher lamah yir’eh ’et peneikhem co‘afim, min hayladim ’asher kegilekhem, weHiyawtem ’et roshi lamelekh. 
daniel 1:11	wayomer daniyeil ’el hamelzar; ’asher minah sar hassarisim, ‘al daniyeil Hananyah, misha’eil wa‘acaryah. 
daniel 1:12	nas na ’et ‘awadekha yamim ‘asarah; weyitenu lanu min hacceiro‘im wenokhelah umayim wenishteh. 
daniel 1:13	weyeira’u lefanekha mar’einu, umar’eih hayladim, ha’okhelim, ’eit patbag hamelekh; wekha’asher tir’eih, ‘aseih ‘im ‘awadekha. 
daniel 1:14	wayishma‘ lahem ladawar hacceh; waynasseim yamim ‘asarah. 
daniel 1:15	umiqzat yamim ‘asarah, nir’ah mar’eihem Tow, uweri’ei basar; min kal hayladim, ha’okhelim, ’eit patbag hamelekh. 
daniel 1:16	wayhi hamelzar, nosei ’et patbagam, weyein mishteihem; wenotein lahem ceire‘onim. 
daniel 1:17	wehayladim ha’eileh ’arba‘tam, natan lahem ha’elohim mada‘ wehaskeil bekhal seifer weHakhemah; wedaniyeil heiwin, bekhal Hacon waHalomot. 
daniel 1:18	ulemiqzat hayamim, ’asher ’amar hamelekh lahawi’am; waywi’eim sar hassarisim, lifnei newukhadnezar. 
daniel 1:19	waydabeir ’itam hamelekh welo nimza mikulam, kedaniyeil Hananyah, misha’eil wa‘acaryah; waya‘amdu lifnei hamelekh. 
daniel 1:20	wekhol, dewar Hakhemat binah, ’asher biqeish meihem hamelekh; wayimza’eim ‘eser yadot, ‘al kal haHarTumim ha’ashafim, ’asher bekhal malkhuto. 
daniel 1:21	wayhi daniyeil, ‘ad shenat ’aHat lekhoresh hamelekh.
daniel 2:1	uwishnat shetayim, lemalkhut newukhadnezar, Halam newukhadnezar Halomot; watitpa‘em ruHo, ushenato nihyetah ‘alaw. 
daniel 2:2	wayomer hamelekh liqro laHarTumim wela’ashafim, welamkhashefim welakasdim, lehagid lamelekh Halomotaw; wayawo’u waya‘amdu lifnei hamelekh. 
daniel 2:3	wayomer lahem hamelekh Halom Halameti; watipa‘em ruHi, lada‘at ’et haHalom. 
daniel 2:4	waydaberu hakasdim lamelekh ’aramit; malka le‘alemin Heyi, ’emar Helma le‘awdayikh le‘awdakh ufishra neHawwei. 
daniel 2:5	‘aneih malka we’amar lekhasdayei lekhasda’ei, mileta mini ’acda; hein la tehod‘unani Helma ufishreih, hadamin tit‘awdun, uwateikhon newali yitesamun. 
daniel 2:6	wehein Helma ufishreih tehaHawon, matenan unewicbah wiqar sagi, teqabelun min qodamay; lahein Helma ufishreih haHawoni. 
daniel 2:7	‘ano tinyanut we’amerin; malka Helma yeimar le‘awdohi ufishrah nehaHaweih. 
daniel 2:8	‘aneih malka we’amar, min yaziw yada‘ ’anah, di ‘idana ’antun cawenin; kal qoweil di Haceiton, di ’acda mini mileta. 
daniel 2:9	di hein Helma la tehod‘unani Hadah hi datekhon, umilah khidwah usheHitah hacmintun hicdemintun lemeimar qadamay, ‘ad di ‘idana yishtanei; lahein, Helma ’emaru li, we’inda‘ di fishreih tehaHawunani. 
daniel 2:10	‘ano khasdayei khasda’ei qodam malka we’amerin, la ’itay ’anash ‘al yabeshta, di milat malka, yukhal lehaHawayah; kal qoweil, di kal melekh raw weshaliT, milah khidnah la she’eil, lekhal HarTom we’ashaf wekhasday. 
daniel 2:11	umileta di malkah sha’eil yaqirah, we’aHoran la ’itay, di yeHawwinah qodam malka; lahein ’elahin, di medarehon, ‘im bisra la ’itohi. 
daniel 2:12	kal qoweil denah, malka benas uqezaf sagi; wa’amar lehowadah, lekhol Hakimei wawel. 
daniel 2:13	wedata nefqat, weHakimaya mitqaTelin; uwe‘o daniyeil weHawrohi lehitqeTalah.
daniel 2:14	beidayin daniyeil, hatiw ‘eiTa uTe‘eim, le’aryokh raw TabaHaya di malka; di nefaq leqaTalah, leHakimei bawel. 
daniel 2:15	‘aneih we’amar, le’aryokh shaliTa di malka, ‘al mah data mehaHzefah min qodam malka; ’edayin mileta, hoda‘ ’aryokh ledaniyeil. 
daniel 2:16	wedaniyeil, ‘al uwe‘ah min malka; di ceman yintein leih, ufishra lehaHawayah lemalka.
daniel 2:17	’edayin daniyeil lewayteih ’acal; welaHananyah misha’eil wa‘acaryah Hawrohi mileta hoda‘. 
daniel 2:18	weraHamin, lemiw‘ei min qodam ’elah shemaya, ‘al racah denah; di la yehowedun daniyeil weHawrohi, ‘im she’ar Hakimei wawel. 
daniel 2:19	’edayin, ledaniyeil beHecwa di leileya racah gali; ’edayin daniyeil, barikh le’elah shemaya. 
daniel 2:20	‘aneih daniyeil we’amar, lehewei shemeih di ’elaha mewarakh, min ‘alema we‘ad ‘alema; di Hakhemeta ugewureta di leih hi. 
daniel 2:21	wehu mehashnei ‘idanaya wecimnaya, meha‘deih malkhin umehaqeim malkhin; yaheiw Hakhemeta leHakimin, umande‘a leyade‘ei winah. 
daniel 2:22	hu galei ‘amiqata umesaterata; yada‘ mah waHashokha, unehira unehora ‘imeih sherei. 
daniel 2:23	lakh ’elah ’awahati, mehodei umeshabaH ’anah, di Hakhemeta ugewureta yehawt li; ukhe‘an hoda‘tani di we‘eina minakh, di milat malka hoda‘tena. 
daniel 2:24	kal qoweil denah, daniyeil ‘al ‘al ’aryokh, di mani malka, lehowadah leHakimei wawel; ’acal wekhein ’amar leih, leHakimei wawel ’al tehoweid, ha‘eileni qodam malka, ufishra lemalka ’aHawwei.
daniel 2:25	’edayin ’aryokh behitbehalah, han‘eil ledaniyeil qodam malka; wekhein ’amar leih, di hashkaHat gewar min benei galuta di yehud, di fishra lemalka yehoda‘. 
daniel 2:26	‘aneih malka we’amar ledaniyeil, di shemeih beileTeshazar; ha’itayikh ha’itakh kaheil, lehoda‘utani Helma di Haceit ufishreih. 
daniel 2:27	‘aneih daniyeil qodam malka we’amar; racah di malka sha’eil, la Hakimin ’ashefin, HarTumin gacerin, yakhelin lehaHawayah lemalka. 
daniel 2:28	beram ’itay ’elah bishmaya galei racin, wehoda‘, lemalka newukhadnezar, mah di lehewei be’aHarit yomaya; Helmakh weHecwei reishakh ‘al mishkewakh denah hu.
daniel 2:29	’antah malka, ra‘yonakh ‘al mishkewakh seliqu, mah di lehewei ’aHarei denah; wegalei racaya hod‘akh mah di lehewei. 
daniel 2:30	wa’anah, la weHakhemah di ’itay bi min kal Hayaya, raca denah geli li; lahein, ‘al diwrat di fishra lemalka yehod‘un, wera‘yonei liwwakh tinda‘. 
daniel 2:31	’antah malka, Haceih hawayta wa’alu zeleim Had sagi, zalma dikein raw weciweih yatir qa’eim leqawelakh; wereiweih deHil. 
daniel 2:32	hu zalma, reisheih di dehaw Taw, Hadohi udera‘ohi di khesaf; me‘ohi weyarkhateih di neHash. 
daniel 2:33	shaqohi di farcel; raglohi minehon minehein di farcel, uminehon uminehein di Hasaf. 
daniel 2:34	Haceih hawayta, ‘ad di hitgeceret ’ewen di la widayin, umeHat lezalma ‘al raglohi, di farcela weHaspa; wehadeiqet himon. 
daniel 2:35	beidayin daqu khaHadah parcela Haspa neHasha kaspa wedahawa, wahawo ke‘ur min ’iderei qayiT, unesa himon ruHa, wekhal ’atar la hishtakhaH lehon; we’awna di meHat lezalma, hawat leTur raw umelat kal ’ar‘a. 
daniel 2:36	denah Helma, ufishreih neimar qodam malka. 
daniel 2:37	’antah malka, melekh malkhaya; di ’elah shemaya, malkhuta Hisna wetaqepa wiqara yehaw lakh. 
daniel 2:38	uwekhal di da’arin dayerin benei ’anasha Heiwat bara we‘of shemaya yehaw bidakh, wehashleTakh bekhalehon; ’antah hu, reishah di dahawa. 
daniel 2:39	uwaterakh, tequm malkhu ’aHori ’ara‘ minakh; umalkhu telitaya telita’ah ’aHori di neHasha, di tishlaT bekhal ’ar‘a. 
daniel 2:40	umalkhu rewi‘ayah rewi‘a’ah, tehewei taqifah kefarcela; kal qoweil, di farcela mehadeiq weHasheil kola, ukhefarcela di mera‘a‘ kal ’ilein tadiq weteiroa‘. 
daniel 2:41	wedi Hacaytah raglaya we’ezbe‘ata, minehon minehein Hasaf di feHar uminehon uminehein parcel, malkhu feligah teheweih, umin nizbeta di farcela lehewei wah; kal qoweil di Hacaytah, parcela, me‘araw baHasaf Tina. 
daniel 2:42	we’ezbe‘at raglaya, minehon minehein parcel uminehon uminehein Hasaf; min qezat malkhuta teheweih taqifah, uminah teheweih tewirah. 
daniel 2:43	di wedi Hacayta, parcela me‘araw baHasaf Tina, mit‘arewin lehewon bicra‘ ’anasha, wela lehewon daweqin denah ‘im denah; hei khedi farcela, la mit‘araw ‘im Haspa. 
daniel 2:44	uweyomeihon di malkhaya ’inun, yeqim ’elah shemaya malkhu di le‘alemin la titHabal, umalkhutah, le‘am ’aHoran la tishtewiq; tadiq wetaseif kal ’ilein malkhewata, wehi tequm le‘alemaya. 
daniel 2:45	kal qoweil di Hacayta di miTura ’itgeceret ’ewen di la widayin, wehadeqet parcela neHasha Haspa kaspa wedahawa, ’elah raw hoda‘ lemalka, mah di lehewei ’aHarei denah; weyaziw Helma umeheiman pishreih.
daniel 2:46	beidayin malka newukhadnezar nefal ‘al ’anpohi, uledaniyeil segid; uminHah weniHoHin, ’amar lenassakhah leih. 
daniel 2:47	‘aneih malka ledaniyeil we’amar, min qeshoT di ’elahakhon, hu ’elah ’elahin umarei malkhin wegaleih racin; di yekheileta, lemiglei racah denah. 
daniel 2:48	’edayin malka ledaniyeil rabi, umatenan rawrewan sagi’an yehaw leih, wehashleTeih, ‘al kal medinat bawel; weraw signin, ‘al kal Hakimei wawel. 
daniel 2:49	wedaniyeil be‘a min malka, umani, ‘al ‘awideta di medinat bawel, leshadrakh meishakh wa‘aweid nego; wedaniyeil bitra‘ malka.
daniel 3:1	newukhadnezar malka, ‘awad zeleim di dehaw, rumeih ’amin shitin, petayeih ’amin shit; ’aqimeih bewiq‘at dura, bimdinat bawel. 
daniel 3:2	unewukhadnezar malka shelaH lemikhnash la’aHashdarpenaya signaya ufaHawata ’adargaceraya gedaweraya detaweraya tiftayei, wekhol shilTonei medinata; lemeitei laHanukat zalma, di haqeim newukhadnezar malka. 
daniel 3:3	beidayin mitkaneshin ’aHashdarpenaya signaya ufaHawata ’adargaceraya gedaweraya detaweraya tiftayei, wekhol shilTonei medinata, laHanukat zalma, di haqeim newukhadnezar malka; weqa’amin weqayemin laqoweil zalma, di haqeim newukhadnezar. 
daniel 3:4	wekharoca qarei weHayil; lekhon ’amerin ‘amaya, ’umaya welishanaya. 
daniel 3:5	be‘idana di tishme‘un qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha pesanteirin sumeponeyah, wekhol cenei cemara; tipelun wetisgedun lezelem dahawa, di haqeim newukhadnezar malka. 
daniel 3:6	uman di la yipeil weyisgud; bah sha‘ata yitremei, lego ’atun nura yaqidta. 
daniel 3:7	kal qoweil denah beih cimna kedi shame‘in kal ‘amaya qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha pesanTeirin, wekhol cenei cemara; nafelin kal ‘amaya ’umaya welishanaya, sagedin lezelem dahawa, di haqeim newukhadnezar malka. 
daniel 3:8	kal qoweil denah beih cimna, qeriwu guwrin kasda’in; wa’akhalu qarzeihon di yehudayei. 
daniel 3:9	‘ano we’amerin, linwukhadnezar malka; malka le‘alemin Heyi. 
daniel 3:10	’antah ’ant malka sameta Te‘eim di khal ’enash di yishma‘ qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha fesanteirin wesiponeyah wesuponeyah, wekhol cenei cemara; yipeil weyisgud lezelem dahawa. 
daniel 3:11	uman di la yipeil weyisgud; yitremei lego ’atun nura yaqidta. 
daniel 3:12	’itay guwrin yehudayin, di manita yatehon ‘al ‘awidat medinat bawel, shadrakh meishakh wa‘aweid nego; guwraya ’ileikh, la samu ‘alayikh ‘alakh malka Te‘eim, leilahayikh leilahakh la faleHin, ulezelem dahawa di haqeimeta la sagedin.
daniel 3:13	beidayin newukhadnezar birgac waHamah, ’amar lehaytayah, leshadrakh meishakh wa‘aweid nego; beidayin guwraya ’ileikh, heitayu qodam malka. 
daniel 3:14	‘aneih newukhadnezar we’amar lehon, hazda shadrakh meishakh wa‘aweid nego; leilahay, la ’iteikhon paleHin, ulezelem dahawa di haqeimet la sagedin. 
daniel 3:15	ke‘an hein ’iteikhon ‘atidin, di we‘idana di tishme‘un qal qarna mashroqita qitaros qatros sabekha pesanteirin wesumeponeyah wekhol cenei cemara, tipelun wetisgedun lezalma di ‘awdeit wehein la tisgedun, bah sha‘atah titremon, lego ’atun nura yaqidta; uman hu ’elah, dei yesheicewinkhon min yeday. 
daniel 3:16	‘ano, shadrakh meishakh wa‘aweid nego, we’amerin lemalka; newukhadnezar, la HashHin ’anaHnah ‘al denah pitgam lahatawutakh. 
daniel 3:17	hein ’itay, ’elahana di ’anaHna faleHin, yakhil lesheicawutana; min ’atun nura yaqidta umin yedakh malka yesheiciw. 
daniel 3:18	wehein la, yedia‘ lehewei lakh malka; di leilahayikh la ’itayna ’itana faleHin, ulezelem dahawa di haqeimeta la nisgud.
daniel 3:19	beidayin newukhadnezar hitmeli Hema, uzeleim ’anpohi ’eshtanu ’eshtani, ‘al shadrakh meishakh wa‘aweid nego; ‘aneih we’amar lemeicei le’atuna, Had shiw‘ah, ‘al di Haceih lemeiceyeih. 
daniel 3:20	uleguwrin gibarei Hayil di weHayleih, ’amar lekhapatah, leshadrakh meishakh wa‘aweid nego; lemirmei le’atun nura yaqidta. 
daniel 3:21	beidayin guwraya ’ileikh, kefitu besarbaleihon paTisheihon paTesheihon, wekharbelatehon ulewusheihon; uremiw lego ’atun nura yaqidta. 
daniel 3:22	kal qoweil denah, min di milat malka maHzefah, we’atuna ’eiceih yatira; guwraya ’ileikh, di hassiqu leshadrakh meishakh wa‘aweid nego, qaTil himon, shewiwa di nura. 
daniel 3:23	weguwraya ’ileikh telateihon, shadrakh meishakh wa‘aweid nego; nefalu lego ’atun nura yaqidta mekhapetin.
daniel 3:24	’edayin newukhadnezar malka, tewah weqam behitbehalah; ‘aneih we’amar lehadawerohi, hala guwrin telata remeina lego nura mekhapetin, ‘anayin we’amerin lemalka, yaziwa malka. 
daniel 3:25	‘aneih we’amar, ha ’anah Haceih guwrin ’arbe‘ah, sherayin mahlekhin bego nura, waHawal la ’itay behon; wereiweih di rewi‘aya rewi‘a’ah, dameih lewar ’elahin.
daniel 3:26	beidayin qereiw newukhadnezar, litra‘ ’atun nura yaqidta ‘aneih we’amar, shadrakh meishakh wa‘aweid nego ‘awdohi di ’elaha ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah puqu we’eto; beidayin nafeqin, shadrakh meishakh wa‘aweid nego min go nura. 
daniel 3:27	umitkaneshin ’aHashdarpenaya signaya ufaHawata wehadawerei malka Hacayin leguwraya ’ileikh di la sheleiT nura begeshmehon, use‘ar reishehon la hitHarakh, wesarebaleihon la sheno; wereiaH nur, la ‘adat behon. 
daniel 3:28	‘aneih newukhadnezar we’amar, berikh ’elahahon di shadrakh meishakh wa‘aweid nego, di shelaH mal’akheih wesheiciw le‘awdohi, di hitreHizu ‘alohi; umilat malka shaniw, wihawu geshmeihon geshmehon, di la yifleHun wela yisgedun lekhal ’elah, lahein leilahahon. 
daniel 3:29	umini sim Te‘eim di khal ‘am ’umah welishan, di yeimar sheilah shalu ‘al ’elahahon, di shadrakh meishakh wa‘aweid nego, hadamin yit‘aweid, uwayteih newali yishtawweih; kal qoweil, di la ’itay ’elah ’aHoran, di yikul lehazalah kidnah. 
daniel 3:30	beidayin malka, hazlaH leshadrakh meishakh wa‘aweid nego bimdinat bawel.
daniel 4:1	newukhadnezar malka, lekhal ‘amaya ’umaya welishanaya di da’arin dayerin bekhal ’ar‘a shelamekhon yisgei. 
daniel 4:2	’ataya wetimhaya, di ‘awad ‘imi, ’elaha ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah; shefar qadamay lehaHawayah. 
daniel 4:3	’atohi kemah rawrewin, wetimhohi kemah taqifin; malkhuteih malkhut ‘alam, weshaleTaneih ‘im dar wedar. 
daniel 4:4	’anah newukhadnezar, sheleih haweit beweiti, wera‘nan beheikheli. 
daniel 4:5	Heilem Haceit widaHalinani; weharhorin ‘al mishkewi, weHecwei reishi yewahalunani. 
daniel 4:6	umini sim Te‘eim, lehan‘alah qadamay, lekhol Hakimei wawel; di feshar Helma yehod‘unani. 
daniel 4:7	beidayin ‘alalin ‘alin, HarTumaya ’ashefaya, kasdayei kasda’ei wegaceraya; weHelma, ’amar ’anah qodameihon, ufishreih la mehod‘in li. 
daniel 4:8	we‘ad ’aHorein ‘al qadamay daniyeil di shemeih beileTeshazar keshum ’elahi, wedi ruaH ’elahin qadishin beih; weHelma qadamohi ’amreit. 
daniel 4:9	beileTeshazar raw HarTumaya di ’anah yid‘eit, di ruaH ’elahin qadishin bakh, wekhal rac la ’aneis lakh; Hecwei Helmi di Haceit ufishreih ’emar. 
daniel 4:10	weHecwei reishi ‘al mishkewi; Haceih haweit, wa’alu ’ilan bego ’ar‘a werumeih sagi. 
daniel 4:11	rewah ’ilana uteqif; werumeih yimTei lishmaya, waHacoteih lesof kal ’ar‘a. 
daniel 4:12	‘afeyeih shapir we’inbeih sagi, umacon lekhola weih; teHotohi taTleil Heiwat bara, uwe‘anfohi yedurun yeduran ziparei shemaya, umineih yitecin kal bisra. 
daniel 4:13	Haceih haweit beHecwei reishi ‘al mishkewi; wa’alu ‘ir weqadish, min shemaya naHit. 
daniel 4:14	qarei weHayil wekhein ’amar, godu ’ilana weqazizu ‘anfohi, ’ataru ‘afeyeih uwadaru ’inbeih; tenud Heiweta min taHtohi, weziperaya min ‘anfohi. 
daniel 4:15	beram ‘iqar shareshohi be’ar‘a shewuqu, uwe’esur di farcel uneHash, bedit’a di wara; uweTal shemaya yizTaba‘, we‘im Heiweta Halaqeih ba‘asaw ’ar‘a. 
daniel 4:16	liwweih min ’enosha ’anasha yeshanon, ulewaw Heiwah yityehiw leih; weshiw‘ah ‘idanin yaHlefun ‘alohi. 
daniel 4:17	bigceirat ‘irin pitgama, umeimar qadishin she’eileta; ‘ad diwrat di yinde‘un Hayaya di shaliT ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah bemalkhut ’enosha ’anasha, uleman di yizbei yiteninah, ushefal ’anashim yeqim ‘alayah ‘alah. 
daniel 4:18	denah Helma Haceit, ’anah malka newukhadnezar; we’antah we’ant beileTeshazar pishrei ’emar, kal qoweil di kal Hakimei malkhuti, la yakhelin pishra lehoda‘utani, we’antah we’ant kaheil, di ruaH ’elahin qadishin bakh. 
daniel 4:19	’edayin daniyeil di shemeih beileTeshazar, ’eshtomam kesha‘ah Hadah, wera‘yonohi yewahaluneih; ‘aneih malka we’amar, beileTeshazar Helma ufishrei ’al yewahalakh, ‘aneih weileTeshazar we’amar, mare’i mari Helma lesane’ayikh lesane’akh ufishreih le‘arayikh le‘arakh 
daniel 4:20	’ilana di Hacayta, di rewah uteqif; werumeih yimTei lishmaya, waHacoteih lekhal ’ar‘a. 
daniel 4:21	we‘afeyeih shapir we’inbeih sagi, umacon lekhola weih; teHotohi, tedur Heiwat bara, uwe‘anfohi yishkenan ziparei shemaya. 
daniel 4:22	’antah ’ant hu malka, di rewayt uteqeifet; urewutakh rewat umeTat lishmaya, weshaleTanakh lesof ’ar‘a. 
daniel 4:23	wedi Hacah malka ‘ir weqadish naHit min shemaya we’amar godu ’ilana weHabeluhi, beram ‘iqar shareshohi be’ar‘a shewuqu, uwe’esur di farcel uneHash, bedit’a di wara; uweTal shemaya yizTaba‘, we‘im Heiwat bara Halaqeih, ‘ad di shiw‘ah ‘idanin yaHlefun ‘alohi. 
daniel 4:24	denah fishra malka; ugeceirat ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah hi, di meTat ‘al mar’i mari malka. 
daniel 4:25	welakh Taredin min ’anasha we‘im Heiwat bara leheweih medorakh we‘isba khetorin lakh yeTa‘amun, umiTal shemaya lakh mezabe‘in, weshiw‘ah ‘idanin yaHlefun ‘alayikh ‘ad di tinda‘, di shaliT ‘ilaya bemalkhut ’anasha, uleman di yizbei yiteninah. 
daniel 4:26	wedi ’amaru, lemishbaq ‘iqar shareshohi di ’ilana, malkhutakh lakh qayamah; min di tinda‘, di shaliTin shemaya. 
daniel 4:27	lahein malka, milki yishpar ‘alayikh ‘alakh, waHaTayakh waHaTa’akh bezidqah feruq, wa‘awayatakh bemiHan ‘anayin; hein tehewei ’arkhah lishleiwetakh. 
daniel 4:28	kola meTa, ‘al newukhadnezar malka.
daniel 4:29	liqzat yarHin terei ‘asar; ‘al heikhal malkhuta di wawel mehaleikh hawah. 
daniel 4:30	‘aneih malka we’amar, hala da hi bawel rabeta; di ’anah wenaytah leweit malkhu, bitqaf Hisni weliqar hadri. 
daniel 4:31	‘od, mileta befum malka, qal min shemaya nefal; lakh ’amerin newukhadnezar malka, malkhutah ‘adat minakh. 
daniel 4:32	umin ’anasha lakh Taredin we‘im Heiwat bara medorakh, ‘isba khetorin lakh yeTa‘amun, weshiw‘ah ‘idanin yaHlefun ‘alayikh ‘alakh; ‘ad di tinda‘, di shaliT ‘ilaya bemalkhut ’anasha, uleman di yizbei yiteninah. 
daniel 4:33	bah sha‘ata, mileta safat ‘al newukhadnezar umin ’anasha Terid, we‘isba khetorin yeikhul, umiTal shemaya gishmeih yizTaba‘; ‘ad di sa‘reih kenishrin rewah weTifrohi kheziperin. 
daniel 4:34	weliqzat yomayah ’anah newukhadnezar ‘aynay lishmaya niTleit, umande‘i ‘alay yetuw, ule‘ilaya ule‘ila’ah barekheit, uleHay ‘alema shabeHeit wehadereit; di shaleTaneih shaleTan ‘alam, umalkhuteih ‘im dar wedar. 
daniel 4:35	wekhal da’arei dayerei ’ar‘a kelah Hashiwin, ukhemizbeyeih, ‘aweid beHeil shemaya, weda’arei wedayerei ’ar‘a; wela ’itay di yemaHei wideih, weyeimar leih mah ‘awadt. 
daniel 4:36	beih cimna mande‘i yetuw ‘alay, weliqar malkhuti hadri weciwi yetuw ‘alay, weli hadaweray werawrewanay yewa‘on; we‘al malkhuti hateqenat, urewu yatirah husefat li. 
daniel 4:37	ke‘an ’anah newukhadnezar, meshabaH umeromeim umehadar lemelekh shemaya, di khal ma‘awadohi qeshoT, we’oreHateih din; wedi mahlekhin begeiwah, yakhil lehashpalah.
daniel 5:1	beileshazar malka, ‘awad leHem raw, lerawrewanohi ’alaf; welaqoweil ’alpa Hamra shateih. 
daniel 5:2	beileshazar ’amar biT‘eim Hamra, lehaytayah lemanei dahawa wekhaspa, di hanpeiq newukhadnezar ’awuhi, min heikhela di wirushelem; weyishton behon, malka werawrewanohi, sheigelateih uleHeinateih. 
daniel 5:3	beidayin, haytiw manei dahawa, di hanpiqu, min heikhela di weit ’elaha di wirushelem; we’ishtiw behon, malka werawrewanohi, sheigelateih uleHeinateih. 
daniel 5:4	’ishtiw Hamra; weshabaHu leilahei dahawa wekhaspa neHasha farcela ’a‘a we’awna. 
daniel 5:5	bah sha‘atah, nefaqu nefaqah ’ezbe‘an di yad ’enash, wekhatewan laqoweil newrashta, ‘al gira di khetal heikhela di malka; umalka Haceih, pas yedah di khatewah. 
daniel 5:6	’edayin malka ciyohi shenohi, wera‘yonohi yewahaluneih; weqiTrei Harzeih mishtarayin, we’arkhubateih, da leda naqeshan. 
daniel 5:7	qarei malka beHayil, lehe‘alah le’ashefaya, kasdayei kasda’ei wegaceraya; ‘aneih malka we’amar leHakimei wawel, di khal ’enash di yiqreih ketawah denah, ufishreih yeHawwinani, ’argewana yilbash, wehamonkha wehamnikha di dahawa ‘al zawwereih, wetalti wemalkhuta yishlaT.
daniel 5:8	’edayin ‘alalin ‘alin, kol Hakimei malka; wela khahalin ketawa lemiqrei, ufishra ufishreih lehoda‘ah lemalka. 
daniel 5:9	’edayin malka weileshazar sagi mitbahal, weciyohi shanayin ‘alohi; werawrewanohi mishtabeshin. 
daniel 5:10	malketa laqoweil milei malka werawrewanohi, leweit mishteya ‘alalat ‘alat; ‘anat malketa wa’ameret, malka le‘alemin Heyi, ’al yewahalukh ra‘yonakh, weciwaykh ’al yishtano. 
daniel 5:11	’itay gewar bemalkhutakh, di ruaH ’elahin qadishin beih uweyomei ’awukh, nahiru wesakheletanu weHakhemah keHakhemat ’elahin hishtekhaHat beih; umalka newukhadnezar ’awukh, raw HarTumin ’ashefin, kasda’in gacerin, haqimeih ’awukh malka. 
daniel 5:12	kal qoweil di ruaH yatirah umanda‘ wesakheletanu mefashar Helmin wa’aHawayat ’aHidan umesharei qiTrin, hishtekhaHat beih bedaniyeil, di malka sam shemeih beileTeshazar; ke‘an daniyeil yitqerei ufishrah yehaHaweih.
daniel 5:13	beidayin daniyeil, hu‘al qodam malka; ‘aneih malka we’amar ledaniyeil, ’antah ’ant hu daniyeil di min benei galuta di yehud, di hayti malka ’awi min yehud. 
daniel 5:14	weshim‘eit ‘alayikh ‘alakh, di ruaH ’elahin bakh; wenahiru wesakheletanu weHakhemah yatirah hishtekhaHat bakh. 
daniel 5:15	ukhe‘an hu‘alu qadamay, Hakimaya ’ashefaya, di khetawah denah yiqron, ufishreih lehoda‘utani; wela khahalin peshar mileta lehaHawayah. 
daniel 5:16	wa’anah shim‘eit ‘alayikh ‘alakh, di tukhal tikul pishrin lemifshar weqiTrin lemishrei; ke‘an hein tukhal tikhul ketawa lemiqrei, ufishreih lehoda‘utani, ’argewana tilbash, wehamonkha wehamnikha di dahawa ‘al zawwerakh, wetalta wemalkhuta tishlaT.
daniel 5:17	beidayin ‘aneih daniyeil, we’amar qodam malka, matenatakh lakh lehewyan, unewacebeyatakh le’aHoran haw; beram, ketawa ’eqrei lemalka, ufishra ’ahod‘ineih. 
daniel 5:18	’antah ’ant malka; ’elaha ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah, malkhuta urewuta wiqara wehadrah, yehaw linwukhadnezar ’awukh. 
daniel 5:19	umin rewuta di yehaw leih, kol ‘amaya, ’umaya welishanaya, hawo ca’a‘in caye‘in wedaHalin min qodamohi; di hawah zawei hawa qaTeil, wedi hawah zawei hawah maHei, wedi hawah zawei hawah marim, wedi hawah zawei hawah mashpil. 
daniel 5:20	ukhedi rim liwweih, weruHeih tiqfat lahacadah; haneHat min karesei malkhuteih, wiqarah he‘diyu mineih. 
daniel 5:21	umin benei ’anasha Terid weliwweih ‘im Heiweta shewi shawwiyw, we‘im ‘aradaya medoreih, ‘isba khetorin yeTa‘amuneih, umiTal shemaya gishmeih yizTaba‘; ‘ad di yeda‘, di shaliT ’elaha ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah bemalkhut ’anasha, uleman di yizbeih yehaqeim ‘alayeih ‘alah. 
daniel 5:22	we’antah we’ant bereih beileshazar, la hashpeilet liwwakh; kal qoweil di khal denah yeda‘ta. 
daniel 5:23	we‘al marei shemaya hitromamta ulemanaya di wayteih haytiw qadamayikh qadamakh, we’antah we’ant werawrewanayikh werawrewanakh sheigelatakh uleHeinatakh Hamra shatayin behon weleilahei khaspa wedahawa neHasha farcela ’a‘a we’awna, di la Hacayin wela shame‘in wela yade‘in shabaHta; weleilaha di nishmetakh bideih wekhal ’oreHatakh leih la hadarta. 
daniel 5:24	beidayin min qodamohi, sheliyaaH passa di yeda; ukhetawa denah reshim. 
daniel 5:25	udenah khetawa di reshim; menei menei teqeil ufarsin. 
daniel 5:26	denah peshar mileta; menei menah ’elaha malkhutakh wehashlemah. 
daniel 5:27	teqeil; teqiletah wemocanya wehishtekhaHat Hassir. 
daniel 5:28	pereis; perisat malkhutakh, wihiwat lemaday ufaras. 
daniel 5:29	beidayin ’amar beileshazar, wehalbishu ledaniyeil ’argewana, wehamonkha wehamnikha di dahawa ‘al zawwereih; wehakhricu ‘alohi, di lehewei shaliT talta bemalkhuta. 
daniel 5:30	beih beleileya, qeTil beileshazar malka khasdaya khasda’ah.
daniel 5:31	wedareyawesh madaya qabeil malkhuta; kewar shenin shitin wetartein. 
daniel 6:1	shefar qodam dareyawesh, wahaqim ‘al malkhuta, la’aHashdarpenaya me’ah we‘esrin; di lehewon bekhal malkhuta. 
daniel 6:2	we‘eila minehon sarekhin telata, di daniyeil Had minehon; di lehewon ’aHashdarpenaya ’ilein, yahawin lehon Ta‘ma, umalka la lehewei naciq. 
daniel 6:3	’edayin daniyeil denah, hawa mitnazaH, ‘al sarekhaya wa’aHashdarpenaya; kal qoweil, di ruaH yatira beih, umalka ‘ashit, lahaqamuteih ‘al kal malkhuta. 
daniel 6:4	’edayin sarekhaya wa’aHashdarpenaya, hawo wa‘ayin ‘ilah lehashkaHah ledaniyeil mizad malkhuta; wekhal ‘ilah usheHitah la yakhelin lehashkaHah, kal qoweil di meheiman hu, wekhal shalu usheHitah, la hishtekhaHat ‘alohi. 
daniel 6:5	’edayin guwraya ’ileikh ’amerin, di la nehashkaH ledaniyeil denah kal ‘ila; lahein hashkaHnah ‘alohi bedat ’elaheih.
daniel 6:6	’edayin sarekhaya wa’aHashdarpenaya ’ilein, hargishu ‘al malka; wekhein ’amerin leih, dareyawesh malka le‘alemin Heyi. 
daniel 6:7	’itya‘aTu kol sarekhei malkhuta, signaya wa’aHashdarpenaya hadaweraya ufaHawata, leqayamah qeyam malka, uletaqafah ’esar; di khal di yiw‘eih wa‘u min kal ’elah we’enash ‘ad yomin telatin, lahein minakh malka, yitremei legow ’aryawata. 
daniel 6:8	ke‘an malka, teqim ’esara wetirshum ketawa; di la lehashnayah kedat maday ufaras di la te‘dei. 
daniel 6:9	kal qoweil denah; malka dareyawesh, resham ketawa we’esara. 
daniel 6:10	wedaniyeil kedi yeda‘ di reshim ketawa ‘al lewayteih, wekhawwin petiHan leih be‘iliteih, neged yerushelem; wecimnin telatah weyoma hu bareikh ‘al birkhohi, umezalei umodei qodam ’elaheih, kal qoweil di hawa ‘aweid, min qadmat denah.
daniel 6:11	’edayin guwraya ’ileikh hargishu, wehashkaHu ledaniyeil; ba‘ei umitHanan qodam ’elaheih. 
daniel 6:12	beidayin qeriwu we’amerin qodam malka ‘al ’esar malka hala ’esar reshamta, di khal ’enash di yiw‘eih min kal ’elah we’enash ‘ad yomin telatin, lahein minakh malka, yitremei legow ’aryawta; ‘aneih malka we’amar, yaziwa mileta kedat maday ufaras di la te‘dei. 
daniel 6:13	beidayin ‘ano we’amerin qodam malka di daniyeil di min benei galuta di yehud, la sam ‘alayikh ‘alakh malka Te‘eim, we‘al ’esara di reshamta; wecimnin telatah beyoma, ba‘ei ba‘uteih. 
daniel 6:14	’edayin malka kedi mileta shema‘, sagi be’eish ‘alohi, we‘al daniyeil sam bal lesheicawuteih; we‘ad me‘alei shimsha, hawa mishtadar lehazaluteih. 
daniel 6:15	beidayin guwraya ’ileikh, hargishu ‘al malka; we’amerin lemalka, da‘ malka di dat lemaday ufaras, di khal ’esar uqeyam di malka yehaqeim la lehashnayah. 
daniel 6:16	beidayin malka ’amar, wehaytiw ledaniyeil, uremo leguba di ’aryawata; ‘aneih malka we’amar ledaniyeil, ’elahakh, di ’antah ’ant palaH leih bitdira, hu yesheicewinakh. 
daniel 6:17	weheitayit ’ewen Hadah, wesumat ‘al pum guba; weHatmah malka be‘icqeteih, uwe‘icqat rawrewanohi, di la tishnei zewu bedaniyeil. 
daniel 6:18	’edayin ’acal malka leheikheleih uwat Tewat, wedaHawan la han‘eil qadamohi; weshinteih nadat ‘alohi. 
daniel 6:19	beidayin malka, bishparpara yequm benageha; uwehitbehalah, leguba di ’aryawata ’acal. 
daniel 6:20	ukhemiqreweih leguba, ledaniyeil, beqal ‘aziw ce‘iq; ‘aneih malka we’amar ledaniyeil, daniyeil ‘aweid ’elaha Haya, ’elahakh, di ’antah ’ant palaH leih bitdira, haykhil lesheicawutakh min ’aryawata. 
daniel 6:21	’edayin daniyel, ‘im malka malil; malka le‘alemin Heyi. 
daniel 6:22	’elahi shelaH mal’akheih, usagar pum ’aryawata wela Habeluni; kal qoweil, di qadamohi cakhu hishtekhaHat li, we’af qadamayikh qadamakh malka, Hawulah la ‘awdeit. 
daniel 6:23	beidayin malka, sagi Te’eiw ‘alohi, uledaniyeil, ’amar lehansaqah min guba; wehussaq daniyeil min guba, wekhal Hawal la hishtekhaH beih, di heimin beilaheih. 
daniel 6:24	wa’amar malka, wehaytiw guwraya ’ileikh di ’akhalu qarzohi di daniyeil, ulegow ’aryawata remo, ’inun beneihon unesheihon; wela meTo le’ar‘it guba, ‘ad di sheliTu wehon ’aryawata, wekhal garmeihon hadiqu. 
daniel 6:25	beidayin dareyawesh malka, ketaw lekhal ‘amaya ’umaya welishanaya di da’arin dayerin bekhal ’ar‘a shelamekhon yisgei. 
daniel 6:26	min qodamay sim Te‘eim di bekhal shaleTan malkhuti, lehewon ca’a‘in caye‘in wedaHalin, min qodam ’elaheih di daniyeil; di hu ’elaha Haya, weqayam le‘alemin, umalkhuteih di la titHabal, weshaleTaneih ‘ad sofa. 
daniel 6:27	mesheiciw umazil, we‘aweid ’atin wetimhin, bishmaya uwe’ar‘a; di sheiciw ledaniyeil, min yad ’aryawata. 
daniel 6:28	wedaniyeil denah, hazlaH bemalkhut dareyawesh; uwemalkhut koresh paresaya paresa’ah.
daniel 7:1	bishnat Hadah, leweileshazar melekh bawel, daniyeil Heilem Hacah, weHecwei reisheih ‘al mishkeweih; beidayin Helma khetaw, reish milin ’amar. 
daniel 7:2	‘aneih daniyeil we’amar, Haceih haweit beHecwi ‘im leileya; wa’aru, ’arba‘ ruHei shemaya, megiHan leyama raba. 
daniel 7:3	we’arba‘ Heiwan rawrewan, saleqan min yama; shaneyan da min da. 
daniel 7:4	qadmayeta khe’aryeih, wegapin di neshar lah; Haceih haweit ‘ad di meriTu gapayh uneTilat min ’ar‘a, we‘al raglayin ke’enash hoqimat, ulewaw ’enash yehiw lah. 
daniel 7:5	wa’aru Heiwah ’aHori tinyanah dameyah ledow, welisTar Had hoqimat, utelat ‘il‘in befumah bein shinayah shinah; wekhein ’amerin lah, qumi ’akhuli besar sagi. 
daniel 7:6	batar denah Haceih haweit, wa’aru ’aHori kinmar, welah gapin ’arba‘ di ‘of ‘al gabayah gabah; we’arbe‘ah reishin leHeiweta, weshaleTan yehiw lah. 
daniel 7:7	batar denah Haceih haweit beHecwei leileya, wa’aru Heiwah rewi‘ayah rewi‘a’ah deHilah we’eimetani wetaqifa yatira, weshinayin di farcel lah rawrewan, ’akhelah umadeqah, ushe’ara beraglayah beraglah rafesah; wehi meshaneyah, min kal Heiwata di qadamayh, weqarnayin ‘asar lah. 
daniel 7:8	mistakal haweit beqarnaya, wa’alu qeren ’aHori ce‘eirah silqat beineihon beineihein, utelat, min qarnaya qadmayata, ’et‘aqaru ’et‘aqarah min qodamayah qodamah; wa’alu ‘aynin ke‘aynei ’anasha beqarna da, ufum memalil rawrewan. 
daniel 7:9	Haceih haweit, ‘ad di kharesawan remiw, we‘atiq yomin yetiw; lewusheih kitlag Hiwwar, use‘ar reisheih ka‘amar neqei, kareseyeih shewiwin di nur, galgilohi nur daliq. 
daniel 7:10	nehar di nur, nageid wenafeiq min qodamohi, ’elef ’alfayim ’alfin yeshameshuneih, weribo rabewan riwwan qadamohi yequmun; dina yetiw wesifrin petiHu. 
daniel 7:11	Haceih haweit, beidayin, min qal milaya rawrewata, di qarna memalelah; Haceih haweit ‘ad di qeTilat Heiweta wehuwad gishmah, wihiwat liqeidat ’esha. 
daniel 7:12	ushe’ar Heiwata, he‘diw shaleTanehon; we’arkhah weHayin yehiwat lehon ‘ad ceman we‘idan. 
daniel 7:13	Haceih haweit beHecwei leileya, wa’aru ‘im ‘ananei shemaya, kewar ’enash ’ateih hawah; we‘ad ‘atiq yomaya meTah, uqedamohi haqrewuhi. 
daniel 7:14	weleih yehiw shaleTan wiqar umalkhu, wekhol ‘amaya, ’umaya welishanaya leih yifleHun; shaleTaneih shaleTan ‘alam di la ye‘deih, umalkhuteih di la titHabal.
daniel 7:15	’etkeriyat ruHi ’anah daniyeil bego nidneh; weHecwei reishi yewahalunani. 
daniel 7:16	qirweit, ‘al Had min qa’amaya, weyaziwa ’ew‘ei mineih ‘al kal denah; wa’amar li ufeshar milaya yehod‘inani. 
daniel 7:17	’ilein Heiwata rawrewata, di ’inin ’arba‘; ’arbe‘ah malkhin yequmun min ’ar‘a. 
daniel 7:18	wiqabelun malkhuta, qadishei ‘elyonin; weyaHsenun malkhuta ‘ad ‘alema, we‘ad ‘alam ‘alemaya. 
daniel 7:19	’edayin, zewit leyazawa, ‘al Heiweta rewi‘ayeta, di hawat shaneyah min kalehon kalehein; deHilah yatirah, shinayah shinah di farcel weTifrayh di neHash, ’akhelah madaqah, ushe’ara beraglayh rafesah. 
daniel 7:20	we‘al qarnaya ‘asar di wereishah, we’aHori di silqat, unefalu unefalah min qodamayah qodamah telat; weqarna dikein we‘aynin lah, wefum memalil rawrewan, weHecwah raw min Hawratah. 
daniel 7:21	Haceih haweit, weqarna dikein, ‘awedah qeraw ‘im qadishin; weyakhelah lehon. 
daniel 7:22	‘ad di ’atah, ‘atiq yomaya, wedina yehiw, leqadishei ‘elyonin; wecimna meTah, umalkhuta heHesinu qadishin. 
daniel 7:23	kein ’amar Heiweta rewi‘ayeta, malkhu rewi‘aya rewi‘a’ah tehewei we’ar‘a, di tishnei min kal malkhewata; weteikhul kal ’ar‘a, utedushinah wetadeqinah. 
daniel 7:24	weqarnaya ‘asar, minah malkhutah, ‘asrah malkhin yequmun; we’aHoran yequm ’aHareihon, wehu yishnei min qadmayei, utelatah malkhin yehashpil. 
daniel 7:25	umilin, lezad ‘ilaya ‘ila’ah yemalil, uleqadishei ‘elyonin yewalei; weyisbar, lehashnayah cimnin wedat, weyityahawun bideih, ‘ad ‘idan we‘idanin ufelag ‘idan. 
daniel 7:26	wedina yitiw; weshaleTaneih yeha‘don, lehashmadah ulehowadah ‘ad sofa. 
daniel 7:27	umalkhutah weshaleTana urewuta, di malkhewat teHot kal shemaya, yehiwat le‘am qadishei ‘elyonin; malkhuteih malkhut ‘alam, wekhol shaleTanaya, leih yifleHun weyishtame‘un. 
daniel 7:28	‘ad kah sofa di mileta; ’anah daniyeil sagi ra‘yonay yewahalunani, weciway yishtanon ‘alay, umileta belibi niTreit.
daniel 8:1	bishnat shalosh, lemalkhut beileshazar hamelekh; Hacon nir’ah ’eilay ’ani daniyeil, ’aHarei hanir’ah ’eilay bateHilah. 
daniel 8:2	wa’er’eh beHacon wayhi bir’oti, wa’ani beshushan habirah, ’asher be‘eilam hamedinah; wa’er’eh beHacon, wa’ani hayiti ‘al ’uwal ’ulay. 
daniel 8:3	wa’esa ‘einay wa’er’eh, wehineih ’ayil ’eHad, ‘omeid lifnei ha’uwal welo qeranayim; wehaqeranayim gewohot, weha’aHat gewohah min hasheinit, wehagewohah, ‘olah ba’aHaronah. 
daniel 8:4	ra’iti ’et ha’ayil menageiaH yamah wezafonah wanegbah, wekhal Hayot lo ya‘amdu lefanaw, we’ein mazil miyado; we‘asah khirzono wehigdil. 
daniel 8:5	wa’ani hayiti meiwin, wehineih zefir ha‘iccim ba min hama‘araw ‘al penei khal ha’arez, we’ein nogeia‘ ba’arez; wehazafir, qeren Hacut bein ‘einaw. 
daniel 8:6	wayawo, ‘ad ha’ayil ba‘al haqeranayim, ’asher ra’iti, ‘omeid lifnei ha’uwal; wayaraz ’eilaw baHamat koHo. 
daniel 8:7	ure’itiw magia‘ ’eizel ha’ayil, wayitmarmar ’eilaw wayakh ’et ha’ayil, wayshabeir ’et shetei qeranaw, welo hayah khoaH ba’ayil la‘amod lefanaw; wayashlikheihu ’arzah wayirmeseihu, welo hayah mazil la’ayil miyado. 
daniel 8:8	uzefir ha‘iccim higdil ‘ad me’od; ukhe‘azemo, nishberah haqeren hagedolah, wata‘alenah Hacut ’arba‘ taHteha, le’arba‘ ruHot hashamayim. 
daniel 8:9	umin ha’aHat meihem, yaza qeren ’aHat mize‘irah; watigdal yeter ’el hanegew we’el hamicraH we’el hazewi. 
daniel 8:10	watigdal ‘ad zewa hashamayim; watapeil ’arzah min hazawa umin hakokhawim watirmeseim. 
daniel 8:11	we‘ad sar hazawa higdil; umimenu heirim huram hatamid, wehushlakh mekhon miqdasho. 
daniel 8:12	wezawa tinatein ‘al hatamid befasha‘; wetashleikh ’emet ’arzah, we‘asetah wehizliHah. 
daniel 8:13	wa’eshme‘ah ’eHad qadosh medabeir; wayomer ’eHad qadosh lapalmoni hamdabeir, ‘ad matay heHacon hatamid wehapesha‘ shomeim, teit weqodesh wezawa mirmas. 
daniel 8:14	wayomer ’eilay, ‘ad ‘erew boqer, ’alpayim ushelosh mei’ot; wenizdaq qodesh. 
daniel 8:15	wayhi, bir’oti ’ani daniyeil ’et heHacon; wa’awaqshah winah, wehineih ‘omeid lenegdi kemar’eih gawer. 
daniel 8:16	wa’eshma‘ qol ’adam bein ’ulay; wayiqra wayomar, gawri’eil hawein lehalac ’et hamar’eh. 
daniel 8:17	wayawo ’eizel ‘amedi, uwewo’o niw‘ati, wa’epelah ‘al panay; wayomer ’eilay hawein ben ’adam, ki le‘et qeiz heHacon. 
daniel 8:18	uwedabero ‘imi, nirdamti ‘al panay ’arezah; wayiga‘ bi, waya‘amideini ‘al ‘amedi. 
daniel 8:19	wayomer hini modi‘akha, ’eit ’asher yihyeh be’aHarit hacca‘am; ki lemo‘eid qeiz. 
daniel 8:20	ha’ayil ’asher ra’ita ba‘al haqeranayim; malkhei maday ufaras. 
daniel 8:21	wehazafir hasa‘ir melekh yawan; wehaqeren hagedolah ’asher bein ‘einaw, hu hamelekh harishon. 
daniel 8:22	wehanishberet, wata‘amodenah ’arba‘ taHteha; ’arba‘ malkhuyot migo ya‘amodenah welo wekhoHo. 
daniel 8:23	uwe’aHarit malkhutam, kehateim haposhe‘im; ya‘amod melekh ‘ac panim umeiwin Hidot. 
daniel 8:24	we‘azam koHo welo wekhoHo, wenifla’ot yashHit wehizliaH we‘asah; wehishHit ‘azumim we‘am qedoshim. 
daniel 8:25	we‘al sikhlo, wehizliaH mirmah beyado, uwilwawo yagdil, uweshalwah yashHit rabim; we‘al sar sarim ya‘amod, uwe’efes yad yishaweir. 
daniel 8:26	umar’eih ha‘erew wehaboqer ’asher ne’emar ’emet hu; we’atah setom heHacon, ki leyamim rabim. 
daniel 8:27	wa’ani daniyeil, nihyeiti weneHeleiti yamim, wa’aqum wa’e‘eseh ’et melekhet hamelekh; wa’eshtomeim ‘al hamar’eh we’ein meiwin.
daniel 9:1	bishnat ’aHat, ledareyawesh ben ’aHashweirosh miccera‘ maday; ’asher hamelakh, ‘al malkhut kasdim. 
daniel 9:2	bishnat ’aHat lemalekho, ’ani daniyeil, binoti bassefarim; mispar hashanim, ’asher hayah dewar yhoh ’el yirmiyah hanawi, lemalot leHarewot yerushalim shiw‘im shanah. 
daniel 9:3	wa’etenah ’et panay, ’el ’adonay ha’elohim, lewaqeish tefilah wetaHanunim; bezom wesaq wa’eifer. 
daniel 9:4	wa’etpalah yhoh ’elohay wa’etwadeh; wa’omerah, ’ana ’adonay ha’eil hagadol wehanora, shomeir haberit wehaHesed, le’ohawaw uleshomerei mizwotaw. 
daniel 9:5	HaTanu we‘awinu wehirsha‘nu hirsha‘nu umaradenu; wesor mimizwotekha umimishpaTekha. 
daniel 9:6	welo shama‘nu ’el ‘awadekha hanewi’im, ’asher diberu beshimkha, ’el melakheinu sareinu wa’awoteinu; we’el kal ‘am ha’arez. 
daniel 9:7	lekha ’adonay hazedaqah, welanu boshet hapanim kayom hacceh; le’ish yehudah uleyoshewei yerushalim, ulekhal yisra’eil haqerowim wehareHoqim, bekhal ha’arazot ’asher hidaHtam sham, bema‘alam ’asher ma‘alu wakh. 
daniel 9:8	yhoh lanu boshet hapanim, limlakheinu lesareinu wela’awoteinu; ’asher HaTanu lakh. 
daniel 9:9	ladonay ’eloheinu, haraHamim wehasseliHot; ki maradnu bo. 
daniel 9:10	welo shama‘nu, beqol yhoh ’eloheinu; lalekhet betorotaw ’asher natan lefaneinu, beyad ‘awadaw hanewi’im. 
daniel 9:11	wekhal yisra’eil, ‘aweru ’et toratekha, wesor lewilti shemoa‘ beqolekha; watitakh ‘aleinu ha’alah wehashewu‘ah, ’asher ketuwah betorat mosheh ‘ewed ha’elohim, ki HaTanu lo. 
daniel 9:12	wayaqem ’et dewaraw dewaro ’asher diber ‘aleinu, we‘al shofeTeinu ’asher shefaTunu, lehawi ‘aleinu ra‘ah gedolah; ’asher lo ne‘estah, taHat kal hashamayim, ka’asher ne‘estah birushalim. 
daniel 9:13	ka’asher katuw betorat mosheh, ’eit kal hara‘ah haccot ba’ah ‘aleinu; welo Hilinu ’et penei yhoh ’eloheinu, lashuw mei‘awoneinu, ulehaskil ba’amitekha. 
daniel 9:14	wayishqod yhoh ‘al hara‘ah, waywi’eha ‘aleinu; ki zadiq yhoh ’eloheinu, ‘al kal ma‘asaw ’asher ‘asah, welo shama‘nu beqolo. 
daniel 9:15	we‘atah ’adonay ’eloheinu, ’asher hozeita ’et ‘amekha mei’erez mizrayim beyad Hacaqah, wata‘as lekha sheim kayom hacceh; HaTanu rasha‘enu. 
daniel 9:16	’adonay, kekhal zidqotekha yashaw na ’apekha waHamatekha, mei‘irekha yerushalim har qadshekha ki waHaTa’einu uwa‘awonot ’awoteinu, yerushalim we‘amekha leHerpah lekhal sewiwoteinu. 
daniel 9:17	we‘atah shema‘ ’eloheinu, ’el tefilat ‘awdekha we’el taHanunaw, weha’eir panekha, ‘al miqdashekha hashameim; lema‘an ’adonay. 
daniel 9:18	haTeih ’elohay ’acenekha ushama‘ piqHah peqaH ‘einekha, ure’eih shomemoteinu, weha‘ir ’asher niqra shimkha ‘aleha; ki lo ‘al zidqoteinu, ’anaHnu mapilim taHanuneinu lefanekha, ki ‘al raHamekha harabim. 
daniel 9:19	’adonay shema‘ah ’adonay selaHah, ’adonay haqashiwah wa‘aseih ’al te’aHar; lema‘ankha ’elohay, ki shimkha niqra, ‘al ‘irekha we‘al ‘amekha. 
daniel 9:20	we‘od ’ani medabeir umitpaleil, umitwadeh HaTati, weHaTat ‘ami yisra’eil; umapil teHinati, lifnei yhoh ’elohay, ‘al har qodesh ’elohay. 
daniel 9:21	we‘od ’ani medabeir batefilah; weha’ish gawri’eil ’asher ra’iti weHacon bateHilah mu‘af bi‘af, nogeia‘ ’eilay, ke‘eit minHat ‘arew. 
daniel 9:22	wayawen waydabeir ‘imi; wayomar daniyeil ‘atah yazati lehaskilekha winah. 
daniel 9:23	bitHilat taHanunekha yaza dawar, wa’ani bati lehagid, ki Hamudot ’atah; uwin badawar, wehawein bamar’eh. 
daniel 9:24	shawu‘im shiw‘im neHtakh ‘al ‘amekha we‘al ‘ir qadshekha lekhalei hapesha‘ ulaHtom ulehateim HaTa’ot HaTat ulekhapeir ‘awon, ulehawi zedeq ‘olamim; welaHtom Hacon wenawi, welimshoaH qodesh qadashim. 
daniel 9:25	weteida‘ wetaskeil min moza dawar, lehashiw weliwnot yerushalim ‘ad mashiaH nagid, shawu‘im shiw‘ah; weshawu‘im shishim ushenayim, tashuw weniwnetah reHow weHaruz, uwezoq ha‘itim. 
daniel 9:26	we’aHarei hashawu‘im shishim ushenayim, yikareit mashiaH we’ein lo; weha‘ir wehaqodesh yashHit ‘am nagid haba weqizo washeTef, we‘ad qeiz milHamah, neHerezet shomeimot. 
daniel 9:27	wehigbir berit larabim shawua‘ ’eHad; waHazi hashawua‘ yashbit cewaH uminHah, we‘al kenaf shiquzim meshomeim, we‘ad kalah weneHerazah, titakh ‘al shomeim.
daniel 10:1	bishnat shalosh, lekhoresh melekh paras, dawar niglah ledaniyeil, ’asher niqra shemo beileTeshazar; we’emet hadawar wezawa gadol, uwin ’et hadawar, uwinah lo bamar’eh. 
daniel 10:2	bayamim haheim; ’ani daniyeil hayiti mit’abeil, sheloshah shawu‘im yamim. 
daniel 10:3	leHem Hamudot lo ’akhalti, uwasar wayayin lo wa ’el pi wesokh lo sakheti; ‘ad melot sheloshet shawu‘im yamim.
daniel 10:4	uweyom ‘esrim we’arba‘ah laHodesh harishon; wa’ani, hayiti ‘al yad hanahar hagadol hu Hidaqel. 
daniel 10:5	wa’esa ’et ‘einay wa’eire, wehineih ’ish ’eHad lawush badim; umatenaw Hagurim bekhetem ’ufac. 
daniel 10:6	ugewiyato khetarshish, ufanaw kemar’eih waraq we‘einaw kelapidei ’eish, ucero‘otaw umargelotaw, ke‘ein neHoshet qalal; weqol dewaraw keqol hamon. 
daniel 10:7	wera’iti ’ani daniyeil lewadi ’et hamar’ah, weha’anashim ’asher hayu ‘imi, lo ra’u ’et hamar’ah; ’awal, Haradah gedolah nafelah ‘aleihem, wayiwreHu beheiHawei. 
daniel 10:8	wa’ani nish’arti lewadi, wa’er’eh, ’et hamar’ah hagedolah haccot, welo nish’ar bi koH; wehodi, nehpakh ‘alay lemashHit, welo ‘azarti koaH. 
daniel 10:9	wa’eshma‘ ’et qol dewaraw; ukheshame‘i ’et qol dewaraw, wa’ani, hayiti nirdam ‘al panay ufanay ’arezah. 
daniel 10:10	wehineih yad nage‘ah bi; wateni‘eini ‘al birkay wekhapot yaday. 
daniel 10:11	wayomer ’eilay daniyeil ’ish Hamudot hawein badewarim ’asher ’anokhi doweir ’eilekha wa‘amod ‘al ‘amedekha, ki ‘atah shulaHti ’eilekha; uwedabero ‘imi ’et hadawar hacceh ‘amadti mar‘id. 
daniel 10:12	wayomer ’eilay ’al tira daniyeil ki min hayom harishon, ’asher natata ’et libekha lehawin ulehit‘anot lifnei ’elohekha nishme‘u dewarekha; wa’ani wati bidwarekha. 
daniel 10:13	wesar malkhut paras, ‘omeid lenegdi ‘esrim we’eHad yom, wehineih mikha’eil, ’aHad hasarim harishonim ba le‘acereini; wa’ani notarti sham, ’eizel malkhei faras. 
daniel 10:14	uwati lahawinekha, ’eit ’asher yiqrah le‘amekha be’aHarit hayamim; ki ‘od Hacon layamim. 
daniel 10:15	uwedabero ‘imi, kadewarim ha’eileh; natati fanay ’arzah wene’elameti. 
daniel 10:16	wehineih, kidmut benei ’adam, nogeia‘ ‘al sefatay; wa’eftaH pi, wa’adaberah wa’omerah ’el ha‘omeid lenegdi, ’adoni, bamar’ah nehefkhu ziray ‘alay, welo ‘azarti koaH. 
daniel 10:17	weheikh yukhal, ‘ewed ’adoni ceh, ledabeir ‘im ’adoni ceh; wa’ani mei‘atah lo ya‘amad bi khoaH, uneshamah lo nish’arah wi. 
daniel 10:18	wayosef wayiga‘ bi kemar’eih ’adam wayHacceqeini. 
daniel 10:19	wayomer ’al tira ’ish Hamudot shalom lakh Hacaq waHacaq; ukhedabero ‘imi hitHaccaqti, wa’omerah yedabeir ’adoni ki Hiccaqtani. 
daniel 10:20	wayomer, hayada‘ta lamah bati ’eilekha, we‘atah ’ashuw, lehilaHeim ‘im sar paras; wa’ani yozei, wehineih sar yawan ba. 
daniel 10:21	’awal ’agid lekha, ’et harashum bikhtaw ’emet; we’ein ’eHad mitHacceiq ‘imi ‘al ’eileh, ki ’im mikha’eil sarkhem.
daniel 11:1	wa’ani bishnat ’aHat, ledareyawesh hamadi; ‘amedi lemaHaciq ulema‘oc lo. 
daniel 11:2	we‘atah ’emet ’agid lakh; hineih ‘od sheloshah melakhim ‘omedim lefaras, weharewi‘i ya‘ashir ‘osher gadol mikol, ukheHecqato we‘ashero, ya‘ir hakol, ’eit malkhut yawan. 
daniel 11:3	we‘amad melekh gibor; umashal mimshal raw, we‘asah kirzono. 
daniel 11:4	ukhe‘amedo tishaweir malkhuto, weteiHaz le’arba‘ ruHot hashamayim; welo le’aHarito, welo khemashelo ’asher mashal, ki tinateish malkhuto, wela’aHeirim milewad ’eileh. 
daniel 11:5	weyeHecaq melekh hanegew umin saraw; weyeHecaq ‘alaw umashal, mimshal raw memshalto. 
daniel 11:6	uleqeiz shanim yitHabaru, uwat melekh hanegew, tawo ’el melekh hazafon, la‘asot meisharim; welo ta‘zor koaH hacceroa‘, welo ya‘amod ucero‘o, wetinatein hi umewi’eha wehayoledah, umaHaciqah ba‘itim. 
daniel 11:7	we‘amad mineizer sharasheha kano; weyawo ’el haHayil, weyawo bema‘oc melekh hazafon, we‘asah wahem weheHeciq. 
daniel 11:8	wegam ’eloheihem ‘im nesikheihem ‘im kelei Hemdatam kesef wecahaw bashewi yawi mizrayim; wehu shanim ya‘amod, mimelekh hazafon 
daniel 11:9	uwa, bemalkhut melekh hanegew, weshaw ’el ’admato. 
daniel 11:10	uweno uwanaw yitgaru, we’asefu hamon Hayalim rabim, uwa wo weshaTaf we‘awar; weyashow weyitgaru weyitgareh ‘ad ma‘uccah ma‘ucco. 
daniel 11:11	weyitmarmar melekh hanegew, weyaza wenilHam ‘imo ‘im melekh hazafon; wehe‘emid hamon raw, wenitan hehamon beyado. 
daniel 11:12	wenisa hehamon yarum weram lewawo; wehipil ribo’ot welo ya‘oc. 
daniel 11:13	weshaw melekh hazafon, wehe‘emid hamon, raw min harishon; uleqeiz ha‘itim shanim yawo wo, beHayil gadol uwirkhush raw. 
daniel 11:14	uwa‘itim haheim, rabim ya‘amdu ‘al melekh hanegew; uwenei parizei ‘amekha, yinase’u leha‘amid Hacon wenikhshalu. 
daniel 11:15	weyawo melekh hazafon, weyishpokh solalah, welakhad ‘ir miwzarot; ucero‘ot hanegew lo ya‘amodu, we‘am miwHaraw, we’ein koaH la‘amod. 
daniel 11:16	weya‘as haba ’eilaw kirzono, we’ein ‘omeid lefanaw; weya‘amod be’erez hazewi wekhalah weyado. 
daniel 11:17	weyaseim panaw lawo betoqef kal malkhuto wisharim ‘imo we‘asah; uwat hanashim yiten lo lehashHitah, welo ta‘amod welo lo tihyeh. 
daniel 11:18	weyasheiw weyaseim panaw le’iyim welakhad rabim; wehishbit qazin Herpato lo, bilti Herpato yashiw lo. 
daniel 11:19	weyasheiw panaw, lema‘uccei ’arzo; wenikhshal wenafal welo yimazei. 
daniel 11:20	we‘amad ‘al kano ma‘awir nogeis heder malkhut; uweyamim ’aHadim yishaweir, welo we’apayim welo wemilHamah. 
daniel 11:21	we‘amad ‘al kano niwceh, welo natenu ‘alaw hod malkhut; uwa weshalwah, weheHeciq malkhut baHalaqlaqot. 
daniel 11:22	ucero‘ot hasheTef yishaTefu milefanaw weyishaweiru; wegam negid berit. 
daniel 11:23	umin hitHaberut ’eilaw ya‘aseh mirmah; we‘alah we‘azam bim‘aT go. 
daniel 11:24	beshalwah uwemishmanei medinah yawo we‘asah, ’asher lo ‘asu ’awotaw wa’awot ’awotaw, biccah weshalal urekhush lahem yiwcor; we‘al miwzarim yeHasheiw maHshewotaw we‘ad ‘eit. 
daniel 11:25	weya‘eir koHo ulewawo ‘al melekh hanegew beHayil gadol umelekh hanegew, yitgareh lamilHamah, beHayil gadol we‘azum ‘ad me’od; welo ya‘amod, ki yaHshewu ‘alaw maHashawot. 
daniel 11:26	we’okhelei fat bago yishberuhu weHeilo yishTof; wenafelu Halalim rabim. 
daniel 11:27	usheneihem hamelakhim lewawam lemeira‘, we‘al shulHan ’eHad kacaw yedabeiru; welo tizlaH, ki ‘od qeiz lamo‘eid. 
daniel 11:28	weyashow ’arzo birkhush gadol, ulewawo ‘al berit qodesh; we‘asah weshaw le’arzo. 
daniel 11:29	lamo‘eid yashuw uwa wanegew; welo tihyeh kharishonah wekha’aHaronah. 
daniel 11:30	uwa’u wo ziyim kitim wenikh’ah, weshaw weca‘am ‘al berit qodesh we‘asah; weshaw weyawein, ‘al ‘ocewei berit qodesh. 
daniel 11:31	ucero‘im mimenu ya‘amodu; weHilelu hamiqdash hama‘oc weheisiru hatamid, wenatenu hashiquz meshomeim. 
daniel 11:32	umarshi‘ei werit, yaHanif baHalaqot; we‘am yode‘ei ’elohaw yaHaciqu we‘asu. 
daniel 11:33	umaskilei ‘am, yawinu larabim; wenikhshelu beHerew uwelehawah bishwi uwewiccah yamim. 
daniel 11:34	uwehikashelam, yei‘aceru ‘eicer me‘aT; wenilwu ‘aleihem rabim baHalaqlaqot. 
daniel 11:35	umin hamaskilim yikashelu, lizrof bahem ulewareir welalbein ‘ad ‘eit qeiz; ki ‘od lamo‘eid. 
daniel 11:36	we‘asah khirzono hamelekh, weyitromeim weyitgadeil ‘al kal ’eil, we‘al ’eil ’eilim, yedabeir nifla’ot; wehizliaH ‘ad kalah ca‘am, ki neHerazah ne‘esatah. 
daniel 11:37	we‘al ’elohei ’awotaw lo yawin, we‘al Hemdat nashim we‘al kal ’eloah lo yawin; ki ‘al kol yitgadal. 
daniel 11:38	wele’eloah ma‘uccim, ‘al kano yekhabeid; wele’eloah ’asher lo yeda‘uhu ’awotaw, yekhabeid becahaw uwekhesef uwe’ewen yeqarah uwaHamudot. 
daniel 11:39	we‘asah lemiwzerei ma‘uccim ‘im ’eloah neikhar, ’asher hikir yakir yarbeh khawod; wehimshilam barabim, wa’adamah yeHaleiq bimHir. 
daniel 11:40	uwe‘eit qeiz, yitnagaH ‘imo melekh hanegew, weyista‘eir ‘alaw melekh hazafon, berekhew uwefarashim, uwa’oniyot rabot; uwa wa’arazot weshaTaf we‘awar. 
daniel 11:41	uwa be’erez hazewi, werabot yikasheilu; we’eileh yimaleTu miyado, ’edom umo’aw, wereishit benei ‘amon. 
daniel 11:42	weyishlaH yado ba’arazot; we’erez mizrayim, lo tihyeh lifleiTah. 
daniel 11:43	umashal, bemikhmanei haccahaw wehakesef, uwekhol Hamudot mizrayim; weluwim wekhushim bemiz‘adaw. 
daniel 11:44	ushemu‘ot yewahaluhu, mimicraH umizafon; weyaza beHeima gedolah, lehashmid ulehaHarim rabim. 
daniel 11:45	weyiTa‘ ’ahole ’apadno, bein yamim lehar zewi qodesh; uwa ‘ad qizo, we’ein ‘oceir lo. 
daniel 12:1	uwa‘eit hahi ya‘amod mikha’eil hasar hagadol, ha‘omeid ‘al benei ‘amekha wehayetah ‘eit zarah, ’asher lo nihyetah mihyot go, ‘ad ha‘eit hahi; uwa‘eit hahi yimaleiT ‘amekha, kal hanimza katuw basseifer. 
daniel 12:2	werabim miyesheinei ’admat ‘afar yaqizu; ’eileh leHayei ‘olam, we’eileh laHarafot ledir’on ‘olam.
daniel 12:3	wehamaskilim, yachiru kecohar haraqia‘; umazdiqei harabim, kakokhawim le‘olam wa‘ed.
daniel 12:4	we’atah daniyeil, setom hadewarim waHatom hasseifer ‘ad ‘eit qeiz; yeshoTeTu rabim wetirbeh hada‘at. 
daniel 12:5	wera’iti ’ani daniyeil, wehineih shenayim ’aHeirim ‘omedim; ’eHad heinah lisfat hay’or, we’eHad heinah lisfat hay’or. 
daniel 12:6	wayomer, la’ish lewush habadim, ’asher mima‘al lemeimei hay’or; ‘ad matay qeiz hapela’ot. 
daniel 12:7	wa’eshma‘ ’et ha’ish lewush habadim, ’asher mima‘al lemeimei hay’or wayarem yemino usemolo ’el hashamayim, wayishawa‘ beHei ha‘olam; ki lemo‘eid mo‘adim waHeizi, ukhekhalot napeiz yad ‘am qodesh tikhlenah khal ’eileh. 
daniel 12:8	wa’ani shama‘ti welo ’awin; wa’omerah, ’adoni mah ’aHarit ’eileh.
daniel 12:9	wayomer leikh daniyeil; ki setumim waHatumim hadewarim ‘ad ‘eit qeiz. 
daniel 12:10	yitbararu weyitlabenu weyizarefu rabim, wehirshi‘u resha‘im, welo yawinu kal resha‘im; wehamaskilim yawinu. 
daniel 12:11	umei‘eit husar hatamid, welateit shiquz shomeim; yamim ’elef matayim wetish‘im. 
daniel 12:12	’ashrei hamHakeh weyagia‘; leyamim ’elef shelosh mei’ot sheloshim waHamishah. 
daniel 12:13	we’atah leikh laqeiz; wetanuaH weta‘amod legoralekha leqeiz hayamin. 
ecra 1:1	uwishnat ’aHat, lekhoresh melekh paras, likhlot dewar yhoh mipi yirmeyah; hei‘ir yhoh ’et ruaH koresh melekh paras, waya‘awer qol bekhal malkhuto, wegam bemikhtaw leimor. 
ecra 1:2	koh ’amar, koresh melekh paras, kol mamlekhot ha’arez, natan li, yhoh ’elohei hashamayim; wehu faqad ‘alay liwnot lo wayit, birushalim ’asher bihudah. 
ecra 1:3	mi wakhem mikal ‘amo, yehi ’elohaw ‘imo, weya‘al lirushalim ’asher bihudah; weyiwen, ’et beit yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, hu ha’elohim ’asher birushalim. 
ecra 1:4	wekhal hanish’ar, mikal hameqomot ’asher hu gar sham yenase’uhu ’anshei meqomo, bekhesef uwecahaw uwirkhush uwiwheimah; ‘im hanedawah, leweit ha’elohim ’asher birushalim. 
ecra 1:5	wayaqumu rashei ha’awot, lihudah uwinyamin, wehakohanim wehalwiyim; lekhol hei‘ir ha’elohim ’et ruHo, la‘alot liwnot, ’et beit yhoh ’asher birushalim. 
ecra 1:6	wekhal sewiwoteihem Hiccequ wideihem, bikhlei khesef baccahaw barekhush uwabeheimah uwamigdanot; lewad ‘al kal hitnadeiw.
ecra 1:7	wehamelekh koresh, hozi ’et kelei weit yhoh; ’asher hozi newukhadnezar mirushalim, wayiteneim beweit ’elohaw. 
ecra 1:8	wayozi’eim, koresh melekh paras, ‘al yad mitredat hagicbar; wayispereim lesheishebazar, hanasi lihudah. 
ecra 1:9	we’eileh misparam; ’agarTelei cahaw sheloshim, ’agarTelei khesef ’alef, maHalafim tish‘ah we‘esrim.
ecra 1:10	keforei cahaw sheloshim, keforei khesef mishnim, ’arba‘ mei’ot wa‘asarah; keilim ’aHeirim ’alef.
ecra 1:11	kal keilim laccahaw welakesef, Hameishet ’alafim we’arba‘ mei’ot; hakol he‘elah sheishebazar, ‘im hei‘alot hagolah, mibawel lirushalim.
ecra 2:1	we’eileh benei hamedinah, ha‘olim mishewi hagolah, ’asher heglah newukhadnezor newukhadnezar melekh bawel lewawel; wayashuwu lirushalim wihudah ’ish le‘iro. 
ecra 2:2	’asher ba’u ‘im cerubawel, yeishua‘ neHemyah serayah re‘eilayah maredokhay bilshan mispar bigway reHum ba‘anah; mispar ’anshei ‘am yisra’eil.
ecra 2:3	benei far‘osh, ’alpayim mei’ah shiw‘im ushenayim.
ecra 2:4	benei shefaTyah, shelosh mei’ot shiw‘im ushenayim.
ecra 2:5	benei ’araH, shewa‘ mei’ot Hamishah weshiw‘im.
ecra 2:6	benei faHat mo’aw liwnei yeishua‘ yo’aw; ’alpayim shemoneh mei’ot usheneim ‘asar.
ecra 2:7	benei ‘eilam, ’elef matayim Hamishim we’arba‘ah.
ecra 2:8	benei catu, tesha‘ mei’ot we’arba‘im waHamishah.
ecra 2:9	benei cakay, shewa‘ mei’ot weshishim.
ecra 2:10	benei wani, sheish mei’ot ’arba‘im ushenayim.
ecra 2:11	benei weiway, sheish mei’ot ‘esrim usheloshah.
ecra 2:12	benei ‘acgad, ’elef matayim ‘esrim ushenayim.
ecra 2:13	benei ’adoniqam, sheish mei’ot shishim weshishah.
ecra 2:14	benei wigway, ’alpayim Hamishim weshishah.
ecra 2:15	benei ‘adin, ’arba‘ mei’ot Hamishim we’arba‘ah.
ecra 2:16	benei ’aTeir liHicqiyah tish‘im ushemonah.
ecra 2:17	benei weizay, shelosh mei’ot ‘esrim usheloshah.
ecra 2:18	benei yorah, mei’ah usheneim ‘asar.
ecra 2:19	benei Hashum, matayim ‘esrim usheloshah.
ecra 2:20	benei gibar tish‘im waHamishah.
ecra 2:21	benei weit laHem, mei’ah ‘esrim usheloshah.
ecra 2:22	’anshei neTofah Hamishim weshishah. 
ecra 2:23	’anshei ‘anatot, mei’ah ‘esrim ushemonah.
ecra 2:24	benei ‘acmawet ’arba‘im ushenayim.
ecra 2:25	benei qiryat ‘arim kefirah uwe’eirot, shewa‘ mei’ot we’arba‘im usheloshah.
ecra 2:26	benei haramah wagawa‘, sheish mei’ot ‘esrim we’eHad.
ecra 2:27	’anshei mikhmas, mei’ah ‘esrim ushenayim.
ecra 2:28	’anshei weit ’eil weha‘ay, matayim ‘esrim usheloshah.
ecra 2:29	benei newo Hamishim ushenayim.
ecra 2:30	benei magbish, mei’ah Hamishim weshishah.
ecra 2:31	benei ‘eilam ’aHeir, ’elef matayim Hamishim we’arba‘ah.
ecra 2:32	benei Harim, shelosh mei’ot we‘esrim.
ecra 2:33	benei lod Hadid we’ono, shewa‘ mei’ot ‘esrim waHamishah.
ecra 2:34	benei yereiHo, shelosh mei’ot ’arba‘im waHamishah.
ecra 2:35	benei sena’ah, sheloshet ’alafim, wesheish mei’ot usheloshim.
ecra 2:36	hakohanim; benei yeda‘yah leweit yeishua‘, tesha‘ mei’ot shiw‘im usheloshah.
ecra 2:37	benei ’imeir, ’elef Hamishim ushenayim.
ecra 2:38	benei fashHur, ’elef matayim ’arba‘im weshiw‘ah.
ecra 2:39	benei Harim, ’elef weshiw‘ah ‘asar.
ecra 2:40	halwiyim; benei yeishua‘ weqadmi’eil liwnei hodawyah shiw‘im we’arba‘ah.
ecra 2:41	hamshorerim; benei ’asaf, mei’ah ‘esrim ushemonah.
ecra 2:42	benei hasho‘arim, benei shalum benei ’aTeir benei Talmon benei ‘aquw, benei HaTiTa benei showay; hakol mei’ah sheloshim wetish‘ah.
ecra 2:43	hanetinim; benei ziHa wenei Hasufa benei Taba‘ot. 
ecra 2:44	benei qeiros benei si‘aha benei fadon. 
ecra 2:45	benei lewanah wenei Hagawah benei ‘aquw. 
ecra 2:46	benei Hagaw benei shamlay shalmay benei Hanan. 
ecra 2:47	benei gideil benei gaHar benei re’ayah. 
ecra 2:48	benei rezin benei neqoda benei gaccam. 
ecra 2:49	benei ‘ucca wenei faseiaH benei weisay. 
ecra 2:50	benei ’asnah wenei me‘inim me‘unim benei nefisim nefusim. 
ecra 2:51	benei waqbuq benei Haqufa benei HarHur. 
ecra 2:52	benei wazlut benei meHida benei Harsha. 
ecra 2:53	benei warqos benei sisera benei tamaH. 
ecra 2:54	benei neziaH benei HaTifa. 
ecra 2:55	benei ‘awdei shelomoh; benei soTay benei hassoferet benei feruda. 
ecra 2:56	benei ya‘lah wenei darqon benei gideil. 
ecra 2:57	benei shefaTyah wenei HaTil, benei pokheret hazewayim benei ’ami. 
ecra 2:58	kal hanetinim, uwenei ‘awdei shelomoh; shelosh mei’ot tish‘im ushenayim.
ecra 2:59	we’eileh, ha‘olim miteil melaH teil Harsha, keruw ’adan ’imeir; welo yakhelu, lehagid beit ’awotam wecar‘am, ’im miyisra’eil heim. 
ecra 2:60	benei delayah wenei Towiyah benei neqoda; sheish mei’ot Hamishim ushenayim.
ecra 2:61	umibenei hakohanim, benei Howayah benei haqoz; benei warcilay, ’asher laqaH mibenot barcilay hagil‘adi ’ishah, wayiqarei ‘al shemam. 
ecra 2:62	’eileh, biqshu khetawam hamityaHsim welo nimza’u; waygo’alu min hakehunah. 
ecra 2:63	wayomer hatirshata lahem, ’asher lo yokhelu miqodesh haqodashim; ‘ad ‘amod kohein le’urim uletumim. 
ecra 2:64	kal haqahal ke’eHad; ’arba‘ ribo, ’alpayim shelosh mei’ot shishim. 
ecra 2:65	milewad ‘awdeihem we’amhoteihem ’eileh, shiw‘at ’alafim, shelosh mei’ot sheloshim weshiw‘ah; welahem meshorerim umeshorerot matayim. 
ecra 2:66	suseihem shewa‘ mei’ot sheloshim weshishah; pirdeihem matayim ’arba‘im waHamishah. 
ecra 2:67	gemaleihem, ’arba‘ mei’ot sheloshim waHamishah; Hamorim sheishet ’alafim, shewa‘ mei’ot we‘esrim.
ecra 2:68	umeirashei ha’awot, bewo’am leweit yhoh ’asher birushalim; hitnadewu leweit ha’elohim, leha‘amido ‘al mekhono. 
ecra 2:69	kekhoHam, natenu le’ozar hamelakhah cahaw, darkemonim sheish ribot wa’elef, s wekhesef manim Hameishet ’alafim; wekhatenot kohanim mei’ah.
ecra 2:70	wayeishewu hakohanim wehalwiyim umin ha‘am wehamshorerim wehasho‘arim wehanetinim be‘areihem; wekhal yisra’eil be‘areihem.
ecra 3:1	wayiga‘ haHodesh hashewi‘i, uwenei yisra’eil be‘arim; s wayei’asefu ha‘am ke’ish ’eHad ’el yerushalim.
ecra 3:2	wayaqam yeishua‘ ben yozadaq we’eHaw hakohanim, ucerubawel ben she’alti’eil we’eHaw, wayiwnu ’et micbaH ’elohei yisra’eil; leha‘alot ‘alaw ‘olot, kakatuw betorat mosheh ’ish ha’elohim. 
ecra 3:3	wayakhinu hamicbeiaH ‘al mekhonotaw, ki be’eimah ‘aleihem, mei‘amei ha’arazot; waya‘al waya‘alu ‘alaw ‘olot yhoh, ‘olot laboqer wela‘arew. 
ecra 3:4	waya‘asu ’et Hag hassukot kakatuw; we‘olat yom beyom bemispar, kemishpaT dewar yom beyomo. 
ecra 3:5	we’aHareikhein ‘olat tamid weleHodashim, ulekhal mo‘adei yhoh hamqudashim; ulekhol mitnadeiw nedawah yhoh. 
ecra 3:6	miyom ’eHad laHodesh hashewi‘i, heiHeilu leha‘alot ‘olot yhoh; weheikhal yhoh lo yussad. 
ecra 3:7	wayitenu khesef, laHozewim weleHarashim; uma’akhal umishteh washemen, lazidonim welazorim, lehawi ‘azei ’aracim min halewanon ’el yam yafo, kerishyon koresh melekh paras ‘aleihem.
ecra 3:8	uwashanah hasheinit, lewo’am ’el beit ha’elohim lirushalim, baHodesh hasheini; heiHeilu cerubawel benosh ’alti’eil weyeishua‘ ben yozadaq ushe’ar ’aHeihem hakohanim wehalwiyim, wekhal haba’im meihashewi yerushalim, waya‘amidu ’et halwiyim, miben ‘esrim shanah wama‘lah, lenazeiaH ‘al melekhet beit yhoh.
ecra 3:9	waya‘amod yeishua‘ banaw we’eHaw qadmi’eil uwanaw benei yehudah ke’eHad, lenazeiaH ‘al ‘oseih hamelakhah beweit ha’elohim; s benei Heinadad, beneihem wa’aHeihem halwiyim. 
ecra 3:10	weyissedu habonim ’et heikhal yhoh; waya‘amidu hakohanim melubashim baHazozerot, wehalwiyim benei ’asaf bamziltayim, lehaleil ’et yhoh, ‘al yedei dawid melekh yisra’eil. 
ecra 3:11	waya‘anu behaleil uwehodot yhoh ki Tow, ki le‘olam Hasdo ‘al yisra’eil; wekhal ha‘am heiri‘u teru‘ah gedolah wehaleil yhoh, ‘al husad beit yhoh.
ecra 3:12	werabim meihakohanim wehalwiyim werashei ha’awot hacceqeinim, ’asher ra’u ’et habayit harishon beyasedo, ceh habayit be‘eineihem, bokhim beqol gadol; werabim bitru‘ah wesimHah leharim qol. 
ecra 3:13	we’ein ha‘am, makirim qol teru‘at hasimHah, leqol bekhi ha‘am; ki ha‘am, meri‘im teru‘ah gedolah, wehaqol nishma‘ ‘ad lemeiraHoq.
ecra 4:1	wayishme‘u, zarei yehudah uwinyamin; ki wenei hagolah bonim heikhal, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. 
ecra 4:2	wayigeshu ’el cerubawel we’el rashei ha’awot, wayomeru lahem niwneh ‘imakhem, ki khakhem, nidrosh leiloheikhem; welo welo ’anaHnu coweHim, mimei ’eisar Hadon melekh ’ashur, hama‘aleh ’otanu poh. 
ecra 4:3	wayomer lahem cerubawel weyeishua‘, ushe’ar rashei ha’awot leyisra’eil, lo lakhem walanu, liwnot bayit leiloheinu; ki ’anaHnu yaHad niwneh, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ka’asher ziwwanu, hamelekh koresh melekh paras. 
ecra 4:4	wayhi ‘am ha’arez, merapim yedei ‘am yehudah; umewalahim umewahalim ’otam liwnot. 
ecra 4:5	wesokherim ‘aleihem yo‘azim lehafeir ‘azatam; kal yemei, koresh melekh paras, we‘ad malkhut dareyawesh melekh paras. 
ecra 4:6	uwemalkhut ’aHashweirosh, bitHilat malkhuto; katewu siTnah, ‘al yoshewei yehudah wirushalim.
ecra 4:7	uwimei ’artaHshasta, kataw bishlam mitredat Tawe’eil ushe’ar kenawoto kenawotaw, ‘al ’artaHshasta ’artaHshast melekh paras; ukhetaw hanishtewan, katuw ’aramit umeturgam ’aramit.
ecra 4:8	reHum be‘eil Te‘eim, weshimshay safera, ketawu ’igerah Hadah ‘al yerushelem; le’artaHshast malka keneima. 
ecra 4:9	’edayin reHum be‘eil Te‘eim, weshimshay safera, ushe’ar kenawatehon; dinayei wa’afarsatkhayei Tarpelayei ’afaresayei, ’arkeway ’arkewayei wawelayei shushankhayei, dihu dehayei ‘eilemayei. 
ecra 4:10	ushe’ar ’umaya, di hagli ’asenapar raba weyaqira, wehoteiw himo, beqiryah di shamerayin; ushe’ar ‘awar naharah ukhe‘enet. 
ecra 4:11	denah parshegen ’igarta, di shelaHu ‘alohi, ‘al ’artaHshast malka; ‘awdayikh ’enash ‘awar naharah ukhe‘enet.
ecra 4:12	yedia‘ lehewei lemalka, di yehudayei, di seliqu min lewatakh, ‘alena ’ato lirushelem; qiryeta maradeta uwiyosheta weshuraya  weshuraya ’eshkhelilu shakhlilu,  we’ushaya yaHiTu. 
ecra 4:13	ke‘an, yedia‘ lehewei lemalka, di hein qiryeta dakh titbenei, weshurayah yishtakhlelun; mindah welo wahalakh la yintenun, we’apetom malkhim tehanciq. 
ecra 4:14	ke‘an, kal qoweil di melaH heikhela melaHna, we‘arwat malka, la ’arikh lana lemeHecei; ‘al denah, shelaHna wehoda‘na lemalka. 
ecra 4:15	di yewaqar bisfar dakheranaya di ’awahatakh, utehashkaH bisfar dakheranaya wetinda‘ di qiryeta dakh qirya marada, umehanceqat malkhin umedinan, we’eshtadur ‘awedin begawwah, min yomat ‘alema; ‘al denah, qiryeta dakh haHarewat. 
ecra 4:16	mehod‘in ’anaHnah lemalka, di hein qiryeta dakh titbenei, weshurayah yishtakhlelun; laqoweil denah, Halaq ba‘awar nahara, la ’itay lakh.
ecra 4:17	pitgama shelaH malka, ‘al reHum be‘eil Te‘eim weshimshay safera, ushe’ar kenawatehon, di yatewin beshamerayin; ushe’ar ‘awar naharah shelam ukhe‘et.
ecra 4:18	nishtewana di shelaHtun ‘alena; mefarash qeri qadamay. 
ecra 4:19	umini sim Te‘eim uwaqaru wehashkaHu, di qiryeta dakh, min yomat ‘alema, ‘al malkhin mitnase’ah; umerad we’eshtadur mit‘awed bah. 
ecra 4:20	umalkhin taqifin, hawo ‘al yerushelem, weshaliTin, bekhol ‘awar naharah; umidah welo wahalakh mityeheiw lehon. 
ecra 4:21	ke‘an simu Te‘eim, lewaTala guwraya ’ileikh; weqiryeta dakh la titbenei, ‘ad mini Ta‘ma yitesam. 
ecra 4:22	ucehirin hewo shalu leme‘bad ‘al denah; lemah yisgei Hawala, lehancaqat malkhin.
ecra 4:23	’edayin, min di parshegen nishtewana di ’artaHshasta ’artaHshast malka, qeri qodam reHum weshimshay safera ukhenawatehon; ’acalu wiwhilu lirushelem ‘al yehudayei, uwaTilu himo be’edra‘ weHayil.
ecra 4:24	beidayin, beTeilat ‘awidat beit ’elaha, di birushelem; wahawat baTela, ‘ad shenat tartein, lemalkhut dareyawesh melekh paras.
ecra 5:1	wehitnabi Hagay newi’ah newiya, ucekharyah war ‘ido newi’aya newiyaya, ‘al yehudayei, di wihud uwirushelem; beshum ’elah yisra’eil ‘aleihon.
ecra 5:2	beidayin qamu cerubawel bar she’alti’eil weyeishua‘ bar yozadaq, weshariw lemiwnei, beit ’elaha di wirushelem; we‘imehon newi’aya newiyaya di ’elaha mesa‘adin lehon
ecra 5:3	beih cimna ’ata ‘aleihon tatenay paHat ‘awar naharah ushetar bocnay ukhenawatehon; wekhein ’amerin lehom, man sam lekhom Te‘eim, bayta denah libenei, we’usharna denah leshakhlalah.
ecra 5:4	’edayin keneima ’amarna lehom; man ’inun shemahat guwraya, di denah winyana banayin. 
ecra 5:5	we‘ein ’elahahom, hawat ‘al sawei yehudayei, wela waTilu himo, ‘ad Ta‘ma ledareyawesh yehakh; we’edayin yetiwun nishtewana ‘al denah.
ecra 5:6	parshegen ’igarta di shelaH tatenay paHat ‘awar naharah, ushetar bocnay ukhenawateih, ’afarsekhayei, di ba‘awar naharah; ‘al dareyawesh malka. 
ecra 5:7	pitgama shelaHu ‘alohi; wekhidnah ketiw begawweih, ledareyawesh malka shelama khola.
ecra 5:8	yedia‘ lehewei lemalka, di ’acalna lihud medineta leweit ’elaha raba, wehu mitbenei ’ewen gelal, we’a‘ mitesam bekhutlaya; wa‘awideta dakh ’aseparna mit‘awda umazlaH beyedhom.
ecra 5:9	’edayin, she’eilena lesawaya ’ileikh, keneima ’amarna lehom; man sam lekhom Te‘eim, bayta denah lemiwneyah, we’usharna denah leshakhlalah. 
ecra 5:10	we’af shemahatehom she’eilena lehom lehoda‘utakh; di nikhtuw shum guwraya di werasheihom.
ecra 5:11	ukheneima fitgama hatiwuna lemeimar; ’anaHna himo ‘awdohi di ’elah shemaya we’ar‘a, uwanayin bayta di hawa weneih miqadmat denah shenin sagi’an, umelekh leyisra’eil raw, benahi weshakhleleih. 
ecra 5:12	lahein, min di hargicu ’awahotana le’elah shemaya, yehaw himo, beyad newukhadnezar melekh bawel kasdaya kasda’ah; uwaytah denah satreih, we‘amah hagli lewawel.
ecra 5:13	beram bishnat Hadah, lekhoresh malka di wawel; koresh malka sam Te‘eim, beit ’elaha denah libenei. 
ecra 5:14	we’af manaya di weit ’elaha di dahawah wekhaspa di newukhadnezar, hanpeiq min heikhela di wirushelem, weheiweil himo, leheikhela di wawel; hanpeiq himo koresh malka, min heikhela di wawel, wihiwu lesheishebazar shemeih, di feHah sameih. 
ecra 5:15	wa’amar leih ’eileh ’eil manaya, sē ’eicel ’aHeit himo, beheikhela di wirushelem; uweit ’elaha yitbenei ‘al ’atreih.
ecra 5:16	’edayin sheishebazar deikh, ’ata, yehaw ’ushaya di weit ’elaha di wirushelem; umin ’edayin we‘ad ke‘an mitbenei wela shelim. 
ecra 5:17	ukhe‘an hein ‘al malka Taw, yitbaqar beweit gincaya di malka tamah di bewawel hein ’itay, di min koresh malka sim Te‘eim, lemiwnei beit ’elaha deikh birushelem; ure‘ut malka ‘al denah yishlaH ‘alena.
ecra 6:1	beidayin dareyawesh malka sam Te‘eim; uwaqaru beweit sifraya, di gincaya mehaHatin tamah bewawel. 
ecra 6:2	wehishtekhaH be’aHmeta, bewireta di bemaday medinetah megilah Hadah; wekhein ketiw begawwah dikhronah.
ecra 6:3	bishnat Hadah lekhoresh malka, koresh malka sam Te‘eim beit ’elaha wirushelem bayta yitbenei, ’atar di daweHin diwHin, we’ushohi mesowlin; rumeih ’amin shitin, petayeih ’amin shitin. 
ecra 6:4	nidbakhin di ’ewen gelal telata, wenidbakh di ’a‘ Hadat; wenifqeta, min beit malka tityehiw. 
ecra 6:5	we’af manei weit ’elaha di dahawah wekhaspa di newukhadnezar, hanpeiq min heikhela di wirushelem weheiweil lewawel; yahatiwun, wihakh leheikhela di wirushelem le’atreih, wetaHeit beweit ’elaha.
ecra 6:6	ke‘an tatenay paHat ‘awar naharah shetar bocnay ukhenawatehon, ’afarsekhayei, di ba‘awar naharah; raHiqin hawo min tamah. 
ecra 6:7	shewuqu la‘awidat beit ’elaha deikh; paHat yehudayei ulesawei yehudayei, beit ’elaha deikh yiwnon ‘al ’atreih. 
ecra 6:8	umini sim Te‘eim lema di ta‘awdun, ‘im sawei yehudayei ’ileikh, lemiwnei beit ’elaha deikh; uminikhsei malka, di midat ‘awar naharah, ’aseparna, nifqeta tehewei mityahawa leguwraya ’ileikh di la lewaTala. 
ecra 6:9	umah HashHan uwenei torin wedikhrin we’imerin la‘alawan le’elah shemaya HinTin melaH Hamar umeshaH, kemeimar kahanaya di wirushelem lehewei mityeheiw lehom yom beyom di la shalu. 
ecra 6:10	di lehewon mehaqrewin niHoHin le’elah shemaya; umezalayin leHayei malka uwenohi. 
ecra 6:11	umini sim Te‘eim di khal ’enash, di yehashnei pitgama denah, yitnesaH ’a‘ min bayteih, uceqif yitmeHei ‘alohi; uwayteih newalu yit‘aweid ‘al denah. 
ecra 6:12	weilaha di shakin shemeih tamah, yemagar kal melekh we‘am di yishlaH yedeih, lehashnayah leHabalah beit ’elaha deikh di wirushelem; ’anah dareyawesh samet Te‘eim, ’aseparna yit‘awid.
ecra 6:13	’edayin tatenay paHat ‘awar naharah shetar bocnay ukhenawatehon; laqoweil, di shelaH dareyawesh malka keneima ’aseparna ‘awadu. 
ecra 6:14	wesawei yehudayei banayin umazleHin, binwu’at Hagay newi’ah newiya, ucekharyah bar ‘ido; uweno weshakhlilu, min Ta‘am ’elah yisra’eil, umiTe‘eim koresh wedareyawesh, we’artaHshast melekh paras.
