ecra 6:15	wesheizi baytah denah, ‘ad yom telatah liraH ’adar; di hi shenat sheit, lemalkhut dareyawesh malka.
ecra 6:16	wa‘awadu wenei yisra’eil kahanaya weleiwayei ushe’ar benei galuta, Hanukat beit ’elaha denah beHedwah. 
ecra 6:17	wehaqriwu, laHanukat beit ’elaha denah torin me’ah, dikhrin matayin, ’imerin ’arba‘ me’ah; uzefirei ‘iccin leHaTaya leHaTa’ah ‘al kal yisra’eil terei ‘asar, leminyan shiwTei yisra’eil. 
ecra 6:18	wahaqimu khahanaya biflugatehon, weleiwayei bemaHleqatehon, ‘al ‘awidat ’elaha di wirushelem; kikhtaw sefar mosheh.
ecra 6:19	waya‘asu wenei hagolah ’et hapasaH; be’arba‘ah ‘asar laHodesh harishon. 
ecra 6:20	ki hiTaharu hakohanim wehalwiyim ke’eHad kulam Tehorim; wayishHaTu hapesaH lekhal benei hagolah, wela’aHeihem hakohanim welahem. 
ecra 6:21	wayokhelu wenei yisra’eil, hashawim meihagolah, wekhol, haniwdal miTum’at goyei ha’arez ’aleihem; lidrosh yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. 
ecra 6:22	waya‘asu Hag mazot shiw‘at yamim besimHah; ki simeHam yhoh weheiseiw leiw melekh ’ashur ‘aleihem, leHacceiq yedeihem, bimlekhet beit ha’elohim ’elohei yisra’eil.
ecra 7:1	we’aHar hadewarim ha’eileh, bemalkhut ’artaHshast melekh paras; ‘ecra ben serayah, ben ‘acaryah ben Hilqiyah. 
ecra 7:2	ben shalum ben zadoq ben ’aHiTuw. 
ecra 7:3	ben ’amaryah wen ‘acaryah ben merayot. 
ecra 7:4	ben ceraHyah wen ‘ucci ben buqi. 
ecra 7:5	ben ’awishua‘, ben pineHas ben ’el‘acar, ben ’aharon hakohein harosh. 
ecra 7:6	hu ‘ecra ‘alah mibawel, wehu sofeir mahir betorat mosheh, ’asher natan yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil; wayiten lo hamelekh, keyad yhoh ’elohaw ‘alaw, kol baqashato.
ecra 7:7	waya‘alu mibenei yisra’eil umin hakohanim wehalwiyim wehamshorerim wehasho‘arim wehanetinim ’el yerushalim; bishnat shewa‘ le’artaHshast hamelekh. 
ecra 7:8	wayawo yerushalim baHodesh haHamishi; hi shenat hashewi‘it lamelekh. 
ecra 7:9	ki, be’eHad laHodesh harishon, hu yesud, hama‘alah mibawel; uwe’eHad laHodesh haHamishi, ba ’el yerushalim, keyad ’elohaw haTowah ‘alaw. 
ecra 7:10	ki ‘ecra heikhin lewawo, lidrosh ’et torat yhoh wela‘asot; ulelameid beyisra’eil Hoq umishpaT.
ecra 7:11	weceh parshegen hanishtewan, ’asher natan hamelekh ’artaHshast, le‘ecra hakohein hassofeir; sofeir diwrei mizwot yhoh weHuqaw ‘al yisra’eil.
ecra 7:12	’artaHshast, melekh malkhaya; le‘ecra khahana safar data di ’elah shemaya gemir ukhe‘enet. 
ecra 7:13	mini sim Te‘eim di khal mitnadaw bemalkhuti min ‘amah yisra’eil wekhahanohi weleiwayei, limhakh lirushelem ‘imakh yehakh. 
ecra 7:14	kal qoweil, di min qodam malka weshiw‘at ya‘aTohi sheliaH, lewaqara ‘al yehud welirushelem; bedat ’elahakh di widakh. 
ecra 7:15	uleheiwalah kesaf udehaw; di malka weya‘aTohi, hitnadawu le’elah yisra’eil, di wirushelem mishkeneih. 
ecra 7:16	wekhol kesaf udehaw, di tehashkaH, bekhol medinat bawel; ‘im hitnadawut ‘ama wekhahanaya mitnadewin, leweit ’elahahom di wirushelem. 
ecra 7:17	kal qoweil denah ’aseparna tiqnei bekhaspa denah, torin dikhrin ’imerin, uminHatehon weniskeihon; uteqareiw himo, ‘al madbeHah, di beit ’elahakhom di wirushelem. 
ecra 7:18	umah di ‘alayikh ‘alakh we‘al ’eHayikh ’eHakh yiTaw, bish’ar kaspa wedahawah leme‘bad; kir‘ut ’elahakhom ta‘awdun. 
ecra 7:19	umanaya di mityahawin lakh, lefaleHan beit ’elahakh; hashleim qodam ’elah yerushelem. 
ecra 7:20	ushe’ar, HashHut beit ’elahakh, di yipel lakh lemintan; tintein min beit gincei malka. 
ecra 7:21	umini ’anah ’artaHshast malka sim Te‘eim, lekhol giccawraya, di ba‘awar naharah; di khal di yish’alenkhon ‘ecra khahanah safar data di ’elah shemaya, ’aseparna yit‘awid. 
ecra 7:22	‘ad kesaf kakerin me’ah we‘ad HinTin korin me’ah, we‘ad Hamar batin me’ah, we‘ad batin meshaH me’ah; umelaH di la khetaw. 
ecra 7:23	kal di, min Ta‘am ’elah shemaya, yit‘aweid ’adracda, leweit ’elah shemaya; di lemah lehewei qezaf, ‘al malkhut malka uwenohi. 
ecra 7:24	ulekhom mehod‘in, di khal kahanaya weleiwayei camaraya tara‘aya netinaya, ufaleHei, beit ’elaha denah; mindah welo wahalakh, la shaliT lemirmei ‘aleihom. 
ecra 7:25	we’ant ‘ecra, keHakhemat ’elahakh di widakh meni shafeTin wedayanin, di lehewon da’anin dayenin lekhal ‘amah di ba‘awar naharah, lekhal yade‘ei datei ’elahakh; wedi la yada‘ tehod‘un. 
ecra 7:26	wekhal di la lehewei ‘aweid data di ’elahakh, wedata di malka, ’aseparna dinah lehewei mit‘aweid mineih; hein lemot hein lishroshu lishroshi, hein la‘anash nikhsin wele’esurin.
ecra 7:27	barukh yhoh ’elohei ’awoteinu; ’asher natan kacot beleiw hamelekh, lefa’eir ’et beit yhoh ’asher birushalim. 
ecra 7:28	we‘alay hiTah Hesed, lifnei hamelekh weyo‘azaw, ulekhal sarei hamelekh hagiborim; wa’ani hitHaccaqti, keyad yhoh ’elohay ‘alay, wa’eqbezah miyisra’eil rashim la‘alot ‘imi.
ecra 8:1	we’eileh rashei ’awoteihem wehityaHsam; ha‘olim ‘imi, bemalkhut ’artaHshast hamelekh mibawel.
ecra 8:2	mibenei fineHas geireshom, s mibenei ’itamar daniyeil; s mibenei dawid HaTush.
ecra 8:3	mibenei shekhanyah, s mibenei far‘osh cekharyah; we‘imo hityaHeis lickharim mei’ah waHamishim.
ecra 8:4	mibenei paHat mo’aw, ’elyeho‘einay ben ceraHyah; we‘imo matayim haccekharim.
ecra 8:5	mibenei shekhanyah ben yaHaci’eil; we‘imo shelosh mei’ot haccekharim.
ecra 8:6	umibenei ‘adin, ‘ewed ben yonatan; we‘imo Hamishim haccekharim.
ecra 8:7	umibenei ‘eilam, yesha‘yah ben ‘atalyah; we‘imo shiw‘im haccekharim.
ecra 8:8	umibenei shefaTyah, cewadyah ben mikha’eil; we‘imo shemonim haccekharim.
ecra 8:9	mibenei yo’aw, ‘owadyah ben yeHi’eil; we‘imo matayim ushemonah ‘asar haccekharim.
ecra 8:10	umibenei shelomit ben yosifyah; we‘imo mei’ah weshishim haccekharim.
ecra 8:11	umibenei weiway, cekharyah ben beiway; we‘imo ‘esrim ushemonah haccekharim.
ecra 8:12	umibenei ‘acgad, yoHanan ben haqaTan; we‘imo mei’ah wa‘asarah haccekharim.
ecra 8:13	umibenei ’adoniqam ’aHaronim we’eileh shemotam, ’elifeleT ye‘i’eil ushema‘yah; we‘imahem shishim haccekharim.
ecra 8:14	umibenei wigway ‘utay wecawud wecakur; we‘imo shiw‘im haccekharim.
ecra 8:15	wa’eqbezeim, ’el hanahar haba ’el ’ahawa, wanaHaneh sham yamim sheloshah; wa’awinah wa‘am uwakohanim, umibenei leiwi lo mazati sham. 
ecra 8:16	wa’eshleHah le’eli‘ecer la’ari’eil lishma‘yah ule’elnatan uleyariw ule’elnatan ulenatan welickharyah welimshulam rashim; uleyoyariw ule’elnatan mewinim 
ecra 8:17	wa’ozi’ah wa’azawweh ’otam ‘al ’ido harosh, bekhasifya hamaqom; wa’asimah befihem dewarim ledabeir ’el ’ido ’aHiw hanetunim hanetinim bekhasifya hamaqom, lehawi lanu mesharetim leweit ’eloheinu. 
ecra 8:18	wayawi’’u lanu keyad ’eloheinu haTowah ‘aleinu ’ish sekhel, mibenei maHli, ben leiwi ben yisra’eil; wesheireiweyah uwanaw we’eHaw shemonah ‘asar. 
ecra 8:19	we’et Hashawyah, we’ito yesha‘yah mibenei merari; ’eHaw uweneihem ‘esrim.
ecra 8:20	umin hanetinim, shenatan dawid wehasarim la‘awodat halwiyim, netinim matayim we‘esrim; kulam niqewu wesheimot. 
ecra 8:21	wa’eqra sham zom ‘al hanahar ’ahawa, lehit‘anot lifnei ’eloheinu; lewaqeish mimenu derekh yesharah, lanu uleTapeinu ulekhal rekhusheinu. 
ecra 8:22	ki wosheti, lish’ol min hamelekh Hayil ufarashim, le‘acereinu mei’oyeiw badarekh; ki ’amarnu lamelekh leimor, yad ’eloheinu ‘al kal mewaqshaw leTowah, we‘ucco we’apo, ‘al kal ‘ocewaw. 
ecra 8:23	wanazumah wanewaqshah mei’eloheinu ‘al cot; wayei‘ateir lanu. 
ecra 8:24	wa’awdilah misarei hakohanim sheneim ‘asar; lesheireiweyah Hashawyah, we‘imahem mei’aHeihem ‘asarah. 
ecra 8:25	wa’eshqolah wa’eshqolah lahem, ’et hakesef we’et haccahaw we’et hakeilim; terumat beit ’eloheinu, haheirimu hamelekh weyo‘azaw wesaraw, wekhal yisra’eil hanimza’im. 
ecra 8:26	wa’eshqalah ‘al yadam kesef, kikarim sheish mei’ot waHamishim, ukhelei khesef mei’ah lekhikarim; cahaw mei’ah khikar. 
ecra 8:27	ukheforei cahaw ‘esrim, la’adarkhonim ’alef; ukhelei neHoshet muzhaw Towah shenayim, Hamudot kaccahaw. 
ecra 8:28	wa’omerah ’aleihem, ’atem qodesh yhoh, wehakeilim qodesh; wehakesef wehaccahaw nedawah, yhoh ’elohei ’awoteikhem. 
ecra 8:29	shiqdu weshimru, ‘ad tishqelu lifnei sarei hakohanim wehalwiyim wesarei ha’awot leyisra’eil birushalim; halishkhot beit yhoh. 
ecra 8:30	weqibelu hakohanim wehalwiyim, mishqal hakesef wehaccahaw wehakeilim; lehawi lirushalim leweit ’eloheinu.
ecra 8:31	wanis‘ah minehar ’ahawa, bishneim ‘asar laHodesh harishon, lalekhet yerushalim; weyad ’eloheinu hayetah ‘aleinu, wayazileinu, mikaf ’oyeiw we’oreiw ‘al hadarekh. 
ecra 8:32	wanawo yerushalim; waneishew sham yamim sheloshah. 
ecra 8:33	uwayom harewi‘i nishqal hakesef wehaccahaw wehakeilim beweit ’eloheinu, ‘al yad mereimot ben ’uriyah hakohein, we‘imo ’el‘acar ben pineHas; we‘imahem yocawad ben yeishua‘ weno‘adyah wen binui halwiyim. 
ecra 8:34	bemispar bemishqal lakol; wayikateiw kal hamishqal ba‘eit hahi.
ecra 8:35	haba’im meihashewi wenei hagolah hiqriwu ‘olot leilohei yisra’eil, parim sheneim ‘asar ‘al kal yisra’eil ’eilim tish‘im weshishah, kewasim shiw‘im weshiw‘ah, zefirei HaTat sheneim ‘asar; hakol ‘olah yhoh.
ecra 8:36	wayitenu ’et datei hamelekh, la’aHashdarpenei hamelekh, ufaHawot ‘eiwer hanahar; wenise’u ’et ha‘am we’et beit ha’elohim.
ecra 9:1	ukhekhalot ’eileh, nigeshu ’eilay hasarim leimor, lo niwdelu ha‘am yisra’eil wehakohanim wehalwiyim, mei‘amei ha’arazot; keto‘awoteihem lakena‘ani haHiti hapericci haywusi, ha‘amoni hamo’awi, hamizri weha’emori. 
ecra 9:2	ki nase’u mibenoteihem, lahem weliwneihem, wehit‘arewu cera‘ haqodesh, be‘amei ha’arazot; weyad hasarim wehasseganim, hayetah bama‘al hacceh rishonah.
ecra 9:3	ukheshame‘i ’et hadawar hacceh, qara‘ti ’et bigdi ume‘ili; wa’emreTah mise‘ar roshi uceqani, wa’eishewah meshomeim. 
ecra 9:4	we’eilay yei’asefu, kol Hareid bediwrei ’elohei yisra’eil, ‘al ma‘al hagolah; wa’ani yosheiw meshomeim, ‘ad leminHat ha‘arew. 
ecra 9:5	uweminHat ha‘erew, qamti mita‘aniti, uweqare‘i wigdi ume‘ili; wa’ekhre‘ah ‘al birkay, wa’efresah khapay ’el yhoh ’elohay. 
ecra 9:6	wa’omerah, ’elohay bosheti wenikhlamti, leharim ’elohay panay ’eilekha; ki ‘awonoteinu rawu lema‘lah rosh, we’ashmateinu gadelah ‘ad lashamayim. 
ecra 9:7	mimei ’awoteinu, ’anaHnu be’ashmah gedolah, ‘ad hayom hacceh; uwa‘awonoteinu nitanu ’anaHnu melakheinu khohaneinu beyad malkhei ha’arazot, baHerew bashewi uwabiccah uwewoshet panim kehayom hacceh. 
ecra 9:8	we‘atah kim‘aT rega‘ hayetah teHinah mei’eit yhoh ’eloheinu, lehash’ir lanu peleiTah, welatet lanu yateid bimqom qadesho; leha’ir ‘eineinu ’eloheinu, uletiteinu miHyah me‘aT be‘awduteinu. 
ecra 9:9	ki ‘awadim ’anaHnu, uwe‘awduteinu, lo ‘acawanu ’eloheinu; wayaT ‘aleinu Hesed lifnei malkhei faras latet lanu miHyah, leromeim ’et beit ’eloheinu uleha‘amid ’et Harewotaw, welatet lanu gadeir, bihudah uwirushalim.
ecra 9:10	we‘atah mah nomar ’eloheinu ’aHarei cot; ki ‘acawnu mizwotekha. 
ecra 9:11	’asher ziwwita, beyad ‘awadekha hanewi’im leimor ha’arez, ’asher ’atem ba’im lerishtah, ’erez nidah hi, benidat ‘amei ha’arazot; beto‘awoteihem, ’asher mil’uha mipeh ’el peh beTum’atam. 
ecra 9:12	we‘atah benoteikhem ’al titenu liwneihem, uwenoteihem ’al tis’u liwneikhem, welo tidreshu shelomam weTowatam ‘ad ‘olam; lema‘an teHecqu, wa’akhaltem ’et Tuw ha’arez, wehorashtem liwneikhem ‘ad ‘olam. 
ecra 9:13	we’aHarei kal haba ‘aleinu, bema‘aseinu hara‘im, uwe’ashmateinu hagedolah; ki ’atah ’eloheinu, Hasakhta lemaTah mei‘awoneinu, wenatatah lanu peleiTah kacot. 
ecra 9:14	hanashuw lehafeir mizwotekha, ulehitHatein, be‘amei hato‘eiwot ha’eileh; halo te’enaf banu ‘ad kaleih, le’ein she’eirit ufeleiTah.
ecra 9:15	yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil zadiq ’atah, ki nish’arnu feleiTah kehayom hacceh; hinu lefanekha be’ashmateinu, ki ’ein la‘amod lefanekha ‘al cot.
ecra 10:1	ukhehitpaleil ‘ecra ukhehitwadoto, bokheh umitnapeil, lifnei beit ha’elohim; niqbezu ’eilaw miyisra’eil qahal raw me’od, ’anashim wenashim wiladim, ki wakhu ha‘am harbeih wekheh.
ecra 10:2	waya‘an shekhanyah wen yeHi’eil mibenei ‘olam ‘eilam wayomer le‘ecra, ’anaHnu ma‘alnu weiloheinu, wanoshew nashim nakheriyot mei‘amei ha’arez; we‘atah yeish miqweh leyisra’eil ‘al cot. 
ecra 10:3	we‘atah nikhrat berit leiloheinu lehozi khal nashim wehanolad meihem ba‘azat ’adonay, wehaHareidim bemizwat ’eloheinu; wekhatorah yei‘aseh. 
ecra 10:4	qum ki ‘alekha hadawar wa’anaHnu ‘imakh; Hacaq wa‘aseih.
ecra 10:5	wayaqam ‘ecra wayashba‘ ’et sarei hakohanim halwiyim wekhal yisra’eil, la‘asot kadawar hacceh wayishawei‘u. 
ecra 10:6	wayaqam ‘ecra, milifnei beit ha’elohim, wayeilekh ’el lishkat yehoHanan ben ’elyashiw; wayeilekh sham, leHem lo ’akhal umayim lo shatah, ki mit’abeil ‘al ma‘al hagolah.
ecra 10:7	waya‘awiru qol bihudah wirushalim, lekhol benei hagolah, lehiqaweiz yerushalim. 
ecra 10:8	wekhol ’asher lo yawo lishloshet hayamim, ka‘azat hasarim wehacceqeinim, yaHoram kal rekhusho; wehu yibadeil miqehal hagolah.
ecra 10:9	wayiqawezu khal ’anshei yehudah uwinyamin yerushalim lishloshet hayamim, hu Hodesh hateshi‘i be‘esrim baHodesh; wayeishewu khal ha‘am, birHow beit ha’elohim, mar‘idim ‘al hadawar umeihageshamim.
ecra 10:10	wayaqam ‘ecra hakohein wayomer ’aleihem, ’atem me‘altem, watoshiwu nashim nakheriyot; lehosif ‘al ’ashmat yisra’eil. 
ecra 10:11	we‘atah, tenu todah yhoh ’elohei ’awoteikhem wa‘asu rezono; wehibadelu mei‘amei ha’arez, umin hanashim hanakheriyot. 
ecra 10:12	waya‘nu khal haqahal wayomeru qol gadol; kein kediwrekha kidwarekha ‘aleinu la‘asot. 
ecra 10:13	’awal ha‘am raw weha‘eit geshamim, we’ein koaH la‘amod baHuz; wehamelakhah, lo leyom ’eHad welo lishnayim, ki hirbinu lifshoa‘ badawar hacceh. 
ecra 10:14	ya‘amdu na reinu lekhal haqahal wekhol ’asher be‘areinu, hahoshiw nashim nakheriyot yawo le‘itim mecumanim, we‘imahem ciqnei ‘ir wa‘ir weshofeTeha; ‘ad lehashiw Haron ’af ’eloheinu mimenu, ‘ad ladawar hacceh.
ecra 10:15	’akh yonatan ben ‘asah’eil weyaHceyah wen tiqwah ‘amedu ‘al cot; umeshulam weshabetay haleiwi ‘acarum. 
ecra 10:16	waya‘asu khein benei hagolah wayibadelu ‘ecra hakohein ’anashim rashei ha’awot leweit ’awotam wekhulam besheimot; wayeishewu, beyom ’eHad laHodesh ha‘asiri, ledaryosh hadawar. 
ecra 10:17	waykhalu wakol, ’anashim hahoshiwu nashim nakheriyot; ‘ad yom ’eHad laHodesh harishon.
ecra 10:18	wayimazei mibenei hakohanim, ’asher hoshiwu nashim nakheriyot; mibenei yeishua‘ ben yozadaq we’eHaw, ma‘aseiyah we’eli‘ecer, weyariw ugedalyah. 
ecra 10:19	wayitenu yadam lehozi nesheihem; wa’asheimim ’eil zon ‘al ’ashmatam.
ecra 10:20	umibenei ’imeir, Hanani ucewadyah.
ecra 10:21	umibenei Harim; ma‘aseiyah we’eiliyah ushema‘yah, wiHi’eil we‘uciyah. 
ecra 10:22	umibenei pashHur; ’elyo‘einay ma‘aseiyah yishma‘eil netan’eil, yocawad we’el‘asah.
ecra 10:23	umin halwiyim; yocawad weshim‘i, weqeilayah hu qeliTa, petaHyah yehudah we’eli‘ecer.
ecra 10:24	umin hamshorerim ’elyashiw; umin hasho‘arim, shalum waTelem we’uri.
ecra 10:25	umiyisra’eil; mibenei far‘osh ramyah weyicciyah umalkiyah umiyamin we’el‘acar, umalkiyah uwenayah.
ecra 10:26	umibenei ‘eilam; matanyah cekharyah wiHi’eil we‘awdi, wireimot we’eiliyah.
ecra 10:27	umibenei catu; ’elyo‘einay ’elyashiw matanyah wireimot, wecawad wa‘acica.
ecra 10:28	umibenei beiway; yehoHanan Hananyah cabay ‘atlay.
ecra 10:29	umibenei bani; meshulam malukh wa‘adayah, yashuw ushe’al yereimot weramot.
ecra 10:30	umibenei paHat mo’aw ‘adna ukhelal; benayah ma‘aseiyah matanyah wezal’eil, uwinui umenasheh.
ecra 10:31	uwenei Harim; ’eli‘ecer yishiyah malkiyah shema‘yah shim‘on. 
ecra 10:32	beneyamin malukh shemaryah.
ecra 10:33	mibenei Hashum; matenay matatah cawad ’elifeleT, yereimay menasheh shim‘i.
ecra 10:34	mibenei wani, ma‘aday ‘amram we’u’eil.
ecra 10:35	benayah weideyah kelahay keluhu. 
ecra 10:36	wanyah mereimot ’elyashiw. 
ecra 10:37	matanyah matenay weya‘aso weya‘asay. 
ecra 10:38	uwani uwinui shim‘i. 
ecra 10:39	weshelemyah wenatan wa‘adayah. 
ecra 10:40	makhnadway shashay sharay. 
ecra 10:41	‘acar’eil weshelemyahu shemaryah. 
ecra 10:42	shalum ’amaryah yoseif.
ecra 10:43	mibenei newo; ye‘i’eil matityah cawad cewina, yado yaday weyo’eil benayah. 
ecra 10:44	kal ’eileh nase’u nase’u nashim nakheriyot; weyeish meihem nashim, wayasimu banim.
nehemiah 1:1	diwrei neHemyah ben Hakhalyah; wayhi weHodesh kisleiw kisleiw shenat ‘esrim, wa’ani hayiti beshushan habirah. 
nehemiah 1:2	wayawo Hanani ’eHad mei’aHay hu wa’anashim mihudah; wa’esh’aleim ‘al hayehudim hapeleiTah ’asher nish’aru min hashewi we‘al yerushalim. 
nehemiah 1:3	wayomeru li hanish’arim ’asher nish’aru min hashewi sham bamedinah, bera‘ah gedolah uweHerpah; weHomat yerushalim meforazet, ushe‘areha nizetu wa’eish. 
nehemiah 1:4	wayhi keshame‘i ’et hadewarim ha’eileh, yashawti wa’ewkeh, wa’et’abelah yamim; wa’ehi zam umitpaleil, lifnei ’elohei hashamayim. 
nehemiah 1:5	wa’omar, ’ana yhoh ’elohei hashamayim, ha’eil hagadol wehanora; shomeir haberit waHesed, le’ohawaw uleshomerei mizwotaw. 
nehemiah 1:6	tehi na ’acenekha qashewet we‘einekha fetuwwHot lishmoa‘ ’el tefilat ‘awdekha ’asher ’anokhi mitpaleil lefanekha hayom yomam walaylah, ‘al benei yisra’eil ‘awadekha; umitwadeh, ‘al HaTot benei yisra’eil ’asher HaTanu lakh, wa’ani uweit ’awi HaTanu. 
nehemiah 1:7	Hawol Hawalnu lakh; welo shamarnu ’et hamizwot, we’et haHuqim we’et hamishpaTim, ’asher ziwwita ’et mosheh ‘awdekha. 
nehemiah 1:8	cekhar na ’et hadawar, ’asher ziwwita ’et mosheh ‘awdekha leimor; ’atem tim‘alu, ’ani ’afiz ’etkhem ba‘amim. 
nehemiah 1:9	weshawtem ’eilay, ushemartem mizwotay, wa‘asitem ’otam; ’im yihyeh nidaHakhem biqzeih hashamayim misham ’aqabezeim, wahawo’otim wahawi’otim ’el hamaqom, ’asher baHarti, leshakein ’et shemi sham. 
nehemiah 1:10	weheim ‘awadekha we‘amekha; ’asher padita bekhoHakha hagadol, uweyadekha haHacaqah. 
nehemiah 1:11	’ana ’adonay, tehi na ’acenekha qashewet ’el tefilat ‘awdekha we’el tefilat ‘awadekha, haHafeizim leyir’ah ’et shemekha, wehazliHah na le‘awdekha hayom, uteneihu leraHamim, lifnei ha’ish hacceh; wa’ani hayiti mashqeh lamelekh.
nehemiah 2:1	wayhi beHodesh nisan, shenat ‘esrim le’artaHshast hamelekh yayin lefanaw; wa’esa ’et hayayin wa’etenah lamelekh, welo hayiti ra‘ lefanaw. 
nehemiah 2:2	wayomer li hamelekh madua‘ panekha ra‘im, we’atah ’einekha Holeh, ’ein ceh, ki ’im roa‘ leiw; wa’ira harbeih me’od. 
nehemiah 2:3	wa’omar lamelekh, hamelekh le‘olam yiHyeh; madua‘ lo yeire‘u fanay, ’asher ha‘ir beit qiwrot ’awotay Hareiwah, ushe‘areha ’ukelu wa’eish.
nehemiah 2:4	wayomer li hamelekh, ‘al mah ceh ’atah mewaqeish; wa’etpaleil, ’el ’elohei hashamayim. 
nehemiah 2:5	wa’omar lamelekh, ’im ‘al hamelekh Tow, we’im yiTaw ‘awdekha lefanekha; ’asher tishlaHeini ’el yehudah, ’el ‘ir qiwrot ’awotay we’ewnenah. 
nehemiah 2:6	wayomer li hamelekh wehasheigal yoshewet ’ezlo, ‘ad matay yihyeh mahalakhakha umatay tashuw; wayiTaw lifnei hamelekh wayishlaHeini, wa’etenah lo ceman. 
nehemiah 2:7	wa’omar lamelekh ’im ‘al hamelekh Tow, ’igerot yitenu li, ‘al paHawot ‘eiwer hanahar; ’asher ya‘awiruni, ‘ad ’asher ’awo ’el yehudah. 
nehemiah 2:8	we’igeret ’el ’asaf shomeir hapardeis ’asher lamelekh, ’asher yiten li ‘eizim leqarot ’et sha‘arei habirah ’asher labayit uleHomat ha‘ir, welabayit ’asher ’awo ’eilaw; wayiten li hamelekh, keyad ’elohay haTowah ‘alay. 
nehemiah 2:9	wa’awo, ’el paHawot ‘eiwer hanahar, wa’etenah lahem, ’eit ’igerot hamelekh; wayishlaH ‘imi hamelekh, sarei Hayil ufarashim.
nehemiah 2:10	wayishma‘ sanwalaT haHoroni, weTowiyah ha‘ewed ha‘amoni, wayeira‘ lahem ra‘ah gedolah; ’asher ba ’adam, lewaqeish Towah liwnei yisra’eil. 
nehemiah 2:11	wa’awo ’el yerushalim; wa’ehi sham yamim sheloshah. 
nehemiah 2:12	wa’aqum laylah, ’ani wa’anashim me‘aT ‘imi welo higadti le’adam, mah, ’elohay notein ’el libi, la‘asot lirushalim; uweheimah ’ein ‘imi, ki ’im habeheimah, ’asher ’ani rokheiw bah. 
nehemiah 2:13	wa’eize’ah wesha‘ar hagay laylah, we’el penei ‘ein hatanin, we’el sha‘ar ha’ashpot; wa’ehi soweir beHomot yerushalim ’asher hamforwazim heim peruzim, ushe‘areha ’ukelu wa’eish. 
nehemiah 2:14	wa’e‘ewor ’el sha‘ar ha‘ayin, we’el bereikhat hamelekh; we’ein maqom labeheimah la‘awor taHtay. 
nehemiah 2:15	wa’ehi ‘oleh wanaHal laylah, wa’ehi soweir baHomah; wa’ashuw, wa’awo besha‘ar hagay wa’ashuw. 
nehemiah 2:16	wehasseganim, lo yade‘u ’anah halakhti, umah ’ani ‘oseh; welayehudim welakohanim welaHorim welasseganim, uleyeter ‘oseih hamelakhah, ‘ad kein lo higadti. 
nehemiah 2:17	wa’omar ’aleihem, ’atem ro’im hara‘ah ’asher ’anaHnu wah, ’asher yerushalim Hareiwah, ushe‘areha nizetu wa’eish; lekhu, weniwneh ’et Homat yerushalim, welo nihyeh ‘od Herpah. 
nehemiah 2:18	wa’agid lahem ’et yad ’elohay, ’asher hi Towah ‘alay, we’af diwrei hamelekh ’asher ’amar li; wayomeru naqum uwaninu, wayHaccequ yedeihem laTowah.
nehemiah 2:19	wayishma‘ sanwalaT haHoroni weTowiyah ha‘ewed ha‘amoni, wegeshem ha‘arwi, wayal‘igu lanu, wayiwcu ‘aleinu; wayomeru, mah hadawar hacceh ’asher ’atem ‘osim, ha‘al hamelekh ’atem moredim. 
nehemiah 2:20	wa’ashiw ’otam dawar, wa’omar lahem ’elohei hashamayim, hu yazliaH lanu, wa’anaHnu ‘awadaw naqum uwaninu; welakhem, ’ein Heileq uzedaqah wecikaron birushalim. 
nehemiah 3:1	wayaqam ’elyashiw hakohein hagadol we’eHaw hakohanim, wayiwnu ’et sha‘ar hazon, heimah qideshuhu, waya‘amidu daltotaw; we‘ad migdal hamei’ah qideshuhu, ‘ad migdal Hanan’eil.
nehemiah 3:2	we‘al yado wanu ’anshei yereiHo; s we‘al yado wanah, cakur ben ’imri.
nehemiah 3:3	we’eit sha‘ar hadagim, banu benei hassena’ah; heimah qeiruhu, waya‘amidu daltotaw, man‘ulaw uweriHaw.
nehemiah 3:4	we‘al yadam heHeciq, mereimot ben ’uriyah ben haqoz, s we‘al yadam heHeciq, meshulam ben berekhyah ben mesheicaw’eil; s we‘al yadam heHeciq, zadoq ben ba‘ana.
nehemiah 3:5	we‘al yadam heHeciqu hateqo‘im; we’adireihem lo heiwi’u zawwaram, ba‘awodat ’adoneihem.
nehemiah 3:6	we’eit sha‘ar hayshanah heHeciqu, yoyada‘ ben paseiaH, umeshulam ben besodyah; heimah qeiruhu, waya‘amidu daltotaw, uman‘ulaw uweriHaw.
nehemiah 3:7	we‘al yadam heHeciq melaTyah hagiw‘oni, weyadon hameironoti, ’anshei giw‘on wehamizpah; lekhissei paHat ‘eiwer hanahar.
nehemiah 3:8	‘al yado heHeciq, ‘ucci’eil ben Harhayah zorfim, s we‘al yado heHeciq, Hananyah ben haraqaHim; waya‘acwu yerushalim, ‘ad haHomah hareHawah.
nehemiah 3:9	we‘al yadam heHeciq refayah wen Hur, sar Hazi pelekh yerushalim.
nehemiah 3:10	we‘al yadam heHeciq yedayah wen Harumaf weneged beito; s we‘al yado heHeciq, HaTush ben Hashawneyah. 
nehemiah 3:11	midah sheinit, heHeciq malkiyah wen Harim, weHashuw ben paHat mo’aw; we’eit migdal hatanurim.
nehemiah 3:12	we‘al yado heHeciq, shalum ben haloHeish, sar Hazi pelekh yerushalim; hu uwenotaw.
nehemiah 3:13	’eit sha‘ar hagay heHeciq Hanun weyoshewei canoaH heimah wanuhu, waya‘amidu daltotaw, man‘ulaw uweriHaw; we’elef ’amah baHomah, ‘ad sha‘ar hashafot. 
nehemiah 3:14	we’eit sha‘ar ha’ashpot, heHeciq malkiyah wen reikhaw, sar pelekh beit hakarem; hu yiwnenu, weya‘amid daltotaw, man‘ulaw uweriHaw.
nehemiah 3:15	we’eit sha‘ar ha‘ayin heHeciq shalun ben kal Hoceh sar pelekh hamizpah hu yiwnenu wiTalenu, weya‘amidu weya‘amid daltotaw, man‘ulaw uweriHaw; we’eit Homat bereikhat hashelaH legan hamelekh, we‘ad hama‘alot, hayordot mei‘ir dawid.
nehemiah 3:16	’aHaraw heHeciq neHemyah wen ‘acbuq, sar Hazi pelekh beit zur; ‘ad neged qiwrei dawid, we‘ad habereikhah ha‘asuyah, we‘ad beit hagiborim.
nehemiah 3:17	’aHaraw heHeciqu halwiyim reHum ben bani; ‘al yado heHeciq, Hashawyah sar Hazi felekh qe‘ilah lefilko.
nehemiah 3:18	’aHaraw heHeciqu ’aHeihem, bawway ben Heinadad; sar Hazi pelekh qe‘ilah.
nehemiah 3:19	wayHacceiq ‘al yado ‘eicer ben yeishua‘ sar hamizpah midah sheinit; mineged ‘alot hanesheq hamiqzoa‘.
nehemiah 3:20	’aHaraw heHerah heHeciq barukh ben cabay cakay midah sheinit; min hamiqzoa‘, ‘ad petaH beit ’elyashiw, hakohein hagadol.
nehemiah 3:21	’aHaraw heHeciq, mereimot ben ’uriyah ben haqoz midah sheinit; mipetaH beit ’elyashiw, we‘ad takhlit beit ’elyashiw.
nehemiah 3:22	we’aHaraw heHeciqu hakohanim ’anshei hakikar. 
nehemiah 3:23	’aHaraw heHeciq binyamin weHashuw neged beitam; s ’aHaraw heHeciq, ‘acaryah wen ma‘aseiyah ben ‘ananeyah ’eizel beito.
nehemiah 3:24	’aHaraw heHeciq, binui ben Heinadad midah sheinit; mibeit ‘acaryah, ‘ad hamiqzoa‘ we‘ad hapinah. 
nehemiah 3:25	palal ben ’ucay mineged hamiqzoa‘ wehamigdal, hayozei mibeit hamelekh ha‘elyon, ’asher laHazar hamaTarah; ’aHaraw pedayah wen par‘osh.
nehemiah 3:26	wehanetinim, hayu yoshewim ba‘ofel; ‘ad neged sha‘ar hamayim lamicraH, wehamigdal hayozei.
nehemiah 3:27	’aHaraw heHeciqu hateqo‘im midah sheinit; mineged hamigdal hagadol hayozei, we‘ad Homat ha‘ofel. 
nehemiah 3:28	mei‘al sha‘ar hassusim, heHeciqu hakohanim, ’ish leneged beito.
nehemiah 3:29	’aHaraw heHeciq zadoq ben ’imeir neged beito; s we’aHaraw heHeciq shema‘yah wen shekhanyah, shomeir sha‘ar hamicraH.
nehemiah 3:30	’aHarei ’aHaraw heHeciq Hananyah wen shelemyah, weHanun ben zalaf hashishi midah sheini; s ’aHaraw heHeciq, meshulam ben berekhyah, neged nishkato.
nehemiah 3:31	’aHarei ’aHaraw heHeciq, malkiyah ben hazorefi, ‘ad beit hanetinim weharokhelim; neged sha‘ar hamifqad, we‘ad ‘aliyat hapinah. 
nehemiah 3:32	uwein ‘aliyat hapinah lesha‘ar hazon, heHeciqu hazorefim weharokhelim.
nehemiah 4:1	yehi ka’asher shama‘ sanwalaT, ki ’anaHnu wonim ’et haHomah, wayiHar lo, wayikh‘as harbeih; wayal‘eig ‘al hayehudim. 
nehemiah 4:2	wayomer lifnei ’eHaw, weHeil shomeron, wayomer mah hayehudim ha’ameilalim ‘osim; haya‘acwu lahem hayicbaHu haykhalu wayom, hayHayu ’et ha’awanim mei‘areimot he‘afar weheimah serufot. 
nehemiah 4:3	weTowiyah ha‘amoni ’ezlo; wayomer, gam ’asher heim bonim, ’im ya‘aleh shu‘al, ufaraz Homat ’awneihem.
nehemiah 4:4	shema‘ ’eloheinu ki hayinu wucah, wehasheiw Herpatam ’el rosham; uteneim lewiccah be’erez shiwyah. 
nehemiah 4:5	we’al tekhas ‘al ‘awonam, weHaTatam milefanekha ’al timaHeh; ki hikh‘isu leneged habonim. 
nehemiah 4:6	waniwneh ’et haHomah, watiqasheir kal haHomah ‘ad Hezyah; wayhi leiw la‘am la‘asot.
nehemiah 4:7	wayhi kha’asher shama‘ sanwalaT weTowiyah weha‘arwim weha‘amonim weha’ashdodim, ki ‘aletah ’arukhah leHomot yerushalim, ki heiHeilu haperuzim lehissateim; wayiHar lahem me’od. 
nehemiah 4:8	wayiqsheru khulam yaHdaw, lawo lehilaHeim birushalim; wela‘asot lo to‘ah. 
nehemiah 4:9	wanitpaleil ’el ’eloheinu; wana‘amid mishmar ‘aleihem yomam walaylah mipeneihem. 
nehemiah 4:10	wayomer yehudah, kashal koaH hassabal, wehe‘afar harbeih; wa’anaHnu lo nukhal, liwnot baHomah. 
nehemiah 4:11	wayomeru zareinu, lo yeide‘u welo yir’u, ‘ad ’asher nawo ’el tokham waharagnum; wehishbatnu ’et hamelakhah. 
nehemiah 4:12	wayhi ka’asher ba’u hayehudim, hayoshewim ’ezlam; wayomeru lanu ‘eser pe‘amim, mikal hameqomot ’asher tashuwu ‘aleinu. 
nehemiah 4:13	wa’a‘amid mitaHtiyot lamaqom mei’aHarei laHomah bazeHiHiyim bazeHiHim; wa’a‘amid ’et ha‘am lemishpaHot, ‘im Harwoteihem rameHeihem weqashetoteihem. 
nehemiah 4:14	wa’eire wa’aqum, wa’omar ’el haHorim we’el hasseganim we’el yeter ha‘am, ’al tire’u mipeneihem; ’et ’adonay hagadol wehanora cekhoru, wehilaHamu, ‘al ’aHeikhem beneikhem uwenoteikhem, nesheikhem uwateikhem.
nehemiah 4:15	wayhi ka’asher shame‘u ’oyweinu ki noda‘ lanu, wayafer ha’elohim ’et ‘azatam; wanashuw wanashaw kulanu ’el haHomah, ’ish ’el melakhto. 
nehemiah 4:16	wayhi min hayom hahu, Hazi ne‘aray ‘osim bamelakhah weHezyam, maHaciqim weharemaHim hamaginim, wehaqeshatot wehashiryonim; wehasarim, ’aHarei kal beit yehudah. 
nehemiah 4:17	habonim baHomah wehanose’im bassewel ‘omesim; be’aHat yado ‘oseh wamelakhah, we’aHat maHaceqet hashalaH. 
nehemiah 4:18	wehabonim, ’ish Harbo ’asurim ‘al matenaw uwonim; wehatoqeia‘ bashofar ’ezli. 
nehemiah 4:19	wa’omar ’el haHorim we’el hasseganim we’el yeter ha‘am, hamelakhah harbeih ureHawah; wa’anaHnu, nifradim ‘al haHomah, reHoqim ’ish mei’aHiw. 
nehemiah 4:20	bimqom, ’asher tishme‘u ’et qol hashofar, shamah tiqawezu ’eileinu; ’eloheinu yilaHem lanu. 
nehemiah 4:21	wa’anaHnu ‘osim bamelakhah; weHezyam, maHaciqim baremaHim, mei‘alot hashaHar, ‘ad zeit hakokhawim. 
nehemiah 4:22	gam ba‘eit hahi ’amarti la‘am, ’ish wena‘aro, yalinu betokh yerushalim; wehayu lanu halaylah mishmar wehayom melakhah. 
nehemiah 4:23	we’ein ’ani we’aHay une‘aray, we’anshei hamishmar ’asher ’aHaray, ’ein ’anaHnu fosheTim begadeinu; ’ish shilHo hamayim.
nehemiah 5:1	watehi za‘aqat ha‘am unesheihem gedolah; ’el ’aHeihem hayehudim. 
nehemiah 5:2	weyeish ’asher ’omerim, baneinu uwenoteinu ’anaHnu rabim; weniqHah dagan wenokhelah weniHyeh. 
nehemiah 5:3	weyeish ’asher ’omerim, sedoteinu ukherameinu uwateinu ’anaHnu ‘orewim; weniqHah dagan bara‘aw. 
nehemiah 5:4	weyeish ’asher ’omerim, lawinu khesef lemidat hamelekh; sedoteinu ukherameinu. 
nehemiah 5:5	we‘atah, kiwsar ’aHeinu besareinu, kiwneihem baneinu; wehineih ’anaHnu khoweshim ’et baneinu we’et benoteinu la‘awadim, weyeish mibenoteinu nikhbashot we’ein le’eil yadeinu, usedoteinu ukherameinu la’aHeirim. 
nehemiah 5:6	wayiHar li me’od; ka’asher shama‘ti ’et ca‘aqatam, we’eit hadewarim ha’eileh. 
nehemiah 5:7	wayimaleikh libi ‘alay, wa’ariwah ’et haHorim we’et hasseganim, wa’omerah lahem, masha ’ish be’aHiw ’atem noshim; wa’etein ‘aleihem qehilah gedolah. 
nehemiah 5:8	wa’omerah lahem, ’anaHnu qaninu ’et ’aHeinu hayehudim hanimkarim lagoyim kedei wanu, wegam ’atem timkeru ’et ’aHeikhem wenimkeru lanu; wayaHarishu, welo maze’u dawar.
nehemiah 5:9	wayomer wa’omar lo Tow hadawar ’asher ’atem ‘osim; halo beyir’at ’eloheinu teileikhu, meiHerpat hagoyim ’oyweinu. 
nehemiah 5:10	wegam ’ani ’aHay une‘aray, noshim bahem kesef wedagan; na‘acwah na ’et hamasha hacceh. 
nehemiah 5:11	hashiwu na lahem kehayom, sedoteihem karmeihem ceiteihem uwateihem; ume’at hakesef wehadagan hatirosh wehayizhar, ’asher ’atem noshim bahem. 
nehemiah 5:12	wayomeru nashiw, umeihem lo newaqeish, kein na‘aseh, ka’asher ’atah ’omeir; wa’eqra ’et hakohanim, wa’ashbi‘eim, la‘asot kadawar hacceh. 
nehemiah 5:13	gam Hazeni na‘arti, wa’omerah kakhah yena‘eir ha’elohim ’et kal ha’ish ’asher lo yaqim ’et hadawar hacceh, mibeito umigi‘o, wekhakhah yihyeh na‘ur wareiq; wayomeru khal haqahal ’amein, wayhalu ’et yhoh, waya‘as ha‘am kadawar hacceh. 
nehemiah 5:14	gam miyom ’asher ziwwah ’oti, lihyot peHam be’erez yehudah mishenat ‘esrim, we‘ad shenat sheloshim ushetayim le’artaHshast hamelekh, shanim sheteim ‘esreih; ’ani we’aHay, leHem hapeHah lo ’akhalti. 
nehemiah 5:15	wehapaHot harishonim ’asher lefanay hikhbidu ‘al ha‘am, wayiqHu meihem beleHem wayayin ’aHar kesef sheqalim ’arba‘im, gam na‘areihem shaleTu ‘al ha‘am; wa’ani lo ‘asiti khein, mipenei yir’at ’elohim. 
nehemiah 5:16	wegam bimlekhet haHomah haccot heHecaqti, wesadeh lo qaninu; wekhal ne‘aray, qewuzim sham ‘al hamelakhah. 
nehemiah 5:17	wehayehudim wehasseganim mei’ah waHamishim ’ish, wehaba’im ’eileinu min hagoyim ’asher sewiwoteinu ‘al shulHani. 
nehemiah 5:18	wa’asher hayah na‘aseh leyom ’eHad, shor ’eHad zon sheish berurot weziporim na‘asu li, uwein ‘aseret yamim bekhal yayin leharbeih; we‘im ceh, leHem hapeHah lo wiqashti, ki khawedah ha‘awodah ‘al ha‘am hacceh. 
nehemiah 5:19	cakherah li ’elohay leTowah; kol ’asher ‘asiti ‘al ha‘am hacceh.
nehemiah 6:1	wayhi kha’asher nishma‘ lesanwalaT weTowiyah ulegeshem ha‘arwi uleyeter ’oyeweinu, ki waniti ’et haHomah, welo notar bah parez; gam ‘ad ha‘eit hahi, delatot lo he‘emadti washe‘arim. 
nehemiah 6:2	wayishlaH sanwalaT wegeshem ’eilay leimor, lekhah weniwwa‘adah yaHdaw bakefirim bewiq‘at ’ono; weheimah Hoshewim, la‘asot li ra‘ah. 
nehemiah 6:3	wa’eshleHah ‘aleihem mal’akhim leimor, melakhah gedolah ’ani ‘oseh, welo ’ukhal laredet; lamah tishbat hamelakhah ka’asher ’arpeha, weyaradti ’aleikhem. 
nehemiah 6:4	wayishleHu ’eilay kadawar hacceh ’arba‘ pe‘amim; wa’ashiw ’otam kadawar hacceh.
nehemiah 6:5	wayishlaH ’eilay sanwalaT kadawar hacceh pa‘am Hamishit ’et na‘aro; we’igeret petuHah beyado. 
nehemiah 6:6	katuw bah, bagoyim nishma‘ wegashmu ’omeir, ’atah wehayehudim Hoshewim limrod, ‘al kein ’atah woneh haHomah; we’atah, hoeh lahem lemelekh, kadewarim ha’eileh. 
nehemiah 6:7	wegam newi’im he‘emadta liqro ‘alekha wirushalim leimor, melekh bihudah, we‘atah yishama‘ lamelekh, kadewarim ha’eileh; we‘atah lekhah, weniwwa‘azah yaHdaw.
nehemiah 6:8	wa’eshleHah ’eilaw leimor, lo nihyah kadewarim ha’eileh, ’asher ’atah ’omeir; ki milibekha ’atah wodam 
nehemiah 6:9	ki khulam, meyare’im ’otanu leimor, yirpu yedeihem min hamelakhah welo tei‘aseh; we‘atah Hacceiq ’et yaday. 
nehemiah 6:10	wa’ani wati, beit shema‘yah wen delayah ben meheiTaw’eil wehu ‘azur; wayomer niwwa‘eid ’el beit ha’elohim ’el tokh haheikhal, wenisgerah daltot haheikhal, ki ba’im leharegekha, welaylah ba’im leharegekha. 
nehemiah 6:11	wa’omerah, ha’ish kamoni yiwraH, umi khamoni ’asher yawo ’el haheikhal waHay; lo ’awo. 
nehemiah 6:12	wa’akirah wehineih lo ’elohim shelaHo; ki hanewu’ah diber ‘alay, weTowiyah wesanwalaT sekharo. 
nehemiah 6:13	lema‘an sakhur hu, lema‘an ’ira we’e‘eseh kein weHaTati; wehayah lahem lesheim ra‘, lema‘an yeHarefuni.
nehemiah 6:14	cakherah ’elohay leTowiyah ulesanwalaT kema‘asaw ’eileh; wegam leno‘adyah hanewi’ah uleyeter hanewi’im, ’asher hayu meyare’im ’oti. 
nehemiah 6:15	watishlam haHomah, be‘esrim waHamishah le’elul; laHamishim ushenayim yom.
nehemiah 6:16	wayhi, ka’asher shame‘u kal ’oyweinu, wayir’u, kal hagoyim ’asher sewiwoteinu, wayipelu me’od be‘eineihem; wayeide‘u, ki mei’eit ’eloheinu, ne‘estah hamelakhah haccot. 
nehemiah 6:17	gam bayamim haheim, marbim Horei yehudah ’igeroteihem, holkhot ‘al Towiyah; wa’asher leTowiyah ba’ot ’aleihem. 
nehemiah 6:18	ki rabim bihudah, ba‘alei shewu‘ah lo, ki Hatan hu lishkhanyah wen ’araH; wihoHanan beno, laqaH ’et bat meshulam ben berekhyah. 
nehemiah 6:19	gam Towotaw, hayu ’omerim lefanay, udewaray hayu mozi’im lo; ’igerot shalaH Towiyah leyare’eini. 
nehemiah 7:1	wayhi, ka’asher niwnetah haHomah, wa’a‘amid hadelatot; wayipaqedu hasho‘arim wehamshorerim wehalwiyim. 
nehemiah 7:2	wa’azawweh ’et Hanani ’aHi, we’et Hananyah sar habirah ‘al yerushalim; ki hu ke’ish ’emet, weyarei ’et ha’elohim meirabim. 
nehemiah 7:3	wayomer wa’omar lahem, lo yipateHu sha‘arei yerushalim ‘ad Hom hashemesh, we‘ad heim ‘omedim yagifu hadelatot we’eHocu; weha‘ameid, mishmerot yoshewei yerushalim, ’ish bemishmaro, we’ish neged beito. 
nehemiah 7:4	weha‘ir raHawat yadayim ugedolah, weha‘am me‘aT betokhah; we’ein batim benuyim. 
nehemiah 7:5	wayitein ’elohay ’el libi, wa’eqbezah ’et haHorim we’et hasseganim we’et ha‘am lehityaHeis; wa’emza, seifer hayaHas ha‘olim barishonah, wa’emza katuw bo.
nehemiah 7:6	’eileh benei hamedinah, ha‘olim mishewi hagolah, ’asher heglah, newukhadnezar melekh bawel; wayashuwu lirushalim welihudah ’ish le‘iro. 
nehemiah 7:7	haba’im ‘im cerubawel, yeishua‘ neHemyah ‘acaryah ra‘amyah naHamani maredokhay bilshan misperet bigway neHum ba‘anah; mispar ’anshei ‘am yisra’eil.
nehemiah 7:8	benei far‘osh, ’alpayim mei’ah weshiw‘im ushenayim.
nehemiah 7:9	benei shefaTyah, shelosh mei’ot shiw‘im ushenayim.
nehemiah 7:10	benei ’araH, sheish mei’ot Hamishim ushenayim.
nehemiah 7:11	benei faHat mo’aw liwnei yeishua‘ weyo’aw; ’alpayim ushemoneh mei’ot shemonah ‘asar.
nehemiah 7:12	benei ‘eilam, ’elef matayim Hamishim we’arba‘ah.
nehemiah 7:13	benei catu, shemoneh mei’ot ’arba‘im waHamishah.
nehemiah 7:14	benei cakay, shewa‘ mei’ot weshishim.
nehemiah 7:15	benei winui, sheish mei’ot ’arba‘im ushemonah.
nehemiah 7:16	benei weiway, sheish mei’ot ‘esrim ushemonah.
nehemiah 7:17	benei ‘acgad, ’alpayim shelosh mei’ot ‘esrim ushenayim.
nehemiah 7:18	benei ’adoniqam, sheish mei’ot shishim weshiw‘ah.
nehemiah 7:19	benei wigway, ’alpayim shishim weshiw‘ah.
nehemiah 7:20	benei ‘adin, sheish mei’ot Hamishim waHamishah.
nehemiah 7:21	benei ’aTeir leHicqiyah tish‘im ushemonah.
nehemiah 7:22	benei Hashum, shelosh mei’ot ‘esrim ushemonah.
nehemiah 7:23	benei weizay, shelosh mei’ot ‘esrim we’arba‘ah.
nehemiah 7:24	benei Harif, mei’ah sheneim ‘asar.
nehemiah 7:25	benei giw‘on tish‘im waHamishah.
nehemiah 7:26	’anshei weit leHem uneTofah, mei’ah shemonim ushemonah.
nehemiah 7:27	’anshei ‘anatot, mei’ah ‘esrim ushemonah.
nehemiah 7:28	’anshei weit ‘acmawet ’arba‘im ushenayim.
nehemiah 7:29	’anshei qiryat ye‘arim kefirah uwe’eirot, shewa‘ mei’ot ’arba‘im usheloshah.
nehemiah 7:30	’anshei haramah wagawa‘, sheish mei’ot ‘esrim we’eHad.
nehemiah 7:31	’anshei mikhmas, mei’ah we‘esrim ushenayim.
nehemiah 7:32	’anshei weit ’eil weha‘ay, mei’ah ‘esrim usheloshah.
nehemiah 7:33	’anshei newo ’aHeir Hamishim ushenayim.
nehemiah 7:34	benei ‘eilam ’aHeir, ’elef matayim Hamishim we’arba‘ah.
nehemiah 7:35	benei Harim, shelosh mei’ot we‘esrim.
nehemiah 7:36	benei yereiHo, shelosh mei’ot ’arba‘im waHamishah.
nehemiah 7:37	benei lod Hadid we’ono, shewa‘ mei’ot we‘esrim we’eHad.
nehemiah 7:38	benei sena’ah, sheloshet ’alafim, tesha‘ mei’ot usheloshim.
nehemiah 7:39	hakohanim; benei yeda‘yah leweit yeishua‘, tesha‘ mei’ot shiw‘im usheloshah.
nehemiah 7:40	benei ’imeir, ’elef Hamishim ushenayim.
nehemiah 7:41	benei fashHur, ’elef matayim ’arba‘im weshiw‘ah.
nehemiah 7:42	benei Harim, ’elef shiw‘ah ‘asar.
nehemiah 7:43	halwiyim; benei yeishua‘ leqadmi’eil liwnei lehodwah shiw‘im we’arba‘ah.
nehemiah 7:44	hamshorerim; benei ’asaf, mei’ah ’arba‘im ushemonah.
nehemiah 7:45	hasho‘arim, benei shalum benei ’aTeir benei Talmon benei ‘aquw, benei HaTiTa benei showay; mei’ah sheloshim ushemonah.
nehemiah 7:46	hanetinim; benei ziHa wenei Hasufa benei Taba‘ot. 
nehemiah 7:47	benei qeiros benei si‘a benei fadon. 
nehemiah 7:48	benei lewanah wenei Hagawah benei shalmay. 
nehemiah 7:49	benei Hanan benei gideil benei gaHar. 
nehemiah 7:50	benei re’ayah wenei rezin benei neqoda. 
nehemiah 7:51	benei gaccam benei ‘ucca benei faseiaH. 
nehemiah 7:52	benei weisay benei me‘unim benei nefushesim nefishesim. 
nehemiah 7:53	benei waqbuq benei Haqufa benei HarHur. 
nehemiah 7:54	benei wazlit benei meHida benei Harsha. 
nehemiah 7:55	benei warqos benei sisera benei tamaH. 
nehemiah 7:56	benei neziaH benei HaTifa. 
nehemiah 7:57	benei ‘awdei shelomoh; benei soTay benei soferet benei ferida. 
nehemiah 7:58	benei ya‘la wenei darqon benei gideil. 
nehemiah 7:59	benei shefaTyah wenei HaTil, benei pokheret hazewayim benei ’amon. 
nehemiah 7:60	kal hanetinim, uwenei ‘awdei shelomoh; shelosh mei’ot tish‘im ushenayim.
nehemiah 7:61	we’eileh, ha‘olim miteil melaH teil Harsha, keruw ’adon we’imeir; welo yakhelu, lehagid beit ’awotam wecar‘am, ’im miyisra’eil heim. 
nehemiah 7:62	benei delayah wenei Towiyah benei neqoda; sheish mei’ot we’arba‘im ushenayim.
nehemiah 7:63	umin hakohanim, benei Howayah benei haqoz; benei warcilay, ’asher laqaH mibenot barcilay hagil‘adi ’ishah, wayiqarei ‘al shemam. 
nehemiah 7:64	’eileh, biqshu khetawam hamityaHsim welo nimza; waygo’alu min hakehunah. 
nehemiah 7:65	wayomer hatirshata lahem, ’asher lo yokhelu miqodesh haqodashim; ‘ad ‘amod hakohein le’urim wetumim. 
nehemiah 7:66	kal haqahal ke’eHad; ’arba‘ ribo, ’alpayim shelosh mei’ot weshishim. 
nehemiah 7:67	milewad ‘awdeihem we’amhoteihem ’eileh, shiw‘at ’alafim, shelosh mei’ot sheloshim weshiw‘ah; welahem, meshorarim umeshorarot, matayim we’arba‘im waHamishah. 
nehemiah 7:68
nehemiah 7:69	gemalim ’arba‘ mei’ot sheloshim waHamishah; s Hamorim sheishet ’alafim, shewa‘ mei’ot we‘esrim. 
nehemiah 7:70	umiqzat rashei ha’awot, natenu lamelakhah; hatirshata natan la’ozar, cahaw darkemonim ’elef micraqot Hamishim, katenot kohanim, sheloshim waHameish mei’ot. 
nehemiah 7:71	umeirashei ha’awot, natenu le’ozar hamelakhah, cahaw darkemonim shetei ribot; wekhesef manim ’alpayim umatayim. 
nehemiah 7:72	wa’asher natenu she’eirit ha‘am cahaw, darkemonim shetei ribo, wekhesef manim ’alpayim; wekhatenot kohanim shishim weshiw‘ah.
nehemiah 7:73	wayeishewu hakohanim wehalwiyim wehasho‘arim wehamshorerim umin ha‘am wehanetinim wekhal yisra’eil be‘areihem; wayiga‘ haHodesh hashewi‘i, uwenei yisra’eil be‘areihem. 
nehemiah 8:1	wayei’asefu khal ha‘am ke’ish ’eHad, ’el hareHow, ’asher lifnei sha‘ar hamayim; wayomeru le‘ecra hassofeir, lehawi, ’et seifer torat mosheh, ’asher ziwwah yhoh ’et yisra’eil. 
nehemiah 8:2	wayawi ‘ecra hakohein ’et hatorah lifnei haqahal mei’ish we‘ad ’ishah, wekhol meiwin lishmoa‘; beyom ’eHad laHodesh hashewi‘i. 
nehemiah 8:3	wayiqra wo lifnei hareHow ’asher lifnei sha‘ar hamayim, min ha’or ‘ad maHazit hayom, neged ha’anashim wehanashim wehamewinim; we’acenei khal ha‘am ’el seifer hatorah. 
nehemiah 8:4	waya‘amod ‘ecra hassofeir, ‘al migdal ‘eiz ’asher ‘asu ladawar waya‘amod ’ezlo matityah weshema‘ wa‘anayah we’uriyah weHilqiyah uma‘aseiyah ‘al yemino; umisemolo, pedayah umisha’eil umalkiyah weHashum weHashbadanah cekharyah meshulam.
nehemiah 8:5	wayiftaH ‘ecra hasseifer le‘einei khal ha‘am, ki mei‘al kal ha‘am hayah; ukhefitHo ‘amedu khal ha‘am. 
nehemiah 8:6	waywarekh ‘ecra, ’et yhoh ha’elohim hagadol; waya‘anu khal ha‘am ’amein ’amein bemo‘al yedeihem, wayiqedu wayishtaHawu yhoh ’apayim ’arezah. 
nehemiah 8:7	weyeishua‘ uwani wesheireiweyah yamin ‘aquw shabetay hodiyah ma‘aseiyah qeliTa ‘acaryah yocawad Hanan pelayah wehalwiyim, mewinim ’et ha‘am latorah; weha‘am ‘al ‘amedam. 
nehemiah 8:8	wayiqre’u wasseifer betorat ha’elohim meforash; wesom sekhel, wayawinu bamiqra.
nehemiah 8:9	wayomer neHemyah hu hatirshata we‘ecra hakohein hassofeir wehalwiyim hamewinim ’et ha‘am lekhal ha‘am, hayom qadosh hu yhoh ’eloheikhem, ’al tit’abelu we’al tiwku; ki wokhim kal ha‘am, keshame‘am ’et diwrei hatorah. 
nehemiah 8:10	wayomer lahem lekhu ’ikhlu mashmanim ushetu mamtaqim, weshilHu manot le’ein nakhon lo, ki qadosh hayom la’adoneinu; we’al tei‘azeiwu, ki Hedwat yhoh hi ma‘uccekhem. 
nehemiah 8:11	wehalwiyim maHshim lekhal ha‘am leimor hassu, ki hayom qadosh; we’al tei‘azeiwu. 
nehemiah 8:12	wayeilekhu khal ha‘am le’ekhol welishtot uleshalaH manot, wela‘asot simHah gedolah; ki heiwinu badewarim, ’asher hodi‘u lahem.
nehemiah 8:13	uwayom hasheini ne’esfu rashei ha’awot lekhal ha‘am, hakohanim wehalwiyim, ’el ‘ecra hassofeir; ulehaskil ’el diwrei hatorah. 
nehemiah 8:14	wayimze’u katuw batorah; ’asher ziwwah yhoh beyad mosheh, ’asher yeishewu wenei yisra’eil bassukot beHag baHodesh hashewi‘i. 
nehemiah 8:15	wa’asher yashmi‘u, weya‘awiru qol bekhal ‘areihem uwirushalim leimor ze’u hahar, wehawi’u ‘alei cayit wa‘alei ‘eiz shemen, wa‘alei hadas wa‘alei temarim, wa‘alei ‘eiz ‘awot; la‘asot sukot kakatuw.
nehemiah 8:16	wayeize’u ha‘am wayawi’u waya‘asu lahem sukot ’ish ‘al gago uweHazroteihem, uweHazrot beit ha’elohim; uwirHow sha‘ar hamayim, uwirHow sha‘ar ’efrayim. 
nehemiah 8:17	waya‘asu khal haqahal hashawim min hashewi sukot wayeishewu wassukot ki lo ‘asu mimei yeishua‘ bin nun kein benei yisra’eil, ‘ad hayom hahu; watehi simHah gedolah me’od. 
nehemiah 8:18	wayiqra beseifer torat ha’elohim yom beyom, min hayom harishon, ‘ad hayom ha’aHaron; waya‘asu Hag shiw‘at yamim, uwayom hashemini ‘azeret kamishpaT.
nehemiah 9:1	uweyom ‘esrim we’arba‘ah laHodesh hacceh, ne’esfu wenei yisra’eil bezom uwesaqim, wa’adamah ‘aleihem. 
nehemiah 9:2	wayibadelu cera‘ yisra’eil, mikol benei neikhar; waya‘amdu, wayitwadu ‘al HaToteihem, wa‘awonot ’awoteihem. 
nehemiah 9:3	wayaqumu ‘al ‘amedam, wayiqre’u, beseifer torat yhoh ’eloheihem rewi‘it hayom; urewi‘it mitwadim umishtaHawim, yhoh ’eloheihem.
nehemiah 9:4	wayaqam ‘al ma‘aleih halwiyim, yeishua‘ uwani qadmi’eil shewanyah buni sheireiweyah bani khenani; wayic‘aqu beqol gadol, ’el yhoh ’eloheihem. 
nehemiah 9:5	wayomeru halwiyim yeishua‘ weqadmi’eil bani Hashawneyah sheireiweyah hodiyah shewanyah fetaHyah, qumu, barakhu ’et yhoh ’eloheikhem, min ha‘olam ‘ad ha‘olam; wiwarekhu sheim kewodekha, umeromam ‘al kal berakhah utehilah. 
nehemiah 9:6	’atah hu yhoh lewadekha ’at ’atah ‘asita ’et hashamayim shemei hashamayim wekhal zewa’am, ha’arez wekhal ’asher ‘aleha hayamim wekhal ’asher bahem, we’atah meHayeh ’et kulam; uzewa hashamayim lekha mishtaHawim. 
nehemiah 9:7	’atah hu yhoh ha’elohim, ’asher baHarta be’awram, wehozeito mei’ur kasdim; wesamta shemo ’awraham. 
nehemiah 9:8	umazata ’et lewawo ne’eman lefanekha wekharot ‘imo haberit, lateit ’et ’erez hakena‘ani haHiti ha’emori wehapericci wehaywusi wehagirgashi lateit lecar‘o; wataqem ’et dewarekha, ki zadiq ’atah. 
nehemiah 9:9	wateire ’et ‘oni ’awoteinu bemizrayim; we’et ca‘aqatam shama‘ta ‘al yam suf. 
nehemiah 9:10	watitein ’otot umofetim befar‘oh uwekhal ‘awadaw uwekhal ‘am ’arzo, ki yada‘ta, ki heicidu ‘aleihem; wata‘as lekha sheim kehayom hacceh. 
nehemiah 9:11	wehayam baqa‘ta lifneihem, waya‘awru wetokh hayam bayabashah; we’et rodefeihem hishlakhta wimzolot kemo ’ewen bemayim ‘accim. 
nehemiah 9:12	uwe‘amud ‘anan, hinHitam yomam; uwe‘amud ’eish laylah, leha’ir lahem, ’et haderekh ’asher yeilekhu wah. 
nehemiah 9:13	we‘al har sinay yaradta, wedabeir ‘imahem mishamayim; watitein lahem mishpaTim yesharim wetorot ’emet, Huqim umizwot Towim. 
nehemiah 9:14	we’et shabat qadshekha hoda‘ata lahem; umizwot weHuqim wetorah, ziwwita lahem, beyad mosheh ‘awdekha. 
nehemiah 9:15	weleHem mishamayim natatah lahem lir‘awam, umayim, missela‘ hozeita lahem lizma’am; watomer lahem, lawo lareshet ’et ha’arez, ’asher nasata ’et yadekha lateit lahem. 
nehemiah 9:16	weheim wa’awoteinu heicidu; wayaqshu ’et ‘arepam, welo shame‘u ’el mizwotekha. 
nehemiah 9:17	wayma’anu lishmoa‘, welo cakheru nifle’otekha ’asher ‘asita ‘imahem, wayaqshu ’et ‘arepam, wayitenu rosh lashuw le‘awdutam bemiryam; we’atah ’eloah seliHot Hanun weraHum ’erekh ’apayim weraw weHesed Hesed welo ‘acawtam. 
nehemiah 9:18	’af, ki ‘asu lahem ‘eigel masseikhah, wayomeru, ceh ’elohekha, ’asher he‘elkha mimizrayim; waya‘asu, ne’azot gedolot. 
nehemiah 9:19	we’atah beraHamekha harabim, lo ‘acawtam bamidbar; ’et ‘amud he‘anan lo sar mei‘aleihem beyomam lehanHotam behaderekh, we’et ‘amud ha’eish belaylah leha’ir lahem, we’et haderekh ’asher yeilekhu wah. 
nehemiah 9:20	weruHakha haTowah, natata lehaskilam; umankha lo mana‘ta mipihem, umayim natatah lahem lizma’am. 
nehemiah 9:21	we’arba‘im shanah kilkaltam bamidbar lo Haseiru; salmoteihem lo walu, weragleihem lo wazeiqu. 
nehemiah 9:22	watitein lahem mamlakhot wa‘amamim, wataHleqeim lefei’ah; wayireshu ’et ’erez siHon, we’et ’erez melekh Heshbon, we’et ’erez ‘og melekh habashan. 
nehemiah 9:23	uweneihem hirbita, kekhokhewei hashamayim; watewi’eim ’el ha’arez, ’asher ’amarta la’awoteihem lawo larashet. 
nehemiah 9:24	wayawo’u habanim wayireshu ’et ha’arez, watakhna‘ lifneihem ’et yoshewei ha’arez hakena‘anim, watiteneim beyadam; we’et malkheihem we’et ‘amei ha’arez, la‘asot bahem kirzonam. 
nehemiah 9:25	wayilkedu ‘arim bezurot wa’adamah shemeinah wayireshu batim melei’im kal Tuw borot Hazuwim keramim weceitim we‘eiz ma’akhal larow; wayokhelu wayisbe‘u wayashminu, wayit‘adenu beTuwekha hagadol. 
nehemiah 9:26	wayamru wayimredu bakh, wayashlikhu ’et toratekha ’aHarei gawwam, we’et newi’ekha haragu, ’asher hei‘idu wam lahashiwam ’eilekha; waya‘asu, ne’azot gedolot. 
nehemiah 9:27	watiteneim beyad zareihem, wayazeiru lahem; uwe‘eit zaratam yiz‘aqu ’eilekha, we’atah mishamayim tishma‘, ukheraHamekha harabim, titein lahem moshi‘im, weyoshi‘um miyad zareihem. 
nehemiah 9:28	ukhenoaH lahem, yashuwu la‘asot ra‘ lefanekha; wata‘acweim beyad ’oyeweihem wayirdu wahem, wayashuwu wayic‘aqukha, we’atah mishamayim tishma‘ wetazileim keraHamekha rabot ‘itim. 
nehemiah 9:29	wata‘ad bahem lahashiwam ’el toratekha, weheimah heicidu welo shame‘u lemizwotekha uwemishpaTekha HaTe’u wam, ’asher ya‘aseh ’adam weHayah wahem; wayitenu khateif soreret, we‘arepam hiqshu welo shamei‘u. 
nehemiah 9:30	watimshokh ‘aleihem shanim rabot, wata‘ad bam beruHakha beyad newi’ekha welo he’ecinu; watiteneim, beyad ‘amei ha’arazot. 
nehemiah 9:31	uweraHamekha harabim lo ‘asitam kalah welo ‘acawtam; ki ’eil Hanun weraHum ’atah. 
nehemiah 9:32	we‘atah ’eloheinu ha’eil hagadol hagibor wehanora shomeir haberit wehaHesed ’al yim‘aT lefanekha ’eit kal hatela’ah ’asher meza’atnu limlakheinu lesareinu ulekhohaneinu welinwi’einu wela’awoteinu ulekhal ‘amekha; mimei malkhei ’ashur, ‘ad hayom hacceh. 
nehemiah 9:33	we’atah zadiq, ‘al kal haba ‘aleinu; ki ’emet ‘asita wa’anaHnu hirsha‘enu. 
nehemiah 9:34	we’et melakheinu sareinu kohaneinu wa’awoteinu, lo ‘asu toratekha; welo hiqshiwu ’el mizwotekha, ule‘eidewotekha, ’asher ha‘idota bahem. 
nehemiah 9:35	weheim bemalkhutam uweTuwekha haraw ’asher natata lahem, uwe’erez hareHawah wehashemeinah ’asher natata lifneihem lo ‘awadukha; welo shawu, mima‘aleihem hara‘im. 
nehemiah 9:36	hineih ’anaHnu hayom ‘awadim; weha’arez ’asher natatah la’awoteinu, le’ekhol ’et piryah we’et Tuwah, hineih ’anaHnu ‘awadim ‘aleha. 
nehemiah 9:37	utewu’atah marbah, lamelakhim ’asher natatah ‘aleinu beHaToteinu; we‘al gewiyoteinu moshelim uwiwhemteinu kirzonam, uwezarah gedolah ’anaHenu.
nehemiah 9:38	uwekhal cot ’anaHnu koretim ’amanah wekhotewim; we‘al heHatum, sareinu lewiyeinu kohaneinu. 
nehemiah 10:1	we‘al haHatumim; neHemyah hatirshata ben Hakhalyah wezidqiyah. 
nehemiah 10:2	serayah ‘acaryah yirmeyah. 
nehemiah 10:3	pashHur ’amaryah malkiyah. 
nehemiah 10:4	HaTush shewanyah malukh. 
nehemiah 10:5	Harim mereimot ‘owadyah. 
nehemiah 10:6	daniyeil gineton barukh. 
nehemiah 10:7	meshulam ’awiyah miyamin. 
nehemiah 10:8	ma‘acyah wilgay shema‘yah; ’eileh hakohanim.
nehemiah 10:9	wehalwiyim; weyeishua‘ ben ’acanyah, binui mibenei Heinadad qadmi’eil. 
nehemiah 10:10	wa’aHeihem; shewanyah hodiyah qeliTa pelayah Hanan. 
nehemiah 10:11	mikha reHow Hashawyah. 
nehemiah 10:12	cakur sheireiweyah shewanyah. 
nehemiah 10:13	hodiyah wani beninu.
nehemiah 10:14	rashei ha‘am; par‘osh paHat mo’aw, ‘eilam catu bani. 
nehemiah 10:15	buni ‘acgad beiway. 
nehemiah 10:16	’adoniyah wigway ‘adin. 
nehemiah 10:17	’aTeir Hicqiyah ‘accur. 
nehemiah 10:18	hodiyah Hashum beizay. 
nehemiah 10:19	Harif ‘anatot noway neiway. 
nehemiah 10:20	magpi‘ash meshulam Heicir. 
nehemiah 10:21	mesheicaw’eil zadoq yadua‘. 
nehemiah 10:22	pelaTyah Hanan ‘anayah. 
nehemiah 10:23	hosheia‘ Hananyah Hashuw. 
nehemiah 10:24	haloHeish pilHa showeiq. 
nehemiah 10:25	reHum Hashawnah ma‘aseiyah. 
nehemiah 10:26	wa’aHiyah Hanan ‘anan. 
nehemiah 10:27	malukh Harim ba‘anah. 
nehemiah 10:28	ushe’ar ha‘am hakohanim halwiyim hasho‘arim hamshorerim hanetinim, wekhal haniwdal mei‘amei ha’arazot ’el torat ha’elohim, nesheihem beneihem uwenoteihem; kol yodeia‘ meiwin. 
nehemiah 10:29	maHaciqim ‘al ’aHeihem ’adireihem uwa’im be’alah uwishwu‘ah, lalekhet betorat ha’elohim, ’asher nitenah, beyad mosheh ‘ewed ha’elohim; welishmor wela‘asot, ’et kal mizwot yhoh ’adoneinu, umishpaTaw weHuqaw. 
nehemiah 10:30	wa’asher lo nitein benoteinu le‘amei ha’arez; we’et benoteihem, lo niqaH lewaneinu. 
nehemiah 10:31	we‘amei ha’arez hamwi’im ’et hamaqaHot wekhal shewer beyom hashabat limkor, lo niqaH meihem bashabat uweyom qodesh; weniTosh ’et hashanah hashewi‘it umasha khal yad. 
nehemiah 10:32	wehe‘emadnu ‘aleinu mizwot, lateit ‘aleinu shelishit hasheqel bashanah; la‘awodat beit ’eloheinu. 
nehemiah 10:33	leleHem hama‘arekhet uminHat hatamid ule‘olat hatamid hashabatot heHodashim lamo‘adim, welaqodashim welaHaTa’ot, lekhapeir ‘al yisra’eil; wekhol melekhet beit ’eloheinu.
nehemiah 10:34	wehagoralot hipalnu ‘al qurban ha‘eizim, hakohanim halwiyim weha‘am lehawi leweit ’eloheinu leweit ’awoteinu le‘itim mecumanim shanah weshanah; lewa‘eir, ‘al micbaH yhoh ’eloheinu, kakatuw batorah. 
nehemiah 10:35	ulehawi ’et bikurei ’admateinu, uwikurei kal peri khal ‘eiz shanah weshanah; leweit yhoh. 
nehemiah 10:36	we’et bekhorot baneinu uwehemteinu, kakatuw batorah; we’et bekhorei weqareinu wezoneinu, lehawi leweit ’eloheinu, lakohanim, hamsharetim beweit ’eloheinu. 
nehemiah 10:37	we’et reishit ‘arisoteinu uterumoteinu uferi khal ‘eiz tirosh weyizhar, nawi lakohanim ’el lishkhot beit ’eloheinu, uma‘sar ’admateinu lalwiyim; weheim halwiyim, ham‘aserim, bekhol ‘arei ‘awodateinu. 
nehemiah 10:38	wehayah hakohein ben ’aharon ‘im halwiyim ba‘seir halwiyim; wehalwiyim ya‘alu ’et ma‘asar hama‘aseir leweit ’eloheinu, ’el haleshakhot leweit ha’ozar. 
nehemiah 10:39	ki ’el haleshakhot yawi’u wenei yisra’eil uwenei haleiwi, ’et terumat hadagan hatirosh wehayizhar wesham kelei hamiqdash, wehakohanim hamsharetim, wehasho‘arim wehamshorerim; welo na‘acow ’et beit ’eloheinu. 
nehemiah 11:1	wayeishewu sarei ha‘am birushalim; ushe’ar ha‘am hipilu goralot lehawi ’eHad min ha‘asarah, lashewet birushalim ‘ir haqodesh, weteisha‘ hayadot be‘arim. 
nehemiah 11:2	waywarakhu ha‘am; lekhol ha’anashim, hamitnadewim, lashewet birushalim.
nehemiah 11:3	we’eileh rashei hamedinah, ’asher yashewu birushalim; uwe‘arei yehudah, yashewu ’ish ba’aHuccato be‘areihem, yisra’eil hakohanim wehalwiyim wehanetinim, uwenei ‘awdei shelomoh. 
nehemiah 11:4	uwirushalim yashewu, mibenei yehudah umibenei winyamin; mibenei yehudah ‘atayah wen ‘ucciyah ben cekharyah wen ’amaryah ben shefaTyah wen mahalal’eil mibenei farez. 
nehemiah 11:5	uma‘aseiyah wen barukh ben kal Hoceh ben Hacayah wen ‘adayah wen yoyariw ben cekharyah ben hashiloni 
nehemiah 11:6	kal benei ferez hayoshewim birushalim; ’arba‘ mei’ot shishim ushemonah ’anshei Hayil.
nehemiah 11:7	we’eileh benei winyamin; salu ben meshulam ben yo‘eid ben pedayah wen qolayah wen ma‘aseiyah ben ’iti’eil ben yesha‘yah. 
nehemiah 11:8	we’aHaraw gabay salay; tesha‘ mei’ot ‘esrim ushemonah. 
nehemiah 11:9	weyo’eil ben cikhri paqid ‘aleihem; wihudah wen hassenu’ah ‘al ha‘ir mishneh.
nehemiah 11:10	min hakohanim; yeda‘yah wen yoyariw yakhin. 
nehemiah 11:11	serayah wen Hilqiyah ben meshulam ben zadoq, ben merayot ben ’aHiTuw, negid beit ha’elohim. 
nehemiah 11:12	wa’aHeihem, ‘osei hamelakhah labayit, shemoneh mei’ot ‘esrim ushenayim; wa‘adayah ben yeroHam ben pelalyah ben ’amzi wen cekharyah, ben pashHur ben malkiyah. 
nehemiah 11:13	we’eHaw rashim le’awot, matayim ’arba‘im ushenayim; wa‘amashsay ben ‘acar’eil ben ’aHcay ben meshileimot ben ’imeir. 
nehemiah 11:14	wa’aHeihem giborei Hayil, mei’ah ‘esrim ushemonah; ufaqid ‘aleihem, cawdi’eil ben hagedolim.
nehemiah 11:15	umin halwiyim; shema‘yah wen Hashuw ben ‘acriqam ben Hashawyah ben buni. 
nehemiah 11:16	weshabetay weyocawad ‘al hamelakhah haHizonah leweit ha’elohim, meirashei halwiyim. 
nehemiah 11:17	umatanyah wen mikhah ben cawdi wen ’asaf rosh, hateHilah yehodeh latefilah, uwaqbuqyah mishneh mei’eHaw; we‘awda ben shamua‘, ben galal ben yeditun yedutun. 
nehemiah 11:18	kal halwiyim be‘ir haqodesh, matayim shemonim we’arba‘ah.
nehemiah 11:19	wehasho‘arim ‘aquw Talmon, wa’aHeihem hashomerim bashe‘arim; mei’ah shiw‘im ushenayim. 
nehemiah 11:20	ushe’ar yisra’eil hakohanim halwiyim bekhal ‘arei yehudah, ’ish benaHalato. 
nehemiah 11:21	wehanetinim yoshewim ba‘ofel; weziHa wegishpa ‘al hanetinim.
nehemiah 11:22	ufeqid halwiyim birushalim, ‘ucci wen bani ben Hashawyah, ben matanyah ben mikha; mibenei ’asaf hamshorerim, leneged melekhet beit ha’elohim. 
nehemiah 11:23	ki mizwat hamelekh ‘aleihem; wa’amanah ‘al hamshorerim dewar yom beyomo. 
nehemiah 11:24	ufetaHyah ben mesheicaw’eil mibenei ceraH ben yehudah leyad hamelekh, lekhal dawar la‘am. 
nehemiah 11:25	we’el haHazeirim bisdotam; mibenei yehudah, yashewu beqiryat ha’arba‘ uwenoteha, uwediwon uwenoteha, uwiqawze’eil waHazeireha. 
nehemiah 11:26	uweyeishua‘ uwemoladah uweweit paleT. 
nehemiah 11:27	uwaHazar shu‘al uwiw’eir shewa‘ uwenoteha. 
nehemiah 11:28	uweziqlag uwimkhonah uwiwnoteha. 
nehemiah 11:29	uwe‘ein rimon uwezare‘ah uweyarmut. 
nehemiah 11:30	canoaH ‘adulam weHazreihem, lakhish usedoteha, ‘aceiqah uwenoteha; wayaHanu mibe’eir shewa‘ ‘ad gei hinom. 
nehemiah 11:31	uwenei winyamin migawa‘; mikhmas we‘ayah, uweit ’eil uwenoteha. 
nehemiah 11:32	‘anatot now ‘ananeyah. 
nehemiah 11:33	Hazor ramah gitayim. 
nehemiah 11:34	Hadid zewo‘im newalaT. 
nehemiah 11:35	lod we’ono gei haHarashim. 
nehemiah 11:36	umin halwiyim, maHleqot yehudah lewinyamin.
nehemiah 12:1	we’eileh hakohanim wehalwiyim, ’asher ‘alu ‘im cerubawel ben she’alti’eil weyeishua‘; serayah yirmeyah ‘ecra. 
nehemiah 12:2	’amaryah malukh HaTush. 
nehemiah 12:3	shekhanyah reHum mereimot. 
nehemiah 12:4	‘ido gineto ’awiyah. 
nehemiah 12:5	miyamin ma‘adyah bilgah. 
nehemiah 12:6	shema‘yah weyoyariw yeda‘yah. 
nehemiah 12:7	salu ‘amoq, Hilqiyah yeda‘yah; ’eileh rashei hakohanim wa’aHeihem bimei yeishua‘.
nehemiah 12:8	wehalwiyim, yeishua‘ binui qadmi’eil sheireiweyah yehudah matanyah; ‘al hyedot hu we’eHaw 
nehemiah 12:9	uwaqbuqyah we‘uno we‘uni ’aHeihem lenegdam lemishmarot. 
nehemiah 12:10	weyeishua‘ holid ’et yoyaqim; weyoyaqim holid ’et ’elyashiw, we’elyashiw ’et yoyada‘. 
nehemiah 12:11	weyoyada‘ holid ’et yonatan, weyonatan holid ’et yadua‘. 
nehemiah 12:12	uwimei yoyaqim, hayu khohanim rashei ha’awot; lisrayah merayah, leyirmeyah Hananyah. 
nehemiah 12:13	le‘ecra meshulam, la’amaryah yehoHanan. 
nehemiah 12:14	limlukhi limlikhu yonatan, lishwanyah yoseif. 
nehemiah 12:15	leHarim ‘adna, limrayot Helqay. 
nehemiah 12:16	la‘adaya le‘ido cekharyah legineton meshulam. 
nehemiah 12:17	la’awiyah cikhri; leminyamin, lemo‘adyah pilTay. 
nehemiah 12:18	lewilgah shamua‘, lishma‘yah yehonatan. 
nehemiah 12:19	uleyoyariw matenay, lida‘yah ‘ucci. 
nehemiah 12:20	lesalay qalay le‘amoq ‘eiwer. 
nehemiah 12:21	leHilqiyah Hashawyah, lida‘yah netan’eil. 
nehemiah 12:22	halwiyim bimei ’elyashiw yoyada‘ weyoHanan weyadua‘, ketuwim rashei ’awot; wehakohanim, ‘al malkhut dareyawesh haparesi.
nehemiah 12:23	benei leiwi rashei ha’awot, ketuwim ‘al seifer diwrei hayamim; we‘ad yemei yoHanan ben ’elyashiw. 
nehemiah 12:24	werashei halwiyim Hashawyah sheireiweyah weyeishua‘ ben qadmi’eil wa’aHeihem lenegdam, lehaleil lehodot, bemizwat dawid ’ish ha’elohim; mishmar le‘umat mishmar. 
nehemiah 12:25	matanyah uwaqbuqyah ‘owadyah meshulam Talmon ‘aquw; shomerim sho‘arim mishmar, ba’asupei hashe‘arim. 
nehemiah 12:26	’eileh bimei yoyaqim ben yeishua‘ ben yozadaq; uwimei neHemyah hapeHah, we‘ecra hakohein hassofeir.
nehemiah 12:27	uwaHanukat Homat yerushalim, biqshu ’et halwiyim mikal meqomotam, lahawi’am lirushalim; la‘asot Hanukah wesimHah uwetodot uweshir, meziltayim newalim uwekhinorot. 
nehemiah 12:28	wayei’asefu, benei hamshorerim; umin hakikar sewiwot yerushalim, umin Hazrei neTofati. 
nehemiah 12:29	umibeit hagilgal, umisedot gewa‘ we‘acmawet; ki Hazeirim, banu lahem hamshorarim, sewiwot yerushalim. 
nehemiah 12:30	wayiTaharu, hakohanim wehalwiyim; wayTaharu ’et ha‘am, we’et hashe‘arim we’et haHomah. 
nehemiah 12:31	wa’a‘aleh ’et sarei yehudah, mei‘al laHomah; wa’a‘amidah shetei todot gedolot wetahalukhot layamin mei‘al laHomah, lesha‘ar ha’ashpot. 
nehemiah 12:32	wayeilekh ’aHareihem hosha‘yah, waHazi sarei yehudah. 
nehemiah 12:33	wa‘acaryah ‘ecra umeshulam. 
nehemiah 12:34	yehudah uwinyamin, ushema‘yah weyirmeyah.
nehemiah 12:35	umibenei hakohanim baHazozerot; cekharyah wen yonatan ben shema‘yah, ben matanyah ben mikhayah, ben cakur ben ’asaf. 
nehemiah 12:36	we’eHaw shema‘yah wa‘acar’eil milalay gilalay ma‘ay netan’eil wihudah Hanani, bikhlei shir dawid ’ish ha’elohim; we‘ecra hassofeir lifneihem. 
nehemiah 12:37	we‘al sha‘ar ha‘ayin wenegdam, ‘alu ‘al ma‘alot ‘ir dawid, bama‘aleh laHomah; mei‘al leweit dawid, we‘ad sha‘ar hamayim micraH. 
nehemiah 12:38	wehatodah hasheinit haholekhet lemol wa’ani ’aHareha; waHazi ha‘am mei‘al lehaHomah, mei‘al lemigdal hatanurim, we‘ad haHomah hareHawah. 
nehemiah 12:39	umei‘al lesha‘ar ’efrayim we‘al sha‘ar hayshanah we‘al sha‘ar hadagim, umigdal Hanan’eil umigdal hamei’ah, we‘ad sha‘ar hazon; we‘amedu, besha‘ar hamaTarah. 
nehemiah 12:40	wata‘amodenah shetei hatodot beweit ha’elohim; wa’ani waHazi hasseganim ‘imi. 
nehemiah 12:41	wehakohanim ’elyaqim ma‘aseiyah minyamin mikhayah ’elyo‘einay cekharyah Hananyah baHazozerot. 
nehemiah 12:42	uma‘aseiyah ushema‘yah we’el‘acar we‘ucci wihoHanan umalkiyah we‘eilam wa‘acer; wayashmi‘u hamshorerim, weyicraHyah hapaqid. 
nehemiah 12:43	wayicbeHu wayom hahu cewaHim gedolim wayismaHu, ki ha’elohim simeHam simHah gedolah, wegam hanashim wehayladim sameiHu; watishama‘ simHat yerushalim meiraHoq. 
nehemiah 12:44	wayipaqedu wayom hahu ’anashim ‘al haneshakhot, la’ozarot laterumot lareishit welama‘asrot likhnos bahem lisdei he‘arim mena’ot hatorah, lakohanim welalwiyim; ki simHat yehudah, ‘al hakohanim we‘al halwiyim ha‘omedim. 
nehemiah 12:45	wayishmeru mishmeret ’eloheihem umishmeret haTahorah, wehamshorerim wehasho‘arim; kemizwat dawid shelomoh weno. 
nehemiah 12:46	ki wimei dawid we’asaf miqedem; rosh rashei hamshorerim, weshir tehilah wehodot leilohim. 
nehemiah 12:47	wekhal yisra’eil bimei cerubawel uwimei neHemyah, notenim menayot hamshorerim wehasho‘arim dewar yom beyomo; umaqdishim lalwiyim, wehalwiyim, maqdishim liwnei ’aharon.
nehemiah 13:1	bayom hahu, niqra beseifer mosheh be’acenei ha‘am; wenimza katuw bo, ’asher lo yawo ‘amoni umo’awi biqhal ha’elohim ‘ad ‘olam. 
nehemiah 13:2	ki lo qidemu ’et benei yisra’eil baleHem uwamayim; wayiskor ‘alaw ’et bil‘am leqalo, wayahafokh ’eloheinu haqelalah liwrakhah. 
nehemiah 13:3	wayhi keshame‘am ’et hatorah; wayawdilu khal ‘eirew miyisra’eil. 
nehemiah 13:4	welifnei micceh, ’elyashiw hakohein, natun belishkat beit ’eloheinu; qarow leTowiyah. 
nehemiah 13:5	waya‘as lo lishkah gedolah, wesham hayu lefanim notenim ’et haminHah halewonah wehakeilim, uma‘sar hadagan hatirosh wehayizhar, mizwat halwiyim, wehamshorerim wehasho‘arim; uterumat hakohanim. 
nehemiah 13:6	uwekhal ceh lo hayiti birushalim; ki bishnat sheloshim ushetayim le’artaHshast melekh bawel bati ’el hamelekh, uleqeiz yamim nish’alti min hamelekh. 
nehemiah 13:7	wa’awo lirushalim; wa’awinah wara‘ah, ’asher ‘asah ’elyashiw leTowiyah, la‘asot lo nishkah, beHazrei beit ha’elohim. 
nehemiah 13:8	wayeira‘ li me’od; wa’ashlikhah ’et kal kelei weit Towiyah haHuz min halishkah. 
nehemiah 13:9	wa’omerah, wayTaharu haleshakhot; wa’ashiwah sham, kelei beit ha’elohim, ’et haminHah wehalewonah.
nehemiah 13:10	wa’eide‘ah, ki menayot halwiyim lo nitanah; wayiwreHu ’ish lesadeihu halwiyim wehamshorerim ‘osei hamelakhah. 
nehemiah 13:11	wa’ariwah ’et hasseganim, wa’omerah, madua‘ ne‘ecaw beit ha’elohim; wa’eqbezeim, wa’a‘amideim ‘al ‘amedam. 
nehemiah 13:12	wekhal yehudah, heiwi’u ma‘sar hadagan wehatirosh wehayizhar la’ozarot. 
nehemiah 13:13	wa’ozrah ‘al ’ozarot shelemyah hakohein wezadoq hassofeir, ufedayah min halwiyim, we‘al yadam, Hanan ben cakur ben matanyah; ki ne’emanim neHshawu, wa‘aleihem laHaloq la’aHeihem.
nehemiah 13:14	cakherah li ’elohay ‘al cot; we’al temaH Hasaday, ’asher ‘asiti beweit ’elohay uwemishmaraw. 
nehemiah 13:15	bayamim haheimah ra’iti wihudah dorekhim gitot bashabat umewi’im ha‘areimot we‘omesim ‘al haHamorim we’af yayin ‘anawim ute’einim wekhal masa, umewi’im yerushalim beyom hashabat; wa’a‘id beyom mikhram zayid. 
nehemiah 13:16	wehazorim yashewu wah, mewi’im dag wekhal mekher; umokherim bashabat liwnei yehudah uwirushalim. 
nehemiah 13:17	wa’ariwah ’eit Horei yehudah; wa’omerah lahem, mah hadawar hara‘ hacceh ’asher ’atem ‘osim, umeHalelim ’et yom hashabat. 
nehemiah 13:18	halo khoh ‘asu ’awoteikhem, wayawei ’eloheinu ‘aleinu, ’eit kal hara‘ah haccot, we‘al ha‘ir haccot; we’atem mosifim Haron ‘al yisra’eil, leHaleil ’et hashabat.
nehemiah 13:19	wayhi ka’asher zalalu sha‘arei yerushalim lifnei hashabat, wa’omerah wayissageru hadelatot, wa’omerah, ’asher lo yiftaHum, ‘ad ’aHar hashabat; umine‘aray, he‘emadti ‘al hashe‘arim, lo yawo masa beyom hashabat. 
nehemiah 13:20	wayalinu harokhelim umokherei khal mimkar miHuz lirushalim pa‘am ushetayim. 
nehemiah 13:21	wa’a‘idah wahem, wa’omerah ’aleihem madua‘ ’atem leinim neged haHomah, ’im tishnu yad ’eshlaH bakhem; min ha‘eit hahi, lo wa’u bashabat.
nehemiah 13:22	wa’omerah lalwiyim, ’asher yihyu miTaharim uwa’im shomerim hashe‘arim, leqadeish ’et yom hashabat; gam cot cakherah li ’elohay, weHusah ‘alay kerow Hasdekha.
nehemiah 13:23	gam bayamim haheim, ra’iti ’et hayehudim hoshiwu, nashim ’ashdodiyot ’ashdodiyot, ‘amoniyot ‘amoniyot mo’awiyot. 
nehemiah 13:24	uweneihem, Hazi medabeir ’ashdodit, we’einam makirim ledabeir yehudit; wekhilshon ‘am wa‘am. 
nehemiah 13:25	wa’ariw ‘imam wa’aqaleim, wa’akeh meihem ’anashim wa’emreTeim; wa’ashbi‘eim beilohim, ’im titenu wenoteikhem liwneihem, we’im tis’u mibenoteihem, liwneikhem welakhem. 
nehemiah 13:26	halo ‘al ’eileh HaTa shelomoh melekh yisra’eil uwagoyim harabim lo hayah melekh kamohu, we’ahuw leilohaw hayah, wayiteneihu ’elohim, melekh ‘al kal yisra’eil; gam ’oto heHeTi’u, hanashim hanakheriyot. 
nehemiah 13:27	welakhem hanishma‘, la‘asot ’eit kal hara‘ah hagedolah haccot, lim‘ol beiloheinu; lehoshiw nashim nakheriyot. 
nehemiah 13:28	umibenei yoyada‘ ben ’elyashiw hakohein hagadol, Hatan lesanwalaT haHoroni; wa’awriHeihu mei‘alay. 
nehemiah 13:29	cakherah lahem ’elohay; ‘al ga’olei hakehunah, uwerit hakehunah wehalwiyim. 
nehemiah 13:30	weTihartim mikal neikhar; wa’a‘amidah mishmarot lakohanim welalwiyim ’ish bimlakhto. 
nehemiah 13:31	ulequrban ha‘eizim be‘itim mecumanot welabikurim; cakherah li ’elohay leTowah. 
1_chronicles 1:1	’adam sheit ’enosh. 
1_chronicles 1:2	qeinan mahalal’eil yared. 
1_chronicles 1:3	Hanokh metushelaH lamekh. 
1_chronicles 1:4	noaH sheim Ham wayafet.
1_chronicles 1:5	benei yefet, gomer umagog, umaday weyawan wetuwal; umeshekh wetiras.
1_chronicles 1:6	uwenei gomer; ’ashkanac wedifat wetogarmah. 
1_chronicles 1:7	uwenei yawan ’elishah wetarshishah; kitim werodanim.
1_chronicles 1:8	benei Ham; kush umizrayim puT ukhena‘an. 
1_chronicles 1:9	uwenei khush, sewa waHawilah, wesawta wera‘ma wesawtekha; uwenei ra‘ma shewa udedan.
1_chronicles 1:10	wekhush yalad ’et nimrod; hu heiHeil, lihyot gibor ba’arez.
1_chronicles 1:11	umizrayim yalad ’et ludiyim ludim we’et ‘anamim we’et lehawim we’et naftuHim. 
1_chronicles 1:12	we’et patrusim we’et kasluHim, ’asher yaze’u misham pelishtim we’et kaftorim.
1_chronicles 1:13	ukhena‘an, yalad ’et zidon bekhoro we’et Heit. 
1_chronicles 1:14	we’et haywusi we’et ha’emori, we’eit hagirgashi. 
1_chronicles 1:15	we’et haHiwwi we’et ha‘arqi we’et hassini. 
1_chronicles 1:16	we’et ha’arwadi we’et hazemari we’et haHamati.
1_chronicles 1:17	benei sheim, ‘eilam we’ashur, we’arpakhshad welud wa’aram; we‘uz weHul wegeter wameshekh.
1_chronicles 1:18	we’arpakhshad yalad ’et shalaH; weshelaH yalad ’et ‘eiwer. 
1_chronicles 1:19	ule‘eiwer yulad shenei wanim; sheim ha’eHad peleg, ki weyamaw niflegah ha’arez, wesheim ’aHiw yaqeTan. 
1_chronicles 1:20	weyaqeTan yalad, ’et ’almodad we’et shalef; we’et Hazarmawet we’et yaraH. 
1_chronicles 1:21	we’et hadoram we’et ’ucal we’et diqlah. 
1_chronicles 1:22	we’et ‘eiwal we’et ’awima’eil we’et shewa. 
1_chronicles 1:23	we’et ’ofir we’et Hawilah we’et yowaw; kal ’eileh benei yaqeTan.
1_chronicles 1:24	sheim ’arpakhshad shalaH. 
1_chronicles 1:25	‘eiwer peleg re‘u. 
1_chronicles 1:26	serug naHor taraH. 
1_chronicles 1:27	’awram hu ’awraham.
1_chronicles 1:28	benei ’awraham, yizHaq weyishma‘eil.
1_chronicles 1:29	’eileh toledotam; bekhor yishma‘eil newayot, weqeidar we’adbe’eil umiwsam. 
1_chronicles 1:30	mishma‘ wedumah, masa Hadad weteima. 
1_chronicles 1:31	yeTur nafish waqeidemah; ’eileh heim benei yishma‘eil.
1_chronicles 1:32	uwenei qeTurah pilegesh ’awraham, yaledah ’et cimran weyaqeshan umedan umidyan weyishbaq weshuaH; uwenei yaqeshan shewa udedan.
1_chronicles 1:33	uwenei midyan, ‘eifah wa‘eifer waHanokh, wa’awida‘ we’elda‘ah; kal ’eileh benei qeTurah.
1_chronicles 1:34	wayoled ’awraham ’et yizHaq; s benei yizHaq, ‘eisaw weyisra’eil.
1_chronicles 1:35	benei ‘eisaw; ’elifac re‘u’eil wi‘ush weya‘lam weqoraH.
1_chronicles 1:36	benei ’elifac; teiman we’omar zefi wega‘tam, qenac wetimna‘ wa‘amaleiq.
1_chronicles 1:37	benei re‘u’eil; naHat ceraH shamah umiccah.
1_chronicles 1:38	uwenei sei‘ir, loTan weshowal weziw‘on wa‘anah; wedishon we’eizer wedishan. 
1_chronicles 1:39	uwenei loTan Hori wehomam; wa’aHot loTan timna‘.
1_chronicles 1:40	benei showal, ‘alyan umanaHat we‘eiwal shefi we’onam; s uwenei ziw‘on ’ayah wa‘anah. 
1_chronicles 1:41	benei ‘anah dishon; s uwenei dishon, Hamran we’eshban weyitran ukheran.
1_chronicles 1:42	benei ’eizer, bilhan weca‘awan ya‘aqan; benei dishon ‘uz wa’aran.
1_chronicles 1:43	we’eileh hamelakhim, ’asher malekhu be’erez ’edom, lifnei melakh melekh liwnei yisra’eil; bela‘ ben be‘or, wesheim ‘iro dinhawah. 
1_chronicles 1:44	wayamat bala‘; wayimlokh taHtaw, yowaw ben ceraH mibazerah. 
1_chronicles 1:45	wayamat yowaw; wayimlokh taHtaw, Husham mei’erez hateimani. 
1_chronicles 1:46	wayamat Husham; wayimlokh taHtaw hadad ben bedad, hamakeh ’et midyan bisdeih mo’aw, wesheim ‘iro ‘ayot ‘awit. 
1_chronicles 1:47	wayamat hadad; wayimlokh taHtaw, samlah mimasreiqah. 
1_chronicles 1:48	wayamat samlah; wayimlokh taHtaw, sha’ul meireHowot hanahar. 
1_chronicles 1:49	wayamat sha’ul; wayimlokh taHtaw, ba‘al Hanan ben ‘akhbor. 
1_chronicles 1:50	wayamat ba‘al Hanan, wayimlokh taHtaw hadad, wesheim ‘iro pa‘i; wesheim ’ishto meheiTaw’eil bat maTreid, bat mei cahaw. 
1_chronicles 1:51	wayamat hadad; s wayihyu ’alufei ’edom, ’aluf timna‘ ’aluf ‘alyah ‘alwah ’aluf yeteit. 
1_chronicles 1:52	’aluf ’aholiwamah ’aluf ’eilah ’aluf pinon. 
1_chronicles 1:53	’aluf qenac ’aluf teiman ’aluf miwzar. 
1_chronicles 1:54	’aluf magdi’eil ’aluf ‘iram; ’eileh ’alufei ’edom.
1_chronicles 2:1	’eileh benei yisra’eil; re’uwein shim‘on leiwi wihudah, yisashkhar ucewulun. 
1_chronicles 2:2	dan yoseif uwinyamin, naftali gad we’asheir.
1_chronicles 2:3	benei yehudah, ‘eir we’onan wesheilah, sheloshah nolad lo, mibat shua‘ hakena‘anit; wayhi ‘eir bekhor yehudah, ra‘ be‘einei yhoh waymiteihu.
1_chronicles 2:4	wetamar kalato, yaledah lo ’et perez we’et caraH; kal benei yehudah Hamishah.
1_chronicles 2:5	benei ferez Hezron weHamul.
1_chronicles 2:6	uwenei ceraH, cimri we’eitan weheiman wekhalkol wadara‘ kulam Hamishah.
1_chronicles 2:7	uwenei karmi; ‘akhar ‘okheir yisra’eil, ’asher ma‘al baHeirem.
1_chronicles 2:8	uwenei ’eitan ‘acaryah. 
1_chronicles 2:9	uwenei Hezron ’asher nolad lo; ’et yeraHme’eil we’et ram we’et keluway. 
1_chronicles 2:10	weram holid ’et ‘aminadaw; we‘aminadaw holid ’et naHshon, nesi benei yehudah. 
1_chronicles 2:11	wenaHshon holid ’et salma, wesalma holid ’et bo‘ac. 
1_chronicles 2:12	uwo‘ac holid ’et ‘oweid, we‘oweid holid ’et yishay. 
1_chronicles 2:13	we’ishay holid ’et bekhoro ’et ’eli’aw; wa’awinadaw hasheini, weshim‘a hashelishi. 
1_chronicles 2:14	netan’eil harewi‘i, raday haHamishi. 
1_chronicles 2:15	’ozem hashishi, dawid hashewi‘i. 
1_chronicles 2:16	we’aHyoteihem we’aHyoteihem zeruyah wa’awigayil; uwenei zeruyah, ’awshay weyo’aw wa‘asah ’eil sheloshah. 
1_chronicles 2:17	wa’awigayil yaledah ’et ‘amasa; wa’awi ‘amasa, yeter hayishme‘eili. 
1_chronicles 2:18	wekhaleiw ben Hezron, holid ’et ‘acuwah ’ishah we’et yeri‘ot; we’eileh waneha, yeisher weshowaw we’ardon. 
1_chronicles 2:19	watamat ‘acuwah; wayiqaH lo khaleiw ’et ’efrat, wateiled lo ’et Hur. 
1_chronicles 2:20	weHur holid ’et ’uri, we’uri holid ’et bezal’eil.
1_chronicles 2:21	we’aHar, ba Hezron ’el bat makhir ’awi gil‘ad, wehu leqaHah, wehu ben shishim shanah; wateiled lo ’et seguw. 
1_chronicles 2:22	useguw holid ’et ya’ir; wayhi lo, ‘esrim weshalosh ‘arim, be’erez hagil‘ad. 
1_chronicles 2:23	wayiqaH geshur wa’aram ’et Hawwot ya’ir mei’itam ’et qenat we’et benoteha shishim ‘ir; kal ’eileh benei makhir ’awi gil‘ad. 
1_chronicles 2:24	we’aHar mot Hezron bekhaleiw ’efratah; we’eishet Hezron ’awiyah, wateiled lo, ’et ’ashHur ’awi teqoa‘. 
1_chronicles 2:25	wayihyu wenei yeraHme’eil bekhor Hezron habekhor ram; uwunah wa’oren wa’ozem ’aHiyah. 
1_chronicles 2:26	watehi ’ishah ’aHeret liraHme’eil ushemah ‘aTarah; hi ’eim ’onam.
1_chronicles 2:27	wayihyu wenei ram bekhor yeraHme’eil; ma‘az weyamin wa‘eiqer. 
1_chronicles 2:28	wayihyu wenei ’onam shamay weyada‘; uwenei shamay, nadaw wa’awishur. 
1_chronicles 2:29	wesheim ’eishet ’awishur ’awihayil; wateiled lo, ’et ’aHban we’et molid. 
1_chronicles 2:30	uwenei nadaw seled we’apayim; wayamat seled lo wanim.
1_chronicles 2:31	uwenei ’apayim yish‘i; uwenei yish‘i sheishan, uwenei sheishan ’aHlay. 
1_chronicles 2:32	uwenei yada‘ ’aHi shamay, yeter weyonatan; wayamat yeter lo wanim.
1_chronicles 2:33	uwenei yonatan pelet wecaca; ’eileh hayu benei yeraHme’eil. 
1_chronicles 2:34	welo hayah lesheishan banim ki ’im banot; ulesheishan ‘ewed mizri ushemo yarHa‘. 
1_chronicles 2:35	wayitein sheishan ’et bito leyarHa‘ ‘awdo le’ishah; wateiled lo ’et ‘atay. 
1_chronicles 2:36	we‘atay holid ’et natan, wenatan holid ’et cawad. 
1_chronicles 2:37	wecawad holid ’et ’eflal, we’eflal holid ’et ‘oweid. 
1_chronicles 2:38	we‘oweid holid ’et yeihu, weyeihu holid ’et ‘acaryah. 
1_chronicles 2:39	wa‘acaryah holid ’et Halez, weHelez holid ’et ’el‘asah. 
1_chronicles 2:40	we’el‘asah holid ’et sismay, wesismay holid ’et shalum. 
1_chronicles 2:41	weshalum holid ’et yeqamyah, wiqamyah holid ’et ’elishama‘. 
1_chronicles 2:42	uwenei khaleiw ’aHi yeraHme’eil, meisha‘ bekhoro hu ’awi cif; uwenei mareishah ’awi Hewron. 
1_chronicles 2:43	uwenei Hewron; qoraH wetapuaH wereqem washama‘. 
1_chronicles 2:44	weshema‘ holid, ’et raHam ’awi yareqo‘am; wereqem holid ’et shamay. 
1_chronicles 2:45	uwen shamay ma‘on; uma‘on ’awi weit zur. 
1_chronicles 2:46	we‘eifah pilegesh kaleiw, yaledah ’et Haran we’et moza we’et gaceic; weHaran holid ’et gaceic.
1_chronicles 2:47	uwenei yaheday; regem weyotam wegeishan wafeleT we‘eifah washa‘af. 
1_chronicles 2:48	pilegesh kaleiw ma‘akhah, yalad shewer we’et tirHanah. 
1_chronicles 2:49	wateiled, ‘af ’awi madmanah, ’et shewa ’awi makhbeinah wa’awi giw‘a; uwat kaleiw ‘akhsah.
1_chronicles 2:50	’eileh hayu benei khaleiw, ben Hur bekhor ’efratah; showal ’awi qiryat ye‘arim. 
1_chronicles 2:51	salma ’awi weit laHem, Hareif ’awi weit gadeir. 
1_chronicles 2:52	wayihyu wanim leshowal, ’awi qiryat ye‘arim; haro’eh Hazi hamenuHot. 
1_chronicles 2:53	umishpeHot qiryat ye‘arim, hayitri wehaputi, wehashumati wehamishra‘i; mei’eileh, yaze’u hazare‘ati, weha’eshta’uli.
1_chronicles 2:54	benei salma, beit leHem uneTofati, ‘aTrot beit yo’aw; waHazi hamanaHti hazare‘i. 
1_chronicles 2:55	umishpeHot soferim yoshewu yoshewei ya‘beiz, tir‘atim shim‘atim sukhatim; heimah haqinim haba’im, meiHamat ’awi weit reikhaw.
1_chronicles 3:1	we’eileh hayu benei dawyid, ’asher nolad lo beHewron; habekhor ’amnon, la’aHino‘am hayicre‘eilit, sheini daniyeil, la’awigayil hakarmelit. 
1_chronicles 3:2	hashelishi le’awshalom ben ma‘akhah, bat talmay melekh geshur; harewi‘i ’adoniyah wen Hagit. 
1_chronicles 3:3	haHamishi shefaTyah la’awiTal; hashishi yitre‘am le‘eglah ’ishto. 
1_chronicles 3:4	shishah nolad lo weHewron, wayimlakh sham, shewa‘ shanim weshishah Hodashim; usheloshim weshalosh shanah, malakh birushalim.
1_chronicles 3:5	we’eileh nuledu lo birushalayim; me‘a weshowaw wenatan ushelomoh ’arba‘ah, lewat shua‘ bat ‘ami’eil. 
1_chronicles 3:6	weyiwHar we’elishama‘ we’elifaleT. 
1_chronicles 3:7	wenogah wenefeg weyafia‘. 
1_chronicles 3:8	we’elishama‘ we’elyada‘ we’elifeleT tish‘ah. 
1_chronicles 3:9	kol benei dawid; milewad benei filagshim wetamar ’aHotam.
1_chronicles 3:10	uwen shelomoh reHaw‘am; ’awiyah weno ’asa weno yehoshafaT beno. 
1_chronicles 3:11	yoram beno ’aHacyahu weno yo’ash beno. 
1_chronicles 3:12	’amazyahu weno ‘acaryah weno yotam beno. 
1_chronicles 3:13	’aHac beno Hicqiyahu weno menasheh weno. 
1_chronicles 3:14	’amon beno yoshiyahu weno. 
1_chronicles 3:15	uwenei yoshiyahu, habekhor yoHanan, hasheini yehoyaqim; hashelishi zidqiyahu, harewi‘i shalum. 
1_chronicles 3:16	uwenei yehoyaqim; yekhaneyah weno zidqiyah weno. 
1_chronicles 3:17	uwenei yekhaneyah ’assir, she’alti’eil beno. 
1_chronicles 3:18	umalkiram ufedayah weshen’azar; yeqamyah hoshama‘ unedawyah. 
1_chronicles 3:19	uwenei fedayah, cerubawel weshim‘i; uwen cerubawel meshulam waHananyah, ushelomit ’aHotam. 
1_chronicles 3:20	waHashuwah wa’ohel uwerekhyah waHasadyah yushaw Hesed Hameish. 
1_chronicles 3:21	uwen Hananyah pelaTyah wisha‘yah; benei refayah benei ’arnan, benei ‘owadyah benei shekhanyah.
1_chronicles 3:22	uwenei shekhanyah shema‘yah; uwenei shema‘yah, HaTush weyig’al uwariaH une‘aryah weshafaT shishah. 
1_chronicles 3:23	uwen ne‘aryah, ’elyo‘einay weHicqiyah we‘acriqam sheloshah. 
1_chronicles 3:24	uwenei ’elyo‘einay, hodaywahu hodawyahu we’elyashiw ufelayah we‘aquw weyoHanan udelayah wa‘anani shiw‘ah.
1_chronicles 4:1	benei yehudah; perez Hezron wekharmi weHur weshowal. 
1_chronicles 4:2	ure’ayah wen showal holid ’et yaHat, weyaHat holid, ’et ’aHumay we’et lahad; ’eileh mishpeHot hazare‘ati.
1_chronicles 4:3	we’eileh ’awi ‘eiTam, yicre‘el weyishma weyidbash; wesheim ’aHotam hazlelponi. 
1_chronicles 4:4	ufenu’eil ’awi gedor, we‘eicer ’awi Hushah; ’eileh wenei Hur bekhor ’efratah, ’awi beit laHem. 
1_chronicles 4:5	ule’ashHur ’awi teqoa‘, hayu shetei nashim; Hel’ah wena‘arah. 
1_chronicles 4:6	wateiled lo na‘arah ’et ’aHuccam we’et Heifer, we’et teimeni we’et ha’aHashtari; ’eileh benei na‘arah. 
1_chronicles 4:7	uwenei Hel’ah; zeret yizHar wezoHar we’etnan. 
1_chronicles 4:8	weqoz holid, ’et ‘anuw we’et hazoweiwah; umishpeHot ’aHarHeil ben harum. 
1_chronicles 4:9	wayhi ya‘beiz, nikhbad mei’eHaw; we’imo, qare’ah shemo ya‘beiz leimor, ki yaladti be‘ozew. 
1_chronicles 4:10	wayiqra ya‘beiz leilohei yisra’eil leimor, ’im bareikh tewarakheini wehirbita ’et gewuli wehayetah yadekha ‘imi, we‘asita meira‘ah lewilti ‘azebi; wayawei ’elohim ’eit ’asher sha’al. 
1_chronicles 4:11	ukheluw ’aHi shuHah holid ’et meHir; hu ’awi ’eshton. 
1_chronicles 4:12	we’eshton, holid ’et beit rafa we’et paseiaH, we’et teHinah ’awi ‘ir naHash; ’eileh ’anshei reikhah.
1_chronicles 4:13	uwenei qenac, ‘ateni’eil userayah; uwenei ‘ateni’eil Hatat. 
1_chronicles 4:14	ume‘onotay holid ’et ‘aferah; userayah, holid ’et yo’aw ’awi gei Harashim, ki Harashim hayu.
1_chronicles 4:15	uwenei kaleiw ben yefuneh, ‘iru ’eilah wana‘am; uwenei ’eilah uqenac. 
1_chronicles 4:16	uwenei yehalel’eil; cif wecifah, tireya wa’asar’eil. 
1_chronicles 4:17	uwen ‘ecrah, yeter umered we‘eifer weyalon; watahar ’et miryam we’et shamay, we’et yishbaH ’awi ’eshtemoa‘. 
1_chronicles 4:18	we’ishto hayhudiyah, yaledah ’et yered ’awi gedor we’et Hewer ’awi sokho, we’et yequti’eil ’awi canoaH; we’eileh, benei bityah wat par‘oh, ’asher laqaH mared.
1_chronicles 4:19	uwenei ’eishet hodiyah, ’aHot naHam, ’awi qe‘ilah hagarmi; we’eshtemoa‘ hama‘akhati. 
1_chronicles 4:20	uwenei shimon, ’amnon werinah, ben Hanan wetolon wetilon; uwenei yish‘i, coHeit uwen coHeit. 
1_chronicles 4:21	benei sheilah wen yehudah, ‘eir ’awi leikhah, wela‘dah ’awi mareishah; umishpeHot beit ‘awodat habuz leweit ’ashbeia‘. 
1_chronicles 4:22	weyoqim we’anshei khoceiwa, weyo’ash wesaraf ’asher ba‘alu lemo’aw weyashuwi laHem; wehadewarim ‘atiqim. 
1_chronicles 4:23	heimah hayozrim, weyoshewei neTa‘im ugedeirah; ‘im hamelekh bimlakhto yashewu sham.
1_chronicles 4:24	benei shim‘on; nemu’eil weyamin, yariw ceraH sha’ul. 
1_chronicles 4:25	shalum beno miwsam beno mishma‘ beno. 
1_chronicles 4:26	uwenei mishma‘; Hamu’eil beno cakur beno shim‘i weno. 
1_chronicles 4:27	uleshim‘i banim shishah ‘asar uwanot sheish, ule’eHaw ’ein banim rabim; wekhol mishpaHtam, lo hirbu ‘ad benei yehudah.
1_chronicles 4:28	wayeishewu biw’eir shewa‘ umoladah waHazar shu‘al. 
1_chronicles 4:29	uwewilhah uwe‘ezem uwetolad. 
1_chronicles 4:30	uwiwtu’eil uweHaremah uweziqelag. 
1_chronicles 4:31	uweweit markawot uwaHazar susim, uweweit bir’i uwesha‘arayim; ’eileh ‘areihem ‘ad melokh dawid. 
1_chronicles 4:32	weHazreihem ‘eiTam wa‘ayin, rimon wetokhen we‘ashan; ‘arim Hameish. 
1_chronicles 4:33	wekhal Hazreihem, ’asher sewiwot he‘arim ha’eileh ‘ad ba‘al; cot moshewotam, wehityaHsam lahem. 
1_chronicles 4:34	umeshowaw weyamleikh, weyoshah ben ’amazyah. 
1_chronicles 4:35	weyo’eil; weyeihu ben yoshiwyah, ben serayah ben ‘asi’eil. 
1_chronicles 4:36	we’elyo‘einay weya‘aqowah wishoHayah wa‘asayah wa‘adi’eil wisimi’eil uwenayah. 
1_chronicles 4:37	wecica wen shif‘i wen ’alon ben yedayah wen shimri ben shema‘yah. 
1_chronicles 4:38	’eileh haba’im besheimot, nesi’im bemishpeHotam; uweit ’awoteihem, parezu larow. 
1_chronicles 4:39	wayeilekhu limwo gedor, ‘ad lemicraH hagay; lewaqeish mir‘eh lezonam. 
1_chronicles 4:40	wayimze’u mir‘eh shamein waTow, weha’arez raHawat yadayim, weshoqeTet usheleiwah; ki min Ham, hayoshewim sham lefanim. 
1_chronicles 4:41	wayawo’u ’eileh haketuwim besheimot bimei yeHicqiyahu melekh yehudah, wayaku ’et ’aholeihem we’et hame‘inim hame‘unim ’asher nimze’u shamah wayaHarimum ‘ad hayom hacceh, wayeishewu taHteihem; ki mir‘eh lezonam sham. 
1_chronicles 4:42	umeihem min benei shim‘on, halekhu lehar sei‘ir, ’anashim Hameish mei’ot; ufelaTyah une‘aryah urefayah we‘ucci’eil benei yish‘i berosham. 
1_chronicles 4:43	wayaku ’et she’eirit hapeleiTah la‘amaleiq; wayeishewu sham, ‘ad hayom hacceh.
