1_chronicles 5:1	uwenei re’uwein bekhor yisra’eil ki hu habekhor uweHalelo yezu‘ei ’awiw, nitenah bekhorato, liwnei yoseif ben yisra’eil; welo lehityaHeis labekhorah. 
1_chronicles 5:2	ki yehudah gawar be’eHaw, ulenagid mimenu; wehabekhorah leyoseif.
1_chronicles 5:3	benei re’uwein bekhor yisra’eil; Hanokh ufalu Hezron wekharmi. 
1_chronicles 5:4	benei yo’eil; shema‘yah weno gog beno shim‘i weno. 
1_chronicles 5:5	mikhah weno re’ayah weno ba‘al beno. 
1_chronicles 5:6	be’eirah weno, ’asher heglah, tilegat pilne’eser melekh ’ashur; hu nasi lar’uweini. 
1_chronicles 5:7	we’eHaw lemishpeHotaw, behityaHeis letoledotam; harosh ye‘i’eil ucekharyahu. 
1_chronicles 5:8	uwela‘ ben ‘acac, ben shema‘ ben yo’eil; hu yosheiw ba‘aro‘eir, we‘ad newo uwa‘al me‘on. 
1_chronicles 5:9	welamicraH, yashaw ‘ad lewo midbarah, lemin hanahar perat; ki miqneihem rawu be’erez gil‘ad. 
1_chronicles 5:10	uwimei sha’ul, ‘asu milHamah ‘im hahagri’im, wayipelu beyadam; wayeishewu be’aholeihem, ‘al kal penei micraH lagil‘ad.
1_chronicles 5:11	uwenei gad lenegdam, yashewu be’erez habashan ‘ad salkhah. 
1_chronicles 5:12	yo’eil harosh, weshafam hamishneh; weya‘nay weshafaT babashan. 
1_chronicles 5:13	wa’aHeihem leweit ’awoteihem, mikha’eil umeshulam weshewa‘ weyoray weya‘kan wecia‘ wa‘eiwer shiw‘ah.
1_chronicles 5:14	’eileh benei ’awiHayil, ben Huri ben yaroaH ben gil‘ad ben mikha’eil ben yeshishay ben yaHdo ben buc. 
1_chronicles 5:15	’aHi ben ‘awdi’eil ben guni, rosh leweit ’awotam. 
1_chronicles 5:16	wayeishewu bagil‘ad babashan uwiwnoteha; uwekhal migreshei sharon ‘al toz’otam. 
1_chronicles 5:17	kulam hityaHsu, bimei yotam melekh yehudah; uwimei yarawe‘am melekh yisra’eil.
1_chronicles 5:18	benei re’uwein wegadi waHazi sheiweT menasheh min benei Hayil ’anashim nose’ei magein weHerew wedorekhei qeshet, ulemudei milHamah; ’arba‘im we’arba‘ah ’elef ushewa‘ mei’ot weshishim yoze’ei zawa. 
1_chronicles 5:19	waya‘asu milHamah ‘im hahagri’im; wiTur wenafish wenodaw. 
1_chronicles 5:20	wayei‘aceru ‘aleihem, wayinatenu weyadam hahagri’im, wekhol she‘imahem; ki leilohim ca‘aqu bamilHamah, wena‘tor lahem ki waTeHu wo. 
1_chronicles 5:21	wayishbu miqneihem, gemaleihem Hamishim ’elef wezon, matayim waHamishim ’elef, waHamorim ’alpayim; wenefesh ’adam mei’ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 5:22	ki Halalim rabim nafalu, ki meiha’elohim hamilHamah; wayeishewu taHteihem ‘ad hagolah.
1_chronicles 5:23	uwenei, Hazi sheiweT menasheh, yashewu ba’arez; mibashan ‘ad ba‘al Hermon usenir wehar Hermon heimah rawu. 
1_chronicles 5:24	we’eileh rashei weit ’awotam; we‘eifer weyish‘i we’eli’eil we‘acri’eil weyirmeyah wehodawyah weyaHdi’eil, ’anashim giborei Hayil, ’anshei sheimot, rashim leweit ’awotam. 
1_chronicles 5:25	wayim‘alu, beilohei ’awoteihem; wayicnu, ’aHarei ’elohei ‘amei ha’arez, ’asher hishmid ’elohim mipeneihem. 
1_chronicles 5:26	waya‘ar ’elohei yisra’eil ’et ruaH pul melekh ’ashur, we’et ruaH tilegat pilneser melekh ’ashur, wayagleim lar’uweini welagadi, welaHazi sheiweT menasheh; waywi’eim laHlaH weHawor wehara unehar gocan, ‘ad hayom hacceh.
1_chronicles 6:1	benei leiwi; geireshon qehat umerari. 
1_chronicles 6:2	uwenei qehat; ‘amram yizhar, weHewron we‘ucci’eil.
1_chronicles 6:3	uwenei ‘amram, ’aharon umosheh umiryam; s uwenei ’aharon, nadaw wa’awihu, ’el‘acar we’itamar.
1_chronicles 6:4	’el‘acar holid ’et pineHas, pineHas holid ’et ’awishua‘. 
1_chronicles 6:5	wa’awishua‘ holid ’et buqi, uwuqi holid ’et ‘ucci. 
1_chronicles 6:6	we‘ucci holid ’et ceraHyah, uceraHyah holid ’et merayot. 
1_chronicles 6:7	merayot holid ’et ’amaryah, wa’amaryah holid ’et ’aHiTuw. 
1_chronicles 6:8	wa’aHiTuw holid ’et zadoq, wezadoq holid ’et ’aHima‘az. 
1_chronicles 6:9	wa’aHima‘az holid ’et ‘acaryah, wa‘acaryah holid ’et yoHanan. 
1_chronicles 6:10	weyoHanan holid ’et ‘acaryah; hu ’asher kihein, babayit ’asher banah shelomoh birushalim. 
1_chronicles 6:11	wayoled ‘acaryah ’et ’amaryah; wa’amaryah holid ’et ’aHiTuw. 
1_chronicles 6:12	wa’aHiTuw holid ’et zadoq, wezadoq holid ’et shalum. 
1_chronicles 6:13	weshalum holid ’et Hilqiyah, weHilqiyah holid ’et ‘acaryah. 
1_chronicles 6:14	wa‘acaryah holid ’et serayah, userayah holid ’et yehozadaq. 
1_chronicles 6:15	wihozadaq halakh, behaglot yhoh, ’et yehudah wirushalim; beyad newukhadnezar.
1_chronicles 6:16	benei leiwi; geireshom qehat umerari. 
1_chronicles 6:17	we’eileh shemot benei geireshom liwni weshim‘i. 
1_chronicles 6:18	uwenei qehat; ‘amram weyizhar, weHewron we‘ucci’eil. 
1_chronicles 6:19	benei merari maHli umushi; we’eileh mishpeHot haleiwi la’awoteihem. 
1_chronicles 6:20	legeireshom; liwni weno yaHat beno cimah weno. 
1_chronicles 6:21	yo’aH beno ‘ido weno, ceraH beno ye’ateray beno. 
1_chronicles 6:22	benei qehat; ‘aminadaw beno, qoraH beno ’assir beno. 
1_chronicles 6:23	’elqanah weno we’ewyasaf beno we’assir beno. 
1_chronicles 6:24	taHat beno ’uri’eil beno, ‘ucciyah weno wesha’ul beno. 
1_chronicles 6:25	uwenei ’elqanah, ‘amasay wa’aHimot. 
1_chronicles 6:26	’elqanah; beno benei ’elqanah, zofay beno wenaHat beno. 
1_chronicles 6:27	’eli’aw beno yeroHam beno ’elqanah weno. 
1_chronicles 6:28	uwenei shemu’eil habekhor washni wa’awiyah.
1_chronicles 6:29	benei merari maHli; liwni weno shim‘i weno ‘uccah weno. 
1_chronicles 6:30	shim‘a weno Hagiyah weno ‘asayah weno.
1_chronicles 6:31	we’eileh, ’asher he‘emid dawid ‘al yedei shir beit yhoh; mimenoaH ha’aron. 
1_chronicles 6:32	wayihyu mesharetim lifnei mishkan ’ohel mo‘eid bashir, ‘ad benot shelomoh ’et beit yhoh birushalim; waya‘amdu khemishpaTam ‘al ‘awodatam. 
1_chronicles 6:33	we’eileh ha‘omedim uweneihem; mibenei haqehati, heiman hamshoreir, ben yo’eil ben shemu’eil. 
1_chronicles 6:34	ben ’elqanah ben yeroHam, ben ’eli’eil ben toaH. 
1_chronicles 6:35	ben zif zuf ben ’elqanah, ben maHat ben ‘amasay. 
1_chronicles 6:36	ben ’elqanah ben yo’eil, ben ‘acaryah ben zefanyah. 
1_chronicles 6:37	ben taHat ben ’assir, ben ’ewyasaf ben qoraH. 
1_chronicles 6:38	ben yizhar ben qehat, ben leiwi ben yisra’eil. 
1_chronicles 6:39	we’aHiw ’asaf, ha‘omeid ‘al yemino; ’asaf ben berekhyahu ben shim‘a. 
1_chronicles 6:40	ben mikha’eil ben ba‘aseiyah ben malkiyah. 
1_chronicles 6:41	ben ’etni wen ceraH ben ‘adayah. 
1_chronicles 6:42	ben ’eitan ben cimah ben shim‘i. 
1_chronicles 6:43	ben yaHat ben geireshom ben leiwi.
1_chronicles 6:44	uwenei merari ’aHeihem ‘al hasemol; ’eitan ben qishi, ben ‘awdi ben malukh. 
1_chronicles 6:45	ben Hashawyah wen ’amazyah ben Hilqiyah. 
1_chronicles 6:46	ben ’amzi wen bani ben shamer. 
1_chronicles 6:47	ben maHli ben mushi, ben merari ben leiwi.
1_chronicles 6:48	wa’aHeihem halwiyim; netunim lekhal ‘awodat, mishkan beit ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 6:49	we’aharon uwanaw maqTirim ‘al micbaH ha‘olah we‘al micbaH haqeToret, lekhol melekhet qodesh haqodashim; ulekhapeir ‘al yisra’eil, kekhol ’asher ziwwah, mosheh ‘ewed ha’elohim.
1_chronicles 6:50	we’eileh benei ’aharon; ’el‘acar beno pineHas beno ’awishua‘ beno. 
1_chronicles 6:51	buqi weno ‘ucci weno ceraHyah weno. 
1_chronicles 6:52	merayot beno ’amaryah weno ’aHiTuw beno. 
1_chronicles 6:53	zadoq beno ’aHima‘az beno.
1_chronicles 6:54	we’eileh moshewotam, leTirotam bigwulam; liwnei ’aharon lemishpaHat haqehati, ki lahem hayah hagoral. 
1_chronicles 6:55	wayitenu lahem ’et Hewron be’erez yehudah; we’et migrasheha sewiwoteha. 
1_chronicles 6:56	we’et sedeih ha‘ir we’et Hazeireha; natenu lekhaleiw ben yefuneh.
1_chronicles 6:57	weliwnei ’aharon, natenu ’et ‘arei hamiqlaT, ’et Hewron we’et liwnah we’et migrasheha; we’et yatir we’et ’eshtemoa‘ we’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:58	we’et Hileic we’et migrasheha, ’et dewir we’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:59	we’et ‘ashan we’et migrasheha, we’et beit shemesh we’et migrasheha.
1_chronicles 6:60	umimaTeih winyamin, ’et gewa‘ we’et migrasheha we’et ‘alemet we’et migrasheha, we’et ‘anatot we’et migrasheha; kal ‘areihem shelosh ‘esreih ‘ir bemishpeHoteihem.
1_chronicles 6:61	weliwnei qehat hanotarim, mimishpaHat hamaTeh mimaHazit maTeih Hazi menasheh bagoral ‘arim ‘aser.
1_chronicles 6:62	weliwnei geireshom lemishpeHotam, mimaTeih yisashkhar umimaTeih ’asheir umimaTeih naftali, umimaTeih menasheh babashan, ‘arim shelosh ‘esreih.
1_chronicles 6:63	liwnei merari lemishpeHotam, mimaTeih re’uwein umimaTeih gad umimaTeih cewulun bagoral, ‘arim sheteim ‘esreih. 
1_chronicles 6:64	wayitenu wenei yisra’eil lalwiyim; ’et he‘arim we’et migresheihem. 
1_chronicles 6:65	wayitenu wagoral, mimaTeih wenei yehudah umimaTeih wenei shim‘on, umimaTeih benei winyamin; ’eit he‘arim ha’eileh, ’asher yiqre’u ’ethem besheimot.
1_chronicles 6:66	umimishpeHot benei qehat; wayhi ‘arei gewulam, mimaTeih ’efrayim. 
1_chronicles 6:67	wayitenu lahem ’et ‘arei hamiqlaT ’et shekhem we’et migrasheha behar ’efrayim; we’et gecer we’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:68	we’et yaqeme‘am we’et migrasheha, we’et beit Horon we’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:69	we’et ’ayalon we’et migrasheha, we’et gat rimon we’et migrasheha.
1_chronicles 6:70	umimaHazit maTeih menasheh, ’et ‘aneir we’et migrasheha, we’et bil‘am we’et migrasheha; lemishpaHat liwnei qehat hanotarim.
1_chronicles 6:71	liwnei geireshom mimishpaHat, Hazi maTeih menasheh, ’et golan babashan we’et migrasheha; we’et ‘ashtarot we’et migrasheha.
1_chronicles 6:72	umimaTeih yisashkhar, ’et qedesh we’et migrasheha; ’et dawerat we’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:73	we’et ramot we’et migrasheha, we’et ‘aneim we’et migrasheha.
1_chronicles 6:74	umimaTeih ’asheir, ’et mashal we’et migrasheha; we’et ‘awdon we’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:75	we’et Huqoq we’et migrasheha, we’et reHow we’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:76	umimaTeih naftali, ’et qedesh bagalil we’et migrasheha, we’et Hamon we’et migrasheha; we’et qiryatayim we’et migrasheha.
1_chronicles 6:77	liwnei merari hanotarim mimaTeih cewulun, ’et rimono we’et migrasheha; ’et tawor we’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:78	umei‘eiwer leyardein yereiHo lemicraH hayardein mimaTeih re’uwein, ’et bezer bamidbar we’et migrasheha; we’et yahzah we’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:79	we’et qedeimot we’et migrasheha, we’et meifa‘at we’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:80	umimaTeih gad, ’et ramot bagil‘ad we’et migrasheha; we’et maHanayim we’et migrasheha. 
1_chronicles 6:81	we’et Heshbon we’et migrasheha, we’et ya‘ceir we’et migrasheha.
1_chronicles 7:1	weliwnei yisashkhar, tola‘ ufu’ah yashiw yashuw weshimron ’arba‘ah.
1_chronicles 7:2	uwenei tola‘, ‘ucci urefayah wiri’eil weyaHmay weyiwsam ushemu’eil, rashim leweit ’awotam letola‘, giborei Hayil letoledotam; misparam bimei dawid, ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef wesheish mei’ot.
1_chronicles 7:3	uwenei ‘ucci yicraHyah; uwenei yicraHyah, mikha’eil we‘owadyah weyo’eil yishiyah Hamishah rashim kulam. 
1_chronicles 7:4	wa‘aleihem letoledotam leweit ’awotam, gedudei zewa milHamah, sheloshim weshishah ’alef; ki hirbu nashim uwanim. 
1_chronicles 7:5	wa’aHeihem, lekhol mishpeHot yisashkhar, giborei Hayalim; shemonim weshiw‘ah ’elef, hityaHsam lakol.
1_chronicles 7:6	binyamin, bela‘ wawekher widi‘a’eil sheloshah. 
1_chronicles 7:7	uwenei wela‘, ’ezbon we‘ucci we‘ucci’eil wirimot we‘iri Hamishah, rashei beit ’awot, giborei Hayalim; wehityaHsam, ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef, usheloshim we’arba‘ah.
1_chronicles 7:8	uwenei wekher, cemirah weyo‘ash we’eli‘ecer we’elyo‘einay we‘ameri wireimot wa’awiyah, wa‘anatot we‘alamet; kal ’eileh benei wakher. 
1_chronicles 7:9	wehityaHsam letoledotam, rashei beit ’awotam, giborei Hayil; ‘esrim ’elef umatayim.
1_chronicles 7:10	uwenei yedi‘a’eil bilhan; uwenei wilhan, ye‘ish ye‘ush uwinyamin we’eihud ukhena‘anah weceitan, wetarshish wa’aHishaHar. 
1_chronicles 7:11	kal ’eileh benei yedi‘a’eil lerashei ha’awot, giborei Hayalim; shiw‘ah ‘asar ’elef umatayim, yoze’ei zawa lamilHamah. 
1_chronicles 7:12	weshupim weHupim benei ‘ir, Hushim benei ’aHeir. 
1_chronicles 7:13	benei naftali, yaHazi’eil weguni weyeizer weshalum benei wilhah.
1_chronicles 7:14	benei menasheh, ’asri’eil ’asher yaladah; pilagsho ha’aramiyah, yaledah ’et makhir ’awi gil‘ad. 
1_chronicles 7:15	umakhir laqaH ’ishah leHupim uleshupim, wesheim ’aHoto ma‘akhah, wesheim hasheini zelafeHad; watihyenah lizlafeHad banot. 
1_chronicles 7:16	wateiled ma‘akhah ’eishet makhir bein, watiqra shemo peresh, wesheim ’aHiw sharesh; uwanaw ’ulam waraqem. 
1_chronicles 7:17	uwenei ’ulam bedan; ’eileh benei gil‘ad, ben makhir ben menasheh. 
1_chronicles 7:18	wa’aHoto hamolekhet; yaledah ’et ’ishehod, we’et ’awi‘ecer we’et maHlah. 
1_chronicles 7:19	wayihyu benei shemida‘; ’aHyan washekhem, weliqHi wa’ani‘am.
1_chronicles 7:20	uwenei ’efrayim shutalaH; uwered beno wetaHat beno, we’el‘adah weno wetaHat beno. 
1_chronicles 7:21	wecawad beno weshutelaH beno we‘eicer we’el‘ad; waharagum, ’anshei gat hanoladim ba’arez, ki yaredu, laqaHat ’et miqneihem. 
1_chronicles 7:22	wayit’abeil ’efrayim ’awihem yamim rabim; wayawo’u ’eHaw lenaHamo. 
1_chronicles 7:23	wayawo ’el ’ishto, watahar wateiled bein; wayiqra ’et shemo beri‘ah, ki wera‘ah hayetah beweito. 
1_chronicles 7:24	uwito she’erah, watiwen ’et beit Horon hataHton we’et ha‘elyon; we’eit ’uccein she’erah. 
1_chronicles 7:25	werefaH beno, wereshef wetelaH beno wetaHan beno. 
1_chronicles 7:26	la‘dan beno ‘amihud beno ’elishama‘ beno. 
1_chronicles 7:27	non beno yehoshua‘ beno. 
1_chronicles 7:28	wa’aHuccatam umoshewotam, beit ’eil uwenoteha; welamicraH na‘aran, welama‘araw, gecer uwenoteha ushekhem uwenoteha, ‘ad ‘ayah uwenoteha. 
1_chronicles 7:29	we‘al yedei wenei menasheh, beit she’an uwenoteha ta‘nakh uwenoteha, megido uwenoteha dor uwenoteha; be’eileh yashewu, benei yoseif ben yisra’eil.
1_chronicles 7:30	benei ’asheir, yimnah weyishwah weyishwi uweri‘ah weseraH ’aHotam. 
1_chronicles 7:31	uwenei weri‘ah, Hewer umalki’eil; hu ’awi wircot wircayit. 
1_chronicles 7:32	weHewer holid ’et yafleiT, we’et shomeir we’et Hotam; we’eit shu‘a ’aHotam. 
1_chronicles 7:33	uwenei yafleiT, pasakh uwimhal we‘ashwat; ’eileh benei yafleiT. 
1_chronicles 7:34	uwenei shamer; ’aHi werohagah werahegah yaHbah weHubah wa’aram. 
1_chronicles 7:35	uwen heilem ’aHiw; zofaH weyimna‘ wesheilesh we‘amal. 
1_chronicles 7:36	benei zofaH; suaH weHarnefer weshu‘al uweiri weyimrah. 
1_chronicles 7:37	bezer wahod, weshama weshilshah weyitran uwe’eira. 
1_chronicles 7:38	uwenei yeter; yefuneh ufispah wa’ra. 
1_chronicles 7:39	uwenei ‘ula; ’araH weHani’eil werizya. 
1_chronicles 7:40	kal ’eileh wenei ’asheir rashei weit ha’awot berurim giborei Hayalim, rashei hanesi’im; wehityaHsam bazawa bamilHamah, misparam ’anashim, ‘esrim weshishah ’alef.
1_chronicles 8:1	uwinyamin, holid ’et bela‘ bekhoro; ’ashbeil hasheini, we’aHraH hashelishi. 
1_chronicles 8:2	noHah harewi‘i, werafa haHamishi.
1_chronicles 8:3	wayihyu wanim lewala‘; ’adar wegeira wa’awihud. 
1_chronicles 8:4	wa’awishua‘ wena‘aman wa’aHoaH. 
1_chronicles 8:5	wegeira ushefufan weHuram. 
1_chronicles 8:6	we’eileh benei ’eiHud; ’eileh heim rashei ’awot leyoshewei gewa‘, wayaglum ’el manaHat. 
1_chronicles 8:7	wena‘aman wa’aHiyah wegeira hu heglam; weholid ’et ‘ucca we’et ’aHiHud. 
1_chronicles 8:8	weshaHarayim, holid bisdeih mo’aw, min shilHo ’otam; Hushim we’et ba‘ara nashaw. 
1_chronicles 8:9	wayoled min Hodesh ’ishto; ’et yowaw we’et ziwya, we’et meisha we’et malkam. 
1_chronicles 8:10	we’et ye‘uz we’et sakheyah we’et mirmah; ’eileh wanaw rashei ’awot. 
1_chronicles 8:11	umeiHushim holid ’et ’awiTuw we’et ’elpa‘al. 
1_chronicles 8:12	uwenei ’elpa‘al, ‘eiwer umish‘am washamed; hu banah ’et ’ono, we’et lod uwenoteha. 
1_chronicles 8:13	uweri‘ah washema‘, heimah rashei ha’awot, leyoshewei ’ayalon; heimah hiwriHu ’et yoshewei gat. 
1_chronicles 8:14	we’aHyo shashaq wireimot. 
1_chronicles 8:15	ucewadyah wa‘arad wa‘ader. 
1_chronicles 8:16	umikha’eil weyishpah weyoHa benei weri‘ah. 
1_chronicles 8:17	ucewadyah umeshulam weHicqi waHawer. 
1_chronicles 8:18	weyishmeray weyicli’ah weyowaw benei ’elpa‘al. 
1_chronicles 8:19	weyaqim wecikhri wecawdi. 
1_chronicles 8:20	we’eli‘einay weziletay we’eli’eil. 
1_chronicles 8:21	wa‘adayah uwerayah weshimrat benei shim‘i. 
1_chronicles 8:22	weyishpan wa‘eiwer we’eli’eil. 
1_chronicles 8:23	we‘awdon wecikhri weHanan. 
1_chronicles 8:24	waHananyah we‘eilam we‘antotiyah. 
1_chronicles 8:25	weyifdeyah ufeni’eil ufenu’eil benei shashaq. 
1_chronicles 8:26	weshamsheray usheHaryah wa‘atalyah. 
1_chronicles 8:27	weya‘areshyah we’eiliyah wecikhri benei yeroHam. 
1_chronicles 8:28	’eileh rashei ’awot letoledotam rashim; ’eileh yashewu wirushalim.
1_chronicles 8:29	uwegiw‘on yashewu ’awi giw‘on; wesheim ’ishto ma‘akhah. 
1_chronicles 8:30	uweno habekhor ‘awdon; wezur weqish uwa‘al wenadaw. 
1_chronicles 8:31	ugedor we’aHyo wacakher. 
1_chronicles 8:32	umiqlot holid ’et shim’ah; we’af heimah, neged ’aHeihem yashewu wirushalim ‘im ’aHeihem.
1_chronicles 8:33	weneir holid ’et qish, weqish holid ’et sha’ul; wesha’ul, holid ’et yehonatan we’et malki shua‘, we’et ’awinadaw we’et ’eshba‘al. 
1_chronicles 8:34	uwen yehonatan meriw ba‘al; umeriw ba‘al holid ’et mikhah.
1_chronicles 8:35	uwenei mikhah; piton wamelekh weta’reia‘ we’aHac. 
1_chronicles 8:36	we’aHac holid ’et yeho‘adah, wiho‘adah, holid ’et ‘alemet we’et ‘acmawet we’et cimri; wecimri holid ’et moza. 
1_chronicles 8:37	umoza holid ’et bin‘a; rafah weno ’el‘asah weno ’azeil beno. 
1_chronicles 8:38	ule’azeil shishah wanim we’eileh shemotam, ‘acriqam bokheru weyishma‘eil ushe‘aryah, we‘owadyah weHanan; kal ’eileh benei ’azal. 
1_chronicles 8:39	uwenei ‘eisheq ’aHiw; ’ulam bekhoro, ye‘ush hasheini, we’elifeleT hashelishi. 
1_chronicles 8:40	wayihyu wenei ’ulam ’anashim giborei Hayil dorekhei qeshet, umarbim banim uwenei wanim, mei’ah waHamishim; kal ’eileh mibenei winyamin.
1_chronicles 9:1	wekhal yisra’eil hityaHsu, wehinam ketuwim, ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’eil; wihudah hagelu lewawel bema‘alam.
1_chronicles 9:2	wehayoshewim harishonim, ’asher ba’aHuccatam be‘areihem; yisra’eil hakohanim, halwiyim wehanetinim. 
1_chronicles 9:3	uwirushalim yashewu, min benei yehudah umin benei winyamin; umin benei ’efrayim umenasheh. 
1_chronicles 9:4	‘utay ben ‘amihud ben ‘ameri ben ’imri wen banimin bani, min benei ferez ben yehudah. 
1_chronicles 9:5	umin hashiloni, ‘asayah habekhor uwanaw. 
1_chronicles 9:6	umin benei ceraH ye‘u’eil; wa’aHeihem sheish mei’ot wetish‘im. 
1_chronicles 9:7	umin benei binyamin; salu ben meshulam, ben hodawyah ben hassenu’ah. 
1_chronicles 9:8	weyiwneyah ben yeroHam, we’eilah wen ‘ucci ben mikhri; umeshulam ben shefaTyah, ben re‘u’eil ben yiwniyah. 
1_chronicles 9:9	wa’aHeihem letoledotam, tesha‘ mei’ot waHamishim weshishah; kal ’eileh ’anashim, rashei ’awot leweit ’awoteihem.
1_chronicles 9:10	umin hakohanim; yeda‘yah wihoyariw weyakhin. 
1_chronicles 9:11	wa‘acaryah wen Hilqiyah ben meshulam ben zadoq, ben merayot ben ’aHiTuw, negid beit ha’elohim.
1_chronicles 9:12	wa‘adayah ben yeroHam, ben pashHur ben malkiyah; uma‘say ben ‘adi’eil ben yaHceirah ben meshulam ben meshileimit ben ’imeir. 
1_chronicles 9:13	wa’aHeihem, rashim leweit ’awotam, ’elef ushewa‘ mei’ot weshishim; giborei Heil, melekhet ‘awodat beit ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 9:14	umin halwiyim; shema‘yah wen Hashuw ben ‘acriqam ben Hashawyah min benei merari. 
1_chronicles 9:15	uwaqbaqar Heresh wegalal; umatanyah ben mikha, ben cikhri ben ’asaf. 
1_chronicles 9:16	we‘owadyah ben shema‘yah, ben galal ben yedutun; uwerekhyah wen ’asa ben ’elqanah, hayosheiw beHazrei neTofati. 
1_chronicles 9:17	wehasho‘arim shalum we‘aquw, weTalmon wa’aHiman; wa’aHihem shalum harosh. 
1_chronicles 9:18	we‘ad heinah, besha‘ar hamelekh micraHah; heimah hasho‘arim, lemaHanot benei leiwi. 
1_chronicles 9:19	weshalum ben qorei ben ’ewyasaf ben qoraH we’eHaw leweit ’awiw haqareHim, ‘al melekhet ha‘awodah, shomerei hassipim la’ohel; wa’awoteihem ‘al maHaneih yhoh, shomerei hamawo. 
1_chronicles 9:20	ufineHas ben ’el‘acar, nagid hayah ‘aleihem lefanim yhoh ‘imo. 
1_chronicles 9:21	cekharyah ben meshelemyah, sho‘eir petaH le’ohel mo‘eid. 
1_chronicles 9:22	kulam haberurim lesho‘arim bassipim, matayim usheneim ‘asar; heimah weHazreihem hityaHsam, heimah yissad dawid ushemu’eil haro’eh be’emunatam. 
1_chronicles 9:23	weheim uweneihem ‘al hashe‘arim leweit yhoh leweit ha’ohel lemishmarot. 
1_chronicles 9:24	le’arba‘ ruHot, yihyu hasho‘arim; micraH yamah zafonah wanegbah. 
1_chronicles 9:25	wa’aHeihem beHazreihem lawo leshiw‘at hayamim mei‘eit ’el ‘eit ‘im ’eileh. 
1_chronicles 9:26	ki we’emunah heimah, ’arba‘at giborei hasho‘arim, heim halwiyim; wehayu ‘al haleshakhot, we‘al ha’ozerot beit ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 9:27	usewiwot beit ha’elohim yalinu; ki ‘aleihem mishmeret, weheim ‘al hamafteiaH welaboqer laboqer. 
1_chronicles 9:28	umeihem ‘al kelei ha‘awodah; ki wemispar yewi’um, uwemispar yozi’um. 
1_chronicles 9:29	umeihem, memunim ‘al hakeilim, we‘al kal kelei haqodesh; we‘al hassolet wehayayin wehashemen, wehalewonah wehabesamim. 
1_chronicles 9:30	umin benei hakohanim, roqeHei hamirqaHat labesamim. 
1_chronicles 9:31	umatityah min halwiyim, hu habekhor leshalum haqareHi; be’emunah ‘al ma‘aseih haHawitim. 
1_chronicles 9:32	umin benei haqehati min ’aHeihem ‘al leHem hama‘arakhet; lehakhin shabat shabat.
1_chronicles 9:33	we’eileh hamshorerim rashei ’awot lalwiyim baleshakhot peTirim peTurim; ki yomam walaylah ‘aleihem bamelakhah. 
1_chronicles 9:34	’eileh rashei ha’awot lalwiyim letoledotam rashim; ’eileh yashewu wirushalim.
1_chronicles 9:35	uwegiw‘on yashewu ’awi giw‘on ye‘u’eil ye‘i’eil; wesheim ’ishto ma‘akhah. 
1_chronicles 9:36	uweno habekhor ‘awdon; wezur weqish, uwa‘al weneir wenadaw. 
1_chronicles 9:37	ugedor we’aHyo, ucekharyah umiqlot. 
1_chronicles 9:38	umiqlot holid ’et shim’am; we’af heim, neged ’aHeihem yashewu wirushalim ‘im ’aHeihem.
1_chronicles 9:39	weneir holid ’et qish, weqish holid ’et sha’ul; wesha’ul, holid ’et yehonatan we’et malki shua‘, we’et ’awinadaw we’et ’eshba‘al. 
1_chronicles 9:40	uwen yehonatan meriw ba‘al; umeri wa‘al holid ’et mikhah. 
1_chronicles 9:41	uwenei mikhah; piton wamelekh wetaHreia‘. 
1_chronicles 9:42	we’aHac holid ’et ya‘rah, weya‘rah, holid ’et ‘alemet we’et ‘acmawet we’et cimri; wecimri holid ’et moza. 
1_chronicles 9:43	umoza holid ’et bin‘a; urefayah weno ’el‘asah weno ’azeil beno. 
1_chronicles 9:44	ule’azeil shishah wanim we’eileh shemotam, ‘acriqam bokheru weyishma‘eil ushe‘aryah, we‘owadyah weHanan; ’eileh benei ’azal.
1_chronicles 10:1	ufelishtim nilHamu weyisra’eil; wayanas; ’ish yisra’eil mipenei felishtim, wayipelu Halalim behar gilboa‘. 
1_chronicles 10:2	wayadbequ felishtim, ’aHarei sha’ul we’aHarei wanaw; wayaku felishtim, ’et yonatan we’et ’awinadaw we’et malki shua‘ benei sha’ul. 
1_chronicles 10:3	watikhbad hamilHamah ‘al sha’ul, wayimza’uhu hamorim baqashet; wayaHel min hayorim. 
1_chronicles 10:4	wayomer sha’ul ’el nosei kheilaw shelof Harbekha wedaqereini wah, pen yawo’u ha‘areilim ha’eileh wehit‘alelu wi, welo ’awah nosei kheilaw, ki yarei me’od; s wayiqaH sha’ul ’et haHerew, wayipol ‘aleha. 
1_chronicles 10:5	wayar nosei kheilaw ki meit sha’ul; wayipol gam hu ‘al haHerew wayamot.
1_chronicles 10:6	wayamat sha’ul usheloshet banaw, wekhal beito yaHdaw meitu. 
1_chronicles 10:7	wayir’u kal ’ish yisra’eil ’asher ba‘eimeq ki nasu, wekhi meitu sha’ul uwanaw; waya‘acwu ‘areihem wayanusu, wayawo’u felishtim, wayeishewu bahem.
1_chronicles 10:8	wayhi mimaHorat, wayawo’u felishtim, lefasheiT ’et haHalalim; wayimze’u ’et sha’ul we’et banaw, nofelim behar gilboa‘. 
1_chronicles 10:9	wayafshiTuhu, wayis’u ’et rosho we’et keilaw; wayshaleHu we’erez felishtim sawiw, lewaseir ’et ‘azabeihem we’et ha‘am. 
1_chronicles 10:10	wayasimu ’et keilaw, beit ’eloheihem; we’et gulgaleto taqe‘u beit dagon.
1_chronicles 10:11	wayishme‘u, kol yaweish gil‘ad; ’eit kal ’asher ‘asu felishtim lesha’ul. 
1_chronicles 10:12	wayaqumu kal ’ish Hayil wayis’u ’et gufat sha’ul, we’eit gufot banaw, waywi’um yaweishah; wayiqberu ’et ‘azmoteihem taHat ha’eilah beyaweish, wayazumu shiw‘at yamim. 
1_chronicles 10:13	wayamat sha’ul, bema‘alo ’asher ma‘al yhoh, ‘al dewar yhoh ’asher lo shamar; wegam lish’ol ba’ow lidrosh. 
1_chronicles 10:14	welo darash yhoh waymiteihu; wayasseiw ’et hamelukhah, ledawid ben yishay.
1_chronicles 11:1	wayiqawezu khal yisra’eil ’el dawid Hewronah leimor; hineih ‘azmekha uwesarekha ’anaHenu. 
1_chronicles 11:2	gam temol gam shilshom, gam bihyot sha’ul melekh, ’atah hamozi wehameiwi ’et yisra’eil; wayomer yhoh ’elohekha lekha, ’atah tir‘eh ’et ‘ami ’et yisra’eil, we’atah tihyeh nagid, ‘al ‘ami yisra’eil. 
1_chronicles 11:3	wayawo’u kal ciqnei yisra’eil ’el hamelekh Hewronah, wayikhrot lahem dawid berit beHewron lifnei yhoh; wayimsheHu ’et dawid lemelekh ‘al yisra’eil, kidwar yhoh beyad shemu’eil.
1_chronicles 11:4	wayeilekh dawid wekhal yisra’eil yerushalim hi yewus; wesham haywusi, yoshewei ha’arez. 
1_chronicles 11:5	wayomeru yoshewei yewus ledawid, lo tawo heinah; wayilkod dawid ’et mezudat ziyon, hi ‘ir dawid. 
1_chronicles 11:6	wayomer dawid, kal makeih yewusi barishonah, yihyeh lerosh ulesar; waya‘al barishonah yo’aw ben zeruyah wayhi lerosh. 
1_chronicles 11:7	wayeishew dawid bamzad; ‘al kein qare’u lo ‘ir dawid. 
1_chronicles 11:8	wayiwen ha‘ir missawiw, min hamilo we‘ad hassawiw; weyo’aw yeHayeh ’et she’ar ha‘ir. 
1_chronicles 11:9	wayeilekh dawid halokh wegadol; yhoh zewa’ot ‘imo.
1_chronicles 11:10	we’eileh rashei hagiborim ’asher ledawid, hamitHacceqim ‘imo wemalkhuto ‘im kal yisra’eil lehamlikho; kidwar yhoh ‘al yisra’eil.
1_chronicles 11:11	we’eileh mispar hagiborim ’asher ledawid; yashawe‘am ben Hakhmoni, rosh hasheloshim hashalishim, hu ‘oreir ’et Hanito ‘al shelosh mei’ot Halal befa‘am ’eHat. 
1_chronicles 11:12	we’aHaraw ’el‘acar ben dodo ha’aHoHi; hu bishloshah hagiborim. 
1_chronicles 11:13	hu hayah ‘im dawid bapas damim, wehapelishtim ne’esfu sham lamilHamah, watehi Helqat hasadeh melei’ah se‘orim; weha‘am nasu mipenei felishtim. 
1_chronicles 11:14	wayityazewu wetokh haHelqah wayaziluha, wayaku ’et pelishtim; wayosha‘ yhoh teshu‘ah gedolah. 
1_chronicles 11:15	wayeiredu sheloshah min hasheloshim rosh ‘al hazur ’el dawid, ’el me‘arat ‘adulam; umaHaneih felishtim, Honah be‘eimeq refa’im. 
1_chronicles 11:16	wedawid ’ac bamezudah; uneziw pelishtim, ’ac beweit laHem. 
1_chronicles 11:17	wayit’aw wayit’aw dawid wayomar; mi yashqeini mayim, mibor beit leHem ’asher basha‘ar. 
1_chronicles 11:18	wayiwqe‘u hasheloshah bemaHaneih felishtim, wayish’awu mayim mibor beit leHem ’asher basha‘ar, wayis’u wayawi’u ’el dawid; welo ’awah dawid lishtotam, waynasseikh ’otam yhoh. 
1_chronicles 11:19	wayomer Halilah li mei’elohay mei‘asot cot, hadam ha’anashim ha’eileh ’eshteh wenafshotam ki wenafshotam hewi’um, welo ’awah lishtotam; ’eileh ‘asu, sheloshet hagiborim. 
1_chronicles 11:20	we’awshay ’aHi yo’aw, hu hayah rosh hasheloshah, wehu ‘oreir ’et Hanito, ‘al shelosh mei’ot Halal; welo welo sheim basheloshah. 
1_chronicles 11:21	min hasheloshah washenayim nikhbad, wayhi lahem lesar; we‘ad hasheloshah lo wa.
1_chronicles 11:22	benayah wen yehoyada‘ ben ’ish Hayil raw pe‘alim min qawze’eil; hu hikah, ’eit shenei ’ari’eil mo’aw, wehu yarad wehikah ’et ha’ari betokh habor beyom hashaleg. 
1_chronicles 11:23	wehu hikah ’et ha’ish hamizri ’ish midah Hameish ba’amah, uweyad hamizri Hanit kimnor ’oregim, wayeired ’eilaw bashaweT; wayigcol ’et haHanit miyad hamizri, wayahargeihu baHanito. 
1_chronicles 11:24	’eileh ‘asah, benayahu ben yehoyada‘; welo sheim bishloshah hagiborim. 
1_chronicles 11:25	min hasheloshim, hino nikhbad hu, we’el hasheloshah lo wa; waysimeihu dawid ‘al mishma‘to.
1_chronicles 11:26	wegiborei haHayalim; ‘asah ’eil ’aHi yo’aw, ’elHanan ben dodo mibeit laHem.
1_chronicles 11:27	shamot haharori, Helez hapeloni.
1_chronicles 11:28	‘ira wen ‘iqeish hateqo‘i, ’awi‘ecer ha‘anetoti.
1_chronicles 11:29	sibekhay haHushati, ‘ilay ha’aHoHi.
1_chronicles 11:30	mahray haneTofati, Heiled ben ba‘anah haneTofati.
1_chronicles 11:31	’itay ben riway, migiw‘at benei winyamin, s benayah hapir‘atoni. 
1_chronicles 11:32	Huray minaHalei ga‘ash, s ’awi’eil ha‘arwati.
1_chronicles 11:33	‘acmawet habaHarumi, ’elyaHba hasha‘alwoni.
1_chronicles 11:34	benei, hasheim hagiconi, yonatan ben shageih haharari.
1_chronicles 11:35	’aHi’am ben sakhar haharari ’elifal ben ’ur.
1_chronicles 11:36	Heifer hamekheirati, ’aHiyah hapeloni.
1_chronicles 11:37	Hezro hakarmeli, na‘aray ben ’ecbay.
1_chronicles 11:38	yo’eil ’aHi natan, miwHar ben hagri.
1_chronicles 11:39	zeleq ha‘amoni; naHray habeiroti, nosei kelei yo’aw ben zeruyah.
1_chronicles 11:40	‘ira hayitri, gareiw hayitri.
1_chronicles 11:41	’uriyah haHiti, cawad ben ’aHlay.
1_chronicles 11:42	‘adina wen shica har’uweini, rosh lar’uweini we‘alaw sheloshim.
1_chronicles 11:43	Hanan ben ma‘akhah, weyoshafaT hamitni.
1_chronicles 11:44	‘uciya ha‘ashterati; shama‘ wi‘u’eil wi‘i’eil, s benei Hotam ha‘aro‘eiri.
1_chronicles 11:45	yedi‘a’eil ben shimri, weyoHa ’aHiw hatizi.
1_chronicles 11:46	’eli’eil hamaHawim, wiriway weyoshawyah benei ’elna‘am; weyitmah hamo’awi. 
1_chronicles 11:47	’eli’eil we‘oweid, weya‘asi’eil hamezowayah.
1_chronicles 12:1	we’eileh, haba’im ’el dawid leziqelag, ‘od ‘azur, mipenei sha’ul ben qish; weheimah bagiborim, ‘ocerei hamilHamah. 
1_chronicles 12:2	nosheqei qeshet, mayminim umasmilim ba’awanim, uwaHizim baqashet; mei’aHei sha’ul mibinyamin. 
1_chronicles 12:3	harosh ’aHi‘ecer weyo’ash, benei hashema‘ah hagiw‘ati, wicu’eil wici’eil wafeleT benei ‘acmawet; uwerakhah weyeihu ha‘anetoti. 
1_chronicles 12:4	weyishma‘yah hagiw‘oni gibor basheloshim we‘al hasheloshim. 
1_chronicles 12:5	weyirmeyah weyaHaci’eil weyoHanan, weyocawad hagedeirati. 
1_chronicles 12:6	’el‘ucay wirimot uwe‘alyah ushemaryahu, ushefaTyahu haHarifi haHarufi. 
1_chronicles 12:7	’elqanah weyishiyahu wa‘acar’eil weyo‘ecer weyashawe‘am haqareHim. 
1_chronicles 12:8	weyo‘eilah ucewadyah benei yeroHam min hagedor. 
1_chronicles 12:9	umin hagadi niwdelu ’el dawid lamzad midbarah giborei haHayil, ’anshei zawa lamilHamah, ‘orekhei zinah waromaH; ufenei ’aryeih peneihem, wekhizwayim ‘al heharim lemaheir.
1_chronicles 12:10	‘eicer harosh; ‘owadyah hasheini, ’eli’aw hashelishi. 
1_chronicles 12:11	mishmanah harewi‘i, yirmeyah haHamishi. 
1_chronicles 12:12	‘atay hashishi, ’eli’eil hashewi‘i. 
1_chronicles 12:13	yoHanan hashemini, ’elcawad hateshi‘i. 
1_chronicles 12:14	yirmeyahu ha‘asiri, s makhbanay ‘ashtei ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 12:15	’eileh mibenei gad rashei hazawa; ’eHad lemei’ah haqaTan, wehagadol le’alef. 
1_chronicles 12:16	’eileh heim, ’asher ‘aweru ’et hayardein baHodesh harishon, wehu memalei ‘al kal gidyotaw gedotaw; wayawriHu ’et kal ha‘amaqim, lamicraH welama‘araw.
1_chronicles 12:17	wayawo’u, min benei winyamin wihudah, ‘ad lamzad ledawid. 
1_chronicles 12:18	wayeizei dawid lifneihem waya‘an wayomer lahem, ’im leshalom batem ’eilay le‘acereini, yihyeh li ‘aleikhem leiwaw leyaHad; we’im leramotani lezaray, belo Hamas bekhapay, yeire ’elohei ’awoteinu weyokhaH.
1_chronicles 12:19	weruaH laweshah, ’et ‘amasay rosh hasheloshim hashalishim lekha dawid we‘imekha wen yishay, shalom shalom lekha, weshalom le‘ocerekha, ki ‘acarekha ’elohekha; wayqabeleim dawid, wayiteneim berashei hagedud.
1_chronicles 12:20	umimenasheh nafelu ‘al dawid, bewo’o ‘im pelishtim ‘al sha’ul lamilHamah welo ‘acarum; ki we‘eizah, shileHuhu sarnei felishtim leimor, berasheinu yipol ’el ’adonaw sha’ul. 
1_chronicles 12:21	belekhto ’el ziqelag, nafelu ‘alaw mimenasheh ‘adnaH weyocawad widi‘a’eil umikha’eil weyocawad, we’elihu weziletay; rashei ha’alafim ’asher limnasheh. 
1_chronicles 12:22	weheimah, ‘aceru ‘im dawid ‘al hagedud, ki giborei Hayil kulam; wayihyu sarim bazawa. 
1_chronicles 12:23	ki le‘et yom beyom, yawo’u ‘al dawid le‘acero; ‘ad lemaHaneh gadol kemaHaneih ’elohim.
1_chronicles 12:24	we’eileh misperei rashei heHaluz lazawa, ba’u ‘al dawid Hewronah; lehaseiw malkhut sha’ul ’eilaw kefi yhoh.
1_chronicles 12:25	benei yehudah, nose’ei zinah waromaH; sheishet ’alafim ushemoneh mei’ot Haluzei zawa.
1_chronicles 12:26	min benei shim‘on, giborei Hayil lazawa, shiw‘at ’alafim umei’ah.
1_chronicles 12:27	min benei haleiwi, ’arba‘at ’alafim wesheish mei’ot.
1_chronicles 12:28	wihoyada‘ hanagid le’aharon; we‘imo sheloshet ’alafim ushewa‘ mei’ot.
1_chronicles 12:29	wezadoq na‘ar gibor Hayil; uweit ’awiw sarim ‘esrim ushenayim.
1_chronicles 12:30	umin benei winyamin ’aHei sha’ul sheloshet ’alafim; we‘ad heinah marbitam, shomerim mishmeret beit sha’ul.
1_chronicles 12:31	umin benei ’efrayim, ‘esrim ’elef ushemoneh mei’ot; giborei Hayil, ’anshei sheimot leweit ’awotam.
1_chronicles 12:32	umeiHazi maTeih menasheh, shemonah ‘asar ’alef; ’asher niqewu besheimot, lawo lehamlikh ’et dawid.
1_chronicles 12:33	umibenei yisashkhar, yod‘ei winah la‘itim, lada‘at mah ya‘aseh yisra’eil; rasheihem matayim, wekhal ’aHeihem ‘al pihem.
1_chronicles 12:34	miccewulun yoz’ei zawa, ‘orekhei milHamah bekhal kelei milHamah Hamishim ’alef; wela‘ador belo leiw waleiw.
1_chronicles 12:35	uminaftali sarim ’alef; we‘imahem bezinah waHanit, sheloshim weshiw‘ah ’alef.
1_chronicles 12:36	umin hadani ‘orekhei milHamah, ‘esrim ushemonah ’elef wesheish mei’ot.
1_chronicles 12:37	umei’asheir, yoz’ei zawa la‘arokh milHamah ’arba‘im ’alef.
1_chronicles 12:38	umei‘eiwer layardein min har’uweini wehagadi waHazi sheiweT menasheh, bekhol kelei zewa milHamah, mei’ah we‘esrim ’alef. 
1_chronicles 12:39	kal ’eileh ’anshei milHamah ‘oderei ma‘arakhah beleiwaw shaleim ba’u Hewronah, lehamlikh ’et dawid ‘al kal yisra’eil; wegam kal sheirit yisra’eil leiw ’eHad lehamlikh ’et dawid. 
1_chronicles 12:40	wayihyu sham ‘im dawid yamim sheloshah, ’okhelim weshotim; ki heikhinu lahem ’aHeihem. wegam haqerowim ’aleihem ‘ad yisashkhar ucewulun wenaftali, mewi’im leHem baHamorim uwagemalim uwaperadim uwabaqar ma’akhal qemaH deweilim wezimuqim weyayin weshemen uwaqar wezon larow; ki simHah beyisra’eil.
1_chronicles 13:1	wayiwwa‘az dawid, ‘im sarei ha’alafim wehamei’ot lekhal nagid. 
1_chronicles 13:2	wayomer dawid lekhol qehal yisra’eil, ’im ‘aleikhem Tow umin yhoh ’eloheinu, nifrezah nishleHah ‘al ’aHeinu hanish’arim, bekhol ’arzot yisra’eil, we‘imahem hakohanim wehalwiyim be‘arei migresheihem; weyiqawezu ’eileinu. 
1_chronicles 13:3	wenaseibah ’et ’aron ’eloheinu ’eileinu; ki lo derashnuhu bimei sha’ul. 
1_chronicles 13:4	wayomeru khal haqahal la‘asot kein; ki yashar hadawar be‘einei khal ha‘am. 
1_chronicles 13:5	wayaqheil dawid ’et kal yisra’eil, min shiHor mizrayim we‘ad lewo Hamat; lehawi ’et ’aron ha’elohim, miqiryat ye‘arim. 
1_chronicles 13:6	waya‘al dawid wekhal yisra’eil ba‘alatah, ’el qiryat ye‘arim ’asher lihudah; leha‘alot misham, ’eit ’aron ha’elohim yhoh yosheiw hakeruwim ’asher niqra sheim. 
1_chronicles 13:7	wayarkiwu ’et ’aron ha’elohim ‘al ‘agalah Hadashah, mibeit ’awinadaw; we‘ucca we’aHyo, nohagim ba‘agalah. 
1_chronicles 13:8	wedawid wekhal yisra’eil, mesaHaqim lifnei ha’elohim bekhal ‘oc; uweshirim uwekhinorot uwinwalim uwetupim, uwimziltayim uwaHazozerot. 
1_chronicles 13:9	wayawo’u ‘ad goren kidon; wayishlaH ‘ucca ’et yado, le’eHoc ’et ha’aron, ki shameTu habaqar. 
1_chronicles 13:10	wayiHar ’af yhoh be‘ucca, wayakeihu ‘al ’asher shalaH yado ‘al ha’aron; wayamat sham lifnei ’elohim. 
1_chronicles 13:11	wayiHar ledawid, ki faraz yhoh perez be‘ucca; wayiqra lamaqom hahu perez ‘ucca, ‘ad hayom hacceh. 
1_chronicles 13:12	wayira dawid ’et ha’elohim, bayom hahu leimor; heikh ’awi ’eilay, ’eit ’aron ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 13:13	welo heisir dawid ’et ha’aron ’eilaw ’el ‘ir dawid; wayaTeihu ’el beit ‘oweid ’edom hagiti. 
1_chronicles 13:14	wayeishew ’aron ha’elohim ‘im beit ‘oweid ’edom beweito sheloshah Hodashim; waywarekh yhoh ’et beit ‘oweid ’edom we’et kal ’asher lo.
1_chronicles 14:1	wayishlaH Hiram Huram melekh zor mal’akhim ’el dawid wa‘azei ’aracim, weHarashei qir, weHarashei ‘eizim; liwnot lo bayit. 
1_chronicles 14:2	wayeida‘ dawid, ki hekhino yhoh lemelekh ‘al yisra’eil; ki niseit lema‘lah malkhuto, ba‘awur ‘amo yisra’eil.
1_chronicles 14:3	wayiqaH dawid ‘od nashim birushalim; wayoled dawid ‘od banim uwanot. 
1_chronicles 14:4	we’eileh shemot hayludim, ’asher hayu lo birushalim; shamua‘ weshowaw, natan ushelomoh. 
1_chronicles 14:5	weyiwHar we’elishua‘ we’elpaleT. 
1_chronicles 14:6	wenogah wenefeg weyafia‘. 
1_chronicles 14:7	we’elishama‘ uwe‘elyada‘ we’elifaleT. 
1_chronicles 14:8	wayishme‘u felishtim, ki nimshaH dawid lemelekh ‘al kal yisra’eil, waya‘alu khal pelishtim lewaqeish ’et dawid; wayishma‘ dawid, wayeizei lifneihem. 
1_chronicles 14:9	ufelishtim ba’u; wayifsheTu be‘eimeq refa’im. 
1_chronicles 14:10	wayish’al dawid beilohim leimor, ha’e‘eleh ‘al pelishtiyim pelishtim, unetatam beyadi; wayomer lo yhoh ‘aleih, unetatim beyadekha. 
1_chronicles 14:11	waya‘alu bewa‘al perazim wayakeim sham dawid wayomer dawid, paraz ha’elohim ’et ’oyway beyadi keferez mayim; ‘al kein, qare’u sheim hamaqom hahu ba‘al perazim. 
1_chronicles 14:12	waya‘acwu sham ’et ’eloheihem; wayomer dawid, wayisarefu ba’eish.
1_chronicles 14:13	wayosifu ‘od pelishtim, wayifsheTu ba‘eimeq. 
1_chronicles 14:14	wayish’al ‘od dawid beilohim, wayomer lo ha’elohim, lo ta‘aleh ’aHareihem; haseiw mei‘aleihem, uwata lahem mimul habekha’im. 
1_chronicles 14:15	wihi keshame‘akha ’et qol haze‘adah berashei habekha’im, ’ac teizei wamilHamah; ki yaza ha’elohim lefanekha, lehakot ’et maHaneih felishtim. 
1_chronicles 14:16	waya‘as dawid, ka’asher ziwwahu ha’elohim; wayaku ’et maHaneih felishtim, migiw‘on we‘ad gacerah. 
1_chronicles 14:17	wayeizei sheim dawid bekhal ha’arazot; yhoh natan ’et paHdo ‘al kal hagoyim. 
1_chronicles 15:1	waya‘as lo watim be‘ir dawid; wayakhen maqom la’aron ha’elohim, wayeT lo ’ohel. 
1_chronicles 15:2	’ac ’amar dawid, lo laseit ’et ’aron ha’elohim, ki ’im halwiyim; ki wam baHar yhoh laseit ’et ’aron yhoh uleshareto ‘ad ‘olam.
1_chronicles 15:3	wayaqheil dawid ’et kal yisra’eil ’el yerushalim; leha‘alot ’et ’aron yhoh, ’el meqomo ’asher heikhin lo. 
1_chronicles 15:4	waye’esof dawid ’et benei ’aharon we’et halwiyim. 
1_chronicles 15:5	liwnei qehat; ’uri’eil hasar, we’eHaw mei’ah we‘esrim.
1_chronicles 15:6	liwnei merari; ‘asayah hasar, we’eHaw matayim we‘esrim.
1_chronicles 15:7	liwnei geireshom; yo’eil hasar, we’eHaw mei’ah usheloshim.
1_chronicles 15:8	liwnei ’elizafan; shema‘yah hasar we’eHaw matayim.
1_chronicles 15:9	liwnei Hewron; ’eli’eil hasar we’eHaw shemonim.
1_chronicles 15:10	liwnei ‘ucci’eil; ‘aminadaw hasar, we’eHaw mei’ah usheneim ‘asar.
1_chronicles 15:11	wayiqra dawid, lezadoq ule’ewyatar hakohanim; welalwiyim, le’uri’eil ‘asayah weyo’eil shema‘yah, we’eli’eil we‘aminadaw. 
1_chronicles 15:12	wayomer lahem, ’atem rashei ha’awot lalwiyim; hitqadeshu ’atem wa’aHeikhem, weha‘alitem, ’eit ’aron yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’el hakhinoti lo. 
1_chronicles 15:13	ki lemabarishonah lo ’atem; paraz yhoh ’eloheinu banu, ki lo derashnuhu kamishpaT. 
1_chronicles 15:14	wayitqadeshu, hakohanim wehalwiyim; leha‘alot ’et ’aron yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. 
1_chronicles 15:15	wayis’u wenei halwiyim, ’eit ’aron ha’elohim, ka’asher ziwwah mosheh kidwar yhoh; bikhteifam bamoTot ‘aleihem.
1_chronicles 15:16	wayomer dawid lesarei halwiyim leha‘amid, ’et ’aHeihem hamshorerim, bikhlei shir newalim wekhinorot umeziltayim; mashmi‘im leharim beqol lesimHah.
1_chronicles 15:17	waya‘amidu halwiyim, ’eit heiman ben yo’eil, umin ’eHaw, ’asaf ben berekhyahu; s umin benei merari ’aHeihem, ’eitan ben qushayahu. 
1_chronicles 15:18	we‘imahem ’aHeihem hamishnim; cekharyahu bein weya‘aci’eil ushemiramot wiHi’eil we‘uni ’eli’aw uwenayahu uma‘aseiyahu umatityahu we’elifeleihu umiqneiyahu we‘oweid ’edom wi‘i’eil hasho‘arim. 
1_chronicles 15:19	wehamshorerim, heiman ’asaf we’eitan; bimziltayim neHoshet lehashmia‘. 
1_chronicles 15:20	ucekharyah wa‘aci’eil ushemiramot wiHi’eil we‘uni we’eli’aw, uma‘aseiyahu uwenayahu; binwalim ‘al ‘alamot. 
1_chronicles 15:21	umatityahu we’elifeleihu, umiqneiyahu we‘oweid ’edom, wi‘i’eil wa‘acacyahu; bekhinorot ‘al hasheminit lenazeiaH. 
1_chronicles 15:22	ukhenanyahu sar halwiyim bemasa; yasor bamasa, ki meiwin hu. 
1_chronicles 15:23	uwerekhyah we’elqanah, sho‘arim la’aron. 
1_chronicles 15:24	ushewanyahu weyoshafaT unetan’eil wa‘amasay ucekharyahu uwenayahu we’eli‘ecer hakohanim, maHazozerim maHzerim baHazozerot, lifnei ’aron ha’elohim; we‘oweid ’edom wiHiyah, sho‘arim la’aron. 
1_chronicles 15:25	wayhi dawid weciqnei yisra’eil wesarei ha’alafim; haholekhim, leha‘alot ’et ’aron berit yhoh min beit ‘oweid ’edom besimHah.
1_chronicles 15:26	wayhi be‘cor ha’elohim, ’et halwiyim, nose’ei ’aron berit yhoh; wayicbeHu shiw‘ah farim weshiw‘ah ’eilim. 
1_chronicles 15:27	wedawid mekhurbal bim‘il buz, wekhal halwiyim hanose’im ’et ha’aron, wehamshorerim, ukhenanyah hasar hamasa hamshorerim; we‘al dawid ’eifod bad. 
1_chronicles 15:28	wekhal yisra’eil, ma‘alim ’et ’aron berit yhoh, bitru‘ah uweqol shofar, uwaHazozerot uwimziltayim; mashmi‘im binwalim wekhinorot. 
1_chronicles 15:29	wayhi, ’aron berit yhoh, ba ‘ad ‘ir dawid; umikhal bat sha’ul nishqefah be‘ad haHalon, wateire ’et hamelekh dawid meraqeid umesaHeiq, watiwec lo belibah.
1_chronicles 16:1	wayawi’u ’et ’aron ha’elohim, wayazigu ’oto, betokh ha’ohel, ’asher naTah lo dawid; wayaqriwu ‘olot ushelamim lifnei ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 16:2	waykhal dawid, meiha‘alot ha‘olah wehashelamim; waywarekh ’et ha‘am besheim yhoh. 
1_chronicles 16:3	wayHaleiq lekhal ’ish yisra’eil, mei’ish we‘ad ’ishah; le’ish kikar leHem, we’eshpar wa’ashishah. 
1_chronicles 16:4	wayitein lifnei ’aron yhoh min halwiyim mesharetim; ulehackir ulehodot ulehaleil, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil.
1_chronicles 16:5	’asaf harosh umishneihu cekharyah; ye‘i’eil ushemiramot wiHi’eil umatityah we’eli’aw uwenayahu we‘oweid ’edom wi‘i’eil, bikhlei newalim uwekhinorot, we’asaf bamziltayim mashmia‘. 
1_chronicles 16:6	uwenayahu weyaHaci’eil hakohanim; baHazozerot tamid, lifnei ’aron berit ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 16:7	bayom hahu, ’ac natan dawid barosh, lehodot yhoh; beyad ’asaf we’eHaw.
1_chronicles 16:8	hodu yhoh qir’u wishmo, hodi‘u wa‘amim ‘alilotaw. 
1_chronicles 16:9	shiru lo cameru lo, siHu bekhal nifle’otaw. 
1_chronicles 16:10	hithalu besheim qadesho, yismaH leiw mewaqshei yhoh. 
1_chronicles 16:11	dirshu yhoh we‘ucco, baqeshu fanaw tamid. 
1_chronicles 16:12	cikhru, nifle’otaw ’asher ‘asah, mofetaw umishpeTei fihu. 
1_chronicles 16:13	cera‘ yisra’eil ‘awdo, benei ya‘aqow beHiraw. 
1_chronicles 16:14	hu yhoh ’eloheinu, bekhal ha’arez mishpaTaw. 
1_chronicles 16:15	cikhru le‘olam berito, dawar ziwwah le’elef dor. 
1_chronicles 16:16	’asher karat ’et ’awraham, ushewu‘ato leyizHaq. 
1_chronicles 16:17	waya‘amideha leya‘aqow leHoq, leyisra’eil berit ‘olam. 
1_chronicles 16:18	leimor, lekha ’etein ’erez kena‘an, Hewel naHalatkhem. 
1_chronicles 16:19	bihyotkhem metei mispar, kim‘aT wegarim bah. 
1_chronicles 16:20	wayithalekhu migo ’el go, umimamlakhah ’el ‘am ’aHeir. 
1_chronicles 16:21	lo hiniaH le’ish le‘asheqam, wayokhaH ‘aleihem melakhim. 
1_chronicles 16:22	’al tige‘u bimshiHay, uwinwi’ay ’al tarei‘u.
1_chronicles 16:23	shiru yhoh kal ha’arez, baseru miyom ’el yom yeshu‘ato. 
1_chronicles 16:24	saperu wagoyim ’et kewodo, bekhal ha‘amim nifle’otaw. 
1_chronicles 16:25	ki gadol yhoh umehulal me’od, wenora hu ‘al kal ’elohim. 
1_chronicles 16:26	ki kal ’elohei ha‘amim ’elilim, yhoh shamayim ‘asah. 
1_chronicles 16:27	hod wehadar lefanaw, ‘oc weHedwah bimqomo. 
1_chronicles 16:28	hawu yhoh mishpeHot ‘amim, hawu yhoh kawod wa‘oc. 
1_chronicles 16:29	hawu yhoh kewod shemo; se’u minHah uwo’u lefanaw, hishtaHawu yhoh behadrat qodesh. 
1_chronicles 16:30	Hilu milefanaw kal ha’arez, ’af tikon teiweil bal timoT. 
1_chronicles 16:31	yismeHu hashamayim wetageil ha’arez, weyomeru wagoyim yhoh malakh. 
1_chronicles 16:32	yir‘am hayam umelo’o, ya‘aloz hasadeh wekhal ’asher bo. 
1_chronicles 16:33	’ac yeranenu ‘azei haya‘ar; milifnei yhoh, ki wa lishpoT ’et ha’arez. 
1_chronicles 16:34	hodu yhoh ki Tow, ki le‘olam Hasdo. 
1_chronicles 16:35	we’imru hoshi‘einu ’elohei yish‘einu, weqabezeinu wehazileinu min hagoyim; lehodot lesheim qadshekha lehishtabeiaH bithilatekha. 
1_chronicles 16:36	barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, min ha‘olam we‘ad ha‘olam; wayomeru khal ha‘am ’amein, wehaleil yhoh.
1_chronicles 16:37	waya‘acaw sham, lifnei ’aron berit yhoh, le’asaf ule’eHaw; leshareit lifnei ha’aron tamid lidwar yom beyomo. 
1_chronicles 16:38	we‘oweid ’edom wa’aHeihem shishim ushemonah; we‘oweid ’edom ben yeditun weHosah lesho‘arim. 
1_chronicles 16:39	we’eit zadoq hakohein, we’eHaw hakohanim, lifnei mishkan yhoh; babamah ’asher begiw‘on. 
1_chronicles 16:40	leha‘alot ‘olot yhoh ‘al micbaH ha‘olah tamid laboqer wela‘arew; ulekhal hakatuw betorat yhoh, ’asher ziwwah ‘al yisra’eil. 
1_chronicles 16:41	we‘imahem heiman widutun, ushe’ar haberurim, ’asher niqewu besheimot; lehodot yhoh, ki le‘olam Hasdo. 
1_chronicles 16:42	we‘imahem heiman widutun Hazozerot umeziltayim lemashmi‘im, ukhelei shir ha’elohim; uwenei yedutun lasha‘ar. 
1_chronicles 16:43	wayeilekhu khal ha‘am ’ish leweito; wayissow dawid lewareikh ’et beito.
1_chronicles 17:1	wayhi ka’asher yashaw dawid beweito; wayomer dawid ’el natan hanawi, hineih ’anokhi yosheiw beweit ha’aracim, wa’aron berit yhoh taHat yeri‘ot. 
1_chronicles 17:2	wayomer natan ’el dawid, kol ’asher bilwawekha ‘aseih; ki ha’elohim ‘imakh.
1_chronicles 17:3	wayhi balaylah hahu; wayhi dewar ’elohim, ’el natan leimor. 
1_chronicles 17:4	leikh we’amarta ’el dawid ‘awdi, koh ’amar yhoh; lo ’atah tiwneh li habayit lashawet. 
1_chronicles 17:5	ki lo yashawti bewayit, min hayom, ’asher he‘eleiti ’et yisra’eil, ‘ad hayom hacceh; wa’ehyeh mei’ohel ’el ’ohel umimishkan. 
1_chronicles 17:6	bekhol ’asher hithalakhti bekhal yisra’eil hadawar dibarti, ’et ’aHad shofeTei yisra’eil, ’asher ziwwiti lir‘ot ’et ‘ami leimor; lamah lo wenitem li beit ’aracim. 
1_chronicles 17:7	we‘atah koh tomar le‘awdi ledawid, s koh ’amar yhoh zewa’ot, ’ani leqaHtikha min hanaweh, min ’aHarei hazon; lihyot nagid, ‘al ‘ami yisra’eil. 
1_chronicles 17:8	wa’ehyeh ‘imekha, bekhol ’asher halakhta, wa’akhrit ’et kal ’oywekha mipanekha; we‘asiti lekha sheim, kesheim hagedolim ’asher ba’arez. 
1_chronicles 17:9	wesamti maqom le‘ami yisra’eil uneTa‘tihu weshakhan taHtaw, welo yirgac ‘od; welo yosifu wenei ‘awlah lewaloto, ka’asher barishonah. 
1_chronicles 17:10	ulemiyamim, ’asher ziwwiti shofeTim ‘al ‘ami yisra’eil, wehikhna‘ti ’et kal ’oywekha; wa’agid lakh, uwayit yiwneh lekha yhoh. 
1_chronicles 17:11	wehayah, ki male’u yamekha lalekhet ‘im ’awotekha, wahaqimoti ’et car‘akha ’aHarekha, ’asher yihyeh mibanekha; wahakhinoti ’et malkhuto. 
1_chronicles 17:12	hu yiwneh li bayit; wekhonanti ’et kis’o ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_chronicles 17:13	’ani ’ehyeh lo le’aw, wehu yihyeh li lewein; weHasdi lo ’asir mei‘imo, ka’asher hasiroti, mei’asher hayah lefanekha. 
1_chronicles 17:14	weha‘amadtihu beweiti uwemalkhuti ‘ad ha‘olam; wekhis’o yihyeh nakhon ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_chronicles 17:15	kekhol hadewarim ha’eileh, ukhekhol heHacon hacceh; kein diber natan ’el dawid.
1_chronicles 17:16	wayawo hamelekh dawid, wayeishew lifnei yhoh; wayomer, mi ’ani yhoh ’elohim umi weiti, ki hawi’otani ‘ad halom. 
1_chronicles 17:17	watiqTan cot be‘einekha ’elohim, watedabeir ‘al beit ‘awdekha lemeiraHoq; ure’itani, ketor ha’adam hama‘alah yhoh ’elohim. 
1_chronicles 17:18	mah yosif ‘od dawid ’eilekha lekhawod ’et ‘awdekha; we’atah ’et ‘awdekha yada‘eta. 
1_chronicles 17:19	yhoh ba‘awur ‘awdekha ukhelibekha, ‘asita ’eit kal hagedulah haccot; lehodia‘ ’et kal hagedulot. 
1_chronicles 17:20	yhoh ’ein kamokha, we’ein ’elohim culatekha; bekhol ’asher shama‘nu be’aceneinu. 
1_chronicles 17:21	umi ke‘amekha yisra’eil, go ’eHad ba’arez; ’asher halakh ha’elohim lifdot lo ‘am, lasum lekha m gedulot wenora’ot, legareish, mipenei ‘amekha ’asher padita mimizrayim goyim. 
1_chronicles 17:22	watitein ’et ‘amekha yisra’eil lekha le‘am ‘ad ‘olam; we’atah yhoh, hayita lahem leilohim. 
1_chronicles 17:23	we‘atah yhoh, hadawar, ’asher dibarta ‘al ‘awdekha we‘al beito, yei’amein ‘ad ‘olam; wa‘aseih ka’asher dibarta. 
1_chronicles 17:24	weyei’amein weyigdal shimkha ‘ad ‘olam leimor, yhoh zewa’ot ’elohei yisra’eil, ’elohim leyisra’eil; uweit dawid ‘awdekha nakhon lefanekha. 
1_chronicles 17:25	ki ’atah ’elohay, galita ’et ’ocen ‘awdekha, liwnot lo bayit; ‘al kein maza ‘awdekha, lehitpaleil lefanekha. 
1_chronicles 17:26	we‘atah yhoh, ’atah hu ha’elohim; watedabeir ‘al ‘awdekha, haTowah haccot. 
1_chronicles 17:27	we‘atah, ho’alta lewareikh ’et beit ‘awdekha, lihyot le‘olam lefanekha; ki ’atah yhoh beirakhta, umeworakh le‘olam.
1_chronicles 18:1	wayhi ’aHarei khein, wayakh dawid ’et pelishtim wayakhni‘eim; wayiqaH ’et gat uwenoteha miyad pelishtim. 
1_chronicles 18:2	wayakh ’et mo’aw; wayihyu mo’aw ‘awadim ledawid, nose’ei minHah. 
1_chronicles 18:3	wayakh dawid ’et hadad‘ecer melekh zowah Hamatah; belekhto lehaziw yado binhar perat. 
1_chronicles 18:4	wayilkod dawid mimenu ’elef rekhew, weshiw‘at ’alafim parashim, we‘esrim ’elef ’ish ragli; way‘aqeir dawid ’et kal harekhew, wayoteir mimenu mei’ah rakhew. 
1_chronicles 18:5	wayawo ’aram darmeseq, la‘cor lahadad‘ecer melekh zowah; wayakh dawid ba’aram, ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef ’ish. 
1_chronicles 18:6	wayasem dawid ba’aram darmeseq, wayhi ’aram ledawid, ‘awadim nose’ei minHah; wayosha‘ yhoh ledawid, bekhol ’asher halakh. 
1_chronicles 18:7	wayiqaH dawid, ’eit shilTei haccahaw, ’asher hayu, ‘al ‘awdei hadad‘acer; waywi’eim yerushalim. 
1_chronicles 18:8	umiTiwHat umikun ‘arei hadad‘ecer, laqaH dawid neHoshet rabah me’od; bah ‘asah shelomoh, ’et yam haneHoshet we’et ha‘amudim, we’eit kelei haneHoshet.
1_chronicles 18:9	wayishma‘ to‘u melekh Hamat; ki hikah dawid, ’et kal Heil hadad‘ecer melekh zowah. 
1_chronicles 18:10	wayishlaH ’et hadoram beno ’el hamelekh dawid lish’ol lish’al lo leshalom ulewarakho, ‘al ’asher nilHam bahadad‘ecer wayakeihu, ki ’ish milHamot to‘u hayah hadad‘acer; wekhol, kelei cahaw wakhesef uneHoshet. 
1_chronicles 18:11	gam ’otam, hiqdish hamelekh dawid yhoh, ‘im hakesef wehaccahaw, ’asher nasa mikal hagoyim; mei’edom umimo’aw umibenei ‘amon, umipelishtim umei‘amaleiq. 
1_chronicles 18:12	we’awshay ben zeruyah, hikah ’et ’edom begei hamelaH, shemonah ‘asar ’alef. 
1_chronicles 18:13	wayasem be’edom neziwim, wayihyu khal ’edom ‘awadim ledawid; wayosha‘ yhoh ’et dawid, bekhol ’asher halakh. 
1_chronicles 18:14	wayimlokh dawid ‘al kal yisra’eil; wayhi, ‘oseh mishpaT uzedaqah lekhal ‘amo. 
1_chronicles 18:15	weyo’aw ben zeruyah ‘al hazawa; wihoshafaT ben ’aHilud mackir. 
1_chronicles 18:16	wezadoq ben ’aHiTuw wa’awimelekh ben ’ewyatar kohanim; weshawsha sofeir. 
1_chronicles 18:17	uwenayahu ben yehoyada‘, ‘al hakereiti wehapeleiti; uwenei dawid harishonim leyad hamelekh.
1_chronicles 19:1	wayhi ’aHarei khein, wayamat naHash melekh benei ‘amon; wayimlokh beno taHtaw. 
1_chronicles 19:2	wayomer dawid ’e‘eseh Hesed ‘im Hanun ben naHash, ki ‘asah ’awiw ‘imi Hesed, wayishlaH dawid mal’akhim lenaHamo ‘al ’awiw; wayawo’u ‘awdei dawid ’el ’erez benei ‘amon ’el Hanun lenaHamo. 
1_chronicles 19:3	wayomeru sarei wenei ‘amon leHanun, hamkhabeid dawid ’et ’awikha be‘einekha, ki shalaH lekha menaHamim; halo ba‘awur laHqor welahafokh ulerageil ha’arez, ba’u ‘awadaw ’eilekha.
1_chronicles 19:4	wayiqaH Hanun ’et ‘awdei dawid waygaleHeim, wayikhrot ’et madweihem baHeizi ‘ad hamifsa‘ah; wayshaleHeim. 
1_chronicles 19:5	wayeilekhu wayagidu ledawid ‘al ha’anashim wayishlaH liqratam, ki hayu ha’anashim nikhlamim me’od; wayomer hamelekh shewu wireiHo, ‘ad ’asher yezamaH ceqankhem weshawtem. 
1_chronicles 19:6	wayir’u benei ‘amon, ki hitba’ashu ‘im dawid; wayishlaH Hanun uwenei ‘amon ’elef kikar kesef, liskor lahem min ’aram naharayim umin ’aram ma‘akhah umizowah, rekhew ufarashim. 
1_chronicles 19:7	wayiskeru lahem shenayim usheloshim ’elef rekhew, we’et melekh ma‘akhah we’et ‘amo, wayawo’u wayaHanu lifnei meidewa; uwenei ‘amon, ne’esfu mei‘areihem, wayawo’u lamilHamah 
1_chronicles 19:8	wayishma‘ dawid; wayishlaH ’et yo’aw, we’eit kal zawa hagiborim. 
1_chronicles 19:9	wayeize’u benei ‘amon, waya‘arkhu milHamah petaH ha‘ir; wehamelakhim ’asher ba’u, lewadam basadeh. 
1_chronicles 19:10	wayar yo’aw, ki hayetah fenei hamilHamah ’eilaw panim we’aHor; wayiwHar, mikal baHur beyisra’eil, waya‘arokh liqrat ’aram. 
1_chronicles 19:11	we’eit yeter ha‘am, natan beyad ’awshay ’aHiw; waya‘arkhu, liqrat benei ‘amon. 
1_chronicles 19:12	wayomer, ’im teHecaq mimeni ’aram, wehayita li litshu‘ah; s we’im benei ‘amon yeHecqu mimekha wehosha‘tikha. 
1_chronicles 19:13	Hacaq wenitHacceqah be‘ad ‘ameinu, uwe‘ad ‘arei ’eloheinu; yhoh, haTow be‘einaw ya‘aseh. 
1_chronicles 19:14	wayigash yo’aw weha‘am ’asher ‘imo lifnei ’aram lamilHamah; wayanusu mipanaw. 
1_chronicles 19:15	uwenei ‘amon ra’u ki nas ’aram, wayanusu gam heim, mipenei ’awshay ’aHiw, wayawo’u ha‘irah; wayawo yo’aw yerushalim.
1_chronicles 19:16	wayar ’aram, ki nigefu lifnei yisra’eil wayishleHu mal’akhim, wayozi’u ’et ’aram, ’asher mei‘eiwer hanahar; weshofakh sar zewa hadad‘ecer lifneihem. 
1_chronicles 19:17	wayugad ledawid, waye’esof ’et kal yisra’eil waya‘awor hayardein, wayawo ’aleihem, waya‘arokh ’aleihem; waya‘arokh dawid liqrat ’aram milHamah, wayilaHamu ‘imo. 
1_chronicles 19:18	wayanas ’aram milifnei yisra’eil wayaharog dawid mei’aram, shiw‘at ’alafim rekhew, we’arba‘im ’elef ’ish ragli; we’eit shofakh sar hazawa heimit. 
1_chronicles 19:19	wayir’u ‘awdei hadad‘ecer, ki nigefu lifnei yisra’eil, wayashlimu ‘im dawid waya‘awduhu; welo ’awah ’aram, lehoshia‘ ’et benei ‘amon ‘od.
1_chronicles 20:1	wayhi le‘eit teshuwat hashanah le‘eit zeit hamelakhim, wayinhag yo’aw ’et Heil hazawa wayashHeit ’et ’erez benei ‘amon, wayawo wayazar ’et rabah, wedawid yosheiw birushalim; wayakh yo’aw ’et rabah wayeherseha. 
1_chronicles 20:2	wayiqaH dawid ’et ‘aTeret malkam mei‘al rosho wayimza’ah mishqal kikar cahaw, uwah ’ewen yeqarah, watehi ‘al rosh dawid; ushelal ha‘ir hozi harbeih me’od. 
1_chronicles 20:3	we’et ha‘am ’asher bah hozi, wayasar bamegeirah uwaHarizei habarcel uwamegeirot, wekhein ya‘aseh dawid, lekhol ‘arei wenei ‘amon; wayashaw dawid wekhal ha‘am yerushalim.
1_chronicles 20:4	wayhi ’aHareikhein, wata‘amod milHamah begecer ‘im pelishtim; ’ac hikah sibekhay haHushati, ’et sipay milidei harefa’im wayikanei‘u. 
1_chronicles 20:5	watehi ‘od milHamah ’et pelishtim; wayakh ’elHanan ben ya‘ur ya‘ir, ’et laHmi ’aHi galeyat hagiti, we‘eiz Hanito, kimnor ’oregim. 
1_chronicles 20:6	watehi ‘od milHamah begat; wayhi ’ish midah, we’ezbe‘otaw sheish washeish ‘esrim we’arba‘, wegam hu nolad leharafa. 
1_chronicles 20:7	wayHareif ’et yisra’eil; wayakeihu yehonatan, ben shim‘a ’aHi dawid. 
1_chronicles 20:8	’eil nuledu leharafa begat; wayipelu weyad dawid uweyad ‘awadaw.
1_chronicles 21:1	waya‘amod saTan ‘al yisra’eil; wayaset ’et dawid, limnot ’et yisra’eil. 
1_chronicles 21:2	wayomer dawid ’el yo’aw we’el sarei ha‘am, lekhu, sifru ’et yisra’eil, mibe’eir shewa‘ we‘ad dan; wehawi’u ’eilay, we’eide‘ah ’et misparam. 
1_chronicles 21:3	wayomer yo’aw, yoseif yhoh ‘al ‘amo kaheim mei’ah fe‘amim, halo ’adoni hamelekh, kulam ladoni la‘awadim; lamah yewaqeish cot ’adoni, lamah yihyeh le’ashmah leyisra’eil. 
1_chronicles 21:4	udewar hamelekh Hacaq ‘al yo’aw; wayeizei yo’aw, wayithaleikh bekhal yisra’eil, wayawo yerushalim. 
1_chronicles 21:5	wayitein yo’aw ’et mispar mifqad ha‘am ’el dawid; wayhi khal yisra’eil ’elef ’alafim umei’ah ’elef ’ish sholeif Herew, wihudah ’arba‘ mei’ot weshiw‘im ’elef ’ish sholeif Harew. 
1_chronicles 21:6	weleiwi uwinyamin, lo faqad betokham; ki nit‘aw dewar hamelekh ’et yo’aw. 
1_chronicles 21:7	wayeira‘ be‘einei ha’elohim, ‘al hadawar hacceh; wayakh ’et yisra’eil.
1_chronicles 21:8	wayomer dawid ’el ha’elohim, HaTati me’od, ’asher ‘asiti ’et hadawar hacceh; we‘atah, ha‘awer na ’et ‘awon ‘awdekha, ki niskalti me’od.
1_chronicles 21:9	waydabeir yhoh ’el gad, Hoceih dawid leimor. 
1_chronicles 21:10	leikh wedibarta ’el dawid leimor, koh ’amar yhoh, shalosh ’ani noTeh ‘alekha; beHar lekha ’aHat meiheinah we’e‘eseh lakh. 
1_chronicles 21:11	wayawo gad ’el dawid; wayomer lo koh ’amar yhoh qabel lakh. 
1_chronicles 21:12	’im shalosh shanim ra‘aw, we’im sheloshah Hodashim nispeh mipenei zarekha weHerew ’oywekha lemaseget we’im sheloshet yamim Herew yhoh wedewer ba’arez, umal’akh yhoh, mashHit bekhal gewul yisra’eil; we‘atah re’eih, mah ’ashiw ’et sholeHi dawar.
1_chronicles 21:13	wayomer dawid ’el gad zar li me’od; ’epelah na weyad yhoh ki rabim raHamaw me’od, uweyad ’adam ’al ’epol. 
1_chronicles 21:14	wayitein yhoh dewer beyisra’eil; wayipol miyisra’eil, shiw‘im ’elef ’ish. 
1_chronicles 21:15	wayishlaH ha’elohim mal’akh lirushalim lehashHitah ukhehashHit, ra’ah yhoh wayinaHem ‘al hara‘ah, wayomer lamal’akh hamashHit raw, ‘atah heref yadekha; umal’akh yhoh ‘omeid, ‘im goren ’arenan haywusi.
1_chronicles 21:16	wayisa dawid ’et ‘einaw, wayar ’et mal’akh yhoh ‘omeid, bein ha’arez uwein hashamayim, weHarbo shelufah beyado, neTuyah ‘al yerushalim; wayipol dawid wehacceqeinim mekhussim basaqim ‘al peneihem. 
1_chronicles 21:17	wayomer dawid ’el ha’elohim halo ’ani ’amarti limnot ba‘am, wa’ani hu ’asher HaTati wehareia‘ harei‘oti, we’eileh hazon meh ‘asu; yhoh ’elohay, tehi na yadekha bi uweweit ’awi, uwe‘amekha lo lemageifah.
1_chronicles 21:18	umal’akh yhoh ’amar ’el gad leimor ledawid; ki ya‘aleh dawid, lehaqim micbeiaH yhoh, begoren ’arenan haywusi. 
1_chronicles 21:19	waya‘al dawid bidwar gad, ’asher diber besheim yhoh. 
1_chronicles 21:20	wayashaw ’arenan, wayar ’et hamal’akh, we’arba‘at banaw ‘imo mitHabe’im; we’arenan dash HiTim. 
1_chronicles 21:21	wayawo dawid ‘ad ’arenan; wayabeiT ’arenan wayar ’et dawid, wayeizei min hagoren, wayishtaHu ledawid ’apayim ’arezah. 
1_chronicles 21:22	wayomer dawid ’el ’arenan, tenah li meqom hagoren, we’ewneh bo micbeiaH yhoh; bekhesef malei teneihu li, wetei‘azar hamageifah mei‘al ha‘am. 
1_chronicles 21:23	wayomer ’arenan ’el dawid qaH lakh, weya‘as ’adoni hamelekh haTow be‘einaw; re’eih natati habaqar la‘olot, wehamorigim la‘eizim wehaHiTim laminHah hakol natati. 
1_chronicles 21:24	wayomer hamelekh dawid le’arenan, lo ki qanoh ’eqneh bekhesef malei; ki lo ’esa ’asher lekha yhoh, weha‘alot ‘olah Hinam. 
1_chronicles 21:25	wayitein dawid le’arenan bamaqom; shiqlei cahaw, mishqal sheish mei’ot. 
1_chronicles 21:26	wayiwen sham dawid micbeiaH yhoh, waya‘al ‘olot ushelamim; wayiqra ’el yhoh, waya‘aneihu wa’eish min hashamayim, ‘al micbaH ha‘olah.
1_chronicles 21:27	wayomer yhoh lamal’akh, wayashew Harbo ’el nedanah. 
1_chronicles 21:28	ba‘eit hahi, bir’ot dawid ki ‘anahu yhoh, begoren ’arenan haywusi; wayicbaH sham. 
1_chronicles 21:29	umishkan yhoh ’asher ‘asah mosheh wamidbar umicbaH ha‘olah ba‘eit hahi; babamah begiw‘on. 
1_chronicles 21:30	welo yakhol dawid lalekhet lefanaw lidrosh ’elohim; ki niw‘at, mipenei Herew mal’akh yhoh.
1_chronicles 22:1	wayomer dawid, ceh hu, beit yhoh ha’elohim; weceh micbeiaH le‘olah leyisra’eil.
1_chronicles 22:2	wayomer dawid, likhnos ’et hageirim, ’asher be’erez yisra’eil; waya‘ameid Hozewim, laHzow ’awnei gacit, liwnot beit ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 22:3	uwarcel larow lamismerim ledaltot hashe‘arim welamHaberot heikhin dawid; uneHoshet larow ’ein mishqal. 
1_chronicles 22:4	wa‘azei ’aracim le’ein mispar; ki heiwi’u hazidonim wehazorim ‘azei ’aracim larow ledawid.
1_chronicles 22:5	wayomer dawid, shelomoh weni na‘ar warakh wehabayit liwnot yhoh lehagdil lema‘lah lesheim uletif’eret lekhal ha’arazot, ’akhinah na lo; wayakhen dawid larow lifnei moto. 
1_chronicles 22:6	wayiqra lishlomoh weno; wayzawweihu liwnot bayit, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil.
1_chronicles 22:7	wayomer dawid lishlomoh; beno beni ’ani hayah ‘im lewawi, liwnot bayit, lesheim yhoh ’elohay. 
1_chronicles 22:8	wayhi ‘alay dewar yhoh leimor, dam larow shafakhta, umilHamot gedolot ‘asita; lo tiwneh wayit lishmi, ki damim rabim, shafakhta ’arzah lefanay. 
1_chronicles 22:9	hineih wein nolad lakh, hu yihyeh ’ish menuHah, wahaniHoti lo mikal ’oywaw missawiw; ki shelomoh yihyeh shemo, weshalom washeqeT ’etein ‘al yisra’eil beyamaw. 
1_chronicles 22:10	hu yiwneh wayit lishmi, wehu yihyeh li lewein, wa’ani lo le’aw; wahakhinoti kissei malkhuto ‘al yisra’eil ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_chronicles 22:11	‘atah weni, yehi yhoh ‘imakh; wehizlaHta, uwanita beit yhoh ’elohekha, ka’asher diber ‘alekha. 
1_chronicles 22:12	’akh yiten lekha yhoh seikhel uwinah, wizawwekha ‘al yisra’eil; welishmor ’et torat yhoh ’elohekha. 
1_chronicles 22:13	’ac tazliaH, ’im tishmor, la‘asot ’et haHuqim we’et hamishpaTim, ’asher ziwwah yhoh ’et mosheh ‘al yisra’eil; Hacaq we’emaz, ’al tira we’al teiHat. 
1_chronicles 22:14	wehineih we‘aneyi hakhinoti leweit yhoh cahaw kikarim mei’ah ’elef wekhesef, ’elef ’alafim kikarim, welaneHoshet welabarcel ’ein mishqal, ki larow hayah; we‘eizim wa’awanim hakhinoti, wa‘aleihem tosif. 
1_chronicles 22:15	we‘imekha larow ‘osei melakhah, Hozewim weHarashei ’ewen wa‘eiz; wekhal Hakham bekhal melakhah. 
1_chronicles 22:16	laccahaw lakesef welaneHoshet welabarcel ’ein mispar; qum wa‘aseih, wihi yhoh ‘imakh. 
1_chronicles 22:17	wayzaw dawid lekhal sarei yisra’eil, la‘cor lishlomoh weno. 
1_chronicles 22:18	halo yhoh ’eloheikhem ‘imakhem, weheiniaH lakhem missawiw; ki natan beyadi, ’eit yoshewei ha’arez, wenikhbeshah ha’arez lifnei yhoh welifnei ‘amo. 
1_chronicles 22:19	‘atah, tenu lewawkhem wenafshekhem, lidrosh yhoh ’eloheikhem; wequmu, uwenu ’et miqdash yhoh ha’elohim, lehawi ’et ’aron berit yhoh ukhelei qodesh ha’elohim, labayit haniwneh lesheim yhoh.
1_chronicles 23:1	wedawid caqein wesawa‘ yamim; wayamleikh ’et shelomoh weno ‘al yisra’eil. 
1_chronicles 23:2	waye’esof ’et kal sarei yisra’eil, wehakohanim wehalwiyim. 
1_chronicles 23:3	wayissaferu halwiyim, miben sheloshim shanah wama‘elah; wayhi misparam legulgelotam ligwarim, sheloshim ushemonah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 23:4	mei’eileh, lenazeiaH ‘al melekhet beit yhoh, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef; weshoTerim weshofeTim sheishet ’alafim. 
1_chronicles 23:5	we’arba‘at ’alafim sho‘arim; we’arba‘at ’alafim mehalim yhoh, bakeilim ’asher ‘asiti lehaleil. 
1_chronicles 23:6	wayeHaleqeim dawid maHleqot; s liwnei leiwi, legeireshon qehat umerari.
1_chronicles 23:7	lageireshuni la‘dan weshim‘i.
1_chronicles 23:8	benei la‘dan, harosh yeHi’eil weceitam weyo’eil sheloshah.
1_chronicles 23:9	benei shim‘i, shelomot shelomit waHaci’eil weharan sheloshah; ’eileh rashei ha’awot lela‘dan.
1_chronicles 23:10	uwenei shim‘i, yaHat cina, wi‘ush uweri‘ah; ’eileh wenei shim‘i ’arba‘ah. 
1_chronicles 23:11	wayhi yaHat harosh, wecicah hasheini; wi‘ush uweri‘ah lo hirbu wanim, wayihyu leweit ’aw, lifqudah ’eHat.
1_chronicles 23:12	benei qehat, ‘amram yizhar Hewron we‘ucci’eil ’arba‘ah.
1_chronicles 23:13	benei ‘amram ’aharon umosheh; wayibadeil ’aharon lehaqdisho qodesh qadashim hu uwanaw ‘ad ‘olam, lehaqTir lifnei yhoh leshareto ulewareikh bishmo ‘ad ‘olam. 
1_chronicles 23:14	umosheh ’ish ha’elohim; banaw yiqare’u ‘al sheiweT haleiwi. 
1_chronicles 23:15	benei mosheh, geireshom we’eli‘ecer. 
1_chronicles 23:16	benei geireshom shewu’eil harosh. 
1_chronicles 23:17	wayihyu wenei ’eli‘ecer reHawyah harosh; welo hayah le’eli‘ecer banim ’aHeirim, uwenei reHawyah rawu lema‘elah. 
1_chronicles 23:18	benei yizhar shelomit harosh.
1_chronicles 23:19	benei Hewron; yeriyahu harosh ’amaryah hasheini, yaHaci’eil hashelishi, wiqam‘am harewi‘i. 
1_chronicles 23:20	benei ‘ucci’eil; mikhah harosh, weyishiyah hasheini.
1_chronicles 23:21	benei merari maHli umushi, benei maHli ’el‘acar weqish. 
1_chronicles 23:22	wayamat ’el‘acar, welo hayu lo banim ki ’im banot; wayisa’um benei qish ’aHeihem. 
1_chronicles 23:23	benei mushi, maHli we‘eider wireimot sheloshah. 
1_chronicles 23:24	’eileh wenei leiwi leweit ’awoteihem rashei ha’awot lifqudeihem, bemispar sheimot legulgelotam, ‘oseih hamelakhah, la‘awodat beit yhoh; miben ‘esrim shanah wama‘elah. 
1_chronicles 23:25	ki ’amar dawid, heiniaH yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil le‘amo; wayishkon birushalim ‘ad le‘olam. 
1_chronicles 23:26	wegam lalwiyim; ’ein laseit ’et hamishkan we’et kal keilaw la‘awodato. 
1_chronicles 23:27	ki wediwrei dawid ha’aHaronim, heimah mispar benei leiwi; miben ‘esrim shanah ulema‘elah. 
1_chronicles 23:28	ki ma‘amadam leyad benei ’aharon, la‘awodat beit yhoh, ‘al haHazeirot we‘al haleshakhot, we‘al Tahorat lekhal qodesh; uma‘aseih, ‘awodat beit ha’elohim. 
1_chronicles 23:29	uleleHem hama‘arekhet ulesolet leminHah welirqiqei hamazot, welamaHawat welamurbakhet; ulekhal mesurah umidah. 
1_chronicles 23:30	wela‘amod baboqer baboqer, lehodot ulehaleil yhoh; wekhein la‘arew. 
1_chronicles 23:31	ulekhol ha‘alot ‘olot yhoh, lashabatot, leHodashim welamo‘adim; bemispar kemishpaT ‘aleihem tamid lifnei yhoh. 
1_chronicles 23:32	weshameru ’et mishmeret ’ohel mo‘eid, we’eit mishmeret haqodesh, umishmeret benei ’aharon ’aHeihem; la‘awodat beit yhoh.
1_chronicles 24:1	weliwnei ’aharon maHleqotam; benei ’aharon, nadaw wa’awihu, ’el‘acar we’itamar. 
1_chronicles 24:2	wayamat nadaw wa’awihu lifnei ’awihem, uwanim lo hayu lahem; waykhahanu, ’el‘acar we’itamar. 
1_chronicles 24:3	wayeHaleqeim dawid, wezadoq min benei ’el‘acar, wa’aHimelekh min benei ’itamar; lifqudatam ba‘awodatam. 
1_chronicles 24:4	wayimaze’u wenei ’el‘acar rabim lerashei hagewarim min benei ’itamar wayaHlequm; liwnei ’el‘acar rashim leweit ’awot shishah ‘asar, weliwnei ’itamar leweit ’awotam shemonah. 
1_chronicles 24:5	wayaHlequm begoralot ’eileh ‘im ’eileh; ki hayu sarei qodesh wesarei ha’elohim, mibenei ’el‘acar uwiwnei ’itamar.
1_chronicles 24:6	wayikhteweim shema‘yah wen netan’eil hassofeir min haleiwi, lifnei hamelekh wehasarim wezadoq hakohein, wa’aHimelekh ben ’ewyatar, werashei ha’awot, lakohanim welalwiyim; beit ’aw ’eHad, ’aHuc le’el‘acar, we’aHuc ’aHuc le’itamar.
1_chronicles 24:7	wayeizei hagoral harishon lihoyariw, lida‘yah hasheini. 
1_chronicles 24:8	leHarim hashelishi, lis‘orim harewi‘i. 
1_chronicles 24:9	lemalkiyah haHamishi, lemiyamin hashishi. 
1_chronicles 24:10	lehaqoz hashewi‘i, la’awiyah hashemini. 
1_chronicles 24:11	leyeishua‘ hateshi‘i, lishkhanyahu ha‘asiri. 
1_chronicles 24:12	le’elyashiw ‘ashtei ‘asar, leyaqim sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 24:13	leHupah sheloshah ‘asar, leyeshew’aw ’arba‘ah ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 24:14	lewilgah Hamishah ‘asar, le’imeir shishah ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 24:15	leHeicir shiw‘ah ‘asar, lehapizeiz shemonah ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 24:16	liftaHyah tish‘ah ‘asar, liHecqeil ha‘esrim. 
1_chronicles 24:17	leyakhin ’eHad we‘esrim, legamul shenayim we‘esrim. 
1_chronicles 24:18	lidlayahu sheloshah we‘esrim, lema‘acyahu ’arba‘ah we‘esrim.
1_chronicles 24:19	’eileh fequdatam la‘awodatam, lawo leweit yhoh kemishpaTam, beyad ’aharon ’awihem; ka’asher ziwwahu, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil.
1_chronicles 24:20	weliwnei leiwi hanotarim; liwnei ‘amram shuwa’eil, liwnei shuwa’eil yeHdeyahu. 
1_chronicles 24:21	lirHawyahu; liwnei reHawyahu, harosh yishiyah. 
1_chronicles 24:22	layizhari shelomot, liwnei shelomot yaHat. 
1_chronicles 24:23	uwenay yeriyahu; ’amaryahu hasheini, yaHaci’eil hashelishi, yeqam‘am harewi‘i. 
1_chronicles 24:24	benei ‘ucci’eil mikhah, liwnei mikhah shamur shamir. 
1_chronicles 24:25	’aHi mikhah yishiyah, liwnei yishiyah cekharyahu. 
1_chronicles 24:26	benei merari maHli umushi, benei ya‘aciyahu weno. 
1_chronicles 24:27	benei merari; leya‘aciyahu weno, weshoham wecakur we‘iwri. 
1_chronicles 24:28	lemaHli ’el‘acar, welo hayah lo banim. 
1_chronicles 24:29	leqish benei qish yeraHme’eil. 
1_chronicles 24:30	uwenei mushi, maHli we‘eider wirimot; ’eileh benei halwiyim leweit ’awoteihem. 
1_chronicles 24:31	wayapilu gam heim goralot le‘umat ’aHeihem benei ’aharon, lifnei dawid hamelekh wezadoq wa’aHimelekh, werashei ha’awot, lakohanim welalwiyim; ’awot harosh, le‘umat ’aHiw haqaTan.
1_chronicles 25:1	wayawdeil dawid wesarei hazawa la‘awodah, liwnei ’asaf weheiman widutun, hanebi’im hanibe’im bekhinorot binwalim uwimziltayim; wayhi misparam, ’anshei melakhah la‘awodatam. 
1_chronicles 25:2	liwnei ’asaf, cakur weyoseif unetanyah wa’asar’eilah benei ’asaf; ‘al yad ’asaf, haniba ‘al yedei hamelekh. 
1_chronicles 25:3	lidutun; benei yedutun gedalyahu uzeri wisha‘yahu Hashawyahu umatityahu shishah, ‘al yedei ’awihem yedutun bakinor, haniba ‘al hodot wehaleil yhoh.
1_chronicles 25:4	leheiman; benei heiman buqiyahu matanyahu ‘ucci’eil shewu’eil wirimot Hananyah Hanani, ’eli’atah gidalti weromamti ‘ecer, yashebeqashah maloti, hotir maHaci’ot. 
1_chronicles 25:5	kal ’eileh wanim leheiman, Hoceih hamelekh bediwrei ha’elohim leharim qaren; wayitein ha’elohim leheiman, banim ’arba‘ah ‘asar uwanot shalosh. 
1_chronicles 25:6	kal ’eileh ‘al yedei ’awihem bashir beit yhoh bimziltayim newalim wekhinorot, la‘awodat beit ha’elohim; ‘al yedei hamelekh, s ’asaf widutun weheiman. 
1_chronicles 25:7	wayhi misparam ‘im ’aHeihem, melumedei shir yhoh; kal hameiwin, matayim shemonim ushemonah. 
1_chronicles 25:8	wayapilu goralot mishmeret, le‘umat kaqaTon kagadol, meiwin ‘im talmid.
1_chronicles 25:9	wayeizei hagoral harishon le’asaf leyoseif; gedalyahu hasheini, hu we’eHaw uwanaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:10	hashelishi cakur, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:11	harewi‘i layizri, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:12	haHamishi netanyahu, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:13	hashishi wuqiyahu, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:14	hashewi‘i yesar’eilah, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:15	hashemini yesha‘yahu, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:16	hateshi‘i matanyahu, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:17	ha‘asiri shim‘i, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:18	‘ashtei ‘asar ‘acar’eil, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:19	hasheneim ‘asar laHashawyah, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:20	lishloshah ‘asar shuwa’eil, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:21	le’arba‘ah ‘asar matityahu, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:22	laHamishah ‘asar lireimot, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:23	leshishah ‘asar laHananyahu, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:24	leshiw‘ah ‘asar leyashebeqashah, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:25	lishmonah ‘asar laHanani, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:26	letish‘ah ‘asar lemaloti, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:27	le‘esrim le’eliyatah, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:28	le’eHad we‘esrim lehotir, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:29	lishnayim we‘esrim legidalti, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:30	lishloshah we‘esrim lemaHaci’ot, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 25:31	le’arba‘ah we‘esrim leromamti ‘acer, banaw we’eHaw sheneim ‘asar.
1_chronicles 26:1	lemaHleqot lesho‘arim; laqareHim meshelemyahu wen qorei min benei ’asaf. 
1_chronicles 26:2	welimshelemyahu banim; cekharyahu habekhor yedi‘a’eil hasheini, cewadyahu hashelishi, yatni’eil harewi‘i. 
1_chronicles 26:3	‘eilam haHamishi yehoHanan hashishi, ’elyeho‘einay hashewi‘i. 
1_chronicles 26:4	ule‘oweid ’edom banim; shema‘yah habekhor yehocawad hasheini, yo’aH hashelishi wesakhar harewi‘i, unetan’eil haHamishi. 
1_chronicles 26:5	‘ami’eil hashishi yisashkhar hashewi‘i, pe‘uletay hashemini; ki weirakho ’elohim.
1_chronicles 26:6	welishma‘yah weno nolad banim, hamimshalim leweit ’awihem; ki giborei Hayil heimah. 
1_chronicles 26:7	benei shema‘yah, ‘ateni urefa’eil we‘oweid ’elcawad ’eHaw benei Hayil; ’elihu usemakhyahu. 
1_chronicles 26:8	kal ’eileh mibenei ‘oweid ’edom, heimah uweneihem wa’aHeihem, ’ish Hayil bakoaH la‘awodah; shishim ushenayim le‘oweid ’edom. 
1_chronicles 26:9	welimshelemyahu, banim we’aHim benei Hayil shemonah ‘asar.
1_chronicles 26:10	uleHosah min benei merari banim; shimri harosh ki lo hayah wekhor, waysimeihu ’awihu lerosh. 
1_chronicles 26:11	Hilqiyahu hasheini Tewalyahu hashelishi, cekharyahu harewi‘i; kal banim we’aHim leHosah sheloshah ‘asar. 
1_chronicles 26:12	le’eileh maHleqot hasho‘arim lerashei hagewarim mishmarot le‘umat ’aHeihem; leshareit beweit yhoh. 
1_chronicles 26:13	wayapilu goralot kaqaTon kagadol leweit ’awotam lesha‘ar washa‘ar.
1_chronicles 26:14	wayipol hagoral micraHah leshelemyahu; ucekharyahu weno yo‘eiz besekhel, hipilu goralot, wayeizei goralo zafonah.
1_chronicles 26:15	le‘oweid ’edom negbah; ulewanaw beit ha’asupim. 
1_chronicles 26:16	leshupim uleHosah lama‘araw, ‘im sha‘ar shalekhet, bamsilah ha‘olah; mishmar le‘umat mishmar. 
1_chronicles 26:17	lamicraH halwiyim shishah lazafonah layom ’arba‘ah, lanegbah layom ’arba‘ah; wela’asupim shenayim shenayim. 
1_chronicles 26:18	laparbar lama‘araw; ’arba‘ah lamsilah, shenayim laparbar. 
1_chronicles 26:19	’eileh, maHleqot hasho‘arim, liwnei haqareHi weliwnei merari. 
1_chronicles 26:20	wehalwiyim; ’aHiyah, ‘al ’ozrot beit ha’elohim, ule’ozerot haqodashim. 
1_chronicles 26:21	benei la‘dan benei hageireshuni lela‘dan, rashei ha’awot lela‘dan hageireshuni yeHi’eili. 
1_chronicles 26:22	benei yeHi’eili; ceitam weyo’eil ’aHiw, ‘al ’ozerot beit yhoh. 
1_chronicles 26:23	la‘amrami layizhari, laHewroni la‘acci’eili. 
1_chronicles 26:24	ushewu’eil ben geireshom ben mosheh, nagid ‘al ha’ozarot. 
1_chronicles 26:25	we’eHaw le’eli‘ecer; reHawyahu weno wisha‘yahu weno weyoram beno, wecikhri weno ushelomot ushelomit beno. 
1_chronicles 26:26	hu shelomot we’eHaw, ‘al kal ’ozerot haqodashim ’asher hiqdish dawid hamelekh, werashei ha’awot lesarei ha’alafim wehamei’ot wesarei hazawa. 
1_chronicles 26:27	min hamilHamot umin hashalal hiqdishu; leHacceiq leweit yhoh. 
1_chronicles 26:28	wekhol hahiqdish shemu’eil haro’eh wesha’ul ben qish, we’awneir ben neir, weyo’aw ben zeruyah; kol hamaqdish, ‘al yad shelomit we’eHaw.
1_chronicles 26:29	layizhari kenanyahu uwanaw, lamelakhah haHizonah ‘al yisra’eil, leshoTerim uleshofeTim. 
1_chronicles 26:30	laHewroni Hashawyahu we’eHaw benei Hayil ’elef ushewa‘ mei’ot, ‘al pequdat yisra’eil, mei‘eiwer layardein ma‘rawah; lekhol melekhet yhoh, wela‘awodat hamelekh. 
1_chronicles 26:31	laHewroni yeriyah harosh, laHewroni letoledotaw le’awot; bishnat ha’arba‘im lemalkhut dawid nidrashu, wayimazei wahem giborei Hayil beya‘ceir gil‘ad. 
1_chronicles 26:32	we’eHaw benei Hayil, ’alpayim ushewa‘ mei’ot rashei ha’awot; wayafqideim dawid hamelekh, ‘al har’uweini wehagadi waHazi sheiweT hamnashi, lekhal dewar ha’elohim udewar hamelekh.
1_chronicles 27:1	uwenei yisra’eil lemisparam rashei ha’awot wesarei ha’alafim wehamei’ot weshoTereihem hamsharetim ’et hamelekh lekhol dewar hamaHleqot, haba’ah wehayozeit Hodesh beHodesh, lekhol Hadeshei hashanah; hamaHaloqet ha’aHat, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef.
1_chronicles 27:2	‘al hamaHaloqet harishonah laHodesh harishon, yashawe‘am ben cawdi’eil; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:3	min benei ferez, harosh lekhal sarei hazewa’ot laHodesh harishon. 
1_chronicles 27:4	we‘al maHaloqet haHodesh hasheini, doday ha’aHoHi umaHaluqto, umiqlot hanagid; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef.
1_chronicles 27:5	sar hazawa hashelishi laHodesh hashelishi, benayahu wen yehoyada‘ hakohein rosh; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef. 
1_chronicles 27:6	hu wenayahu gibor hasheloshim we‘al hasheloshim; umaHaluqto, ‘amicawad beno.
1_chronicles 27:7	harewi‘i laHodesh harewi‘i, ‘asah ’eil ’aHi yo’aw, ucewadyah weno ’aHaraw; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef.
1_chronicles 27:8	haHamishi laHodesh haHamishi, hasar shamhut hayicraH; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef.
1_chronicles 27:9	hashishi laHodesh hashishi, ‘ira wen ‘iqeish hateqo‘i; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef.
1_chronicles 27:10	hashewi‘i laHodesh hashewi‘i, Helez hapeloni min benei ’efrayim; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef.
1_chronicles 27:11	hashemini laHodesh hashemini, sibekhay haHushati laccarHi; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef.
1_chronicles 27:12	hateshi‘i laHodesh hateshi‘i, ’awi‘ecer ha‘anetoti labenyemini labein yemini; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef.
1_chronicles 27:13	ha‘asiri laHodesh ha‘asiri, mahray haneTofati laccarHi; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef.
1_chronicles 27:14	‘ashtei ‘asar le‘ashtei ‘asar haHodesh, benayah hapir‘atoni min benei ’efrayim; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef.
1_chronicles 27:15	hasheneim ‘asar lishneim ‘asar haHodesh, Helday haneTofati le‘ateni’eil; we‘al maHaluqto, ‘esrim we’arba‘ah ’alef.
1_chronicles 27:16	we‘al shiwTei yisra’eil, lar’uweini nagid, ’eli‘ecer ben cikhri; s lashim‘oni, shefaTyahu ben ma‘akhah.
1_chronicles 27:17	leleiwi Hashawyah wen qemu’eil le’aharon zadoq.
1_chronicles 27:18	lihudah ’elihu mei’aHei dawid; leyisashkhar, ‘ameri ben mikha’eil.
1_chronicles 27:19	licwulun yishma‘yahu ben ‘owadyahu; lenaftali, yerimot ben ‘acri’eil.
1_chronicles 27:20	liwnei ’efrayim, hosheia‘ ben ‘acacyahu; laHazi sheiweT menasheh, yo’eil ben pedayahu.
1_chronicles 27:21	laHazi hamnasheh gil‘adah, yido ben cekharyahu; s lewinyamin, ya‘asi’eil ben ’awneir.
1_chronicles 27:22	ledan ‘acar’eil ben yeroHam; ’eileh sarei shiwTei yisra’eil. 
1_chronicles 27:23	welo nasa dawid misparam, lemiben ‘esrim shanah ulemaTah; ki ’amar yhoh, leharbot ’et yisra’eil kekhokhwei hashamayim. 
1_chronicles 27:24	yo’aw ben zeruyah heiHeil limnot welo khilah, wayhi wacot qezef ‘al yisra’eil; welo ‘alah hamispar, bemispar diwrei hayamim lamelekh dawid.
1_chronicles 27:25	we‘al ’ozerot hamelekh, ‘acmawet ben ‘adi’eil; s we‘al ha’ozarot basadeh be‘arim uwakefarim uwamigdalot, yehonatan ben ‘ucciyahu.
1_chronicles 27:26	we‘al, ‘osei melekhet hasadeh, la‘awodat ha’adamah; ‘ecri ben keluw. 
1_chronicles 27:27	we‘al hakeramim, shim‘i haramati; we‘al shebakeramim le’ozerot hayayin, cawdi hashifmi.
1_chronicles 27:28	we‘al hacceitim wehashiqmim ’asher bashefeilah, ba‘al Hanan hagedeiri; s we‘al ’ozerot hashemen yo‘ash.
1_chronicles 27:29	we‘al habaqar haro‘im basharon, shiTray shirTay hasharoni; we‘al habaqar ba‘amaqim, shafaT ben ‘adlay.
1_chronicles 27:30	we‘al hagemalim, ’owil hayishme‘eili; we‘al ha’atonot, yeHdeyahu hameironoti.
1_chronicles 27:31	we‘al hazon yacic hahagri; kal ’eileh sarei harekhush, ’asher lamelekh dawid. 
1_chronicles 27:32	wihonatan dod dawid yo‘eiz, ’ish meiwin wesofeir hu; wiHi’eil ben Hakhmoni ‘im benei hamelekh. 
1_chronicles 27:33	wa’aHitofel yo‘eiz lamelekh; s weHushay ha’arki reia‘ hamelekh. 
1_chronicles 27:34	we’aHarei ’aHitofel, yehoyada‘ ben benayahu we’ewyatar, wesar zawa lamelekh yo’aw.
1_chronicles 28:1	wayaqheil dawid ’et kal sarei yisra’eil sarei hashewaTim wesarei hamaHleqot hamsharetim ’et hamelekh wesarei ha’alafim wesarei hamei’ot wesarei khal rekhush umiqneh lamelekh ulewanaw ‘im hassarisim wehagiborim ulekhal gibor Hayil ’el yerushalim. 
1_chronicles 28:2	wayaqam dawid hamelekh ‘al raglaw, wayomer shema‘uni ’aHay we‘ami; ’ani ‘im lewawi liwnot beit menuHah la’aron berit yhoh welahadom raglei ’eloheinu, wahakhinoti liwnot. 
1_chronicles 28:3	weha’elohim ’amar li, lo tiwneh wayit lishmi; ki ’ish milHamot ’atah wedamim shafakheta. 
1_chronicles 28:4	wayiwHar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil bi mikol beit ’awi, lihyot lemelekh ‘al yisra’eil le‘olam, ki wihudah baHar lenagid, uweweit yehudah beit ’awi; uwiwnei ’awi, bi razah, lehamlikh ‘al kal yisra’eil. 
1_chronicles 28:5	umikal banay, ki rabim banim, natan li yhoh; wayiwHar bishlomoh weni, lashewet, ‘al kissei malkhut yhoh ‘al yisra’eil. 
1_chronicles 28:6	wayomer li, shelomoh winkha, hu yiwneh weiti waHazeirotay; ki waHarti wo li lewein, wa’ani ’ehyeh lo le’aw. 
1_chronicles 28:7	wahakhinoti ’et malkhuto ‘ad le‘olam; ’im yeHecaq, la‘asot mizwotay umishpaTay kayom hacceh. 
1_chronicles 28:8	we‘atah le‘einei khal yisra’eil qehal yhoh uwe’acenei ’eloheinu, shimru wedirshu, kal mizwot yhoh ’eloheikhem; lema‘an tireshu ’et ha’arez haTowah, wehinHaltem liwneikhem ’aHareikhem ‘ad ‘olam.
1_chronicles 28:9	we’atah shelomoh weni da‘ ’et ’elohei ’awikha we‘awedeihu, beleiw shaleim uwenefesh Hafeizah, ki khal lewawot doreish yhoh, wekhal yeizer maHashawot meiwin; ’im tidreshenu yimazei lakh, we’im ta‘acwenu yacniHakha la‘ad. 
1_chronicles 28:10	re’eih ‘atah, ki yhoh baHar bekha liwnot bayit lamiqdash Hacaq wa‘aseih.
1_chronicles 28:11	wayitein dawid lishlomoh weno ’et tawnit ha’ulam we’et bataw wegancakaw wa‘aliyotaw waHadaraw hapenimim uweit hakaporet. 
1_chronicles 28:12	wetawnit, kol ’asher hayah waruaH ‘imo, leHazrot beit yhoh ulekhal haleshakhot sawiw; le’ozerot beit ha’elohim, ule’ozerot haqodashim.
