1_chronicles 28:13	ulemaHleqot hakohanim wehalwiyim, ulekhal melekhet ‘awodat beit yhoh; ulekhal kelei ‘awodat beit yhoh. 
1_chronicles 28:14	laccahaw bamishqal laccahaw, lekhal kelei ‘awodah wa‘awodah; lekhol kelei hakesef bemishqal, lekhal kelei ‘awodah wa‘awodah. 
1_chronicles 28:15	umishqal limnorot haccahaw, weneiroteihem cahaw, bemishqal menorah umenorah weneiroteha; welimnorot hakesef bemishqal limnorah weneiroteha, ka‘awodat menorah umenorah. 
1_chronicles 28:16	we’et haccahaw mishqal leshulHanot hama‘arekhet leshulHan weshulHan; wekhesef leshulHanot hakasef. 
1_chronicles 28:17	wehamiclagot wehamicraqot wehaqesawot cahaw Tahor; welikhforei haccahaw bemishqal likhfor ukhefor, welikhforei hakesef bemishqal likhfor ukhefor. 
1_chronicles 28:18	ulemicbaH haqeToret cahaw mecuqaq bamishqal; uletawnit hamerkawah, hakeruwim cahaw leforesim, wesokhekhim ‘al ’aron berit yhoh. 
1_chronicles 28:19	hakol bikhtaw miyad yhoh ‘alay hiskil; kol mal’akhot hatawnit.
1_chronicles 28:20	wayomer dawid lishlomoh weno, Hacaq we’emaz wa‘aseih, ’al tira we’al teiHat; ki yhoh ’elohim ’elohay ‘imakh, lo yarpekha welo ya‘acweka, ‘ad likhlot kal melekhet ‘awodat beit yhoh. 
1_chronicles 28:21	wehineih, maHleqot hakohanim wehalwiyim, lekhal ‘awodat beit ha’elohim; we‘imekha wekhal melakhah lekhal nadiw baHakhemah lekhal ‘awodah, wehasarim wekhal ha‘am lekhal dewarekha.
1_chronicles 29:1	wayomer dawid hamelekh lekhal haqahal, shelomoh weni ’eHad baHar bo ’elohim na‘ar warakh; wehamelakhah gedolah, ki lo le’adam habirah, ki yhoh ’elohim. 
1_chronicles 29:2	ukhekhal koHi hakhinoti leweit ’elohay, haccahaw laccahaw wehakesef lakesef wehaneHoshet laneHoshet, habarcel labarcel, weha‘eizim la‘eizim; ’awnei shoham umilu’im ’awnei fukh weriqmah, wekhol ’ewen yeqarah we’awnei shayish larow. 
1_chronicles 29:3	we‘od, birzoti beweit ’elohay, yesh li segulah cahaw wakhasef; natati leweit ’elohay lema‘lah, mikal hakhinoti leweit haqodesh. 
1_chronicles 29:4	sheloshet ’alafim kikerei cahaw miccehaw ’ofir; weshiw‘at ’alafim kikar kesef mecuqaq, laTuaH qirot habatim. 
1_chronicles 29:5	laccahaw laccahaw welakesef lakesef, ulekhal melakhah beyad Harashim; umi mitnadeiw, lemalot yado hayom yhoh. 
1_chronicles 29:6	wayitnadewu sarei ha’awot wesarei shiwTei yisra’eil, wesarei ha’alafim wehamei’ot, ulesarei melekhet hamelekh. 
1_chronicles 29:7	wayitenu la‘awodat beit ha’elohim, cahaw kikarim Hameishet ’alafim wa’adarkhonim ribo wekhesef, kikarim ‘aseret ’alafim, uneHoshet ribo ushemonat ’alafim kikarim; uwarcel mei’ah ’elef kikarim. 
1_chronicles 29:8	wehanimza ’ito ’awanim, natenu le’ozar beit yhoh; ‘al yad yeHi’eil hageireshuni. 
1_chronicles 29:9	wayismeHu ha‘am ‘al hitnadewam, ki beleiw shaleim, hitnadewu yhoh; wegam dawid hamelekh, samaH simHah gedolah.
1_chronicles 29:10	waywarekh dawid ’et yhoh, le‘einei kal haqahal; wayomer dawid, barukh ’atah yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil ’awinu, mei‘olam we‘ad ‘olam. 
1_chronicles 29:11	lekha yhoh hagedulah wehagewurah wehatif’eret wehaneizaH wehahod, ki khol bashamayim uwa’arez; lekha yhoh hamamlakhah, wehamitnasei lekhol lerosh. 
1_chronicles 29:12	weha‘osher wehakawod milefanekha, we’atah mosheil bakol, uweyadekha koaH ugewurah; uweyadekha, legadeil uleHacceiq lakol. 
1_chronicles 29:13	we‘atah ’eloheinu, modim ’anaHnu lakh; umehalim lesheim tif’artekha. 
1_chronicles 29:14	wekhi mi ’ani umi ‘ami, ki na‘zor koaH, lehitnadeiw kacot; ki mimekha hakol, umiyadekha natanu lakh. 
1_chronicles 29:15	ki geirim ’anaHnu lefanekha wetoshawim kekhal ’awoteinu; kazeil yameinu ‘al ha’arez we’ein miqweh. 
1_chronicles 29:16	yhoh ’eloheinu, khol hehamon hacceh ’asher hakhinonu, liwnot lekha wayit lesheim qadshekha miyadekha hi hu ulekha hakol. 
1_chronicles 29:17	weyada‘ti ’elohay, ki ’atah boHein leiwaw, umeisharim tirzeh; ’ani, beyosher lewawi hitnadawti khal ’eileh, we‘atah, ‘amekha hanimze’u foh, ra’iti wesimHah lehitnadew lakh. 
1_chronicles 29:18	yhoh ’elohei ’awraham yizHaq weyisra’eil ’awoteinu, shomrah cot le‘olam, leyeizer maHshewot lewaw ‘amekha; wehakhein lewawam ’eilekha. 
1_chronicles 29:19	welishlomoh weni, tein leiwaw shaleim, lishmor mizwotekha, ‘eidewotekha weHuqekha; wela‘asot hakol, weliwnot habirah ’asher hakhinoti.
1_chronicles 29:20	wayomer dawid lekhal haqahal, barekhu na ’et yhoh ’eloheikhem; waywarakhu khal haqahal, yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem, wayiqedu wayishtaHawu yhoh welamelekh. 
1_chronicles 29:21	wayicbeHu yhoh cewaHim waya‘alu ‘olot yhoh lemaHorat hayom hahu parim ’elef ’eilim ’elef kewasim ’elef weniskeihem; ucewaHim larow lekhal yisra’eil. 
1_chronicles 29:22	wayokhelu wayishtu lifnei yhoh bayom hahu besimHah gedolah; wayamlikhu sheinit lishlomoh wen dawid, wayimsheHu yhoh lenagid ulezadoq lekhohein. 
1_chronicles 29:23	wayeishew lomoh ‘al kissei yhoh lemelekh taHat dawid ’awiw wayazlaH; wayishme‘u ’eilaw kal yisra’eil. 
1_chronicles 29:24	wekhal hasarim wehagiborim, wegam kal benei hamelekh dawid; natenu yad, taHat shelomoh hamelekh. 
1_chronicles 29:25	waygadeil yhoh ’et shelomoh lema‘lah, le‘einei kal yisra’eil; wayitein ‘alaw hod malkhut, ’asher lo hayah ‘al kal melekh lefanaw ‘al yisra’eil.
1_chronicles 29:26	wedawid ben yishay, malakh ‘al kal yisra’eil. 
1_chronicles 29:27	wehayamim, ’asher malakh ‘al yisra’eil, ’arba‘im shanah; beHewron malakh shewa‘ shanim, uwirushalim malakh sheloshim weshalosh. 
1_chronicles 29:28	wayamat beseiwah Towah, sewa‘ yamim ‘osher wekhawod; wayimlokh shelomoh weno taHtaw. 
1_chronicles 29:29	wediwrei dawid hamelekh, harishonim weha’aHronim; hinam ketuwim, ‘al diwrei shemu’eil haro’eh, we‘al diwrei natan hanawi, we‘al diwrei gad haHoceh. 
1_chronicles 29:30	‘im kal malkhuto ugewurato; weha‘itim, ’asher ‘aweru ‘alaw we‘al yisra’eil, we‘al kal mamlekhot ha’arazot.
2_chronicles 1:1	wayitHacceiq shelomoh wen dawid ‘al malkhuto; yhoh ’elohaw ‘imo, waygadeleihu lema‘elah. 
2_chronicles 1:2	wayomer shelomoh lekhal yisra’eil lesarei ha’alafim wehamei’ot welashofeTim, ulekhol nasi lekhal yisra’eil rashei ha’awot. 
2_chronicles 1:3	wayeilekhu, shelomoh wekhal haqahal ‘imo, labamah ’asher begiw‘on; ki sham hayah, ’ohel mo‘eid ha’elohim, ’asher ‘asah mosheh ‘ewed yhoh bamidbar. 
2_chronicles 1:4	’awal, ’aron ha’elohim he‘elah dawid miqiryat ye‘arim, baheikhin lo dawid; ki naTah lo ’ohel birushalim. 
2_chronicles 1:5	umicbaH haneHoshet, ’asher ‘asah bezal’eil ben ’uri wen Hur, sam lifnei mishkan yhoh; wayidresheihu shelomoh wehaqahal. 
2_chronicles 1:6	waya‘al shelomoh sham ‘al micbaH haneHoshet lifnei yhoh, ’asher le’ohel mo‘eid; waya‘al ‘alaw ‘olot ’alef. 
2_chronicles 1:7	balaylah hahu, nir’ah ’elohim lishlomoh; wayomer lo, she’al mah ’eten lakh. 
2_chronicles 1:8	wayomer shelomoh leilohim, ’atah, ‘asita ‘im dawid ’awi Hesed gadol; wehimlakhtani taHtaw. 
2_chronicles 1:9	‘atah yhoh ’elohim, yei’amein dewarekha, ‘im dawid ’awi; ki ’atah himlakhtani, ‘al ‘am raw ka‘afar ha’arez. 
2_chronicles 1:10	‘atah, Hakhmah umada‘ ten li, we’eize’ah lifnei ha‘am hacceh we’awo’ah; ki mi yishpoT, ’et ‘amekha hacceh hagadol.
2_chronicles 1:11	wayomer ’elohim lishlomoh ya‘an ’asher hayetah cot ‘im lewawekha, welosha ’alta ‘osher nekhasim wekhawod we’eit nefesh sone’ekha, wegam yamim rabim lo sha’aleta; watish’al lekha Hakhmah umada‘, ’asher tishpoT ’et ‘ami, ’asher himlakhtikha ‘alaw. 
2_chronicles 1:12	haHakhemah wehamada‘ natun lakh; we‘osher unekhasim wekhawod ’eten lakh, ’asher lo hayah khein, lamelakhim ’asher lefanekha, we’aHarekha lo yihyeh kein. 
2_chronicles 1:13	wayawo shelomoh labamah ’asher begiw‘on yerushalim, milifnei ’ohel mo‘eid; wayimlokh ‘al yisra’eil.
2_chronicles 1:14	waye’esof shelomoh rekhew ufarashim wayhi lo, ’elef we’arba‘ mei’ot rekhew, usheneim ‘asar ’elef parashim; wayaniHeim be‘arei harekhew, we‘im hamelekh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 1:15	wayitein hamelekh ’et hakesef we’et haccahaw birushalim ka’awanim; we’eit ha’aracim, natan kashiqmim ’asher bashefeilah larow. 
2_chronicles 1:16	umoza hassusim ’asher lishlomoh mimizrayim; umiqwei soHarei hamelekh, miqwei yiqHu bimHir. 
2_chronicles 1:17	waya‘alu wayozi’u mimizrayim merkawah besheish mei’ot kesef, wesus baHamishim umei’ah; wekhein lekhal malkhei haHitim umalkhei ’aram beyadam yozi’u. 
2_chronicles 2:1	wayomer shelomoh, liwnot bayit lesheim yhoh, uwayit lemalkhuto. 
2_chronicles 2:2	wayispor shelomoh shiw‘im ’elef ’ish sabal, ushemonim ’elef ’ish Hozeiw bahar; umenazeHim ‘aleihem, sheloshet ’alafim wesheish mei’ot.
2_chronicles 2:3	wayishlaH shelomoh, ’el Huram melekh zor leimor; ka’asher ‘asita ‘im dawid ’awi, watishlaH lo ’aracim, liwnot lo wayit lashewet bo. 
2_chronicles 2:4	hineih ’ani woneh bayit lesheim yhoh ’elohay, lehaqdish lo lehaqTir lefanaw qeToret samim uma‘arekhet tamid we‘olot laboqer wela‘erew, lashabatot weleHodashim, ulemo‘adei yhoh ’eloheinu; le‘olam cot ‘al yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 2:5	wehabayit ’asher ’ani woneh gadol; ki gadol ’eloheinu mikal ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 2:6	umi ya‘azar koaH liwnot lo wayit, ki hashamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkeluhu; umi ’ani ’asher ’ewneh lo wayit, ki ’im lehaqTir lefanaw. 
2_chronicles 2:7	we‘atah shelaH li ’ish Hakham la‘asot baccahaw uwakesef uwaneHoshet uwabarcel, uwa’argewan wekharmil utekheilet, weyodeia‘ lefateiaH pituHim; ‘im haHakhamim, ’asher ‘imi bihudah uwirushalim, ’asher heikhin dawid ’awi. 
2_chronicles 2:8	ushelaH li ‘azei ’aracim beroshim we’algumim meihalewanon ki ’ani yada‘ti, ’asher ‘awadekha yod‘im, likhrot ‘azei lewanon; wehineih ‘awaday ‘im ‘awadekha. 
2_chronicles 2:9	ulehakhin li ‘eizim larow; ki habayit ’asher ’ani woneh gadol wehaflei. 
2_chronicles 2:10	wehineih laHoTewim lekhoretei ha‘eizim natati HiTim makot la‘awadekha, korim ‘esrim ’elef, use‘orim korim ‘esrim ’alef; weyayin, batim ‘esrim ’elef, weshemen batim ‘esrim ’alef.
2_chronicles 2:11	wayomer Huram melekh zor bikhtaw, wayishlaH ’el shelomoh; be’ahawat yhoh ’et ‘amo, netanekha ‘aleihem melekh. 
2_chronicles 2:12	wayomer Huram barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’asher ‘asah, ’et hashamayim we’et ha’arez; ’asher natan ledawid hamelekh bein Hakham, yodeia‘ seikhel uwinah, ’asher yiwneh bayit yhoh, uwayit lemalkhuto. 
2_chronicles 2:13	we‘atah, shalaHti ’ish Hakham yodeia‘ binah leHuram ’awi. 
2_chronicles 2:14	ben ’ishah min benot dan, we’awiw ’ish zori yodeia‘ la‘asot baccahaw uwakesef baneHoshet babarcel ba’awanim uwa‘eizim, ba’argaman batekheilet uwabuz uwakarmil, ulefateiaH kal pituaH, welaHshow kal maHashawet; ’asher yinaten lo ‘im Hakhamekha, weHakhmei, ’adoni dawid ’awikha. 
2_chronicles 2:15	we‘atah haHiTim wehase‘orim hashemen wehayayin ’asher ’amar ’adoni, yishlaH la‘awadaw. 
2_chronicles 2:16	wa’anaHnu nikhrot ‘eizim min halewanon kekhal zarekekha, unewi’eim lekha rafsodot ‘al yam yafo; we’atah ta‘aleh ’otam yerushalim.
2_chronicles 2:17	wayispor shelomoh, kal ha’anashim hageirim ’asher be’erez yisra’eil, ’aHarei hassefar, ’asher sefaram dawid ’awiw; wayimaze’u, mei’ah waHamishim ’elef, usheloshet ’alafim wesheish mei’ot. 
2_chronicles 2:18	waya‘as meihem shiw‘im ’elef sabal, ushemonim ’elef Hozeiw bahar; usheloshet ’alafim wesheish mei’ot, menazeHim leha‘awid ’et ha‘am. 
2_chronicles 3:1	wayaHel shelomoh, liwnot ’et beit yhoh birushalim, behar hamoriyah, ’asher nir’ah ledawid ’awihu; ’asher heikhin bimqom dawid, begoren ’arenan haywusi. 
2_chronicles 3:2	wayaHel liwnot baHodesh hasheini basheini, bishnat ’arba‘ lemalkhuto. 
2_chronicles 3:3	we’eileh husad shelomoh, liwnot ’et beit ha’elohim; ha’orekh ’amot bamidah harishonah ’amot shishim, weroHaw ’amot ‘esrim. 
2_chronicles 3:4	weha’ulam ’asher ‘al penei ha’orekh ‘al penei roHaw habayit ’amot ‘esrim, wehagowah mei’ah we‘esrim; wayzapeihu mipenimah cahaw Tahor. 
2_chronicles 3:5	we’eit habayit hagadol, Hipah ‘eiz beroshim, wayHapeihu cahaw Tow; waya‘al ‘alaw timorim wesharsherot. 
2_chronicles 3:6	wayzaf ’et habayit ’ewen yeqarah letif’aret; wehaccahaw cehaw parwayim. 
2_chronicles 3:7	wayHaf ’et habayit haqorot hassipim weqirotaw wedaltotaw cahaw; ufitaH keruwim ‘al haqirot.
2_chronicles 3:8	waya‘as ’et beit qodesh haqodashim, ’areko ‘al penei roHaw habayit ’amot ‘esrim, weraHebo ’amot ‘esrim; wayHapeihu cahaw Tow, lekhikarim sheish mei’ot. 
2_chronicles 3:9	umishqal lemismerot lishqalim Hamishim cahaw; weha‘aliyot Hipah cahaw. 
2_chronicles 3:10	waya‘as beweit qodesh haqodashim keruwim shenayim, ma‘aseih za‘azu‘im; wayzapu ’otam cahaw. 
2_chronicles 3:11	wekhanfei hakeruwim, ’arekam ’amot ‘esrim; kenaf ha’eHad le’amot Hameish, maga‘at leqir habayit, wehakanaf ha’aHeret ’amot Hameish, magia‘ likhnaf hakeruw ha’aHeir. 
2_chronicles 3:12	ukhenaf hakeruw ha’eHad ’amot Hameish, magia‘ leqir habayit; wehakanaf ha’aHeret ’amot Hameish, deweiqah likhnaf hakeruw ha’aHeir. 
2_chronicles 3:13	kanfei hakeruwim ha’eileh, poresim ’amot ‘esrim; weheim ‘omedim ‘al ragleihem ufeneihem labayit.
2_chronicles 3:14	waya‘as ’et haparokhet, tekheilet we’argaman wekharmil uwuz; waya‘al ‘alaw keruwim.
2_chronicles 3:15	waya‘as lifnei habayit ‘amudim shenayim, ’amot sheloshim weHameish ’orekh; wehazefet ’asher ‘al rosho ’amot Hameish.
2_chronicles 3:16	waya‘as sharsherot badewir, wayitein ‘al rosh ha‘amudim; waya‘as rimonim mei’ah, wayitein basharsherot. 
2_chronicles 3:17	wayaqem ’et ha‘amudim ‘al penei haheikhal, ’eHad miyamin we’eHad meihasemol; wayiqra sheim haymini haymani yakhin, wesheim hasemali bo‘ac.
2_chronicles 4:1	waya‘as micbaH neHoshet, ‘esrim ’amah ’areko, we‘esrim ’amah raHebo; we‘eser ’amot qomato.
2_chronicles 4:2	waya‘as ’et hayam muzaq; ‘eser ba’amah misefato ’el sefato ‘agol sawiw, weHameish ba’amah qomato, weqaw sheloshim ba’amah, yasow ’oto sawiw. 
2_chronicles 4:3	udemut beqarim taHat lo sawiw sawiw sowwim ’oto, ‘eser ba’amah, maqifim ’et hayam sawiw; shenayim Turim habaqar, yezuqim bemuzaqto. 
2_chronicles 4:4	‘omeid ‘al sheneim ‘asar baqar, sheloshah fonim zafonah usheloshah fonim yamah usheloshah ponim negbah, usheloshah ponim micraHah, wehayam ‘aleihem milma‘elah; wekhal ’aHoreihem bayetah. 
2_chronicles 4:5	we‘aweyo TefaH, usefato kema‘aseih sefat kos, peraH shoshanah; maHaciq batim, sheloshet ’alafim yakhil.
2_chronicles 4:6	waya‘as kiyorim ‘asarah wayitein Hamishah miyamin waHamishah misemol leraHezah wahem, ’et ma‘aseih ha‘olah yadiHu wam; wehayam leraHezah lakohanim bo.
2_chronicles 4:7	waya‘as ’et menorot haccahaw ‘eser kemishpaTam; wayitein baheikhal, Hameish miyamin weHameish misemol.
2_chronicles 4:8	waya‘as shulHanot ‘asarah wayanaH baheikhal, Hamishah miyamin waHamishah misemol; waya‘as micreqei cahaw mei’ah. 
2_chronicles 4:9	waya‘as Hazar hakohanim, weha‘acarah hagedolah; udelatot la‘acarah wedaltoteihem zipah neHoshet. 
2_chronicles 4:10	we’et hayam, natan miketef haymanit qeidemah mimul negbah. 
2_chronicles 4:11	waya‘as Huram, ’et hassirot, we’et haya‘im we’et hamicraqot; s waykhal Hyram Huram, la‘asot ’et hamelakhah, ’asher ‘asah lamelekh shelomoh beweit ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 4:12	‘amudim shenayim, wehagulot wehakotarot ‘al rosh ha‘amudim shetayim; wehasewakhot shetayim, lekhassot, ’et shetei gulot hakotarot, ’asher ‘al rosh ha‘amudim. 
2_chronicles 4:13	we’et harimonim ’arba‘ mei’ot lishtei hasewakhot; shenayim Turim rimonim lasewakhah ha’eHat, lekhassot, ’et shetei gulot hakotarot, ’asher ‘al penei ha‘amudim. 
2_chronicles 4:14	we’et hamekhonot ‘asah; we’et hakiyorot ‘asah ‘al hamekhonot. 
2_chronicles 4:15	’et hayam ’eHad; we’et habaqar sheneim ‘asar taHtaw. 
2_chronicles 4:16	we’et hassirot we’et haya‘im we’et hamiclagot we’et kal keleihem, ‘asah Huram ’awiw lamelekh shelomoh leweit yhoh; neHoshet maruq. 
2_chronicles 4:17	bekhikar hayardein yezaqam hamelekh, ba‘awi ha’adamah; bein sukot uwein zereidatah. 
2_chronicles 4:18	waya‘as shelomoh kal hakeilim ha’eileh larow me’od; ki lo neHqar mishqal haneHoshet.
2_chronicles 4:19	waya‘as shelomoh, ’eit kal hakeilim, ’asher beit ha’elohim; we’eit micbaH haccahaw, we’et hashulHanot, wa‘aleihem leHem hapanim. 
2_chronicles 4:20	we’et hamenorot weneiroteihem, lewa‘aram kamishpaT lifnei hadewir cahaw sagur. 
2_chronicles 4:21	wehaperaH wehaneirot wehamelqaHayim cahaw; hu mikhlot cahaw. 
2_chronicles 4:22	wehamcamerot wehamicraqot wehakapot wehamaHtot cahaw sagur; ufetaH habayit daltotaw hapenimiyot leqodesh haqodashim, wedaltei habayit laheikhal cahaw. 
2_chronicles 5:1	watishlam kal hamelakhah, ’asher ‘asah shelomoh leweit yhoh; s wayawei shelomoh ’et qadeshei dawid ’awiw, we’et hakesef we’et haccahaw we’et kal hakeilim, natan be’ozerot beit ha’elohim.
2_chronicles 5:2	’ac yaqheil shelomoh ’et ciqnei yisra’eil, we’et kal rashei hamaTot nesi’ei ha’awot liwnei yisra’eil ’el yerushalim; leha‘alot ’et ’aron berit yhoh mei‘ir dawid hi ziyon. 
2_chronicles 5:3	wayiqahalu ’el hamelekh kal ’ish yisra’eil beHag; hu haHodesh hashewi‘i. 
2_chronicles 5:4	wayawo’u kol ciqnei yisra’eil; wayis’u halwiyim ’et ha’aron. 
2_chronicles 5:5	waya‘alu ’et ha’aron we’et ’ohel mo‘eid, we’et kal kelei haqodesh ’asher ba’ohel; he‘elu ’otam, hakohanim halwiyim. 
2_chronicles 5:6	wehamelekh shelomoh, wekhal ‘adat yisra’eil hano‘adim ‘alaw lifnei ha’aron; mecabeHim zon uwaqar, ’asher lo yissaferu welo yimanu meirow. 
2_chronicles 5:7	wayawi’u hakohanim ’et ’aron berit yhoh ’el meqomo ’el dewir habayit ’el qodesh haqedashim; ’el taHat kanfei hakeruwim. 
2_chronicles 5:8	wayihyu hakeruwim poresim kenafayim, ‘al meqom ha’aron; waykhassu hakeruwim ‘al ha’aron we‘al badaw milma‘elah. 
2_chronicles 5:9	waya’arikhu habadim wayeira’u rashei habadim min ha’aron ‘al penei hadewir, welo yeira’u haHuzah; wayhi sham, ‘ad hayom hacceh. 
2_chronicles 5:10	’ein ba’aron, raq shenei haluHot, ’asher natan mosheh beHoreiw; ’asher karat yhoh ‘im benei yisra’eil, bezeitam mimizrayim.
2_chronicles 5:11	wayhi bezeit hakohanim min haqodesh; ki kal hakohanim hanimze’im hitqadashu, ’ein lishmor lemaHleqot. 
2_chronicles 5:12	wehalwiyim hamshorarim lekhulam le’asaf leheiman lidutun weliwneihem wela’aHeihem melubashim buz, bimziltayim uwinwalim wekhinorot, ‘omedim micraH lamicbeiaH; we‘imahem kohanim lemei’ah we‘esrim, maHzeririm maHzerim baHazozerot. 
2_chronicles 5:13	wayhi khe’eHad lamaHazozerim lamHazerim welamshorarim lehashmia‘ qol ’eHad, lehaleil ulehodot yhoh ukheharim qol baHazozerot uwimziltayim uwikhlei hashir, uwehaleil yhoh ki Tow, ki le‘olam Hasdo; wehabayit malei ‘anan beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 5:14	welo yakhelu hakohanim la‘amod leshareit mipenei he‘anan; ki malei khewod yhoh ’et beit ha’elohim.
2_chronicles 6:1	’ac ’amar shelomoh; yhoh ’amar, lishkon ba‘arafel. 
2_chronicles 6:2	wa’ani baniti weit cewul lakh; umakhon leshiwtekha ‘olamim. 
2_chronicles 6:3	wayasseiw hamelekh ’et panaw, waywarekh ’eit kal qehal yisra’eil; wekhal qehal yisra’eil ‘omeid. 
2_chronicles 6:4	wayomer, barukh yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, ’asher diber befiw, ’eit dawid ’awi; uweyadaw milei leimor. 
2_chronicles 6:5	min hayom, ’asher hozeiti ’et ‘ami mei’erez mizrayim lo waHarti we‘ir, mikol shiwTei yisra’eil, liwnot bayit, lihyot shemi sham; welo waHarti we’ish, lihyot nagid ‘al ‘ami yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 6:6	wa’ewHar birushalim, lihyot shemi sham; wa’ewHar bedawid, lihyot ‘al ‘ami yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 6:7	wayhi ‘im lewaw dawid ’awi; liwnot bayit, lesheim yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 6:8	wayomer yhoh ’el dawid ’awi, ya‘an, ’asher hayah ‘im lewawekha, liwnot bayit lishmi; heTiwota, ki hayah ‘im lewawekha. 
2_chronicles 6:9	raq ’atah, lo tiwneh habayit; ki winkha hayozei meiHalazekha, hu yiwneh habayit lishmi. 
2_chronicles 6:10	wayaqem yhoh, ’et dewaro ’asher dibeir; wa’aqum taHat dawid ’awi wa’eisheiw ‘al kissei yisra’eil, ka’asher diber yhoh, wa’ewneh habayit, lesheim yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 6:11	wa’asim sham ’et ha’aron, ’asher sham berit yhoh; ’asher karat ‘im benei yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 6:12	waya‘amod, lifnei micbaH yhoh, neged kal qehal yisra’eil; wayifros kapaw. 
2_chronicles 6:13	ki ‘asah shelomoh kiyor neHoshet, wayiteneihu betokh ha‘acarah Hameish ’amot ’areko, weHameish ’amot raHebo, we’amot shalosh qomato; waya‘amod ‘alaw, wayiwrakh ‘al birkaw neged kal qehal yisra’eil, wayifros kapaw hashamayemah. 
2_chronicles 6:14	wayomar, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil ’ein kamokha ’elohim, bashamayim uwa’arez; shomeir haberit wehaHesed, la‘awadekha haholekhim lefanekha bekhal libam. 
2_chronicles 6:15	’asher shamarta, le‘awdekha dawid ’awi, ’eit ’asher dibarta lo; watedabeir befikha uweyadekha mileita kayom hacceh. 
2_chronicles 6:16	we‘atah yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, mor le‘awdekha dawid ’awi ’eit ’asher dibarta lo leimor, lo yikareit lekha ’ish milefanay, yosheiw ‘al kissei yisra’eil; raq ’im yishmeru wanekha ’et darkam, lalekhet betorati, ka’asher halakhta lefanay. 
2_chronicles 6:17	we‘atah yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil; yei’amein dewarekha, ’asher dibarta le‘awdekha ledawid. 
2_chronicles 6:18	ki ha’umnam, yeisheiw ’elohim ’et ha’adam ‘al ha’arez; hineih shamayim ushemei hashamayim lo yekhalkelukha, ’af ki habayit hacceh ’asher baniti. 
2_chronicles 6:19	ufanita ’el tefilat ‘awdekha we’el teHinato yhoh ’elohay; lishmoa‘ ’el harinah we’el hatefilah, ’asher ‘awdekha mitpaleil lefanekha. 
2_chronicles 6:20	lihyot ‘einekha fetuHot ’el habayit hacceh yomam walaylah, ’el hamaqom, ’asher ’amarta, lasum shimkha sham; lishmoa‘ ’el hatefilah, ’asher yitpaleil ‘awdekha, ’el hamaqom hacceh. 
2_chronicles 6:21	weshama‘ta ’el taHanunei ‘awdekha we‘amekha yisra’eil, ’asher yitpalu ’el hamaqom hacceh; we’atah tishma‘ mimeqom shiwtekha min hashamayim, weshama‘ta wesalaHeta. 
2_chronicles 6:22	’im yeHeTa ’ish lerei‘eihu, wenasha wo ’alah leha’aloto; uwa, ’alah lifnei micbaHakha babayit hacceh. 
2_chronicles 6:23	we’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim, we‘asita weshafaTta ’et ‘awadekha, lehashiw lerasha‘, lateit darko berosho; ulehazdiq zadiq, latet lo kezidqato.
2_chronicles 6:24	we’im yinageif ‘amekha yisra’eil lifnei ’oyeiw ki yeHeT’u lakh; weshawu wehodu ’et shemekha, wehitpalu wehitHanenu lefanekha babayit hacceh. 
2_chronicles 6:25	we’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim, wesalaHta, leHaTat ‘amekha yisra’eil; wahasheiwotam ’el ha’adamah, ’asher natatah lahem wela’awoteihem.
2_chronicles 6:26	behei‘azeir hashamayim welo yihyeh maTar ki yeHeT’u lakh; wehitpalu ’el hamaqom hacceh wehodu ’et shemekha, meiHaTatam yeshuwun ki ta‘aneim. 
2_chronicles 6:27	we’atah tishma‘ hashamayim, wesalaHta leHaTat ‘awadekha we‘amekha yisra’eil, ki toreim ’el haderekh haTowah ’asher yeilekhu wah; wenatatah maTar ‘al ’arzekha, ’asher natatah le‘amekha lenaHalah.
2_chronicles 6:28	ra‘aw ki yihyeh wa’arez, dewer ki yihyeh shidafon weyeiraqon ’arbeh weHasil ki yihyeh, ki yazar lo ’oywaw be’erez she‘araw; kal nega‘ wekhal maHalah. 
2_chronicles 6:29	kal tefilah khal teHinah, ’asher yihyeh lekhal ha’adam, ulekhol ‘amekha yisra’eil; ’asher yeide‘u, ’ish nig‘o umakh’owo, ufaras kapaw ’el habayit hacceh. 
2_chronicles 6:30	we’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim mekhon shiwtekha wesalaHta, wenatatah la’ish kekhal derakhaw, ’asher teida‘ ’et lewawo; ki ’atah lewadekha yada‘ta, ’et lewaw benei ha’adam. 
2_chronicles 6:31	lema‘an yira’ukha, lalekhet bidrakhekha, kal hayamim, ’asher heim Hayim ‘al penei ha’adamah; ’asher natatah la’awoteinu.
2_chronicles 6:32	wegam ’el hanakheri, ’asher lo mei‘amekha yisra’eil hu uwa mei’erez reHoqah, lema‘an shimkha hagadol weyadekha haHacaqah, ucero‘akha haneTuyah; uwa’u wehitpalu ’el habayit hacceh. 
2_chronicles 6:33	we’atah tishma‘ min hashamayim mimekhon shiwtekha, we‘asita kekhol ’asher yiqra ’eilekha hanakheri; lema‘an yeide‘u khal ‘amei ha’arez ’et shemekha, uleyir’ah ’otekha ke‘amekha yisra’eil, welada‘at ki shimkha niqra, ‘al habayit hacceh ’asher baniti. 
2_chronicles 6:34	ki yeizei ‘amekha lamilHamah ‘al ’oywaw, baderekh ’asher tishlaHeim; wehitpalu ’eilekha, derekh ha‘ir haccot ’asher baHarta bah, wehabayit ’asher baniti lishmekha. 
2_chronicles 6:35	weshama‘ta min hashamayim, ’et tefilatam we’et teHinatam; we‘asita mishpaTam. 
2_chronicles 6:36	ki yeHeT’u lakh, ki ’ein ’adam ’asher lo yeHeTa, we’anafta wam, unetatam lifnei ’oyeiw; weshawum showeihem ’el ’erez reHoqah ’o qerowah. 
2_chronicles 6:37	weheishiwu ’el lewawam, ba’arez ’asher nishbu sham; weshawu wehitHanenu ’eilekha, be’erez shiwyam leimor, HaTanu he‘ewinu werasha‘enu. 
2_chronicles 6:38	weshawu ’eilekha, bekhal libam uwekhal nafsham, be’erez shiwyam ’asher shawu ’otam; wehitpalu, derekh ’arzam ’asher natatah la’awotam, weha‘ir ’asher baHarta, welabayit ’asher baniti lishmekha. 
2_chronicles 6:39	weshama‘ta min hashamayim mimekhon shiwtekha, ’et tefilatam we’et teHinoteihem, we‘asita mishpaTam; wesalaHta le‘amekha ’asher HaTe’u lakh. 
2_chronicles 6:40	‘atah ’elohay, yihyu na ‘einekha petuHot, we’acenekha qashuwot; litfilat hamaqom hacceh.
2_chronicles 6:41	we‘atah, qumah yhoh ’elohim lenuHekha, ’atah wa’aron ‘uccekha; kohanekha yhoh ’elohim yilbeshu teshu‘ah, waHasidekha yismeHu waTow. 
2_chronicles 6:42	yhoh ’elohim, ’al tasheiw penei meshiHekha; cakherah leHasdei dawid ‘awdekha.
2_chronicles 7:1	ukhekhalot shelomoh lehitpaleil, weha’eish, yaredah meihashamayim, watokhal ha‘olah wehaccewaHim; ukhewod yhoh malei ’et habayit. 
2_chronicles 7:2	welo yakhelu hakohanim, lawo ’el beit yhoh; ki malei khewod yhoh ’et beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 7:3	wekhol benei yisra’eil, ro’im beredet ha’eish, ukhewod yhoh ‘al habayit; wayikhre‘u ’apayim ’arzah ‘al harizfah wayishtaHawu, wehodot yhoh ki Tow, ki le‘olam Hasdo. 
2_chronicles 7:4	wehamelekh wekhal ha‘am; coweHim cewaH lifnei yhoh.
2_chronicles 7:5	wayicbaH hamelekh shelomoh ’et cewaH habaqar, ‘esrim ushenayim ’elef, wezon mei’ah we‘esrim ’alef; wayaHnekhu ’et beit ha’elohim, hamelekh wekhal ha‘am. 
2_chronicles 7:6	wehakohanim ‘al mishmerotam ‘omedim, wehalwiyim bikhlei shir yhoh ’asher ‘asah dawid hamelekh, lehodot yhoh ki le‘olam Hasdo, behaleil dawid beyadam; wehakohanim maHazozerim maHzerim negdam, wekhal yisra’eil ‘omedim.
2_chronicles 7:7	wayqadeish shelomoh, ’et tokh heHazeir ’asher lifnei weit yhoh, ki ‘asah sham ha‘olot, we’eit Helwei hashelamim; ki micbaH haneHoshet ’asher ‘asah shelomoh, lo yakhol, lehakhil ’et ha‘olah we’et haminHah we’et haHalawim. 
2_chronicles 7:8	waya‘as shelomoh ’et heHag ba‘eit hahi shiw‘at yamim wekhal yisra’eil ‘imo, qahal gadol me’od; milewo Hamat ‘ad naHal mizrayim. 
2_chronicles 7:9	waya‘asu bayom hashemini ‘azaret; ki Hanukat hamicbeiaH, ‘asu shiw‘at yamim, weheHag shiw‘at yamim. 
2_chronicles 7:10	uweyom ‘esrim usheloshah laHodesh hashewi‘i, shilaH ’et ha‘am le’aholeihem; semeiHim weTowei leiw, ‘al haTowah, ’asher ‘asah yhoh ledawid welishlomoh, uleyisra’eil ‘amo. 
2_chronicles 7:11	waykhal shelomoh ’et beit yhoh we’et beit hamelekh; we’eit kal haba ‘al leiw shelomoh, la‘asot beweit yhoh uweweito hizliaH.
2_chronicles 7:12	wayeira yhoh ’el shelomoh balayelah; wayomer lo, shama‘ti ’et tefilatekha, uwaHarti bamaqom hacceh li leweit cawaH. 
2_chronicles 7:13	hein ’e‘ezor hashamayim welo yihyeh maTar, wehein ’azawweh ‘al Hagaw le’ekhol ha’arez; we’im ’ashalaH dewer be‘ami. 
2_chronicles 7:14	weyikane‘u ‘ami ’asher niqra shemi ‘aleihem, weyitpalu wiwaqshu fanay, weyashuwu midarkheihem hara‘im; wa’ani ’eshma‘ min hashamayim, we’eslaH leHaTatam, we’erpa ’et ’arzam. 
2_chronicles 7:15	‘atah, ‘einay yihyu fetuHot, we’acenay qashuwot; litfilat hamaqom hacceh. 
2_chronicles 7:16	we‘atah, baHarti wehiqdashti ’et habayit hacceh, lihyot shemi sham ‘ad ‘olam; wehayu ‘einay welibi sham kal hayamim. 
2_chronicles 7:17	we’atah ’im teileikh lefanay, ka’asher halakh dawid ’awikha, wela‘asot kekhol ’asher ziwwitikha; weHuqay umishpaTay tishmor. 
2_chronicles 7:18	wahaqimoti, ’eit kissei malkhutekha; ka’asher karati, ledawid ’awikha leimor, lo yikareit lekha ’ish, mosheil beyisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 7:19	we’im teshuwun ’atem, wa‘acawtem Huqotay umizwotay, ’asher natati lifneikhem; wahalakhtem, wa‘awadtem ’elohim ’aHeirim, wehishtaHawitem lahem. 
2_chronicles 7:20	unetashtim, mei‘al ’admati ’asher natati lahem, we’et habayit hacceh ’asher hiqdashti lishmi, ’ashlikh mei‘al panay; we’etenenu lemashal welishninah bekhal ha‘amim. 
2_chronicles 7:21	wehabayit hacceh ’asher hayah ‘elyon, lekhal ‘oweir ‘alaw yishom; we’amar, bameh ‘asah yhoh kakhah, la’arez haccot welabayit hacceh. 
2_chronicles 7:22	we’ameru, ‘al ’asher ‘acewu ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem, ’asher hozi’am mei’erez mizrayim wayaHaciqu beilohim ’aHeirim, wayishtaHawu lahem waya‘awdum; ‘al kein heiwi ‘aleihem, ’eit kal hara‘ah haccot.
2_chronicles 8:1	wayhi miqeiz ‘esrim shanah, ’asher banah shelomoh ’et beit yhoh we’et beito. 
2_chronicles 8:2	wehe‘arim, ’asher natan Huram lishlomoh, banah shelomoh ’otam; wayoshew sham ’et benei yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 8:3	wayeilekh shelomoh Hamat zowah, wayeHecaq ‘aleha. 
2_chronicles 8:4	wayiwen ’et tadmor bamidbar; we’eit kal ‘arei hamiskenot, ’asher banah baHamat. 
2_chronicles 8:5	wayiwen ’et beit Horon ha‘elyon, we’et beit Horon hataHton; ‘arei mazor, Homot delatayim uweriaH. 
2_chronicles 8:6	we’et ba‘alat, we’eit kal ‘arei hamiskenot ’asher hayu lishlomoh, we’eit kal ‘arei harekhew, we’eit ‘arei haparashim; we’eit kal Heisheq shelomoh, ’asher Hashaq liwnot birushalim uwalewanon, uwekhol ’erez memshalto. 
2_chronicles 8:7	kal ha‘am hanotar min haHiti weha’emori wehapericci wehaHiwwi wehaywusi, ’asher lo miyisra’eil heimah. 
2_chronicles 8:8	min beneihem, ’asher notru ’aHareihem ba’arez, ’asher lo khilum benei yisra’eil; waya‘aleim shelomoh lemas, ‘ad hayom hacceh. 
2_chronicles 8:9	umin benei yisra’eil, ’asher lo natan shelomoh la‘awadim limlakhto; ki heimah ’anshei milHamah wesarei shalishaw, wesarei rikhbo ufarashaw.
2_chronicles 8:10	we’eileh sarei haneziwim hanizawim ’asher lamelekh shelomoh Hamishim umatayim; harodim ba‘am. 
2_chronicles 8:11	we’et bat par‘oh, he‘elah shelomoh mei‘ir dawid, labayit ’asher banah lah; ki ’amar, lo teisheiw ’ishah li beweit dawid melekh yisra’eil, ki qodesh heimah, ’asher ba’ah ’aleihem ’aron yhoh.
2_chronicles 8:12	’ac he‘elah shelomoh ‘olot yhoh; ‘al micbaH yhoh, ’asher banah lifnei ha’ulam. 
2_chronicles 8:13	uwidwar yom beyom, leha‘alot kemizwat mosheh, lashabatot weleHodashim, welamo‘adot, shalosh pe‘amim bashanah; beHag hamazot uweHag hashawu‘ot uweHag hassukot. 
2_chronicles 8:14	waya‘ameid kemishpaT dawid ’awiw ’et maHleqot hakohanim ‘al ‘awodatam, wehalwiyim ‘al mishmerotam lehaleil uleshareit neged hakohanim lidwar yom beyomo, wehasho‘arim bemaHleqotam lesha‘ar washa‘ar; ki khein, mizwat dawid ’ish ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 8:15	welo saru mizwat hamelekh ‘al hakohanim wehalwiyim lekhal dawar wela’ozarot. 
2_chronicles 8:16	watikon kal melekhet shelomoh, ‘ad hayom musad beit yhoh we‘ad keloto; shaleim beit yhoh.
2_chronicles 8:17	’ac halakh shelomoh le‘ezyon gewer we’el ’eilot ‘al sefat hayam be’erez ’edom. 
2_chronicles 8:18	wayishlaH lo Huram beyad ‘awadaw ’oniyot ’oniyot, wa‘awadim yod‘ei yam wayawo’u ‘im ‘awdei shelomoh ’ofirah, wayiqHu misham, ’arba‘ mei’ot waHamishim kikar cahaw; wayawi’u ’el hamelekh shelomoh.
2_chronicles 9:1	umalkat shewa, shame‘ah ’et sheima‘ shelomoh watawo lenassot ’et shelomoh weHidot birushalim, beHayil kaweid me’od ugemalim nose’im besamim wecahaw larow we’ewen yeqarah; watawo ’el shelomoh, watedabeir ‘imo, ’eit kal ’asher hayah ‘im lewawah. 
2_chronicles 9:2	wayaged lah shelomoh ’et kal dewareha; welo ne‘lam dawar mishelomoh, ’asher lo higid lah. 
2_chronicles 9:3	wateire malkat shewa, ’eit Hakhemat shelomoh; wehabayit ’asher banah. 
2_chronicles 9:4	uma’akhal shulHano umoshaw ‘awadaw uma‘amad mesharetaw umalbusheihem, umashqaw umalbusheihem, wa‘aliyato, ’asher ya‘aleh beit yhoh; welo hayah ‘od bah ruaH. 
2_chronicles 9:5	watomer ’el hamelekh, ’emet hadawar, ’asher shama‘ti be’arzi; ‘al dewarekha we‘al Hakhematekha. 
2_chronicles 9:6	welo he’emanti lediwreihem, ‘ad ’asher bati watir’enah ‘einay, wehineih lo hugad li, Hazi marbit Hakhematekha; yasafta ‘al hashemu‘ah ’asher shama‘eti. 
2_chronicles 9:7	’ashrei ’anashekha, we’ashrei ‘awadekha ’eileh; ha‘omedim lefanekha tamid, weshome‘im ’et Hakhematekha. 
2_chronicles 9:8	yehi yhoh ’elohekha barukh, ’asher Hafeiz bekha, letitekha ‘al kis’o lemelekh, yhoh ’elohekha; be’ahawat ’elohekha ’et yisra’eil leha‘amido le‘olam, wayitenkha ‘aleihem lemelekh, la‘asot mishpaT uzedaqah. 
2_chronicles 9:9	watitein lamelekh mei’ah we‘esrim kikar cahaw, uwesamim larow me’od we’ewen yeqarah; welo hayah kabosem hahu, ’asher natenah malkat shewa lamelekh shelomoh. 
2_chronicles 9:10	wegam ‘awdei Hiram Huram we‘awdei shelomoh, ’asher heiwi’u cahaw mei’ofir; heiwi’u ‘azei ’algumim we’ewen yeqarah. 
2_chronicles 9:11	waya‘as hamelekh ’et ‘azei ha’algumim mesilot leweit yhoh uleweit hamelekh, wekhinorot unewalim lasharim; welo nir’u khaheim lefanim be’erez yehudah. 
2_chronicles 9:12	wehamelekh shelomoh natan lemalkat shewa, ’et kal Hefzah ’asher sha’alah, milewad ’asher heiwi’ah ’el hamelekh; watahafokh wateilekh le’arzah hi wa‘awadeha.
2_chronicles 9:13	wayhi mishqal haccahaw, ’asher ba lishlomoh beshanah ’eHat; sheish mei’ot weshishim washeish kikerei cahaw. 
2_chronicles 9:14	lewad mei’anshei hatarim wehassoHarim mewi’im; wekhal malkhei ‘araw ufaHot ha’arez, mewi’im cahaw wakhesef lishlomoh. 
2_chronicles 9:15	waya‘as hamelekh shelomoh matayim zinah cahaw shaHuT; sheish mei’ot cahaw shaHuT, ya‘aleh ‘al hazinah ha’eHat. 
2_chronicles 9:16	ushelosh mei’ot maginim cahaw shaHuT, shelosh mei’ot cahaw, ya‘aleh ‘al hamagein ha’eHat; wayiteneim hamelekh, beweit ya‘ar halewanon.
2_chronicles 9:17	waya‘as hamelekh kissei shein gadol; wayzapeihu cahaw Tahor. 
2_chronicles 9:18	wesheish ma‘alot lakissei wekhewesh baccahaw lakissei ma’oHacim, weyadot micceh umicceh ‘al meqom hashawet; ushenayim ’arayot, ‘omedim ’eizel hayadot. 
2_chronicles 9:19	usheneim ‘asar ’arayot, ‘omedim sham ‘al sheish hama‘alot micceh umicceh; lo na‘asah khein lekhal mamlakhah. 
2_chronicles 9:20	wekhol kelei mashqeih hamelekh shelomoh cahaw, wekhol, kelei beit ya‘ar halewanon cahaw sagur; ’ein kesef, neHshaw bimei shelomoh lim’umah. 
2_chronicles 9:21	ki ’oniyot lamelekh holekhot tarshish, ‘im ‘awdei Huram; ’aHat leshalosh shanim tawonah ’oniyot tarshish, nose’ot cahaw wakhesef, shenhabim weqofim wetukiyim.
2_chronicles 9:22	wayigdal hamelekh shelomoh, mikol malkhei ha’arez; le‘osher weHakhemah. 
2_chronicles 9:23	wekhol malkhei ha’arez, mewaqshim ’et penei shelomoh; lishmoa‘ ’et Hakhemato, ’asher natan ha’elohim belibo. 
2_chronicles 9:24	weheim mewi’im ’ish minHato kelei khesef ukhelei cahaw uselamot neisheq uwesamim, susim uferadim; dewar shanah beshanah.
2_chronicles 9:25	wayhi lishlomoh ’arba‘at ’alafim ’uryot susim umarkawot, usheneim ‘asar ’elef parashim; wayaniHeim be‘arei harekhew, we‘im hamelekh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 9:26	wayhi mosheil bekhal hamelakhim; min hanahar we‘ad ’erez pelishtim, we‘ad gewul mizrayim. 
2_chronicles 9:27	wayitein hamelekh ’et hakesef birushalim ka’awanim; we’eit ha’aracim, natan kashiqmim ’asher bashefeilah larow. 
2_chronicles 9:28	umozi’im susim mimizrayim lishlomoh umikal ha’arazot. 
2_chronicles 9:29	ushe’ar diwrei shelomoh, harishonim weha’aHaronim; halo heim ketuwim, ‘al diwrei natan hanawi, we‘al newu’at ’aHiyah hashiloni, uwaHacot ye‘di ye‘do haHoceh, ‘al yarawe‘am ben newaT. 
2_chronicles 9:30	wayimlokh shelomoh wirushalim ‘al kal yisra’eil ’arba‘im shanah. 
2_chronicles 9:31	wayishkaw shelomoh ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqberuhu, be‘ir dawid ’awiw; wayimlokh reHaw‘am beno taHtaw.
2_chronicles 10:1	wayeilekh reHaw‘am shekhemah; ki shekhem ba’u khal yisra’eil lehamlikh ’oto. 
2_chronicles 10:2	wayhi kishmoa‘ yarawe‘am ben newaT wehu wemizrayim, ’asher baraH, mipenei shelomoh hamelekh; wayashaw yarawe‘am mimizrayim. 
2_chronicles 10:3	wayishleHu wayiqre’u lo, wayawo yarawe‘am wekhal yisra’eil; waydaberu, ’el reHaw‘am leimor. 
2_chronicles 10:4	’awikha hiqshah ’et ‘uleinu; we‘atah haqeil mei‘awodat ’awikha haqashah, umei‘ulo hakaweid ’asher natan ‘aleinu wena‘awdeka. 
2_chronicles 10:5	wayomer ’aleihem, ‘od sheloshet yamim weshuwu ’eilay; wayeilekh ha‘am.
2_chronicles 10:6	wayiwwa‘az hamelekh reHaw‘am, ’et hacceqeinim ’asher hayu ‘omedim, lifnei shelomoh ’awiw, bihyoto Hay leimor; ’eikh ’atem no‘azim, lehashiw la‘am hacceh dawar. 
2_chronicles 10:7	waydaberu ’eilaw leimor, ’im tihyeh leTow leha‘am hacceh urezitam, wedibarta ’aleihem dewarim Towim; wehayu lekha ‘awadim kal hayamim. 
2_chronicles 10:8	waya‘acow ’et ‘azat hacceqeinim ’asher ye‘azuhu; wayiwwa‘az, ’et hayladim ’asher gadelu ’ito, ha‘omedim lefanaw. 
2_chronicles 10:9	wayomer ’aleihem, mah ’atem no‘azim, wenashiw dawar ’et ha‘am hacceh; ’asher diberu ’eilay leimor, haqeil min ha‘ol, ’asher natan ’awikha ‘aleinu. 
2_chronicles 10:10	waydaberu ’ito, hayladim ’asher gadelu ’ito leimor koh tomar la‘am ’asher diberu ’eilekha leimor, ’awikha hikhbid ’et ‘uleinu, we’atah haqeil mei‘aleinu; koh tomar ’aleihem, qaTani ‘awah mimatenei ’awi. 
2_chronicles 10:11	we‘atah, ’awi he‘mis ‘aleikhem ‘ol kaweid, wa’ani ’osif ‘al ‘ulekhem; ’awi, yissar ’etkhem bashoTim, wa’ani ba‘aqrabim.
2_chronicles 10:12	wayawo yarawe‘am wekhal ha‘am ’el reHaw‘am bayom hashelishi; ka’asher diber hamelekh leimor, shuwu ’eilay bayom hashelishi. 
2_chronicles 10:13	waya‘aneim hamelekh qashah; waya‘acow hamelekh reHaw‘am, ’eit ‘azat hacceqeinim. 
2_chronicles 10:14	waydabeir ’aleihem, ka‘azat hayladim leimor, ’akhbid ’et ‘ulekhem, wa’ani ’osif ‘alaw; ’awi, yissar ’etkhem bashoTim, wa’ani ba‘aqrabim. 
2_chronicles 10:15	welo shama‘ hamelekh ’el ha‘am; ki hayetah nesibah mei‘im ha’elohim, lema‘an haqim yhoh ’et dewaro, ’asher diber beyad ’aHiyahu hashiloni, ’el yarawe‘am ben newaT. 
2_chronicles 10:16	wekhal yisra’eil, ki lo shama‘ hamelekh lahem wayashiwu ha‘am ’et hamelekh leimor mah lanu Heileq bedawid welo naHalah bewen yishay, ’ish le’ohalekha yisra’eil, ‘atah re’eih weitekha dawid; wayeilekh kal yisra’eil le’ohalaw.
2_chronicles 10:17	uwenei yisra’eil, hayoshewim be‘arei yehudah; wayimlokh ‘aleihem reHaw‘am. 
2_chronicles 10:18	wayishlaH hamelekh reHaw‘am, ’et hadoram ’asher ‘al hamas, wayirgemu wo wenei yisra’eil ’ewen wayamot; wehamelekh reHaw‘am, hit’ameiz la‘alot bamerkawah, lanus yerushalim.
2_chronicles 10:19	wayifshe‘u yisra’eil beweit dawid, ‘ad hayom hacceh.
2_chronicles 11:1	wayawo reHaw‘am yerushalim wayaqheil ’et beit yehudah uwinyamin, mei’ah ushemonim ’elef baHur ‘oseih milHamah; lehilaHeim ‘im yisra’eil, lehashiw ’et hamamlakhah lirHaw‘am.
2_chronicles 11:2	wayhi dewar yhoh, ’el shema‘yahu ’ish ha’elohim leimor. 
2_chronicles 11:3	’emor ’el reHaw‘am ben shelomoh melekh yehudah; we’el kal yisra’eil, bihudah uwinyamin leimor. 
2_chronicles 11:4	koh ’amar yhoh lo ta‘alu welo tilaHamu ‘im ’aHeikhem, uwu ’ish leweito, ki mei’iti nihyah hadawar hacceh; wayishme‘u ’et diwrei yhoh, wayashuwu milekhet ’el yarawe‘am.
2_chronicles 11:5	wayeishew reHaw‘am birushalim; wayiwen ‘arim lemazor bihudah. 
2_chronicles 11:6	wayiwen ’et beit leHem we’et ‘eiTam we’et teqoa‘. 
2_chronicles 11:7	we’et beit zur we’et sokho we’et ‘adulam. 
2_chronicles 11:8	we’et gat we’et mareishah we’et cif. 
2_chronicles 11:9	we’et ’adorayim we’et lakhish we’et ‘aceiqah. 
2_chronicles 11:10	we’et zare‘ah we’et ’ayalon, we’et Hewron, ’asher bihudah uwewinyamin; ‘arei mezurot. 
2_chronicles 11:11	wayHacceiq ’et hamezurot; wayitein bahem negidim, we’ozerot ma’akhal weshemen wayayin. 
2_chronicles 11:12	uwekhal ‘ir wa‘ir zinot uremaHim, wayHacceqeim leharbeih me’od; wayhi lo yehudah uwinyamin.
2_chronicles 11:13	wehakohanim wehalwiyim, ’asher bekhal yisra’eil; hityazewu ‘alaw mikal gewulam. 
2_chronicles 11:14	ki ‘acewu halwiyim, ’et migresheihem wa’aHuccatam, wayeilekhu lihudah welirushalim; ki hicniHam yarawe‘am uwanaw, mikahein yhoh. 
2_chronicles 11:15	waya‘amed lo kohanim, labamot welase‘irim; wela‘agalim ’asher ‘asah. 
2_chronicles 11:16	we’aHareihem, mikol shiwTei yisra’eil, hanotenim ’et lewawam, lewaqeish ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil; ba’u yerushalim, licboaH yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem. 
2_chronicles 11:17	wayHaccequ ’et malkhut yehudah, way’amezu ’et reHaw‘am ben shelomoh leshanim shalosh; ki halekhu, bederekh dawid ushelomoh leshanim shalosh. 
2_chronicles 11:18	wayiqaH lo reHaw‘am ’ishah, ’et maHalat, ben bat yerimot ben dawid; ’awihayil bat ’eli’aw ben yishay. 
2_chronicles 11:19	wateiled lo banim; ’et ye‘ush we’et shemaryah we’et caham. 
2_chronicles 11:20	we’aHareha laqaH, ’et ma‘akhah bat ’awshalom; wateiled lo, ’et ’awiyah we’et ‘atay, we’et cica we’et shelomit. 
2_chronicles 11:21	waye’ehaw reHaw‘am ’et ma‘akhah wat ’awshalom, mikal nashaw ufilagshaw, ki nashim shemoneh ‘esreih nasa, ufilagshim shishim; wayoled, ‘esrim ushemonah banim weshishim banot. 
2_chronicles 11:22	waya‘ameid larosh reHaw‘am ’et ’awiyah wen ma‘akhah lenagid be’eHaw; ki lehamlikho. 
2_chronicles 11:23	wayawen wayifroz mikal banaw lekhal ’arzot yehudah uwinyamin, lekhol ‘arei hamezurot, wayitein lahem hamacon larow; wayish’al hamon nashim. 
2_chronicles 12:1	wayhi, kehakhin malkhut reHaw‘am ukheHecqato, ‘acaw ’et torat yhoh; wekhal yisra’eil ‘imo.
2_chronicles 12:2	wayhi bashanah haHamishit lamelekh reHaw‘am, ‘alah shishaq melekh mizrayim ‘al yerushalim; ki ma‘alu yhoh. 
2_chronicles 12:3	be’elef umatayim rekhew, uweshishim ’elef parashim; we’ein mispar, la‘am ’asher ba’u ‘imo mimizrayim, luwim sukiyim wekhushim. 
2_chronicles 12:4	wayilkod ’et ‘arei hamezurot ’asher lihudah; wayawo ‘ad yerushalim.
2_chronicles 12:5	ushema‘yah hanawi ba ’el reHaw‘am, wesarei yehudah, ’asher ne’esfu ’el yerushalim mipenei shishaq; wayomer lahem koh ’amar yhoh ’atem ‘acawtem ’oti, we’af ’ani ‘acawti ’etkhem beyad shishaq. 
2_chronicles 12:6	wayikane‘u sarei yisra’eil wehamelekh; wayomeru zadiq yhoh. 
2_chronicles 12:7	uwir’ot yhoh ki nikhna‘u, hayah dewar yhoh ’el shema‘yah leimor nikhne‘u lo ’ashHiteim; wenatati lahem kim‘aT lifleiTah, welo titakh Hamati birushalim beyad shishaq. 
2_chronicles 12:8	ki yihyu lo la‘awadim; weyeide‘u ‘awodati, wa‘awodat mamlekhot ha’arazot.
2_chronicles 12:9	waya‘al shishaq melekh mizrayim ‘al yerushalim wayiqaH ’et ’ozerot beit yhoh we’et ’ozerot beit hamelekh, ’et hakol laqaH; wayiqaH ’et maginei haccahaw, ’asher ‘asah shelomoh. 
2_chronicles 12:10	waya‘as hamelekh reHaw‘am taHteihem, maginei neHoshet; wehifqid, ‘al yad sarei harazim, hashomerim, petaH beit hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 12:11	wayhi midei wo hamelekh beit yhoh; ba’u harazim unesa’um, weheshiwum ’el ta harazim. 
2_chronicles 12:12	uwehikane‘o, shaw mimenu ’af yhoh, welo lehashHit lekhalah; wegam bihudah, hayah dewarim Towim.
2_chronicles 12:13	wayitHacceiq hamelekh reHaw‘am birushalim wayimlokh; ki wen ’arba‘im we’aHat shanah reHaw‘am bemalekho ushawa‘ ‘esreih shanah malakh birushalim, ha‘ir ’asher baHar yhoh lasum ’et shemo sham mikol shiwTei yisra’eil, wesheim ’imo, na‘amah ha‘amonit. 
2_chronicles 12:14	waya‘as hara‘; ki lo heikhin libo, lidrosh ’et yhoh.
2_chronicles 12:15	wediwrei reHaw‘am, harishonim weha’aHaronim, halo heim ketuwim bediwrei shema‘yah hanawi we‘ido haHoceh lehityaHeis; umilHamot reHaw‘am weyarawe‘am kal hayamim. 
2_chronicles 12:16	wayishkaw reHaw‘am ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqaweir be‘ir dawid; wayimlokh ’awiyah weno taHtaw.
2_chronicles 13:1	bishnat shemoneh ‘esreih lamelekh yarawe‘am; wayimlokh ’awiyah ‘al yehudah. 
2_chronicles 13:2	shalosh shanim, malakh birushalim, wesheim ’imo, mikhayahu wat ’uri’eil min giw‘ah; umilHamah hayetah bein ’awiyah uwein yarawe‘am. 
2_chronicles 13:3	waye’sor ’awiyah ’et hamilHamah, beHayil giborei milHamah, ’arba‘ mei’ot ’elef ’ish baHur; s weyarawe‘am, ‘arakh ‘imo milHamah, bishmoneh mei’ot ’elef ’ish baHur gibor Hayil.
2_chronicles 13:4	wayaqam ’awiyah, mei‘al lehar zemarayim, ’asher behar ’efrayim; wayomer shema‘uni yarawe‘am wekhal yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 13:5	halo lakhem lada‘at, ki yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, natan mamlakhah ledawid ‘al yisra’eil le‘olam; lo ulewanaw berit melaH.
2_chronicles 13:6	wayaqam yarawe‘am ben newaT, ‘ewed shelomoh wen dawid; wayimrod ‘al ’adonaw. 
2_chronicles 13:7	wayiqawezu ‘alaw, ’anashim reiqim benei weliya‘al, wayit’amezu ‘al reHaw‘am ben shelomoh; ureHaw‘am, hayah na‘ar werakh leiwaw, welo hitHaccaq lifneihem. 
2_chronicles 13:8	we‘atah ’atem ’omerim, lehitHacceiq lifnei mamlekhet yhoh, beyad benei dawid; we’atem hamon raw, we‘imakhem ‘eglei cahaw, ’asher ‘asah lakhem yarawe‘am leilohim. 
2_chronicles 13:9	halo hidaHtem ’et kohanei yhoh, ’et benei ’aharon wehalwiyim; wata‘asu lakhem kohanim ke‘amei ha’arazot, kal haba, lemalei yado befar ben baqar we’eilim shiw‘ah, wehayah khohein lelo ’elohim.
2_chronicles 13:10	wa’anaHnu yhoh ’eloheinu welo ‘acawnuhu; wekhohanim mesharetim yhoh benei ’aharon, wehalwiyim bamlakhet. 
2_chronicles 13:11	umaqTirim yhoh ‘olot baboqer baboqer uwa‘erew ba‘erew uqeToret samim uma‘arekhet leHem ‘al hashulHan haTahor, umenorat haccahaw weneiroteha lewa‘eir ba‘erew ba‘erew, ki shomerim ’anaHnu, ’et mishmeret yhoh ’eloheinu; we’atem ‘acawtem ’oto. 
2_chronicles 13:12	wehineih ‘imanu warosh ha’elohim wekhohanaw waHazozerot hateru‘ah leharia‘ ‘aleikhem; benei yisra’eil, ’al tilaHamu ‘im yhoh ’elohei ’awoteikhem ki lo tazliHu. 
2_chronicles 13:13	weyarawe‘am, heiseiw ’et hama’raw, lawo mei’aHareihem; wayihyu lifnei yehudah, wehama’raw mei’aHareihem. 
2_chronicles 13:14	wayifnu yehudah, wehineih lahem hamilHamah panim we’aHor, wayiz‘aqu yhoh; wehakohanim, maHazozerim maHzerim baHazozerot. 
2_chronicles 13:15	wayari‘u ’ish yehudah; wayhi, beharia‘ ’ish yehudah, weha’elohim, nagaf ’et yarawe‘am wekhal yisra’eil, lifnei ’awiyah wihudah. 
2_chronicles 13:16	wayanusu wenei yisra’eil mipenei yehudah; wayiteneim ’elohim beyadam. 
2_chronicles 13:17	wayaku wahem ’awiyah we‘amo makah rabah; wayipelu Halalim miyisra’eil, Hameish mei’ot ’elef ’ish baHur. 
2_chronicles 13:18	wayikane‘u wenei yisra’eil ba‘eit hahi; waye’emzu benei yehudah, ki nish‘anu, ‘al yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem. 
2_chronicles 13:19	wayirdof ’awiyah ’aHarei yarawe‘am wayilkod mimenu ‘arim, ’et beit ’eil we’et benoteha, we’et yeshanah we’et benoteha; we’et ‘efron ‘efrayin uwenoteha. 
2_chronicles 13:20	welo ‘azar koaH yarawe‘am ‘od bimei ’awiyahu; wayigefeihu yhoh wayamot.
2_chronicles 13:21	wayitHacceiq ’awiyahu, wayisa lo, nashim ’arba‘ ‘esreih; wayoled, ‘esrim ushenayim banim, wesheish ‘esreih banot.
2_chronicles 13:22	weyeter diwrei ’awiyah, uderakhaw udewaraw; ketuwim bemidrash hanawi ‘ido. 
2_chronicles 14:1	wayishkaw ’awiyah ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqberu ’oto be‘ir dawid, wayimlokh ’asa weno taHtaw; beyamaw shaqeTah ha’arez ‘eser shanim.
2_chronicles 14:2	waya‘as ’asa haTow wehayashar, be‘einei yhoh ’elohaw. 
2_chronicles 14:3	wayasar ’et micbeHot haneikhar wehabamot; wayshabeir ’et hamazeiwot, waygada‘ ’et ha’asheirim. 
2_chronicles 14:4	wayomer lihudah, lidrosh ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem; wela‘asot hatorah wehamizwah. 
2_chronicles 14:5	wayasar mikal ‘arei yehudah, ’et habamot we’et haHamanim; watishqoT hamamlakhah lefanaw. 
2_chronicles 14:6	wayiwen ‘arei mezurah bihudah; ki shaqeTah ha’arez, we’ein ‘imo milHamah bashanim ha’eileh, ki heiniaH yhoh lo. 
2_chronicles 14:7	wayomer lihudah niwneh ’et he‘arim ha’eileh, wenaseiw Homah umigdalim delatayim uweriHim ‘odenu ha’arez lefaneinu, ki darashnu ’et yhoh ’eloheinu, darashnu wayanaH lanu missawiw; wayiwnu wayazliHu.
2_chronicles 14:8	wayhi le’asa, Hayil nosei zinah waromaH mihudah shelosh mei’ot ’elef, s umibinyamin, nose’ei magein wedorekhei qeshet, matayim ushemonim ’alef; kal ’eileh giborei Hayil. 
2_chronicles 14:9	wayeizei ’aleihem ceraH hakushi, beHayil ’elef ’alafim, umarkawot shelosh mei’ot; wayawo ‘ad mareishah. 
2_chronicles 14:10	wayeizei ’asa lefanaw; waya‘arkhu milHamah, begei zefatah lemareishah. 
2_chronicles 14:11	wayiqra ’asa ’el yhoh ’elohaw wayomar yhoh ’ein ‘imekha la‘cor bein raw le’ein koaH, ‘acereinu yhoh ’eloheinu ki ‘alekha nish‘anu, uweshimkha wanu, ‘al hehamon hacceh; yhoh ’eloheinu ’atah, ’al ya‘zor ‘imekha ’enosh.
2_chronicles 14:12	wayigof yhoh ’et hakushim, lifnei ’asa welifnei yehudah; wayanusu hakushim. 
2_chronicles 14:13	wayirdefeim ’asa weha‘am ’asher ‘imo ‘ad ligrar wayipol mikushim le’ein lahem miHyah, ki nishberu lifnei yhoh welifnei maHaneihu; wayis’u shalal harbeih me’od. 
2_chronicles 14:14	wayaku, ’eit kal he‘arim sewiwot gerar, ki hayah faHad yhoh ‘aleihem; wayawoccu ’et kal he‘arim, ki wiccah rabah hayetah wahem. 
2_chronicles 14:15	wegam ’aholei miqneh hiku; wayishbu zon larow ugemalim, wayashuwu yerushalim.
2_chronicles 15:1	wa‘acaryahu ben ‘odeid, hayetah ‘alaw ruaH ’elohim. 
2_chronicles 15:2	wayeizei lifnei ’asa wayomer lo, shema‘uni ’asa wekhal yehudah uwinyamin; yhoh ‘imakhem bihyotkhem ‘imo, we’im tidreshuhu yimazei lakhem, we’im ta‘acwuhu ya‘acow ’etkhem.
2_chronicles 15:3	weyamim rabim leyisra’eil; lelo ’elohei ’emet, ulelo kohein moreh ulelo torah. 
2_chronicles 15:4	wayashaw bazar lo, ‘al yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil; waywaqshuhu wayimazei lahem. 
2_chronicles 15:5	uwa‘itim haheim, ’ein shalom layozei welaba; ki mehumot rabot, ‘al kal yoshewei ha’arazot. 
2_chronicles 15:6	wekhutetu go bego we‘ir be‘ir; ki ’elohim hamamam bekhal zarah. 
2_chronicles 15:7	we’atem Hicqu, we’al yirpu yedeikhem; ki yeish sakhar lif‘ulatkhem.
2_chronicles 15:8	wekhishmoa‘ ’asa hadewarim ha’eileh, wehanewu’ah ‘odeid hanawi hitHaccaq, waya‘aweir hashiquzim mikal ’erez yehudah uwinyamin, umin he‘arim, ’asher lakhad meihar ’efrayim; wayHadeish ’et micbaH yhoh, ’asher lifnei ’ulam yhoh. 
2_chronicles 15:9	wayiqboz, ’et kal yehudah uwinyamin, wehagarim ‘imahem, mei’efrayim umenasheh umishim‘on; ki nafelu ‘alaw miyisra’eil larow, bir’otam ki yhoh ’elohaw ‘imo.
2_chronicles 15:10	wayiqawezu yerushalim baHodesh hashelishi; lishnat Hameish ‘esreih lemalkhut ’asa. 
2_chronicles 15:11	wayicbeHu yhoh bayom hahu, min hashalal heiwi’u; baqar shewa‘ mei’ot, wezon shiw‘at ’alafim. 
2_chronicles 15:12	wayawo’u waberit, lidrosh ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem; bekhal lewawam uwekhal nafsham. 
2_chronicles 15:13	wekhol ’asher lo yidrosh yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil yumat; lemin qaTon we‘ad gadol, lemei’ish we‘ad ’ishah. 
2_chronicles 15:14	wayishawe‘u yhoh, beqol gadol uwitru‘ah; uwaHazozerot uweshofarot. 
2_chronicles 15:15	wayismeHu khal yehudah ‘al hashewu‘ah, ki wekhal lewawam nishba‘u, uwekhal rezonam biqshuhu, wayimazei lahem; wayanaH yhoh lahem missawiw. 
2_chronicles 15:16	wegam ma‘akhah ’eim ’asa hamelekh, hesirah migewirah, ’asher ‘asetah la’asheirah miflazet; wayikhrot ’asa ’et miflaztah, wayadeq wayisrof benaHal qidron. 
2_chronicles 15:17	wehabamot, lo saru miyisra’eil; raq lewaw ’asa hayah shaleim kal yamaw. 
2_chronicles 15:18	wayawei ’et qadeshei ’awiw weqadashaw beit ha’elohim; kesef wecahaw wekheilim. 
2_chronicles 15:19	umilHamah lo hayatah; ‘ad shenat sheloshim weHameish lemalkhut ’asa.
2_chronicles 16:1	bishnat sheloshim washeish lemalkhut ’asa, ‘alah ba‘sha melekh yisra’eil ‘al yehudah, wayiwen ’et haramah; lewilti, teit yozei wawa, le’asa melekh yehudah. 
2_chronicles 16:2	wayozei ’asa kesef wecahaw, mei’ozerot beit yhoh uweit hamelekh; wayishlaH, ’el ben hadad melekh ’aram, hayosheiw bedarmeseq leimor. 
2_chronicles 16:3	berit beini uweinekha, uwein ’awi uwein ’awikha; hineih shalaHti lekha kesef wecahaw, leikh hafeir beritekha, ’et ba‘sha melekh yisra’eil, weya‘aleh mei‘alay. 
2_chronicles 16:4	wayishma‘ ben hadad ’el hamelekh ’asa, wayishlaH ’et sarei haHayalim ’asher lo ’el ‘arei yisra’eil, wayaku ’et ‘iyon we’et dan, we’eit ’aweil mayim; we’eit kal miskenot ‘arei naftali. 
2_chronicles 16:5	wayhi kishmoa‘ ba‘sha, wayeHdal mibenot ’et haramah; wayashbeit ’et melakhto.
2_chronicles 16:6	we’asa hamelekh, laqaH ’et kal yehudah, wayis’u ’et ’awnei haramah we’et ‘eizeha, ’asher banah ba‘sha; wayiwen bahem, ’et gewa‘ we’et hamizpah.
2_chronicles 16:7	uwa‘eit hahi, ba Hanani haro’eh, ’el ’asa melekh yehudah; wayomer ’eilaw, behisha‘enkha ‘al melekh ’aram welo nish‘anta ‘al yhoh ’elohekha, ‘al kein, nimlaT Heil melekh ’aram miyadekha. 
2_chronicles 16:8	halo hakushim wehaluwim, hayu leHayil larow lerekhew ulefarashim leharbeih me’od; uwehisha‘enkha ‘al yhoh netanam beyadekha. 
2_chronicles 16:9	ki yhoh ‘einaw meshoTeTot bekhal ha’arez lehitHacceiq ‘im lewawam shaleim ’eilaw niskalta ‘al cot; ki mei‘atah, yeish ‘imekha milHamot. 
2_chronicles 16:10	wayikh‘as ’asa ’el haro’eh, wayiteneihu beit hamahpekhet, ki weca‘af ‘imo ‘al cot; wayrazeiz ’asa min ha‘am ba‘eit hahi. 
2_chronicles 16:11	wehineih diwrei ’asa, harishonim weha’aHaronim; hinam ketuwim ‘al seifer hamelakhim, lihudah weyisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 16:12	wayeHele ’asa bishnat sheloshim wateisha‘ lemalkhuto beraglaw, ‘ad lema‘lah Haleyo; wegam beHaleyo lo darash ’et yhoh, ki barofe’im. 
2_chronicles 16:13	wayishkaw ’asa ‘im ’awotaw; wayamat bishnat ’arba‘im we’aHat lemalekho. 
2_chronicles 16:14	wayiqberuhu weqiwrotaw, ’asher karah lo be‘ir dawid wayashkiwuhu, bamishkaw ’asher milei besamim ucenim, meruqaHim bemirqaHat ma‘aseh; wayisrefu lo sereifah gedolah ‘ad lim’od.
2_chronicles 17:1	wayimlokh yehoshafaT beno taHtaw; wayitHacceiq ‘al yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 17:2	wayiten Hayil, bekhal ‘arei yehudah habezurot; wayitein neziwim be’erez yehudah, uwe‘arei ’efrayim, ’asher lakhad ’asa ’awiw. 
2_chronicles 17:3	wayhi yhoh ‘im yehoshafaT; ki halakh, bedarkhei dawid ’awiw harishonim, welo darash labe‘alim. 
2_chronicles 17:4	ki leilohei ’awiw darash, uwemizwotaw halakh; welo kema‘aseih yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 17:5	wayakhen yhoh ’et hamamlakhah beyado, wayitenu khal yehudah minHah lihoshafaT; wayhi lo ‘osher wekhawod larow. 
2_chronicles 17:6	wayigbah libo bedarkhei yhoh; we‘od, heisir ’et habamot we’et ha’asheirim mihudah.
2_chronicles 17:7	uwishnat shalosh lemalekho, shalaH lesaraw lewen Hayil ule‘owadyah welickharyah, welintan’eil ulemikhayahu; lelameid be‘arei yehudah. 
2_chronicles 17:8	we‘imahem halwiyim, shema‘yahu unetanyahu ucewadyahu wa‘asah’eil ushemirimot ushemiramot wihonatan wa’adoniyahu weTowiyahu weTow ’adoniyah halwiyim; we‘imahem ’elishama‘ wihoram hakohanim. 
2_chronicles 17:9	waylamedu bihudah, we‘imahem, seifer torat yhoh; wayasobu bekhal ‘arei yehudah, waylamedu ba‘am. 
2_chronicles 17:10	wayhi paHad yhoh ‘al kal mamlekhot ha’arazot, ’asher sewiwot yehudah; welo nilHamu ‘im yehoshafaT. 
2_chronicles 17:11	umin pelishtim, mewi’im lihoshafaT minHah wekhesef masa; gam ha‘arwi’im, mewi’im lo zon ’eilim, shiw‘at ’alafim ushewa‘ mei’ot, uteyashim shiw‘at ’alafim ushewa‘ mei’ot.
2_chronicles 17:12	wayhi yehoshafaT holeikh wegadeil ‘ad lema‘elah; wayiwen bihudah biraniyot we‘arei miskenot. 
2_chronicles 17:13	umelakhah rabah hayah lo be‘arei yehudah; we’anshei milHamah giborei Hayil birushalim. 
2_chronicles 17:14	we’eileh fequdatam leweit ’awoteihem; lihudah sarei ’alafim, ‘adnah hasar, we‘imo giborei Hayil, shelosh mei’ot ’alef.
2_chronicles 17:15	we‘al yado yehoHanan hasar; we‘imo matayim ushemonim ’alef.
2_chronicles 17:16	we‘al yado ‘amasyah wen cikhri, hamitnadeiw yhoh; we‘imo matayim ’elef gibor Hayil.
2_chronicles 17:17	umin binyamin, gibor Hayil ’elyada‘; we‘imo nosheqei qeshet umagein matayim ’alef.
2_chronicles 17:18	we‘al yado yehocawad; we‘imo mei’ah ushemonim ’elef Haluzei zawa.
2_chronicles 17:19	’eileh hamsharetim ’et hamelekh; milewad ’asher natan hamelekh be‘arei hamiwzar bekhal yehudah.
2_chronicles 18:1	wayhi lihoshafaT ‘osher wekhawod larow; wayitHatein le’aH’aw. 
2_chronicles 18:2	wayeired leqeiz shanim ’el ’aH’aw leshomeron, wayicbaH lo ’aH’aw zon uwaqar larow, wela‘am ’asher ‘imo; waysiteihu la‘alot ’el ramot gil‘ad. 
2_chronicles 18:3	wayomer ’aH’aw melekh yisra’eil, ’el yehoshafaT melekh yehudah, hateileikh ‘imi ramot gil‘ad; wayomer lo, kamoni khamokha ukhe‘amekha ‘ami, we‘imekha bamilHamah. 
2_chronicles 18:4	wayomer yehoshafaT ’el melekh yisra’eil; derash na khayom ’et dewar yhoh. 
2_chronicles 18:5	wayiqboz melekh yisra’eil ’et hanewi’im ’arba‘ mei’ot ’ish wayomer ’aleihem, haneileikh ’el ramot gil‘ad lamilHamah ’im ’eHdal; wayomeru ‘aleih, weyitein ha’elohim beyad hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 18:6	wayomer yehoshafaT, ha’ein poh nawi yhoh ‘od; wenidreshah mei’oto. 
2_chronicles 18:7	wayomer melekh yisra’eil ’el yehoshafaT ‘od ’ish ’eHad lidrosh ’et yhoh mei’oto wa’ani seneitihu, ki ’einenu mitnabei ‘alay leTowah ki khal yamaw lera‘ah, hu mikhayehu wen yimla; wayomer yehoshafaT, ’al yomar hamelekh kein. 
2_chronicles 18:8	wayiqra melekh yisra’eil, ’el saris ’eHad; wayomer maheir mikhahu mikhayehu wen yimla. 
2_chronicles 18:9	umelekh yisra’eil wihoshafaT melekh yehudah yoshewim ’ish ‘al kis’o melubashim begadim weyoshewim begoren, petaH sha‘ar shomeron; wekhal hanewi’im, mitnabe’im lifneihem. 
2_chronicles 18:10	waya‘as lo zidqiyahu wen kena‘anah qarnei warcel wayomer koh ’amar yhoh, be’eileh tenagaH ’et ’aram ‘ad kalotam. 
2_chronicles 18:11	wekhal hanewi’im, nibe’im kein leimor; ‘aleih ramot gil‘ad wehazlaH, wenatan yhoh beyad hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 18:12	wehamal’akh ’asher halakh liqro lemikhayehu, diber ’eilaw leimor, hineih diwrei hanewi’im peh ’eHad Tow ’el hamelekh; wihi na dewarekha ke’aHad meihem wedibarta Tow. 
2_chronicles 18:13	wayomer mikhayehu; Hay yhoh ki ’et ’asher yomar ’elohay ’oto ’adabeir. 
2_chronicles 18:14	wayawo ’el hamelekh wayomer hamelekh ’eilaw, mikhah haneileikh ’el ramot gil‘ad lamilHamah ’im ’eHdal; wayomer ‘alu wehazliHu, weyinatenu beyedkhem. 
2_chronicles 18:15	wayomer ’eilaw hamelekh, ‘ad kameh fe‘amim ’ani mashbi‘ekha; ’asher lo tedabeir ’eilay raq ’emet besheim yhoh. 
2_chronicles 18:16	wayomer, ra’iti ’et kal yisra’eil nefozim ‘al heharim, kazon ’asher ’ein lahen ro‘eh; wayomer yhoh lo ’adonim la’eileh, yashuwu ’ish leweito beshalom. 
2_chronicles 18:17	wayomer melekh yisra’eil ’el yehoshafaT; halo ’amarti ’eilekha, lo yitnabei ‘alay Tow ki ’im lera‘.
2_chronicles 18:18	wayomer lakhein shim‘u dewar yhoh; ra’iti ’et yhoh yosheiw ‘al kis’o, wekhal zewa hashamayim ‘omedim, ‘al yemino usemolo. 
2_chronicles 18:19	wayomer yhoh mi yefateh ’et ’aH’aw melekh yisra’eil, weya‘al weyipol beramot gil‘ad; wayomer ceh ’omeir kakhah, weceh ’omeir kakhah. 
2_chronicles 18:20	wayeizei haruaH, waya‘amod lifnei yhoh, wayomer ’ani ’afatenu; wayomer yhoh ’eilaw bamah. 
2_chronicles 18:21	wayomer, ’eizei wehayiti leruaH sheqer, befi kal newi’aw; wayomer, tefateh wegam tukhal, zei wa‘aseih khein. 
2_chronicles 18:22	we‘atah, hineih natan yhoh ruaH sheqer, befi newi’ekha ’eileh; yhoh, diber ‘alekha ra‘ah.
2_chronicles 18:23	wayigash zidqiyahu wen kena‘anah, wayakh ’et mikhayehu ‘al haleHi; wayomer, ’ei ceh haderekh ‘awar ruaH yhoh mei’iti ledabeir ’otakh. 
2_chronicles 18:24	wayomer mikhayehu, hinekha ro’eh bayom hahu; ’asher tawo Heder beHeder leheiHawei. 
2_chronicles 18:25	wayomer melekh yisra’eil, qeHu ’et mikhayehu, wahashiwuhu ’el ’amon sar ha‘ir; we’el yo’ash ben hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 18:26	wa’amartem, koh ’amar hamelekh, simu ceh beit hakele; weha’akhiluhu leHem laHaz umayim laHaz, ‘ad shuwi weshalom. 
2_chronicles 18:27	wayomer mikhayehu, ’im show tashuw beshalom, lo diber yhoh bi; wayomer shim‘u ‘amim kulam.
2_chronicles 18:28	waya‘al melekh yisra’eil wihoshafaT melekh yehudah ’el ramot gil‘ad. 
2_chronicles 18:29	wayomer melekh yisra’eil ’el yehoshafaT, hitHapeis wawo wamilHamah, we’atah lewash begadekha; wayitHapeis melekh yisra’eil, wayawo’u bamilHamah. 
2_chronicles 18:30	umelekh ’aram ziwwah ’et sarei harekhew ’asher lo leimor, lo tilaHamu, ’et haqaTon ’et hagadol; ki ’im ’et melekh yisra’eil lewado. 
2_chronicles 18:31	wayhi kir’ot sarei harekhew ’et yehoshafaT, weheimah ’ameru melekh yisra’eil hu, wayasobu ‘alaw lehilaHeim; wayic‘aq yehoshafaT yhoh ‘acaro, waysiteim ’elohim mimenu. 
2_chronicles 18:32	wayhi, kir’ot sarei harekhew, ki lo hayah melekh yisra’eil; wayashuwu mei’aHaraw. 
2_chronicles 18:33	we’ish, mashakh baqeshet letumo, wayakh ’et melekh yisra’eil, bein hadewaqim uwein hashiryan; wayomer larakaw, hafokh yadekha yadekha wehozeitani min hamaHaneh ki haHoleiti. 
2_chronicles 18:34	wata‘al hamilHamah bayom hahu, umelekh yisra’eil, hayah ma‘amid bamerkawah nokhaH ’aram ‘ad ha‘arew; wayamat le‘eit bo hashamesh. 
2_chronicles 19:1	wayashaw yehoshafaT melekh yehudah ’el beito beshalom lirushalim. 
2_chronicles 19:2	wayeizei ’el panaw, yeihu wen Hanani haHoceh wayomer ’el hamelekh yehoshafaT, halarasha‘ la‘cor, ulesone’ei yhoh te’ehaw; uwacot ‘alekha qezef, milifnei yhoh. 
2_chronicles 19:3	’awal dewarim Towim nimze’u ‘imakh; ki wi‘arta ha’asheirot min ha’arez, wahakhinota lewawekha lidrosh ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 19:4	wayeishew yehoshafaT birushalim; s wayashaw wayeizei wa‘am, mibe’eir shewa‘ ‘ad har ’efrayim, wayshiweim ’el yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem. 
2_chronicles 19:5	waya‘ameid shofeTim ba’arez, bekhal ‘arei yehudah habezurot le‘ir wa‘ir. 
2_chronicles 19:6	wayomer ’el hashofeTim, re’u mah ’atem ‘osim, ki lo le’adam tishpeTu ki yhoh; we‘imakhem bidwar mishpaT. 
2_chronicles 19:7	we‘atah yehi faHad yhoh ‘aleikhem; shimru wa‘asu, ki ’ein ‘im yhoh ’eloheinu, ‘awlah umaso fanim umiqaH shoHad. 
2_chronicles 19:8	wegam birushalim he‘emid yehoshafaT min halwiyim wehakohanim, umeirashei ha’awot leyisra’eil, lemishpaT yhoh welariw; wayashuwu yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 19:9	wayzaw ‘aleihem leimor; koh ta‘asun beyir’at yhoh, be’emunah uweleiwaw shaleim. 
2_chronicles 19:10	wekhal riw ’asher yawo ‘aleikhem mei’aHeikhem hayoshewim be‘areihem, bein dam ledam bein torah lemizwah leHuqim ulemishpaTim wehichartem ’otam, welo ye’shemu yhoh, wehayah qezef ‘aleikhem we‘al ’aHeikhem; koh ta‘asun welo te’shamu. 
2_chronicles 19:11	wehineih ’amaryahu khohein harosh ‘aleikhem lekhol dewar yhoh ucewadyahu wen yishma‘eil hanagid leweit yehudah lekhol dewar hamelekh, weshoTerim halwiyim lifneikhem; Hicqu wa‘asu, wihi yhoh ‘im haTow.
2_chronicles 20:1	wayhi ’aHareikhein ba’u wenei mo’aw uwenei ‘amon we‘imahem meiha‘amonim ‘al yehoshafaT lamilHamah. 
2_chronicles 20:2	wayawo’u, wayagidu lihoshafaT leimor, ba ‘alekha hamon raw mei‘eiwer layam mei’aram; wehinam beHazon tamar, hi ‘ein gedi. 
2_chronicles 20:3	wayira wayitein yehoshafaT ’et panaw lidrosh yhoh; wayiqra zom ‘al kal yehudah. 
2_chronicles 20:4	wayiqawezu yehudah, lewaqeish yhoh; gam mikal ‘arei yehudah, ba’u lewaqeish ’et yhoh. 
2_chronicles 20:5	waya‘amod yehoshafaT, biqhal yehudah wirushalim beweit yhoh; lifnei heHazeir haHadashah. 
2_chronicles 20:6	wayomar, yhoh ’elohei ’awoteinu halo ’atah hu ’elohim bashamayim, we’atah mosheil, bekhol mamlekhot hagoyim; uweyadekha koaH ugewurah, we’ein ‘imekha lehityazeiw. 
2_chronicles 20:7	halo ’atah ’eloheinu, horashta ’et yoshewei ha’arez haccot, milifnei ‘amekha yisra’eil; watitenah, lecera‘ ’awraham ’ohawkha le‘olam. 
2_chronicles 20:8	wayeishewu wah; wayiwnu lekha bah miqdash leshimkha leimor. 
2_chronicles 20:9	’im tawo ‘aleinu ra‘ah, Herew shefoT wedewer wera‘aw na‘amdah lifnei habayit hacceh ulefanekha, ki shimkha babayit hacceh; wenic‘aq ’eilekha mizarateinu wetishma‘ wetoshia‘. 
2_chronicles 20:10	we‘atah hineih wenei ‘amon umo’aw wehar sei‘ir, ’asher lo natatah leyisra’eil lawo wahem, bewo’am mei’erez mizrayim; ki saru mei‘aleihem welo hishmidum. 
2_chronicles 20:11	wehineih heim, gomelim ‘aleinu; lawo legaresheinu, miyerushatekha ’asher horashtanu. 
2_chronicles 20:12	’eloheinu halo tishpaT bam, ki ’ein banu koaH, lifnei hehamon haraw hacceh haba ‘aleinu; wa’anaHnu, lo neida‘ mah na‘aseh, ki ‘alekha ‘eineinu. 
2_chronicles 20:13	wekhol yehudah, ‘omedim lifnei yhoh; gam Tapam nesheihem uweneihem.
2_chronicles 20:14	weyaHaci’eil ben cekharyahu ben benayah ben ye‘i’eil ben matanyah haleiwi min benei ’asaf; hayetah ‘alaw ruaH yhoh, betokh haqahal. 
2_chronicles 20:15	wayomer, haqshiwu khal yehudah weyoshewei yerushalim, wehamelekh yehoshafaT; koh ’amar yhoh lakhem, ’atem ’al tire’u we’al teiHatu mipenei hehamon haraw hacceh, ki lo lakhem hamilHamah ki leilohim. 
2_chronicles 20:16	maHar redu ‘aleihem, hinam ‘olim bema‘aleih haziz; umezatem ’otam besof hanaHal, penei midbar yeru’eil. 
2_chronicles 20:17	lo lakhem lehilaHeim bacot; hityazewu ‘imdu ure’u ’et yeshu‘at yhoh ‘imakhem yehudah wirushalim, ’al tire’u we’al teiHatu, maHar ze’u lifneihem, yhoh ‘imakhem. 
2_chronicles 20:18	wayiqod yehoshafaT ’apayim ’arezah; wekhal yehudah weyoshewei yerushalim, nafelu lifnei yhoh, lehishtaHawot yhoh. 
2_chronicles 20:19	wayaqumu halwiyim min benei haqehatim umin benei haqareHim; lehaleil, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, beqol gadol lema‘elah. 
2_chronicles 20:20	wayashkimu waboqer, wayeize’u lemidbar teqoa‘; uwezeitam ‘amad yehoshafaT, wayomer shema‘uni, yehudah weyoshewei yerushalim, ha’aminu yhoh ’eloheikhem wetei’ameinu, ha’aminu winwi’aw wehazliHu. 
2_chronicles 20:21	wayiwwa‘az ’el ha‘am, waya‘ameid meshorarim yhoh, umehalim lehadrat qodesh; bezeit lifnei heHaluz, we’omerim hodu yhoh, ki le‘olam Hasdo. 
2_chronicles 20:22	uwe‘eit heiHeilu werinah utehilah, natan yhoh me’arewim ‘al benei ‘amon mo’aw wehar sei‘ir haba’im lihudah wayinageifu. 
2_chronicles 20:23	waya‘amdu benei ‘amon umo’aw ‘al yoshewei har sei‘ir lehaHarim ulehashmid; ukhekhalotam beyoshewei sei‘ir, ‘aceru ’ish berei‘eihu lemashHit. 
2_chronicles 20:24	wihudah ba ‘al hamizpeh lamidbar; wayifnu ’el hehamon, wehinam pegarim nofelim ’arzah we’ein peleiTah. 
2_chronicles 20:25	wayawo yehoshafaT we‘amo lawoc ’et shelalam wayimze’u wahem larow urekhush ufegarim ukhelei Hamudot, waynazelu lahem le’ein masa; wayihyu yamim sheloshah bocecim ’et hashalal ki raw hu. 
2_chronicles 20:26	uwayom harewi‘i, niqhalu le‘eimeq berakhah, ki sham beirakhu ’et yhoh; ‘al kein qare’u ’et sheim hamaqom hahu ‘eimeq berakhah ‘ad hayom. 
2_chronicles 20:27	wayashuwu kal ’ish yehudah wirushalim wihoshafaT berosham, lashuw ’el yerushalim besimHah; ki simeHam yhoh mei’oyweihem. 
2_chronicles 20:28	wayawo’u yerushalim, binwalim uwekhinorot uwaHazozerot; ’el beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 20:29	wayhi paHad ’elohim, ‘al kal mamlekhot ha’arazot; beshame‘am ki nilHam yhoh, ‘im ’oywei yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 20:30	watishqoT malkhut yehoshafaT; wayanaH lo ’elohaw missawiw.
2_chronicles 20:31	wayimlokh yehoshafaT ‘al yehudah; ben sheloshim weHameish shanah bemalekho, we‘esrim weHameish shanah malakh birushalim, wesheim ’imo, ‘acuwah bat shilHi. 
2_chronicles 20:32	wayeilekh, bederekh ’awiw ’asa welo sar mimenah; la‘asot hayashar be‘einei yhoh. 
2_chronicles 20:33	’akh habamot lo saru; we‘od ha‘am lo heikhinu lewawam, leilohei ’awoteihem. 
2_chronicles 20:34	weyeter diwrei yehoshafaT, harishonim weha’aHaronim; hinam ketuwim, bediwrei yeihu wen Hanani, ’asher ho‘alah, ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 20:35	we’aHareikhein, ’etHabar yehoshafaT melekh yehudah, ‘im ’aHacyah melekh yisra’eil; hu hirshia‘ la‘asot. 
2_chronicles 20:36	wayHabereihu ‘imo, la‘asot ’oniyot lalekhet tarshish; waya‘asu ’oniyot be‘ezyon gawer. 
2_chronicles 20:37	wayitnabei ’eli‘ecer ben dodawahu mimareishah, ‘al yehoshafaT leimor; kehitHaberkha ‘im ’aHacyahu, paraz yhoh ’et ma‘asekha, wayishaweru ’oniyot, welo ‘azeru lalekhet ’el tarshish. 
2_chronicles 21:1	wayishkaw yehoshafaT ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqaweir ‘im ’awotaw be‘ir dawid; wayimlokh yehoram beno taHtaw. 
2_chronicles 21:2	welo ’aHim benei yehoshafaT, ‘acaryah wiHi’eil ucekharyahu wa‘acaryahu, umikha’eil ushefaTyahu; kal ’eileh benei yehoshafaT melekh yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 21:3	wayitein lahem ’awihem matanot rabot lekhesef ulecahaw ulemigdanot, ‘im ‘arei mezurot bihudah; we’et hamamlakhah natan lihoram ki hu habekhor.
2_chronicles 21:4	wayaqam yehoram ‘al mamlekhat ’awiw wayitHaccaq, wayaharog ’et kal ’eHaw beHarew; wegam misarei yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 21:5	ben sheloshim ushetayim shanah yehoram bemalekho; ushemoneh shanim, malakh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 21:6	wayeilekh bederekh malkhei yisra’eil, ka’asher ‘asu beit ’aH’aw, ki bat ’aH’aw, hayetah lo ’ishah; waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh. 
2_chronicles 21:7	welo ’awah yhoh lehashHit ’et beit dawid, lema‘an haberit, ’asher karat ledawid; wekha’asher ’amar, lateit lo nir ulewanaw kal hayamim. 
2_chronicles 21:8	beyamaw pasha‘ ’edom, mitaHat yad yehudah; wayamlikhu ‘aleihem melekh. 
2_chronicles 21:9	waya‘awor yehoram ‘im saraw, wekhal harekhew ‘imo; wayhi qam laylah, wayakh, ’et ’edom hassoweiw ’eilaw, we’eit sarei harakhew. 
2_chronicles 21:10	wayifsha‘ ’edom mitaHat yad yehudah, ‘ad hayom hacceh, ’ac tifsha‘ liwnah ba‘eit hahi mitaHat yado; ki ‘acaw, ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awotaw. 
2_chronicles 21:11	gam hu ‘asah wamot beharei yehudah; wayecen ’et yoshewei yerushalim, wayadaH ’et yehudah.
2_chronicles 21:12	wayawo ’eilaw mikhtaw, mei’eiliyahu hanawi leimor; koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei dawid ’awikha, taHat, ’asher lo halakhta bedarkhei yehoshafaT ’awikha, uwedarkhei ’asa melekh yehudah. 
2_chronicles 21:13	wateilekh, bederekh malkhei yisra’eil, watacneh ’et yehudah we’et yoshewei yerushalim, kehacnot beit ’aH’aw; wegam ’et ’aHekha weit ’awikha haTowim mimekha harageta. 
2_chronicles 21:14	hineih yhoh nogeif mageifah gedolah be‘amekha; uwewanekha uwenashekha uwekhal rekhushekha. 
2_chronicles 21:15	we’atah baHolayim rabim bemaHaleih mei‘ekha; ‘ad yeize’u mei‘ekha min haHoli, yamim ‘al yamim. 
2_chronicles 21:16	waya‘ar yhoh ‘al yehoram, ’eit ruaH hapelishtim weha‘arwim, ’asher ‘al yad kushim. 
2_chronicles 21:17	waya‘alu wihudah wayiwqa‘uha, wayishbu, ’eit kal harekhush hanimza leweit hamelekh, wegam banaw wenashaw; welo nish’ar lo bein, ki ’im yeho’aHac qeTon banaw. 
2_chronicles 21:18	we’aHarei kal cot; negafo yhoh bemei‘aw laHoli le’ein marpei. 
2_chronicles 21:19	wayhi leyamim miyamim ukhe‘eit zeit haqeiz leyamim shenayim, yaze’u mei‘aw ‘im Haleyo, wayamat betaHalu’im ra‘im; welo ‘asu lo ‘amo sereifah kisreifat ’awotaw. 
2_chronicles 21:20	ben sheloshim ushetayim hayah wemalekho, ushemoneh shanim, malakh birushalim; wayeilekh belo Hemdah, wayiqberuhu be‘ir dawid, welo beqiwrot hamelakhim. 
2_chronicles 22:1	wayamlikhu yoshewei yerushalim ’et ’aHacyahu weno haqaTon taHtaw, ki khal harishonim harag hagedud, haba wa‘arwim lamaHaneh; wayimlokh ’aHacyahu wen yehoram melekh yehudah.
2_chronicles 22:2	ben ’arba‘im ushetayim shanah ’aHacyahu wemalekho, weshanah ’aHat, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, ‘atalyahu bat ‘ameri. 
2_chronicles 22:3	gam hu halakh, bedarkhei beit ’aH’aw; ki ’imo hayetah yo‘azto leharshia‘. 
2_chronicles 22:4	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh keweit ’aH’aw; ki heimah hayu lo yo‘azim, ’aHarei mot ’awiw lemashHit lo. 
2_chronicles 22:5	gam ba‘azatam halakh wayeilekh ’et yehoram ben ’aH’aw melekh yisra’eil, lamilHamah ‘al Haca’eil melekh ’aram beramot gil‘ad; wayaku haramim ’et yoram. 
2_chronicles 22:6	wayashaw lehitrapei weyicre‘el, ki hamakim ’asher hikuhu waramah, behilaHamo, ’et Hacah’eil melekh ’aram; wa‘acaryahu wen yehoram melekh yehudah, yarad lir’ot ’et yehoram ben ’aH’aw beyicre‘el ki Holeh hu. 
2_chronicles 22:7	umei’elohim, hayetah tewusat ’aHacyahu, lawo ’el yoram; uwewo’o, yaza ‘im yehoram ’el yeihu wen nimshi, ’asher meshaHo yhoh, lehakhrit ’et beit ’aH’aw. 
2_chronicles 22:8	wayhi kehishafeiT yeihu ‘im beit ’aH’aw; wayimza ’et sarei yehudah uwenei ’aHei ’aHacyahu mesharetim la’aHacyahu wayahargeim. 
2_chronicles 22:9	waywaqeish ’et ’aHacyahu wayilkeduhu wehu mitHabei weshomeron, waywi’uhu ’el yeihu waymituhu wayiqberuhu, ki ’ameru ben yehoshafaT hu, ’asher darash ’et yhoh bekhal lewawo; we’ein leweit ’aHacyahu, la‘zor koaH lemamlakhah. 
2_chronicles 22:10	wa‘atalyahu ’eim ’aHacyahu, ra’atah ki meit benah; wataqam, watedabeir ’et kal cera‘ hamamlakhah leweit yehudah. 
2_chronicles 22:11	watiqaH yehoshaw‘at bat hamelekh ’et yo’ash ben ’aHacyahu, watignow ’oto mitokh benei hamelekh hamumatim, watitein ’oto we’et meiniqto baHadar hamiTot; watastireihu yehoshaw‘at bat hamelekh yehoram ’eishet yehoyada‘ hakohein ki hi hayetah ’aHot ’aHacyahu mipenei ‘atalyahu welo hemitatehu. 
2_chronicles 22:12	wayhi ’itam beweit ha’elohim, mitHabei sheish shanim wa‘atalyah molekhet ‘al ha’arez.
2_chronicles 23:1	uwashanah hashewi‘it hitHaccaq yehoyada‘, wayiqaH ’et sarei hamei’ot la‘acaryahu wen yeroHam uleyishma‘eil ben yehoHanan wela‘acaryahu wen ‘oweid we’et ma‘aseiyahu wen ‘adayahu we’et ’elishafaT ben cikhri ‘imo waberit. 
2_chronicles 23:2	wayasobu bihudah, wayiqbezu ’et halwiyim mikal ‘arei yehudah, werashei ha’awot leyisra’eil; wayawo’u ’el yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 23:3	wayikhrot kal haqahal berit beweit ha’elohim ‘im hamelekh; wayomer lahem, hineih wen hamelekh yimlokh, ka’asher diber yhoh ‘al benei dawid. 
2_chronicles 23:4	ceh hadawar ’asher ta‘asu; hashelishit mikem ba’ei hashabat, lakohanim welalwiyim, lesho‘arei hassipim. 
2_chronicles 23:5	wehashelishit beweit hamelekh, wehashelishit besha‘ar haysod; wekhal ha‘am, beHazrot beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 23:6	we’al yawo weit yhoh ki ’im hakohanim wehamsharetim lalwiyim, heimah yawo’u ki qodesh heimah; wekhal ha‘am, yishmeru mishmeret yhoh. 
2_chronicles 23:7	wehiqifu halwiyim ’et hamelekh sawiw, ’ish wekheilaw beyado, wehaba ’el habayit yumat; wihyu ’et hamelekh bewo’o uwezeito. 
2_chronicles 23:8	waya‘asu halwiyim wekhal yehudah, kekhol ’asher ziwwah yehoyada‘ hakohein wayiqHu ’ish ’et ’anashaw, ba’ei hashabat, ‘im yoz’ei hashabat; ki lo faTar yehoyada‘ hakohein ’et hamaHleqot. 
2_chronicles 23:9	wayitein yehoyada‘ hakohein lesarei hamei’ot, ’et haHanitim we’et hamaginot we’et hashelaTim, ’asher lamelekh dawid; ’asher beit ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 23:10	waya‘ameid ’et kal ha‘am we’ish shilHo weyado, miketef habayit haymanit ‘ad ketef habayit hasemalit, lamicbeiaH welabayit; ‘al hamelekh sawiw. 
2_chronicles 23:11	wayozi’u ’et ben hamelekh, wayitenu ‘alaw ’et haneicer we’et ha‘eidut, wayamlikhu ’oto; wayimshaHuhu yehoyada‘ uwanaw, wayomeru yeHi hamelekh.
2_chronicles 23:12	watishma‘ ‘atalyahu, ’et qol ha‘am harazim, wehamhalim ’et hamelekh; watawo ’el ha‘am beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 23:13	wateire wehineih hamelekh ‘omeid ‘al ‘amudo bamawo, wehasarim wehaHazozerot ‘al hamelekh wekhal ‘am ha’arez sameiaH, wetoqeia‘ baHazozerot, wehamshorarim bikhlei hashir, umodi‘im lehaleil; watiqra‘ ‘atalyahu ’et begadeha, watomer qesher qasher.
2_chronicles 23:14	wayozei yehoyada‘ hakohein ’et sarei hamei’ot pequdei haHayil, wayomer ’aleihem hozi’uha ’el mibeit hasedeirot, wehaba ’aHareha yumat beHarew; ki ’amar hakohein, lo temituha beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 23:15	wayasimu lah yadayim, watawo ’el mewo sha‘ar hassusim beit hamelekh; waymituha sham.
2_chronicles 23:16	wayikhrot yehoyada‘ berit, beino uwein kal ha‘am uwein hamelekh; lihyot le‘am yhoh. 
2_chronicles 23:17	wayawo’u khal ha‘am beit haba‘al wayitezuhu, we’et micbeHotaw we’et zelamaw shibeiru; we’eit, matan kohein haba‘al, haregu lifnei hamicbeHot. 
2_chronicles 23:18	wayasem yehoyada‘ pequdot beit yhoh beyad hakohanim halwiyim ’asher Halaq dawid ‘al beit yhoh leha‘alot ‘olot yhoh kakatuw betorat mosheh besimHah uweshir; ‘al yedei dawid. 
2_chronicles 23:19	waya‘ameid hasho‘arim, ‘al sha‘arei beit yhoh; welo yawo Tamei lekhal dawar. 
2_chronicles 23:20	wayiqaH ’et sarei hamei’ot we’et ha’adirim we’et hamoshelim ba‘am we’eit kal ‘am ha’arez, wayored ’et hamelekh mibeit yhoh, wayawo’u betokh sha‘ar ha‘elyon beit hamelekh; wayoshiwu ’et hamelekh, ‘al kissei hamamlakhah. 
2_chronicles 23:21	wayismeHu khal ‘am ha’arez weha‘ir shaqaTah; we’et ‘atalyahu heimitu weHarew.
2_chronicles 24:1	ben shewa‘ shanim yo’ash bemalekho, we’arba‘im shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, ziwyah mibe’eir shawa‘. 
2_chronicles 24:2	waya‘as yo’ash hayashar be‘einei yhoh; kal yemei yehoyada‘ hakohein. 
2_chronicles 24:3	wayisa lo yehoyada‘ nashim shetayim; wayoled banim uwanot. 
2_chronicles 24:4	wayhi ’aHareikhein; hayah ‘im leiw yo’ash, leHadeish ’et beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 24:5	wayiqboz ’et hakohanim wehalwiyim wayomer lahem ze’u le‘arei yehudah weqiwzu mikal yisra’eil kesef leHacceiq ’et beit ’eloheikhem, midei shanah beshanah, we’atem temaharu ladawar; welo miharu halwiyim. 
2_chronicles 24:6	wayiqra hamelekh lihoyada‘ harosh wayomer lo, madua‘ lo darashta ‘al halwiyim, lehawi mihudah umirushalim, ’et mas’at mosheh ‘ewed yhoh, wehaqahal leyisra’eil; le’ohel ha‘eidut. 
2_chronicles 24:7	ki ‘atalyahu hamirsha‘at, baneha farezu ’et beit ha’elohim; wegam kal qadeshei weit yhoh, ‘asu labe‘alim. 
2_chronicles 24:8	wayomer hamelekh, waya‘asu ’aron ’eHad; wayitenuhu besha‘ar beit yhoh Huzah. 
2_chronicles 24:9	wayitenu qol bihudah uwirushalim, lehawi yhoh mas’at mosheh ‘ewed ha’elohim ‘al yisra’eil bamidbar. 
2_chronicles 24:10	wayismeHu khal hasarim wekhal ha‘am; wayawi’u wayashlikhu la’aron ‘ad lekhaleih. 
2_chronicles 24:11	wayhi be‘eit yawi ’et ha’aron ’el pequdat hamelekh beyad halwiyim wekhir’otam ki raw hakesef, uwa sofeir hamelekh ufeqid kohein harosh, wi‘aru ’et ha’aron, weyisa’uhu wishiwuhu ’el meqomo; koh ‘asu leyom beyom, waya’asfu khesef larow. 
2_chronicles 24:12	wayiteneihu hamelekh wihoyada‘, ’el ‘oseih melekhet ‘awodat beit yhoh, wayihyu sokherim Hozewim weHarashim, leHadeish beit yhoh; wegam leHarashei warcel uneHoshet, leHacceiq ’et beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 24:13	waya‘asu ‘osei hamelakhah, wata‘al ’arukhah lamelakhah beyadam; waya‘amidu ’et beit ha’elohim ‘al matkunto way’amezuhu. 
2_chronicles 24:14	ukhekhalotam heiwi’u lifnei hamelekh wihoyada‘ ’et she’ar hakesef, waya‘aseihu kheilim leweit yhoh kelei shareit, weha‘alot wekhapot, ukhelei cahaw wakhasef; wayihyu ma‘alim ‘olot beweit yhoh tamid, kol yemei yehoyada‘.
2_chronicles 24:15	wayicqan yehoyada‘ wayisba‘ yamim wayamot; ben mei’ah usheloshim shanah bemoto. 
2_chronicles 24:16	wayiqberuhu we‘ir dawid ‘im hamelakhim; ki ‘asah Towah beyisra’eil, we‘im ha’elohim uweito.
2_chronicles 24:17	we’aHarei mot yehoyada‘, ba’u sarei yehudah, wayishtaHawu lamelekh; ’ac shama‘ hamelekh ’aleihem. 
2_chronicles 24:18	waya‘acwu, ’et beit yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem, waya‘awdu ’et ha’asheirim we’et ha‘azabim; wayhi qezef, ‘al yehudah wirushalim, be’ashmatam cot. 
2_chronicles 24:19	wayishlaH bahem newi’im, lahashiwam ’el yhoh; waya‘idu wam welo he’ecinu.
2_chronicles 24:20	weruaH ’elohim, laweshah ’et cekharyah ben yehoyada‘ hakohein, waya‘amod mei‘al la‘am; wayomer lahem koh ’amar ha’elohim, lamah ’atem ‘owerim ’et mizwot yhoh welo tazliHu, ki ‘acawtem ’et yhoh waya‘acow ’etkhem. 
2_chronicles 24:21	wayiqsheru ‘alaw, wayirgemuhu ’ewen bemizwat hamelekh; baHazar beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 24:22	welo cakhar yo’ash hamelekh, haHesed ’asher ‘asah yehoyada‘ ’awiw ‘imo, wayaharog ’et beno; ukhemoto ’amar, yeire yhoh weyidrosh.
2_chronicles 24:23	wayhi litqufat hashanah, ‘alah ‘alaw Heil ’aram wayawo’u, ’el yehudah wirushalim, wayashHitu ’et kal sarei ha‘am mei‘am; wekhal shelalam shileHu lemelekh darmaseq. 
2_chronicles 24:24	ki wemiz‘ar ’anashim ba’u Heil ’aram, yhoh natan beyadam Hayil larow me’od, ki ‘acewu, ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem; we’et yo’ash ‘asu shefaTim. 
2_chronicles 24:25	uwelekhtam mimenu, ki ‘acewu ’oto bemaHaliyim bemaHaluyim rabim hitqasheru ‘alaw ‘awadaw, bidmei benei yehoyada‘ hakohein, wayaharguhu ‘al miTato wayamot; wayiqberuhu be‘ir dawid, welo qewaruhu beqiwrot hamelakhim.
2_chronicles 24:26	we’eileh hamitqasherim ‘alaw; cawad, ben shim‘at ha‘amonit, wihocawad, ben shimrit hamo’awit. 
2_chronicles 24:27	uwanaw werow yirew hamasa ‘alaw, wisod beit ha’elohim, hinam ketuwim, ‘al midrash seifer hamelakhim; wayimlokh ’amazyahu weno taHtaw.
2_chronicles 25:1	ben ‘esrim weHameish shanah malakh ’amazyahu, we‘esrim wateisha‘ shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, yeho‘adan mirushalayim. 
2_chronicles 25:2	waya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh; raq lo beleiwaw shaleim. 
2_chronicles 25:3	wayhi ka’asher Haceqah hamamlakhah ‘alaw; wayaharog ’et ‘awadaw, hamakim ’et hamelekh ’awiw. 
2_chronicles 25:4	we’et beneihem lo heimit; ki khakatuw batorah beseifer mosheh ’asher ziwwah yhoh leimor, lo yamutu ’awot ‘al banim uwanim lo yamutu ‘al ’awot, ki ’ish beHeT’o yamutu.
2_chronicles 25:5	wayiqboz ’amazyahu ’et yehudah, waya‘amideim leweit ’awot, lesarei ha’alafim ulesarei hamei’ot, lekhal yehudah uwinyamin; wayifqedeim, lemiben ‘esrim shanah wama‘lah, wayimza’eim, shelosh mei’ot ’elef baHur yozei zawa, ’oHeic romaH wezinah. 
2_chronicles 25:6	wayiskor miyisra’eil, mei’ah ’elef gibor Hayil bemei’ah khikar kasef. 
2_chronicles 25:7	we’ish ha’elohim, ba ’eilaw leimor, hamelekh ’al yawo ‘imekha zewa yisra’eil; ki ’ein yhoh ‘im yisra’eil, kol benei ’efrayim. 
2_chronicles 25:8	ki ’im bo ’atah, ‘aseih Hacaq lamilHamah; yakhshilekha ha’elohim lifnei ’oyeiw, ki yesh koaH beilohim la‘cor ulehakhshil. 
2_chronicles 25:9	wayomer ’amazyahu le’ish ha’elohim, umah la‘asot lim’at hakikar, ’asher natati ligdud yisra’eil; wayomer ’ish ha’elohim, yeish yhoh, latet lekha harbeih micceh. 
2_chronicles 25:10	wayawdileim ’amazyahu, lehagedud ’asher ba ’eilaw mei’efrayim, lalekhet limqomam; wayiHar ’apam me’od bihudah, wayashuwu limqomam baHori ’af.
