2_chronicles 25:11	wa’amazyahu hitHaccaq, wayinhag ’et ‘amo, wayeilekh gei hamelaH; wayakh ’et benei sei‘ir ‘aseret ’alafim. 
2_chronicles 25:12	wa‘aseret ’alafim Hayim, shawu benei yehudah, waywi’um lerosh hassala‘; wayashlikhum meirosh hassela‘ wekhulam niwqa‘u.
2_chronicles 25:13	uwenei hagedud, ’asher heishiw ’amazyahu milekhet ‘imo lamilHamah, wayifsheTu be‘arei yehudah, mishomeron we‘ad beit Horon; wayaku meihem sheloshet ’alafim, wayawoccu biccah rabah.
2_chronicles 25:14	wayhi, ’aHarei wo ’amazyahu meihakot ’et ’adomim, wayawei, ’et ’elohei benei sei‘ir, waya‘amideim lo leilohim; welifneihem yishtaHaweh welahem yeqaTeir. 
2_chronicles 25:15	wayiHar ’af yhoh ba’amazyahu; wayishlaH ’eilaw nawi, wayomer lo, lamah darashta ’et ’elohei ha‘am, ’asher lo hizilu ’et ‘amam miyadekha. 
2_chronicles 25:16	wayhi bedabero ’eilaw, wayomer lo halyo‘eiz lamelekh netanukha, Hadal lekha lamah yakukha; wayeHdal hanawi, wayomer yada‘ti, ki ya‘az ’elohim lehashHitekha, ki ‘asita cot, welo shama‘ta la‘azati.
2_chronicles 25:17	wayiwwa‘az, ’amazyahu melekh yehudah, wayishlaH ’el yo’ash ben yeho’aHac ben yeihu melekh yisra’eil leimor; lekha lekhah nitra’eh fanim. 
2_chronicles 25:18	wayishlaH yo’ash melekh yisra’eil, ’el ’amazyahu melekh yehudah leimor haHoaH ’asher balewanon, laH ’el ha’erec ’asher balewanon leimor, tenah ’et bitekha liwni le’ishah; wata‘awor Hayat hasadeh ’asher balewanon, watirmos ’et haHoaH. 
2_chronicles 25:19	’amarta, hineih hikita ’et ’edom, unesa’akha libekha lehakhbid; ‘atah shewah beweitekha, lamah titgareh bera‘ah, wenafalta, ’atah wihudah ‘imakh. 
2_chronicles 25:20	welo shama‘ ’amazyahu, ki meiha’elohim hi, lema‘an titam beyad; ki dareshu, ’eit ’elohei ’edom. 
2_chronicles 25:21	waya‘al yo’ash melekh yisra’eil wayitra’u fanim, hu wa’amazyahu melekh yehudah; beweit shemesh ’asher lihudah. 
2_chronicles 25:22	wayinagef yehudah lifnei yisra’eil; wayanusu ’ish le’ohalaw. 
2_chronicles 25:23	we’eit ’amazyahu melekh yehudah ben yo’ash ben yeho’aHac, tafas yo’ash melekh yisra’eil beweit shamesh; waywi’eihu yerushalim, wayifroz beHomat yerushalim, misha‘ar ’efrayim ‘ad sha‘ar haponeh, ’arba‘ mei’ot ’amah. 
2_chronicles 25:24	wekhal haccahaw wehakesef we’eit kal hakeilim hanimze’im beweit ha’elohim ‘im ‘oweid ’edom, we’et ’ozerot beit hamelekh, we’eit benei hata‘aruwot; wayashaw shomeron.
2_chronicles 25:25	wayHi ’amazyahu wen yo’ash melekh yehudah, ’aHarei mot, yo’ash ben yeho’aHac melekh yisra’eil; Hameish ‘esreih shanah. 
2_chronicles 25:26	weyeter diwrei ’amazyahu, harishonim weha’aHaronim; halo hinam ketuwim, ‘al seifer malkhei yehudah weyisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 25:27	umei‘eit, ’asher sar ’amazyahu mei’aHarei yhoh, wayiqsheru ‘alaw qesher birushalim wayanas lakhishah; wayishleHu ’aHaraw lakhishah, waymituhu sham. 
2_chronicles 25:28	wayisa’uhu ‘al hassusim; wayiqberu ’oto ‘im ’awotaw be‘ir yehudah. 
2_chronicles 26:1	wayiqHu kal ‘am yehudah ’et ‘ucciyahu, wehu ben sheish ‘esreih shanah; wayamlikhu ’oto, taHat ’awiw ’amazyahu. 
2_chronicles 26:2	hu banah ’et ’eilot, wayshiweha lihudah; ’aHarei shekhaw hamelekh ‘im ’awotaw.
2_chronicles 26:3	ben sheish ‘esreih shanah ‘ucciyahu wemalekho, waHamishim ushetayim shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, yekhileyah yekhaleyah min yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 26:4	waya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh; kekhol ’asher ‘asah ’amazyahu ’awiw. 
2_chronicles 26:5	wayhi lidrosh ’elohim, bimei cekharyahu, hameiwin bir’ot ha’elohim; uwimei daresho ’et yhoh, hizliHo ha’elohim.
2_chronicles 26:6	wayeizei wayilaHem bapelishtim, wayifroz ’et Homat gat, we’eit Homat yawneih, we’eit Homat ’ashdod; wayiwneh ‘arim, be’ashdod uwapelishtim. 
2_chronicles 26:7	waya‘cereihu ha’elohim ‘al pelishtim we‘al ha‘arwiyim ha‘arwim hayoshewim begur ba‘al wehame‘unim. 
2_chronicles 26:8	wayitenu ha‘amonim minHah le‘ucciyahu; wayeilekh shemo ‘ad lewo mizrayim, ki heHeciq ‘ad lema‘elah. 
2_chronicles 26:9	wayiwen ‘ucciyahu migdalim birushalim, ‘al sha‘ar hapinah we‘al sha‘ar hagay we‘al hamiqzoa‘; wayHacceqeim. 
2_chronicles 26:10	wayiwen migdalim bamidbar, wayaHzow borot rabim, ki miqneh raw hayah lo, uwashefeilah uwamishor; ’ikarim wekhoremim, beharim uwakarmel, ki ’oheiw ’adamah hayah.
2_chronicles 26:11	wayhi le‘ucciyahu Hayil ‘oseih milHamah yoz’ei zawa ligdud, bemispar pequdatam, beyad ye‘u’eil ye‘i’eil hassofeir, uma‘aseiyahu hashoTeir; ‘al yad Hananyahu, misarei hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 26:12	kol mispar rashei ha’awot legiborei Hayil, ’alpayim wesheish mei’ot. 
2_chronicles 26:13	we‘al yadam Heil zawa shelosh mei’ot ’elef, weshiw‘at ’alafim waHameish mei’ot, ‘osei milHamah bekhoaH Hayil; la‘cor lamelekh ‘al ha’oyeiw. 
2_chronicles 26:14	wayakhen lahem ‘ucciyahu lekhal hazawa, maginim uremaHim wekhowa‘im, weshiryonot uqeshatot; ule’awnei qela‘im. 
2_chronicles 26:15	waya‘as birushalim Hishewonot maHashewet Hosheiw, lihyot ‘al hamigdalim we‘al hapinot, liro baHizim, uwa’awanim gedolot; wayeizei shemo ‘ad lemeiraHoq, ki hifli lehei‘aceir ‘ad ki Hacaq. 
2_chronicles 26:16	ukheHecqato, gawah libo ‘ad lehashHit, wayim‘al yhoh ’elohaw; wayawo ’el heikhal yhoh, lehaqTir ‘al micbaH haqeToret. 
2_chronicles 26:17	wayawo ’aHaraw ‘acaryahu hakohein; we‘imo kohanim yhoh shemonim benei Hayil. 
2_chronicles 26:18	waya‘amdu ‘al ‘ucciyahu hamelekh, wayomeru lo lo lekha ‘ucciyahu, lehaqTir yhoh, ki lakohanim benei ’aharon hamqudashim lehaqTir; zei min hamiqdash ki ma‘alta, welo lekha lekhawod yhoh ’elohim. 
2_chronicles 26:19	wayic‘af ‘ucciyahu, uweyado miqTeret lehaqTir; uweca‘po ‘im hakohanim, wehazara‘at careHah wemizHo lifnei hakohanim beweit yhoh, mei‘al lemicbaH haqeToret. 
2_chronicles 26:20	wayifen ’eilaw ‘acaryahu khohein harosh wekhal hakohanim, wehineih hu mezora‘ bemizHo, wayawhiluhu misham; wegam hu nidHaf lazeit, ki nige‘o yhoh. 
2_chronicles 26:21	wayhi ‘ucciyahu hamelekh mezora‘ ‘ad yom moto, wayeishew beit haHafeshut haHafeshit mezora‘, ki nigcar mibeit yhoh; weyotam beno ‘al beit hamelekh, shofeiT ’et ‘am ha’arez. 
2_chronicles 26:22	weyeter diwrei ‘ucciyahu, harishonim weha’aHaronim; kataw yesha‘yahu wen ’amoz hanawi. 
2_chronicles 26:23	wayishkaw ‘ucciyahu ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqberu ’oto ‘im ’awotaw bisdeih haqewurah ’asher lamelakhim, ki ’ameru mezora‘ hu; wayimlokh yotam beno taHtaw.
2_chronicles 27:1	ben ‘esrim weHameish shanah yotam bemalekho, wesheish ‘esreih shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, yerushah bat zadoq. 
2_chronicles 27:2	waya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh kekhol ’asher ‘asah ‘ucciyahu ’awiw, raq lo wa ’el heikhal yhoh; we‘od ha‘am mashHitim. 
2_chronicles 27:3	hu, banah ’et sha‘ar beit yhoh ha‘elyon; uweHomat ha‘ofel banah larow. 
2_chronicles 27:4	we‘arim banah behar yehudah; uweHorashim banah, biraniyot umigdalim. 
2_chronicles 27:5	wehu nilHam ‘im melekh benei ‘amon wayeHecaq ‘aleihem wayitenu lo wenei ‘amon bashanah hahi, mei’ah kikar kesef, wa‘aseret ’alafim korim HiTim, use‘orim ‘aseret ’alafim; cot, heishiwu lo benei ‘amon, s uwashanah hasheinit wehashelishit. 
2_chronicles 27:6	wayitHacceiq yotam; ki heikhin derakhaw, lifnei yhoh ’elohaw. 
2_chronicles 27:7	weyeter diwrei yotam, wekhal milHamotaw uderakhaw; hinam ketuwim, ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’eil wihudah. 
2_chronicles 27:8	ben ‘esrim weHameish shanah hayah wemalekho; wesheish ‘esreih shanah, malakh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 27:9	wayishkaw yotam ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqberu ’oto be‘ir dawid; wayimlokh ’aHac beno taHtaw.
2_chronicles 28:1	ben ‘esrim shanah ’aHac bemalekho, wesheish ‘esreih shanah, malakh birushalim; welo ‘asah hayashar be‘einei yhoh kedawid ’awiw. 
2_chronicles 28:2	wayeilekh bedarkhei malkhei yisra’eil; wegam masseikhot ‘asah labe‘alim. 
2_chronicles 28:3	wehu hiqTir begei wen hinom; wayaw‘eir ’et banaw ba’eish, keto‘awot hagoyim, ’asher horish hasheim mipenei benei yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 28:4	waycabeiaH wayqaTeir babamot we‘al hagewa‘ot; wetaHat kal ‘eiz ra‘anan. 
2_chronicles 28:5	wayiteneihu yhoh ’elohaw beyad melekh ’aram wayaku wo, wayishbu mimenu shiwyah gedolah, wayawi’u darmaseq; wegam beyad melekh yisra’eil nitan, wayakh bo makah gedolah.
2_chronicles 28:6	wayaharog peqaH ben remalyahu bihudah, mei’ah we‘esrim ’elef beyom ’eHad hakol benei Hayil; be‘acewam ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awotam. 
2_chronicles 28:7	wayaharog cikhri gibor ’efrayim, ’et ma‘aseiyahu ben hamelekh, we’et ‘acriqam negid habayit; we’et ’elqanah mishneih hamelekh.
2_chronicles 28:8	wayishbu wenei yisra’eil mei’aHeihem matayim ’elef, nashim banim uwanot, wegam shalal raw bacecu meihem; wayawi’u ’et hashalal leshomeron.
2_chronicles 28:9	wesham hayah nawi yhoh ‘odeid shemo wayeizei, lifnei hazawa haba leshomeron, wayomer lahem, hineih baHamat yhoh ’elohei ’awoteikhem ‘al yehudah netanam beyedkhem; watahargu wam weca‘af, ‘ad lashamayim higia‘. 
2_chronicles 28:10	we‘atah benei yehudah wirushalim ’atem ’omerim, likhbosh la‘awadim welishfaHot lakhem; halo raq ’atem ‘imakhem ’ashamot, yhoh ’eloheikhem. 
2_chronicles 28:11	we‘atah shema‘uni, wehashiwu hashiwyah, ’asher shewitem mei’aHeikhem; ki Haron ’af yhoh ‘aleikhem.
2_chronicles 28:12	wayaqumu ’anashim meirashei wenei ’efrayim, ‘acaryahu wen yehoHanan berekhyahu wen meshileimot, wiHicqiyahu ben shalum, wa‘amasa ben Hadlay; ‘al haba’im min hazawa. 
2_chronicles 28:13	wayomeru lahem, lo tawi’u ’et hashiwyah heinah, ki le’ashmat yhoh ‘aleinu ’atem ’omerim, lehosif ‘al HaToteinu we‘al ’ashmateinu; ki rabah ’ashmah lanu, waHaron ’af ‘al yisra’eil.
2_chronicles 28:14	waya‘acow heHaluz, ’et hashiwyah we’et habiccah, lifnei hasarim wekhal haqahal. 
2_chronicles 28:15	wayaqumu ha’anashim ’asher niqewu wesheimot wayaHaciqu washiwyah, wekhal ma‘arumeihem hilbishu min hashalal wayalbishum wayan‘ilum waya’akhilum wayashqum waysukhum, waynahalum baHamorim lekhal kosheil, waywi’um yereiHo ‘ir hatemarim ’eizel ’aHeihem; wayashuwu shomeron.
2_chronicles 28:16	ba‘eit hahi, shalaH hamelekh ’aHac ‘al malkhei ’ashur la‘cor lo. 
2_chronicles 28:17	we‘od ’adomim ba’u; wayaku wihudah wayishbu shewi. 
2_chronicles 28:18	ufelishtim pasheTu, be‘arei hashefeilah wehanegew lihudah wayilkedu ’et beit shemesh we’et ’ayalon we’et hagedeirot, we’et sokho uwenoteha we’et timnah uwenoteha, we’et gimco we’et benoteha; wayeishewu sham. 
2_chronicles 28:19	ki hikhnia‘ yhoh ’et yehudah, ba‘awur ’aHac melekh yisra’eil; ki hifria‘ bihudah, uma‘ol ma‘al yhoh. 
2_chronicles 28:20	wayawo ‘alaw, tilegat pilne’eser melekh ’ashur; wayazar lo welo Hacaqo. 
2_chronicles 28:21	ki Halaq ’aHac ’et beit yhoh, we’et beit hamelekh wehasarim; wayitein lemelekh ’ashur, welo le‘ecrah lo. 
2_chronicles 28:22	uwe‘eit hazeir lo, wayosef lim‘ol yhoh; hu hamelekh ’aHac. 
2_chronicles 28:23	wayicbaH, leilohei darmeseq hamakim bo wayomer, ki ’elohei malkhei ’aram heim ma‘cerim ’otam, lahem ’acabeiaH weya‘ceruni; weheim hayu lo lehakhshilo ulekhal yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 28:24	waye’esof ’aHac ’et kelei weit ha’elohim, wayqazeiz ’et kelei weit ha’elohim, wayisgor ’et daltot beit yhoh; waya‘as lo micbeHot bekhal pinah birushalim. 
2_chronicles 28:25	uwekhal ‘ir wa‘ir lihudah ‘asah wamot, leqaTeir leilohim ’aHeirim; wayakh‘eis ’et yhoh ’elohei ’awotaw. 
2_chronicles 28:26	weyeter dewaraw wekhal derakhaw, harishonim weha’aHaronim; hinam ketuwim, ‘al seifer malkhei yehudah weyisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 28:27	wayishkaw ’aHac ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqberuhu wa‘ir birushalim, ki lo hewi’uhu, leqiwrei malkhei yisra’eil; wayimlokh yeHicqiyahu weno taHtaw.
2_chronicles 29:1	yeHicqiyahu malakh, ben ‘esrim weHameish shanah, we‘esrim wateisha‘ shanah, malakh birushalim; wesheim ’imo, ’awiyah bat cekharyahu. 
2_chronicles 29:2	waya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh; kekhol ’asher ‘asah dawid ’awiw. 
2_chronicles 29:3	hu washanah harishonah lemalekho baHodesh harishon, pataH ’et daltot beit yhoh wayHacceqeim. 
2_chronicles 29:4	wayawei ’et hakohanim we’et halwiyim; waya’asfeim lirHow hamicraH. 
2_chronicles 29:5	wayomer lahem shema‘uni halwiyim; ‘atah hitqadeshu, weqadeshu ’et beit yhoh ’elohei ’awoteikhem, wehozi’u ’et hanidah min haqodesh. 
2_chronicles 29:6	ki ma‘alu ’awoteinu, we‘asu hara‘ be‘einei yhoh ’eloheinu waya‘acwuhu; wayasseibu feneihem mimishkan yhoh wayitenu ‘oref. 
2_chronicles 29:7	gam sageru daltot ha’ulam, waykhabu ’et haneirot, uqeToret lo hiqTiru; we‘olah lo he‘elu waqodesh, leilohei yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 29:8	wayhi qezef yhoh, ‘al yehudah wirushalim; wayiteneim licwa‘ah leca‘awah leshamah welishreiqah, ka’asher ’atem ro’im be‘eineikhem. 
2_chronicles 29:9	wehineih nafelu ’awoteinu beHarew; uwaneinu uwenoteinu wenasheinu bashewi ‘al cot. 
2_chronicles 29:10	‘atah ‘im lewawi, likhrot berit, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil; weyashow mimenu Haron ’apo. 
2_chronicles 29:11	banay ‘atah ’al tishalu; ki wakhem baHar yhoh la‘amod lefanaw leshareto, welihyot lo mesharetim umaqTirim.
2_chronicles 29:12	wayaqumu halwiyim maHat ben ‘amasay weyo’eil ben ‘acaryahu min benei haqehati umin benei merari, qish ben ‘awdi, wa‘acaryahu ben yehalel’eil; umin hageireshuni, yo’aH ben cimah, we‘eiden ben yo’aH. 
2_chronicles 29:13	umin benei ’elizafan, shimri wi‘u’eil wi‘i’eil; umin benei ’asaf, cekharyahu umatanyahu.
2_chronicles 29:14	umin benei heiman yeHu’eil yeHi’eil weshim‘i; s umin benei yedutun, shema‘yah we‘ucci’eil. 
2_chronicles 29:15	waya’asfu ’et ’aHeihem wayitqadeshu, wayawo’u khemizwat hamelekh bediwrei yhoh; leTaheir beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 29:16	wayawo’u hakohanim lifnimah weit yhoh leTaheir wayozi’u, ’eit kal haTum’ah ’asher maze’u beheikhal yhoh, laHazar beit yhoh; wayqabelu halwiyim, lehozi lenaHal qidron Huzah. 
2_chronicles 29:17	wayaHeilu be’eHad laHodesh harishon leqadeish uweyom shemonah laHodesh, ba’u le’ulam yhoh, wayqadeshu ’et beit yhoh leyamim shemonah; uweyom shishah ‘asar laHodesh harishon kilu.
2_chronicles 29:18	wayawo’u fenimah ’el Hicqiyahu hamelekh, wayomeru, Tiharnu ’et kal beit yhoh; ’et micbaH ha‘olah we’et kal keilaw, we’et shulHan hama‘arekhet we’et kal keilaw. 
2_chronicles 29:19	we’eit kal hakeilim, ’asher hicniaH hamelekh ’aHac bemalkhuto bema‘alo heikhanu wehiqdashenu; wehinam lifnei micbaH yhoh.
2_chronicles 29:20	wayashkeim yeHicqiyahu hamelekh, waye’esof ’eit sarei ha‘ir; waya‘al beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 29:21	wayawi’u farim shiw‘ah we’eilim shiw‘ah ukhewasim shiw‘ah, uzefirei ‘iccim shiw‘ah leHaTat, ‘al hamamlakhah we‘al hamiqdash we‘al yehudah; wayomer, liwnei ’aharon hakohanim, leha‘alot ‘al micbaH yhoh. 
2_chronicles 29:22	wayishHaTu habaqar, wayqabelu hakohanim ’et hadam, wayicrequ hamicbeiHah; wayishHaTu ha’eilim, wayicrequ hadam hamicbeiHah, wayishHaTu hakewasim, wayicrequ hadam hamicbeiHah. 
2_chronicles 29:23	wayagishu ’et se‘irei haHaTat, lifnei hamelekh wehaqahal; wayismekhu yedeihem ‘aleihem. 
2_chronicles 29:24	wayishHaTum hakohanim, wayHaTe’u ’et damam hamicbeiHah, lekhapeir ‘al kal yisra’eil; ki lekhal yisra’eil ’amar hamelekh, ha‘olah wehaHaTat. 
2_chronicles 29:25	waya‘ameid ’et halwiyim beit yhoh bimziltayim binwalim uwekhinorot, bemizwat dawid wegad Hoceih hamelekh wenatan hanawi; ki weyad yhoh hamizwah beyad newi’aw.
2_chronicles 29:26	waya‘amdu halwiyim bikhlei dawid, wehakohanim baHazozerot.
2_chronicles 29:27	wayomer Hicqiyahu, leha‘alot ha‘olah lehamicbeiaH; uwe‘eit heiHeil ha‘olah, heiHeil shir yhoh wehaHazozerot, we‘al yedei, kelei dawid melekh yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 29:28	wekhal haqahal mishtaHawim, wehashir meshoreir, wehaHazozerot maHazozerim maHzerim; hakol ‘ad likhlot ha‘olah. 
2_chronicles 29:29	ukhekhalot leha‘alot; kare‘u, hamelekh wekhal hanimze’im ’ito wayishtaHawu. 
2_chronicles 29:30	wayomer yeHicqiyahu hamelekh wehasarim lalwiyim, lehaleil yhoh, bediwrei dawid we’asaf haHoceh; wayhalu ‘ad lesimHah, wayiqedu wayishtaHawu.
2_chronicles 29:31	waya‘an yeHicqiyahu wayomer, ‘atah mileitem yedkhem yhoh, goshu wehawi’u cewaHim wetodot leweit yhoh; wayawi’u haqahal cewaHim wetodot, wekhal nediw leiw ‘olot. 
2_chronicles 29:32	wayhi mispar ha‘olah ’asher heiwi’u haqahal baqar shiw‘im, ’eilim mei’ah kewasim matayim; le‘olah yhoh kal ’eileh. 
2_chronicles 29:33	wehaqodashim; baqar sheish mei’ot, wezon sheloshet ’alafim. 
2_chronicles 29:34	raq hakohanim hayu lim‘aT, welo yakhelu, lehafshiT ’et kal ha‘olot; wayeHaccequm ’aHeihem halwiyim, ‘ad kelot hamelakhah we‘ad yitqadeshu hakohanim, ki halwiyim yishrei leiwaw, lehitqadeish meihakohanim. 
2_chronicles 29:35	wegam ‘olah larow beHelwei hashelamim uwanesakhim la‘olah; watikon ‘awodat beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 29:36	wayismaH yeHicqiyahu wekhal ha‘am, ‘al haheikhin ha’elohim la‘am; ki befit’om hayah hadawar.
2_chronicles 30:1	wayishlaH yeHicqiyahu ‘al kal yisra’eil wihudah, wegam ’igerot kataw ‘al ’efrayim umenasheh, lawo leweit yhoh birushalim; la‘asot pesaH, yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 30:2	wayiwwa‘az hamelekh wesaraw wekhal haqahal birushalim; la‘asot hapesaH baHodesh hasheini. 
2_chronicles 30:3	ki lo yakhelu la‘asoto ba‘eit hahi; ki hakohanim lo hitqadeshu lemaday, weha‘am lo ne’esfu lirushalim. 
2_chronicles 30:4	wayishar hadawar be‘einei hamelekh; uwe‘einei kal haqahal. 
2_chronicles 30:5	waya‘amidu dawar, leha‘awir qol bekhal yisra’eil mibe’eir shewa‘ we‘ad dan, lawo la‘asot pesaH yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil birushalim; ki lo larow ‘asu kakatuw. 
2_chronicles 30:6	wayeilekhu harazim ba’igerot miyad hamelekh wesaraw, bekhal yisra’eil wihudah, ukhemizwat hamelekh leimor; benei yisra’eil, shuwu ’el yhoh ’elohei ’awraham yizHaq weyisra’eil, weyashow ’el hapeleiTah, hanish’eret lakhem, mikaf malkhei ’ashur. 
2_chronicles 30:7	we’al tihyu, ka’awoteikhem wekha’aHeikhem, ’asher ma‘alu, yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem; wayiteneim leshamah, ka’asher ’atem ro’im. 
2_chronicles 30:8	‘atah ’al taqshu ‘arepekhem ka’awoteikhem; tenu yad yhoh uwo’u lemiqdasho ’asher hiqdish le‘olam, we‘iwdu ’et yhoh ’eloheikhem, weyashow mikem Haron ’apo. 
2_chronicles 30:9	ki weshuwekhem ‘al yhoh ’aHeikhem uweneikhem leraHamim lifnei showeihem, welashuw la’arez haccot; ki Hanun weraHum yhoh ’eloheikhem, welo yasir panim mikem, ’im tashuwu ’eilaw.
2_chronicles 30:10	wayihyu harazim ‘owerim mei‘ir la‘ir be’erez ’efrayim umenasheh we‘ad cewulun; wayihyu masHiqim ‘aleihem, umal‘igim bam. 
2_chronicles 30:11	’akh ’anashim mei’asheir umenasheh umiccewulun; nikhne‘u, wayawo’u lirushalim. 
2_chronicles 30:12	gam bihudah, hayetah yad ha’elohim, lateit lahem leiw ’eHad; la‘asot mizwat hamelekh wehasarim bidwar yhoh. 
2_chronicles 30:13	wayei’asefu yerushalim ‘am raw, la‘asot ’et Hag hamazot baHodesh hasheini; qahal larow me’od. 
2_chronicles 30:14	wayaqumu wayasiru ’et hamicbeHot, ’asher birushalim; we’eit kal hamqaTerot heisiru, wayashlikhu lenaHal qidron. 
2_chronicles 30:15	wayishHaTu hapesaH, be’arba‘ah ‘asar laHodesh hasheini; wehakohanim wehalwiyim nikhlemu wayitqadeshu, wayawi’u ‘olot beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 30:16	waya‘amdu ‘al ‘amedam kemishpaTam, ketorat mosheh ’ish ha’elohim; hakohanim coreqim ’et hadam, miyad halwiyim. 
2_chronicles 30:17	ki rabat baqahal ’asher lo hitqadashu; wehalwiyim ‘al sheHiTat hapesaHim, lekhol lo Tahor, lehaqdish yhoh. 
2_chronicles 30:18	ki marbit ha‘am rabat mei’efrayim umenasheh yisashkhar ucewulun lo hiTeharu, ki ’akhelu ’et hapesaH belo khakatuw; ki hitpaleil yeHicqiyahu ‘aleihem leimor, yhoh haTow yekhapeir be‘ad. 
2_chronicles 30:19	kal lewawo heikhin, lidrosh ha’elohim yhoh ’elohei ’awotaw; welo keTahorat haqodesh.
2_chronicles 30:20	wayishma‘ yhoh ’el yeHicqiyahu, wayirpa ’et ha‘am.
2_chronicles 30:21	waya‘asu wenei yisra’eil hanimze’im birushalim ’et Hag hamazot shiw‘at yamim besimHah gedolah; umehalim yhoh yom beyom halwiyim wehakohanim bikhlei ‘oc yhoh.
2_chronicles 30:22	waydabeir yeHicqiyahu, ‘al leiw kal halwiyim, hamaskilim seikhel Tow yhoh; wayokhelu ’et hamo‘eid shiw‘at hayamim, mecabeHim ciwHei shelamim, umitwadim, yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem.
2_chronicles 30:23	wayiwwa‘azu kal haqahal, la‘asot shiw‘at yamim ’aHeirim; waya‘asu shiw‘at yamim simHah. 
2_chronicles 30:24	ki Hicqiyahu melekh yehudah heirim laqahal ’elef parim weshiw‘at ’alafim zon s wehasarim heirimu laqahal parim ’elef, wezon ‘aseret ’alafim; wayitqadeshu khohanim larow. 
2_chronicles 30:25	wayismeHu kal qehal yehudah, wehakohanim wehalwiyim, wekhal haqahal haba’im miyisra’eil; wehageirim, haba’im mei’erez yisra’eil, wehayoshewim bihudah. 
2_chronicles 30:26	watehi simHah gedolah birushalim; ki mimei shelomoh wen dawid melekh yisra’eil, lo khacot birushalim.
2_chronicles 30:27	wayaqumu hakohanim halwiyim waywarakhu ’et ha‘am, wayishama‘ beqolam; watawo tefilatam lim‘on qadesho lashamayim.
2_chronicles 31:1	ukhekhalot kal cot, yaze’u kal yisra’eil hanimze’im le‘arei yehudah wayshaberu hamazeiwot waygade‘u ha’asheirim waynatezu ’et habamot we’et hamicbeHot mikal yehudah uwinyamin uwe’efrayim umenasheh ‘ad lekhaleih; wayashuwu kal benei yisra’eil ’ish la’aHuccato le‘areihem.
2_chronicles 31:2	waya‘ameid yeHicqiyahu ’et maHleqot hakohanim wehalwiyim ‘al maHleqotam ’ish kefi ‘awodato, lakohanim welalwiyim, le‘olah welishlamim; leshareit ulehodot ulehaleil, besha‘arei maHanot yhoh.
2_chronicles 31:3	umenat hamelekh min rekhusho la‘olot, le‘olot haboqer weha‘erew, weha‘olot, lashabatot weleHodashim welamo‘adim; kakatuw betorat yhoh. 
2_chronicles 31:4	wayomer la‘am leyoshewei yerushalim, lateit menat hakohanim wehalwiyim; lema‘an yeHecqu betorat yhoh. 
2_chronicles 31:5	wekhifroz hadawar, hirbu wenei yisra’eil reishit dagan, tirosh weyizhar udewash, wekhol tewu’at sadeh; uma‘sar hakol larow heiwi’u. 
2_chronicles 31:6	uwenei yisra’eil wihudah, hayoshewim be‘arei yehudah gam heim, ma‘sar baqar wazon, uma‘sar qadashim, hamqudashim yhoh ’eloheihem; heiwi’u wayitenu ‘areimot ‘areimot.
2_chronicles 31:7	baHodesh hashelishi, heiHeilu ha‘areimot leyissod; uwaHodesh hashewi‘i kilu.
2_chronicles 31:8	wayawo’u yeHicqiyahu wehasarim, wayir’u ’et ha‘areimot; waywarakhu ’et yhoh, we’eit ‘amo yisra’eil.
2_chronicles 31:9	wayidrosh yeHicqiyahu, ‘al hakohanim wehalwiyim ‘al ha‘areimot. 
2_chronicles 31:10	wayomer ’eilaw, ‘acaryahu hakohein harosh leweit zadoq; wayomer meihaHeil haterumah lawi weit yhoh ’akhol wesawoa‘ wehoteir ‘ad larow, ki yhoh beirakh ’et ‘amo, wehanotar ’et hehamon hacceh.
2_chronicles 31:11	wayomer yeHicqiyahu, lehakhin leshakhot beweit yhoh wayakhinu. 
2_chronicles 31:12	wayawi’u ’et haterumah wehama‘aseir wehaqodashim be’emunah; wa‘aleihem nagid konanyahu kananyahu haleiwi, weshim‘i ’aHihu mishneh. 
2_chronicles 31:13	wiHi’eil wa‘acacyahu wenaHat wa‘asah’eil wirimot weyocawad we’eli’eil weyismakhyahu, umaHat uwenayahu; peqidim, miyad kawnanyahu kananyahu weshim‘i ’aHiw, bemifqad yeHicqiyahu hamelekh, wa‘acaryahu negid beit ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 31:14	weqorei wen yimnah haleiwi hasho‘eir lamicraHah, ‘al nidwot ha’elohim; lateit terumat yhoh, weqadeshei haqodashim. 
2_chronicles 31:15	we‘al yado ‘eiden uminyamin weyeishua‘ ushema‘yahu ’amaryahu ushekhanyahu be‘arei hakohanim be’emunah; lateit la’aHeihem bemaHleqot, kagadol kaqaTan. 
2_chronicles 31:16	milewad hityaHsam lickharim, miben shalosh shanim ulema‘lah, lekhal haba leweit yhoh lidwar yom beyomo; la‘awodatam, bemishmerotam kemaHleqoteihem. 
2_chronicles 31:17	we’eit hityaHeis hakohanim leweit ’awoteihem, wehalwiyim, miben ‘esrim shanah ulema‘elah; bemishmeroteihem bemaHleqoteihem. 
2_chronicles 31:18	ulehityaHeis, bekhal Tapam nesheihem uweneihem uwenoteihem lekhal qahal; ki we’emunatam yitqadeshu qodesh. 
2_chronicles 31:19	weliwnei ’aharon hakohanim bisdei migrash ‘areihem bekhal ‘ir wa‘ir, ’anashim ’asher niqewu besheimot; lateit manot, lekhal cakhar bakohanim, ulekhal hityaHeis balwiyim. 
2_chronicles 31:20	waya‘as kacot yeHicqiyahu bekhal yehudah; waya‘as haTow wehayashar weha’emet, lifnei yhoh ’elohaw. 
2_chronicles 31:21	uwekhal ma‘aseh ’asher heiHeil ba‘awodat beit ha’elohim, uwatorah uwamizwah, lidrosh leilohaw; bekhal lewawo ‘asah wehizliaH.
2_chronicles 32:1	’aHarei hadewarim weha’emet ha’eileh, ba sanHeiriw melekh ’ashur; wayawo wihudah, wayiHan ‘al he‘arim habezurot, wayomer lewiq‘am ’eilaw. 
2_chronicles 32:2	wayar yeHicqiyahu, ki wa sanHeiriw; ufanaw lamilHamah ‘al yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 32:3	wayiwwa‘az, ‘im saraw wegiboraw, listom ’et meimei ha‘ayanot, ’asher miHuz la‘ir; waya‘ceruhu. 
2_chronicles 32:4	wayiqawezu ‘am raw, wayistemu ’et kal hama‘yanot, we’et hanaHal hashoTeif betokh ha’arez leimor; lamah yawo’u malkhei ’ashur, umaze’u mayim rabim. 
2_chronicles 32:5	wayitHaccaq wayiwen ’et kal haHomah haperuzah waya‘al ‘al hamigdalot, welaHuzah haHomah ’aHeret, wayHacceiq ’et hamilo ‘ir dawid; waya‘as shelaH larow umaginim. 
2_chronicles 32:6	wayitein sarei milHamot ‘al ha‘am; wayiqbezeim ’eilaw, ’el reHow sha‘ar ha‘ir, waydabeir ‘al lewawam leimor. 
2_chronicles 32:7	Hicqu we’imzu, ’al tire’u we’al teiHatu, mipenei melekh ’ashur, umilifnei kal hehamon ’asher ‘imo; ki ‘imanu raw mei‘imo. 
2_chronicles 32:8	‘imo ceroa‘ basar, we‘imanu yhoh ’eloheinu le‘acereinu, ulehilaHeim milHamoteinu; wayissamekhu ha‘am, ‘al diwrei yeHicqiyahu melekh yehudah.
2_chronicles 32:9	’aHar ceh, laH sanHeiriw melekh ’ashur ‘awadaw yerushalaymah, wehu ‘al lakhish, wekhal memshalto ‘imo; ‘al yeHicqiyahu melekh yehudah, we‘al kal yehudah ’asher birushalim leimor. 
2_chronicles 32:10	koh ’amar, sanHeiriw melekh ’ashur; ‘al mah ’atem boTeHim, weyoshewim bemazor birushalim. 
2_chronicles 32:11	halo yeHicqiyahu massit ’etkhem, lateit ’etkhem, lamut bera‘aw uwezama leimor; yhoh ’eloheinu, yazileinu mikaf melekh ’ashur. 
2_chronicles 32:12	halo hu yeHicqiyahu, heisir ’et bamotaw we’et micbeHotaw; wayomer lihudah welirushalim leimor, lifnei micbeiaH ’eHad tishtaHawu we‘alaw taqTiru. 
2_chronicles 32:13	halo teide‘u, meh ‘asiti ’ani wa’awotay, lekhol ‘amei ha’arazot; hayakhol yakhelu, ’elohei goyei ha’arazot, lehazil ’et ’arzam miyadi. 
2_chronicles 32:14	mi bekhal ’elohei hagoyim ha’eileh ’asher heHerimu ’awotay, ’asher yakhol, lehazil ’et ‘amo miyadi; ki yukhal ’eloheikhem, lehazil ’etkhem miyadi. 
2_chronicles 32:15	we‘atah ’al yashi ’etkhem Hicqiyahu we’al yassit ’etkhem kacot we’al ta’aminu lo ki lo yukhal, kal ’eloha kal go umamlakhah, lehazil ‘amo miyadi umiyad ’awotay; ’af ki ’eloheikhem, lo yazilu ’etkhem miyadi. 
2_chronicles 32:16	we‘od diberu ‘awadaw, ‘al yhoh ha’elohim; we‘al yeHicqiyahu ‘awdo. 
2_chronicles 32:17	usefarim kataw, leHareif yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil; weleimor ‘alaw leimor, keilohei goyei ha’arazot ’asher lo hizilu ‘amam miyadi, kein lo yazil ’elohei yeHicqiyahu ‘amo miyadi. 
2_chronicles 32:18	wayiqre’u weqol gadol yehudit, ‘al ‘am yerushalim ’asher ‘al haHomah, leyare’am ulewahalam; lema‘an yilkedu ’et ha‘ir. 
2_chronicles 32:19	waydaberu, ’el ’elohei yerushalim; ke‘al, ’elohei ‘amei ha’arez, ma‘aseih yedei ha’adam.
2_chronicles 32:20	wayitpaleil yeHicqiyahu hamelekh, wisha‘yahu wen ’amoz hanawi ‘al cot; wayic‘aqu hashamayim.
2_chronicles 32:21	wayishlaH yhoh mal’akh, wayakhHeid kal gibor Hayil wenagid wesar, bemaHaneih melekh ’ashur; wayashaw bewoshet panim le’arzo, wayawo beit ’elohaw, umizi’o umizi’ei mei‘aw, sham hipiluhu weHarew. 
2_chronicles 32:22	wayosha‘ yhoh ’et yeHicqiyahu we’eit yoshewei yerushalim, miyad sanHeiriw melekh ’ashur umiyad kol; waynahaleim missawiw. 
2_chronicles 32:23	werabim mewi’im minHah yhoh lirushalim, umigdanot, liHicqiyahu melekh yehudah; wayinasei le‘einei khal hagoyim mei’aHarei khein.
2_chronicles 32:24	bayamim haheim, Halah yeHicqiyahu ‘ad lamut; wayitpaleil ’el yhoh, wayomer lo, umofeit natan lo. 
2_chronicles 32:25	welo khigmul ‘alaw heishiw yeHicqiyahu, ki gawah libo; wayhi ‘alaw qezef, we‘al yehudah wirushalim. 
2_chronicles 32:26	wayikana‘ yeHicqiyahu begowah libo, hu weyoshewei yerushalim; welo wa ‘aleihem qezef yhoh, bimei yeHicqiyahu. 
2_chronicles 32:27	wayhi liHicqiyahu ‘osher wekhawod harbeih me’od; we’ozarot ‘asah lo lekhesef ulecahaw ule’ewen yeqarah, weliwsamim ulemaginim, ulekhol kelei Hemdah. 
2_chronicles 32:28	umiskenot, litwu’at dagan wetirosh weyizhar; we’urawot lekhal beheimah uweheimah, wa‘adarim la’aweirot. 
2_chronicles 32:29	we‘arim ‘asah lo, umiqneih zon uwaqar larow; ki natan lo ’elohim, rekhush raw me’od. 
2_chronicles 32:30	wehu yeHicqiyahu, satam ’et moza meimei giHon ha‘elyon, wayayshereim lemaTah ma‘rawah le‘ir dawid; wayazlaH yeHicqiyahu bekhal ma‘aseihu. 
2_chronicles 32:31	wekhein bimlizei sarei bawel, hamshaleHim ‘alaw lidrosh, hamofeit ’asher hayah wa’arez, ‘acawo ha’elohim; lenassoto, lada‘at kal bilwawo. 
2_chronicles 32:32	weyeter diwrei yeHicqiyahu waHasadaw; hinam ketuwim, baHacon yesha‘yahu wen ’amoz hanawi, ‘al seifer malkhei yehudah weyisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 32:33	wayishkaw yeHicqiyahu ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqberuhu bema‘aleih qiwrei wenei dawid wekhawod ‘asu lo wemoto, kal yehudah weyoshewei yerushalim; wayimlokh menasheh weno taHtaw.
2_chronicles 33:1	ben sheteim ‘esreih shanah menasheh wemalekho; waHamishim weHameish shanah, malakh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 33:2	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh; keto‘awot hagoyim, ’asher horish yhoh, mipenei benei yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 33:3	wayashaw, wayiwen ’et habamot, ’asher nitaz yeHicqiyahu ’awiw; wayaqem micbeHot labe‘alim waya‘as ’asheirot, wayishtaHu lekhal zewa hashamayim, waya‘awod ’otam. 
2_chronicles 33:4	uwanah micbeHot beweit yhoh; ’asher ’amar yhoh, birushalim yihyeh shemi le‘olam. 
2_chronicles 33:5	wayiwen micbeHot lekhal zewa hashamayim; bishtei Hazrot beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 33:6	wehu he‘ewir ’et banaw ba’eish begei wen hinom, we‘onein weniHeish wekhisheif, we‘asah ’ow weyide‘oni; hirbah, la‘asot hara‘ be‘einei yhoh lehakh‘iso. 
2_chronicles 33:7	wayasem ’et pesel hassemel ’asher ‘asah; beweit ha’elohim, ’asher ’amar ’elohim ’el dawid we’el shelomoh weno, babayit hacceh uwirushalim, ’asher baHarti mikol shiwTei yisra’eil, ’asim ’et shemi le‘eilom. 
2_chronicles 33:8	welo ’osif, lehasir ’et regel yisra’eil, mei‘al ha’adamah, ’asher he‘emadti la’awoteikhem; raq ’im yishmeru la‘asot, ’eit kal ’asher ziwwitim, lekhal hatorah wehaHuqim wehamishpaTim beyad mosheh. 
2_chronicles 33:9	wayeta‘ menasheh, ’et yehudah weyoshewei yerushalim; la‘asot ra‘, min hagoyim, ’asher hishmid yhoh, mipenei benei yisra’eil.
2_chronicles 33:10	waydabeir yhoh ’el menasheh we’el ‘amo welo hiqshiwu. 
2_chronicles 33:11	wayawei yhoh ‘aleihem, ’et sarei hazawa ’asher lemelekh ’ashur, wayilkedu ’et menasheh baHoHim; waya’asruhu banHushtayim, wayolikhuhu bawelah. 
2_chronicles 33:12	ukhehazeir lo, Hilah ’et penei yhoh ’elohaw; wayikana‘ me’od, milifnei ’elohei ’awotaw. 
2_chronicles 33:13	wayitpaleil ’eilaw, wayei‘ater lo wayishma‘ teHinato, wayshiweihu yerushalim lemalkhuto; wayeida‘ menasheh, ki yhoh hu ha’elohim. 
2_chronicles 33:14	we’aHarei khein banah Homah Hizonah le‘ir dawid ma‘rawah legiHon banaHal welawo wesha‘ar hadagim wesawaw la‘ofel, wayagbiheha me’od; wayasem sarei Hayil bekhal he‘arim habezurot bihudah. 
2_chronicles 33:15	wayasar ’et ’elohei haneikhar we’et hassemel mibeit yhoh, wekhal hamicbeHot, ’asher banah behar beit yhoh uwirushalim; wayashleikh Huzah la‘ir. 
2_chronicles 33:16	wayakhen wayiwen ’et micbaH yhoh, wayicbaH ‘alaw, ciwHei shelamim wetodah; wayomer lihudah, la‘awod ’et yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 33:17	’awal ‘od ha‘am, coweHim babamot; raq yhoh ’eloheihem. 
2_chronicles 33:18	weyeter diwrei menasheh utefilato ’el ’elohaw wediwrei haHocim, hamdaberim ’eilaw, besheim yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil; hinam ‘al diwrei malkhei yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 33:19	utefilato wehei‘ater lo wekhal HaTato uma‘lo wehameqomot, ’asher banah wahem bamot wehe‘emid ha’asheirim wehapesilim, lifnei hikane‘o; hinam ketuwim, ‘al diwrei Hocay. 
2_chronicles 33:20	wayishkaw menasheh ‘im ’awotaw, wayiqberuhu beito; wayimlokh ’amon beno taHtaw.
2_chronicles 33:21	ben ‘esrim ushetayim shanah ’amon bemalekho; ushetayim shanim, malakh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 33:22	waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh, ka’asher ‘asah menasheh ’awiw; ulekhal hapesilim, ’asher ‘asah menasheh ’awiw, cibaH ’amon waya‘awdeim. 
2_chronicles 33:23	welo nikhna‘ milifnei yhoh, kehikana‘ menasheh ’awiw; ki hu ’amon hirbah ’ashmah. 
2_chronicles 33:24	wayiqsheru ‘alaw ‘awadaw, waymituhu beweito. 
2_chronicles 33:25	wayaku ‘am ha’arez, ’eit kal haqosherim ‘al hamelekh ’amon; wayamlikhu ‘am ha’arez ’et yoshiyahu weno taHtaw.
2_chronicles 34:1	ben shemoneh shanim yoshiyahu wemalekho; usheloshim we’aHat shanah, malakh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 34:2	waya‘as hayashar be‘einei yhoh; wayeilekh, bedarkhei dawid ’awiw, welo sar yamin usemol. 
2_chronicles 34:3	uwishmoneh shanim lemalekho, wehu ‘odenu na‘ar, heiHeil lidrosh leilohei dawid ’awiw; uwishteim ‘esreih shanah, heiHeil leTaheir, ’et yehudah wirushalim, min habamot weha’asheirim, wehapesilim wehamasseikhot. 
2_chronicles 34:4	waynatezu lefanaw, ’eit micbeHot habe‘alim, wehaHamanim ’asher lema‘lah mei‘aleihem gideia‘; weha’asheirim wehapesilim wehamasseikhot shibar weheidaq, wayicroq ‘al penei haqewarim, haccoweHim lahem. 
2_chronicles 34:5	we‘azmot kohanim, saraf ‘al micbeHotaym micbeHotam; wayTaheir ’et yehudah we’et yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 34:6	uwe‘arei menasheh we’efrayim weshim‘on we‘ad naftali; bahar bateihem beHarwoteihem sawiw. 
2_chronicles 34:7	waynateiz ’et hamicbeHot, we’et ha’asheirim wehapesilim kitat leheidaq, wekhal haHamanim gida‘ bekhal ’erez yisra’eil; wayashaw lirushalim.
2_chronicles 34:8	uwishnat shemoneh ‘esreih lemalekho, leTaheir ha’arez wehabayit; laH ’et shafan ben ’azalyahu we’et ma‘aseiyahu sar ha‘ir, we’eit yo’aH ben yo’aHac hamackir, leHacceiq ’et beit yhoh ’elohaw. 
2_chronicles 34:9	wayawo’u ’el Hilqiyahu hakohein hagadol, wayitenu ’et hakesef hamuwa weit ’elohim ’asher ’asefu halwiyim shomerei hassaf miyad menasheh we’efrayim, umikol she’eirit yisra’eil, umikal yehudah uwinyamin; weyoshewei wayashuwu yerushalim. 
2_chronicles 34:10	wayitenu, ‘al yad ‘oseih hamelakhah, hamufqadim beweit yhoh; wayitenu ’oto ‘osei hamelakhah, ’asher ‘osim beweit yhoh, liwdoq uleHacceiq habayit. 
2_chronicles 34:11	wayitenu, leHarashim welabonim, liqnot ’awnei maHzeiw, we‘eizim lamHaberot; uleqarot ’et habatim, ’asher hishHitu malkhei yehudah. 
2_chronicles 34:12	weha’anashim ‘osim be’emunah bamelakhah, wa‘aleihem mufqadim yaHat we‘owadyahu halwiyim min benei merari, ucekharyah umeshulam min benei haqehatim lenazeiaH; wehalwiyim, kal meiwin bikhlei shir. 
2_chronicles 34:13	we‘al hassabalim, umenazeHim lekhol ‘oseih melakhah, la‘awodah wa‘awodah; umeihalwiyim, sofrim weshoTerim wesho‘arim. 
2_chronicles 34:14	uwehozi’am ’et hakesef, hamuwa beit yhoh; maza Hilqiyahu hakohein, ’et seifer torat yhoh beyad mosheh. 
2_chronicles 34:15	waya‘an Hilqiyahu, wayomer ’el shafan hassofeir, seifer hatorah mazati beweit yhoh; wayitein Hilqiyahu ’et hasseifer ’el shafan. 
2_chronicles 34:16	wayawei shafan ’et hasseifer ’el hamelekh, wayashew ‘od ’et hamelekh dawar leimor; kol ’asher nitan beyad ‘awadekha heim ‘osim. 
2_chronicles 34:17	wayatikhu ’et hakesef hanimza beweit yhoh; wayitenuhu, ‘al yad hamufqadim, we‘al yad ‘osei hamelakhah. 
2_chronicles 34:18	wayageid shafan hassofeir lamelekh leimor, seifer natan li, Hilqiyahu hakohein; wayiqra wo shafan lifnei hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 34:19	wayhi kishmoa‘ hamelekh, ’eit diwrei hatorah; wayiqra‘ ’et begadaw. 
2_chronicles 34:20	wayzaw hamelekh ’et Hilqiyahu we’et ’aHiqam benosha fan we’et ‘awdon ben mikhah we’eit shafan hassofeir, we’eit ‘asayah ‘ewed hamelekh leimor. 
2_chronicles 34:21	lekhu dirshu ’et yhoh ba‘adi, uwe‘ad hanish’ar beyisra’eil uwihudah, ‘al diwrei hasseifer ’asher nimza; ki gedolah Hamat yhoh ’asher nitekhah wanu, ‘al ’asher lo shameru ’awoteinu ’et dewar yhoh, la‘asot kekhal hakatuw ‘al hasseifer hacceh.
2_chronicles 34:22	wayeilekh Hilqiyahu wa’asher hamelekh, ’el Huldah hanewi’ah ’eishet shalum ben toqhat taqehat, ben Hasrah shomeir habegadim, wehi yoshewet birushalim bamishneh; waydaberu ’eileha kacot.
2_chronicles 34:23	watomer lahem, koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil; ’imru la’ish, ’asher shalaH ’etkhem ’eilay.
2_chronicles 34:24	koh ’amar yhoh, hini meiwi ra‘ah ‘al hamaqom hacceh we‘al yoshewaw; ’eit kal ha’alot haketuwot ‘al hasseifer, ’asher qare’u, lifnei melekh yehudah. 
2_chronicles 34:25	taHat ’asher ‘acawuni, wayaqTiru wayqaTeru leilohim ’aHeirim, lema‘an hakh‘iseini, bekhol ma‘asei yedeihem; wetitakh Hamati bamaqom hacceh welo tikhbeh. 
2_chronicles 34:26	we’el melekh yehudah, hasholeiaH ’etkhem lidrosh yhoh, koh tomeru ’eilaw; s koh ’amar yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil, hadewarim ’asher shama‘eta. 
2_chronicles 34:27	ya‘an rakh lewawekha watikana‘ milifnei ’elohim, beshame‘akha ’et dewaraw ‘al hamaqom hacceh we‘al yoshewaw, watikana‘ lefanay, watiqra‘ ’et begadekha wateiwek lefanay; wegam ’ani shama‘ti ne’um yhoh. 
2_chronicles 34:28	hini ’osifkha ’el ’awotekha, wene’esafta ’el qiwrotekha beshalom welo tir’enah ‘einekha, bekhol hara‘ah, ’asher ’ani meiwi ‘al hamaqom hacceh we‘al yoshewaw; wayashiwu ’et hamelekh dawar.
2_chronicles 34:29	wayishlaH hamelekh; waye’esof ’et kal ciqnei yehudah wirushalim. 
2_chronicles 34:30	waya‘al hamelekh beit yhoh wekhal ’ish yehudah weyoshewei yerushalim, wehakohanim wehalwiyim, wekhal ha‘am migadol we‘ad qaTan; wayiqra we’aceneihem, ’et kal diwrei seifer haberit, hanimza beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 34:31	waya‘amod hamelekh ‘al ‘amedo, wayikhrot ’et haberit lifnei yhoh lalekhet ’aHarei yhoh welishmor ’et mizwotaw we‘eidewotaw weHuqaw, bekhal lewawo uwekhal nafsho; la‘asot ’et diwrei haberit, haketuwim ‘al hasseifer hacceh. 
2_chronicles 34:32	waya‘ameid ’eit kal hanimza wirushalim uwinyamin; waya‘asu yoshewei yerushalim, kiwrit ’elohim ’elohei ’awoteihem. 
2_chronicles 34:33	wayasar yoshiyahu ’et kal hato‘eiwot, mikal ha’arazot ’asher liwnei yisra’eil waya‘aweid, ’eit kal hanimza beyisra’eil, la‘awod ’et yhoh ’eloheihem; kal yamaw lo saru, mei’aHarei yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem.
2_chronicles 35:1	waya‘as yoshiyahu wirushalim pesaH yhoh; wayishHaTu hapesaH, be’arba‘ah ‘asar laHodesh harishon. 
2_chronicles 35:2	waya‘ameid hakohanim ‘al mishmerotam; wayHacceqeim, la‘awodat beit yhoh. 
2_chronicles 35:3	wayomer lalwiyim hamewunim hamewinim lekhal yisra’eil haqedoshim yhoh tenu ’et ’aron haqodesh babayit ’asher banah shelomoh wen dawid melekh yisra’eil, ’ein lakhem masa bakateif; ‘atah, ‘iwdu ’et yhoh ’eloheikhem, we’eit ‘amo yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 35:4	wehikonu leweit ’awoteikhem kemaHleqoteikhem; bikhtaw, dawid melekh yisra’eil, uwemikhtaw shelomoh weno. 
2_chronicles 35:5	we‘imdu waqodesh, liflugot beit ha’awot, la’aHeikhem benei ha‘am; waHaluqat beit ’aw lalwiyim. 
2_chronicles 35:6	weshaHaTu hapasaH; wehitqadeshu wehakhinu la’aHeikhem, la‘asot kidwar yhoh beyad mosheh.
2_chronicles 35:7	wayarem yoshiyahu liwnei ha‘am zon kewasim uwenei ‘iccim hakol lapesaHim lekhal hanimza, lemispar sheloshim ’elef, uwaqar sheloshet ’alafim; ’eileh meirekhush hamelekh.
2_chronicles 35:8	wesaraw lindawah la‘am lakohanim welalwiyim heirimu; Hilqiyah ucekharyahu wiHi’eil, negidei beit ha’elohim, lakohanim natenu lapesaHim, ’alpayim wesheish mei’ot, uwaqar shelosh mei’ot. 
2_chronicles 35:9	wekhawnanyahu wekhananyahu ushema‘yahu unetan’eil ’eHaw, waHashawyahu wi‘i’eil weyocawad sarei halwiyim; heirimu lalwiyim lapesaHim Hameishet ’alafim, uwaqar Hameish mei’ot. 
2_chronicles 35:10	watikon ha‘awodah; waya‘amdu hakohanim ‘al ‘amedam wehalwiyim ‘al maHleqotam kemizwat hamelekh. 
2_chronicles 35:11	wayishHaTu hapasaH; wayicrequ hakohanim miyadam, wehalwiyim mafshiTim. 
2_chronicles 35:12	wayasiru ha‘olah letitam lemiflagot leweit ’awot liwnei ha‘am, lehaqriw yhoh, kakatuw beseifer mosheh; wekhein labaqar. 
2_chronicles 35:13	waywashelu hapesaH ba’eish kamishpaT; wehaqodashim bishelu, bassirot uwadewadim uwazeilaHot, wayarizu lekhal benei ha‘am. 
2_chronicles 35:14	we’aHar, heikhinu lahem welakohanim, ki hakohanim benei ’aharon, beha‘alot ha‘olah wehaHalawim ‘ad layelah; wehalwiyim heikhinu lahem, welakohanim benei ’aharon. 
2_chronicles 35:15	wehamshorarim benei ’asaf ‘al ma‘amadam, kemizwat dawid we’asaf weheiman widutun Hoceih hamelekh, wehasho‘arim lesha‘ar washa‘ar; ’ein lahem, lasur mei‘al ‘awodatam, ki ’aHeihem halwiyim heikhinu lahem. 
2_chronicles 35:16	watikon kal ‘awodat yhoh bayom hahu la‘asot hapesaH, weha‘alot ‘olot, ‘al micbaH yhoh; kemizwat hamelekh yoshiyahu. 
2_chronicles 35:17	waya‘asu wenei yisra’eil hanimze’im ’et hapesaH ba‘eit hahi; we’et Hag hamazot shiw‘at yamim. 
2_chronicles 35:18	welo na‘asah fesaH kamohu beyisra’eil, mimei shemu’eil hanawi; wekhal malkhei yisra’eil lo ‘asu kapesaH ’asher ‘asah yoshiyahu wehakohanim wehalwiyim wekhal yehudah weyisra’eil hanimza, weyoshewei yerushalim.
2_chronicles 35:19	bishmoneh ‘esreih shanah, lemalkhut yoshiyahu; na‘asah hapesaH hacceh. 
2_chronicles 35:20	’aHarei khal cot, ’asher heikhin yoshiyahu ’et habayit, ‘alah nekho melekh mizrayim lehilaHeim bekharkemish ‘al perat; wayeizei liqrato yoshiyahu. 
2_chronicles 35:21	wayishlaH ’eilaw mal’akhim leimor mah li walakh melekh yehudah, lo ‘alekha ’atah hayom ki ’el beit milHamti, weilohim ’amar lewahaleini; Hadal lekha mei’elohim ’asher ‘imi we’al yashHitekha. 
2_chronicles 35:22	welo heiseiw yoshiyahu fanaw mimenu, ki lehilaHeim bo hitHapeis, welo shama‘ ’el diwrei nekho mipi ’elohim; wayawo lehilaHeim bewiq‘at megido. 
2_chronicles 35:23	wayoru hayorim, lamelekh yoshiyahu; wayomer hamelekh la‘awadaw ha‘awiruni, ki haHoleiti me’od. 
2_chronicles 35:24	waya‘awiruhu ‘awadaw min hamerkawah, wayarkiwuhu ‘al rekhew hamishneh ’asher lo wayolikhuhu yerushalim, wayamat wayiqaweir beqiwrot ’awotaw; wekhal yehudah wirushalim, mit’abelim ‘al yoshiyahu.
2_chronicles 35:25	wayqonein yirmeyahu ‘al yoshiyahu wayomeru khal hasharim wehasharot beqinoteihem ‘al yoshiyahu ‘ad hayom, wayitenum leHoq ‘al yisra’eil; wehinam ketuwim ‘al haqinot. 
2_chronicles 35:26	weyeter diwrei yoshiyahu waHasadaw; kakatuw betorat yhoh. 
2_chronicles 35:27	udewaraw harishonim weha’aHaronim; hinam ketuwim, ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’eil wihudah. 
2_chronicles 36:1	wayiqHu ‘am ha’arez, ’et yeho’aHac ben yoshiyahu; wayamlikhuhu taHat ’awiw birushalim. 
2_chronicles 36:2	ben shalosh we‘esrim shanah yo’aHac bemalekho; usheloshah Hodashim, malakh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 36:3	waysireihu melekh mizrayim birushalim; waya‘anosh ’et ha’arez, mei’ah khikar kesef wekhikar cahaw. 
2_chronicles 36:4	wayamleikh melekh mizrayim ’et ’elyaqim ’aHiw, ‘al yehudah wirushalim, wayasseiw ’et shemo yehoyaqim; we’et yo’aHac ’aHiw laqaH nekho, waywi’eihu mizrayemah.
2_chronicles 36:5	ben ‘esrim weHameish shanah yehoyaqim bemalekho, we’aHat ‘esreih shanah, malakh birushalim; waya‘as hara‘, be‘einei yhoh ’elohaw. 
2_chronicles 36:6	‘alaw ‘alah, newukhadnezar melekh bawel; waya’asreihu banHushtayim, leholikho bawelah. 
2_chronicles 36:7	umikelei beit yhoh, heiwi newukhadnezar lewawel; wayiteneim beheikhalo bewawel. 
2_chronicles 36:8	weyeter diwrei yehoyaqim weto‘awotaw ’asher ‘asah wehanimza ‘alaw, hinam ketuwim, ‘al seifer malkhei yisra’eil wihudah; wayimlokh yehoyakhin beno taHtaw.
2_chronicles 36:9	ben shemoneh shanim yehoyakhin bemalekho, usheloshah Hodashim wa‘aseret yamim, malakh birushalim; waya‘as hara‘ be‘einei yhoh. 
2_chronicles 36:10	welitshuwat hashanah, shalaH hamelekh newukhadnezar, waywi’eihu wawelah, ‘im kelei Hemdat beit yhoh; wayamleikh ’et zidqiyahu ’aHiw, ‘al yehudah wirushalim.
2_chronicles 36:11	ben ‘esrim we’aHat shanah zidqiyahu wemalekho; we’aHat ‘esreih shanah, malakh birushalim. 
2_chronicles 36:12	waya‘as hara‘, be‘einei yhoh ’elohaw; lo nikhna‘, milifnei yirmeyahu hanawi mipi yhoh. 
2_chronicles 36:13	wegam bamelekh newukhadnezar marad, ’asher hishbi‘o beilohim; wayeqesh ’et ‘arepo way’ameiz ’et lewawo, mishuw ’el yhoh ’elohei yisra’eil. 
2_chronicles 36:14	gam kal sarei hakohanim weha‘am hirbu lim‘al ma‘al, kekhol to‘awot hagoyim; wayTame’u ’et beit yhoh, ’asher hiqdish birushalim. 
2_chronicles 36:15	wayishlaH yhoh ’elohei ’awoteihem ‘aleihem beyad mal’akhaw hashkeim weshaloaH; ki Hamal ‘al ‘amo we‘al me‘ono. 
2_chronicles 36:16	wayihyu mal‘iwim bemal’akhei ha’elohim, uwocim dewaraw, umita‘te‘im binwi’aw; ‘ad ‘alot Hamat yhoh be‘amo ‘ad le’ein marpei. 
2_chronicles 36:17	waya‘al ‘aleihem ’et melekh kasdiyim kasdim, wayaharog baHureihem baHerew beweit miqdasham, welo Hamal ‘al baHur uwetulah caqein weyasheish; hakol natan beyado. 
2_chronicles 36:18	wekhol kelei beit ha’elohim hagedolim wehaqeTanim, we’ozerot beit yhoh, we’ozerot hamelekh wesaraw; hakol heiwi wawel. 
2_chronicles 36:19	wayisrefu ’et beit ha’elohim, waynatezu, ’eit Homat yerushalim; wekhal ’armenoteha sarefu wa’eish, wekhal kelei maHamadeha lehashHit.
2_chronicles 36:20	wayegel hashe’eirit min haHerew ’el bawel; wayihyu lo ulewanaw la‘awadim, ‘ad melokh malkhut paras. 
2_chronicles 36:21	lemalot dewar yhoh befi yirmeyahu, ‘ad razetah ha’arez ’et shabetoteha; kal yemei hashamah shawatah, lemalot shiw‘im shanah.
2_chronicles 36:22	uwishnat ’aHat, lekhoresh melekh paras, likhlot dewar yhoh befi yirmeyahu; hei‘ir yhoh ’et ruaH koresh melekh paras, waya‘awer qol bekhal malkhuto, wegam bemikhtaw leimor.
2_chronicles 36:23	koh ’amar koresh melekh paras, kal mamlekhot ha’arez natan li, yhoh ’elohei hashamayim, wehu faqad ‘alay liwnot lo wayit, birushalim ’asher bihudah; mi wakhem mikal ‘amo, yhoh ’elohaw ‘imo weya‘al.
